40001001	Maussauh haih zis gas Abraham dah nyei nyet, Dawi dah lo Yesu Khristu dah diuscaiq shap zis nghuot.
40001002	Abraham mas yaus zis Isak; Isak mas yaus zis Yakop; Yakop mas yaus zis Yuda yahge nyah vmang vnoeuh moq;
40001003	Yuda gas Pere yahge Zera lyis Tama masyah yaus zis nghuot. Pere mas yaus zis Hezron; Hezron mas yaus zis Ram;
40001004	Ram mas yaus zis Aminadab; Aminadab mas yaus zis Nashon; Nashon mas yaus zis Salmon;
40001005	Salmon gas Boaz lyis Rahab masyah yaus zis nghuot. Boaz gas Obed lyis Rutha masyah yaus zis nghuot. Obed mas yaus zis Yese;
40001006	Yese mas yaus zis hwankti Dawi; Dawi gas Solomon lyis Uria dah yhensain nyhiq nghuot ku soeu masyah yaus zis nghuot.
40001007	Solomon mas yaus zis Rehoboam; Rehoboam mas yaus zis Abiya; Abiya mas yaus zis Asa;
40001008	Asa mas yaus zis Yehoshaphat; Yehoshaphat mas yaus zis Yehoram; Yehoram mas yaus zis Uzia;
40001009	Uzia mas yaus zis Yotham; Yotham mas yaus zis Ahaz; Ahaz mas yaus zis Hezekia;
40001010	Hezekia mas yaus zis Manase; Manase mas yaus zis Amon; Amon mas yaus zis Yosia;
40001011	Babilon mau pheh jons loh las nyeis dah uhlyis Yosia mas yaus zis Yekhonia yahge nyah vmang vnoeuh moq;
40001012	Babilon mau pheh jons loh thang lhyi Yekhonia mas yaus zis Shealtiel; Shealtiel mas yaus zis Zerubabe;
40001013	Zerubabe mas yaus zis Abiud; Abiud mas yaus zis Eliakim; Eliakim mas yaus zis Azor;
40001014	Azor mas yaus zis Zadok; Zadok mas yaus zis Akhim; Akhim mas yaus zis Eliud;
40001015	Eliud mas yaus zis Eleazar; Eleazar mas yaus zis Mathan; Mathan mas yaus zis Yakop;
40001016	Yakop mas yaus dah Yosep gas, Khristu ge dah Yesu lyis khoeu kat soeu Mari dah yhensain phoq nghuot.
40001017	Housoeh diuscaiq dvnganh lyis Abraham masyah Dawi jweh shoq dvci nyei caiq; Dawi masyah Babilon pheh jons loh yvmas jweh shoq dvci nyei caiq; Babilon pheh jons loh masyah Khristu mas jweh shoq dvci nyei caiq tsain nghuot.
40001018	Gvshih Yesu Khristu khoeu los cho ka heisoeh ge: Nyah ungwes Mari gas Yosep xiklyis kwank toh zis, nyah aiq yuk ma zomhgoh shih lyis Gyingshang Dyos masyah, Mari dah ung mha loshang bos los zis lyis tsain seq.
40001019	Gvshih nyah yhensain phoq Yosep gas dan soeu nghuot yvmvyah, Mari lyis svbih xikkhonh mas xoq ma mes lhoeu phuh las tsoek yah she tyamp das, ge nghamh thyet.
40001020	Nghuot laus eq nyang haih zis lyis nghamh yoeuh nyeis lyis, yoeuh aq,Yhensaindah loeuswons soeu nyang lyis yhetmoq mas nyvng xoeuq las taiq zis gas, Dawi dah lo Yosep eh, nvng Mari lyis nah yhensain nyhiq khyvlyis yoeus das xiklyis vgyuk: nyang loshang gungs lyis chi zis gas, Gyingshang Dyos masyah nghuot.
40001021	Nyang gas yukgis lo khoeu los das, nvng gas nyah nyings lyis Yesu oen yoh nyhink dyei das: khasoeh ge lyis, nyah vnyau vshih lyis nyamoq dah yaunos masyah khyuot yoeus das.
40001022	Gvshih haih cho dvnganh Yhensain dah lvpe mhayah taiq toh dang nyuk los bas jungh, ge bweh los.
40001023	Houka: Yoeuh aq, lonyi gyingh gas loshang gungs lyis chi lha yukgis lo khoeu los das; nyah nyings lyis Immanuel ge lui das, ge. Hauh vjyuk gas Mangso ka ngamoq yah dvgeh nyeis, ge zis nghuot.
40001024	Yosep yhet masyah toq los las,Yhensaindah loeuswons soeu taiq toh zis yah dvyhangteh, nyah yhensain nyhiq lyis yoeus.
40001025	Nghuot laus eq Mari nyah loxeih yukgis lo ma khoeu dvchank nyang yah ma zomhgoh. Yosep gas, nyah nyings lyis Yesu ge nyhink dyei.
40002001	Gvshih hwankti Herod zaih lyis, Yuda mau Betlehem mas Yesu khoeu los lyis yoeuh aq, joeui bos bang buisthuq shot pheh yah Yerusalem mas jweh los las,
40002002	Khoeu los dah Yuda Hwankti ka khamha nyeis lah? Buisthuq shot pheh nyah kyi lhyi ngamoq nyvng yvmvyah nyang lyis paiq das xiklyis ngamoq jweh los, ge.
40002003	Hwankti Herod hauh dang xauhgyo lyis, nyang yahge Yerusalem mas bang dvnganhmoq chiq las,
40002004	nyang gas nyamoq mas dah phudyei uhjyung jens yahge maussauh lhaih bang lyis tsainh toh las, Khristu khamha khoeu das zis lyis nyei.
40002005	Nyamoq taiq zis gas, Nyang lyis Yuda mau, Betlehem wugungs mas khoeu das: khasoeh ge lyis lvpe lhaihtoh zis gas,
40002006	Yuda mau Betlehem nvng gas, Yuda zau jens mas ngis thank soeu ma nghuot; Ngah vnyau Israel dius lyis shwih guon das zau gas, Nvng masyah thuq los das, ge.
40002007	Hauh uhlyis Herod gas, joeui bos bang lyis tsoek yah gauh khi yoeus las, hau kyi thuq los dah shishenh lyis jyuk-yang nyei gyo las,
40002008	nyang nyamoq lyis Betlehem mas nhang lha taiq zis gas, Namoq loshang lhyi jyuk-yang loh nyei xo lha, nyang lyis nyvng lho lhyi, ngos eq nyang lyis yoh paiq bas jungh, ngos lyis los taiq kyoh geh, ge.
40002009	Hwankti phoq dah dang lyis xauhgyo las, nyamoq thuq loh lyis, nyamoq buisthuq shot pheh nyvng kat dah kyi ka, loshang nyeis dah vtoeu mha loh no joq shoq nyamoq dah xik mas loh nyeis.
40002010	Hauh kyi lhyi tsain nyvng lyis, nyamoq svsoh gaus.
40002011	Hauh yhen mha tsain wvng loh lyis, loshang yahge nyah ungwes Mari lyis nyvng las, nyamoq phvluk zomhgyuis las nyang lyis paiq. Nyamoq dah zisyos phank las nyang lyis xing, loban yahge mura jyungshuk tsain dyei.
40002012	Nyamoq Herod jyank mas ma tauh loh das xiklyis yhetmoq mas thuq xoeuq las zaih nhang zis xauh yvmvyah, nyamoq gas nyamoq nyang mau pheh gohcho yah tauh loh.
40002013	Gvshih nyamoq loh khoq thang lhyi,Yhensaindah loeuswons soeu ka, Yosep lyis yhetmoq mas thuq xoeuq las taiq zis gas, Toq aq, Loshang yahge nyah ungwes lyis shwih las Egutu pheh cangh aq, ngos nvng lyis doms khi shishenh jweh shoq houmha nyeis aq: khasoeh ge lyis Herod gas loshang lhyi mhont das zis xo das, ge.
40002014	Housoeh nyang toq las nyenh lyis hauh loshang yahge nyah ungwes lyis shwih las Egutu pheh e.
40002015	Herod shei buisnyeis jweh shoq houmha nyeis. Hauh zis gas, Ngos ngah Lo lyis Egutu masyah khi yoeus goeus, ge lvpe dah nhuot masyah Yhensain taiq dah dang gas nyuk los bas jungh, ge bweh los.
40002016	Herod gas hau joeui bos bang yah nyang lyis hwah khoq zis seq lyis, nhaiqlom tsoeu zis yah, joeui bos bang nyang lyis taiq toh khoq dah shishenh lyis suon yoeuh las, hauh mau mas dius nhang lha, Betlehem yahge hauh wuxom mha nyeis dah yukgis lo aiq zvn masyah o pheh bang lyis sat nhang.
40002017	Lvpe Yeremia taiq khoq dah dang nyuk los goeus.
40002018	Hauh zis gas, Rama mas shei uhngauh, ngausdyeis ngausnhvp yah kukxi thwe lhyi xauhgyo; Rakhel gas nyah lo jens gvng mas kuk nyingh shohthang thauh zis lyis nhaiq ma yoh taink lo: Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq ma nyeis lo, ge.
40002019	Gvshih Herod shei thang lhyi, yoeuh aq, Yhensain dah loeuswons soeu ka, Yosep lyis Egutu mas yhetmoq mas thuq xoeuq las taiq zis gas,
40002020	Toq aq, loshang yahge nyah ungwes lyis shwih las Israel mau mas loh aq, hauh loshang dah kang lhyi xo bang shei goeus, ge.
40002021	Nyang toq las loshang yahge nyah ungwes lyis shwih las Israel mau pheh los.
40002022	Nghuot laus eq Akhela-u gas nyah uwus Herod gungsthaiq Yuda mau mas guon nyeis zis lyis nyang xauhgyo lyis, houmha wvng loh das zis gyuk nyeis. Hauh thoq lyis nyang lyis yhetmoq mas zaih nhang yvmvyah, Galile mau pheh loh las,
40002023	Nazaret ge dah wugungs dvkoeuq mas loh nyeis. Hauh zis gas, Nyang lyis Nazaret phoq ge lui das ge, lvpe jens taiq khoq dang nyuk los.
40003001	Hauh buisnyeis lyis jeisnyhop dyei soeu Yohan thuq los las, Yuda mau mhanhdyvp mas taiq hoeuh nyeis zis gas.
40003002	Maukhung munghdan jweh ni los las, nhaiqlom thaiq geh, ge.
40003003	Lvpe Esaia gas haih soeu cho heisoeh ge: Mhanhdyvp mas dvyuk kaiq nyeis dah thwe ka, Yhensain dah cho lhyi sont toh geh, Nyah chokhyoh lyis soq dan geh, ge.
40003004	Yohan ka, gola-u mauh dyi wuot, thyikdom mas shohyeis dyichih chih toh. Nyah wom gas janghgyik yahge mhanhdyvp mas dah dyoyhei nghuot.
40003005	Hauh uhlyis Yerusalem, Yuda mau gonh mas bang, Yodan lvng vwi vyvm mas bang dvnganh, nyah jyank mas e lha,
40003006	nyamoq dah yaunos lyis rhen lha, Yodan lvng Yohan jyank mas nyamoq jeisnyhop tsain kham.
40003007	Pharishe yahge Saduke jens nyoshoq jeisnyhop kham das xiklyis lyih yvlyis nyvng las, nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ywimuhtsanh vnyau eh, jweh los das dah nhaiqlom dyis masyah cangh das zis namoq lyis hank yah taiq kyingh goh lah?
40003008	Housoeh yvmvyah nhaiqlom thaiq zis yah mon yih dah vshih shih geh.
40003009	Namoq ehnyet mas Abraham gas namoq dah phauh thyeih nghuot oen vtaiq zo goh. Ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, Mangso ka haih lukzains masyah Abraham xiklyis lo jens yoh thuq los nhang.
40003010	Gvshih yangh wuzung gas saiqzains khyei mha toh goeus. Housoeh yvmvyah gis dah vshih ma shih dah vzains khanghmuh lyis thoeuq las nyi mas kat das.
40003011	Ngos namoq lyis nhaiqlom thaiq das xiklyis jeis yah jeisnyhop dvdyei shih, nghuot laus eq ngah thang mha los soeu ka ngah thoq lyis yombos soeu nghuot las, ngos gas hauh soeu dah thyvkoq dvng dyei das zis yangh ma mon. Nyang gas namoq lyis gyingshang Dyos yah eq, nyi yah eq jeisnyhop dyei das.
40003012	Nyang nyah thanjang mas guk lhank das xiklyis hauq chi toh. Nyang gukmos lyis jyi mha kat toh las, guksom lhyi ka ma jom nyi mas ngheq das, ge.
40003013	Hauh uhlyis Yesu gas Yohan loq mas jeisnyhop kham das xiklyis Galile mau masyah Yohan nyeis dah Yodan lvng mas jweh los.
40003014	Nghuot laus eq Yohan nyang lyis tomp las taiq, Ngos yuk nah jyank mas jeisnyhop dvkham chah zis, nvng ngah jyank mas lyih lhyeh, ge.
40003015	Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Gvshih gas heisoeh kuot aq, khasoeh ge lyis heisoeh kuot zis gas dan cho dvnganh nyuk los das xiklyis nghuot, ge. Housoeh ge lho lhyi nyang dvkham dyei.
40003016	Yesu jeisnyhop kham lha jeis khau mhayah toq los yah dvyih, nyah jyank mas maukhung phank los las, Mangso dah Dyos gas khotjyauh teh gyoh los las nyah thoq mas los no joq yvlyis ngos nyvng.
40003017	Maukhung mhayah thwe eq dvkoeuq los zis gas, Haih soeu ka ngos jyetdap dah ngah Lo nghuot, ngos nyang lyis nhaiqdoeus, ge.
40004001	Hauh thang lhyi yius yah shiwu zis xauh das xiklyis, Dyos gas Yesu lyis mhanhdyvp pheh shwih loh.
40004002	Wom ma zo zis nyeici nyeih nyeici nyens thang lhyi Yesu wom yuot.
40004003	Hauh thang lhyi yius nyah jyank mas los las taiq zis gas, Nvng Mangso dah Lo nghuot lyis gas, haih lukgoq lyis ohlhyoq bweh nhang aq, ge.
40004004	Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Dius gas ohlhyoq yah kyingh yoh dwis nyeis zis ma nghuot: Mangso nhuot masyah thuq dah dang khonh khanghmuh yah yoh dwis nyeis das, ge lhaih toh, ge.
40004005	Tsai, yius gas Yesu lyis Gyingshang wus Yerusalem mas shwih loh las, Yhenmuh thyoh mas yap nhang lha taiq zis gas,
40004006	Nvng Mangso dah Lo nghuot lyis gas o mha dyvm gyoh aq. Khasoeh ge lyis nah khyei lukzains mas ma thungh das xiklyis, nyang nyah loeuswons bang lyis tying toh las, nyamoq loq yah nvng lyis po yoeus das, ge lhaih toh, ge.
40004007	Yesu phuk taiq zis gas, Nvng Yhensain nah Mangso lhyi vshi yoeuh ge lhaih toh, ge.
40004008	Tsai, yius gas Yesu lyis svsoh nyhang dah boms thoq mas shwih doq loh las, mungkvn mas dah munghdan dvnganh yahge nyamoq dah kuhxing cho dvnganh lyis chixoeuq.
40004009	Yius gas, Nvng gop las ngos lyis paiq lyis gas, hauh zis dvnganh yah ngos nvng lyis dyei das, ge.
40004010	Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Satan eh, thuq loh aq: Khasoeh ge lyis nvng Yhensain nah Mangso lhyi paiq las, nyang lyis kyingh phuqsoe chah, ge lhaih toh, ge.
40004011	Yius gas Yesu jyank masyah gang loh goeus las, loeuswons bang nyang lyis los phuqsoe.
40004012	Yohan thung khyoq zis xauh cho Yesu xauhgyo lyis, nyang Galile mau pheh thuq khoq.
40004013	Nyang Nazaret mas ma nyeis. Zebulun yahge Napthali mau Galile Thomh yvm, Kaperna-um wus mas loh nyeis.
40004014	Haih cho ka, lvpe Esaia taiq khoq dang nyuk los das xiklyis nghuot.
40004015	Hauh zis gas, Zebulun mau yahge Napthali mau, thomh yvm chank yah, Yodan lvng thyitvp gohnyau bang nyeis dah Galile mau;
40004016	Mauchuotdwang mas tsung toh bang gas, bvng zainsmuh nyvng goeus. Shei mau yahge hauh siyet khau mha tsung toh bang jyank mas bvng zis thuq los goeus, ge.
40004017	Hauh shishenh masyah Yesu gas, Maukhung munghdan gas ni los goeus las namoq yaunos masyah tauh los geh, ge nyah loeus taiq hoeuh zoh loh.
40004018	Yesu Galile thomh yvm chank yah suh loh lyis, oeng nhoh zo dah vmang vnoeuh aiq yuk, Petru ge dah Simon yahge nyah vnoeuh Andre gas thomh mas nyho yah oeng gaiq nyeis zis lyis nyvng.
40004019	Yesu nyah zomh lyis taiq, Ngah thang mha chank los geh, ngos nah zomh lyis dius nhoh nhang das, ge.
40004020	Nyah zomh gas houjang yah nyamoq nyho tsain toh khoq las nyah thang mha chank loh.
40004021	Hou mhayah doms loh lyis, gohtoeu vmang vnoeuh dvzomh, Zebedi dah lotang Yaku yahge Yohan lyis nyvng. Nyamoq gas lhyik khau mha nyamoq uwus Zebedi yah dvgeh nyho pho nyeis. Yesu gas nyah zomh lyis khi.
40004022	Housoeh nyah zomh gas houjang yah nyah zomh dah uwus yahge lhyik lyis toh khoq las nyah thang mha chank loh.
40004023	Yesu gas Galile dvmau gonh loh las lyi jungs mas jyauh. Munghdan cho Gausyis Dang taiq hoeuh uhlyis yah, dius jens dah nos vja ja yahge noslom vja ja lyis gis los nhang.
40004024	Housoeh nyah nyings gas Siria dvmau gonh hoeuh loh yvmvyah, nyamoq gas nos bang, yau khih chang khih bang, yius kuq bang, chuot bang yahge gungsjen shei bang dvnganhmoq lyis nyah jyank mas shwih lyih las, nyang nyamoq lyis gis los nhang.
40004025	Housoeh Galile yahge Dekapoli mau, Yerusalem, Yuda mau yahge Yodan lvng thyitvp mas dah dius moqjens nyah thang mha chank los.
40005001	Dius moqjens nyvng lyis nyang boms thoq mas doq loh. Nyang tsung toh lyis nyah changlo jens nyah jyank mas los.
40005002	Hauh uhlyis nyang nyamoq lyis jyauh zoh lyis yah taiq zis gas,
40005003	Dyos mas shohjyen nyeis cho lhyi soh bang gas ngelhoq: Khasoeh ge lyis maukhung munghdan gas nyamoq zis nghuot.
40005004	Kukxi bang gas ngelhoq: Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas nhaiqtaink zis xauh das.
40005005	Ehnyet noeuh nhamp bang gas ngelhoq: Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas nyeisjvng lyis vso vlho xauh sain das.
40005006	Dan cho lhyi yuot shet bang gas ngelhoq: Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq jo los das.
40005007	Nhaiqnyen shoh seqgyo bang gas ngelhoq: Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas nhaiqnyen shohgyo zis xauh das.
40005008	Nhaiqlom gyingshang bang gas ngelhoq: Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas Mangso lhyi nyvng das.
40005009	Mehoq tamp bang gas ngelhoq: Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq lyis Mangso dah lo jens ge lui das.
40005010	Dan cho gvng mas shoeuhshih zis xauh bang gas ngelhoq: Khasoeh ge lyis maukhung munghdan gas nyamoq dah munghdan nghuot.
40005011	Ngah gvng mas svbih yah namoq lyis jwangh las shoeuhshih zis yahge ma ying khyvlyis tyi vja ja xo zis xauh lyis namoq ngelhoq.
40005012	Gaus geh svsoh gauslaus geh, khasoeh ge lyis maukhung mha namoq lyis phauh shangh zis gas svsoh kuh. Khasoeh ge lyis namoq xik mas dah lvpe jens lyis eq nyamoq houyah dvyhangteh shoeuhshih goeus, ge.
40005013	Namoq gas nyeisjvng dah coh nghuot: nghuot laus eq coh gas ngvm zis bi tyamp goeus ya, hauh zis lyis khasoeh doms yoh ngvm nhang das lah? Nghe pheh doeuh tyamp las svbih yah nang nheh das zis masyah lai las cha eq yhung pvjus lo.
40005014	Namoq gas mungkvn dah bvng zis nghuot: jing thoq mas kuot toh dah wugungs lyis hank eq ma yoh gos shung toh.
40005015	Nyibung lyis tuonh las dang yah hank ma tsungh lhunk toh; dvyhen gonh yah nyvng das xiklyis nyibung gus mas dvgyangh tuonh kih toh.
40005016	Housoeh las svbih gas namoq dah gis muhzoh lyis nyvng las, maukhung thoq mas namoq Uwus lyis chungh bas jungh, dius xikkhonh mas namoq dah bvng zis lyis pank dyei geh.
40005017	Ngos gas Moshe dah lyi yahge lvpe jens dah dang lyis lhoeu thyoq das xiklyis lyih oen vnghamh goh. Ngos gas lhoeu thyoq das xiklyis lyih zis ma nghuot, nyuk los nhang das xiklyis dvlyih.
40005018	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, maukhung yahge nyeisjvng lai loh laus eq, hauh lyi mas sauhchvp ngis dvkoeuq, dvzoq eq ma nyuk nyuk, i loh das zis ma nghuot.
40005019	Housoeh yvmvyah tyingtoh dang mas vtsihlo dvkoeuq lyis ma chank chank, svbih lyis housoeh jyauh nghuot lyis gas, maukhung munghdan mas hauh soeu lhyi ngis thank soeu ge lui das. Nghuot laus eq chank las jyauh soeu lhyi ka, maukhung munghdan mas kuh soeu ge lui langh das.
40005020	Ngos namoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq dah dan cho ka Pharishe jens yahge lyi svra jens dah dan cho thoq lyis ma zes lyis gas, namoq munghdan mas jyoengh ma xauh wvng das.
40005021	Dius vsat, sat soeu hank laus eq soetuon zis xauh das, ge gohnhamp yah taiq toh zis namoq xauhgyo goeus.
40005022	Ngos namoq lyis taiq bah: Dvyuk yuk nyah vmang vnoeuh lyis shohyos gungs mas nhaiqyo nghuot lyis gas, soetuon zis xauh das. Nyah vmang vnoeuh lyis, Nvng teh zis ge taiq soeu hank laus eq nhaiqbos huom dah soetuon zis xauh das. Nvng koh, ge sang soeu ka munyi thomh mas jweh das.
40005023	Housoeh yvmvyah hauh phon mha nvng nah jyungshuk chi e uhlyis, nah vmang vnoeuh yah nvng lyis yobos dvja ja huon chank bos lyis, nvng hauh uhlyis yoh nghamh soh lyis gas,
40005024	Hauh zis lyis phon xik mas toh khoq las, nah vmang vnoeuh yah shih cangxeih loh taiq tamp goh aq. Hauh thang lhyi lyih las nah jyungshuk lyis phudyei aq.
40005025	Nvng lyis zau kauq soeu yah cho mha dvgeh nghuot shih lyis, hauh soeu yah lvnyap taiq tamp goh aq. Housoeh ma nghuot lyis gas nvng lyis soetuon soeu jyank mas kyauh das. Soetuon soeu nvng lyis pyada lyis kyauh las, nyang gas nvng lyis thung khyoq das.
40005026	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, thang thank thunkcent kyvp ma dye cap dvchank, nvng hou mhayah yoh thuq los das zis ma nghuot.
40005027	Nyi shuot lvng vshuot ge gohnhamp dah bang taiq zis lyis namoq xauhgyo ku goeus.
40005028	Nghuot laus eq ngos namoq lyis taiq zis gas, Vmesbih lyis nyetnau zis yah yoeuh soeu hank eq nyah ehnyet mas hauh vmesbih yah nyi shuot goeus.
40005029	Housoeh las nah loqyos nyoqjeih yah nvng lyis shuot nhang lhyi, hauh yvlyis thuiq tyamp aq. Nvng nah dvgungs gonh lyis munyi thomh mas khyoq kat zis xauh das thoq lyis nah gungsdoeus dvkoeuq dyoq das zis gas nah xiklyis zes gis.
40005030	Nah loqyos loq yah nvng lyis shuot nhang lhyi, hauh yvlyis thyet doeuh tyamp aq: Khasoeh ge lyis nvng nah dvgungs gonh lyis munyi thomh mas khyoq kat zis xauh das thoq lyis, nah gungsdoeus dvkoeuq dyoq das zis gas nah xiklyis zes gis.
40005031	Nyah yhensain nyhiq lyis she tyamp mes soeu hank laus eq, nyang lyis kangh maussauh lhaih dyei bas jungh, ge dah dang eq joq.
40005032	Nghuot laus eq ngos namoq lyis taiq zis gas, Hank laus eq yauxi zis za ma nghuot lyis gas, yhensain nyhiq lyis she tyamp soeu hank laus eq, nyang lyis lvng shuot nhang zis nghuot. Hauh vmesbih lyis nyihwank yoeus soeu eq nyi shuot zis nghuot.
40005033	Tsai, Namoq ma jyoeng khyvlyis mau vkhi. Nvng Yhensain lhyi maukhi zis yah dvyhangteh yoh nyuk los das ge gohnhamp bang taiq khoq zis lyis namoq xauhgyo ku:
40005034	Nghuot laus eq ngos namoq lyis taiq zis gas, Mau khi nyang vkhi goh. Maukhung yah mau vkhi goh: khasoeh ge lyis hauh zis gas Mangso dah tank nghuot.
40005035	Nyeisjvng yah eq mau vkhi goh: houka Mangso dah nangte nghuot. Yerusalem yah mau vkhi, houka hwankti zainsmuh dah wus nghuot.
40005036	Nah uhloms yah mau vkhi, nvng nah cam dvkhvt yangh thyoeu bas jungh, noq bas jungh ge ma yoh kuot.
40005037	Nvng taiq dang mas, nghuot lyis gas nghuot, ma nghuot lyis eq ma nghuot, oen bas jungh: dang hei mhayah lai zis cha eq ma gis masyah los.
40005038	Nyoqjeih xiklyis nyoqjeih, zwis xiklyis zwis, dvm jyen cap, ge taiq khoq dah dang gas namoq xauhgyo ku.’
40005039	Nghuot laus eq ngos namoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ma gis soeu lhyi ma gis zis vdoms phuk. Nah loqyos bvlot tyuk dyei soeu lhyi gohtoeu dvshot eq lhaiq dyei shih aq.
40005040	Dvyuk yuk nvng lyis zau kauq las nah dyi yoeus mes soeu lhyi nah thoq dyi eq yoeus nhang shih aq.
40005041	Nvng lyis cho dvmain tsoengh loh nhang lhyi, nvng nyang yah dvgeh aiq main loh aq.
40005042	Nvng lyis sang soeu lhyi dyei aq; nah jyank masyah jyeih nghoh mes soeu lhyi jyeih dyei aq.
40005043	Nvng nah yhenkyoh lyis jyetdap las, nah jeswus lyis hoeng aq, ge taiq zis lyis namoq xauhgyo ku.
40005044	Nghuot laus eq ngos namoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq dah jeswus lyis jyetdap geh. Namoq lyis shoeuhshih bang lyis shvmanh dung dyei geh.
40005045	Housoeh lyis namoq gas maukhung mha nyeis, namoq Uwus dah lo jens duot das: khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas ma gis bang yahge gis bang thoq mas nyah buis lyis tso nhang lha, dan bang yahge ma dan bang thoq mas mau dvyih wus dyei nhang.
40005046	Namoq lyis jyetdap bang lyis kyingh namoq jyetdap lyis chah phauh shangh zis yoh das lah? Khoengh khywi bang eq housoeh gas kuot ma nghuot lhyeh?
40005047	Namoq dah vmang vnoeuh lyis kyingh jeshuh lyis gas gohnyau bang thoq lyis cha zes lah? Khoengh khywi bang eq housoeh gas kuot ma nghuot lhyeh?
40005048	Housoeh las maukhung mha namoq dah Uwus gas dyinghjet zis yah dvyhangteh namoq eq dyinghjet nyeis geh.
40006001	Namoq dah gis muhzoh lyis svbih nyvng bas jungh oen nyamoq xikkhonh mas ma kuot das xiklyis zaih geh: housoeh ma nghuot lyis gas, maukhung mha namoq Uwus jyank masyah khyik manh phauh yoh das zis ma nghuot.
40006002	Namoq vlu dyei uhlyis yah namoq nyang xikkhonh mas lvbuh vmuot goh: gis guons kuot bang gas lyi jungs mas, talhoeu mha svbih chungh das xiklyis kyingh dvtsain kuot nyeis. Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, nyamoq gas nyamoq dah khyikmanh phauh xauh yoeus goeus.
40006003	Nghuot laus eq nvng vlu dyei lyis, nah loqyos loq kuot zis loqwi loq lyis vseq nhang.
40006004	Housoeh lyis namoq vlu dyei zis gas tsoek yah nghuot las, tsoek yah gauh kuot yvlyis nyvng soeu, namoq Uwus gas namoq lyis phauh shangh das.
40006005	Namoq shvmanh dung uhlyis gis guons kuot bang teh vkuot goh: khasoeh ge lyis svbih yah nyamoq lyis nyvng bas jungh, ge lyi jungs mas, talhoeu chokangh mas yap las shvmanh dung das zis tsain o. Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, nyamoq gas nyamoq khyik manh phauh tsain yoh goeus.
40006006	Nghuot laus eq namoq gas shvmanh dung dah uhlyis vsainnyang yvplhunk khau mha wvng las, khomh nyheih lho lha, sam yvmas nyvng soeu, namoq dah Uwus lyis shvmanh dung geh; housoeh lyis tsoek yah kuot yvlyis nyvng soeu, namoq dah Uwus gas namoq lyis shvmanh dyei das.
40006007	Namoq shvmanh dung uhlyis gohnyau bang kuot teh dang nuk nuk las vdung goh: khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq dang nyoshoq dung gvng mas gyo yoeus dyei das, ge nghamh.
40006008	Namoq ma dung shih lyis yah namoq chah zis lyis namoq dah Uwus seq goeus yvmvyah nyamoq teh vkuot goh.
40006009	Housoeh las namoq heisoeh dung geh: Maukhung mha nyeis, ngamoq dah Uwus eh, Nah nyings gyingshang nyeis bas jungh.
40006010	Nah munghdan jweh los bas jungh; Maukhung mha nah ehnyet tap joq zis yah dvyhangteh, Nyeisjvng mas eq tap joq bas jungh.
40006011	Ngamoq chah nyeis dah wom jeis khvnyhik ngamoq lyis dyei aq.
40006012	Ngamoq lyis cu bang dah yobos lyis ngamoq khyuot dyei zis yah dvyhangteh, Ngamoq cu dah yobos lyis khyuot dyei aq.
40006013	Ngamoq lyis shiwu yvmas vshwih loh; Ma gis cho mhayah ngamoq lyis khyuot kat aq: khasoeh ge lyis munghdan yomsoq yahge phunk nyoqnho ngelang gas vcaiq vto nah zis nghuot. Amen.
40006014	Khasoeh ge lyis namoq svbih lyis cu dah yobos lyis khyuot dyei nghuot lyis gas, maukhung mha namoq dah Uwus eq namoq yobos lyis khyuot dyei das.
40006015	Nghuot laus eq svbih yah namoq lyis cu zis lyis namoq ma khyuot dyei lyis gas, namoq dah Uwus gas namoq yobos lyis ma khyuot dyei das.
40006016	Namoq womkyi uhlyis, gis guons kuot bang teh nyoqnho vnyhauh goh: khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq womkyi zis lyis svbih nyvng bas jungh ge nyamoq nyoqnho svsoh tsain nyhauh. Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, nyamoq gas nyamoq phauh shangh zis xauh goeus.
40006017	Nghuot laus eq nvng womkyi uhlyis, nvng uhloms mas coeu juot las nyoq eq cheih aq.
40006018	Housoeh nvng womkyi zis svbih xikkhonh mas ma nghuot, sam yvmas nyeis soeu, nah Uwus xikkhonh mas dede nghuot joq las, sam joqyos lyis nyvng soeu, nah Uwus gas nvng lyis phauh shangh das.
40006019	Naus yahge yus zo, khauh bang yah yoh kyungh phank khauh loh dah nyeisjvng thoq mas namoq zisyos lyis vtsain yung toh goh.
40006020	Naus yahge yus ma zo thyoq, khauh bang eq ma yoh thyoq wvng khauh loh dah, maukhung mha namoq zisyos lyis dvyung toh geh.
40006021	Khasoeh ge lyis namoq zisyos joq yvmas namoq nhaiqlom eq joq das.
40006022	Nyoqjeih gas gungs dah bvng zis nghuot. Housoeh las nah nyoqjeih gyings lyis gas, nah dvgungs gonh bvng joq das.
40006023	Nghuot laus eq nah nyoq ma gyings nghuot lyis gas, nah dvgungs gonh soeng soeng noq das. Housoeh yvmvyah nvng mas bos dah bvng zis soeng soeng noq nghuot lyis gas, hauh noq zis gas kha iq noq soengh thoengh nghuot joq lah!
40006024	Hank eq yhensain aiq yuk lyis ma yoh phuqsoe: khasoeh ge lyis dvyuk lyis hoeng lha gohtoeu dvyuk lyis jyetdap das. Dvyuk lyis domsyos gyo las, dvyuk lyis gas ma phauh ma danh kuot das. Namoq gas Mangso yahge nyeisjvng zisyos lyis dvgeh ma yoh phuqsoe:
40006025	Housoeh yvmvyah ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, namoq gas kang xiklyis cha zo das cha shuk das; gungs xiklyis cha wuot das, oen vchiq goh. Kang ka zonoms thoq lyis, gungs gas dyimis thoq lyis zes phauhdap ma nghuot lhyeh?
40006026	Mau dang nghoq jens lyis yoeuh geh; nyamoq gas jyo ma khyoq, jyo eq ma yhomh, jyi mha yhomh kat zis eq ma bos: nghuot laus eq maukhung mha namoq dah Uwus gas nyamoq lyis gvmtsoh nyeis. Namoq gas nyamoq thoq lyis zes phauhdap ma nghuot lhyeh?
40006027	Namoq chiq las vsainnyang kang lhyi loq dvbon hank yoh chent kat?
40006028	Wuot das xiklyis namoq chamus chiq goh? Pa mha dah anghchau ban khasoeh yuk kuh los yvlyis nghamh yoeuh geh. Nyamoq gas muh eq ma zwi, jei eq ma ni:
40006029	nghuot laus eq ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, phunk nyoqnho ngelang bos dah Solomon dyimis yangh haih ban dvjyo lhyi ma nyis.
40006030	Lomsjingh ehnyet nain bang eh, khvnyhik joq las nvpyo nyikhyomp mas doeuh kat das, yos mas dah nyoq lyis yangh Mangso heisoeh gvmhuot lyis gas, namoq lyis hauh thoq lyis zes gvmhuot das ma nghuot lhyeh?
40006031	Housoeh yvmvyah namoq gas chiqjyen zoh lyis yah, Cha zo cha shuk das, cha wuot das oen vtaiq goh.
40006032	Khasoeh ge lyis gohnyau bang gas hai dvnganh yvlyis tsain xo. Maukhung mha namoq dah Uwus gas hau namoq chah nyeis zis dvnganh seq.
40006033	Namoq gas Mangso munghdan yahge nyah dan cho lhyi shih cangxeih xo geh, housoeh lyis haih zis dvnganh namoq lyis lung dyei das.
40006034	Housoeh yvmvyah phvnaq nyeihyo xiklyis vnghamh chiq goh: Khasoeh ge lyis phvnaq nyeihyo dah chiq cho lhyi phvnaq nyeihyo chiq goeus jungh. Dvnyeih dah chiq cho ka dvnyeih nyhenshang geh joq.
40007001	Namoq soetuon zis ma xauh bas jungh, soe vtuon goh.
40007002	Khasoeh ge lyis namoq soetuon vgus namoq soetuon zis xauh das; namoq laiq dyei pan mhayah namoq lyis laiq dyei das.
40007003	Nah nyoqjeih mas bos dah thangh-tungh lyis ma nghamh yoeuh, nah vmang vnoeuh nyoqjeih mas bos dah phvlhau lhyi chamus yoeuh nyeis lah?
40007004	Nah nyoqjeih mas thangh-tungh bos joq las, nah vmang vnoeuh lyis, Nah nyoqjeih mas phvlhau yoeus tyamp dyei bah, oen khasoeh yoh taiq lah?
40007005	Gis guons kuot soeu eh, nvnyang nyoqjeih mas dah thangh-tungh lyis shih yoeus tyamp aq; hauh thang lhyi nah vmang vnoeuh nyoqjeih mas dah phvlhau lhyi yoeus tyamp dyei das zis dede nyvng das.
40007006	Gyingshang dah zis lvkhuih jens lyis vdyei goh. Namoq uhshot lyis wuq xikkhonh mas vdoeuh kat goh: housoeh kuot lyis nyamoq hauh yvlyis nang nheh doq lhyweq las namoq lyis dyvm ngat los das.
40007007	Dung geh, housoeh lyis namoq yoh das; xo geh, housoeh lyis namoq nyvng das; khomh koq geh, housoeh lyis namoq lyis phank dyei das.
40007008	Khasoeh ge lyis dung soeu hank eq yoh; xo soeu eq nyvng; khomh koq soeu lhyi eq phank dyei das.
40007009	Namoq hank laus eq, nyah lo ohlhyoq sang lhyi lukgoq dyei das lhyeh?
40007010	Oengdoq sang lhyi lhangnyis dyei das lhyeh?
40007011	Namoq ma gis bang yangh, namoq lo jens lyis gis dah jyungshuk seq dyei lyis gas, maukhung mha namoq dah Uwus gas, nyang lyis dung bang lyis hauh thoq lyis gis dah jyungshuk seq dyei das ma nghuot lhyeh?
40007012	Gohyuk yah namoq lyis khasoeh kuot dyei nhang mes lyis namoq eq nyamoq lyis housoeh nyang, kuot dyei geh. Khasoeh ge lyis haih zis gas lyi yahge lvpe jens taiq zis nghuot.
40007013	Zvvs dah khomh cho yah wvng geh: khasoeh ge lyis, dyoqbis yvpheh bangh loh dah khomh gas hanh, cho eq suh pyo lha houmha wvng loh bang nyoshoq nghuot.
40007014	Kang dwis yvpheh bangh loh dah khomh gas zvvs las cho eq choyauhyot nghuot yvmvyah, hauh zis lyis xo nyvng bang nain.
40007015	Wus dah cauhpau jens teh nghuot las, yvng yeis khuk zis yah namoq jyank mas los das lvpe hwah lyis zaih geh.
40007016	Namoq, nyamoq dah zoeu gyomh masyah zvbiq shih, nhoh zoeu zains masyah maiphang shih yoh thyoq yoeus lhyeh?
40007017	Housoeh las saiq gis zains khanghmuh gas gis dah vshih shih joq. Nghuot laus eq ma gis dah saiqzains mas ma gis dah vshih shih joq.
40007018	Saiq gis zains mas ma gis dah vshih ma yoh shih. Ma gis dah saiqzains mas eq gis dah vshih ma yoh shih.
40007019	Gis dah vshih ma shih dah saiqzains khanghmuh lyis gas thoeuq las nyi mas doeuh kat das.
40007020	Housoeh las nyamoq dah vshih lyis yoeuh las hauh saiqzains lyis yoh tsain seq das.
40007021	Ngos lyis, Yhensain eh, Yhensain eh ge bang dvnganh maukhung munghdan mas xauh wvng das zis ma nghuot. Maukhung mha nyeis, ngah Uwus dah ehnyet chank soeu dvxauh wvng das.
40007022	Hauh buisnyeis lyis dius nyoshoq gas ngos lyis, Yhensain eh, Yhensain eh, nah nyings masyah ngamoq lvpe pe goeus, nah nyings masyah yius khat tyamp goeus; nah nyings masyah mauhphoh muh lyis zwi goeus ma nghuot lhyeh, ge taiq los das.
40007023	Hauh uhlyis ngos gas, Ngos namoq lyis khayhoq eq ma seq ku: lyi ma chi muh kuot bang eh, namoq ngah jyank masyah thuq loh geh, oen taiq das.
40007024	Housoeh yvmvyah hai ngah dang dvnganh lyis xauhgyo las chank kuot soeu hank laus eq nyah yhen lhyi lukmuh lom thoq mas ci toh dah joeui bos soeu yah doeusgoh.
40007025	Mau wus, jeis je, lyeis muot los las, hauh yhen lhyi bat laus eq hauh yhen khyei ka lukmuh lom thoq mas ci toh yvmvyah ma lains loh.
40007026	Hai ngah dang lyis xauhgyo las ma chank soeu hank laus eq nyah yhen lhyi sihsho yos mas ci toh dah koh soeu yah doeusgoh.
40007027	Mau wus, jeis je, lyeis muot los las, hauh yhen lhyi bat yvmvyah lains loh. Hauh dyoqbis zis gas kha iq kuh lah!
40007028	Gvshih Yesu haih dang dye taiq lyis, dius jens gas nyang jyauh cho lhyi svsoh mauh.
40007029	Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas, maussauh lhaih bang teh ma nghuot, vmingh bos soeu teh nyamoq lyis jyauh.
40008001	Nyang boms masyah gyoh los lyis, moqjens nyah thang mha chank los.
40008002	Yoeuh aq, mvnggvng dap soeu dvyuk nyang lyis los dupaiq las, Yhensain eh, nvng bauh nghuot lyis gas, ngos lyis yoh thyauhlhyang los nhang, ge.
40008003	Yesu nyah loq yhuonh kat las nyang lyis tanh zoh lyis yah taiq zis gas, Ngos mes, nvng thyauhlhyang los bas jungh, ge thangjang nyah gungs mas mvnggvng gas dyuk loh.
40008004	Housoeh Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Haih cho hank lyis eq vtaiq kyoh; nghuot laus eq nah gungs phudyei bang lyis loh chixoeuq aq. Housoeh las Moshe tying toh khoq zis yah dvyhangteh, jyungshuk phudyei zis yah nyamoq xikkhonh mas kanghjyoeng nghuot bas jungh, ge.
40008005	Yesu Kaperna-um wus mas wvng loh lyis, jes dvxo guon zau dvyuk nyah jyank mas los las, nyang lyis sang zis gas,
40008006	Yhensain eh, ngah jyeidwis gas gungsjen shei lha yhen mha svsoh nos nyeis, ge dung lyis,
40008007	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos los las nyang lyis gis los nhang das, ge.
40008008	Nghuot laus eq hau jes dvxo guon zau phuk taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, nvng ngah nyhanghmau thang mha wvng los das zis ngos ma mon: nghuot laus eq nah dang dvkhonh kyingh taiq kat lyis ngah jyeidwis gis los das.
40008009	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos gas vmingh khau mha dah dius dvyuk nghuot las ngah o mha eq jeslo jens nyeis: ngos haih soeu lhyi, Loh aq, oen lhyi nyang loh. Gohtoeu dvyuk lyis, Los aq, oen lhyi nyang los. Ngah jyeidwis lyis, Haih zis kuot aq, oen lhyi nyang kuot, ge.
40008010	Yesu hauh dang xauhgyo lyis mauh las, nyah thang mha chank yenh bang lyis, Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, Israel dius nyau mas yangh hei iq lomsjingh soeu ngos ma nyvng, ge.
40008011	Ngos namoq lyis taiq zis gas, Buisthuq buiswvng pheh yah dius nyoshoq jweh los das las, maukhung munghdan mas Abraham, Isak, Yakop moq yah zo shuk das.
40008012	Hauh munghdan lo jens nghuot vvng bang gas nghe pheh soeng soeng noq yvmas doeuh kat zis xauh das: hauh yvmas ngausdyeis ngausnhvp yah zwis khih chap loh das.
40008013	Yesu gas jes dvxo guon zau lyis, nvng loh aq, nvng lomsjingh zis yah dvyhangteh nah jyank mas bweh bas jungh, ge kat. Hauh shishenh lyis nyang, nyah jyeidwis gas gis los goeus.
40008014	Yesu gas Petru dah yhen mha wvng loh lyis, Petru dah yuknyih gungs ngeh las nos lhain toh zis lyis nyvng.
40008015	Housoeh Yesu nyah loq mas tanh lho lhyi hau gungs ngeh zis gis tyamp. Hauh uhlyis nyang toq las nyang lyis daih.
40008016	Nyenhthang jweh lyis nyamoq gas, yius kuq bang nyoshoq lyis nyah jyank mas shwih lyih las, nyang gas nyah dang khonh yah yius lyis khat tyamp: nos bang dvnganh lyis gis los nhang.
40008017	Haih zis gas, Nyang yamoq dah shanghsenh kham tyamp dyei las, Yamoq dah noslom wons tyamp dyei goeus, ge lvpe Esaia taiq toh dang nyuk los das xiklyis nghuot.
40008018	Yesu gas nyah nvm yvm nvm wi lhaink toh dah moqjens zainsmuh lyis nyvng lho lhyi, thomh thyitvp pheh goeu e das xiklyis vmingh dyei.
40008019	Hauh uhlyis maussauh lhaih soeu dvyuk nyah jyank mas los las, Svra eh, nvng khalhye loh khalhye, ngos nah thang mha chank das, ge.
40008020	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Womkhuih jens eq khyung bos, mau dang nghoq jens eq sot yoh: nghuot laus eq Cangsoeu Lo gas nyah uhloms toh das joqyos ma yoh, ge.
40008021	Nyah changlo jens mas gohtoeu dvyuk eq, Yhensain eh, ngah uwus lyis shih loh nyhop khoq nhang aq, ge nyang lyis taiq.
40008022	Nghuot laus eq Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngah thang mha chank los aq; shei bang lyis gas nyamoq shei bang nyang nyhop bas jungh, ge.
40008023	Nyang lhyik khau mha wvng goeus ya, nyah changlo jens nyah thang mha chank los.
40008024	Hauh uhlyis, yoeuh aq, hauh thomh mas lyeismuh jyang muot los lyis changhphauq doeuh las lhyik gas nyop bah ge lyis eq nyang gas yhet joq.
40008025	Changlo jens nyang lyis loh nhauh las taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, ngamoq lyis khyuot yoeus aq, gudwvng bah ge goeus, ge.
40008026	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Lomsjingh ehnyet ngis bang eh, chamus gyuk nyeis goh, ge uhjyangh nyang toq las lyeisdons yahge thomh lyis nyho lho lhyi hauh zis gas samlo no tyamp.
40008027	Housoeh dius jens gas mauh las, Haih soeu ka khasoeh teh dah dius nghuot au lhyeh? Hau lyeis yahge thomh yangh nyah domsyos gyo, ge.
40008028	Nyang thomh thyitvp Gadara mau jweh loh lyis, yius kuq dah dius aiq yuk gas lop masyah thuq los las nyang lyis zes langh. Nyah aiq yuk gas svsoh lhuon lha, hauh cho khvt chank yah hank eq ma yoh lai loh.
40008029	Housoeh las yoeuh aq, hauh aiq yuk gas, Mangso dah Lo Yesu eh, ngamoq nvng yah cha sen lah? Shishenh ma jweh shih lyis nvng ngamoq lyis joeng das zis jweh los lhyeh, ge tsain kaiq.
40008030	Gvshih nyamoq jyank masyah gvgis lo we yvmas wuq dvjens botzo nyeis.
40008031	Housoeh las yius jens nyang lyis dung zis gas, nvng ngamoq lyis khat tyamp das lyis gas, ngamoq lyis wuq jens mas wvng nhang aq, ge.
40008032	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Thuq loh geh, ge. Nyamoq gas thuq las wuq jens mas tsain wvng loh. Yoeuh aq, hauh wuq jens dvnganh yah nyeismhung mhayah thomh mas tyauq wvng las ciang shei.
40008033	Wuq yoeuh bang gas hauh wus mas phang wvng loh las, bweh ya bweh zis yahge yius kuq vzomh dah cho tsain taiq kyoh.
40008034	Housoeh las, yoeuh aq dvwus gonh bang Yesu yah xauhgoh das xiklyis thuq loh las, nyang lyis nyvng goeus ya, nyang lyis nyamoq dah maukyo mhayah thuq loh das xiklyis tsain dung.
40009001	Nyang lhyik khau mha wvng las goeu loh lyis nyah wugungs mas jweh loh.
40009002	Hauh uhlyis, yoeuh aq, gungsjen shei lha yhetyos mas dvnyeis soeu dvyuk lyis nyah jyank mas tsain dvng lyih. Yesu nyamoq dah lomsjingh ehnyet lyis nyvng lyis, gungsjen shei soeu lhyi taiq zis gas, Lo eh yom huont aq, nah yaunos khyuot dyei goeus, ge.
40009003	Housoeh las, maussauh lhaih bang mas dvyhamh gas, Haih soeu ka loeusmus soqzo dang taiq, ge nyamoq dah ehnyet mas tsain taiq zo nyeis.
40009004	Yesu gas nyamoq khasoeh nghamh zis lyis seq las taiq zis gas, Namoq ehnyet mas chamus ma gis zis nghamh goh?
40009005	Nah yaunos khyuot dyei goeus oen zis yah, Toq las suh loh aq, oen zis khah zis zes taiq lwis lah?
40009006	Nghuot laus eq Cangsoeu Lo gas nyeisjvng thoq mas yaunos khyuot dyei das vmingh yoh zis gas namoq seq bas jungh, gungsjen shei soeu lhyi, Toq aq, nah yhetyos yoeus las nah yhen pheh loh lo aq, ge.
40009007	Hauh uhlyis nyang toq las nyah yhen pheh loh.
40009008	Moqjens hauh zis nyvng lyis, nyamoq mauh las, dius lyis heisoeh teh vmingh dyei dah Mangso lhyi chungh.
40009009	Yesu hou mhayah lai loh lyis, Mathe ge soeu khoengh khywi joqyos mas tsung toh zis nyvng las nyang lyis, Ngah thang mha chank los aq, ge. Housoeh nyang toq las nyah thang mha chank loh.
40009010	Hauh thang lhyi Yesu gas hauh soeu dah yhen, womjus mas tsung toh lyis, khoengh khywi bang yahge yaunos wons bang nyoshoq, Yesu yahge nyah changlo jens yah dvgeh tsung toh.
40009011	Hauh zis lyis Pharishe moq nyvng lyis, nyamoq gas nyah changlo jens lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq dah svra gas khoengh khywi bang yahge yaunos wons bang yah dvgeh chamus zo shuk au lhyeh, ge.
40009012	Yesu hauh zis xauhgyo las nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Yanghzan bang gas mvcheih lastsiang ma chah, nos bang dvchah.
40009013	Housoeh las namoq loh las, Ngos gas nhaiqnyen shohgyo zis lyis o, lomhxangh lainh zis lyis ma o, ge dah vjyuk lyis xuq geh: khasoeh ge lyis, ngos lyih zis gas, dan bang lyis khi das xiklyis ma nghuot, yaunos wons bang xiklyis dvnghuot, ge.
40009014	Hauh thang lhyi Yohan dah changlo jens nyah jyank mas lyih las, Ngamoq yahge Pharishe moq womkyi lhyi, nah changlo jens gas chamus wom ma kyi goh lah, ge.
40009015	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Nyi hwank yvp yah sen dah loshang jens yah dvgeh nyeis shih uhlyis, nyamoq gas nhaiqkuk nhaiqngis zis xauh das lah? Nghuot laus eq loloeu saiq lyis nyamoq jyank masyah yoeus tyamp das buisnyeis jweh los das: hauh uhlyis nyamoq womkyi das.
40009016	Dyi tyang mha misseh saiq yah hank ma pho: khasoeh ge lyis, pho toh dah vdwang yah dyi lyis lang yaq las, hou mhayah juiq zis zes lvm los das.
40009017	Zvbiq jeis saiq eq shohyeis thung tyang mha hank ma kat. Kat nghuot lyis gas, buk las zvbiq jeis eq shuon, shohyeis thung eq monh das. Zvbiq jeis saiq gas shohyeis thung saiq mas kat las, hau aiq ja yah gis joq, ge.
40009018	Yesu nyamoq lyis haih zis taiq nyeis dah uhlyis, lyi jungs uhjyung dvyuk nyah jyank mas los las nyang lyis dupaiq zoh lyis yah taiq zis gas, Ngah lonyi lo gvshih shei goeus; nghuot laus eq nvng los las nyah thoq mas loq kih dyei lyis gas dwis los das, ge.
40009019	Housoeh Yesu toq las nyah thang mha chank e. Nyah changlo jens eq chank e.
40009020	Hauh uhlyis, dvci aiq zvn suih shuon dah vmesbih dvyuk gas nyah thang mha lyih las nyah dyithang mha tanh.
40009021	Khasoeh ge lyis nyah nhaiqlom mas, Ngos nyah dyi thang mha khvlangh xauh tanh lyis ngos gis los das, ge taiq zo.
40009022	Yesu lhain yoeuh las nyang lyis nyvng lho lhyi nyang taiq zis gas, Lonyi eh, yom huont aq, nah lomsjingh zis gas nvng lyis gis los nhang goeus, ge. Hauh shishenh masyah hauh vmesbih gas gis los goeus.
40009023	Yesu gas, hau guon soeu dah yhen mha jweh loh lyis, khvlhank muot bang yahge dius nyoshoq hoeu nyeis zis lyis nyvng lyis,
40009024	Nyang taiq zis gas, Joqyos xwiq geh, khasoeh ge lyis lonyi lo gas shei zis ma nghuot, yhet joq zis dvnghuot, ge, Nyamoq gas nyang lyis yis.
40009025	Nghuot laus eq dius jens lyis thuq loh nhang thang lhyi, nyang wvng loh las hauh lonyi lo dah loq mas zwi lho lhyi, nyang gas toq los.
40009026	Housoeh las nyah cho ka wuxom gonh mas hoeuh loh.
40009027	Yesu gas hou mhayah lai loh lyis, nyoqjet aiq yuk gas nyah thang mha chank los las kaiq sang zis gas, Dawi dah Lo eh, ngah aiq yuk lyis nhaiqnyen aq, ge.
40009028	Nyang yvpkhau mha wvng loh lyis, nyoqjet vzomh eq nyah jyank mas los. Yesu nyah aiq yuk lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos yoh gis los nhang oen zis lyis jingh lhyeh, ge lyis, nyah aiq yuk gas, Yhensain eh, jingh, ge.
40009029	Housoeh nyang nyah aiq yuk dah nyoq mas tanh uhlyis yah taiq zis gas, Nah aiq yuk lomsjingh zis yah dvyhangteh bweh bas jungh, ge.
40009030	Hauh uhlyis nyah aiq yuk nyoq bangh los. Yesu gas nyah aiq yuk lyis hank lyis eq ma seq nhang das xiklyis khyangh com kat.
40009031	Nghuot laus eq nyah aiq yuk gas, nyah cho lhyi hauh wuxom gonh mas tsain taiq hoeuh loh.
40009032	Nyamoq thuq loh yah dvyih, yius kuq dah nhuotjet dvyuk lyis nyah jyank mas shwih los.
40009033	Yius khat tyamp thang lhyi nhuotjet dang jis los. Hauh uhlyis dius jens gas mauh las, Israel dius jens mas heisoeh teh zis khanhamp eq ma nyvng ku, ge.
40009034	Nghuot laus eq Pharishe jens taiq zis gas, Nyang gas yius zau dah vmingh yah yius lyis khat tyamp zis nghuot, ge.
40009035	Yesu gas wus yahge wukhau khanghmuh mas suh jyuon yenh las, nyamoq dah lyi jungs mha eq jyauh uhlyis yah, Mangso munghdan gausyis dang lyis taiq hoeuh las, dius mas nos vja ja yahge noslom vja ja lyis gis los nhang.
40009036	Nyang moqjens lyis nyvng lyis, nyamoq gas yoeuh soeu ma bos dah yvng jens teh vshoh vjyen dungsshih lvnggang tsain dyos yenh yvmvyah, nyang nyamoq lyis nhaiq yoeuh nyen.
40009037	Hauh thang lhyi nyang nyah changlo jens lyis taiq zis gas, Jyo yhomh das zis nyoshoq bos laus eq, muh zwi bang nain, ge.
40009038	Housoeh yvmvyah jyo Yhensain ka nyah jyo yhomh das zis uhkung jens lyis nhang kat dyei bas jungh dung nyeis geh, ge.
40010001	Yesu gas nyah changlo dvci aiq yuk lyis khi yoeus las nyamoq lyis yius khat tyamp das zis yahge nos thyoh vja ja, noslom vja ja lyis yoh gis los nhang das toeuh dyei.
40010002	Lvgyo dvci aiq yuk moq dah nyings gas haih zis tsain nghuot. Cangxeih vyuk gas Petru ge soeu Simon, nyah vnoeuh Andre; Zebedi dah lotang Yaku yahge nyah vnoeuh Yohan;
40010003	Philip yahge Bartholomeu; Thoma yahge khoengh khywi soeu Mathe; Alphe dah lo Yaku yahge Thade;
40010004	Vnyau lyis jyet soeu Simon yahge Yesu lyis phanhlyen soeu Yudas Iskarot moq nghuot.
40010005	Yesu hai dvci aiq yuk moq lyis nhang kat uhlyis yah dyens mhoq zis gas, Namoq gas gohnyau bang jyank mas vwvng goh, Samari wukhau mha eq vwvng goh.
40010006	Nghuot laus eq Israel vnyau mas dyuk loh dah yvng jens dah jyank mas dvloh geh.
40010007	Namoq loh lyis, Maukhung munghdan gas ni los goeus oen tsain taiq hoeuh geh.
40010008	Nos bang lyis gis los nhang geh; shei goeus bang lyis dwis los nhang geh; mvnggvng dap bang lyis eq thyauhlhang nhang geh; yius jens lyis khat thuq dyei geh. Namoq gas phauh ma gyoh xauh yoeus las, namoq eq phauh ma sang dyei geh.
40010009	Namoq dah dyilhunk mas ngwis, xing, thunkjangh dyvpson cha eq vkat chi goh.
40010010	Bvtmuh yahge dyi aiq dung, thyvkoq, lhamloq eq vtsain chi goh: khasoeh ge lyis muh zwi soeu ka nyah zokho yah mon yih nyeis.
40010011	Wukhau, wugungs khateh yvmas loh nghuot laus eq, houmha mon yih soeu khayuk nyeis zis lyis nyei gyo las, doms thuq loh shoq houmha nyeis geh.
40010012	Namoq hauh yhen mha wvng loh lyis phauh nyang zis yah jhent geh.
40010013	Hauh yhenbang mas mon yih nghuot lyis gas, namoq dah nyenstap zis gas nyamoq mas joq bas jungh: nghuot laus eq ma mon yih lyis gas namoq dah nyenstap zis gas namoq jyank mas tauh los bas jungh.
40010014	Hank laus eq namoq lyis ma lhom yoeus, namoq dah dang lyis ma gyo yoeus bang bos nghuot lyis, hauh yhen, hauh wukhau mhayah namoq thuq loh lyis, namoq khyei mha phvlhau lhyi ko khyoq toh khoq geh.
40010015	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, soetuon dah buisnyeis lyis Sodom yahge Gomora gas hauh wus thoq lyis sunghhuq das.
40010016	Yoeuh aq, ngos namoq lyis womkhuih jens jo mas yvng jens lyis teh nhang kat. Housoeh yvmvyah namoq gas lhangnyis teh yik las khotjyauh teh kyonhzoeh nyeis geh.
40010017	Nghuot laus eq dius jens lyis zaih geh: khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas namoq lyis soetuon huom mha kyauh tyamp das. Nyamoq dah lyi jungs mha eq namoq lyis tsain lyuk das.
40010018	Nyamoq xikkhonh mas eq, gohnyau bang dah xikkhonh mas eq thanghchvp duot das xiklyis, ngah gvng mas, namoq lyis zau bang yahge hwankti jens xikkhonh mas eq lang she loh zis xauh das.
40010019	Namoq lyis kyauh tyamp goeus ya, namoq khasoeh oen cha taiq das zis vchiq goh: namoq taiq das dang gas hauh uhlyis namoq lyis dyei los das.
40010020	Khasoeh ge lyis, dang taiq soeu ka namoq ma nghuot, namoq Uwus dah Dyos gas namoq vkhau mha dang taiq nyeis.
40010021	Hauh uhlyis, vmang vnoeuh nyang changh shei cho pheh kyauh tyamp das, uwus gas lo lyis shei das yvmas kyauh tyamp das. Lo jens gas nyhiphoq lyis jes sont las shei nhang das.
40010022	Ngah nyings gvng mas dius dvnganh gas namoq lyis hoeng los das. Nghuot laus eq thang thank jweh shoq yoh jhen soeu ka, khyuot yoeus zis xauh das.
40010023	Housoeh haih wus mas shoeuhshih lyis gohtoeu dvwus pheh phang loh geh. Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, Cangsoeu Lo ma jweh shih lyis Israel mau mas dah wugungs lyis namoq yoh lhaink khvp das zis ma nghuot.
40010024	Changlo gas svra thoq lyis zes zis ma nghuot; jyeidwis eq nyah joeuzoe thoq lyis zes zis ma nghuot.
40010025	Changlo gas nyah svra iq, jyeidwis eq nyah joeuzoe iq duot los lyis gas geh joq. Yhensain lhyi nyamoq Bezebu ge lui nghuot lyis gas, nyah yhenbang lyis ma gis dah nyings zes lui das ma nghuot lhyeh?
40010026	Housoeh yvmvyah nyamoq lyis vgyuk goh: khasoeh ge lyis, ma yoh chixoeuq shoq nghop toh zis cha eq ma bos. Ma seq shoq shung toh zis cha eq ma bos.
40010027	Ngos namoq lyis soeng soeng noq yvmas taiq zis lyis bvng yvmas taiq kyoh geh. Nhuot sot sot zis namoq xauhgyo yvlyis yhen khung thoq mas taiq hoeuh geh, ge.
40010028	Gungs lyis kyingh yoh sat las dyos lyis ma yoh tsain sat bang lyis vgyuk goh. Dyos yahge gungs lyis munyi thomh mas yoh mhont soeu lhyi dvgyuk geh.
40010029	Joslo aiq doeu gas dyvpson dvkyvp yah ungh ma nghuot lhyeh? Nah Uwus ma bauh lyis hau jos dvdoeu eq nyeisjvng mas ma dyet gyoh.
40010030	Khasoeh ge lyis namoq dah cam khvt dvnganh lyis yangh suon toh.
40010031	Housoeh yvmvyah vchiq goh, namoq gas jos nyoshoq thoq lyis zes phauhdap.
40010032	Housoeh yvmvyah svbih dah xikkhonh mas ngos lyis rhen soeu lhyi, ngos eq maukhung mha ngah Uwus xikkhonh mas hauh soeu lhyi rhen das.
40010033	Nghuot laus eq svbih xikkhonh mas ngos lyis he tyamp soeu lhyi, maukhung mha ngah Uwus dah xikkhonh mas ngos eq hauh soeu lhyi he tyamp das.
40010034	Nyeisjvng thoq mas nyenstap cho chi lyih das xiklyis ngos lyih oen vnghamh goh; nyenstap cho chi lyih das xiklyis ngos lyih zis ma nghuot, moengsa chi los das xiklyis ngos dvlyih.
40010035	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos lyih zis gas, loloeu gas nyah uwus yah, lonyi gas nyah ungwes yah, doeusmuh gas nyimuh yah tyixo goh das xiklyis dvnghuot.
40010036	Dius dvyuk dah jeswus gas nyah yhen mha bang nyang nghuot los das.
40010037	Ngos lyis jyetdap thoq lyis nyah ungwes uwus lyis zes jyetdap soeu ka, ngos yah ma mon: ngos lyis jyetdap thoq lyis nyah loloeu lonyi lyis zes jyetdap soeu eq ngos yah ma mon.
40010038	Hauh thoq lyis magoh, nyah tapzains wuq las ngah thang mha ma chank soeu ka ngos yah ma mon.
40010039	Vsainnyang kang lhyi xo soeu ka kang dyuk das. Ngah gvng mas kang dyuk soeu ka, kang yoh das.
40010040	Namoq lyis lhom yoeus soeu ka ngos lyis lhom yoeus zis nghuot; ngos lyis lhom yoeus soeu eq ngos lyis nhang kat soeu lhyi lhom yoeus zis nghuot.
40010041	Dius dvyuk lyis lvpe nghuot yvmvyah lhom yoeus soeu ka lvpe dah khyik manh phauh xauh yoeus das. Dius dvyuk lyis dan soeu khyvlyis lhom yoeus soeu eq hau dan soeu dah khyik manh phauh xauh yoeus das.
40010042	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, Haih bang mas loshang dvyuk lyis changlo nghuot yvmvyah shuk jeis dvkom khvlangh gvmshuk soeu hank laus eq, nyang khyik manh phauh dyuk das zis ma nghuot.
40011001	Yesu gas nyah changlo dvci aiq yuk lyis dyens dye mhoq kat las, nyamoq dah wus mas jyauh das zis yahge taiq hoeuh das xiklyis, nyang eq hou mhayah thuq loh.
40011002	Khristu kuot dah muhzoh lyis Yohan thung mhayah xauhgyo lyis, nyang nyah changlo jens lyis nhang lha taiq zis gas,
40011003	Nvng gas hau jweh los das soeu nghuot lah? Nghuot ya ngamoq gohtoeu lhyi nghamhloms shih das lah, ge.
40011004	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Namoq nyvng las xauhgyo zis Yohan lyis loh taiq kyoh geh.
40011005	Nyoqjet bang nyoq nyvng los; khyei gyau bang yoh suh loh; mvnggvng dap bang eq thyauh lhyang loh; nojet bang no gyo los; shei goeus bang eq doms dwis los nhang zis xauh las, nyungs bang lyis gausyis dang taiq kyoh nyeis.
40011006	Ngos mas ehnyet zis ma bos soeu hank laus eq ngelhoq, ge.
40011007	Nyamoq loh khoq thang lhyi Yesu gas, Yohan cho dius phung lhyi taiq zis gas, Namoq mhanhdyvp pheh cha loh yoeuh goh? Lyeis muot kamh dah jvmbu lyis lhyeh?
40011008	Housoeh lyis cha loh thuq yoeuh goh? Lungphauq dyi wuot soeu lhyi lah? Yoeuh aq, nhamp dah dyimis wuot bang gas hwankti yhen mha nyeis.
40011009	Housoeh lyis cha loh thuq yoeuh goh? Lvpe lhyi lah? Nghuot goeus, ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, lvpe thoq lyis zes kuh soeu nghuot.
40011010	Yoeuh aq, nah cho sont langh das xiklyis, Ngos ngah loeuskyoh soeu lhyi nah xik pheh nhang kat, ge lhaih toh zis gas nyah cho nghuot.’
40011011	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, vmesbih masyah khoeu los bang mas jeisnyhop dyei soeu Yohan thoq lyis zes soeu hank ma thuq los ku. Nghuot laus eq maukhung munghdan mas ngis thank soeu ka, nyah thoq lyis zes kuh.
40011012	Jeisnyhop dyei soeu Yohan dah buisnyeis masyah gvshih jweh shoq, maukhung munghdan gas shohbop shohjyen xauh nyeis las, shohbop shohjyen kuot bang gas hauh zis lyis tsoengh lhuot yoeus nyeis.
40011013	Khasoeh ge lyis, lvpe jens dvnganh yahge Moshe dah lyi gas, Yohan dah buisnyeis jweh shoq cha bweh los das cho uhlhomh taiq toh.
40011014	Namoq lhom yoeus mes nghuot lyis gas, Yohan gas jweh los das dah Eliya nghuot.
40011015	Gyo yoeus das no dap soeu ka xauhgyo bas jungh.
40011016	Haq caiq mas bang lyis cha yah byi xoeuq das lah? Nyamoq gas kaih jang mas tsung lha dvyuk yah dvyuk lui goh nyeis dah loshang jens yah doeusgoh.
40011017	Ngamoq gas namoq lyis khvlhank muot dyei lyis eq namoq ma goh; Ngamoq kukxi lyis eq namoq ma ngaus.
40011018	Khasoeh ge lyis Yohan jweh los las ma zo ma shuk nyeis lyis eq nyamoq gas, Nyang mas yius bos, tsain ge.
40011019	Cangsoeu Lo lyih las zo shuk lyis eq, Yoeuh aq, wom lvm soeu, zvbiq yet soeu, khoengh khywi bang yahge yaunos wons bang dah dyenschangh, tsain ge. Nghuot laus eq Mangso dah joeui lhyi ka hau muhzoh yah jyoeng yvlyis tuonh shet nyeis.
40011020	Housoeh nyang dang zoh yoeus las, nyah yomsoq zains muhzoh nyothyang kuot goeus dah wugungs, ehnyet ma tsain thaiq yvmvyah, nyang nyamoq lyis heisoeh ge nyho.
40011021	Korazin eh, nvng mvtanhzoe nghuot. Betsaida eh, nvng mvtanhzoe nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis, namoq jyank mas nyvng nhang dah yomsoq zains muhzoh lyis Taire yahge Sidon mas nyvng nhang nghuot lyis gas, hauh wus mas bang gohnhamp yah yanghthung dyi wuot, nyiyvp boms mas lhoeuh las nhaiqlom yoh thaiq hah das.
40011022	Nghuot laus eq ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, soetuon dah buisnyeis lyis Taire yahge Sidon xauh zis gas namoq thoq lyis sunghhuq das.
40011023	Kaperna-um eh, nvng maukhung jweh shoq chunghtoq zis xauh das lah, munyi thomh jweh shoq khyoq zis xauh das: khasoeh ge lyis, nah jyank mas kuot dah yomsoq zains muhzoh lyis Sodom mas toq kuot nghuot lyis gas, hauh zis gas khvnyhik jweh shoq joq shih das.
40011024	Khasoeh ge lyis, ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, soetuon dah buisnyeis lyis Sodom xauh zis gas nah thoq lyis zes sunghhuq das, ge.
40011025	Hauh shishenh lyis Yesu gas dang phank las, Maukhung nyeisjvng dah Yhensain Uwus eh, joeui bos bang yahge ehnyet yik bang jyank masyah nvng haih cho jens lyis tsain nghop shung toh las, lonoeuh jens lyis chixoeuq yvmvyah, ngos nvng lyis nhaiqshoqlang.
40011026	Nghuot goeus Uwus eh, heisoeh bweh los zis gas nvng nhaiqdoeus khyvlyis nghuot.
40011027	Ngah Uwus gas, ngos lyis dvnganh dyei toh goeus: Lo hank nghuot yvlyis Uwus mas lai las hank ma seq. Uwus hank nghuot yvlyis Lo yahge hauh Lo yah nyah cho chixoeuq das xiklyis khyen yoeus zis xauh soeu mha lai las hank ma seq.
40011028	Nyung daus las yvwons lyei bang dvnganhmoq eh, ngah jyank mas los geh, ngos namoq lyis no nhang das.
40011029	Ngah tanzoe lyis dvng geh, ngah jyank masyah xuq geh, khasoeh ge lyis, ngos gas noeuh nhamp las, o mha gyoh soeu nghuot: housoeh lyis namoq xauh no das.
40011030	Khasoeh ge lyis ngah tanzoe gas dvng lwis zis yahge ngah yvwons eq siq, ge.
40012001	Yesu gas Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis sunghso yos cho yah lai loh. Nyah changlo jens gas wom yuot las, sunghso nham lhyi tsain shap zo.
40012002	Hauh zis lyis Pharishe moq nyvng las, nyamoq nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, nah changlo jens gas Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis kuot das lyi ma bos zis tsain kuot, ge.
40012003	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Dawi gas yuot shet dah uhlyis nyang gas nyang yah nyeis bang yah dvgeh,
40012004	Mangso dah yhen mha khasoeh wvng loh las, phudyei bang kyingh ma nghuot lyis gas, nyang yahge, nyang yah dvgeh bang ma gis zo dah hau chixoeuq ohlhyoq lyis nyamoq khasoeh zo tyamp zis lyis namoq ma tsain nghap ku lhyeh?
40012005	Nghuot ya phudyei bang Yuda No Buisnyeis dah lyi lhyweq laus eq, nyamoq gas yobos ma bos cho Moshe dah lyi maussauh lyis ma tsain nghap yoeuh goh lhyeh?
40012006	Ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, Yhenmuh thoq lyis zes kuh zis heimha joq.
40012007	Ngos o mes zis gas phudyei cho ma nghuot, nhaiqnyen cho lhyi dv o mes ge dah dang khonh vjyuk lyis namoq seq nghuot lyis gas, yobos ma bos bang lyis namoq dang thang thyet das zis ma nghuot.
40012008	Khasoeh ge lyis hauh Cangsoeu Lo gas hau Yuda No Buisnyeis dah Yhensain nghuot, ge.
40012009	Hou mhayah nyang toq loh lyis, nyamoq dah lyi jungs mas wvng loh.
40012010	Houmha loq dvshot shei soeu dvyuk nyeis. Nyamoq gas nyang lyis yoh kauq shoq nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis nos bang lyis gis los nhang zis, lyi bos lah, ge.
40012011	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq dvyuk yuk mas yvng dvdoeu kyingh yoh las hauh zis Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis dwang mas dyet gyoh joq lyis, ma siq yoeus das lhyeh?
40012012	Dius gas yvng thoq lyis kha iq zes phauhdap lah? Housoeh yvmvyah Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis, gis dah muh zwi das zis gas lyi bos, ge.
40012013	Hauh uhlyis nyang hauh soeu lhyi, Nah loq yhuonh kat aq, ge. Nyang loq yhuonh kat lyis hauh zis gas gohtoeu dvshot yhangteh gis los.
40012014	Pharishe moq thuq loh las, nyang lyis khasoeh yoh mhont das cho xamgoh nyeis.
40012015	Yesu haih zis lyis seq lyis, hou mhayah jhank loh. Nyah thang mha chank los dah moqjens zainsmuh dvnganhmoq lyis nyang gis los nhang.
40012016	Nyang lyis gohtoeu dius jens lyis ma seq nhang das xiklyis nyang nyamoq lyis taiq toh.
40012017	Haih zis gas lvpe Esaia taiq khoq zis nyuk los das xiklyis nghuot.
40012018	Hauh dang gas, Ngos khyen yoeus toh ngah jyeidwis lyis yoeuh aq; Ngos nhaiqdoeus las ngos jyetdap soeu nghuot; Ngos nyang lyis ngah Dyos kat dyei las, Nyang gas ngah soetuon cho gohnyau bang lyis kyoh das,
40012019	Nyang gas nyingh ma nyo, ma kaiq las, Nyah thwe lhyi talhoeu mha hank eq ma xauhgyo das.
40012020	Lyi jus cho lhyi ung cho yoh nhang buisnyeis jweh shoq, Nyang gas jap dah jvmbu lyis ma khyauh das zis yahge Nyikhauh thuq nyeis dah nyizoh lyis ma sat das.
40012021	Nyah nyings mas gohnyau bang eq loms das, ge.
40012022	Hauh thang lhyi nyoqjet, nhuot jet dah yius kuq soeu dvyuk lyis, nyah jyank mas shwih los. Nyang gas hauh soeu lhyi gis los nhang lha, dang yoh jis los, nyoq eq nyvng los.
40012023	Dius jens dvnganh gas mauh las, Haih soeu ka Dawi dah Lo ma nghuot lhyeh, ge.
40012024	Nghuot laus eq Pharishe jens hauh zis xauhgyo lyis, Haih soeu ka yius zau Bezebu dah vmingh yah yius lyis khat tyamp, tsain ge.
40012025	Nyamoq nghamh yvlyis Yesu seq las, nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Nyang changh nyang gang lvn loh dah munghdan khanghmuh gas dyoqbis das. Nyang changh nyang gang lvn loh dah wugungs, nghuot ya yhen ka yoh goeng joq das zis ma nghuot.
40012026	Satan yah Satan lhyi khat tyamp nghuot lyis gas, nyang gas, nyang gungs lyis nyang zan nyeis yvmvyah nyah munghdan gas khasoeh yoh goeng joq das lah?
40012027	Ngos Bezebu dah vmingh yah yius khat tyamp nghuot lyis gas, namoq dah lo jens gas hank dah vmingh yah yius lyis khat thuq lah? Housoeh yvmvyah nyamoq gas namoq lyis soetuon das bang duot das.
40012028	Nghuot laus eq Mangso dah Dyos masyah ngos yius lyis khat tyamp nghuot lyis gas, Mangso munghdan namoq jyank mas jweh goeus.
40012029	Yombos soeu lhyi shih cangxeih ma twih lyis gas, nyah yhen mha wvng las nyah zisyos lyis hank ma yoh thyoq yoeus. Nyang lyis twih thang lhyi nyah yhen dvyoh thyoq das.
40012030	Ngos yah dvgeh ma nyeis soeu ka ngos lyis jes sont zis nghuot. Ngos yah dvgeh ma huom nyeis soeu ka dungsshih lvnggang mus loh das.
40012031	Housoeh yvmvyah ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, dius jens dah yaunos yahge loeusmus soqzo zis dvnganh khyuot tyamp dyei zis xauh das. Nghuot laus eq Gyingshang Dyos lyis loeusmus soqzo dah yobos lyis gas ma yoh khyuot tyamp dyei.
40012032	Cangsoeu Lo lyis nhuot yah taiq shuot soeu hank lyis laus eq yobos yoh khyuot dyei, nghuot laus eq Gyingshang Dyos lyis taiq shuot soeu lhyi ka haq caiq mas eq, jweh los das vcaiq mas eq yobos ma yoh khyuot dyei das.
40012033	Gis dah vshih yoh das xiklyis gas gis dah saiqzains yoh chah. Ma gis dah saiqzains yoh lyis gas ma gis dah vshih yoh das: khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq dah vshih lyis yoeuh las hauh saiqzains lyis yoh tsain seq.
40012034	Ywimuhtsanh vnyau eh, namoq ma tsain gis zis, gis dah dang khasoeh yoh taiq das lah? Khasoeh ge lyis nhaiqlom mas dyingh las nhuot mas taiq thuq los.
40012035	Gis soeu ka nyah gis dah zisyos mhayah gis zis thuq kat. Ma gis soeu ka ma gis dah zisyos masyah ma gis zis thuq kat.
40012036	Ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, Soetuon buisnyeis lyis yuk khanghmuh gas nyang taiq dah yhung pvjus dang khanghmuh nyhenshang dang thang thyet zis xauh das.
40012037	Khasoeh ge lyis, nah dang gvng mas nvng lyis jyoeng khyvlyis suon dyei das. Nah dang gvng mas nvng dang thang thyet zis xauh das, ge.
40012038	Hauh thang lhyi maussauh lhaih bang yahge Pharishe dvyhamh gas, nyang lyis, Svra eh, ngamoq nvng chixoeuq dah vlho dvkoeuq nyvng mes, ge.
40012039	Nghuot laus eq nyang nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ma gis zis yahge Mangso lhyi tyamp khoq dah caiq mas bang gas vlho tsain xo. Nghuot laus eq lvpe Yona dah vlho mha lai las gohtoeu chah vlho eq nyamoq lyis ma dyei das.
40012040	Khasoeh ge lyis Yona gas somh nyeih somh nyens hau oengmuh womdau mas lungh joq zis yah dvyhangteh, Cangsoeu Lo eq somh nyeih somh nyens jweh shoq nyeisjvng khau mha lungh das.
40012041	Soetuon dah uhlyis Ninewe dius jens gas haq caiq mas bang yah dvgeh toq los las nyamoq lyis dang thang thyet das. Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas Yona taiq kyoh dah dang gvng mas nhaiqlom tsain thaiq goeus. Yoeuh aq, heimha Yona thoq lyis zes cho joq.
40012042	Soetuon dah buisnyeis lyis mautyi pheh dah hwankti nyih gas haq caiq mas bang yah dvgeh toq los las nyamoq lyis dang thang thyet das. Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas Solomon dah joeui gyo yoeus das xiklyis mau thang mhayah jweh los. Yoeuh aq, heimha Solomon thoq lyis zes soeu nyeis.
40012043	Yius gas dius jyank masyah thuq loh las, kyuk dah mau mas lamh yenh. Nyang noyos xo laus eq ma nyvng.
40012044	Hauh thang lhyi nyang doms taiq zis gas, Ngos thuq khoq dah yhen mha tauh loh das, ge. Nyang jweh loh lyis, yhen ka shenh shang lha vshung vgvn joq yvlyis nyvng.
40012045	Hauh thang lhyi nyang loh las, nyah thoq lyis zes xungh xent dah yius nyhet doeu shwih las, hauh vkhau mha los tsain wvng lungh joq. Housoeh las hauh soeu dah wotwu gas xikpheh thoq lyis zes yau los. Hai lhung dah vcaiq mas bang eq houyah dvyhangteh bweh los das, ge.
40012046	Yesu dius jens lyis dang taiq nyeis shih lyis, yoeuh aq, nyah ungwes yahge nyah vwik jens gas nghe mha yap las nyang lyis dang jis mes nyeis.
40012047	Housoeh las dius dvyuk nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, nah ungwes yahge nah vwik jens nvng lyis dang jis mes las nghe mha yap joq, ge.
40012048	Nghuot laus eq nyang hau los taiq soeu lhyi phuk taiq zis gas, Ngah ungwes yahge ngah vwik jens gas hank nghuot lah, ge.
40012049	Housoeh nyang nyah changlo jens lyis loq tuonh kat las taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, haih bang gas ngah ungwes yahge ngah vwik jens nghuot, ge.
40012050	Khasoeh ge lyis maukhung mha ngah Uwus dah ehnyet chank bang hank laus eq ngah vwik, ngah nhamhmuh, ngah ungwes tsain nghuot, ge.
40013001	Hauh nyeihyo Yesu gas hauh yhen mhayah thuq loh las thomh yvm mas tsung toh.
40013002	Dius moqjens nyah jyank mas zain huom los las, nyang lhyik khau mha loh wvng tsung toh. Moqjens gas jyankyvm mas yap joq.
40013003	Nyang nyamoq lyis dangtoeuq yah nyoshoq ja taiq kyoh zis gas, Yoeuh aq, jyo khyoq soeu ka, jyo nyau sanh das xiklyis nghe pheh thuq loh.
40013004	Nyang jyo sanh khyoq kat lyis, dvkhamh gas chokhyoh mas gyoh las hauh yvlyis nghoq jens yah lyih kui zo tyamp.
40013005	Gohtoeu dvkhamh gas tsoh ma thoeu dah lukjvp yos mas gyoh loh. Tsoh ma thoeu lha hauh zis gas lvnyap yuk thuq los.
40013006	Nghuot laus eq vnyet ma yoh chent yvmvyah buis tso los lyis lhap nyhauh tyamp.
40013007	Dvyhamh gas zoeu gyomh mas gyoh loh, zoeu zains yuk kuh los las hauh yvlyis huop tyamp.
40013008	Gohtoeu ka nyeisjvng gis yvmas gyoh las, jyo dvxo huon, khyukci huon, somhci huon je los.
40013009	Gyo yoeus das no dap soeu ka xauhgyo bas jungh, ge.
40013010	Changlo jens nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Nyamoq lyis chamus dangtoeuq yah taiq kyoh lah, ge.
40013011	Nyang nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Maukhung munghdan dah nghop toh cho ka namoq lyis seq nhang goeus. Nghuot laus eq nyamoq lyis gas ma seq nhang shih.
40013012	Yoh bang lyis lung dyei das: Housoeh nyamoq gas magons magoh yoh das; ma yoh bang jyank masyah gas nyamoq yoh joq zis yangh yoeus tyamp dyei das.
40013013	Ngos nyamoq lyis dangtoeuq yah taiq zis gas, nyamoq yoeuh laus eq ma nyvng, xauhgyo laus eq ma seqgyo yvmvyah nghuot.
40013014	Housoeh yvmvyah lvpe Esaia taiq khoq zis gas, nyamoq jyank mas nyuk los. Houka: Namoq xauhgyo laus eq ma daq gyo khyen yoeus. Namoq yoeuh laus eq ma nyvng.
40013015	Khasoeh ge lyis, haih bang dah ehnyet gas nhaiq chuot nonungs las, nyamoq nojet, nyoq eq chenh goeus. Housoeh ma nghuot ya nyamoq dah nyoq nyvng los. Nyamoq no xauhgyo, nyamoq dah ehnyet mas seq los las, ngos nyamoq lyis yhoh dyei das xiklyis ngah jyank mas lhain los das, ge.
40013016	Nghuot laus eq namoq nyoq nyvng zis yahge namoq no xauhgyo yvmvyah ngelhoq.
40013017	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, namoq nyvng yvlyis lvpe jens yahge dan bang nyoshoq moq nyvng mes laus eq ma xauh nyvng khoq. Namoq xauhgyo yvlyis gyo mes laus eq ma xauhgyo khoq.
40013018	Housoeh yvmvyah jyo nyau sanh dah dangtoeuq lyis gyo yoeus geh.
40013019	Dvyuk yuk Mangso munghdan dang lyis xauhgyo laus eq nyah ehnyet khau mha sanh toh dah jyo nyau lyis ma shop soeu yah yoeus tyamp dyei las nyang ma seqgyo. Hauh zis gas cho mas gyoh dah jyo nyau nghuot.
40013020	Lukjvp yos mas gyoh dah jyo nyau gas, Dang lyis xauhgyo las lvnyap lhom yoeus dah soeu nghuot.
40013021	Nghuot laus eq nhaiqlom khau mha vnyet ma chent yvmvyah, dvyoq kyingh dvyoh kham. Nyang hauh dang gvng mas shoeuhshih zis xauh lyis ehnyet dyet las lvnyap nungsdoms loh.
40013022	Zoeu gyomh mas gyoh dah jyo nyau gas, Dang lyis xauhgyo laus eq mungkvn mas dah chiqjyen zis yahge mhuih jyomh dah zisyos gas hauh dang lyis huop las vshih ma yoh shih bang nghuot.
40013023	Nghuot laus eq nyeisjvng gis yvmas gyoh goeu gas, Dang lyis xauhgyo zis yah dvyhangteh hauh zis lyis seqgyo yoeus, vshih shih las, dvxo huon, khyukci huon, somhci huon je los bang nghuot.
40013024	Nyang nyamoq lyis gohtoeu dangtoeuq eq taiq: Maukhung munghdan gas, nyah yos mas jyo nyau gis sanh kat soeu yah doeusgoh.
40013025	nyamoq yhet joq dah uhlyis, ma gis dah jes lyih las sunghso sanh toh yvmas yohnoq los sanh khoq.
40013026	Nghuot laus eq jyo nyau yuk los las vshih shih dah uhlyis yohnoq eq thuq los.
40013027	Housoeh las hauh yhensain dah uhkung jens nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, nah yos mas gis dah jyo kyingh dvkhyoq ma nghuot lhyeh? Housoeh lyis chamus yohnoq yuk los lah, ge.
40013028	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Haih zis gas jes yah kuot zis dvnghuot, ge. Uhkung jens nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Housoeh lyis ngamoq yohnoq pom lhyi nuot tyamp das zis nvng vgyo lah, ge.
40013029	Nyang gas, Ma nghuot, namoq nyoq nuot lyis sunghso nyet lyis ma bos zangh nuot tyamp bas jungh.
40013030	Aiq ja yah dvgeh yet yhomh nyos jweh shoq yuk joq bas jungh. Jyo yhomh nyos lyis, jyo yhomh bang lyis, Nyoq lyis ngheq tyamp das xiklyis cangxeih yet dain toh geh, sunghso lhyi ka yet las ngah jyi mha kat toh geh oen das, ge.
40013031	Nyang nyamoq lyis dangtoeuq taiq shih zis gas, Maukhung munghdan gas, dius dvyuk nyah yos mha yoeus sanh kat dah anghwvng shih yah doeusgoh.
40013032	Hauh zis gas vnyau dvnganh thoq mas zes ngis. Nghuot laus eq hauh zis kuh los goeus ya, angh nyaus phoqywi thoq lyis kuh thank vzains bweh los las, hauh vko mha mau dang nghoq jens sot yoh sot.
40013033	Nyang nyamoq lyis gohtoeu dangtoeuq taiq shih zis gas, Maukhung munghdan gas, vmesbih dvyuk sunghso mons somh pan mha yoeus kat lyis, sunghso dvnganh yvlyis yoh dau los nhang dah bicheih yah doeusgoh, ge.
40013034	Housoeh Yesu gas, haih zis dvnganh, moqjens lyis dangtoeuq yah taiq. Dangtoeuq ma bos bos nyang nyamoq lyis cha eq ma taiq kyoh.
40013035	Hauh zis gas, Ngos gas ngah nhuot haq las dangtoeuq yah taiq bah, Mungkvn xi lhyi yah shung toh zis lyis taiq das, ge lvpe taiq toh dang nyuk los das xiklyis nghuot.
40013036	Yesu gas moqjens lyis pont kat lho lha yhen khau mha wvng loh lyis, nyah changlo jens gas nyah jyank mas los las taiq zis gas, Yos mas dah yohnoq dangtoeuq ngamoq lyis doms phui kyoh aq, ge.
40013037	Nyang nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Gis dah jyo nyau sanh soeu ka, Cangsoeu Lo nghuot.
40013038	Yos gas mungkvn nghuot; gis dah jyo nyau gas munghdan lo jens lyis taiq. Nghuot laus eq yohnoq gas ma gis soeu dah lo jens nghuot.
40013039	Hauh yohnoq lyis sanh dah jes gas Satan nghuot; yet yhomh dah shishenh gas mungkvn thank zis nghuot. Jyo yhomh bang gas loeuswons bang nghuot.
40013040	Hauh yohnoq lyis tsainh yoeus las nyi mas ngheq teh, mungkvn thank uhlyis housoeh bweh das.
40013041	Hauh Cangsoeu Lo gas nyah loeuswons bang lyis nhang kat das las, nyamoq gas nyah munghdan mas dah ehnyet lainszo nhang bang yahge lyi ma chi dah muh kuot bang dvnganhmoq lyis tsainh las,
40013042	nyamoq lyis nyikhyomp mas khyoq kat das zis nghuot. Hauh yvmas nyamoq ngausdyeis ngausnhvp yah zwis khih chap loh das.
40013043	Hauh uhlyis dan bang gas, nyamoq Uwus dah munghdan mas buis soeh bvng los das. Gyo yoeus das no dap soeu ka xauhgyo bas jungh, ge.
40013044	Maukhung munghdan gas yos mas shung toh dah zisyos yah doeusgoh. Hauh zis lyis dius dvyuk nyvng lyis, doms shung toh khoq las gaus ehnyet yah loh las, yoh ya yoh goeu lyis ungh las hauh yos lyis wis yoeus.
40013045	Tsai, maukhung munghdan gas, gis dah uhshot lyis xo dah soenghi phoq yah doeusgoh.
40013046	Nyang gas svsoh phauhdap dah uhshot lyis xo nyvng lyis, loh las vsainnyang yoh ya yoh zis lyis ungh las hauh yvlyis wis yoeus.
40013047	Tsai maukhung munghdan gas, thomh mas doeuh las oeng vja ja lyis yoh nghop yoeus dah nyho yah doeusgoh.
40013048	Hau dyingh joq zis lyis jyankyvm mas yoeus los las tsung uhlyis yah gis yvlyis khyont mas kat, nghuot laus eq ma gis yvlyis gas doeuh tyamp.
40013049	Mungkvn thank uhlyis eq houyah dvyhangteh bweh los das. Loeuswons bang gyoh los las ma shop bang lyis dan bang masyah kangh yoeus las,
40013050	Nyikhyomp mas doeuh khyoq tyamp das. Hauh yvmas ngausdyeis ngausnhvp yahge zwis khih chap loh das.
40013051	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Hai dvnganh zis lyis vtsain seqgyo shih lah, ge. Nyamoq nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Seqgyo goeus Yhensain eh, ge.
40013052	Housoeh las nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Maukhung munghdan xiklyis maussauh lhaih svra duot das zis xuq goeus soeu khanghmuh gas, vsainnyang dah zisyos kyunk masyah vsaiq eq vcauh eq lap thuq los dah yhensain dvyuk yah doeusgoh.
40013053	Hauh thang lhyi Yesu gas, dangtoeuq dye taiq lyis hou mhayah thuq loh.
40013054	Nyah wus mas doms jweh loh lyis, nyamoq dah lyi jungs mas nyamoq lyis jyauh yvlyis gyo mauh las, Hauh soeu ka heisoeh teh dah joeui yahge yomzains muhzoh kuot das yomsoq khalhye yah yoh au lhyeh?
40013055	Nyang gas hai soehfuh dah lo ma nghuot lhyeh? Nyah ungwes gas Mari ge soeu nghuot las, nyah vnoeuh moq Yaku, Yosep, Simon yahge Yuda moq nghuot ma nghuot lhyeh?
40013056	Nyah nhamhmuh jens dvnganhmoq eq yang yah dvgeh ma nghuot lhyeh? Housoeh dvnghuot zis haih soeu housoeh teh yomsoq khalhye yah yoh au lhyeh, tsain ge.
40013057	Housoeh nyamoq gas nyang lyis ehnyet lainszo gus bweh. Nghuot laus eq Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Lvpe ka vsainnyang mau, yahge yhen mas lai las nyoqnho ngelang ma yoh zis ma bos, ge.
40013058	nyamoq lomsjingh ehnyet ma bos yvmvyah, hauh joqyos mas nyang yomsoq zains muhzoh nyoshoq ma yoh kuot khoq.
40014001	Hauh shishenh lyis Galile mungh zau Herod gas Yesu dah nyings hoeuh zis xauhgyo lyis,
40014002	nyah jyeidwis jens lyis taiq zis gas, Haih zis gas jeisnyhop dyei soeu Yohan nghuot. Nyang gas shei masyah dwis toq los goeus, housoeh yvmvyah nyang yomsoq zains muhzoh yoh kuot, ge.
40014003	Housoeh Herod gas nyah boek Philip dah yhensain nyhiq Herodia gvng mas Yohan lyis nyhik nhang lha thung mas lhunk toh.
40014004	Khasoeh ge lyis Yohan gas Herod lyis nyah boek Philip dah yhensain nyhiq Herodia lyis yoeus das lyi ma bos ge taiq yvmvyah nghuot.
40014005	Nyang gas Yohan lyis sat mes laus eq moqjens lyis gyuk: khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas nyang lyis lvpe dvyuk nghuot ge loms.
40014006	Nghuot laus eq Herod khoeu dah buisnyeis lyis, hauh pwe mha los bang dah xikkhonh mas Herodia dah lonyi lo goh xoeuq zis yah Herod lyis nhaiqtap nhang.
40014007	Hauh uhlyis nyang gas hau lonyi lo lyis, nyang cha sang cha dyei das, ge das-ing dah khonh toh.
40014008	Housoeh hauh lonyi lo gas nyah ungwes joeui dyei zis yah dvyhangteh, Jeisnyhop dyei soeu Yohan dah uhloms lyis bvn masyah kat los dyei aq, ge taiq.
40014009	Hwankti ka nhaiqkuk laus eq maukhi toh dang yahge nyah boenghwus jens gvng mas nyang lyis dyei das xiklyis taiq kat las,
40014010	nyang dius nhang lha thung mha Yohan dah uhloms lyis thyet goeus.
40014011	Nyah uhloms lyis bvn masyah yoeus los las hauh lonyi lo lyis dyei lyis, nyang gas nyah ungwes lyis dyei.
40014012	Nyah changlo jens gas, mvng lyis loh yoeus nyhop thang lhyi Yesu lyis loh tsain taiq kyoh.
40014013	Yesu hauh yvlyis xauhgyo lyis, nyang gas lhyik mas tsung lha sam joqyos pheh jhank loh. Nghuot laus eq dius jens hauh zis xauhgyo lyis wus masyah thuq las khyei cho yah nyah thang mha tsain chank loh.
40014014	Nyang lhyik masyah thuq loh lyis moqjens lyis nyvng kat. Nyamoq lyis nhaiq yoeuh nyen las, nyamoq dah nos bang lyis gis los nhang.
40014015	Nyenhthang jweh lyis, nyah changlo jens nyah jyank mas los taiq zis gas, Haih zis gas mhanhdyvp nghuot, shishenh eq lai loh goeus, moqjens lyis wukhau mha nyamoq xiklyis zonoms loh tsain wis bas jungh, nyamoq lyis nhang kat aq, ge.
40014016	Yesu taiq zis gas, Nyamoq lyis ma loh nhang noh nyamoq lyis namoq zonoms dyei geh, ge.
40014017	Nyamoq, nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngamoq ohlhyoq oeng koeuq yahge oengdoq aiq doeu dvyoh, ge.
40014018	Nyang gas, Hauh zis ngah jyank mas chi los aq, ge.
40014019	Housoeh nyang gas moqjens lyis mhanh thoq mas tsung das zis taiq toh lho lha, ohlhyoq oeng koeuq yahge oengdoq aiq doeu lyis yoeus chi lho lha, maukhung pheh nghank las shvmanh dung. Hauh thang lhyi khyiq las hauh ohlhyoq nyah changlo jens lyis dyei. Changlo jens gas moqjens lyis gvm dyei.
40014020	Nyamoq dvnganhmoq zo jo thang lhyi, nyet dah vpop vsop tsain kui tsainh lyis dvci aiq dang muis nghuot.
40014021	Zo bang vmesbih yahge loshang jens ma suon, yukgis goeu oeng khyoengh ko nghuot.
40014022	Yesu moqjens lyis pont nyeis uhlyis nyah changlo jens lyis lhyik mas tsung lha thyitvp pheh, nyah xik pheh goeu loh nhang.
40014023	Nyang gas moqjens lyis pont lho lha, shvmanh dung das xiklyis boms mas nyang kyingh doq loh. Mauchuot los lyis houmha nyang kyingh nyeis.
40014024	Nghuot laus eq hauh uhlyis lhyik gas jyankyvm yah svsoh we yvmas loh nyeis. Hauh uhlyis lyeis ma doeus yvmvyah changhphauq doeuh nyeis.
40014025	Nvpsangh nyoq nyvng zoh lyis Yesu gas thomh thoq cho yah nyamoq jyank pheh suh los nyeis.
40014026	Housoeh thomh thoq cho suh los yvlyis changlo jens nyvng lyis nyamoq gyuk las kaiq zis gas, Haih zis gas sidyos nghuot, ge.
40014027	Nghuot laus eq houjang yah Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Vgyuk goh, ngos dvnghuot, yomhont geh, ge.
40014028	Petru nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, nvng dvnghuot lyis gas jeis thoq cho yah ngos lyis nah jyank mas los nhang aq, ge.
40014029	Los aq, ge nyang lyis taiq lho lhyi, Petru gas lhyik masyah gyoh las Yesu jyank mas loh das xiklyis jeis thoq mas suh loh.
40014030	Nghuot laus eq lyeismuh jyang lhyi nyvng lyis nyang gyuk los: hauh uhlyis nyang nyop loh nyeis las kaiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, ngos lyis khyuot yoeus aq, ge.
40014031	Yesu loq lvnyap yhuonh kat las, nyang lyis lang she uhlyis yah taiq zis gas, Lomsjingh Ehnyet nain soeu eh, chamus khamkhvv lah, ge.
40014032	Nyamoq lhyik khau mha wvng goeus ya, lyeis eq tam goeus.
40014033	Hauh lhyik khau mha bang nyang lyis dupaiq uhlyis yah taiq zis gas, Nvng gas Mangso dah lo jyoengh nghuot, ge.
40014034	Nyamoq thyitvp pheh dap loh lyis, Genesaret mau mas jweh loh.
40014035	Hauh joqyos mas bang gas nyang lyis seq las, nyamoq gas hauh wuxom gonh mas dah nos bang dvnganh lyis Yesu jyank mas loh shwih los nhang.
40014036	Housoeh nyamoq gas nyah dyithang lhyi khvlangh tanh das xiklyis nyang lyis dung. Nyang lyis xauh tanh bang dvnganh gis los.
40015001	Yerusalem mas dah maussauh lhaih bang yahge Pharishe jens Yesu jyank mas los taiq zis gas,
40015002	Nah changlo jens gas chamus nyamoq loq ma cheih wom zo las logis jens dah thungh lyis thyoq goh lah, ge.
40015003	Nyang nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Namoq dah thungh chank das xiklyis Mangso dah tyingtoh dang lyis chamus thyoq goh lah?
40015004	Mangso taiq zis gas, Nah ungwes uwus lyis phauh nyang aq; ungwes uwus lyis ma gis zis taiq soeu ka shei nyang shei bas jungh, ge.
40015005	Nghuot laus eq namoq taiq zis gas, Nah ungwes uwus lyis, Namoq ngah loq masyah xauh yoeus das vyhang ka Mangso lhyi dyei ge las,
40015006	nyah nyhiphoq lyis ma phauh lyis gas, nyang gas shuot zis ma bos ge namoq dah thungh yah Mangso dah tyingtoh dang lyis peq toh.
40015007	Gis guons kuot bang eh, namoq yah sen lha Esaia pe khoq zis gas jyoengh nyang nghuot.
40015008	Hauh zis gas: Haih dius jens gas nyamoq nhuotkuk yah ngos lyis phauh nyang laus eq, Nyamoq dah nhaiqlom gas ngos yah we goh joq.
40015009	Dius dah tyingtoh dang lyis kyingh vgungs toh las jyauh chah yhangteh jyauh nyeis yvmvyah, nyamoq ngos lyis paiq zis gas vkom dvnghuot, ge.
40015010	Housoeh nyang moqjens lyis khi lha taiq zis gas, Gyo yoeus las seqgyo geh.
40015011	Nhuot mas wvng zis gas dius lyis vwot v-oeu bweh nhang zis ma nghuot; nhuot masyah thuq loh zis gas dius lyis vwot v-oeu bweh nhang, ge.
40015012	Hauh uhlyis changlo jens nyah jyank mas los las taiq zis gas, Haih dang Pharishe jens xauhgyo lyis nhaiq gyo nos zis nvng vseq lah, ge.
40015013	Nyang nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Maukhung mha dah ngah Uwus ma xoh toh vzains dvnganh yah khuot tyamp zis xauh das.
40015014	Nyamoq housoeh nghuot langh shih bas jungh, nyamoq gas nyoqjet dah choshe bang nghuot. Nyoqjet soeu ka nyoqjet soeu lhyi choshe lhyi ka, aiq yuk yah dwang mas gyoh das, ge.
40015015	Petru nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Haih dangtoeuq ngamoq lyis phui kyoh aq, ge.
40015016	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq haih zis lyis gvshih jweh shoq do ma lhain goh lhyeh?
40015017	Nhuot mas wvng dah vyhang cha nghuot laus eq womdau khau mha wvng loh thang lhyi nghe pheh thuq loh goeus zis lyis namoq ma seq goh lhyeh?
40015018	Nghuot laus eq nhuot masyah thuq loh zis gas, nhaiqlom khau mhayah bweh thuq los las, haih goeu gas dius lyis vwot v-oeu bweh nhang.
40015019	Khasoeh ge lyis nhaiqlom masyah ma gis zis nghamh, dius sat, nyi shuot lvng shuot, yauxi, khauh, ma ying kanghjyoeng kat zis yahge loeusmus soqzo zis bweh thuq los.
40015020	Haih goeu gas dius lyis vwot v-oeu bweh nhang zis nghuot. Nghuot laus eq loq ma cheih wom zo zis gas, dius lyis vwot v-oeu bweh nhang zis ma nghuot, ge.
40015021	Yesu gas hou mhayah thuq las Taire yahge Sidon wuxom pheh jhank loh.
40015022	Hauh uhlyis yoeuh aq, Khanan vmesbih dvyuk hauh mau masyah los las kaiq sang zis gas, Dawi dah Lo Yhensain eh, ngos lyis nhaiqnyen aq, ngah lonyi lo yius kuq las svsoh shanghsenh nyeis, ge.
40015023	Housoeh ge nghuot laus eq Yesu gas, nyang lyis dang dvkhonh eq ma toeuh dyei. Nyah changlo jens nyang lyis los taiq zis gas, Nyang lyis loh nhang aq: Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas yah thang mha chank kaiq ngaus yenh, ge.
40015024	Nyang phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos lyis gas Israel yhen bang mas dyuk tyamp dah yvng jens jyank mas kyingh dvnhang kat, ge.
40015025	Hauh uhlyis nyang ywi los las gyuis gop zoh lyis yah taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, ngos lyis bos pangh aq, ge.
40015026	Nyang phuk taiq zis gas, Loshang jens dah zonoms lyis yoeus las lvkhuih jens lyis doeuh dyei zis gas ma doeus, ge.
40015027	Hauh vmesbih nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Nghuot goeus Yhensain eh, nghuot laus eq lvkhuih eq nyah yhensain kihgus masyah gyoh dah zopop kui zo, ge.
40015028	Housoeh Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Vmesbih eh, nah lomsjingh zis gas kuh joq. Nvng omes zis yah dvyhangteh bweh bas jungh, ge. Nyah lonyi lo gas hauh shishenh lyis nyang gis los goeus.
40015029	Yesu gas hauh mau masyah thuq loh lyis, Galile thomh nvm mas jweh loh. Housoeh boms mas doq loh las houmha tsung toh.
40015030	Hauh uhlyis moqjens nyah jyank mas zain los las khyei gis loq ma yoh, nyoqjet, nhuotjet bang yahge gohtoeu noslom vja ja yoh bang nyoshoq moq lyis nyamoq shwih nhoenk lyih las, nyah khyeiyang mas toh. Housoeh las nyang nyamoq lyis gis los nhang.
40015031	Housoeh nhuotjet bang yoh jis los, shei nhui bang gis los, khyei dyoq bang yoh suh loh, nyoqjet bang nyvng los zis lyis moqjens nyvng lyis mauh. Housoeh las nyamoq gas Israel dah Mangso phunk lyis tsain chungh.
40015032	Hauh thang lhyi Yesu gas nyah changlo jens lyis khi lha taiq zis gas, Ngos haih moqjens lyis nhaiqnyen: Khasoeh ge lyis, nyamoq ngos yah nyeis zis gvshih somh nyeih nyangh goeus, nyamoq zo das zis cha eq ma yoh. Ngos nyamoq lyis wom yuot zis yah ma mes nhang kat, nyamoq cholvt mas wom yuot lhyauh das, ge.
40015033	Changlo jens nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Mhanhdyvp mas heinyhoq moq lyis tham shoq dah ohlhyoq gas khamha yoh xo das lah, ge.
40015034	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ohlhyoq khanyhoq koeuq yoh goh lah, ge lyis, Nyamoq taiq zis gas, Nyhet koeuq yahge oengdoq dvtsiq dvbos lo, ge.
40015035	Moqjens lyis nyeisjvng mas tsung das xiklyis taiq toh lho lha,
40015036	Nyang hau ohlhyoq nyhet koeuq yahge oengdoq lyis yoeus chi lha jyehjuh chungh thang lhyi khyiq las, changlo jens lyis dyei. Changlo jens eq moqjens lyis gvm dyei.
40015037	Housoeh nyamoq dvnganhmoq zo jo thang lhyi, nyet dah vpop vsop kui tsainh lyis nyhet dang muis nghuot.
40015038	Zo bang vmesbih yahge loshang jens ma suon, yukgis komshang nyei khyoengh nghuot.
40015039	Nyang moqjens lyis pont kat thang lhyi, lhyik khau mha wvng tsung lha Magadan wuxom mha jweh loh.
40016001	Hauh uhlyis Pharishe yahge Saduke moq los las, nyang lyis shiwu zoh lyis maukhung mha dah vlho dvkoeuq chixoeuq aq, ge sang.
40016002	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, nyenhthang lhyi namoq taiq zis gas, maukhung nes las mau phangh das.
40016003	Nvpsangh pheh maukhung nes, mau eq noq lyis gas, Khvnyhik mau thunghkyei gyoh das ge gyangh daq taiq. Namoq maukhung wuhsoh lyis seq yoeuh laus eq, shishenh yah sen dah vlho lhyi ka ma seq yoeuh ma nghuot lhyeh?
40016004	Ma shop zis yahge Mangso lhyi toh tyamp bang gas, vlho tsain xo. Nghuot laus eq lvpe Yona dah vlho mha lai las gohtoeu chah vlho eq nyamoq lyis ma dyei das, ge. Housoeh nyang nyamoq lyis toh khoq las thuq loh.
