40016005	Changlo jens gas thomh thyitvp pheh goeu dap loh lyis, nyamoq ohlhyoq wons los das zis tohnyhik khoq.
40016006	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Pharishe yahge Saduke jens dah bicheih lyis zaih geh, ge.
40016007	Housoeh nyamoq nyang changh taiq goh zis gas, Yang ohlhyoq ma tsain wons yvmvyah nghuot, ge.
40016008	Yesu hauh yvlyis seq las, Lomsjingh ehnyet nain bang eh, namoq ohlhyoq ma wons cho lhyi chamus taiq goh nyeis lah?
40016009	Namoq ma seqgyo shih goh lhyeh? Ohlhyoq oeng koeuq yah dius oeng khyoengh lyis tsoh las khanyhoq dang yoh kui tsainh shih zis lyis namoq ma soh goh lhyeh?
40016010	Ohlhyoq nyhet koeuq yah dius nyei khyoengh lyis tsoh las khanyhoq dang yoh kui tsainh shih zis lyis ma tsain soh lo goh lhyeh?
40016011	Ngos namoq lyis ohlhyoq dah cho ma taiq zis gas namoq chamus ma seqgyo goh lah? Pharishe yahge Saduke moq dah bicheih lyis zaih geh, oen dvtaiq, ge.
40016012	Hauh uhlyis ohlhyoq dah bicheih lyis taiq zis ma nghuot, Pharishe yahge Saduke moq jyauh dah cho lhyi zaih das zis dvtaiq yvlyis tsain seqgyo.
40016013	Gvshih Yesu gas Kesare mau Philipi mas jweh loh lyis, nyang nyah changlo jens lyis nyei zis gas, Dius jens Cangsoeu Lo lyis hank nghuot ge goh lah, ge.
40016014	Nyamoq, nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Dvyhamh gas jeisnyhop dyei soeu Yohan; dvyhamh gas Eliya; gohtoeu dvyhamh gas, Yeremia, nghuot ya, lvpe dvyuk yuk nghuot, ge.
40016015	Housoeh lyis namoq gas ngos lyis hank nghuot oen goh lah, ge nyamoq lyis taiq.
40016016	Simon Petru phuk taiq zis gas, Nvng gas dwis nyeis Mangso dah Lo Khristu nghuot, ge.
40016017	Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Yona dah lo Simon eh, nvng gas ngelhoq, nvng lyis haih zis chixoeuq zis gas suihshoh ma nghuot, maukhung mha dah ngah Uwus chixoeuq zis dvnghuot.
40016018	Petru eh, ngos nvng lyis taiq bah, nvng gas luk nghuot las, Ngos ngah tsainhtoh phung lhyi haih lukmuh lom thoq mas ci toh das las, hauh yvlyis shei dah yomsoq ge munyi thomh khomh yah yoh ung das zis ma nghuot, ge.
40016019	Maukhung munghdan suhshih ngos nvng lyis dyei das: nyeisjvng thoq mas nvng twih ya twih toh zis gas, maukhung mha eq twih toh zis xauh das. Nyeisjvng thoq mas nvng phui ya phui kat zis cha nghuot laus eq maukhung mha phui kat zis xauh das, ge.
40016020	Hauh thang lhyi nyang gas Yesu Khristu nghuot zis hank lyis eq ma taiq das xiklyis nyah changlo jens lyis khyangh wontang com toh.
40016021	Hauh shishenh masyah Yesu gas Yerusalem mas e lha logis jens yahge phudyei uhjyung jens, maussauh lhaih bang dah loq mas shanghsenh zis vja ja xauh thang lhyi nyang lyis sat las, somh vnyeih lyis dwis toq das cho nyah changlo jens lyis chixoeuq zoh loh.
40016022	Housoeh las Petru gas nyang lyis khi yoeus las nyho zis gas, Yhensain eh, ma gis bweh, hauh zis gas nvng masyah we loh bas jungh; haih zis nah jyank mas khanhamp eq ma bweh bas jungh, ge.
40016023	Nghuot laus eq nyang Petru lyis lhain yoeuh las phuk taiq zis gas, Satan eh, ngah nungsthank pheh jik loh aq, nvng gas Mangso shot pheh yah ma nghamh, dius shot pheh yah dvnghamh yvmvyah, nvng gas ngah dah lainszo gus nghuot, ge.
40016024	Housoeh Yesu nyah changlo jens lyis taiq zis gas, Dvyuk yuk ngah thang chank soeu duot mes lyis gas, nyah gungs lyis nungsyos toh, nyah tapzains wuq las ngah thang mha chank bas jungh.
40016025	Khasoeh ge lyis vsainnyang kang lhyi khyuot yoeus mes soeu ka, kang dyuk das. Nghuot laus eq ngah gvng mas kang dyuk soeu ka kang xo nyvng das.
40016026	Dius dvyuk gas mungkvn gonh lyis sain toh laus eq nyah kang dyuk tyamp lyis gas nyah xiklyis chah vkyuh bos lah? Cangsoeu dius gas nyah kang lhyi cha yah yoh thaiq yoeus das lah?
40016027	Khasoeh ge lyis hauh Cangsoeu Lo gas Uwus dah phunk mas nyah loeuswons bang yah dvgeh jweh los das; hauh uhlyis yuk khanghmuh gas nyah muhzoh lyis tank las phauh shangh zis xauh das.
40016028	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, heimha yap joq bang dvyhamh gas hauh Cangsoeu Lo nyah munghdan yah jweh los zis ma nyvng dvchank ma shei das, ge.
40017001	Khyuk nyeih dah thang lhyi Yesu gas Petru, Yaku yahge nyah vnoeuh Yohan moq lyis shwih las boms nyhang thoq mas nyamoq nyang kyingh doq loh.
40017002	Nyang gas nyamoq dah xikkhonh mas vwot thaiq los las nyah nyoqnho ka buis teh bvng los, nyah dyi eq thyoeu lha kyi kyi bvng los.
40017003	Nyang yah jisgoh nyeis dah Moshe yahge Eliya eq nyamoq lyis nyetlos nyettant nyvng xoeuq.
40017004	Housoeh Petru Yesu lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, heimha yang nyeis das xiklyis gis. Nvng gyo nghuot lyis gas, ngamoq heimha zvng somh koeuq nvng, Moshe, Eliya xiklyis dvyuk dvkoeuq kuot dyei das, ge.
40017005	Nyang housoeh taiq nyeis shih lyis bvng dah jyommauh yah nyamoq lyis nghop tyamp las: yoeuh aq, jyommauh khau mhayah thwe dvkoeuq taiq zis gas, Haih soeu ka ngos jyetdap dah ngah Lo nghuot, ngos nyang lyis nhaiq doeus - nyah dang gyo geh, ge.
40017006	Changlo jens haih zis xauhgyo lyis, gyuk nvn las gop pyeh toh.
40017007	Housoeh Yesu nyamoq lyis los tanh las taiq zis gas, Toq geh, vgyuk goh, ge.
40017008	Nyamoq tsain nghank yoeuh lyis, Yesu masyah lai las gohtoeu hank lyis eq ma nyvng lo.
40017009	Nyamoq boms masyah gyoh los dah uhlyis, Yesu nyamoq lyis khyangh com zis gas, Cangsoeu Lo shei masyah ma doms dwis toq los dvchank, haih nyoqnyvng hank lyis eq vtaiq kyoh goh, ge.
40017010	Nyah changlo jens nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Maussauh lhaih bang chamus Eliya shih jweh los chah ge taiq au lhyeh, ge.
40017011	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Jyoengh Eliya shih los las dvnganh yvlyis soq das.
40017012	Nghuot laus eq ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, Eliya gas jweh los goeus zis nyamoq gas nyang lyis ma seq yvmvyah nyamoq o khyvlyis kuot. Houyah dvyhangteh Cangsoeu Lo eq nyamoq dah loq mas shanghsenh zis xauh das, ge.
40017013	Changlo jens gas nyang nyamoq lyis jeisnyhop dyei soeu Yohan dah cho taiq kyoh nyeis ge seqgyo.
40017014	Nyamoq moqjens jyank mas jweh e lhyi, dius dvyuk nyah jyank mas lyih las nyah xikkhonh mas phvluk zomhgyuis las taiq zis gas,
40017015	Yhensain eh, ngah lo lyis nhaiqnyen aq: khasoeh ge lyis, nyang gas chuot las shanghsenh nyeis. Nyi mas eq, jeis mas eq dvsoq soq lyis lains wvng loh.
40017016	Ngos nyang lyis nah changlo jens jyank mas shwih e laus eq nyamoq ma yoh lhoq gis dyei, ge.
40017017	Yesu phuk taiq zis gas, Lomsjingh cho ma bos, ung lhung dah vcaiq mas bang eh, Ngos namoq yah khanyhank jweh shoq yoh nyeis nyeis das lah? Khanyhank jweh shoq namoq lyis jhen chah das lah? Nyang lyis ngah jyank mas shwih los aq, ge.
40017018	Yesu yius lyis nyho lho lhyi yius gas loshang jyank masyah thuq loh goeus las, hauh shishenh masyah nyang gas gis los.
40017019	Hauh thang lhyi changlo jens nyang kyingh Yesu jyank mas los las taiq zis gas, Ngamoq hauh yius lyis chamus ma yoh khat thuq au lhyeh, ge.
40017020	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq lomsjingh ehnyet nain yvmvyah nghuot. Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, namoq mas lomsjingh ehnyet anghshih chvp iq bos nghuot lyis gas, namoq haih boms lyis, Thyimha ywi cheh loh aq, ge lyis ywi cheh loh das. Housoeh nghuot lyis gas namoq xiklyis ma duot zis cha eq ma bos lo das.
40017021	Nghuot laus eq shvmanh dung zis yahge womkyi zis yah kyingh ma nghuot lyis gas haih ja gas ma yoh thuq loh, ge.
40017022	Gvshih nyamoq Galile mau mas nyeis dah uhlyis, Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Cangsoeu Lo gas dius jens dah loq mas phanhlyen dyei zis xauh das.
40017023	Nyamoq gas nyang lyis sat das, hauh thang lhyi somh vnyeih lyis nyang dwis toq das, ge. Changlo jens gas vthanklang masyah ohyom.
40017024	Kaperna-um mha jweh loh lyis, yhenmuh khoenghdaus khywi bang gas Petru jyank mas los las, Namoq dah svra gas yhenmuh khoenghdaus ma kat lah, ge lyis nyang phuk taiq zis gas, Kat, ge.
40017025	Petru yhen khau mha wvng loh lyis Yesu nyang lyis lhom taiq zis gas, Simon eh, nvng khasoeh nghamh? Nyeisjvng hwankti jens khoenghdaus, vkhoq khywi zis gas hank jyank masyah nghuot au lhyeh? Nyamoq lo jens masyah lah? Gohnyau bang jyank masyah lah, ge.
40017026	Petru gas, Gohnyau bang jyank masyah nghuot ge lyis, Yesu gas, Lo jens gas luiq goeus.
40017027	Nghuot laus eq yah gvng mas nyamoq ehnyet ma dyet bas jungh, thomh mas oeng nghweh e khyoq aq; cangxeih yoh dah oeng lyis lap yoeus las nhuot lang haq lyis ngwis dvkyvp nyvng das: hauh zis yoeus las nvng yahge ngah xiklyis nyamoq lyis dyei aq, ge.
40018001	Hauh shishenh lyis changlo jens gas Yesu jyank mas los las taiq zis gas, Maukhung munghdan mas kuh thank zis hank nghuot, ge.
40018002	Nyang loshang dvyuk nyah jyank mas khi yoeus las nyamoq vgungs mas yap nhang lha taiq zis gas,
40018003	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, namoq ehnyet thaiq las loshang jens teh ma bweh los nghuot lyis gas, namoq maukhung munghdan mas ma xauh wvng loh das.
40018004	Housoeh yvmvyah haih loshang teh ehnyet o mha gyoh soeu hank laus eq, maukhung munghdan mas zes kuh soeu nghuot los das.
40018005	Heisoeh teh dah loshang dvyuk lyis ngah nyings masyah lhom yoeus soeu hank laus eq ngos lyis lhom yoeus zis nghuot.
40018006	Nghuot laus eq ngos lyis lomsjingh dah haih ngis bang dvyuk yuk lyis yaunos kuot nhang soeu hank laus eq, nyah lainzain mas mhoq shan tyaulhangh las hauh dah thomh noq mas khyoq kat lyis nyah xiklyis zes gis.
40018007	Yaunos kuot das xiklyis shiwu cho nyoshoq bos yvmvyah mungkvn gas mvtanhzoe nghuot: khasoeh ge lyis hau yaunos thuq los zis gas soengh choenk nghuot. Nghuot laus eq hau shiwu cho lhyi bweh nhang soeu ka mvtanhzoe nghuot.
40018008	Nah loq nah khyei dvjaja yah nvng lyis shuot nhang lhyi, hauh yvlyis thyet doeuh tyamp aq; Nah dah aiq loq nghuot ya, aiq khyei dap zis yah vcaiq vto nyi mas kat zis xauh das thoq lyis, loqdung khyeidung yah kang dwis yvmas xauh wvng loh das zis gas nah xiklyis zes gis.
40018009	Nah nyoqjeih yah nvng lyis shuot nhang lhyi ka, hauh yvlyis thuiq tyamp aq. Nyoq dvjeih yah kang dwis yvmas xauh wvng zis gas, nyoq aiq jeih yah munyi thomh mas wvng loh thoq lyis zes gis.
40018010	Housoeh yvmvyah ngis bang dvyuk lyis eq chaxwe ma nhang vkuot goh. Khasoeh ge lyis ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, maukhung mha nyamoq dah loeuswons bang eq, maukhung mha nyeis, ngah Uwus nyoqnho lhyi vjangh yoeuh nyeis.
40018011	Cangsoeu Lo gas dyuk loh soeu lyis khyuot yoeus das xiklyis lyih.
40018012	Namoq khasoeh nghamh goh lah? Dius dvyuk yuk yvng dvxo doeu yoh: hou mhayah dvdoeu chowhang whang dyuk loh lyis, gauci gau lyis boms mas nyhei toh khoq las, chowhang whang dyuk loh dah vdoeu lyis loh xo ma nghuot lhyeh?
40018013	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, hauh vdoeu xo nyvng lyis, chowhang ma whang dyuk dah gauci gau doeu nyhenshang gauslaus thoq lyis hau dvdoeu xiklyis zes gauslaus.
40018014	Houyah dvyhangteh maukhung mha dah namoq Uwus gas, hau ngis bang mas dvyuk yuk dyuk das zis yangh ma bauh.
40018015	Nah vmang vnoeuh yah nvng lyis cu lhyi, nvng e lha nah aiq yuk nyang kyingh nyeis yvmas, nyang chah zis lyis taiq aq. Nyang nah dang gyo yoeus lyis gas, nvng nah vmang vnoeuh lyis yoh doms jyoeuq yoeus goeus.
40018016	Nghuot laus eq nyang ma gyo dyei lyis gas, nvng yah dvgeh kanghjyoeng dvyuk, nghuot ya aiq yuk shwih e lha, dang khonh khanghmuh lyis kanghjyoeng aiq yuk somh yuk dah xikkhonh mas taiq jyoeng aq.
40018017	Nyamoq dang lyis eq ma gyo dyei nghuot lyis gas, tsainhtoh phung lhyi taiq kyoh aq. Tsainhtoh phung lhyi eq nyang ma gyo dyei nghuot lyis gas, nyang gas gohnyau bang yahge khoengh khywi soeu teh nghuot bas jungh.
40018018	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, nyeisjvng mas namoq twih ya twih zis lyis maukhung mha twih toh das. Nyeisjvng mas namoq phui ya phui kat zis lyis maukhung mha eq phui kat das.
40018019	Ngos namoq lyis taiq shih bah, nyeisjvng thoq mas namoq aiq yuk xamxonh las dung lyis gas, cha nghuot laus eq namoq dung zis lyis maukhung thoq mas ngah Uwus gas namoq lyis kuot dyei das.
40018020	Khasoeh ge lyis ngah nyings mas aiq yuk, nghuot ya somh yuk dvgeh huom dah nyamoq vgungs mas ngos bos, ge.
40018021	Hauh uhlyis Petru nyah jyank mas los taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, ngah vmang vnoeuh ngos lyis doms shuot doms shuot nghuot lyis, ngos nyah yobos lyis khanyhoq lhain khyuot dyei chah das lah? Nyhet lhain jweh shoq lah, ge.
40018022	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos nvng lyis nyhet lhain kyingh oen ma taiq; nyhetci lhain mulas nyhet lhain jweh shoq khyuot dyei aq, ge.
40018023	Housoeh yvmvyah maukhung munghdan gas, uhkung jens lyis jyen suon mes dah hwankti dvyuk yah doeusgoh.
40018024	Housoeh jyen suon nyeis lyis, nyang lyis ngwis jyen sens sens wvn wvn dap soeu dvyuk nyah jyank mas tsain shwih los.
40018025	Hauh soeu ka jyen cap das zis cha eq ma yoh yvmvyah, nyah gungs, nyah yhensain nyhiq, nyah lo jens yahge nyang yoh ya yoh zis dvnganh ungh las jyen cap das xiklyis nyah yhensain vmingh dyei.
40018026	Hauh uhkung ka nyah xikkhonh mas phvluk zomhgyuis paiq las taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, ngos lyis jenh jhen dyei shih aq, ngos nvng lyis dvnganh yah cap das, ge.
40018027	Hauh uhkung dah yhensain ka nhaiqnyen las kat kat: nyah jyen lhyi lhuiq tyamp dyei.
40018028	Nghuot laus eq uhkung hauh vyuk thuq loh lyis, nyang lyis jyen dvxo shauh soeu uhkung changh dvyuk yah xauhgoh lyis, nyang gas hauh soeu lhyi nyhik yoeus lho lha, lainzain mas chih toh las, Ngah ngwis jyen cap aq, ge sang.
40018029	Hau uhkung changh eq nyah khyeiyang mas gyuis las nyang lyis khyoeuq zis gas, Ngos lyis jenh jhen dyei shih aq, ngos nvng lyis dvnganh yah cap das, ge.
40018030	Jyeih dyei soeu eq ma gyo dyei, jyen dye cap shoq nyang lyis thung mha lhunk toh.
40018031	Hauh cho lhyi nyah uhkung changh jens nyvng lyis, ehnyet ma tap las nyang kuot ya kuot zis dvnganh nyamoq dah yhensain lhyi loh tsain taiq kyoh.
40018032	Hauh thang lhyi nyah yhensain nyang lyis khi yoeus las taiq zis gas, Ung lhung dah uhkung eh, nvng ngos lyis dung yvmvyah, nvng cap chah jyen dvnganh yah ngos lhuiq dyei goeus.
40018033	Ngos nvng lyis nhaiqnyen zis yah dvyhangteh, nvng nah uhkung changh lyis eq nhaiqnyen chah ma nghuot lhyeh, ge.
40018034	Nyah yhensain svsoh nhaiqyo las nyang cap chah goeu dye cap shoq thung vgyis jens loq mas kyauh toh.
40018035	Houyah dvyhangteh, namoq yuk khanghmuh nah vmang vnoeuh cu zis lyis ehnyet nhaiqlom dvnganh yah ma khyuot dyei lyis gas, maukhung mha dah ngah Uwus eq namoq lyis houyah dvyhangteh kuot das, ge.
40019001	Gvshih Yesu haih dang dye taiq lyis, nyang Galile mau masyah toq las Yodan lvng thyitvp, Yuda wuxom mha jweh loh.
40019002	Moqjens zainsmuh nyah thang mha chank los las, nyang houmha nyamoq lyis gis los nhang.
40019003	Hauh uhlyis Pharishe moq nyah jyank mas los las nyang lyis shiwu zoh lyis nyei zis gas, Dvyuk yuk gas nyah yhensain nyhiq dvja ja chah shuot lyis she tyamp das zis lyi vbos lah, ge.
40019004	Nyang nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis, Cangxeih lyis yah nyah zomh lyis gvnkhanh soeu ka, vbusbih yahge vmesbih lyis gvnkhanh toh goeus yvlyis namoq ma nghap ku goh lhyeh?
40019005	Hauh gvng mas vbusbih gas nyah ungwes uwus lyis toh khoq zis yah nyah yhensain nyhiq yah tsoq las, nyah zomh gas gungsshoh dvkoeuq kyingh duot das, ge.
40019006	Housoeh yvmvyah nyah zomh gas aiq yuk ma nghuot, gungsshoh dvkoeuq dvnghuot lo. Housoeh Mangso tsomp toh yvlyis dius yah ma kangh bas jungh, ge.
40019007	Nyamoq nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Housoeh lyis gas, kangh maussauh lhaih dyei las nyang lyis yoh nhang kat, ge Moshe chamus tying toh au lhyeh, ge.
40019008	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq nhaiqlom tsain than yvmvyah, namoq dah yhensain nyhiq jens lyis tsain she tyamp das xiklyis Moshe vmingh dyei zis nghuot. Nghuot laus eq cangxeih gas heisoeh ma nghuot.
40019009	Ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, yauxi cho mhayah lai las, vsainnyang dah yhensain nyhiq lyis she tyamp las gohtoeu nyihwank yoeus soeu hank laus eq nyi shuot soeu nghuot, ge.
40019010	Nyah changlo jens nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nyi lvng dah cho heisoeh nghuot lyis gas, nyi yoeus, yhenloh ma kuot lyis gis, ge.
40019011	Nghuot laus eq nyang nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Hai jyauh cho lhyi dius dvnganhmoq yah ma yoh lhom yoeus: hauh zis dyei toh zis xauh bang kyingh dvyoh lhom yoeus.
40019012	Khasoeh ge lyis dius dvyhamh gas, nyah ungwes ung mhayah khoeu los lyis yah yukgis ma dyeh bang bos. Dvyhamh gas dius yah shan toh. Dvyhamh gas maukhung munghdan xiklyis nyi ma yoeus yhen ma loh bang eq bos. Yoh lhom yoeus soeu ka lhom yoeus bas jungh, ge.
40019013	Hauh thang lhyi loshang jens thoq mas loq kih las shvmanh dung dyei bas jungh ge, nyamoq lyis nyah jyank mas shwih lyih uhlyis, changlo jens gas nyamoq lyis nyho.
40019014	Nghuot laus eq Yesu taiq zis gas, Loshang jens ngah jyank mas los nhang geh, nyamoq lyis vtomp toh goh: khasoeh ge lyis maukhung munghdan gas housoeh teh bang xiklyis nghuot, ge.
40019015	Housoeh nyang nyamoq thoq mas loq kih dyei lho lha, hou mhayah toq loh.
40019016	Yoeuh aq, dius dvyuk nyah jyank mas los las, Svra eh, ngos vcaiq vto kang yoh das xiklyis gis zis cha kuot chah lah, ge.
40019017	Nyang taiq zis gas, Nvng ngos lyis gis cho yah sen lha chamus nyei? Gis soeu dvyuk kyingh dvbos. Nvng kang o mes lyis gas tyingtoh dang lyis chank aq, ge.
40019018	Nyang, Yesu lyis taiq zis gas, Lyi kha koeuq nghuot lah, ge. Yesu phuk taiq zis gas, Dius vsat, nyi vshuot, vkhauh, ma ying kanghjyoeng vkat;
40019019	Nah ungwes uwus lyis phauh nyang aq, nah yhenkyoh lyis nvnyang gungs lyis teh yoh jyetdap das, ge.
40019020	Hauh loyvm phoq nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Hauh goeu dvnganh yvlyis ngos loyvm yoq lyis yah chank kuot goeus: ngos cha chah shih lah, ge.
40019021	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng dyinghjet mes lyis gas, Loh aq, nvng yoh zis ungh las nyungs bang lyis dyei tyamp aq, housoeh lyis nvng maukhung mha zisyos yoh das. Housoeh las ngah thang mha chank los aq, ge.
40019022	Nghuot laus eq hau loyvm phoq hauh dang xauhgyo lyis nhaiqkuk zis yah loh lo: Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas zisyos nyoshoq yoh soeu nghuot.
40019023	Housoeh las Yesu nyah changlo jens lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, dis soeu ka maukhung munghdan mas svsoh wvng yau.
40019024	Ngos namoq lyis taiq shih bah, Dis soeu dvyuk Mangso munghdan mas yoh wvng das thoq lyis gas, nghvpnho mha gola-u wvng das zis zes lwis, ge.
40019025	Nyah changlo jens hauh zis xauhgyo lyis nyamoq svsoh mauh las, Housoeh lyis gas khyuot yoeus zis hank xauh das lah, ge.
40019026	Nghuot laus eq Yesu nyamoq lyis yoeuh lho lha taiq zis gas, Haih zis gas dius yah gas ma yoh bweh, nghuot laus eq Mangso ka dvnganh zis lyis yoh bweh nhang, ge.
40019027	Petru nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, ngamoq dvnganh yah toh khoq las nah thang mha chank los goeus. Housoeh las ngamoq cha xauh yoeus das lah, ge.
40019028	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, Cangsoeu Lo gas nyah phunk yah hwankti tank mas tsung dah dius caiq vsaiq mas namoq ngah thang mha chank bang eq, hwankti tank dvci aiq lom mas tsung lha Israel dvci aiq nyau lyis soetuon das, ge.
40019029	Ngah nyings gvng mas yhen, vmang vnoeuh, nhamhmuh, ungwes, uwus, yhensain nyhiq, lo jens, maunyeis lyis tyamp soeu hank laus eq vkyuh dvxo huon xauh yoeus las, vcaiq vto kang vso vlho xauh kham yoeus das.
40019030	Nghuot laus eq cangxeih bang nyoshoq gas thang thank nghuot das. Thang thank bang cangxeih nghuot das, ge.
40020001	Maukhung munghdan gas zvbiq khyam mha muh zwi uhkung lhung kat das zis nvpsangh yah thuq loh dah yhensain dvyuk yah doeusgoh.
40020002	Hauh soeu ka dvnyeih lyis ngwis kyvp dvkoeuq dyei das xiklyis tsain xam woengh goh las uhkung jens lyis zvbiq khyam mha nhang kat.
40020003	Gau shishenh ko lhyi nyang thuq e lhyi kaih jang mas gohtoeu mvgon yap joq bang lyis nyvng las,
40020004	nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq eq zvbiq khyam mha tsain e geh, phauh mon yih nyhoq ngos namoq lyis dyei das, ge lho lhyi nyamoq e loh.
40020005	Tsai nyang dvci aiq shishenh yahge somh shishenh lyis doms thuq e lha houyah dvyhangteh kuot.
40020006	Oeng shishenh lyis doms thuq e lyis eq, gohtoeu mvgon yap joq bang lyis nyvng las, Namoq dvbuis yah heimha mvgon chamus yap joq goh, ge nyamoq lyis taiq.
40020007	Nyamoq gas nyang lyis, Ngamoq lyis hank ma lhung yvmvyah nghuot ge lho lhyi, nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq eq zvbiq khyam mha tsain e geh, ge.
40020008	Nyenhthang jweh lyis, zvbiq khyam sain ka, muh zwi bang lyis khi los aq, thang thank wvng soeu masyah cangxeih wvng soeu jweh shoq uhkung phauh khaih aq, ge nyah ziszom lyis taiq toh.
40020009	Hauh uhlyis oeng shishenh lyis lhung zis xauh bang los las, ngwis dvyuk dvkyvp tsain xauh yoeus.
40020010	Nghuot laus eq cangxeih wvng bang los las, nyamoq zes xauh yoeus das ge nghamh laus eq, dvyuk dvkyvp kyingh dvtsain xauh yoeus.
40020011	nyamoq tsain xauh yoeus dah thang lhyi nyamoq gas, yhensain lhyi lop zoh lyis yah taiq zis gas,
40020012	Hai thang thank wvng bang gas dvshishenh kyingh dvkung, nghuot laus eq khvnyhik dvnyeih yah wons wuq las buis gywes zis kham bang, ngamoq lyis nvng, nyamoq yah dvyhangteh kuot nyvng! ge.
40020013	Nghuot laus eq nyang nyamoq mas dvyuk lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Buisnoms phoq eh, ngos nvng lyis ma kuot cu. Ngwis dvkyvp khyoq toh zis lyis nvng gyo goeus ma nghuot lhyeh?
40020014	Nah zis yoeus las loh aq; thang thank wvng bang lyis nvng yah dvyih dyei das zis ngos o.
40020015	Ngah vyhang lhyi ngos o khyvlyis kuot das zis, lyi ma bos lhyeh? Ngos gis yvmvyah nah nyoq yoeuh zoeu vnghuot lah?
40020016	Housoeh yvmvyah thang thank soeu ka xik pheh nghuot los das, cangxeih soeu ka thang thank nghuot los das, ge.
40020017	Yesu gas nyah changlo jens dvci aiq yuk lyis shwih las Yerusalem pheh doq loh nyeis uhlyis cho mha nyamoq lyis lhyenwhei taiq zis gas,
40020018	Yoeuh aq, yang Yerusalem pheh doq loh nyeis: Cangsoeu Lo gas phudyei uhjyung jens yahge maussauh lhaih bang loq mas kyauh tyamp las, nyamoq gas nyang lyis shei das cho dang thang thyet das zis yahge,
40020019	Nyang lyis jwangh, lyuk las tapzains mas taplhangh tyamp das xiklyis gohnyau bang lyis kyauh tyamp das. Somh vnyeih lyis dwis toq kat zis xauh das, ge.
40020020	Hauh thang lhyi Zebedi lotang ungwes gas Yesu jyank mas nyah lotang yah dvgeh e dupaiq lho lha nyang lyis dvja sang.
40020021	Nyang gas, Cha o mes lah, ge nyei. Hau vmesbih taiq zis gas, Nah munghdan mas ngah lotang lhyi nah loqwi pheh dvyuk, loqyos pheh dvyuk tsung nhang aq, ge.
40020022	Nghuot laus eq Yesu gas, Namoq cha dung zis lyis namoq nyang ma seq. Ngos shuk das kom lhyi namoq yoh shuk goh das lhyeh, ge lyis, nyamoq gas, Ngamoq yoh kuot, ge.
40020023	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngah kom lhyi namoq shuk nyang shuk chah das. Nghuot laus eq ngah loqwi loqyos mas yoh tsung das dah vmingh ngos ma yoh dyei. Houka ngah Uwus sont toh dyei bang xiklyis dvnghuot, ge.
40020024	Hauh zis dvci yuk moq xauhgyo lyis nyamoq gas hau vmang vnoeuh aiq yuk lyis nhaiq tsain yo.
40020025	Nghuot laus eq Yesu nyamoq lyis khi yoeus las taiq zis gas, Gohnyau bang lyis guon bang gas nyamoq thoq mas zau las, vmingh yoh bang eq nyamoq thoq mas vmingh tsain bos yvlyis namoq seq.
40020026	Nghuot laus eq namoq gas housoeh ma nghuot das. Namoq vzainsmuh kuot mes soeu hank laus eq namoq dah jyeidwis duot chah.
40020027	Namoq mas uhjyung duot mes soeu hank laus eq namoq dah jyeidwis duot bas jungh.
40020028	Cangsoeu Lo gas, phuqsoe kham das xiklyis jweh los zis ma nghuot. Phuqsoe das zis yahge, nyoshoq lyis khyuot yoeus das xiklyis nyah kang dyei das zis dvjweh los, ge.
40020029	Yerikho masyah nyamoq thuq los lyis, moqjens zainsmuh nyah thang mha tsain chank los.
40020030	Hauh uhlyis nyoqjet aiq yuk choyvm mas tsung toh zis, Yesu lai loh sam gyo lyis nyah aiq yuk kaiq zis gas, Dawi dah Lo Yhensain eh, ngah aiq yuk lyis nhaiqnyen aq, ge.
40020031	Moqjens gas nyah aiq yuk lyis samlo nyeis bas jungh ge nyho laus eq, nyah aiq yuk gas zes kaiq las, Dawi dah Lo Yhensain eh, ngah aiq yuk lyis nhaiqnyen aq, ge.
40020032	Yesu yap las nyah aiq yuk lyis khi yoeus lho lha taiq zis gas, Ngos nah aiq yuk lyis cha kuot dyei das zis o goh lah, ge.
40020033	Nyah aiq yuk gas, Yhensain eh, ngah aiq yuk dah nyoqjeih phank dyei das zis o, tsain ge.
40020034	Housoeh las Yesu gas nyah aiq yuk lyis nhaiqnyen las nyoqjeih mas tanh dyei. Houjang yah nyah aiq yuk dah nyoq nyvng los las nyah thang mha tsain chank loh.
40021001	Nyamoq gas Yerusalem mas jweh ni los las, Tsanlun boms khyei, Betphage wukhau mha jweh loh lyis Yesu gas changlo aiq yuk lyis nhang lha taiq kat zis gas,
40021002	Nah aiq yuk xik mas dah wukhau mha wvng loh geh. Houjang houmha twih toh dah mauhlyihzoe zains yahge mauhlyihzoe lo lyis nah aiq yuk nyvng das. Hauh yvlyis ngah jyank mas phui she los geh.
40021003	Dvyuk yuk nah aiq yuk lyis dvja ja taiq lyis gas, Yhensain hauh yvlyis yhung chah ge, oen nyamoq lyis taiq geh. Houjang nyang hauh yvlyis tsain nhang kat das.
40021004	Hau dvnganh gas lvpe dah dang nyuk los das xiklyis bweh los zis nghuot.
40021005	Houka: Zion lonyi lyis heisoeh oen taiq aq: Yoeuh aq, nah Hwankti ka noeuh nhamp dah nhaiqlom yah mauhlyihzoe thoq mas, Nghuot goeus mauhlyihzoe zains dah lo mauhlyihzoe lo thoq mas ji las, Nah jyank mas jweh los, ge.
40021006	Hauh changlo tang ka Yesu nyah aiq yuk lyis tying kat vgus loh kuot las,
40021007	Mauhlyihzoe zains yahge mauhlyihzoe lo tsain she los las, nyamoq dah dyimis nyhoeuh dyei lho lha nyang hauh thoq mas ji.
40021008	Moqjens zainsmuh gas nyamoq dah dyi yah cho mha tsain nyhoeuh dyei. Dvyhamh gas saiqzains mas dah saiqko zan las cho mha nyhoeuh dyei.
40021009	Nyah xik pheh thang pheh chank bang moqjens gas kaiq las, Dawi dah Lo lyis chungh goh! (Hosana!) Yhensain dah nyings mas jweh los soeu ka ngelhoq. Nyhang thank Mangso lhyi chungh goh, ge.
40021010	Gvshih Yerusalem mas wvng loh lyis dvwus gonh hoeu lha, Haih soeu ka hank nghuot lah, ge.
40021011	Moqjens gas, Haih soeu ka Galile mau, Nazaret wukhau mha dah Yesu ge dah lvpe nghuot, tsain ge.
40021012	Hauh thang lhyi Yesu gas Mangso dah yhenmuh mas wvng loh las hauh yhenmuh khau mha ungh bang wis bang dvnganhmoq lyis khat thuq las, ngwis thaiq bang dah kihgus yahge khotjyauh ungh bang dah tank lyis toeu phanh tyamp.
40021013	Ngah yhen lhyi shvmanh dung yhen oen das, ge lhaih toh goeus lyis eq, namoq gas haih yvlyis khyanktau khyung tsain kuot nyvng! ge taiq.
40021014	Yhenmuh khau mha, nyah jyank mas lyih dah nyoqjet bang yahge khyei dyoq bang lyis nyang gis los nhang.
40021015	Nghuot laus eq phudyei uhjyung jens yahge maussauh lhaih bang gas, nyang kuot dah mauhphoh zis yahge yhenmuh khau mha, Dawi dah Lo lyis chungh goh, ge tsain kaiq nyeis dah loshang jens lyis nyvng lyis nhaiq tsain yo.
40021016	Nyamoq cha taiq yvlyis nvng vxauhgyo lah, ge nyang lyis taiq lho lhyi, Yesu taiq zis gas, Xauhgyo. Lonoeuh yahge loshang jens dah nhuot masyah dyinghjet dah Chungh Dang thuq los das, ge yvlyis namoq khanhamp eq ma nghap yoeuh ku goh lhyeh, ge.
40021017	Nyang gas nyamoq lyis nyhei toh khoq las wus nghe pheh thuq las Bethani mas loh yhet khoq.
40021018	Nungs lyis nvpyo noq yah, nyang hauh wugungs mas tauh los lyis, nyang wom yuot.
40021019	Choyvm mas maiphang dvzains nyvng las nyang e lhyi cha eq ma dap, vhuq kyingh dvnghuot las, nyang gas hauh saiqzains lyis, Gvshih masyah nvng mas khanhamp eq shih ma shih lo bas jungh, ge lho lhyi, maiphang zains gas houjang yah kyuk loh.
40021020	Changlo jens hauh yvlyis nyvng lho lhyi, nyamoq svsoh mauh las taiq zis gas, Haih maiphang zains houjang yah chamus kyuk tyamp, ge.
40021021	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, namoq lomsjingh ehnyet bos las khamkhvv zis ma bos nghuot lyis gas, haih maiphang zains mas bweh thoq lyis namoq yoh tsain kuot das zis yahge haih boms lyis eq ywi las thomh mas cheh wvng aq, ge lyis, namoq taiq vgus bweh das.
40021022	Hauh thoq lyis namoq lomsjingh ehnyet yah shvmanh dung zis dvnganh yah namoq xauh yoeus das, ge.
40021023	Nyang yhenmuh khau mha wvng loh las jyauh nyeis lyis, phudyei uhjyung jens yahge dius jens dah logis jens nyah jyank mas los nyei zis gas, Nvng gas chah vmingh yah haih zis tsain kuot lah? Nvng lyis haih vmingh hank dyei, ge.
40021024	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos eq namoq lyis dvja nyei yoeuh bah, namoq eq hauh zis lyis taiq kyoh lyis gas, ngos chah vmingh yah heinyhoq zis kuot yvlyis ngos namoq lyis taiq kyoh das.
40021025	Yohan dah jeisnyhop cho ka maukhung mhayah nghuot lah? Dius masyah nghuot lah, ge. Nyamoq nyang changh tsain xamgoh zis gas, Yang, Maukhung mhayah nghuot oen ya, Housoeh lyis namoq nyang lyis chamus ma lomsjingh goh, ge das.
40021026	Dius masyah nghuot oen yang taiq lyis gas, yang moqjens lyis gyuk: khasoeh ge lyis Yohan gas lvpe nghuot zis lyis dvnganhmoq jingh, ge.
40021027	Housoeh las nyamoq Yesu lyis taiq zis gas, Ngamoq ma seq, ge. Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos haih muh chah vmingh yah kuot zis namoq lyis ma taiq kyoh das, ge.
40021028	Namoq khasoeh nghamh goh lah? Dius dvyuk gas lo aiq yuk yoh. Nyang gas lomons jyank mas e lha, Nauh mons eh, khvnyhik zvbiq khyam mha e zwi aq, ge lyis,
40021029	Nyang gas, Ngos ma e, ge laus eq thang lhyi nyang ehnyet thaiq las e goeus.
40021030	Tsai, nyang ngis vyuk jyank mas e lha vgus housoeh taiq lyis, Ngos e das ge las ma e.
40021031	Hau aiq yuk mas nyah uwus o mes zis khayuk kuot, ge. Nyamoq taiq zis gas, Lomons nghuot, ge. Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, khoengh khywi bang yahge nghe nyhiq jens gas namoq dah xik pheh Mangso munghdan mas wvng loh.
40021032	Khasoeh ge lyis Yohan gas dan cho lhyi chank las namoq jyank mas los laus eq namoq gas nyang lyis ma tsain jingh. Nghuot laus eq khoengh khywi bang yahge nghe nyhiq jens gas nyang lyis jingh. Namoq hauh zis lyis nyvng laus eq nyang lyis jingh das xiklyis namoq ehnyet ma tsain thaiq.
40021033	Gohtoeu dah dangtoeuq lyis gyo yoeus shih geh: Yhensain dvyuk gas zvbiq dvkhyam ba tsungh toh lho lha, yvmlhaink yah khyam kyamp las zvbiq nyhet zwvng eq doeu toh. Tyoeuq zvm eq thung lho lha khyam muh zwi bang lyis tsoeuh dyei khoq las nyang we mau pheh loh.
40021034	Vshih nyhink nyos jweh lyis houmha dah vshih xauh yoeus das xiklyis nyah jyeidwis jens lyis khyam tsoeuh zwi bang jyank mas nhang kat.
40021035	Khyam zwi bang gas nyah jyeidwis jens lyis nyhik las, dvyuk lyis bat, dvyuk lyis sat, gohtoeu dvyuk lyis lukzains yah tsain doeuh.
40021036	Tsai, nyang gas xik pheh thoq lyis nyo dah gohtoeu jyeidwis jens lyis doms nhang kat lyis eq, nyamoq gas xikpheh yhangteh nyamoq lyis kuot.
40021037	Thang thank lyis, nyah lo lyis gas nyamoq phauh nyang das ge, nyamoq jyank mas nyah lo lyis nhang kat.
40021038	Nghuot laus eq khyam zwi bang hauh lo lyis nyvng lyis, Haih soeu ka yhenzis zom das soeu nghuot. Los geh, nyang lyis sat las, nyah yhenzis yang yoeus goh, ge nyamoq nyang changh tsain taiq goh.
40021039	Nyamoq gas nyang lyis nyhik las, zvbiq khyam nghe pheh she thuq las sat.
40021040	Housoeh las zvbiq khyam sain doms los lyis haih khyam tsoeuh zwi bang lyis khasoeh kuot das lah, ge nyei.
40021041	Nyamoq taiq zis gas, Hau lhung bang lyis gas ma gis khyvlyis nyang mhont das las, shishenh jweh lyis, nyang lyis vshih yoh dyei bang, gohyuk lyis hauh khyam cheh tsoeuh toh das, ge.
40021042	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Yhen tsuk bang khyen tyamp dah luklom gas, Yhenthunk lukzains bweh los. Haih zis gas Yhensain nyang kuot las, yah xikkhonh mas mauhphoh zis nghuot, ge dah lhaihtoh dang lyis khanhamp eq ma nghap yoeuh goh lhyeh, ge.
40021043	Housoeh las ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, Mangso munghdan gas namoq jyank masyah yoeus las hauh dah vshih yoh dyei bang lyis dyei das.
40021044	Haih lukzains thoq mas gyoh soeu hank laus eq dyis tyamp das. Hank thoq mas laus eq hauh zis gyoh lyis gas, phih soeh nhoeuq tyamp das.
40021045	Hauh dangtoeuq lyis phudyei uhjyung jens yahge Pharishe moq xauhgyo lyis, nyang nyamoq lyis toeuq las taiq yvlyis nyamoq seq.
40021046	Nyang lyis nyhik das zis yomkat laus eq, moqjens lyis nyamoq gyuk: khasoeh ge lyis, nyang gas lvpe nghuot zis lyis nyamoq jingh.
40022001	Yesu nyamoq lyis dangtoeuq yah phuk taiq zis gas,
40022002	Maukhung munghdan gas nyah lo xiklyis nyihwank pwe kuot dyei dah hwankti dvyuk yah doeusgoh.
40022003	Hauh nyihwank pwe mha khi toh bang lyis nyah jyeidwis jens lyis yah khi nhang kat lyis, nyamoq ma los.
40022004	Nyang gohtoeu jyeidwis jens lyis doms nhang lha taiq zis gas, Ngah nyenhcon ba sont toh goeus. Noeu eq, nyhuk toh dah gaunyhauq eq sat goeus: dvnganh yah cicont nghuot goeus, nyihwank pwe mha dvlyih lo geh, ge kat.
40022005	Nghuot laus eq nyamoq hauh yvlyis pvlhyahlyoeus kuot las nyamoq nyang cho pheh tsain loh. Dvyuk gas nyah danh pheh, gohtoeu dvyuk gas soenghi kuot loh.
40022006	Nyeis shih dah bang gas, nyah jyeidwis jens lyis nyhik yoeus las xoq lhoeu phuh zis yah sat.
40022007	Hwankti hauh zis xauhgyo lyis nhaiqyo las jeslo jens nhang lha dius sat bang lyis mhont nhang. Nyamoq dah wugungs lyis eq ngheq.
40022008	Hauh thang lhyi nyang nyah jyeidwis jens lyis taiq zis gas, Ngah nyihwank pwe cicont nghuot goeus, nghuot laus eq khi toh bang gas ma mon.
40022009	Housoeh yvmvyah namoq talhoeu chokangh mas loh las nyvng ya nyvng nyhoq pwe mha tsain khi los geh, ge.
40022010	Jyeidwis jens talhoeu mha tsain thuq e lha, gis lyis gang lyis nyamoq nyvng ya nyvng bang dvnganh lyis yoh khi tsainh toh goeus las, hauh nyihwank pwe mha boenghwus dyingh nhoenk joq.
40022011	Hwankti ka boenghwus yoeuh das ge wvng los lyis, houmha pwe dyi ma wuot soeu dvyuk lyis nyvng.
40022012	Housoeh las nyang gas, Buisnoms phoq eh, nvng nyi hwank pwe dyimis ma wuot zis heimha khasoeh los lah, ge nyei lyis nyang cha ma daq taiq lo.
40022013	Hwankti nyah jyeidwis jens lyis taiq zis gas, Nyang lyis khyei mha loq mas twih las shwih loh zis yah, ngausdyeis ngausnhvp yah zwis khih chap loh dah nghe pheh, mauchuotdwang mas khyoq kat geh.
40022014	Khi zis xauh bang nyo laus eq khyen yoeus zis xauh bang nain, ge.
40022015	Hauh thang lhyi Pharishe moq thuq los las nyang taiq dang mas thangzoe khasoeh kuot las yoh xo das zis xamgoh nyeis.
40022016	Hauh uhlyis nyamoq gas, nyamoq dah changlo jens yahge Herodia moq lyis Yesu jyank mas nhang kat las, Svra eh, nvng gas jyoeng nyeis zis yahge, hank lyis eq nyoqnho ma khyen, dvnganhmoq lyis Mangso dah cho jyoeng khyvlyis jyauh las hank nyoqnho lhyi eq ma yoeuh, hank lyis eq gungsyaus ma yaus yvlyis ngamoq seq.
40022017	Housoeh yvmvyah nvng khasoeh nghamh zis ngamoq lyis taiq aq, hwankti Kesar lyis khoengh kat das zis, lyi bos lah, ma bos lah, ge.
40022018	Nghuot laus eq Yesu gas nyamoq dah lhung ehnyet lyis seq las taiq zis gas, Gis guons kuot bang eh, namoq ngos lyis chamus shi yoeuh goh lah?
40022019	Ngos lyis hau ngwis chixoeuq geh, ge taiq lyis, nyamoq gas ngwis dvkyvp nyah jyank mas chi los dyei.
40022020	Housoeh las nyang nyamoq lyis doms taiq zis gas, Haih zis hank gungslho yahge maussauh dap lah, ge.
40022021	Nyamoq gas nyang lyis, Kesar zis nghuot, ge. Hauh uhlyis nyang gas, Kesar zis nghuot lyis gas Kesar lyis dyei geh, Mangso zis nghuot lyis gas Mangso lhyi dyei geh, ge.
40022022	Nyamoq hauh dang lyis xauhgyo lyis mauh las, nyang lyis toh khoq las tsain thuq loh.
40022023	Dwis toq cho ma bos ge dah Saduke moq gas, hauh nyeihyo nyang, nyah jyank mas los nyei zis gas,
40022024	Svra eh, nyihwank goeus dah yukgis dvyuk loshang ma bos shei khoq lyis nyah yhensain nyhiq lyis nyah vnoeuh shoeuh las nyah vmang dah vshih tsoq bas jungh, ge Moshe taiq.
40022025	Gvshih heisoeh teh vmang vnoeuh nyhet yuk ngamoq yah dvgeh nghuot. Cangxeih vyuk nyihwank las loshang ma bos shih lyis shei khoq las, vnoeuh gas chauhmuh shoeuh.
40022026	Hau aiq vyuk eq, somh vyuk eq, vnoeuh moq nyhet yuk jweh shoq hauh vmesbih lyis tsain shoeuh.
40022027	Thang thank lyis hauh vmesbih eq shei loh.
40022028	Housoeh las dwis toq los uhlyis hauh vmesbih gas nyhet yuk gonh mas khayuk dah yhensain nyhiq nghuot das lah? Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas nyamoq dvnganhmoq yah phoengh wvng goeus, ge.
40022029	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Namoq lhaihtoh dang lyis ma seq, Mangso dah yomsoq cho lhyi eq ma seq yvmvyah shuot zis nghuot.
40022030	Khasoeh ge lyis, dwis toq los yvmas, nyamoq nyi hwank zis ma bos, lonyi dyeizo zis eq ma bos, maukhung mha loeuswons bang teh dvnghuot lo.
40022031	Nghuot laus eq shei masyah dwis toq cho, Mangso namoq lyis taiq zis lyis namoq ma nghap yoeuh goh lhyeh?
40022032	Nyang taiq zis gas, Ngos gas Abraham dah Mangso, Isak dah Mangso, Yakop dah Mangso nghuot: Mangso ka shei bang dah Mangso ma nghuot, dwis bang dah Mangso dvnghuot, ge.
40022033	Moqjens hauh zis lyis xauhgyo lyis nyang jyauh dah cho gvng mas mauh.
40022034	Saduke moq dah dang lyis taiq nhoeuh zis Pharishe moq xauhgyo lyis, nyamoq zain los las,
40022035	Nyamoq mas lyi svra nghuot soeu dvyuk, nyang lyis shi yoeuh zoh lyis yah taiq zis gas,
40022036	Svra eh, lyi mas dah tyingtoh dang mas khah zis zes kuh lah, ge.
40022037	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Hau nah Yhensain Mangso lhyi nah nhaiqlom dvnganh yah, nah ehnyet dvnganh yah, nvng dolhain zis dvnganh yah nvng jyetdap chah, ge.
40022038	Haih zis gas cangxeih dah dang yahge tyingtoh dang zainsmuh nghuot.
40022039	Aiq vkhonh eq hauh zis yah doeusgoh las, Nah yhenkyoh lyis nah gungs yah dvyhangteh jyetdap chah, ge zis nghuot.’
40022040	Haih tyingtoh dang aiq khonh gas, Moshe dah lyi yahge lvpe jens dah dang dvnganh dah vpom nghuot.
40022041	Pharishe moq dvgeh huom toh yvmas Yesu nyamoq lyis nyei zis gas,
40022042	Khristu dah cho lhyi namoq khasoeh tsain nghamh goh lah? Nyang hank dah lo nghuot lah, ge. Nyamoq, nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Dawi dah lo nghuot, ge.
40022043	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Housoeh lyis Dawi gas dyos kat dyei zis xauh las nyang lyis Yhensain ge lui las,
40022044	Hauh Yhensain ngah Yhensain lhyi taiq zis gas, Ngos nah jeswus lyis nah khyei o mha toh shoq, Nvng ngah loqyos shot pheh tsung toh aq, ge.
40022045	Housoeh Dawi gas nyang lyis, Yhensain ge lui lyis, nyah lo khasoeh yoh nghuot das lah, ge.
40022046	Housoeh las hauh nyeihyo masyah nyang lyis dang dvkhonh yangh hank ma yoh toeuh lo. Nyang lyis dang hank ma womh nyei lo.
40023001	Hauh thang lhyi Yesu gas moqjens yahge nyah changlo jens lyis taiq zis gas,
40023002	Maussauh lhaih bang yahge Pharishe moq gas, Moshe dah tank mas tsung toh.
40023003	Housoeh yvmvyah nyamoq taiq yvlyis gyo las chank kuot geh. Nghuot laus eq nyamoq kuot teh vchank kuot goh: Khasoeh ge lyis, nyamoq gas nyamoq nyang taiq toh las nyamoq ma chank kuot.
40023004	Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas svsoh lyei dah yvwons zwis toh las, gohyuk dah kvtoq mas tsain kih dyei. Nghuot laus eq nyamoq gas hauh yvlyis loqnyhauh yah eq ma mes thungh tanh.
40023005	Nyamoq kuot dah muhzoh dvnganh yvlyis svbih nyvng bas jungh ge lyi kwilo yahge dyithang bandyoms xing xing tsain kuot.
40023006	Pwe mha gis thank joqyos, lyi jungs mas gis thank tsunggus lyis tsain o.
40023007	Kaih mas svbih yah Svra eh, ge lui las phauh nyang jeshuh das yvlyis tsain o.
40023008	Nghuot laus eq namoq gas Svra oen vlui nhang goh: namoq dah choshe soeu ka Khristu ge soeu dvyuk kyingh nghuot las, namoq dvnganhmoq gas vmang vnoeuh dvnghuot.
40023009	Nyeisjvng thoq mas namoq hank lyis eq uwus oen vlui goh. Khasoeh ge lyis maukhung mha nyeis soeu dvyuk kyingh namoq dah Uwus dvnghuot.
40023010	Uhjyung jens ge lui das zis v-o goh: Khasoeh ge lyis namoq dah choshe soeu ka Khristu ge soeu dvyuk kyingh dvnghuot.
40023011	Namoq mas zes kuh soeu ka namoq dah changlo duot bas jungh.
40023012	Hank laus eq vsainnyang gungs lyis chunghtoq soeu ka, o mha khyoq zis xauh das. Vsainnyang gungs lyis o mha gyoh soeu ka chunghtoq zis xauh das.
40023013	Nghuot laus eq namoq gis guons kuot dah Pharishe moq yahge maussauh lhaih bang gas mvtanhzoe nghuot! Khasoeh ge lyis, namoq gas dius jens maukhung munghdan mas wvng loh das khomh lyis nyheih toh las, namoq nyang eq ma wvng loh, wvng loh mes bang lyis eq kyamp gos toh.
40023014	Gis guons kuot dah maussauh lhaih bang yahge Pharishe moq eh, namoq gas mvtanhzoe nghuot! Khasoeh ge lyis, namoq gas shvmanh xing xing dung guons kuot las, chauhmuh jens dah yhen lhyi kuot zo kuot shuk. Housoeh yvmvyah namoq zes kuh dah soetuon zis xauh das.
40023015	Gis guons kuot dah maussauh lhaih bang yahge Pharishe moq eh, namoq gas mvtanhzoe nghuot! Yuda lomsjingh cho lhyi chank das dius dvyuk yoh shoq namoq gas thomh cho tung yos cho khyop xo lha nyang lyis yoh lying yoeus goeus ya, namoq thoq lyis aiq huon zes shoq munyi thomh lo duot nhang.
40023016	Nyoqjet dah choshe bang eh, namoq mvtanhzoe nghuot! Hank laus eq yhenmuh dah xing yah maukhi lhyi tyink dyei chah, nghuot laus eq yhenmuh yah maukhi lhyi ka cha ma kuot noh, tsain ge.
40023017	Nyoq eq jet, koh eq koh bang eh, hauh xing lhyi tsingh-kan nhang dah yhenmuh yahge xing ka khah zis zes kuh lah?
40023018	Hank laus eq phon thoq mas dah jyungshuk yah maukhi lhyi tyink dyei chah, nghuot laus eq phon yah maukhi lhyi cha ma chah, tsain ge.
40023019	Nyoq jet bang namoq eh, hauh jyungshuk lyis tsingh-kan nhang dah phon yahge jyungshuk gas khah zis zes kuh lah?
40023020	Housoeh yvmvyah hauh phon yah maukhi soeu ka hauh zis yahge hauh thoq mas joq zis dvnganh yah maukhi goeus.
40023021	Hau yhenmuh yah maukhi soeu eq hauh zis yahge houmha nyeis soeu dah nyings yah maukhi goeus.
40023022	Maukhung yah maukhi soeu eq Mangso dah hwankti tank yahge houmha tsung toh soeu dah nyings yah maukhi goeus.
40023023	Gis guons kuot dah maussauh lhaih bang yahge Pharishe moq eh, namoq gas mvtanhzoe nghuot! Khasoeh ge lyis namoq gas shomnhamh, hoeuhxangh, lyenhswi jeih mas dah ciboms dvboms kat goeus laus eq, hauh lyi mas bos thoq lyis zes yhaugyen dah lyi jyoeng cho, nhaiqnyen zis yahge lomsjingh cho lhyi namoq tsain toh khoq. Zes yhaugyen zis lyis ma gis lhyweq toh khoq.
40023024	Nyoqjet dah choshe bang eh, namoq tyop lyis kan tyamp las gola-u lyis doms tsain nyhau kat nyvng.
40023025	Gis guons kuot dah maussauh lhaih bang yahge Pharishe moq eh, namoq mvtanhzoe nghuot! Khasoeh ge lyis namoq gas kom yahge bvn dah vthoq pheh tsain cheih, vkhau mha ka lhuot zo lhuot shuk zis yahge nyoqnoq zis yah yoh dah zisyos yah dyingh joq.
40023026	Nyoqjet dah Pharishe jens eh, nghe pheh eq lhyang los das xiklyis hau kom yahge bvn lywas dah vkhau mha cangxeih cheih aq.
40023027	Gis guons kuot dah maussauh lhaih bang yahge Pharishe moq eh, namoq gas mvtanhzoe nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis namoq gas thoq mas thyoeu zis yah juot toh laus eq vkhau mha ka mvng dah shohyau yahge vchoqh vjyot zis dvnganh yah dyingh joq dah lop yah doeusgoh.
40023028	Houyah dvyhangteh, namoq gas nghe mha dius jens xik mas dan teh kuot. Nghuot laus eq vkhau mha ka gis guons kuot zis yahge yaunos yobos yah dyingh joq.
40023029	Gis guons kuot dah maussauh lhaih bang yahge Pharishe moq eh, namoq gas mvtanhzoe nghuot! Namoq gas lvpe jens dah lop lyis ci lha, dan bang dah lop lyis soh das xiklyis tsain shunk.
40023030	Yang gas phauh thyeih moq caiq mas nyeis ya, lvpe jens dah suih huot yvmas bos das zis ma nghuot, ge namoq taiq.
40023031	Housoeh lvpe jens lyis sat dah lo jens nghuot yvlyis namoq nyang kanghjyoeng kat nyeis.
40023032	Housoeh namoq phauh thyeih moq dah yaunos dyingh shoq tsain kuot tyink geh.
40023033	Lhangnyis eh, Ywimuhtsanh vnyau eh, munyi thomh mas dang thang thyet kat das masyah khasoeh yoh luiq das lah?
40023034	Housoeh las yoeuh aq, lvpe jens joeui bos bang yahge maussauh lhaih bang lyis ngos namoq jyank mas nhang kat las, nyamoq mas dvyhamh lyis, namoq sat, dvyhamh lyis tapzains mas taplhangh, dvyhamh lyis namoq dah lyi jungs mas bat zis yahge dvwus thang lhyi dvwus tsain shoeuhshih das.
40023035	Housoeh dan soeu Abel suih masyah hau yhenmuh yahge phon jo mas namoq sat dah Barakhia dah lo Zekharia suih jweh shoq nyeisjvng thoq mas huot tyamp, dan bang dah suih dvnganh zis gas namoq thoq mas kih toh das.
40023036	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, haih zis dvnganh yah haq caiq mas bang jyank mas jweh los das.
40023037	Yerusalem eh, Yerusalem eh, nvng lvpe jens lyis sat las, nah jyank mas nhang kat bang lyis lukzains yah doeuh sat dah wus eh, gyoqzains gas gyoqlo jens lyis nyah dungs khau mha xwih tsainh teh, nah lo jens lyis ngos khanyhoq lhain xwih tsainh toh mes laus eq, nvng ma gyo.
40023038	Yoeuh aq, nah yhenmuh gas jyamhjyuklhyuk nyet joq khoq goeus.
40023039	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos namoq lyis taiq bah: Yhensain dah nyings mas jweh los soeu ka ngelhoq, ge namoq nyang ma taiq dvchank, gvshih masyah nvng ngos lyis ma nyvng das, ge.
40024001	Yesu hau yhenmuh masyah thuq loh nyeis lyis, nyah changlo jens gas hau yhenmuh mas dah yhen lhyi tuonh shet das ge nyah jyank mas los.
40024002	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Hai dvnganh yvlyis namoq nyvng ma nghuot lhyeh? Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, hauh goeu gas ma thyoq thyoq luk dvlom thoq mas dvlom kih toh zis ma bos lo das, ge.
40024003	Nyang Tsanlun boms thoq mas tsung toh lyis, nyah changlo jens nyang lyis lhyenwhei los nyei zis gas, Hounyhoq zis gas khanhamp nghuot los das lah? Nvng doms jweh das zis yahge mungkvn thank das lyis chah vlho thuq los das lah? Ngamoq lyis taiq kyoh aq, ge.
40024004	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Namoq lyis hank eq chowhang ma shwih whang bas jungh, zaih geh.
40024005	Khasoeh ge lyis, nyoshoq moq ngah nyings masyah thuq los das. Ngos gas Khristu nghuot ge, nyoshoq lyis chowhang shwih whang das.
40024006	Moeng zan goh zis yahge moeng dyoq dah loeus namoq xauhgyo los das. Nghuot laus eq vdvn goh: Khasoeh ge lyis hauh goeu gas bweh los das. Nghuot laus eq thang thank gas ma nghuot shih.
40024007	Khasoeh ge lyis dius dvnyau yah dvnyau, munghdan dvkoeuq yah dvkoeuq jes sont goh los das. Joqyos vdeh deh mas panghkhauq gyoh zis yahge maunyeis dwis zis bweh los das.
40024008	Hau dvnganh gas lo khoeu nos nos xi zis dvnghuot shih.
40024009	Nyamoq gas namoq lyis shanghsenh zis xauh nhang das yvmas kyauh tyamp las, sat das. Ngah nyings gvng mas dius nyau khanghmuh namoq lyis hoeng das.
40024010	Hauh uhlyis dius nyoshoq lomsjingh cho mhayah nungsdoms loh das, dvyuk yah dvyuk phanhlyen goh das, nyang changh nyang hoeng goh das.
40024011	Lvpe hwah jens eq nyoshoq thuq los las, nyoshoq lyis chowhang shwih whang das.
40024012	Lyi ma chi dah muh je los das yvmvyah nyoshoq moq dah jyetdap nhaiqlom eq jam loh das.
40024013	Nghuot laus eq thang thank jweh shoq jhen soeu ka khyuot yoeus zis xauh das.
40024014	Hauh munghdan gausyis dang gas dius nyau khanghmuh xiklyis kanghjyoeng yoh bweh bas jungh, nyeisjvng thoq mas nyeis dah dius dvnganh lyis taiq hoeuh das nghuot. Hauh thang lhyi thang thank buisnyeis jweh los das.
40024015	Housoeh yvmvyah lvpe Daniel taiq toh, lhoeu thyoq dah vchoqh vjyot zis gas hau gyingshang joqyos mas yap joq yvlyis namoq nyvng lyis, maussauh nghap soeu ka hauh yvlyis seqgyo bas jungh.
40024016	Hauh uhlyis Yuda mau mas nyeis bang gas boms pheh phang loh bas jungh.
40024017	Yhenkhung mha nyeis soeu ka, nyah yhen khau mha dah vyhang yoeus das zis ma gyoh los goeus jungh.
40024018	Yos mas nyeis soeu ka nyah shanhzoe yoeus das zis ma tauh los goeus jungh.
40024019	Hauh buisnyeis lyis loshang gungs nghuot bang yahge lonoeuh nauh gvmshuk bang gas mvtanhzoe nghuot!
40024020	Nghuot laus eq namoq phang shishenh gas Yuda No Buisnyeis yahge cungh lyis ma nghuot bas jungh, shvmanh dung nyeis geh.
40024021	Khasoeh ge lyis, mauthuq nyeiszvn masyah khvnyhik jweh shoq ma bweh ku, thang pheh eq ma bweh lo das shanghsenh gas hauh buisnyeis gyo lyis bweh thuq los das.
40024022	Hauh buisnyeis lyis ma shungh dyei lyis gas hank eq ma yoh luiq das. Nghuot laus eq khyen yoeus bang xiklyis gas, hauh buisnyeis shungh dyei das.
40024023	Hauh uhlyis dvyuk yuk namoq lyis, Yoeuh aq, Khristu heimha nyeis, thyimha nyeis, ge laus eq vjingh goh.
40024024	Khasoeh ge lyis, ma ying dah Khristu jens eq, lvpe hwah jens eq thuq los las, gis bweh lyis khyen toh goeus bang lyis yangh chowhang yoh shwih whang shoq, vlho zainsmuh yahge mauh loqmuh chixoeuq das.
40024025	Yoeuh aq, ngos namoq lyis uhlhomh taiq toh.
40024026	Housoeh las nyamoq gas namoq lyis, Yoeuh geh, nyang gas mhanhdyvp mas nghuot, ge taiq laus eq namoq vloh goh. Nyang gas khau lhunk mas nyeis, ge laus eq hauh yvlyis vjingh goh.
40024027	Khasoeh ge lyis, buisthuq masyah maunyoq nyik zis buiswvng jweh shoq bvng loh zis yah dvyhangteh, hau Cangsoeu Lo doms jweh los zis gas housoeh teh nghuot das.
40024028	Mvng joq yvmas lvngda eq houmha zain los das.
40024029	Tsai, hauh shanghsenh dah buisnyeis lai loh thangjang buis eq soeng soeng noq los das. Lhamhmuh eq ma tso lo das. Kyi eq maukhung mhayah gyoh las maukhung yomsoq nonh das.
40024030	Hauh uhlyis Cangsoeu Lo dah vlho ka maukhung mha thuq los das. Houjang nyeisjvng thoq mas dah dius nyau khanghmuh gas kuk nyingh shoh thang thauh uhjyangh, hauh Cangsoeu Lo gas yomsoq yahge phunk zainsmuh yah maukhung jyommauh yah gyoh los zis lyis nyvng das.
40024031	Nyah loeuswons bang lyis lvbuh thwe zainsmuh yah nhang kat las, nyamoq gas lyeis nyei shot, maukhung dvthang mhayah gohtoeu dvthang jweh shoq, nyang khyen toh bang lyis xwih tsainh das.
40024032	Gvshih hau maiphang zains masyah xuq yoeus geh, hauh dah vnyuk tuot las vhuq thuot los goeus ya, zvn wvng los goeus zis lyis namoq seq.
40024033	Houyah dvyhangteh namoq gas, hau bweh los zis dvnganh lyis nyvng lyis nyang gas khomhdwang mas ni los goeus yvlyis seq geh.
40024034	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, Haih zis ma nyuk los dvchank haq caiq ma lai das.
40024035	Maukhung nyeisjvng lai loh laus eq ngah dang gas ma lai loh das.
40024036	Nghuot laus eq hauh buisnyeis yahge shishenh lyis gas hank eq ma seq. Maukhung mha dah loeuswons bang ma seq, Lo eq ma seq, Uwus kyingh dvseq.
40024037	Cangsoeu Lo doms lyih das buisnyeis gas, Noa zaih lyis bweh yhangteh nghuot los das.
40024038	Khasoeh ge lyis jeis ma nhauq shih lyis dah dius jens gas, Noa jeis sangpho khau mha wvng loh buisnyeis jweh shoq zo, shuk, nyihwank, lonyi dyeizo tsain kuot nyeis.
40024039	Jeis nhauq los las dvnganh yvlyis khyuot loh shoq nyamoq ma soh ma thamh nyeis. Houyah dvyhangteh Cangsoeu Lo jweh lyih lyis eq housoeh nghuot das.
40024040	Hauh uhlyis danh mas yukgis aiq yuk dvgeh nyeis mhayah dvyuk lyis shwih loh las dvyuk gas nyet joq das.
40024041	Vmesbih aiq yuk dvgeh wom mhoq nyeis masyah dvyuk lyis shwih loh las dvyuk gas nyet joq das.
40024042	Housoeh las namoq Yhensain khah shishenh lyis lyih das zis ma seq yvmvyah, zungh nyeis geh.
40024043	Nghuot laus eq yhensain ka nyenh lyis khauh soeu wvng das shishenh lyis seq nghuot lyis gas, nyah yhen lhyi ma los yoh thyoq wvng shoq nyang zungh nyeis das zis namoq seq geh.
40024044	Housoeh yvmvyah namoq eq cicont kuot geh: Khasoeh ge lyis, namoq ma zangh soh dah shishenh lyis Cangsoeu Lo jweh los das.
40024045	Hauh thoq lyis Yhensain ka nyah yhenbang lyis shishenh jweh lyis zonoms dyei das xiklyis toeuq toh, lomluk las joeui bos dah jyeidwis gas hank nghuot lah?
40024046	Nyah yhensain jweh los uhlyis lomluk luk kuot nyeis yvlyis los nyvng jus dah jyeidwis gas ngelhoq.
40024047	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, yhensain ka nyah zisyos dvnganh thoq mas guon soeu nyang lyis kuot nhang das.
40024048	Nghuot laus eq ma lyungs jyeidwis gas nyah ehnyet mas, Ngah yhensain los das zis nyangh shih ge nghamh zo nyeis.
40024049	Housoeh nyah jyeidwis changh jens lyis bat las, yhei yet bang yah dvgeh zo shuk las nyeis dah uhlyis,
40024050	hauh jyeidwis dah yhensain ka, nyang ma nghamh dah buisnyeis, ma soh dah shishenh lyis doms los das.
40024051	Nyang lyis jap chink las gis guons kuot bang yah dvgeh toh das. Hauh yvmas ngausdyeis ngausnhvp yah zwis khih chap loh das.
40025001	Maukhung munghdan gas, nyibung tsain chi lha loloeu saiq lyis zes e dah lonyi gyingh dvci yuk yah doeusgoh.
40025002	Nyamoq mas oeng yuk gas yik, oeng yuk gas tsain koh.
40025003	Koh bang gas nyamoq nyang dah nyibung gas chi lha coeu ka ma tsain chi.
40025004	Nghuot laus eq yik bang gas nyamoq dah nyibung yah dvgeh coeu thuk tsain chi.
40025005	Gvshih loloeu saiq gas sheq nyeis shih yvmvyah, nyamoq dvnganh gas yhet tsain muih joq.
40025006	Gungsgvm lyis gas, Loloeu saiq jweh los goeus! Nyang lyis zes langh das zis toq geh, ge kaiq nyeis.
40025007	Hauh uhlyis lonyi gyingh dvnganhmoq toq las nyamoq nyang dah nyibung lyis tsain sont.
40025008	Koh bang yah yik bang lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq dah coeu ngamoq lyis dvtsiq jenh kat dyei geh: ngamoq dah nyibung shei loh nyeis, ge.
40025009	Nghuot laus eq yik bang phuk taiq zis gas, Namoq xiklyis yahge ngamoq xiklyis ma tham das, ungh bang jyank mas namoq nyang loh wis geh, ge.
40025010	Nyamoq e wis nyeis uhlyis loloeu saiq jweh los las cicont sont toh bang gas nyihwank pwe mha nyang yah dvgeh wvng loh las khomh nyheih goeus.
40025011	Hauh thang lhyi gohtoeu lonyi jens eq jweh los las, Yhensain eh, yhensain eh, ngamoq lyis khomh phank dyei aq, ge.
40025012	Nghuot laus eq nyang phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, ngos namoq lyis ma seq, ge.
40025013	Housoeh yvmvyah Cangsoeu Lo khanhamp lyih das dah buisnyeis yahge shishenh lyis ma seq yvmvyah zungh nyeis geh, ge.
40025014	Maukhung munghdan gas dius dvyuk we mau pheh gyung suh das las, nyah jyeidwis jens lyis khi yoeus las nyah vyhang nyamoq lyis tsain kyauh toh khoq yhangteh nghuot.
40025015	Dvyuk lyis xing kyvp oeng khyoengh, gohtoeu dvyuk lyis aiq khyoengh, thang thank dvyuk lyis dvkhyoengh mulas, nyamoq nyang yoh kuot dah yom lyis tank las dyei toh khoq las, houjang yah nyang gas gyung suh loh.
40025016	Houjang xing kyvp oeng khyoengh xauh yoeus soeu ka, hauh zis yah soenghi loh kuot lyis gohtoeu oeng khyoengh myat los.
40025017	Houyah dvyhangteh aiq khyoengh xauh yoeus soeu ka, hauh zis yah soenghi loh kuot lyis gohtoeu aiq khyoengh myat los.
40025018	Nghuot laus eq dvkhyoengh xauh yoeus soeu ka, nyah yhensain dah ngwis lyis nyeisjvng mas doeu nyhop shung toh.
40025019	Dvyoq nyangh thang lhyi hauh jyeidwis jens dah yhensain doms los las soenghi jyen los suon.
40025020	Housoeh las xing kyvp oeng khyoengh xauh yoeus soeu ka, gohtoeu oeng khyoengh doms chi lyih las taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh yoeuh aq, nvng ngos lyis xing kyvp oeng khyoengh dyei toh zis yah ngos tsai oeng khyoengh yoh myat yoeus, ge.
40025021	Nyah yhensain nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nghuot goeus, gis las lomluk dah jyeidwis eh, nvng gas vyhang dvmhauh yvmas lomluk goeus. Vyhang nyoshoq dah thoq mas ngos nvng lyis guon nhang das: nah yhensain gaus yvmas bos aq, ge.
40025022	Xing kyvp aiq khyoengh xauh yoeus soeu eq jweh los las, Yhensain eh, nvng ngos lyis aiq khyoengh dyei toh zis, yoeuh aq, ngos gohtoeu aiq khyoengh yoh myat los, ge.
40025023	Nyah yhensain nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nghuot goeus, gis las lomluk dah jyeidwis eh, nvng vyhang dvmhauh yvmas lomluk goeus. Vyhang nyoshoq thoq mas ngos nvng lyis guon nhang das: nah yhensain gaus yvmas bos aq, ge.
40025024	Hauh thang lhyi dvkhyoengh xauh yoeus soeu los las taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, nvng gas yau dah dius dvyuk nghuot las, nvng ma khyoq masyah yhomh yoeus das, nvng ma sanh toh masyah tsainh yoeus das zis lyis ngos seq.
40025025	Housoeh ngos gyuk las nah xing kyvp dvkhyoengh lyis nyeisjvng mas doeu nyhop shung toh. Yoeuh aq, nah vyhang joq shih, ge.
40025026	Nyah yhensain nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Lan las ma lyungs dah jyeidwis eh, ngos ma khyoq masyah yhomh yoeus das zis yahge ma sanh toh masyah tsainh yoeus das zis nvng seq nyeis.
40025027	Housoeh yvmvyah ngah ngwis lyis ngwis jyi mha yoh tsomh nhang toh das las, ngah ngwis bonzoe eq ngwis lhyi eq doms yoh tauh yoeus das.
40025028	Housoeh yvmvyah nyah jyank mas dah ngwis yoeus las dvmons yoh soeu lhyi dyei geh.
40025029	Khasoeh ge lyis yoh bang lyis lung dyei das las nyang mas nyo los je los das. Nghuot laus eq ma yoh soeu jyank masyah gas, nyang yoh ya yoh zis lyis eq doms yoeus tyamp shih das.
40025030	Hau ma lyungs jyeidwis lyis gas, nghe pheh soeng soeng noq yvmas doeuh kat geh. Hauh yvmas nyang gas ngausdyeis ngausnhvp yahge zwis khih chap loh das, ge.
40025031	Hauh Cangsoeu Lo gas nyah phunk bvng las gyingshang loeuswons bang dvnganh yah dvgeh gyohlyih dah uhlyis, nyang gas nyah phunk bos dah hwankti tank mas tsung das las,
40025032	Dius nyau khanghmuh lyis nyah xikkhonh mas tsainh toh lho lha, yvng yoeuh soeu ka yvng yahge shvbeq jens lyis kangh toh teh nyamoq lyis kyoq toh das.
40025033	Yvng lyis nyah loqyos shot pheh, shvbeq lyis nyah loqwi shot pheh toh das.
40025034	Hauh uhlyis Hwankti phoq gas nyah loqyos shot pheh nyeis bang lyis, Namoq Uwus jyank masyah shvmanh tsain yoh bang eh, los geh, mauthuq nyeiszvn lyis yah namoq xiklyis sont toh dah munghdan vso vlho lhyi tsain kham yoeus geh.
40025035	Khasoeh ge lyis, Ngos wom yuot lyis namoq ngos lyis zonoms dyei, ngos jeis shet lyis namoq ngos lyis shuk das zis dyei. Ngos boengh duot yenh lyis namoq ngos lyis boengh daih langh.
40025036	Ngos shohchen nghuot uhlyis namoq ngos lyis gvm huot. Ngos nos nyeis lyis namoq ngos lyis tsain dyangh. Ngos thung lungh nyeis lyis namoq ngos lyis komh goeus, oen das.
40025037	Hauh uhlyis dan bang gas, Yhensain eh, nvng yuot zis lyis ngamoq khanhamp nyvng las tsoh ku lah? Jeis shet zis lyis khanhamp nyvng las gvmshuk ku lah?
40025038	Nvng boengh duot yenh zis lyis ngamoq khanhamp nyvng las boengh daih ku lah? Nvng shohchen nghuot zis lyis ngamoq khanhamp nyvng las gvm huot ku lah?
40025039	Nvng nos xauh zis yahge thung lungh nyeis yvlyis ngamoq khanhamp nyvng las nvng lyis komh ku lah, ge nyang lyis tsain toeuh das.
40025040	Hauh uhlyis hwankti phoq nyamoq lyis phuk taiq das zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, hai ngah vnoeuh moq mas ngis thank soeu dvyuk lyis namoq kuot zis gas, ngos lyis kuot goeus, ge.
40025041	Loqwi shot pheh bang lyis nyang taiq das zis gas, Nhoengh khonh zangh bang eh, ngos yah gang las yius gomloeus yahge nyah loeuswons bang xiklyis sont toh dah ma jom nyi mas wvng loh geh.
40025042	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos wom yuot dah uhlyis namoq ngos lyis zonoms ma dyei. Ngos jeis shet dah uhlyis namoq ngos lyis jeis ma dyei.
40025043	Ngos boengh duot yenh dah uhlyis ngos lyis boengh ma daih; Ngos shohchen nghuot uhlyis namoq ngos lyis ma gvmhuot. Ngos nos xauh zis yahge thung lungh nyeis dah uhlyis namoq ngos lyis ma komh, ge.
40025044	Hauh uhlyis nyamoq eq, Yhensain eh, nvng wom yuot zis, jeis shet zis, boengh duot yenh zis, shohchen nghuot zis, nos xauh zis yahge thung lungh zis lyis ngamoq khanhamp nyvng las nvng lyis ma phuqsoe dyei lah, ge phuk taiq das.
40025045	Nyang nyamoq lyis phuk taiq das zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, haih bang mas ngis thank soeu dvyuk lyis namoq ma kuot zis gas, ngos lyis ma kuot zis nghuot, ge.
40025046	Housoeh las nyamoq gas vcaiq vto shanghsenh yvmas wvng loh das. Nghuot laus eq dan bang gas, vcaiq vto kang dwis yvmas xauh wvng das, ge.
40026001	Yesu haih dang dvnganh dye taiq lho lhyi nyah changlo jens lyis taiq zis gas,
40026002	Aiq nyeih thang lhyi hau Lhuiq Kat Pwe nghuot zis namoq seq nyeis las, Cangsoeu Lo gas tapzains mas taplhangh tyamp das xiklyis phanhlyen zis xauh das, ge.
40026003	Hauh uhlyis phudyei uhjyung jens yahge maussauh lhaih bang, dius jens dah logis jens gas, Kayapa ge Phudyei Zainsmuh dah yhen ganthoq mas tsain zop huom toh.
40026004	Yesu lyis tsoek yah nyhik yoeus las sat das cho xamgoh nyeis.
40026005	Nghuot laus eq nyamoq taiq zis gas, Pwe gyo lyis ma nghuot goeus jungh, dius hoeu toq mvbeh, ge.
40026006	Gvshih Yesu gas Bethani mas mvnggvng dap soeu Simon dah yhen mha nyeis,
40026007	Nyang womjus mas tsung toh lyis, vmesbih dvyuk, luk thyoeu jywanglo mhayah svsoh phauh dah xangh coeu nyah jyank mas chi lyih las nyah uhloms mas huot kat dyei.
40026008	Nghuot laus eq nyah changlo jens hauh zis lyis nyvng lyis, nyamoq nhaiq yoeuh yo las taiq zis gas, Chamus haih coeu lhyi vyu vgeh kuot?
40026009	Khasoeh ge lyis hauh yvlyis phauh nyo nyo yah ungh las nyungs bang lyis yoh gvm dyei das zis, ge.
40026010	Yesu hauh zis lyis seq las nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Chamus hauh vmesbih lyis yau nhang goh lah? Nyang ngos lyis gis khyvlyis kuot goeus.
40026011	Hau nyungs bang gas vjangh namoq yah dvgeh nyeis, nghuot laus eq ngos gas namoq yah vjangh ma nyeis.
40026012	Khasoeh ge lyis, haih coeu lhyi ngah gungs mas huot kat zis gas, nyang ngos lyis ba nyhop das xiklyis sont zis nghuot.
40026013	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, mungkvn gonh mas haih gausyis dang taiq hoeuh loh dah joqyos khanghmuh mas nyang lyis soh das nyhenshang hai nyang kuot khoq cho lhyi taiq kyoh das, ge.
40026014	Changlo dvci aiq yuk mas bos, Yudas Iskarot ge soeu ka, phudyei uhjyung jens jyank mas e lha,
40026015	Nyang lyis ngos namoq dah loq mas dyei lyis, ngos lyis cha dyei das lah, ge nyamoq lyis nyei. Nyamoq gas, nyang lyis ngwis kyvp somhci suon dyei.
40026016	Hou mhayah nyang lyis yoh phanhlyen dyei das toeuh xo nyeis.
40026017	Gvshih bicheih ma kat ohlhyoq zo pwe, cangxeih vnyeih lyis changlo jens Yesu jyank mas los nyei zis gas, Lhuiq Kat Pwe zo das xiklyis nvng ngamoq lyis khamha sont toh dyei nhang mes lah, ge.
40026018	Nyang taiq zis gas, Hauh wugungs mas soeu dvyuk jyank mas loh las, Ngah shishenh ni los goeus, nah yhen mha ngos ngah changlo jens yah hau Lhuiq Kat Pwe zo das ge Svra taiq kat, oen nyang lyis taiq geh, ge.
40026019	Changlo jens eq Yesu taiq kat vgus kuot las, hau Lhuiq Kat Pwe nyenhcon lhyi tsain ba sont toh.
40026020	Gvshih nyenhthang lhyi nyang gas dvci aiq yuk moq yah dvgeh joqyos yoeus.
40026021	Nyamoq wom zo nyeis uhlyis nyang taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, namoq mas dvyuk ngos lyis phanhlyen das, ge.
40026022	Hauh uhlyis nyamoq nhaiq svsoh tsain kuk las dvyuk thang lhyi dvyuk nyang lyis, Yhensain eh, ngos nghuot lah, ge.
40026023	Nyang phuk taiq zis gas, Bvn mas ngos yah dvgeh loq lap soeu ka ngos lyis kyauh tyamp das soeu nghuot.
40026024	Lhaih toh zis yah dvyhangteh, Cangsoeu Lo gas kuot tyink loh chah, nghuot laus eq Cangsoeu Lo lyis phanhlyen soeu ka mvtanhzoe nghuot! Nyang ma khoeu los ya nyah xiklyis zes gis das, ge.
40026025	Hauh uhlyis kyauh tyamp soeu Yudas eq nyang lyis, Svra eh, ngos nghuot lah, ge lyis, nyang gas, Nvng taiq goeus, ge phuk taiq.
40026026	Nyamoq wom zo nyeis uhlyis Yesu gas ohlhyoq yoeus las shvmanh thang lhyi khyiq las, changlo jens lyis dyei uhlyis yah taiq zis gas, Namoq tsain yoeus zo geh, haih zis gas ngah gungs nghuot, ge.
40026027	Nyang kom lhyi yoeus las jyehjuh lyis chungh thang lhyi dyei uhlyis yah taiq zis gas, Namoq dvnganhmoq haih zis shuk geh:
40026028	Haih zis gas nyoshoq moq dah yaunos lyis khyuot tyamp das xiklyis huot tyamp dah ngah suih yah kuot toh thanghchvp nghuot.
40026029	Ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, Ngah Uwus dah munghdan mas namoq yah dvgeh zvbiq saiq lyis xauh shuk buisnyeis jweh shoq, zvbiq shih mas zis lyis ngos ma shuk lo, ge nyamoq lyis gvm dyei.
40026030	Nyamoq chunghthwe dvkoeuq chungh lho lha, Tsanlun boms pheh thuq loh.
40026031	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, khvnyens namoq dvnganh gas ngos lyis tyamp khoq das: khasoeh ge lyis, Hauh yvng yoeuh soeu lhyi ngos bat sat las, Yvng phung mha dah yvng gas dyos loh das, ge lhaih toh, ge.
40026032	Nghuot laus eq ngos gas dwis toq los nhang thang lhyi, Galile mau mas ngos namoq dah xikpheh loh langh das, ge.
40026033	Petru nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Dvnganhmoq nah gvng mas nvng lyis tyamp khoq laus eq ngos gas khanhamp eq ma tyamp das, ge.
40026034	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos nvng lyis jyoengh taiq bah; khvnyens nyang gyoq ma tuon shih lyis nvng ngos lyis somh lhain he tyamp das, ge.
40026035	Petru nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos nvng yah dvgeh shei chah laus eq nvng lyis gas ma he tyamp das, ge. Changlo jens dvnganh eq vgus housoeh taiq.
40026036	Hauh thang lhyi Yesu gas nyamoq yah dvgeh, Gesemani ge dah joqyos mas jweh las changlo jens lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos thyimha shvmanh loh dung uhlyis namoq heimha tsung langh geh, ge.
40026037	Hauh uhlyis nyang gas Petru yahge Zebedi dah lotang lyis eq shwih las, kuk zis yah ehnyet nyo nyeis.
40026038	Housoeh las nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngah nhaiqlom shei bah ge shoq nhaiqkuk nhaiqngis nyeis. Ngos yah dvgeh namoq heimha phuksohlhaiq mus nyeis langh geh, ge.
40026039	Housoeh nyang hou mhayah dvthungh loh shih las, nyah nyoqnho gop las shvmanh dung uhlyis yah taiq zis gas, Ngah Uwus eh, gis bweh nghuot lyis gas, haih kom ngah jyank masyah lai loh nhang aq: nghuot laus eq ngos o khyvlyis ma nghuot, nvng o khyvlyis dvnghuot bas jungh, ge.
40026040	Nyang nyah changlo jens jyank mas tauh los lyis, nyamoq yhet joq yvlyis los nyvng las Petru lyis, Khasoeh gah, namoq ngos yah dvshishenh eq ma yoh zungh nyeis goh lhyeh?
40026041	Shiwu yvmas namoq ma wvng loh bas jungh zungh nyeis uhjyangh shvmanh dung geh. Dyos gas mes laus eq gungsshoh gas yomnhuk joq, ge.
40026042	Nyang aiq vlhain doms loh las shvmanh dung zis gas, Oh ngah Uwus eh, haih kom lhyi ngos ma shuk shuk ngah jyank masyah ma yoh lai loh nghuot lyis gas, nah ehnyet nghuot bas jungh, ge.
40026043	Dvlhain doms tauh los lyis eq, nyamoq nyoqkuk lyei las doms yhet muih joq yvlyis los nyvng.
40026044	Housoeh nyang nyamoq lyis toh khoq las somh vlhain doms loh las vkhang dah dang khonh doms dung nyeis.
40026045	Hauh thang lhyi nyang nyah changlo jens jyank mas los las taiq zis gas, Gvshih lvlaihsoe yhet joq lhyeh? Yoeuh aq, Cangsoeu Lo lyis yaunos wons bang loq mas kyauh tyamp das shishenh gas jweh los goeus.
40026046	Toq geh, yang tsain loh goh: yoeuh aq, ngos lyis kyauh tyamp das soeu los goeus, ge.
40026047	Nyang taiq nyeis shih lyis, yoeuh aq, dvci aiq yuk mas bos dah Yudas gas los las, phudyei uhjyung jens yahge dius jens dah logis jens mas dah dius dvjens dvlvng moengsa yahge dunghkuq chi lha nyah thang mha chank los.
40026048	Gvshih nyang lyis phanhlyen soeu ka, Ngos bvlot tanh soeu ka hauh soeu nyang nghuot goeus; nyang lyis nyhik yoeus geh, ge nyamoq lyis wuhsoh dyei toh.
40026049	Nyang gas Yesu jyank mas chot e lha, Svra eh, dvyangh lah, ge bvlot tanh.
40026050	Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Buisnoms phoq eh, nvng kuot chah zis lvnyap dvkuot aq, ge. Housoeh las nyamoq Yesu lyis kvp tsain dap nyhik.
40026051	Yesu yah dvgeh nyeis bang mas dvyuk gas, nyah moengsa she lha Phudyei Zainsmuh dah jyeidwis dvyuk lyis zan khyoq kat lho lhyi, nyah no dyet tyamp.
40026052	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nah moengsa lhyi dyvng mas cank toh aq: khasoeh ge lyis moengsa she bang dvnganh gas moengsa yah shei das, ge.
40026053	Ngos ngah Uwus lyis shvmanh dung lyis, nyang gvshih nyang loeuswons bang nyoshoq, dvci aiq dvp thoq lyis zes shoq ngah jyank mas yoh nhang kat das zis lyis nvng ma nghamh yoeuh lhyeh?
40026054	Housoeh kuot lyis, Haih cho yoh bweh das, ge lhaihtoh dang gas khasoeh yoh nyuk los das lah, ge.
40026055	Hauh shishenh lyis nyang, Yesu moqjens lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq ngos lyis khyanktau nyhik teh nyhik das zis moengsa, dunghkuq yah tsain los lhyeh? Ngos nyeih khanghmuh yhenmuh mas jyauh uhjyangh tsung toh lyis eq namoq ngos lyis ma nyhik.
40026056	Nghuot laus eq heisoeh bweh los zis dvnganh, lvpe jens dah maussauh nyuk los das xiklyis nghuot, ge. Hauh uhlyis changlo jens dvnganh yah nyang lyis tyamp khoq las cangh loh.
40026057	Yesu lyis nyhik bang gas, maussauh lhaih bang yahge logis jens huom toh dah Phudyei Zainsmuh Kayapa jyank mas Yesu lyis tsain shwih loh.
40026058	Petru gas nyah thang mha we we masyah chank loh las, Phudyei Zainsmuh gan thoq khau mha wvng las muh thang thyet yvlyis yoeuh das xiklyis zungh bang yah dvgeh tsung toh.
40026059	Gvshih Phudyei uhjyung jens yah dvgeh nhaiqbos dvhuom gonh Yesu lyis yoh sat das dah kanghjyoeng tsain xo.
40026060	Nghuot laus eq hank eq ma yoh. Ma ying kanghjyoeng nyoshoq los laus eq kanghjyoeng cha eq ma nyvng. Thang thank lyis ma ying kanghjyoeng aiq yuk los las taiq zis gas,
40026061	Haih soeu ka, Ngos Mangso dah yhenmuh lyis thyoq tyamp las, somh nyeih gyo lyis hauh zis lyis yoh doms kuot, ge taiq goeus, ge.
40026062	Hauh uhlyis Phudyei Zainsmuh toq las nyang lyis, Nvng lyis tyixo kanghjyoeng kat nyeis zis cha nghuot, nvng ma phuk taiq lhyeh, ge.
40026063	Nghuot laus eq Yesu gas samlo dvnyeis. Tsai Phudyei Zainsmuh taiq zis gas, Mangso dah Lo ge, Khristu gas nvng nghuot lah? Ma nghuot lah, zis ngamoq lyis taiq kyoh bas jungh, oen dwis nyeis dah Mangso nyings yoeus las ngos nvng lyis maukhi, ge.
40026064	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng taiq goeus, ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, hauh Cangsoeu Lo gas Yomsoq dah loqyos shot pheh tsung lha maukhung jyommauh yah jweh lyih yvlyis namoq nyvng das, ge.
40026065	Hauh uhlyis Phudyei Zainsmuh gas nyah dyi lang chuiq las, Haih soeu ka Mangso lhyi loeusmus soqzo dang taiq. Yoeuh aq, namoq nyang hauh loeusmus soqzo dang lyis xauhgyo goeus. Chah kanghjyoeng chah shih lah?
40026066	Namoq soe khasoeh tuon das, ge. Nyamoq phuk taiq zis gas, Nyang gas shei chah dah yobos bos soeu nghuot, ge.
40026067	Nyamoq gas nyah nyoqnho mha svkanh dyeh gyuon las chwiq. Gohyhamh bang eq nyang lyis loqwu yah tsain tyuk las,
40026068	Khristu eh, nvng lyis hank tyuk zis lyis pe zis yah ngamoq lyis taiq kyoh aq, tsain ge.
40026069	Petru gas ganthoq mas tsung toh: nyelo dvyuk nyah jyank mas los las, nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng eq Galile dius Yesu yah nyeis ku, ge.
40026070	Nghuot laus eq nyang gas, Nvng cha taiq mes zis ngos ma seqgyo, ge nyamoq dvnganh dah xikkhonh mas he.
40026071	Tsai, nyang gas wumuk pheh thuq loh lyis gohtoeu vmesbih dvyuk eq nyang lyis nyvng las, houmha nyeis bang lyis taiq zis gas, Haih soeu eq Nazaret mas Yesu yah dvgeh nyeis soeu nghuot, ge.
40026072	Nyang gas, Hauh soeu lhyi ngos ma seq, ge maukhi nyeissoq las doms he.
40026073	Khanyhank ma nyangh lyis houmha yap joq bang los las Petru lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng eq nyamoq mas zis dvyuk jyoengh nghuot: nvng kat dah nyingh ma dyeh zis gas nvng lyis tuonh shet nyeis, ge.
40026074	Housoeh las nyang gas nhoengh nhoengh khan khan maukhi lha taiq zis gas, Ngos hauh soeu lhyi ma seq, ge. Houjang gyoq tuon los.
40026075	Housoeh las Petru gas, Gyoq ma tuon shih lyis nvng ngos lyis somh lhain he tyamp das, ge Yesu nyang lyis taiq dang lyis soh los las nyang nghe pheh e lha svsoh ngaus.
40027001	Nvpyo jweh lyis phudyei uhjyung jens yahge dius jens dah logis jens dvnganh Yesu lyis sat das cho xamgoh.
40027002	Nyamoq gas nyang lyis twih lho lha mungh zau Pilat jyank mas loh shwih kyauh tyamp.
40027003	Nyang lyis phanhlyen dah Yudas gas, Yesu lyis dang thang thyet goeus zis nyvng lyis, nyang auhuiq las, phudyei uhjyung jens yahge logis jens jyank mas hau ngwis somhci yoeus e lha,
40027004	Yobos ma bos soeu dah suih lyis ngos phanhlyen goeus las ngos yaunos dap goeus, ge. Nyamoq gas, Hauh zis ngamoq yah cha sen? Nvnyang kuot zis dvnghuot, ge.
40027005	Housoeh las nyang gas hauh ngwis lyis yhenmuh khau mha doeuh toh khoq las nyah gungs lyis nyang e lhangh sheizo.
40027006	Phudyei uhjyung jens gas, hauh ngwis lyis kui lha, Haih zis gas suih phauh nghuot yvmvyah, vlu ziskwi mas kat toh das zis lyi ma bos, ge.
40027007	Hauh thang lhyi nyamoq doms xamgoh las, dius boengh lyis nyhop das xiklyis yam shuon soeu dah maunyeis lyis wis toh.
40027008	Housoeh yvmvyah hauh maunyeis lyis khvnyhik jweh shoq Suih yos, ge tsain lui.
40027009	Lvpe Yeremia taiq khoq dang mas, Hauh Yhensain ngos lyis taiq toh zis yah dvyhangteh, Israel dius dvyhamh yah dius dvyuk dah phauh thyet toh dah phauh ngwis kyvp somhci lhyi nyamoq yoeus las,
40027010	Yhensain ngos lyis taiq toh zis yah dvyhangteh nyamoq hauh yvlyis yoeus las yam shuonh soeu dah maunyeis wis yvmas yhung, ge zis gas hauh uhlyis nyuk los.
40027011	Yesu gas mungh zau xikkhonh mas yap joq. Mungh zau nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Nvng Yuda hwankti nghuot lhyeh, ge. Yesu taiq zis gas, Nvng taiq nyeis, ge.
40027012	Phudyei uhjyung jens yahge logis jens yah nyang lyis zau kauq laus eq nyang cha eq ma phuk taiq.
40027013	Pilat gas nyang lyis, Nyamoq nvng lyis khanyhoq zau kauq nyeis zis lyis nvng ma xauhgyo lhyeh, ge.
40027014	Nghuot laus eq nyang dang dvkhonh eq ma phuk taiq. Housoeh mungh zau gas svsoh mauh.
40027015	Gvshih haih pwe mha mungh zau gas, dius xiklyis thung lungh bang mas nyamoq lhuiq kat nhang mes soeu dvyuk yuk lyis gyangh lhuiq kat dyei.
40027016	Hauh uhlyis Baraba ge, ma gis nyings hoeuh soeu dvyuk thung lungh nyeis.
40027017	Housoeh yvmvyah nyamoq dvgeh zain dah uhlyis, Pilat nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq xiklyis hank lyis lhuiq kat dyei das zis o goh lah? Baraba lyis lah? Khristu ge Yesu lyis lah, ge.
40027018	Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq noh gvng mas, Yesu lyis kyauh tyamp yvlyis nyang seq.
40027019	Pilat soetuon tank mas tsung toh shih lyis, nyah yhensain nyhiq yah dius nhang lha nyang lyis taiq kat zis gas, Dan soeu lhyi nvng cha eq vkuot; nyah gvng mas khvnyhik yangh ngos yhetmoq mas ma nyens mus nyeis, ge.
40027020	Nghuot laus eq phudyei uhjyung jens yahge logis jens gas, Baraba lyis kat kat las Yesu lyis gas mhont das xiklyis sang gis, ge dius jens lyis jaus jyuonh, yomdyei.
40027021	Mungh zau nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Haih dvzomh mas namoq xiklyis ngos khayuk lyis kat kat dyei das zis o mes goh lah, ge. Nyamoq gas, Baraba lyis o mes, ge.
40027022	Tsai, Pilat nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Housoeh lyis Khristu ge dah Yesu lyis ngos khasoeh kuot das lah, ge. Nyamoq dvnganh gas, Nyang lyis tapzains mas taplhangh aq, ge.
40027023	Hauh uhlyis mungh zau taiq zis gas, Chamus lah? Nyang ma gis zis cha kuot lah, ge. Nghuot laus eq nyamoq gas, Nyang lyis tapzains mas taplhangh tyamp bas jungh, ge zes tsain kaiq los.
40027024	Pilat gas nyang taiq dah dang lyis hank ma gyo dyei hoeu los zis lyis nyvng lyis, jeis yoeus las moqphung xikkhonh mas nyang loq cheih zoh lyis yah taiq zis gas, Haih dan soeu dah suih masyah ngos luiq bas jungh: namoq kuot dah muh dvnghuot, ge.
40027025	Hauh uhlyis dius dvnganhmoq gas, Nyah suih gas ngamoq thoq mas eq, ngamoq lo jens thoq mas eq joq bas jungh, ge.
40027026	Housoeh nyang nyamoq xiklyis Baraba lyis kat kat dyei. Nghuot laus eq Yesu lyis gas, lyuk lho lha tapzains mas taplhangh tyamp das xiklyis kyauh tyamp.
40027027	Hauh thang lhyi mungh zau dah jeslo jens gas, Yesu lyis mungh zau yhen mha shwih wvng loh las, nyamoq dvdvp gonh dah jeslo jens lyis nyah jyank mas khi tsainh las,
40027028	Nyamoq gas nyah dyimis lyis khyuot tyamp dyei las, dyi nesnoq gvmhuot.
40027029	Nyamoq gas zoeu yah zaiq dah buismuk nyah uhloms mas tsungh dyei. Nyah loqyos loq mas jvmbu dvyau chi toh nhang lha, nyah xikkhonh mas nyamoq phvluk zomhgyuis las jwangh zoh lyis yah, Yuda hwankti kang xing bas jungh, tsain ge.
40027030	Nyamoq gas nyang lyis svkanh dyeh gyuon las, hau jvmbu yau doms yoeus las Yesu dah uhloms mas lyuk dyei.
40027031	Nyamoq gas nyang lyis dye jwangh goeus ya, nyamoq hauh dyi khyuot yoeus las, nyah dyi doms gvmhuot lho lha, nyang lyis tapzains mas taplhangh das zis shwih thuq loh.
40027032	Nyamoq thuq loh lyis Kureni dius Simon ge soeu lhyi nyvng las nyah tapzains lyis bos tsain tsoengh wuq nhang.
40027033	Nyamoq gas Golgotha ge, Uhkhangh ge dah joqyos mas jweh lyis,
40027034	nyamoq gas kyei yah lhoeuq dah zvbiq nyang lyis gvmshuk, nghuot laus eq nyang chaq yoeuh las ma shuk lo.
40027035	Nyamoq gas nyang lyis dye taplhangh toh thang lhyi, nyah dyi lyis nyamoq doeugoh las gvm yoeus.
40027036	nyamoq gas houmha tsung lha nyang lyis zungh nyeis.
40027037	Nyah uhloms toeu mha, Haih soeu ka YUDA HWANKTI YESU nghuot, ge nyang lyis zau kauq dang lhaih tap toh.
40027038	Khyanktau aiq yuk lyis eq nyang yah dvgeh, nyah loqwi loqyos dvshot dvyuk tapzains mas tsain lhangh toh.
40027039	Cho mha suh lai loh bang eq nyang lyis jwangh zoh lyis yah, uhloms nguot las,
40027040	Yhenmuh lyis thyoq tyamp las somh nyeih gyo lyis doms kuot das ge soeu eh, nvnyang gungs lyis khyuot yoeus aq, nvng Mangso dah Lo nghuot lyis gas, tapzains masyah gyoh los aq, tsain ge.
40027041	Phudyei uhjyung jens, maussauh lhaih bang yahge logis jens eq houyah dvyhangteh nyang lyis jwangh las,
40027042	Gohyuk lyis nyang khyuot yoeus, nyah gungs lyis nyang ma yoh khyuot yoeus nyvng! Nyang Israel hwankti nghuot lyis gas, nyang lyis ngamoq yoh lomsjingh das xiklyis tapzains masyah gvshih gyoh los bas jungh.
40027043	Nyang gas Mangso lhyi loms nyeis; Ngos gas Mangso dah lo nghuot, ge taiq goeus yvmvyah, Mangso nyang lyis o nghuot lyis gas nyang lyis gvshih khyuot kat bas jungh, tsain ge.
40027044	Nyang yah dvgeh tapzains mas lhangh toh dah khyanktau aiq yuk eq houyah dvyhangteh tsain jwangh.
40027045	Gvshih dvci aiq shishenh masyah somh shishenh jweh shoq dvmau gonh mau chuot joq.
40027046	Somh shishenh ko lhyi Yesu thwe zainsmuh yah taiq zis gas, ELI, ELI LEMA SABAKTHANI ge. Hauh zis gas, Ngah Mangso eh, ngah Mangso eh, nvng ngos lyis chamus doeuh tyamp toh lah, ge zis nghuot.
40027047	Houmha yap joq bang dvyhamh hauh dang xauhgyo lyis, Nyang gas Eliya lyis lui nyeis, tsain ge.
40027048	Houjang yah nyamoq mas dvyuk wuih e lha, khotlhyop dvjop lyis shihjyen jeis mas jen las, jvmbu yau mas tap las nyang lyis gvmshuk.
40027049	Dvyhamh bang gas, Nghuot lo goeus jungh, Eliya nyang lyis vlyih khyuot yoeus das lah zis langh yoeuh goh, ge.
40027050	Tsai, Yesu gas thwe zainsmuh yah doms kaiq lho lha nyah dyos lyis kyauh tyamp.
40027051	Yoeuh aq, yhenmuh mas dah gos misseh eq vthyoh mas zis vkhyei mha jweh shoq aiq khyamh juiq tyamp. Maunyeis eq dwis las lukmuh lom eq tsain gwi.
40027052	Lop eq tsain phank hanh los las yhet joq goeus, gyingshang bang dah gungs eq nyoshoq toq los las,
40027053	Nyang dwis toq loh dah thang lhyi lop masyah thuq las hau gyingshang wus vkhau mha wvng loh las nyoshoq moq lyis nyvng xoeuq.
40027054	Gvshih jes dvxo guon zau yahge nyang yah dvgeh Yesu lyis zungh bang hau maunyeis dwis zis yahge bweh ya bweh los zis nyvng lyis svsoh gyuk las, Haih soeu ka jyoengh nyang Mangso dah Lo nghuot, tsain ge.
40027055	Galile mau masyah Yesu lyis phuqsoe lha nyah thang mha chank yenh dah vmesbih jens nyoshoq eq houmha nghuot las, we we masyah yoeuh nyeis.
40027056	Hauh bang mas Magdala Mari, Yaku yahge Yosep dah ungwes Mari, Zebedi lo jens dah ungwes moq nghuot.
40027057	Gvshih nyenhthang jweh lyis Yesu dah changlo dvyuk nghuot, dis soeu Yosep ge dah Arimathia dius dvyuk jweh los.
40027058	Nyang gas Pilat jyank mas wvng las, Yesu dah mvng lyis sang lhyi, Pilat gas hauh mvng nyang lyis dyei kat das zis vmingh dyei.
40027059	Housoeh las Yosep gas mvng lyis yoeus las lhoq dah jeimuh mis yah lyet lho lha,
40027060	Lukmuh lom mas kyungh toh dah nyah lop saiq mas toh. Hau lopkhonh mas lukzains toeu cheiq khoq las loh.
40027061	Houmha Magdala Mari yahge gohtoeu Mari eq lop nhuotkhonh mas tsain tsung toh.
40027062	Hau sont buisnyeis dah nungs nyeih phudyei uhjyung jens yahge Pharishe moq gas Pilat jyank mas e lha,
40027063	Yhensain eh, yeis khuk soeu ka, nyang dwis nyeis shih lyis, Ngos gas somh nyeih thang lhyi dwis toq los das, ge nyang taiq dang lyis ngamoq soh.
40027064	Housoeh yvmvyah nyenh lyis nyah changlo jens nyang lyis los khauh yoeus las, shei masyah toq loh goeus, ge dius jens lyis ma yoh taiq bas jungh somh nyeih hauh lop wontang zungh das zis vmingh dyei aq: housoeh ma nghuot lyis gas, xik lyis hwah lungs cho thoq lyis thang lhyi hwah lungs cho zes yau los das, ge.
40027065	Pilat nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq zungh das bang yoh, namoq yoh kuot nyhoq wontang loh kuot geh, ge.
40027066	Housoeh nyamoq e lha, lop mas dah luk lyis loqsoh tap, zungh nhang lha gau gau kuot toh.
40028001	Yuda No Buisnyeis lai las dvdaus dah cangxeih vnyeih, nyoq nyvng zoh lyis, Magdala Mari yahge gohtoeu Mari gas lop lyis komh das zis tsain e.
40028002	Hauh uhlyis, yoeuh aq, maunyeis gvgis dwis los: Khasoeh ge lyis, Yhensain dah loeuswons soeu maukhung mhayah gyoh lyih las, lop khomh luklom lyis toeu tyamp las hauh thoq mas tsung toh.
40028003	Nyah vwot gas mau nyoq nyik teh nghuot; nyah dyi eq gyu teh thyoeu.
40028004	Nyang lyis gyuk dvn yvmvyah, zungh bang tyik tyik nvn las shei bang teh chuot tyamp.
40028005	Hauh loeuswons soeu yah hauh vmesbih aiq yuk lyis taiq zis gas, Nah aiq yuk vgyuk goh, tapzains mas taplhangh tyamp goeus soeu Yesu lyis nah aiq yuk xo yvlyis ngos seq.
40028006	Nyang heimha ma nyeis lo: Khasoeh ge lyis nyang taiq zis yah dvyhangteh, nyang gas dwis toq loh goeus: Los geh, nyang lhain dah joqyos lyis los yoeuh geh.
40028007	Lvnyap loh las nyah changlo jens lyis, Nyang gas dwis toq loh goeus, oen taiq kyoh geh. Yoeuh aq, nyang gas namoq dah xik pheh Galile mau mas loh goeus. Houmha namoq nyang lyis nyvng das. Yoeuh aq, ngos namoq lyis taiq kyoh, ge.
40028008	Hauh uhlyis nyah aiq yuk gas gyuk eq gyuk, gaus eq svsoh gaus zis yah lop masyah lvnyap loh las nyah changlo jens lyis hauh dang taiq kyoh das xiklyis tsain wuih loh.
