40028009	Yoeuh aq, Yesu nyah aiq yuk yah xauhgoh las. Gausyis nyeis bas jungh, ge. Nyah aiq yuk gas nyah khyei lhyi zwi las tsain paiq.
40028010	Yesu nyah aiq yuk lyis taiq zis gas, Vtsain gyuk goh, ngah vmang vnoeuh moq Galile mau mas loh das xiklyis loh taiq kyoh geh, nyamoq ngos yah houmha xauhgoh das, ge.
40028011	Nyah aiq yuk loh nyeis lyis, yoeuh aq, lop zungh bang mas dvyhamh wukhau mha wvng loh las, houmha bweh ya bweh cho dvnganh yah phudyei uhjyung jens lyis taiq kyoh.
40028012	Hauh uhlyis nyamoq logis jens yah tsain huom lha, xam nyoq thang lhyi, nyamoq gas jeslo jens lyis ngwis nyoshoq dyei las taiq zis gas,
40028013	Nyenhyo ngamoq yhet joq uhlyis nyah changlo jens nyang lyis lyih khauh yoeus loh, oen taiq geh.
40028014	Haih zis lyis mungh zau xauhgyo nghuot lyis namoq lyis yobos ma zangh das xiklyis ngamoq, nyang lyis jyoeuq das, ge.
40028015	Housoeh nyamoq hauh ngwis tsain yoeus khoq las, jyauh kat zis yah dvyhangteh kuot. Housoeh las dang hauh zis gas Yuda dius mas khvnyhik jweh shoq hoeuh nyeis.
40028016	Housoeh las changlo jens dvci dvyuk moq gas, Galile mau mas loh las, Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq toh dah boms mas tsain doq loh.
40028017	Houmha nyang lyis nyvng las tsain paiq. Nghuot laus eq dvyhamh bang gas khamkhvv.
40028018	Yesu nyamoq jyank mas los las taiq zis gas, Maukhung thoq mas eq, nyeisjvng thoq mas eq, vmingh dvnganh yah ngos lyis dyei goeus.
40028019	Housoeh yvmvyah namoq loh las, dius nyau khanghmuh lyis ngah changlo jens bweh nhang lha, Uwus, Lo, Gyingshang Dyos dah nyings masyah nyamoq lyis jeisnyhop dyei geh.
40028020	Ngos namoq lyis taiq ya taiq yvlyis yoh chank das xiklyis nyamoq lyis jyauh geh. Hauh thoq lyis, yoeuh aq, mungkvn thank shoq, ngos vjangh namoq yah dvgeh nyeis, ge. Amen.
41001001	Mangso dah Lo Yesu Khristu dah gausyis Dang cangxeih vpom;
41001002	Lvpe Esaia lhaih toh zis gas, Yoeuh aq, nah cho sont langh das xiklyis, Ngos ngah loeuskyoh soeu lhyi nah xik pheh nhang kat.
41001003	Mhanhdyvp mas dvyuk kaiq nyeis dah thwe ka, Yhensain dah cho lhyi sont toh geh, Nyah chokhyoh lyis soq dan geh, ge.
41001004	Mhanhdyvp mas jeisnyhop dyei soeu Yohan thuq los las yaunos khyuot dyei das xiklyis nhaiqlom thaiq las jeisnyhop kham geh ge taiq hoeuh nyeis.
41001005	Housoeh las Yuda mau gonh bang yahge Yerusalem mas bang dvnganh nyah jyank mas e lha, nyamoq dah yaunos lyis rhen lha, Yodan lvng mas nyah loq yah jeisnyhop dyei zis tsain xauh.
41001006	Yohan ka gola-u mauh dyi wuot, thyikdom mas shohyeis dyichih chih toh. Nyah wom gas janghgyik yahge mhanhdyvp mas dah dyoyhei nghuot.
41001007	Housoeh nyang taiq hoeuh zis gas, Ngah thoq lyis zes yombos soeu dvyuk ngah thang mha los das: ngos gas nyah thyvkoq twih lyis gop las phui das zis yangh ma mon.
41001008	Ngos gas namoq lyis jeis yah jeisnyhop dyei, nghuot laus eq nyang gas namoq lyis Gyingshang Dyos yah jeisnyhop dyei das, ge.
41001009	Hauh buisnyeis gyo lyis Yesu gas Galile mau, Nazaret masyah jweh los las, Yodan lvng, Yohan loq mas jeisnyhop kham.
41001010	Yesu jeis masyah toq los yah dvyih, maukhung phank los las, hauh Dyos nyah thoq mas khotjyauh teh gyoh los yvlyis nyang nyvng.
41001011	Housoeh maukhung mhayah thwe dvkoeuq los zis gas, Nvng gas ngos jyetdap dah ngah Lo nghuot, ngos nvng lyis nhaiqdoeus, ge.
41001012	Houjang Dyos gas nyang lyis mhanhdyvp pheh jyuonh kat.
41001013	Nyang gas mhanhdyvp mas nyeici nyeih Satan yah shiwu las yewus jens yah nyeis uhlyis loeuswons bang nyang lyis los phuqsoe.
41001014	Yohan thung khyoq zis xauh thang lhyi, Yesu gas Galile mau pheh loh las, Mangso dah Gausyis Dang lyis taiq kyoh zis gas,
41001015	Shishenh nyuk los goeus las Mangso dah munghdan ni los goeus. Namoq dah yaunos masyah tauh los las Gausyis Dang lyis lomsjingh geh, ge.
41001016	Yesu Galile thomh yvm chank yah suh loh lyis, oeng nhoh zo dah vmang vnoeuh aiq yuk Petru ge dah Simon yahge nyah vnoeuh Andre gas, thomh mas nyho yah oeng gaiq nyeis zis lyis nyvng.
41001017	Yesu nyah zomh lyis taiq, Ngah thang mha chank los geh, ngos nah zomh lyis dius nhoh nhang das, ge.
41001018	Nyamoq gas houjang yah nyamoq nyho tsain toh khoq las nyah thang mha chank loh.
41001019	Xik pheh dvthungh loh lho lhyi, gohtoeu vmang vnoeuh dvzomh Zebedi dah lotang Yaku yahge Yohan lyis nyvng. Nyamoq gas lhyik khau mha nyho pho nyeis.
41001020	Housoeh Yesu gas nyah zomh lyis nyvng yah dvyih nyah zomh lyis khi. Nyah zomh gas nyah zomh dah uwus Zebedi yahge uhkung jens lyis lhyik mas toh khoq las Yesu thang mha chank loh.
41001021	Yesu yahge nyah changlo jens gas Kaperna-um wus mas jweh loh. Yuda No Buisnyeis jweh lyis Yesu gas lyi jungs mas wvng las jyauh.
41001022	Nyang gas maussauh lhaih bang teh ma nghuot, vmingh bos soeu teh jyauh yvmvyah nyamoq gas nyang jyauh cho lhyi mauh.
41001023	Hauh uhlyis nyamoq dah lyi jungs khau mha yius wvng dah dius dvyuk nyetlos nyettant kaiq ngaus zis gas,
41001024	Nazaret phoq Yesu eh, nvng ngamoq yah cha sen lah? Nvng ngamoq lyis mhont das xiklyis los lhyeh? Ngos nvng hank nghuot zis seq; Nvng gas Mangso dah Gyingshang Soeu nghuot, ge.
41001025	Yesu nyang lyis nyho lha taiq zis gas, No aq, nyah jyank masyah thuq loh aq, ge.
41001026	Housoeh las yius gas, hauh soeu lhyi huonh nhang lho lha, yomkat kaiq las nyah jyank masyah thuq loh.
41001027	Nyamoq dvnganhmoq mauh las nyei goh zis gas, Haih zis cha nghuot au? Jyauh cho vsaiq nghuot lhyeh? Nyang vmingh dyei yvlyis yius eq tsain gyo dyei, ge.
41001028	Houjang yah Galile vyvm vwi mas bang dvnganhmoq gas dvkhauyah nyah cho tsain taiq hoeuh loh.
41001029	Nyamoq lyi jungs masyah thuq lyih thangjang nyamoq gas Yaku, Yohan yah dvgeh Simon yahge Andre yhen mha wvng loh.
41001030	Houmha Simon dah yuknyih gungs ngeh las nos lhain toh. Houjang nyamoq gas nyah cho Yesu lyis tsain taiq kyoh.
41001031	Yesu los las, nyang lyis loq masyah she toq lho lhyi, hau gungs ngeh las nos zis gis goeus las, nyang nyamoq lyis daih.
41001032	Nyenhthang buis wvng zoh lyis, nos bang, yius kuq bang dvnganh lyis nyah jyank mas tsain shwih lyih.
41001033	Dvwus gonh bang hauh khomhdwang mas lyih tsain huom toh.
41001034	Nyang gas nos bang, noslom vja ja bos bang dvnganh lyis gis los nhang. Yius jens lyis eq khat tyamp. Nyamoq gas nyang lyis seq yvmvyah nyang nyamoq lyis dang ma taiq nhang.
41001035	Nvpsangh nyoq ma nyvng shih lyis, nyang toq las mhanhdyvp pheh loh las shvmanh dung.
41001036	Hauh uhlyis Simon yahge nyang yah dvgeh nyeis bang gas, nyang lyis chank xo.
41001037	Nyang lyis nyamoq nyvng lyis taiq zis gas, Dvnganhmoq yah nvng lyis xo nyeis, ge.
41001038	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Vyvm vwi mas dah wugungs mas tsain loh goh: khasoeh ge lyis ngos jweh los zis gas, hauh yvmas eq yoh taiq kyoh das xiklyis nghuot, ge.
41001039	Housoeh nyang gas Galile dvmau gonh loh las lyi jungs mas tsain taiq hoeuh las yius lyis eq khat thuq dyei.
41001040	Mvnggvng dap soeu dvyuk nyang lyis los dupaiq las dung zis gas, Nvng bauh nghuot lyis gas ngos lyis yoh thyauhlhyang los nhang, ge.
41001041	Nyang nhaiq yoeuh nyen yvmvyah nyah loq yhonh kat las nyang lyis tanh uhlyis yah taiq zis gas, Ngos mes, nvng thyauhlhyang los bas jungh, ge.
41001042	Houjang mvnggvng nos gis goeus las, nyang gas thyauhlhyang goeus.
41001043	Yesu gas nyang lyis zaih nhang lha lvnyap nhang kat.
41001044	Haih cho hank lyis eq vtaiq kyoh, nghuot laus eq nvnyang gungs phudyei soeu jyank mas loh chixoeuq aq, Moshe dah lyi yah dvyhangteh loh phudyei aq: khasoeh ge lyis, nyamoq xiklyis kanghjyoeng nghuot bas jungh, ge.
41001045	Nghuot laus eq nyang thuq loh las, hauh cho nyoshoq moq lyis taiq hoeuh loh. Housoeh yvmvyah nyang gas wugungs mas debangh ma yoh loh. Nyang gas mhanhdyvp mas nyeis lyis, khyiq khanghmuh mas bang nyah jyank mas los.
41002001	Dvkyoh lo nyangh thang lhyi, nyang gas Kaperna-um mas doms loh las nyah yhen mha nyeis zis lyis tsain xauhgyo.
41002002	Housoeh las dius dvnganhmoq zop huom yvmvyah joqyos eq ma bos lo. Khomhdwang mas jweh shoq tsain nyeis las nyang nyamoq lyis Dang taiq kyoh.
41002003	Housoeh gungsjen shei soeu dvyuk lyis dius nyei yuk yah nyah jyank mas dvng lyih.
41002004	Dius puk thoeu yvmvyah nyah jyank mas ma yoh tanh loh las, nyamoq gas nyang nyeis dah vtoeu mha yhenkhung dwang phank las, gungsjen shei soeu lhyi yhetyos eq cheq juons khyoq kat.
41002005	Yesu gas nyamoq dah lomsjingh zis lyis nyvng las, gungsjen shei soeu lhyi taiq zis gas, Lo eh, nah yaunos khyuot dyei goeus, ge.
41002006	Hauh yvmas maussauh lhaih bang dvyhamh tsung toh las, nyamoq ehnyet mas tsain nghamh zis gas,
41002007	Haih soeu ka chamus loeusmus soqzo dang taiq au lhyeh? Mangso kyingh ma nghuot lyis gas yaunos hank yoh khyuot dyei lah, ge.
41002008	Houjang yah Yesu gas nyamoq dah nhaiqlom khau mha nghamh zis lyis nyah dyos mas seq las, nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq ehnyet mas chamus housoeh tsain nghamh goh lah?
41002009	Gungsjen shei soeu lhyi, Nah yaunos khyuot dyei goeus, oen das zis yahge, Nah yhetyos toq yoeus las suh loh aq, oen zis kha khonh taiq lwis lah?
41002010	Cangsoeu Lo gas nyeisjvng mas yaunos yoh khyuot dyei dah vmingh yoh zis gas namoq seq bas jungh, ge.
41002011	Hauh gungsjen shei soeu lhyi taiq zis gas, Ngos nvng lyis taiq bah, toq aq, nah yhetyos yoeus las nah yhen pheh loh aq, ge.
41002012	Houjang nyang toq los las yhetyos yoeus chi lha, dvnganhmoq dah xikkhonh mas suh loh yvmvyah dvnganhmoq svsoh mauh las, Mangso lhyi chungh zis yah, Ngamoq heisoeh teh zis khanhamp eq ma nyvng ku, ge.
41002013	Nyang gas thomh yvm pheh doms thuq loh lyis, moqjens dvnganh nyah jyank mas los yvmvyah, nyang nyamoq lyis jyauh.
41002014	Nyang lai dyet loh lyis Alphe dah lo Lewi gas khoengh khywi dah joqyos mas tsung toh zis lyis nyvng las nyang lyis, Ngah thang mha chank los aq, ge taiq lyis nyang toq las nyah thang mha chank loh.
41002015	Hauh thang lhyi Yesu gas, Lewi yhen, womjus mas tsung toh lyis khoengh khywi bang yahge yaunos wons bang nyoshoq eq Yesu yahge nyah changlo jens yah dvgeh tsung toh: khasoeh ge lyis nyoshoq moq nyah thang mha chank yenh.
41002016	Nyang khoengh khywi bang yahge yaunos wons bang yah dvgeh wom zo nyeis zis lyis, maussauh lhaih bang yahge Pharishe moq nyvng lyis nyah changlo jens lyis taiq zis gas, Nyang khoengh khywi bang yahge yaunos wons bang yah dvgeh chamus zo shuk au lhyeh, ge.
41002017	Hauh zis xauhgyo las Yesu gas, Yanghzan bang mvcheih lastsiang ma chah, nos bang dvchah; ngos gas dan bang lyis khi das xiklyis lyih zis ma nghuot, yaunos wons bang xiklyis dvnghuot, ge.
41002018	Yohan dah changlo jens yahge Pharishe moq wom gyangh kyi. nyamoq lyih las nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yohan dah changlo jens yahge Pharishe jens dah changlo jens gas womkyi lhyi, nah changlo jens chamus wom ma kyi goh lah, ge.
41002019	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Phoengh hwank pwe mha bang Loloeu saiq yah dvgeh nyeis uhlyis nyamoq wom yoh kyi lah? Loloeu saiq yah dvgeh nyeis shih lyis nyamoq wom ma yoh kyi.
41002020	Nghuot laus eq loloeu saiq lyis nyamoq jyank masyah shwih loh buisnyeis jweh los das; hauh uhlyis nyamoq womkyi das.
41002021	Dyi tyang mha misseh saiq yah hank ma pho: housoeh pho lhyi ka, vsaiq chuq yah vcauh lyis lang yaq las, hou mhayah juiq zis zes lvm los.
41002022	Zvbiq jeis saiq lyis eq shohyeis thung cauh mas hank ma kat toh. Hauh zis kat nghuot lyis gas, zvbiq jeis saiq gas shohyeis thung lhyi zo phuk las zvbiq jeis shuon das, shohyeis thung eq monh das. Zvbiq jeis saiq gas shohyeis thung saiq mas kat chah, ge.
41002023	Hauh thang lhyi nyang gas Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis sunghso yos cho yah lai loh. Nyamoq loh nyeis lyis nyah changlo jens gas sunghso nham lhyi tsain shap.
41002024	Housoeh las Pharishe moq nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis kuot das lyi ma bos zis lyis chamus kuot goh, ge.
41002025	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Dawi nyang yahge nyah dyenschangh jens yuot shet las chah nyeis uhlyis cha kuot khoq zis lyis khayhoq eq ma nghap yoeuh ku goh lhyeh?
41002026	Phudyei Zainsmuh Abiatha dah zaih lyis Mangso dah yhen khau mha wvng las, phudyei bang mas lai las zo das lyi ma bos, chixoeuq toh dah ohlhyoq lyis zo las, nyang yah dvgeh bang lyis eq dyei, ge.
41002027	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Yuda No Buisnyeis gas dius xiklyis kuot toh zis nghuot; dius gas Yuda No Buisnyeis xiklyis kuot toh zis ma nghuot.
41002028	Housoeh yvmvyah Cangsoeu Lo gas Yuda No Buisnyeis dah Yhensain nghuot, ge.
41003001	Nyang lyi jungs mas doms wvng loh lyis, houmha loq dvshot shei soeu dvyuk nyeis.
41003002	Nyamoq gas nyang lyis yoh kauq shoq, nyang Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis hauh soeu lhyi vgis los nhang dvluk, ge tsain zungh yoeuh nyeis.
41003003	Nyang gas hau loq shei soeu lhyi, Xikkhonh mas toq yap aq, ge.
41003004	Hou lho lha nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis gis cho kuot das zis, lyi bos lah, ma gis cho kuot das zis, lyi bos lah? Kang kyoeu gis lah, sat gis lah, ge nyei. Nyamoq samlo nyeis.
41003005	nyamoq nhaiqlom than yvmvyah nyang nhaiqkuk las, nhaiq yo zoh lyis yah zui lhaink yoeuh las hauh soeu lhyi taiq zis gas, Nah loq yhuonh kat aq, ge. Nyang loq yhuonh kat lyis, nyah loq gis los.
41003006	Hauh uhlyis Pharishe moq thuq loh las, nyang lyis khasoeh yoh mhont das cho, houjang Herodia moq yah xamgoh nyeis.
41003007	Yesu gas nyah changlo jens yah dvgeh Galile Thomh pheh loh lyis, Yuda mau yahge Galile mau mas dah dius phung zainsmuh nyah thang mha chank los.
41003008	Hauh uhlyis Yerusalem mas bang, Idumea yahge Yodan lvng thyitvp mas bang, Taire yahge Sidon wuxom mas bang somci moqmuh gas nyang kuot dah muh zains lyis xauhgyo las nyah jyank mas los.
41003009	Moqjens yah nyang lyis ma zangh nyhenh das xiklyis, nyah nyhenshang lhyik dvkoeuq sont toh dyei das xiklyis nyang nyah changlo jens lyis taiq.
41003010	Khasoeh ge lyis, nyang gas dius nyoshoq moq lyis gis los nhang yvmvyah, noslom yoh ya yoh bang gas, nyang lyis xauh tanh das xiklyis duon nyhenh los.
41003011	Yius jens eq nyang lyis nyvng lho lhyi nyah xikkhonh mas gyuis las kaiq zis gas, Nvng gas Mangso dah Lo nghuot, ge.
41003012	Nyang lyis gohtoeu dius jens lyis ma seq nhang das xiklyis nyang nyamoq lyis than than taiq toh.
41003013	Tsai, nyang hau boms mas doq loh las, nyang khi yoeus mes bang lyis khi lhyi, nyamoq eq nyah jyank mas los.
41003014	Housoeh las nyang gas, dvci aiq yuk lyis khyen lha lvgyo jens ge nyhink las toeuq kat toh. Nyamoq gas nyang yah dvgeh nyeis das xiklyis eq, loeus taiq hoeuh das xiklyis eq,
41003015	yius yoh khat tyamp dah vmingh yoh das xiklyis eq nghuot.
41003016	Petru ge nyhink dyei dah Simon.
41003017	Maujau dah lo jens ge vjyuk bos, Boanage ge nyhink dyei, Zebedi dah lo jens Yaku yahge Yaku dah vnoeuh Yohan.
41003018	Andre, Philip, Bartholomeu, Mathe, Thoma, Alphe dah lo Yaku, Thade, vnyau lyis jyet soeu Simon yahge,
41003019	Nyang lyis phanhlyen das Yudas Iskarot moq nghuot. Hauh thang lhyi nyang yhen pheh loh.
41003020	Moqjens nyah jyank mas doms los yvmvyah nyamoq wom zo das shishenh yangh ma tsain yoh.
41003021	Nyah dyenschangh jens hauh zis lyis xauhgyo lyis, nyamoq gas, Nyang lyis nyhik das ge los. Khasoeh ge lyis dius jens gas Yesu koh goeus, tsain ge.
41003022	Yerusalem masyah gyoh los dah maussauh lhaih bang eq, Nyang mas Bezebu bos, yius zau dah yomsoq yah nyang yius lyis khat tyamp, tsain ge.
41003023	Housoeh las nyang nyamoq lyis khi yoeus las dangtoeuq yah taiq zis gas, Satan ka Satan lyis khasoeh yoh khat tyamp das lah?
41003024	Munghdan dvkoeuq mas nyang changh nyang gang lvn, zan goh nghuot lyis gas, yoh goeng joq das zis ma nghuot.
41003025	Dvyhen khau mha dius eq, nyang changh nyang gang lvn, dyoqgoh lyis, hauh yhen ka yoh goeng joq das zis ma nghuot.
41003026	Houyah dvyhangteh, Satan ka vsainnyang changh zan goh lyis gas, nyang yoh goeng toenk das zis ma nghuot, thank dyuk das.
41003027	Yombos soeu lhyi shih cangxeih ma twih lyis gas, nyah yhen khau mha wvng las nyah zisyos lyis hank eq ma yoh thyoq yoeus; nyang lyis twih thang lhyi nyah yhen dvyoh thyoq das.
41003028	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, cangsoeu dius dah yaunos dvnganh zis yahge, nyamoq dah loeusmus soqzo dang vja ja lyis khyuot tyamp dyei das.
41003029	Nghuot laus eq, hau Gyingshang Dyos lyis loeusmus soqzo soeu hank laus eq yobos khyuot dyei zis khanhamp eq ma xauh, vcaiq vto yaunos dap soeu nghuot joq, ge.
41003030	Housoeh ge zis gas nyamoq yah nyang lyis, Yius kuq soeu ge taiq yvmvyah nghuot.
41003031	Nyah ungwes, nyah vwik jens gas nghe mha lyih yap las nyang lyis lui nhang kat.
41003032	Hauh uhlyis nyah vwi vyvm mas tsung toh dah dius jens nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, nah ungwes yahge nah vwik jens, nhamhmuh jens nghe mha yap las nvng lyis nyei nyeis, ge.
41003033	Nyang nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngah ungwes yahge ngah vwik jens gas hank nghuot goh lah, ge.
41003034	Nyang nyah yvm lhaink yah tsung toh bang lyis yoeuh lho lha taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, ngah ungwes yahge ngah vwik jens.
41003035	Mangso dah ehnyet chank bang hank laus eq, ngah vwik, ngah nhamhmuh, ngah ungwes tsain nghuot, ge.
41004001	Tsai, hau thomh yvm mas nyang doms jyauh xi loh lyis, moqjens nyah jyank mas zain huom los las nyang gas thomh mas lhyik dvkoeuq vkhau mha loh wvng tsung toh: moqjens gas thomh yvm tung yos mas nyeis.
41004002	Hauh uhlyis dangtoeuq yah nyoshoq ja jyauh uhlyis nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas:
41004003	Gyo yoeus geh. Jyo khyoq soeu ka jyo khyoq das ge thuq loh.
41004004	Sanh kat lyis dvkhamh gas chokhyoh mas gyoh las, hauh yvlyis nghoq jens yah lyih kui zo tyamp.
41004005	Gohtoeu dvkhamh gas tsoh ma thoeu dah lukjvp yos mas gyoh; tsoh ma thoeu yvmvyah dvdvm kyingh lyis yuk thuq los.
41004006	Nghuot laus eq vnyet ma yoh chent yvmvyah buis tso los lyis lhap nhe lha nyhauh tyamp.
41004007	Gohtoeu ka zoeu gyomh mas gyoh loh, zoeu zains yuk kuh los las hauh yvlyis huop tyamp yvmvyah vshih ma yoh shih.
41004008	Gohtoeu ka nyeisjvng gis yvmas gyoh las, yuk kuh bvng lainh zis yah vshih shih los las, somhci, khyukci, dvxo huon je los, ge.
41004009	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Gyo yoeus das no dap soeu ka xauhgyo bas jungh, ge.
41004010	Hauh thang lhyi nyang kyingh nyeis lyis, nyang yah dvgeh nghuot dah changlo dvci aiq yuk moq gas, hauh dangtoeuq cho nyang lyis nyei.
41004011	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Mangso munghdan dah nghop toh cho ka namoq lyis seq nhang goeus. Nghuot laus eq nghe pheh bang lyis gas dvnganh zis dangtoeuq yah dvchixoeuq.
41004012	nyamoq yoeuh laus eq ma nyvng, xauhgyo laus eq ma seqgyo. Housoeh ma nghuot lyis gas nyamoq Mangso jyank tauh los las yobos khyuot dyei zis xauh das.
41004013	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Haih dangtoeuq ma seqgyo goh lhyeh? Housoeh lyis gas dangtoeuq dvnganh yvlyis khasoeh seqgyo yoeus goh das lah?
41004014	Jyo khyoq soeu ka hauh dang lyis khyoq goeus.
41004015	Cho mas gyoh zis gas, hauh dang lyis sanh yah dvyih nyamoq xauhgyo zis lyis Satan lvnyap los las, nyamoq nhaiqlom mas sanh toh dah dang lyis yoeus tyamp zis nghuot.
41004016	Houyah dvyhangteh, hauh lukjvp yos mas sanh khyoq toh zis gas, hauh dang lyis xauhgyo yah dvyih gausyis zis yah lvnyap lhom yoeus bang nghuot.
41004017	Nghuot laus eq nyamoq mas vnyet ma chent joq yvmvyah, dvyoq dvyoh kham. Hauh thang lhyi hauh dang gvng mas, shanghsenh zis yahge shoeuhshih zis xauh los yah dvyih nyamoq lvnyap nungsdoms loh zis lyis ge.
41004018	Zoeu gyomh mas sanh kat toh goeu gas, hauh dang lyis xauhgyo laus eq,
41004019	Hauh maunyeis dah chiqjyen, zisyos mhuih jyomh cho yahge, nyoqnoq obos cho wvng los zis yah hauh dang lyis huop las vshih ma yoh shih bang nghuot.
41004020	Tsai, nyeisjvng gis yvmas sanh toh bang gas, hauh dang lyis xauhgyo zis yah lhom yoeus las vshih shih las somhci, khyukci, dvxo huon jebais los bang nghuot, ge.
41004021	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Nyibung lyis tuonh las dang theh mas, jungjeis mas tuonh das ge gyangh yoeus los lhyeh? Nyibung gus mas kih das ge dvgyangh yoeus los ma nghuot lhyeh?
41004022	Khasoeh ge lyis, nghop shung toh yvlyis dede Chixoeuq das. Nghop toh zis cha laus eq phank xoeuq das.
41004023	Gyo yoeus das no dap soeu ka xauhgyo bas jungh, ge.
41004024	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq cha xauhgyo yvlyis zaih geh: Namoq laiq dyei pan mhayah namoq lyis doms laiq dyei das: hauh thoq lyis lung dyei shih das.
41004025	Khasoeh ge lyis, yoh bang lyis lung dyei das; ma yoh bang jyank masyah gas nyamoq yoh joq zis yangh yoeus tyamp dyei das.
41004026	Tsai, nyang taiq zis gas, Mangso munghdan gas, nyeisjvng mas jyo sanh soeu teh nghuot.
41004027	Sanh toh las, nyang nyeih nyenh yhet, toq, kuot las nyau khasoeh yuk kuh los zis eq ma seq.
41004028	Nyeisjvng gas nyang pheh yah vshih shih los nhang lha, cangxeih lyis vnyuk, thang lhyi vnham, hauh thang lhyi vshih dap los nhang.
41004029	Vshih nyhink goeus ya jyo yhomh nyos jweh las, houjang hau banlyenh yah yet yoeus, ge.
41004030	Nyang doms taiq zis gas, Mangso munghdan cho lhyi cha yah yoh toeuq das lah? Dangtoeuq cha yah byi das lah?
41004031	Hauh zis gas anghwvng shih chvp teh nghuot joq. Nyeisjvng mas sanh khyoq lyis nyeisjvng thoq dah vshih dvnganh mas zes ngis laus eq,
41004032	Sanh kat thang lhyi yuk los las, anghnyaus phoqywi dvnganh thoq lyis kuh thank las, vko kuh thya los yvmvyah, mau dang nghoq jens hauh buisshen mha sot yoh sot, ge.
41004033	Housoeh dangtoeuq nyoshoq yah hauh dang cho nyamoq seqgyo nyhoq nyang nyamoq lyis taiq kyoh.
41004034	Dangtoeuq ma bos bos, nyang nyamoq lyis cha eq ma taiq kyoh. Nghuot laus eq nyamoq nyang kyingh nyeis lyis, nyah changlo jens lyis dang dvnganh dah vjyuk phant kyoh.
41004035	Hauh buisnyeis nyenhthang jweh lyis, nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Yang thyitvp pheh tsain goeu e goh, ge.
41004036	Nyamoq gas moqjens lyis toh khoq las Yesu tsung toh goeus dah lhyik khau mha wvng las nyang lyis shwih loh. Nyang yah dvgeh gohtoeu lhyik eq tsain bos shih.
41004037	Hauh uhlyis lyeismuh jyang toq los las, lhyik lyis jeisphauq bat yvmvyah hauh lhyik mas jeis dyingh los nyeis.
41004038	Nghuot laus eq nyang gas lhyik thang mha uhkhoeuq khoeuq las yhet joq: hauh uhlyis nyamoq gas, nyang lyis nhauh las taiq zis gas, Svra eh, ngamoq dyuk tyamp das zis lyis nvng ma bos chiq lhyeh, ge.
41004039	Nyang toq las lyeis lyis nyho lha, thomh lyis eq, Tsoeklo sam loh aq, ge. Housoeh las lyeis gas tam loh las sam goeus.
41004040	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq chamus tsain gyuk goh? Lomsjingh zis ma bos goh lah, ge.
41004041	Nyamoq svsoh mauh las, dvyuk yah dvyuk taiq goh zis gas, Haih soeu ka hank nghuot lah? Hau lyeis yahge thomh yangh nyah domsyos gyo, ge.
41005001	Gvshih nyamoq gas hauh thomh thyitvp, Gerasa mau mas jweh loh.
41005002	Nyang lhyik masyah thuq yah dvyih, yius kuq dah vbusbih dvyuk lop khyam mhayah thuq los las nyang yah xauhgoh.
41005003	Hauh soeu dah joqyos gas, lopkhyam nghuot las, nyang lyis hank eq ma yoh twih, shamjvng yah yangh ma yoh twih toh.
41005004	Khasoeh ge lyis nyang lyis kyomh yahge shamjvng yah nyoshoq lhain twih toh laus eq, nyang shamjvng lyis vdoeus doeus lang phaiq thyet tyamp las, nyang lyis yoh mhiq yoeus ko yom hank eq ma bos.
41005005	Nyeih nyenh vjangh yah hauh lopkhyam yahge boms mas nyeis las, kaiq zis yah nyang gungs nyang lukgoq mas vkhyamh khyamh lhyamh tyamp.
41005006	Yesu lyis we masyah nyvng kat lyis, nyang wuih loh las, nyang lyis dupaiq.
41005007	Nyang yomkat kaiq las taiq zis gas, Nyhang thank Mangso dah Lo Yesu eh, ngos nvng yah cha sen lah? Nvng ngos lyis ma shoeuhshih das xiklyis ngos nvng lyis Mangso nyings yah dung, ge.
41005008	Khasoeh ge lyis, nyang gas yius lyis, Yius nvng eh, haih soeu jyank masyah thuq loh aq, ge yvmvyah nghuot.
41005009	Yesu gas, Nah nyings cha nghuot, ge nyang lyis nyei. Nyang phuk taiq zis gas, Ngah nyings Nyoshoq nghuot: khasoeh ge lyis, ngamoq nyoshoq nghuot, ge.
41005010	Housoeh hauh joqyos masyah nyamoq lyis ma pont tyamp bas jungh, ge nyang lyis dung.
41005011	Gvshih hauh bauslhyoq mas wuq dvjens buot zo nyeis.
41005012	Housoeh las yius jens gas, Ngamoq lyis hauh wuq jens mas jenh wvng nhang aq, ge nyang lyis dung.
41005013	Nyang eq gyo las yius jens gas thuq las wuq jens mas wvng goeus ya, wuq jens gas hauh gammhung mhayah tyauq gyoh loh las thomh mas tsain ciang shei. Hauh wuq jens gas aiq khyoengh ko nghuot.
41005014	Wuq yoeuh bang gas, phang wuih loh las, hauh mau yahge wus mas, hauh cho tsain taiq kyoh lho lhyi, nyamoq cha mus loh zis lyis e tsain yoeuh.
41005015	Nyamoq Yesu jyank mas jweh lyis, yius nyoshoq kuq soeu ka, dyimis wuot las cha ma chah soeu teh dah ehnyet yah tsung toh yvlyis nyamoq nyvng yvmvyah gyuk.
41005016	Hauh cho nyvng bang eq, hauh yius kuq soeu yahge wuq jens mas khasoeh bweh zis lyis, nyamoq lyis tsain lhom taiq kyoh.
41005017	Housoeh las nyamoq gas, nyamoq dah wuxom masyah thuq loh das nyhenshang nyang lyis chomp sang.
41005018	Nyang lhyik mas wvng lyis, yius kuq soeu ka Yesu lyis, nyang yah dvgeh nyeis das xiklyis dung.
41005019	Yesu gas ma gyo, Nah yhen mha bang yahge nah dyenschangh jens jyank mas doms loh las hauh Yhensain nah xiklyis kha iq kuot dyei zis yahge, kha iq nhaiqnyen goeus zis lyis loh taiq kyoh aq, ge nyang lyis taiq kat.
41005020	Housoeh las, nyang thuq loh las Yesu nyah xiklyis kha iq kuot dyei yvlyis Dekapoli mau mas taiq hoeuh loh goeus las dvnganhmoq mauh.
41005021	Yesu gas lhyik yah thyitvp pheh doms goeu loh lyis, moqjens nyah jyank mas zain los. Nyang gas thomh yvm mas nyeis.
41005022	Yoeuh aq, lyi jungs uhjyung jens mas Yairu ge soeu jweh los las, nyang lyis nyvng lyis, nyah khyeiyang mas gyuis las,
41005023	Nyang lyis khyoeuq zis gas, Ngah lonyi lo shei bah ge loh goeus, nyang dwis nyeis bas jungh, nvng los las nyah thoq mas loq kih zis yah gis los nhang aq, ge.
41005024	Housoeh las nyang gas nyang yah dvgeh loh. Moqjens eq nyah thang mha chank yenh las, nyamoq gas nyang lyis zangh duon nyhenh.
41005025	Dvci aiq zvn suih shuon lha nos dah vmesbih dvyuk gas,
41005026	Lastsiang nyoshoq dah loq mas nyang yoh goeu dvnganh dye yhung laus eq cha eq ma gis, dvzes xungh xent los.
41005027	Nyang Yesu cho xauhgyo lyis, hauh dius puk mas loh las, nyah nungsthank dyithang mha tanh.
41005028	Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas, Nyah dyimis lyis khvlangh ngos xauh tanh ya ngos gis los das, ge.
41005029	Hauh uhlyis nyang suih shuon zis houjang doms tyamp las, nyah noslom gis los goeus zis lyis nyang sohseq.
41005030	Yesu gas nyang masyah yomsoq thuq loh zis, houjang nyah ehnyet mas soh yvmvyah, dius puk pheh lhain los uhjyangh, Ngah dyimis lyis hank tanh, ge taiq lho lhyi,
41005031	Nyah changlo jens nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Moqjens nvng lyis duon nyhenh los zis lyis nyvng las, Ngos lyis hank tanh, ge shih lhyeh, ge.
41005032	Nyang gas heisoeh hank kuot yvlyis nyvng das xiklyis zuilhaink lhain yoeuh nyeis.
41005033	Hauh vmesbih gas, nyang mas bweh dah cho lhyi seq yvmvyah, gyuk nvn zoh lyis yah los las nyah xikkhonh mas gyuis gyoh uhjyangh jyoengh nghuot cho dvnganh taiq kyoh.
41005034	Nyang gas, Ngah lonyi eh, nah lomsjingh zis gas nvng lyis gis los nhang goeus. Nyenstap zis yah loh aq, nah noslom gis los bas jungh, ge nyang lyis taiq.
41005035	Nyang taiq nyeis shih lyis, lyi jungs uhjyung dah yhen mha bang jweh los las, Nah lonyi shei goeus: hau svra lyis chamus thauqkhyi nyeis lo, ge.
41005036	Nghuot laus eq Yesu nyamoq dang lyis ma gyo, lyi jungs uhjyung lhyi taiq zis gas, Vchiq, loms kyingh dvloms aq, ge.
41005037	Yesu gas Petru, Yaku yahge Yaku dah vnoeuh Yohan mas lai las, gohyuk hank lyis eq nyah thang mha ma chank nhang.
41005038	Gvshih hau lyi jungs uhjyung dah yhen mha jweh lyis, dius wuhtoeng ge ngaus zis yahge shei uhngauh zis lyis nyang nyvng.
41005039	Nyang yhen mha wvng loh las, nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq chamus wuhtoeng ge ngausdyeis ngausnhvp mus nyeis goh lah? Loshang ka shei zis ma nghuot, dvyhet joq, ge.
41005040	Nyamoq gas nyang lyis jwangh. Nghuot laus eq nyang gas, dvnganh lyis nghe pheh dye thuq loh nhang lha, loshang dah ungwes uwus yahge nyang yah dvgeh nghuot bang lyis shwih lho lha, hau loshang lhain toh yvmas wvng loh.
41005041	Hauh uhlyis nyang gas, hau nyelo dah loq lyis zwi toh las, Nyelo eh, toq aq, ge.
41005042	Houjang hauh nyelo gas toq las suh loh. Nyah nyenhkyi ka dvci aiq zvn nghuot. Housoeh nyamoq svsoh mauh lhung thungh goeus.
41005043	Hauh muh dah cho hank eq ma seq bas jungh, nyang nyamoq lyis khyangh gvgis com toh las, nyelo lyis zonoms dyei das zis tying toh.
41006001	Yesu hou mhayah thuq las, nyah wus pheh loh. Nyah changlo jens eq nyah thang mha chank yenh.
41006002	Yuda No Buisnyeis jweh lyis, lyi jungs mas nyang jyauh zoh loh. Nyah dang xauhgyo bang nyoshoq gyo mauh las taiq zis gas, Haih dius yuk heinyhoq zis khalhye yah yoh au lhyeh? Nyang lyis dyei toh joeui cha nghuot au? Nyah loq yah yomzains muh kuot nyeis nyvng!
41006003	Nyang gas hau soehfuh ma nghuot lhyeh? Mari dah lo, Yaku, Yosep, Yuda yahge Simon yahge Yuda moq dah vmang eq nyang nghuot ma nghuot lhyeh? Nyah nhamhmuh jens eq heimha yang yah dvgeh nyeis ma nghuot lhyeh, ge. Nyamoq gas nyang lyis ehnyet lainszo gus bweh.
41006004	Nghuot laus eq Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Lvpe ka, vsainnyang mau, buisnoms yahge yhen mhayah lai las nyoqnho ngelang ma yoh zis ma bos, ge.
41006005	Nos bang dvyhamh thoq mas loq kih dyei las nyamoq lyis gis los nhang thoq lyis lai las, nyang hauh yvmas gohtoeu chah yomsoq zains muhzoh eq ma yoh kuot.
41006006	Nyamoq dah ma lomsjingh ehnyet gvng mas, nyang mauh nyeis. Hauh thang lhyi vyvm vwi mas dah wukhau mha nyang loh jyauh.
41006007	Nyang hau changlo dvci aiq yuk lyis khi yoeus las, dvzomh dvzomh lyis nhang kat las, yius lyis yoh ung das toeuh dyei.
41006008	Lhamloq masyah gohtoeu gyung cho xiklyis ohlhyoq eq, bvtmuh eq, dyilhunk mas ngwis eq ma chi das xiklyis jyauh kat.
41006009	Nghuot laus eq thyvkoq koq las, thoq dyi eq aiq dung vwuot loh goh.
41006010	Hauh thoq lyis, namoq kha yhen mha nghuot laus eq wvng goeus ya, hauh joqyos masyah thuq loh shishenh jweh shoq houmha nyeis geh.
41006011	Hank laus eq namoq lyis ma lhom yoeus las namoq dang ma gyo yoeus lyis gas, hou mhayah thuq loh uhjyangh nyamoq xikkhonh mas kanghjyoeng duot das xiklyis, namoq khyeiwu mas dap dah phvlhau lhyi ko khyoq toh khoq geh, ge kat.
41006012	Housoeh nyamoq thuq loh las, dius nhaiqlom thaiq das cho tsain taiq hoeuh.
41006013	Nyamoq yius nyoshoq lyis eq khat tyamp zis yahge, nos bang nyoshoq lyis coeu juot dyei las lhoq gis dyei.
41006014	Nyah dah nyings hoeuh zis lyis hwankti Herod xauhgyo. Dvyhamh taiq lyis Jeisnyhop dyei soeu Yohan gas, shei masyah dwis toq kat zis xauh goeus; housoeh las hauh muh yoh kuot, ge.
41006015	Gohyhamh bang gas, Nyang gas Eliya nghuot; gohyhamh bang gas, Gohlhain dah lvpe jens mas dah lvpe dvyuk nghuot, ge.
41006016	Nghuot laus eq Herod hauh zis xauhgyo lyis, Ngos uhloms thyet goeus dah Yohan ka shei masyah dwis toq los goeus, ge.
41006017	Khasoeh ge lyis, Herod gas nyah vnoeuh Philip dah yhensain nyhiq Herodia dah gvng mas, Yohan lyis nyhik nhang lha thung mha lhunk toh. Herod gas Herodia lyis nyihwank yoeus goeus yvmvyah,
41006018	Yohan gas Herod lyis, Nah vnoeuh dah yhensain nyhiq lyis yoeus zis gas lyi lhyweq cho nghuot, ge taiq.
41006019	Herodia gas Yohan lyis nhaiqnos las, nyang lyis sat mes, nghuot laus eq nyang lyis ma yoh sat.
41006020	Khasoeh ge lyis Yohan ka dan, gyingshang soeu eq nghuot yvlyis Herod seq yvmvyah, nyang lyis gyuk woms zis yah dvgeh gomh nyeis. Nyah dang xauhgyo khanghmuh nyah ehnyet mas zangh. Nghuot laus eq, nyah dang lyis gausyis zis yah gyo yoeus nyeis.
41006021	Shishenh doeus, Herod dah khoeu buisnyeis lyis, nyang gas nyah loeuzomh jens, jeszau jens yahge Galile mau mas dah mungh zau jens lyis nyenhcon daih nyeis lyis,
41006022	houmha Herodia dah lonyi wvng las goh xoeuq zis yah Herod yahge nyang yah dvgeh tsung toh bang lyis nhaiqtap nhang. Housoeh las hwankti ka, hau lonyi lo lyis, Nvng cha o zis sang aq, ngos nvng lyis dyei das, ge taiq.
41006023	Hauh thoq lyis, nvng ngos lyis sang ya sang zis ngah munghdan dvgohyih jweh shoq ngos nvng lyis dyei das, ge nyang lyis maukhi toh.
41006024	Hauh uhlyis nyang thuq loh las, nyah ungwes lyis, Ngos cha sang das lah, ge nyei. Nyah ungwes nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Jeisnyhop dyei soeu Yohan dah uhloms lyis sang aq, ge.
41006025	Houjang nyang hwankti jyank mas lvnyap wvng sang zis gas, Nvng ngos lyis gvshih nyang jeisnyhop Yohan dah uhloms lyis bvn masyah kat los dyei das zis ngos o, ge.
41006026	Hwankti ka svsoh nhaiqkuk laus eq, maukhi toh dang yahge nyah boenghwus jens gvng mas, nyang lyis ma womh he lo.
41006027	Houjang hwankti ka zungh dah jeslo dvyuk nhang lha Yohan dah uhloms lyis e yoeus das zis vmingh dyei kat lyis, nyang e lha thung mha Yohan dah uhloms lyis thyet goeus.
41006028	Hauh uhloms lyis bvn masyah yoeus los las hauh lonyi lo lyis dyei. Hauh lonyi lo eq nyah ungwes lyis dyei.
41006029	Nyah changlo jens hauh zis xauhgyo lyis, nyamoq e lha nyah mvng lyis yoeus las lopkhyung mha kat toh.
41006030	Hauh thang lhyi lvgyo jens gas Yesu jyank mas zain zop las, nyamoq kuot goeus dah cho dvnganh, jyauh cho dvnganh nyang lyis tsain taiq kyoh.
41006031	Housoeh las nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, sam joqyos mas namoq nyang dvdvm no yoeus geh: khasoeh ge lyis e los kuot bang nyo las, nyamoq gas wom zo das shishenh yangh ma yoh bos, ge.
41006032	Housoeh las nyamoq nyang kyingh lhyik yah sam joqyos pheh jhank loh.
41006033	Nghuot laus eq dius jens gas nyamoq thuq loh zis lyis nyvng. Nyoshoq moq eq nyamoq lyis seq las wus khanghmuh masyah khyei cho lvnyap loh las nyamoq xik mas wuih jweh loh.
41006034	Housoeh Yesu lhyik masyah thuq loh lyis moqjens lyis nyvng kat. Nyamoq gas yoeuh soeu ma bos dah yvng jens yah doeusgoh yvmvyah, nyang nyamoq lyis nhaiq yoeuh nyen. Housoeh nyang nyamoq lyis nyoshoq jyauh xi.
41006035	Nyenhthang lhyi nyah changlo jens nyah jyank mas los taiq zis gas, Haih zis gas mhanhdyvp nghuot, shishenh eq lai loh goeus.
41006036	Housoeh las moqjens lyis vyvm vwi wukhau mha zonoms loh wis bas jungh, nyamoq lyis nhang kat aq, ge.
41006037	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Nyamoq lyis namoq zonoms dyei geh, ge. Nyamoq taiq zis gas, Ngamoq ngwis kyvp aiq xo yah ohlhyoq loh wis tsoh das lah, ge.
41006038	Nyang nyamoq lyis doms taiq zis gas, Namoq ohlhyoq khanyhoq yoh goh lah, e xo yoeuh geh, ge. Nyamoq seq lho lhyi, Ohlhyoq oeng koeuq yahge oengdoq aiq doeu dvnghuot, ge.
41006039	Housoeh las dvnganhmoq gas, hauh mhanh nyaus pa mha nyang huom nyang tsain tsung bas jungh, ge nyang vmingh dyei.
41006040	Nyamoq gas dvxo xo, oengci ci mulas nyang jens nyang tsung toh.
41006041	Nyang hau ohlhyoq oeng koeuq yahge oengdoq aiq doeu yoeus chi lha, maukhung mha nghank yoeuh las shvmanh dung thang lhyi, ohlhyoq lyis khyiq las dius jens lyis gvm das nyhenshang nyah changlo jens lyis dyei. Hau oengdoq aiq doeu eq dvnganhmoq lyis gvm dyei.
41006042	Nyamoq dvnganhmoq zo jo.
41006043	Nyet dah ohlhyoq yahge oengdoq nyamoq kui tsainh lyis dvci aiq dang muis nghuot.
41006044	Ohlhyoq zo bang yuk gis goeu oeng khyoengh nghuot.
41006045	Nyang dius jens lyis pont nyeis uhlyis, houjang nyah changlo jens gas lhyik mas wvng las thyitvp Betsaida pheh loh das nyhenshang nhang kat.
41006046	Nyamoq lyis dye pont kat lho lhyi, nyang gas shvmanh dung das xiklyis boms pheh doq loh.
41006047	Nyenhthang jweh lyis, hauh lhyik gas thomh mas nghuot joq las, nyang kyingh tungyos mas nyeis khoq.
41006048	Nyoqnyvng zoh lyis nyang gas jeis thoq cho suh las lhyik lyis lai khoq das ge cvvq. Hauh uhlyis lyeis uh doeus las nyamoq lhyik zes yau nyeis yvlyis nyang nyvng.
41006049	Nghuot laus eq nyamoq gas nyang jeis thoq mas suh loh zis nyvng lyis sidyos nghuot soh bos ge nghamh las tsain kaiq.
41006050	Khasoeh ge lyis, dvnganhmoq nyang lyis nyvng las gyuk dvn. Houjang nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Yomhont geh, ngos dvnghuot, ma gyuk noh, ge.
41006051	Nyang gas nyamoq nyeis dah lhyik khau mha wvng goeus ya, lyeis eq tam loh yvmvyah nyamoq ma thoq taiq lo shoq mauh.
41006052	Nyamoq dah nhaiqlom than zis gas, ohlhyoq yah sen dah yomsoq muh lyis nyamoq ma seqgyo yvmvyah nghuot.
41006053	Nyamoq thyitvp pheh dap loh lyis Genesaret mau mas jweh loh las lhyik lyis twih toh.
41006054	nyamoq lhyik masyah thuq loh yah dvyih dius jens gas nyang lyis seq las,
41006055	hauh wuxom gonh tsain wuih las nyamoq, nyang kha thaq nyeis ge zis xauhgyo yvmas, nos bang lyis thyangh nyhoeuh masyah dvng e.
41006056	Hauh thoq lyis wukhau, wugungs, mhanhdyvp wukhau, kaih mas eq nyang wvng loh lyis noslom vja ja zis yah nos bang gas, houmha shwih toh yvmvyah, nyah dyithang lhyi khvlangh xauh tanh das xiklyis nyang lyis dung. Nyang lyis xauh tanh bang dvnganh gis los.
41007001	Housoeh Pharishe moq yahge Yerusalem masyah los dah maussauh lhaih bang dvyhamh nyah jyank mas zop los.
41007002	Housoeh changlo jens dvyhamh loq ma cheih, ma lhoq ma shang zis yah ohlhyoq zo yvlyis nyamoq nyvng.
41007003	Khasoeh ge lyis Pharishe yahge Yuda jens dvnganh gas, nyamoq logis jens thungh chank las, loq ma cheih lyis ohlhyoq ma zo.
41007004	Kaih masyah los lyis eq lyi yah dvyhangteh nyamoq gungs ma cheih lyis gas ma zo. Hauh thoq lyis kom, auh, thunk khuq lyis cheih zis yahge gohtoeu eq nyamoq chank zis bos shih.
41007005	Housoeh las Pharishe yahge maussauh lhaih bang nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Nah changlo jens gas chamus logis jens dah thungh lyis ma chank, loq ma cheih wom zo goh lah, ge.
41007006	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Gis guons kuot bang eh, namoq yah sen lha Esaia pe khoq zis lyis lhaih toh zis gas, Haih dius jens dah nhuot yah ngos lyis phauh nyang laus eq, Nyamoq dah nhaiqlom gas ngos yah we goh joq.
41007007	Dius dah tyingtoh dang lyis kyingh vgungs toh las jyauh chah yhangteh jyauh nyeis yvmvyah, nyamoq ngos lyis paiq zis gas vkom dvnghuot, ge.
41007008	Namoq gas Mangso dah tyingtoh dang lyis nungsyos toh las, khuq auh cheih yhangteh dius dah thungh lyis kyingh tsain chank nyeis.
41007009	Housoeh yvmvyah nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq dah thungh chank das xiklyis Mangso dah tyingtoh dang lyis gas peq toh nyvng!
41007010	Moshe taiq zis gas, Ungwes uwus lyis phauh nyang aq, ungwes uwus lyis ma gis zis taiq soeu ka shei nyang shei bas jungh, ge.
41007011	Nghuot laus eq namoq taiq zis gas, Dius dvyuk nyah ungwes uwus lyis, Ngah jyank masyah nvng xauh yoeus das vyhang ka, phudyei jyungshuk kuot goeus ya cha ma chah lo ge,
41007012	Nyah ungwes uwus lyis pangh das nyhenshang namoq tomp toh.
41007013	Housoeh namoq jyauh dah thungh gvng mas, Mangso dah dang lyis tsain peq toh. Housoeh teh zis namoq nyoshoq kuot, ge.
41007014	Housoeh nyang moqjens lyis doms khi lha taiq zis gas, Namoq dvnganhmoq ngah dang gyo yoeus las seqgyo geh.
41007015	Nghe mhayah dius dah vkhau mha wvng los dah vyhang ka, nyang lyis vwot v-oeu yoh bweh nhang zis ma nghuot. Dius dah vkhau mhayah thuq los zis gas vwot v-oeu bweh nhang.
41007016	Gyo yoeus das no dap soeu ka xauhgyo bas jungh, ge.
41007017	Moqjens masyah yvpkhau mha wvng loh thang lhyi, nyah changlo jens gas hauh dangtoeuq lyis doms nyei.
41007018	Housoeh las nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Nghe mhayah dius dah vkhau mha wvng los zis cha laus eq dius lyis vwot v-oeu kuot zis ma nghuot. Namoq eq seq cho ma bos.
41007019	Khasoeh ge lyis, zonoms gas nhaiqlom khau mha wvng loh zis ma nghuot, womdau khau mha wvng loh thang lhyi nghe pheh thuq loh ma nghuot lhyeh? Housoeh nyang gas zonoms dvnganh gas lhoqshang ge taiq hoeuh.
41007020	Dius jyank masyah thuq los zis gas dius lyis vwot v-oeu kuot.
41007021	Khasoeh ge lyis dius dah ehnyet khau mhayah ma gis zis nghamh thuq los zis gas, nyi shuot lvng shuot, yauxi, dius sat,
41007022	khauh, nyoqnoq, ung lhung, chuq, nyoqjvng ma nyaus wotwu, noh, loeusmus soqzo, khwank zis yahge vkoh vbang zis nghuot.
41007023	Hai ma gis zis dvnganh gas vkhau mhayah thuq los las dius lyis vwot v-oeu bweh nhang, ge.
41007024	Nyang hou mhayah toq loh las Taire mau mas jweh loh. Nyang yhen khau mha wvng loh zis lyis hank lyis eq ma seq nhang mes laus eq nyang ma yoh tamh.
41007025	Yius kuq dah nyelo yoh dah vmesbih dvyuk gas, nyah cho xauhgyo yvmvyah, nyang houjang nyah khyeiyang mas lyih gyuis las,
41007026	Nyah lonyi jyank mas dah yius khat tyamp dyei das xiklyis dung nyeis. Hauh vmesbih gas Heleni dius Sirophoni vnyau nghuot.
41007027	Nghuot laus eq Yesu hauh vmesbih lyis taiq zis gas, Loshang jens shih cangxeih zo jo bas jungh: khasoeh ge lyis loshang jens dah zonoms lyis yoeus las lvkhuih jens lyis doeuh dyei zis gas ma doeus, ge.
41007028	Hauh vmesbih nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Nghuot goeus Yhensain eh, kihgus jeis mas dah lvkhuih eq loshang jens dah zopop kui zo, ge.
41007029	Nyang hauh vmesbih lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng heisoeh taiq gvng mas, Loh aq, yius gas nah lonyi jyank masyah thuq loh goeus, ge.
41007030	Hou mhayah nyang yhen mha doms jweh loh lyis, nyah lonyi lo yius ma bos lo, yhetyos mas lhain toh zis lyis nyvng.
41007031	Taire wuxom mhayah thuq loh lyis Sidon masyah lai dyet loh las Dekapoli wuxom cho lai loh lyis Galile thomh mas jweh loh.
41007032	Houmha nyamoq gas nojet las o twih soeu lhyi nyah jyank mas tsain shwih lyih las, nyah thoq mas loq kih dyei das xiklyis tsain dung.
41007033	Moqjens masyah nyang lyis shwih thuq loh las, nyah nokhyung khau mha Yesu dah loq nyhauh jauh kat dyei zis yahge svkanh dyeh las nyah lhyo lhyi eq tanh dyei.
41007034	Nyang maukhung mha nghank yoeuh zis yah, soqmuh nyhank las nyang lyis Ephatha, ge taiq. Hauh zis gas, Bangh los aq, ge zis nghuot.
41007035	Houjang nyah no bangh los, lhyo twih zis eq buis loh las, nyang khyangh khyangh yoh taiq.
41007036	Hauh cho hank lyis eq ma taiq kyoh bas jungh, ge nyang nyamoq lyis khyangh com kat laus eq, zes com kat zes taiq kyoh loh.
41007037	Nyamoq svsoh mauh zis yah, Nojet bang lyis xauhgyo los nhang, dang ma yoh jis bang lyis dang yoh jis los nhang lha, dvnganh zis lyis gis shoq yoh kuot dyei, ge tsain taiq.
41008001	Hauh buisnyeis gyo lyis moqjens zain huom nyeis las zonoms cha eq ma yoh las, Yesu gas nyah changlo jens lyis khi lha taiq zis gas,
41008002	Ngos haih moqjens lyis nhaiqnyen: khasoeh ge lyis, nyamoq ngos yah nyeis zis gvshih somh nyeih nyangh goeus, nyamoq zo das zis cha eq ma yoh.
41008003	Ngos nyamoq lyis yhen pheh wom yuot zis yah pont kat lyis, cholvt mas yuot lhyauh shangh das, khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq dvyhamh gas mau we masyah zis nghuot, ge.
41008004	Nyah changlo jens nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Mhanhdyvp mas heinyhoq moq xiklyis ohlhyoq khalhye yah yoh thoq luk das lah, ge.
41008005	Nyang nyamoq lyis, Ohlhyoq khanyhoq yoh goh lah, ge lyis, Nyhet koeuq yoh, ge.
41008006	Housoeh las dius jens lyis nyeisjvng mas tsung das xiklyis taiq las, hau ohlhyoq nyhet koeuq yoeus chi lha jyehjuh chungh thang lhyi khyiq las, gvm das xiklyis nyah changlo jens lyis dyei. Nyamoq eq moqjens lyis gvm dyei.
41008007	Nyamoq oengdoq mhauhlo dvtsiq tsain yoh yvlyis eq nyang shvmanh lho lha, nyamoq xikkhonh mas toh dyei das xiklyis vmingh dyei.
41008008	Housoeh nyamoq zo jo thang lhyi, nyet dah vpop vsop kui tsainh lyis nyhet dang muis nghuot.
41008009	Nyamoq zo bang nyei khyoengh ko nghuot. Hauh thang lhyi nyang nyamoq lyis pont kat.
41008010	Houjang nyang nyah changlo jens yah dvgeh lhyik khau mha wvng las, Dalmanutha wuxom mha jweh loh.
41008011	Hauh uhlyis Pharishe moq thuq los las nyang yah taiq phyen-goh las nyang lyis shiwu zoh lyis maukhung mha dah vlho dvkoeuq sang.
41008012	Housoeh nyang soqmuh nyhank las taiq zis gas, Dius haq caiq mas dah bang chamus vlho tsain xo au lhyeh? Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, haq caiq lyis vlho cha eq ma dyei das, ge.
41008013	Nyang nyamoq lyis toh khoq las lhyik khau mha doms wvng zis yah thyitvp pheh goeu loh.
41008014	Changlo jens ohlhyoq wons los das zis tohnyhik khoq las, chont khau mha ohlhyoq dvkoeuq kyingh dvbos joq.
41008015	Nyang nyamoq lyis jyauhhuh kat zis gas, Pharishe jens yahge Herod dah bicheih lyis zaih geh, ge.
41008016	Housoeh nyamoq nyang changh taiq goh zis gas, Yang ohlhyoq ma tsain wons yvmvyah nghuot, ge.
41008017	Yesu hauh yvlyis seq las nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq ohlhyoq ma wons cho lhyi chamus taiq goh nyeis lah? Namoq ma seqgyo shih goh lhyeh? Namoq dah ehnyet dvtsain than joq shih goh lhyeh?
41008018	Nyoqjeih dap las ma nyvng goh lhyeh, no dap las ma xauhgyo lhyeh? Namoq ma comh goh lhyeh?
41008019	Ngos dius oeng khyoengh xiklyis ohlhyoq oeng koeuq lyis khyiq las tsoh thang lhyi, namoq vpop vsop khanyhoq dang yoh kui goh lah, ge. Nyamoq taiq zis gas, Dvci aiq dang, ge.
41008020	Dius nyei khyoengh lyis ohlhyoq nyhet koeuq yah tsoh thang lhyi, namoq khanyhoq dang dyingh shoq yoh kui goh lah, ge. Nyamoq taiq zis gas, Nyhet dang, ge.
41008021	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq ma seqgyo shih goh lah, ge.
41008022	Nyamoq Betsaida mas jweh loh lyis, nyamoq gas nyoqjet dah yukgis dvyuk nyah jyank mas shwih lyih las, tanh dyei das xiklyis nyang lyis dung.
41008023	Nyang gas nyoqjet soeu lhyi loq masyah wus nghe pheh she thuq loh las, nyah nyoq mas svkanh taiqh lho lha, nyah thoq mas loq kih uhlyis yah, Nvng dvja ja lyis vnyvng lah, ge nyang lyis nyei.
41008024	Nyang nghank yoeuh las taiq zis gas, Ngos dius jens lyis saiqzains suh loh yhangteh nyvng, ge.
41008025	Hauh thang lhyi nyoq mas nyah loq kih toh las, hauh soeu lhyi nghank yoeuh nhang lhyi, nyah nyoqjeih doms gis los las dius yuk khanghmuh lyis dede nyvng.
41008026	Yesu gas, nyang lyis nyah yhen mha nhang kat uhlyis yah taiq kat zis gas, Wukhau mha vwvng loh, ge.
41008027	Hauh thang lhyi Yesu yahge nyah changlo jens gas Kesare Philipi wus mas wvng loh lyis, cho mha nyah changlo jens lyis nyei zis gas, Dius jens ngos lyis hank nghuot ge goh lah, ge.
41008028	Nyamoq nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Jeisnyhop dyei soeu Yohan; dvyhamh gas Eliya; gohtoeu dvyhamh gas, Lvpe dvyuk yuk nghuot, ge.
41008029	Nyang nyamoq lyis, Namoq gas ngos lyis hank nghuot oen goh lah, ge. Petru phuk taiq zis gas, Nvng gas Khristu nghuot, ge.
41008030	Nyah cho hank lyis eq ma taiq das xiklyis nyang nyamoq lyis khyangh wontang com toh.
41008031	Hauh thang lhyi Cangsoeu Lo gas shanghsenh zis nyoshoq xauh las, logis jens, phudyei uhjyung jens yahge maussauh lhaih bang yah peq tyamp las, sat zis xauh das, somh nyeih thang lhyi dwis toq los das cho nyang nyamoq lyis jyauh xi loh.
41008032	Nyang hauh dang lyis debangh taiq. Housoeh Petru gas nyang lyis khi yoeus las nyho.
41008033	Nyang nyah changlo jens lyis lhain yoeuh las, Petru lyis nyho zis gas, Satan eh, ngah nungsthank pheh jik loh aq: nvng gas Mangso shot pheh yah ma nghamh, dius shot pheh yah dvnghamh, ge.
41008034	Nyang nyah changlo jens yahge moqjens lyis khi yoeus las taiq zis gas, Dvyuk yuk ngah thang chank soeu duot mes lyis gas, nyah gungs lyis nungsyos toh, nyah tapzains wuq las ngah thang mha chank bas jungh, ge.
41008035	Khasoeh ge lyis vsainnyang kang lhyi khyuot yoeus mes soeu ka, kang dyuk das. Nghuot laus eq ngah nyhenshang yahge gausyis dang gvng mas kang dyuk soeu ka kang yoh das.
41008036	Cangsoeu dius gas mungkvn gonh lyis sain toh laus eq nyah kang dyuk tyamp lyis gas chah vkyuh bos lah?
41008037	Cangsoeu dius gas nyah kang lhyi cha yah yoh thaiq yoeus das lah?
41008038	Hai nyi shuot lvng shuot las yaunos dap dah caiq mas, ngos yahge ngah dang lyis xoq lyis gas, Cangsoeu Lo gas nyah Uwus dah phunk khau mha hauh gyingshang loeuswons bang yah jweh lyih lyis, nyang eq hauh soeu lhyi xoq das, ge.
41009001	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, houmha yap joq bang dvyhamh, Mangso munghdan gas yomsoq yah jweh lyih zis lyis nyvng shoq shei zis ma bos das, ge.
41009002	Khyuk nyeih thang lhyi Yesu gas Petru, Yaku, Yohan moq lyis shwih las nyamoq nyang kyingh boms nyhang thoq mas doq loh; hauh uhlyis nyamoq dah xikkhonh mas nyang vwot thaiq los.
41009003	Nyah dyi eq thyoeu lha kyi kyi bvng: nyeisjvng thoq mas hou iq yoh cauh thyoeu zis hank eq ma bos.
41009004	Yesu yah jis goh nyeis dah Moshe yahge Eliya eq nyamoq lyis nyvng xoeuq.
41009005	Petru Yesu lyis taiq zis gas, Svra eh, heimha yang nyeis das zis gis, yang zvng somh koeuq kuot goh; nah nyhenshang dvkoeuq, Moshe nyhenshang dvkoeuq, Eliya nyhenshang dvkoeuq nghuot bas jungh, ge.
41009006	Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gyuk nyeis yvmvyah, nyang cha taiq das zis ma seq lo.
41009007	Hauh uhlyis jyommauh yah nyamoq lyis nghop gos las, hauh jyommauh khau mhayah thwe dvkoeuq taiq thuq los zis gas, Haih soeu ka ngos jyetdap, ngah Lo nghuot, nyah dang gyo geh, ge.
41009008	Vyvm vwi mas nyamoq nyetlos nyettant yoeuh kat lyis Yesu yahge nyamoq nyang masyah lai las gohtoeu hank lyis eq ma nyvng lo.
41009009	Gvshih nyamoq boms masyah doms gyoh los lyis, Cangsoeu Lo gas shei masyah ma dwis toq los dvchank, nyamoq nyvng zis hank lyis eq ma taiq kyoh das xiklyis nyang nyamoq lyis khyangh com toh.
41009010	Nyamoq hauh dang lyis gyo chi lha, shei masyah dwis toq los das ge zis gas, cha lhyi ge au, ge nyang changh nyang nyei goh nyeis.
41009011	nyamoq, nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Maussauh lhaih bang gas, chamus Eliya shih cangxeih los chah, ge taiq au lhyeh, ge.
41009012	Nyang nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Eliya jyoengh nyang cangxeih jweh los las dvnganh zis lyis soq kuot toh goeus. Cangsoeu Lo eq shanghsenh zis nyoshoq xauh las ma phauh ma danh kuot zis xauh das cho lhaih toh ma nghuot lhyeh, ge.
41009013	Nghuot laus eq ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, Eliya gas los goeus. Nyah cho lhyi lhaih toh zis yah dvyhangteh, nyang lyis nyamoq o khyvlyis kuot goeus, ge.
41009014	Changlo jens jyank mas jweh loh lyis, nyamoq dah vyvm mas moqjens zainsmuh tsain nyeis las, maussauh lhaih bang nyamoq yah taiq phyen-goh nyeis zis lyis nyvng.
41009015	Houjang dius dvnganhmoq nyang lyis nyvng kat lho lhyi, svsoh mauh zis yah nyang lyis lyih tsain wuih zes langh.
41009016	Nyang nyamoq lyis nyei zis gas, Namoq nyamoq yah cha taiq phyen-goh nyeis lah, ge.
41009017	Moqjens mas dvyuk nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Svra eh, nhuotjet yius kuq dah ngah lo lyis, ngos nah jyank mas shwih lyih.
41009018	Nyang lyis kuq los goeus ya, khamha eq nyang lyis nyeisjvng mas she lhain lha, nyop vdoe doe zwis khih chap las gyi lang loh. Housoeh las yius khat thuq dyei bas jungh oen ngos nah changlo jens lyis taiq laus eq, nyamoq ma yoh khat thuq dyei, ge.
41009019	Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Lomsjingh cho ma bos dah caiq mas bang eh, ngos namoq yah dvgeh khanyhank jweh shoq xauh nyeis das lah? Ngos namoq lyis khanyhank jweh shoq jhen chah das lah? Nyang lyis ngah jyank mas shwih los aq, ge.
41009020	Housoeh las nyamoq gas nyang lyis nyah jyank mas shwih los. Yius gas Yesu lyis nyvng yah dvyih loshang lhyi chuot nhang lha, nyang nyeisjvng mas lains loeu las nhuot mas nyop vdoe doe mus nyeis.
41009021	Housoeh las nyang gas nyah uwus lyis taiq zis gas, Nyang heisoeh mus zis khanyhank nyangh goeus lah, ge. Nyang gas, Loshang lhyi yah nghuot goeus.
41009022	Nyang lyis mhont tyamp das zis ge nyi mas eq, jeis mas eq vlhain lhain doeuh kat goeus; nghuot laus eq nvng yoh kuot nghuot lyis gas nhaiqnyen las ngah phvtang lhyi bos jenh pangh aq, ge.
41009023	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng yoh bweh lyis oen chamus sang! Lomsjingh soeu xiklyis dvnganh yah yoh bweh, ge.
41009024	Houjang yah loshang dah uwus gas kaiq las, Yhensain eh, ngos lomsjingh, ngos ma lomsjingh zis lyis bos pangh aq, ge.
41009025	Dius jens tsain wuih zain los yvlyis Yesu nyvng lyis, hauh yius lyis nyho zis gas, Nhuotjet, nojet yius nvng eh, ngos nvng lyis vmingh dyei bah, nyah jyank masyah thuq loh aq, khayhoq eq vdoms wvng loh lo, ge.
41009026	Yius eq kaiq las nyang lyis doms chuot nhang lha thuq loh. Nyang eq shei goeus teh nghuot las, dius nyoshoq moq gas, Nyang shei goeus, ge.
41009027	Nghuot laus eq Yesu nyah loq masyah she toq kat lho lhyi, nyang toq los.
41009028	Nyang yhen khau mha wvng loh lyis, nyah changlo jens nyang kyingh nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Ngamoq hauh yius lyis chamus ma yoh khat thuq au lhyeh, ge.
41009029	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Haih ja gas shvmanh dung zis yah kyingh dvyoh thuq loh nhang, ge.
41009030	Nyamoq hou mhayah thuq las Galile chank yah tsain loh lyis, nyang hank lyis eq ma mes seq nhang.
41009031	Khasoeh ge lyis Cangsoeu Lo lyis svbih loq mas phanhlyen dyei las nyamoq gas nyang lyis sat das, hauh thang lhyi somh vnyeih lyis nyang dwis toq das, ge nyah changlo jens lyis jyauh nyeis.
41009032	Nyamoq hauh cho ma seqgyo laus eq nyang lyis nyei das zis tsain gyuk.
41009033	Housoeh nyamoq gas Kaperna-um mas jweh loh. Yhen khau mha lungh joq uhlyis nyang nyamoq lyis nyei zis gas, Namoq cho mha cha lhyi taiq nyingh nyo goh lah, ge.
41009034	Nghuot laus eq nyamoq gas samlo nyeis: khasoeh ge lyis cho mha dvyuk yah dvyuk kuh thank zis hank nghuot, ge taiq nyingh nyo goh.
41009035	Housoeh nyang tsung uhlyis yah, nyah changlo dvci aiq yuk lyis khi yoeus las taiq zis gas, Namoq mas dvyuk yuk uhshe soeu duot mes lyis gas, dvnganhmoq dah thang chank soeu yahge dvnganhmoq dah jyeidwis duot chah, ge.
41009036	Nyang gas loshang dvyuk lyis nyamoq dah vgungs mas yap nhang toh: nyang lyis po lho lha, nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas,
41009037	Hank laus eq heisoeh teh dah loshang dvyuk lyis ngah nyings masyah lhom yoeus soeu ka, ngos lyis lhom yoeus zis nghuot. Ngos lyis lhom yoeus soeu hank laus eq ngos lyis lhom yoeus zis ma nghuot, ngos lyis nhang kat soeu lhyi lhom yoeus zis dvnghuot, ge.
41009038	Yohan nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Svra eh, ngamoq nah nyings yah yius khat thuq soeu dvyuk lyis nyvng: nyang gas ngamoq mas zis ma nghuot yvmvyah nyang lyis tomp toh, ge.
41009039	Nghuot laus eq Yesu gas, Nyang lyis vtomp toh goh: khasoeh ge lyis, ngos lyis ma gis zis taiq las ngah nyings mas yomsoq muh yoh kuot soeu hank eq ma bos.
41009040	Khasoeh ge lyis yang lyis tyi ma xo soeu ka yah shot pheh zis nghuot.
41009041	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, namoq gas Khristu yah sen yvmvyah namoq lyis jeis dvkom gvmshuk soeu hank laus eq, nyah khyik manh phauh dyuk das zis ma nghuot.
41009042	Ngos lyis lomsjingh dah haih ngis bang dvyuk yuk lyis yaunos kuot nhang soeu hank laus eq nyah lainzain mas mhoq shan tyaulhangh las thomh mas lhwih kat das zis gas nyah xiklyis zes gis.
41009043	Housoeh nah loq yah nvng lyis shuot nhang lhyi, hauh yvlyis thyet tyamp aq: Loq aiq shot dap las ma jom munyi thomh mas wvng das thoq lyis, loq dvshot kyingh yah kang dwis yvmas wvng das zis gas nah xiklyis zes gis.
41009044	Hauh munyi mas nyamoq dah luk ma shei, nyi eq ma yoh sat.
41009045	Nah khyei yah nvng lyis shuot nhang lhyi, hauh yvlyis thyet tyamp aq: khyei aiq khyei yah dap las munyi thomh mas wvng das thoq lyis khyei dung yah kang dwis yvmas wvng das zis gas nah xiklyis zes gis.
41009046	Hauh munyi mas nyamoq dah luk ma shei, nyi eq ma yoh sat.
41009047	Nah nyoqjeih yah nvng lyis shuot nhang lhyi, hauh yvlyis thuiq tyamp aq: nyoq aiq jeih yah munyi thomh mas khyoq kat zis xauh das thoq lyis nyoq dvjeih yah Mangso munghdan mas wvng das zis gas nah xiklyis zes gis.
41009048	Hauh munyi mas nyamoq dah luk ma shei, nyi eq ma yoh sat.
41009049	Khasoeh ge lyis lomhxangh dvnganh lyis coh cheih teh yuk khanghmuh lyis nyi yah phuot shang zis xauh das.
41009050	Coh gas gis, nghuot laus eq nyah dah ngvm zis bi tyamp goeus ya, khasoeh doms yoh ngvm nhang das lah? Namoq mas coh ngvm nhang lha, namoq nyang changh nyang nyenstap nyeis geh, ge.
41010001	Hou mhayah nyang toq las, Yodan lvng thyitvp Yuda wuxom mha jweh loh lyis moqjens nyah jyank mas doms zain los yvmvyah, nyang gyangh kuot vgus nyamoq lyis jyauh.
41010002	Housoeh Pharishe moq nyah jyank mas los las, nyang lyis shiwu zoh lyis nyei zis gas, Yhensain phoq gas yhensain nyhiq lyis she tyamp das zis lyi vbos lah, ge.
41010003	Nyang nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Moshe namoq lyis khasoeh ge tying toh lah, ge.
41010004	Nyamoq taiq zis gas, Kangh dah maussauh lhaih toh las, nyang lyis nhang kat das zis Moshe kuot nhang toh, ge.
41010005	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq nhaiqlom tsain than yvmvyah, Moshe haih lyi lhaih toh.
41010006	Nghuot laus eq, mauthuq nyeiszvn masyah Mangso ka vbusbih yahge vmesbih lyis gvnkhanh toh goeus.
41010007	Housoeh yvmvyah vbusbih gas nyah ungwes uwus lyis toh khoq zis yah, nyah yhensain nyhiq yah tsoq las,
41010008	nyah zomh gas gungsshoh dvkoeuq kyingh nghuot das. Housoeh nyah zomh gas aiq yuk ma nghuot, gungsshoh dvkoeuq dvnghuot lo.
41010009	Housoeh Mangso tsomp toh yvlyis dius yah ma kangh bas jungh, ge.
41010010	Yvpkhau mha tsain nyeis uhlyis changlo jens gas haih cho nyang lyis doms tsain nyei.
41010011	Housoeh las nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Hank laus eq nyah yhensain nyhiq lyis she tyamp las, gohtoeu dvyuk phoengh doms hwank lyis gas, nyang nyi shuot zis nghuot.
41010012	Housoeh vmesbih eq nyah yhensain phoq lyis she tyamp las, gohtoeu dvyuk yah phoengh doms wvng lyis gas, nyang lvng shuot zis nghuot, ge.
41010013	Loshang jens lyis tanh dyei bas jungh, ge nyamoq gas nyah jyank mas tsain shwih lyih. Nghuot laus eq changlo jens gas nyamoq lyis nyho.
41010014	Yesu hauh zis lyis nyvng lyis nhaiqyo las nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Loshang jens lyis ngah jyank mas los nhang geh, nyamoq lyis vtomp toh goh: khasoeh ge lyis Mangso munghdan gas housoeh teh bang dah xiklyis nghuot.
41010015	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, hank laus eq Mangso munghdan lyis loshang teh ma lhom yoeus soeu ka, nyang houmha ma xauh wvng loh das, ge.
41010016	Yesu loshang jens lyis po lha nyamoq thoq mas loq kih las shvmanh dyei.
41010017	Tsai nyang cho mha doms loh nyeis lyis dius dvyuk wuih los las, phvluk zomhgyuis zis yah nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Gis dah Svra eh, ngos vcaiq vto kang yoh das xiklyis cha kuot chah lah, ge.
41010018	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng ngos lyis chamus Gis soeu oen lui lah? Mangso mha lai las gis soeu dvyuk eq ma bos.
41010019	Lyi mas, nyi shuot lvng vshuot, dius vsat, vkhauh, ma ying kanghjyoeng vkat, v-an zo, nah ungwes uwus lyis phauh nyang aq, ge zis nvng seq toh goeus, ge.
41010020	Hauh soeu phuk taiq zis gas, Svra eh, hauh goeu dvnganh zis lyis ngos loyvm yoq lyis yah chank goeus, ge.
41010021	Yesu nyang lyis yoeuh uhlyis yah jyet las nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng dvja chah shih, nvng loh las nvng yoh ya yoh zis lyis ungh las nyungs bang lyis gvm dyei aq: housoeh lyis maukhung mha zisyos yoh das, housoeh nvng ngah thang mha chank los aq, ge.
41010022	Hauh dang khonh xauhgyo lyis nyang nyoqnho shen. Nyang nhaiqkuk zis yah loh lo: Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas zisyos nyoshoq yoh soeu nghuot.
41010023	Housoeh Yesu zuilhaink yah yoeuh lho lha nyah changlo jens lyis taiq zis gas, Yoh khuiq bang gas Mangso munghdan mas wvng das zis kha iq yau, ge.
41010024	Changlo jens gas nyah dang lyis tsain gyo mauh nyeis. Nghuot laus eq Yesu nyamoq lyis doms taiq zis gas, Loshang jens eh, Mangso munghdan mas wvng das zis kha iq yau!
41010025	Dis soeu ka Mangso munghdan mas wvng lwis thoq lyis gola-u gas nghvpnho mha lai das zis zes lwis, ge.
41010026	Nyamoq gas svsoh mauh las dvyuk yah dvyuk taiq goh zis gas, Housoeh lyis gas khyuot yoeus zis hank xauh das lah, ge.
41010027	Yesu nyamoq lyis yoeuh las taiq zis gas, Haih zis gas dius yah gas ma gis bweh, nghuot laus eq Mangso ka ma gis bweh zis ma nghuot: khasoeh ge lyis Mangso yomsoq gas dvnganh zis yoh bweh, ge.
41010028	Hauh uhlyis Petru nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, ngamoq gas vyhang dvnganh toh tyamp las nah thang mha chank los goeus, ge.
41010029	Yesu phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, hank laus eq ngos yahge hauh gausyis dang nyhenshang yhen, vmang vnoeuh, nhamhmuh jens, ungwes, uwus, yhensain nyhiq, lo jens, maunyeis yvsoh toh tyamp soeu ka,
41010030	shoeuhshih zis yah dvgeh, haq caiq mas yhen, vmang vnoeuh, nhamhmuh, ungwes, lo jens yahge maunyeis yvsoh dvxo huon yoh yoeus das, jweh los das caiq mas eq vcaiq vto kang yoh das.
41010031	Nghuot laus eq cangxeih bang nyoshoq gas thang thank nghuot das. Thang thank bang cangxeih nghuot das, ge.
41010032	Gvshih nyamoq gas Yerusalem pheh doq loh cho mha nghuot. Yesu gas nyamoq dah xik mas loh nyeis las nyamoq mauh. Nyah thang mha chank loh bang eq gyuk nyeis. Nyang gas changlo dvci aiq yuk lyis khi yoeus las nyang mas bweh das cho nyamoq lyis taiq kyoh zoh loh zis gas,
41010033	Yoeuh aq, yang Yerusalem pheh doq loh nyeis. Hau Cangsoeu Lo gas phudyei uhjyung jens yahge maussauh lhaih bang loq mas kyauh tyamp zis xauh das. Nyamoq gas nyang lyis shei das cho dang thang thyet las, nyang lyis gohnyau bang dah loq mas kyauh tyamp das.
41010034	Nyamoq gas nyang lyis jwangh, svkanh dyeh gyuon, lyuk las sat das. Somh vnyeih lyis nyang dwis toq das, ge.
41010035	Zebedi lotang Yaku yahge Yohan nyah jyank mas e sang zis gas, Svra eh, ngah zomh sang ya sang zis nvng ngah zomh lyis kuot dyei das yvlyis ngah zomh o, ge.
41010036	Nyang nyah zomh lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos nah zomh lyis cha kuot dyei das yvlyis o lah, ge.
41010037	Nyah zomh phuk taiq zis gas, Nah phunk nyoqnho yah hwankti tank mas tsung uhlyis ngah zomh lyis nah loqyos pheh dvyuk, loqwi pheh dvyuk tsung nhang aq, ge.
41010038	Nghuot laus eq Yesu nyah zomh lyis taiq zis gas, Nah zomh cha sang nyeis zis nah zomh nyang ma seq. Ngos shuk kom lhyi nah zomh yoh shuk das lhyeh? Ngos kham dah jeisnyhop cho lhyi eq nah zomh yoh kham das lah, ge.
41010039	Nyah zomh gas, Ngah zomh yoh kuot das, ge. Yesu nyah zomh lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos shuk kom lhyi nah zomh xauh shuk das; ngos kham dah jeisnyhop lyis eq xauh kham das.
41010040	Nghuot laus eq ngah loqwi loqyos mas yoh tsung das vmingh ngos ma yoh dyei. Houka sont toh dyei bang xiklyis dvnghuot, ge.
41010041	Hauh zis dvci yuk moq xauhgyo lyis, nyamoq gas Yaku yahge Yohan lyis nhaiq tsain yo.
41010042	Housoeh Yesu nyamoq lyis khi yoeus las taiq zis gas, Gohnyau lyis guon das bang gas, nyamoq dah thoq mas zau las, nyamoq mas kuh bang gas nyamoq thoq mas vmingh tsain bos yvlyis namoq seq.
41010043	Nghuot laus eq namoq mas gas housoeh ma gis nghuot; namoq mas uhjyung duot mes soeu hank laus eq namoq dah jyeidwis duot chah.
41010044	Namoq mas uhjyung duot mes soeu hank laus eq, dvnganhmoq dah jyeidwis duot bas jungh.
41010045	Khasoeh ge lyis, hau Cangsoeu Lo gas phuqsoe kham das xiklyis jweh los zis ma nghuot. Phuqsoe das zis yahge nyoshoq lyis khyuot yoeus das xiklyis, nyah kang dyei das zis dvjweh los, ge.
41010046	Nyamoq Yerikho wus mas jweh las nyang gas nyah changlo jens yahge dius moqjens yah dvgeh Yerikho masyah thuq loh lyis Timiu dah lo nyoqjet Batimiu gas choyvm mas tsung lha dung zo nyeis.
41010047	Nazaret phoq Yesu nghuot zis lyis xauhgyo lyis nyang kaiq las, Dawi dah Lo Yesu eh, ngos lyis nhaiqnyen aq, ge.
41010048	Nyang samlo nyeis das xiklyis nyoshoq moq nyang lyis tung toh, nghuot laus eq nyang gas zes kaiq las, Dawi dah Lo eh, ngos lyis nhaiqnyen aq, ge.
41010049	Yesu gas yap las, Nyang lyis khi los aq, ge. Housoeh las nyamoq gas hau nyoqjet soeu lhyi lui zoh lyis yah, Yomhuont aq, toq aq, nyang nvng lyis khi nyeis, ge.
41010050	Nyang gas nyah dyi khyuot lhwih tyamp lha Yesu jyank mas tsangh toq loh.
41010051	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos nvng lyis cha kuot dyei das zis o lah, ge. Nyoqjet soeu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Svra eh, ngah nyoq doms nyvng nhang aq, ge.
41010052	Yesu nyang lyis taiq, Suh loh aq, nah lomsjingh zis gas nvng lyis gis los nhang goeus, ge. Houjang yah nyah nyoq nyvng los las, gyung cho mhayah Yesu thang mha chank loh.
41011001	Gvshih nyamoq Yerusalem yahge Tsanlun boms nvm, Betphage yahge Bethani wukhau mha jweh los lyis, nyang nyah changlo aiq yuk lyis nhang lha taiq kat zis gas,
41011002	Nah aiq yuk xik mas dah wukhau mha loh geh: houmha wvng loh yah dvyih hank eq ma ji ku shih dah mauhlyihzoe lo twih toh zis lyis nah aiq yuk nyvng das: hauh yvlyis phui she los geh.
41011003	Dvyuk yuk nah aiq yuk lyis chamus housoeh kuot goh lah, ge nyei lyis nah aiq yuk gas, Yhensain hauh yvlyis yhung chah. Nyang hauh yvlyis lvnyap doms tauh dyei das oen geh, ge.
41011004	Nyah aiq yuk loh las choyvm khomh nghe pheh twih toh dah mauhlyihzoe lyis nyvng. Nyamoq hauh yvlyis phui nyeis lyis,
41011005	houmha yap joq bang dvyhamh gas, Nah aiq yuk hauh mauhlyihzoe lyis chamus phui goh lah, ge nyei.
41011006	Yesu nyah aiq yuk lyis vmingh dyei kat vgus nyamoq lyis tsain taiq. Housoeh las nyamoq gas nyah aiq yuk lyis yoeus nhang.
41011007	Hauh uhlyis nyah aiq yuk gas, hau mauhlyihzoe lyis Yesu jyank mas she loh las, hauh thoq mas nyamoq dah dyimis nyhoeuh las, nyang houmha ji.
41011008	Nyoshoqmoq eq nyamoq dah dyi yah cho mha tsain nyhoeuh dyei. Gohtoeu dvyhamh bang gas pa mha dah saiq kyang zan las cho mha nyhoeuh dyei.
41011009	Xik pheh loh bang yahge nungs pheh chank bang gas kaiq las, Mangso lhyi chungh goh! (Hosana!) Yhensain dah nyings mas jweh los soeu ka ngelhoq:
41011010	Yhensain nyings mas jweh los das dah yah Uwus Dawi dah munghdan gas ngelhoq: Nyhang thank Mangso lhyi chungh goh, ge.
41011011	Nyang Yerusalem mas wvng loh las, yhenmuh mas eq wvng loh. Vyhang dvnganh zis lyis dye yoeuh lyis mau chuot los las dvci aiq yuk yah dvgeh Bethani pheh thuq loh.
41011012	Nungs nvp nyamoq Bethani masyah thuq los lyis, nyang wom yuot.
41011013	Housoeh vhuq moengh joq dah maiphang dvzains lyis nyang we masyah nyvng kat las, houmha shih dvlom lom xauh yoeus mvbeh ge nghamh las loh. Houmha jweh lyis, maiphang shih shih nyos ma nghuot yvmvyah vhuq lyis kyingh dvnyvng.
41011014	Housoeh las Yesu hauh yvlyis, Hank khanhamp eq nah vshih ma doms zo lo bas jungh, ge. Nyah changlo jens eq hauh zis lyis xauhgyo.
41011015	Nyamoq Yerusalem mas jweh lyis, hau yhenmuh mas eq nyang wvng loh las hau yhenmuh khau mha kaih ungh kaih wis bang lyis khat thuq tyamp; ngwis thaiq bang dah kihgus yahge khotjyauh ungh bang dah tank lyis eq toeu phanh tyamp.
41011016	Nyang hau yhenmuh mas hank lyis khuq dvkhyvp eq ma chi lai nhang.
41011017	Nyang nyamoq lyis jyauh las taiq zis gas, Ngah yhen ka dius nyau khanghmuh shvmanh dung yhen, ge lui das ge lhaih toh ma nghuot lhyeh? Nghuot laus eq namoq gas hauh yvlyis khyanktau khyung tsain kuot, ge.
41011018	Maussauh lhaih bang yahge phudyei uhjyung jens hauh zis xauhgyo lyis, Yesu lyis sat das cho tsain xo. Khasoeh ge lyis dius dvnganhmoq gas nyang jyauh cho lhyi mauh yvmvyah nyamoq gas nyang lyis gyuk nyeis.
41011019	Nyensyo jweh los las wus nghe pheh thuq loh.
41011020	Nvpsangh lyis nyamoq suh lai loh lyis hau maiphang zains gas vnyet eq cheq kyuk joq yvlyis nyamoq nyvng.
41011021	Housoeh Petru nghamh soh los las nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Svra eh, yoeuh aq, nvng nhoengh dah maiphang zains gas kyuk tyamp goeus, ge.
41011022	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Mangso lhyi lomsjingh geh.
41011023	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, hank laus eq khamkhvv ehnyet ma bos bos vsainnyang taiq zis yah dvyhangteh bweh das, ge lomsjingh nghuot lyis gas haih boms lyis, Nvng ywi las thomh mas cheh wvng aq, ge lyis nvng taiq vgus bweh das.
41011024	Housoeh las ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, namoq o zis shvmanh dung lyis namoq yoh yoeus goeus oen loms lyis, namoq xauh yoeus das.
41011025	Shvmanh dung las yap joq uhlyis, dius dvyuk yuk nvng lyis dvja ja toq lhoq cu lhyi maukhung mha namoq dah Uwus gas namoq dah yobos lyis yoh khyuot tyamp dyei bas jungh, nyah yobos lyis khyuot dyei aq.
41011026	Namoq nyah yobos ma khyuot dyei lyis, maukhung mha namoq dah Uwus gas namoq yobos lyis ma khyuot dyei, ge.
41011027	Nyamoq gas Yerusalem mas doms jweh loh: nyang yhenmuh khau mha suh loh lyis, phudyei uhjyung jens, maussauh lhaih bang yahge logis jens nyah jyank mas jweh lyih las,
41011028	Nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng gas chah vmingh yah kuot? Nvng lyis haih vmingh hank dyei, ge.
41011029	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis dang dvkhonh nyei yoeuh bah, ngos lyis phuk taiq geh, housoeh lyis ngos chah vmingh yah heinyhoq zis kuot yvlyis ngos namoq lyis taiq kyoh das.
41011030	Yohan dah jeisnyhop cho ka maukhung mhayah nghuot lah? Dius masyah nghuot lah, ngos lyis taiq kyoh geh, ge.
41011031	Nyamoq gas nyang changh nyang taiq goh las, Maukhung mhayah nghuot oen yang taiq lyis gas, Housoeh lyis namoq nyang lyis chamus ma lomsjingh goh lah, ge das.
41011032	Nghuot laus eq yang nyang lyis dius masyah nghuot oen das lah? Nyamoq moqjens lyis gyuk: khasoeh ge lyis Yohan gas lvpe jyoengh nghuot zis lyis dvnganhmoq jingh, ge.
41011033	Housoeh las nyamoq gas Yesu lyis, Ngamoq ma seq, ge phuk taiq. Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos haih muh chah vmingh yah kuot zis namoq lyis ma taiq kyoh das, ge.
41012001	Nyang nyamoq lyis dangtoeuq yah taiq xi loh zis gas, Dius dvyuk zvbiq dvkhyam ba tsungh toh lho lha, yvmlhaink yah khyam kyamp las, zvbiq nyhet zwvng eq doeu toh. Tyoeuq zvm eq thung lho lha, khyam muh zwi bang lyis tsoeuh dyei khoq las we mau pheh loh.
41012002	Shishenh jweh lyis, khyam tsoeuh zwi bang jyank masyah zvbiq shih gvmboms xauh yoeus das xiklyis jyeidwis dvyuk lyis nhang kat.
41012003	Nyamoq gas nyang lyis nyhik yoeus, bat las gungskom nhang kat.
41012004	Nyang gohtoeu jyeidwis dvyuk lyis nyamoq jyank mas doms nhang kat. Nyamoq gas hauh soeu dah uhloms lyis bat las, xoq lhoeu phuh kat.
41012005	Tsai, nyang gohtoeu dvyuk doms nhang lhyi, nyamoq hauh soeu lhyi sat. Gohtoeu nyoshoq yuk lyis nhang kat lyis eq, nyamoq gas dvyhamh lyis bat pop, dvyhamh lyis sat.
41012006	Nyang jyetdap lo dvyuk nyeis shih: ngah lo lyis gas nyamoq phauh das ge nghamh las, thang thank lyis nyang lyis eq nyamoq jyank mas nhang kat.
41012007	Nghuot laus eq khyam kuot nyang changh taiq goh zis gas, Haih soeu ka yhenzis zom das soeu nghuot, los geh, nyang lyis sat goh. Housoeh lyis nyah yhenzis gas yah zis nghuot das, ge.
41012008	Housoeh nyamoq gas nyang lyis nyhik lho lha sat las, zvbiq khyam nghe pheh doeuh tyamp.
41012009	Housoeh yvmvyah zvbiq khyam sain ka, khasoeh kuot das lah? Nyang gas khyam tsoeuh zwi bang lyis los mhont las hauh zvbiq khyam gohyuk lyis dyei das.
41012010	Lhaihtoh dang mas, Yhen tsuk bang peq tyamp dah luklom gas Yhenthunk lukzains bweh los.
41012011	Haih zis gas Yhensain nyang kuot las, yah xikkhonh mas mauhphoh zis nghuot, ge zis lyis namoq ma nghap yoeuh goh lhyeh, ge.
41012012	Housoeh las nyamoq gas nyang lyis nyhik das zis tsain yomkat laus eq moqjens lyis gyuk: khasoeh ge lyis haih dangtoeuq gas, nyang nyamoq lyis toeuq las taiq yvlyis nyamoq seqgyo las, nyamoq gas nyang lyis toh khoq las thuq loh.
41012013	Nyah dang mas yobos xo lha nyang lyis nyhik das xiklyis, nyamoq gas Pharishe moq yahge Herodia ge bang dvyhamh lyis nyah jyank mas nhang kat.
41012014	Housoeh nyamoq jweh lyis taiq zis gas, Svra eh, nvng gas jyoeng zis nghuot las, hank lyis eq gungsyaus ma yaus, dius dah nyoqnho lhyi ma yoeuh, Mangso dah cho lhyi jyoeng khyvlyis jyauh nyeis zis gas ngamoq seq. Hwankti Kesar lyis khoengh kat das zis lyi bos lah, ma bos lah?
41012015	Ngamoq kat das au, ma kat das au, ge. Nghuot laus eq nyang gas yamoq dah ehnyet gis guons kuot zis seq las nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq ngos lyis chamus shi yoeuh goh lah? Hauh ngwis dvkyvp ngah jyank mas chi los geh, ngos yoeuh bah, ge.
41012016	Housoeh las nyamoq ngwis dvkyvp yoeus los lyis, nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Haih zis hank gungslho yahge maussauh dap lah, ge. Nyamoq gas, Kesar zis nghuot, ge.
41012017	Housoeh las Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Kesar zis nghuot lyis gas Kesar lyis dyei geh; Mangso zis nghuot lyis gas Mangso lhyi dyei geh, ge. Nyamoq gas nyang lyis svsoh tsain mauh.
41012018	Hauh thang lhyi, Dwis toq cho ma bos ge taiq dah Saduke moq nyah jyank mas los nyei zis gas,
41012019	Svra eh, Yhensain nyhiq bos dah vmang, lo ma bos khoq shei lhyi, vmang dah chauhmuh lyis vnoeuh shoeuh las vmang dah vshih tsoq bas jungh ge Moshe ngamoq lyis lhaih toh dyei.
41012020	Housoeh teh dah vmang vnoeuh moq nyhet yuk nyeis. Xik lyis dah vyuk gas phoengh hwank las nyau ma bos shei khoq.
41012021	Aiq vyuk chauhmuh shoeuh las lo ma bos shei khoq. Somh vyuk eq housoeh vgus nghuot.
41012022	Hau nyhet yuk gonh nyang lyis shoeuh laus eq lo ma bos. Thang thank lyis hauh vmesbih eq shei loh.
41012023	Gvshih hau dwis toq los uhlyis, nyang gas hank dah yhensain nyhiq nghuot das lah? Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas nyhet yuk moq yah phoengh wvng goeus, ge.
41012024	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Namoq lhaihtoh dang lyis ma seq, Mangso dah yomsoq cho lhyi eq ma seq yvmvyah shuot nyeis ma nghuot lhyeh?
41012025	Shei bang dwis toq lyis, nyamoq nyi hwank zis ma bos: lonyi dyeizo zis eq ma bos nyamoq gas maukhung mha loeuswons bang teh dvnghuot lo.
41012026	Hauh thoq lyis shei bang dwis toq los das cho yah sen lha, hauh mhanhgyomh mas Mangso ka, Ngos gas Abraham dah Mangso, Isak dah Mangso, Yakop dah Mangso nghuot, ge Moshe lhyi taiq toh dang lyis Moshe dah maussauh mas namoq ma nghap yoeuh goh lhyeh?
41012027	Nyang gas shei bang dah Mangso ma nghuot, dwis bang dah Mangso dvnghuot. Housoeh yvmvyah namoq svsoh shuot goeus, ge.
41012028	Maussauh lhaih bang mas dvyuk los las nyamoq taiq phyen-goh yvlyis xauhgyo zis yahge nyang vlhomuh phuk taiq yvlyis yoh seq las nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Tyingtoh dang dvnganh mas khah zis zes yhaugyen lah, ge.
41012029	Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Israel jens eh, gyo yoeus geh, Lyi dvnganh yvmas cangxeih vkoeuq gas, Yhensain yah Mangso ka Yhensain dvyuk kyingh nghuot.
41012030	Yhensain nah Mangso lhyi nah nhaiqlom dvnganh yah, nah dyos dvnganh yah, nvng dolhain zis dvnganh yah, nah yom dvnganh yah yoh jyetdap das. Haih zis gas cangxeih tyingtoh dang nghuot.
41012031	Aiq vkoeuq gas, Nvng nah yhenkyoh lyis nah gungs yah dvyhangteh yoh jyetdap das. Haih thoq lyis kuh dah tyingtoh dang gohtoeu ma bos lo, ge.
41012032	Maussauh lhaih soeu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, nghuot goeus svra eh, nvng taiq dah dang jus joq: Mangso dvyuk kyingh dvnghuot, nyah thoq lyis gohtoeu hank ma bos lo.
41012033	Hauh thoq lyis nhaiqlom dvnganh yah, seq gyo zis dvnganh yah, yom dvnganh yah nyang lyis jyetdap das zis yahge vsainnyang yhenkyoh lyis vsainnyang gungs yah dvyhangteh jyetdap das zis gas, nyi ngheq phudyei zis yahge lomhxangh dvnganh thoq lyis zes joq, ge.
41012034	Hauh soeu ka yik zis yah phuk taiq nyeis yvlyis Yesu nyvng lyis, Nvng gas Mangso munghdan yah ma we, ge nyang lyis taiq. Hauh thang lhyi ka, nyang lyis hank eq cha ma womh nyei lo.
41012035	Yesu yhenmuh mas jyauh uhjyangh phuk taiq zis gas, Khristu gas Dawi dah lo nghuot, ge maussauh lhaih bang khasoeh yoh taiq lah?
41012036	Khasoeh ge lyis Dawi nyah gungs nyang Gyingshang Dyos masyah taiq zis gas, Hauh Yhensain ngah Yhensain lhyi taiq zis gas, Ngos nah jeswus lyis nah khyei o mha toh shoq, Nvng ngah loqyos shot pheh tsung toh aq, ge.
41012037	Housoeh las Dawi nyang, nyang lyis Yhensain ge. Housoeh lyis nyah lo khasoeh yoh nghuot das lah, ge. Moqphung ka nyang lyis gausyis zis yah tsain gyo dyei.
41012038	Nyang nyamoq lyis jyauh uhlyis yah taiq zis gas, Maussauh lhaih bang lyis zaih geh: nyamoq gas dyixing wuot las suh mes, kaih mas phauh nyang zis yah jeshuh das zis eq,
41012039	Lyi jungs mas gis thank tsunggus lyis eq, pwe mha gis thank joqyos lyis eq tsain o mes.
41012040	Chauhmuh jens dah yhen lhyi kuot zo kuot shuk las, gis guons kuot zis yah shvmanh xing xing dung: hauh bang gas zes than dah dang thang thyet zis xauh das.
41012041	Yesu gas ziskwi yah twi twi tsung lha, moqjens houmha ngwis kat yvlyis yoeuh nyeis: dis bang nyoshoq gas ngwis nyo nyo tsain kat.
41012042	Hauh uhlyis nyungs dah chauhmuh dvyuk lyih las dyvpson dvkyvp phauh dah thunkcent aiq kyvp kat.
41012043	Hauh gvng mas nyang nyah changlo jens lyis yoeuh las taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, hai nyungs dah chauhmuh gas, ziskwi mha kat bang dvnganh thoq lyis zes nyo shoq kat goeus.
41012044	Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq dvnganhmoq gas nyamoq magons magoh yoh masyah vlu kat. Nghuot laus eq nyang gas vshoh vjyen masyah nyah kang khoeu das zis yoh zis dvnganh kat goeus, ge.
41013001	Nyang yhenmuh masyah thuq loh lyis nyah changlo dvyuk nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Svra eh, yoeuh aq khoek khoek dah luk yahge yhenzains yoszains tsain nghuot nyvng gah, ge.
41013002	Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Hai kuh dah yhenzains yoszains lyis nvng nyvng lhyeh? Hauh goeu gas ma thyoq thyoq, luk dvlom thoq mas dvlom kih toh zis ma bos lo das, ge.
41013003	Yhenmuh yah twi twi, Tsanlun boms thoq mas nyang tsung toh uhlyis, Petru, Yaku, Yohan yahge Andre moq nyang lyis lhyenwhei nyei zis gas,
41013004	Heinyhoq zis khanhamp nghuot das lah? Hai dvnganh nyuk los das lyis chah vlho thuq los das lah? Ngamoq lyis taiq kyoh aq, ge.
41013005	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Namoq lyis hank eq chowhang ma shwih whang bas jungh zaih geh.
41013006	Khasoeh ge lyis nyoshoq moq ngah nyings masyah thuq los las, Ngos gas Khristu nghuot ge nyoshoq lyis chowhang shwih whang das.
41013007	Moeng zan zis yahge moeng dyoq dah loeus namoq xauhgyo lyis vchiq goh: hauh cho bweh chah, nghuot laus eq thang thank zis gas ma nghuot shih.
41013008	Khasoeh ge lyis, dius dvnyau yah dvnyau, munghdan dvkoeuq yah dvkoeuq jes sont goh los das. Joqyos vdeh deh mas maunyeis dwis los das. Phanghkhauq gyoh das. Nghuot laus eq heika lokhoeu nos nos xi zis dvnghuot shih.
41013009	Nghuot laus eq namoq gas vsainnyang gungs vsainnyang zaih geh. Nyamoq gas nhaiqbos huom mha namoq lyis kyauh tyamp das; lyi jungs mha namoq lyis batpop zis tsain xauh das; guon bang yahge hwankti jens xikkhonh mas shwih hwank las, ngah xiklyis kanghjyoeng bweh das zis xauh yap das.
41013010	Dius nyau dvnganh lyis Gausyis dang shih xauh taiq hoeuh das.
41013011	Namoq lyis soetuon bang jyank mas shwih e lha, kyauh tyamp goeus ya, namoq dang khasoeh taiq das zis vchiq goh: hauh shishenh lyis namoq lyis taiq nhang zis yah dvyhangteh taiq geh: hauh zis gas nvng taiq nyeis zis ma nghuot, Gyingshang Dyos dvtaiq nyeis.
41013012	Hauh uhlyis vmang gas vnoeuh lyis, vnoeuh gas vmang lyis, uwus gas vlo lyis shei yvpheh kyauh tyamp das: lo jens gas nyamoq dah nyhiphoq jens lyis jes kuot las sat nhang das.
41013013	Ngah nyings gvng mas dius dvnganhmoq hoeng zis namoq xauh das. Thang thank jweh shoq jhen soeu ka khyuot yoeus zis xauh das.
41013014	Nghuot laus eq lvpe Daniel taiq toh: lhoeu thyoq dah vchoqh vjyot zis gas ma yap vvng dah joqyos mas yap joq yvlyis namoq nyvng lyis, maussauh nghap soeu ka hauh yvlyis seqgyo bas jungh. Yuda mau mas nyeis bang gas boms pheh phang loh bas jungh.
41013015	Yhenkhung mha nyeis soeu ka yhen khau mha ma gyoh los goeus jungh. Yhen khau mha dvja ja yoeus loh das ge eq ma wvng loh goeus jungh.
41013016	Yos mas nyeis soeu eq nyah shanhzoe yoeus das zis ma tauh los goeus jungh.
41013017	Hauh buisnyeis lyis loshang gungs nghuot bang yahge lonoeuh nauh gvmshuk bang gas mvtanhzoe nghuot!
41013018	Namoq phang shishenh gas cungh lyis ma nghuot bas jungh, shvmanh dung nyeis geh.
41013019	Khasoeh ge lyis, Mangso nyeisjvng vsaiq gvnkhanh masyah gvshih jweh shoq ma bweh ku, thang pheh eq ma bweh lo das shanghsenh gas hauh buisnyeis gyo lyis bweh thuq los das.
41013020	Hauh buisnyeis lyis Yhensain nyang ma shungh dyei lyis gas, hank eq ma yoh luiq. Nghuot laus eq nyang khyen toh bang xiklyis gas, hauh buisnyeis shungh dyei goeus.
41013021	Hauh uhlyis dvyuk yuk namoq lyis, Yoeuh aq, Khristu heimha nyeis. Yoeuh aq, nyang thyimha nyeis, ge laus eq vjingh goh.
41013022	Khasoeh ge lyis ma ying dah Khristu jens yahge lvpe hwah jens thuq los las, gis bweh lyis Mangso khyen toh goeus bang lyis chowhang yoh shwih whang shoq, nyamoq vlho yahge mauh loqmuh chixoeuq das.
41013023	Namoq zaih geh, yoeuh aq, ngos namoq lyis dvnganh uhlhomh taiq toh.
41013024	Nghuot laus eq hau yaukyenh shanghsenh thang lhyi dah buisnyeis lyis buis eq soeng soeng noq los das. Lhamhmuh eq ma tso lo das.
41013025	Kyi eq maukhung mhayah dyet gyoh las, maukhung mha dah yomsoq nonh das.
41013026	Hauh shishenh lyis Cangsoeu Lo gas, yomsoq yahge phunk zainsmuh yah jyommauh yah gyoh los zis lyis nyamoq nyvng das.
41013027	Nyang nyah loeuswons bang lyis nhang lha, lyeis nyei shot, nyeisjvng vthang mhayah maukhung vthang mha jweh shoq nyang khyen toh bang lyis xwih tsainh das.
41013028	Gvshih hau maiphang zains masyah xuq yoeus geh: hauh dah vnyuk tuot las vhuq thuot los goeus ya, zvn wvng los goeus zis lyis namoq seq.
41013029	Houyah dvyhangteh namoq gas hau bweh los zis lyis nyvng lyis, nyang gas khomhdwang mas ni los goeus yvlyis seq geh.
41013030	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, Haih zis ma nyuk los dvchank haq caiq ma lai das.
41013031	Maukhung yahge nyeisjvng lai loh laus eq ngah dang gas ma lai loh das.
41013032	Nghuot laus eq hauh buisnyeis yahge shishenh lyis gas hank eq ma seq: Maukhung mha dah loeuswons bang ma seq, Lo eq ma seq, Uwus kyingh dvseq.
41013033	Namoq hauh shishenh khanhamp nghuot zis ma seq yvmvyah zaih las zungh nyeis geh.
