41013034	Haih zis gas, dius dvyuk nyah yhen lhyi nyah jyeidwis jens lyis kyauh toh khoq las, nyang yuk nyang toeu lhyi muh gvm dyei lho lha, khomh zungh soeu lhyi eq zungh nyeis das xiklyis vmingh dyei khoq las gyung suh loh zis yah doeusgoh.
41013035	Khasoeh ge lyis hauh yhensain ka gungsgvm lyis, gyoq tuon nyen lyis, nyoq nyvng zoh lyis, khah shishenh lyis jweh los das yvlyis namoq ma seq yvmvyah zungh nyeis geh.
41013036	Housoeh ma nghuot lyis gas, nyang nyetlos nyettant los uhlyis namoq yhet joq zis lyis los nyvng das.
41013037	Ngos namoq lyis taiq zis gas, dvnganhmoq lyis taiq zis nghuot las, zungh nyeis geh, ge.
41014001	Hauh thang lhyi aiq nyeih lyis Lhuiq Kat Pwe yahge bicheih ma kat ohlhyoq zo pwe nghuot. Hauh uhlyis phudyei uhjyung jens yahge maussauh lhaih bang gas, nyang lyis tsoek yah khasoeh nyhik las sat das dah cho tsain xo nyeis.
41014002	Nghuot laus eq nyamoq taiq zis gas, Pwe gyo lyis ma nghuot goeus jungh, dius hoeu toq mvbeh, ge.
41014003	Nyang gas Bethani mas mvnggvng dap soeu Simon dah yhen, womjus mas tsung toh lyis, vmesbih dvyuk svsoh phauh dah mura nadu coeu kat dah luk thyoeu jywang lo lyis yoeus lyih las, hauh zis lyis khwih lho lha nyah uhloms mas huot kat dyei.
41014004	Nghuot laus eq nyamoq dvyhamh nhaiqyo las nyang changh nyang taiq goh zis gas, Chamus haih coeu lhyi vyu vgeh kuot au?
41014005	Khasoeh ge lyis hauh yvlyis ngwis kyvp somhxo nyet yah ungh las nyungs bang lyis gvm dyei das zis, ge nyamoq hauh vmesbih lyis nyho.
41014006	Nghuot laus eq Yesu taiq zis gas, Nghuot goeus jungh, namoq nyang lyis chamus lhoeu yau goh, nyang gas ngah xiklyis gis dah muh kuot goeus.
41014007	Khasoeh ge lyis, nyungs bang gas vjangh namoq yah dvgeh nyeis las, namoq nyamoq lyis gis zis kuot dyei mes uhlyis khanhamp eq yoh kuot dyei; nghuot laus eq ngos gas namoq yah vjangh ma nyeis.
41014008	Nyang gas nyang duot nyhoq kuot goeus: nyang coeu huot kat dyei zis yah ngos lyis ba nyhop das xiklyis sont zis nghuot.
41014009	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, mungkvn gonh mas haih gausyis dang taiq hoeuh loh dah joqyos khanghmuh mas nyang lyis soh das nyhenshang hai nyang kuot khoq cho lhyi taiq kyoh das, ge.
41014010	Changlo dvci aiq mas zis dvyuk nghuot dah Yudas Iskarot gas, Yesu lyis phudyei uhjyung jens jyank mas phanhlyen dyei das zis nyamoq jyank pheh e loh.
41014011	Hauh zis lyis nyamoq xauhgyo lho lhyi gaus las, nyang lyis ngwis dyei das dangthoengh tsain toh. Housoeh las nyang lyis yoh phanhlyen dyei das toeuh xo nyeis.
41014012	Bicheih ma kat ohlhyoq zo pwe cangxeih nyeihyo Lhuiq Kat Pwe lomhxangh lainh das yvnglo phudyei uhlyis, nyah changlo jens nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Nvng Lhuiq Kat Pwe zo das xiklyis nvng ngamoq lyis khamha loh sont toh dyei langh nhang mes lah, ge.
41014013	Nyang nyah changlo aiq yuk lyis nhang lha taiq kat zis gas, Wugungs mas wvng loh geh; jeis-jywang wuq soeu dvyuk nah aiq yuk yah xauhgoh das, nyah thang mha chank loh geh.
41014014	Nyang khalhye wvng loh yvmas, hauh yhensain lhyi, Ngos yahge ngah changlo jens hau Lhuiq Kat Pwe zo das dah boenghdoq yvp khah zis nghuot lah, ge Svra nyei nhang kat, oen taiq geh.
41014015	Hauh uhlyis nyang gas sont toh dah yhenthoq yvpmuh dvyvp tuonh shet das, yah nyhenshang houmha ba sont toh langh geh, ge.
41014016	Hauh changlo tang thuq loh las, wugungs mas wvng loh lyis nyang nyah aiq yuk lyis taiq kat vgus nyvng las, hau Lhuiq Kat Pwe nyenhcon lhyi tsain ba sont toh.
41014017	Nyenhthang lhyi, nyang hau dvci aiq yuk moq yah dvgeh jweh loh.
41014018	Nyamoq tsung lha wom tsain zo nyeis lyis Yesu taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, namoq mas dvyuk ngos yah dvgeh wom zo soeu ka ngos lyis phanhlyen das, ge.
41014019	Nyamoq kuk las dvyuk thang lhyi dvyuk, Ngos nghuot lah, ge tsain nyei.
41014020	Nyang nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Dvci aiq yuk mas dvyuk, bvn khau mha ngos yah dvgeh jen zo soeu nghuot.
41014021	Cangsoeu Lo gas nyah cho lhaih toh zis yah dvyhangteh xauh chah, nghuot laus eq Cangsoeu Lo lyis phanhlyen soeu ka mvtanhzoe nghuot! Nyang ma khoeu los ya nyah xiklyis zes gis das, ge.
41014022	Nyamoq housoeh zo nyeis lyis Yesu gas, ohlhyoq yoeus las shvmanh thang lhyi khyiq lho lha nyamoq lyis dyei uhlyis yah taiq zis gas, Namoq yoeus zo geh: haih zis gas ngah gungs nghuot, ge.
41014023	Nyang kom lhyi eq yoeus las dye chungh thang lhyi nyamoq lyis dyei lyis nyamoq dvnganhmoq hauh zis tsain shuk.
41014024	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Haih zis gas nyoshoq moq xiklyis huot tyamp, ngah suih yah kuot toh thanghchvp nghuot.
41014025	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, Mangso dah munghdan mas zvbiq saiq lyis ngos xauh shuk buisnyeis jweh shoq, zvbiq shih mas zis lyis ngos ma shuk lo das, ge.
41014026	Nyamoq chunghthwe dvkoeuq chungh lho lha, Tsanlun boms pheh thuq loh.
41014027	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Khvnyens namoq dvnganhmoq ngah gvng mas ehnyet dyet das: Khasoeh ge lyis, Yvng yoeuh soeu lhyi ngos bat sat las, Yvng jens dyos loh das, ge lhaih toh.
41014028	Nghuot laus eq ngos gas dwis toq los nhang thang lhyi, Galile mau mas ngos namoq xik mas loh langh das, ge.
41014029	Petru nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Dvnganhmoq tyamp khoq laus eq ngos gas ma tyamp das, ge.
41014030	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos nvng lyis jyoengh taiq bah, khvnyens nyang gyoq aiq nyen ma tuon shih lyis nvng ngos lyis somh lhain he tyamp das, ge.
41014031	Petru gas, Ngos nvng yah dvgeh shei chah lyis eq ngos nvng lyis ma he tyamp das, ge taiq. Nyamoq dvnganhmoq eq vgus housoeh taiq.
41014032	Nyamoq gas Gesemani ge yvmas jweh loh lyis, nyang nyah changlo jens lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos shvmanh dung uhlyis namoq heimha tsung langh geh, ge.
41014033	Nyang gas Petru, Yaku, Yohan moq lyis shwih las, nyang svsoh chiqjyen zis yah ehnyet nyo nyeis.
41014034	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos shei das shoq nhaiqkuk nhaiqngis nyeis. Namoq heimha phuksohlhaiq mus nyeis langh geh, ge.
41014035	Hou mhayah dvthungh loh shih lho lha nyeisjvng mas gop las shvmanh dung zis gas, Gis bweh lyis hauh shishenh ngah jyank masyah lai loh nhang aq.
41014036	Aba, Uwus eh, nvng dvnganh zis lyis yoh bweh nhang: haih kom lhyi ngah jyank masyah lhuiq tyamp dyei aq, nghuot laus eq ngos o khyvlyis ma nghuot, nvng o khyvlyis dvnghuot bas jungh, ge.
41014037	Nyang doms los lyis, nyamoq yhet joq yvlyis nyvng las Petru lyis taiq zis gas, Simon eh, nvng yhet muih joq lhyeh? Dvshishenh eq nvng ma yoh zungh langh lhyeh?
41014038	Phuksohlhaiq mus las shvmanh dung nyeis geh. Housoeh ma nghuot lyis namoq shiwu zis xauh das. Dyos gas mes laus eq gungsshoh gas yomnhuk joq, ge.
41014039	Tsai, nyang doms loh shih las vkhang dung dah dang khonh doms dung nyeis.
41014040	Doms tauh los lyis nyamoq doms yhet joq zis lyis los nyvng. Housoeh nyamoq gas svsoh yhet mes las nguis nyeis shih yvmvyah nyang lyis khasoeh phuk taiq das zis yangh ma seq.
41014041	Housoeh nyang somh vlhain tauh los las nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq yhet las lvlaihsoe no nyeis shih goh lhyeh? Geh goeus, shishenh jweh goeus, yoeuh aq Cangsoeu Lo gas yaunos wons bang loq mas phanhlyen dyei goeus.
41014042	Toq geh, yang loh goh, yoeuh aq, ngos lyis phanhlyen das soeu ka jweh los goeus, ge.
41014043	Nyang taiq nyeis shih lyis, changlo dvci aiq yuk mas dah Yudas yahge phudyei uhjyung jens, maussauh lhaih bang, logis jens jyank masyah bang moengsa yahge dunghkuq chi dah moqjens nyetlos nyettant los.
41014044	Nyang lyis phanhlyen soeu ka nyamoq lyis, Ngos bvlot tanh soeu ka hauh soeu nyang nghuot goeus. Nyang lyis nyhik las vlhomuh shwih loh geh, ge vsoh dyei toh vgus.
41014045	Nyang jweh yah dvyih nyah jyank mas dvlhain dvm e lha, Svra eh, ge bvlot tanh.
41014046	Nyamoq gas Yesu lyis dap nyhik las shwih loh.
41014047	Vyvm mas yap joq soeu dvyuk gas moengsa she lha Phudyei Zainsmuh jyeidwis dah no jap thyet dyei.
41014048	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq gas khyanktau nyhik das teh moengsa, dunghkuq chi lha ngos lyis nyhik das zis los goh lhyeh?
41014049	Jyauh uhlyis yah yhenmuh mas ngos namoq yah nyeih yau nyeih dvgeh nyeis laus eq namoq ngos lyis ma nyhik; nghuot laus eq lhaihtoh dang nyuk los chah, ge.
41014050	Nyamoq dvnganhmoq yah nyang lyis tyamp khoq las cangh loh.
41014051	Shohchen mha jeimuh mis khuk chi dah loyvm dvyuk nyah thang mha chank loh. Nyang lyis nyamoq yah nyhik loh.
41014052	Nyang gas hau jeimuh mis lyis khyuot toh khoq las shohchen cangh loh.
41014053	Nyamoq gas Yesu lyis Phudyei Zainsmuh jyank mas shwih loh uhlyis, phudyei uhjyung jens, logis jens yahge maussauh lhaih bang dvnganhmoq huom toh.
41014054	Petru gas Phudyei Zainsmuh dah ganthoq mha jweh shoq we we masyah chank loh las zungh bang yah dvgeh joq tsung gvng nyeis.
41014055	Gvshih Phudyei uhjyung jens yah dvgeh nhaiqbos dvhuom gonh Yesu lyis yoh sat das dah kanghjyoeng tsain xo laus eq hank eq ma yoh.
41014056	Khasoeh ge lyis, nyoshoq moq nyah cho ma ying kanghjyoeng tsain kat laus eq, nyamoq dah kanghjyoeng dang ma tsain huq.
41014057	Hauh uhlyis dvyhamh toq las nyah cho ma ying kanghjyoeng tsain kat zis gas,
41014058	Haih soeu ka loq yah kuot toh dah hai yhenmuh lyis, ngos thyoq tyamp las somh nyeih gyo lyis loq yah ma kuot kuot, gohtoeu dvkoeuq doms kuot das, ge nyang taiq dang lyis ngamoq xauhgyo, ge.
41014059	Nghuot laus eq nyamoq dah kanghjyoeng dang gas ma huq shih.
41014060	Hauh uhlyis Phudyei Zainsmuh gas nyamoq xikkhonh mas toq yap las, Yesu lyis nyei, Nvng lyis tyixo kanghjyoeng kat nyeis zis cha nghuot, nvng ma phuk taiq lhyeh, ge.
41014061	Nghuot laus eq nyang dvkhonh eq ma phuk taiq, samlo dvnyeis. Tsai, Phudyei Zainsmuh nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Nvng gas Ngelhoq soeu dah Lo ge, Khristu nghuot lah, ge.
41014062	Yesu taiq zis gas, Ngos nghuot. Hauh thoq lyis Cangsoeu Lo gas Yomsoq dah loqyos shot pheh tsung lha, maukhung jyommauh yah jweh lyih yvlyis namoq nyvng das, ge.
41014063	Phudyei Zainsmuh gas, nyah dyi lang chuiq zis yah taiq zis gas, Yang chah kanghjyoeng tsain chah shih lah?
41014064	Hauh loeusmus soqzo dang lyis namoq vxauhgyo shih goh lah? Namoq khasoeh dang thang thyet goh? Nyamoq dvnganhmoq gas, Nyang shei mon soeu nghuot, ge dang thang tsain thyet.
41014065	Dvyhamh gas nyang lyis svkanh dyeh gyuon. Nyah nyoqnho lhyi nghop dyei lho lha, nyang lyis chwiq las, Lvpe pe aq, ge nyang lyis taiq. Zungh bang eq nyang lyis tyuk las shwih loh.
41014066	Petru gas hauh yhen o ganthoq khau mha nyeis uhlyis, Phudyei Zainsmuh dah uhkung nyhiq dvyuk los las,
41014067	Petru joq gvng nyeis yvlyis nyvng lyis, nyang lyis yoeuh las taiq zis gas, Nvng eq Yesu ge dah Nazaret phoq yah nyeis ku, ge.
41014068	Nghuot laus eq nyang he lha taiq zis gas, Ngos ma seq, nvng cha taiq zis eq ngos ma seqgyo, ge. Nyang khyam khomh pheh thuq loh. Hauh uhlyis gyoq tuon los.
41014069	Hauh uhkung nyhiq nyang lyis doms nyvng lho lhyi, vyvm vwi yap joq bang lyis taiq zis gas, Haih soeu eq nyamoq mas zis dvyuk nghuot, ge.
41014070	Nyang gas doms he. Hauh thang lhyi dvsoq lyis vyvm vwi mas tsain yap joq bang eq Petru lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng nyamoq mas zis dvyuk jyoengh nghuot: nvng Galile dius eq nghuot, ge.
41014071	Housoeh las nyang gas, Namoq taiq soeu lhyi ngos ma seq, ge nhoengh nhoengh khan khan maukhi.
41014072	Houjang gyoq aiq nyen tuon los. Housoeh las Petru gas, Gyoq aiq nyen ma tuon shih lyis nvng ngos lyis somh lhain he tyamp das, ge Yesu nyang lyis taiq dang lyis soh los las svsoh ngaus.
41015001	Nvpsangh yah phudyei uhjyung jens gas logis jens, maussauh lhaih bang yahge nhaiqbos huom gonh xam nyoq goeus las Yesu lyis twih lho lha Pilat jyank mas loh shwih kyauh tyamp.
41015002	Pilat nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng Yuda hwankti nghuot lhyeh, ge. Nyang phuk taiq zis gas, Nvng taiq nyeis, ge.
41015003	Phudyei uhjyung jens yah nyang lyis nyoshoq ja kauq.
41015004	Housoeh Pilat nyang lyis doms nyei zis gas, Nvng cha eq ma phuk taiq lhyeh? Yoeuh aq, nvng lyis nyamoq hounyhoq tyixo nyeis, ge.
41015005	Nghuot laus eq Yesu cha eq ma doms phuk taiq yvmvyah Pilat mauh.
41015006	Gvshih hauh pwe mas nyamoq lhuiq kat nhang mes dah thung lungh bang dvyuk yuk lyis nyang gyangh lhuiq kat dyei.
41015007	Gomloeus toq yvmas dius sat las yobos zangh dah Baraba ge soeu gomloeus toq bang yah dvgeh thung lungh joq.
41015008	Moqjens gas Pilat jyank mas e lha, nyang nyamoq lyis vjangh yah kuot dyei teh kuot dyei das xiklyis tsain sang zoh loh.
41015009	Pilat phuk taiq zis gas, Namoq nyhenshang Yuda hwankti lhyi lhuiq kat dyei nhang mes lhyeh, ge.
41015010	Khasoeh ge lyis phudyei uhjyung jens gas noh gvng mas nyang lyis kyauh tyamp yvlyis nyang seq.
41015011	Nghuot laus eq phudyei uhjyung jens gas, nyamoq xiklyis Baraba dvlhuiq kat dyei bas jungh, ge moqjens lyis jaus jyonh nyeis.
41015012	Pilat nyamoq lyis doms phuk taiq zis gas, Housoeh lyis namoq Yuda hwankti ge lui soeu lhyi ngos khasoeh kuot das lah, ge.
41015013	Nyamoq gas, Nyang lyis tapzains mas taplhangh toh aq, ge doms tsain kaiq.
41015014	Pilat nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Chamus lah? Nyang ma gis zis cha kuot cu lah, ge. Nyamoq doms zes kaiq zis gas, Nyang lyis tapzains mas taplhangh toh aq, ge.
41015015	Pilat eq moqphung lhyi ehnyet lhoq tap dyei mes las, nyamoq xiklyis Baraba lyis lhuiq kat dyei las, Yesu lyis gas lyuk lho lha tapzains mas taplhangh tyamp das xiklyis kyauh tyamp.
41015016	Jeslo jens gas Yesu lyis mungh zau yhen mha shwih loh las nyamoq jes dvdvp gonh lyis khi tsainh toh.
41015017	Nyamoq gas, nyang lyis nesnoq dah dyimis gvm huot, zoeu yah zaiq dah buismuk eq nyah uhloms mas tsungh dyei lho lha,
41015018	Yuda hwankti kang xing bas jungh, ge nyang lyis tsain kaiq.
41015019	Nyamoq gas nyah uhloms lyis jvmbu yau yah lyuk, svkanh eq dyeh gyuon, phvluk thuk las nyang lyis tsain paiq.
41015020	Nyamoq gas nyang lyis dye jwangh goeus ya, hau nesnoq dyixing lyis khyuot yoeus lho lha nyah dyi doms gvmhuot. Housoeh nyang lyis tapzains mas taplhangh das zis shwih thuq loh.
41015021	Alesanda yahge Rufu dah uwus, Kureni Simon gas Pa mhayah wvng los nyeis yvlyis nyamoq gas nyang lyis Yesu dah tapzains tsoengh wuq nhang.
41015022	Nyamoq gas nyang lyis Golgotha ge yvmas shwih loh: hauh dang jyuk gas Uhkhangh ge dah joqyos nghuot.
41015023	Nyamoq gas mura yah lhoeuq dah zvbiq nyang lyis gvmshuk. Nghuot laus eq nyang hauh yvlyis ma lhom yoeus.
41015024	Nyamoq gas nyang lyis dye taplhangh thang lhyi, nyah dyi lyis hank yoeus vvng ge tsain doeugoh..
41015025	Nyang lyis nyamoq lhangh tyamp zis gas, gau shishenh lyis nghuot.
41015026	Hauh thoq mas YUDA HWANKTI ge nyang lyis kauq dah dang khonh lhaih tap toh.
41015027	Nyamoq gas khyanktau aiq yuk lyis eq, nyah loqyos shot pheh dvyuk, loqwi shot pheh dvyuk nyang yah dvgeh tsain taplhangh toh.
41015028	Houka, Nyang lyis lyi lhyweq bang yah bos suon tap tyamp goeus, ge dah lhaihtoh dang nyuk los.
41015029	Suh e loh bang eq ma phauh ma nyang lainkamh nocwih kuot las, Ah! yhenmuh lyis thyoq tyamp las somh nyeih gyo lyis doms kuot soeu eh,
41015030	Nvnyang gungs lyis khyuot yoeus las tapzains masyah gyoh los aq, tsain ge.
41015031	Phudyei uhjyung jens eq houyah dvyhangteh nyang lyis jwangh las, maussauh lhaih bang yah nyamoq nyang taiq goh zis gas, Nyang gohyuk lyis gas khyuot yoeus, nyang gungs nyang gas ma yoh khyuot yoeus nyvng!
41015032	Ngamoq nyvng las yoh lomsjingh bas jungh, hauh Israel dah hwankti, Khristu tapzains masyah gvshih gyoh los aq, ge dvyuk dvyuk tsain taiq jwangh. Nyang yah dvgeh tapzains mas lhangh toh vzomh eq nyang lyis ma phauh ma danh tsain taiq.
41015033	Nyeih gungs jweh lyis dvmau gonh chuot joq zis somh shishenh jweh shoq nghuot.
41015034	Somh shishenh lyis Yesu thwe zainsmuh yah kaiq zis gas, ELOI, ELOI LEMA SABAKTHANI ge. Hauh vjyuk gas, Ngah Mangso eh, ngah Mangso eh, nvng ngos lyis chamus doeuh tyamp toh lah, ge zis nghuot.
41015035	Hauh vyvm mas yap joq bang dvyhamh gas hauh zis xauhgyo las taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, nyang Eliya lyis lui nyeis, ge.
41015036	Hauh uhlyis dius dvyuk wuih los las khotlhyop dvjop mas jeis jyen jen lho lha jvmbu lyang mas tap las nyang shuk das xiklyis dyei las taiq zis gas, Eliya nyang lyis vlyih yoeus khyoq das lah, yamoq yoeuh goh, ge.
41015037	Yesu gas thwe zainsmuh yah kaiq lho lha kang gyoh.
41015038	Hauh uhlyis yhenmuh mas dah gos misseh gas vthyoh mas zis vkhyei mha jweh shoq aiq khyamh juiq tyamp.
41015039	Nyang housoeh kaiq lho lha kang gyoh yvlyis nyah xik mas yap joq dah jes dvxo guon zau nyvng lyis, Haih soeu ka Mangso dah Lo gyingh nghuot, ge taiq.
41015040	We we masyah yoeuh nyeis dah vmesbih jens eq nyeis. Hauh bang gas Magdala Mari, Yaku ngis yahge Yosep dah ungwes Mari yahge Salome nghuot las, nyamoq gas nyang Galile mas nyeis yoq lyis nyang lyis phuqsoe dah bang nghuot.
41015041	Yerusalem mas nyang yah dvgeh doq loh dah vmesbih jens gohtoeu eq nyoshoq nghuot.
41015042	Hauh nyeih gas Yuda No Buisnyeis dah xiklyis nyeihyo, sont buisnyeis nghuot yvmvyah nyenhthang jweh lyis,
41015043	Nyoqnho ngelang bos dah nhaiqbos, Mangso munghdan lyis langh nyeis soeu Arimathia mas dah Yosep lyih las, nhaiqlom yangh yangh Pilat jyank mas Yesu mvng lyis loh sang yoeus.
41015044	Pilat gas Yesu gvshih shei tyamp goeus yvlyis mauh las jes dvxo guon zau lyis khi lha, Nyang shei zis nyangh goeus lhyeh, ge nyei.
41015045	Jes dvxo guon zau jyank masyah shei goeus cho seq lho lhyi, nyang gas Yosep lyis hauh mvng dyei.
41015046	Nyang gas jeimuh misdain wis las, nyang lyis yoeus khyoq lho lha hauh zis yah lyet las lukmuh lom mas kyungh toh dah lop mas kat toh. Hau lopkhonh mas nyang lukzains toeu cheiq toh.
41015047	Magdala Mari yahge Yosep dah ungwes Mari gas, nyah mvng toh dah joqyos lyis nyvng.
41016001	Yuda No Buisnyeis lai thang lhyi Magdala Mari, Yaku dah ungwes Mari yahge Salome moq gas hauh mvng lyis loh juot dyei das xiklyis xangh coeu tsain wis.
41016002	Dvdaus dah cangxeih vnyeih nvpsangh buis canh los lyis, nyamoq hauh lop pheh e loh.
41016003	Nyamoq dvyuk yah dvyuk taiq goh loh zis gas, Yang lyis hau lopkhonh mas dah lukzains hank toeu tyamp dyei das au, ge.
41016004	Nyamoq yoeuh kat lyis hau lukzains toeu phanh toh yvlyis nyvng. Hauh lukzains gas svsoh kuh zis nghuot.
41016005	Hauh lop khau mha wvng loh lyis, bang bang thyoeu dah shanhzoe wuot las, loqyos shot pheh tsung toh dah loyvm phoq lyis nyamoq nyvng las mauh.
41016006	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq vmauh goh, tapzains mas taplhangh tyamp goeus, Nazaret mas dah Yesu lyis namoq xo nyeis. Nyang toq loh goeus, nyang heimha ma nyeis lo; nyang lyis toh dah joqyos mas yoeuh geh.
41016007	Nghuot laus eq loh geh, nyah changlo jens yahge Petru moq lyis, Nyang gas Galile mau pheh namoq xik mas loh goeus. Nyang namoq lyis taiq toh vgus, houmha nyang lyis nyvng das, oen taiq kyoh geh, ge.
41016008	Nyamoq gas nvn, mauh yvmvyah lvnyap thuqh loh las lop masyah cangh khoq. Nyamoq gyuk yvmvyah hank lyis eq cha ma taiq.
41016009	Gvshih hau dvdaus dah cangxeih vnyeih noq yah nyang dwis toq los thang lhyi, nyang yius nyhet doeu khat tyamp dyei dah Magdala Mari lyis Yesu cangxeih nyvng xoeuq.
41016010	Hauh vmesbih loh las nyang yah dvgeh zomh ku bang, kukxi ngaus nyeis yvmas loh taiq kyoh.
41016011	Yesu dwis nyeis, nyang nyvng khoq goeus ge yvlyis nyamoq xauhgyo laus eq ma jingh.
41016012	Hauh thang lhyi nyamoq mas zis aiq yuk wukhau pheh loh nyeis lyis, nyah gungs gohja thaiq las nyvng xoeuq.
41016013	Nyah aiq yuk tauh loh las nyeis khoq bang lyis taiq kyoh laus eq nyamoq ma jingh.
41016014	Changlo jens dvci dvyuk moq womjus mas tsung toh uhlyis nyang nyvng xoeuq. Nyang shei masyah dwis toq los las, nyvng bang dah dang lyis ma tsain jing yvmvyah, nyamoq dah ma lomsjingh zis yahge nhaiqlom than zis lyis nyho.
41016015	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq mungkvn goms shoq loh las, cangsoeu dius nyau khanghmuh lyis gausyis Dang taiq kyoh geh.
41016016	Lomsjingh las jeisnyhop kham soeu ka khyuot yoeus zis xauh das; ma lomsjingh soeu ka dang thang thyet zis xauh das.
41016017	Lomsjingh bang yoh kuot dah vlho ka, haih zis nghuot. Ngah nyings masyah nyamoq yius lyis yoh khat tyamp das. Nyingh saiq yah eq yoh tsain taiq das.
41016018	Lhangnyis lyis eq yoh nyhik lhangh toh das; nyonoq bos dah jeis shuk laus eq ma shei nhang das. Nos bang thoq mas nyamoq loq kih dyei las hauh bang doms huiq los das, ge.
41016019	Hauh Yhensain nyamoq lyis dye taiq thang lhyi, maukhung mha toqh yoeus zis xauh las, Mangso dah loqyos shot pheh tsung toh.
41016020	Nyamoq eq thuq loh las, Yhensain pangh zis yah eq, nyamoq mas bweh dah vlho yah Dang lyis goeng toenk nhang zis yah eq, joqyos khyiq khanghmuh tsain taiq hoeuh. Amen.
42001001	Cangxeih lyis yah nyoq yah nyvng dah kanghjyoeng yahge gausyis Dang lyis wons wuq bang taiq kyoh zis yah dvyhangteh,
42001002	Ngamoq vkhau mha bweh lai loh goeus cho vjaja lyis lhaih xi bang nyoshoq bos yvmvyah,
42001003	Ngos eq haih cho dvnganh lyis vpom mhayah vlhomuh nyei gyo thang lhyi nvng xuq goeus cho dvnganh gas jyoengh jus yvlyis nvng yoh seq shoq ngos nah xiklyis vzoh yah lhaih dyei das oen nghamh thyet toh, nhaiqbos Theophilu eh.
42001005	Yuda hwankti Herod zaih lyis, Abiya vkoq mas dah Zekharia ge dah phudyei soeu dvyuk nyeis. Nyah yhensain nyhiq Elizabet gas Aron dah nyeinyet nghuot.
42001006	Nyah zomh gas yobos huon chank ma bos khyvlyis Yhensain dah lyi yahge tyingtoh cho dvnganh lyis chank las Mangso xikkhonh mas dan nyeis.
42001007	Nghuot laus eq Elizabet gas dius thonh nghuot yvmvyah, nyah zomh loshang ma bos, Nyah zomh gas mang eq mang loh goeus.
42001008	Dvlhain ka nyang Mangso dah xikkhonh mas nyah phudyei phung mha muh kuot vvng lhyi,
42001009	phudyei bang dah thungh yah dvyhangteh nyamoq doeugoh lyis nyang mas vvng lha, nyang gas Yhensain dah yhenmuh mas wvng las xangh ngheq nhamp nyeis.
42001010	Hauh uhlyis dius jens dvnganhmoq gas nghe pheh shvmanh dung nyeis.
42001011	Xangh ngheq nhamp dah phon loqyos shot pheh Yhensain dah loeuswons soeu yap las nyang lyis nyvng xoeuq.
42001012	Zekharia nyang lyis nyvng las gyuk nvn nyeis.
42001013	Nghuot laus eq hauh loeuswons soeu yah nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Vgyuk Zekharia eh, khasoeh ge lyis nvng dung zis lyis gyo dyei goeus; nah yhensain nyhiq Elizabet gas nah nyhenshang yukgis lo dvyuk khoeu los das, nvng nyah nyings lyis Yohan ge lui das.
42001014	Housoeh las nvng gausyis nhaiqtap zis yoh das; nyang khoeu los yvmvyah dius nyoshoq eq gaus das.
42001015	Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas Yhensain xikkhonh mas kuhxing das. Nyang gas zvbiq yahge yhei shuk das zis ma nghuot; nyah ungwes dah ung mhayah yangh Gyingshang Dyos yah dyingh das.
42001016	Nyang gas Israel jens nyoshoq lyis nyamoq dah Yhensain Mangso jyank pheh doms lhain los nhang das.
42001017	Uwus moq dah ehnyet lyis lo jens jyank pheh, dang ma gyo bang lyis dan bang dah joeui cho pheh lhain los nhang das zis yahge, Yhensain xiklyis sont toh dah dius nyau lyis cicont kuot dyei das nyhenshang nyang gas Eliya dah dyos yahge yomsoq dyingh las nyah xik pheh loh das, ge.
42001018	Zekharia loeuswons soeu lhyi taiq zis gas, Ngos gas mang loh goeus, ngah yhensain nyhiq eq nyenhkyi kuh goeus yvmvyah, haih zis lyis jyoengh nghuot oen ngos kha mhayah yoh seq das lah, ge.
42001019	Loeuswons soeu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos gas Mangso xikkhonh mas yap soeu Gabriel nghuot. Nvng lyis taiq kyoh aq, ge haih gausyis loeus taiq kyoh das xiklyis, ngos lyis nhang kat.
42001020	Yoeuh aq, nyah shishenh jweh lyis nyuk los das dah ngah dang lyis nvng ma jingh yvmvyah, haih cho bweh los dah buisnyeis jweh shoq nvng dang ma yoh jis, nhuot jet nyeis das, ge.
42001021	Zekharia gas yhenmuh khau mha loh nyangh nyeis yvmvyah, nyang lyis langh nyeis dah dius jens gas mauh nyeis.
42001022	Nyang thuq los dah uhlyis nyamoq lyis dang ma yoh jis lo yvmvyah, nyang gas yhenmuh mas nyoqnyvng nyvng zis lyis nyamoq soh dyei. Nyang gas nyamoq lyis loq toeuq toeuq las nhuot jet zis yah nyeis.
42001023	Nyang gas, nyang phudyei muh kuot dah buisnyeis dyingh lyis, nyah yhen pheh loh.
42001024	Hauh thang lhyi nyah yhensain nyhiq Elizabet gas loshang gungs lyis chi los las, nyang kyingh yhen khau mha lhamhmuh oeng khyvp gauh lungh joq.
42001025	Housoeh nyang taiq zis gas, Svbih dah xikkhonh mas ngos lyis jwangh nyhap zis yoeus tyamp dyei das xiklyis Yhensain ka ngos lyis nyoqzons doeus las jyehjuh dyei goeus, ge.
42001026	Elizabet loshang gungs lyis chi zis lhamhmuh khyuk vkhyvp lyis, Mangso ka loeuswons soeu Gabriel lyis Galile mau Nazaret ge dah wugungs mas,
42001027	Hwankti Dawi dah vnyau vshih, Yosep ge soeu xiklyis kwank toh dah lonyi gyingh jyank mas nhang kat. Hauh lonyi dah nyings gas Mari nghuot.
42001028	Loeuswons soeu nyah jyank mas jweh taiq zis gas, Dvyangh lah? Yhensain ka nvng lyis nyoqzons doeus las, nvng yah dvgeh nyeis. (Vmesbih jens mas nvng gas ngelhoq), ge.
42001029	Mari gas nyang lyis nyvng las housoeh taiq zis lyis gyo mauh las, Heisoeh lhom jis zis gas khasoeh ge zis nghuot das au, ge nyah ehnyet mas nghamh nyeis.
42001030	Loeuswons soeu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Mari eh, vgyuk: nvng gas Mangso nyoqzons doeus soeu nghuot.
42001031	Nvng gas loshang gungs lyis chi lha, yukgis lo dvyuk khoeu das. Nvng nyah nyings lyis Yesu oen nyhink dyei chah.
42001032	Nyang gas kuhxing lha nyang lyis gas Nyhang thank Soeu dah Lo ge lui das: Yhensain Mangso ka nyah uwus Dawi dah hwankti tsung tank eq nyang lyis dyei das.
42001033	Nyang gas Yakop dah yhen thoq mas vcaiq vto guon das. Nyah munghdan khayhoq eq thank das zis ma nghuot, ge.
42001034	Mari loeuswons soeu lhyi taiq zis gas, Hauh zis khasoeh yoh bweh das lah? Ngos lonyi gyingh dvnghuot, ge.
42001035	Loeuswons soeu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Gyingshang Dyos nah thoq mas jweh das las, nyhang thank thoq mas soeu dah yomsoq yah nvng lyis gos das. Housoeh las nvng khoeu das lo gas gyingshang. Nyang lyis Mangso dah Lo ge lui das.
42001036	Yoeuh aq, dius thonh ge dvlui, nvng yah dvhuh dah Elizabet eq manglo lyis yukgis loshang dvyuk gungs lyis chi zis lhamhmuh khyuk khyvp nghuot los goeus.
42001037	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ma yoh kuot zis cha ma bos, ge.
42001038	Hauh uhlyis Mari taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, Yhensain dah jyeidwis ngos nghuot nyeis; nah dang yah dvyhangteh ngah jyank mas nghuot bas jungh, ge. Hauh uhlyis hauh loeuswons soeu nyah jyank masyah loh.
42001039	Hauh buisnyeis gyo lyis Mari gas Yuda mau boms wugungs dvkoeuq mas lvnyap toq loh las,
42001040	Zekharia yhen mha nyang wvng loh lyis, Elizabet yah loh xauhgoh.
42001041	Mari lhom jis zis lyis Elizabet xauhgyo lyis nyah ung mha loshang jywe los. Elizabet gas Gyingshang Dyos dyingh las,
42001042	thwe zainsmuh yah kaiq zis gas, Vmesbih jens mas nvng gas ngelhoq, nah ung mha dah shih eq ngelhoq.
42001043	Ngah Yhensain dah ungwes ngah jyank mas jweh los zis gas, kha iq gaus chank bos au!
42001044	Yoeuh aq, nvng lhom jis dang ngah no mas xauhgyo yah dvyih, ngah ung mha loshang ka gaus zis yah jywe los.
42001045	Yhensain jyank masyah nyang lyis taiq zis gas bweh los das, ge lomsjingh dah vmesbih gas ngelhoq.
42001046	Mari taiq zis gas, Ngah dyos Yhensain lhyi chungh.
42001047	Ngah dyos eq khyuot yoeus Yhensain mha gauslaus:
42001048	Khasoeh ge lyis ma mon ma yih dah nyah jyeidwis lyis nyang nhaiqdoeus dyei: khasoeh ge lyis, Yoeuh aq, gvshih masyah dius caiq dvnganh gas ngos lyis ngelhoq soeu ge das.
42001049	Khasoeh ge lyis yomsoq zains bos soeu ka ngos lyis kuh thank dah muh kuot dyei, nyah nyings eq gyingshang.
42001050	Nyang lyis phauh nyang gyukwoms bang thoq mas nyah nhaiqnyen shohgyo zis gas, dvcaiq thang lhyi dvcaiq joq joq.
42001051	Nyah loqyom yah yombos zis lyis chixoeuq; Nyamoq dah ehnyet mas nghamh yvlyis khwank nyeis soeu lhyi lhoq sanh tyamp.
42001052	Yombos bang lyis nyamoq hwankti tank masyah khyoq las, Nyhen mha gyoh bang lyis nyang toeutoq das.
42001053	Nyang gas yuot bang lyis zonoms gis yah jo nhang lha, Dis bang lyis gungskom nhang kat.
42001054	Nyah nhaiqnyen ehnyet lyis soh zis yah nyah jyeidwis Israel lyis pangh dyei.
42001055	Houka Abraham yahge nyah lo jens nghuot dah yah phauh thyeih moq lyis dyei toh dah vcaiq vto dangthoengh yah dvyhangteh nghuot, ge.
42001056	Mari gas Elizabet yah dvgeh lhamhmuh somh khyvp ko nyeis lho lha nyah yhen pheh tauh loh.
42001057	Gvshih Elizabet gas buisnyeis dyingh las, yukgis lo dvyuk khoeu.
42001058	Yhensain ka nyah kuhxing dah nhaiqnyen shohgyo zis nyang lyis khasoeh Chixoeuq yvlyis buisnoms sainhchangh yahge dvhuh bang xauhgyo lyis nyang yah dvgeh tsain gaus nyeis.
42001059	Xet vnyeih lyis, loshang lhyi vthyoh tyomh dyei das zis nyamoq los las, nyah uwus dah nyings teh nyang lyis Zekharia ge nyhink das zis sont.
42001060	Nyah ungwes phuk taiq zis gas, Ma nghuot, nyang lyis Yohan oen nyhink dyei chah, ge.
42001061	Nyang lyis nyamoq taiq zis gas, Nah vhuh mas housoeh ge zis hank eq ma bos, ge.
42001062	Nyamoq gas nyah uwus lyis loq toeuq las nyings khasoeh nyhink mes yvlyis nyei.
42001063	Nyang gas lhaih das luklhyoq sang yoeus las, Nyah nyings gas Yohan nghuot, ge lhaih xoeuq. Housoeh nyamoq dvnganhmoq mauh.
42001064	Houjang nyah nhuot eq bangh, lhyo eq buis las dang taiq zis yah Mangso lhyi chungh.
42001065	Nyah vyvm vwi mas nyeis bang gas gyuk las, hauh dang lyis Yuda boms mau dvnganh yvmas hoeuh loh.
42001066	Xauhgyo bang dvnganh dah nhaiqlom mas tsain comh toh las, Haih loshang ka khasoeh teh soeu nghuot das au, tsain ge. Khasoeh ge lyis, Yhensain dah yomsoq gas nyang yah dvgeh nghuot.
42001067	Hauh uhlyis nyah uwus Zekharia gas Gyingshang Dyos dyingh las pe zis gas,
42001068	Hauh Yhensain Israel dah Mangso ka ngelhoq: Nyah dius lyis komh las khyuot yoeus cho kuot dyei.
42001069	Nyah jyeidwis Dawi dah yhen mhayah, yah xiklyis yomsoq bos dah khyuot yoeus soeu thuq los nhang das, ge.
42001070	Mungkvn xi masyah nyang nyah gyingshang lvpe jens dah nhuot masyah taiq toh zis yah dvyhangteh,
42001071	Yah jeswus yahge yang lyis hoeng bang dvnganh dah loq masyah lhuiq kat das xiklyis nghuot.
42001072	Nyang taiq zis gas, Yah phauh thyeih moq lyis nhaiqnyen ehnyet Chixoeuq las nyah gyingshang dangthoengh lyis soh das, ge.
42001073	Ngamoq yahge ngamoq dah jes jens masyah khyuot yoeus las gyuk ehnyet ma bos bos nyang lyis yoh phuqsoe das xiklyis Mangso ka yah phauh thyeih Abraham lyis maukhi dang yah dangthoengh toh.
42001075	Housoeh yang gas yah dvcaiq gonh nyah xikkhonh mas gyingshang zis yah dan khyvlyis yoh nyeis das nyhenshang nghuot.
42001076	Loshang eh, nvng lyis gas, Nyhang thank Soeu dah lvpe ge lui los das: khasoeh ge lyis nvng gas Yhensain dah cho sont das xiklyis nyah xik pheh loh das zis nghuot las,
42001077	Nyah dius jens lyis yaunos khyuot dyei zis xauh yvmvyah khyuot yoeus dah jyehjuh lyis seq nhang das.
42001078	Yah Mangso dah nhaiqnyen jyehjuh yah, nyah khyuot yoeus cho ka yah thoq mas buis teh pank dyei las,
42001079	chuot zis yahge shei dah siyet mas tsung toh bang dvnganh lyis nyenstap cho mha xauh suh bas jungh, nyhang thank thoq masyah pank dyei nyeis, ge.
42001080	Loshang ka bes los zis yahge nyah dah dyos yombos los las Israel vnyau lyis thuq xoeuq buisnyeis jweh shoq nyang gas mhanhdyvp mas nyeis.
42002001	Hauh buisnyeis gyo lyis mungkvn gonh dius nyings lhaih das xiklyis Kesar Agustu dah dang kyoh kat.
42002002	Haih dius nyings lhaih zis gas, Siria mau mas Kureni mungh zau kuot uhlyis, cangxeih vlhain nghuot.
42002003	Hauh uhlyis dius dvnganhmoq gas, nyings lhaih das xiklyis yuk khanghmuh vsainnyang wus pheh tsain loh.
42002004	Housoeh Yosep eq, Dawi dah nyei nyet nghuot yvmvyah, Galile mau Nazaret wus masyah Yuda mau Betlehem ge, Dawi dah wugungs pheh loh.
42002005	Nyah yhensain nyhiq duot das xiklyis kwank toh dah Mari yah dvgeh nyings kat das xiklyis loh. Mari gas ung mha loshang chi.
42002006	Nyah zomh houmha nyeis dah uhlyis, Mari loshang khoeu das buisnyeis jweh los las,
42002007	yukgis lomons lyis khoeu lha, misseh yah lyet las lang khau mha lhain toh: khasoeh ge lyis nyah zomh xiklyis hau boengh doq yhen mha joqyos ma bos.
42002008	Hauh wuxom pa mha yvng yoeuh bang gas, nyenh lyis nyamoq dah yvng tsomh uhlyis yah nyeis.
42002009	Yoeuh aq, Yhensain dah loeuswons soeu ka, nyamoq jyank mas jweh las, Yhensain dah phunk gas, nyamoq dah vyvm vwi mas bvng joq: housoeh las nyamoq gas svsoh gyuk.
42002010	Loeuswons soeu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Vgyuk goh, Yoeuh aq dius dvnganhmoq xiklyis gaus thank dang ngos namoq jyank mas wons lyih.
42002011	Khvnyhik Dawi wugungs mas namoq xiklyis khyuot yoeus soeu khoeu los. Hauh soeu ka Yhensain Khristu nghuot.
42002012	Namoq xiklyis vlho ka haih zis nghuot. Loshang lhyi shipu yah lyet las lang mas lhain toh zis lyis namoq nyvng das, ge.
42002013	Hauh loeuswons soeu yah dvgeh, loeuswons bang moqjens nyetlos nyettant thuq los las Mangso lhyi chungh zis gas:
42002014	Nyhang thank thoq mas Mangso ka phunk bos nyeis bas jungh, Nyeisjvng mas eq nyang nhaiqdoeus bang jyank mas nyenstap zis joq bas jungh, ge.
42002015	Hauh loeuswons bang nyamoq jyank masyah maukhung pheh tauh loh thang lhyi, yvng yoeuh bang dvyuk yah dvyuk taiq goh zis gas, Yang gvshih Betlehem jweh shoq e lha, bweh los goeus zis yahge Yhensain yang lyis seq nhang zis yah dvyhangteh, e tsain yoeuh goh, ge.
42002016	Housoeh nyamoq lvnyap e lha, Mari yahge Yosep lyis eq, lang mas lhain toh dah loshang lyis eq tsain nyvng.
42002017	Housoeh nyamoq nyvng lho lhyi, haih loshang dah cho, nyamoq lyis taiq kyoh khoq dah dang lyis tsain hoeuh loh.
42002018	Yvng yoeuh bang taiq dah dang lyis xauhgyo bang dvnganhmoq gas mauh.
42002019	Nghuot laus eq Mari gas haih cho dvnganh yvlyis comh yoeus las nyah ehnyet mas nghamh yoeuh nyeis.
42002020	Yvng yoeuh bang nyamoq lyis taiq zis yah dvyhangteh, nyamoq xauhgyo, xauh nyvng dah cho dvnganh gvng mas Mangso dah phunk lyis chungh las tauh loh.
42002021	Xet nyeih dyingh las nyang lyis vthyoh tyomh dyei lyis, nyang ung mha ma bos shih lyis yah loeuswons soeu nyings dyei toh vgus, nyang lyis Yesu ge nyhink.
42002022	Moshe dah lyi yah dvyhangteh nyamoq dah cheihshang chah dah buisnyeis dyingh los lyis, nyah zomh gas Yhensain lhyi kyauh das xiklyis nyang lyis Yerusalem mas shwih e.
42002023	Cangxeih khoeu dah yukgis lo khanghmuh lyis Yhensain xiklyis gyingshang oen yoh taiq das, ge Yhensain dah lyi mas lhaih toh vgus nghuot.
42002024	Yhensain dah lyi mas taiq zis yah dvyhangteh, khotjyauh dvzomh, nghuot ya, guzoe lo dvzomh yah lomhxangh lainh.
42002025	Yoeuh aq, Yerusalem mas Simon ge soeu dvyuk nyeis. Nyang gas dan las lomsjingh cho mha wontang soeu nghuot las Israel lyis nhaiqtaink dyei das cho lhyi nghamhloms nyeis soeu nghuot. Gyingshang Dyos eq nyah thoq mas nyeis.
42002026	Simon gas Yhensain dah Khristu lyis ma nyvng dvchank ma shei das ge, Gyingshang Dyos yah chixoeuq zis xauh.
42002027	Thungh yah dvyhangteh kuot dyei das nyhenshang nyhiphoq gas Yesu lyis shwih e lhyi, nyang eq Dyos yah yhenmuh mas jweh lyih los.
42002028	Nyang gas hauh loshang lyis nyah loq mas po chi lha Mangso lhyi chungh zis gas,
42002029	Yhensain eh, nah dang vgus nah jyeidwis lyis nyenstap zis yah shei nhang lo aq:
42002030	Khasoeh ge lyis nah khyuot yoeus cho lhyi ngah nyoqjeih yah nyvng goeus.
42002031	Dius dvnganhmoq xikkhonh mas hauh zis nvng sont toh dyei.
42002032	Gohnyau bang lyis pank dyei das dah bvng zis yahge Nah vnyau Israel dah phunk nyhenshang nghuot, ge.
42002033	Nyah cho yah sen zis lyis taiq gvng mas, Yosep yahge nyah ungwes gas gyo mauh.
42002034	Simon gas nyamoq lyis shvmanh dyei lho lha nyah ungwes Mari lyis taiq zis gas, Haih loshang ka Israel dius jens nyoshoq dyoqbis zis xauh das cho yahge khyuot yoeus zis xauh das xiklyis Mangso khyen toh soeu nghuot. Nyang lyis dius nyoshoq yah ngoek tyamp das, Mangso jyank mas dah vlho nghuot las nghop toh dah nghamh cho lhyi phank xoeuq das.
42002035	Nah sainh lyis eq shamthoh teh dah chiqjyen cho yah thauh kyank dyei zis xauh das, ge.
42002036	Hou mhayah Asher vnyau Phanuel dah lonyi Anna ge dah lvpe vmesbih dvyuk nyeis. Nyang gas svsoh mang goeus: lonyi uhlyis yah nyhet zvn kyingh nyah yhensain phoq yah zomh nyeis las,
42002037	zvnlom xetci nyei zvn bos shoq chauhmuh muh nyeis. Nyang gas yhenmuh yah ma gang, womkyi lha shvmanh dung zis yah nyeih nyenh Mangso lhyi phuqsoe nyeis.
42002038	Nyang eq hauh shishenh lyis los las Yhensain dah jyehjuh lyis chungh las, Yerusalem wugungs lyis khyuot yoeus das cho lhyi nghamhloms bang dvnganhmoq lyis nyah cho taiq kyoh.
42002039	Nyah zomh gas Yhensain dah lyi yah dvyhangteh dye kuot lho lhyi, nyamoq nyang dah wugungs Nazaret mas tauh loh.
42002040	Hauh loshang ka kuh bes, yombos los las joeui yah dyingh joq. Mangso dah nhaiqdoeus soeu bweh nyeis.
42002041	Gvshih nyah nyhiphoq gas, zvn yau zvn Lhuiq Kat Pwe Yerusalem mas loh.
42002042	Yesu dvci aiq zvn jweh lyis, pwe dah thungh yah dvyhangteh, nyamoq eq Yerusalem pheh doq loh.
42002043	Pwe buisnyeis lai loh thang lhyi tsain tauh loh lyis, loshang Yesu gas Yerusalem mas gyoh nyeis khoq; hauh zis lyis nyah ungwes uwus gas ma seq.
42002044	Nyang dius phung mha bos, ge nghamh las, dvnyeih gyung cho loh thang lhyi, buisnoms sainhchangh yahge seq goh bang mas nyang lyis tsain xo.
42002045	Nyah zomh gas nyang lyis ma nyvng lyis Yerusalem mas doms loh las nyang lyis xo.
42002046	Housoeh somh vnyeih lyis, nyang lyis yhenmuh khau mha svra moq dah vgungs mas tsung lha gyo yoeus las nyei goh nyeis zis lyis nyvng.
42002047	Nyah dang lyis xauhgyo bang dvnganhmoq gas, nyang seqgyo cho lhyi eq, nyang phuk taiq dang gvng mas eq tsain mauh.
42002048	Nyah ungwes uwus nyang lyis nyvng lhyi tsain mauh las nyah ungwes nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Lo eh, chamus nvng ngamoq lyis heisoeh kuot lah? Yoeuh aq, nah uwus yahge ngos gas nvng lyis sainhkhoh las xo nyeis, ge.
42002049	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Chamus namoq ngos lyis xo goh? Ngos gas ngah Uwus dah yhen mha nyeis chah yvlyis namoq ma seq goh lhyeh, ge.
42002050	Nghuot laus eq nyang nyah aiq yuk lyis taiq dah dang lyis nyah aiq yuk ma seqgyo.
42002051	Housoeh nyang gas nyamoq yah dvgeh loh las Nazaret mas jweh lyis nyamoq sang dang gyo las nyeis. Nghuot laus eq nyah ungwes gas hauh dang dvnganh zis lyis nyah nhaiqlom mas comh toh.
42002052	Yesu gas gungs bes yvmas thyoh bes, joeui bos los las, Mangso xikkhonh mas eq, dius xikkhonh mas eq nyoqnho ngelang bos los.
42003001	Hwankti Kesar guon zis dvci oeng vzvn lyis Pontu Pilat gas Yuda mau lyis, Herod gas Galile mau lyis, nyah vnoeuh Yuda gas Ituria yahge Trakoni lyis, Lisani gas Abili lyis guon nyeis uhlyis,
42003002	Anna yahge Kayapa gas phudyei zainsmuh tsain nghuot. Hauh uhlyis, Mangso dah dang gas mhanhdyvp mas nyeis, Zekharia dah lo Yohan jyank mas jweh los.
42003003	Nyang gas Yodan lvng vwi vyvm dvkhauyah jweh las yaunos masyah nhaiqlom thaiq zis yah jeisnyhop kham geh, Mangso ka namoq dah yaunos khyuot dyei das, ge taiq hoeuh nyeis.
42003004	Lvpe Esaia dah maussauh mas lhaih toh vgus, mhanhdyvp mas dvyuk kaiq nyeis dah thwe ka, Yhensain dah cho lhyi tsain sont toh geh; Nyah chokhyoh lyis soq dan geh.
42003005	Langhkhau khanghmuh yoh tyink das, Boms khanghmuh, jing khanghmuh lyis chink khyoq das; Cho yauhyot lyis yoh xiq das, Cho guih lyis yoh lhoq dan das.
42003006	Cangsoeu dius dvnganh Mangso dah khyuot yoeus cho lhyi nyvng das, ge.
42003007	Yohan ka nyah jyank mas jeisnyhop kham das xiklyis tsain los dah dius moqjens lyis taiq zis gas, Ywimuhtsanh vnyau eh, jweh los das dah nhaiqlom dyis masyah cangh das zis namoq lyis hank yah taiq kyingh goh lah?
42003008	Housoeh yvmvyah nhaiqlom thaiq zis yah mon yih dah vshih shih geh. Namoq ehnyet mas Abraham gas namoq dah phauh thyeih nghuot, oen vtaiq zo goh; khasoeh ge lyis, ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, Mangso ka haih lukzains masyah Abraham xiklyis lo jens yoh thuq los nhang.
42003009	Gvshih yangh wuzung gas saiqzains khyei mha toh goeus. Housoeh yvmvyah gis dah vshih ma shih dah vzains khanghmuh lyis thoeuq las nyi mas kat das.
42003010	Dius jens nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Housoeh lyis ngamoq cha kuot das lah, ge.
42003011	Nyang nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Thoq dyi aiq dung yoh soeu ka ma yoh soeu lhyi gvm dyei bas jungh; zonoms yoh soeu eq vgus housoeh kuot bas jungh, ge.
42003012	Khoengh khywi bang eq jeisnyhop kham das ge nyah jyank mas lyih las taiq zis gas, Svra eh, ngamoq cha kuot das lah, ge.
42003013	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Toeuq toh dah vgus masyah jyeq las vkhywi yoeus goh, ge.
42003014	Jeslo jens eq nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Ngamoq cha kuot das lah, ge. Nyang nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Hank lyis eq lyi ma bos khyvlyis ngwis vlhyent yoeus goh; ma jus khyvlyis zau vkauq goh, namoq nyang dah uhkung phauh yah nhaiqtap geh, ge.
42003015	Dius jens gas, Yohan ka Meshia mvbeh, ge nghamhloms zis yah nyamoq ehnyet mas tsain nghamh yoeuh nyeis.
42003016	Yohan nyamoq dvnganhmoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos gas namoq lyis jeis mas jeisnyhop dyei: nghuot laus eq ngah thoq lyis yombos soeu dvyuk ngah thang mha los nyeis. Ngos gas nyah thyvkoq twih phui das zis yangh ma mon. Nyang gas namoq lyis Gyingshang Dyos yah eq, nyi yah eq jeisnyhop dyei das.
42003017	Nyang nyah thanjang mas guk lhank das xiklyis hauq chi toh. Nyang gukmos lyis jyi mha kat toh las, guksom lhyi ka ma jom nyi mas ngheq das, ge.
42003018	Housoeh nyang gas gohtoeu taiq kyingh dang nyoshoq yah eq dius jens lyis gausyis dang taiq kyoh.
42003019	Mau nyei boms dvboms lyis guon dah zau Herod gas nyah vnoeuh Philip dah yhensain nyhiq Herodia cho yahge, Herod kuot dah ma shop muh dvnganh gvng mas eq nyang nyho zis xauh.
42003020	Hau thang lhyi Herod gas Yohan lyis thung lhunk zis yah nyang gas zes ma gis dah muh kuot goeus.
42003021	Dius jens dvnganh jeisnyhop dye kham thang lhyi Yesu eq jeisnyhop kham. Nyang shvmanh dung nyeis lyis maukhung phank los las,
42003022	Gyingshang Dyos gas khotjyauh gungs teh zis nyah thoq mas gyoh lyih. Hauh uhlyis maukhung mhayah thwe dvkoeuq thuq los zis gas, Nvng gas ngos jyetdap dah ngah Lo nghuot, ngos nvng lyis nhaiqdoeus, ge.
42003023	Yesu gas muh kuot xi loh lyis, somhci zvn ko nghuot; Nyang gas dius jens nghamh vgus, Yosep dah lo khyvlyis nghuot. Yosep gas Heli dah lo;
42003024	Heli gas Mathat dah lo; Mathat gas Lewi dah lo; Lewi gas Melki dah lo; Melki gas Yanai dah lo; Yanai gas Yosep dah lo;
42003025	Yosep gas Matathia dah lo; Matathia gas Amo dah lo; Amo gas Nahum dah lo; Nahum gas Esli dah lo; Esli gas Nagai dah lo;
42003026	Nagai gas Maat dah lo; Maat gas Matathia dah lo; Matathia gas Semein dah lo; Semein gas Yosek dah lo; Yosek gas Yoda dah lo;
42003027	Yoda gas Yoanan dah lo; Yoanan gas Resa dah lo; Resa gas Zerubabe dah lo; Zerubabe gas Shealtiel dah lo; Sheatiel gas Neri dah lo;
42003028	Neri gas Melki dah lo; Melki gas Adi dah lo; Adi gas Khosam dah lo; Khosam gas Elmadam dah lo; Elmadam gas Era dah lo;
42003029	Era gas Yoshua dah lo; Yoshua gas Elieza dah lo; Elieza gas Yorim dah lo; Yorim gas Mathat dah lo; Mathat gas Lewi dah lo;
42003030	Lewi gas Simon dah lo; Simon gas Yuda dah lo; Yuda gas Yosep dah lo; Yosep gas Yonam dah lo; Yonam gas Eliakim dah lo;
42003031	Eliakim gas Melea dah lo; Melea gas Mena dah lo; Mena gas Matatha dah lo; Matatha gas Nathan dah lo; Nathan gas Dawi dah lo;
42003032	Dawi gas Yese dah lo; Yese gas Obed dah lo; Obed gas Boaz dah lo; Boaz gas Salmon dah lo; Salmon gas Nashon dah lo;
42003033	Nashon gas Aminadab dah lo; Aminadab gas Admin dah lo; Admin gas Arni dah lo, Arni gas Hezron dah lo; Hezron gas Pere dah lo; Pere gas Yuda dah lo;
42003034	Yuda gas Yakop dah lo; Yakop gas Isak dah lo; Isak gas Abraham dah lo; Abraham gas Tera dah lo; Tera gas Nahor dah lo;
42003035	Nahor gas Serug dah lo; Serug gas Reu dah lo; Reu gas Peleg dah lo; Peleg gas Eber dah lo; Eber gas Shela dah lo;
42003036	Shela gas Kainan dah lo; Kainan gas Arphaza dah lo; Arphaza gas Shem dah lo; Shem gas Noa dah lo; Noa gas Lamek dah lo;
42003037	Lamek gas Methusela dah lo; Methusela gas Enok dah lo; Enok gas Yared dah lo; Yared gas Mahalalel dah lo; Mahalalel gas Kenan dah lo;
42003038	Kenan gas Enosh dah lo; Enosh gas Set dah lo; Set gas Adam dah lo; Adam gas Mangso dah lo nghuot.
42004001	Hauh thang lhyi Yesu gas Gyingshang Dyos dyingh las Yodan lvng masyah tauh loh lyis, Dyos yah mhanhdyvp pheh shwih loh.
42004002	Houmha nyeici nyeih Satan yah shiwu zis xauh; hauh buisnyeis gyo lyis nyang gas cha eq ma zo las, thang thank lyis nyang wom yuot.
42004003	Housoeh las yius nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng Mangso dah Lo nghuot lyis gas, haih lukgoq lyis ohlhyoq bweh nhang aq, ge.
42004004	Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Dius gas ohlhyoq yah kyingh yoh dwis nyeis zis ma nghuot, ge lhaih toh, ge.
42004005	Tsai, yius gas nyang lyis boms nyhang thoq mas shwih doq loh las, mungkvn mas dah munghdan dvnganh lyis dvdvm dyvm chixoeuq.
42004006	Yius gas, Haih yomsoq yahge dis cho dvnganh yah ngos nvng lyis dyei das. Khasoeh ge lyis hauh zis gas ngos lyis kyauh toh goeus las, ngos dyei mes soeu hank lyis eq yoh dyei.
42004007	Nvng ngos lyis paiq lyis gas, hai dvnganh yah nah zis nghuot das, ge.
42004008	Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Nvng Yhensain nah Mangso lhyi paiq las, nyang lyis kyingh phuqsoe chah, ge lhaih toh, ge.
42004009	Tsai, yius gas nyang lyis Yerusalem mas shwih loh las, Yhenmuh thyoh mas yap nhang lha taiq zis gas, Nvng Mangso dah Lo nghuot lyis gas hei mhayah o mha dyvm gyoh aq.
42004010	Khasoeh ge lyis lhaih toh zis gas, Nvng lyis gomh das xiklyis Mangso ka nyah loeuswons bang lyis tying toh das.
42004011	Nah khyei lukzains mas ma thungh das xiklyis nyamoq loq yah nvng lyis po langh das, ge.
42004012	Yesu phuk taiq zis gas, Nvng Yhensain nah Mangso lhyi vshi yoeuh ge lhaih toh, ge.
42004013	Yius gas Yesu lyis shiwu zis dvnganh dye goeus ya, nyah jyank masyah dvyoq gang loh.
42004014	Hou mhayah Yesu gas Galile mau pheh tauh loh. Gyingshang Dyos dah yomsoq gas nyang mas bos joq. Hauh uhlyis nyah cho dvmau yah hoeuh loh.
42004015	Nyang nyamoq dah lyi jungs mas jyauh las nyamoq dvnganhmoq nyang lyis chungh.
42004016	Housoeh nyang nyeis bes los dah Nazaret mas jweh loh las, nyah thungh yah dvyhangteh Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis lyi jungs mas wvng loh. Houmha nyang maussauh nghap das xiklyis toq yap.
42004017	Lvpe Esaia maussauh dain nyang lyis dyei los las, nyang hauh yvlyis phank lyis heisoeh ge lhaih toh yvlyis nyvng.
42004018	Yhensain dah Dyos ngah thoq mas nyeis. Khasoeh ge lyis nyungs bang lyis gausyis dang taiq kyoh das xiklyis, Nyang ngos lyis coeu juot dyei. Lhunk toh bang lyis phank kat das xiklyis, nyoqjet bang doms nyvng das xiklyis, zaiq toh las shanghsenh zis xauh bang luiq das xiklyis taiq kyoh das nyhenshang nyang ngos lyis nhang kat.
42004019	Yhensain nhaiq doeus zvn lyis taiq hoeuh das, ge.
42004020	Dye lyis nyang hauh maussauh nyheih las uhshe soeu lhyi doms dyei lho lha tsung toh. Hauh lyi jungs mas bang dvnganh nyang lyis yoeuh tsuk toh.
42004021	Housoeh nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Hai lhaihtoh dang gas khvnyhik nyang namoq dah no mas nyuk los goeus, ge.
42004022	Dvnganhmoq yah nyah cho lhyi kanghjyoeng kat dyei zis yahge, nyah nhuot masyah thuq los dah jyehjuh dang lyis mauh las, Haih soeu ka Yosep dah lo ma nghuot lhyeh, ge.
42004023	Housoeh las nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq gas ngos lyis, Lastsiang eh, nvnyang gungs lyis yhohzo aq; ngamoq xauhgyo ku vgus, Kaperna-um mas kuot teh nvnyang mau mas eq kuot xoeuq aq, ge sodang yah tsain taiq los das, ge.
42004024	Nyang taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, lvpe lhyi nyah choq thyet mau mas lhom yoeus zis ma bos, ge.
42004025	Nghuot laus eq ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, Eliya zaih lyis maukhung lhyi somh zvn lhamhmuh khyuk khyvp mau ma wus las, mau gonh mas panghkhauq gyoh los lyis Israel vnyau mas chauhmuh nyoshoq nyeis khoq ku.
42004026	Nghuot laus eq Sidon mau Zarephat mha dah chauhmuh dvyuk mas lai las gohyuk hank jyank mas eq Eliya lyis ma nhang kat.
42004027	Lvpe Elisha zaih lyis eq Israel mau mas mvnggvng dap bang nyoshoq nyeis khoq; Siria dius Naman mas lai las nyamoq mas gohyuk hank eq ma yoh thyauhlhang los, ge.
42004028	Haih dang xauhgyo lyis lyi jungs mas bang dvnganh gas nhaiqlom dyis zis yah,
42004029	toq las nyang lyis wus nghe pheh khat thuq las nyamoq wus kuot toh dah jing mhung mhayah vtauh khyvlyis duon thyet khyoq das ge tsain shwih loh.
42004030	Nghuot laus eq nyang gas nyamoq dah vjo masyah thuq las loh lo.
42004031	Yesu gas Galile mau Kaperna-um wus mas loh las, Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis nyang dius jens lyis jyauh.
42004032	Nyang gas vmingh yah taiq yvmvyah nyamoq gas nyang jyauh cho lhyi mauh.
42004033	Hauh uhlyis lyi jungs mas yius kuq dah dius dvyuk nyeis, nyang gas yomkat kaiq las,
42004034	Nazaret phoq Yesu eh, nvng ngamoq yah cha sen lah? Nvng ngamoq lyis mhont das xiklyis los lhyeh? Ngos nvng hank nghuot zis seq; Nvng gas Mangso dah Gyingshang Soeu nghuot, ge.
42004035	Hauh uhlyis Yesu gas nyang lyis, Tsoek! nyah jyank masyah thuq loh aq, ge nyho. Housoeh las yius gas hauh soeu lhyi dvm ma dap nhang nhang nyamoq vgungs mas toeulhain tyamp khoq las nyah jyank masyah thuq loh.
42004036	Housoeh las dvnganhmoq mauh las nyamoq nyang changh taiq goh nyeis zis gas, Haih zis gas chah dang nghuot au lhyeh? Zaudang yah eq, yomsoq yah eq yius lyis taiq kat las nyamoq thuq loh, ge.
42004037	Housoeh las hauh mau vyvm vwi joqyos khyiq khanghmuh mas nyah cho tsain taiq hoeuh loh.
42004038	Nyang lyi jungs masyah thuq loh las, Simon dah yhen mha wvng loh. Houmha Simon dah yuknyih gungs svsoh ngeh las nos nyeis. Nyamoq gas nyah nyhenshang Yesu lyis sang.
42004039	Housoeh las nyang nyah nvm mas yap las hauh nos lyis nyho tyamp lho lhyi nyang gungs ngeh zis gis los. Nyang houjang toq las nyamoq lyis daih.
42004040	Buis wvng zoh lyis noslom vja ja yah nos moq yoh bang dvnganh gas hauh bang lyis nyah jyank mas shwih lyih; nyang gas nyamoq yuk khanghmuh dah thoq mas loq kih dyei las gis los nhang.
42004041	Yius jens eq, nyoshoq moq masyah, Nvng gas Mangso dah Lo nghuot, ge kaiq las tsain thuq loh. Nyamoq gas nyang Meshia nghuot yvlyis seq yvmvyah nyang nyamoq lyis dang ma yoh jis lo shoq nyho.
42004042	Nyoq nyvng los lyis nyang gas mhanhdyvp pheh loh. Dius jens gas nyang lyis chank xo lha, nyah jyank mas jweh lyis, nyang lyis nyamoq jyank masyah ma gang loh das xiklyis tomp.
42004043	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Gohwus gohthomh mas eq Mangso munghdan gausyis dang ngos loh taiq kyoh chah: khasoeh ge lyis hauh nyhenshang ngos lyis nhang kat, ge.
42004044	Housoeh nyang gas dvmau gonh mas dah lyi jungs mas tsain taiq hoeuh.
42005001	Dvlhain ka Yesu Genesaret thomh yvm mas yap joq dah uhlyis moqjens gas Mangso dang gyo yoeus das xiklyis nhoenk los.
42005002	Hauh uhlyis nyang gas jyank yvm mas lhyik aiq koeuq joq yvlyis nyvng. Oeng nhoh bang gas lhyik masyah thuq las nyho tsain cheih nyeis.
42005003	Nyang gas Simon dah lhyik khau mha wvng lho lha, tungyos masyah dvtsiq we loh das xiklyis Simon lyis sang. Housoeh nyang tsung lha moqjens lyis jyauh.
42005004	Nyang dang dye taiq lyis Simon lyis taiq zis gas, Jeis nauh yvmas ywi las nyho doeuh aq, ge.
42005005	Simon nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, ngamoq nyens gonh kuot nyung goeus, nghuot laus eq nah dang masyah ngos nyho doeuh bah, ge.
42005006	Nyamoq nyho doeuh zis yah dvyhangteh oengdoq nyoshoq xauh doeuh yoeus las nyho eq juiq bah ge loh.
42005007	Housoeh nyamoq gas gohtoeu lhyik mas dah loeuzomh jens lyis los bos pangh das xiklyis uk nyeis. Nyamoq los las lhyik aiq koeuq mas dyingh las nyop loh bah ge loh.
42005008	Simon Petru hauh zis nyvng lyis, Yesu dah khyeiyang mas gyuis gyoh las taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, ngah jyank masyah gang loh aq: Khasoeh ge lyis ngos gas yaunos wons soeu nghuot, ge.
42005009	Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq oengdoq hounyhoq tsain xauh yoeus yvmvyah, nyang eq, nyang yah dvgeh bang dvnganhmoq eq mauh.
42005010	Simon dah oengnhoh changh Zebedi dah lotang Yaku yahge Yohan eq tsain mauh. Yesu Simon lyis taiq, Vgyuk, gvshih masyah nvng dius nhoh das, ge.
42005011	Nyamoq lhyik lyis jyankyvm mas dvp loh lho lhyi, nyamoq vyhang dvnganh tsain toh khoq las nyah thang mha chank loh.
42005012	Nyang wugungs dvkoeuq mas nyeis lyis, yoeuh aq, dvgungs yah mvnggvng dap soeu dvyuk Yesu lyis nyvng lyis, dupaiq las dung zis gas, Yhensain eh, nvng bauh nghuot lyis gas ngos lyis yoh thyauhlhyang los nhang, ge.
42005013	Hauh uhlyis Yesu gas nyang nyah loq yhuonh kat las, nyang lyis tanh uhlyis yah, Ngos mes, nvng thyauhlhyang los aq ge lho lhyi, houjang nyah gungs mas mvnggvng gas dyuk loh.
42005014	Yesu gas, hank lyis eq ma taiq kyoh das xiklyis khyangh com lho lha taiq zis gas, Loh aq, gohyhamh bang dah xiklyis kanghjyoeng nghuot bas jungh, phudyei soeu jyank mas nah gungs loh chixoeuq aq, Moshe lyi vgus, nvng thyauhlhyang los goeus gvng mas loh phudyei khoq aq, ge.
42005015	Nghuot laus eq Yesu dah cho ka zes hoeuh loh. Dius moqjens gas nyah dang gyo yoeus das zis yahge nos yhoh yoeus das xiklyis tsain zain los.
42005016	Nghuot laus eq nyang gas mhanhdyvp pheh thuq loh las shvmanh dung nyeis.
42005017	Dvnyeih gas, nyang nyamoq lyis jyauh nyeis lyis, Galile mau, Yuda mau yahge Yerusalem, wus khanghmuh mas dah Pharishe jens yahge lyi svra jens eq, nyah nvm thaq los tsung toh. Nyamoq lyis gis los nhang das xiklyis Yhensain dah yomsoq gas nyah jyank mas bos joq.
42005018	Yoeuh aq, gungsjen shei soeu dvyuk lyis yhetyos masyah nyamoq dvng lyih las, nyah xikkhonh mas wvng das xiklyis cho tsain xo.
42005019	Nghuot laus eq dius sunk nyo yvmvyah nyang lyis khasoeh kuot las dvng hwank das cho xo ma nyvng las, nyamoq gas yhenkhung mha doq loh las yhenkhung phank lho lha, hauh soeu lhyi nyah yhetyos yah dvgeh moqphung vgungs, Yesu dah xikkhonh mas juons khyoq kat.
42005020	Nyang nyamoq dah lomsjingh nhaiqlom lyis nyvng lyis nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Buisnoms eh, nah yaunos khyuot dyei goeus, ge.
42005021	Hauh uhlyis maussauh lhaih bang yahge Pharishe moq gas, heisoeh loeusmus soqzo dang taiq soeu ka hank nghuot lah? Mangso kyingh ma nghuot lyis gas, yaunos hank yoh khyuot dyei lah, ge.
42005022	Nghuot laus eq nyamoq nghamh zis lyis Yesu seq yvmvyah, nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Namoq ehnyet mas chamus housoeh tsain nghamh goh lah?
42005023	Nah yaunos khyuot dyei goeus oen zis yahge, Toq yap las suh loh aq, oen zis kha khonh zes taiq lwis lah?
42005024	Nghuot laus eq cangsoeu Lo gas nyeisjvng thoq mas yaunos yoh khyuot dyei dah vmingh yoh zis gas namoq seq das xiklyis hauh gungsjen shei soeu lhyi, Ngos nvng lyis taiq bah, Toq aq, nah yhetyos yoeus las nah yhen pheh loh aq, ge.
42005025	Houjang nyang nyamoq xikkhonh masyah toq las, nyah yhetyos yoeus lho lha Mangso lhyi chungh uhlyis yah nyah yhen pheh loh.
42005026	Nyamoq dvnganhmoq mauh dvn las Mangso lhyi chungh nyeis; nyamoq gyuk las taiq zis gas, Khvnyhik ngamoq muh gohtseq nyvng goeus, ge.
42005027	Hauh thang lhyi nyang thuq loh lyis khoengh khywi jang mas Lewi ge dah khoengh khywi soeu tsung toh zis lyis nyvng las nyang lyis, Ngah thang mha chank los aq, ge.
42005028	Nyang gas dvnganh toh khoq las nyah thang mha chank loh.
42005029	Lewi gas Yesu lyis nyah yhen mha pwe zainsmuh dvkoeuq kuot dyei; houmha khoengh khywi bang yahge gohtoeu nyoshoq moq dvgeh tsung toh.
42005030	Housoeh las Pharishe moq yahge nyamoq dah maussauh lhaih bang dvyhamh gas, Namoq khoengh khywi bang yahge yaunos wons bang yah dvgeh chamus zo shuk goh lah, ge nyah changlo jens lyis tsain lop.
42005031	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Yanghzan bang gas mvcheih lastsiang ma chah, nos bang dvchah.
42005032	Dan bang lyis khi das xiklyis ngos lyih zis ma nghuot; yaunos wons bang nhaiqlom thaiq das xiklyis dvnghuot, ge.
42005033	Nyamoq, nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yohan dah changlo jens gas Pharishe dah changlo jens teh dvsoq soq lyis womkyi lha shvmanh dung; nghuot laus eq nah changlo jens gas zo shuk nyeis, ge.
42005034	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Nyi hwank pwe los bang lyis, nyamoq loloeu saiq yah dvgeh nyeis shih lyis wom yoh kyi nhang das lah?
42005035	Nghuot laus eq, loloeu saiq lyis nyamoq jyank masyah shwih loh buisnyeis jweh los das, hauh uhlyis nyamoq womkyi das, ge.
42005036	Nyang nyamoq lyis dangtoeuq dvkoeuq taiq zis gas, Dyi saiq masyah misseh chuiq las dyi tyang mha hank ma pho; housoeh kuot lyis gas, dyi saiq eq juiq las, vcauh eq dyisaiq seh yah ma phi goh das.
42005037	Zvbiq saiq eq shohyeis thung cauh mas hank ma kat, shohyeis thung cauh mas zvbiq jeis saiq kat lyis gas, zvbiq jeis saiq gas hau thung lhyi juiq nhang zis yah zvbiq shuon lha shohyeis thung eq monh das.
42005038	Nghuot laus eq zvbiq saiq lyis gas shohyeis thung saiq mas kat chah.
42005039	Zvbiq vcauh shuk goeus soeu ka vsaiq lyis ma o: Khasoeh ge lyis vcauh gas gis ge taiq, ge.
42006001	Yuda No Buisnyeis dvnyeih lyis, Yesu gas sunghso yos cho yah lai loh. Hauh uhlyis nyah changlo jens gas sunghso nham lhyi shap las loq yah tsain nis phuk zo loh.
42006002	Housoeh las Pharishe dvyhamh nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis kuot das lyi ma bos zis lyis chamus kuot goh, ge.
42006003	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Dawi nyang yahge nyah dyenschangh jens gas, yuot shet dah uhlyis, cha kuot khoq zis lyis namoq ma nghap yoeuh goh lhyeh?
42006004	Nyang gas Mangso dah yhen khau mha wvng loh las, phudyei bang kyingh ma nghuot lyis gas, hank eq ma gis zo, chixoeuq ohlhyoq lyis nyah dyenschangh jens lyis eq dyei las, tsain zo ma nghuot lhyeh, ge.
42006005	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Cangsoeu Lo gas Yuda No Buisnyeis dah Yhensain nghuot, ge.
42006006	Gohtoeu Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis nyang gas lyi jungs mha wvng las jyauh nyeis; houmha loqyos loq shei soeu dvyuk nyeis.
42006007	Maussauh lhaih bang yahge Pharishe moq gas, nyang lyis yoh kauq shoq Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis nyang nos bang lyis vgis los nhang dvluk, ge tsain zungh yoeuh nyeis.
42006008	Nghuot laus eq nyamoq nghamh zis lyis Yesu seq las, loq shei soeu lhyi, Heimha los yap aq, ge lyis nyang toq yap joq.
42006009	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis dvja nyei yoeuh bah, Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis gis cho kuot das zis lyi bos lah? ma gis cho kuot das zis lyi bos lah? Kang kyoeu gis lah, mhont gis lah, ge.
42006010	Hauh thang lhyi nyang gas vyvm vwi mas nyamoq lyis tsain yoeuh lho lha, nyang nos soeu lhyi taiq zis gas, Nah loq yhuonh kat aq, ge. Nyang loq yhuonh kat lyis nyah loq gis los.
42006011	Nghuot laus eq, nyamoq gas nhaiq gis yo las, Yesu lyis khasoeh kuot das lah, ge nyang changh nyang xamgoh nyeis.
42006012	Hauh buisnyeis gyo lyis, Yesu gas shvmanh dung das xiklyis boms mas doq loh las dvnyens gonh Mangso lhyi shvmanh dung nyeis.
42006013	Nyoq nyvng los lyis nyah changlo jens lyis khi yoeus las nyamoq masyah dvci aiq yuk khyen yoeus lho lha, nyamoq lyis lvgyo jens ge nyhink.
42006014	Hauh bang gas, Yesu yah Petru ge nyings nyhink dyei dah Simon yahge nyah vnoeuh Andre; Yaku yahge Yohan; Philip; Bartholomeu;
42006015	Mathe yahge Thoma; Alphe dah lotang Yaku yahge Zelot ge soeu Simon;
42006016	Yaku dah lo Yuda yahge phanhlyen soeu Yudas Iskarot moq nghuot.
42006017	Yesu gas lvgyo jens yah dvgeh jing masyah gyoh loh las jangpa mha nyah changlo jens dius phung zainsmuh yah dvgeh yap joq. Hauh yvmas Yuda mau gonh mas bang, Yerusalem mas bang, thomh yvm Taire yahge Sidon mau mas bang bos.
42006018	Nyamoq gas nyah dang gyo yoeus das zis yahge, nyamoq dah nos zis gis los das xiklyis tsain los. Yius yah yau dyei zis xauh bang eq los las gis los nhang zis xauh.
42006019	Yhensain dah gungs mas yomsoq thuq las dvnganhmoq lyis gis los nhang yvmvyah moq dvphung gonh nyang lyis xauh tanh das xiklyis tsain yomkat.
42006020	Housoeh nyang nyah changlo jens lyis nghank yoeuh las taiq zis gas, Namoq nyungs bang gas ngelhoq: Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso munghdan gas namoq zis nghuot.
42006021	Namoq gvshih yuot shet nyeis bang gas ngelhoq: Khasoeh ge lyis namoq jo los das. Namoq gvshih ngaus nyeis bang gas ngelhoq: Khasoeh ge lyis namoq yis das.
42006022	Cangsoeu Lo gvng mas namoq lyis hoeng zis yah kangh tyamp las jwangh zis yah namoq nyings lyis ma gis khyvlyis nghamh las lhoeu thyoq zis xauh lyis namoq ngelhoq.
42006023	Hauh buisnyeis lyis tsain gausyis las jywe nyeis geh: Khasoeh ge lyis maukhung mha namoq lyis phauh shangh zis gas svsoh kuh. Nyamoq dah phauh thyeih moq eq lvpe jens lyis housoeh teh kuot ku.
42006024	Nghuot laus eq namoq dis bang gas mvtanhzoe nghuot! Khasoeh ge lyis namoq gas pyo pyo xauh nyeis goeus.
42006025	Gvshih namoq jo buk nyeis bang gas mvtanhzoe nghuot! Khasoeh ge lyis namoq yuot shet zis xauh das. Namoq gvshih yis nyeis bang gas mvtanhzoe nghuot! Khasoeh ge lyis namoq gas kukxi zis yahge ngaus zis xauh das.
42006026	Dius dvnganhmoq namoq lyis gis, ge taiq lyis namoq mvtanhzoe nghuot! Khasoeh ge lyis namoq dah phauh thyeih moq eq lvpe hwah jens lyis housoeh teh taiq khoq ku.
42006027	Namoq gyo yoeus bang lyis ngos taiq bah, Namoq dah jeswus lyis jyetdap geh. Namoq lyis hoeng bang lyis eq gis khyvlyis kuot dyei geh.
42006028	Namoq lyis nhoengh bang lyis shvmanh dyei geh; namoq lyis laihwangh bang lyis shvmanh dung dyei geh.
42006029	Nah bvlot dvshot los tyuk soeu lhyi, gohtoeu dvshot eq lhaiq dyei shih aq; nah thoq dyi yoeus soeu lhyi nah dyi lyis eq yoeus nhang shih aq.
42006030	Nvng lyis sang soeu lhyi dyei aq; nah kyahsoe zisyos yoeus loh soeu jyank masyah vdoms sang lo.
42006031	Gohyuk yah namoq lyis khasoeh kuot dyei nhang mes lyis namoq eq nyamoq lyis housoeh nyang kuot dyei geh.
42006032	Namoq lyis jyetdap bang lyis kyingh namoq doms phuk jyetdap lyis gas, namoq xiklyis chah jyehjuh bos lah? Khasoeh ge lyis yaunos wons bang yangh vsainnyang lyis jyetdap bang lyis gas jyetdap.
42006033	Namoq lyis gis zis kuot bang lyis kyingh gis khyvlyis phuk kuot lyis gas, namoq xiklyis chah jyehjuh bos lah? Khasoeh ge lyis yaunos wons bang eq housoeh gas kuot.
42006034	Yoh doms cap das teh bang lyis za dvjyeih dvnghoh dyei lyis gas namoq xiklyis chah jyehjuh bos lah? Khasoeh ge lyis yaunos wons bang yangh yaunos wons bang lyis yoh doms cap das nyhoq jyeih dyei.
42006035	Nghuot laus eq namoq dah jeswus lyis jyetdap aq, nyamoq lyis gis zis kuot geh; doms xauh yoeus das oen ma nghamh jyeih nghoh dyei geh; housoeh lyis namoq khyik manh phauh gas kuh das. Nyhang thank thoq mas Soeu dah lo jens eq namoq duot das: khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas jyehjuh ma seq nghamh bang yahge ma gis bang lyis nhaiqnyen nyeis.
42006036	Housoeh yvmvyah namoq dah Uwus nhaiqnyen zis yah dvyhangteh, namoq eq nhaiqnyen nyeis geh.
42006037	Soe vtuon goh, housoeh lyis namoq eq soetuon zis ma xauh das. Yobos vhuon goh, housoeh lyis namoq eq yobos huon zis ma xauh das. Khyuot dyei geh, housoeh lyis namoq eq khyuot dyei zis xauh das.
42006038	Dyei geh, housoeh lyis namoq lyis dyei das: jyoeng pan mhayah dyingh muis shoq lhvvq jying lha namoq dah dyithang khau mha dyei das: Khasoeh ge lyis namoq laiq dyei pan mhayah namoq lyis doms laiq dyei das.
42006039	Nyang nyamoq lyis dangtoeuq yah taiq zis gas, nyoqjet soeu ka nyoqjet soeu lhyi cho yoh she goh das lah? Aiq yuk yah dwang mas ma gyoh das lah?
42006040	Changlo gas svra thoq lyis zes zis ma nghuot: nghuot laus eq dyinghjet shoq xuq goeus soeu hank laus eq nyah svra teh nghuot das.
42006041	Nah nyoqjeih mas bos dah thangh-tungh lyis ma nghamh yoeuh, nah vmang vnoeuh nyoqjeih mas bos dah phvlhau lhyi chamus yoeuh nyeis lah?
42006042	Vsainnyang dah nyoqjeih mas dah thangh-tungh yangh ma nyvng zis, Vmang vnoeuh eh, nah nyoqjeih mas dah phvlhau lhyi ngos yoeus tyamp dyei bah, oen nah vmang vnoeuh lyis khasoeh yoh taiq lah? Gis guons kuot soeu eh, nah nyoqjeih mas dah thangh-tungh lyis shih cangxeih yoeus tyamp aq; hauh thang lhyi nah vmang vnoeuh nyoqjeih mas dah phvlhau lhyi yoeus tyamp dyei das zis dede nyvng das.
42006043	Khasoeh ge lyis, saiq gis zains mas ma gis dah vshih ma shih; ma gis dah saiqzains mas eq gis dah vshih ma shih.
42006044	Housoeh las saiqzains khanghmuh lyis nyah vshih masyah yoh seq: Khasoeh ge lyis zoeu zains masyah maiphang shih hank ma thyoq yoeus ku; zoeu gyomh masyah eq zvbiq shih hank ma thyoq ku.
42006045	Gis soeu ka nyah gis dah nhaiqlom zisyos masyah gis zis thuq kat. Ma gis soeu eq nyah ma gis dah nhaiqlom masyah ma gis zis thuq kat: Khasoeh ge lyis nhaiqlom mas dyingh las nhuot mas taiq thuq los.
42006046	Ngos taiq zis yah dvyhangteh ma tsain kuot zis, ngos lyis Yhensain eh, Yhensain eh, oen chamus lui goh lah?
42006047	Ngah jyank mas los las, ngah dang gyo yoeus zis yah chank kuot bang hank lyis laus eq, nyang hank yah doeusgoh zis lyis ngos chixoeuq das.
42006048	Nyang gas lukmuh lom thoq mas noq noq doeu cuk toh dah yhen tsuk soeu yah doeusgoh: jeis je los las changhphauq doeuh lyis eq hauh yhen lhyi ma yoh lhoq nhont: Khasoeh ge lyis hauh zis gas lukmuh lom thoq mas ci toh.
42006049	Nghuot laus eq xauhgyo thang lhyi ma chank dah soeu ka, yhen lhyi ma ci, nyeisjvng mas kuot soeu yah doeusgoh. Hauh yhen lhyi jeisbaus yah guons las houjang lains loh; hauh yhen dyoqbis tyamp, ge.
42007001	Yesu dius jens lyis dvnganh dye jyauh goeus ya, Kaperna-um wus mas wvng loh.
42007002	Hauh uhlyis jes dvxo guon zau jyetdap dah jyeidwis gas nos las shei loh nyeis.
42007003	Nyang Yesu dah loeus xauhgyo las, Yuda jens dah logis jens lyis Yesu jyank mas, nyah jyeidwis lyis lyih lhoq gis dyei das xiklyis sang nhang kat.
42007004	Nyamoq Yesu jyank mas jweh lyis, nyang lyis khyoeuq taiq zis gas, Nvng haih zis kuot dyei das xiklyis nyang gas mon yih soeu nghuot.
42007005	Nyang gas yah vnyau lyis jyetdap yvmvyah, yah xiklyis lyi jungs eq dvkoeuq kuot dyei soeu nghuot, ge.
42007006	Housoeh las Yesu gas nyamoq yah dvgeh chank loh. Nyang hauh yhen yah khahweq ma we yvmas jweh lyis, jes dvxo guon zau gas nyah dyenschangh lyis yah taiq nhang kat zis gas, Yhensain eh, nvng lyis ma thauqkhyi lo goeus jungh, nvng ngah yhen nyhangh mau khau mas wvng das zis ngos ma mon.
42007007	Housoeh ngos eq nah jyank mas lyih das zis ma mon oen ngos nghamh; nghuot laus eq nah dang dvkhonh yah taiq kat aq. Housoeh lyis ngah jyeidwis gis los das.
42007008	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos gas vmingh khau mha dah dius dvyuk nghuot las, ngah o mha eq jeslo jens nyeis: ngos haih soeu lhyi, Loh aq, oen lhyi nyang loh. Gohtoeu dvyuk lyis, Los aq, oen lhyi nyang los. Ngah jyeidwis lyis, Haih zis kuot aq, oen lhyi nyang kuot, ge.
42007009	Yesu gas hauh zis xauhgyo lyis, nyang lyis mauh las nyah thang mha chank yenh bang lyis lhain yoeuh las, Ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, Israel dius nyau mas yangh hei iq lomsjingh zis ngos ma nyvng, ge.
42007010	Hau nhang kat zis xauh bang yhen mha doms jweh loh lyis, hauh jyeidwis gas gis nyeis langh goeus zis lyis nyvng.
42007011	Ma nyangh lyis nyang gas Na-in ge dah wukhau mha loh lyis nyah changlo jens yahge moqjens eq nyang yah dvgeh loh.
42007012	Nyang wus khomh jweh ni los lyis, Yoeuh aq, chauhmuh dvyuk dah loloeu loteh shei lha mvng tsain dvng nyhop loh: wugungs dius nyoshoq eq nyang yah dvgeh nghuot.
42007013	Yhensain ka hauh chauhmuh lyis nyvng lyis nhaiq yoeuh nyen las, nyang lyis, Vngaus, ge.
42007014	Nyang loh las, koncaih lyis tanh lho lhyi, mvng dvng bang gas no yap joq. Housoeh nyang gas, Loyvm phoq eh, ngos nvng lyis taiq bah, Toq aq, ge.
42007015	Shei soeu ka toq tsung lha dang jis los. Housoeh Yesu gas nyah ungwes lyis kyauh kat.
42007016	Dvnganhmoq gyuk los las, nyamoq Mangso lhyi chungh zoh lyis yah taiq zis gas, Lvpe zainsmuh dvyuk yamoq mas thuq los goeus; Mangso ka nyah dius lyis lyih komh yenh, ge.
42007017	Housoeh las hai nyah loeus gas Yuda mau gonh yahge hauh vyvm vwi mas tsain taiq hoeuh loh.
42007018	Yohan dah changlo jens gas hauh cho dvnganh Yohan lyis loh taiq kyoh.
42007019	Yohan gas nyah changlo aiq yuk lyis khi lha, Yesu jyank mas nhang lha taiq zis gas, Nvng gas lyih das soeu nghuot lah? Nghuot ya ngamoq gohtoeu lhyi langh shih das lah, ge.
42007020	Nyah aiq yuk eq nyah jyank mas jweh lyis, Nvng gas hau jweh los das soeu nghuot lah? Nghuot ya ngamoq gohyuk lyis langh shih das lah, ge jeisnyhop dyei soeu Yohan ngah aiq yuk lyis nah jyank mas nyei nhang kat, ge.
42007021	Hauh shishenh lyis nyang, nyang gas nos bang, yomh, yius kuq bang nyoshoq lyis gis los nhang; nyoqjet bang nyoshoq lyis eq nyvng los nhang.
42007022	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Namoq nyvng las xauhgyo zis Yohan lyis loh taiq kyoh geh: nyoqjet bang nyoq nyvng los, khyei gyau bang yoh suh loh, mvnggvng dap bang thyauh lhyang loh, nojet bang no gyo los, shei goeus bang eq doms dwis los nhang zis xauh las, nyungs bang lyis gausyis dang taiq kyoh nyeis.
42007023	Ngos mas ehnyet dyet zis ma bos soeu hank laus eq ngelhoq, ge.
42007024	Yohan dah loeuswons bang aiq yuk loh khoq thang lhyi, Yesu gas Yohan cho dius phung lhyi taiq zis gas, Namoq mhanhdyvp pheh cha loh yoeuh goh? Lyeis muot kamh dah jvmbu lyis lhyeh?
42007025	Housoeh lyis cha loh thuq yoeuh goh? Lungphauq dyi wuot soeu lhyi lah? Yoeuh aq, nhamp dah dyimis wuot las zogis shuklhoq zo bang gas hwankti yhen mha nyeis.
42007026	Housoeh lyis cha loh thuq yoeuh goh? Lvpe lhyi lah? Nghuot goeus, ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, lvpe thoq lyis zes kuh soeu nghuot.
42007027	Yoeuh aq, nah cho sont das zis ngos ngah loeuskyoh soeu lhyi nah xik pheh nhang kat, ge lhaih toh zis gas nyah cho nghuot.
42007028	Ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, vmesbih masyah khoeu bang mas jeisnyhop dyei soeu Yohan thoq lyis kuh soeu hank ma bos. Nghuot laus eq Mangso munghdan mas ngis thank soeu ka nyah thoq lyis zes kuh, ge.
42007029	Khoengh khywi bang yahge dius jens dvnganhmoq gas, Yohan dah dang xauhgyo lyis, nyah jeisnyhop lyis tsain kham zis yah, Mangso ka dan, ge nyamoq rhen.
42007030	Pharishe jens yahge Lyi svra jens gas, Yohan dah jeisnyhop lyis ma kham yoeus, Mangso toeuq toh cho lhyi peq tyamp.
42007031	Housoeh las Yhensain taiq zis gas, Haq caiq mas bang, nyamoq cha yah doeusgoh zis lyis ngos cha yah byi das lah?
42007032	Nyamoq gas kaih jang mas tsung lha, dvyuk yah dvyuk lui goh las, Ngamoq gas namoq lyis khvlhank muot dyei lyis eq namoq ma goh, Ngamoq kukxi lyis eq namoq ma ngaus, ge dah loshang jens yah doeusgoh.
42007033	Khasoeh ge lyis jeisnyhop dyei soeu Yohan gas, ohlhyoq eq ma zo, zvbiq eq ma shuk jweh los lyis namoq gas, Nyang mas yius bos, tsain ge.
42007034	Yoeuh aq, Cangsoeu Lo gas zo shuk uhjyangh lyih lyis, Womlvm soeu, zvbiq yet soeu, khoengh khywi bang yahge yaunos wons bang dah dyenschangh, tsain ge.
42007035	Nghuot laus eq Mangso dah joeui ka jyoeng yvlyis hau joeui dah lo jens yah tuonh shet nyeis.
42007036	Pharishe dvyuk gas nyang yah dvgeh wom zo das zis nyang lyis khi; nyang eq Pharishe dah yhen khau mha wvng las womjus mas tsung toh.
42007037	Yoeuh aq, hauh wugungs mas yaunos wons dah vmesbih dvyuk gas Yesu Pharishe yhen mha wom zo das zis tsung toh zis lyis seq lyis, xangh coeu luk jywanglo dvkoeuq chi lyih las,
42007038	Nyah khyeiyang nungstsaink mas ngaus yap uhlyis yah Yesu khyei mha nyoqdyeis yah jyweq los las, nyah uhloms mas cam yah buot las nyah khyei lhyi bvlot tanh zis yah coeu juot dyei.
42007039	Nyang lyis khi dah Pharishe hauh yvlyis nyvng lyis, nyah ehnyet mas, Haih soeu lvpe nghuot lyis gas, nyang lyis tanh dah haih vmesbih gas hank nghuot zis eq, yaunos wons dah soeu nghuot zis lyis eq nyang seq wondoeus, ge.
42007040	Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Simon eh, ngos nvng lyis taiq das zis dvja bos, ge. Nyang gas, Svra eh, taiq aq, ge.
42007041	Yesu gas, jyeih dyei soeu dvyuk mas jyen dap soeu aiq yuk bos: dvyuk mas ngwis kyvp oengxo, gohtoeu dvyuk mas oengci nghuot.
42007042	Nyah aiq yuk gas jyen cap das zis ma yoh yvmvyah nyah aiq yuk lyis khyuot tyamp dyei goeus. Housoeh lyis hau aiq yuk mas nyang lyis khayuk zes jyetdap das lah, ge.
42007043	Simon phuk taiq zis gas, Zes nyoshoq khyuot tyamp dyei zis xauh soeu nghuot das oen ngos nghamh, ge. Nyang taiq zis gas, Nvng jus khyvlyis soetuon goeus, ge.
42007044	Housoeh nyang gas vmesbih jyank pheh xoeu lha Simon lyis taiq zis gas, Haih vmesbih lyis nvng nyvng ma nghuot lhyeh? Ngos nah yhen mha wvng los lyis nvng ngos lyis khyei cheih jeis ma dyei: nghuot laus eq nyang gas nyah nyoqdyeis yah ngah khyei mha taiqh dyei las, nyah cam yah buot dyei.
42007045	Nvng ngos lyis bvlot ma tanh, nghuot laus eq haih vmesbih gas ngos wvng los masyah ma lyen lo ngah khyei mha bvlot tanh nyeis.
42007046	Nvng ngah uhloms lyis coeu eq ma juot dyei, nghuot laus eq haih vmesbih gas ngah khyei lhyi xangh coeu juot dyei.
42007047	Housoeh yvmvyah ngos nvng lyis taiq bah, nyah yaunos nyoshoq lyis khyuot dyei zis xauh goeus yvmvyah nyang zes las jyetdap nyeis. Dvmhauh khyuot dyei zis xauh soeu ka nainlo dvjyetdap, ge.
42007048	Hauh vmesbih lyis eq, Nah yaunos khyuot tyamp dyei goeus, ge nyang lyis taiq.
42007049	Nyang yah dvgeh womjus mas tsung toh bang, nyamoq ehnyet mas taiq zis gas, Yaunos yangh yoh khyuot dyei soeu haih zis gas hank nghuot lah, ge.
42007050	Nyang hau vmesbih lyis taiq zis gas, Nah lomsjingh zis gas nvng lyis khyuot yoeus goeus, nyenstap zis yah loh lo aq, ge.
42008001	Hauh thang lhyi khanyhank ma nyangh lyis nyang gas Mangso munghdan gausyis dang lyis taiq hoeuh uhjyangh wus yahge wukhau khanghmuh jweh loh. Changlo dvci aiq yuk moq eq nyang yah dvgeh nghuot.
42008002	Yius kuq zis yahge noslom nyoshoq masyah gis los nhang zis xauh dah vmesbih jens dvyhamh, yius nyhet doeu thuq loh goeus dah Magdala ge soeu Mari;
42008003	Herod dah ziszom Khuza dah yhensain nyhiq Yoana yahge Susana, gohtoeu nyoshoq moq eq nyamoq yoh zisyos yah nyang lyis phuqsoe uhjyangh nyang yah dvgeh tsain chank yenh.
42008004	Wugungs khanghmuh masyah dah dius phung nyah jyank mas huom los lyis, nyang dangtoeuq yah taiq zis gas,
42008005	Jyo khyoq soeu ka nyah jyo nyau sanh das xiklyis thuq loh. Nyang sanh kat lyis dvkhamh gas chokhyoh mas gyoh las svbih yah nang nheh zis yahge mau dang nghoq jens yah lyih kui zo tyamp.
42008006	Dvyhamh gas lukjvp yos mas gyoh loh. Hauh zis gas yuk los laus eq nyeissoq ma nam yvmvyah nyhauh loh.
42008007	Dvyhamh gas zoeu gyomh mas gyoh loh, hauh zis gas zoeu zains yah dvgeh yuk kuh los las hauh yvlyis huop tyamp.
42008008	Gohtoeu ka nyeisjvng gis yvmas gyoh las, yuk kuh los lyis vshih eq dvxo huon je los. Nyang haih zis dye taiq lyis, Gyo yoeus das no dap soeu ka xauhgyo bas jungh, ge.
42008009	Nyah changlo jens nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Haih dangtoeuq gas cha ge mes lah, ge.
42008010	Nyang taiq zis gas, Maukhung munghdan dah nghop toh cho ka namoq lyis seq nhang goeus. Nghuot laus eq gohyhamh bang lyis gas ngos dangtoeuq yah dvtaiq. Housoeh nyamoq yoeuh laus eq ma nyvng, gyo laus eq ma seqgyo, ge.
42008011	Gvshih haih dangtoeuq gas heisoeh nghuot: jyo nyau gas Mangso dah Dang nghuot.
42008012	Cho mha gyoh zis gas, hauh zis lyis xauhgyo lyis nyamoq lomsjingh las khyuot yoeus zis ma xauh das xiklyis, yius los las nyamoq nhaiqlom mas dah dang lyis yoeus tyamp zis xauh bang nghuot.
42008013	Luk thoq mas gyoh zis gas, nyamoq hau dang xauhgyo lyis gausyis zis yah dang lyis lhom yoeus laus eq vnyet ma chent yvmvyah, dvyoq kyingh lomsjingh las shiwu zis xauh lyis nungsdoms loh bang nghuot.
42008014	Zoeu gyomh mas gyoh zis gas, xauhgyo thang lhyi chiq cho, dis los cho yahge pyo cho yah huop las mos dah vshih ma shih bang nghuot.
42008015	Nghuot laus eq nyeisjvng gis yvmas gyoh zis gas, gis dah ehnyet yah dang lyis gyo yoeus lho lha wontang zwi zains toh las jhen zis yah vshih shih bang nghuot.
42008016	Nyibung lyis tuonh las dang yah nghop toh zis hank ma bos, jungjeis mas eq hank ma kat toh: wvng los bang bvng zis nyvng das xiklyis nyibung gus mas dvgyangh tuonh toh.
42008017	Khasoeh ge lyis, ma chixoeuq shoq gauh shung toh zis cha eq ma bos; ma seq ma nyvng shoq nghop toh zis cha eq ma bos.
42008018	Housoeh yvmvyah namoq khasoeh xauhgyo zis lyis zaih nyeis geh. Khasoeh ge lyis, yoh bang lyis lung dyei das; ma yoh bang jyank masyah gas nyamoq yoh joq teh zis yangh yoeus tyamp dyei das.
42008019	Hauh uhlyis nyah ungwes yahge nyah vwik jens gas nyah jyank mas jweh lyih las dius puk thoeu yvmvyah nyah jyank mas ma tsain yoh wvng loh.
42008020	Housoeh nyang lyis taiq los zis gas, Nah ungwes yahge nah vwik jens nvng yah xauhgoh mes las nghe mha los tsain yap joq, ge.
42008021	Nyang nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Mangso dang lyis xauhgyo las, hauh yvlyis chank kuot bang gas ngah ungwes yahge ngah vwik jens nghuot, ge.
42008022	Dvnyeih gas nyang nyah changlo jens yah dvgeh lhyik khau mha wvng tsung lha nyamoq lyis taiq, Yang thomh thyitvp pheh goeu e goh, ge nyamoq goeu loh.
42008023	Housoeh nyamoq goeu loh nyeis lyis Yesu gas yhet joq. Houmha lyeismuh jyang muot yvmvyah chont mas jeis dyingh los las, nyamoq gudwvng bah ge.
42008024	Housoeh las nyamoq gas nyang lyis loh nhauh uhlyis yah taiq zis gas, Svra eh, svra eh, ngamoq shei bah ge loh nyeis, ge. Housoeh nyang toq las lyeis yahge jeisphauq lyis nyho lho lhyi, hauh zis gas tam loh las sam joq.
42008025	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq dah lomsjingh zis gas khalhye gah, ge. Hauh uhlyis nyamoq gyuk mauh las, Haih soeu ka hank nghuot lah? Lyeis yahge jeisphauq lyis taiq kat lyis, nyah domsyos tsain gyo, ge nyang changh nyang tsain taiq goh.
42008026	Nyamoq gas Galile thyitvp Gerasa ge dah mau mas jweh loh.
42008027	Nyang tungyos pheh thuq suh loh lyis houmha hauh wus mas dah yius kuq dah yukgis dvyuk yah xauhgoh. Hauh soeu ka shishenh nyangh nyangh dyimis ma wuot, yhen mha eq ma nyeis, lopkhyam mha kyingh dvnyeis.
42008028	Nyang Yesu lyis nyvng yah dvyih kaiq zis yah xikkhonh mas gop las, Nyhang thank Mangso dah Lo Yesu eh, Nvng ngos yah cha sen lah? Nvng ngos lyis ma shoeuhshih das xiklyis ngos dung, ge thwe zainsmuh yah taiq.
42008029	Khasoeh ge lyis Yesu gas hauh yius lyis hauh dius yuk jyank masyah thuq loh das xiklyis vmingh dyei yvmvyah nghuot. Vlhain lhain nyang lyis kuq las shamjvng yah twih las kyomh kyomh toh lyis eq, lang phaiq thyet las yius gas nyang lyis mhanhdyvp pheh shwih loh loh mus.
42008030	Yesu nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Nah nyings cha nghuot, ge. Nyang gas, Nyoshoq nghuot: Khasoeh ge lyis nyah vkhau mha yius nyoshoq lungh joq.
42008031	Nyamoq lyis noq thank dwang chuk buiq mas ma khat tyamp das xiklyis nyang lyis dung.
42008032	Hauh jingkank mas wuq dvjens bot zo nyeis: nyamoq gas hauh wuq jens mas wvng nhang aq, ge nyang lyis vmingh sang nyeis las nyang gyo dyei.
42008033	Hauh uhlyis yius jens gas dius jyank masyah thuq las wuq jens mas tsain wvng loh. Wuq jens gas gammhung mhayah tyauq gyoh las thomh mas ciang shei.
42008034	Wuq yoeuh bang hauh zis nyvng yvmvyah cangh loh las, wugungs yahge wukhau mha loh tsain taiq kyoh.
42008035	Nyamoq eq bweh goeus cho lhyi yoeuh das xiklyis thuq loh las Yesu jyank mas jweh lyis, vkhang yius thuq loh goeus dah dius gas yos yos lyis dah ehnyet teh, dyimis wuot las Yesu dah khyeiyang mas tsung toh zis lyis nyamoq nyvng las gyuk.
42008036	Hauh zis lyis nyvng bang gas, vkhang yius kuq soeu lhyi khasoeh kuot las gis los nhang zis nyamoq lyis taiq kyoh.
42008037	Hauh uhlyis Gerasa mau vyvm vwi mas dah somhloh moqjens dvnganhmoq gas, nyang lyis nyamoq jyank masyah thuq loh das xiklyis tsain dung: Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq svsoh gyuk. Nyang gas chont khau mha wvng tsung lha tauh loh.
42008038	Nghuot laus eq yius cangh thuq loh goeus soeu ka, nyang yah dvgeh nyeis das xiklyis nyang lyis khyoeuq nyeis. Nghuot laus eq Yesu gas nyang lyis nhang kat uhlyis yah taiq zis gas,
42008039	Nah yhen mha tauh loh las, Mangso nvng lyis kha iq kuot dyei goeus zis loh taiq hoeuh aq, ge. Nyang eq loh las Yesu nyah xiklyis kha iq kuhxing zis kuot dyei goeus zis lyis dvwus gonh, joqyos khanghmuh mas taiq hoeuh loh.
42008040	Housoeh Yesu tauh loh lyis, dius jens gas nyang lyis gauslaus zis yah lhom yoeus: Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq dvnganhmoq gas nyang lyis tsain langh nyeis.
42008041	Yoeuh aq, Yairu ge, lyi jungs uhjyung dvyuk los las, Yesu dah khyeiyang mas gyuis las, nyah yhen mha los das xiklyis khyoeuq nyeis.
42008042	Khasoeh ge lyis, dvci aiq zvn ko dah nyah lonyi loteh gas shei loh nyeis. Nyang e loh nyeis lyis moqjens yah nyang lyis duon nyhenh los.
42008043	Dvci aiq zvn suih shuon lha nos dah vmesbih dvyuk gas, nyang yoh goeu dvnganh mvcheih lastsiang jens jyank mas yhung mhont tyamp lyis eq, hank eq nyang lyis ma thyeh yhoh gis dyei.
42008044	Nyah nungsthank dyithang mha tanh lho lhyi, nyang suih shuon zis houjang doms tyamp.
42008045	Yesu gas, Ngos lyis hank tanh, ge nyei. Dvnganhmoq yah he uhlyis, Petru yahge nyang yah dvgeh nghuot bang taiq zis gas, Svra eh, moqjens nvng lyis tsain duon nyhenh los lyis, Ngos lyis hank tanh lah, ge.
42008046	Yesu gas, Dvyuk ngos lyis tanh goeus, khasoeh ge lyis ngah gungs masyah yomsoq thuq loh zis ngos seq, ge.
42008047	Hauh vmesbih gas ma yoh zauh toh zis lyis seq goeus ya, tyik tyik nvn zis yah nyah xikkhonh mas gyuis gyoh las, nyang lyis chamus tanh zis yahge houjang nyang khasoeh gis los zis lyis taiq thuq.
