42008048	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Lonyi eh, nhaiq dainh lo aq, nah lomsjingh zis gas nvng lyis gis los nhang goeus; nyenstap zis yah loh lo aq, ge.
42008049	Nyang housoeh taiq nyeis lyis, lyi jungs uhjyung dah yhen mha bang dvyuk los las, Nah lonyi shei goeus; Svra lyis vthauqkhyi nyeis lo, ge.
42008050	Hauh dang Yesu xauhgyo lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Vchiq, lomsjingh ehnyet dvbos aq, housoeh lyis nah lonyi gis los das, ge.
42008051	Housoeh nyang yhen khau mha jweh loh lyis, Petru, Yaku yahge Yohan, nyelo dah ungwes uwus masyah lai las gohyuk hank lyis eq ma wvng nhang.
42008052	Dvnganhmoq yah ngaus las hauh nyelo xiklyis shei uh tsain ngauh nyeis laus eq nyang taiq zis gas, Vngaus goh, nyang ma shei, dvyhet joq, ge.
42008053	Hauh nyelo shei goeus zis lyis tsain seq yvmvyah, nyamoq gas nyang lyis jwangh yis.
42008054	Nghuot laus eq nyang, nyah loq lyis zwi las, Nyelo eh, toq aq, ge lui lho lhyi,
42008055	nyah dyos doms los las, nyang houjang toq los. Yesu gas, nyang lyis zonoms dyei das zis nyamoq lyis taiq toh.
42008056	Nyah ungwes uwus gas mauh: laus eq bweh goeus cho hank lyis eq ma taiq kyoh das xiklyis, nyang nyamoq lyis khyangh com.
42009001	Hauh thang lhyi Yesu gas nyah changlo dvci aiq yuk lyis khi yoeus las, yius dvnganh lyis ung das zis yahge noslom gis los nhang das yomsoq yahge toeuh dyei las,
42009002	Mangso munghdan cho lhyi taiq kyoh das xiklyis eq, nos bang lyis gis los nhang das xiklyis eq nyang nyamoq lyis nhang kat.
42009003	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Gyung cho xiklyis lhamloq, bvtmuh, ohlhyoq, ngwis, dyi aiq dung, cha eq vchi goh.
42009004	Namoq kha yhen mha wvng loh lyis eq hauh wukhau mhayah doms thuq loh shishenh jweh shoq houmha nyeis geh.
42009005	Hank laus eq namoq lyis ma lhom yoeus nghuot lyis gas, namoq hauh wukhau mhayah doms thuq loh dah uhlyis nyamoq xikkhonh mas kanghjyoeng duot das xiklyis namoq khyei mha dap dah phvlhau lhyi ko khyoq toh khoq geh, ge.
42009006	Housoeh nyamoq tsain thuq loh las, wugungs khanghmuh mas gausyis dang taiq hoeuh yenh uhlyis yah joqyos khyiq khanghmuh mas nos bang lyis gis los nhang.
42009007	Gvshih nyei boms dvboms guon soeu hwankti Herod gas nyang kuot dah muhzoh dvnganh yvlyis xauhgyo lyis, nyang gas nhaiqlom svsoh ma nyens ma tap mus nyeis: khasoeh ge lyis, dvyhamh bang gas, Yohan gas shei masyah dwis toq los.
42009008	Dvyhamh gas Eliya jweh los. Gohtoeu dvyhamh gas, Gohnhamp dah lvpe dvyuk dwis toq los, ge.
42009009	Herod gas, Ngos Yohan lhyi uhloms thyet goeus: nghuot laus eq ngos hei iq xauhgyo tsuk toh soeu ka hank nghuot lah? Nyang lyis nyvng mes, ge.
42009010	Lvgyo jens tauh los las, nyamoq kuot goeus dah cho dvnganh nyang lyis tsain taiq kyoh. Nyang gas nyamoq lyis shwih las, Betsaida wus pheh jhank loh.
42009011	Nghuot laus eq dius jens seq las nyah thang mha tsain chank loh. Housoeh nyang nyamoq lyis lhom yoeus las Mangso munghdan cho lhyi taiq kyoh. Nos gis los mes bang lyis gis los nhang.
42009012	Nyenhthang buis wvng loh lyis dvci aiq yuk moq nyang lyis los taiq zis gas, Haih zis mhanhdyvp dvnghuot yvmvyah, moqjens lyis vwi vyvm wukhau mha yhet das joqyos yahge xo zo das xiklyis nyamoq lyis nhang kat aq, ge.
42009013	Nyang taiq zis gas, Nyamoq lyis namoq zonoms dyei geh, ge. Hauh uhlyis nyamoq phuk taiq zis gas, Haih dius dvnganhmoq xiklyis gas ngamoq loh wis zis ma nghuot lyis gas, ohlhyoq oeng koeuq yahge oengdoq aiq doeu mas lai las ngamoq cha eq ma yoh, ge.
42009014	Khasoeh ge lyis yukgis jens oeng khyoengh ko nghuot. Nyang nyah changlo jens lyis taiq zis gas, Dvhuom mha oengci ci tsung nhang geh, ge.
42009015	Nyamoq eq housoeh kuot las dvnganhmoq lyis tsung nhang.
42009016	Hauh thang lhyi ohlhyoq oeng koeuq yahge oengdoq aiq doeu lyis nyang yoeus chi lha, maukhung mha nghank yoeuh las shvmanh dung thang lhyi khyiq las moqjens lyis gvm dyei das nyhenshang changlo jens lyis dyei.
42009017	Nyamoq dvnganhmoq zo jo thang lhyi, nyet dah vpop vsop kui tsainh lyis dvci aiq dang nghuot.
42009018	Hauh thang lhyi nyang kyingh shvmanh dung nyeis uhlyis, nyah changlo jens eq nyang yah dvgeh nyeis las, nyang nyamoq lyis nyei zis gas, Moqjens ngos lyis hank nghuot ge goh lah, ge.
42009019	nyamoq phuk taiq zis gas, Dvyhamh gas, Jeisnyhop dyei soeu Yohan; dvyhamh gas, Eliya; gohtoeu dvyhamh gas, gohnhamp dah lvpe dvyuk dwis toq los, tsain ge, ge.
42009020	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq gas ngos lyis hank nghuot oen goh lah, ge. Petru phuk taiq zis gas, Nvng gas Mangso dah Khristu nghuot, ge.
42009021	Hauh zis hank lyis eq ma taiq das xiklyis nyang nyamoq lyis khyangh wontang com toh.
42009022	Housoeh nyang taiq zis gas, Cangsoeu Lo gas shanghsenh zis nyoshoq xauh las, maussauh lhaih bang, phudyei uhjyung jens yahge logis jens yah peq tyamp las, nyang lyis sat thang lhyi somh vnyeih lyis dwis toq los das, ge.
42009023	Housoeh nyang dvnganhmoq lyis taiq zis gas, Dvyuk yuk ngah thang chank soeu duot mes lyis gas, nyah gungs lyis nungsyos toh las nyeih khanghmuh nyah tapzains wuq las ngah thang mha chank bas jungh.
42009024	Khasoeh ge lyis vsainnyang kang lhyi khyuot yoeus mes soeu ka kang dyuk das. Nghuot laus eq ngah gvng mas kang dyuk soeu ka kang yoh das.
42009025	Dius gas mungkvn gonh lyis sain toh laus eq, nyah kang dyuk tyamp lyis gas nyah xiklyis chah vkyuh bos lah?
42009026	Hank laus eq ngos yahge ngah dang lyis xoq soeu lhyi ka, cangsoeu Lo gas nyah phunk yah, Uwus dah phunk yahge gyingshang loeuswons bang dah phunk yah jweh lyih lyis nyang lyis eq xoq das.
42009027	Nghuot laus eq ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, heimha yap joq bang mas dvyhamh gas Mangso munghdan ma nyvng dvchank gas ma shei das, ge.
42009028	Hauh dang taiq thang lhyi xet nyeih ko lhyi, Yesu gas Petru, Yaku, Yohan moq lyis shwih las, shvmanh dung das xiklyis boms mas doq loh.
42009029	Nyang shvmanh dung nyeis lyis nyah nyoqnho vwot thaiq los las, nyang wuot dyi eq thyoeu lha kyi kyi bvng.
42009030	Vbusbih aiq yuk, Moshe yahge Eliya gas nyang yah dang jis goh nyeis yvlyis nyamoq nyetlos nyettant nyvng.
42009031	Nyah aiq yuk gas phunk yah thuq los las, Yesu Yerusalem mas kuot nyhuk chah dah nyang shei chah cho lhyi taiq goh nyeis.
42009032	Nghuot laus eq Petru yahge nyang yah dvgeh nghuot vzomh gas yhet tsain nguis nyeis zis gying soh los lyis, nyah phunk yahge nyang yah dvgeh yap joq vbusbih aiq yuk lyis nyvng.
42009033	Hauh vbusbih aiq yuk nyah jyank masyah gang loh nyeis lyis, Petru gas Yesu lyis, Svra eh, heimha yang nyeis das xiklyis gis, yang zvng somh koeuq kuot goh, Nvng, Moshe, Eliya xiklyis dvyuk dvkoeuq ge las nyang cha taiq nyeis zis nyang ma seq taiq.
42009034	Nyang housoeh taiq nyeis lyis, jyommauh yah nyamoq lyis nghop las, nyamoq hau vkhau mha wvng loh nyeis lyis nyamoq gyuk los.
42009035	Hauh thang lhyi jyommauh khau mhayah eq thwe dvkoeuq thuq los zis gas, Haih soeu ka ngos khyen toh, ngos jyetdap Lo nghuot; nyah dang gyo geh, ge.
42009036	Hauh thwe dye taiq lyis, Yesu dvyuk lyis kyingh dvnyvng lo: hauh yoq lyis nyamoq tsoeklo nyeis las, nyamoq nyvng zis lyis hank lyis eq ma taiq kyoh.
42009037	Nungs nyeih nyamoq boms masyah gyoh los lyis, dius nyoshoq moq nyang lyis zes langh.
42009038	Yoeuh aq, dius phung mhayah yukgis dvyuk gas kaiq las, Svra eh, ngah lo lyis yoeuh dyei das zis ngos nvng lyis dung: khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas ngah loteh nghuot.
42009039	Yoeuh aq, yius yah kuq dah uhlyis gas chuot las nyetlos nyettant kaiq los. Nyop vdoe doe mulas yius yah nyang lyis nos shoq shoeuhshih las khayhoq eq nyang yah ma gang loh.
42009040	Nyang lyis khat thuq dyei das xiklyis nah changlo jens lyis ngos dung yoeuh goeus; nghuot laus eq nyamoq ma yoh khat tyamp.
42009041	Yesu phuk taiq zis gas, Lomsjingh cho ma bos, ma shop dah caiq mas bang eh, ngos namoq yah dvgeh khanyhank jweh shoq nyeis las namoq lyis jhen dyei nyeis das lah? Nah lo lyis heimha shwih los aq, ge.
42009042	Loshang los nyeis uhlyis, yius yah kuq lhain kat las chuot nhang. Nghuot laus eq Yesu gas yius lyis nhant las loshang lo lyis gis los nhang lha nyah uwus lyis doms kyauh kat.
42009043	Nyamoq dvnganhmoq Mangso dah yomsoq zains lyis tsain mauh. Nyang kuot dah muhzoh dvnganh gvng mas tsain mauh nyeis lyis nyang nyah changlo jens lyis taiq zis gas,
42009044	Namoq haih dang lyis wontang gyo yoeus geh: khasoeh ge lyis Cangsoeu Lo gas svbih loq mas phanhlyen dyei zis xauh das, ge.
42009045	Nghuot laus eq nyamoq gas nyang cha lhyi taiq zis ma seqgyo: khasoeh ge lyis haih zis gas nyamoq jyank masyah nghop shung toh. Nyang lyis nyamoq hauh cho nyei das zis tsain gyuk.
42009046	Hauh uhlyis nyamoq mas kuh thank zis hank, ge taiq phyen-goh thuq los.
42009047	Yesu gas nyamoq ehnyet mas nghamh zis lyis seq las, loshang dvyuk lyis nyah vyvm mas shwih toh las,
42009048	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngah nyings masyah haih loshang lhyi lhom yoeus soeu hank laus eq, ngos lyis lhom yoeus zis nghuot. Ngos lyis lhom yoeus soeu hank laus eq ngos lyis nhang kat soeu lhyi lhom yoeus zis nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis namoq dvnganhmoq mas ngis thank soeu ka, kuh thank soeu eq nghuot, ge.
42009049	Yohan phuk taiq zis gas, Svra eh, nah nyings yah yius khat thuq soeu dvyuk lyis ngamoq nyvng. Nyang ngamoq mas zis ma nghuot yvmvyah, nyang lyis tomp toh, ge.
42009050	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nyang lyis vtomp toh goh: khasoeh ge lyis namoq lyis tyi ma xo soeu ka namoq shot pheh zis nghuot, ge.
42009051	Nyang lyis toqh yoeus das shishenh jweh los nyeis lyis, nyang gas Yerusalem mas e das zis lyis wontang nghamh tsuk zains toh.
42009052	Nyah xik pheh loeuswons bang lyis nhang kat. Nyah xiklyis cicont sont toh dyei das nyhenshang nyamoq gas Samari wukhau dvkoeuq mas wvng loh.
42009053	Nyah nyoqnho ka Yerusalem pheh loh das teh dvdoeus yvmvyah nyamoq gas nyang lyis ma tsain lhom yoeus.
42009054	Nyah changlo tang Yaku yahge Yohan hauh zis lyis nyvng las taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, nyamoq lyis ngheq tyamp das zis ngamoq lyis maukhung mha dah nyi vkhi khyoq nhang mes lah, ge.
42009055	Nghuot laus eq nyang lhain yoeuh las nyah aiq yuk lyis nyho.
42009056	Hauh thang lhyi Yesu yahge nyah changlo jens gas gohwus pheh loh.
42009057	Hauh thang lhyi nyamoq cho mha loh nyeis lyis dius dvyuk Yesu lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng khalhye loh khalhye ngos nah thang mha chank das, ge.
42009058	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Womkhuih jens eq khyung bos; mau dang nghoq jens eq sot yoh; nghuot laus eq Cangsoeu Lo gas nyah uhloms toh das joqyos ma yoh, ge.
42009059	Nyang gas gohtoeu dvyuk lyis, Ngah thang mha chank los aq, ge. Nyang taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, ngah uwus lyis shih loh nyhop khoq nhang aq, ge.
42009060	Nghuot laus eq Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Shei bang lyis gas nyamoq dah shei bang nyang nyhop bas jungh: nvng gas Mangso munghdan cho loh taiq hoeuh aq, ge.
42009061	Tsai, gohtoeu dvyuk eq, Yhensain eh, ngos nah thang chank das: nghuot laus eq ngah yhen mha nyeis bang lyis shih loh jeshuh khoq bah, ge.
42009062	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Khont zwi las nungs pheh lhain yoeuh soeu hank laus eq Mangso munghdan yah ma mon, ge.
42010001	Yhensain ka gohtoeu nyhetci aiq yuk lyis eq toeuq kat las, nyamoq lyis nyang loh das wukhau khyiq khanghmuh mas aiq yuk dvtwi twi nyah xik mas nhang kat.
42010002	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Jyo yhomh das zis nyoshoq bos laus eq, muh zwi bang nain. Housoeh yvmvyah jyo Yhensain ka nyah jyo yhomh das zis uhkung jens lyis nhang kat dyei bas jungh dung nyeis geh.
42010003	Namoq tsain loh geh, yoeuh aq, ngos namoq lyis womkhuih jens jo mas yvng lo jens lyis teh, nhang kat.
42010004	Ngwis thung, bvtmuh, thyvkoq teh zis cha eq vchi goh: cholvt mas hank lyis eq vjhent goh.
42010005	Namoq kha yhen mha wvng loh laus eq, Haih yhen mha nyenstap joq bas jungh, oen shih cangxeih taiq geh.
42010006	Hauh yhen mha nyenstap dah lo nyeis nghuot lyis gas, namoq dah nyenstap zis hauh soeu jyank mas doengs joq das, ma nyeis nghuot lyis gas, namoq dah nyenstap zis gas namoq jyank mas tauh los das.
42010007	Namoq hauh yhen mha nyang nyeis las, nyamoq gvmtsoh zis zo shuk geh: khasoeh ge lyis muh zwi soeu ka, nyah uhkung phauh yoh mon: dvyhen thang lhyi dvyhen vtyungh vlvng goh.
42010008	Namoq wvng loh dah wukhau mha laus eq, nyamoq lhom yoeus langh nghuot lyis gas, namoq xikkhonh mas khyoq dyei yvlyis tsain zo shuk geh.
42010009	Houmha nos bang lyis gis los nhang lha, Mangso dah munghdan gas namoq jyank mas ni los goeus, oen dius jens lyis taiq kyoh geh.
42010010	Nghuot laus eq namoq loh dah wus mas bang, namoq lyis ma lhom yoeus nghuot lyis gas, talhoeu pheh doms thuq las heisoeh oen taiq geh.
42010011	Ngamoq khyei mha dap, namoq wus mas dah phvlhau yangh namoq lyis yobos tuonh shet yvmas kanghjyoeng duot das nyhenshang ko khyoq toh khoq goeus; nghuot laus eq Mangso munghdan gas namoq jyank mas ni los goeus zis lyis soh geh, oen taiq kyoh geh.
42010012	Nghuot laus eq namoq lyis ngos taiq bah, hauh buisnyeis lyis Sodom wugungs kham zo zis gas, hauh wus thoq lyis sunghhuq das, ge.
42010013	Korazin eh, nvng mvtanhzoe nghuot! Betsaida eh, nvng mvtanhzoe nghuot! Khasoeh ge lyis namoq jyank mas nyvng nhang dah yomsoq zains muhzoh lyis Taire yahge Sidon mas nyvng nhang nghuot lyis gas, hauh wus mas bang gohnhamp yah yanghthung dyi wuot, nyiyvp boms mas lhoeuh las nhaiqlom yoh thaiq hah das.
42010014	Soetuon dah buisnyeis lyis Taire yahge Sidon xauh zis gas namoq thoq lyis sunghhuq das.
42010015	Kaperna-um eh, nvng maukhung jweh shoq chunghtoq zis xauh das lah, munyi thomh jweh shoq khyoq zis xauh das.
42010016	Namoq dah dang gyo soeu ka ngah dang gyo zis nghuot, Namoq lyis peq tyamp soeu ka ngos lyis peq tyamp zis nghuot. Ngos lyis peq tyamp soeu ka, ngos lyis nhang kat soeu lhyi peq tyamp zis nghuot, ge.
42010017	Hau nyhetci aiq yuk moq gas gauslaus zis yah tauh los las taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, nah nyings masyah yius jens yangh ngamoq dah dang tsain gyo, ge.
42010018	Nyang nyamoq lyis doms taiq zis gas, Satan gas maunyoq nyik teh maukhung mhayah gyoh zis ngos nyvng goeus.
42010019	Yoeuh aq, lhangnoq yahge gungsgauh lyis nang nheh das zis yahge jeswus yomsoq dvnganh zis lyis ung tyamp das yomsoq gas, ngos namoq lyis dyei goeus yvmvyah, namoq lyis cha yah eq yoh nos nhang das zis ma nghuot.
42010020	Nghuot laus eq yius gas namoq dah dang gyo oen vgauslaus goh: namoq dah nyings maukhung mha lhaih toh yvmvyah dvgauslaus geh, ge.
42010021	Hauh shishenh lyis Yesu gas, Dyos mas gauslaus las heisoeh ge: Maukhung nyeisjvng dah Yhensain Uwus eh, joeui bos bang yahge ehnyet yik bang jyank masyah nvng haih cho jens lyis nghop shung toh las, lonoeuh jens lyis chixoeuq yvmvyah, ngos nvng lyis nhaiqshoqlang. Nghuot goeus Uwus eh, heisoeh bweh los zis gas nvng nhaiqdoeus khyvlyis nghuot.
42010022	Ngah Uwus gas ngos lyis dvnganh dyei toh goeus: Lo hank nghuot yvlyis Uwus mas lai las hank eq ma seq, Uwus hank nghuot yvlyis Lo yahge hauh Lo yah nyah cho chixoeuq das xiklyis khyen yoeus zis xauh soeu mha lai las hank ma seq.
42010023	Hauh thang lhyi nyang nyah changlo jens jyank pheh lhain yoeuh las gauh taiq zis gas, Namoq nyvng dah vyhang lhyi nyvng dah nyoq gas ngelhoq.
42010024	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, namoq nyvng yvlyis lvpe jens yahge hwankti jens nyoshoq nyvng mes laus eq ma xauh nyvng khoq. Namoq xauhgyo yvlyis gyo mes laus eq ma xauhgyo khoq, ge.
42010025	Yoeuh aq, lyi svra dvyuk toq yap las Yesu lyis shiwu zoh lyis yah taiq zis gas, Svra eh, vcaiq vto kang vso vlho xauh kham yoeus das xiklyis ngos cha kuot chah lah, ge.
42010026	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Lyi maussauh mas cha lhaih toh? Nvng khasoeh seqgyo lah, ge lyis,
42010027	Nyang phuk taiq zis gas, Nah Yhensain Mangso lhyi nah nhaiqlom dvnganh yah, nah dyos dvnganh yah, nah yom dvnganh yah, nvng dolhain zis dvnganh yah jyetdap aq, nah yhenkyoh lyis eq nah gungs yah dvyhangteh jyetdap aq, ge.
42010028	Yesu doms taiq zis gas, Nvng taiq zis jus, housoeh kuot lyis kang yoh das, ge.
42010029	Nghuot laus eq nyang gas vsainnyang dan zis lyis seq nhang mes dah ehnyet yah taiq zis gas, Ngah yhenkyoh gas hank nghuot lah, ge.
42010030	Yesu phuk taiq zis gas, Dius dvyuk Yerusalem wus masyah Yerikho pheh gyoh e lhyi, khyanktau xauh. Hauh bang gas nyah dyi khyuot lho lha vnyhoq mvnos bat, dvmtap las vluk shei bah ge lyis toh khoq las tsain loh.
42010031	Hou cho yah phudyei soeu dvyuk suh lai jus las, hauh soeu lhyi nyvng lyis gohshot jhank lai loh.
42010032	Vgus Lewi dius dvyuk hauh yvmas jweh las nyang lyis loh yoeuh lho lha gohshot cho yah doms jhank lai loh.
42010033	Nghuot laus eq gyung suh loh dah Samari dvyuk hauh soeu jyank mas jweh las nyvng lyis nhaiq yoeuh nyen las,
42010034	nyah jyank mas loh las, nyah dvm mas coeu yahge zvbiq kat dyei lho lha misseh yah lyet dyei thang lhyi, nyah mauhlyihzoe thoq mas thuq loh las, boenghdoq yhen dvkoeuq mas shwih loh las dyangh dyei.
42010035	Thang lhyi nyeihyo nyang ngwis kyvp aiq koeuq yhensain lhyi lap dyei las taiq zis gas, nyang lyis bos dyangh aq, kha nyhoq jes gyoh zis ngos doms los uhlyis nvng lyis doms cap das, ge thuq loh.
42010036	Hau somh yuk mas khyanktau xauh soeu dah yhenkyoh gas khayuk nghuot oen nvng nghamh lah, ge nyei.
42010037	Nyang gas, Nyang lyis nhaiqnyen soeu nghuot, ge. Yesu taiq zis gas, Nvng eq houyah dvyhangteh loh kuot aq, ge.
42010038	Gvshih nyamoq loh lyis, nyang gas wukhau dvkoeuq mas wvng loh: houmha Matha ge dah vmesbih dvyuk gas, nyang lyis nyah yhen mha boengh lhom yoeus langh.
42010039	Nyang mas Mari ge dah vnoeuh dvyuk bos: nyang gas Yesu dah khyeiyang mas tsung lha nyah dang gyo nyeis.
42010040	Nghuot laus eq Matha gas phuqsoe dah muh lyis chiq yvmvyah, Yesu jyank mas los las taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, ngah vnoeuh gas boengh daih cho mha ngos lyis kyingh doeuh gyomh toh dyei yvlyis nvng chaxwe ma nhang lhyeh? Nyang ngos lyis bos pangh das xiklyis taiq kat dyei aq, ge.
42010041	Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Matha, Matha, nvng gas vyhang nyoshoq lyis ehnyet nyo las chiq nyeis.
42010042	Nghuot laus eq chah zis dvja kyingh dvnghuot: Mari gas gis zis lyis khyen yoeus goeus yvmvyah, hauh zis lyis nyah jyank masyah yoh yoeus tyamp dyei das zis ma nghuot, ge.
42011001	Dvlhain ka nyang joqyos dvdeh mas shvmanh dung nyeis. Nyang dye dung thang lhyi nyah changlo dvyuk nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, Yohan eq nyah changlo jens lyis shvmanh dung jyauh yhangteh, ngamoq lyis eq jyauh aq, ge.
42011002	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq shvmanh dung lyis heisoeh dung geh: Ngamoq dah Uwus eh, Nah nyings gyingshang nyeis bas jungh. Nah munghdan jweh los bas jungh.
42011003	Ngamoq chah dah wom jeis ngamoq lyis nyeih yau nyeih dyei aq.
42011004	Ngamoq gas ngamoq lyis cu bang dah yobos lyis khyuot dyei goeus yvmvyah ngamoq dah yobos lyis khyuot dyei aq. Ngamoq lyis shiwu yvmas vshwih loh.
42011005	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq mas dvyuk, dyenschangh yoh las, gungsgvm lyis nyah jyank mas e lha, Dyenschangh phoq eh ohlhyoq somh lhyoq jenh dyei langh aq;
42011006	ngah dyenschangh dvyuk nyah gyung cho mhayah ngah jyank mas jweh los, nyang lyis tsoh das zis cha eq ma joq, ge lho lhyi,
42011007	yhen khau mha soeu ka, Ngos lyis vthauqkhyi goh; khomh eq nyheih goeus, ngah lo jens eq ngos yah dvgeh yhetyos mas yhet joq goeus, ngos nvng lyis ma yoh toq dyei lo, ge phuk toeuh goh lah?
42011008	Ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, dyenschangh nghuot, ge las ma toq dyei nghuot laus eq nyang tungh khyoeuq sang nyeis yvmvyah, hauh soeu lhyi nyang chah ya chah zis, toq las dyei das.
42011009	Housoeh yvmvyah ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, Dung geh, hauh zis namoq lyis dyei das: xo geh, housoeh lyis namoq nyvng das; khomh koq geh, housoeh lyis namoq lyis phank dyei das.
42011010	Dung soeu hank eq yoh; xo soeu eq nyvng; khomh koq soeu lhyi eq phank dyei das.
42011011	Dangtoeuq gvshih namoq mas uwus dvyuk yuk lyis lo gas ohlhyoq sang lhyi lukgoq dyei das lhyeh? Oengdoq sang lhyi lhangnyis dyei das lhyeh?
42011012	Gyoq uq sang lhyi gungsgauh dyei das lhyeh?
42011013	Namoq ma gis dah bang yangh vsainnyang lo jens lyis gis dah jyungshuk seq dyei lyis gas, hauh thoq lyis zes las maukhung mha dah Uwus gas, nyang lyis dung bang lyis hauh Gyingshang Dyos dyei das ma nghuot lhyeh?
42011014	Nyang gas nhuotjet yius lyis khat tyamp: yius thuq loh thang lhyi, nhuotjet soeu dang jis los las, dius jens gas mauh.
42011015	Nghuot laus eq nyamoq mas dvyhamh taiq zis gas, Yius zau Bezebu dah vmingh yah nyang yius jens lyis yoh khat thuq, ge.
42011016	Gohyhamh bang eq nyang lyis shiwu zoh lyis yah, maukhung mha dah vlho dvkoeuq tsain sang.
42011017	Nyang gas nyamoq nghamh yvlyis seq las nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, munghdan nyang changh zan goh lyis gas hauh munghdan gas dyoqbis das. Yhenbang nyang changh dyoqgoh lyis gas hauh yhen ka dyoqbis tyamp das.
42011018	Ngos gas Bezebu dah yomsoq yah yius jens lyis khat tyamp, ge namoq taiq. Satan gas nyang changh nyang zan goh nghuot lyis gas, nyah munghdan khasoeh yoh goeng joq das lah?
42011019	Ngos Bezebu yomsoq yah yius jens lyis khat thuq nghuot lyis gas, namoq dah lo jens gas hank mas yah khat thuq nyeis lah? Housoeh yvmvyah nyamoq gas namoq lyis soetuon das bang duot das.
42011020	Nghuot laus eq ngos gas Mangso dah yomsoq yah yius jens lyis khat tyamp nghuot lyis gas, Mangso munghdan namoq jyank mas jweh goeus.
42011021	Yombos soeu ka jes kyahsoe yah nyah yhen zungh nyeis lyis gas, nyah zisyos gau joq.
42011022	Nghuot laus eq nyah thoq lyis yombos soeu los las, nyang lyis ung tyamp thang lhyi, nyang khauq dah sham lham yoeus tyamp lho lha, nyah yhenzis lyis tsain gvm yoeus.
42011023	Ngos yah dvgeh ma nghuot soeu ka, ngos lyis jes sont soeu nghuot. Ngos yah dvgeh ma tsainh soeu ka dungsshih lvnggang nghuot, ge.
42011024	Yius gas dius jyank masyah thuq loh las, kyuk dah mau mas lamh yenh. Nyang noyos xo laus eq ma nyvng. Hauh thang lhyi nyang doms taiq zis gas, Ngos thuq khoq dah yhen mha tauh loh das, ge.
42011025	Nyang jweh loh lyis yhen ka shenh shang lha vshung vgvn joq yvlyis nyvng.
42011026	Hauh thang lhyi nyang loh las nyah thoq lyis zes xungh xent dah yius nyhet doeu shwih las hauh vkhau mha los tsain wvng lungh joq. Housoeh las hauh soeu dah wotwu gas xikpheh thoq lyis zes yau los.
42011027	Nyang housoeh taiq nyeis uhlyis, dius phung mhayah vmesbih dvyuk gas kaiq las nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng lyis khoeu kat las nauh gvmshuk soeu ka ngelhoq, ge.
42011028	Nghuot laus eq nyang taiq zis gas, Nghuot goeus, Mangso dang lyis gyo yoeus las chank bang gas nge zes lhoq, ge.
42011029	Moqjens zain nhoenk los lyis nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zoh loh zis gas, Dius haih caiq gas lhung dah vcaiq nghuot. Nyamoq gas vlho lhyi tsain xo laus eq, lvpe Yona dah vlho mha lai las gohtoeu chah vlho lhyi eq nyamoq lyis ma chixoeuq das.
42011030	Yona gas Ninewe bang dah vlho duot vgus, Cangsoeu Lo eq dius haq caiq xiklyis vlho duot das.
42011031	Hauh Soetuon yvmas, mautyi hwankti nyih gas haq caiq mas bang yah dvgeh toq los las nyamoq lyis dang thang thyet das. Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas Solomon dah joeui gyo yoeus das xiklyis mau thang mhayah jweh los. Yoeuh aq, heimha Solomon thoq lyis zes soeu nyeis.
42011032	Soetuon yvmas Ninewe wus mas bang gas, haq caiq mas bang yah dvgeh toq las nyamoq lyis dang thang thyet dyei das: khasoeh ge lyis Yona taiq kyoh dang gvng mas nyamoq nhaiqlom tsain thaiq los. Yona thoq lyis zes soeu heimha nyeis.
42011033	Nyibung lyis tuonh las hank ma gyangh gos shung toh; dang yah eq ma gyangh tsungh toh: wvng los bang bvng zis nyvng das xiklyis nyibung gus mas dvgyangh tuonh toh.
42011034	Nyoqjeih gas gungs dah bvng zis nghuot. Nah nyoqjeih gyings lyis gas, nah dvgungs gonh bvng joq das, nah nyoqjeih ma gis lyis gas nah gungs eq soeng soeng noq.
42011035	Housoeh yvmvyah nah jyank mas bos dah bvng zis gas ma noq tyamp bas jungh zaih nyeis aq.
42011036	Nah gungs mas soeng soeng noq zis dvchuq eq ma bos, gungs gonh yah bvng nyeis nghuot lyis gas, bvng dah nyibung yah nvng lyis pank dyei yhangteh nah gungs gonh bvng zis yah dyingh das, ge.
42011037	Nyang housoeh taiq nyeis lyis, Pharishe dvyuk gas nyang yah dvgeh zo shuk das zis nyang lyis khi lha, nyang wvng las wom zo das zis tsung toh.
42011038	Pharishe gas Yesu nyang wom ma zo shih lyis cheihshang cho ma kuot yvmvyah mauh nyeis.
42011039	Housoeh las Yhensain nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq Pharishe jens gas, kom yahge bvn lyis nghe pheh kyingh dvgyangh shang nhang; namoq dah vkhau mha ka lhuot zo lhuot shuk las lhung zis kyingh dyingh joq.
42011040	Koh bang eh, nghe pheh kuot toh dah Mangso ka vkhau mha eq kuot ma nghuot lhyeh?
42011041	Bvn vkhau mha bos zis nyungs bang lyis dyei geh. Housoeh lyis dvnganh gas, namoq xiklyis lhoqshang zis duot das.
42011042	Pharishe jens eh, namoq mvtanhzoe nghuot! Khasoeh ge lyis, namoq gas shomnhamh yahge angh nyaus dvja ja mas ciboms dvboms tsain kat. Nghuot laus eq, lyi jyoeng zis yahge Mangso lhyi jyetdap cho lhyi lhyweq toh khoq. Ciboms dvboms dyei cho lhyi ma toh khoq, lyi jyoeng cho yahge Mangso lhyi jyetdap cho lhyi kuot vvng.
42011043	Pharishe jens eh, namoq mvtanhzoe nghuot! Khasoeh ge lyis, lyi jungs mas gis thank tsunggus mas tsung, kaih mas phauh nyang jeshuh das yvlyis namoq o.
42011044	Namoq mvtanhzoe nghuot! Khasoeh ge lyis namoq gas ma nyvng lo dah lop yah doeusgoh, dius jens gas hauh thoq mas pyo pyo suh nyeis, ge.
42011045	Hauh uhlyis lyi svra dvyuk nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Svra eh, nvng heisoeh taiq zis gas, ngamoq lyis jwangh nyeis.
42011046	Housoeh las nyang taiq zis gas, Lyi svra moq eh, namoq eq mvtanhzoe nghuot! Khasoeh ge lyis namoq gas dius jens lyis wons nanh dah yvwons kih dyei las vsainnyang gas hauh yvwons lyis loqnyhauh yah eq ma tsain tanh yoeuh ku.
42011047	Namoq gas mvtanhzoe nghuot! Khasoeh ge lyis, namoq dah phauh thyeih moq sat dah lvpe jens lop lyis tsain ci goeus.
42011048	Namoq gas namoq dah phauh thyeih moq dah muhzoh lyis kanghjyoeng kat bang yahge xamxonh bang jyoengh nghuot: khasoeh ge lyis, nyamoq dah lvpe jens lyis sat las, nyamoq lop lyis namoq tsain ci.
42011049	Housoeh yvmvyah, Mangso dah joeui yah taiq zis gas, lvpe jens yahge lvgyo jens lyis ngos nyamoq jyank mas nhang kat das, nyamoq dvyhamh lyis sat las dvyhamh lyis shoeuhshih das.
42011050	Mungkvn cangxeih gvnkhanh uhlyis yah huot tyamp, lvpe jens dvnganh dah suih gas haq caiq bang masyah cangjau sang das.
42011051	Abel dah suih masyah hau yhenmuh yahge phon jo mas sat zis xauh dah Zekharia suih jweh shoq, nghuot goeus, ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, hauh zis gas haq caiq bang mas yoh huon das.
42011052	Lyi svra jens eh, namoq mvtanhzoe nghuot! Khasoeh ge lyis, seq cho suhshih yoeus toh las, vsainnyang eq ma wvng, wvng loh mes bang lyis eq namoq kyoq toh, ge.
42011053	Nyang nghe pheh thuq loh lyis lyi svra moq yahge Pharishe jens gas nyang lyis svsoh nhaiqyo zis yah nyang lyis cho vja ja yah sen lha nyei zis yah,
42011054	nyang dvja ja taiq shuot lyis yobos nyhik das nyhenshang langh nyeis.
42012001	Hauh uhlyis dius ma thoq suon lo dah moqjens zain los las, nyamoq nyang changh zangh nang goh loh nyeis lyis, nyang nyah changlo jens lyis shih taiq zis gas, Pharishe jens dah bicheih lyis zaih geh, ge. Houka gis guons kuot ge dah wotwu nghuot.
42012002	Khasoeh ge lyis ma yoh chixoeuq shoq nghop shung toh zis cha eq ma bos; ma yoh seq shoq shung toh zis cha eq ma bos.
42012003	Housoeh yvmvyah namoq chuot yvmas taiq ya taiq zis lyis bvng yvmas xauhgyo los das. Yvplhunk mas nhuot sot sot zis yhen khung thoq mas taiq hoeuh loh das.
42012004	Ngah loeuzomh jens eh, ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, gungs lyis kyingh yoh sat las hauh thang lhyi cha eq ma yoh kuot lo bang lyis vgyuk goh.
42012005	Nghuot laus eq hank lyis gyuk chah zis ngos namoq lyis taiq; gungs lyis sat thang lhyi, munyi thomh mas yoh khyoq kat dah yomsoq yoh soeu lhyi dvgyuk geh. Nghuot goeus, ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, nyang lyis gyuk geh.
42012006	Nghuot laus eq jos oeng doeu lyis dyvpson aiq kyvp yah ungh ma nghuot lhyeh? Hau jos dvdoeu lyis eq Mangso ma tohnyhik.
42012007	Namoq dah uhloms mas cam khvt dvnganh lyis yangh suon toh. Housoeh yvmvyah vchiq goh, namoq gas jos nyoshoq thoq lyis zes phauhdap.
42012008	Nghuot laus eq ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, Hank laus eq dius xikkhonh mas ngos lyis rhen soeu lhyi, cangsoeu Lo eq Mangso dah loeuswons bang xikkhonh mas nyang lyis rhen das.
42012009	Nghuot laus eq cangsoeu dius xikkhonh mas ngos lyis he tyamp soeu lhyi, Mangso dah loeuswons bang xikkhonh mas nyang lyis eq he tyamp das.
42012010	Cangsoeu Lo lyis dang yah jis shuot yobos lyis yoh khyuot dyei: nghuot laus eq Gyingshang Dyos lyis loeusmus soqzo dah yobos lyis gas ma yoh khyuot dyei das.
42012011	Nyamoq gas namoq lyis lyi jungs mas nhaiqbos bang, vmingh yoh dah guon bang xikkhonh mas shwih loh lyis, khasoeh cha phuk taiq das zis vchiq goh.
42012012	Hauh shishenh lyis khasoeh taiq chah zis gas, Gyingshang Dyos yah namoq lyis jyauh das.
42012013	Dius huom mha dvyuk nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Svra eh, ngah vmang lyis ngos yah yhenzis gvm goh das cho lhyi bos taiq aq, ge.
42012014	Nyang hauh soeu lhyi taiq zis gas, Lvcang eh, nah zomh jo mas soetuon das zis yahge gvm dyei das soeu kuot das nyhenshang ngos lyis hank toeuq toh lah, ge.
42012015	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Nyoqnoq cho lhyi tsain zaih lha zaih geh: khasoeh ge lyis, zisyos magons magoh yoh yvmas dius dah kang bos zis ma nghuot, ge.
42012016	Nyang nyamoq lyis dangtoeuq dvkoeuq taiq zis gas, Dis soeu dvyuk dah maunyeis mas guknyau shihnyau nyoshoq yoh los.
42012017	Nyang nghamh zis gas, Ngah guknyau shihnyau kat toh das joqyos ma bos, ngos khasoeh kuot das au?
42012018	Ngos heisoeh kuot das: Ngah jyi cauh lyis thyoq tyamp las, zes kuh zis tsuk lho lha, hauh yvmas ngah wom yahge yhenzis dvnganh kat toh das.
42012019	Housoeh las ngah gungs dyos lyis, Gungs dyos eh, zvnlom nyoshoq xiklyis vyhang nyoshoq kat toh goeus, zo shuk, pyo lha nyenstap nyeis aq, oen taiq das, ge.
42012020	Nghuot laus eq Mangso nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Koh soeu eh, khvnyens nyang, nyang nah gungs dyos lyis yoeus tyamp das: housoeh las nvng ba kat toh vyhang ka hank xiklyis nghuot das lah, ge.
42012021	Vsainnyang xiklyis zisyos yung toh las Mangso mha ma dis soeu ka housoeh teh soeu nghuot.
42012022	Tsai, nyang nyah changlo jens lyis taiq zis gas, Housoeh yvmvyah ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, kang xiklyis cha zo das; gungs xiklyis cha wuot das oen vchiq goh, ge.
42012023	Kang ka zonoms thoq lyis, gungs gas dyimis thoq lyis zes phauhdap.
42012024	Kvnhoq jens gas jyo ma khyoq, jyo eq ma yhomh zis lyis nghamh yoeuh geh; nyamoq mas jyi eq ma bos, zisyos eq ma joq; nghuot laus eq Mangso ka nyamoq lyis gvmtsoh nyeis. Namoq gas nghoq thoq lyis kha iq zes phauhdap!
42012025	Namoq chiq las vsainnyang kang lhyi loq dvbon hank yoh chent kat?
42012026	Housoeh teh ngis thank cho lhyi yangh namoq ma yoh kuot lyis, gohtoeu nyet shih goeu lyis chamus chiq nyeis goh lah?
42012027	Anghchau ban khasoeh yuk kuh los yvlyis nghamh yoeuh geh. Nyamoq gas muh eq ma zwi, jei eq ma ni, nghuot laus eq ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, phunk nyoqnho ngelang bos dah Solomon dyimis yangh haih ban dvjyo lhyi ma nyis.
42012028	Lomsjingh ehnyet nain bang eh, yos mas yuk las phvnaq nyeihyo nyikhyomp mas kat tyamp das dah mhanh lyis yangh Mangso heisoeh gvmhuot lyis gas, namoq lyis hauh thoq lyis zes gvmhuot das ma nghuot lhyeh?
42012029	Cha zo cha shuk das oen zis yah sen yvmas kyingh shishenh vthank nhang goh.
42012030	Khasoeh ge lyis, hauh zis lyis gas mungkvn mas dah dius jens tsain xo lha, hounyhoq namoq chah nyeis yvlyis namoq dah Uwus seq.
42012031	Namoq gas Mangso munghdan lyis xo geh; housoeh lyis hau chah nyeis cho dvnganh namoq lyis lung dyei das.
42012032	Yvng phung ngis eh, Vchiq goh: khasoeh ge lyis, namoq Uwus gas hauh munghdan namoq lyis dyei das zis svsoh mes.
42012033	Namoq yoh zis lyis ungh las, gvm dyei geh. Khauh soeu ma jweh, naus eq ma yoh zo joqyos, maukhung mha namoq zisyos xiklyis ma seq tyang dah ngwis thung kuot toh geh.
42012034	Khasoeh ge lyis, namoq zisyos joq yvmas namoq nhaiqlom eq joq das.
42012035	Namoq dah yhensain nyihwank pwe mhayah tauh los lyis zes das xiklyis sont langh nyeis dah jyeidwis jens teh dyichih chih, nyibung tuonh las cicont langh nyeis geh.
42012036	Nyang jweh las khomh koq lyis hau jyeidwis jens nyang lyis khomh phank dyei.
42012037	Jyeidwis jens langh nyeis zis lyis yhensain los nyvng lyis, hauh jyeidwis jens gas ngelhoq. Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, hauh yhensain nyang dyichih chih lho lha, nyamoq lyis zojus mas tsung nhang lha, nyang nyang nyamoq lyis phuqsoe das.
42012038	Nyensyo gungsgvm lyis, nghuot ya maubuh los yoq lyis housoeh zungh nyeis langh zis lyis yhensain los nyvng lyis, hauh jyeidwis jens gas ngelhoq.
42012039	Haih zis lyis seq geh: khauh soeu khanhamp los das zis lyis yhensain seq nghuot lyis gas, nyah yhen lhyi ma los yoh thyoq wvng shoq nyang zungh nyeis das.
42012040	Housoeh yvmvyah namoq eq cicont kuot geh. Khasoeh ge lyis namoq ma zangh soh dah shishenh lyis, Cangsoeu Lo jweh los das, ge.
42012041	Hauh thang lhyi Petru nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, haih dangtoeuq gas ngamoq lyis kyingh taiq lah, dvnganhmoq lyis taiq lah, ge.
42012042	Yhensain taiq zis gas, Yhensain ka nyah yhenbang lyis, shishenh jweh lyis zonoms gvm dyei das xiklyis toeuq toh, lomluk las joeui bos dah jyeidwis gas hank nghuot lah, ge.
42012043	Nyah yhensain jweh los uhlyis lomluk luk kuot nyeis yvlyis los nyvng jus dah jyeidwis gas ngelhoq.
42012044	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, yhensain ka nyah zisyos dvnganh thoq mas guon soeu nyang lyis kuot nhang das.
42012045	Nghuot laus eq hauh jyeidwis gas nyah ehnyet mas, Ngah yhensain los das zis nyangh shih ge, nghamh las, phoq jyeidwis nyhiq jyeidwis jens lyis bat, zo shuk, yet nyeis lyis gas,
42012046	hauh jyeidwis dah yhensain ka nyang ma nghamh dah buisnyeis, ma soh dah shishenh lyis nyah yhensain jweh los lyis, nyang lyis zan chink las lom ma luk bang yah dvgeh toh das.
42012047	Nyah yhensain dah ehnyet lyis seq toh las, nyah ehnyet ma chank, cicont ma sont toh dah jyeidwis hank laus eq pop pop bat zis xauh das.
42012048	Nghuot laus eq ma seq las lyuk mon dah muh shuot soeu ka, nainlo dvxauh lyuk das: khasoeh ge lyis, nyoshoq dyei zis xauh soeu hank laus eq nyah jyank masyah nyoshoq sang zis xauh das. Nyoshoq dyei toh goeus soeu jyank masyah zes las sang das.
42012049	Nyeisjvng thoq mas nyi khyoq kat das xiklyis ngos los; hauh nyi gvshih nyang dap nyeis lyis kha iq gis das lah?
42012050	Nghuot laus eq ngos kham chah shih dah jeisnyhop dvkoeuq bos shih. Hauh zis ma kham dvchank, ngos kha iq ehnyet nyo nyeis lah?
42012051	Nyeisjvng thoq mas nyenstap cho chi lyih das xiklyis nghuot oen nghamh goh lhyeh? Ma nghuot, kangh das xiklyis dvnghuot.
42012052	Khasoeh ge lyis, gvshih masyah gas oeng yuk nyeis dah yhen mha somh yuk gas aiq yuk yah, aiq yuk gas somh yuk yah tyixo goh das.
42012053	Uwus yahge loloeu, loloeu yahge uwus; ungwes yahge lonyi, lonyi yahge ungwes, nyimuh yahge doeusmuh, doeusmuh yahge nyimuh gang goh das.
42012054	Nyang dius phung lhyi eq taiq zis gas, Buiswvng shot pheh jyommauh nyvng lyis, nvng houjang yah mau wus das, ge vgus wus los.
42012055	Mautyi lyeis muot los lyis gas, buis gywes das ge vgus gyangh bweh los.
42012056	Gis guons kuot bang eh, maukhung yahge nyeisjvng nyoqnho wuhsoh lyis seq taiq lyis gas: haq caiq dah vlho lhyi chamus ma seq suon goh lah?
42012057	Namoq nyang gungs lyis chamus jyoeng khyvlyis soe ma tuon goh lah?
42012058	Nvng gas nvng lyis zau kauq soeu yah cho mha dvgeh nghuot shih lyis hauh soeu yah lvnyap taiq tamp goh aq. Housoeh ma nghuot lyis gas, zau kauq soeu yah nvng lyis soetuon soeu jyank mas kyauh das. Soetuon soeu nvng lyis pyada lyis kyauh las, nyang gas nvng lyis thung khyoq das.
42012059	Ngos nvng lyis taiq bah, thang thank thunkcent kyvp ma dye cap dvchank nvng hou mhayah yoh thuq los das zis ma nghuot.
42013001	Hauh uhlyis houmha nyeis bang dvyhamh gas, Pilat mungh zau gas, Galile dius dvyhamh bang dah suih lyis nyamoq lomhxangh lainh zis yah lhoeuq cho Yesu lyis tsain taiq kyoh.
42013002	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Hauh Galile dius jens housoeh xauh yvmvyah, Galile dius dvnganh thoq lyis yaunos zes wons oen namoq nghamh goh lah?
42013003	Ma nghuot, ngos namoq lyis taiq bah: namoq eq nhaiqlom ma thaiq lyis gas, namoq dvnganh houyah dvyhangteh dyoqbis das.
42013004	Nghuot ya, Silom wus mas dah tyoeuqzvm gyop las nhiq sat goeus bang dvci xet yuk gas Yerusalem mas bang dvnganh thoq lyis yaunos zes wons bang nghuot oen namoq nghamh goh lah?
42013005	Ma nghuot, ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, namoq eq nhaiqlom ma thaiq lyis gas namoq dvnganh houyah dvyhangteh dyoqbis das.
42013006	Nyang haih dangtoeuq eq taiq shih: dius dvyuk nyah zvbiq khyam mha maiphang dvzains tsungh toh. Houmha vshih e xo lhyi cha eq ma nyvng.
42013007	Housoeh las nyang nyah zvbiq khyam dyangh soeu lhyi taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, ngos haih maiphang zains mas shih xo zis somh zvn bos goeus; cha eq ma nyvng, thoeuq tyamp aq, chamus joqyos nghant toh lah, ge.
42013008	Nghuot laus eq hauh soeu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, khvzvn yuk joq shih bas jungh: ngos zuilhaink yah khop nhuk, jenh kat dyei shih das.
42013009	Sangnhaiq vshih shih los mvbeh, ma shih los nghuot lyis gas, hauh thang lhyi nvng thoeuq tyamp aq, ge.
42013010	Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis nyang gas lyi jungs dvlom mas jyauh nyeis.
42013011	Yoeuh aq, dvci xet zvn gonh yius kuq nosbaus wons dah vmesbih dvyuk nyeis. Nyang gas nungs goeuh las shoqlang ma yoh dan lo.
42013012	Yesu hauh vmesbih lyis nyvng las, nyang lyis nyah jyank mas khi yoeus lho lha, Vmesbih eh, nvng nos masyah luiq goeus ge,
42013013	Nyah thoq mas Yesu loq kih lho lhyi, houjang nyang dan los las, Mangso phunk lyis chungh.
42013014	Yesu Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis noslom yoh bang lyis gis los nhang yvmvyah, lyi jungs gomh soeu ka, nhaiqyo las dius jens lyis taiq zis gas, Muh zwi das xiklyis khyuk nyeih bos, hauh buisnyeis gyo lyis lyih yhoh yoeus geh, Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis vlyih goh, ge.
42013015	Yhensain nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Gis guons kuot soeu eh, namoq yuk khanghmuh Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis, noeu nghuot ya mauhlyihzoe lyis jeis gvmshuk das zis, zungs masyah phank shwih thuq loh ma nghuot lhyeh?
42013016	Housoeh lyis dvci xet zvn Satan yah twih toh zis xauh, Abraham lonyi nghuot dah haih vmesbih lyis hau twih toh masyah Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis ma gis phui kat lhyeh, ge.
42013017	Nyang heisoeh taiq lho lhyi, nyang lyis tyixo bang dvnganh gas tsain xoq goeus. Dius jens gas nyang kuot dah mauhphoh cho dvnganh gvng mas tsain gauslaus.
42013018	Hauh thang lhyi Yesu taiq zis gas, Mangso munghdan gas cha yah doeusgoh lah? Ngos cha yah byi das lah?
42013019	Hauh zis gas, dius dvyuk yoeus las nyah khyam mha sanh kat dah anghwvng shih chvp yah doeusgoh. Hauh zis yuk las vzains kuh los lyis mau dang nghoq jens hauh vko mha sot yoh sot, ge.
42013020	Nyang taiq shih zis gas, Mangso munghdan lyis ngos cha yah byi das au lhyeh?
42013021	Hauh zis gas vmesbih dvyuk sunghso mons somh pan mha yoeus kat lyis sunghso dvnganh yvlyis yoh dau los nhang dah bicheih yah doeusgoh, ge.
42013022	Tsai, nyang gas, dvwus thang lhyi dvwus wvng las jyauh uhlyis yah, Yerusalem pheh e loh.
42013023	Hauh uhlyis dius dvyuk nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, khyuot yoeus zis xauh bang nainlo dvnghuot lhyeh, ge. Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas,
42013024	Zvvs dah khomh cho yah wvng das xiklyis yomkat geh: khasoeh ge lyis dius nyoshoq wvng loh das zis xo laus eq ma tsain xauh wvng loh das.
42013025	Hauh Yhensain khomh toq nyheih toh goeus ya, namoq nghe pheh yap las khomh koq uhlyis yah, Yhensain eh, ngamoq lyis khomh phank dyei aq ge lyis, Namoq khalhye yah zis nghuot yvlyis ngos ma seq, ge toeuh das.
42013026	Namoq gas, Ngamoq nah xikkhonh mas zo shuk ku; ngamoq dah talhoeu mha eq nvng jyauh ku, tsain ge das.
42013027	Nghuot laus eq nyang taiq das zis gas, Namoq khamha bang nghuot yvlyis ngos ma seq; ma jyoeng dah muh kuot bang dvnganhmoq eh, ngah jyank masyah thuq loh geh, ge.
42013028	Abraham, Isak, Yakop yahge lvpe jens nyoshoq Mangso munghdan mas nyeis zis lyis namoq nyvng las, namoq nyang gas nghe pheh khat thuq zis xauh das: hauh yvmas ngausdyeis ngausnhvp yah zwis khih chap loh das.
42013029	Hauh uhlyis dius jens gas buisthuq buiswvng, mautsung mautyi pheh yah los las Mangso munghdan mas zo shuk das.
42013030	Housoeh las, thang thank bang gas xik lyis nghuot das; xik lyis bang gas thang thank nghuot das, ge.
42013031	Hauh nyeihyo nyang Pharishe dvyhamh Yesu jyank mas tsain lyih las Yesu lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng hei mhayah thuq loh aq; Herod nvng lyis sat das zis cvvq nyeis, ge.
42013032	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Hauh dah cauhpau lhyi heisoeh oen loh taiq geh, Khvnyhik yahge phvnaq nyeihyo ngos yius khat tyamp las nos zis lyis gis los nhang das, somh vnyeih lyis ngah muh dye das.
42013033	Nghuot laus eq khvnyhik phvnaq nyeihyo, sangphoq nyeihyo ngos suh chah shih: Khasoeh ge lyis, Yerusalem mas lai las lvpe gohyos ma gis shei.
42013034	Yerusalem eh, Yerusalem eh, lvpe jens lyis sat las, nah jyank mas nhang kat bang lyis lukzains yah doeuh sat dah wus eh, gyoqzains gas gyoqlo jens lyis nyah dungs khau mha xwih tsainh teh, nah lo jens lyis ngos khanyhoq lhain xwih tsainh toh mes laus eq, nvng ma gyo.
42013035	Yoeuh aq, nah yhenmuh gas jyamhjyuklhyuk joq goeus. Ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, Yhensain nyings mas jweh los soeu ka ngelhoq, ge namoq nyang ma taiq dvchank, nvng ngos lyis ma nyvng das, ge.
42014001	Hauh thang lhyi, Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis nyang gas Pharishe uhjyung dvyuk dah yhen mha wom zo das zis wvng loh lyis, nyamoq gas nyang lyis zungh yoeuh nyeis.
42014002	Yoeuh aq, khyei loq yam nos dah vbusbih dvyuk Yesu jyank mas jweh los.
42014003	Housoeh las Yesu gas lyi svra moq yahge Pharishe moq lyis taiq zis gas, Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis gis los nhang das zis lyi vbos lah, ge.
42014004	Nyamoq gas samlo nyeis. Hauh soeu lhyi nyang shwih yoeus las gis los nhang lho lha nhang kat.
42014005	Hauh thang lhyi nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq dvyuk yuk dah lo, nghuot ya noeu Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis jeisdwang mas dyet gyoh loh lyis, namoq houjang ma siq yoeus das lhyeh, ge.
42014006	Nyamoq gas nyang lyis haih cho ma yoh phuk taiq lo.
42014007	Khi toh boenghwus gas zes phauh joqyos lyis tsain khyen zis nyvng las, nyang nyamoq lyis dangtoeuq yah taiq zis gas,
42014008	Dius dvyuk yuk nvng lyis nyihwank pwe mha khi lhyi, zes gis joqyos mas vloh tsung; nah thoq lyis nyoqnho ngelang bos soeu lhyi eq nyang khi toh mvbeh.
42014009	Nah aiq yuk lyis khi toh soeu lyih las, Haih soeu lhyi joqyos xwiq dyei aq, ge nvng lyis taiq lyis, nvng gas xoq zis yah nyhen thank joqyos mas cheh tsung chah das.
42014010	Nghuot laus eq nvng lyis khi lhyi, nyhen thank yvmas loh tsung aq. Hauh uhlyis nvng lyis khi toh soeu los las, Dyenschangh phoq eh, nyhang mha doq tsung aq, ge nvng lyis taiq lyis, nvng yah tsung toh bang dvnganh dah xikkhonh mas nvng nyoqnho ngelang yoh das.
42014011	Khasoeh ge lyis, nyah gungs lyis chungh zo soeu hank laus eq o mha khyoq zis xauh das: nghuot laus eq nyah gungs lyis o mha gyoh soeu ka chungh zis xauh das, ge.
42014012	Nyang lyis boengh khi soeu lhyi eq nyang taiq zis gas, Nvng nyeihzvng, nghuot ya, nyenhcon khi tsoh lyis, nah dyenschangh jens, nah vmang vnoeuh, buisnoms sainhchangh jens, dis dah yhenkyoh hank lyis eq vkhi. Nyamoq eq nvng lyis doms khi tsoh lyis gas, nvng lyis zo jyen doms yoh cap das.
42014013	Nghuot laus eq nvng pwe kuot lyis, nyungs bang, khyei gis loq ma yoh bang khyei gyau bang, nyoqjet bang lyis khi aq.
42014014	Housoeh lyis nvng ngelhoq das: khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq nvng lyis jyehjuh ma yoh tauh. Nghuot laus eq dan bang dwis toq yvmas nvng jyehjuh xauh kham das, ge.
42014015	Nyang yah dvgeh zo tsung toh soeu dvyuk hauh zis xauhgyo lyis, Mangso munghdan mas wom xauh zo das soeu ka ngelhoq, ge nyang lyis taiq.
42014016	Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Dius dvyuk nyenhcon tsoh pwe zainsmuh dvkoeuq kuot las, dius nyoshoq lyis khi toh.
42014017	Nyenhcon tsoh yoq jweh lyis, Tsain los geh, zo shuk das zis dvnganh cicont nghuot goeus, ge khi toh bang lyis khi das xiklyis nyah jyeidwis lyis nhang kat.
42014018	Nghuot laus eq nyamoq dvnganhmoq xamxonh las tsain jyamp taiq. Cangxeih vyuk gas, Ngos maunyeis dvchuq wis toh, hauh zis lyis loh yoeuh chah, ngos lyis jenh nhang kat aq, ge.
42014019	Gohtoeu dvyuk gas, Ngos gas noeu oeng kya wis toh, hauh zis lyis shi yoeuh chah, ngos lyis jenh nhang kat aq, ge.
42014020	Gohtoeu dvyuk eq, Ngos eq phoengh hwank toh, housoeh las ma yoh los, ge.
42014021	Hauh jyeidwis gas nyah yhensain lhyi hauh cho los taiq kyoh. Hauh yhensain ka nhaiq gis yo las nyah jyeidwis lyis taiq zis gas, Wus talhoeu yahge khyam gyung mas lvnyap e lha, nyungs bang khyei gis loq ma yoh bang, khyei gyau bang, nyoqjet bang lyis e shwih hwank aq, ge.
42014022	Hauh thang lhyi jyeidwis taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, nvng taiq vgus khi goeus, nghuot laus eq joqyos bos shih, ge.
42014023	Hauh yhensain ka nyah jyeidwis lyis, talhoeu mha, vthunk vyoq mas e lha, ngah yhen khau dyingh bas jungh, nyamoq lyis ma gyo ma thoq khi hwank aq, ge.
42014024	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, khi toh bang dvyuk eq ngah nyenhcon lhyi xauh zo shi yoeuh das zis ma nghuot, ge.
42014025	Moqjens nyang yah dvgeh loh nyeis las, nyang lhain yoeuh lho lha nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas,
42014026	Ngah jyank mas los soeu hank laus eq, vsainnyang dah ungwes uwus, yhensain nyhiq yahge lo jens, vmang vnoeuh yahge nhamhmuh moq; hauh thoq lyis vsainnyang kang lhyi jyet thoq lyis ngos lyis ma zes jyet lyis gas ngah changlo ma yoh bweh.
42014027	Hank laus eq vsainnyang tapzains wuq las ngah thang mha ma chank soeu ka ngah changlo ma yoh bweh.
42014028	Khasoeh ge lyis namoq jyank mas dvyuk yuk tyoeuqzvm tsuk das lyis, hauh zis dye tsuk shoq nyah ngwis luk das, ma luk das zis lyis tsung lha cangxeih ma suon yoeuh soeu bos lah?
42014029	Housoeh vpom xi lho lha dye shoq ma tyeh tsuk nyhuk lyis gas, nyvng bang dvnganhmoq gas jwangh las,
42014030	Haih soeu ka, kuot xi lho lha dye shoq ma yoh tsuk lo, tsain ge das.
42014031	Dvcho ka: hwankti dvyuk gas gohtoeu hwankti dvyuk yah moeng zan goh das cvvq lyis, dius aiq mons yah lyih dah bang lyis dvmons yah yoh thoenk zan das, ma yoh thoenk zan das zis, tsung lha cangxeih ma nghamh yoeuh zis bos das lah?
42014032	Ma duot lyis gas, gohtoeu hwankti we yvmas nghuot shih lyis lvgyo nhang lha nyenstap das xiklyis kuot nhang chah.
42014033	Housoeh las namoq mas vsainnyang yoh ya yoh zis lyis ma tyamp khoq soeu hank laus eq ngah changlo ma yoh bweh.
42014034	Coh gas gis, nghuot laus eq, ngvm zis bi tyamp goeus ya khasoeh doms yoh ngvm nhang das lah?
42014035	Hauh zis gas nyeisjvng xiklyis ma gis, jenh eq ma gis las nghe pheh gyangh doeuh tyamp. Gyo yoeus das no dap soeu ka xauhgyo bas jungh, ge.
42015001	Hauh uhlyis khoengh khywi bang yahge yaunos wons bang dvnganh gas, nyah dang gyo das ge nyah jyank mas zain los.
42015002	Housoeh las Pharishe moq yahge maussauh lhaih bang lop zis gas, Haih soeu ka yaunos wons bang lyis lhom yoeus las, nyamoq yah dvgeh zo shuk nyeis, ge.
42015003	Nyang nyamoq lyis haih dangtoeuq yah taiq zis gas,
42015004	Namoq dvyuk yuk yvng dvxo doeu yoh; hou mhayah dvdoeu dyuk loh lyis gauci gau doeu lyis mhanhdyvp mas nyhei toh khoq las, dyuk dah vdoeu lyis nyvng shoq ma chank xo soeu hank bos lah?
42015005	Nyang hauh yvlyis xo nyvng lyis, gauslaus zis yah nyah kvtoq mas kih wuq las,
42015006	Nyah yhen mha jweh los lyis, nyah dyenschangh jens yahge nyah yhenkyoh bang lyis khi tsainh las taiq zis gas, Ngah yvng dyuk dah vdoeu doms nyvng goeus yvmvyah, ngos yah dvgeh tsain gausyis goh, ge.
42015007	Houyah dvyhangteh ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, Dan las nhaiqlom thaiq ma chah dah dius gauci gau yuk lyis gauslaus thoq lyis, yaunos wons soeu dvyuk nhaiqlom thaiq los lyis maukhung mha zes gauslaus.
42015008	Vmesbih dvyuk gas ngwis kyvp dvci yoh yvmas dvkyvp dyuk tyamp lyis, nyibung tuonh lho lha yhen shenh las nyvng shoq vlhomuh ma xo zis bos das lah?
42015009	Nyang hauh zis xo nyvng lho lhyi, nyah dyenschangh jens yahge yhenkyoh bang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngah ngwis dyuk dah vkyvp xo nyvng goeus yvmvyah ngos yah dvgeh chomp gaus goh, ge.
42015010	Houyah dvyhangteh ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, yaunos wons soeu dvyuk nhaiqlom thaiq los lyis, Mangso dah loeuswons bang xikkhonh mas gauslaus chank bos, ge.
42015011	Nyang taiq shih zis gas, Gohlhain dius dvyuk mas yukgis lo aiq yuk bos.
42015012	Vnoeuh yuk gas nyah uwus lyis, Uwus eh, ngos yoh vvng dah yhenzis gvmdyei aq, ge sang lhyi, nyang nyah yhenzis nyah zomh lyis gvm dyei.
42015013	Khanyhank nyeih ma nyangh lyis vnoeuh yuk gas nyah yhenzis dvnganh yoeus las we mau pheh gyung suh loh. Hauh mau mas xihphah wuhlhan lha nyah zisyos dvnganh kvlhoeu lhangzvng tyau tyamp.
42015014	Housoeh nyang yoh ya yoh goeu dvnganh thank tyamp dah thang lhyi, hauh mau mas panghkhauq zainsmuh gyoh los las nyang gas shanghsenh los.
42015015	Hauh uhlyis nyang gas hauh mau mas dah dius dvyuk jyank mas khau nges nyeis. Hauh soeu ka nyang lyis nyah yos mas wuq nyhoeu nhang kat.
42015016	Nyang gas wuq zo dah nukkuk yah nyah womdau tyink mes laus eq, nyang lyis hank ma gvmtsoh.
42015017	Housoeh nyang nghamh soh los las taiq zis gas, Ngah uwus dah uhkung jens gas jo shoq xauh zo las nyet shih das. Ngos gas heimha yuot shet shei loh nyeis.
42015018	Ngos toq las ngah uwus jyank mas loh las nyang lyis, Uwus eh, ngos Mangso lhyi eq, nvng lyis eq cu goeus.
42015019	Ngos nah lo oen das zis ma mon lo, nah uhkung dvyuk yhangteh jenh toh aq, oen taiq das.
42015020	Housoeh nyang toq las nyah uwus jyank mas loh. Nyang we mas dvnghuot shih lyis, nyah uwus gas nyang lyis nyvng lyis nhaiq yoeuh nyen zis yah wuih e lha, nyah lainzain mas po lha bvlot zwi tanh.
42015021	Hauh lo nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Uwus eh, ngos Mangso lhyi eq, nvng lyis eq cu goeus, ngos gas nah lo oen lui das zis ma mon lo, ge.
42015022	Nghuot laus eq nyah uwus, jyeidwis jens lyis taiq zis gas, Gis thank dyi xing dung lvnyap yoeus gvmhuot geh, nyah loq mas loqkyop kyop dyei las, nyah khyei mha thyvkoq koq dyei geh.
42015023	Nyhuk toh noeulo eq she los las sat geh, yang zo las pyo goh:
42015024	Khasoeh ge lyis hai ngah lo gas shei goeus zis doms dwis los, nyang dyuk goeus zis doms nyvng, ge. Housoeh las nyamoq pwe kuot nyeis.
42015025	Gvshih nyah lomons yuk gas yos masyah los las yhen mha jweh ni los lyis zains thungh mangh bat sam yahge goh sam xauhgyo.
42015026	Nyang gas jyeidwis dvyuk lyis khi yoeus las khasoeh nghuot zis nyei yoeuh.
42015027	Hauh soeu ka nyang lyis, Nah vnoeuh doms los goeus las, nah uwus eq nyang lyis yangh yangh zan zan xauh lhom yoeus langh yvmvyah, nyhuk toh noeulo eq sat goeus, ge.
42015028	Lomons yuk nhaiqyo los las yvpkhau mha eq ma wvng loh lo. Housoeh las nyah uwus thuq loh las nyang lyis e jyoeuq yoeus.
42015029	Nyang nyah uwus lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, heinyhoq zvn ngos nvng lyis jons dvyuk teh phuqsoe los: tyingtoh dang khayhoq eq ma lai ku, nghuot laus eq ngah dyenschangh jens yah pyo das zis shvbeq lo dvdoeu yangh nvng ngos lyis ma dyei ku.
42015030	Nghuot laus eq nghe nyhiq yah zomh las nah zisyos chi yonh tyamp, hai nah lo doms los lyis gas, nyhuk toh dah noeulo nyah xiklyis sat dyei, ge.
42015031	Nyah uwus nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Vlo eh, nvng gas vjangh ngos yah dvgeh nyeis: ngos yoh ya yoh zis dvnganh nah zis nghuot.
42015032	Hai nah vnoeuh gas shei goeus zis doms dwis los; dyuk goeus mhayah doms xo nyvng. Housoeh yvmvyah yang pyo pyo gausyis gis, ge.
42016001	Yesu nyah changlo jens lyis eq taiq zis gas, Dis soeu dvyuk gas nyah ziszom dvyuk yoh. Hauh ziszom gas nyah yhensain dah zisyos lyis lhoeu mhont tyamp dyei, ge zau kauq bang bos.
42016002	Dis soeu ka nyang lyis khi yoeus las taiq zis gas, Hai nah cho ngos xauhgyo zis khasoeh nghuot lah? Nvng kuot dah muhzoh jyen suon xoeuq aq, gvshih masyah nvng gas ziszom muh yoh kuot lo das zis ma nghuot, ge.
42016003	Hauh uhlyis ziszom nyah nhaiq mas taiq zo zis gas, Ngos khasoeh kuot das lah? Ngah yhensain ngos lyis ziszom muh no tyamp dyei goeus. Ngos yos eq ma yoh khop, yon zo das zis eq xoq.
42016004	Nghuot laus eq ziszom muh masyah gyoh thang lhyi svbih, nyamoq yhen mha ngos lyis lhom yoeus das xiklyis cha kuot das zis ngos seq goeus, ge.
42016005	Yhensain lhyi jyen dap bang yuk khanghmuh lyis khi yoeus las, cangxeih dah soeu lhyi, Ngah yhensain lhyi nvng jyen khanyhoq dap lah, ge nyei.
42016006	Hauh soeu taiq zis gas, Coeu dvxo joi dap, ge. Nyang gas, Nah jyen comh maussauh buk yoeus las, oengci oen lvnyap lhaih aq, ge.
42016007	Tsai, gohtoeu dvyuk lyis eq, Nvng jyen kha nyhoq dap lah, ge. Nyang gas sunghso dvxo luh dap, ge lho lhyi nyang taiq zis gas, Nah jyen comh buk yoeus las xetci oen lhaih aq, ge.
42016008	Ma dan dah ziszom joeui bos khyvlyis kuot yvmvyah hauh yhensain ka nyang lyis chungh: khasoeh ge lyis haq caiq mas dah lo jens gas nyamoq muh kuot yvmas, bvng dah lo jens thoq lyis zes yik.
42016009	Housoeh las ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, nyeisjvng zisyos yah vsainnyang xiklyis buisnoms tsain kuot geh, hauh zis wui lho lhyi namoq gas, vcaiq vto joqyos mas lhom yoeus zis xauh das.
42016010	Dvmhauh yvmas lomluk soeu ka nyoshoq yvmas eq lomluk das. Dvmhauh yvmas ma dan soeu ka nyoshoq yvmas eq dan das zis ma nghuot.
42016011	Housoeh las nyeisjvng zisyos lyis yangh namoq lom ma yoh luk lyis gas, hau jyoeng dah zisyos namoq lyis loms las hank kyauh das lah?
42016012	Namoq gas svbih dah vyhang lhyi lom ma yoh luk lyis gas, namoq yoh vvng dah zisyos namoq lyis hank dyei das lah?
42016013	Jyeidwis dvyuk yhensain aiq yuk lyis ma yoh phuqsoe: khasoeh ge lyis dvyuk lyis hoeng lha dvyuk lyis gas jyetdap das. Dvyuk lyis domsyos gyo las dvyuk lyis gas ma phauh ma danh kuot das. Namoq gas Mangso yahge nyeisjvng zisyos lyis dvgeh ma yoh phuqsoe, ge.
42016014	Hauh dang dvnganh zis lyis ngwis nyoqnoq dah Pharishe moq xauhgyo las, nyang lyis tsain jwangh.
42016015	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Svbih dah xikkhonh mas vsainnyang gungs lyis dan, ge bang namoq nghuot. Nghuot laus eq namoq nhaiqlom lyis Mangso seq: khasoeh ge lyis dius xikkhonh mas chunghtoq zis gas Mangso xikkhonh mas gas vchoqh vlhauq nghuot.
42016016	Lyi yahge lvpe jens dah dang gas, jeisnyhop Yohan dah buisnyeis jweh shoq nghuot. Hou mhayah Mangso munghdan gausyis dang lyis taiq kyoh nyeis las, dius dvnganh gas houmha xauh wvng das xiklyis tsoengh nyhenh loh.
42016017	Lyi maussauh mas dah sauhchvp dvzoq gyoh lwis thoq lyis, maukhung yahge nyeisjvng lai loh das zis svsoh lwis.
42016018	Vsainnyang dah yhensain nyhiq she tyamp las gohtoeu dvyuk lyis phoengh hwank soeu hank laus eq nyi shuot zis nghuot. Yhensain phoq she tyamp dah vmesbih lyis phoengh hwank soeu eq nyi shuot zis nghuot.
42016019	Dis soeu dvyuk gas nyeih khanghmuh nesnoq las yhwiq dah jeimuh dyi xing wuot las nghamh nghamh zo zis yah pyo nyeis.
42016020	Gungs gonh dvmjot jot dah Lazaru ge, shohjyen soeu dvyuk lyis khomhdwang mas lyih tsain toh las,
42016021	Dis soeu dah kihgus masyah gyoh dah zopop kui zo mes nyeis. Lvkhuih eq nyah dvm mas los lyoq dyei.
42016022	Hauh thang lhyi hauh shohjyen soeu shei lai loh las, loeuswons bang gas nyang lyis Abraham sainhkhonh khau mha shwih kat toh. Dis soeu eq shei lha tsain ba nyhop.
42016023	Munyi thomh mas shanghsenh zoh lyis yah, nyah nyoq nghank yoeuh kat lyis, svsoh we yvmas Abraham yahge nyah sainhkhonh khau mha dah Lazaru lyis nyvng kat.
42016024	Hauh uhlyis nyang kaiq las taiq zis gas, Uwus Abraham eh, ngos lyis nhaiqnyen aq; ngos haih nyilhyam thyoh mas shanghsenh zis xauh nyeis yvmvyah, Lazaru gas nyah loqnyhauh thyoh jeis mas jen las ngah lhyo mha taiqh jyamh dyei das zis ngah jyank mas jenh nhang kat aq, ge.
42016025	Nghuot laus eq Abraham taiq zis gas, Lo eh, nvng gas dwis nyeis yoq lyis gis dah zis lyis xauh yoeus. Lazaru gas houmha shanghsenh zis lyis soh aq. Nghuot laus eq gvshih nyang gas nhaiqtaink zis xauh las, nvng gas shanghsenh zis xauh nyeis.
42016026	Hauh thoq lyis, hei mhayah namoq jyank pheh goeu e mes bang ma yoh goeu dap loh das xiklyis eq, hou mhayah ngamoq jyank pheh hank ma yoh goeu dap los das xiklyis eq, ngamoq yahge namoq dah jo mas langhkhau zainsmuh kyo joq, ge.
42016027	Nyang taiq zis gas, Housoeh lyis gas, ngah uwus dah yhen mha nyang lyis nhang kat das xiklyis dung.
42016028	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos vmang vnoeuh oeng yuk yoh shih yvmvyah, heisoeh shanghsenh dah joqyos mas nyamoq ma jweh das xiklyis, nyang nyamoq lyis loh zaih nhang aq, ge.
42016029	Abraham nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Nyamoq gas Moshe dah lyi yahge lvpe jens dah maussauh yoh: hauh bang nyamoq dah dang gyo yoeus bas jungh, ge.
42016030	Dis soeu ka, Ma nghuot, uwus Abraham eh, shei goeus bang mas zis dvyuk nyamoq jyank mas doms loh lyis nyamoq nhaiqlom tsain thaiq das, ge.
42016031	Abraham nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nyamoq Moshe yahge lvpe jens dah dang yangh ma gyo yoeus lyis gas, shei goeus bang dvyuk doms toq loh laus eq gyo yoeus das zis ma nghuot, ge.
42017001	Hauh thang lhyi, nyang changlo jens lyis taiq zis gas, Lainszo gus ma bos shoq gas ma yoh bweh; nghuot laus eq lainszo gus lhoeu thuq soeu ka mvtanhzoe nghuot!
42017002	Hai ngis bang dvyuk yuk lyis yaunos kuot nhang soeu ka, nyah lainzain mas mhoq shan tyaulhangh las thomh mas lhwih kat das zis gas nyah xiklyis zes gis.
42017003	Namoq gas namoq nyang zaih geh: Nah vmang vnoeuh nvng lyis yobos kuot lhyi nyang lyis nyho aq. Nyang nhaiqlom thaiq lyis gas nyang lyis yobos khyuot dyei aq.
42017004	Nyang nvng lyis dvnyeih lyis nyhet lhain yobos kuot las, Ngos nhaiqlom thaiq goeus, ge dvnyeih lyis nyhet lhain nah jyank mas doms lhain los las taiq lyis gas, nvng nyah yobos khyuot dyei aq.
42017005	Lvgyo jens Yhensain lhyi taiq zis gas, Ngamoq dah lomsjingh ehnyet je los nhang aq, ge.
42017006	Yhensain taiq zis gas, Namoq lomsjingh ehnyet anghshih chvp iq bos nghuot lyis, namoq gas nyvng zains lyis, Nvng vnyet masyah guot las thomh mas loh yuk joq aq, oen taiq lyis hauh zis gas namoq domsyos gyo das.
42017007	Namoq jyank mas yos phuk soeu, nghuot ya yvng yoeuh soeu jyeidwis nyeis las, yos pheh yah jweh los yah dvyih nyang lyis, Lvnyap los tsung lha zo shuk aq, ge namoq mas hank taiq das lah?
42017008	Nyang lyis, Ngah nyenhcon ba aq, nvng dyichih chih las ngos dye zo shuk shoq ngos lyis phuqsoe aq, hauh thang lhyi nvng dvyoh zo shuk das, ge taiq das ma nghuot lhyeh?
42017009	Nyang lyis taiq ya taiq zis kuot dyei yvmvyah, nyang gas jyeidwis lyis, Nhaiqshoqlang, ge taiq das lah? Ma taiq mvbeh.
42017010	Houyah dvyhangteh namoq eq taiq ya taiq zis lyis dye kuot lho lhyi, Ngamoq gas phauh ma dap dah jyeidwis dvtsain nghuot, ngamoq kuot chah goeu kyingh dvkuot oen taiq geh, ge.
42017011	Nyang Yerusalem pheh loh uhlyis Samari yahge Galile mau gungs cho lai loh.
42017012	Wukhau dvkoeuq mas wvng loh lyis, mvnggvng nos dah yukgis dvci yuk we we mas yap joq las nyang yah xauhgoh.
42017013	Nyamoq kaiq las taiq zis gas, Yhensain Yesu eh, ngamoq lyis nhaiqnyen aq, ge.
42017014	Nyang nyamoq lyis nyvng las nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq dah gungs phudyei bang lyis loh chixoeuq geh, ge. Nyamoq loh nyeis lyis tsain thyauhlhang loh goeus.
42017015	Nyamoq mas dvyuk gas, nyang gis goeus zis lyis nyvng lho lhyi, tauh loh las Mangso lhyi yomkat kaiq chungh lho lha,
42017016	Nyah khyeiyang mas dupaiq las nyang lyis nhaiqshoqlang sang. Nyang gas Samari dius nghuot.
42017017	Yesu phuk taiq zis gas, Dvci yuk thyauhlhyang loh goeus ma nghuot lhyeh? Gau yuk khapheh loh goeus lah, ge.
42017018	Haih tungbaus mas lai las gohtoeu ka Mangso phunk lyis chungh das zis doms tauh los soeu ma bos lo nyvng, ge lho lha,
42017019	Nyang hauh soeu lhyi taiq zis gas, Toq las loh lo aq; nah lomsjingh zis gas nvng lyis gis los nhang goeus, ge.
42017020	Mangso munghdan khanhamp jweh los das cho, Pharishe moq yah nyang lyis nyei lyis nyang taiq zis gas, Mangso munghdan jweh zis gas nyoqjeih yah yoeuh nyeis las nyvng das zis ma nghuot.
42017021	Yoeuh aq, heineh, yoeuh aq thyineh, ge yoh taiq das zis ma nghuot: khasoeh ge lyis Mangso dah munghdan gas namoq dah vkhau mha nghuot, ge.
42017022	Nyang changlo jens lyis taiq zis gas, cangsoeu Lo dah buisnyeis dvnyeih lyis namoq nyvng mes laus eq, ma xauh nyvng das shishenh jweh los das.
42017023	Nyamoq gas namoq lyis, Heimha yoeuh aq, thyimha yoeuh aq ge lyis eq nyamoq thang mha vchank loh goh.
42017024	Khasoeh ge lyis maukhung dvshot pheh yah maunyoq nyik kat zis gohtoeu dvshot jweh shoq bvng loh zis yah dvyhangteh, Cangsoeu Lo gas nyah buisnyeis lyis housoeh nghuot los das.
42017025	Nghuot laus eq hauh zis ma bweh shih lyis shanghsenh zis nyoshoq yahge haq caiq bang peq tyamp zis xauh shih das.
42017026	Noa zaih lyis bweh yhangteh, hauh Cangsoeu Lo dah buisnyeis lyis eq housoeh nghuot los das.
42017027	Noa gas jeis sangpho khau mha wvng lho lhyi jeis nhauq las, dvnganh yvlyis mhont tyamp dah buisnyeis jweh shoq nyamoq gas, zo, shuk, nyihwank, lonyi dyeizo tsain kuot nyeis.
42017028	Lot zaih lyis eq housoeh vgus nghuot. Hauh uhlyis eq nyamoq gas zo, shuk, wis, ungh, jyo khyoq, yhen kuot las nyeis.
42017029	Nghuot laus eq Lot gas Sodom masyah thuq loh dah buisnyeis lyis maukhung mha dah nyi yahge hwank mau wus las, dvnganh yvlyis mhont.
42017030	Cangsoeu Lo thuq xoeuq dah buisnyeis lyis eq housoeh nghuot das.
42017031	Hauh buisnyeis lyis yhenkhung mha nyeis soeu ka, nyah yhen khau mha joq vyhang vlyih gyoh yoeus lo. Yos mas nyeis soeu eq vtauh los lo.
42017032	Lot dah yhensain nyhiq lyis tsain soh geh.
42017033	Vsainnyang kang lhyi khyuot yoeus das cho xo soeu hank laus eq, kang dyuk das. Kang dyuk soeu hank laus eq nyang kang xauh dwis das.
42017034	Ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, hauh nyens lyis dvjung mas aiq yuk yhet joq mhayah dvyuk lyis shwih loh las dvyuk gas nyet joq das.
42017035	Vmesbih aiq yuk dvgeh wom mhoq nyeis masyah, dvyuk lyis shwih loh las dvyuk gas nyet joq das.
42017036	Yos mas nyeis dah vbusbih aiq yuk mas, dvyuk lyis shwih yoeus loh las dvyuk gas nyet joq khoq das.
42017037	Nyamoq nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, khamha bweh das lah, ge. Nyang gas, Mvng joq yvmas lvngda eq houmha zain los das, ge.
42018001	Hauh thang lhyi, dius gas yom ma gyau gyau vjangh shvmanh dung chah dah cho lhyi Yesu nyamoq lyis dangtoeuq yah taiq zis gas,
42018002	Wusmuhpuk dvkoeuq mas Mangso lhyi ma gyuk, dius lyis eq gungsyaus ma seq yaus dah soetuon soeu dvyuk nyeis.
42018003	Hauh wus mas chauhmuh dvyuk nyeis. Nyang gas nyah jyank mas lyih las sang zis gas, Ngah jeswus yahge ngah jo mas dan khyvlyis soetuon dyei aq, ge.
42018004	Nyang gas nyangh shoq soe ma tuon dyei toh tyamp. Hauh thang lhyi nyang taiq zis gas, Ngos gas Mangso lhyi ma gyuk, dius changh lyis eq gungsyaus ma yaus nghuot laus eq,
42018005	haih chauhmuh gas ngos lyis dvthauqkhyi nyeis yvmvyah, nyah shot pheh dap las lvto phuk dyei das: housoeh ma nghuot lyis gas nyang ngos lyis lhoq nyung nyeis das, ge.
42018006	Housoeh las Yhensain taiq zis gas, Ma dan dah soetuon soeu taiq zis lyis gyo yoeuh geh.
42018007	Mangso nyang khyen toh bang, nyang lyis nyeih nyenh dung nyeis shot pheh dap las dan khyvlyis lvnyap soetuon dyei das.
42018008	Ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, nyang gas nyamoq xiklyis lvto lvnyap phuk dyei das. Nghuot laus eq cangsoeu Lo jweh lyih buisnyeis lyis haih nyeisjvng mas lomsjingh ehnyet bos bang lyis xo nyvng das lah, ge.
42018009	Vsainnyang gungs lyis dan, ge nghamhzo las gohyhamh bang lyis gas cha nho ma doeus bang lyis toeuq las nyang hai dangtoeuq yah eq taiq kyoh.
42018010	Dius aiq yuk shvmanh dung das xiklyis yhenmuh mas doq loh: dvyuk gas Pharishe, gohtoeu dvyuk gas khoengh khywi soeu nghuot.
42018011	Pharishe gas yap las, Mangso eh, ngos gas lhuot zo lhuot shuk, ma dan, nyi shuot lvng shuot bang teh ma nghuot thoq lyis magoh khoengh khywi soeu yhangteh yangh ma nghuot yvmvyah ngos nvng lyis jyehjuh chungh.
42018012	Ngos gas Yuda No Buisnyeis dvdaus lyis aiq lhain womkyi lha, ngos yoh goeu dvnganh mas ciboms dvboms vlu kat, ge dung.
42018013	Khoengh khywi soeu ka we mas yap las, nyah nyoq maukhung mha ma womh nghank yoeuh yoeuh nyah yvnggvng mas bat las dung zis gas, Mangso eh, ngos yaunos wons soeu lhyi nhaiqnyen aq, ge.
42018014	Ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, haih soeu ka thyi gohtoeu dvyuk thoq lyis dan zis yah nyah yhen pheh loh. Khasoeh ge lyis vsainnyang gungs lyis chunghzo soeu hank laus eq o mha khyoq zis xauh das. Vsainnyang gungs lyis o mha gyoh soeu ka chungh zis xauh das, ge.
42018015	Nyamoq gas lonoeuh jens lyis tanh dyei bas jungh, ge nyah jyank mas shwih lyih yvlyis changlo jens nyvng las nyamoq lyis tsain nyho.
42018016	Nghuot laus eq Yesu nyamoq lyis khi yoeus las taiq zis gas, Loshang jens lyis ngah jyank mas los nhang geh, nyamoq lyis vtomp toh goh: khasoeh ge lyis, Mangso munghdan gas housoeh teh bang xiklyis nghuot.
42018017	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, Hank laus eq Mangso munghdan lyis loshang teh ma lhom yoeus soeu ka, houmha ma yoh wvng loh, ge.
42018018	Guon soeu dvyuk nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Gis dah Svra eh, ngos vcaiq vto kang yoh das xiklyis cha kuot chah lah, ge.
42018019	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng ngos lyis chamus Gis soeu, oen lui lah? Mangso mha lai las gis soeu dvyuk eq ma bos.
42018020	Lyi mas, nyi shuot lvng vshuot, dius vsat, vkhauh, ma ying kanghjyoeng vkat, nah ungwes uwus lyis phauh nyang aq, ge zis nvng seq toh goeus, ge.
42018021	Nyang taiq zis gas, Haih goeu dvnganh lyis ngos loyvm yoq lyis yah chank goeus, ge.
42018022	Yesu haih yvlyis xauhgyo las nyang lyis taiq zis gas, nvng dvja chah shih: nvng yoh dah goeu dvnganh ungh las nyungs bang lyis gvm dyei aq, housoeh lyis nvng maukhung mha zisyos yoh das; housoeh las ngah thang mha chank los aq, ge.
42018023	Gvshih, nyang haih zis xauhgyo lyis, nyang svsoh nhaiqkuk: khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas svsoh dis soeu nghuot.
42018024	Nyang housoeh nhaiqkuk yvlyis Yesu nyvng lyis, nyang taiq zis gas, Yoh khuiq bang gas Mangso munghdan mas wvng das zis kha iq yau!
42018025	Khasoeh ge lyis dis soeu Mangso munghdan mas wvng lwis thoq lyis gola-u gas nghvpnho mha wvng das zis zes lwis, ge.
42018026	Hauh dang lyis xauhgyo bang taiq zis gas, Housoeh lyis gas khyuot yoeus zis hank xauh das lah, ge.
42018027	Nyang taiq zis gas, Dius ma gis bweh zis Mangso ka gis bweh, ge.
42018028	Hauh uhlyis Petru taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, ngamoq gas dvnganh toh khoq las nah thang mha chank los goeus, ge.
42018029	Housoeh las nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, Mangso munghdan gvng mas vsainnyang dah yhen, ungwes, uwus, vmang vnoeuh, yhensain nyhiq, lo jens lyis toh khoq soeu hank laus eq,
42018030	gvshih dah vcaiq mas nyoshoq huon xauh yoeus das: hauh thoq lyis jweh los das vcaiq mas eq vcaiq vto kang xauh yoeus das, ge.
42018031	Hauh thang lhyi nyang gas dvci aiq yuk moq lyis nyah jyank mas shwih yoeus las nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, yang gas Yerusalem pheh loh nyeis. Cangsoeu Lo yah sen lha lvpe jens lhaih ya lhaih toh zis dvnganh nyuk los das.
42018032	Khasoeh ge lyis nyang lyis gohnyau bang loq mas kyauh tyamp las, jwangh, ma phauh gis kuot zis yahge svkanh dyeh gyuon zis xauh das.
42018033	Nyamoq gas nyang lyis lyuk las sat das: somh vnyeih lyis nyang dwis toq das.
42018034	Nyamoq gas haih zis dvkoeuq eq ma seqgyo: khasoeh ge lyis haih dang gas nyamoq xikkhonh mas nghop shung toh las, taiq kyoh zis dvkoeuq eq ma tsain seq.
42018035	Gvshih nyang Yerikho mas jweh ni los lyis, nyoqjet soeu dvyuk choyvm mas tsung lha dung zo nyeis.
42018036	Moqjens lai sam gyo las, nyang gas hauh zis cha nghuot yvlyis nyei.
42018037	Nyamoq gas nyang lyis, Nazaret Yesu lai loh zis lyis tsain taiq kyoh dyei.
42018038	Housoeh las nyang kaiq sang zis gas, Dawi dah Lo Yesu eh, ngos lyis nhaiqnyen aq, ge.
42018039	Xik lyis loh nyeis bang gas nyang tsoeklo nyeis bas jungh ge, nyang lyis tsain nyho. Nghuot laus eq nyang gas zes kaiq las, Dawi dah Lo eh, ngos lyis nhaiqnyen aq, ge.
42018040	Yesu yap las, hauh soeu lhyi nyah jyank mas shwih los das xiklyis vmingh dyei. Housoeh nyah jyank mas ni los lyis nyang lyis nyei zis gas,
42018041	Ngos nvng lyis cha kuot dyei das zis o lah, ge. Nyang gas, Yhensain eh, ngah nyoq doms nyvng nhang aq, ge.
42018042	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nah nyoq doms nyvng los bas jungh, nah lomsjingh zis gas nvng lyis gis los nhang goeus, ge.
42018043	Houjang yah nyah nyoq nyvng los las, Mangso dah phunk lyis chungh zis yah nyah thang mha chank loh. Dius dvnganh gas hauh zis lyis nyvng las Mangso lhyi chungh.
42019001	Yesu gas Yerikho wus cho yah wvng las lai loh.
42019002	Yoeuh aq, khoengh khywi bang mas uhjyung nghuot dah Zake ge soeu dvyuk nyeis. Hauh soeu ka dis soeu nghuot.
42019003	Nyang gas Yesu hank nghuot yvlyis nyvng mes las xo laus eq dius puk thoeu lha, nyang gas nyhen yvmvyah ma yoh nyvng.
42019004	Housoeh las nyang lyis nyvng shoq, xik lyis uhlhomh wuih las nyang lai loh das choyvm, lvhomp zains mas doq loh.
42019005	Yesu hauh yvmas jweh las nghank yoeuh kat lyis nyang lyis nyvng las, Zake eh, lvnyap gyoh los aq, khvnyhik ngos nah yhen mha thoeng das, ge.
42019006	Nyang eq lvnyap gyoh las nyang lyis gauslaus gausseq lhom yoeus langh.
42019007	Nyamoq hauh zis nyvng lyis, nyamoq dvnganhmoq gas nyang lyis, yaunos wons soeu yhen mha boengh wvng doq, ge lop.
42019008	Zake toq yap las Yhensain lhyi taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, yoeuh aq ngah vyhang dvgohyih nyungs bang lyis dyei das; dvyuk yuk lyis ngos anzo lyis nyei huon doms cap das, ge.
42019009	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Khyuot yoeus cho ka khvnyhik haih yhen mha los goeus, khasoeh ge lyis nyang eq Abraham dah lo dvyuk nghuot.
42019010	Cangsoeu Lo gas dyuk loh soeu lhyi xo lha khyuot yoeus das xiklyis los zis nghuot, ge.
42019011	Nyamoq haih zis lyis tsain xauhgyo lyis, nyang gas Yerusalem mas jweh ni los yvmvyah eq, nyamoq gas Mangso munghdan lvnyap thuq los das ge nghamh yvmvyah eq, nyang dangtoeuq dvkoeuq yah doms kyah taiq.
42019012	Housoeh yvmvyah nyang taiq zis gas, Nyoqnho bos soeu dvyuk gas, nyang nyang munghdan dvkoeuq xauh yoeus thang lhyi doms los das ge we mau pheh loh.
42019013	Hauh uhlyis nyah jyeidwis jens mas dvci yuk lyis khi las, yuk khanghmuh lyis ngwis kyvp dvci ci kyauh toh lho lha taiq zis gas, Ngos doms jweh los shoq haih zis yah soenghi kuot geh, ge.
42019014	Nghuot laus eq nyah dius jens gas nyang lyis hoeng lha, Haih soeu ngamoq thoq mas guon das zis ngamoq ma o, ge nyah thang mha mang chank kat kat.
42019015	Hauh thang lhyi nyang munghdan yoh las tauh jweh los lyis, nyang ngwis dyei toh khoq dah jyeidwis jens soenghi kuot las, vmyat khayuk khanyhoq yoh zis seq shoq nyamoq lyis khi nhang kat.
42019016	Cangxeih vyuk lyih las taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, nah ngwis kyvp mas dvci kyvp myat goeus, ge.
42019017	Nyang gas, Gis dah jyeidwis eh, nvng gas vmhauhlo dah muh mas lomluk goeus, wus dvci lhyi guon aq, ge nyang lyis taiq.
42019018	Aiq vyuk eq, Yhensain eh, nah ngwis kyvp mas oeng kyvp myat goeus, ge.
42019019	Nyang gas hauh soeu lhyi eq, Nvng wus oeng koeuq lyis guon aq, ge taiq.
42019020	Gohtoeu dvyuk eq lyih las, Yhensain eh yoeuh aq, nah ngwis kyvp lyis ngos misseh yah khoek tsomh toh.
42019021	Nvng gas ma toh masyah yoeus las, jyo ma khyoq masyah seq yhomh dah dius yau dvyuk nghuot yvmvyah ngos nvng lyis gyuk, ge taiq.
42019022	Nyang taiq zis gas, Ma lyungs jyeidwis eh, nvnyang dang khonh yah ngos nvng lyis soetuon das: ngos ma toh masyah yoeus las, jyo ma khyoq masyah yhomh yoeus soeu, yau dah dius nghuot yvlyis nvng seq toh goeus lyis gas,
42019023	ngos doms los lyis ngah ngwis bonzoe yahge ngwis lhyi yoh shoq ngwis jyi mha chamus ma kat toh, ge.
42019024	Vyvm mas yap joq bang lyis eq nyang taiq zis gas, Nyah jyank masyah hauh ngwis kyvp dvkoeuq lyis yoeus las ngwis kyvp dvci yoh soeu lhyi dyei geh, ge.
42019025	Nyamoq, nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, nyang ngwis kyvp dvci yoh goeus, ge.
42019026	Ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, Yoh bang lyis lung dyei das. Ma yoh bang jyank masyah gas, nyamoq yoh joq zis yangh yoeus tyamp dyei das.
42019027	Ngos, nyamoq lyis guon das yvlyis ma o dah ngah jeswus lyis heimha shwih los las, ngah xikkhonh mas sat geh, ge.
42019028	Nyang housoeh dye taiq lho lhyi, nyang gas nyamoq xik mas Yerusalem pheh tsoq loh nyeis.
42019029	Tsanlun ge dah boms, Betphage yahge Bethani wukhau nvm mas jweh ni los lyis, nyang nyah changlo aiq yuk lyis nhang lha taiq kat zis gas,
42019030	Nah aiq yuk, xik mas dah wukhau mha loh geh; houmha wvng loh lyis hank eq ma ji ku shih dah mauhlyihzoe lo dvdoeu twih toh zis lyis nah aiq yuk wvng loh lyis nyvng das, hauh yvlyis phui she los geh.
42019031	Dvyuk yuk nah aiq yuk lyis, Chamus hauh yvlyis phui goh lah, ge nyei lyis, Yhensain hauh yvlyis yhung chah ge, oen taiq geh, ge.
42019032	Jyeinhang zis xauh vzomh loh las nyang taiq kat vgus loh nyvng.
42019033	Nyah aiq yuk mauhlyihzoe lo lyis phui nyeis lyis, yhensain moq gas, Hauh mauhlyihzoe lo chamus phui goh lah, ge nyah aiq yuk lyis nyei.
42019034	Nyah aiq yuk phuk taiq zis gas, Yhensain haih yvlyis yhung chah ge, ge.
42019035	Nyah aiq yuk gas hau mauhlyihzoe lo lyis Yesu jyank mas she loh dyei. Mauhlyihzoe gungs thoq mas nyamoq dah dyimis nyhoeuh las Yesu lyis ji nhang.
42019036	Nyang housoeh ji loh nyeis lyis cho mha dius jens gas nyamoq dah dyi tsain nyhoeuh dyei.
42019037	Gvshih wugungs jweh bah ge dah Tsanlun boms nyeismhung mha jweh lyis, nyah moqjens gas nyamoq nyvng ku dah yomsoq zains muhzoh gvng mas phunk lyis gauslaus las Mangso lhyi yomkat las tsain chungh zis gas,
42019038	Yhensain nyings mas jweh los dah hwankti ka ngelhoq; Maukhung mha nyenstap zis yahge nyhang thank joqyos mas phunk bos nyeis bas jungh, ge.
42019039	Dius moqjens masyah Pharishe dvyhamh nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Svra eh, nah changlo jens lyis nyho aq, ge.
42019040	Nyang nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, haih bang samlo nyeis nghuot lyis gas lukgoq tsain kaiq los das, ge.
42019041	Nyang hauh wus mas jweh ni los las, hauh wugungs lyis nyvng lyis, hauh nyhenshang nyang ngaus las taiq zis gas,
42019042	Wugungs nvng eh, nah nyenstap zis yah sen zis cha nghuot yvlyis khvnyhik nvng toq seq ya lhyeh! Nghuot laus eq gvshih gas hauh zis lyis nvng ma nyvng.
42019043	Khasoeh ge lyis, nah jeswus jens gas nah vyvm vwi mas gvduk kuot lho lha, nvng lyis tsain lhaink toh las, nvng lyis shot khanghmuh kyamp gos toh dah buisnyeis jweh los das.
42019044	Nvng lyis eq, nah wusciank khau mha nyeis bang lyis eq mhont tyamp das las, nvng mas lukgoq dvlom thoq mas dvlom yangh ma yoh ci toh lo das: khasoeh ge lyis Mangso nvng lyis komh das shishenh lyis nvng ma seq.
42019045	Nyang gas yhenmuh mas wvng loh las houmha kaih ungh kaih wis bang lyis khat thuq tyamp.
42019046	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Maussauh mas, Ngah yhen ka shvmanh dung yhen nghuot, ge lhaih toh laus eq namoq gas hauh yvlyis khyanktau khyung tsain kuot, ge.
42019047	Nyang gas nyeih khanghmuh yhenmuh mas jyauh nyeis. Nghuot laus eq Phudyei uhjyung jens, maussauh lhaih bang yahge dius jens lyis uhshe bang gas, nyang lyis sat das cho tsain xo.
42019048	Nghuot laus eq dius jens dvnganh gas nyah dang mas nhaiq wvng nyeis yvmvyah, nyamoq khasoeh kuot das cho ma xo nyvng.
42020001	Dvnyeih gas nyang yhenmuh mas dius jens lyis jyauh zis yahge gausyis dang taiq kyoh nyeis dah uhlyis, Phudyei uhjyung jens, maussauh lhaih bang yahge logis jens nyah jyank mas lyih las,
42020002	Nvng gas chah vmingh yah haih zis kuot lah? Nvng lyis haih vmingh hank dyei zis ngamoq lyis taiq kyoh aq, ge.
42020003	Nyang nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos eq namoq lyis dvja nyei bah, ngos lyis phuk taiq geh.
42020004	Yohan dah jeisnyhop cho ka Mangso mhayah nghuot lah? Dius masyah nghuot lah, ge.
42020005	Nyamoq nyang changh xamgoh las, Yang maukhung mhayah nghuot oen taiq lyis gas, Housoeh lyis namoq, nyang lyis chamus ma lomsjingh goh lah, ge das.
42020006	Nghuot laus eq yang dius masyah nghuot oen lhyi ka, dius dvnganh gas yang lyis lukgoq yah doeuh das: khasoeh ge lyis Yohan ka lvpe nghuot yvlyis nyamoq jingh, ge.
42020007	Housoeh las nyamoq phuk taiq zis gas, Khamha yah nghuot zis ngamoq ma seq, ge.
42020008	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos haih muh chah vmingh yah kuot zis namoq lyis ma taiq kyoh das, ge.
42020009	Hauh thang lhyi, nyang dius jens lyis haih dangtoeuq yah taiq zoh loh zis gas, Dius dvyuk zvbiq dvkhyam ba tsungh toh lho lha, khyam muh zwi bang lyis tsoeuh dyei khoq las, nyang gas we mau mas nyangh shoq loh nyeis.
42020010	Shishenh jweh lyis, khyam mha dah zvbiq shih gvmboms nyang lyis dyei bas jungh ge, khyam tsoeuh zwi bang jyank mas jyeidwis dvyuk nhang kat. Nghuot laus eq khyam tsoeuh zwi bang gas nyang lyis bat las, gungskom nhang kat.
42020011	Nyang gohtoeu jyeidwis dvyuk lyis doms nhang kat. Nyang lyis eq nyamoq bat, vxoq vcaiq shoeuhshih las gungskom nhang kat.
42020012	Somh vyuk nhang lhyi, nyang lyis eq dvmtap las, khat thuq tyamp.
42020013	Hauh thang lhyi zvbiq khyam sain taiq zis gas, Ngos khasoeh kuot das lah? Ngos jyetdap, ngah lo lyis nhang kat das, nyang lyis gas nyamoq phauh nyang mvbeh, ge.
42020014	Nghuot laus eq, khyam tsoeuh zwi bang nyang lyis nyvng lyis, nyamoq nyang changh taiq goh zis gas, Haih soeu ka yhenzis zom das soeu nghuot. Hauh yhenzis gas yah zis nghuot bas jungh, nyang lyis sat goh, ge.
42020015	Nyamoq gas, nyang lyis zvbiq khyam nghe pheh she thuq las sat. Housoeh las zvbiq khyam sain ka nyamoq lyis khasoeh kuot das lah?
42020016	Nyang jweh los las hauh khyam tsoeuh zwi bang lyis mhont las, zvbiq khyam ka gohyhamh bang lyis dyei das, ge. Hauh zis xauhgyo bang gas, Heisoeh ma nghuot bas jungh, tsain ge.
42020017	Nyang nyamoq lyis yoeuh las taiq zis gas, Housoeh lyis gas, yhen tsuk bang peq tyamp dah luklom gas, yhenthunk lukzains bweh los goeus, ge lhaih toh zis gas cha ge lah?
42020018	Hauh lukzains thoq mas gyoh soeu hank laus eq dyis tyamp das. Hank thoq mas laus eq hauh zis gyoh lyis gas phih soeh nhoeuq tyamp das, ge.
42020019	Hauh dangtoeuq gas, phudyei uhjyung jens yahge maussauh lhaih bang lyis toeuq las taiq yvlyis nyamoq seqgyo las, hauh uhlyis yangh nyang lyis nyhik das zis sont nyeis. Nghuot laus eq dius jens lyis gyuk.
42020020	Housoeh las nyamoq gas, jyoeng guons kuot dah joh yoeuh bang lyis lhom nhang zis gas, nyang cha taiq yvlyis nyhik las, nyang lyis yomsoq yahge vmingh yoh dah mungh zau jyank mas yoh kyauh tyamp das xiklyis nghuot.
42020021	Nyamoq, nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Svra eh, nvng gas dius dah nyoqnho lhyi ma yoeuh dan khyvlyis jyauh las Mangso dah lyi jus jus jyauh nyeis zis lyis ngamoq seq.
42020022	Ngamoq gas hwankti Kesar lyis khoengh kat das zis lyi bos lah, ma bos lah, ge.
42020023	Nghuot laus eq nyang gas nyamoq dah nhaiqlom guih zis seq las nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas,
42020024	Ngwis kyvp dvkoeuq ngos lyis chixoeuq geh, hauh zis hank gungslho yahge maussauh dap lah, ge. Nyamoq taiq zis gas, Kesar zis nghuot, ge.
42020025	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Housoeh yvmvyah Kesar zis nghuot lyis gas Kesar lyis, Mangso zis nghuot lyis gas Mangso lhyi dyei geh, ge.
42020026	Nyamoq gas dius jens xikkhonh mas nyah dang khonh mas yobos ma nyvng zis yahge nyang phuk taiq dang lyis tsain mauh las samlo no dyuk goeus.
42020027	Hauh uhlyis, dwis toq cho ma bos ge dah Saduke dvyhamh nyah jyank mas los nyei zis gas,
42020028	Svra eh, yhensain nyhiq bos dah vmang, lo ma bos khoq shei lhyi, vmang dah chauhmuh lyis vnoeuh shoeuh las vmang dah vshih tsoq bas jungh ge Moshe ngamoq lyis lhaih toh dyei.
42020029	Gvshih houteh vmang vnoeuh nyhet yuk nyeis. Cangxeih vyuk gas nyihwank las lo ma bos shei khoq.
42020030	Aiq vyuk eq chauhmuh shoeuh las lo ma bos shei khoq.
42020031	Somh vyuk eq chauhmuh shoeuh goeus. Housoeh nyhet yuk jweh shoq lo ma bos tsain shei khoq.
42020032	Thang thank lyis hauh vmesbih eq shei loh.
42020033	Housoeh yvmvyah hau dwis toq los uhlyis hauh vmesbih gas, hank dah yhensain nyhiq nghuot das lah? Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas nyhet yuk moq yah phoengh wvng goeus, ge.
42020034	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Haih mungkvn lo jens gas phoengh hwank, lonyi dyeizo kuot.
42020035	Nghuot laus eq shei masyah dwis toq los las hauh mau mas jweh bang gas, phoengh hwank, lonyi dyeizo zis ma bos lo.
42020036	Nyamoq gas loeuswons bang teh nghuot las ma shei lo. Nyamoq lyis shei masyah dwis toq los nhang goeus yvmvyah nyamoq gas Mangso dah lo jens nghuot.
42020037	Shei bang lyis dwis toq los nhang cho yah sen lha Moshe ka kanghjyoeng dede chixoeuq goeus. Nyi dap nyeis dah mhanhgyomh yah sen lha lhaih toh dah Jyomp maussauh doeus mas Moshe ka Yhensain lhyi Abraham dah Mangso, Isak dah Mangso, Yakop dah Mangso, ge lui.
