42020038	Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas shei bang dah Mangso ma nghuot, dwis nyeis bang dah Mangso dvnghuot; Mangso dah xikkhonh mas haih bang dvnganh gas dwis nyeis, ge.
42020039	Hauh uhlyis maussauh lhaih bang dvyhamh nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Svra eh, nvng taiq zis jus, ge.
42020040	Hauh thang lhyi nyamoq gas nyang lyis cha eq ma womh nyei lo.
42020041	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Khristu gas Dawi dah lo nghuot, ge nyamoq khasoeh yoh taiq lah?
42020042	Dawi nyang Chungh Dang maussauh mas, Hauh Yhensain ngah Yhensain lhyi taiq zis gas,
42020043	Ngos nah jeswus lyis nah nangte kuot shoq, Nvng ngah loqyos shot pheh tsung toh aq, ge.
42020044	Housoeh las Dawi gas Khristu lyis Yhensain ge lui lyis gas, nyah lo khasoeh yoh nghuot das lah, ge.
42020045	Hauh thang lhyi dius dvnganhmoq xauhgyo shoq nyang nyah changlo jens lyis taiq zis gas,
42020046	Maussauh lhaih bang lyis zaih geh: nyamoq gas dyixing wuot las suh mes. Kaih mas phauh nyang zis yah jeshuh das zis eq, lyi jungs mas gis thank tsunggus lyis eq, pwe mha gis thank joqyos lyis eq tsain o mes.
42020047	Chauhmuh jens dah yhen lhyi kuotzo kuot shuk las dius dah xikkhonh mas yoeuh doeus das xiklyis shvmanh xing xing dung guons kuot. Hauh bang gas zes than dah yobos dyei zis xauh das, ge.
42021001	Housoeh nyang yoeuh kat lyis, dis bang ziskwi mha vlu tsain kat nyeis yvlyis nyvng las,
42021002	thunkcent aiq kyvp kat, nyungs dah chauhmuh dvyuk lyis eq nyang nyvng.
42021003	Nyang taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, hai nyungs dah chauhmuh gas nyamoq dvnganhmoq thoq lyis zes nyo shoq kat goeus.
42021004	Khasoeh ge lyis hauh bang dvnganhmoq gas, nyamoq magons magoh yoh masyah vlu kat. Nghuot laus eq nyang gas vshoh vjyen masyah nyah kang khoeu das zis dvnganh kat goeus, ge.
42021005	Dius dvyhamh gas yhenmuh lyis yungh dah luk yahge dyei toh dah jyungshuk yah shunk toh zis lyis taiq nyeis lyis nyang taiq zis gas,
42021006	Gvshih namoq nyvng nyeis, luk dvlom thoq mas dvlom ci toh dah haih goeu gas, dvlom thoq mas dvlom kih toh zis ma bos lo das buisnyeis jweh los das, ge.
42021007	Nyamoq, nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Svra eh, hauh zis gas khanhamp nghuot das lah? Hauh cho bweh ni los lyis chah vlho nghuot das lah, ge.
42021008	Nyang taiq zis gas, Namoq mhuih khwangh zis ma xauh bas jungh, zaih geh: khasoeh ge lyis, nyoshoq moq ngah nyings yoeus las, Ngos gas Khristu nghuot; hauh shishenh jweh ni los goeus, ge vguons kuot taiq los das: housoeh las namoq hauh bang thang mha vchank loh goh.
42021009	Namoq gas moeng dyoq zis yahge gomloeus toq cho xauhgyo lyis vgyuk vdvn goh: Hauh cho ka xik bweh los das. Nghuot laus eq thang thank zis gas ma jweh los shih, ge.
42021010	Tsai, nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Dius dvnyau yah dvnyau, munghdan dvkoeuq yah dvkoeuq zan goh das.
42021011	Joqyos vdeh deh mas maunyeis gvgis dwis las, panghkhauq, yomh jweh los das. Maukhung mhayah eq gyukphoh zis yahge vlho zainsmuh bweh thuq los das.
42021012	Nghuot laus eq hauh cho dvnganh ma bweh shih lyis, ngah nyings gvng mas svbih yah namoq lyis nyhik las shoeuhshih, lyi jungs mas kyauh tyamp las thung lhunk, hwankti yahge guon bang dah xikkhonh mas shwih loh zis tsain xauh das.
42021013	Housoeh teh zis gas namoq kanghjyoeng kat das dah toeuh bweh los das.
42021014	Housoeh yvmvyah namoq khasoeh toeuh das zis, xik lyis yah ma nghamh toh noh zis namoq nhaiqlom mas tsain kat chi geh.
42021015	Khasoeh ge lyis jeswus namoq lyis ma yoh taiq ung, dang uh ma yoh lhomh das nyhenshang ngos namoq lyis nhuot mas joeui dyei das.
42021016	Namoq dah nyhiphoq, vmang vnoeuh, vnyau vhuh yahge dyenschangh jens gas namoq lyis phanhlyen das. Namoq mas dvyhamh lyis gas sat das.
42021017	Ngah nyings gvng mas dvnganhmoq namoq lyis hoeng los das.
42021018	Nghuot laus eq namoq dah cam dvkhvt eq dyoq das zis ma nghuot.
42021019	Namoq gas jhen zis yah namoq dah kang khyuot yoeus zis xauh das.
42021020	Yerusalem wugungs lyis jeswus yah lhaink toh zis lyis namoq nyvng goeus ya, hauh wugungs dyoqbis bah ge goeus zis lyis namoq seq toh lo geh.
42021021	Hauh uhlyis Yuda mau mas nyeis bang gas boms pheh phang loh bas jungh. Wugungs khau mha nyeis bang gas thuq loh bas jungh. Wuxom mha nyeis bang eq wus vkhau mha ma wvng los bas jungh.
42021022	Khasoeh ge lyis hauh buisnyeis lyis gas, lhaih ya lhaih toh dang nyuk los das las, haih buisnyeis gas lvto phuk das buisnyeis nghuot.
42021023	Hauh buisnyeis lyis loshang gungs nghuot bang yahge lonoeuh nauh gvmshuk bang gas mvtanhzoe nghuot! Khasoeh ge lyis hauh mau mas gyukluklvsonh shohjyen zis xauh las, haih dius nyau thoq mas nhaiqlom dyis zis jweh das.
42021024	Nyamoq gas moengsa yah dyoqbis das, dius nyau khanghmuh yah nyhik shwih loh zis xauh das. Gohnyau bang dah shishenh ma thank dvchank Yerusalem gas gohnyau bang yah nang zaiq toh zis xauh das.
42021025	Hauh uhlyis buis, lhamhmuh yahge kyi mha eq vlho thuq los das; thomh yahge jeisphauq toq thwe gvng mas munghdan gas mauh las,
42021026	hauh nyeisjvng mas bweh los zis lyis yoeuh las, dius jens gyuk zis yah chuot lains loh das. Khasoeh ge lyis maukhung mha dah yomsoq nonh los das.
42021027	Hauh uhlyis Cangsoeu Lo gas, yomsoq yahge phunk zainsmuh yah jyommauh yah gyoh los zis lyis nyamoq nyvng das.
42021028	Haih vyhang bweh zoh los lyis, namoq uhloms nghank las yoeuh kat geh: khasoeh ge lyis namoq dah khyuot yoeus cho jweh ni los goeus.
42021029	Nyang nyamoq lyis dangtoeuq yah taiq zis gas, Namoq maiphang zains yahge gohtoeu saiqzains dvnganh zis lyis yoeuh geh:
42021030	Saiq nyuk tuot los zis nyvng goeus ya, zvn wvng los zis lyis namoq nyang yoh seq.
42021031	Houyah dvyhangteh hai bweh los dah vyhang lhyi nyvng lyis, Mangso munghdan gas jweh ni los goeus zis seq geh.
42021032	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, Haih zis ma nyuk los dvchank haq caiq ma lai das.
42021033	Maukhung nyeisjvng lai loh laus eq ngah dang gas ma lai loh das.
42021034	Namoq gas vsainnyang dah gungs lyis zaih nyeis geh. Namoq gas, zo lais shuk lais pwe kuot gvng mas nyeisjvng thoq mas dah chiqjyen yvmas shishenh vthank nhang goh. Hauh buisnyeis gas lhyik baiq teh namoq mas nyetlos nyettant thungh phuh los das.
42021035	Khasoeh ge lyis, hauh buisnyeis gas nyeisjvng gonh mas nyeis ya nyeis bang thoq mas jweh los das.
42021036	Housoeh yvmvyah hai bweh los das dah cho dvnganh masyah namoq luiq las, cangsoeu Lo dah xikkhonh mas yoh yap das xiklyis, vjangh shvmanh dung las zungh nyeis geh, ge.
42021037	Housoeh Yesu gas nyeih lyis yhenmuh mas jyauh nyeis. Nyenh lyis gas thuq las Tsanlun ge dah boms mas loh nyeis.
42021038	Dius dvnganh nyah dang lyis gyo yoeus das nyhenshang nvpsangh yah yhenmuh mas tsain los.
42022001	Lhuiq Kat Pwe ge nyhink dah bicheih ma kat ohlhyoq zo pwe jweh ni los nyeis.
42022002	Hauh uhlyis phudyei uhjyung jens yahge maussauh lhaih bang gas, nyang lyis khasoeh yoh sat das dah cho tsain xamgoh nyeis. Nghuot laus eq nyamoq gas dius jens lyis gyuk nyeis.
42022003	Hauh shvhoeu lhyi dvci aiq yuk mas Iskarot ge dah Yudas jyank mas Satan wvng las,
42022004	nyang thuq loh las phudyei uhjyung jens yahge zau jens jyank mas, nyang lyis khasoeh yoh phanhlyen dyei das cho, nyamoq yah e xamgoh nyeis.
42022005	Hauh bang gas gaus las ngwis dyei das xiklyis xamxonh.
42022006	Nyang nyamoq yah xamxonh las moqjens ma nyeis uhlyis nyang lyis yoh phanhlyen dyei das toeuh xo nyeis.
42022007	Lhuiq Kat Pwe yvnglo sat phudyei las bicheih ma kat ohlhyoq zo pwe shishenh jweh los.
42022008	Housoeh yvmvyah nyang gas, Petru yahge Yohan lyis xik pheh nhang lha taiq kat zis gas, Yang zo das xiklyis Lhuiq Kat Pwe loh sont langh geh, ge.
42022009	Hauh aiq yuk nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Nvng ngamoq lyis khamha loh sont toh dyei langh nhang mes lah, ge.
42022010	Nyang nyah aiq yuk lyis taiq zis gas, Nah aiq yuk wugungs mas wvng loh lyis jywang dvng soeu dvyuk yah xauhgoh das: hauh soeu wvng loh dah yhen khau mha chank wvng loh geh.
42022011	Hauh yhensain lhyi, Ngos ngah changlo jens yah Lhuiq Kat Pwe zo das dah boenghdoq yvp khah zis nghuot lah, ge Svra nyei nhang, oen taiq geh.
42022012	Housoeh lyis nyang sont toh dah yhenthoq yvpmuh dvyvp tuonh shet das, yah nyhenshang houmha ba sont toh langh geh, ge.
42022013	Nyah aiq yuk loh lyis nyang taiq kat vgus nyvng las, hau Lhuiq Kat Pwe nyenhcon lhyi tsain ba sont toh.
42022014	Shishenh jweh las nyang gas lvgyo jens yah dvgeh kihgus mas joqyos yoeus.
42022015	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos shanghsenh zis ma xauh shih lyis namoq yah dvgeh haih Lhuiq Kat Pwe svsoh zo shuk mes.
42022016	Ngos namoq lyis taiq zis gas, Mangso munghdan mas doms xauh zo shishenh jweh shoq, ngos haih yvlyis ma zo das, ge.
42022017	Nyang kom lhyi yoeus las jyehjuh chungh lho lha taiq zis gas, Haih zis lyis yoeus las namoq mas gvm geh.
42022018	Ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, Mangso munghdan jweh los shoq, ngos zvbiq shih mas zis ma shuk lo das, ge.
42022019	Hauh thang lhyi ohlhyoq yoeus las jyehjuh chungh lho lha khyiq dyei las taiq zis gas, Haih zis gas namoq xiklyis dyei tyamp dah ngah gungs nghuot. Ngos lyis soh das xiklyis haih zis kuot geh.
42022020	Houyah dvyhangteh nyamoq dye zo thang lhyi kom lhyi yoeus las taiq zis gas, Haih zis gas namoq xiklyis huot tyamp, ngah suih yah kuot toh dah thanghchvp vsaiq nghuot.
42022021	Nghuot laus eq yoeuh aq, ngos lyis phanhlyen das soeu dah loq gas haih kihgus mas ngah loq yah dvgeh nghuot.
42022022	Cangsoeu Lo gas toeuq toh zis yah dvyhangteh loh lo das; nghuot laus eq nyang lyis phanhlyen soeu ka mvtanhzoe nghuot, ge.
42022023	Hauh uhlyis nyamoq eq hauh cho kuot das zis hank nghuot das au, ge tsain nyei goh nyeis.
42022024	Hauh thoq lyis changlo jens mas zes kuh soeu hank nghuot nyeis au lhyeh, ge nyamoq taiq phyen goh nyeis yvmas,
42022025	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Gohnyau hwankti jens gas nyamoq xauh guon bang lyis kyukzo nhantzo. Nyamoq lyis vmingh dyei bang eq, nyamoq nyang gungs lyis jyehjuh yhensain nghuot ge taiqzo.
42022026	Nghuot laus eq namoq gas housoeh ma nghuot; namoq mas zes kuh soeu ka zes ngis soeu yhangteh nghuot las, uhjyung ka phuqsoe soeu teh nghuot chah.
42022027	Womjus mas tsung toh soeu yahge phuqsoe soeu hank zes kuh lah? Wom jus mas tsung toh soeu ma nghuot lhyeh? Nghuot laus eq ngos gas namoq mas phuqsoe soeu teh nghuot nyeis.
42022028	Namoq gas, ngos yaukyenh uhlyis, ngos yah dvgeh nyeis bang nghuot.
42022029	Ngah Uwus ngos lyis munghdan dyei zis yah dvyhangteh, ngos namoq lyis dyei.
42022030	Namoq gas ngah munghdan mas, ngah kihgus mas yoh zo shuk das zis yahge soetuon tank mas tsung lha, Israel dvci aiq nyau lyis soetuon das, ge.
42022031	Housoeh las Yhensain taiq zis gas, Simon, Simon Satan gas namoq lyis sunghso khyink teh khyink mes nyeis.
42022032	Nghuot laus eq nah lomsjingh ehnyet ma dyoq das xiklyis, ngos nvng lyis shvmanh dung dyei. Nah nhaiqlom thaiq las doms lhain soh los lyis, nah vmang vnoeuh moq lyis thukxank nyeis aq, ge.
42022033	Petru taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, ngos gas nvng thung gyoh laus eq, shei chah laus eq nvng yah dvgeh loh das xiklyis cicont nghuot, ge.
42022034	Nyang taiq zis gas, Petru, ngos nvng lyis taiq bah, khvnyens gyoq ma tuon shih lyis nvng, ngos lyis ma seq, ge somh lhain he tyamp das, ge.
42022035	Nyang nyamoq lyis doms taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis ngwis thung, bvtmuh yahge thyvkoq ma bos bos nhang kat lyis dvja ja vchah goh lah, ge. Nyamoq gas, Cha eq ma chah, ge.
42022036	Nyang taiq zis gas, Gvshih gas ngwis thung yoh soeu ka yoeus chi aq, bvtmuh eq houyah dvyhangteh wons aq, moengsa ma yoh soeu ka dyi ungh las wis chi aq.
42022037	Ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, O mha dah dang gas ngos mas nyuk los chah. Houka, Nyang lyis gas lyi lhyweq bang mas bos suon kat goeus; jyoengh ngah cho lhaih toh zis gas nyuk los, ge.
42022038	Nyamoq taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, moengsa aiq chamh joq, ge. Nyang gas, Hauh zis luk goeus, ge.
42022039	Hauh thang lhyi nyang gas, vjangh gyangh doq dah Tsanlun boms mas doq loh. Nyah changlo jens eq nyah thang mha chank loh.
42022040	Joqyos mas jweh las nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Shiwu yvmas ma wvng loh das xiklyis shvmanh dung nyeis geh, ge lho lha,
42022041	nyamoq nyeis masyah luk dvlom doeuh ko loh las, phvluk zomhgyuis lho lha shvmanh dung zis gas:
42022042	Uwus eh, nvng bauh lyis gas, haih kom ngah jyank masyah yoeus tyamp dyei aq, nghuot laus eq ngah ehnyet ma nghuot, nah ehnyet dvnghuot bas jungh, ge.
42022043	Loeuswons soeu dvyuk maukhung mhayah thuq los las nyang lyis yomdyei nyeis.
42022044	Nyah ehnyet loh thank nyung daus zis yah dvgeh yomkat las shvmanh dung nyeis lyis, nyah gywesjeis eq nyeisjvng mas suih zoq gyoh teh gyoh nyeis.
42022045	Shvmanh dung masyah toq las nyah changlo jens jyank pheh loh lyis, nyamoq gas nhaiqkuk ehnyet yah yhet joq zis lyis loh nyvng.
42022046	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq chamus yhet joq goh lah? Shiwu yvmas ma bos loh das xiklyis toq las shvmanh dung nyeis geh, ge.
42022047	Housoeh taiq nyeis shih lyis, yoeuh aq, moqjens yah dvgeh, dvci aiq yuk mas dvyuk nghuot dah Yudas ge soeu ka, nyamoq xik mas loh las, Yesu lyis bvlot tanh das xiklyis nyah jyank mas ni loh.
42022048	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yudas eh, nvng gas cangsoeu Lo lyis bvlot tanh zis yah phanhlyen nyeis vnghuot lah, ge.
42022049	Yesu yah dvgeh nyeis bang gas, bweh los das cho lhyi yoeuh seq las nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, ngamoq moengsa yah vzan das lah, ge.
42022050	Dvyuk gas Phudyei Zainsmuh jyeidwis dah loqyos no zan thyet dyei.
42022051	Yesu phuk taiq zis gas, No geh, ge hauh no lyis nyang tanh zis yah doms gis nhang.
42022052	Yesu gas jweh los dah phudyei uhjyung jens, yhenmuh gomh zau jens yahge logis jens lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq gas khyanktau nyhik das teh, ngos lyis nyhik das xiklyis moengsa, dunghkuq chi lha los lhyeh?
42022053	Yhenmuh mas nyeih yau nyeih ngos namoq yah dvgeh nyeis uhlyis gas namoq ngos lyis ma nyhik, nghuot laus eq gvshih gas namoq dah shishenh nghuot joq zis yah dvyhangteh, mauchuot dwang dah yomsoq eq nghuot, ge.
42022054	Hauh dius jens gas Yesu lyis nyhik las Phudyei Zainsmuh dah yhen mha tsain shwih loh. Petru eq nyamoq yah we we masyah chank loh.
42022055	Ganthoq khau mha nyi khat las tsung toh yvmas Petru eq bos.
42022056	Housoeh nyikhyomp yvm mas tsung toh zis lyis jyeidwis nyelo dvyuk nyvng lyis, nyang lyis jeih jeih yoeuh las, Haih soeu eq Yesu yah dvgeh zis nghuot, ge.
42022057	Petru he lha taiq zis gas, Nyelo eh, nyang lyis ngos ma seq, ge.
42022058	Dvxa lhyi gohtoeu dvyuk eq Petru lyis nyvng las, Nvng eq haih bang mas zis nghuot ge lyis, Petru gas, Vbusbih eh, ngos ma nghuot, ge.
42022059	Dvshishenh ko doms nyangh thang lhyi, gohtoeu dvyuk taiq zis gas, Haih soeu eq jyoengh nyang, nyang yah dvgeh zis nghuot. Nyang Galile dius eq nghuot, ge.
42022060	Petru doms taiq zis gas, Vbusbih eh, nvng cha taiq zis ngos ma seq, ge. Housoeh taiq yah dvyih gyoq tuon los.
42022061	Hauh uhlyis Yhensain ka Petru lyis lhain yoeuh kat: Gyoq ma tuon shih lyis nvng ngos lyis somh lhain he tyamp das, ge dah Yhensain dang lyis Petru soh los yah dvyih,
42022062	Petru nghe pheh thuq las svsoh ngaus.
42022063	Yesu lyis nyhik toh bang gas, nyang lyis lyuk las tsain jwangh.
42022064	Nyah nyoq lyis nghop dyei las lyuk zis yah, nyang lyis taiq zis gas, nvng lyis lyuk zis hank nghuot lah? Lvpe pe aq, ge.
42022065	Gohtoeu dah loeusmus soqzo dang eq nyoshoq Yhensain lhyi sang gyuon shih.
42022066	Nyoq nyvng los lyis, dius jens dah logis jens, phudyei uhjyung jens, maussauh lhaih bang tsain huom lha, Yhensain lhyi hauh huom pheh shwih e lha taiq zis gas,
42022067	Nvng Khristu nghuot jyoeng lhyi ka ngamoq lyis taiq aq, ge. Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos taiq lyis eq namoq jingh das zis ma nghuot.
42022068	Ngos nyeidang lyis eq namoq ma phuk taiq, ngos lyis kat kat das zis ma nghuot.
42022069	Gvshih masyah cangsoeu Lo gas Mangso Yomsoq dah loqyos shot pheh tsung das, ge.
42022070	Nyamoq dvnganhmoq gas, Housoeh lyis nvng Mangso dah Lo nyang nghuot lhyeh, ge tsain nyei. Nyang gas, Ngos hauh soeu nghuot ge namoq taiq nyeis, ge.
42022071	Housoeh hauh bang taiq zis gas, Yang gohtoeu chah kanghjyoeng chah shih lah? Yvnyang nyah nhuot masyah xauhgyo goeus, ge.
42023001	Housoeh somci moqmuh dvnganhmoq yah toq las, nyang lyis Pilat jyank mas shwih e.
42023002	Haih soeu ka dius jens lyis chowhang shwih whang lha, vsainnyang gas Khristu ge dah hwankti nghuot, ge Kesar lhyi khoengh ma kat noh, ge tung zis ngamoq nyvng, ge zau tsain kauq.
42023003	Pilat nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Nvng Yuda hwankti nghuot lhyeh, ge. Nyang phuk taiq zis gas, Nvng taiq nyeis, ge.
42023004	Pilat gas, Ngos haih dius yuk mas chah yobos eq ma nyvng, ge phudyei uhjyung jens yahge moqjens lyis taiq.
42023005	Nghuot laus eq hauh bang zes kaiq las taiq zis gas, Haih dius yuk gas Galile mau masyah xi lha Yuda mau khyiq khanghmuh, haih joqyos mas jweh shoq jyauh las shwih hoeu, ge.
42023006	Pilat haih zis xauhgyo yah dvyih, Haih dius yuk gas Galile dius nghuot lhyeh, ge nyei.
42023007	Hwankti Herod guon dah yvmas soeu nghuot zis seq yah dvyih, nyang lyis hauh hwankti jyank mas shwih kat nhang. Hauh shvhoeu lhyi Herod eq Yerusalem mas nyeis.
42023008	Herod gas Yesu lyis nyvng lyis svsoh gaus: khasoeh ge lyis nyah cho xauhgyo yvmvyah nyang lyis nyvng mes zis nyangh goeus. Chixoeuq dah vlho dvkoeuq koeuq lyis xauh nyvng das, ge nghamhloms nyeis.
42023009	Herod gas nyang lyis dang nyoshoq nyei laus eq, nyang gas cha eq ma phuk taiq.
42023010	Phudyei uhjyung jens yahge maussauh lhaih bang gas toq las, nyang lyis yobos khoek khoek taiq huon.
42023011	Herod gas nyah jesphung yah dvgeh Yhensain lhyi jwangh nyhap zis yah nyang lyis kyi kyi bvng dah dyi gvmhuot las Pilat jyank mas doms shwih dyei kat.
42023012	Hauh nyenhyo Herod yahge Pilat gas buisnoms bweh los: xikpheh gas nyang changh nyang jes dvnghuot.
42023013	Pilat gas Phudyei uhjyung jens yahge zauguon jens, dius jens lyis khi tsainh las taiq zis gas,
42023014	Haih soeu ka dius jens lyis chowhang shwih whang soeu teh namoq ngah jyank mas shwih los las, yoeuh aq, namoq nyang dah xikkhonh mas ngos nyang lyis nyei yoeuh goeus. Nghuot laus eq, namoq nyang lyis yobos huon zis yah dvyhangteh, ngos nyang mas yobos ma nyvng.
42023015	Ngos namoq lyis Herod jyank mas eq nhang kat goeus: Herod eq yobos ma nyvng. Yoeuh aq, haih soeu ka shei mon dah yobos cha eq ma kuot toh.
42023016	Housoeh yvmvyah ngos haih soeu lhyi lyuk las kat kat das, ge.
42023017	(Khasoeh ge lyis, hauh pwe mha thung lungh bang dvyuk yuk lyis ma lhuiq kat ma gis nghuot.)
42023018	Somci moqmuh gas, Hauh soeu lhyi toh las nyamoq lyis Baraba lhuiq kat dyei aq, ge dvyih dvyot tsain kaiq sang.
42023019	(Baraba gas wugungs lyis jausxo, coeuh kang nhang dah yobos, dius sat dah yobos gvng mas thung gyoh soeu nghuot.)
42023020	Pilat gas Yesu lyis lhuiq kat mes las dvlhain doms taiq.
42023021	Nyamoq kaiq zis gas, Nyang lyis tapzains mas taplhangh aq, taplhangh aq, tsain ge.
42023022	Pilat gas, Hauh soeu ka cha cu lah? Ngos nyah jyank mas shei das yobos dvkoeuq eq ma nyvng, ge somh vlhain jweh shoq taiq. Housoeh las ngos nyang lyis lyuk las kat kat das, ge.
42023023	Dius jens gas hauh soeu lhyi tapzains mas taplhangh tyamp das xiklyis yomkat tsain kaiq nyeis las, hauh bang thwe yahge phudyei uhjyung jens dah thwe kaiq ung tyamp.
42023024	Pilat eq nyamoq dung zis yah dvyhangteh bweh shoq dang thang thyet dyei.
42023025	Coeuh kang nhang dah zis yahge dius sat yobos gvng mas thung lhunk toh soeu lhyi nyamoq o zis yah dvyhangteh lhuiq las, Yesu lyis gas nyamoq o khyvlyis kyauh tyamp.
42023026	Yhensain lhyi shwih thuq loh dah uhlyis, Kureni mhanhdyvp wukhau mhayah los langh dah Simon lyis nyvng lyis, nyhik las Yesu thang mha tapzains bos wuq nhang.
42023027	Yesu thang mha chank loh dah dius somci moqmuh mas, Yhensain gvng mas ngausdyeis ngausnhvp mus bang vmesbih jens dvyhamh bos.
42023028	Hauh bang lyis Yesu lhain yoeuh las taiq zis gas, Yerusalem lonyi jens eh, namoq ngah nyhenshang vngaus goh, namoq nyang xiklyis yahge namoq dah lo jens xiklyis ngaus geh.
42023029	Yoeuh aq, dius thonh vmesbih gas ngelhoq: lo ma wons ku dah ung yahge vnoeuh ma jyop ku dah nauh gas phauhdap ge taiq los dah buisnyeis jweh los das.
42023030	Hauh uhlyis nyamoq gas boms lyis, Ngamoq thoq mas jingh gyoh nhiq aq, jing jens eh, ngamoq lyis nghop toh dyei aq, ge khi das.
42023031	Khasoeh ge lyis vnyaus zains lyis housoeh kuot lyis, vkyuk zains gas khasoeh bweh das lah, ge.
42023032	Yhensain yah dvgeh khyanktau aiq yuk lyis eq sat das xiklyis shwih thuq loh.
42023033	Uhkhangh ge dah joqyos mas jweh lyis, tapzains mas taplhangh las, khyanktau aiq yuk lyis eq nyah loqwi loqyos dvshot dvyuk taplhangh toh.
42023034	Housoeh las Yesu taiq zis gas, Uwus eh, nyamoq kuot dah zis nyamoq ma seq yvmvyah nyamoq lyis khyuot dyei aq, ge. Nyah dyi lyis eq nyamoq doeugoh las gvm yoeus.
42023035	Dius jens eq houmha tsain yoeuh yap joq. Houmha dah zau jens Yesu lyis jwangh zis gas, Nyang gohyhamh lyis daq khyuot yoeus. Mangso khyen yoeus dah Khristu nghuot lyis gas nyah gungs nyang khyuot yoeus bas jungh, ge.
42023036	Jeslo jens los las nyang lyis shihjyen jeis dyei uhlyis yah jwangh zis gas,
42023037	Nvng Yuda Hwankti nghuot jyoeng lhyi, nvnyang gungs nvnyang khyuot yoeus zo aq, ge.
42023038	Nyah vtoeu mha maussauh lhaih toh zis gas, Haih soeu ka YUDA HWANKTI nghuot, ge Heleni, Latin yahge Hebre nyingh pheh yah tsain lhaih toh.
42023039	Tapzains mas lhangh toh dah khyanktau dvyuk eq, Nvng Khristu nghuot lyis gas nah gungs lyis nvnyang yahge ngah aiq yuk lyis eq khyuot yoeus aq, ge ma phauh ma danh sang.
42023040	Gohtoeu dvyuk gas nyah dyenschangh phoq lyis nyho lha taiq zis gas, Nvng eq joeng zis heinyhoq xauh nyeis goeus lyis eq Mangso lhyi ma gyuk lhyeh?
42023041	Yah aiq yuk gas vsainnyang kuot dah yobos gvng mas mon yih khyvlyis xauh kham lha, haih soeu ka cha ma cu, ge.
42023042	Nyang Yesu lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, nah munghdan mas jweh lyis, ngos lyis soh dyei aq, ge.
42023043	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos nvng lyis jyoengh taiq bah, khvnyhik nyang nvng ngos yah dvgeh Pharadisu mas nyeis das, ge.
42023044	Hauh shishenh gas dvci aiq shishenh ko nghuot las, somh shishenh jweh shoq dvmau gonh mau chuot joq.
42023045	Buis eq soeng soeng noq las, yhenmuh khau mha gos misseh eq vgungs masyah juiq tyamp.
42023046	Yesu thwe zainsmuh yah taiq zis gas, Uwus eh, ngah dyos lyis nah loq khau mha kyauh goeus, ge nyang kang gyoh.
42023047	Hauh cho lhyi jes dvxo guon zau nyvng lyis, Haih soeu ka ehnyet dan soeu gyingh nghuot, ge Mangso lhyi chungh nyeis.
42023048	Hauh cho lhyi los jweh yoeuh bang gas heisoeh teh yvlyis nyvng las sainhkhonh loq bat las tauh loh.
42023049	Galile mau masyah Yhensain thang mha chank los dah vmesbih jens yahge nyang yah seq goh bang eq we masyah tsain yap las hau dvnganh yvlyis yoeuh nyeis.
42023050	Yoeuh aq, nhaiqbos zau Yosep ge soeu nyang gas gis las dan soeu dvyuk nghuot.
42023051	Nyang gas, Arimathia mas dah Yuda dius nghuot. Nyang gas Mangso munghdan lyis langh nyeis dah nhaiqbos soeu nghuot las nyamoq xam lha kuot yvmas xam ma bos xonh soeu nghuot.
42023052	Nyang gas Pilat jyank mas wvng las Yesu dah gungs lyis sang yoeus.
42023053	Gungs lyis khyoq las jeimuh mis yah lyet lho lha hank eq ma nyhop ku shih dah lop mas e kat toh.
42023054	Hauh nyeih gas Yuda jens dah sont buisnyeis nghuot zis yahge Yuda No Buisnyeis eq ni los goeus.
42023055	Galile mau masyah, nyang yah dvgeh chank los dah vmesbih jens eq lop mas nyah mvng toh dah joqyos lyis yoeuh das xiklyis tsain los.
42023056	Hauh thang lhyi nyamoq doms los las, xangh coeu yahge nvm pyo zis tsain sont toh. Tyingtoh dang yah dvyhangteh Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis no nyeis.
42024001	Dvdaus dah cangxeih vnyeih, nvpsangh noq yah hau vmesbih jens gas, gohtoeu vmesbih jens yah dvgeh nyamoq sont toh dah xangh coeu chi lha lop pheh tsain e loh.
42024002	Jweh lyis lop mas dah lukzains toeu phanh toh zis nyvng las,
42024003	lop mas wvng loh lyis eq Yhensain Yesu dah mvng lyis ma tsain nyvng.
42024004	Housoeh svsoh tsain mauh nyeis lyis, yoeuh aq, bvng dah dyi wuot dah dius aiq yuk, nyamoq vyvm mas yap joq.
42024005	Hauh vmesbih jens gyuk yos zoh lyis yah nyeisjvng mas tsain gop joq lyis, hauh aiq yuk nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Dwis nyeis soeu lhyi shei bang mas chamus xo nyeis goh lah? Nyang heimha ma nyeis lo, dwis toq loh goeus.
42024006	Galile mas nyeis shih yoq lyis nyang namoq lyis khasoeh taiq toh zis lyis soh geh.
42024007	Cangsoeu Lo gas yaunos dap bang dah loq mas kyauh tyamp zis xauh las, tapzains mas taplhangh tyamp zis xauh thang lhyi somh vnyeih lyis dwis toq das, ge taiq toh, ge.
42024008	Housoeh nyamoq gas nyang taiq dang lyis tsain soh.
42024009	Lop masyah doms loh las hauh cho dvnganh, dvci dvyuk moq yahge gohtoeu dah bang lyis tsain taiq kyoh.
42024010	Lvgyo jens lyis hauh loeuskyoh bang gas, Magdala Mari, Yaku ungwes Mari, Yoana yahge gohtoeu vmesbih jens tsain nghuot.
42024011	Nyamoq taiq dang gas lvdyoq mvnyei taiq teh dvnghuot las ma tsain jingh.
42024012	Nghuot laus eq Petru gas toq las lop pheh wuih e. Lop mas jweh las gop yoeuh lyis lyet misseh dvjoq lo zis nyvng yvmvyah mauh las nyah yhen pheh tauh loh.
42024013	Hauh nyeihyo nyang, Yerusalem masyah nyhet main ko we dah Ema-u wukhau pheh dius aiq yuk loh nyeis.
42024014	Hauh nhaiqtang eq hau bweh lai loh dah cho lhyi taiq goh loh.
42024015	Housoeh taiq goh nyeis lyis Yesu nyang nvmtanh jweh thuq los las, nyamoq dvgeh loh.
42024016	Nghuot laus eq nyah aiq yuk gas Yesu nghuot zis ma seq das xiklyis nyoq hwah nhang.
42024017	Nyang nyah aiq yuk lyis taiq zis gas, Nah aiq yuk gyung suh uhjyangh chah bvhwa lhah goh las nhaiqngis goh lah, ge.
42024018	Khleopa ge soeu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Nvng gas Yerusalem mas dah boenghwus nghuot las, khvlyens bweh dah cho lhyi nvng kyingh ma seq dvmus lhyeh, ge.
42024019	Nyang nyei zis gas, chah cho gah, ge. Nyah aiq yuk taiq zis gas, Nazaret wukhau mha dah Yesu cho nghuot. Nyang gas lvpe nghuot las, Mangso yahge dius xikkhonh mas kuot dah muh yahge taiq dang mas yomsoq bos soeu nghuot.
42024020	Hauh soeu lhyi phudyei uhjyung jens yahge ngamoq dah guon bang yah sat das xiklyis kyauh tyamp las, tapzains mas tsain taplhangh tyamp.
42024021	Nyang gas Israel dius nyau lyis khyuot yoeus das soeu nghuot, oen ngamoq nghamhloms. Hauh thoq lyis haih cho bweh zis gvshih somh nyeih bos goeus.
42024022	Ngamoq mas dah vmesbih dvyhamh nvpsangh yah e lha,
42024023	Nyah mvng ma nyvng las tauh los lyis, Nyang gas dwis nyeis, ge loeuswons bang yah nyvng xoeuq dah cho los tsain taiq kyoh las nyamoq mauh nyeis.
42024024	Housoeh las ngamoq yah nyeis bang dvyhamh lop mas e yoeuh lyis eq, hauh vmesbih jens taiq teh nyvng nghuot laus eq nyamoq, nyang lyis ma nyvng, ge taiq ge, ge.
42024025	Nyang nyah aiq yuk lyis taiq zis gas, Lvpe jens dah dang dvnganh yvlyis yoh lomsjingh das joeui ma bos, nhaiqlom than bang eh,
42024026	Khristu gas housoeh teh shanghsenh kham lha nyah phunk mas yoh wvng das ma nghuot lhyeh, ge lho lha,
42024027	Moshe masyah xi lha lvpe jens dvnganh dah dang mas, nyang yah sen lha lhaih toh dang lyis nyang nyah aiq yuk lyis phui kyoh.
42024028	Nyah aiq yuk loh nyeis dah wukhau nvm mas jweh lyis, nyang lai loh das teh doeus las,
42024029	nyah aiq yuk gas nyang lyis, Ngah aiq yuk yah dvgeh wukhau mha thoeng goh: buis wvng goeus, mau eq chuot goeus, ge nyang lyis khyoeuq. Housoeh las thoeng das xiklyis nyah aiq yuk yah loh.
42024030	Womjus mas nyamoq yah dvgeh tsung toh uhlyis, ohlhyoq lyis yoeus las shvmanh thang lhyi khyiq las nyah aiq yuk lyis dyei.
42024031	Hauh uhlyis nyah aiq yuk nyoq bangh los las, nyang Yesu nghuot zis lyis tsain seq. Housoeh las nyang gas nyah aiq yuk jyank masyah dyuk loh.
42024032	Nyah aiq yuk dvyuk yah dvyuk taiq goh zis gas, Nyang cho mha yah aiq yuk yah dvgeh taiq goh los las, lhaihtoh dang vjyuk phant uhlyis, yah aiq yuk dah nhaiqlom nyi soeh ngeh vnghuot lah, ge.
42024033	Nyah aiq yuk gas hauh shishenh lyis nyang, Yerusalem wus pheh tauh loh las dvci dvyuk moq gas gohyhamh bang yah dvgeh nyeis zis lyis loh nyvng.
42024034	Huom nyeis bang eq, Yhensain ka jyoengh dwis toq goeus, Simon dah nyoq mas eq nyvng xoeuq, ge taiq.
42024035	Nyah aiq yuk eq cho mha bweh zis yahge ohlhyoq khyiq yvmas, nyang nghuot cho yoh seq cho lhyi tsain taiq kyoh.
42024036	Housoeh tsain taiq goh nyeis lyis, nyamoq dah vgungs mas Yesu yap las nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq nyenstap nyeis bas jungh, ge.
42024037	Nghuot laus eq changlo jens gas sidyos lyis nyvng, ge nghamh las gyuk nyeis.
42024038	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Chamus chiq nyeis goh lah? Chamus ehnyet khamkhvv goh lah?
42024039	Ngah loq ngah khyei lhyi yoeuh geh, ngos lyis zwi yoeuh geh, ngos gas gungs gyingh nyang nghuot. Sidyos gas ngos lyis nyvng teh shohyau shohkhyiq ma bos, ge.
42024040	Haih zis taiq lho lha, nyang nyamoq lyis nyah loq yahge nyah khyei chixoeuq.
42024041	Hauh bang gaus las ma yoh jingh shih, dvmauh nyeis shih lyis, nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq heimha zonoms dvja ja vyoh lah, ge.
42024042	Nyamoq gas nyang lyis kank dah oengdoq dvchink yahge dyoyhei dvtap dyei lyis,
42024043	Yhensain ka yoeus las nyamoq xikkhonh mas zo.
42024044	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Moshe dah Lyi mas eq, lvpe jens dah maussauh mas yahge Chungh Dang maussauh mas ngos lyis toeuq las lhaih ya lhaih toh dang nyuk los chah ngos namoq yah dvgeh nyeis khoq yoq lyis taiq dah dang gas, haih cho nyang nghuot.
42024045	Housoeh las lhaihtoh dang seqgyo das xiklyis nyamoq dah seqgyo cho lhyi phank dyei.
42024046	Nyang taiq zis gas, Lhaihtoh dang heisoeh ge: Khristu gas shanghsenh zis xauh las somh vnyeih lyis shei masyah dwis toq chah:
42024047	Yerusalem masyah xi lha, dius nyau khanghmuh lyis yaunos yoh khyuot dyei dah nhaiqlom thaiq cho lhyi nyah nyings mas yoh taiq kyoh das.
42024048	Namoq eq haih cho dvnganh dah kanghjyoeng tsain nghuot.
42024049	Yoeuh aq, ngah Uwus dah dangthoengh joq zis yah dvyhangteh, ngos namoq lyis nhang kat dyei das. Housoeh las namoq gas nyhang mha dah yomsoq ma xauh yoeus dvchank, Yerusalem mas nyeis shih geh, ge.
42024050	Hauh thang lhyi nyamoq lyis Bethani jweh shoq shwih loh las, nyah loq toeu lha nyamoq lyis shvmanh dyei.
42024051	Housoeh shvmanh dyei nyeis uhlyis, nyang gas changlo jens yah gang las maukhung mha toqh yoeus zis xauh goeus.
42024052	Housoeh las nyamoq gas nyang lyis paiq las svsoh gausyis zis yah Yerusalem wus pheh tsain tauh loh.
42024053	Housoeh Mangso lhyi chunghtoq las chungh zis yah Yhenmuh mas tsain nyeis nyeis. Amen.
43001001	Cangxeih lyis Dang bos: hauh Dang gas Mangso yah nghuot las Dang gas Mangso nghuot.
43001002	Nyang gas cangxeih lyis yah Mangso yah nghuot.
43001003	Vyhang dvnganh zis lyis nyang yah kuot toh. Kuot toh yvmas, nyang ma bos bos kuot zis dvkoeuq eq ma bos.
43001004	Nyang mas kang bos, hauh kang ka dius jens dah bvng zis nghuot.
43001005	Hau bvng zis gas chuot yvlyis pank dyei; chuot zis gas bvng zis lyis ma duot.
43001006	Mangso jyank masyah nhang kat dah dius dvyuk bos: nyah nyings gas Yohan nghuot.
43001007	Kanghjyoeng kat das nyhenshang nyang los zis gas bvng zis yah sen lha nyang kanghjyoeng kat lyis, nyang masyah dius dvnganhmoq yoh lomsjingh bas jungh ge zis nghuot.
43001008	Nyang gas hauh bvng zis ma nghuot, bvng zis lyis kanghjyoeng kat das xiklyis dvlos.
43001009	Hau jyoeng dah bvng zis gas mungkvn mas los nyeis dah dius yuk khanghmuh lyis pank dyei.
43001010	Hauh soeu ka haih mungkvn mas nyeis khoq: haih mungkvn lyis eq nyang yah kuot toh goeus; nghuot laus eq mungkvn gas nyang lyis ma seq kat.
43001011	Nyang gas nyah vnyau jyank mas jweh nyeis laus eq, nyah vnyau gas nyang lyis ma tsain lhom yoeus.
43001012	Nghuot laus eq nyang lyis lhom ya lhom yoeus bang ge, nyah nyings lyis lomsjingh bang lyis Mangso dah lo jens duot das dah yomsoq dyei goeus.
43001013	Hauh bang lyis khoeu kat toh zis gas, suih masyah eq ma nghuot, gungsshoh ehnyet masyah eq ma nghuot, dius ehnyet khyvlyis eq ma nghuot, Mangso mhayah dvnghuot.
43001014	Dang gas suihshoh lyih duot las yah jyank mas nyeis ku. Yang nyvng dah nyah phunk gas Uwus dah Loteh phunk nghuot las, jyoeng zis yahge jyehjuh yah dyingh joq.
43001015	Yohan gas nyah cho lhyi kanghjyoeng kat las kaiq taiq zis gas, Ngah thang mha los soeu ka ngah xik lyis yah nhaiqdoeus zis xauh soeu nghuot, oen ngos taiq soeu ka haih soeu nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas ngah xik lyis yah nyeis goeus, ge.
43001016	Yang dvnganhmoq gas dyingh joq dah nyah jyehjuh lyis dvsoenk thang lhyi dvsoenk xauh kham yoeus.
43001017	Khasoeh ge lyis, Lyi gas Moshe yah dyei khoq; nghuot laus eq jyehjuh yahge jyoeng cho ka, Yesu Khristu masyah los zis nghuot.
43001018	Mangso lhyi hank khanhamp eq ma nyvng yoeuh ku: nghuot laus eq Uwus sainhkhonh mas nyeis dah Loteh gas nyah cho lhyi taiq hoeuh goeus.
43001019	Yerusalem mas dah Yuda jens gas phudyei bang yahge Lewi jens lyis Yohan jyank mas nhang lha, Nvng hank nghuot lah, ge nyei uhlyis Yohan kanghjyoeng kat las,
43001020	Nyang rhen cho ka, Ngos gas Khristu ma nghuot, ge.
43001021	Hauh bang nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Housoeh lyis nvng Eliya nghuot lhyeh, ge lyis, Ma nghuot, ge. Lvpe nghuot lhyeh, ge lyis eq, Ma nghuot, ge.
43001022	Hauh bang eq, Nvng hank nghuot lah? Ngamoq lyis nhang kat bang lyis doms taiq das dang bos shoq, nah gungs lyis nvnyang khasoeh oen zis taiq kyoh aq ge lyis,
43001023	Nyang taiq zis gas, Ngos gas lvpe Esaia taiq toh zis yah dvyhangteh, Yhensain dah cho lhyi dan nhang geh ge mhanhdyvp mas dvyuk kaiq nyeis dah thwe nghuot.
43001024	Pharishe jens gas nyamoq mas bang lyis nhang kat las,
43001025	Nyamoq nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng gas Khristu eq ma nghuot, Eliya eq ma nghuot, lvpe eq ma nghuot lyis gas chamus jeisnyhop dyei lah, ge.
43001026	Yohan nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos gas jeis mas jeisnyhop dyei. Nghuot laus eq namoq vgungs mas yap joq, namoq ma seq soeu ka,
43001027	ngah thang mha dvlos laus eq ngah thoq lyis zes las, ngos gas hauh soeu dah thyvkoq twih phui dyei das zis yangh ma mon, ge.
43001028	Hauh cho bweh dah joqyos gas, Yodan lvng thyitvp, Bethani wukhau, Yohan jeisnyhop dyei dah yvmas nghuot.
43001029	Hauh thang lhyi nyeihyo Yohan gas, Yesu nyah jyank mas los nyeis yvlyis nyvng las taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, haih mungkvn mas yaunos lyis wons tyamp das, Mangso dah Yvnglo!
43001030	Ngah thang mha los soeu ka ngah xik lyis yah nhaiqdoeus zis xauh soeu nghuot oen ngos taiq toh soeu ka haih soeu nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas ngah xik lyis yah nyeis goeus.
43001031	Ngos gas nyang lyis ma seq, nghuot laus eq ngos jweh los las jeisnyhop dyei zis gas, nyang lyis Israel xikkhonh mas chixoeuq das zis nghuot.
43001032	Yohan kanghjyoeng kat zis gas, Dyos gas maukhung mhayah khotjyauh teh gyoh los las, hauh soeu thoq mas lyih no zis lyis ngos nyvng goeus.
43001033	Haih soeu hank nghuot zis lyis ngos ma seq, nghuot laus eq, jeis mas jeisnyhop dyei das xiklyis ngos lyis nhang kat soeu nyang taiq zis gas, Dyos dvyuk dah thoq mas lyih gyoh no joq yvlyis nvng nyvng das, hauh soeu ka Gyingshang Dyos mas jeisnyhop dyei soeu nyang nghuot, ge.
43001034	Ngos nyvng goeus las, Haih soeu ka Mangso dah Lo nghuot oen kanghjyoeng kat, ge.
43001035	Hauh thang lhyi nyeihyo Yohan gas nyah changlo aiq yuk yah dvgeh yap joq lyis,
43001036	Yesu los nyeis zis lyis yoeuh las nyang taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, Mangso dah Yvnglo, ge.
43001037	Hauh dang lyis hauh changlo aiq yuk xauhgyo lyis, Yesu thang mha tsain chank loh.
43001038	Yesu lhain yoeuh kat lyis, hauh dius aiq yuk chank los zis nyvng las, Cha xo goh lah, ge nyei. Nyah aiq yuk gas, Svra eh, nvng khamha nyeis lah, ge nyei.
43001039	Nyang nyah aiq yuk lyis taiq zis gas, Los yoeuh geh nyvng das, ge. Houka nyei shishenh ko lhyi nghuot. Nyang khamha nyeis zis loh nyvng las, hauh nyeihyo nyang yah dvgeh nyeis.
43001040	Yohan taiq dang xauhgyo las, nyah thang chank dah dius aiq yuk mas dvyuk gas Simon Petru dah vnoeuh Andre nghuot.
43001041	Hauh soeu ka nyah vmang Simon lyis shih xauhgoh las nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngamoq Meshia lyis nyvng goeus, ge. (Meshia vjyuk gas Khristu nghuot.)
43001042	Nyang lyis nyah jyank mas shwih e. Yesu hauh soeu lhyi yoeuh las taiq zis gas, Nvng gas Yona dah lo Simon nghuot. Nvng lyis gas Kepha ge lui das, ge. (Hauh vjyuk gas lukzains, ge.)
43001043	Hauh thang lhyi nyeihyo Yesu gas Galile mau pheh loh uhlyis nyang Philip lyis nyvng lho lhyi, Ngah thang mha chank los aq, ge taiq.
43001044	Philip gas Andre yahge Petru dah wukhau, Betsaida mas soeu nghuot.
43001045	Philip gas Nathaniel yah xauhgoh las nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Moshe dah lyi yahge lvpe jens lhaih toh, Yosep dah lo Nazaret Yesu lyis ngamoq nyvng goeus, ge.
43001046	Nathaniel nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nazaret masyah gis zis dvja ja yoh thuq los lhyeh, ge. Philip gas, Los yoeuh aq, ge.
43001047	Yesu gas Nathaniel los nyeis zis lyis nyvng lyis, nyang lyis toeuq las taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq Israel gyingh soeu dvyuk nghuot las nyang mas ung lhung zis ma bos, ge.
43001048	Nathaniel gas nyang lyis, Nvng ngos lyis khalhye yah seq lah, ge nyei. Yesu doms taiq zis gas, Philip nvng lyis ma lui shih shvhoeu lhyi nvng maiphang zains khyei mha nyeis zis lyis ngos nyvng, ge.
43001049	Nathaniel nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Svra eh, nvng gas Mangso dah Lo nghuot; Israel dah Hwankti nghuot, ge.
43001050	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, ngos nvng lyis maiphang zains khyei mha nyvng oen yvmvyah lomsjingh lhyeh? Haih thoq lyis zes kuh zis eq nvng nyvng das, ge.
43001051	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, vkhoeuq maukhung khomh phank los las Mangso dah loeuswons bang gas cangsoeu Lo thoq mas doq gyoh kuot nyeis zis lyis namoq nyvng das, ge taiq.
43002001	Hauh thang lhyi somh vnyeih lyis Galile mau Kana wukhau mha nyihwank pwe bos. Yesu dah ungwes eq houmha nyeis.
43002002	Yesu yahge nyah changlo jens lyis eq hauh nyihwank pwe mha tsain khi.
43002003	Zvbiq thank tyamp las Yesu ungwes gas nyang lyis, Nyamoq zvbiq ma bos lo ge taiq kyoh.
43002004	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Vmesbih eh, nvng ngos lyis chamus los taiq lah? Ngah shishenh ma jweh shih, ge.
43002005	Yesu dah ungwes eq, Nyang kuot nhang zis dvnganh yah kuot geh, ge jyeidwis jens lyis taiq toh.
43002006	Yuda thungh yah dvyhangteh cheihshang das xiklyis aiq somhci galan wvng dah luk yammuh khyuk lom joq.
43002007	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Haih yammuh goeu mas jeis tyink geh, ge. Nyamoq eq yammuh mas jeis dyingh shoq tsain kham kat.
43002008	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Gvshih pwe jangzoe lyis loh khoeuh dyei aq, ge zis yah dvyhangteh tsain kuot.
43002009	Pwe jangzoe gas hauh zvbiq jeis bweh nhang dah jeis lyis chaq yoeuh las, hauh jeis khoeuh los dah jyeidwis jens gas zvbiq jeis kha mhayah yoh zis seq laus eq pwe jangzoe gas ma seq yvmvyah, loloeu saiq lyis khi lha,
43002010	Yuk khanghmuh zvbiq jeis nghamh shih jo shoq gvm shuk thang lhyi zvbiq jeis phih dvgyangh dyei; nvng gas zvbiq jeis nghamh lyis gvshih jweh shoq tsomh toh, ge.
43002011	Yesu gas cangxeih vlhain dah vlho lhyi hai Galile, Kana mha Chixoeuq las, nyah phunk nyvng nhang lha, nyah changlo jens eq nyang lyis lomsjingh.
43002012	Hauh thang lhyi Yesu yahge nyah ungwes, nyah vnoeuh moq, nyah changlo jens yah dvgeh Kaperna-um wus pheh loh las houmha dvyoq dvnyeis.
43002013	Yuda jens dah Lhuiq Kat Pwe ni los nyeis goeus las, Yesu gas Yerusalem pheh doq loh.
43002014	Yesu gas yhenmuh mas noeu, yvng yahge khotjyauh ungh bang, ngwis thaiq zo bang tsung toh yvlyis nyvng lyis,
43002015	twih lvxuk kuot las, houmha ungh bang, noeu, yvng, khotjyauh dvnganh zis lyis yhenmuh masyah khat thuq tyamp; kihgus lyis eq toeu phanh tyamp.
43002016	Khotjyauh ungh bang lyis taiq zis gas, Haih zisyos lyis yoeus loh geh, ngah Uwus dah yhen lhyi soenghi yhen vtsain kuot nyeis goh, ge.
43002017	Yhensain dah yhen mha nhaiq kank wvng dah ehnyet gas ngos lyis zo tyamp das ge lhaih toh zis lyis hauh uhlyis changlo jens nghamh soh los.
43002018	Yuda jens nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Heisoeh teh kuot zis gas, ngamoq lyis chah vlho chixoeuq lah, ge.
43002019	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Haih yhenmuh lyis thyoq tyamp geh; ngos somh nyeih lyis doms toeu toq das, ge.
43002020	Yuda jens nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Haih yhenmuh lyis nyeici khyuk zvn tsuk zis lyis nvng gas somh nyeih lyis yoh toeu shap das lah, ge.
43002021	Nyang housoeh taiq zis gas, nyah gungs ge dah yhenmuh lyis toeuq las taiq zis nghuot.
43002022	Housoeh yvmvyah, shei yvmvyah dwis toq los thang lhyi, nyah changlo jens gas nyang taiq toh dang lyis doms soh las, lhaihtoh dang lyis eq, Yesu taiq dang lyis eq tsain lomsjingh.
43002023	Lhuiq Kat Pwe yoq lyis Yesu gas Yerusalem mas nyeis uhlyis nyang chixoeuq dah vlho lhyi tsain nyvng las, nyoshoq moq nyah nyings mas lomsjingh.
43002024	Nghuot laus eq Yesu gas nyamoq lyis ma loms: Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas dius dvnganhmoq lyis seq toh.
43002025	Dius dah ehnyet khau mha bos zis lyis nyang seq yvmvyah, dius cho lhyi kanghjyoeng hank eq ma kat dyei noh.
43003001	Pharishe jens mas Nikodimu ge soeu Yuda jens lyis guon dah dius dvyuk nyeis.
43003002	Nyenh lyis Yesu jyank mas lyih las, Svra eh, nvng gas Mangso jyank masyah jweh lyih dah svra dvyuk nghuot yvlyis ngamoq seq. Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso nvng yah dvgeh ma nyeis nghuot lyis gas nvng chixoeuq dah vlho dius hank eq ma yoh kuot, ge.
43003003	Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos nvng lyis jyoengh taiq bah, hank laus eq dvlhain ma doms khoeu lhyi ka, nyang Mangso munghdan lyis ma yoh nyvng, ge.
43003004	Nikodimu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Dius gas kuh thang lhyi khasoeh yoh doms khoeu das lah? Ungwes ung mas doms wvng las khoeu das lah, ge.
43003005	Yesu phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos nvng lyis jyoengh taiq bah, hank laus eq jeis yahge Gyingshang Dyos mas ma khoeu soeu ka, Mangso munghdan mas ma yoh wvng das.
43003006	Gungsshoh mas khoeu zis gas gungsshoh nghuot; Dyos masyah khoeu zis gas dyos nghuot.
43003007	Ngos taiq dah dang gvng mas vmauh: nvng dvlhain doms khoeu chah.
43003008	Lyeis gas nyang muot loh mes yvpheh muot loh las, lyeis thwe lhyi nvng xauhgyo laus eq, khapheh yah muot los las khapheh muot loh zis ma seq: Dyos masyah khoeu bang dvnganhmoq eq houyah dvyhangteh nghuot, ge.
43003009	Nikodimu phuk taiq zis gas, Haih cho khasoeh yoh bweh das lah, ge.
43003010	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng gas Israel vnyau dah svra dvyuk nghuot joq las haih zis yangh ma seq lhyeh?
43003011	Ngos nvng lyis jyoengh taiq zis gas, Ngamoq gas ngamoq seq dah vyhang lhyi taiq; ngamoq nyvng zis lyis kanghjyoeng kat, nghuot laus eq ngamoq dah kanghjyoeng lhyi namoq ma tsain lhom yoeus.
43003012	Ngos namoq lyis nyeisjvng yah sen zis taiq lyis namoq ma jingh zis, maukhung dah cho taiq lyis namoq khasoeh lomsjingh goh das lah?
43003013	Maukhung mhayah gyoh los dah cangsoeu Lo mas lai las gohyuk hank eq maukhung mha doq loh ku soeu ma bos.
43003014	Moshe ka mhanhdyvp mas lhangnoq lyis toeushap toh zis yah dvyhangteh, cangsoeu Lo gas toeushap toh zis xauh das.
43003015	Houka nyang lyis lomsjingh bang dvnganhmoq gas, dyoqbis zis ma xauh, vcaiq vto kang yoh das xiklyis nghuot.
43003016	Khasoeh ge lyis nyang lyis 4 lomsjingh bang dvnganhmoq gas dyoqbis zis ma xauh, vcaiq vto kang yoh das xiklyis, Mangso ka nyah Loteh lyis dyei tyamp shoq mungkvn lyis jyetdap.
43003017	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka nyah Lo lyis mungkvn mas nhang kat zis gas, mungkvn lyis soetuon das xiklyis ma nghuot, nyang masyah mungkvn lyis khyuot yoeus das xiklyis dvnghuot.
43003018	Nyang lyis lomsjingh soeu ka, soetuon zis ma xauh; ma lomsjingh soeu ka, Mangso dah Loteh nyings lyis ma lomsjingh yvmvyah, gvshih yangh soetuon zis xauh goeus.
43003019	Hauh soetuon zis gas, Bvng zis gas haih mungkvn mas wvng laus eq, dius jens gas nyamoq kuot zis ma gis yvmvyah, bvng zis lyis ngwis thoq lyis chuot zis lyis zes ngwis yvmvyah nghuot.
43003020	Ma gis zis kuot soeu ka bvng zis lyis hoeng lha, nyang kuot dah muhzoh lyis ma mes kyink yvmvyah bvng yvmas ma los.
43003021	Jyoeng zis kuot bang gas, nyang kuot dah muhzoh gas Mangso xikkhonh mas phi thoeuq zis lyis yoh chixoeuq das xiklyis bvng yvmas los, ge.
43003022	Hauh thang lhyi Yesu gas changlo jens yah dvgeh Yuda mau mas nyeis las, jeisnyhop dyei nyeis.
43003023	Yohan eq Salim nvm mas dah Enon mas jeis nyoshoq joq yvmvyah, jeisnyhop dyei nyeis. Dius nyoshoq jeisnyhop los kham.
43003024	Khasoeh ge lyis Yohan gas thung ma gyoh shih.
43003025	Yohan dah changlo jens gas Yuda jens yah cheihshang cho lhyi tsain taiq phyen-goh nyeis las,
43003026	nyamoq Yohan jyank mas lyih las nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Svra eh, yoeuh aq, Yodan lvng thyitvp pheh, nvng yah dvgeh nyeis ku lha nvng kanghjyoeng kat dyei soeu ka, nyang nyang jeisnyhop dyei nyeis las, dius dvnganhmoq nyah jyank jweh los, ge.
43003027	Yohan phuk taiq zis gas, Maukhung mhayah ma dyei lyis gas dius hank eq cha ma xauh lhom yoeus, ge.
43003028	Ngos gas Khristu ma nghuot, ngos gas nyah xik pheh nhang kat dah soeu dvnghuot oen ngos taiq dang lyis namoq nyang kanghjyoeng bos kat dyei goeus.
43003029	Nyi hwank pwe mha lonyi saiq lyis yoh soeu ka, loloeu saiq nghuot: dyenschangh phoq gas loloeu saiq vyvm mas yap las, hauh soeu dah dang thwe xauhgyo yvmvyah gaus nyeis. Housoeh ngos gaus zis gas ngah jyank mas nyuk los.
43003030	Nyang gas je los das, ngos gas yoms loh das.
43003031	Nyhang mhayah los soeu ka dvnganh thoq mas zes soeu nghuot: nyeisjvng masyah bweh los soeu ka nyeisjvng yah sen lha, nyeisjvng cho lhyi kyingh dvseq taiq. Maukhung mhayah jweh los soeu ka dvnganh dah vzainsmuh nghuot.
43003032	Nyoqjeih yah nyvng zis, no yah gyo zis dvnganh yvlyis kanghjyoeng kat nyeis. Nyang kanghjyoeng kat zis lyis hank eq ma lhom yoeus.
43003033	Nyah kanghjyoeng cho lhyi lhom yoeus soeu ka, Mangso ka jyoeng zis nghuot yvlyis kyihau tap zis nghuot.
43003034	Mangso nhang kat soeu ka, Mangso dah dang lyis taiq: Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas Gyingshang Dyos lyis laiq dyei, toeuq dyei zis ma nghuot.
43003035	Uwus gas Lo lyis jyetdap las dvnganh zis lyis nyah loq khau mha dyei toh.
43003036	Lo lyis lomsjingh soeu ka vcaiq vto kang lhyi yoh: Lo lyis ma lomsjingh soeu ka kang dwis cho ma nyvng, Mangso dah nhaiqlom dyis zis gas hauh soeu thoq mas joq.
43004001	Yesu gas Yohan thoq lyis changlo jens zes yoh zis yahge, Yohan thoq lyis jeisnyhop zes yoh dyei yvlyis Pharishe jens xauhgyo zis lyis Yhensain seq.
43004002	(Yesu nyang jeisnyhop ma dyei laus eq nyah changlo jens kham dyei.)
43004003	Nyang gas Yuda mau masyah dyens toq las Galile pheh doms loh.
43004004	Housoeh las nyang gas Samari mau cho yah suh lai loh.
43004005	Nyang gas, Yakop gas nyah lo Yosep lyis dyei toh dah maunyeis chuq nvm mas joq, Sika ge dah Samari wugungs mas jweh loh.
43004006	Hauh yvmas Yakop dah jeisdwang joq. Yesu gas gyung suh nyung las jeisdwang nvm mas tsung toh. Hauh shishenh gas nyeihgungs ko nghuot.
43004007	Samari vmesbih dvyuk jeis kham das ge lyih nyeis: Yesu hauh vmesbih lyis taiq zis gas, jeis dvtsiq gvmshuk aq, ge.
43004008	(Nyah changlo jens gas zonoms wis das xiklyis wugungs pheh wvng loh.)
43004009	Hauh vmesbih nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng Yuda vnyau nghuot las, ngos Samari jyank mas chamus shuk jeis sang, ge. Khasoeh ge lyis Yuda dius nyau gas Samari dius nyau yah ma zomh goh.
43004010	Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Nvng Mangso dah shvmanh jyungshuk yahge ngos lyis jeis gvm shuk aq, ge taiq soeu hank nghuot zis lyis nvng toq seq nghuot lyis gas, nvng nyang lyis dung las, nyang gas nvng lyis kang dwis jeis dyei das, ge.
43004011	Vmesbih nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, nah jyank mas jeis gaiq pungh ma joq, jeisdwang eq noq, kang dwis jeis khalhye yah yoh das lah?
43004012	Haih jeisdwang gas, ngamoq dah phauh thyeih ngamoq lyis dyei toh las, nyang yahge nyah lo jens eq shuk, nyah gaunyhauq lyis eq gvmshuk toh, nvng ngamoq dah phauh thyeih Yakop thoq lyis ma zes kuh ma nghuot lhyeh, ge.
43004013	Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Haih jeisdwang mas jeis shuk bang hank laus eq jeis doms shet shih das.
43004014	Nghuot laus eq ngos gvmshuk dah jeis lyis shuk soeu ka, vcaiq vto ma shet lo das las, ngos dyei dah jeis gas nyah vkhau mha vcaiq vto kang yoh dyei dah jeisthuq dwang bweh das, ge.
43004015	Hauh vmesbih nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, ngos jeis eq ma shet, heimha jeis eq ma lyih lang chah lo bas jungh, hauh jeis ngos lyis dyei aq, ge.
43004016	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nah yhensain phoq lyis heimha loh khi los aq, ge.
43004017	Hauh vmesbih phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos yhensain phoq ma bos, ge. Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos yhensain phoq ma bos ge nvng taiq dang jus:
43004018	Khasoeh ge lyis nvng yhensain phoq oeng yuk yoh ku goeus; gvshih dah soeu ka nah yhensain phoq ma nghuot; haih cho mha nvng dang jyoeng taiq, ge.
43004019	Hauh vmesbih nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, nvng Lvpe nghuot yvlyis ngos seq goeus.
43004020	Ngamoq dah phauh thyeih moq gas haih boms mas gyangh paiq; namoq taiq zis gas, Paiq chah joqyos gas Yerusalem mas kyingh dvnghuot, ge.
43004021	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Vmesbih eh, ngos lyis lomsjingh aq, namoq gas haih boms mas eq, Yerusalem wus mas eq ma nghuot nghuot, Uwus lyis paiq das shishenh gas jweh los das.
43004022	Namoq gas namoq nyang ma seq yvlyis paiq. Ngamoq gas ngamoq nyang seq yvlyis paiq: Khasoeh ge lyis khyuot yoeus cho ka Yuda vnyau masyah nghuot.
43004023	Nghuot laus eq jyoeng khyvlyis paiq bang gas, Dyos mas eq, jyoeng yvmas eq Uwus lyis paiq das shishenh gas jweh los nyeis las, gvshih yangh nghuot joq. Uwus gas housoeh paiq bang lyis xo nyeis.
43004024	Mangso ka Dyos nghuot. Nyang lyis paiq bang gas, Dyos mas eq, jyoeng yvmas eq paiq chah, ge.
43004025	Hauh vmesbih nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Khristu ge dah Meshia jweh los das zis ngos seq. Hauh soeu jweh goeus ya, nyang yang lyis cho khat khanghmuh taiq shet das, ge.
43004026	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng yah jis goh nyeis soeu ngos gas hauh soeu nyang nghuot goeus, ge.
43004027	Hauh uhlyis nyah changlo jens tauh los las, vmesbih yah dang jis goh zis nyvng lyis tsain mauh. Nghuot laus eq, Nvng cha chah? Vmesbih yah dang chamus jis goh, ge hank eq ma nyei.
43004028	Vmesbih gas nyah jywang toh khoq lho lha, wugungs pheh tauh loh las dius jens lyis taiq zis gas,
43004029	Ngos cha kuot khoq zis dvnganh ngos lyis doms taiq kyoh soeu lhyi lyih yoeuh geh, hauh soeu ka Khristu vnghuot au, ge.
43004030	Nyamoq eq wus masyah thuq loh las nyah jyank mas tsain jweh e.
43004031	Hauh uhlyis changlo jens nyang lyis khyoeuq zis gas, Svra eh, wom zo aq, ge.
43004032	Nyang nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Namoq ma seq dah zonoms ngos yoh, ge.
43004033	Housoeh yvmvyah changlo jens dvyuk yah dvyuk taiq goh zis gas, Nyang lyis dvyuk yuk zonoms dyei goeus lah, ge.
43004034	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos lyis nhang kat soeu o khyvlyis chank kuot das zis yahge, nyah muh tyeh zwi das zis gas ngah zonoms nghuot, ge.
43004035	Namoq gas lhamhmuh nyei khyvp nghuot thang lhyi guk yhomh das, ge ma nghuot lhyeh? Yoeuh aq, ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, nghank las yoeuh kat geh, yos mas guk nyhink joq goeus las jyo yhomh das xiklyis gvshih yangh nghuot joq.
43004036	Jyo yhomh soeu ka uhkung phauh yoh zis yah dvgeh vcaiq vto kang xiklyis jyo xauh yhomh yoeus las, jyo khyoq soeu yahge jyo yhomh soeu dvgeh yoh gausyis das.
43004037	Housoeh las, dvyuk khyoq las gohtoeu dvyuk yhomh goeus ge dah sangkhyangh gas jus.
43004038	Namoq yom ma kat toh yvmas jyo yhomh das zis ngos namoq lyis nhang kat: Gohyhamh yomkat goeus yvmas namoq lyis eq bos joq nhang.
43004039	Ngos kuot khoq dah cho dvnganh yah ngos lyis doms taiq kyoh dyei, ge dah hau vmesbih kanghjyoeng dang gvng mas, hauh wugungs mas dah Samari dius nyoshoq nyang lyis tsain lomsjingh.
43004040	Housoeh las hau Samari jens nyah jyank mas los las, Ngamoq yah dvgeh jenh nyeis goh, ge tsain dung yvmvyah, aiq nyeih nyeis khoq.
43004041	Nyah dang gvng mas nyoshoq moq lomsjingh los.
43004042	Hauh bang hauh vmesbih lyis taiq zis gas, Gvshih gas nvng taiq yvmvyah kyingh ngamoq lomsjingh zis ma nghuot lo, ngamoq nyang xauhgyo lho lha, Haih soeu ka haih mungkvn dah khyuot yoeus soeu Khristu nyang jyoengh nghuot zis lyis ngamoq nyang seq goeus, ge.
43004043	Aiq nyeih dah thang lhyi nyang gas Galile mau pheh thuq loh.
43004044	Khasoeh ge lyis lvpe ka, vsainnyang mau mas nyoqnho ngelang ma bos, ge Yesu nyang kanghjyoeng kat nyeis.
43004045	Galile mau mas jweh lyis, Galile bang gas pwe yoq lyis Yerusalem mas nyang kuot xoeuq dah muhzoh dvnganh zis lyis nyvng las nyang lyis tsain lhom yoeus. Khasoeh ge lyis, nyamoq eq hauh Lhuiq Kat Pwe mha bos.
43004046	Yesu gas, nyang jeis lyis zvbiq bweh nhang khoq dah joqyos, Galile mau, Kana wukhau mha doms los uhlyis, zau dvyuk dah yukgis lo gas Kaperna-um mha nos nyeis.
43004047	Yesu gas Yuda mau masyah Galile mau mas jweh nyeis zis lyis hauh zau phoq xauhgyo las nyah jyank mas e lha, shei bah ge goeus dah nyah lo lyis los jenh lhoq gis dyei aq, ge nyang lyis dung nyeis.
43004048	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq vlho yahge mauh loqmuh ma nyvng lyis gas ma lomsjingh, ge.
43004049	Hauh zau phoq nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, ngah lo ma shei shih lyis jenh los aq, ge.
43004050	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Loh aq, nah lo doeng los das, ge. Hauh soeu eq Yesu taiq dang lyis jingh las loh lo.
43004051	Nyang loh nyeis lyis, nyah jyeidwis jens nyang lyis lyih zes uhlyis yah taiq zis gas, Nah lo doeng los goeus, ge.
43004052	Housoeh las nos huiq dah shishenh nyei huq lyis, nyamoq gas, Nyinaq dvshishenh lyis nos huiq goeus, ge tsain taiq kyoh.
43004053	Hau nos huiq los dah shishenh gas, Nah lo doeng los das, ge Yesu nyang lyis taiq dah shishenh nyang nghuot zis lyis nyah uwus seq las, nyang yahge nyah yhenbang dvnganhmoq lomsjingh.
43004054	Haih vlho ka, Yesu Yuda mau masyah Galile mau mas jweh las chixoeuq khoq, aiq vlhain vlho nghuot.
43005001	Hauh thang lhyi Yuda jens dah pwe dvkoeuq bos las, Yesu gas Yerusalem pheh doq loh.
43005002	Hau Yerusalem mas, Yvng khomh nvm mas Hebre nyingh pheh yah, Bethzatha ge dah thomh dvkoeuq joq. Hauh thomh yvm mas thoenggus oeng koeuq bos.
43005003	Hauh vkhau mha nos bang, nyoqjet bang, khyei gyau bang, gungsjen shei teh dah nos bang moqjens zainsmuh gas jeis dwis los das yvlyis langh nyeis.
43005004	Khasoeh ge lyis loeuswons soeu dvyuk gyoh los las thomh lhoq dwis dah uhlyis hank laus eq cangxeih xauh wvng soeu ka, chah ja noslom laus eq gis los zis xauh.
43005005	Hauh yvmas somhci xet zvn gonh nos soeu dvyuk bos.
43005006	Yesu gas hau nos lhain toh soeu lhyi los nyvng las, nyo nyangh goeus yvlyis seq yvmvyah, hauh nos soeu lhyi, Nvng vgis mes lah, ge nyei.
43005007	Nos soeu phuk taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, jeis dwis uhlyis ngos lyis thomh mas shwih wvng das dius ma yoh, ngos wvng loh nyeis lyis, ngah xik pheh dvyuk yuk wvng loh tyamp, ge.
43005008	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Toq aq, nah yhetyos kui wuq las suh loh aq, ge.
43005009	Hauh nos soeu houjang gis los las, yhetyos kui wuq las suh loh. Hauh nyeih gas Yuda No Buisnyeis nghuot.
43005010	Housoeh las Yuda jens hau nos gis los soeu lhyi taiq zis gas, Khvnyhik Yuda No Buisnyeis nghuot, nah yhetyos ma gis wuq, ge.
43005011	Nyang nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos lyis gis los nhang soeu yah, Nah yhetyos yoeus las suh loh aq, ge ngos lyis taiq, ge.
43005012	Nyamoq nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Nvng lyis yhetyos yoeus las suh loh aq, ge soeu hank nghuot lah, ge.
43005013	Hau nos gis goeus soeu ka, Hank nghuot zis eq ma seq kat: Khasoeh ge lyis hauh joqyos mas dius nyoshoq whom toh las, Yesu gas hau dius puk masyah jhank thuq loh.
43005014	Hauh thang lhyi Yesu gas, yhenmuh mas hauh soeu lhyi nyvng las nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, nvng gvshih yanghzan goeus thang pheh haih thoq lyis zes dah shohjyen zis ma xauh bas jungh, yaunos vdoms kuot lo, ge.
43005015	Hauh soeu ka thuq loh las, nyang lyis gis los nhang soeu ka Yesu nghuot dah cho Yuda jens lyis taiq kyoh.
43005016	Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis houyhang teh dah muh kuot yvmvyah, Yuda jens Yesu lyis shoeuhshih las sat das cho xo nyeis.
43005017	Nghuot laus eq Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Gvshih jweh shoq ngah Uwus gas vjangh muh zwi nyeis yvmvyah, ngos eq zwi, ge.
43005018	Housoeh Yuda No Buisnyeis dah thungh lhoq thyoq thoq lyis magoh, Mangso lhyi nyah Uwus nghuot ge, nyah gungs lyis nyang Mangso yah byi yvmvyah, Yuda jens gas nyang lyis yoh sat das cho zes yomkat xo nyeis.
43005019	Housoeh las Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, Vlo gas vsainnyang ehnyet yah cha eq ma yoh kuot, Uwus kuot nhang goeu kyingh dvyoh kuot. Uwus zwi dah muhzoh lyis Lo eq houyah dvyhangteh chank zwi nyeis.
43005020	Uwus gas Lo lyis jyetdap yvmvyah, nyang zwi ya zwi dah muh dvnganh, Lo lyis Chixoeuq. Namoq mauh hangh shoq gvshih thoq lyis zes kuh dah muhzoh lyis eq nyang lyis Chixoeuq das.
43005021	Khasoeh ge lyis, Uwus gas shei bang lyis toeu toq las dwis los nhang zis yah dvyhangteh, Lo eq nyang dyei mes soeu lhyi kang dyei.
43005022	Uwus gas hank lyis eq soe ma tuon, soetuon cho dvnganh Lo lyis dyei goeus.
43005023	Dvnganhmoq Lo lyis phauh nyang zis gas Uwus lyis phauh nyang zis yah dvyhangteh nghuot. Lo lyis ma phauh ma nyang kuot soeu ka, nyang lyis nhang kat dah Uwus lyis ma phauh ma nyang kuot zis dvnghuot.
43005024	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, ngah dang gyo las ngos lyis nhang kat soeu lhyi lomsjingh soeu ka, vcaiq vto kang yoh goeus las, dang thang thyet yvmas ma bos, shei masyah dwis nyeis yvpheh yoh luiq los goeus.
43005025	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, shei joq bang gas Mangso dah Lo dah thwe lhyi xauhgyo das shishenh jweh los nyeis las, gvshih yangh eq jweh joq. Hauh zis xauhgyo bang gas dwis nyeis das.
43005026	Khasoeh ge lyis Uwus nyang mas kang bos zis yah dvyhangteh, Lo nyang mas eq kang bos das cho dyei toh.
43005027	Soetuon dah vmingh eq nyang lyis dyei toh: Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas cangsoeu Lo nghuot.
43005028	Haih cho lhyi vmauh goh: khasoeh ge lyis lop mas bos bang dvnganh eq nyah thwe xauhgyo das shishenh jweh los das.
43005029	Gis zis kuot khoq bang gas kang bos yvpheh toq los das; ma shop zis kuot bang gas dang thang thyet yvpheh xauh toq los das.
43005030	Ngos gas ngah ehnyet yah kuot zis cha ma bos: ngos xauhgyo zis yah dvyhangteh soetuon goeus. Ngos tuon dah soe eq jyoeng; khasoeh ge lyis ngos gas ngah ehnyet chank das zis ma xo, ngos lyis nhang kat, Uwus dah ehnyet chank das zis kyingh dvxo.
43005031	Ngah gungs lyis ngvnyang kanghjyoeng kat nghuot lyis gas hauh kanghjyoeng ka ma jyoeng.
43005032	Ngah xiklyis kanghjyoeng kat dyei soeu dvyuk nyeis: nyang kat dah kanghjyoeng ka jyoeng yvlyis ngos seq.
43005033	Namoq gas Yohan jyank mas mang kat las, hauh soeu ka jyoeng dah cho kanghjyoeng kat.
43005034	Ngos yoh dah kanghjyoeng ka dius jyank masyah ma nghuot, nghuot laus eq namoq khyuot yoeus zis xauh bas jungh oen ngos haih cho taiq kyoh.
43005035	Yohan gas duk nyeis las pank dyei nyeis dah nyibung nghuot khoq yvmvyah, namoq gas hau nyah dah bvng yvmas dvyoq pyo mes nyeis.
43005036	Ngos gas Yohan thoq lyis zes kuh dah kanghjyoeng yoh. Ngos tyeh wons wuq das xiklyis Uwus ngos lyis dyei toh las muh kuot nyeis. Ngos kuot muhzoh gas, Uwus ngos lyis nhang kat cho lhyi kanghjyoeng kat nyeis.
43005037	Ngos lyis nhang kat dah Uwus nyang ngos lyis kanghjyoeng kat dyei nyeis. Namoq gas nyah thwe lhyi khanhamp eq ma xauhgyo ku, nyah gungs khyank lyis eq ma nyvng yoeuh ku.
43005038	Nyah dang eq namoq ehnyet mas ma bos: khasoeh ge lyis, nyang nhang kat soeu lhyi namoq ma lomsjingh.
43005039	Lhaihtoh dang lyis xo nghap geh: Khasoeh ge lyis houmha vcaiq vto kang yoh ge namoq nghamh. Nghuot laus eq hauh zis gas ngah cho lhyi kanghjyoeng kat nyeis.
43005040	Namoq kang yoh das xiklyis namoq ngah jyank mas ma mes los.
43005041	Dius yah nyoqnho ngelang dyei yvlyis ngos ma lhom yoeus.
43005042	Khasoeh ge lyis, namoq mas Mangso dah jyetdap zis ma bos yvlyis ngos seq.
43005043	Ngos gas ngah Uwus dah nyings masyah lyih nghuot laus eq, namoq ngos lyis ma lhom yoeus. Gohtoeu dvyuk yuk vsainnyang nyings masyah los nghuot lyis gas, hauh soeu lhyi namoq lhom yoeus das.
43005044	Namoq gas Mangso jyank masyah los dah nyoqnho ngelang lyis ma xo xo, dvyuk yah dvyuk dyei goh dah nyoqnho ngelang lyis lhom yoeus lyis gas, namoq khasoeh yoh lomsjingh das lah?
43005045	Uwus dah xikkhonh mas ngos namoq lyis zau kauq das oen vnghamh goh: namoq lyis zau kauq das soeu ka, namoq khau nges nyeis dah Moshe dvnghuot.
43005046	Moshe lhyi lomsjingh nghuot lyis gas, ngos lyis eq lomsjingh das. Khasoeh ge lyis Moshe ka ngah cho lhyi lhaih toh.
43005047	Nyang lhaihtoh cho lhyi ma lomsjingh lyis gas, ngah dang lyis khasoeh yoh lomsjingh das lah, ge.
43006001	Yesu gas Tiberia ge dah Galile thomh thyitvp pheh goeu e.
43006002	Nos bang thoq mas kuot xoeuq dah yomsoq muh lyis nyvng yvmvyah, moqjens nyah thang mha tsain chank loh.
43006003	Housoeh las Yesu gas hau boms thoq mas doq las nyah changlo jens yah dvgeh tsung toh.
43006004	Lhuiq Kat Pwe ge Yuda jens dah pwe eq ni los nyeis.
43006005	Housoeh Yesu nghank yoeuh kat lyis, nyah jyank mas moqjens los nyeis yvlyis nyvng las, Philip lyis taiq zis gas, Heinyhoq moq zo das ohlhyoq khalhye wis das au, ge.
43006006	Housoeh ge nyei zis gas nyang lyis shi yoeuh zis dvnghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis nyang khasoeh kuot das zis gas nyang seq toh.
43006007	Philip phuk taiq zis gas, Ngwis kyvp aiqxo yah ohlhyoq wis lyis eq, dvyuk dvmhauh tsoh das xiklyis yangh ma tham das, ge.
43006008	Nyah changlo jens mas dvyuk nghuot dah Simon Petru dah vnoeuh Andre nyang lyis taiq zis gas,
43006009	Yukgis lo dvyuk mas ohlhyoq oeng koeuq yahge oengdoq aiq doeu gas bos, nghuot laus eq heinyhoq dah moqphung xiklyis thoq tham das lah, ge.
43006010	Yesu taiq zis gas, Dius jens lyis tsain tsung nhang geh, ge. Hauh yvmas mhanh eq thoeu joq. Housoeh yukgis oeng khyoengh ko tsung toh.
43006011	Hauh thang lhyi Yesu gas, hauh ohlhyoq lyis yoeus las jyehjuh chungh thang lhyi changlo jens lyis gvm dyei las, changlo jens gas tsung toh bang lyis gvm dyei. Houyah dvyhangteh oengdoq lyis eq nyamoq chah nyhoq gvm dyei.
43006012	Nyamoq zo jo thang lhyi nyang nyah changlo jens lyis taiq zis gas, Cha eq ma dyuk shoq, zo nyhet dah vpop dvnganh yah kui tsainh geh, ge.
43006013	Housoeh ge zis yah dvyhangteh, nyamoq kui tsainh lyis hau ohlhyoq oeng koeuq masyah zo nyet goeu dvci aiq dang muis nghuot.
43006014	Nyang chixoeuq dah vlho lhyi moqphung nyvng las, hauh bang taiq zis gas, Haih soeu ka mungkvn mas jweh lyih das dah lvpe jyoengh nghuot, ge.
43006015	Hauh dius jens gas Yesu lyis nyamoq dah hwankti tsoengh kuot nhang das sont zis lyis nyang seq las, nyang kyingh boms pheh doq loh.
43006016	Nyenhthang jweh lyis, nyah changlo jens gas thomh pheh gyoh e.
43006017	Chont dvlom mas wvng tsung lha thomh thyitvp, Kaperna-um pheh goeu loh. Hauh uhlyis mau chuot goeus, Yesu eq nyamoq jyank mas ma jweh los shih.
43006018	Lyeismuh jyang muot los yvmvyah jeisphauq toq los.
43006019	Nyamoq somh main nyei main ko goeu loh lyis, Yesu gas jeis thoq mas suh las, nyamoq lhyik nvm mas ni los yvlyis nyamoq nyvng las gyuk.
43006020	Nghuot laus eq nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Vgyuk goh, ngos dvnghuot, ge.
43006021	Nyamoq gas nyang lyis lhyik mas wvng tsung nhang mes nyeis lyis, houjang lhyik eq nyamoq jweh mes dah mau mas jweh loh.
43006022	Hauh nungs nyeih thomh thyitvp pheh nyeis khoq dah dius jens gas, lhyik dvlom kyingh dvjoq yvlyis nyvng las, Yesu gas nyah changlo jens yah dvgeh ma loh loh, changlo jens kyingh dvloh zis lyis nyvng kat.
43006023	(Tiberia mas dah lhyik dvkhamh gas Yhensain jyehjuh chungh thang lhyi moqjens hauh ohlhyoq zo dah joqyos goeukhanh mas dap loh nyeis.)
43006024	Housoeh las houmha Yesu eq, nyah changlo jens eq ma nyeis lo zis seq lyis, nyamoq eq lhyik mas tsung lha Yesu lyis xo uhjyangh Kaperna-um mha chank jweh loh.
43006025	Thomh thyitvp pheh Yesu lyis nyvng lyis, Svra eh, nvng heimha khanhamp jweh los lah, ge nyei.
43006026	Yesu taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, namoq gas vlho lhyi nyvng las ngos lyis xo zis ma nghuot, ohlhyoq xauh zo las jo yvmvyah dvxo.
43006027	Seq dyoq loh dah zonoms yoh das xiklyis yom vkat goh; cangsoeu Lo yoh dyei dah vcaiq vto kang xiklyis goeng joq dah zonoms yoh das zis yom dvkat geh: khasoeh ge lyis Uwus Mangso ka nyang lyis kyihau tap toh, ge.
43006028	Housoeh las nyamoq nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Mangso dah muh zwi das xiklyis ngamoq cha kuot chah lah, ge.
43006029	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Mangso dah muhzoh ge zis gas, nyang nhang kat soeu lhyi lomsjingh cho nghuot, ge.
43006030	Nyamoq, nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngamoq nyvng las nvng lyis lomsjingh das xiklyis nvng ngamoq lyis chah vlho chixoeuq lah? Cha kuot goeus lah?
43006031	Nyamoq zo das xiklyis Nyang gas maukhung mhayah khyoq dyei, ge lhaih toh zis yah dvyhangteh, ngamoq dah phauh thyeih moq gas mhanhdyvp mas mana tsain xauh zo, ge.
43006032	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, namoq lyis maukhung mha yah ohlhyoq khyoq dyei zis gas Moshe ma nghuot; maukhung mhayah jyoeng dah ohlhyoq khyoq dyei soeu ka, ngah Uwus dvnghuot.
43006033	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso dah ohlhyoq oen zis gas, maukhung mhayah gyoh lyih las mungkvn lyis kang dyei zis lyis ge, ge.
43006034	Housoeh las nyamoq gas, Yhensain eh, hauh ohlhyoq ngamoq lyis vjangh yah dyei nyeis aq, tsain ge.
43006035	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos gas kang ohlhyoq nghuot. Ngah jyank mas los soeu ka yuot zis xauh das zis ma nghuot. Ngos lyis loms soeu ka khanhamp eq shet das zis ma nghuot.
43006036	Nghuot laus eq ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, namoq ngos lyis nyvng nyeis laus eq ma lomsjingh.
43006037	Uwus yah ngos lyis dyei ya dyei toh zis dvnganh gas, ngah jyank mas jweh los das nghuot las ngah jyank mas jweh los soeu hank lyis eq ngos khat tyamp das zis ma nghuot.
43006038	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos maukhung mhayah gyoh lyih zis gas, ngah ehnyet chank das xiklyis ma nghuot; ngos lyis nhang kat soeu dah ehnyet chank das xiklyis dvnghuot.
43006039	Ngos lyis dyei toh zis dvnganh yvmas dvkoeuq eq ma chi thyuk thyuk, thang thank buisnyeis lyis dwis toq nhang das zis gas ngos lyis nhang kat soeu ngah Uwus dah ehnyet nghuot.
43006040	Nyah Lo lyis nyvng las nyang lyis lomsjingh dah dius, yuk khanghmuh gas vcaiq vto kang xauh yoeus bas jungh, ge zis gas ngos lyis nhang kat soeu ngah Uwus dah ehnyet nghuot las, thang thank buisnyeis lyis ngos hauh soeu lhyi dwis toq los nhang das, ge.
43006041	Housoeh Yesu nyang nyang, ngos gas maukhung mhayah gyoh los dah ohlhyoq nghuot, ge yvmvyah Yuda jens lop zis nghuot.
43006042	Nyamoq taiq zis gas, Nyang gas Yosep dah lo Yesu ma nghuot lhyeh? Nyah uwus ungwes lyis eq yang seq ma nghuot lhyeh? Khasoeh las ngos gas maukhung mhayah gyoh los soeu nghuot ge taiq au lhyeh, ge.
43006043	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Namoq nyang changh nyang vtsain lop nyeis goh.
43006044	Ngos lyis nhang kat dah Uwus, ngah jyank pheh ni los nhang soeu ma nghuot lyis gas, ngah jyank mas hank eq ma yoh los. Hauh soeu lhyi ka thang thank buisnyeis lyis ngos dwis toq los nhang das, ge.
43006045	Lvpe maussauh mas lhaih toh zis gas, Cangsoeu dius dvnganh gas Mangso dah jyauh zis xauh das, ge. Ngah Uwus jyank masyah xauhgyo las xuq soeu khanghmuh ngah jyank mas los das.
43006046	Cangsoeu dius dvyuk eq Uwus lyis nyvng ku zis ma nghuot, Mangso jyank masyah gyoh lyih soeu kyingh Uwus lyis dvnyvng ku.
43006047	Namoq lyis ngos jyoengh taiq bah, ngos lyis lomsjingh soeu ka vcaiq vto kang yoh.
43006048	Ngos gas kang ohlhyoq nghuot.
43006049	Mhanhdyvp mas mana zo khoq bang, namoq dah phauh thyeih moq gas shei goeus.
43006050	Hauh ohlhyoq gas maukhung mhayah gyoh los zis nghuot las hauh yvlyis zo soeu ka ma shei das.
43006051	Ngos gas maukhung mhayah gyoh los, dwis dah ohlhyoq nghuot. Haih ohlhyoq lyis zo soeu ka, vjangh yah kang dwis nyeis das. Mungkvn mas kang dwis nyeis das xiklyis ngos dyei dah ohlhyoq gas ngah shoh nghuot, ge.
43006052	Housoeh las Yuda jens nyamoq nyang changh taiq phyen-goh nyeis zis gas, Haih soeu ka nyah shoh yang lyis khasoeh yoh gvmtsoh das lah, ge.
43006053	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, cangsoeu Lo dah shoh lyis zo zis yahge suih lyis shuk zis ma nghuot lyis gas, namoq mas kang ma bos.
43006054	Ngah shoh lyis zo, ngah suih lyis shuk soeu ka vcaiq vto kang yoh las, thang thank dah buisnyeis lyis ngos nyang lyis dwis toq los nhang das.
43006055	Khasoeh ge lyis ngah shoh gas gyingh dah zonoms nghuot; ngah suih eq gyingh dah shuk phoh nghuot.
43006056	Ngah shoh zo las ngah suih shuk soeu ka, ngos mas nyeis; ngos eq nyang mas nyeis.
43006057	Kang dwis nyeis, ngah Uwus gas ngos lyis nhang kat las, ngos ngah Uwus masyah kang dwis zis yah dvyhangteh, ngos lyis zo soeu eq ngos masyah kang dwis das.
43006058	Haih zis gas maukhung mhayah gyoh los dah ohlhyoq nghuot. Shei goeus bang phauh thyeih moq zo khoq dah mana teh ma nghuot, haih ohlhyoq zo soeu ka vcaiq vto kang dwis das, ge.
43006059	Haih zis gas Kaperna-um wukhau mha dah lyi jungs mha nyang jyauh uhlyis taiq dah dang nghuot.
43006060	Nyah changlo jens nyoshoq hauh dang lyis xauhgyo lyis, Haih dang gas svsoh yau dah dang nghuot, hank yoh gyo yoeus das lah, ge.
43006061	Nyah changlo jens housoeh lop goh nyeis yvlyis Yesu nyah nhaiqlom masyah seq las nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Haih dang yah namoq lyis ehnyet dyet nhang goeus lhyeh?
43006062	Hauh cangsoeu Lo vkhang nyeis khoq dah joqyos mas doq loh zis lyis namoq nyvng lyis namoq khasoeh oen das lah?
43006063	Kang lhyi yoh dwis nhang soeu ka Dyos nghuot. Gungsshoh gas cha yhung pvjus: ngos namoq lyis taiq dah dang gas Dyos nghuot, kang eq nghuot.
43006064	Nghuot laus eq namoq mas dvyhamh gas ma lomsjingh, ge. Khasoeh ge lyis Yesu gas, ma jingh bang hank nghuot zis eq, nyang lyis phanhlyen das zis hank nghuot zis eq, cangxeih lyis yah seq toh.
43006065	Housoeh las nyang taiq zis gas, Hauh cho gvng mas ngah Uwus ma nhang lhyi ngah jyank mas hank eq ma yoh jweh, oen ngos namoq lyis taiq goeus, ge.
43006066	Hauh shishenh lyis nyah changlo nyoshoq nyah thang mha ma chank lo, tsain tauh loh.
43006067	Housoeh las Yesu nyah changlo dvci aiq yuk lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq loh mes lhyeh, ge.
43006068	Simon Petru nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, ngamoq hank jyank mas loh das lah? Nvng gas vcaiq vto kang yah sen dah dang yoh.
43006069	Nvng gas dwis nyeis, Mangso dah Lo Khristu nghuot yvlyis ngamoq jingh las seq goeus, ge.
43006070	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Namoq dvci aiq yuk lyis khyen yoeus goeus ma nghuot lhyeh? Nghuot laus eq namoq mas dvyuk gas Yius nghuot, ge.
43006071	Housoeh ge zis gas, Simon dah lo Yudas Iskarot lyis toeuq las taiq zis nghuot: khasoeh ge lyis hauh soeu ka nyang lyis phanhlyen das soeu nghuot las, changlo dvci aiq yuk mas eq bos.
43007001	Hauh thang lhyi Yesu gas Galile mau mas suh yenh: Yuda jens nyang lyis sat das zis xo yvmvyah, Yuda mau mas ma mes suh yenh.
43007002	Hauh shishenh lyis Yuda jens dah Phunk pwe ge dah pwe jweh los goeus las,
43007003	Nyah vnoeuh moq nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng kuot dah muhzoh lyis nah changlo jens nyvng bas jungh, haih mau masyah thuq las Yuda mau pheh loh aq.
43007004	Khasoeh ge lyis vsainnyang gungs lyis moeng hoeuh das zis xo soeu hank laus eq nyang kuot muh lyis nghop shung lha cha eq ma kuot. Nvng heinyhoq yoh kuot nyeis nghuot lyis gas mungkvn lyis nah gungs chixoeuq aq, ge.
43007005	Khasoeh ge lyis nyah vnoeuh moq yangh nyang lyis ma lomsjingh.
43007006	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngah shishenh ma jweh shih, namoq dah shishenh vjangh yah nghuot joq.
43007007	Mungkvn gas namoq lyis ma yoh hoeng, ngos lyis dvhoeng: khasoeh ge lyis hauh bang kuot cho ma shop zis lyis ngos kanghjyoeng kat yvmvyah nghuot.
43007008	Hauh pwe mha namoq doq loh geh; ngah shishenh ma jweh shih yvmvyah, ngos gas ma doq loh shih das, ge.
43007009	Nyang dang hauh goeu nyamoq lyis taiq lho lha, Galile mas nyeis khoq shih.
43007010	Nghuot laus eq nyah vnoeuh moq hauh pwe mha doq loh thang lhyi, nyang eq debangh ma nghuot, gauh doq loh khyvlyis doq loh.
43007011	Housoeh las Yuda jens gas, hauh pwe mha nyang lyis xo lha, Haih dius yuk khalhye nyeis, ge.
43007012	Moqjens mas nyah cho tsain moengs goh las dvyhamh gas, Nyang gas dius gis dvnghuot, ge. Tsai dvyhamh gas, Ma nghuot, nyang gas dius lyis mhuih jyomh soeu nghuot, ge.
43007013	Nghuot laus eq Yuda jens lyis gyuk yvmvyah, nyah cho lhyi debangh hank eq ma taiq.
43007014	Hauh pwe shishenh dvgohyih nghuot loh lyis, Yesu gas yhenmuh mas wvng las jyauh nyeis.
43007015	Housoeh las Yuda jens mauh zis yah taiq zis gas, Haih dius yuk maussauh eq ma xuq ku zis heinyhoq khasoeh seq au lhyeh, ge.
43007016	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, ngos jyauh cho ka ngah zis ma nghuot, ngos lyis nhang kat soeu zis dvnghuot.
43007017	Hauh soeu dah ehnyet chank mes soeu nghuot lyis gas, jyauh dah cho haih zis gas, Mangso jyank masyah lah, ngah ehnyet yah taiq zis nghuot lah, ge zis seq khyen yoeuh das.
43007018	Vsainnyang dah ehnyet yah taiq soeu ka vsainnyang dah nyoqnho ngelang xo zis nghuot. Vsainnyang lyis nhang kat soeu dah nyoqnho ngelang lyis xo soeu ka, jyoeng lha nyang mas ma dan cho ma bos.
43007019	Moshe ka namoq lyis lyi dyei toh goeus ma nghuot lah? Nghuot laus eq namoq hauh zis lyis dvyuk eq ma chank shih lhyeh? Chamus namoq ngos lyis sat das zis xo goh lah, ge.
43007020	Moqjens phuk taiq zis gas, Nvng yius kuq, nvng lyis sat das zis hank xo nyeis lah, ge.
43007021	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos muh dvja kuot goeus las namoq dvnganhmoq eq mauh goeus.
43007022	Moshe ka namoq lyis vthyoh tyomh cho dyei toh goeus. Hauh zis gas Moshe masyah ma nghuot, phauh thyeih moq masyah dvnghuot. Housoeh las namoq gas No Buisnyeis lyis dius lyis vthyoh tyomh cho tsain kuot nyeis.
43007023	No Buisnyeis lyis loshang lhyi vthyoh tyomh cho lhom yoeus laus eq Moshe dah lyi gas ma dyoqbis loh nghuot lyis gas, No Buisnyeis lyis ngos dius dvgungs gonh lyis lhoq gis gvng mas namoq ngos lyis nhaiqyo lhyeh?
43007024	Thoqlosbaus lyis yah soe vtuon goh, dan khyvlyis dvtuon geh, ge.
43007025	Yerusalem mas dah dius dvyhamh taiq zis gas, Sat das xiklyis nyamoq xo dah dius yuk haih zis ma nghuot lhyeh?
43007026	Yoeuh aq, nyang gas debangh taiq kyoh nyeis yvmvyah, nyang lyis cha ma yoh taiq. Haih soeu nyang Khristu nghuot zis lyis guon bang nyang jyoengh vseq au?
43007027	Nghuot laus eq haih soeu khalhye yah nghuot zis hank eq seq das zis ma nghuot ge.
43007028	Housoeh las Yesu yhenmuh mas jyauh zoh lyis yah kaiq las taiq zis gas, Namoq ngos lyis seq, ngos khalhye yah zis eq seq. Ngos gas ngvnyang los zis ma nghuot, ngos lyis nhang kat soeu ka jyoeng, hauh soeu lhyi namoq ma seq.
43007029	Ngos gas nyang lyis seq: khasoeh ge lyis ngos gas nyah jyank masyah nghuot las nyang ngos lyis nhang kat goeus, ge.
43007030	Housoeh las nyamoq gas nyang lyis nyhik das zis sont laus eq nyah shishenh ma jweh shih yvmvyah, nyang lyis hank eq ma yoh nyhik.
43007031	Moqjens mas dius nyoshoq nyang lyis lomsjingh las taiq zis gas, Khristu los las nyang gas haih soeu thoq lyis vlho zes yoh chixoeuq das lah, ge.
43007032	Dius jens gas nyah cho moengs goh nyeis zis lyis Pharishe jens xauhgyo las, phudyei uhjyung jens yahge Pharishe moq gas nyang lyis nyhik das xiklyis zungh bang lyis nhang kat.
43007033	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, ngos namoq yah dvyoq kyingh nyeis las, ngos lyis nhang kat soeu jyank mas doms loh das.
43007034	Namoq ngos lyis xo laus eq ma nyvng das. Ngos nyeis jang mas eq namoq ma yoh jweh los, ge.
43007035	Housoeh las Yuda jens nyamoq nyang changh taiq goh zis gas, Yang ma yoh xo nyvng shoq haih dius yuk khapheh loh bah ge au? Dyos loh dah Heleni jens jyank mas loh las, hauh bang lyis jyauh das nvdoeus.
43007036	Namoq ngos lyis xo laus eq ma nyvng das, ngos nyeis jang mas eq namoq ma yoh jweh los das, ge dah dang gas cha ge mes dah dang nghuot au lhyeh, ge.
43007037	Hau pwe dah thang thank buisnyeis zainsmuh mas Yesu yap las taiq zis gas, Jeis shet soeu bos lyis ngah jyank mas los shuk bas jungh.
43007038	Ngos lyis lomsjingh soeu ka lhaihtoh dang mas taiq zis yah dvyhangteh, hauh soeu dah ungkhau mhayah kang bos dah jeislvng yaus thuq nyeis das, ge.
43007039	Nyang housoeh taiq zis gas, nyang lyis lomsjingh bang xauh yoeus das dah Dyos lyis toeuq las taiq zis nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis Yesu gas nyah phunk ma pank shih yvmvyah Gyingshang Dyos ma dyei shih zis nghuot.
43007040	Housoeh taiq dang moqjens mas nyoshoq moq xauhgyo las nyamoq taiq zis gas, Haih soeu ka lvpe jyoengh nghuot, ge.
43007041	Dvyhamh gas, Haih soeu ka Khristu nyang nghuot goeus, ge. Nghuot laus eq dvyhamh gas, Khristu gas Galile mau masyah thuq los das lah?
43007042	Khristu gas Dawi dah vnyau vshih masyah dyos las, Dawi dah joqyos ge dah Betlehem wukhau mhayah dvthuq los das, ge lhaihtoh dang mas bos ma nghuot lhyeh, ge.
43007043	Housoeh las moqjens gas nyah gvng mas gang loh.
43007044	Nyamoq mas dvyhamh gas nyang lyis nyhik mes laus eq, hank eq nyang lyis ma nyhik.
43007045	Housoeh las zungh bang gas phudyei uhjyung jens yahge Pharishe moq jyank mas doms jweh loh lyis nyamoq gas, Nyang lyis chamus ma shwih los goh lah, ge lhom nyei langh.
43007046	Zungh bang phuk taiq zis gas, Khayhoq eq haih soeu teh taiq soeu ma bos, ge.
43007047	Housoeh las Pharishe jens nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq lyis eq mhuih goeus lhyeh?
43007048	Guon bang nghuot ya Pharishe mas zis hauh soeu lhyi lomsjingh soeu bos lah?
43007049	Haih dius jens gas lyi ma seq las nhoengh zis xauh goeus, ge.
43007050	Nikodimu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, (nyamoq mas dvyuk nghuot soeu nyenh lyis Yesu jyank mas lyih soeu nghuot.)
43007051	Nyang cha kuot goeus zis ma xauhgyo, ma seq shih lyis yah Lyi gas dvyuk yuk lyis soe gyangh tuon lhyeh, ge.
43007052	Nyamoq phuk taiq zis gas, Nvng eq Galile mas zis nghuot lhyeh? Nvng dvxo choq yoeuh aq, Galile masyah lvpe hank eq ma thuq los ku, ge.
43007053	Hauh thang lyis nyamoq yuk khanghmuh, nyang yuk nyang toeu yhen pheh tsain loh lo.
43008001	Nghuot laus eq Yesu gas Tsanlun boms pheh doq loh.
43008002	Nvpsangh yah nyang gas yhenmuh mas doms loh lyis, dius nyoshoq nyah jyank mas zain los yvmas nyang tsung lha jyauh nyeis.
43008003	Hauh uhlyis maussauh lhaih bang yahge Pharishe jens gas, nyi lvng shuot goh nyeis dah vmesbih dvyuk lyis nyamoq vgungs mas loh shwih lhyap toh las
43008004	nyamoq nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Svra eh, haih vmesbih lyis nyi lvng shuot goh nyeis uhlyis ngamoq loh nyhik goeus.
43008005	Heisoeh teh dah vmesbih lyis lukzains yah yoh doeuh, ge Moshe ka Lyi mas ngamoq lyis vmingh dyei toh. Gvshih nvng gas khasoeh oen das lah, ge.
43008006	Housoeh ge nyei zis gas, nyang lyis yobos huon das zis nyvng das xiklyis nyang lyis shi yoeuh zis nghuot. Yesu gas ma xauhgyo guons kuot las gop las tsoh mas loqnyhauh yah lhaih nyeis.
43008007	Nyamoq housoeh doms tsank nyei nyei kuot yvmvyah, nyang nghank las nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq mas yobos ma yoh soeu shih nyang lyis lukzains yah doeuh aq, ge.
43008008	Housoeh dye taiq yah dvyih nyang doms gop las tsoh mas lhaih nyeis.
43008009	Nyamoq hauh dang xauhgyo lyis nyamoq dah ehnyet mas zangh las, logis jens uhshe lha dvyuk thang lhyi dvyuk thuq loh. Housoeh Yesu nyang kyingh nyet joq las, hauh vmesbih eq vgungs mas yap joq.
43008010	Yesu nghank yoeuh lyis vmesbih mas lai las gohtoeu hank lyis eq ma nyvng yvmvyah, nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Vmesbih eh, nvng lyis zau kauq bang khapheh loh goeus lah? Nvng lyis hank eq dang thang ma thyet lhyeh, ge.
43008011	Vmesbih gas, Yhensain eh, hank ma thyet ge toeuh lyis, Yesu taiq zis gas, Ngos eq nvng lyis dang thang ma thyet, loh lo aq, yaunos vkuot lo, ge.
43008012	Housoeh las Yesu nyang lyis doms taiq zis gas, Ngos gas mungkvn dah bvng zis nghuot. Ngah thang mha chank soeu ka chuot yvmas khanhamp eq ma suh las kang dah bvng cho yoh das.
43008013	Housoeh las Pharishe jens nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nah cho lhyi nvnyang kanghjyoeng kat las, nah kanghjyoeng ka ma jyoeng, ge.
43008014	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngah cho lhyi ngvnyang kanghjyoeng kat laus eq jyoeng. Ngos khapheh yah los las khapheh loh das zis ngvnyang seq: nghuot laus eq namoq gas ngos khapheh yah thuq los las khapheh loh das zis ma seq.
43008015	Namoq gas gungsshoh khyvpheh yah soetuon. Ngos gas hank lyis eq soe ma tuon.
43008016	Soetuon nghuot laus eq ngos tuon khyvlyis jus joq. Khasoeh ge lyis, ngos gas dvyuk kyingh ma nghuot, ngos eq, ngos lyis nhang kat soeu, ngah Uwus eq dvgeh nghuot.
43008017	Namoq dah Lyi mas eq, kanghjyoeng aiq yuk dah dang gas jyoeng, ge lhaih toh.
43008018	Ngos gas vsainnyang xiklyis kanghjyoeng kat soeu nghuot. Ngos lyis nhang kat soeu ngah Uwus eq ngah cho kanghjyoeng kat dyei nyeis, ge.
