43008019	Nyamoq nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nah Uwus gas khalhye nyeis, ge. Yesu phuk taiq zis gas, Namoq gas ngah Uwus lyis eq, ngos lyis eq ma seq. Ngos lyis seq ya, ngah Uwus lyis eq seq das, ge.
43008020	Dang haih zis gas yhenmuh mas jyauh nyeis uhlyis vlu yvp mas taiq dah dang nghuot. Nyah shishenh ma jweh shih yvmvyah, nyang lyis hank eq ma nyhik.
43008021	Nyang nyamoq lyis dvlhain doms taiq zis gas, Ngos loh das, hauh uhlyis namoq ngos lyis xo das. Vsainnyang yaunos mas eq namoq shei das. Ngos loh das joqyos mas eq namoq ma yoh jweh das, ge.
43008022	Housoeh las Yuda jens gas, ngos loh das joqyos mas namoq ma yoh jweh das, ge nyang taiq zis gas, nyang gungs nyang sat das nvdoeus, tsain ge.
43008023	Yesu tsoq taiq zis gas, Namoq gas nyhen mha dah bang nghuot. Ngos gas nyhang mha dah soeu dvnghuot. Namoq gas haih mungkvn mas bang nghuot, Ngos gas haih mungkvn mas zis ma nghuot.
43008024	Housoeh yvmvyah ngos namoq lyis, Namoq gas vsainnyang yaunos mas shei das, oen taiq goeus: khasoeh ge lyis, ngos hauh soeu nghuot zis lyis namoq ma jingh yvmvyah, namoq vsainnyang yaunos mas shei das, ge.
43008025	Housoeh nyamoq taiq zis gas, Nvng hank nghuot lah, ge nyei. Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos gas xik pheh yah ngos namoq lyis taiq toh soeu, hauh soeu nyang nghuot.
43008026	Ngos namoq dah cho mha bos taiq soetuon dyei das zis nyoshoq bos. Nghuot laus eq ngos lyis nhang kat soeu ka jyoeng nyeis yvmvyah, nyah jyank masyah ngos xauhgyo zis mungkvn lyis taiq kyoh zis nghuot, ge.
43008027	Uwus dah cho taiq yvlyis nyamoq ma seq.
43008028	Housoeh las Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Hauh cangsoeu Lo lyis namoq toeu shap toh uhlyis, ngos gas hauh soeu nghuot zis eq, ngos gas ngah ehnyet yah cha eq ma kuot, nghuot laus eq ngah Uwus ngos lyis jyauh zis yah dvyhangteh, hauh dang ngos taiq nyeis zis lyis eq namoq seq los das.
43008029	Ngos lyis nhang kat soeu ka ngos yah dvgeh nyeis. Uwus gas ngvnyang kyingh lyis ma toh khoq: khasoeh ge lyis, nyang o dah muh lyis ngos vjangh kuot nyeis, ge.
43008030	Hauh dang taiq nyeis lyis dius nyoshoq nyang lyis lomsjingh.
43008031	Yesu gas, nyang lyis lomsjingh dah Yuda jens lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq ngah dang mas goeng toenk joq lyis, namoq ngah changlo gyingh nghuot joq.
43008032	Jyoeng cho namoq seq das las, hauh jyoeng cho ka namoq lyis lhuiq kat das, ge.
43008033	Nyamoq, nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngamoq gas Abraham dah vnyau nghuot las khanhamp eq hank jyank mas jons ma mus ku dvnghuot lyis, luiq ge khasoeh yoh taiq das lah, ge.
43008034	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, yaunos kuot bang hank laus eq yaunos dah jons nghuot joq.
43008035	Jons gas yhen mha vjangh yoh nyeis zis ma nghuot: lo gas vjangh nyeis.
43008036	Housoeh las Lo yah namoq lyis lhuiq kat lyis gas, namoq jyoengh luiq das.
43008037	Namoq Abraham dah vnyau nghuot zis ngos seq: nghuot laus eq ngah dang namoq mas ma bos yvmvyah, namoq ngos lyis sat das zis xo nyeis.
43008038	Ngos gas ngah Uwus jyank mas nyvng zis yah dvyhangteh taiq. Namoq eq namoq dah uwus jyank masyah nyvng zis yah dvyhangteh tsain kuot nyeis, ge.
43008039	Nyamoq, nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Abraham gas ngamoq dah uwus nghuot, ge. Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq Abraham dah lo nghuot lyis gas, Abraham kuot dah muh tsain chank kuot das.
43008040	Nghuot laus eq gvshih gas namoq lyis Mangso jyank masyah ngos xauhgyo las hau jyoeng dah cho taiq kyoh soeu ge dah ngos lyis sat das zis tsain xo: Abraham gas housoeh teh soeu ma nghuot.
43008041	Namoq gas namoq dah uwus kuot zis yah dvyhangteh kuot nyeis, ge. Nyamoq, nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngamoq deslos ma nghuot, ngamoq gas Uwus dvyuk kyingh dvyoh: hauh soeu ka Mangso nyang nghuot, ge.
43008042	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq Uwus gas Mangso nghuot lyis, namoq ngos lyis jyetdap das. Khasoeh ge lyis ngos gas Mangso mhayah thuq los soeu nghuot: Ngah ehnyet yah ngos jweh los zis ma nghuot, nyang gas ngos lyis nhang kat.
43008043	Chamus ngah dang lyis ma seqgyo goh lah? Khasoeh ge lyis ngah dang lyis ma kamp gyo las ngah dang ma seqgyo.
43008044	Namoq gas namoq dah uwus ge dah yius masyah tsain dyos lyih las namoq uwus nyetnau khyvlyis chank mes. Yius gas cangxeih yoq lyis yah dius sat soeu nghuot. Nyah jyank mas jyoeng zis ma yoh bos las jyoeng cho mha ma yoh nyeis. Nyang dyoq dah dang taiq lyis nyang nyah ungkhau mha bos zis yah dvyhangteh taiq nyeis. Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas dyoq soeu nghuot, lvdyoq dah uwus eq nghuot.
43008045	Ngos dang jyoeng taiq yvmvyah namoq ma lomsjingh.
43008046	Ngos mas yobos bos oen namoq mas hank yoh tuonh shet das lah? Ngos dang jyoeng taiq nghuot lyis gas, chamus ngos lyis ma lomsjingh goh lah?
43008047	Mangso yah sen soeu ka nyah dang lyis gyo nyeis. Namoq gas Mangso dah bang ma nghuot las, nyah dang lyis ma tsain gyo, ge.
43008048	Yuda jens nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Nvng gas Samari dius nghuot las yius wvng soeu nghuot, oen ngamoq taiq zis gas jus ma nghuot lhyeh, ge.
43008049	Yesu phuk taiq zis gas, ngos yius wvng nyeis soeu ma nghuot, ngah Uwus lyis phauh nyang zis dvnghuot. Namoq yuk ngos lyis ma phauh ma nyang kuot.
43008050	Ngos gas ngvnyang nyoqnho ngelang lyis ma xo; xo lha soetuon dyei soeu dvyuk nyeis.
43008051	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, ngah dang lyis chank soeu ka khanhamp eq ma shei lo, ge.
43008052	Yuda jens nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng yius wvng soeu nghuot yvlyis gvshih ngamoq seq goeus. Abraham yahge lvpe jens dye shei goeus. Nghuot laus eq nvng taiq zis gas, Ngah dang lyis chank soeu ka shei zis khanhamp eq ma bos das, ge.
43008053	Nvng gas shei loh goeus ngamoq uwus Abraham thoq lyis ma zes kuh ma nghuot lhyeh? Lvpe jens eq shei khoq goeus, nvng hank nghuot oen nghamh zo, ge.
43008054	Yesu phuk taiq zis gas, Ngah gungs lyis ngvnyang chungh nghuot lyis gas, ngah nyoqnho ngelang cha eq ma bos; nghuot laus eq ngos lyis chungh soeu ka, namoq dah Mangso nghuot, ge namoq taiq dah ngah Uwus nyang nghuot, ge.
43008055	Nghuot laus eq namoq gas nyang lyis ma seq, ngos gas seq. Ma seq oen lhyi ka ngos eq namoq teh hwah soeu bweh das: nghuot laus eq ngos gas nyang lyis seq las nyah dang lyis eq chank kuot.
43008056	Namoq dah uwus Abraham gas, ngah buisnyeis nyvng das yvlyis gaus las, nyang hauh zis lyis nyvng las gaus goeus, ge.
43008057	Yuda jens nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng oengci zvn yangh ma bos shih zis Abraham lyis nyvng ku lhyeh, ge.
43008058	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, Abraham dah xik lyis yah ngos nyeis, ge.
43008059	Housoeh las nyamoq gas nyang lyis doeuh das ge lukgoq tsain kui. Yesu gas nyah gungs shung lha yhenmuh masyah nyamoq jo chank thuq loh.
43009001	Nyang lai loh nyeis lyis, khoeu los masyah nyoqjet soeu dvyuk lyis nyvng.
43009002	Nyah changlo jens nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Svra eh, haih soeu nyoqjet zis khoeu los zis gas yobos kuot soeu ka hank nghuot lah? Haih dius yuk lah? Nyah ungwes uwus lah, ge.
43009003	Yesu phuk taiq zis gas, Haih soeu yobos kuot zis ma nghuot, nyah nyhiphoq eq ma nghuot, Mangso dah muh, hauh soeu mhayah chixoeuq das xiklyis dvnghuot.
43009004	Ngos lyis nhang kat soeu dah muhzoh lyis nyeihyo nyoq nyvng shih uhlyis ngos wons wuq chah. Muh hank eq ma yoh wons wuq das dah nyenhyo jweh los das.
43009005	Ngos mungkvn mas nyeis shih dah uhlyis ngos mungkvn dah bvng zis nghuot, ge.
43009006	Housoeh dye taiq thang lhyi, nyang nyeisjvng mas svkanh dyeh kat, tsohnyhon lhoeuq yoeus las hauh soeu dah nyoq mas juot dyei las,
43009007	nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Silom thomh mas loh cheih aq, ge. Houyah dvyhangteh nyang loh cheih lyis nyoq nyvng los las loh lo. (Silom vjyuk gas, Nhang kat, ge zis nghuot.)
43009008	Housoeh las yhen kyoh yahge xik pheh nyang nyoqjet zis lyis nyvng yoeuh bang gas, Haih soeu ka tsung lha dung zo soeu ma nghuot lhyeh, ge.
43009009	Dvyhamh gas, Haih soeu nyang nghuot, ge. Tsai dvyhamh gas, Hauh soeu yah doeusgoh, ge. Nyang taiq zis gas, Ngos hauh soeu nyang nghuot goeus, ge.
43009010	Housoeh yvmvyah nyamoq, nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Housoeh lyis nah nyoq khasoeh yoh nyvng los lah, ge.
43009011	Nyang phuk taiq zis gas, Yesu ge soeu tsohnyhon lhoeuq las ngah nyoq mas juot dyei lho lha, Silom thomh mas loh cheih aq, ge zis yah dvyhangteh ngos loh cheih lyis nyoq nyvng los, ge.
43009012	Nyamoq, nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Hauh soeu khamha nyeis, ge nyei. Nyang phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos ma seq, ge.
43009013	Nyamoq gas vkhang nyoqjet soeu lhyi Pharishe jens jyank mas shwih e.
43009014	Yesu tsohnyhon lhoeuq las hauh soeu lhyi nyoq nyvng nhang nyeih gas Yuda No Buisnyeis nghuot.
43009015	Pharishe moq eq, nyah nyoq khasoeh nyvng los cho doms nyei lyis hauh soeu taiq zis gas, Nyang ngah nyoq mas tsohnyhon kat dyei las, ngos nyoq cheih lho lhyi nyvng los, ge.
43009016	Pharishe dvyhamh gas, Haih soeu ka No Buisnyeis lyis ma phauh yvmvyah, nyang gas Mangso jyank masyah jweh lyih soeu ma nghuot, ge. Gohtoeu dvyhamh gas, Yaunos wons soeu ka heiteh dah vlho khasoeh yoh kuot das, ge tsain gang loh.
43009017	Housoeh las nyamoq gas nyoqjet khoq soeu lhyi, Nah nyoq nyvng nhang soeu lhyi nvng khasoeh oen nghamh, ge nyei. Nyang phuk taiq zis gas, Hauh soeu ka lvpe nghuot, ge.
43009018	Yuda jens gas, nyang gas nyoqjet soeu nghuot zis nyoq doms nyvng los zis lyis ma jingh yvmvyah, nyoqjet khoq soeu dah nyhiphoq lyis khi lha,
43009019	nyamoq lyis nyei zis gas, Khoeu los masyah nyoqjet dah haih soeu ka nah zomh dah lo nghuot lhyeh, ge.
43009020	Hauh soeu dah nyhiphoq nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Hauh soeu ka ngah zomh dah lo nghuot, khoeu los masyah nyoqjet zis ngah zomh seq.
43009021	Nghuot laus eq gvshih hank yah khasoeh kuot dyei las nyoq nyvng los zis gas ngah zomh ma seq. Nyang lyis nyei yoeuh geh, nyang nyenhkyi bos goeus las nyah cho nyang taiq das, ge.
43009022	Nyah nyhiphoq housoeh ge zis gas, Yuda jens lyis gyuk yvmvyah nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis, Yesu gas Khristu nghuot ge las lhom yoeus soeu hank lyis laus eq lyi jungs mhayah khat thuq das zis gvshih yangh dye xam nyoq toh goeus.
43009023	Housoeh las hauh soeu dah nyhiphoq gas, Nyang nyenhkyi bos goeus, nyang lyis nyei yoeuh geh, ge zis nghuot.
43009024	Housoeh las hauh nyoqjet khoq soeu lhyi doms khi lha nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Mangso lhyi chungh aq, hauh soeu ka yaunos wons soeu nghuot zis ngamoq seq, ge.
43009025	Hauh soeu phuk taiq zis gas, Nyang yaunos wons soeu nghuot ma nghuot zis ngos ma seq: ngos seq zis gas, ngos xikpheh nyoqjet, gvshih gas nyvng goeus, hounyhoq kyingh dvnghuot, ge.
43009026	Nyamoq, nyang lyis doms taiq zis gas, Nyang nvng lyis cha kuot dyei? Nah nyoq khasoeh phank dyei lah, ge.
43009027	Hauh soeu phuk taiq zis gas, Gvshih shih ngos namoq lyis taiq kyoh goeus; namoq nyang ma tsain seqgyo. Chamus doms tsain gyo mes goh lah? Namoq eq nyah changlo duot mes goh vnghuot lah, ge.
43009028	Housoeh las nyamoq gas, nyang lyis jwangh zoh lyis yah taiq zis gas, Nvng yuk nyah changlo nghuot, ngamoq gas Moshe dah changlo jens dvtsain nghuot.
43009029	Mangso ka Moshe lhyi eq dang jis zis ngamoq seq. Haih soeu khalhye yah nghuot zis gas ngamoq ma seq, ge.
43009030	Hauh soeu phuk taiq zis gas, Nyang gas nyoq yoh phank dyei goeus lyis eq, nyang khalhye yah nghuot zis namoq ma seq zis gas mauhphoh nghuot.
43009031	Yaunos kuot bang lyis Mangso ma gyo dyei zis gas ngamoq seq: nghuot laus eq Mangso lhyi paiq soeu nghuot las, nyah ehnyet lyis chank nghuot lyis gas Mangso nyang lyis gyo dyei.
43009032	Khoeu los lyis yah jet goeus dah nyoq lyis dvyuk eq yoh phank dyei ge mungkvn gvnkhanh masyah ma xauhgyo ku.
43009033	Haih soeu ka Mangso jyank masyah ma nghuot lyis gas, cha eq yoh kuot das zis ma nghuot, ge.
43009034	Nyamoq nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Gungs gonh yaunos thomh masyah dvkhoeu los zis ngamoq lyis jyauh nyeis lhyeh, ge nyang lyis khat thuq kat.
43009035	Hauh soeu lhyi khat thuq cho Yesu xauhgyo las, nyang lyis xo nyvng lyis taiq zis gas, Mangso dah Lo lyis lomsjingh lah, ge.
43009036	Nyang phuk taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, ngos lomsjingh das soeu ka hank nghuot lah, ge.
43009037	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Hauh soeu lhyi nvng nyvng ku goeus, nvng yah jis goh soeu ka hauh soeu nyang nghuot, ge.
43009038	Hauh soeu ka, Yhensain eh, ngos lomsjingh nyeis, ge nyang lyis paiq.
43009039	Yesu taiq zis gas, Haih mungkvn mas ngos jweh lyih zis gas, soetuon das xiklyis nghuot las, nyoqjet bang nyoq nyvng los das xiklyis eq, nyoq nyvng nyeis bang ma nyvng das xiklyis eq nghuot, ge.
43009040	Nyang yah dvgeh nyeis dah Pharishe jens hauh dang lyis xauhgyo las nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngamoq eq nyoqjet lhyeh, ge.
43009041	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq nyoqjet ya yaunos ma tsain yoh das, gvshih namoq taiq zis gas, Ngamoq nyoq nyvng ge yvmvyah namoq yaunos bos joq shih, ge.
43010001	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, yvng khom mha khomh cho yah ma wvng, gohcho yah dyvm wvng soeu ka khauh soeu, khyanktau nghuot.
43010002	Khomh cho yah wvng soeu ka yvng yoeuh soeu nghuot.
43010003	Khomh zungh soeu eq hauh soeu lhyi ka gyangh phank dyei; yvng eq nyah thwe gyo las, nyang gas nyah yvng lyis nyings yoeus las nghe pheh gyangh shwih thuq loh.
43010004	Nyah yvng lyis shwih thuq lho lha, yvng jens dah xik pheh loh yvmvyah, yvng eq nyah thwe seqgyo las nyah thang mha chank loh.
43010005	Dius boengh dah thwe lhyi ka, yvng jens ma shoeuq yvmvyah, hauh soeu thang mha ma chank loh, dvtsain phang loh, ge.
43010006	Yesu gas hauh dangtoeuq nyamoq lyis taiq laus eq, nyang chah cho taiq nyeis yvlyis nyamoq ma seq gyo.
43010007	Housoeh yvmvyah Yesu nyamoq lyis doms taiq. Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, Ngos gas yvng jens dah khomh nghuot.
43010008	Ngah xik lyis los bang dvnganh gas khauh bang, khyanktau jens dvtsain nghuot. Yvng eq nyamoq dah dang ma tsain gyo dyei.
43010009	Ngos gas khomh nghuot: ngos masyah wvng soeu ka khyuot yoeus zis xauh das; thuq wvng yoh kuot las katjang nyvng das.
43010010	Khauh soeu ka khauh das, sat das, mhont das zis ma nghuot lyis gas ma los. Ngos gas, nyamoq kang yoh las magons magoh dyingh bas jungh, oen dvlyih.
43010011	Ngos gas gis dah yvng yoeuh soeu nghuot: gis dah yvng yoeuh soeu ka yvng xiklyis nyah kang yoh dyei.
43010012	Nghuot laus eq yvng lyis sain dah yvng yoeuh soeu ma nghuot, uhkung dvnghuot lyis gas, womkhuih los zis nyvng lyis, yvng lyis toh khoq las phang loh. Womkhuih eq yvng lyis ngat zo las khat sanh tyamp.
43010013	Hauh soeu ka uhkung dvnghuot yvmvyah yvng xiklyis ma chiq dyei, phang khoq.
43010014	Ngos gas gis dah yvng yoeuh soeu nghuot. Ngos gas ngah yvng lyis seq las ngah yvng eq ngos lyis seq.
43010015	Uwus gas ngos lyis seq las ngos eq Uwus lyis seq. Housoeh yvmvyah ngah yvng xiklyis ngah kang dyei tyamp.
43010016	Haih phung mha ma bos dah yvng gohtoeu eq ngos yoh shih: hauh bang eq ngah thwe lhyi gyo las, nyamoq lyis ngos shwih tsainh las, yvng phung dvkoeuq, yvng yoeuh soeu dvyuk kyingh bweh das.
43010017	Housoeh las ngos gas ngah kang lhyi doms xauh yoeus bas jungh, oen kang kyauh tyamp yvmvyah, ngah Uwus ngos lyis jyetdap.
43010018	Ngah kang lhyi hank eq ma yoh yoeus tyamp: ngah ehnyet yah ngvnyang dvkyauh tyamp: kyauh tyamp das yomsoq yahge doms xauh yoeus das yomsoq ngvnyang yoh. Hauh tyingtoh dang gas ngah Uwus jyank masyah ngos yoh toh, ge.
43010019	Hauh dang gvng mas Yuda jens gang loh das cho doms thuq los.
43010020	nyamoq nyoshoq moq taiq, Nyang yius wvng las huonh nyeis: chamus nyah dang gyo nyeis goh lah, ge.
43010021	Dvyhamh gas, Nyah dang gas yius wvng soeu dah dang ma nghuot: yius gas nyoqjet soeu dah nyoq lyis yoh phank dyei das lah! ge.
43010022	Gvshih Yerusalem mas Yhenmuh Kyauh pwe nghuot. Hauh yoq gas cungh nghuot.
43010023	Yesu gas yhenmuh Solomon dah wumuk thang mha suh loh.
43010024	Housoeh Yuda jens nyang lyis khyam nyang los nyei zis gas, Nvng kha nyhank jweh shoq ngamoq lyis khamkhvv nhang das lah, ge.
43010025	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis taiq kyoh goeus, namoq nyang ma tsain jingh dvmus. Ngah Uwus dah nyings yah ngos kuot dah muh gas ngah cho kanghjyoeng kat nyeis.
43010026	Nghuot laus eq ngos namoq lyis taiq toh zis yah dvyhangteh, namoq gas ngah yvng ma tsain nghuot las ma tsain jingh.
43010027	Ngah yvng jens gas ngah thwe lhyi gyo las, ngah thang mha chank, ngos eq nyamoq lyis seq.
43010028	Ngos nyamoq lyis vcaiq vto kang dyei toh las, nyamoq khanhamp eq dyoqbis xauh das zis ma nghuot. Ngah loq masyah hank eq ma yoh lhuot yoeus das.
43010029	Nyamoq lyis ngah loq mas kyauh toh dah ngah Uwus gas, dvnganh thoq mas zes kuh nyeis yvmvyah, ngah Uwus loq masyah nyamoq lyis hank eq yoh lhuot yoeus das zis ma nghuot.
43010030	Ngos yahge ngah Uwus gas dvyuk dvnghuot.
43010031	Hauh uhlyis Yuda jens gas nyang lyis doeuh das ge lukgoq doms tsain kui.
43010032	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngah Uwus jyank masyah gis dah muh nyoshoq ngos namoq lyis chixoeuq goeus. Hauh muh mas khakoeuq gvng mas ngos lyis lukgoq yah doeuh das lah, ge.
43010033	Yuda jens nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Gis dah muh gvng mas nvng lyis doeuh das zis ma nghuot, loeusmus soqzo thang lhyi dius dvnghuot zis nvnyang gungs lyis Mangso kuot gvng mas doeuh das zis dvnghuot, ge.
43010034	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Namoq gas mangso jens nghuot nyeis oen ngos taiq, ge namoq dah Lyi mas lhaih toh ma nghuot lhyeh?
43010035	Mangso dang xauh yoeus bang lyis namoq gas, mangso jens ge taiq toh las, lhaihtoh dang lyis ma gis lhoq thyoq lyis gas,
43010036	Ngah Uwus gyingshang nhang lha haih mungkvn mas nhang kat zis xauh soeu, ngos gas Mangso dah Lo nghuot oen taiq gvng mas hauh soeu lhyi, Nvng loeusmus soqzo oen lha gis taiq das lhyeh?
43010037	Ngos ngah Uwus dah muh ma kuot nghuot lyis gas, ngos lyis vjingh goh.
43010038	Hauh muh ngos kuot nghuot lyis gas, ngos lyis ma loms laus eq, ngos mas ngah Uwus bos las, ngah Uwus mas ngos bos zis lyis namoq seq las lomsjingh bas jungh, hauh muh lyis lomsjingh nyeis geh, ge.
43010039	Housoeh yvmvyah nyang lyis nyhik das zis nyamoq doms xo laus eq, nyang gas nyamoq loq masyah luiq loh.
43010040	Hauh thang lyis Yesu gas Yohan jeisnyhop dyei dah joqyos, Yodan lvng thyitvp pheh goeu e lha houmha nyeis.
43010041	Dius nyoshoq moq nyah jyank mas jweh los las taiq zis gas, Yohan gas vlho cha ma chixoeuq hauh soeu cho Yohan taiq zis dvnganh jus, ge.
43010042	Houmha dius nyoshoq moq Yesu lyis lomsjingh.
43011001	Mari yahge nyah vbi Matha nyeis dah Bethani wukhau mha Lazaru ge soeu nos nyeis.
43011002	Hauh Mari gas Yhensain lhyi mura huot kat dyei las khyei lhyi nyah cam yah buot dyei soeu nghuot. Hau nos soeu Lazaru gas nyah mungs nghuot.
43011003	Housoeh las hauh vbi vnoeuh nhaiqtang, nyah jyank mas taiq nhang kat zis gas, Yhensain eh, nvng jyetdap soeu nos nyeis, ge.
43011004	Yesu gas hauh dang xauhgyo lyis nyang taiq zis gas, Haih nos gas shei nos nos zis ma nghuot: hei mhayah Mangso dah phunk xiklyis nghuot las, Mangso dah Lo masyah yoh chunghtoq das xiklyis bweh los cho nghuot, ge.
43011005	Yesu gas Matha, nyah vnoeuh yahge Lazaru lyis jyetdap.
43011006	Lazaru nos nyeis cho xauhgyo lyis, nyang nyeis yvmas aiq nyeih thoeng khoq shih.
43011007	Hauh thang lhyi nyah changlo jens lyis taiq zis gas, Yuda mau pheh doms loh goh, ge.
43011008	Nyah changlo jens nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Svra eh, Yuda jens gvshih eq lukgoq yah doeuh sat das ge xo nyeis lyis, houmha doms loh shih das lah, ge.
43011009	Yesu phuk taiq zis gas, Dvnyeih lyis dvci aiq shishenh bos ma nghuot lah? Nyeih lyis suh e soeu ka haih mungkvn dah bvng zis nyvng las khyeiuh ma thungh.
43011010	Nyenh lyis suh e soeu ka, nyang mas bvng zis ma bos yvmvyah, khyeiuh seq thungh, ge.
43011011	Nyang hauh goeu lyis dye taiq thang lhyi, nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Yah dyenschangh phoq Lazaru yhet joq: nyang lyis nhauh toq das xiklyis ngos houmha e das, ge.
43011012	Nyah changlo jens nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, nyang yhet muih joq dvnghuot lyis gas gis los das, ge.
43011013	Yesu gas Lazaru shei goeus cho taiq kyoh nyeis lyis eq, nyamoq gas yhet zis lyis dvtaiq das, ge tsain nghamh.
43011014	Housoeh las Yesu gas nyamoq lyis, Lazaru shei goeus, ge debangh taiq.
43011015	Nyamoq yoh lomsjingh das xiklyis ngos houmha ma nyeis jus yvmvyah, namoq dah cho ngos gaus nyeis. Nghuot laus eq gvshih houmha tsain e goh, ge.
43011016	Didimu ge dah Thoma gas, Nyang yah dvgeh bos shei das zis yang eq loh goh, ge nyah changlo changh jens lyis taiq.
43011017	Yesu jweh lyis, Lazaru lyis lopkhyung mha nyei nyeih toh goeus zis nyvng.
43011018	Bethani wukhau ka Yerusalem wus yah aiq main ko dvkyo joq yvmvyah,
43011019	mungs chithyuk dah vbi vnoeuh vzomh, Matha yahge Mari lyis nhaiqtaink das ge Yuda dius jens nyoshoq moq los nyeis.
43011020	Yesu jweh los cho Matha xauhgyo yah dvyih, nyang lyis zes das ge e loh. Mari gas yhen mha tsung toh khoq shih.
43011021	Hauh uhlyis Matha gas, Yhensain eh, nvng heimha dvnyeis ya ngah mungs ma shei das zis:
43011022	gvshih laus eq, Mangso jyank mas nvng dung ya dung yvlyis Mangso nvng lyis dyei das zis ngos seq, ge Yesu lyis lhom taiq kyoh.
43011023	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nah mungs doms toq das, ge.
43011024	Matha nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Thang thank doms toq dah buisnyeis lyis nyang eq dwis toq das zis gas ngos seq, ge.
43011025	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos gas dwis toq cho yahge kang nghuot. Ngos lyis lomsjingh soeu ka, nyang shei laus eq kang dwis das.
43011026	Hank laus eq kang dwis nyeis las ngos lyis lomsjingh soeu ka khanhamp eq shei das zis ma nghuot: nvng haih zis lyis vjingh lah, ge.
43011027	Matha nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nghuot goeus Yhensain eh, nvng gas haih mungkvn mas jweh lyih, Mangso dah Lo Khristu nghuot zis lyis ngos jingh, ge.
43011028	Nyang housoeh taiq lho lha, nyah vnoeuh Mari lyis loh gauh lui las, Svra jweh los goeus, nvng lyis lui nyeis, ge.
43011029	Mari hauh dang xauhgyo yah dvyih lvnyap toq las Yesu jyank pheh e loh.
43011030	Yesu gas wukhau mha ma jweh los shih: Matha nyang yah xauhgoh yvmas nyeis khoq.
43011031	Housoeh yhen mha Mari lyis nhaiqtaink dyei dah Yuda jens gas, Mari lvnyap toq thuq loh zis nyvng las nyamoq nyah thang mha chank e lha, Nyang lop mas e ngaus bah ge soh bos, tsain ge.
43011032	Mari gas Yesu nyeis dah joqyos mas jweh las nyang lyis nyvng lyis, nyah khyeiyang mas dupaiq las taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, nvng heimha dvnyeis ya ngah mungs ma shei das zis, ge.
43011033	Mari ngaus las nyah thang mha chank lyih dah Yuda jens eq ngaus zis lyis Yesu nyvng lyis, nyah dyos mas nhaiqngis zis yah ehnyet nyo nyeis las,
43011034	nyang lyis khamha nyhop toh lah, ge nyei. Nyah zomh taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, lyih yoeuh aq, ge.
43011035	Yesu ngaus.
43011036	Housoeh las Yuda jens gas, Yoeuh aq, nyang hauh soeu lhyi kha iq jyetdap, ge.
43011037	Tsai dvyhamh taiq zis gas, Nyoqjet soeu lhyi nyoq yoh phank dyei dah haih soeu ka, Lazaru lyis eq ma shei das khyvlyis ma yoh kuot das lhyeh, ge.
43011038	Housoeh las Yesu gas nyah ehnyet mas nhaiq doms ngis zis yah lop pheh e loh. Hauh lop gas lukkhyung nghuot las lukzains yah cheiq toh.
43011039	Yesu taiq zis gas, Hauh luk toeu tyamp geh, ge. Shei soeu dah nhamhmuh Matha taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, gvshih gas nvm hah das, nyang shei zis nyei nyeih bos goeus, ge.
43011040	Yesu gas, Nvng lomsjingh lyis gas, Mangso dah phunk xauh nyvng das oen ngos taiq toh goeus ma nghuot lhyeh, ge.
43011041	Housoeh las nyamoq gas hau mvng toh yvmas dah luk lyis toeu tyamp. Hauh uhlyis Yesu gas maukhung mha nghank yoeuh las, Uwus eh, nvng ngah dang gyo dyei yvmvyah ngos nvng lyis chungh.
43011042	Nvng vjangh ngah dang gyo dyei yvlyis ngos seq. Nghuot laus eq nvng ngos lyis nhang kat goeus zis gas, haih vyvm vwi mas dah dius jens lomsjingh bas jungh, oen ngos taiq zis nghuot, ge.
43011043	Housoeh dye taiq thang lhyi, Lazaru eh, thuq lyih aq, ge thwe zainsmuh yah kaiq kat.
43011044	Hauh uhlyis shei goeus soeu ka, nyah khyei nyah loq mas misseh lyet las, nyoqnho mha eq shuhkyenh lyet zis thuq lyih. Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Nyang lyis phui kat geh, ge.
43011045	Housoeh las Mari jyank mas nhaiqtaink lyih bang Yuda jens nyoshoq moq Yesu kuot zis lyis nyvng las nyang lyis tsain lomsjingh.
43011046	Dvyhamh gas Pharishe moq jyank mas loh las, Yesu kuot cho lhyi tsain taiq kyoh.
43011047	Housoeh las Pharishe moq yahge phudyei uhjyung jens gas, hauh nhaiqbos huom khi tsainh las taiq zis gas, Yang cha kuot das au lhyeh? Hauh soeu ka vlho nyoshoq chixoeuq nyeis.
43011048	Nyang lyis heisoeh dvnyhei toh lyis gas dius dvnganh nyang lyis dye tsain lomsjingh das las, Roma dius jens lyih las yah joqyos, yah vnyau lyis lhuot yoeus loh das, ge.
43011049	Nghuot laus eq nyamoq mas hauh zvnyo dah Phudyei Zainsmuh Kayapa ge vyuk taiq zis gas, Namoq cha ma seq.
43011050	Dius dvnyau gonh dyoqbis zis ma xauh shoq, haih vnyau xiklyis dius dvyuk shei kham lhyi yah xiklyis shonsi das yvlyis namoq ma nghamh yoeuh nyvng, ge.
43011051	Dang hauh zis gas nyah ehnyet yah nyang taiq zis ma nghuot: hauh zvn lyis Phudyei Zainsmuh nghuot yvmvyah, Yesu gas vnyau xiklyis shei kham chah das, ge pe zis nghuot.
43011052	Hauh vnyau xiklyis kyingh ma nghuot, joqyos khyiq khanghmuh mas dyos joq, Mangso dah lo jens lyis tsain shwih tsainh das xiklyis shei kham chah das, ge zis nghuot.
43011053	Hauh nyeihyo masyah nyang lyis sat das cho, nyamoq joeui da nyeis.
43011054	Housoeh las Yesu gas Yuda jens dah xikkhonh mas debangh ma suh xoeuq, hou mhayah thuq las mhanhdyvp yvm, Ephraim wukhau mha nyah changlo jens yah dvgeh nyeis.
43011055	Gvshih Yuda jens dah Lhuiq Kat Pwe ni los nyeis las, dius nyoshoq moq pwe ma jweh shih lyis, vsainnyang gungs cheihshang das xiklyis wukhau mhayah Yerusalem wugungs pheh tsain doq loh.
43011056	Nyamoq gas Yesu lyis xo lha, Yhenmuh mas yap las dvyuk yah dvyuk nyei goh zis gas, Namoq khasoeh nghamh goh? Nyang haih pwe mha ma los das lhyeh, ge.
43011057	Hauh uhlyis phudyei uhjyung jens yahge Pharishe moq gas, nyang lyis yoh yoeus shoq, Hank laus eq nyang nyeis joqyos seq lyis gas taiq kyoh chah, ge las vmingh dyei toh.
43012001	Lhuiq Kat Pwe jweh das zis khyuk nyeih chah shih lyis, shei masyah dwis los nhang dah Lazaru nyeis joqyos Bethani mas jweh e.
43012002	Nyamoq gas nyang lyis nyenhcon tsain lhom tsoh langh yvmas, Matha gas wom bos dwis tsoh nyeis. Lazaru gas nyang yah tsung lha wom zo bang mas bos.
43012003	Hauh uhlyis Mari gas phauhdap dah mura nadu coeu gyingh kyatthah 30 yoeus las, Yesu dah khyei mha juot lho lha nyah cam yah buot dyei. Hauh nadu coeu ka dvyhen khau yah nhoenk toh.
43012004	Housoeh nyah changlo dvyuk nghuot las nyang lyis phanhlyen das dah, Simon dah lo Yudas Iskarot taiq zis gas,
43012005	Hau nadu coeu lhyi ngwis somhxo yah ungh las, nyungs bang lyis chamus ma gvm dyei, ge.
43012006	Nyang housoeh ge zis gas nyungs bang xiklyis nghamh dyei las taiq zis ma nghuot: nyang gas ngwis thung chi soeu nghuot las, kat toh dah ngwis masyah gyangh lap zo dah khauh soeu nghuot las taiq zis dvnghuot.
43012007	Housoeh las Yesu taiq zis gas, Nyang kuot zis nghuot goeus jungh, hauh zis gas ngos lyis nyhop dah buisnyeis xiklyis nghuot.
43012008	Nyungs bang gas namoq yah vjangh dvgeh nyeis: ngos gas namoq yah vjangh ma nyeis, ge.
43012009	Yesu houmha nyeis zis lyis Yuda jens nyoshoq moq seq: nyamoq lyih zis gas, Yesu lyis kyingh nyvng mes las ma nghuot, shei masyah nyang dwis los nhang dah Lazaru lyis eq nyvng mes las nghuot.
43012010	Housoeh las phudyei uhjyung jens gas, Lazaru lyis eq sat das zis tsain xamgoh nyeis.
43012011	Khasoeh ge lyis nyah cho gvng mas, Yuda nyoshoq moq tsain thuq loh las Yesu lyis tsain lomsjingh goeus.
43012012	Hauh thang lhyi nyeihyo Yesu gas Yerusalem mas los nyeis zis lyis, hauh pwe mha jweh nyeis dah moqjens xauhgyo lyis,
43012013	nyamoq gas dyoms ko zan chi lha nyang lyis zes das xiklyis thuq los uhjyangh kaiq las, Hosana! Yhensain nyings mas jweh los soeu, Israel Hwankti ka ngelhoq, ge.
43012014	Yesu gas mauhlyihzoe lo nyvng las ji. Hauh zis gas lhaihtoh dang mas:
43012015	Zion lonyi eh, vgyuk, yoeuh aq nah hwankti ka mauhlyihzoe lo ji las jweh los nyeis, ge zis yah dvyhangteh nghuot.
43012016	Hauh cho lhyi nyah changlo jens gas vsaiq yoq lyis ma seqgyo. Nghuot laus eq Yesu gas phunk lyis chungh zis xauh thang lhyi, nyang lyis toeuq las lhaih toh zis lyis eq, nyamoq soh.
43012017	Hauh cho bweh zis gas, Lazaru lyis lop masyah lui las, shei masyah lhoeu toq yoeus uhlyis nyang yah dvgeh nyeis dah moqjens yah kanghjyoeng kat dyei.
43012018	Hauh cho gvng mas moqjens gas nyang lyis e tsain zes zis nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis nyang kuot vlho lhyi nyamoq xauhgyo goeus.
43012019	Housoeh las Pharishe jens nyamoq nyang changh taiq goh zis gas, Namoq khasoeh eq ma yoh kuot lo zis vsoh goh lah? Yoeuh aq, jyoengh nyang dvmau gonh bang nyah thang mha dye chank loh goeus, ge.
43012020	Haih pwe mha shvmanh dung das zis doq los bang mas Heleni eq dvyhamh bos.
43012021	Hauh bang gas, Galile mau, Betsaida wugungs dius Philip jyank mas e lha taiq zis gas, Nhaiqbos eh, ngamoq gas Yesu lyis nyvng mes, ge.
43012022	Philip gas Andre lyis taiq kyoh las, Andre yahge Philip gas Yesu lyis e taiq kyoh.
43012023	Yesu nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas Cangsoeu Lo dah phunk lyis chungh das shishenh jweh los nyeis.
43012024	Namoq lyis ngos jyoengh taiq zis gas, Gukchvp gas nyeisjvng mas gyoh las ma dyoq tyamp lyis gas dvkoeuq kyingh dvnghuot joq: shei tyamp lyis gas vshih nyoshoq shih los.
43012025	Vsainnyang kang lhyi yu soeu ka kang som das: haih mungkvn mas vsainnyang kang lhyi hoeng soeu ka vcaiq vto kang xauh yoeus shoq, vsainnyang kang lhyi yoh tsomh toh das.
43012026	Ngos lyis phuqsoe soeu hank laus eq ngah thang mha chank bas jungh; ngos nyeis jang mas ngah jyeidwis eq nyeis das. Ngos lyis phuqsoe soeu nghuot lyis gas, ngah Uwus hauh soeu lhyi chungh das.
43012027	Gvshih ngos ehnyet nyo nyeis: ngos cha taiq das lah? Uwus eh, ngos lyis lhuiq kat aq, nghuot laus eq haih cho gvng mas ngos haih shishenh mas jweh nyeis.
43012028	Uwus eh, nah nyings lyis chungh aq ge. Hauh uhlyis maukhung mha dah thwe ka, Ngos chungh goeus, chungh shih das, ge taiq thuq los.
43012029	Hauh joqyos mas yap huom joq bang, hauh cho xauhgyo bang gas, Maujau jau nyeis, ge. Dvyhamh bang gas, Nyang lyis loeuswons soeu taiq nyeis, tsain ge.
43012030	Yesu phuk taiq zis gas, Thwe haih zis gas ngah xiklyis nyings thuq los zis ma nghuot, namoq xiklyis dvnghuot.
43012031	Haih mungkvn lyis soetuon zis gas gvshih nghuot: haih mungkvn zau lyis khat tyamp das zis gas gvshih nghuot.
43012032	Ngos gas nyeisjvng masyah toqh kat zis xauh goeus ya, dius dvnganh lyis ngah shot pheh lang yoeus das, ge.
43012033	Housoeh ge zis gas nyang khasoeh shei kham das vlho chixoeuq uhlyis yah taiq zis nghuot.
43012034	Moqjens nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Khristu gas vcaiq vto goeng joq das ge las Lyi mas bos zis dvxauhgyo ku. Housoeh dvnghuot zis nvng gas, Cangsoeu Lo toqh kat zis xauh das, ge zis gas cha ge zis nghuot lah, cangsoeu Lo gas hank nghuot lah, ge.
43012035	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Haih bvng zis gas namoq mas dvsoq dvnyeis lo das; Hau chuot zis gas namoq lyis ma chank duons bas jungh, namoq mas bvng zis joq shih lyis suh e geh; chuot yvmas suh e soeu ka vsainnyang kha pheh loh zis eq ma seq.
43012036	Namoq gas bvng nyeis shih lyis bvng dah lo jens yoh bweh bas jungh, bvng zis lyis lomsjingh nyeis geh, ge. Yesu haih dang dye taiq thuq las nyamoq jyank masyah gang dyuk loh.
43012037	Heinyhoq dah yomsoq muh nyamoq xikkhonh mas kuot xoeuq laus eq, nyamoq gas nyang lyis ma lomsjingh.
43012038	Hauh zis gas, Yhensain eh, ngamoq loeus lyis hank lomsjingh lah? Yhensain ka nyah yomsoq hank lyis chixoeuq ku lah, ge lvpe Esaia taiq dah dang nyuk los das xiklyis nghuot.
43012039	Housoeh yvmvyah nyamoq gas nyang lyis ma lomsjingh: Khasoeh ge lyis, Esaia doms taiq zis gas,
43012040	Nyamoq nyoq ma nyvng, ehnyet mas eq ma seq gyo, nhaiqlom ma thaiq las ngos nyamoq lyis lhoq gis dyei zis ma xauh bas jungh, ge nyang nyamoq dah nyoq lyis jet nhang, nhaiqlom lyis eq than nhang, ge.
43012041	Esaia gas nyah phunk lyis nyvng las nyah cho housoeh taiq zis nghuot.
43012042	Housoeh ge laus eq guon bang yangh nyoshoq moq nyang lyis lomsjingh. Nghuot laus eq Pharishe jens yah nyamoq lyis lyi jungs masyah khat thuq das zis chiq las nyamoq gas nyang lyis ma rhen.
43012043	Khasoeh ge lyis, nyamoq gas Mangso jyank mas dah nyoqnho ngelang yoh das thoq lyis dius jyank mas dah nyoqnho ngelang yoh das zis lyis ngwis.
43012044	Yesu kaiq las taiq zis gas, Ngos lyis lomsjingh soeu ka, ngos lyis loms zis ma nghuot, ngos lyis nhang kat soeu lhyi lomsjingh zis dvnghuot, ge.
43012045	Ngos lyis nyvng soeu ka ngos lyis nhang kat soeu lhyi nyvng zis nghuot.
43012046	Ngos lyis lomsjingh soeu hank laus eq chuot yvmas ma lungh joq bas jungh, oen ngos bvng zis duot las mungkvn mas jweh lyih.
43012047	Ngah dang xauhgyo las ma lomsjingh soeu hank lyis laus eq ngos soetuon das zis ma nghuot: Khasoeh ge lyis ngos haih mungkvn mas jweh lyih zis gas soetuon das xiklyis ma nghuot, khyuot yoeus das xiklyis dvnghuot.
43012048	Ngos lyis peq tyamp las ngah dang ma lhom yoeus soeu lhyi soetuon das zis soetuon soeu nyang nyeis. Ngos taiq dah dang mas nyang, thang thank buisnyeis lyis hauh soeu lhyi soetuon das.
43012049	Ngos gas ngah ehnyet yah taiq zis ma nghuot. Ngos khasoeh jyauh das zis gas ngos lyis nhang kat, ngah Uwus gas ngos lyis tyingtoh dang dyei kat goeus.
43012050	Nyah tyingtoh dang gas vcaiq vto kang nghuot zis ngos seq. Housoeh yvmvyah ngos taiq ya taiq zis gas, ngah Uwus taiq kat khyvlyis taiq, ge.
43013001	Gvshih hau Lhuiq Kat Pwe ma jweh shih lyis Yesu gas, haih mungkvn masyah nyah Uwus jyank mas loh das shishenh jweh goeus zis seq. Haih mungkvn mas nyah dius jens lyis nyang jyetdap zis gas mungkvn goms shoq nghuot.
43013002	Nyenhcon dye zo lyis yius gas Simon dah lo Yudas Iskarot dah ehnyet mas, nyang lyis phanhlyen das joeui dye da las,
43013003	Nyang gas Mangso jyank masyah los las Mangso jyank mas tauh loh das zis yahge, dvnganh zis lyis Uwus yah nyah loq mas kyauh toh yvlyis nyang seq yvmvyah,
43013004	wom zo nyeis masyah Nyang toq loh las, nyah dyi khyuot tyamp lho lha buot misseh dvkoeuq thyikdom mas chih toh.
43013005	Hauh thang lhyi jeislang mas jeis kat yoeus las, changlo jens dah khyei cheih dyei lho lha, nyang chih toh dah misseh yah buot dyei dyei kuot.
43013006	Nyang Simon Petru jyank mas jweh lyis, Petru nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, nvng ngah khyei cheih das lah, ge.
43013007	Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos kuot cho lhyi nvng gvshih ma seq laus eq thang pheh seq das, ge.
43013008	Petru gas, Ngah khyei lhyi nvng khanhamp eq ma yoh cheih das, ge. Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos nvng lyis ma yoh cheih dyei lyis gas nvng ngos yah ma sen, ge.
43013009	Simon Petru nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, ngah khyei kyingh ma nghuot, loq yahge uhloms eq cheih dyei aq, ge.
43013010	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Gungs cheih goeus soeu ka khyei mhayah lai las gohtoeu cha cheih chank ma bos lo: hauh soeu dah gungs gonh gas shang joq goeus, namoq eq shang goeus, nghuot laus eq namoq dvnganhmoq gyingshang zis ma nghuot, ge.
43013011	Khasoeh ge lyis nyang lyis phanhlyen das soeu hank nghuot yvlyis nyang seq toh. Housoeh las, Namoq dvnganh gyingshang zis ma nghuot, ge taiq zis nghuot.
43013012	Housoeh nyamoq dah khyei dye cheih dyei las, nyah dyi yoeus wuot lho lha doms tsung uhlyis yah nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Gvshih namoq lyis ngos kuot cho namoq vseqgyo goh lah?
43013013	Namoq ngos lyis, Svra ge eq, Yhensain ge eq tsain lui. Houyah dvyhangteh ngos nghuot yvmvyah namoq dah dang eq jus.
43013014	Housoeh Svra eq, Yhensain eq nghuot joq las ngos yangh namoq dah khyei cheih dyei lyis gas, namoq eq nyang changh nyang dah khyei gis cheih dyei goh.
43013015	Namoq lyis ngos kuot yhangteh namoq eq chank kuot bas jungh oen, ngos namoq xiklyis yikhyoh toh zis nghuot.
43013016	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, jyeidwis gas yhensain thoq lyis zes zis ma nghuot; mang suh soeu eq jyeinhang kat soeu thoq lyis zes zis ma nghuot.
43013017	Haih cho lhyi namoq seq las, hauh yvlyis chank kuot lyis gas, namoq ngelhoq.
43013018	Namoq dvnganh lyis toeuq las taiq zis ma nghuot: ngos khyen yoeus bang lyis gas ngos seq: nghuot laus eq, Ngos yah wom zo soeu ka nyah thyvthank lvnhaiq yah ngos lyis thoenk, ge lhaihtoh dang nyuk los das xiklyis nghuot.
43013019	Hauh cho bweh los uhlyis ngos hauh soeu nghuot zis gas namoq lomsjingh bas jungh oen, ma bweh shih lyis taiq toh.
43013020	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq zis gas, Ngos nhang kat soeu lhyi lhom yoeus zis gas ngos lyis lhom yoeus zis nghuot. Ngos lyis lhom yoeus soeu eq ngos lyis nhang kat soeu lhyi lhom yoeus zis nghuot, ge.
43013021	Yesu gas housoeh ge dye taiq lyis, nyah dyos mas chiqjyen zis yah, Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, namoq mas dvyuk ngos lyis phanhlyen das ge kanghjyoeng kat nyeis.
43013022	Housoeh las changlo jens gas hank lyis toeuq las taiq zis eq ma seq, khamkhvv lha nyang changh nyang nyei goh nyeis.
43013023	Hauh uhlyis Yesu jyetdap dah changlo dvyuk gas, Yesu dah sainhkhonh mas nges toh las,
43013024	Simon Petru gas, Nyang hank lyis toeuq las taiq nyeis lah? Ngamoq lyis taiq kyoh aq, ge nyang lyis vsoh yah nyei.
43013025	Hauh changlo gas Yesu dah sainhkhonh mas doms lhain nghe lha, Yhensain eh, khayuk nghuot lah, ge nyei.
43013026	Yesu phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos ohlhyoq dvkoeuq jen las dyei soeu nghuot, ge lho lha hau ohlhyoq dvkoeuq jen las Simon dah lo Yudas Iskarot lyis dyei.
43013027	Hauh soeu ka ohlhyoq dvnhuot yoeus zo thang lhyi Satan ka nyah jyank mas wvng. Housoeh las Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng kuot chah muh lvnyap kuot aq, ge.
43013028	Nyang lyis chamus housoeh taiq zis gas kihgus mas bang hank eq ma seq.
43013029	Yesu nyang lyis housoeh taiq zis gas, Yudas gas ngwis zom soeu nghuot las, Yesu gas nyang lyis pwe xiklyis yang chi chah zis e wis aq, nghuot ya nyungs bang lyis dvja ja dyei aq, ge soh bos ge nyamoq dvyhamh nghamh.
43013030	Yudas hauh ohlhyoq dvkoeuq lhom yoeus yah dvyih thuq loh. Hauh shishenh gas nyenhyo nghuot.
43013031	Hauh soeu thuq loh thang lhyi Yesu gas, Gvshih cangsoeu Lo gas chungh zis xauh nyeis las, Mangso eq nyang mas phunk lyis chungh zis xauh goeus.
43013032	Mangso ka, nyang mas phunk lyis chungh zis xauh goeus ya, Mangso eq nyang lyis nyang nyang mas phunk lyis chungh zis xauh las, nyang lyis gvshih nyang chungh dyei das.
43013033	Loshang jens eh, ngos namoq yah dvsoq nyeis shih das: Namoq ngos lyis tsain xo das: ngos loh joqyos mas namoq ma yoh jweh das oen Yuda jens lyis taiq teh, gvshih ngos namoq lyis eq taiq.
43013034	Housoeh namoq dvyuk yah dvyuk jyetdap goh nyeis geh, oen tyingtoh dang saiq ngos namoq lyis dyei toh. Ngos namoq lyis jyetdap zis yah dvyhangteh, namoq eq nyang changh nyang jyetdap goh nyeis das.
43013035	Housoeh namoq dvyuk yah dvyuk jyetdap ehnyet bos nyeis lyis gas, namoq ngah changlo jens nghuot nyeis zis gas, dius dvnganh yoh seq los das, ge.
43013036	Simon Petru nyang lyis taiq, Yhensain eh, nvng khapheh loh lo das lah, ge. Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos loh das joqyos mas nvng gvshih ma yoh chank das, thang pheh dvyoh chank das, ge.
43013037	Tsai, Petru gas, Yhensain eh, ngos nvng yah dvgeh gvshih chamus ma yoh chank das lah? Ngos nah xiklyis ngah kang yoh dyei tyamp, ge.
43013038	Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Nvng ngah xiklyis nah kang yoh dyei das lhyeh? Ngos nvng lyis jyoengh taiq bah, gyoq ma tuon shih lyis nvng ngos lyis somh lhain he tyamp das, ge.
43014001	Namoq ehnyet vnyo goh: Mangso lhyi lomsjingh geh, ngos lyis eq lomsjingh geh.
43014002	Ngah Uwus dah yhen mha joqyos nyoshoq bos: hauh zis ma joq lyis gas, Ma joq oen ngos namoq lyis taiq goeus jvng goeus; khasoeh ge lyis namoq nyhenshang joqyos sont das xiklyis ngos loh das.
43014003	Ngos loh las namoq xiklyis joqyos sont toh las, ngos nyeis jang mas namoq eq yoh nyeis shoq, ngos doms lyih las namoq lyis ngah jyank mas shwih yoeus das.
43014004	Ngos loh dah joqyos mas loh das cho namoq seq, ge.
43014005	Thoma nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, nvng khapheh loh das zis eq ngamoq ma seq zis, cho khasoeh seq das lah, ge.
43014006	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos gas cho eq, jyoeng zis eq, kang eq nghuot. Ngos masyah ma nghuot lyis gas ngah Uwus jyank mas hank eq ma yoh jweh.
43014007	Namoq ngos lyis seq goeus lyis gas, ngah Uwus lyis eq seq goeus. Gvshih masyah namoq, nyang lyis seq goeus, nyvng eq tsain nyvng goeus, ge.
43014008	Philip nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, ngamoq lyis Uwus Chixoeuq aq, housoeh lyis ngamoq nhaiqtap das, ge.
43014009	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yuda eh, ngos namoq yah heinyhank nyangh shoq nyeis los goeus lyis eq nvng ngos lyis ma seq lhyeh? Ngos lyis nyvng ku soeu ka Uwus lyis eq nyvng ku goeus. Housoeh lyis, Ngamoq lyis Uwus Chixoeuq aq, oen khasoeh taiq lah?
43014010	Ngos gas Uwus mas nyeis zis yahge Uwus eq ngos mas nyeis zis lyis nvng ma jingh lhyeh? Ngos namoq lyis taiq dah dang gas ngah ehnyet yah taiq dah dang ma nghuot, ngos mas bos dah ngah Uwus gas, hauh muh lyis nyang kuot nyeis.
43014011	Ngos gas Uwus mas nyeis zis yahge Uwus gas ngos mas nyeis zis lyis lomsjingh nyeis geh, nghuot ya hauh muh masyah khvlangh ngos lyis lomsjingh geh.
43014012	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, ngos lyis lomsjingh soeu ka, ngos kuot dah muh lyis nyang eq yoh kuot das. Hauh thoq lyis zes dah muh eq yoh kuot das: khasoeh ge lyis ngos gas ngah Uwus jyank mas loh das.
43014013	Housoeh Uwus gas Lo mas phunk yoh chungh shoq, ngah nyings yoeus las namoq cha dung lyis ngos kuot dyei das.
43014014	Namoq ngah nyings yoeus las ngah jyank mas dvja ja dung lyis ngos kuot dyei das.
43014015	Namoq ngos lyis jyetdap nghuot lyis gas, ngah tyingtoh dang lyis chank kuot geh.
43014016	Ngos gas Uwus jyank masyah dung das. Uwus gas namoq yah vcaiq vto nyeis das dah gohtoeu Nhaiqtaink Soeu dvyuk namoq lyis dyei das.
43014017	Mungkvn gas hau jyoeng dah Dyos lyis ma nyvng ma seq yvmvyah ma tsain lhom yoeus. Namoq gas nyang lyis seq: khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas namoq yah dvgeh nghuot, namoq mas nyeis das.
43014018	Ngos namoq lyis chauhlo lyis teh she tyamp toh das zis ma nghuot, ngos namoq jyank mas doms lyih das.
43014019	Dvsoq lyis mungkvn gas ngos lyis ma nyvng kat das. Nghuot laus eq namoq gas ngos lyis nyvng shih das: khasoeh ge lyis ngos dwis nyeis yvmvyah namoq eq dwis nyeis das.
43014020	Ngos gas ngah Uwus mas nyeis, namoq eq ngos mas nyeis las, ngos eq namoq mas nyeis zis lyis hauh nyeihyo namoq yoh seq das.
43014021	Ngah tyingtoh dang yoh yoeus las chank kuot soeu ka ngos lyis jyetdap soeu nghuot. Ngos lyis jyetdap soeu lhyi ka ngah Uwus eq jyetdap das. Ngos eq nyang lyis jyetdap zis yah ngvnyang gungs nyang, nyang lyis chixoeuq das, ge.
43014022	Iskarot ma nghuot dah soeu Yuda nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, nah gungs nvnyang ngamoq lyis Chixoeuq las mungkvn lyis ma chixoeuq das zis gas chamus lah, ge.
43014023	Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos lyis jyetdap soeu nghuot lyis gas, ngah dang lyis chank kuot das: ngah Uwus eq hauh soeu lhyi jyetdap das. Ngamoq gas hauh soeu jyank mas e lha nyang yah dvgeh nyeis das.
43014024	Ngos lyis ma jyetdap soeu ka, ngos taiq toh dang ma yoh chank: namoq xauhgyo yoeus dah dang gas ngah dang ma nghuot, ngos lyis nhang kat soeu, ngah Uwus dah dang dvnghuot.
43014025	Ngos namoq yah dvgeh nyeis shih uhlyis ngos namoq lyis haih dang taiq toh.
43014026	Ngah Uwus ngah nyings masyah nhang kat das dah Nhaiqtaink soeu ge dah Gyingshang Dyos gas, namoq lyis dvnganh yah jyauh las, namoq lyis ngos taiq toh dang dvnganh yah soh nhang das.
43014027	Nyenstap cho ngos namoq lyis toh toh dyei. Ngah nyenstap zis ngos namoq lyis dyei goeus: mungkvn mas bang dyei yhangteh ngos namoq lyis dyei zis ma nghuot. Namoq ehnyet vnyo goh, gyuk eq vgyuk goh.
43014028	Ngos loh las namoq jyank mas doms lyih das oen lha, ngos namoq lyis taiq zis gas, namoq xauhgyo goeus. Namoq ngos lyis jyetdap nghuot lyis gas, Uwus jyank mas ngos loh yvmvyah namoq gaus das: khasoeh ge lyis Uwus gas ngah thoq lyis zes kuh.
43014029	Hauh muh bweh thuq los uhlyis namoq yoh lomsjingh bas jungh oen, ma bweh los shih lyis yah ngos namoq lyis taiq toh.
43014030	Gvshih masyah ngos namoq yah dang nyangh shoq ma xauh jis goh lo das: khasoeh ge lyis mungkvn zau gas jweh los nyeis. Hauh soeu ngah thoq mas chah yomsoq eq ma bos.
43014031	Ngos ngah Uwus vmingh dyei zis yah dvyhangteh kuot zis gas, ngos ngah Uwus lyis jyetdap cho mungkvn yoh seq das xiklyis nghuot. Toq geh, hei mhayah loh lo goh, ge.
43015001	Ngos gas jyoeng dah zvbiq nwis nghuot. Ngah Uwus gas khyam sain nghuot.
43015002	Ngos mas vshih ma shih dah vko khanghmuh lyis gas, nyang choeu tyamp. Vshih shih dah vko lhyi ka zes shih bas jungh, ge shang kat.
43015003	Namoq gas, ngos namoq lyis taiq kyoh dah dang gvng mas gvshih yangh shang goeus.
43015004	Ngos mas dap joq geh, ngos eq namoq mas dap joq das. Zvbiq ko ka zvbiq nwis mas ma dap lyis gas nyang kyingh vshih ma yoh shih zis yah dvyhangteh, namoq eq ngos mas ma dap lyis gas vshih ma yoh shih das.
43015005	Ngos gas zvbiq nwis nghuot, namoq gas vko tsain nghuot. Ngos mas dap joq las ngos eq hauh soeu mha dap nghuot lyis gas, hauh soeu ka vshih nyoshoq yoh shih los das: khasoeh ge lyis ngos yah gang lyis namoq cha eq ma yoh kuot das.
43015006	Ngos mas ma dap soeu ka nyhauh loh dah vko lhyi teh doeuh tyamp zis xauh das. Hauh yvlyis dius yah nyi mas khyom kat las ngeh jom tyamp das.
43015007	Namoq ngos mas dap joq las ngah dang eq namoq mas bos joq lyis gas, namoq dung mes zis dung geh, yoh das.
43015008	Namoq vshih nyoshoq shih los yvmvyah, ngah Uwus phunk lyis chungh zis xauh las namoq eq ngah changlo duot los das.
43015009	Uwus gas ngos lyis jyetdap yhangteh ngos eq namoq lyis jyetdap. Ngah jyetdap yvmas nyeis geh.
43015010	Ngos gas ngah Uwus dah tyingtoh dang chank kuot las, nyah jyetdap yvmas nyeis zis yah dvyhangteh, namoq eq ngah tyingtoh dang chank kuot lyis gas, ngah jyetdap yvmas nyeis das.
43015011	Ngah dah gaus ehnyet namoq mas bos joq das zis yahge namoq dah gausyis zis dyingh los das xiklyis, haih dang ngos namoq lyis taiq toh.
43015012	Ngos namoq lyis jyetdap zis yah dvyhangteh namoq nyang changh nyang jyetdap goh nyeis geh. Hauh zis gas ngah tyingtoh dang nghuot.
43015013	Buisnoms xiklyis nyah kang dyei tyamp shoq jyetdap thoq lyis zes kuh dah jyetdap ehnyet gas hank jyank mas eq ma bos.
43015014	Namoq ngah tyingtoh dang chank kuot lyis gas, namoq ngah dah buisnoms jens tsain nghuot.
43015015	Gvshih masyah ngos namoq lyis jyeidwis oen lha ma lui lo das. Khasoeh ge lyis, jyeidwis gas nyah yhensain cha kuot yvlyis ma seq. Nghuot laus eq ngos namoq lyis buisnoms oen lui das: khasoeh ge lyis ngah Uwus jyank masyah ngos xauhgyo zis dvnganh ngos namoq lyis seq nhang goeus.
43015016	Namoq ngos lyis khyen yoeus zis ma nghuot, namoq lyis ngos dvkhyen yoeus. Housoeh namoq lyis toeuq toh zis gas, namoq thuq loh las vshih shih das xiklyis nghuot las, houka namoq dah vshih joq das nyhenshang nghuot. Hank laus eq namoq ngah nyings masyah Uwus jyank mas dung lyis nyang namoq lyis dyei bas jungh.
43015017	Namoq dvyuk yah dvyuk jyetdap goh nyeis bas jungh oen ngos namoq lyis haih dang tying toh.
43015018	Mungkvn namoq lyis hoeng nghuot lyis gas, ngos lyis shih hoeng zis gas seq geh.
43015019	Namoq mungkvn yah sen bang nghuot lyis gas, mungkvn gas vsainnyang yah sen bang lyis jyetdap. Namoq gas mungkvn yah sen bang ma nghuot, haih mungkvn masyah ngos namoq lyis khyen yoeus yvmvyah, mungkvn gas namoq lyis hoeng.
43015020	Jyeidwis gas yhensain thoq lyis zes zis ma nghuot oen, ngos namoq lyis taiq dah dang soh nyeis geh. nyamoq ngos lyis shoeuhshih nghuot lyis gas namoq lyis eq shoeuhshih das. Nyamoq ngah dang lyis chank nghuot lyis gas namoq dah dang lyis eq chank das.
43015021	Nghuot laus eq nyamoq gas ngah nyings gvng mas hauh cho dvnganh namoq lyis kuot das; khasoeh ge lyis ngos lyis nhang kat soeu lhyi nyamoq ma seq.
43015022	Ngos nyamoq lyis ma lyih taiq kyoh ya, nyamoq yobos ma bos das. Nghuot laus eq gvshih gas nyamoq dah yobos lyis jyamp gus ma bos lo.
43015023	Ngos lyis hoeng soeu ka ngah Uwus lyis eq hoeng.
43015024	Gohyuk ma yoh kuot dah muh ngos nyamoq lyis ma kuot nghuot lyis gas nyamoq mas yobos ma bos das. Nghuot laus eq gvshih gas hai kuot dah muh lyis nyamoq nyvng laus eq, nyamoq gas ngos yahge ngah Uwus lyis tsain hoeng.
43015025	Nghuot laus eq houka soe ma bos yvmas nyamoq ngos lyis hoeng, ge nyamoq Lyi mas lhaihtoh dang nyuk los das xiklyis nghuot.
43015026	Ngah Uwus jyank masyah ngos nhang kat das, Nhaiqtaink soeu ge dah jyoeng Dyos gas, Uwus jyank masyah thuq los las namoq jyank mas jweh lyis, nyang gas ngah cho kanghjyoeng kat das.
43015027	Namoq eq cangxeih lyis yah ngos yah dvgeh nyeis goeus yvmvyah, kanghjyoeng yoh kat das.
43016001	Namoq ehnyet ma dyet bas jungh oen, haih goeu ngos namoq lyis taiq.
43016002	Nyamoq gas namoq lyis lyi jungs masyah khat thuq tyamp das: jyoengh nyang namoq lyis yoh sat soeu hank laus eq Mangso lhyi phuqsoe dah muh wons nyeis ge nghamh dah shishenh jweh los das.
43016003	Nyamoq namoq lyis housoeh tsain kuot zis gas, nyamoq gas ngah Uwus lyis eq ma seq, ngos lyis eq ma seq yvmvyah nghuot.
43016004	Nghuot laus eq shishenh jweh lyis ngos namoq lyis taiq toh zis soh bas jungh oen, haih dang ngos namoq lyis taiq. Xikpheh gas ngos namoq yah dvgeh nyeis shih yvmvyah ngos namoq lyis heisoeh ma taiq ku.
43016005	Gvshih gas ngos lyis nhang kat soeu jyank mas ngos loh das: namoq gas dvyuk eq ngos lyis, Nvng khapheh loh das lah, ge ma nyei.
43016006	Nghuot laus eq haih cho ngos namoq lyis taiq kyoh yvmvyah, namoq nhaiqlom mas nhaiqngis zis yah tsain dyingh joq.
43016007	Heisoeh oen laus eq, ngos namoq lyis jyoeng cho dvtaiq. Ngos loh zis gas namoq xiklyis zes gis cho nghuot: khasoeh ge lyis, ngos ma loh lyis gas hau Nhaiqtaink soeu namoq jyank mas jweh los das zis ma nghuot. Ngos loh khau yah, ngos nyang lyis namoq jyank mas dvyoh nhang kat das.
43016008	Hauh soeu jweh lyis, nyang gas, yobos cho, dan cho, soetuon cho, mungkvn lyis dede chixoeuq das.
43016009	Yaunos yoh cho chixoeuq das zis gas, nyamoq ngos lyis ma lomsjingh yvmvyah nghuot.
43016010	Dan cho chixoeuq das zis gas, ngos ngah Uwus jyank mas loh las namoq ngos lyis ma nyvng lo yvmvyah nghuot.
43016011	Soetuon cho chixoeuq das zis gas, haih mungkvn zau lyis soetuon goeus yvmvyah nghuot.
43016012	Ngos namoq lyis taiq khoq das cho nyoshoq bos shih, nghuot laus eq gvshih namoq ma thoq kham yoeus shih.
43016013	Nghuot laus eq hai jyoeng dah Dyos jweh lyih lyis, nyang gas jyoeng cho dvnganh namoq lyis cho she das. Hauh soeu ka nyah ehnyet yah taiq zis ma nghuot, nghuot laus eq xauhgyo yoeus nyhoq taiq kyoh das. Bweh los das zis lyis nyang namoq lyis chixoeuq das.
43016014	Nyang ngos lyis chungh das: khasoeh ge lyis, nyang gas ngah jyank masyah lhom yoeus zis lyis namoq lyis taiq kyoh das.
43016015	Ngah Uwus yoh ya yoh zis gas ngos yoh zis nghuot. Housoeh las nyang ngah jyank masyah yoeus las namoq lyis taiq kyoh das, oen ngos taiq goeus.
43016016	Dvsoq lho lhyi namoq ngos lyis ma nyvng lo das, dvsoq lho lhyi doms nyvng das: khasoeh ge lyis ngos Uwus jyank mas loh das.
43016017	Housoeh nyah changlo jens dvyhamh nyang changh nyang taiq goh zis gas, Dvsoq lho lhyi namoq ngos lyis ma tsain nyvng lo das, dvsoq lho lhyi doms nyvng das ge eq, Uwus jyank pheh ngos loh das ge las eq, nyang yang lyis taiq zis gas cha ge dah dang nghuot au lhyeh, ge.
43016018	Tsai, nyamoq gas, Dvsoq lho lhyi ge taiq zis eq, cha ge dah dang nghuot au lhyeh? Nyang taiq dang lyis yang ma seqgyo, ge.
43016019	Nyang lyis tsain nyei mes yvlyis Yesu seq las nyang gas, Dvsoq lho lhyi namoq ngos lyis ma nyvng lo das, dvsoq lho lhyi doms nyvng das, oen ngos namoq lyis taiq dang lyis namoq nyang changh nyang tsain nyei goh nyeis goh lhyeh?
43016020	Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, namoq gas ngausdyeis ngausnhvp yah kuk nyeis uhlyis mungkvn gas gaus nyeis das. Namoq nhaiqkuk nhaiqngis zis xauh laus eq, namoq dah kuk cho ka gaus yvpheh lhain los das.
43016021	Vmesbih gas lo khoeu das lyis nyah shishenh jweh las nos nyeis; nghuot laus eq lo dye khoeu thang lhyi, haih mungkvn mas dius lo dvyuk khoeu toh goeus yvmvyah, gaus las xik lyis dah nos zis, chiqjyen zis tohnyhik tyamp.
43016022	Houyah dvyhangteh namoq gvshih nhaiq tsain kuk nyeis. Nghuot laus eq namoq yah ngos doms xauhgoh las, namoq gausyis das. Hau namoq dah gausyis zis lyis hank yoh lhuot yoeus das zis ma nghuot.
43016023	Hauh buisnyeis lyis namoq ngos lyis cha eq ma nyei chah lo das. Ngos namoq lyis jyoengh taiq bah, ngah nyings masyah Uwus jyank mas dvja ja dung lyis, nyang namoq lyis dyei das.
43016024	Gvshih jweh shoq namoq ngah nyings yoeus las cha eq ma dung yoeuh ku shih. Namoq dah gausyis cho dyingh nyuk los shoq yoh bas jungh, dung nyeis geh.
43016025	Haih cho ngos namoq lyis dangtoeuq yah taiq kyoh ku goeus: Dangtoeuq yah ma nghuot nghuot, Uwus dah cho namoq lyis bvng bvng taiq kyoh das shishenh gas jweh los goeus:
43016026	Hauh buisnyeis lyis namoq ngah nyings yoeus las tsain dung das. Namoq dah xiklyis ngos ngah Uwus jyank mas dung das oen lha ma taiq.
43016027	Khasoeh ge lyis, namoq ngos lyis jyetdap las ngos gas Uwus jyank masyah los yvlyis namoq lomsjingh yvmvyah Uwus nyang namoq lyis jyetdap.
43016028	Ngos gas Uwus jyank masyah mungkvn mas jweh los goeus: Tsai, mungkvn lyis tyamp las Uwus jyank mas loh das, ge.
43016029	Nyah changlo jens nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, gvshih gas dangtoeuq yah ma nghuot, nvng bvng bvng taiq goeus:
43016030	Nvng dvnganh zis seq nyeis zis eq, hank eq nvng lyis cha ma nyei chah zis eq, gvshih ngamoq seq goeus. Housoeh las nvng Mangso jyank masyah jweh lyih zis lyis ngamoq jingh goeus, ge.
43016031	Yesu phuk taiq zis gas, Namoq gvshih jingh goeus lah?
43016032	Yoeuh aq, namoq nyang yuk nyang toeu yhen pheh dyos loh das las, ngos lyis kyingh toh khoq das dah shishenh jweh los das. Gvshih nyang jweh joq goeus, nghuot laus eq ngos gas ngvnyang kyingh ma nghuot, Uwus gas ngos yah dvgeh nghuot.
43016033	Namoq ngos mas nyenstap zis yoh yoeus bas jungh oen, haih dang ngos namoq lyis taiq. Namoq gas mungkvn mas shanghsenh zis tsain xauh das, nghuot laus eq gaus nyeis geh. Ngos gas mungkvn lyis ung tyamp goeus, ge.
43017001	Yesu hauh dang dye taiq lyis, maukhung mha nghank yoeuh las taiq zis gas, Uwus eh, shishenh jweh goeus.
43017002	Nvng Lo lyis dyei toh zis dvnganh lyis vcaiq vto kang dyei das xiklyis suihshoh bos bang dvnganh thoq mas guon das vmingh dyei toh zis yah dvyhangteh, nah Lo gas nah phunk lyis chungh bas jungh, nah Lo dah phunk lyis chungh dyei aq.
43017003	Dvyuk kyingh nghuot las jyoeng dah Mangso nvng lyis eq, nvng nhang kat dah Yesu Khristu lyis eq, nyamoq yoh seq yoeus zis gas, vcaiq vto kang nghuot.
43017004	Ngos wons wuq das xiklyis nvng ngos lyis kyauh toh dah muhzoh lyis ngos dye wons wuq goeus yvmvyah, nyeisjvng thoq mas nah phunk lyis chungh dyei goeus.
43017005	Uwus eh, mungkvn ma joq shih lyis, nvng yah dvgeh ngos yoh joq dah phunk yah gvshih ngos lyis phunk chungh dyei aq.
43017006	Mungkvn mas nvng ngos lyis kyauh toh dah dius jens lyis ngos nah nyings chixoeuq goeus. Nyamoq gas nah dius jens nghuot las, nvng ngos lyis nyamoq dyei toh. Nyamoq nah dang tsain chank kuot goeus.
43017007	Nvng ngos lyis dyei ya dyei zis dvnganh nah jyank masyah nghuot zis gas gvshih nyamoq seq goeus.
43017008	Khasoeh ge lyis nvng ngos lyis dyei kat dang, ngos nyamoq lyis dyei goeus las, nyamoq eq hauh yvlyis lhom yoeus goeus yvmvyah, nah jyank masyah ngos lyih zis nyamoq vlhomuh seq las, nvng ngos lyis nhang kat zis lyis eq lomsjingh goeus.
43017009	Ngos nyamoq dah xiklyis dung: mungkvn xiklyis dung zis ma nghuot; nvng ngos lyis dyei bang xiklyis dvdung. Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas nah dius tsain nghuot.
43017010	Ngos yoh ya yoh zis gas nah zis nghuot; nvng yoh ya yoh zis eq ngah zis nghuot las, ngah phunk gas nyamoq mas chungh zis xauh goeus.
43017011	Gvshih masyah ngos gas mungkvn mas ma nyeis lo: nghuot laus eq haih moq gas mungkvn mas nyeis nyeis das bang nghuot, ngos gas nah jyank mas los das zis nghuot. Gyingshang dah Uwus eh, yamoq gas dvkoeuq kyingh dvnghuot teh, haih bang nghuot nyeis bas jungh. Nvng ngos lyis dyei bang lyis nah nyings mas goeng toenk nhang toh aq.
43017012	Haih mungkvn mas ngos nyamoq yah dvgeh nyeis uhlyis, nvng ngos lyis dyei bang mas nah nyings goeng toenk nhang lha, nyamoq lyis gomh kat goeus. Nyamoq mas dyoqbis soeu dah lo masyah lai las gohyuk gas dvyuk eq ma dyoq ma bis loh zis nghuot. Hauh soeu dyoqbis loh zis gas lhaihtoh dang nyuk los das xiklyis nghuot.
43017013	Gvshih gas ngos nah jyank mas los das las, ngah gausyis zis gas nyamoq mas nyuk los bas jungh oen lha, mungkvn mas ngos haih dang taiq toh.
43017014	Nah dang ngos nyamoq lyis dyei toh goeus: ngos gas mungkvn mas zis ma nghuot zis yah dvyhangteh, hauh moq eq mungkvn mas zis ma nghuot yvmvyah mungkvn gas nyamoq lyis hoeng.
43017015	Haih bang lyis mungkvn masyah tyungh yoeus das xiklyis ngos dung nyeis zis ma nghuot, ma gis ma shop yvmvyah gomh das xiklyis ngos dvdung.
43017016	Ngos gas mungkvn mas zis ma nghuot zis yah dvyhangteh, nyamoq eq mungkvn mas zis ma tsain nghuot.
43017017	Nah dang gas jyoeng zis nghuot, nah dah jyoeng cho mha nyamoq lyis gyingshang nhang aq.
43017018	Nvng ngos lyis mungkvn mas nhang kat yhangteh ngos eq nyamoq lyis mungkvn mas tsain nhang kat.
43017019	Nyamoq nyang jyoeng cho mha gyingshang nyeis bas jungh oen lha, ngos gas nyamoq xiklyis ngvnyang gungs ngvnyang gyingshang nhang toh goeus.
43017020	Haih bang xiklyis kyingh ngos dung zis ma nghuot: nyamoq taiq kyoh dah dang gvng masyah ngos lyis lomsjingh los das bang xiklyis eq ngos dung.
43017021	Uwus eh, nvng gas ngos mas nghuot las, ngos eq nvng mas nghuot zis yah dvyhangteh hauh bang dvnganhmoq gas yamoq mas dvkoeuq kyingh duot las, nvng ngos lyis nhang kat cho lhyi haih mungkvn yoh lomsjingh das xiklyis nyamoq dvnganhmoq gas dvkoeuq kyingh duot los bas jungh.
43017022	Yang gas dvkoeuq kyingh dvnghuot teh nyamoq eq dvkoeuq kyingh bweh las, nvng ngos lyis dyei toh dah nyoqnho ngelang gas ngos nyamoq lyis dyei toh.
43017023	Ngos gas nyamoq mas nghuot las, nvng gas ngos mas nghuot yhangteh, nyamoq lyis eq dvkoeuq kyingh mas goeng toenk zis xauh las, nvng ngos lyis jyetdap teh nyamoq lyis eq jyetdap las, nvng ngos lyis nhang kat zis haih mungkvn yoh seq bas jungh.
43017024	Uwus eh, mungkvn ma joq shih lyis yah nvng ngos lyis jyetdap nyeis yvmvyah, nvng ngos lyis dyei toh phunk lyis, nvng ngos lyis dyei toh bang eq yoh nyvng bas jungh. Ngos nyeis joqyos mas nyamoq ngos yah dvgeh yoh nyeis das xiklyis ngos o mes.
43017025	Dan dah Uwus eh, mungkvn gas nvng lyis ma seq laus eq, ngos gas seq nyeis. Nvng ngos lyis nhang kat zis gas haih bang eq seq.
43017026	Nvng ngos lyis jyetdap ehnyet gas, nyamoq jyank mas joq joq bas jungh, oen eq, ngos nyamoq jyank mas vjangh nyeis nyeis das xiklyis eq, nah nyings ngos nyamoq lyis seq nhang goeus las, seq nhang nyeis das, ge.
43018001	Yesu hauh dang dye taiq lyis, nyah changlo jens yah dvgeh thuq las, Kidron lvng thyitvp pheh tsain goeu e. Hauh yvmas khyam bos las, nyang gas changlo jens yah houmha wvng loh.
43018002	Yesu gas nyah changlo jens yah dvgeh houmha nyoshoq lhain e ku lha, nyang lyis phanhlyen dah Yudas eq hauh joqyos lyis seq toh.
43018003	Housoeh las Yudas gas jes dvphung yah, phudyei bang yahge Pharishe moq jyank masyah jeszau jens lyis xauh shwih lho lhyi, nyibung, nyiduk, jeszis chi lha hou pheh tsain e loh.
43018004	Yesu gas nyang mas bweh los nyeis dah cho dvnganh seq yvmvyah, e lha nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq hank lyis xo goh lah, ge.
43018005	Nyamoq, nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Nazaret Yesu lyis xo, ge. Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos gas hauh soeu nghuot, ge. Nyang lyis phanhlyen dah Yudas eq hauh bang yah dvgeh yap joq.
43018006	Nyang nyamoq lyis, Ngos hauh soeu nghuot goeus ge las taiq yah dvyih hauh bang gas nungsjik jik las nyeisjvng mas lains loh.
43018007	Nyang gas, Hank lyis xo goh lah, ge nyamoq lyis doms nyei. Nyamoq gas, Nazaret Yesu lyis xo, ge doms tsain taiq.
43018008	Yesu phuk taiq, Ngos hauh soeu nghuot goeus oen ngos namoq lyis taiq goeus: ngos lyis xo nghuot lyis gas, haih bang gas loh lo bas jungh, ge.
43018009	Hauh zis gas, Nvng ngos lyis dyei goeus yvmas, dvyuk lyis eq ma dyuk nhang, ge taiq dah dang nyuk los das xiklyis nghuot.
43018010	Simon Petru gas moengsa wons toh las, moengsa she lha Phudyei Zainsmuh jyeidwis dah loqyos no lyis zan thyet khyoq kat. Hauh jyeidwis dah nyings gas Malkho, ge.
43018011	Yesu Petru lyis taiq zis gas, Nah moengsa lhyi dyvng mas cank toh aq: ngah Uwus ngos lyis dyei toh kom lhyi ngos ma shuk das lhyeh, ge.
43018012	Hauh uhlyis jeslo jens, jeszau phoq yahge Yuda jens dah vgyis moq gas Yesu lyis nyhik las twih she loh.
43018013	Housoeh hauh zvnyo Phudyei Zainsmuh bweh los dah Anna jyank mas cangxeih shwih loh. Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas Kayapa dah yukphoq nghuot.
43018014	Hau Kayapa ka, Vnyau xiklyis dius dvyuk shei lhyi zes gis, ge Yuda jens lyis joeui dyei soeu nghuot.
43018015	Simon Petru yahge gohtoeu changlo dvyuk gas, Yesu thang mha chank loh. Hau gohtoeu changlo lyis Phudyei Zainsmuh seq las, Yesu yah dvgeh Phudyei Zainsmuh dah ganthoq mas wvng loh.
43018016	Petru gas nghe shot pheh khomhdwang mas yap joq khoq. Housoeh las Phudyei Zainsmuh yah seq goh dah changlo gas thuq loh las, khomh zungh vmesbih lyis taiq lho lha Petru lyis shwih hwank kat.
43018017	Khomh zungh vmesbih gas Petru lyis, Nvng eq hauh soeu dah changlo mas zis dvyuk nghuot lhyeh, ge. Petru gas, Ma nghuot, ge toeuh.
43018018	Hauh uhlyis ngamh las vgyis moq dah jyeidwis jens gas nyi khat las nyi tsain gvng yap joq. Petru eq hauh bang yah dvgeh yap las nyi bos gvng nyeis.
43018019	Phudyei Zainsmuh gas Yesu lyis nyah changlo dah cho yahge nyang jyauh cho nyei yoeuh.
43018020	Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Mungkvn mas ngos debangh taiq goeus. Yuda jens huom dah lyi jungs mas eq, yhenmuh mas eq ngos vjangh jyauh goeus: ngos vkhauh vguis cha eq ma jyauh.
43018021	Nvng ngos lyis chamus nyei? Ngos khasoeh jyauh zis gas xauhgyo bang lyis nyei yoeuh aq, ngos taiq dang lyis nyamoq seq, ge.
43018022	Housoeh ge taiq lho lhyi, vyvm mas yap joq dah vgyis dvyuk gas Yesu lyis tyuk las, Phudyei Zainsmuh iq yvlyis nvng housoeh toeuh das lhyeh, ge.
43018023	Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos taiq dang ma gis lyis gas ma gis oen kanghjyoeng kat aq. Ngos dang gis dvtaiq lyis, ngos lyis chamus tyuk, ge.
43018024	Housoeh las Anna gas, Nyang lyis Phudyei Zainsmuh Kayapa jyank mas she kat nhang.
43018025	Simon Petru gas nyi gvng yap joq. Hauh uhlyis nyamoq gas, Nvng eq nyah changlo jens mas zis dvyuk vnghuot lah, ge nyang lyis nyei. Nghuot laus eq Petru gas, Ngos ma nghuot, ge he.
43018026	Petru no hwe thyet dyei soeu yah vmang vnoeuh doeusgoh soeu Phudyei Zainsmuh dah jyeidwis dvyuk eq nyang lyis, Khyam mha ngos nvng lyis hauh soeu yah dvgeh nyvng khoq ma nghuot lhyeh, ge nyei.
43018027	Housoeh las Petru doms he nyeis lyis houjang gyoq tuon los.
43018028	Tsai, nyamoq gas Yesu lyis Kayapa jyank masyah Pretori soetuon yvpmuh pheh e shwih kat. Hauh shishenh gas nvpsangh noq yah nghuot. Nyamoq gas hau Lhuiq Kat Pwe zo das zis nghuot yvmvyah, nyamoq dah gungs vwot v-oeu ma bweh das xiklyis nyamoq nyang gas hauh yvpmuh mas ma wvng.
43018029	Housoeh las Pilat gas, nyamoq nyeis yvmas thuq loh las, Namoq haih soeu lhyi kauq zis cha nghuot goh lah, ge nyei.
43018030	Nyamoq, nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Haih soeu ma gis dah muh kuot soeu ma nghuot lyis gas ngamoq nah jyank mas shwih lyih das zis ma nghuot, ge.
43018031	Pilat nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq, nyang lyis shwih yoeus las namoq dah lyi yah dvyhangteh soetuon geh, ge. Yuda jens nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngamoq gas hank lyis sat das dah lyi ma bos, ge.
43018032	Nyamoq housoeh ge zis gas, Yesu nyang khasoeh teh dah cho yah xauh shei kham das, ge dah vlho chixoeuq las taiq toh dang nyuk los das xiklyis nghuot.
43018033	Housoeh las Pilat gas Pretori soetuon yvpmuh khau mha doms wvng loh las Yesu lyis khi yoeus, nyei zis gas, Nvng Yuda hwankti nghuot lhyeh, ge.
43018034	Yesu nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Hauh zis gas nvnyang nyei lah? Gohyuk yah ngah cho nvng lyis taiq kyoh lah, ge.
43018035	Pilat phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos Yuda dius nghuot lhyeh? Nah dius jens yahge phudyei uhjyung jens gas nvng lyis ngah jyank mas lyih kyauh toh. Nvng cha zangh kuot lah, ge.
43018036	Yesu phuk taiq zis gas, Ngah munghdan haih mungkvn mas zis ma nghuot. Ngah munghdan haih mungkvn mas zis nghuot lyis gas, ngos Yuda dius loq mas ma wvng shoq ngah changlo jens zau das: gvshih gas ngah munghdan heimha ma nghuot, ge.
43018037	Housoeh las Pilat nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Housoeh lyis nvng hwankti nghuot lhyeh, ge nyei. Yesu gas, Nvng taiq zis yah dvyhangteh ngos hwankti nyang nghuot. Housoeh jyoeng shot pheh kanghjyoeng kat das xiklyis ngos khoeu los, mungkvn mas jweh los. Jyoeng cho yah sen bang dvnganh gas ngah thwe tsain gyo, ge.
43018038	Pilat nyang lyis taiq zis gas, jyoeng ge zis cha nghuot lah, ge. Housoeh Yuda jens jyank pheh doms thuq loh las, ngos haih soeu mha cha yobos eq ma nyvng.
43018039	Nghuot laus eq Lhuiq Kat Pwe mha namoq lyis ngos dius dvyuk lyis lhuiq kat dyei dah thungh namoq mas joq zis yah dvyhangteh, Yuda hwankti lhyi vlhuiq kat dyei nhang mes lah, ge.
43018040	Nyamoq kaiq sang zis gas, Hauh soeu lhyi ma nghuot, Baraba lyis lhuiq kat dyei aq, ge. Baraba gas khyanktau nghuot.
43019001	Hauh thang lhyi Pilat gas Yesu lyis lang she lha lyuk.
43019002	Jeslo jens eq zoeu buismuk kuot las nyah uhloms mas tsungh dyei, dyi nesnoq eq nyang lyis gvm huot las,
43019003	Yuda hwankti dvyangh lhyeh, ge nyang lyis tsain tyuk.
43019004	Pilat gas ganthoq pheh doms thuq las nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, ngos haih soeu mha chah yobos eq ma nyvng zis seq bas jungh oen, nyang lyis ngos namoq jyank mas shwih thuq xoeuq, ge.
43019005	Yesu gas zoeu buismuk tsungh, dyi nesnoq wuot zis thuq los. Pilat nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Haih soeu lhyi yoeuh geh, ge.
43019006	Housoeh las phudyei uhjyung jens yahge zau jens gas, Nyang lyis tapzains mas taplhangh toh aq, ge tsain kaiq. Hauh uhlyis Pilat gas, Namoq nyang, nyang lyis yoeus las taplhangh toh geh, ngos gas nyang mas chah yobos eq ma nyvng, ge.
43019007	Yuda jens nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngamoq eq lyi yoh, lyi yah sen lha nyang gas shei chah: chamus ge lyis nyang gas, nyang gungs nyang Mangso dah Lo tsuk zo, ge.
43019008	Pilat hauh dang xauhgyo lyis zes gyuk nyeis yvmvyah,
43019009	Pretori soetuon yvpmuh khau mha doms wvng lho lha, Yesu lyis, Nvng khalhye zis nghuot, ge nyei lyis, Yesu gas dang dvkhonh eq ma phuk taiq.
43019010	Housoeh las Pilat nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng ngos yah dang ma jis lhyeh? Ngos nvng lyis lhuiq kat das vmingh yahge tapzains mas taplhangh toh das vmingh yoh zis lyis nvng ma seq lhyeh, ge.
43019011	Yesu phuk taiq zis gas, Nvng lyis nyhang mhayah dyei toh dah vmingh za ma nghuot lyis gas, nvng ngah thoq mas vmingh cha eq ma yoh: housoeh yvmvyah, ngos lyis nah jyank mas lyih kyauh tyamp soeu ka yobos zes las kuh, ge.
43019012	Housoeh las Pilat gas Yesu lyis lhuiq kat das cho xo nyeis. Nghuot laus eq Yuda jens tsain kaiq zis gas, Nvng hauh soeu lhyi lhuiq kat lyis gas, nvng hwankti Kesar dah buisnoms ma nghuot lo: vsainnyang gungs lyis vsainnyang hwankti tsuk zo soeu ka, hwankti Kesar dah gomloeus nghuot, ge.
43019013	Pilat hauh dang xauhgyo lyis, nyang Yesu lyis shwih thuq loh las, Hebre pheh yah Gabatha ge dah luklhyoq nyhoeuh joqyos soetuon tank mas e tsung toh.
43019014	Gvshih Lhuiq Kat Pwe dah xiklyis sont dah buisnyeis nghuot las nyeihgungs nghuot. Hauh uhlyis nyang Yuda jens lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq dah hwankti lhyi yoeuh geh, ge.
43019015	Nyamoq gas kaiq las, Shung tyamp geh, shung tyamp geh, tapzains mas lhangh tyamp geh, ge. Pilat nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq dah Hwankti lhyi ngos tapzains mas taplhangh toh das lah, ge. Phudyei uhjyung jens phuk taiq zis gas, Kesar masyah lai las ngamoq hwankti ma yoh, ge.
43019016	Housoeh las nyang lyis tapzains mas taplhangh tyamp das xiklyis, nyang lyis nyamoq loq mas kyauh tyamp. Nyamoq gas Yesu lyis shwih yoeus loh.
43019017	Nyang gas nyah tapzains lyis nyang wuq las Uhkhangh ge dah joqyos pheh e loh. Hauh joqyos lyis Hebre pheh yah Golgotha, ge.
43019018	nyamoq gas houmha nyang lyis tapzains mas taplhangh toh. Nyang yah dvgeh khyanktau aiq yuk eq dvshot dvyuk lhangh toh las, Yesu gas hauh aiq yuk dah vjo mas nghuot.
43019019	Pilat eq maussauh lhaih las tapzains mas tap toh. Hau lhaih zis gas, YUDA HWANKTI NAZARET YESU ge zis nghuot.
43019020	Yesu lyis taplhangh toh dah joqyos gas wugungs yah ni joq las, Yuda dius nyoshoq moq hau Hebre, Heleni yahge Latin nyingh pheh yah lhaih toh maussauh lyis tsain nghap.
43019021	Housoeh las Yuda jens dah phudyei uhjyung jens Pilat lyis taiq zis gas, Yuda Hwankti oen vlhaih, Ngos gas Yuda Hwankti nghuot ge nyang taiq, oen dvlhaih aq, ge.
43019022	Pilat phuk taiq zis gas, Ngos lhaih toh khyvlyis lhaih toh goeus, ge.
43019023	Jeslo jens gas Yesu lyis tapzains mas dye lhangh thang lhyi, nyah dyi lyis yoeus las, nyei khyamh khyoq lho lha dvyuk dvkhyamh tsain yoeus loh. Khau dyi lyis eq housoeh kuot bah ge laus eq, hauh khau dyi gas dyijang ma bos dung gonh yoq toh zis nghuot.
43019024	Housoeh las nyamoq gas, Haih dyi lyis yamoq ma lang chuiq chuiq, hank yoeus vvng zis doeusgoh goh, ge nyang changh nyang tsain taiq. Jeslo jens housoeh kuot zis gas, Nyamoq ngah dyi lyis nyang changh nyang gvm goh las, Ngah khau dyi lyis eq tsain doeusgoh, ge dah lhaihtoh dang nyuk los das xiklyis nghuot.
43019025	Gvshih Yesu dah tapzains nvm mas nyah ungwes yahge nyah ungwes dah vnoeuh, Kalopa yhensain nyhiq Mari yahge Magdala Mari moq yap joq.
43019026	Housoeh Yesu gas, nyah ungwes yahge nyah jyetdap changlo vyvm mas tsain yap joq yvlyis nyvng las, nyah ungwes lyis, Vmesbih eh, nah lo lyis yoeuh aq, ge.
43019027	Hauh changlo lyis eq, Nah ungwes lyis yoeuh aq, ge taiq. Hauh shishenh masyah hauh changlo gas nyang lyis nyah yhen mha shwih nyhei toh.
43019028	Hauh thang lhyi Yesu gas muh dvnganh dye goeus zis lyis seq las, lhaihtoh dang nyuk los das xiklyis, Ngos jeis shet, ge taiq.
43019029	Hauh yvmas jeis jyen dyingh shoq dah yam dvlom tsung toh. Housoeh las nyamoq gas khotlhyop mas jeis taiq lho lha, jvmbu lyang thyoh mas tap las nyah nhuot mas yhuonh dyei.
43019030	Yesu hauh jeis jyen lhom shuk lho lha, Dye goeus, ge. Hauh thang lhyi nyang nyah uhloms nghuiq las kang gyoh.
43019031	Hauh buisnyeis gas sont nyeih nghuot las, nungs nyeih eq Yuda No Buisnyeis zainsmuh nghuot yvmvyah, no nyeih lyis tapzains mas mvng ma dap joq bas jungh, Yuda jens gas hauh bang dah khyei lhyi tsain khyauh las hauh mvng lyis tsain yoeus tyamp das zis Pilat jyank mas vmingh tsain sang.
43019032	Housoeh jeslo jens los las, nyang yah dvgeh lhangh toh dah vzomh dah khyei tsain khyauh dyei.
43019033	Nghuot laus eq Yesu jyank mas jweh lyis, nyang shei goeus yvlyis nyamoq nyvng las, nyah khyei lhyi ka ma khyauh dyei.
43019034	Nghuot laus eq jeslo dvyuk gas, nyah nvmjaus lyis lham yah thauh phank dyei las, hauh uhlyis suih yahge jeis thuq los.
43019035	Hauh zis nyvng soeu ka kanghjyoeng kat las, nyah kanghjyoeng ka jus: namoq eq yoh lomsjingh bas jungh, jyoeng dang nyang taiq nyeis zis gas nyang nyang seq.
43019036	Khasoeh ge lyis, haih cho bweh zis gas, Nyah shohyau dvkoeuq eq gyau das zis ma nghuot, ge dah lhaihtoh dang nyuk los das xiklyis nghuot.
43019037	Tsai lhaihtoh dang dvkoeuq mas, Nyamoq thauh phank soeu lhyi nyamoq nyvng das, ge.
43019038	Hauh thang lhyi Yuda jens lyis gyuk yvmvyah, Tsoek yah Yesu dah changlo gauh kuot soeu, Arimathia wukhau mha dah Yosep ge soeu ka, Yesu dah mvng khyoq yoeus das zis Pilat jyank mas sang. Pilat eq yoeus nhang lha, nyang e lha hauh mvng lyis khyoq yoeus.
43019039	Xik pheh nyenh lyis nyah jyank lyih dah Nikodimu eq Mura yah xangh coeu lhoeuq zis dvxo paung ko chi los.
43019040	Nyah aiq yuk gas Yesu dah gungs lyis yoeus las, Yuda jens dah mvng baih thungh yah dvyhangteh, xangh coeu yah dvgeh jeimuh mis yah tsain lyet.
43019041	Nyang lyis taplhangh dah joqyos mas khyam dvkoeuq joq. Houmha dius hank eq ma nyhop ku shih dah lop saiq dvkoeuq joq.
43019042	Yuda jens dah sont buisnyeis nghuot zis yahge, lop hauh zis eq ni joq las, nyah aiq yuk gas Yesu lyis houmha kat toh.
43020001	Dvdaus dah cangxeih vnyeih, nvpsangh nyoq ma nyvng shih lyis Magdala Mari gas, lop pheh e loh las lop mas dah lukzains ywi joq yvlyis nyvng.
43020002	Housoeh las nyang gas Simon Petru yahge Yesu jyetdap dah changlo jens jyank mas wuih loh las nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain lhyi lop masyah nyamoq yoeus las khalhye toh tyamp zis eq ngamoq ma seq, ge.
43020003	Housoeh las Petru yahge gohtoeu changlo gas lop pheh tsain e.
43020004	Nyah aiq yuk dvgeh tsain wuih loh lyis hau gohtoeu changlo gas Petru lyis wuih lhyweq las nyang shih lop mas jweh e.
43020005	Nyang gop yoeuh lyis misseh joq zis lyis dvnyvng. Nghuot laus eq nyang gas vkhau mha ma wvng e.
43020006	Simon Petru eq nyah thang mha chank loh las houmha jweh lyis, vkhau pheh wvng yoeuh laus eq, joq dah misseh lyis kyingh dvnyvng.
43020007	Jeimuh mis joq zis eq, uhloms mas dah shoeuhkyenh gas misseh yah dvgeh ma nghuot nghuot, gohtoeu nap toh zis eq nyang nyvng.
43020008	Housoeh las lop mas cangxeih jweh e dah hau gohtoeu changlo eq chank wvng loh las, nyvng vgus jingh.
43020009	Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas shei masyah dwis toq das, ge lhaihtoh dang lyis nyah aiq yuk ma seq shih.
43020010	Housoeh las hauh changlo aiq yuk gas yhen pheh doms tsain loh.
43020011	Mari gas hau lop nghe mha ngaus yap joq. Housoeh ngaus zoh lyis yah gop las lop khau mha doms yoeuh yoeuh kuot.
43020012	Hauh uhlyis bang bang thyoeu dyi wuot dah loeuswons aiq yuk gas Yesu gungs toh dah uhloms shot pheh dvyuk, khyei thang shot pheh dvyuk tsung toh zis lyis nyvng.
43020013	Hauh aiq yuk nyang lyis taiq, Nyelo eh, nvng chamus ngaus nyeis lah, ge. Nyang taiq, Ngah Yhensain lhyi yoeus loh las khalhye toh toh zis ma seq las nghuot, ge.
43020014	Housoeh ge nyang nungsthank pheh lhain yoeuh kat lyis, Yesu yap joq zis lyis nyvng. Nghuot laus eq hauh zis Yesu nghuot yvlyis ma seq.
43020015	Yesu nyang lyis taiq, Vmesbih eh, chamus ngaus nyeis? Nvng hank lyis xo, ge. Nyang gas hauh soeu lhyi khyam kuot soeu jyo lha nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, nvng nyang lyis dvng tyamp nghuot lyis gas, khamha toh zis ngos lyis jenh taiq kyoh aq, ngos yoeus loh das, ge.
43020016	Hauh uhlyis Yesu gas, Mari eh, ge lui. Nyang eq nyah jyank pheh lhain los las, Hebre nyingh pheh yah Raboni, ge. (Houka, Svra ge zis nghuot.)
43020017	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos lyis vtanh, khasoeh ge lyis ngos Uwus jyank mas ma doq loh shih nghuot laus eq ngah vnoeuh moq jyank mas loh las, Ngos gas ngah Uwus yahge namoq dah Uwus, ngah Mangso yahge namoq dah Mangso jyank pheh doq loh lo das ge oen, nyamoq lyis taiq kyoh aq, ge.
43020018	Magdala Mari eq loh las, Yhensain lhyi nyang nyvng goeus cho yahge, nyang gas nyang lyis housoeh taiq kat dah cho changlo jens lyis taiq kyoh.
43020019	Housoeh las dvdaus dah cangxeih vnyeih nyenhthang mau shomp shomp chuot los lyis, Yuda jens lyis gyuk yvmvyah, changlo jens nyeis dah yhen mha khomh nyheih tyamp thang lhyi, Yesu nyamoq dah vgungs mas jweh yap las taiq zis gas, Namoq nyenstap nyeis bas jungh, ge.
43020020	Housoeh dye taiq lyis nyang nyamoq lyis nyah loq yahge nyah nvmjaus chixoeuq. Changlo jens eq Yhensain lhyi nyvng las gaus.
43020021	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq nyenstap nyeis bas jungh, Ngah Uwus ngos lyis nhang kat teh ngos eq namoq lyis nhang kat, ge.
43020022	Housoeh taiq lho lha, changlo jens thoq mas soq kat dyei las taiq zis gas, Gyingshang Dyos lhom yoeus geh:
43020023	Hank yobos lyis laus eq namoq khyuot tyamp dyei lyis gas gyuot das; hank yobos lyis eq namoq huon toh lyis gas, bos joq das, ge.
43020024	Housoeh Yesu jweh uhlyis changlo dvci aiq yuk mas bos dah Didimu ge soeu Thoma gas nyamoq yah dvgeh ma nyeis jus.
43020025	Housoeh las gohtoeu changlo jens nyang lyis, Ngamoq gas Yhensain lhyi xauh nyvng goeus, ge taiq kyoh. Nghuot laus eq nyang nyamoq lyis taiq, Nyah loq mas tyinghzoe yos ma nyvng, hauh tyinghzoe yos mas ngah loqnyhauh yah ma thauh yoeuh, nyah nvmjaus mas ngah loq ma xauh lap yoeuh lyis gas ngos ma jingh, ge.
43020026	Hauh thang lhyi xet nyeih lyis changlo jens yhen khau mha doms tsain lungh joq las, Thoma eq nyamoq yah dvgeh nyeis. Khomh kyank toh lyis eq, Yesu nyamoq jyank mas los yap las taiq zis gas, Namoq nyenstap nyeis bas jungh, ge.
43020027	Hauh uhlyis nyang gas Thoma lyis, Nah loqnyhauh heimha yhuonh kat las ngah loq lyis yoeuh aq, nah loq tuont kat las ngah nvmjaus mas eq lap yoeuh aq, ma jingh vmus, lomsjingh nyeis aq, ge.
43020028	Thoma nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Ngah Yhensain yahge ngah Mangso eh, ge.
43020029	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Thoma eh, nvng ngos lyis nyvng las dvlomsjingh, ma nyvng laus eq lomsjingh bang gas ngelhoq, ge.
43020030	Haih maussauh mas ma lhaih toh dah gohtoeu vlho nyoshoq eq Yesu nyah changlo jens xikkhonh mas kuot xoeuq.
43020031	Nghuot laus eq heinyhoq lhaih toh zis gas, Mangso dah Lo ge dah Khristu nghuot zis lyis, namoq yoh lomsjingh las, nyah nyings mas lomsjingh yvmvyah kang xauh yoeus bas jungh oen lhaih toh.
43021001	Hauh thang lyis Yesu gas Tiberia thomh yvm mas, nyah changlo jens lyis nyah gungs dvlhain doms nyvng xoeuq. Hauh uhlyis chixoeuq cho gas heisoeh ge.
43021002	Simon Petru yahge lozoms ge dah Thoma, Galile mau, Kana wukhau mas dah Nathaniel, Zebedi dah lotang yahge gohtoeu changlo aiq yuk gas dvgeh tsain nyeis.
43021003	Simon Petru gas, Ngos oeng e gaiq bah ge nyamoq lyis taiq. Nyamoq gas, Ngamoq eq chank das, ge. Housoeh nyamoq thuq loh las lhyik mas houjang wvng. Hauh nyens gonh nyamoq cha eq ma xauh yoeus.
43021004	Nyoq nyvng los lyis, Yesu gas thomh yvm nyeismhung mas yap joq. Nghuot laus eq changlo jens gas Yesu nghuot yvlyis ma tsain seq.
43021005	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Loshang jens eh, namoq oengdoq vyoh goh lah, ge. Nyamoq phuk taiq zis gas, Ma yoh, ge.
43021006	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Chont dah loqyos shot pheh nyho doeuh geh, housoeh lyis yoh das, ge. Houyah dvyhangteh nyamoq nyho tsain doeuh las, oeng nyoshoq xauh shenh yoeus yvmvyah nyho yangh ma tsain yoh lang lo.
43021007	Housoeh las Yesu jyetdap dah changlo gas, Yhensain dvnghuot ge Petru lyis taiq kyoh. Yhensain nghuot ge zis lyis Petru xauhgyo lyis, nyang gas shohchen nghuot las, thoq dyi yoeus wuot lho lha thomh mas wvng loh.
43021008	Gohtoeu changlo jens gas, oeng doq dyingh shoq bos dah nyho she las lhyik lo yah tsain jweh los: khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas nyeismhung yah nyoshoq ma we, gaiq dvxo ko dvwe.
43021009	Nyamoq gas tung yos mas jweh los lyis nyigywe mas oeng kank toh, ohlhyoq eq tsain nyvng.
43021010	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Gvshih namoq yoh dah oengdoq mas zis dvkhamh yoeus los geh, ge.
43021011	Housoeh Simon Petru doq los las, oeng kuh dvxo oengci somh doeu bos dah nyho lyis tung yos mas she thuq kat. Oengdoq hounyhoq bos nghuot laus eq nyho gas ma juiq.
43021012	Yesu nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Los geh nvpceh los zo geh, ge. Nyang Yhensain nghuot yvlyis changlo jens seq las, nyamoq mas khayuk eq nyang lyis, Nvng hank nghuot ge ma womh nyeis.
43021013	Hauh uhlyis Yesu los las hauh ohlhyoq yoeus las changlo jens lyis dyei, oengdoq eq houyah dvyhangteh dyei.
43021014	Yesu nyang shei masyah dwis toq kat zis xauh thang lyis, changlo jens lyis nyvng xoeuq yvmas, haih zis gas somh vlhain nghuot.
43021015	Gvshih wom dye zo thang lyis, Yesu Simon Petru lyis taiq zis gas, Yohan dah lo Simon eh, haih bang thoq lyis nvng ngos lyis jyetdap lhyeh, ge. Nyang taiq zis gas, Nghuot goeus Yhensain eh, ngos nvng lyis jyetdap zis gas nvng seq, ge. Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngah yvnglo jens lyis nyhoeu tsoh nyeis aq, ge.
43021016	Aiq vlhain, Yohan dah lo Simon eh, nvng ngos lyis jyetdap nyeis lhyeh, ge nyang lyis nyei. Nyang phuk taiq zis gas, Nghuot goeus Yhensain eh, ngos nvng lyis jyetdap zis gas nvng seq, ge. Yesu gas, Ngah yvng jens lyis yoeuh nyeis aq, ge.
43021017	Somh vlhain, Yohan dah lo Simon eh, nvng ngos lyis jyetdap nyeis lhyeh, ge nyei. Somh vlhain jweh shoq, Nvng ngos lyis jyetdap nyeis lhyeh, ge nyang lyis nyei yvmvyah, Petru nhaiqkuk las, Yhensain eh, nvng gas dvnganh yvlyis seq nyeis; ngos nvng lyis jyetdap zis gas nvng seq, ge toeuh. Yesu gas, Ngah yvng jens lyis nyhoeu tsoh nyeis aq, ge.
