43021018	Ngos nvng lyis jyoengh taiq bah, nvng loyvm nghuot yoq lyis nvnyang gungs lyis nvnyang dyichih chih las loh mes joqyos khyiq khanghmuh mas yoh loh: nghuot laus eq nvng mang goeus ya, nvng nah loq lvm las gohyuk yah nvng lyis dyichih chih dyei las, nvng ma o joqyos mas shwih loh das, ge nyang lyis taiq.
43021019	Housoeh ge taiq zis gas, Petru gas Mangso dah phunk lyis yoh chungh das xiklyis, nyang khasoeh teh dah shei cho yah shei das zis lyis toeuq las taiq toh zis nghuot. Hauh dang dye taiq lyis Yesu gas Petru lyis, Ngah thang mas chank los aq, ge.
43021020	Petru lhain yoeuh kat lyis, xikpheh nyenhcon zo nyeis lyis, Yesu dah sainhkhonh mas nges las Yhensain eh, nvng lyis kyauh tyamp das soeu khayuk nghuot lah, ge nyei dah soeu, Yesu jyetdap dah changlo chank los nyeis yvlyis nyvng.
43021021	Petru gas hauh soeu lyis nyvng las Yesu lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, haih soeu ka khasoeh nghuot das lah, ge.
43021022	Yesu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos doms jweh lyih shoq ngos nyang lyis gyoh nyeis nhang mes, hauh zis nvng yah cha sen lah? Nvng gas ngah thang mas chank los aq, ge.
43021023	Hauh dang gvng mas hauh changlo gas ma shei das ge vmang vnoeuh moq mas loeus hoeuh loh; nghuot laus eq, hauh soeu ma shei das, ge Yesu taiq zis ma nghuot. Ngah ehnyet o khyvlyis nghuot lyis gas, ngos doms jweh lyih shoq nyang dwis nyeis das, hauh zis nvng yah cha sen lah, ge taiq zis dvnghuot.
43021024	Hauh changlo gas haih cho lhyi kanghjyoeng kat las, haih cho lhyi lhaih toh soeu nghuot. Nyah kanghjyoeng jyoeng zis gas ngamoq seq.
43021025	Yesu kuot dah muhzoh gohtoeu nyoshoq bos shih; hauh yvlyis dvnganh chank lhaih lyis, hau lhaihtoh maussauh buk gas mungkvn gonh mas yangh ma ywih das oen ngos nghamh. Amen.
44001001	Theophilu eh, ngah maussauh cangxeih vbuk mas Yesu muh kuot xi masyah nyang lyis maukhung pheh toqh yoeus loh shishenh jweh shoq gyo lyis nyang kuot cho, jyauh cho dvnganh lyis lhaih toh goeus.
44001002	Nyang toqh kat zis ma xauh shih shishenh lyis nyang khyen toh lvgyo jens lyis Gyingshang Dyos dah yomsoq yah tyingtoh dang tsain taiq toh.
44001003	Nyang shanghsenh kham thang lhyi, nyeici nyeih top nyamoq lyis nyah gungs nyoshoq lhain chixoeuq las, nyang dwis nyeis cho ma yoh he dah kanghjyoeng vja ja yah Chixoeuq. Nyamoq gas nyang lyis nyvng las nyang nyamoq lyis maukhung munghdan cho taiq kyoh.
44001004	Housoeh nyamoq yah dvgeh huom nyeis lyis, nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Yerusalem masyah ma thuq thuq, namoq ngah jyank masyah xauhgyo yoeus das, Uwus dah dangthoengh lyis langh nyeis geh.
44001005	Khasoeh ge lyis Yohan gas jeis yah jeisnyhop dyei, namoq gas ma nyangh lyis Gyingshang Dyos yah jeisnyhop dyei zis xauh das, ge.
44001006	Housoeh nyamoq dvgeh tsain huom toh shih uhlyis, nyamoq gas nyang lyis, Yhensain eh, gvshih Israel dius jens lyis hauh munghdan doms dyei das lah, ge.
44001007	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Uwus gas nyah vmingh yah toeuq toh dah shishenh yahge yoq lyis namoq ma seq noh.
44001008	Nghuot laus eq Gyingshang Dyos namoq thoq mas jweh lyis, namoq yomsoq yoh yoeus das las, namoq gas Yerusalem wugungs yahge Yuda mau gonh, Samari yahge nyeisjvng goms shoq ngah kanghjyoeng tsain duot das, ge.
44001009	Haih zis dye taiq las, nyamoq yoeuh nyeis lyis, nyang lyis nyhang mas toqh yoeus loh las, jyommauh dvbungh gas nyamoq xikkhonh masyah nyang lyis po loh.
44001010	Nyang doq loh tyamp las, nyamoq maukhung mas yoeuh tsuk toh shih lyis, yoeuh aq, dyi thyoeu wuot dah dius aiq yuk nyamoq nvm mas yap thuq los las,
44001011	Galile bang eh, chamus maukhung mas yoeuh tsuk toh shih goh lah? Namoq dah xikkhonh masyah maukhung mas toqh kat zis xauh soeu, Yesu gas namoq nyvng nyeis lyis loh zis yah dvyhangteh, housoeh doms jweh lyih das, ge.
44001012	Nyamoq gas Tsanlun boms masyah Yerusalem wugungs pheh tauh loh. Hauh boms gas Yerusalem masyah nyei falong dvwe joq.
44001013	Jweh lyis nyamoq gyangh nyeis dah thoq yvp mas tsain doq loh. Hauh moq gas, Petru, Yohan, Yaku, Andre, Philip yahge Thoma, Bartholomeu yahge Mathe, Alphe dah lo Yaku, Zelot Simon yahge Yaku dah vnoeuh Yuda moq nghuot.
44001014	Nyamoq gas, vmesbih jens yahge Yesu ungwes Mari, nyah vmang vnoeuh moq yah dvgeh ehnyet dvlom yah wontang shvmanh dung las tsain nyeis.
44001015	Hauh buisnyeis gyo lyis Petru gas changlo dvxo aiqci ko dah vgungs mas toq yap las taiq zis gas,
44001016	Boekyis eh, Yesu lyis nyhik bang dah cho she soeu, Yudas lyis toeuq las gohlhain Dawi dah nhuot masyah Gyingshang Dyos taiq toh las, lhaihtoh dang gas nyuk los chah goeus.
44001017	Khasoeh ge lyis yamoq mas bos suon kat las, haih muh mas nyang eq muh xauh yoeus goeus.
44001018	Hauh soeu ka nyah dah ma shop muh phauh yah maunyeis dvchuq wis toh goeus: houmha nyang gas vtauh pheh yah gyoh shei las, womdau thauh phuk las, oeu eq dvyos dvzoq mus tyamp.
44001019	Hauh cho lhyi Yerusalem bang dvnganh seq loh goeus; housoeh las hauh maunyeis chuq lyis nyamoq nyingh pheh yah Akeldama ge nyhink toh. Houka Suih yos, ge zis nghuot.
44001020	Hauh cho ka Chungh Dang mas, Nyah joqyos jyamhjyuklhyuk mus bas jungh, houmha hank eq ma nyeis bas jungh, ge eq. Nyah dah uhshe muh lyis gohyuk xauh yoeus bas jungh, ge eq bos.
44001021	Housoeh las Yohan jeisnyhop dyei xi masyah, Yesu lyis yamoq jyank masyah toqh yoeus jweh shoq, Yhensain Yesu yamoq mas suh e nyeis.
44001022	Hauh shishenh top mas yang yah dvgeh suh e soeu, dvyuk gas yang yah dvgeh nyah dah dwis toq cho kanghjyoeng bweh chah, ge.
44001023	Hauh uhlyis nyamoq gas, Yustu eq ge, Barsaba ge dah Yosep yahge Mathia lyis tsain khyen kat.
44001024	nyamoq shvmanh dung zis gas, Dius yuk khanghmuh dah ehnyet lyis seq nyeis dah Yhensain eh, Yudas gas nyang yah sen joqyos pheh loh lo das ge, toh tyamp dah muh yahge,
44001025	Lvgyo muh xiklyis haih aiq yuk mas nvng hank lyis khyen yoeus toh cho ngamoq lyis tuonh shet aq, ge.
44001026	Nyamoq doeugoh lyis hauh zis gas Mathia lyis vvng loh. Hou mhayah nyang gas hau lvgyo dvci dvyuk mas lung los.
44002001	Pentekoti buisnyeis jweh lyis, nyamoq dvnganhmoq yah dvkhyiq thaq dvgeh huom toh.
44002002	Hauh uhlyis maukhung masyah uklyeis los teh, nyetlos nyettant nyings thuq los thwe ka, nyamoq tsung toh dah yvpkhau mas dyingh los.
44002003	Nyilhyam teh zis eq thuq los las, nyamoq nyang yuk nyang toeu dah thoq mas lyih no joq.
44002004	nyamoq dvnganh eq Gyingshang Dyos dyingh las, Dyos yah jyuonh zis yah dvyhangteh, gohtoeu nyingh yah tsain taiq los.
44002005	Hauh uhlyis maukhung o mas nyeis ya nyeis dah dius nyau khanghmuh mas nyeis las, lomsjingh cho mas wontang dah Yuda jens gas, Yerusalem wugungs mas nyeis.
44002006	Hau nyings dah thwe xauhgyo lyis, somci moqmuh gas zain los zis yah nyamoq yuk khanghmuh changlo jens taiq dah dang lyis vsainnyang nyingh yah xauhgyo yvmvyah tsain mauh dvn nyeis.
44002007	Nyamoq mauh dvn las taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, gvshih hai taiq nyeis bang dvnganh gas, Galile dius kyingh ma tsain nghuot lhyeh?
44002008	Housoeh lyis yang yuk khanghmuh vsainnyang choq thyet mau mas dah nyingh pheh yah yoh gyo yoeus zis gas khasoeh au lhyeh?
44002009	Yang gas Parthi, Mede, Elam mau mas bang yahge Mesopotamia mau, Yuda mau yahge Kapadokia mau, Pontu yahge Asia,
44002010	Phrigia yahge Pamphilia, Egutu yahge Kureni wuxom mas nyeis dah Libya mau mas bang, Roma masyah los dah boenghwus, Yuda dius jens yahge Yuda phung mas wvng bang,
44002011	Kreti yahge Arabia mau mas bang, yang dvnganh gas Mangso dah mauhphoh muhzoh cho, nyamoq taiq kyoh dang lyis nyang yuk nyang toeu nyingh pheh yah xauhgyo goeus, ge.
44002012	Housoeh nyamoq dvnganhmoq yah mauh khamkhvv las, Heisoeh ge zis gas cha nghuot au lhyeh, ge nyang changh nyang taiq goh.
44002013	Nghuot laus eq dvyhamh gas, nyamoq lyis jwangh zis yah taiq zis gas, Haih bang gas zvbiq saiq shuk yet, ge.
44002014	Hauh uhlyis Petru gas, lvgyo dvci dvyuk moq yah dvgeh toq yap las thwe than yah taiq zis gas, Yuda mau mas bang yahge Yerusalem mas nyeis bang eh, namoq haih cho seqgyo bas jungh, ngah dang lyis eq gyo yoeus geh.
44002015	Namoq nghamh yhangteh haih bang zvbiq yet zis ma nghuot: Khasoeh ge lyis gvshih gau shishenh dvnghuot shih.
44002016	Haih cho ka lvpe Yoel taiq toh dang nghuot. Houka,
44002017	Mangso heisoeh ge, Thang thank buisnyeis lyis ngah Dyos, Dius dvnganhmoq thoq mas huot khyoq las, namoq dah loloeu lonyi jens lvpe pe das; namoq dah wotyamh jens nyoqnyvng nyvng las, namoq dah lokhoq jens yhetmoq moq das.
44002018	Nghuot goeus, hauh buisnyeis lyis Ngah jyeidwis phoq, jyeidwis nyhiq jens thoq mas Ngah Dyos huot khyoq las, Nyamoq lvpe pe das.
44002019	Ngos gas maukhung thoq mas mauh loqmuh, nyeisjvng mas vlho vja ja, Suih, nyi, nyikhauh soq lyis chixoeuq das.
44002020	Kuhxing duk bvng ge dah hauh Yhensain dah buisnyeis ma jweh shih lyis, Buis gas mauchuotdwang bweh tyamp das, Lhamhmuh gas suih teh bweh das.
44002021	Hauh uhlyis Yhensain nyah nyings lyis lui soeu khanghmuh khyuot yoeus zis xauh das, ge.
44002022	Israel dius jens eh, haih dang gyo yoeus geh: Mangso ka Nazaret phoq ge dah Yesu loq masyah namoq mas yomsoq muh, mauh loqmuh yahge vlho kuot xoeuq yvmvyah, nyang gas Mangso khyen toeuq toh soeu nghuot yvlyis chixoeuq zis gas namoq seq.
44002023	Haih soeu ka Mangso nghamh toh goeus joeui yah xiq toh zis yah dvyhangteh, namoq gas lyi ma chi bang dah loq mas kyauh tyamp las, nyang lyis tapzains mas taplhangh sat.
44002024	Nghuot laus eq shei, nos dah shohjyen zis lyis Mangso khyuot tyamp dyei las, nyang lyis dwis toq los nhang. Khasoeh ge lyis hau shei zis gas, nyang lyis yoh zwi kyamp toh zis ma nghuot.
44002025	Khasoeh ge lyis, hauh soeu yah sen las Dawi taiq zis gas, Yhensain lhyi nah xikkhonh mas vjangh nyvng goeus; Ngos ma lop ma loeh bas jungh ge Nyang ngah loqyos shot pheh nyeis.
44002026	Housoeh las ngah nhaiqlom gauslaus nyeis zis yahge, Ngah lhyo gauslaus nyeis. Ngah gungsshoh eq nghamhloms nyeis das.
44002027	Khasoeh ge lyis nvng ngah dyos lyis shei mau mas ma toh tyamp; Nvng nah Gyingshang Soeu dyoqbis xauh das zis ma gyo.
44002028	Kang dwis cho nvng ngos lyis seq nhang. Nah xikkhonh mas nvng ngos lyis gausyis zis yah tyink dyei das, ge.
44002029	Boekyis eh, yah phauh thyeih Dawi gas shei las nyhop zis xauh goeus, nyah lop gas khvnyhik jweh shoq yang yah dvgeh joq zis lyis, ngos namoq lyis womh womh taiq bah.
44002030	Nyang gas lvpe nghuot zis yahge, nyah nyei nyet mas zis dvyuk gas nyah hwankti tank mas tsung nhang das ge Mangso nyang lyis maukhi lha dangthoengh toh yvlyis seq yvmvyah,
44002031	Khristu dah dwis toq los cho nyang uhlhomh nyvng las, nyah dyos lyis shei mau mas ma toh tyamp das zis yahge, nyah gungsshoh dyoqbis ma xauh das cho taiq toh.
44002032	Yesu haih yuk lyis nyang Mangso dwis toq nhang goeus; Ngamoq dvnganh eq haih cho dah kanghjyoeng nghuot.
44002033	Nyang gas nyah Uwus Mangso dah loqyos shot pheh toqh yoeus zis xauh goeus zis yahge Mangso nyang lyis dangthoengh toh zis yah dvyhangteh nyah jyank masyah Gyingshang Dyos lyis xauh lhom yoeus goeus. Gvshih namoq nyvng las xauhgyo zis gas, ngamoq thoq mas nyang huot khyoq dah jyungshuk nghuot.
44002034	Khasoeh ge lyis Dawi gas maukhung mha toqh kat zis ma xauh laus eq nyang nyang heisoeh ge: Hauh Yhensain ngah Yhensain lhyi taiq zis gas,
44002035	Ngos nah jeswus lyis nah nangte kuot shoq, Nvng ngah loqyos shot pheh tsung toh aq, ge.
44002036	Housoeh yvmvyah namoq tapzains mas taplhangh sat goeus dah Yesu lyis Mangso ka Yhensain yahge Khristu bweh nhang zis gas, Israel yhenbang dvnganh top seq yoeus geh, ge.
44002037	Hauh zis tsain xauhgyo lyis nyamoq ehnyet mas zangh las, nyamoq gas Petru yahge gohtoeu lvgyo jens lyis taiq zis gas, Boekyis eh, ngamoq khasoeh kuot das lah, ge.
44002038	Petru nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq dah yaunos khyuot dyei das xiklyis namoq yuk khanghmuh nhaiqlom thaiq las, Yesu Khristu dah nyings mas jeisnyhop kham geh. Housoeh lyis Gyingshang Dyos ge dah jyungshuk gas namoq xauh yoeus das.
44002039	Khasoeh ge lyis hauh dangthoengh gas namoq yahge namoq dah lo jens xiklyis nghuot las, we we mas nyeis bang dvnganh yahge Yhensain Mangso khi yoeus dah bang dvnganh xiklyis nghuot, ge.
44002040	Dang gohtoeu nyoshoq yah eq nyang nyamoq lyis taiq kyingh yomdyei taiq zis gas, Vsainnyang gungs lyis hai ung lhung dah vcaiq masyah lhuiq yoeus geh, ge.
44002041	Housoeh nyah dang lyis lhom yoeus bang lyis jeisnyhop dyei las, hauh nyeihyo dius somh khyoengh ko lung los.
44002042	Hauh bang gas lvgyo jens dah jyauh cho, dvgeh zomh cho, ohlhyoq khyiq gvm cho yahge shvmanh dung cho mha wontang tsain chank.
44002043	Lvgyo jens masyah eq mauh loqmuh yahge vlho nyoshoq kuot xoeuq las, dius jens dvnganh gyukwoms los.
44002044	Lomsjingh bang dvnganhmoq gas dvjoq mas dvgeh huom lha, nyamoq yoh dah vyhang dvnganh xonh yhung.
44002045	Nyamoq gas vsainnyang dah kyahsoe zisyos lyis eq ungh las, dvnganh lyis nyamoq chah zis yah dvyhangteh gvm dyei.
44002046	nyamoq gas nyeih yau nyeih yhenmuh mas zophuom lha, nyamoq dah yhen mas gaus gaus yis yis dyei mes ehnyet yah chomp zo shuk.
44002047	Housoeh nyamoq gas Mangso lhyi chunghtoq zis yah dius dvnganh dah chungh cho lhyi xauh lhom yoeus. Nyeih khanghmuh Yhensain gas khyuot yoeus xauh bang lyis nyamoq phung mas je los nhang.
44003001	Gvshih Petru yahge Yohan gas, somh shishenh dah shvmanh dung shishenh lyis, yhenmuh mas tsain doq loh.
44003002	Hauh uhlyis, nyah ungwes ung masyah khyei ma yangh soeu dvyuk lyis dvng los las, yhenmuh mas wvng loh bang jyank masyah dung zo bas jungh ge, Yunghshop ge dah yhenmuh khomh nvm mas nyeih khanghmuh e toh toh kuot.
44003003	Petru yahge Yohan yhenmuh mas wvng loh nyeis zis lyis nyang nyvng las, Nhaiqnyen aq, ge dung.
44003004	Petru yahge Yohan gas nyang lyis yoeuh tsuk toh las, Ngah aiq yuk lyis yoeuh aq, ge.
44003005	Nyah aiq yuk jyank masyah dvja ja xauh yoeus das ge nghamh las nyah aiq yuk lyis soq yoeuh nyeis.
44003006	Petru taiq zis ka, Ngwis xing gas ngos ma yoh, nghuot laus eq ngos yoh zis nvng lyis dyei bah: Nazaret Yesu Khristu dah nyings masyah toq las suh loh aq, ge.
44003007	Nyang nyah loqyos loq lyis zwi las lang toq kat. Houjang yah nyah khyeinyoqtyon yombos los.
44003008	Nyang dyvm toq yap las suh loh uhlyis yah, goh jywe las Mangso lhyi chungh zoh lyis nyah aiq yuk yah dvgeh yhenmuh mas wvng loh.
44003009	Dius dvnganh gas, nyang suh loh uhjyangh Mangso lhyi chungh yvlyis nyvng.
44003010	Hauh soeu ka yhenmuh mas dah Yunghshop khomh nvm mas tsung las dung zo soeu nghuot zis lyis nyamoq seq yvmvyah, nyang mas bweh los dah cho gvng mas tsain mauh hangh toh.
44003011	Hauh soeu ka, Petru yahge Yohan lyis lang toh zis yah Solomon wumuk thang ge joqyos mas nyeis lyis, dius dvnganhmoq mauh zis yah nyamoq jyank mas wuih los.
44003012	Hauh zis lyis Petru nyvng las dius jens lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Israel dius jens eh, haih soeu dah cho lhyi chamus tsain mauh goh lah? Ngah aiq yuk nyang dah yomsoq yah, nghuot ya lomsjingh dah muh yah haih soeu lhyi yoh suh loh nhang teh chamus yoeuh tsuk toh goh lah?
44003013	Abraham, Isak yahge Yakop dah Mangso, yah phauh thyeih moq dah Mangso ka nyah Jyeidwis Yesu lyis chunghtoq zis dvnghuot. Nyang lyis gas namoq kyauh tyamp las Pilat nyang lyis lhuiq kat das ge sont lyis, namoq gas Pilat dah xikkhonh mas nyang lyis peq tyamp.
44003014	Hau Gyingshang lha dan soeu lhyi namoq peq tyamp las, dius sat soeu lhyi yuk namoq xiklyis kat kat das zis sang yoeus.
44003015	Kang sain lhyi namoq sat goeus; Mangso ka shei masyah nyang lyis dwis toq nhang goeus. Ngamoq eq hauh cho dah kanghjyoeng tsain nghuot.
44003016	Nyah yomsoq gas hai khyei dyoq soeu lhyi yombos nhang goeus. Namoq yoh nyvng yoh seq cho lhyi nyah nyings lyis lomsjingh zis yah bweh nhang goeus. Namoq dvnganhmoq nyvng zis yah dvyhangteh Yesu lyis lomsjingh dah lomsjingh cho ka nyang lyis gis los nhang goeus.
44003017	Gvshih nghuot laus eq, boekyis eh, namoq yahge namoq dah zauguon jens seq cho ma bos las kuot goeus zis gas ngos seq.
44003018	Hauh zis gas, Mangso ka lvpe jens dvnganh dah nhuot masyah, Nyah Khristu gas shanghsenh xauh chah, ge uhlhomh taiq nhang zis lyis nyang, nyuk los nhang goeus.
44003019	Nhaiqlom thaiq las tauh los geh, housoeh lyis namoq yaunos khyuot dyei zis xauh das.
44003020	Housoeh Yhensain ka yomsoq vsaiq yoh doms huiq dah shishenh dyei das nghuot las nyang namoq xiklyis khyen toeuq toh Meshia nghuot dah Yesu lyis nhang kat das.
44003021	Gohlhain yah nyah Gyingshang lvpe jens dah nhuot masyah Mangso taiq toh zis yah dvyhangteh, vyhang dvnganh zis lyis vsaiq doms kuot dah caiq jweh shoq nyang gas maukhung mha nyeis nyeis chah.
44003022	Moshe taiq zis gas, Yhensain namoq dah Mangso ka, ngos teh dah lvpe dvyuk lyis, namoq dah vmang vnoeuh masyah namoq xiklyis thuq los nhang das, nyang taiq ya taiq yvlyis tsain gyo chah.
44003023	Hauh lvpe dah dang ma gyo soeu hank lyis laus eq, Mangso dah dius nyau masyah thyuk tyamp zis xauh das.
44003024	Nghuot goeus, Samuel masyah nyah thang mha chank thuq los las taiq dah lvpe jens dvnganhmoq gas, haih buisnyeis lyis bweh nyeis dah cho lhyi tsain taiq hoeuh.
44003025	Namoq eq hau lvpe jens dah nyei nyet jens tsain nghuot. Mangso ka yah phauh thyeih moq yah thanghchvp toh uhlyis, Abraham lyis, Nah vnyau masyah nyeisjvng thoq mas dius nyau dvnganh shvmanh yoh das ge zis yah dvyhangteh,
44003026	namoq yuk khanghmuh lyis vsainnyang dah unglhung cho masyah yoh lhain los dah shvmanh jyehjuh dyei das xiklyis Mangso ka nyah Jyeidwis Yesu lyis namoq jyank mas cangxeih nhang kat goeus, ge.
44004001	Nyah aiq yuk housoeh moqphung lyis taiq nyeis uhlyis, phudyei bang, yhenmuh gomh soeu yahge Saduke jens thuq los.
44004002	Lvgyo tang ka moqphung lyis, Shei loh goeus bang gas Yesu dwis toq los zis yah dvyhangteh dwis toq los das ge jyauh nyeis yvmvyah, nyamoq nhaiq tsain yo.
44004003	Housoeh nyamoq nyenhthang zoh lyis nyah aiq yuk lyis nyhik las nungs nvp jweh shoq thung mha lhunk toh.
44004004	Nghuot laus eq dang xauhgyo yoeus bang nyoshoq lomsjingh goeus. Lomsjingh bang vbusbih dvnganh lyis oeng khyoengh ko nghuot.
44004005	Nungs nyeih nyamoq dah zauguon bang, logis jens yahge maussauh lhaih bang gas,
44004006	Phudyei Zainsmuh Anna yah dvgeh Kayapa, Yohan Alesanda, Phudyei Zainsmuh dah vnyau dvnganh Yerusalem wugungs mas tsain huom toh.
44004007	Housoeh nyah aiq yuk lyis nyamoq dah vgungs mas kat toh las nyei zis gas, Nah aiq yuk gas chah yomsoq yah, hank nyings masyah haih muh kuot goh lah, ge.
44004008	Hauh uhlyis Petru Gyingshang Dyos dyingh las phuk taiq zis gas, Dius dah guon bang yahge Israel dah logis jens eh,
44004009	hai khyei ma yangh soeu lhyi gis zis kuot gvng mas, hauh soeu lyis khasoeh yhoh, ge khvnyhik ngah aiq yuk lyis nyeiwu zis xauh lyis gas,
44004010	namoq dvnganhmoq yahge Israel dvnyau gonh lyis seq nhang bah: namoq tapzains mas taplhangh sat las, Mangso ka shei masyah dwis toq nhang dah Nazaret Yesu Khristu nyings yah haih soeu namoq xikkhonh mas yanghzan zis yah yap joq.
44004011	Hauh Yesu gas, namoq yhen tsuk bang peq tyamp dah luklom nghuot joq laus eq yhenthunk lukzains bweh los.
44004012	Hank masyah eq khyuot yoeus cho ma bos lo: khasoeh ge lyis khyuot yoeus zis xauh das xiklyis maukhung o mha cangsoeu dius lyis dyei dah nyings gohtoeu ma bos lo, ge.
44004013	Nyamoq gas Petru yahge Yohan dah womh womh kuot yvlyis nyvng las, nyah aiq yuk gas maussauh ma seq bang dvnghuot zis lyis seq las tsain mauh. Nghuot laus eq nyah aiq yuk gas xikpheh Yesu yah dvgeh nyeis ku zis nyamoq soh.
44004014	Gis los nhang zis xauh soeu eq nyah aiq yuk yah dvgeh yap joq zis lyis nyamoq nyvng nyeis yvmvyah, tomp das cho cha ma bos lo.
44004015	Nghuot laus eq nyah aiq yuk lyis hau huom masyah thuq loh das zis vmingh dyei lho las, nyamoq nyang changh xamgoh zis gas,
44004016	Haih aiq yuk lyis khasoeh kuot goh das lah? Nyah aiq yuk loq masyah comh phoh vlho dvkoeuq kuot goeus zis gas Yerusalem mas bang seq goeus yvmvyah, yang he chank ma bos lo.
44004017	Nghuot laus eq hauh cho dius jens mas ma zes hoeuh loh bas jungh, gvshih masyah hauh nyings yoeus las hank lyis eq ma taiq das khyvlyis nyah aiq yuk lyis nyho tomp tyamp goh, ge.
44004018	Housoeh nyah aiq yuk lyis lui las, Yesu dah nyings yoeus las cha eq ma yoh taiq, ma yoh jyauh das khyvlyis nyah aiq yuk lyis vmingh dyei.
44004019	Petru yahge Yohan nyamoq lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Mangso dah dang gyo das thoq lyis namoq dah dang gyo das zis, Mangso xikkhonh mas jus ma jus gas namoq nyang nghamh thyet geh.
44004020	Ngah aiq yuk gas ngah aiq yuk nyvng goeus, xauhgyo goeus cho lhyi ka ma taiq ma yoh nyeis, ge.
44004021	Housoeh nyamoq gas nyah aiq yuk lyis yobos dyei das cho ma nyvng yvmvyah, svsoh kyuk las kat kat. Khasoeh ge lyis nyah aiq yuk kuot dah muhzoh gvng mas dius dvnganhmoq Mangso lhyi tsain chungh.
44004022	Hauh vlho yah gis los nhang zis xauh soeu ka, nyenhkyi nyeici zvn nyet bos goeus.
44004023	Housoeh nyah aiq yuk gas kat kat zis xauh las, nyamoq nyang dah dyenschangh jens jyank pheh loh las, phudyei bang yahge logis jens nyah aiq yuk lyis taiq kat dang dvnganh nyamoq lyis taiq kyoh.
44004024	Hauh zis xauhgyo lyis nyamoq gas, dvthwe kyingh yah Mangso lhyi kaiq dung zis gas, Maukhung yahge nyeisjvng, thomh yahge houmha dah vyhang dvnganh lyis kuot toh las guon nyeis dah Yhensain eh,
44004025	Gyingshang Dyos gas, nah jyeidwis, Dawi nhuot masyah taiq zis gas, Gohnyau bang chamus lhuon lha, Dius jens vkom mas nghamh toeuq nyeis au?
44004026	Nyeisjvng hwankti jens yahge guon bang dvgeh huom lha, Yhensain yahge nyah Meshia lyis jes sont nyeis, ge.
44004027	Jyoengh nyang nvng coeu juot toh, nah Gyingshang Jyeidwis Yesu lyis jes sont das xiklyis Herod yahge Pontu Pilat, gohnyau bang yahge Israel dius jens gas hauh wus mas tsainh toh.
44004028	Nyamoq gas yomsoq yah nah ehnyet joeui yah bweh das nyhenshang xik lyis yah nghamh thyet toh goeus dah muh dvnganh lyis kuot das zis huom toh.
44004029	Yhensain eh, gvshih nyamoq kyuk tant dang lyis jenh yoeuh aq. Nah jyeidwis jens nah dang lyis womh womh yoh taiq das xiklyis pangh aq.
44004030	Lhoqh gis das xiklyis nah loq yhuonh las nah Gyingshang Jyeidwis Yesu nyings yah mauh loqmuh yahge yomsoq muh kuot das yomsoq dyei aq, ge.
44004031	Housoeh nyamoq shvmanh dye dung lyis nyamoq huom joq dah joqyos gas nonh los las dvnganhmoq yah Gyingshang Dyos dyingh los zis yah, Mangso dang lyis ma gyuk ma woms tsain taiq kyoh.
44004032	Hau lomsjingh bang dvphung gonh yah nhaiqlom dvkoeuq khyvlyis yah xam tsain xonh. Housoeh las hank laus eq vsainnyang yoh dah vyhang lhyi, ngah zis ma ge dvnganhmoq tsain chomp chi.
44004033	Lvgyo jens eq Yhensain Yesu dah dwis toq cho lhyi yomsoq zainsmuh yah kanghjyoeng tsain kat nyeis yvmvyah, nyamoq dvnganh gas Mangso jyank masyah jyehjuh nyoshoq xauh yoeus.
44004034	nyamoq mas chah soeu dvyuk eq ma bos: khasoeh ge lyis maunyeis yvsoh yoh bang, yhen yoh bang dvnganhmoq, hauh zis ungh las yoh dah ngwis lyis yoeus lyih las,
44004035	Lvgyo jens khyeiyang mas tsain toh. Housoeh hauh ngwis lyis chah soeu khanghmuh lyis nyamoq chah zis yah dvyhangteh gvm dyei.
44004036	Housoeh Kupru mau mas khoeu dah Lewi dius Yosep gas nyah maunyeis lyis ungh las yoh dah ngwis chi los las lvgyo jens lyis kyauh toh. Hauh soeu lhyi lvgyo jens yah Barnaba ge nyhink. Barnaba vjyuk gas Yomdyei soeu, ge.
44005001	Nghuot laus eq Anani ge soeu yahge nyah yhensain nyhiq Saphira gas, nyah zomh yoh dah zisyos ungh las,
44005002	Nyah zomh dvgeh khaujeini zis yah hauh phauh dvkhamh gauh shung toh las dvkhamh lvgyo jens lyis e kyauh.
44005003	Petru nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Anani eh, nvng chamus Satan dah dang gyo las maunyeis phauh dvkhamh nah xiklyis thyet toh lah? Nvng chamus Gyingshang Dyos lyis hwah lah?
44005004	Hauh zis ma ungh shih lyis nah zis nghuot ma nghuot lhyeh? Ungh thang lhyi eq yoh ungh dah nah ngwis nah zis nghuot las nvng o khyvlyis yoh kuot ma nghuot lhyeh? Chamus nah nhaiq mas housoeh kuot das zis nghamh lah? Nvng gas dius lyis hwah zis ma nghuot, Mangso lhyi hwah zis dvnghuot, ge.
44005005	Hauh dang xauhgyo yah dvyih Anani gas lains shei tyamp. Hauh zis xauhgyo bang dvnganh eq svsoh gyuk.
44005006	Housoeh loyvm jens toq las, nyah mvng lyis thop lho lha e dvng nyhop.
44005007	Hauh thang lhyi somh shishenh ko nyangh lyis, yhensain nyhiq eq housoeh bweh cho ma seq las wvng los.
44005008	Tsai Petru gas, Nyeisjvng ungh zis heinyhoq kyingh dvnghuot lhyeh? Ngos lyis taiq kyoh aq ge lyis, nyang eq, Nghuot goeus, heinyhoq yah dv ungh, ge.
44005009	Petru nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain dah Dyos lyis shi yoeuh das zis nah zomh chamus housoeh xamxonh goh lah? Yoeuh aq, nah yhensain phoq lyis nyhop bang dah khyei, khomh mas jweh los goeus, nvng lyis eq dvng tyamp das, ge.
44005010	Houjang nyang eq nyah khyeiyang mas lains shei goeus. Loyvm jens eq wvng los lyis, hauh vmesbih shei joq yvlyis nyvng las nyah yhensain phoq dah vyvm mas e dvng nyhop.
44005011	Housoeh phung dius jens dvnganh yahge hauh cho lhyi tsain xauhgyo bang dvnganh gas svsoh gyuk goeus.
44005012	Gvshih lvgyo jens dah loq masyah vlho yahge mauh loqmuh nyoshoq dius jens dah xikkhonh mas bweh xoeuq nyeis. Hauh bang dvnganhmoq dvgeh Solomon dah wumuk thang mha nyeis.
44005013	Gohtoeu dius jens hank eq nyamoq yah ma womh zomh. Nghuot laus eq dius jens gas nyamoq lyis gyukwoms.
44005014	Yhensain lhyi lomsjingh bang nyelo yukgis lo nyoshoq zes nyo los.
44005015	Housoeh las Petru suh lai loh lyis, dvyuk yuk dah thoq mas siyet khvlangh zangh bas jungh ge, nos bang lyis cho mha jung yahge mvnyhoeuq yah lyih tsain dvng toh.
44005016	Hauh thoq lyis Yerusalem vyvm vwi wukhau mha dah nos bang yahge yius wvng las shoeuhshih zis xauh bang lyis tsain shwih jweh lyih. Hauh bang dvnganh eq gis los zis xauh.
44005017	Nghuot laus eq Phudyei Zainsmuh yahge nyah dyenschangh jens Saduke ge dah dius phung dvnganhmoq gas, noh dah ehnyet dyingh joq yvmvyah toq las,
44005018	lvgyo jens lyis nyhik lho lha wus thung mas lhunk toh.
44005019	Nghuot laus eq hauh nyenhyo Yhensain dah loeuswons soeu ka, thung khomh phank tyamp dyei las, nyamoq lyis shwih thuq kat uhlyis taiq zis gas,
44005020	Namoq thuq loh geh, yhenmuh mas yap las hai kang dang dvnganh yah dius jens lyis taiq kyoh geh, ge.
44005021	Nyamoq hauh zis xauhgyo lyis, nvpsangh yah yhenmuh mas wvng las tsain jyauh. Nghuot laus eq Phudyei Zainsmuh yahge nyah dyenschangh jens eq jweh los las, soetuon bang yahge Israel jens dah nhaiqbos dvnganh lyis khi huom toh lho lha, lvgyo jens lyis shwih thuq los das xiklyis thung mha dius nhang kat.
44005022	Jyeidwis jens gas, thung mha lvgyo jens lyis ma nyvng yvmvyah tauh los las taiq zis gas,
44005023	thung eq goeng goeng kyank toh, zungh bang eq khomh nghe pheh zungh nyeis zis ngamoq nyvng; nghuot laus eq hauh zis phank yoeuh lyis vkhau mha hank eq ma nyeis langh, ge.
44005024	Yhenmuh gomh soeu yahge phudyei uhjyung jens hauh dang xauhgyo lyis, Haih cho cha bweh los das au, ge uhnungh tsain nungh.
44005025	Hauh uhlyis dvyuk wvng los las nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, namoq thung mha lhunk toh bang gas yhenmuh mas yap las dius jens lyis jyauh nyeis, ge.
44005026	Housoeh las jeszau gas nyah jeslo jens yah lyih las, lvgyo jens lyis tsain shwih loh. Nghuot laus eq khoek khoek ma womh kuot. Khasoeh ge lyis, dius jens lukzains yah doeuh das yvlyis gyuk.
44005027	Housoeh nyamoq shwih yoeus las nhaiqbos huom xikkhonh mas nyhei toh las Phudyei Zainsmuh nyamoq lyis nyei zis gas,
44005028	Namoq haih nyings yah cha eq vtaiq, oen ngamoq khoek khoek taiq toh goeus ma nghuot lhyeh? Yoeuh aq, gvshih Yerusalem dvwus gonh namoq dah jyauh cho tyink las, haih soeu dah cangjau ngamoq thoq mas kih dyei das zis cvvq nyeis, ge.
44005029	Petru yahge lvgyo jens phuk taiq zis gas, Ngamoq gas dius dah dang gyo das thoq lyis Mangso dang lyis gyo chah.
44005030	Ngamoq phauh thyeih dah Mangso ka namoq tapzains mas taplhangh sat dah Yesu lyis dwis toq los nhang goeus.
44005031	Israel vnyau lyis nhaiqlom thaiq cho yahge yaunos khyuot dyei das cho lhyi phank dyei das xiklyis uhjyung yahge khyuot yoeus soeu kuot das ge, Mangso ka hauh soeu lhyi nyah loqyos shot pheh chunghtoq toh goeus.
44005032	Ngamoq eq haih cho dah kanghjyoeng tsain nghuot. Nyah dang gyo bang lyis Mangso dyei dah Gyingshang Dyos eq hauh dah kanghjyoeng nghuot, ge.
44005033	Hauh dang xauhgyo lyis nyamoq nhaiqyo zis yah lvgyo jens lyis sat das zis nghamh los.
44005034	Nghuot laus eq dius dvnganh dah xikkhonh mas nyoqnho ngelang yoh dah Lyi svra Gamale ge dah Pharishe dvyuk hauh nhaiqbos huom mha toq las, lvgyo jens lyis nghe pheh dvdvm thuq loh nhang das xiklyis taiq kat las,
44005035	nyang taiq zis gas, Israel dius jens eh, haih bang lyis cha kuot das zis gas vlhomuh nghamh yoeuh shih geh.
44005036	Khasoeh ge lyis xikpheh Thuda ge soeu nyang dvkohlhaiq teh thuq los lho lhyi dius nyeixo ko nyah thang mas chank ku. Nyang gas sat zis xauh las, nyah dang gyo bang dvnganh gas lanhsanhhu bi dyuk zis yah nyang kuot cho cha eq ma bweh lo.
44005037	Hauh thang lhyi dius nyings lhaih yoq lyis, Galile dius Yuda thuq los las dius jens lyis nyah jyank pheh lang yoeus loh. Nyang eq sat zis xauh las nyah thang chank bang eq lanhsanhhu mus tyamp.
44005038	Housoeh yvmvyah gvshih ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, Haih soe yah sen las nghuot goeus jungh, nyamoq lyis cha vkuot goh: khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq nghamh toh zis cangsoeu dius masyah nghuot lyis gas dyoq tyamp das.
44005039	Nghuot laus eq Mangso jyank masyah nghuot lyis gas namoq nyamoq lyis ung das zis ma nghuot, Mangso lhyi jes kuot bang dvduot das, ge.
44005040	Hauh dang lyis nyamoq lhom yoeus yvmvyah, lvgyo jens lyis khi yoeus lho lha lyuk las Yesu nyings yah ma taiq das xiklyis vmingh dyei lho lha kat kat.
44005041	Nyamoq gas, Nyah nyings gvng mas xoqphuh das zis mon yih nyeis ge Mangso suon dyei yvmvyah gausyis zis yah hauh huom masyah tsain thuq loh.
44005042	Nyamoq nyeih yau nyeih yhenmuh mas eq, nyamoq nyeis dah yhen khanghmuh mas eq, Yesu gas Khristu nghuot cho ma lyen lo jyauh, taiq kyoh nyeis.
44006001	Hauh buisnyeis gyo lyis changlo jens nyo los lyis, nyeih yau nyeih dah phuqsoe muh mas nyamoq mas dah chauhmuh jens lyis yoeuh lhaiq toh yvmvyah, Heleni jens gas Hebre jens lyis tsain lop.
44006002	Hauh uhlyis lvgyo dvci aiq yuk moq gas, somci moqmuh lyis khi tsainh toh las taiq zis gas, Yang Mangso dah dang lyis nungsyos toh las lvzo lvshuk ba dyei nyeis das zis gas ma doeus.
44006003	Housoeh las boekyis eh, namoq mas lomluk las Gyingshang Dyos yahge joeui dyingh bang nyhet yuk khyen toh geh. Yang hauh bang lyis haih muh mas toeuq kat goh.
44006004	Ngamoq gas shvmanh dung muh yahge gausyis dang taiq kyoh muh mas shishenh top yoh dyei das. ge.
44006005	Hauh dang lyis phung dius jens dvnganh xamxonh las lomsjingh ehnyet yahge Gyingshang Dyos dyingh dah Stephan yahge Yuda, Prokoru, Nikanor, Timon, Pamena yahge Yuda lomsjingh cho chank soeu gohnyau bang Antiok wus mas dah Nikola moq lyis tsain khyen yoeus.
44006006	nyamoq lyis lvgyo jens dah xikkhonh mas tsain shwih toh. nyamoq shvmanh dung thang lhyi nyamoq thoq mas loq kih dyei.
44006007	Mangso dah dang eq jelvm los las Yerusalem wugungs mas changlo nyoshoq je los. Phudyei bang nyoshoq eq hau lomsjingh cho tsain chank.
44006008	Gvshih Stephan ka Mangso dah jyehjuh yah lomsjingh ehnyet yahge yomsoq yah dyingh soeu nghuot las, dius jens dah xikkhonh mas kuh dah yomsoq muh yahge mauh loqmuh kuot xoeuq.
44006009	Bent Kureni yahge Alesandria mas dah Yuda dius dvyhamh vsainnyang Lhuiq kat zis xauh bang ge dah lyi jungs phung mha dah phung dius jens nghuot. nyamoq gas Stephan yah phyen-goh. Kiliki yahge Asia mau mas dah Yuda dius jens dvyhamh eq nyang yah phyen-goh.
44006010	Nghuot laus eq Dyos gas Stephan lyis joeui dang dyei las nyang taiq lyis nyamoq nyang lyis ma yoh he.
44006011	Housoeh nyamoq gas dius dvyhamh lyis khauwhot dyei las, Nyang gas Moshe yahge Mangso lhyi loeusmus soqzo nyeis zis ngamoq xauhgyo, ge taiq nhang.
44006012	Nyamoq gas dius jens, logis jens yahge lyi svra moq lyis hoeu nhang las, hauh bang gas nyang lyis loh nyhik lha nhaiqbos huom mha tsain shwih e.
44006013	Housoeh ma ying kanghjyoeng jens lyis toeuq toh las nyamoq gas, Hauh soeu ka haih Gyingshang joqyos yahge lyi lyis loeusmus soqzo dang ma no lo taiq nyeis.
44006014	Khasoeh ge lyis Nazaret Yesu ge soeu ka haih joqyos lyis thyoq tyamp las, ngamoq lyis Moshe dyei toh dah thungh lyis thaiq tyamp das ge nyang nyang taiq dang ngamoq xauhgyo, ge.
44006015	Housoeh hau huom mha tsain tsung toh bang dvnganh nyang lyis yoeuh tsuk toh lyis, nyah nyoqnho ka loeuswons soeu dah nyoqnho teh nghuot zis nyamoq nyvng.
44007001	Phudyei Zainsmuh taiq cho haih zis jyoeng lah, ge.
44007002	Nyang taiq zis gas, Vmang vnoeuh moq yahge uwus moq eh, gyo yoeus dyei geh: ngamoq dah phauh thyeih Abraham Haran mas ma los nyeis shih, Mesopotamia mau mas nyeis khoq yoq lyis, phunk bos dah Mangso ka nyah jyank mas thuq xoeuq las taiq zis gas,
44007003	Nah mau, nah buisnoms sainhchangh masyah thuq las ngos nvng lyis tuonh shet das mau mas loh aq, ge.
44007004	Housoeh las nyang gas Khade mau masyah thuq las Haran mau mas los nyeis. Houmha nyah uwus shei thang lhyi, Mangso ka gvshih namoq nyeis, haih mau mas thuot los nhang.
44007005	Houmha nyang lyis yhenzis yahge maunyeis khyei yos iq khvlangh ma dyei laus eq Mangso nyang lyis dangthoengh toh zis gas, nyang yahge nyah vkoq gas hauh mau lyis xauh sain das, ge. Hauh uhlyis Abraham gas loshang ma bos shih.
44007006	Hauh thoq lyis Mangso haih cho lhyi taiq zis gas, Nyah vnyau lvbaus mau mas loh khau nyeis las, hauh mau mas nyeixo zvn jons duot las nyamoq lyis gyvzaiq gyvnang kuot zis xauh das.
44007007	Nyamoq lyis jons kuot dah vnyau lyis eq, ngos joeng das, hauh uhlyis nyamoq thuq los las haih joqyos mas ngos lyis paiq das, ge.
44007008	Vthyoh tyomh cho yah sen dah thanghchvp lyis eq nyang lyis dyei kat. Housoeh las Abraham mas yaus dah Isak lyis xet vnyeih lyis vthyoh tyomh dyei. Isak mas yaus zis Yakop, Yakop mas yaus zis phauh thyeih moq dvci aiq yuk nghuot.
44007009	Phauh thyeih moq gas Yosep lyis noh las Egutu mau pheh ungh kat. Nghuot laus eq Mangso nyang yah dvgeh nyeis yvmvyah,
44007010	Shohjyen zis dvnganh masyah nyang lyis khyuot yoeus las, Egutu hwankti Pharao dah xikkhonh mas nyang lyis nyoqnho yoh nhang lha joeui Chixoeuq nhang. Hauh hwankti ka Egutu mau yahge nyah yhenbang dvnganh lyis guon soeu kuot nhang.
44007011	Hauh uhlyis Egutu mau yahge Khanan mau gonh mas phangh khauq gyoh las yaukyenh zainsmuh jweh los. Yamoq dah phauh thyeih moq eq zonoms khalhye ma daq xo lo.
44007012	Gvshih Egutu mau mas wom joq cho lhyi Yakop xauhgyo las, nyang gas, yah phauh thyeih moq lyis cangxeih vlhain nhang kat.
44007013	Aiq vlhain ka Yosep gas nyah vmang vnoeuh moq lyis nyang hank nghuot cho taiq kyoh las Yosep dah vnyau cho lhyi eq Pharao seq loh.
44007014	Housoeh Yosep gas nyah uwus Yakop yahge nyah dvyhen gonh oen das, dius nyhetci oeng yuk gonh lyis loeus kyoh las Egutu pheh los das xiklyis khi kat.
44007015	Yakop eq Egutu mau mas e lha, nyang yahge yah phauh thyeih moq houmha shei goeus.
44007016	Nyamoq mvng lyis Shekhem mha tsain yoeus los las, Shekhem mas tsain nyeis, Hamor dah nyei nyet jens jyank masyah Abraham dah ngwis yah wis toh lop mas tsain nyhop.
44007017	Abraham lyis Mangso dangthoengh toh zis yah sen dah shishenh jweh los lyis, Egutu mas nyeis, yah dius jens gas svsoh jebais los.
44007018	Hauh uhlyis Yosep lyis ma seq dah hwankti dvyuk guon xi los.
44007019	Nyang gas yah vnyau lyis lhyent zis yah, phauh thyeih moq lyis gyvzaiq gyvnang shoeuhshih las nyamoq dah lonoeuh jens lyis shei bas jungh ge doeuh tyamp nhang.
44007020	Hauh shishenh lyis Moshe khoeu los: nyang gas Mangso dah xikkhonh mas yungh joq. Nyah uwus dah yhen mas lhamhmuh somh khyvp nyhoeu las,
44007021	doeuh tyamp toh zis xauh uhlyis, Pharao dah lonyi kui zis yah nyah lo kuot las nyhoeu kat.
44007022	Moshe eq Egutu joeui dvnganh xuq las, nhuot nhuot loq loq kunk soeu nghuot.
44007023	Gvshih Moshe nyenhkyi nyeici zvn bos lyis nyah boekyis Israel jens jyank mas e komh mes ehnyet bos los.
44007024	Hauh uhlyis gyvzaiq gyvnang xauh nyeis soeu dvyuk lyis nyang nyvng las, hauh soeu lhyi yeimus las, gyvzaiq gyvnang kuot soeu Egutu dius lyis lvto phuk khyvlyis sat.
44007025	Moshe loq yah boekyis lyis Mangso khyuot yoeus cho phank dyei nyeis zis gas nyamoq seq das, ge las nghamh laus eq, nyamoq gas ma tsain seq.
44007026	Thang lhyi nyeihyo Moshe ka, Israel nyang changh nyang zan goh nyeis zis lyis e zangh nyvng las, nyah aiq yuk lyis khyuon mes yvmvyah, Nhaiqbos tang eh, vmang vnoeuh nyang changh dvnghuot lyis chamus nyang changh nyang zan goh nyeis lah, ge khyuon lhyi,
44007027	yhenkyoh lyis shoeuhshih nyeis soeu ka, Moshe lhyi duon tyamp zis yah, Nvng lyis ngamoq thoq mas guon soeu yahge, soetuon soeu hank kuot nhang?
44007028	Nyinaq Egutu dius dvyuk lyis sat teh, ngos lyis eq sat mes lhyeh, ge phuk taiq.
44007029	Hauh dang gvng mas Moshe phang lha, Midian mau mas dius boengh e duot nyeis uhlyis, nyang mas yukgis lo aiq yuk bos.
44007030	Nyeici zvn dyingh lai thang lhyi, Sina boms dah mhanhdyvp, nyi duk nyeis dah mhanhgyomh mas, Yhensain dah loeuswons soeu nyah jyank mas thuq los.
44007031	Moshe ka hauh yvlyis nyvng lyis hauh nyoqnyvng gvng mas nyang mauh las hauh zis lyis yoeuh das ge loh lyis, Yhensain dah thwe hou mhayah taiq thuq los zis gas,
44007032	Ngos gas nah phauh thyeih moq dah Mangso, Abraham, Isak, Yakop moq dah Mangso nghuot, ge. Moshe ka gyuk nvn las ma womh yoeuh mus.
44007033	Yhensain nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nah thyvkoq khyuot tyamp aq. Khasoeh ge lyis nvng yap joqyos gas gyingshang.
44007034	Egutu mas ngah dius jens xauh dah shoeuhshih cho lhyi ngos jyoengh nyvng goeus. Nyamoq noskyingh thwe xauhgyo. Housoeh yvmvyah nyamoq lyis khyuot yoeus das xiklyis ngos gyoh los zis nghuot. Los aq, ngos nvng lyis Egutu mas nhang kat bah, ge.
44007035	Housoeh las, Nvng lyis guon soeu yahge soetuon soeu hank kuot nhang, ge las nyamoq he tyamp dah Moshe lhyi, Mangso ka mhanhgyomh mas thuq xoeuq dah loeuswons soeu lhyi yah, guon soeu yahge khyuot yoeus soeu kuot das xiklyis nhang kat.
44007036	Housoeh nyang nyamoq lyis Egutu mas eq, Thomh Nes mas eq, mhanhdyvp mas eq nyeici zvn top yomsoq muh yahge mauh loqmuh chixoeuq las shwih los.
44007037	Haih Moshe nyang, Namoq vmang vnoeuh masyah ngos teh dah lvpe dvyuk thuq los nhang das ge Israel jens lyis taiq toh soeu nghuot.
44007038	Mhanhdyvp mas nghuot yoq lyis dah moqphung mha Sina boms mas nyang yah dang jis goh dah loeuswons soeu yahge yah phauh thyeih moq yah dvgeh nghuot soeu ka, nyang nghuot: yang lyis dyei das, kang bos dah dang lhom yoeus soeu eq nyang nghuot.
44007039	Yah phauh thyeih moq gas nyah dang ma mes gyo las, nyang lyis nungsyos toh zis yah, nyamoq dah nhaiqlom mas Egutu pheh doms tauh loh mes.
44007040	Nyamoq Aron lyis taiq zis gas, Ngamoq xik pheh kat das zis mangso jens kuot aq. Khasoeh ge lyis ngamoq lyis Egutu masyah shwih thuq los, haih Moshe chamus goeus zis ngamoq ma seq, ge.
44007041	Hauh buisnyeis gyo lyis nyamoq noeu lho dvkoeuq kuot las, hauh silho lyis lomhxangh lainh las nyamoq nyang loq yah kuot dah muhzoh xiklyis pwe kuot nyeis.
44007042	Housoeh yvmvyah Mangso ka nyamoq jyank masyah nyoqnho gohshot xoeu tyamp las, maukhung mha dah buislom lhamhmuh lyis paiq das xiklyis doeuh tyamp khoq dah haih zis gas, lvpe jens dah maussauh mas, Israel dius jens eh, hau mhanhdyvp mas nyeici zvn gyo lyis namoq sat dah gaunyhauq yahge lomhxangh lainh zis gas, Ngos lyis paiq zis nghuot lah?
44007043	Namoq paiq das xiklyis kuot toh dah gywes lho tsain nghuot dah Molok dah zvng yahge namoq dah gywes Rephan dah kyi namoq tsain wuq. Housoeh yvmvyah namoq lyis ngos Babilon lai shoq jonsdoeus loh nhang das, ge lhaih toh.
44007044	Nvng nyvng dah vzwvng yah dvyhangteh chank kuot aq, ge Moshe lhyi taiq kat zis teh kuot dah kanghjyoeng zvng lyis, hauh mhanhdyvp mas, yah phauh thyeih moq xauh yoeus.
44007045	Hauh thang lhyi yah phauh thyeih moq gas, nyamoq xikkhonh masyah Mangso khat tyamp dah gohnyau bang mau lyis nyamoq dah mau kuot das xiklyis Yoshua yah dvgeh wvng los uhlyis haih zvng eq chi wvng los las Dawi dah zaih jweh shoq joq.
44007046	Dawi gas Mangso xikkhonh mas nyoqnho yoh las, Yakop dah Mangso nyhenshang zvng xo das xiklyis sang toh goeus laus eq,
44007047	Solomon yuk nyah xiklyis zvng kuot dyei.
44007048	Nghuot laus eq nyhang thank Soeu ka, dius loq yah dvkuot yhen mas lungh zis ma nghuot. Hauh cho lvpe taiq zis gas,
44007049	Maukhung ka ngah hwankti tank, nyeisjvng gas ngah nangte nghuot. Nvng ngah xiklyis khasoeh teh dah yhen kuot das lah? Ngos no das joqyos gas khamha nghuot lah?
44007050	Hau dvnganh zis lyis ngah loq yah kyingh dvkuot toh ma nghuot lhyeh? ge Yhensain taiq, ge.
44007051	Nhaiqlom than lha ehnyet yahge no lyis vthyoh ma tyomh bang eh, namoq vjangh Gyingshang Dyos lyis ngoek tyamp; namoq dah phauh thyeih moq kuot teh namoq eq housoeh dvtsain kuot nyeis.
44007052	Namoq dah phauh thyeih ma shoeuhshih ku dah lvpe hank bos lah? Hauh Dan Soeu thuq los das cho lhyi taiq hoeuh bang lyis, nyamoq sat. Gvshih namoq eq hauh soeu lhyi kyauh tyamp bang yahge sat bang nghuot.
44007053	Loeuswons bang masyah xauh yoeus dah Mangso dah lyi xauh yoeus bang nghuot laus eq, namoq hauh yvlyis chank tyink zis ma nghuot, ge.
44007054	Hauh cho xauhgyo lyis nyamoq nhaiq gis yo zis yah nyang lyis zwis swih las tsain yoeuh.
44007055	Nyang gas Gyingshang Dyos dyingh las, maukhung mha yoeuh kat lyis, Mangso phunk yahge Mangso dah loqyos shot pheh Yesu yap joq yvlyis nyvng las,
44007056	Yoeuh aq, maukhung phank hanh joq las cangsoeu Lo gas Mangso dah loqyos shot pheh yap joq yvlyis ngos nyvng goeus, ge.
44007057	Hauh uhlyis nyamoq gas no cauq, yomkat kaiq las, dvyih dvyot dvlhain dvm lyis nyah jyank mas tsain dyvm e las,
44007058	nyamoq gas nyang lyis wus nghe pheh she thuq loh las lukzains yah tsain chomp doeuh. Hauh uhlyis kanghjyoeng jens eq nyamoq dah dyi khyuot las Saulo ge dah loyvm phoq khyeiyang mas tsain toh.
44007059	Housoeh tsain doeuh nyeis lyis, Stephan shvmanh dung zis gas, Yhensain Yesu eh, ngah dyos lyis lhom yoeus dyei aq, ge.
44007060	Tsai, nyang phvluk zomhgyuis las, Yhensain eh, haih yobos nyamoq lyis vhuon dyei ge yomkat kaiq. Hauh zis dye taiq lyis nyang shei goeus.
44008001	Saulo eq nyang lyis sat dah yvmas bos jyonh. Hauh buisnyeis lyis Yerusalem mas dah phung ka shoeuhshih zis xauh los las, lvgyo jens masyah lai las gohtoeu dvnganhmoq gas Yuda mau, Samari mau, joqyos khyiq khanghmuh mas tsain dyos loh.
44008002	Nghuot laus eq lomsjingh cho mha wontang bang gas, Stephan lyis ba nyhop las, nyah xiklyis kukxi zainsmuh kuot.
44008003	Saulo ka yhen khanghmuh wvng las nyelo yukgis lo lyis lang she lha thung lhunk zis yahge hau phung lyis thyoq sanh tyamp.
44008004	Dyos loh bang gas, loh jweh dah joqyos khanghmuh mas Dang lyis taiq kyoh.
44008005	Hauh uhlyis Philip gas Samari wus mas loh las, Khristu dah cho taiq kyoh.
44008006	Nyang taiq kyoh cho xauhgyo zis yahge nyang chixoeuq dah vlho tsain nyvng lyis, dius jens ehnyet dvlom yah nyah dang lyis nhaiq wvng zis yah tsain gyo yoeus.
44008007	Khasoeh ge lyis, yius kuq bang nyoshoq masyah, yius jens gas yomkat kaiq las tsain thuq loh. Gungsjen shei bang yahge khyei dyoq bang nyoshoq eq gis los.
44008008	Housoeh las hauh wus mas svsoh gausyis nyeis.
44008009	Nghuot laus eq houmha Simon ge soeu dvyuk nyeis. Nyang gas nyah gungs nyang diuszains dvyuk teh nghamh las nyah hweq kat zis yah Samari jens lyis dvyoq mauh nhang soeu nghuot.
44008010	Dius ngislo kuhlo dvnganhmoq yah, Haih soeu ka kuh thank Mangso dah yomsoq nghuot, ge nyah dang lyis omes zis yah tsain gyo.
44008011	Hauh soeu ka nyah hweq yah nyamoq lyis nyangh nyangh lo mauh nhang goeus yvmvyah, nyang lyis omes zis yah gyo zis nghuot.
44008012	Nghuot laus eq Mangso dah munghdan cho yahge Yesu Khristu nyings yah sen dah gausyis dang Philip taiq kyoh yvlyis tsain lomsjingh las, nyelo yukgis lo jeisnyhop tsain kham.
44008013	Simon nyang eq lomsjingh las jeisnyhop dye kham yoeus lyis, Philip thang mas chank nyeis. Nyang kuot dah yomsoq muh yahge vlho nyvng lyis nyang svsoh mauh.
44008014	Samari jens Mangso dah Dang lhom yoeus zis lyis Yerusalem mas nyeis dah lvgyo jens xauhgyo lyis, nyamoq gas Petru yahge Yohan lyis nyamoq jyank mas nhang kat.
44008015	Nyah aiq yuk eq houmha jweh lyis, nyamoq Gyingshang Dyos xauh yoeus das xiklyis shvmanh tsain dung dyei.
44008016	Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq hank thoq mas eq Gyingshang Dyos ma gyoh lyih ku shih. Yhensain Yesu dah nyings mas jeisnyhop kham zis kyingh dvtsain nghuot shih.
44008017	Housoeh lvgyo Petru yahge Yohan nyamoq thoq mas loq kih dyei lyis, nyamoq hau Gyingshang Dyos tsain xauh kham yoeus.
44008018	Lvgyo nhaiqtang dah loq kih dyei las Dyos xauh kham yoeus zis lyis Simon nyvng lyis, nyang ngwis e dyei lho lha,
44008019	sang zis gas, Hank thoq mas laus eq ngos loq kih lyis, hauh soeu Gyingshang Dyos xauh yoeus das xiklyis, housoeh teh dah yomsoq ngos lyis eq dyei aq, ge.
44008020	Petru taiq zis gas, Mangso dah jyungshuk lyis ngwis yah xauh yoeus das ge nghamh yvmvyah, nah ngwis gas nvng yah dvgeh dyoqbis bas jungh.
44008021	Nah ehnyet Mangso dah xikkhonh mas ma dan joq yvmvyah, haih cho mha nvng ma bos, gvmboms ma yoh.
44008022	Housoeh yvmvyah nah lhung cho lhyi nhaiqlom thaiq las Yhensain lhyi dung aq, nah ehnyet mas nghamh khoq cho toq khyuot dyei mvbeh.
44008023	Khasoeh ge lyis nvng mas noh cho yah dyingh joq las yaunos dah mauchuotdwang mas lungh joq yvlyis ngos nyvng, ge.
44008024	Simon phuk taiq zis gas, Nah aiq yuk taiq cho ngah jyank mas cha eq ma jweh bas jungh, ngah nyhen shang nah aiq yuk nyang Yhensain jyank mas bos dung dyei geh, ge.
44008025	Nyah aiq yuk gas Yhensain dah dang cho kanghjyoeng kat las dye taiq kyoh lyis, Samari wukhau nyoshoq mas hau gausyis dang taiq kyoh uhjyangh Yerusalem pheh tsain tauh loh.
44008026	Gvshih Yhensain dah loeuswons soeu Philip lyis taiq zis gas, Toq aq, Yerusalem masyah Gaza pheh loh dah cho bangh shoq, mautyi pheh dyet loh aq, ge. Hauh cho ka mhanhdyvp cho nghuot.
44008027	Housoeh nyang toq las loh. Yoeuh aq, Ethiopia mas guon soeu hwankti nyhiq Kandake dah xikkhonh mas nyoqnho ngelang zainsmuh yoh las, nyah zisyos dvnganh yah zom soeu Ethiopia dius Unuk gas, Mangso lhyi chungh paiq das xiklyis Yerusalem mas loh khoq.
44008028	Gvshih nyang doms tauh loh zis nyah nyang lhyingh khau mha tsung las lvpe Esaia dah maussauh nghap nyeis.
44008029	Hauh uhlyis Dyos yah Philip lyis taiq zis gas, Loh aq, hau lhyingh yah tanh tanh loh aq, ge.
44008030	Philip eq wuih loh las Esaia maussauh nghap nyeis zis xauhgyo lyis, Nvng nghap cho lhyi seqgyo lhyeh, ge nyang lyis nyei.
44008031	Hauh soeu phuk taiq zis gas, Vjyuk taiq kyoh das soeu ma bos lyis ngos khasoeh kuot las seqgyo das lah, ge las nyang yah dvgeh lhyingh khau mha wvng tsung das xiklyis Philip lyis yus.
44008032	Nyang nghap dah maussauh dang gas haih zis nghuot. Yvng lyis teh nyang lyis sat das soeu jyank mas shwih loh; Yvnglo gas yvng mauh gom soeu xikkhonh mas taih toh teh, nyang nyah nhuot ma haq.
44008033	Nyang khyoq zis xauh yvmvyah, nyang lyis jyoeng khyvlyis dang thang ma tsain thyet dyei. Nyah dius caiq hank yoh shap? Khasoeh ge lyis nyah kang ka, Nyeisjvng thoq mas thank tyamp goeus, ge.
44008034	Unuk Philip lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Haih lvpe ka hank lyis toeuq las taiq au lhyeh, nyah gungs lyis nyang taiq au? Nghuot ya, gohtoeu dvyuk yuk lyis taiq lah, ge.
44008035	Hauh uhlyis Philip dang taiq phank las, hauh maussauh masyah dang zoh yoeus lho lha, Yesu yah sen dah gausyis dang nyang lyis taiq kyoh.
44008036	Housoeh nyah aiq yuk tsoq loh las jeis joq yvmas jweh lyis Unuk gas, Yoeuh aq, heimha jeis joq; ngos jeisnyhop kham das xiklyis tomp toh das zis cha bos lah, ge.
44008037	Philip taiq zis gas, Nah nhaiqlom dvnganh yah nvng lomsjingh goeus ya, gis kham goeus, ge. Nyang phuk taiq zis gas, Yesu Khristu gas Mangso dah Lo nghuot nyeis zis gas ngos lomsjingh goeus, ge.
44008038	Housoeh nyah lhyingh no nhang lha, nyah aiq yuk jeis lvng mas gyoh e lha, Philip gas Unuk lyis jeisnyhop dyei.
44008039	Jeis masyah tsain thuq los lyis Yhensain dah Dyos Philip lyis shwih loh las, ma nyvng kat lo. Unuk eq gauslaus zis yah nyah cho nyang loh lo.
44008040	Philip gas Azotu wus mas jweh nyeis yvlyis nyang soh. Nyang Kesare wus jweh shoq loh uhlyis suh lai dah wus khanghmuh mas hauh gausyis dang taiq kyoh.
44009001	Hauh yoq lyis Saulo ka Yhensain dah changlo jens lyis sat das xiklyis kyuk tant cho lhyi tsoq kuot nyeis shih. Housoeh nyang gas phudyei zainsmuh jyank mas e lha,
44009002	haih cho chank bang nyelo yukgis lo, nyvng ya nyvng yvlyis nyhik las Yerusalem mas yoh she los shoq, Damasku wugungs, lyi jungs mas bang lyis dyei kat das vmingh maussauh sang wons.
44009003	Nyang Damasku wugungs nvm mas jweh lyis maukhung mha dah bvng zis nyah yvmlhaink yah nyetlos nyettant bvng thuq los.
44009004	Nyang eq nyeisjvng mas lains loh lyis, nyang lyis taiq dah thwe dvkoeuq xauhgyo zis gas, Saulo, Saulo, nvng ngos lyis chamus shoeuhshih nyeis lah, ge.
44009005	Hauh uhlyis nyang gas, Yhensain eh, nvng hank nghuot lah, ge nyei. Yhensain taiq zis gas, Ngos gas nvng shoeuhshih nyeis dah Yesu nghuot.
44009006	Nghuot laus eq, toq las wus mas wvng loh aq. Nvng kuot chah cho nvng lyis taiq kyoh langh das, ge.
44009007	Nyang yah dvgeh loh bang gas tsain mauh: khasoeh ge lyis, thwe xauhgyo laus eq hank lyis eq ma nyvng.
44009008	Saulo nyeisjvng masyah toq las nyoq phank yoeuh lyis cha eq ma nyvng yvmvyah, nyamoq gas nyang lyis loq masyah she las Damasku wus mas shwih wvng loh.
44009009	Gvshih nyang gas somh nyeih top nyoq ma nyvng las ma zo ma shuk nyeis.
44009010	Gvshih Damasku wus mas Anani ge dah changlo dvyuk nyeis. Yhensain ka nyoqnyvng masyah, Anani eh, ge lui. Nyang eq, Yhensain eh, heimha nyeis, ge toeuh.
44009011	Yhensain taiq zis gas, Toq aq, Chodan ge dah wus cho mha e las, Yuda yhen mha Tarshu mas dah dius Saulo ge soeu lhyi e xo aq, nyang shvmanh dung nyeis.
44009012	Nyah nyoqnyvng mas Anani ge soeu nyah jyank mas wvng los las, nyang nyoq doms nyvng bas jungh, ge nyah thoq mas loq kih dyei zis, nyvng goeus, ge.
44009013	Anani gas, Yhensain eh, hauh soeu ka Yerusalem mas nah Gyingshang bang lyis ma gis khyvlyis kha iq kuot zis gas, dius nyoshoq masyah loeus nyoshoq xauhgyo goeus.
44009014	Nah nyings yoeus bang dvnganh lyis twih she loh das ge, phudyei uhjyung jens jyank masyah vmingh xauh yoeus goeus, heimha eq jweh nyeis, ge toeuh.
44009015	Nghuot laus eq Yhensain nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Dv e aq, hauh soeu ka gohnyau bang yahge hwankti jens xikkhonh mas eq, Israel vnyau xikkhonh mas eq ngah nyings wons wuq das xiklyis ngos khyen toh, ngah jyeidwis nghuot.
44009016	Khasoeh ge lyis ngah nyings gvng mas kha iq shanghsenh shohjyen xauh das cho ngos nyang lyis chixoeuq das, ge.
44009017	Housoeh Anani hauh yhen mha jweh e lha, Saulo thoq mas loq kih las, Vmang vnoeuh Saulo eh, nvng nyoq doms nyvng zis yahge Gyingshang Dyos yah dyingh bas jungh, nvng los cho mha nvng lyis nyvng xoeuq dah Yhensain Yesu gas ngos lyis nhang kat, ge lho lhyi,
44009018	Houyah dvyih Saulo dah nyoq masyah vkyvp teh dah zis gyoh tyamp las nyah nyoq doms nyvng goeus. Housoeh nyang toq las jeisnyhop kham.
44009019	Zonoms eq zo las yom huiq yoeus. Hauh thang lhyi Saulo ka Damasku wus mas dah changlo jens yah dvyoq nyeis uhjyangh,
44009020	Khristu gas Mangso dah Lo nghuot, ge hauh uhlyis nyang lyi jungs mas tsain taiq kyoh.
44009021	Nyah dang xauh ya xauhgyo bang gas mauh las, Haih soeu ka Yerusalem mas haih nyings yoeus bang lyis lhoq thyoq soeu ma nghuot lhyeh? Gvshih heimha eq housoeh teh bang lyis nyhik las phudyei uhjyung jens jyank mas loh kyauh das zis los jweh nyeis ma nghuot lhyeh, ge taiq.
44009022	Saulo ka dvnyeih dvnyeih yombos los las, Yesu gas Khristu nyang nghuot dah cho kanghjyoeng Chixoeuq zis yah Damasku mas nyeis dah Yuda jens lyis mauh nhang.
44009023	Buisnyeis nyangh nyangh lo thang lhyi Yuda jens nyang lyis sat das zis xamgoh.
44009024	Nghuot laus eq nyamoq dah khaujeini cho lhyi Saulo seq tyamp goeus. Nyang lyis yoh sat shoq, khomh mas nyeih nyenh tsain lhom nyeis.
44009025	Housoeh las changlo jens gas, nyenh lyis nyang lyis mhanghkhoq masyah ciank khomhbaiq cho nghe pheh tsain xuot khyoq kat.
44009026	Housoeh nyang Yerusalem mas jweh lyis changlo jens yah zomhgoh das zis yomkat; nghuot laus eq nyang gas changlo nghuot goeus zis nyamoq ma jingh las nyang lyis dvnganhmoq gyuk.
44009027	Nghuot laus eq Barnaba gas nyang lyis lvgyo jens jyank mas shwih e lha, Saulo ka Yhensain yah cho mas khasoeh xauhgoh las, Yhensain yah nyang lyis khasoeh taiq zis eq, Damasku mas Yesu nyings yoeus las womh womh taiq kyoh cho eq nyamoq lyis taiq kyoh.
44009028	Housoeh Yerusalem mas nyang nyamoq yah thuq wvng kuot uhjyangh,
44009029	Yhensain Yesu dah nyings yoeus las womh womh taiq kyoh nyeis. Greek nyingh kat dah Yuda jens yah eq taiq phyen-goh yvmvyah, nyamoq gas nyang lyis sat das ge sont.
44009030	Hauh cho lhyi boekyis seq lyis nyang lyis Kesare jweh shoq shwih kat las Tarshu pheh nhang kat.
44009031	Hauh uhlyis Yuda mau, Samari mau yahge Galile mau dvkhauyah dah phung ka nyenstap zis yah tsain kuhxing los. Nyamoq gas Gyingshang Dyos dah nhaiqtaink dyei zis yah dvyhangteh Yhensain lhyi gyukwoms zis yah nyeis las nyoshoq jebais los.
44009032	Hauh uhlyis Petru gas dvkhauyah chank komh yenh. Dvlhain ka Luda wus mas nyeis dah Gyingshang bang jyank mas eq jweh e.
44009033	Hauh yvmas gungsjen shei lha xet zvn top yhetyos masyah ma yoh toq dah Anea ge vbusbih dvyuk lyis nyvng.
44009034	Petru nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Anea eh, Yesu Khristu nvng lyis gis los nhang goeus: toq aq, nah yhetyos shung aq, ge. Houyah dvyih nyang toq loh.
44009035	Luda yahge Sharon wus mas nyeis bang dvnganh eq nyang lyis nyvng las Yhensain jyank pheh tsain lhain los.
44009036	Gvshih Yopa wus mas Tabitha ge dah changlo vmesbih dvyuk nyeis. Greek pheh hauh nyings gas Dorka ge. Vjyuk gas cvt nghuot. Nyang gas gis dah muhzoh yahge vlu dyei cho mas nhaiqbos soeu nghuot.
44009037	Hauh yoq lyis nyang nos las shei tyamp. Nyah mvng lyis cheih las nyhang tsank yvp mas toh toh.
44009038	Luda gas Yopa wus yah ni joq las, Petru houmha nyeis cho changlo jens xauhgyo lyis nyamoq dius dvzomh nhang lha, Ngamoq jyank pheh lvnyap jenh lyih aq, ge dung kat.
44009039	Petru toq las hauh aiq yuk yah dvgeh chank loh. Nyang jweh lyis nyhang tsank yvp mas shwih wvng loh las, chauhmuh jens dvnganhmoq nyah vyvm mas yap ngaus uhjyangh, nyamoq yah dvgeh nyeis shih uhlyis Dorka chop dah dyi chixoeuq las nyeis.
44009040	Petru dvnganhmoq lyis nghe pheh khat thuq lho las, phvluk zomhgyuis las shvmanh dung nyeis. Housoeh hauh mvng pheh lhain los las, Tabitha eh, toq aq, ge. Hauh uhlyis Tabitha gas nyoq phank las Petru lyis nyvng lyis toq tsung toh.
44009041	Petru eq loq yhuonh kat las she toq lho las, gyingshang bang yahge chauhmuh jens lyis khi yoeus las vdwis kyauh.
44009042	Hauh cho lhyi Yopa wuxom gonh xauhgyo yvmvyah nyoshoq Yhensain lhyi lomsjingh.
44009043	Housoeh Petru gas Yopa wus mas dvyoq lo shohyeis muh kuot soeu Simon yah dvgeh nyeis.
44010001	Gvshih Kesare wus mas Korneli ge soeu dvyuk nyeis. Nyang gas Itali ge dah thoenkgus jesdvp mas jes dvxo guon zau nghuot.
44010002	Hauh soeu ka lomsjingh cho mas wontang lha nyah yhenbang dvnganh yah dvgeh, Mangso lhyi gyuk woms zis yah svbih lyis vlu nyoshoq dyei uhjyangh Mangso lhyi vjangh dung nyeis.
44010003	Dvnyeih gas, somh shishenh ko lhyi Mangso dah loeuswons soeu nyah jyank mas jweh las, Korneli eh, ge nyang lyis taiq zis gas nyoq mas gyoq gyoq nyvng.
44010004	Nyang gas hauh soeu lyis gyuk zoh lyis gyaus gyaus yoeuh tsuk toh las, Yhensain eh, chah cho nghuot lah, ge nyang lyis nyei. Hauh soeu ka, Nah shvmanh dung zis yahge vlu dyei cho ka, Mangso xikkhonh mas nyoqnyhank dvkoeuq khyvlyis bangh los goeus.
44010005	Gvshih Yopa wus mas dius nhang las, Petru ge dah Simon lyis khi aq.
44010006	Nyang gas shohyeis muh kuot soeu Simon yhen mas nyeis; nyah yhen ka thomh yvm mas nghuot, ge.
44010007	Korneli yah dang jis goh dah loeuswons soeu loh thang lhyi, nyah yhen mas dah uhkung dvzomh yahge nyah thang mas vjangh chank yenh moq mas lomsjingh cho mas wontang soeu jeslo dvyuk lyis khi yoeus las,
44010008	nyamoq lyis hauh cho dvnganh taiq kyoh lho las, Yopa wus mas nhang kat.
44010009	Nyamoq eq nungs nyeih loh las, Yopa nvm mas jweh lyis, Petru gas nyeihgungs dvci aiq shishenh ko lhyi shvmanh dung das ge yhenkhung thoq mas doq loh.
44010010	Housoeh wom ba nyeis uhlyis nyang wom yuot las zonoms dvja ja zo mes nyeis. Hauh uhlyis nyang yhet muih loh las nyoqnyvng nyvng.
44010011	Maukhung phank las kha iq teh jangthunk dvkhyvp nyeisjvng mas khyoq kat yvlyis nyang nyvng.
44010012	Hauh yvmas nyeisjvng thoq mas dah nyei khyei dap gaunyhauq, yewus, shweh loh ja yahge maudang nghoq vja ja tsain bos.
44010013	Petru eh, toq las sat zo aq, ge thwe nyings thuq los zis nyang xauhgyo.
44010014	Petru phuk taiq zis gas, Ma nghuot, Yhensain eh, ma gis zo zis yahge ma lhoq ma shang vyhang lhyi ngos khanhamp eq ma zo yoeuh, ge.
44010015	Aiq vlhain dah thwe ka, Mangso cheihshang goeus vyhang lyis ma lhoq oen vsang, ge.
44010016	Somh lhain shilo housoeh bweh las, hauh thang lhyi hauh yvlyis maukhung pheh dvlhaindvm doms yoeus tyamp.
44010017	Petru gas nyang nyvng dah nyoqnyvng gas cha nghuot au, ge mauh khamkhvv nyeis uhlyis, Korneli nhang kat bang Simon yhen xo nyeis las khomh nvm mas yap joq.
44010018	Hauh yhen mas Petru ge dah Simon nyeis ma nyeis tsain kaiq nyei nyeis.
44010019	Petru gas nyoqnyvng hauh dah cho lhyi nghamh yoeuh nyeis shih lyis, Dyos gas, Yoeuh aq, dius somh yuk nvng lyis xo nyeis.
44010020	Housoeh yvmvyah nvng toq las gyoh e aq; nyamoq yah dvgeh chank loh aq, khamkhvv chank ma bos: khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq lyis ngos nhang kat, ge.
44010021	Petru eq Korneli yah nyah jyank mas nhang kat bang jyank mas gyoh e las nyei zis gas, Yoeuh aq, namoq xo nyeis soeu ngos nghuot, chah soe bos las xo goh lah, ge.
44010022	Nyamoq taiq zis gas, Dan las Mangso lhyi gyukwoms zis yahge Yuda dvnyau gonh dah xikkhonh mas nyoqnho ngelang bos las jes dvxo guon zau Korneli gas nvng lyis nyah yhen mas khi hwank las nah dang gyo yoeus das cho, Mangso jyank masyah Gyingshang loeuswons soeu lyih taiq kyingh zis xauh, ge.
44010023	Housoeh nyang nyamoq lyis khi hwank las thoeng nhang. Nungs nyeih Petru toq las nyamoq yah dvgeh loh. Yopa wus mas dah boekyis dvyhamh eq nyang yah dvgeh bos loh.
44010024	Hauh thang lhyi nyeihyo Kesare wus mas wvng loh. Korneli gas nyah vmang vnoeuh moq yahge buisnoms sainhchangh jens lyis shwih huom lha nyamoq lyis langh nyeis.
44010025	Gvshih Petru wvng loh lyis, Korneli gas lhom zes zis yah nyah khyeiyang mas dupaiq.
44010026	Nghuot laus eq Petru gas, Toq aq, ngos eq seq shei dah dius dvnghuot, ge taiq uhjyangh nyang lyis she toq kat.
44010027	Housoeh nyang jisgoh zoh lyis yah wvng loh yoeuh lyis dius nyoshoq huom joq yvlyis nyvng.
44010028	Petru nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Yuda dius ge soeu ka gohnyau dius yah thuq wvng zomh goh dah lyi thungh ma bos zis lyis namoq nyang seq. Nghuot laus eq, hank lyis eq ma mon ma yih, ma gying ma shang oen ma gis sang cho ka Mangso ngos lyis chixoeuq goeus.
44010029	Housoeh nghuot yvmvyah, ngos lyis khi lyis ngos ma he he chank los. Housoeh las ngos lhyi chamus khi goh lah, oen nyei mes, ge.
44010030	Korneli taiq zis gas, Lai loh goeus nyei nyeih nyenhthang somh nayi lyis ngos ngah yhen mas shvmanh dung nyeis lyis, yoeuh aq, kyi kyi bvng dah dyimis wuot soeu dvyuk ngah xikkhonh mas nyetlos nyettant yap xoeuq las,
44010031	Nyang taiq zis gas, Korneli eh, nah shvmanh dung dang gyo yoeus goeus. Nah vlu dyei zis eq Mangso comh toh goeus.
44010032	Housoeh yvmvyah Yopa mas Petru ge dah Simon lyis e shwih nhang aq; hauh soeu ka thomh nvm mas nyeis, shohyeis muh kuot soeu Simon yhen mas nyeis, ge.
44010033	Housoeh yvmvyah houjang ngos nah jyank mas dius nhang las, gvshih nvng jweh los zis gas svsoh gis. Housoeh las Mangso nvng lyis taiq nhang kat dang lyis gyo yoeus das xiklyis gvshih ngamoq dvnganh Mangso xikkhonh mas nghuot joq, ge.
44010034	Petru dang zoh yoeus las taiq zis gas, Mangso ka dius nyoqnho ma khyen zis gvshih ngos jyoengh seq goeus.
44010035	Dius nyau khanghmuh mas nyang lyis gyukwoms phauh nyang zis yah dan dah muh kuot soeu lyis gas nyang yoh lhom yoeus.
44010036	Mangso ka Israel dius jens lyis gausyis Dang dyei yvlyis namoq seq. Hauh dang mas nyang gas dvnganh dah Yhensain nghuot dah Yesu Khristu masyah nyenstap gausyis Dang lyis taiq kyoh nyeis.
44010037	Yohan jeisnyhop cho lhyi taiq kyoh thang lhyi, Dang haih zis gas Galile mau masyah Yuda mau gonh mas dyos loh goeus.
44010038	Mangso ka Nazaret phoq Yesu lyis Gyingshang Dyos yah eq, yomsoq yah eq nyang lyis coeu juot dyei goeus zis namoq seq. Yesu Khristu gas vwi vyvm mas loh las, gis dah muh kuot zis yahge yius yah nhiq zaiq toh bang dvnganhmoq lyis lhoq gis dyei. Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka nyang yah dvgeh nghuot.
44010039	Housoeh Yuda jens dah mau mas eq, Yerusalem wus mas eq, nyang kuot yenh muhzoh dvnganh dah kanghjyoeng jens gas ngamoq nghuot. Hauh soeu lyis nyamoq tapzains mas lhangh sat.
44010040	Nghuot laus eq Mangso nyang somh vnyeih lyis hauh soeu lyis dwis toqh kat las,
44010041	Nyah gungs lyis dius dvnganh lyis ma nghuot, Mangso yah kanghjyoeng duot das xiklyis khyen toeuq toh bang nghuot las Yesu shei masyah dwis toq los thang lhyi, nyang yah dvgeh zo shuk nyeis dah ngamoq lyis nyvng xoeuq.
44010042	Yhensain nyang nyang eq dwis bang yahge shei goeus bang dah soetuon soeu kuot das xiklyis, Mangso toeuq toh soeu nghuot goeus cho dius jens lyis taiq kyoh las kanghjyoeng kat das xiklyis nyang ngamoq lyis taiq toh.
44010043	Lvpe jens dvnganh eq nyah cho kanghjyoeng kat zis gas, Nyah nyings lyis loms ya lomsjingh bang yaunos khyuot dyei zis xauh das, ge.
44010044	Petru hauh cho taiq nyeis shih lyis, hauh dang xauhgyo bang dvnganhmoq thoq mas Gyingshang Dyos gyoh los.
44010045	Gyingshang Dyos ge dah jyungshuk gas, gohnyau bang thoq mas huot khyoq yvmvyah Petru yah dvgeh chank bang, vthyoh tyomh cho chank goeus bang yahge lomsjingh bang mauh hangh toh.
44010046	Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq dang vja ja taiq zis yahge Mangso lhyi chungh zis tsain xauhgyo.
44010047	Housoeh Petru taiq zis gas, Yang teh Gyingshang Dyos xauh yoeus bang lyis jeis yah jeisnyhop kham das xiklyis hank tomp toh chank bos lah, ge.
44010048	Housoeh nyang nyamoq lyis Yesu Khristu dah nyings mas jeisnyhop kham das cho taiq kat. Hauh thang lhyi nyamoq gas Petru lyis, dvyoq nyeis khoq das xiklyis dung.
44011001	Lvgyo jens yahge Yuda mau mas dah lomsjingh bang dvyhamh gas, Gohnyau bang eq Mangso dah dang lhom yoeus, ge dah cho xauhgyo.
44011002	Petru Yerusalem mas jweh lyis vthyoh tyomh cho chank bang gas, nyang lyis yobos huon.
44011003	Nvng chamus vthyoh tyomh cho ma chank bang jyank mas loh las, nyamoq yah dvgeh zo shuk lah, ge.
44011004	Hauh uhlyis Petru gas hauh cho vzoh yah dvkoeuq thang lhyi dvkoeuq heisoeh ge, taiq kyoh.
44011005	Ngos gas Yopa wus mas shvmanh dung nyeis; hauh uhlyis ngos muih loh lyis nyoqnyvng nyvng yvmas, kha iq teh jangthunk dvkhyvp maukhung masyah khyoq kat zis gas ngah jyank mas jweh los.
44011006	Ngos doms soq yoeuh lyis, nyeisjvng thoq mas dah nyei khyei dap gaunyhauq, yewus, shweh loh ja yahge maudang nghoq vja ja tsain bos zis nyvng.
44011007	Hou kyingh ma nghuot, Petru eh, toq las sat zo aq, ge ngos lyis taiq dah thwe eq xauhgyo.
44011008	Ngos gas, Ma nghuot, Yhensain eh, vwot v-oeu yahge ma lhoq ma shang ja ngah nhuot mas khanhamp eq ma wvng ku, oen taiq.
44011009	Nghuot laus eq tsai dvlhain maukhung mas dah thwe ka, Mangso lhoqshang nhang goeus dah vyhang lhyi, Ma lhoq oen ma gis sang, ge.
44011010	Housoeh somh lhain bweh thang lhyi hau dvnganh maukhung pheh doms yoeus tyamp.
44011011	Hauh uhlyis nyang Kesare wus masyah ngah jyank mas nhang kat dah dius somh yuk, ngos nyeis dah yhen ganthoq mas yap joq.
44011012	Ma khamkhvv khvv nyamoq yah chank loh das xiklyis Dyos gas ngos lyis taiq. Hauh thoq lyis hai boekyis khyuk yuk moq eq ngos yah dvgeh loh las Korneli yhen mas wvng loh.
44011013	Hauh uhlyis hauh soeu ka, nyang loeuswons soeu dvyuk nyah yhen mas los yap yvlyis nyvng; hau loeuswons soeu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Yopa wus mas dius nhang las Petru ge dah Simon lyis khi aq.
44011014	Nyang gas nvng yahge nah yhenbang dvnganh khyuot yoeus zis xauh dah gausyis dang nvng lyis dyei das ge los taiq cho ngamoq lyis taiq kyoh.
44011015	Ngos dang zoh phank las taiq nyeis lyis, cangxeih lyis, yah thoq mas Gyingshang Dyos gyoh lyih yhangteh nyamoq thoq mas eq gyoh lyih.
44011016	Yohan gas jeis yah jeisnyhop dyei, namoq lyis gas Gyingshang Dyos yah jeisnyhop xauh kham yoeus das, ge Yhensain nyang taiq toh dang lyis ngos soh.
44011017	Housoeh las Yhensain Yesu Khristu lyis lomsjingh bang yang lyis dyei dah jyungshuk yah dvyhangteh, Mangso nyamoq lyis dyei nghuot lyis gas, ngos gas hank nghuot las Mangso lhyi yoh tomp toh das lah, ge.
44011018	Hauh cho tsain xauhgyo lyis, nyamoq samlo nyeis las, Housoeh lyis gas, Mangso ka gohnyau bang lyis eq kang dwis yvpheh yoh shwih loh dah ehnyet thaiq cho dyei goeus nyvng, ge.
44011019	Stephan masyah vzoh xi dah vshoh vjyen shoeuhshih cho gvng masyah tsain dyos loh bang gas, Phoenisia, Kupru mau yahge Antiok wus jweh shoq loh las Yuda dius nyau lyis kyingh Dang tsain taiq kyoh.
44011020	Nghuot laus eq Kupru yahge Kureni mau mas bang dvyhamh, Antiok mas jweh lyis Yhensain Yesu dah gausyis dang Heleni dius lyis eq tsain taiq kyoh.
44011021	Yhensain dah loq nyamoq yah dvgeh nghuot yvmvyah, nyoshoq tsain lomsjingh las Yhensain jyank pheh lhain los.
44011022	Haih loeus gas, Yerusalem mas dah phung jens dah no mas tsain taiq jweh loh zis yah nyamoq gas Barnaba lyis Antiok jweh shoq nhang kat.
44011023	Houmha jweh las Mangso ka dius jens lyis khasoeh shvmanh dyei cho nyvng lyis nyang svsoh gausyis zis yah nyamoq gas Yhensain mas lomluk luk goeng goeng kuk tap toh das xiklyis dvnganhmoq lyis yomdyei taiq kyingh goeus.
44011024	Khasoeh ge lyis hauh soeu ka dius gis nghuot yvmvyah, Gyingshang Dyos yah eq, lomsjingh zis yah eq, dyingh joq soeu dvyuk nghuot. Dius nyoshoq lyis Yhensain jyank pheh shwih los.
44011025	Barnaba gas Saulo lyis loh xo das ge Tarshu pheh thuq loh. Nyang lyis nyvng lyis Antiok mas shwih los.
44011026	Nyah aiq yuk gas dvzvn dyingh shoq hauh phung yah dvgeh huom nyeis yvmvyah, dius nyoshoq lyis xauh jyauh. Antiok gas changlo jens lyis Khristan ge cangxeih nyhink dah joqyos nghuot.
44011027	Hauh uhlyis Yerusalem mas dah lvpe jens gas Antiok mas jweh e.
44011028	Hauh moq mas Agabu ge soeu toq las mungkvn gonh mas yuot panghkhauq zainsmuh los das cho Dyos Chixoeuq zis yah dvyhangteh lvpe pe. Hauh zis Klodi Kesar zaih lyis bweh goeus.
44011029	Housoeh las changlo jens gas Yuda mau mas dah boekyis jyank mas vsainnyang yoh nyhoq bos pangh kat das ge tsain nghamh thyet toh.
44011030	Housoeh toeuq toh zis yah dvyhangteh nyamoq kuot las Barnaba yahge Saulo dah loq masyah logis jens jyank mas huon kat.
44012001	Hauh yoq lyis hwankti Herod gas, phung dius dvyhamh lyis shoeuhshih das ge loqyom tyonh nyeis.
44012002	Housoeh Yohan dah vmang Yaku lyis moengsa yah sat.
44012003	Hauh cho Yuda jens yoeuh gaus zis lyis nyvng las, Petru lyis eq nyhik das zis yomkat nyeis. Hauh shishenh gas bicheih ma kat ohlhyoq zo dah pwe nghuot.
44012004	Petru lyis yoh nyhik lyis thung mas kat toh. Herod gas Lhuiq Kat Pwe lai thang lhyi dius jens jyank mas phank kat dyei das ge, jeslo nyei yuk yuk bos dah jesphung nyei phung loq mas Petru lyis kyauh toh.
44012005	Housoeh Petru gas thung mha lungh joq. Nghuot laus eq phung ka nyah xiklyis Mangso jyank mas shvmanh khyoeuq dung nyeis.
44012006	Herod gas Petru lyis shwih thuq yoeus das dah xik lyis nyensyo, Petru gas shamjvng aiq jvng twih las jeslo aiq yuk dah vjo mas yhet joq. Pyada jens eq thung khomh mas zungh nyeis.
44012007	Hauh uhlyis yoeuh aq, Yhensain dah loeuswons soeu dvyuk gyoh yap las hauh yvpkhau mas bvng joq. Nyang gas Petru dah nunghkhung mas bat las, Lvnyap toq aq, ge nhauh. Hauh uhlyis shamjvng eq nyah loq masyah gyuot loh.
44012008	Loeuswons soeu nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Dyichih chih las thyvkoq koq aq, ge. Nyang eq kuot goeus. Tsai, Nah dyi lyet chi las ngah thang mas chank los aq, ge doms taiq.
44012009	Nyang eq thuq las chank loh nyeis. Nghuot laus eq loeuswons soeu bweh nhang dah muh hauh zis jyoengh nghuot zis nyang ma seq las, nyoqnyvng nghuot, ge nghamh nyeis.
44012010	Nyah aiq yuk zungh joqyos aiq deh lai las, wus shot pheh wvng dah thyeq khomh mas jweh lyis, hauh khomh eq nyang pheh yah phank los. Nyah aiq yuk thuq las wus cho dvkoeuq mas chank los lho las, loeuswons soeu ka houjang nyang yah gang loh.
44012011	Petru yoh nghamh soh lyis, Yhensain gas nyah loeuswons soeu nhang lha Herod dah loq masyah eq, Yuda jens nghamh toh cho dvnganh masyah eq ngos lyis khyuot yoeus goeus zis gas gvshih ngos jyoengh seq goeus, ge.
44012012	Nyang hauh cho nghamh soh lyis, dius nyo nyo lo huom las shvmanh dung nyeis joqyos, Makho ge dah Yohan dah ungwes Mari yhen pheh loh.
44012013	Petru gas, yhen nghe pheh yah khomh loh koq yoeuh lyis, Roda ge dah jyeidwis nyelo dvyuk khomh phank dyei das ge loh.
44012014	Nyang gas Petru thwe nghuot yvlyis seq las khomh ma phank phank yvpkhau mas wuih tauh loh las taiq zis gas, Petru gas khomh nghe mas yap joq, ge.
44012015	Nyamoq nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng koh, ge. Nyang gas jyoengh nghuot ge kyingh taiq nyeis. Tsai nyamoq taiq zis gas, Nyah loeuswons soeu nghuot das, ge.
44012016	Nghuot laus eq Petru gas khomh mas kyingh koq nyeis yvmvyah, nyamoq khomh phank lyis nyang lyis nyvng las tsain mauh.
44012017	Petru gas tsoeklo nyeis das xiklyis loq toeuq las, nyang lyis thung masyah Yhensain khasoeh shwih thuq los cho nyamoq lyis taiq kyoh las, Haih cho Yaku yahge boekyis lyis taiq kyoh kat geh, ge. Nyang gas gohjoqyos pheh doms thuq loh.
44012018	Nyoqnyvng los lyis jeslo jens gas Petru mas cha bweh zis ma seq yvmvyah, svsoh nhunk loh.
44012019	Herod gas Petru lyis xo ma nyvng goeus ya, zungh bang lyis yen yoeuh las nyamoq lyis sat das zis vmingh dyei. Hauh thang lhyi nyang gas Yuda mau masyah Kesare wus pheh gyoh loh las houmha nyeis.
44012020	Hauh yoq lyis Herod gas Taire yahge Sidon dius jens lyis svsoh nhaiqyo goeus. Housoeh las nyamoq gas ehnyet dvlom yah nyah jyank mas e. Cangxeih lyis hwankti yhen zom soeu Blastu lyis nyamoq lyis pangh das xiklyis lhung las hwankti lyis nyenstap das xiklyis dung: Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq mau gas hauh hwankti mau mas dah zonoms shukphoh lyis nges nyeis.
44012021	Housoeh buisnyeis doengs nyeih lyis, Herod gas hwankti gungs shunk las hwankti tank mas tsung las dang taiq.
44012022	Hauh uhlyis dius jens kaiq zis gas, Dius dah thwe ma nghuot, gywes dah thwe dvnghuot, ge.
44012023	Nyang gas Mangso dah phunk lyis ma chungh yvmvyah, houjang Yhensain dah loeuswons soeu nyang lyis dvm dyei las, luk luk zis yah shei loh.
44012024	Mangso dah dang gas tsoq las kuhxing jebais los.
44012025	Barnaba yahge Saulo ka, nyah aiq yuk kuot dyei chah muh dye las Makho ge dah Yohan lyis eq shwih las Yerusalem masyah tauh loh.
44013001	Gvshih Antiok wus mas dah phung mha, lvpe jens, svra moq bos. Hauh moq mas Barnaba, Niger ge dah Simon, Kureni dius Luki, Herod yah zomh bes los dah Manaen yahge Saulo moq nghuot.
44013002	Nyamoq gas Yhensain lhyi chungh paiq las womkyi nyeis lyis Gyingshang Dyos taiq zis gas, Ngos toeuq toh dah muh lyis wons wuq das xiklyis Barnaba yahge Saulo lyis khyen toeuq toh geh, ge.
44013003	Houyah dvyhangteh, nyamoq gas womkyi, shvmanh dung las, nyah aiq yuk thoq mas loq dye kih dyei las nhang kat.
44013004	Housoeh Gyingshang Dyos nyah aiq yuk lyis nhang kat zis yah dvyhangteh, Selukia mas gyoh e las, hou mhayah Kupru pheh goeu loh.
44013005	Salami wus mas jweh lyis Yuda jens dah lyi jungs mas Mangso dang lyis taiq kyoh. Nyah aiq yuk lyis pangh das xiklyis Yohan eq bos.
44013006	Nyamoq gas hauh goeujo suh lai loh las, Papho wus mas jweh lyis, Bar-yesu ge dah Yuda hweq seq soeu lvpe hwah dvyuk yah xauhgoh.
44013007	Hauh soeu ka Segiu Paulu ge dah mungh zau jyank mas nyeis soeu nghuot. Mungh zau gas yik soeu nghuot. Nyang gas Mangso dah dang gyo mes las, Barnaba Yahge Saulo lyis khi yoeus.
44013008	Hauh uhlyis (hweq seq soeu ge dah vjyuk khyvlyis nyhink dah) Elima gas hau mungh zau dah lomsjingh yvlyis lhoeu thyoq mes las, nyamoq lyis zan.
44013009	Hauh uhlyis Paulo eq ge dah Saulo ka Gyingshang Dyos dyingh zis yah nyang lyis yoeuh tsuk toh las taiq zis gas,
44013010	Ung lhung cho yahge phanh cho dvnganh dyingh joq, yius dah lo, dan cho khanghmuh dah jes phoq eh, Yhensain dah dan cho lhyi taiq thyoq masyah nvng khanhamp no das lah?
44013011	Yoeuh aq, gvshih Yhensain nvng lyis yobos dyei las buis dvyoq ma xauh nyvng nyoqjet nyeis das, ge. Houjang nyang nyoq gos tyamp las, soeng soeng noq tyamp. Housoeh nyang lyis she das dius xo uhjyangh suh lhain nyeis.
44013012	Hauh cho lhyi mungh zau nyvng lyis Yhensain dah jyauh cho lhyi mauh zis yah lomsjingh nyeis.
44013013	Hauh thang lhyi Paulo yahge nyah dyenschangh jens gas, Papho masyah goeu las Pamphilia mau Perga wus mas jweh e. Nghuot laus eq Yohan gas nyamoq yah gang las Yerusalem pheh tauh loh.
44013014	Nghuot laus eq nyamoq gas, Perga masyah toq lyis, Pisidia mau Antiok wus mas jweh loh. Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis nyamoq lyi jungs mas wvng tsung toh.
44013015	Hauh uhlyis lyi maussauh buk yahge lvpe maussauh buk dye nghap lyis hauh lyi jungs guon bang gas nyamoq jyank mas dius nhang las taiq zis gas, Boekyis eh, moqphung lyis taiq kyingh das dang yoh lyis taiq kyingh geh, ge.
44013016	Hauh uhlyis Paulo toq las loq vsoh yah: Israel jens yahge Mangso lhyi gyukwoms bang eh, gyo yoeus geh.
44013017	Haih Israel dius dah Mangso ka yah phauh thyeih moq lyis khyen yoeus goeus yvmvyah Egutu mas boengh duot nyeis shih lyis nyamoq lyis dius nyau kuh kuot goeus. Mangso ka nyah yombos dah loqyom yah nyamoq lyis hou mhayah shwih thuq los.
44013018	Tsai mhanhdyvp mas nyeici zvn ko nyamoq lyis Ehnyet xing xing yah shwih los.
44013019	Nyang gas Khanan mau mas dah dius nyhet nyau lyis mhont las, hauh maunyeis yhenzis gas Israel jens dah vso vlho kuot dyei. Haih cho dvnganh bweh lai los zis gas 450 zvn ko nyangh.
44013020	Hauh thang lhyi lvpe Samuel caiq jweh shoq nyang nyamoq lyis soetuon bang toh dyei.
44013021	Hauh thang lhyi nyamoq hwankti sang las, Mangso ka Benyamin vkoq, Kisha dah lo Saulo lyis dyei. Nyang gas 40 zvn hwankti duot goeus.
44013022	Nyang hauh soeu lyis khyoq tyamp uhlyis Dawi lyis nyamoq dah hwankti duot nhang. Hauh soeu dah cho, nyang nyang kanghjyoeng kat zis gas, Yese dah lo Dawi gas ngah ehnyet yah phi thank soeu nghuot las nyang ngos o zis dvnganh chank kuot das.
44013023	Hauh soeu dah vkoq mas Mangso dah dangthoengh toh zis yah dvyhangteh, Israel xiklyis khyuot yoeus soeu Yesu lyis thuq los nhang.
44013024	Hauh soeu ma los shih lyis Yohan eq Israel vnyau dvnganh lyis nhaiqlom thaiq zis yah sen dah jeisnyhop cho taiq kyoh.
44013025	Yohan gas nyah muhzoh tyeh wons wuq nyeis lyis, Ngos lyis hank nghuot oen nghamh nyeis goh lah? Ngos gas hauh soeu ma nghuot, yoeuh aq, ngah thang mas dvyuk jweh los das; ngos gas hauh soeu dah thyvkoq khyuot dyei das zis yangh ma mon, ge.
44013026	Vmang vnoeuh moq eh, haih khyuot yoeus cho ka Abraham dah vnyau vshih, lo jens nghuot dah namoq yahge gohtoeu Mangso lhyi gyukwoms bang dah xiklyis dyei goeus.
44013027	Khasoeh ge lyis Yerusalem mas moq yahge nyamoq dah guon bang gas, nyang lyis ma seq zis yahge Yuda No Buisnyeis khanghmuh nghap dah lvpe jens dah dang lyis ma seqgyo yvmvyah, nyang lyis dang thang thyet zis yah hauh lvpe dang lyis nyuk los nhang.
44013028	Nyang mas shei mon dah yobos ma nyvng laus eq, nyang lyis sat das zis Pilat jyank mas sang.
44013029	Housoeh nyang lyis toeuq las lhaih ya lhaih toh zis dye kuot lyis, nyang lyis saiqzains masyah yoeus khyoq las lop mas kat toh.
44013030	Nghuot laus eq Mangso ka shei masyah nyang lyis toq los nhang.
44013031	Galile masyah Yerusalem pheh nyang yah dvgeh doq loh bang lyis, buisnyeis nyangh nyangh lo nyah gungs lyis nyvng xoeuq las nyamoq gas gvshih dius jens dah xikkhonh mas nyah kanghjyoeng jens bweh nyeis.
44013032	Ngamoq gas ngamoq dah phauh thyeih moq lyis Mangso dyei toh dangthoengh nghuot dah hau gausyis dang lyis namoq jyank mas wons los.
44013033	Mangso ka Yesu lyis shei masyah dwis toq nhang zis yah nyamoq dah lo jens nghuot bang yamoq mas Nyah dangthoengh lyis tyink dyei goeus. Houka Chungh Dang maussauh aiq mas lhaih toh zis yah dvyhangteh, Nvng ngah Lo nghuot, Khvnyhik ngos nvng lyis ngah gungs masyah yaus kat, ge.
44013034	Nyang lyis shei masyah dwis toq nhang las, dyoqbis zis ma doms xauh nhang lo zis yah sen las, Dawi lyis ngos dyei toh Gyingshang dah dangthoengh jens ngos nvng lyis dyei das, ge.
44013035	Housoeh yvmvyah gohtoeu Chungh Dang mas eq, Nah Gyingshang Soeu lyis nvng dyoqbis xauh nhang das zis ma nghuot, ge nyang taiq.
44013036	Khasoeh ge lyis Dawi gas nyah caiq mas Mangso dah nghamh thyet toh cho lhyi dye kuot thang lhyi shei goeus las nyang lyis nyah phauh thyeih moq dah vyvm mas toh zis yah bop yuq goeus.
44013037	Nghuot laus eq Mangso dwis toqh kat soeu ka bop yuq zis ma xauh.
44013038	Housoeh las boekyis eh, hauh soeu gvng mas, yaunos yoh khyuot dyei dah cho namoq lyis taiq kyoh nyeis zis gas seq geh.
44013039	Moshe lyi chank khyvlyis yah namoq dah yaunos masyah ma yoh luiq. Nghuot laus eq Yesu lyis lomsjingh soeu hank laus eq hau yaunos masyah yoh luiq.
44013040	Zaih geh, lvpe pe khoq zis namoq jyank mas ma bweh los bas jungh.
44013041	Jwangh bang eh, yoeuh aq mauh las dyoqbis geh, khasoeh ge lyis namoq dah buisnyeis lyis ngos muh dvkoeuq kuot nyeis. Dius dvyuk ngos namoq lyis taiq kyoh laus eq hauh muh lyis namoq lomsjingh das zis ma nghuot, ge.
44013042	Paulo yahge Barnaba hau lyi jungs masyah thuq loh nyeis lyis, dius jens gas nyah aiq yuk lyis, Haih cho yah sen lha jweh los das No Buisnyeis lyis doms taiq das xiklyis sang.
44013043	Lyi jungs mas huom masyah dyos loh lyis, Yuda jens nyoshoq moq yahge Yuda lomsjingh cho lhyi bos chank bang nyoshoq Paulo yahge Barnaba thang mas tsain chank loh. Nyah aiq yuk gas nyamoq lyis Mangso dah jyehjuh mas suh e nyeis das xiklyis yomdyei taiq kyingh.
44013044	Hauh thang lhyi dah Yuda No Buisnyeis lyis, Mangso dah dang gyo yoeus das zis wus gonh dvgeh tsain huom toh.
44013045	Nghuot laus eq Yuda jens gas hauh moqjens lyis nyvng lyis noh ehnyet dyingh joq las Paulo taiq dang lyis jwangh zis yah tyixo khyvlyis goes tsain sang.
44013046	Paulo yahge Barnaba eq womh womh taiq zis gas, Mangso dang nyamoq lyis cangxeih taiq kyoh das zis gas yhaugyen. Nghuot laus eq namoq hauh yvlyis he las vcaiq vto kang yah ma mon khyvlyis dang thang thyet yoeus yvmvyah, ngamoq gohnyau bang shot pheh loh das, ge.
44013047	Khasoeh ge lyis, Yhensain ngamoq lyis tying toh zis gas, Nyeisjvng gonh khyuot yoeus cho bweh los shoq, Ngos nvng lyis gohnyau bang xiklyis bvng zis kuot, ge.
44013048	Gohnyau bang hauh zis xauhgyo lyis gaus zis yah Yhensain dang lyis tsain chungh. Housoeh nyoshoq lyis vcaiq vto kang yoh das xiklyis toeuq toh goeus zis yah dvyhangteh tsain lomsjingh los.
44013049	Yhensain dang gas hauh mau gonh goms shoq hoeuh loh.
44013050	Yuda jens gas, lomsjingh cho mas wontang las nyoqnho ngelang bos dah vmesbih jens yahge hauh wus mas dah vgyis moq lyis yom taiq bos dyei las, Paulo yahge Barnaba lyis vshoh vjyen shoeuhshih nhang las, nyamoq dah wuxom masyah khat tyamp.
44013051	Housoeh nyamoq lyis yobos Chixoeuq khyvlyis nyah aiq yuk khyei mas dah phvlhau lyis nyamoq shot pheh ko khyoq khoq las Ikoni wus mas jweh loh.
44013052	Changlo jens gas, gaus zis yah Gyingshang Dyos dyingh joq.
44014001	Ikoni wus mas eq Paulo yahge Barnaba gas Antiok mas teh Yuda jens dah lyi jungs mas loh wvng las taiq lyis Yuda jens yahge Heleni jens nyoshoq lomsjingh.
44014002	Nghuot laus eq ma loms dah Yuda jens gas, gohnyau bang dah ehnyet lyis lhoqh thyoq las boekyis lyis hoeng dah xiklyis gomloeus kuot.
44014003	Housoeh nyah aiq yuk eq houmha nyangh nyangh lo nyeis las, Yhensain dah cho lhyi womh womh tsain taiq kyoh. Yhensain eq nyamoq lyis vlho yah kuot das yomsoq dyei zis yah nyah aiq yuk taiq kyoh, Yhensain dah nhaiqnyen shohgyo dang gas jyoeng yvlyis nyang kanghjyoeng kat dyei.
44014004	Wus mas bang gas ehnyet lvn tyamp yvmvyah, dvyhamh gas Yuda jens shot pheh, dvyhamh gas lvgyo jens shot pheh bweh loh.
44014005	Gohnyau bang mas moq eq, Yuda dius yahge nyamoq dah vgyis jens eq, nyah aiq yuk lyis gyvzaiq gyvnang kuot las lukgoq yah doeuh sat das ge sont zis lyis,
