44014006	Nyah aiq yuk seq las Likaoni wuxom pheh phang loh. Housoeh nyah aiq yuk gas Listra yahge Derbe wus yahge vyvm vwi mas joq dah wus mas,
44014007	gausyis dang tsain taiq kyoh.
44014008	Listra wus mas nyah ungwes ung masyah khyei dyoq soeu nghuot las khanhamp eq ma suh yoeuh ku soeu dvyuk tsung toh.
44014009	Nyang gas Paulo taiq dang gyo nyeis. Hauh soeu lyis Paulo yoeuh kat lho lyis, yoh gis los das shoq lomsjingh ehnyet bos yvlyis nyvng seq las,
44014010	thwe than yah, Zungh zungh toq yap aq, ge. Nyang eq dyvm toq las suh loh.
44014011	Housoeh Paulo kuot dah muhzoh lyis dius jens nyvng las nyamoq Likaoni nyingh yah kaiq zis gas, mangso jens diusyeis tsungh las yah jyank mas jweh los, ge.
44014012	Housoeh nyamoq gas Barnaba lyis Ze-u, Paulo gas dang taiq uhjyung nghuot yvmvyah, nyang lyis Herme ge tsain nyhink.
44014013	Hauh wus nghe pheh joq dah Ze-u yhenmuh mas dah phudyei soeu eq wus khomh mas noeujungs lu yahge bankhwank chi lyih las moqjens yah dvgeh nyah aiq yuk lyis lomhxangh lainh das zis tsain cvvq.
44014014	Nghuot laus eq lvgyo Paulo yahge Barnaba gas, hauh cho lhyi xauhgyo lyis nyah aiq yuk dyimis lang chuiq tyamp lho las, dius phung mas wuih wvng loh las kaiq zis gas,
44014015	Nhaiqbos moq eh, chamus hauh zis kuot goh lah? Ngah aiq yuk eq namoq yah dvyhangteh seq shei dah dius dvtsain nghuot; hai vjyuk ma bos dah muh toh tyamp las maukhung nyeisjvng, thomh yahge houmha bos ya bos yvlyis gvnkhanh toh, kang dwis dah Mangso jyank mas lhain los bas jungh oen namoq lyis gausyis dang los taiq kyoh zis dvnghuot.
44014016	Nyang gas gohlhain dah caiq mas dius nyau khanghmuh lyis nyamoq o khyvlyis chank bas jungh, ge kat toh.
44014017	Nghuot laus eq nyah gungs lyis kanghjyoeng ma bos bos toh tyamp zis ma nghuot; gis zis kuot uhjyangh maukhung masyah mau yahge guk nyau shih nyau, nyah yoq dyei zis yah yang lyis zonoms yah eq, gausyis zis yah eq jo nhang nyeis, ge.
44014018	Housoeh taiq lyis yangh dius jens gas nyah aiq yuk lyis lomhxangh lainh dyei das zis vluk ma yoh tomp.
44014019	Hauh thang lhyi Antiok yahge Ikoni wus mas dah Yuda jens jweh los las, dius phung lyis nyamoq shot pheh shwih lho las Paulo lyis lukgoq yah doeuh las, nyang lyis shei goeus jyo yvmvyah wus nghe pheh she thuq tyamp.
44014020	Nghuot laus eq changlo jens khyam nyang yap joq lyis, nyang toq las wus mas wvng loh. Nungs nyeih nyang yahge Barnaba Derbe pheh loh.
44014021	Hauh wus mas gausyis dang taiq kyoh las changlo nyoshoq bweh nhang las, nyah aiq yuk gas Listra, Ikoni, Antiok wus cho doms los.
44014022	Changlo jens dah ehnyet goeng nhang uhjyangh, hauh lomsjingh cho mas goeng das xiklyis taiq kyingh yomdyei zis yahge Mangso munghdan mas wvng das lyis shanghsenh zis nyoshoq xauh chah, ge jyauh toh khoq.
44014023	Phung khanghmuh mas logis jens khyen yoeus las womkyi zis yahge shvmanh dung thang lhyi, nyamoq lomsjingh nyeis Yhensain dah loq mas kyauh toh khoq.
44014024	Hauh thang lhyi nyah aiq yuk gas Pisidia mau cho suh las, Pamphilia mau mas jweh loh.
44014025	Housoeh Perga wus mas dang taiq kyoh las, Atalia pheh tsain gyoh loh.
44014026	Hou mhayah lhyik yah goeu las, nyah aiq yuk wons wuq goeus muh xiklyis Mangso dah jyehjuh mas kyauh las, nyah aiq yuk lyis nhang kat dah Antiok wus pheh tauh loh.
44014027	Nyah aiq yuk jweh lyis phung lyis huom nhang las, Mangso nyah aiq yuk masyah kuot cho dvnganh eq, gohnyau bang lyis, nyang lyis lomsjingh das xiklyis Mangso cho phank dyei zis eq tsain taiq kyoh.
44014028	Housoeh nyah aiq yuk houmha changlo jens yah nyangh nyangh lo thoeng nyeis.
44015001	Yuda mau mas bang dvyhamh jweh los las, boekyis lyis Moshe dah thungh yah dvyhangteh vthyoh tyomh cho ma chank lyis gas namoq khyuot yoeus yvmas ma yoh jweh das ge tsain jyauh.
44015002	Housoeh las lvn loh das cho bweh las, Paulo yahge Barnaba gas hauh bang yah taiq phyen-goh lyis, hauh cho huq yoeuh das xiklyis boekyis gas, Paulo, Barnaba yahge nyamoq mas dvyhamh lyis Yerusalem mas nyeis dah lvgyo jens yahge logis jens jyank mas nhang das xiklyis nghamh thyet toh.
44015003	Housoeh phung yah nyamoq lyis los pauq kat las, nyamoq gas Phoenisia yahge Samari mau cho lai uhjyangh, gohnyau bang nhaiqlom thaiq goeus cho taiq kyoh yvmvyah boekyis lyis svsoh gaus nhang.
44015004	Yerusalem mas jweh lyis, phung, lvgyo jens yahge logis jens gas nyamoq lyis lhom yoeus las, nyamoq gas Mangso nyamoq lyis yah kuot nhang cho dvnganh lyis taiq kyoh.
44015005	Nghuot laus eq Pharishe phung mas dah lomsjingh bang dvyhamh toq las, gohnyau lyis vthyoh tyomh dyei das zis yahge Moshe dah lyi chank das zis chah shih, ge taiq.
44015006	Lvgyo jens yahge logis jens haih cho xamgoh das xiklyis tsain huom.
44015007	Hauh cho mas nyoshoq taiq phyen-goh thang lhyi Petru toq las nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Boekyis eh, gohnyau bang ngah nhuot masyah hau gausyis dang xauhgyo zis yah lomsjingh bas jungh ge, cangxeih lyis yah Mangso ngos lyis namoq masyah khyen yoeus zis gas namoq tsain seq.
44015008	Nhaiqlom lyis yoh seq dyei dah Mangso ka, yang lyis dyei yhangteh nyamoq lyis eq Gyingshang Dyos dyei las, nyang nyamoq lyis khyen yoeus cho lhyi chixoeuq goeus.
44015009	Housoeh lomsjingh zis yah nyamoq dah nhaiqlom lyis Gyingshang nhang goeus yvmvyah, yang yahge nyamoq jo mas shaih cho cha eq ma bos.
44015010	Housoeh gvshih phauh thyeih moq eq ma duot, yang eq ma yoh wuq dah yvwons lyis changlo jens dah kvtoq mas wuq nhang goh ge chamus Mangso lhyi shi yoeuh goh lah?
44015011	Housoeh ma nghuot, yang eq nyamoq teh Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah jyehjuh yah kyingh khyuot yoeus xauh das oen yang loms nyeis, ge.
44015012	Hauh uhlyis huom joq bang gas samlo nyeis las, Barnaba yahge Paulo nyah aiq yuk loq yah gohnyau bang mas Mangso khasoeh teh dah vlho yahge mauh loqmuh bweh nhang cho taiq kyoh uhlyis tsain gyo nyeis.
44015013	Nyah aiq yuk dang thank lyis Yaku taiq zis gas, Boekyis eh, ngah dang gyo yoeus geh.
44015014	Mangso ka gohnyau bang mas, dius dvnyau lyis nyah dius duot das nyhenshang lui yoeus khyvlyis nyah jyetdap cho nyamoq lyis, cangxeih chixoeuq cho lhyi Petru gvshih phui kyoh goeus.
44015015	Hauh cho ka lhaih toh, lvpe jens dah dang yah doeusgoh joq: hauh zis gas,
44015016	Hauh dah thang lhyi ngos tauh los las, dyoq gyoh joq, Dawi dah zvng lyis doms tsuk das. Hau dyoq joq yvlyis ngos doms ci las toeu tsung toh das.
44015017	Housoeh las gohtoeu dius nyau khanghmuh gas, Yhensain lhyi xo das. Ngah dius nyau kuot das xiklyis lui yoeus zis xauh dah gohnyau bang dvnganh gas ngos lyis xo das ge, hau dvnganh yvlyis kuot toh soeu,
44015018	cangxeih mauthuq nyeiszvn lyis yah seq nhang goeus, ge.
44015019	Housoeh yvmvyah, gohnyau bang mas Mangso jyank pheh lhain los bang lyis ma gis lhoqh yau oen nghamh.
44015020	Nghuot laus eq yang nyamoq lyis phvra silho dah vwot v-oeu vyhang, yauxi muh, lainzain lhyent sat shoh yahge suih lyis kyi das cho, maussauh yah gis kyoh kat, oen ngos nghamh.
44015021	Khasoeh ge lyis Moshe Lyi gas Yuda No Buisnyeis khanghmuh lyi jungs mas nghap kyoh nyeis yvmvyah, gohnhamp caiq lyis yah, wus khanghmuh mas hauh dang taiq kyoh bang bos, ge.
44015022	Hauh uhlyis lvgyo jens yahge logis jens gas, phung gonh xam las nyamoq mas dah dius khyen las, Paulo yahge Barnaba yah dvgeh Antiok pheh nhang kat das cho tsain xamxonh. Houyah dvyhangteh boekyis mas uhshe bang Barsaba ge dah Yuda yahge Sila lyis khyen lha,
44015023	Nyah aiq yuk loq masyah lhaih huon kat dang gas, Ngamoq lvgyo jens yahge logis jens, boekyis gas, Antiok wus yahge Siria mau, Kiliki mau mas nyeis dah gohnyau bang boekyis jyank mas jeshuh kat.
44015024	Ngamoq jyank masyah gyangh thuq loh bang dvyhamh, ngamoq eq ma taiq kat zis, namoq lyis vthyoh tyomh las lyi chank chah ge dang yah taiq nhunk las ehnyet nyo nhang zis lyis ngamoq xauhgyo yvmvyah,
44015025	ngamoq dvgeh huom las, dvxam mha khyen yoeus dah Lvgyo jens lyis namoq jyank mas ngamoq dah jyetdap Barnaba yahge Paulo yah dvgeh nhang kat.
44015026	Hauh bang gas, yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah nyhenshang nyamoq dah kang lhyi kyauh toh goeus bang nghuot.
44015027	Housoeh las ngamoq gas Yuda yahge Sila lyis namoq jyank mas nhang kat. Hauh cho yah sen las nyah aiq yuk nhuot yah nyang, namoq lyis taiq kyoh das.
44015028	Khasoeh ge lyis Gyingshang Dyos yah ngamoq gis oen xamxonh zis gas, hai yhaugyen cho mas lai las gohtoeu lyei dah yvwons s lyis ma wons nhang das xiklyis nghuot.
44015029	Phvra lyis phudyei dah vyhang, suih, lainzain lhyent sat shoh yahge yauxi muh lyis jhank nyeis lyis gis. Namoq haih goeu lyis chank nyeis lyis gis. Yanghzan nyeis bas jungh, ge.
44015030	Nyamoq lyis nhang kat las Antiok mas jweh lyis, moqjens kyoh huom lha hau huon kat maussauh lyis tsain dyei.
44015031	Hauh zis dye nghap lyis hau taiq kyingh dang gvng mas nyamoq gaus.
44015032	Yuda yahge Sila gas lvpe jens eq nghuot las, dang nyoshoq yah boekyis lyis taiq kyingh yomdyei.
44015033	Houmha dvyoq nyeis khoq thang lhyi, houmha dah boekyis gas nyamoq lyis nhang kat bang jyank mas nyenstap zis yah doms pont kat.
44015034	(Sila gas houmha nyeis shih das ge nghamh thyet las nyeis.)
44015035	Paulo yahge Barnaba gas Antiok mas thoeng nyeis shih las, gohtoeu nyoshoq moq lyis Yhensain dah dang jyauh, taiq kyoh nyeis.
44015036	Buisnyeis gvgis lo nyangh los lyis, Paulo Barnaba lyis taiq zis gas, Yhensain dah dang taiq kyoh toh goeus dah wus khanghmuh mas dah boekyis khasoeh bweh nyeis zis lyis e doms komh goh, ge.
44015037	Barnaba gas Makho ge dah Yohan lyis shwih mes.
44015038	Nghuot laus eq Paulo gas nyang lyis nyah aiq yuk yah dvgeh shwih ma gis ge nghamh: khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas yoszoh masyah nyamoq yah ma loh loh, Pamphilia mau masyah nyah aiq yuk lyis toh khoq soeu nghuot, ge.
44015039	Housoeh nyah aiq yuk jo mas xam ma xonh goh yvmvyah Barnaba gas Makho lyis shwih las Kupru pheh lhyik yah goeu e.
44015040	Nghuot laus eq Paulo gas Sila lyis khyen toh lho tha, boekyis gas nyang lyis Mangso dah jyehjuh mas kyauh lho lyis nyah aiq yuk toq khoq.
44015041	Housoeh Paulo gas Siria mau, Kiliki mau cho lai loh las phung lyis yom tsain dyei.
44016001	Derbe yahge Listra wus mas eq nyang jweh las, yoeuh aq, houmha Timothi ge dah changlo dvyuk nyeis. Nyah ungwes gas lomsjingh dah Yuda vmesbih nghuot las, nyah uwus gas Heleni nghuot.
44016002	Listra yahge Ikoni wus mas nyeis boekyis gas, nyah dah wotwu gis cho lhyi tsain taiq.
44016003	Paulo gas hauh soeu lyis shwih mes las, nyah uwus gas Heleni nghuot zis lyis houmha dah Yuda dius dvnganhmoq tsain seq yvmvyah, nyang lyis vthyoh tyomh dyei.
44016004	Housoeh dvwus thang lhyi dvwus suh lai uhjyangh, Yerusalem mas dah lvgyo jens yahge logis jens taiq kat dang lyis tsain chank geh ge, nyamoq lyis dyei.
44016005	Phung eq hau lomsjingh cho mas yombos los las lomsjingh bang nyeih khanghmuh je los.
44016006	Gvshih Asia mau mas Dang taiq kyoh das zis Gyingshang Dyos nyamoq lyis tomp yvmvyah, nyamoq gas Phrigia yahge Galati mau lai las,
44016007	Misia mau jweh bah ge lyis Bithuni mau pheh wvng loh das zis tsain sont. Nghuot laus eq Yesu dah Dyos gas nyamoq lyis vmingh ma dyei yvmvyah,
44016008	Misia mau yvm cho lai las Troa wus mas tsain jweh loh.
44016009	Hauh yvmas nyenh lyis Paulo nyoqnyvng nyvng zis gas, Makedoni dius dvyuk los yap las, Makedoni mau pheh goeu lyih las ngamoq lyis los bos pangh geh, ge nyang lyis sang.
44016010	Hauh nyoqnyvng nyvng las Makedoni dius jens lyis gausyis dang taiq kyoh das xiklyis Yhensain yang lyis khi zis nghuot, ge nghamh yoeus las, Makedoni mau pheh goeu das xiklyis ngamoq houjang sont.
44016011	Housoeh yvmvyah ngamoq Troa masyah dan dan Samotrake goeujo pheh sangpho yah goeu loh lyis nungs nyeih Neapoli wus mas jweh loh.
44016012	Hou mhayah doms lai lyis, Roma guon dah Makedoni wuxom mas dah wusmuh Philipi mas jweh las, hauh yvmas ngamoq dvyoq nyeis.
44016013	Yuda No Buisnyeis jweh lyis, wus khomh nghe mas joq dah jeis yvm mas tsain e. Houmha shvmanh dung joqyos bos das teh mus las e tsung toh. Houmha tsain huom los dah vmesbih jens lyis taiq kyoh.
44016014	Hauh uhlyis Mangso lhyi paiq soeu Thiatira wus mas dah nesnoq misseh ungh dah Lidia ge soeu ngamoq dah dang gyo yoeus las, Paulo taiq kyoh dang lyis lhom yoeus das xiklyis Yhensain gas nyah nhaiqlom phank dyei.
44016015	Hauh vmesbih yahge nyah yhenbang jeisnyhop dye kham lyis, Yhensain mas ngos wontang lomsjingh goeus zis namoq suon yoeus goeus lyis gas, ngah yhen mas jenh wvng thoeng geh, ge khyoeuq khi las nyeis nhang. Ngamoq eq nyang yus zis yah dvyhangteh e thoeng.
44016016	Ngamoq hau shvmanh dung joqyos mas e lyis, yius kuq dah lonyi dvyuk yah xauhgoh. Hauh soeu ka nyah yhensain moq lyis gyuis wvng zis yah ngwis svsoh yoh los nhang soeu nghuot.
44016017	Hauh nyelo gas Paulo yahge ngamoq thang mas chank kaiq kaiq kuot zis gas, Haih bang gas namoq lyis khyuot yoeus cho taiq kyoh, nyhang thank Mangso dah jyeidwis jens nghuot, ge.
44016018	Nyoshoq nyeih nyang housoeh mus las, Paulo nhaiqlom phot phot tsoeu las, lhain yoeuh las hauh yius lyis, Yesu Khristu dah nyings masyah ngos nvng lyis taiq, nyah jyank masyah thuq loh aq, ge nyho lho lyis, houjang yius gas nyelo jyank masyah thuq loh.
44016019	Gvshih nyah yhensain moq gas ngwis wvng cho ma bos lo zis seq lyis, Paulo yahge Sila lyis nyhik las, kaih mas nyeis dah guon bang jyank mas she e.
44016020	Housoeh pyada jens dah xikkhonh mas nyah aiq yuk lyis shwih wvng las taiq zis gas, Haih Yuda jens yamoq dah wus lyis svsoh tsain lhoeu nhunk zis yahge,
44016021	Yang Roma dius ma yoh kham yoeus, ma yoh chank lyi ma bos dah thungh los tsain jyauh nyeis, ge.
44016022	Housoeh las dius phung gas nyah aiq yuk lyis tyixo las jes kuot. Wus guon bang eq nyah aiq yuk dah dyi lyis lang chuiq tyamp dyei las, lvxuk yah xuk das cho taiq.
44016023	Housoeh nyah aiq yuk lyis nyoshoq lhain xuk thang lhyi thung mas tsain lhunk lho las, nyah aiq yuk lyis goeng goeng zungh das cho, thung vgyis lyis taiq toh.
44016024	Thung vgyis eq housoeh taiq toh dang gvng mas, nyah aiq yuk lyis thung khaulhunk yvp pheh hwank las khyei mas eq kyomh yah kyomh toh.
44016025	Nghuot laus eq gungsgvm ko lhyi Paulo yahge Sila shvmanh dung zis yahge Mangso lhyi tsain chungh nyeis lyis thung lungh bang gas nyah aiq yuk dah dang tsain gyo nyeis.
44016026	Hauh uhlyis maunyeis nyetlos nyettant dwis las, thung yhen-yos nonh los zis yahge khomh bangh tyamp las yuk khanghmuh lyis twih toh dah twih buis tyamp.
44016027	Thung vgyis soh los las thung khomh bangh joq zis nyvng lyis, thung dius jens phang loh goeus jyo yvmvyah nyah moengsa she las nyah gungs nyang sat shei zo das zis sont nyeis.
44016028	Paulo yomkat kaiq zis gas, Nvng nvnyang gungs lyis vgudwvng nhang, ngamoq dvnganh yah heimha nyeis, ge.
44016029	Hauh uhlyis nyang nyibung sang chi las yvpkhau mas wuih wvng loh las, gyuk nvn zoh lyis yah Paulo yahge Sila xikkhonh mas phvluk zomhgyuis toh.
44016030	Tsai, nyah aiq yuk lyis shwih thuq las taiq zis gas, Yhensain nhaiqtang eh, ngos khyuot yoeus zis xauh shoq ngos cha kuot chah lah, ge.
44016031	Nyah aiq yuk taiq zis gas, Yhensain Yesu lyis lomsjingh aq; housoeh lyis nvng yahge nah dvyhen gonh khyuot yoeus zis xauh das, ge.
44016032	Housoeh nyang yahge nyah dvyhen gonh lyis Yhensain dah dang taiq kyoh.
44016033	Hauh nyenhyo nyang nyah aiq yuk lyis shwih loh las nyah aiq yuk dah dvm cheih dyei. Hauh shishenh lyis nyang yahge nyah dvyhen gonh houjang jeisnyhop tsain kham.
44016034	Tsai, nyang nyah yhen khau mas shwih wvng loh las zonoms yah phuqsoe uhjyangh Mangso lhyi lomsjingh los yvmvyah, nyang yahge nyah yhenbang dvgeh gauslaus nyeis.
44016035	Nyoq nyvng los lyis pyada zau jens gas, hauh vzomh lyis kat kat aq, ge jeslo jens lyis yah taiq nhang kat.
44016036	Thung vgyis gas hauh dang Paulo lyis taiq kyoh las, nyah aiq yuk lyis kat kat das zis zau jens taiq nhang yvmvyah, gvshih nyenstap zis yah thuq loh lo geh, ge.
44016037	Nghuot laus eq Paulo nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngah aiq yuk Roma dius dvnghuot yvlyis ma nyei yoeuh yoeuh dang thang ma thyet shih lyis svbih xikkhonh mas bat, thung khyoq lho las, gvshih tsoek yah gauh nhang kat das ge cvvq lhyeh? Ma nghuot, nyamoq gungs doeu nyang lyih kat kat bas jungh, ge.
44016038	Jeslo jens hauh dang zau jens lyis loh taiq kyoh lyis, nyah aiq yuk Roma dius nghuot zis xauhgyo lyis tsain gyuk las,
44016039	nyamoq gungs doeu nyang nyah aiq yuk jyank mas e las shangphu shwih thuq las hauh wus masyah jenh thuq loh das zis tsain khyoeuq.
44016040	Housoeh nyah aiq yuk gas thung masyah thuq las, Lidia yhen mas wvng loh. Housoeh boekyis lyis nyvng goeus ya nyamoq lyis nhaiqtaink toh khoq las tsain thuq loh.
44017001	Paulo yahge Sila gas Amphipoli yahge Apoloni wus lai lyis, Thesaloni wus mas jweh loh. Houmha Yuda jens dah lyi jungs dvkoeuq bos.
44017002	Paulo gas nyah thungh yah dvyhangteh, lyi jungs mas wvng las, Yuda No Buisnyeis somh daus top Mangso dah Jyomp maussauh masyah nyamoq yah dvgeh xamgoh zis gas,
44017003	Khristu gas shanghsenh chah zis yahge shei masyah dwis toq chah cho Jyomp maussauh masyah taiq las phui kyoh zis gas, Ngos namoq lyis taiq kyoh dah Yesu gas hauh Khristu nyang nghuot, ge.
44017004	Nyamoq mas dvyhamh gas lomsjingh las Paulo yahge Sila yah tsain xonh. Hauh bang mas lomsjingh cho mas wontang dah Heleni nyoshoq yahge nyoqnho ngelang bos dah vmesbih jens eq nyoshoq bos.
44017005	Nghuot laus eq Yuda jens gas noh las, kaih jang mas nyeis, lhung bang dvyhamh yah dvgeh moqphung dvkoeuq kuot las wus gonh lyis dius hoeu toq nhang. Nyamoq gas Paulo yahge Sila lyis moqphung mas shwih los das xiklyis xo nyeis lyis nyamoq gas Yason dah yhen lyis los khyang.
44017006	Nyah aiq yuk lyis ma nyvng goeus ya, Yason yahge Lomsjingh bang dvyhamh lyis wus logis jens dah xikkhonh mas she los zis yah kaiq zis gas, Mungkvn gonh lyis vtauh vxoeu kuot bang gvshih heimha jweh goeus.
44017007	Yason gas nyah aiq yuk lyis boengh lhom toh. Nyamoq dvnganh gas Yesu ge dah gohtoeu hwankti bos shih ge taiq yvmvyah Kesar dah lyi lyis tyixo khyvlyis kuot nyeis.
44017008	Wugungs dius jens yahge guon bang hauh dang xauhgyo lyis, nhaiq tsain yo nyeis.
44017009	Nghuot laus eq Yason yahge gohyhamh bang jyank masyah kham toh vyhang lhyi nyamoq yoeus toh las nyamoq lyis kat kat.
44017010	Boekyis gas hauh nyeihyo nyang Paulo yahge Sila lyis Berea wus pheh nhang kat. Nyah aiq yuk houmha jweh lyis Yuda jens dah lyi jungs mas tsain wvng loh.
44017011	Houmha nyeis dah Yuda jens gas Thesaloni dius jens thoq lyis nhaiq zes bos. Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas hauh dang mas nhaiqkank wvng zis yah lhom yoeus las, jus ma jus yoh seq das xiklyis Jyomp maussauh mas nyeih yau nyeih xo nghap yoeuh nyeis.
44017012	Housoeh las nyamoq mas nyoshoq tsain lomsjingh. Nyoqnho ngelang bos dah Heleni vmesbih jens yahge vbusbih jens eq nyoshoq bos.
44017013	Nghuot laus eq Thesaloni mas dah Yuda jens gas, Paulo Berea wus mas eq Mangso dah dang taiq kyoh nyeis cho xauhgyo lyis, nyamoq houmha eq chank jweh las dius jens lyis jaus jyuonh zis yah Paulo lyis jes mus nhang.
44017014	Boekyis gas houjang Paulo lyis panglai jyankyvm mas jweh shoq pauq kat. Sila yahge Timothi gas nyeis khoq shih.
44017015	Nghuot laus eq Paulo lyis e pauq kat bang gas Athen jweh shoq e shwih kat las, Sila yahge Timothi lyis lvnyap chank los das cho, tying kat dang wons las tauh los.
44017016	Gvshih Paulo gas Athen wus mas nyah aiq yuk lyis langh uhjyangh thoeng nyeis lyis, hauh wus gonh phvra kyingh joq yvlyis nyang nyvng lyis nyah ehnyet ma nyens mus.
44017017	Housoeh las nyang gas lyi jungs mas Yuda jens yah eq, Yuda lomsjingh cho mas wontang bang yah eq, nyeih yau nyeih kaih mas xauhgoh bang yah eq taiq phyen-goh xamgoh nyeis.
44017018	Housoeh las, Epikuri cho yahge Stoik cho chank dah joeui kunk bang dvyhamh nyang yah taiq phyen-goh. Dvyhamh gas, haih nhuot thunk soeu cha taiq mes au lhyeh, ge. Gohyhamh gas gohmau phvra cho taiq kyoh soeu nghuot das, ge. Khasoeh ge lyis nyang Yesu dah cho yahge dwis toq dah gausyis loeus cho taiq yvmvyah nghuot.
44017019	Nyamoq gas Paulo lyis shwih yoeus las Arepagu mas shwih loh las taiq zis gas, Hau nvng jyauh dah cho saiq ngamoq lyis seq nhang aq, ge dung.
44017020	Nvng taiq cho dvkhamh gas ngamoq xiklyis, mauh das teh ge xauhgyo. Housoeh las nvng cha taiq mes yvlyis ngamoq seq mes, ge.
44017021	Gvshih Athen dius jens yahge houmha khau nyeis gohmau bang gas, jyauh cho vsaiq lyis tsain taiq nhamgoh zis yah kyingh, shishenh lai nhang nyeis.
44017022	Paulo Arepagu huom mas yap las taiq zis gas, Athen bang eh, namoq gas cho khat khanghmuh mas svsoh lomsjingh nyeis yvlyis ngos nyvng.
44017023	Khasoeh ge lyis, ngos namoq dah wus chank suh lai loh las namoq paiq dah vyhang lhyi jeih jeih yoeuh lyis, Ma seq dah Mangso dvkoeuq xiklyis, ge lhaih toh phon dvkoeuq lyis nyvng. Hau namoq ma seq seq paiq soeu dah cho, ngos namoq lyis taiq kyoh bah.
44017024	Mungkvn yahge houmha nyeis ya nyeis yvlyis gvnkhanh toh Soeu nghuot. Maukhung yahge nyeisjvng dah Yhensain nghuot las, dius loq yah kuot dah phvra yhen mas lungh joq zis ma nghuot.
44017025	Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas dwis dah kang yahge yoh ya yoh yvlyis dyei soeu nghuot yvmvyah, nyang dvja ja chah soeu teh, dius loq yah phuqsoe chah zis ma nghuot.
44017026	Dius dvyuk kyingh masyah dius nyau dvnganh lyis gvnkhanh toh las, nyeisjvng gonh mas nyeis dyos nhang. Nyamoq khamha nyeis dyos das xiklyis maukyo yahge shishenh lyis gvn toeuq toh dyei.
44017027	Nyamoq gas Mangso lhyi xo wu zis yah nyvng lyis nyvng das. Nyang gas yang hank yah eq we nyeis zis ma nghuot.
44017028	Dius dvyuk taiq zis gas, Yang gas nyang mas nyeis las kang dwis nyeis. Namoq dah sodang svra dvyhamh taiq zis yah dvyhangteh, Yang eq nyah lo jens nghuot, ge.
44017029	Housoeh las yang gas Mangso dah vshih tsain nghuot yvmvyah, Mangso lhyi dius dah ehnyet yah nghamh toeuq las kuot dah ngwis, xing, luk yah kuot dah silho yah doeusgoh oen yang ma gis nghamh.
44017030	Ma xauhgyo, ma seq las lai loh goeus caiq lyis Mangso ka yoeuh lhaiq kat dyei las, gvshih gas joqyos khanghmuh mas nyeis bang dvnganh lyis, nhaiqlom thaiq das xiklyis nyang tying toh.
44017031	Khasoeh ge lyis nyang khyen yoeus soeu dah loq yah mungkvn gonh lyis dan khyvlyis soetuon das xiklyis nyang buisnyeis dvnyeih toeuq toh. Nyang toeuq toh buisnyeis jyoengh bweh los das yvlyis dius khanghmuh xikkhonh mas kanghjyoeng Chixoeuq khyvlyis yah Yesu lyis shei masyah dwis toq los nhang goeus, ge.
44017032	Shei goeus bang dwis toq los ge dah cho xauhgyo lyis, dvyhamh bang gas jingh. Dvyhamh gas, Haih cho dvlhain doms gyo mes shih, ge.
44017033	Housoeh Paulo eq nyamoq jyank masyah thuq loh.
44017034	Nghuot laus eq dius dvyhamh gas nyang yah zomh las lomsjingh. Hauh moq mas Arepagu dius vgyis Dionisi, Damari ge dah vmesbih dvyuk yahge gohtoeu dius jens eq bos.
44018001	Hauh cho bweh thang lhyi Paulo gas Athen wus masyah thuq las Korinthu wus pheh loh.
44018002	Ketha hwankti Klodi gas, Yuda jens dvnganh, Roma wus masyah thuq chah, ge vmingh khyoq yvmvyah, Pontu mau mas khoeu Akula ge dah Yuda dvyuk gas nyah yhensain nyhiq Priska yah dvgeh Itali mau masyah thuot los zis ma nyangh shih. Paulo gas nyamoq yah xauhgoh las nyah zomh yhen mas boengh doq nyeis.
44018003	Nyamoq gas muga zvng chop zo bang tsain nghuot las, muh doeusgoh yvmvyah, Paulo eq nyah zomh yah dvgeh nyeis las muh kuot nyeis.
44018004	Yuda No Buisnyeis khanghmuh lyi jungs mas Yuda jens yahge Heleni jens lyis eq lomsjingh shoq taiq kyoh yomdyei nyeis.
44018005	Sila yahge Timothi Makedoni masyah chank duons los lyis, Paulo gas dang taiq kyoh cho top kuot las, Yesu gas Khristu nghuot, ge Yuda jens lyis kanghjyoeng kat nyeis.
44018006	Nyamoq gas tomp las jwangh nyhap los lyis, nyang nyamoq lyis nyah dyi ko xoeuq zis yah taiq zis gas, Namoq dah suih namoq uhloms mas joq bas jungh; ngos mas yobos ma bos lo: gvshih masyah gohnyau jyank pheh lai loh lo das, ge.
44018007	Nyang hou mhayah thuq las, Mangso lhyi paiq dah Titiu Yustu ge soeu yhen mas wvng loh. Hauh soeu yhen ka lyi jungs yah dvgeh nghuot.
44018008	Krispu ge dah lyi jungs vgyis eq, nyah yhenbang dvnganh mebih yah Yhensain lhyi tsain lomsjingh. Korinthu dius jens nyoshoq eq xauhgyo lyis lomsjingh las jeisnyhop tsain kham.
44018009	Dvnyens gas Yhensain gas nyoqnyvng masyah Paulo lyis taiq zis gas, Vgyuk, dvtaiq aq, samlo vnyeis.
44018010	Ngos nvng yah dvgeh nghuot. Nvng lyis shanghsenh nhang das zis hank loq eq yoh jweh das zis ma nghuot. Haih wus mas ngah dius nyoshoq nyeis, ge.
44018011	Housoeh hauh yvmas Mangso dah dang jyauh uhjyangh dvzvn dvkhyamh nyeis khoq.
44018012	Nghuot laus eq Galio gas Akhaia mau mas mungh zau kuot yoq lyis Yuda jens dvlhain dvm Paulo lyis jes sont las, nyang lyis soetuon jang mas shwih e las taiq zis gas,
44018013	Haih soeu ka lyi yah ma huq khyvlyis Mangso lhyi paiq das nyhenshang ngamoq dah dius jens lyis taiq kyingh nyeis soeu nghuot, ge.
44018014	Housoeh Paulo phuk taiq das ge dvsont shih lyis Galio nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Yuda jens eh, muh haih zis lyi lhyweq muh, lhung cho nghuot lyis gas ngos namoq lyis jhen las gyo dyei vvng.
44018015	Nghuot laus eq gvshih gas namoq dah nyeidang dah dangkhonh, vmingh, namoq dah lyi cho yah sen las phyen-goh cho dvnghuot las namoq nyang yoeuh goh geh. Ngos housoeh teh muh mas soetuon soeu ma mes kuot, ge.
44018016	Housoeh ge nyamoq lyis soetuon jang masyah loh nhang.
44018017	Hauh uhlyis Heleni jens dvnganh gas lyi jungs gomh soeu Sotene lyis nyhik las soetuon jang mas tsain bat. Galio gas hauh cho lhyi pvlhyahlyoeus dvkuot.
44018018	Hauh thang lhyi Paulo gas, houmha nyangh nyangh lo dvyoq nyeis khoq thang lhyi boekyis lyis jeshuh khoq las Siria mau pheh sangpho yah goeu loh. Priska yahge Akula vzomh eq nyang yah dvgeh nghuot. Paulo gas xikpheh maukhi las dangthoengh toh zis bos yvmvyah Kenkhrea wus mas uhyuk tyamp.
44018019	Housoeh nyamoq Ephesu mas jweh las Paulo gas hauh vzomh lyis houmha khyoq toh khoq. Nyang gas lyi jungs mas wvng las Yuda jens yah lhah goh nyeis.
44018020	Houmha bang Paulo lyis houmha dvyoq nyeis khoq das xiklyis sang laus eq nyang ma gyo.
44018021	Nyang nyamoq lyis jeshuh zoh lyis taiq zis gas, Mangso dah ehnyet nghuot lyis gas ngos namoq jyank mas doms jweh das, ge. Housoeh nyang Ephesu masyah sangpho yah goeu khoq.
44018022	Gvshih Kesare jweh lyis, nyang Yerusalem pheh doq loh las, phung lyis xauhgoh khoq lho las, Antiok mas doms loh.
44018023	Hauh yvmas dvyoq nyeis khoq las hou mhayah doms thuq lyis Galati yahge Phrigia mau suh lai uhjyangh changlo jens dvnganhmoq lyis thukxank yomdyei.
44018024	Hauh uhlyis Apolo ge Alesandria wus mas dah dangdat, Yuda dius dvyuk Ephesu mas jweh los. Hauh soeu ka lhaihtoh dang khoek khoek seq soeu nghuot.
44018025	Hauh soeu ka Yhensain dah cho xauh xuq las dyos mas svsoh o mes zis yah Yesu cho vlhomuh jyauh nyeis. Nghuot laus eq nyang gas Yohan dah jeisnyhop cho kyingh dvseq.
44018026	Gvshih nyang gas lyi jungs mas womh ehnyet yah taiq kyoh zoh loh. Hauh uhlyis Priska yahge Akula gas, nyang taiq kyoh dang xauhgyo lyis nyang lyis khi las, Mangso cho zes shopsaq shoq vlhomuh jyauh.
44018027	Nyang gas Akhaia mau pheh goeu e mes lyis, Boekyis eq nyang lyis zes yomdyei las, changlo jens nyang lyis lhom yoeus das xiklyis, nyamoq jyank mas maussauh tsain dyei kat. Nyang jweh lyis Mangso dah jyehjuh gvng mas lomsjingh bang lyis gvgis bos thukxank dyei.
44018028	Khasoeh ge lyis Yesu gas Khristu nyang nghuot, ge lhaihtoh dang tuonh xoeuq las, Yuda jens lyis yomsoq zains yah taiq ung.
44019001	Apolo Korinthu wus mas nyeis nyeis lyis, Paulo gas thoq mau cho suh lai loh las, Ephesu mas jweh e. Houmha changlo dvyhamh yah xauhgoh.
44019002	Nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Namoq lomsjingh uhlyis, Gyingshang Dyos vxauh yoeus shih goh lah, ge. Nyamoq, nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Gyingshang Dyos ge zis yangh ngamoq ma xauhgyo ku, ge.
44019003	Paulo nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Housoeh lyis namoq khasoeh teh jeisnyhop kham goh lah, ge. Nyamoq taiq zis gas, Yohan dah jeisnyhop kham, ge.
44019004	Yohan dah jeisnyhop gas vsainnyang dah yaunos masyah lhain los bang lyis dyei dah jeisnyhop nghuot. Yohan Israel jens lyis taiq zis gas, Ngah thang mas jweh soeu lyis lomsjingh geh, hauh soeu ka Yesu nghuot. ge.
44019005	Hauh bang hauh dang xauhgyo lyis, Yhensain Yesu dah nyings mas jeisnyhop tsain kham.
44019006	Gvshih Paulo nyamoq thoq mas loq kih dyei goeus ya, nyamoq thoq mas Gyingshang Dyos jweh las nyamoq dang vja ja jis las lvpe tsain pe los.
44019007	Nyamoq dvnganh lyis vbusbih dvci aiq yuk nghuot.
44019008	Hauh thang lhyi Paulo gas lyi jungs mas wvng las Mangso munghdan cho lhyi womh womh lhamhmuh somh khyvp top yomsoq bos dah dang yah taiq kyingh.
44019009	Nghuot laus eq dvyhamh gas nhaiqlom than zis yah ma lomsjingh, moqphung xikkhonh mas haih cho yah sen lha ma gis khyvlyis taiq los lyis changlo jens lyis shwih las hau joqyos toh khoq las Tiranu ge dah jyauh yvpmuh mas nyeih nyenh taiq goh nyeis.
44019010	Housoeh aiq zvn gyo lyis jyauh las Asia mau gonh mas dah Yuda dius, Heleni dius Yhensain dah dang lyis tsain gyo yoeus.
44019011	Mangso eq Paulo loq masyah yomsoq muh chixoeuq goeus las,
44019012	Paulo dah gungs yah tanh dah misseh, huyhauh teh zis dvja ja, nos bang jyank mas yoeus los lyis, hauh nos bang gis los. Yius wvng zis eq thuq loh.
44019013	Hauh uhlyis yius khat thuq dyei yenh bang Yuda dius dvyhamh eq, yius kuq bang lyis Yhensain Yesu dah nyings yoeus las yius lyis khat zis yah taiq zis gas, Paulo taiq dah Yesu nyings yah ngos namoq lyis vmingh dyei bah, thuq loh geh, ge.
44019014	Yuda Phudyei Zainsmuh Skewa dah loloeu nyhet yuk eq housoeh tsain kuot.
44019015	Hauh uhlyis ma shop dah yius gas nyamoq lyis, Yesu lyis ngos seq, Paulo lyis eq ngos seq, nghuot laus eq namoq hank nghuot goh: ge.
44019016	Hauh yius kuq soeu eq nyamoq thoq mas dyvm doq las nis ung tyamp. Housoeh nyamoq gas shohthungh shohnyhoq shohchen hauh yhen masyah phang thuq loh.
44019017	Hauh cho lhyi Ephesu mas dah Yuda, Heleni dius dvnganh xauhgyo lyis, nyamoq gyuk dvn mauh las Yhensain Yesu dah nyings lyis chungh nyeis.
44019018	Lomsjingh goeus bang nyoshoq eq lyih las vsainnyang kuot shuot cho cu rhen.
44019019	Mandan muot zo bang nyoshoq eq, nyamoq dah maussauh tsain chi lyih las, dius dvnganh dah xikkhonh mas ngheq tyamp. Hauh maussauh phauh suon yoeuh lyis ngwis kyvp oeng mons ko phauh nghuot.
44019020	Housoeh Yhensain dah dang gas yomsoq zainsmuh yah ung los.
44019021	Hauh cho bweh thang lhyi, Paulo gas Makedoni mau yahge Akhaia mau dye suh lai loh las, Yerusalem mas doms e das, hou mhayah Roma wus pheh eq jweh yoeuh das, ge ehnyet mas nghamh toh.
44019022	Housoeh yvmvyah nyang lyis bos pangh vzomh Timothi yahge Erastu lyis shih Makedoni mau pheh nhang kat las, nyang gas Asia mau mas dvyoq nyeis khoq shih.
44019023	Gvshih hauh gyo lyis, hauh cho gvng mas dius hoeu chetchet lo toq los.
44019024	Khasoeh ge lyis Demetrio ge dah ngwis shonh soeu ka Artemi dah ngwis phvra gyamhlo kuot zis yah shonh bang lyis ngwis nyoshoq yoh nhang nyeis.
44019025	Hauh soeu ka nyah ngwis shonh changh jens yahge gohtoeu hauh muh kuot zo bang dvnganh lyis khi huom las taiq zis gas, Loeuzomh jens eh, haih muh yah kyingh yang dis nyeis zis gas namoq nyang seq.
44019026	Nghuot laus eq gvshih gas, Ephesu wus mas kyingh yangh ma nghuot lo, Asia vluk dvmau gonh nghuot shoq, haih Paulo ge soeu ka, Dius loq kuot zis gas phvra ma nghuot ge, dius nyoshoq lyis nyang taiq dang yoh jingh nhang loh goeus.
44019027	Housoeh yvmvyah, yah dah muh gas jwangh zis xauh thoq lyis magoh kuhxing dah gywes lonyi Artemi dah paiq yhenmuh eq dius jens ma phauh lo zis yahge Asia mau yahge mungkvn gonh paiq dah gywes lonyi dah nyoqnho ngelang lhoeu thyoq tyamp das zis eq chiq chank bos, ge.
44019028	Hauh dang tsain xauhgyo lyis nyamoq nhaiqyo las Ephesu dius dah Artemi gas kuhxing ge tsain kaiq.
44019029	Housoeh hauh wus gonh hoeu las, Paulo dah gyung suh changh Makedoni dius Gai-u yahge Aristaku lyis nyhik she las, nyamoq dah pwe gus mas wuih e.
44019030	Paulo eq haih moqphung mas wvng mes laus eq changlo jens nyang lyis tomp toh.
44019031	Paulo yah seq goh, hauh wus mas dah dius zains dvyhamh eq nyang lyis pwe gus mas ma wvng das xiklyis taiq nhang kat.
44019032	Hauh uhlyis moqphung gas, vnhunk nhunk mus nyeis las gohyuk gohja tsain kaiq. Nyamoq nyothyang gas vsainnyang chamus lyih tsain huom zis yangh ma seq.
44019033	Gvshih Yuda dius jens Alesanda lyis jyuonh las moqphung mas toqh kat. Alesanda eq moqphung sam das xiklyis loq vsoh dyei las taiq bah ge cvvq.
44019034	Nghuot laus eq nyang Yuda dius nghuot zis seq lyis, dvnganhmoq gas dvyih dvyot, Ephesu jens dah Artemi gas kuhxing, ge aiq shishenh ko nyangh shoq tsain kaiq nyeis.
44019035	Wus mas lhaih comh soeu ka hauh moqphung lyis dye sam nhang thang lhyi taiq zis gas, Ephesu bang eh, haih Ephesu wus gas kuhxing dah Artemi gywes lonyi dah yhenmuh yahge maukhung mas gyoh los dah gungslho lyis tsainh toh joqyos nghuot yvlyis ma seq soeu hank bos lah?
44019036	Hauh cho ka ma yoh ngoek cho nghuot yvmvyah ehnyet nyens nyens nyeis gis zis yahge ma nghamh yoeuh muh ma gis kuot.
44019037	Nyamoq gas yah phvra yhen lyis thyoqzo dyei bang eq ma nghuot, yah gywes lonyi lyis loeusmus soqzo bang eq ma nghuot zis, namoq haih bang lyis she los lhyeh?
44019038	Housoeh yvmvyah Demetrio yahge nyah ngwis loqmuh zwi bang dvyuk lyis kauq chank bos lyis, soetuon jang phank toh, mungh zau eq nyeis, nyamoq nyang changh nyang zau kauq goh das.
44019039	Hei mhayah lai las seq mes cho dvja ja bos lyis, lyi wvng dah wus moq huom mas taiq thyet bas jungh.
44019040	Khvnyhik haih bang hoeu dah muh haih zis gas vyang ma bos yvmvyah, yang lyis yobos huon das zis chiq chank bos. Heisoeh teh hoeu yvlyis chamus bweh nhang ge dah phuk dang ngamoq ma yoh, ge.
44019041	Nyang hauh zis dye taiq lyis hauh moq huom lhyi tyo tyamp.
44020001	Gvshih hau hoeu cho sam tyamp thang lhyi, Paulo gas changlo jens lyis khi yoeus las taiq kyingh yomdyei toh khoq lho las jeshuh las Makedoni mau pheh e das zis thuq loh.
44020002	Hauh wuxom cho suh lai las taiq kyingh yom dye dyei lyis Akhaia mau mas jweh loh.
44020003	Houmha lhamhmuh somh khyvp nyeis khoq las, Siria mau pheh doms goeu loh das cvvq lyis, Yuda jens nyang lyis lhom yvmvyah, Makedoni cho doms tauh loh das ge nghamh toh.
44020004	Hauh uhlyis nyah thang chank yenh bang gas, Berea wus mas dah Piru dah lo Sopata; Thesaloni wus mas dah Aristaku yahge Sekundu; Derbe wus mas dah Gai-u; Asia mau mas dah Tichiku, Trophimu; yahge Timothi nghuot.
44020005	Nyamoq gas xik lyis loh las Troa wus mas ngamoq lyis langh nyeis.
44020006	Ngamoq eq bicheih ma kat ohlhyoq zo pwe lai thang lhyi, Philipi wus masyah goeu las oeng nyeih nyangh thang lhyi Troa wus, nyamoq jyank mas jweh lyis houmha nyhet nyeih tsain thoeng.
44020007	Dvdaus dah cangxeih vnyeih lyis ohlhyoq khyiq das xiklyis changlo jens zain joq lyis, Paulo gas nungs nvp thuq das zis sont yvmvyah, nyamoq lyis gungsgvm jweh shoq hauh dang taiq kyingh nyeis.
44020008	Hau nyamoq huom joq, thoq yvp mas nyibung nyoshoq duk nyeis.
44020009	Khomhbaiq mas Utiku ge dah loyvm phoq dvyuk tsung las yhet joq. Paulo dang taiq xing nyeis shih lyis hauh soeu yhet muih loh las, somh tsank yhen masyah dyet gyoh loh. Nyamoq nyang lyis e kui uhlyis nyang shei goeus.
44020010	Housoeh Paulo gyoh loh las hauh soeu lyis po yoeus las taiq zis gas, Vchiq goh nyang kang bos shih, ge.
44020011	Paulo doms doq loh zis yah, ohlhyoq khyiq las zo lho las, nyoqnyvng shoq nyamoq yah dang xing xing dye jisgoh thang lhyi, thuq loh.
44020012	Nyamoq hauh loyvm phoq lyis vdwis shwih loh las, nhaiqtaink zis nyoshoq xauh.
44020013	Paulo gas tungyos cho loh das zis sont toh yvmvyah nyang lyis Aso wus masyah sangpho mha shwih tsung das khyvlyis ngamoq nyah xik pheh hauh wus mas sangpho yah loh langh.
44020014	Nyang Aso wus mas ngamoq yah xauhgoh goeus ya, nyang lyis sangpho shwih tsung lha, Mitilen wus pheh goeu e.
44020015	Ngamoq hou mhayah doms toq lyis, nungs nyeih Kio mas jweh loh. Hou mhayah dvnyeih nyangh lyis Samo mas jweh loh. Hauh nungs nyeih Miletu wus mas jweh loh.
44020016	Khasoeh ge lyis Paulo gas Yerusalem mas Pentekoti buisnyeis duons lyis duons shoq ge mangh nyeis las, Asia mau mas buisnyeis ma thank nhang mes yvmvyah, Ephesu wus lyis lai toh khoq das ge nghamh toh.
44020017	Gvshih Paulo gas Miletu wus masyah Ephesu wus, phung mas dah logis jens lyis khi nhang kat.
44020018	Nyamoq nyah jyank mas jweh lyis nyang nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos Asia mau mas vsaiq wvng nyeih masyah khvnyhik jweh shoq ngos kang khasoeh dwis zis namoq seq.
44020019	Ngos Yhensain dah muh wons wuq yvmas ehnyet khyoq las, ngausdyeis ngausnhvp yah Yuda jens lhom cho dah yaukyenh shanghsenh vja ja lyis kham zo zis yah ehnyet khyoq las ngausdyeis yah Yhensain dah muh lyis ngos wons wuq lai los.
44020020	Namoq xiklyis vkyuh bos dah muh lyis zwi cho mas ngos khanhamp eq nungs ma jik, namoq lyis hauh dang taiq kyoh las dvyhen dvyhen bvng bvng jyauh goeus.
44020021	Yuda dius yahge Heleni dius eq yaunos masyah Mangso jyank pheh lhain los las, yah Yhensain Yesu lyis lomsjingh das xiklyis ngos khoek khoek choshet toh.
44020022	Gvshih yoeuh aq, ngos Dyos lyis domsyos gyo zis yah Yerusalem mas loh chah nyeis. Houmha ngos cha mus das zis gas ngos ma seq.
44020023	Thung lungh das zis yahge shoeuhshih das zis gas ngos lyis langh nyeis ge, wus khanghmuh mas Gyingshang Dyos gas ngos lyis zaih nhang cho kyingh ngos dvseq.
44020024	Nghuot laus eq ngos gas ngos chank chah cho lhyi yoh nyhuk das zis yahge Mangso dah jyehjuh gausyis dang kanghjyoeng kat das xiklyis, Yhensain Yesu jyank masyah ngos xauh yoeus dah muh lyis eq, dye wons wuq das xiklyis ngos ngah kang lhyi ma yu.
44020025	Yoeuh aq, ngos hai maukhung munghdan cho taiq kyoh yenh yoq lyis xauhgoh, zomh yoeuh bang namoq dvnganhmoq, thang pheh ngah nyoqnho lyis ma doms nyvng lo das zis ngos seq.
44020026	Housoeh las dius hank dah suih eq ngah jyank mas ma dap zis gas, ngos khvnyhik namoq lyis kanghjyoeng kat.
44020027	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso nghamh toeuq cho dvnganh zis namoq lyis taiq kyoh cho lhyi ngos khanhamp eq ma chilhaiq.
44020028	Mangso ka nyah suih yah wis dah Mangso dah phung lyis yoeuh das gomh das xiklyis, Gyingshang Dyos namoq lyis uhshe bang kuot nhang goeus yvmvyah, namoq gas vsainnyang gungs yahge yvng phung gonh lyis wontang yoeuh nyeis geh.
44020029	Ngos thuq loh thang lhyi yvng phung lyis nhaiq ma nyen, wus dah cauhpau jens gas namoq mas wvng las yvng phung lyis nyamoq o khyvlyis kuot tyamp das zis ngos seq.
44020030	Namoq mas gomloeus pan bang toq los las changlo jens lyis eq chowhang shwih whang das.
44020031	Housoeh las ngos namoq dvnganhmoq lyis somh zvn top nyeih nyenh ma no lo nyoqdyeis yah taiq kyingh toh zis lyis soh las phuksohlhaiq kuot geh.
44020032	Mangso dah nhaiqnyen shohgyo dah loq yah, nyah jyehjuh Dang mas kyauh toh. Hauh dang gas namoq lyis yoh kuhxing los nhang zis yahge Mangso nyah dius jens dvnganh lyis dyei dah jyehjuh jyungshuk gas namoq lyis xauh kham zo nhang.
44020033	Ngos gas hank dah ngwis xing, dyimis lyis eq nyoqnoq o ma bos ku.
44020034	Nghuot goeus haih loq gas ngah gungs yahge ngah Muh wons changh jens chah dah cho khat khanghmuh kuot dyei loq nghuot yvlyis namoq nyang seq.
44020035	Housoeh tungh kuot las yom ma bos bang lyis bos gis thuk cho eq, lhom yoeus thoq lyis dyei zis gas nge zes lhoq ge, Yhensain Yesu nyang taiq dang lyis soh las ngos kuot teh kuot dah muh mas yomnhuk bang lyis yoh pangh das xiklyis ngos namoq lyis yikhyoh chixoeuq goeus, ge.
44020036	Housoeh dye taiq lho las, nyang nyamoq dvnganhmoq yah dvgeh phvluk zomhgyuis las shvmanh dung.
44020037	nyamoq dvnganhmoq ngaus zis yah Paulo lainzain lyis po las nyang lyis bvlot tanh.
44020038	Thang pheh nyah nyoqnho ma xauh nyvng lo das, ge dah dang khonh mas nyamoq nhaiq zes kuk. Hauh thang lhyi Sangpho jweh shoq eq nyang lyis e tsain pauq kat.
44021001	Ngamoq nyamoq lyis kangh toh khoq las Kosa goeujo dan dan goeu loh. Nungs nyeih Rode mas tsain jweh, hou mhayah Patara wus mas jweh.
44021002	Phoenisia mau pheh goeu dah sangpho nyvng las hauh zis yah tsung loh.
44021003	Kupru goeujo nyvng kat lyis, hauh loqyos shot pheh lai loh las, Siria mau pheh goeu gyoh las sangpho mas dah hu khyoq das xiklyis Taire wus mas thoeng.
44021004	Houmha dah changlo jens lyis loh xauhgoh zis yah ngamoq hauh wus mas nyhet nyeih nyeis khoq. Hauh bang eq Paulo lyis Yerusalem pheh ma loh das xiklyis Dyos yah taiq.
44021005	Nyhet nyeih lai thang lhyi ngamoq thuq las tsoq loh lyis, houmha bang vmesbih jens yah dvgeh wus nghe jweh shoq chank pauq kat. Jyankyvm mas jweh lyis ngamoq dvnganhmoq phvluk zomhgyuis las shvmanh tsain dung.
44021006	Dye lyis dvyuk yah dvyuk jeshuh goh thang lhyi, ngamoq sangpho khau mha wvng las, nyamoq eq yhen pheh tauh loh.
44021007	Ngamoq Taire wus masyah jeis cho tsoq loh lyis Ptolemai wus mas jweh loh. Houmha ngamoq lomsjingh bang yah xauh jhent goh zis yah nyamoq yah dvgeh dvnyeih nyeis khoq.
44021008	Nungs nyeih ngamoq hou mhayah Kesare wus mas jweh loh. Housoeh nyhet yuk mas dvyuk nghuot las, gausyis dang taiq kyoh soeu svra Philip yhen mas ngamoq boengh wvng doq khoq.
44021009	Hauh soeu ka lvpe seq pe dah lonyi gyingh nyhet yuk yoh.
44021010	Ngamoq nyah yhen mas dvyoq nyeis lyis, Yuda mau masyah Agabu ge dah lvpe dvyuk jweh los.
44021011	Housoeh nyang ngamoq jyank wvng las Paulo dah dyichih nyah khyei nyah loq mas yoeus twih lho las taiq zis gas, Gyingshang Dyos heisoeh taiq nyeis. Haih dyichih sain lyis Yerusalem mas Yuda jens yah heisoeh twih las gohnyau loq mas kyauh das, ge.
44021012	Ngamoq hauh dang xauhgyo lyis, ngamoq yahge houmha bang gas, nyang lyis Yerusalem mas ma loh das xiklyis tsain taiq kyingh.
44021013	Paulo phuk taiq zis gas, Namoq chamus tsain ngaus las ngos lyis nhaiqngis nhang goh lah? Twih zis za ma nghuot, Yhensain Yesu dah nyings xiklyis Yerusalem mas loh shei kham das zis yangh cicont nghuot, ge.
44021014	Housoeh ma yoh jyoeuq lo goeus ya, Yhensain dah ehnyet dvnghuot lo oen ngamoq eq samlo nyeis.
44021015	Hauh thang lhyi ngamoq gas dyens sont las Yerusalem pheh loh.
44021016	Kesare mas dah changlo jens dvyhamh eq ngamoq yah dvgeh loh zis yah, ngamoq boengh loh doq das dah yhensain, changlo nyoshoq zvn duot goeus soeu Kupru dius Manason dah yhen mas tsain shwih loh.
44021017	Ngamoq Yerusalem mas jweh lyis, boekyis gas ngamoq lyis gausyis zis yah lhom yoeus.
44021018	Nungs nyeih Paulo gas ngamoq yah dvgeh Yaku jyank mas lamh e lyis logis jens dvnganh eq huom joq langh.
44021019	Nyamoq yah dye jhent goh las, nyang wons wuq muh mas, gohnyau bang mas Mangso bweh nhang cho dvkoeuq thang lhyi dvkoeuq taiq kyoh.
44021020	Hauh zis xauhgyo lyis nyamoq eq Yhensain lhyi chungh las nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Vmang eh, Yuda dius mas lomsjingh bang khyoengh soe mons soe nyo zis gas nvng seq. Hauh bang dvnganh gas Lyi mas nhaiq wvng bang kyingh nghuot.
44021021	Nghuot laus eq gohnyau bang mas loh nyhamh toh dah Yuda dius dvnganh lyis, vsainnyang dah lo jens lyis vthyoh tyomh cho ma kuot dyei noh, nyamoq thungh ma chank noh, ge Moshe Lyi ma chank das khyvlyis nyang jyauh, ge dah dang gas hauh bang dvnganh dye xauhgyo goeus.
44021022	Khasoeh kuot das? Nvng jweh zis nyamoq jyoengh xauhgyo hah das.
44021023	Housoeh las ngamoq taiq teh chank kuot aq. Ngamoq jyank mas dangthoengh toh bang nyei yuk bos.
44021024	Nah cho yah sen las nyamoq xauhgyo dah loeus gas ma jus zis yahge, nvng gas Lyi lyis phauh nyang las chank kuot nyeis zis lyis nyamoq seq das xiklyis haih bang lyis nvng shwih las, nvng eq nyamoq yah dvgeh cheihshang cho kuot aq. Nyamoq dah uhyuk phauh nvng kham aq.
44021025	Nghuot laus eq lomsjingh dah gohnyau bang dah cho ngamoq nghamhthyet cho maussauh yah nyamoq lyis seq nhang goeus. Nyamoq gas phvra lyis kyangh goeus dah vyhang yahge suih, lainzain lhyent sat shoh, yauxi cho lyis jhank chah, ge.
44021026	Hauh thang lhyi Paulo hauh vbusbih jens lyis shwih las, nungs nyeih nyah cheihshang cho lhyi nyamoq yah dvgeh kuot. Hauh thang lhyi, nyang yhenmuh mas wvng las cheihshang thungh lyis khanyhoq nyeih nyangh thang lhyi tyeh las nyamoq dvyuk yah dvyuk xiklyis phudyei das cho loh taiq kyoh.
44021027	Hau nyhet nyeih vluk dyingh los nyeis lyis Asia mau mas dah Yuda jens gas yhenmuh mas Paulo lyis nyvng lyis, moqphung lyis jyuonh las, Nyang lyis nyhik las kaiq zis gas,
44021028	Israel dius jens eh, bos pangh geh. Haih soeu ka joqyos khyiq khanghmuh mas bang dvnganh lyis yah vnyau yahge Lyi lyis eq, haih joqyos lyis eq, Lyi yah ma huq khyvlyis jyauh soeu nghuot. Hauh thoq lyis magoh, yhenmuh mas Heleni dius shwih wvng las haih Gyingshang joqyos lyis vwot v-oeu kuot, ge.
44021029	(Khasoeh ge lyis, Trophimu ge dah Ephesu dius dvyuk lyis wus mas Paulo yah dvgeh nyamoq nyvng goeus las, hauh soeu lyis yhenmuh mas shwih wvng goeus ge tsain nghamh.)
44021030	Dvwus gonh hoeu lha, moqjens tsain wuih wvng los las, Paulo lyis nyhik, yhenmuh masyah she thuq lho las khomh eq dvlhain dvm nyheih tyamp.
44021031	Housoeh Paulo lyis sat das zis sont nyeis lyis, thoenkgus jesdvp guon dah zauzains jyank mas Yerusalem gonh hoeu nyeis cho loeus jweh loh.
44021032	Nyang gas jeslo jens yahge jes dvxo guon zau jens lyis shwih las nyamoq jyank pheh dvlhain dvm wuih e. Nyamoq gas jeslo jens yahge zauzains moq lyis nyvng lyis, nyamoq Paulo lyis lyuk zis tsain no.
44021033	Housoeh zauzains e las Paulo lyis she yoeus lho las jvngchoh aiq khat yah twih das zis vmingh dyei. Paulo hank nghuot? Nyang cha cu zis eq nyei yoeuh.
44021034	Moqphung gas dvyhamh dvja ge kaiq zis yah nyo hoeu yvmvyah, vlhomuh ma yoh seq shih lyis Paulo lyis thoenkgus jesdvp khau mas kat toh das xiklyis vmingh dyei.
44021035	Zvmlhangh mas jweh lyis, moq dius gas ehnyet gywes zis yah Paulo jyank dyvm los yvmvyah, jeslo jens yah nyang lyis po doq loh.
44021036	Chank los dah moqjens gas, Nyang lyis sat geh, ge tsain kaiq nyeis.
44021037	Paulo lyis thoenkgus jesdvp khau mas kat bah ge loqzoh mas, Paulo zauzains lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos nvng lyis dang dvkhonh vyoh taiq das lah, ge. Zauzains phuk taiq zis gas, Nvng Heleni nyingh seq lah, ge.
44021038	Housoeh lyis nvng gas khvlyens shih gomloeus toq las mhanhdyvp mas dius nyei khyoengh lyis shwih loh dah Egutu dius nvng vnghuot lah, ge nyei.
44021039	Paulo gas, Ngos Kiliki mau, Tarshu wus mas dah Yuda dius nghuot. Ngos nyeis wus gas vtsiq vlo ma nghuot; haih dius lyis dang yoh taiq das vmingh dyei aq, ge tungh sang nyeis.
44021040	Nyang vmingh yoh lyis, zvmlhangh thyoh mas yap las, moqphung sam das xiklyis loq vsoh dyei. Nyamoq sam goeus ya, Hebre nyingh pheh yah nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas,
44022001	Nhaiqbos uwus moq yahge boekyis eh, namoq xikkhonh mas ngah gungsgos dang lyis gyo yoeus dyei geh ge,
44022002	Hebre nyingh pheh yah nyang taiq dang lyis nyamoq xauhgyo lyis zes sam nyeis. Housoeh nyang taiq zis gas,
44022003	Ngos gas Kiliki mau, Tarshu wus mas khoeu dah Yuda dius nghuot. Nghuot laus eq, haih wus mas ngos bes los las, Gamale dah khyeiyang mas ngamoq phauh thyeih moq dah svsoh than lyi thungh yah dvyhangteh jeih jyvp xuq las, khvnyhik dah namoq teh ngos eq Mangso shot pheh nhaiq wvng zis yah,
44022004	nyelo yukgis lo lyis twih she, thung khyoq las, haih cho chank bang lyis sat shoq shoeuhshih yoeuh ku.
44022005	Phudyei bang yahge logis jens phung gonh eq ngah xiklyis kanghjyoeng yoh kat. Ngos nyamoq jyank mas dah maussauh xauh yoeus las Damasku wus mas nyeis bang lyis eq Yerusalem mas twih she los las yobos dyei das xiklyis ngos Damasku pheh loh.
44022006	Housoeh ngos loh las, Damasku wus nvm mas jweh loh nyeis lyis, nyeih gungs lyis maukhung masyah svsoh bvng zis ngah vyvm vwi mas nyetlos nyettant bvng thuq los.
44022007	Ngos gas nyeisjvng mas lains loh las xauhgyo dah dang gas, Saulo, Saulo, nvng ngos lyis chamus shoeuhshih nyeis lah, ge.
44022008	Ngos phuk taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, nvng hank nghuot? Nyang taiq zis gas, Ngos gas nvng shoeuhshih nyeis dah Nazaret Yesu nghuot, ge.
44022009	Ngos yah dvgeh loh bang gas bvng zis tsain nyvng laus eq, ngos lyis taiq nyeis soeu dah thwe lyis gas ma xauhgyo.
44022010	Tsai ngos gas, Yhensain eh, ngos cha kuot das lah, oen lyis Yhensain ngos lyis taiq zis gas, Toq las Damasku mas loh aq, nvng lyis dyei toh dah muh dvnganh houmha nvng lyis taiq kyoh das, ge.
44022011	Hauh bvng dah yet gvng mas ngos nyoq ma nyvng lo lyis, ngos yah loh bang ngah loq mas she lha, ngos lyis Damasku mas shwih wvng loh.
44022012	Housoeh lyi chank zis yah lomsjingh cho mas wontang las, houmha nyeis dah Yuda dius dvnganhmoq dah xikkhonh mas nyoqnho ngelang bos dah Anani ge soeu,
44022013	ngah nvm mas lyih yap las, Ngah vnoeuh Saulo eh, nah nyoq doms nyvng bas jungh, ge. Hauh uhlyis ngos ngah nyoq doms nyvng zis yah nyang lyis nyvng.
44022014	Nyah nhaiqlom seq das zis yahge Dan Soeu lyis nyvng las nyah nhuot mas dah dang xauhgyo yoeus das xiklyis, yah phauh thyeih moq dah Mangso ka nvng lyis khyen toh.
44022015	Khasoeh ge lyis nvng nyvng ku zis yahge xauhgyo ku cho lhyi nyeisjvng gonh mas nyah xiklyis kanghjyoeng kat dyei soeu nvng bweh das.
44022016	Gvshih nvng chamus sheq nyeis lah? Toq aq, Yhensain dah nyings lyis yoeus las jeisnyhop kham las, nah yobos cheihshang tyamp aq, ge.
44022017	Hauh thang lhyi ngos Yerusalem mas tauh loh las yhenmuh mas shvmanh dung nyeis lyis ngos nyoqnyvng nyvng zis gas,
44022018	Nvng Yerusalem masyah lvnyap thuq loh aq, nvng ngah cho kanghjyoeng kat dang lyis nyamoq ma lhom yoeus das, ge Yhensain ngos lyis taiq.
44022019	Hauh uhlyis ngos gas, Yhensain eh, nvng lyis lomsjingh bang lyis lyi jungs masyah ngos thung nyhik khyoq zis yahge tsain lyuk zis gas nyamoq nyang seq.
44022020	Nah kanghjyoeng Stephan dah suih huot yoq lyis eq ngos nyang vyvm mas yap las, hauh cho lhyi xam bos xonh las nyang lyis sat bang dah dyimis zungh dyei goeus, oen taiq goeus.
44022021	Yhensain taiq zis gas, Loh aq, ngos nvng lyis gohnyau bang nyeis dah we mau pheh nhang kat das, ge.
44022022	Houmha jweh shoq nyamoq nyah dang gyo lho las, Houteh soeu lyis gas shung tyamp geh, sat geh, nyang kang dwis das zis ma mon lo, ge tsain kaiq.
44022023	Housoeh kaiq uhjyangh, nyamoq nyang dah dyi khyuot doeuh tyamp las tsohphih tsain doeuh lhank nyeis lyis,
44022024	zauzains taiq zis gas, Paulo lyis thoenkgus jesdvp khau mas shwih hwank las, nyah cho chamus heisoeh kaiq zis yoh seq shoq lyuk las nyei yoeuh geh, ge.
44022025	Shohyeis twih yah nyang lyis lyuk das xiklyis lang twih goeus ya, Paulo gas vyvm mas yap dah jes dvxo guon zau lyis, Khasoeh Roma dius nghuot soeu lyis, dang thang ma thyet shih lyis namoq nyang lyis lyuk zis gas lyi bos lhyeh, ge.
44022026	Jes dvxo guon zau hauh zis xauhgyo lyis, zauzains jyank mas loh taiq zis gas, Nvng cha kuot bah oen lah? Hauh soeu ka Roma dius nghuot, ge.
44022027	Zauzains eq Paulo jyank mas e las, Nvng Roma dius nghuot lah? Ngos lyis taiq kyoh aq ge. Nyang taiq zis gas, Nghuot, ge.
44022028	Tsai, zauzains taiq zis gas, Ngos Roma dius xauh bweh das nyhenshang phauh nyoshoq yah dvyoh yoeus, ge. Paulo taiq zis gas, Ngos gas Roma dius bweh goeus zis khoeu los soeu nghuot, ge.
44022029	Housoeh nyang lyis nyei wu yoeuh das ge bang houjang tsain thuq khoq. Zauzains eq Paulo Roma dius nghuot cho seq goeus ya, nyang lyis twih shuot las gyuk nyeis.
44022030	Yuda jens Paulo lyis chah yobos huon zis zauzains jeih jeih seq mes yvmvyah nungs nvp Paulo lyis phui kat las phudyei uhjyung jens yahge Yuda lyi huom gonh lyis huom das xiklyis vmingh dyei. Housoeh nyang Paulo lyis nyamoq xikkhonh masyah lyih shwih toh.
44023001	Housoeh Paulo gas nhaiqbos huom lyis yoeuh tsuk toh las taiq zis gas, Boekyis eh, ngos khvnyhik jweh shoq gis zis dvnganh lyis seq nghamh ehnyet yah Mangso xikkhonh mas dwis nyeis, ge.
44023002	Housoeh las Phudyei Zainsmuh Anani gas, Nyah nhuot lyis tyuk dyei geh, ge vnvm mas yap joq bang lyis vmingh dyei.
44023003	Paulo nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Vthyoeu juot dah tyoyvm eh, Mangso nvng lyis tyuk das: Lyi bos khyvlyis soetuon das zis nvng heimha dvtsung lhyi, Lyi yah shaih khyvlyis ngos lyis tyuk nhang lhyeh, ge.
44023004	Vyvm mas yap joq bang eq, Nvng Mangso dah Phudyei Zainsmuh lyis ma phauhgis womh taiq lhyeh, ge.
44023005	Paulo taiq zis gas, Boekyis eh, nyang Phudyei Zainsmuh nghuot zis ngos ma seq las nghuot. Nah vnyau thoq mas guon soeu lyis ma phauh yoh kuot das zis ma nghuot, ge lhaih toh, ge.
44023006	Hau huom joq bang mas dvyhamh gas Saduke, dvyhamh gas Pharishe tsain nghuot yvlyis Paulo seq lyis, nyang hauh huom mas kaiq zis gas, Boekyis eh, ngos gas Pharishe jens dah lo Pharishe nyang nghuot. Shei goeus bang dwis toq cho lhyi lomsjingh gvng mas ngos shoenk zis xauh nyeis, ge.
44023007	Housoeh taiq kat lyis Pharishe yahge Saduke moq nyang changh nyang phyen-goh las moq huom gas gang lvn loh.
44023008	Khasoeh ge lyis, Saduke moq gas, Dwis toq ge zis ma bos, loeuswons bang yahge dyos eq ma bos, ge sang. Nghuot laus eq Pharishe moq gas hau dvnganh yvlyis lhom yoeus.
44023009	Housoeh las svsoh tsain taiq hoeu goh nyeis. Hauh uhlyis Pharishe phung mas dah maussauh lhaih bang dvyhamh toq las, haih soeu mas chah yobos eq ngamoq ma nyvng, Dyos nghuot ya loeuswons soeu nyang yah dang taiq goh nyeis zis dvnghuot, ge.
44023010	Housoeh svsoh phyen-goh los lyis, zauzains gas nyamoq Paulo lyis lang chingh sat das yvlyis chiq yvmvyah, nyamoq jyank mas gyoh e lha, nyamoq xikkhonh masyah nyang lyis lang she lha thoenkgus jesdvp khau mha shwih loh das xiklyis jeslo jens lyis vmingh dyei.
44023011	Hauh nyensyo Yhensain gas Paulo nvm mas yap las, Vgyuk, nvng ngah cho Yerusalem mas kanghjyoeng kat zis yah dvyhangteh Roma wus mas eq kat chah shih, ge.
44023012	Nyoq nyvng lyis Yuda dius dvyhamh tsain huom, gomloeus pan lha, Paulo lyis ma yoh sat dvchank gas cha eq ma zo ma shuk das, ge nyamoq nyang gungs lyis mau tsain khi toh.
44023013	Housoeh xam bang nyeici nyet ko nghuot.
44023014	Nyamoq gas phudyei uhjyung jens yahge logis jens jyank mas e lha taiq zis gas, Paulo lyis ma yoh sat dvchank gas zonoms cha lyis eq ma tanh das oen ngamoq mau tsain khi toh.
44023015	Housoeh yvmvyah gvshih namoq yahge hau nhaiqbos huom yah dvgeh, Paulo dah cho vlhomuh nyei yoeuh mes shih oen nyang lyis nvpyo namoq jyank mas khi yoeus das khyvlyis zauzains lyis sang kat geh. Ngamoq gas nyang heimha ma jweh shih lyis sat das zis cicont kuot nyeis das, ge.
44023016	Housoeh lhom cho lhyi Paulo vbi dah lo xauhgyo las thoenkgus jesdvp khau mha Paulo lyis wvng taiq kyoh.
44023017	Paulo eq jes dvxo guon zau dvyuk lyis khi las taiq zis gas, Haih loyvm phoq lyis zauzains jyank mas shwih e dyei aq: nyang dvja taiq mes ge, ge.
44023018	Nyang hauh soeu lyis zauzains jyank mas shwih wvng las taiq zis gas, Haih loyvm phoq nvng lyis taiq das dang dvja bos yvmvyah, nyang lyis nah jyank mas shwih lyih das zis thung lungh Paulo ngos lyis khi lha sang kat, ge.
44023019	Zauzains gas nyang lyis nyah loq mas she las, sam joqyos mas shwih loh las nyang lyis nyei zis gas, Nvng ngos lyis cha taiq mes, ge.
44023020	Nyang taiq zis gas, Paulo lyis vlhomuh nyei choq yoeuh mes shih teh kuot las, phvnaq nyeihyo huom mas shwih los dyei das xiklyis, nvng lyis sang das, ge Yuda jens xam tsain xonh goeus.
44023021	Nghuot laus eq nyamoq o khyvlyis vgyo dyei: Khasoeh ge lyis Paulo lyis ma yoh sat dvchank gas cha eq ma zo ma shuk das ge nyamoq gungs lyis mau tsain khi toh bang nyeici nyet, nyang lyis lhom sat das zis tsain tamh joq das; gvshih yangh nah vmingh langh uhjyangh nyamoq haih muh kuot das zis cicont nghuot, ge.
44023022	Zauzains gas, hauh loyvm phoq lyis, Nvng ngos lyis haih cho lyih taiq kyoh zis hank lyis eq vtaiq kyoh, ge khyangh dye com lyis nhang kat.
44023023	Tsai nyang gas jes dvxo guon zau aiq yuk lyis khi lha taiq zis gas, Khvnyens gau shishenh lyis Kesare wus pheh loh das zis jeslo aiqxo, nyang ji zis nyhetci, lham chi bang aiqxo lyis sont toh geh, ge.
44023024	Hauh thoq lyis Paulo lyis nyang ji nhang las mungh zau Felik jyank mas tsoek yah yoh shwih kat das xiklyis taiq toh.
44023025	Maussauh eq heisoeh ge lhaih dyei kat.
44023026	Klodi Lusia gas nyoqnho ngelang kuh dah mungh zau Felik lyis jeshuh kat.
44023027	Haih soeu lyis Yuda jens nyhik las sat das tsain sont lyis, jeslo jens yahge ngos loh las, nyang Roma dius nghuot zis seq los yvmvyah, nyamoq jyank masyah khyuot yoeus toh.
44023028	Housoeh nyang lyis kauq cho seq mes yvmvyah, nyamoq dah lyi huom mas shwih hwank yoeuh lyis,
44023029	ngos nyvng zis gas, nyang mas shei mon, thung khyoq mon dah kauq cho ma bos, nyamoq lyi yah sen las nyei cho dvtsain kauq.
44023030	Haih soeu lyis sat das zis Yuda jens khaujeini las lhom cho ngos lyis taiq kyoh yvmvyah, ngos nyang lyis houjang nah jyank mas shwih kat nhang las, nyang lyis kauq bang eq nah xikkhonh mas tsain lyih nhang das khyvlyis taiq toh, ge.
44023031	Housoeh taiq kat zis yah dvyhangteh, jeslo jens eq Paulo lyis Antipatri jweh shoq nyenh lyis loh tsain shwih kat.
44023032	Nungs nvp, nyang ji bang lyis gas nyang yah dvgeh loh das khyvlyis toh khoq las, nyamoq gas thoenkgus jesdvp pheh tsain tauh los.
44023033	Nyang ji bang eq Kesare wus jweh las mungh zau lyis maussauh dyei toh khoq lho las Paulo lyis eq nyah xikkhonh mas shwih hwank kat.
44023034	Hauh maussauh dye nghap lyis Paulo kha mau mas zis nghuot yvlyis nyei yoeuh las, Kiliki mau mas zis nghuot yvlyis seq goeus ya,
44023035	mungh zau gas, Nvng lyis kauq bang jweh los lho lyis, ngos nah soe gyo dyei das, ge taiq las Paulo lyis Pretori ge, Herod dah yhenmuh mas, zungh bang toh las lhunk toh das zis vmingh dyei.
44024001	Hauh thang lhyi oeng nyeih lyis Phudyei Zainsmuh Anani gas logis jens yah dvgeh, Tertulu ge dah dangdat dvyuk shwih las nyamoq gas mungh zau jyank mas Paulo cho e tsain nyei.
44024002	Housoeh Paulo lyis khi wvng los yah dvyih, Tertulu kauq dang taiq phank los zis gas: Nyoqnho ngelang bos dah Felik eh, nah gvng mas ngamoq gas nyeis tam nyeis zis yahge nvng guon cho lyes yvmvyah, haih vnyau eq kuhxing los.
44024003	Ngamoq hauh yvlyis cho khat khanghmuh, joqyos khyiq khanghmuh mas vjangh nhaiqshoqlang ehnyet yah lhom yoeus khamzo nyeis.
44024004	Nghuot laus eq shishenh nyoshoq ma thank nhang dang lyung yah ngamoq taiq das dang lyis nah kuhxing ehnyet yah jenh gyo dyei aq.
44024005	Haih soeu ka ma gis ma shop zis yah, mungkvn gonh dah Yuda jens lyis shwih hoeu las hau Nazaret phung dah vgyis uhjyung nghuot nyeis zis gas ngamoq nyvng.
44024006	Nyang gas yhenmuh lyis yangh vwot v-oeu kuot das ge sont nyeis. Housoeh yvmvyah ngamoq nyang lyis nyhik las ngamoq dah lyi yah dvyhangteh soetuon mes.
44024007	Nghuot laus eq jeszau Lusia gas nyang lyis ngamoq loq masyah chot shwih yoeus loh. Hauh thang lhyi Lusia gas ngamoq lyis nah xikkhonh mas Paulo lyis yobos los huon das xiklyis vmingh dyei toh.
44024008	Nvng nyang lyis nyei yoeuh lyis ngamoq nyang lyis kauq cho jyoeng zis nghuot yvlyis nvnyang yoh seq das, ge.
44024009	Yuda dius jens eq housoeh nghuot ge bos taiq.
44024010	Mungh zau gas nyang dang taiq das xiklyis vsoh dyei yah dvyih, Paulo taiq zis gas, Yhensain nvng haih vnyau thoq mas soetuon soeu zvnlom nyangh nyangh kuot ku goeus zis gas ngos seq yvmvyah, ngos ngah cho lhyi gauslaus zis yah taiq bah.
44024011	Khasoeh ge lyis Yerusalem mas shvmanh dung das xiklyis doq loh zis, buisnyeis dvci aiq nyeih ma lai shih zis gas nvng yoh seq, ge.
44024012	Nyamoq gas ngos Yhenmuh yahge lyi jungs, wus vkhau mas hank yah phyen-goh zis eq, moqphung lyis shwih hoeu yos eq nyamoq ma nyvng.
44024013	Gvshih nyamoq ngos lyis kauq cho mas, nvng lyis chah kanghjyoeng ma yoh tsain chixoeuq.
44024014	Nghuot laus eq cho dvja gas ngos nah xikkhonh mas rhen. Houka ngamoq phauh thyeih dah Mangso lhyi nyamoq shuot ge nghamh dah cho ge lomsjingh vkhyoh yah paiq. Housoeh paiq yvmas Lyi maussauh mas dyei toh cho dvnganh yahge lvpe jens dah maussauh mas lhaih toh zis dvnganh lyis lomsjingh las lhom yoeus toh.
44024015	Ngos gas nyamoq yah dvyhangteh Mangso mas nghamhloms cho yoh. Houka dius dvnganh gas gis bang eq, ma gis bang eq shei masyah dwis toq los ge dah nghamhloms cho nghuot.
44024016	Ngos vjangh yah Mangso yahge dius xikkhonh mas shang dah seq nghamh ehnyet yah kang yoh dwis das xiklyis kank bos nyhoq yomkat nyeis.
44024017	Housoeh nyoshoq zvn lai thang lhyi, ngah dius nyau jyank mas Vlu jyungshuk dyei das zis yahge phudyei das xiklyis ngos jweh loh.
44024018	Ngos housoeh phudyei nyeis shishenh lyis nyamoq ngos lyis yhenmuh mas nyvng. Hauh shishenh lyis ngos ngah cheihshang thungh lyis dye kuot goeus. Houmha ngos yah dvgeh moqphung hank eq ma nyeis, hoeu cho eq cha ma bos.
44024019	Asia mau mas dah Yuda dvyhamh nyeis. Nyamoq ngos lyis kauq chank bos lyis gas, hauh bang nyang nah xikkhonh mas lyih taiq gis.
44024020	Nghuot ya, ngos hauh lyi huom xikkhonh mas yap joq uhlyis, haih dius jens ngos cu yobos nyvng lyis gas nyamoq nyang taiq thuq los bas jungh.
44024021	Ngos gas shei bang doms dwis los ge dah lomsjingh cho gvng mas khvnyhik namoq dah soetuon zis xauh nyeis oen nyamoq xikkhonh mas yap uhlyis kaiq kat dang mas lai las nyamoq ngos lyis yobos huon chank cha ma bos.
44024022	Mungh zau Felik gas Cho ge dah lomsjingh cho lhyi gvgis lo seq toh. Zauzains Lusia heimha jweh lyis ngos namoq dah soe dang thang thyet dyei das ge taiq zis yah hauh huom no toh.
44024023	Housoeh nyang gas jes dvxo guon zau lyis, Paulo lyis zungh soeu yah toh das xiklyis vmingh dyei. Nghuot laus eq nyah buisnoms jens lyih phuqsoe mes bang lyis ma tomp das xiklyis taiq toh.
44024024	Nyoshoq nyeih thang lhyi, Felik gas Yuda vmesbih Drusila ge, nyah yhensain nyhiq yah los las, Paulo lyis khi yoeus lho las, Khristu lyis lomsjingh cho lyis gyo yoeus.
44024025	Paulo gas, dan cho, nyang gungs nyang guon cho yahge jweh los das soetuon cho taiq thuq xoeuq lyis Felik dvn las phuk taiq zis gas, Gvshih loh shih aq, ngos doms ngo uhlyis nvng lyis khi das, ge.
44024026	Paulo gas nyang lyis ngwis dyei mvbeh ge nghamhloms yvmvyah nyang lyis dvsoq soq lyis khi yoeus las lhah goh nyeis.
44024027	Aiq zvn thang lhyi Porkiu Festu gas Felik dah muh lyis los thaiq. Housoeh Felik gas Yuda jens lyis ehnyet lhoqh pyo dyei mes yvmvyah Paulo lyis thung khyoq toh shih.
44025001	Hauh mauxom mas Festu wvng los thang lhyi somh nyeih lyis nyang gas Kesare wus masyah Yerusalem pheh loh.
44025002	Hauh uhlyis Phudyei Zainsmuh yahge Yuda jens dah uhjyung jens gas, nyang lyis Paulo dah cho tyixo khyvlyis,
44025003	Paulo lyis Yerusalem mas loh das xiklyis khi nhang das zis sang las, nyamoq gas Paulo lyis cho mas lhom sat das zis sont.
44025004	Nghuot laus eq Festu phuk taiq zis gas, Paulo lyis Kesare mas lhunk toh chah shih zis yahge, ma nyangh lyis nyang eq houmha tauh loh das.
44025005	Namoq mas vmingh bos bang ngos yah dvgeh loh las, hauh soeu mas yobos dvja ja bos lyis gas, hauh bang nyang kauq bas jungh, ge.
44025006	Housoeh nyamoq jyank mas xet nyeih, nghuot ya dvci nyeih ko thoeng khoq las, nyang gas Kesare wus pheh loh. Hauh nungs nyeih, nyang soetuon tank mas tsung las Paulo lyis khi los nhang.
44025007	Nyang jweh lyis, Yerusalem masyah los dah Yuda jens gas Paulo dah yvmlhaink yap las nyang lyis yobos vja ja tsain taiq huon. Nghuot laus eq nyamoq kanghjyoeng ma yoh chixoeuq.
44025008	Paulo phuk taiq zis gas, Yuda jens dah lyi lyis eq, yhenmuh lyis eq, hwankti Kesar lyis eq ngos cha ma cu ku, ge gungsgos dang taiq.
44025009	Nghuot laus eq Festu gas, Yuda jens xikkhonh mas nyoqnho yoh mes las Paulo lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng Yerusalem mas loh las, houmha ngah xikkhonh mas haih muhzoh cho soetuon kham das zis nvng gyo das lah, ge.
44025010	Paulo taiq zis gas, ngos Kesar dah soetuon tank xik mas yap joq. Houka ngos lyis soetuon dyei das joqyos nghuot. Nvng vlhomuh seq nyeis zis yah dvyhangteh ngos Yuda jens lyis cha ma cu.
44025011	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos cu nghuot lyis gas, nghuot ya shei mon zis dvja ja cu lyis gas shei das zis lyis ngos ma jhank. Nghuot laus eq nyamoq ngos lyis yobos huon cho cha eq ma jyoeng lyis gas ngos lyis hank eq nyamoq loq mas yoh kyauh das zis ma nghuot. Kesar xikkhonh mas soetuon dyei das zis ngos dung.
44025012	Festu gas nyah dah soetuon huom bang yah dye xamgoh las nyang lyis phuk taiq zis gas, Nvng Kesar soetuon dyei das zis dung kham goeus las, Kesar jyank mas loh das, ge.
44025013	Hauh thang lhyi buisnyeis kha nyhank ma nyangh lyis hwankti Agripa yahge Bernike gas Kesare wus mas jweh las Festu lyis loh xauhgoh.
44025014	nyamoq nyoshoq nyeih nyeis thang lhyi, Festu gas Paulo dah cho hau hwankti lyis taiq kyoh zis gas, Felik lhunk toh langh dah thung lungh soeu dvyuk nyeis.
44025015	Ngos Yerusalem mas nyeis lyis phudyei uhjyung jens yahge Yuda logis jens hauh soeu dah cho lhyi taiq las, nyah cho dang thang thyet dyei das zis tsain sang.
44025016	Ngos gas kauq soeu, kauq bang yah nhuot tsuk taiq goh las gungsgos dang ma yoh taiq shih lyis, hank lyis kyauh tyamp das zis eq Roma thungh ma bos oen las nyamoq lyis taiq toh.
44025017	Housoeh las nyamoq heimha tsain huom joq lyis, ngos eq ma sheq toh lo, nungs nyeih nyang soetuon tank mas tsung las, hauh soeu lyis shwih thuq los das zis taiq kat.
44025018	Hauh uhlyis nyang lyis kauq bang toq yap laus eq, nyang mas ngos jyo dah ma gis cho nyamoq cha eq ma yoh chixoeuq.
44025019	Nyamoq gas nyang yah ma woenghgoh cho dvtsiq bos. Houka nyamoq dah lomsnoq cho yah sen cho yahge shei goeus dah Yesu ge soeu lyis Paulo gas, Nyang dwis nyeis ge dah cho jens nghuot, ge.
44025020	Haih nyeidang jens lyis jyoeng dah phuk dang yoh shoq khasoeh nyei gyo das yvlyis vlhomuh ma yoh nghamh yvmvyah, Paulo lyis haih cho yah sen lha Yerusalem pheh loh las houmha soetuon kham das lah, oen nyei goeus.
44025021	Nghuot laus eq Paulo gas nyah soe lyis Kesar tuon dyei shoq thung lhunk toh das xiklyis sang yvmvyah, ngos nyang lyis Kesar jyank mas yoh nhang kat shishenh jweh shoq thung lhunk toh das xiklyis vmingh dyei, ge.
44025022	Agripa Festu lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos hauh soeu cha taiq das yvlyis gyo mes ge. Festu gas, Nvpyo xauhgyo das, ge.
44025023	Nungs nyeih Agripa yahge Bernike gas shunk las ngelang bos bos, jeszau jens yahge wus mas dah vgyis, nhaiqbos bang yah dvgeh lyih las yvpmuh mas tsain jweh lyis, Festu taiq kat zis yah dvyhangteh Paulo lyis hwank kat.
44025024	Hauh uhlyis Festu taiq zis gas, hwankti Agripa yahge gvshih heimha tsain nyeis bang eh, Yerusalem yahge haih wus mas dah Yuda jens dvnganh, ngos lyis los taiq las, hauh soeu lyis kang dwis nhang toh ma gis lo, ge tsain kaiq zis gas gvshih namoq nyvng nyeis, haih soeu lyis nghuot.
44025025	Nghuot laus eq ngos haih soeu mas shei mon dah yobos cha eq ma nyvng. Nyang Agustu soetuon dyei das xiklyis dung kham toh goeus las, ngos nyang lyis houmha nhang das zis nghamh thyet toh.
44025026	Nghuot laus eq nyah cho yah sen las ngamoq dah Kesar hwankti zainsmuh lyis jeihjyvp lhaih das zis cha eq ma yoh. Housoeh yvmvyah nyang lyis nyei wu thang lhyi ngos dvja ja yoh lhaih das xiklyis namoq dvnganhmoq xikkhonh mas, zes las nvng hwankti Agripa dah xikkhonh mas ngos nyang lyis shwih thuq xoeuq.
44025027	Khasoeh ge lyis thung lungh soeu dvyuk loh shwih kat lyis, nyang lyis huon dah yobos cho cha ma lhaih lhaih nhang kat das zis gas ma jus, oen nghamh, ge.
44026001	Agripa Paulo lyis taiq zis gas, Nah cho dang taiq das toeuh yoh goeus, ge. Housoeh las Paulo loq toeu las gungsgos dang taiq zis gas,
44026002	Hwankti Agripa eh, ngos lyis Yuda jens kauq zis yah sen lha, khvnyhik ngos nah xikkhonh mas gungsgos dang xauh taiq las gaus.
44026003	Khasoeh ge lyis nvng gas Yuda jens dah lyi cho yah phyen-goh cho lhyi jeih jeih seq. Housoeh yvmvyah ngos lyis jhen las gyo dyei das xiklyis khyoeuq.
44026004	Ngos loyvm uhlyis yah, Yerusalem mas nyeis ngah vnyau yah dvgeh nghuot yvmvyah ngos chank dah wotwu Yuda jens dvnganhmoq tsain seq.
44026005	Nyamoq kanghjyoeng kat mes lyis gas, ngos gas hau paiq thungh mas zes than dah phung mas dah Pharishe dvyuk nghuot yvlyis nyamoq cangxeih lyis yah seq toh.
44026006	Nghuot laus eq gvshih Mangso ka phauh thyeih moq lyis dyei toh dangthoengh lyis ngos nghamhloms yvmvyah ngos heimha yap las soetuon zis xauh nyeis.
44026007	Hauh dangthoengh xauh yoeus shoq, ngamoq dvci aiq nyau gonh nyeih nyenh Mangso lhyi phuqsoe nyeis. Hau nghamhloms cho gvng mas Yuda jens ngos lyis tsain kauq, hwankti Agripa eh.
44026008	Mangso ka, shei bang lyis dwis toq nhang ge zis lyis namoq heimha tsung toh bang yuk khanghmuh chamus ma yoh lomsjingh lah?
44026009	Ngvnyang Nazaret Yesu dah nyings lyis gomloeus kuot chah oen ngos jyoengh nghamh ku.
44026010	Housoeh nyang ngos Yerusalem mas kuot ku goeus. Phudyei uhjyung jens jyank masyah vmingh yoh las, Gyingshang bang nyoshoq lyis thung khyoq thoq lyis magoh nyamoq lyis sat dah yobos dyei das nyhenshang ngos eq bos xihhonh.
44026011	Lyi jungs khanghmuh mas eq, nyamoq lyis shoeuhshih zis yahge Yesu lyis loeusmus soqzo nhang shoq khank goeus. Nyamoq lyis svsoh nhaiqyo las gohnyau bang dah wus mas jweh shoq chank shoeuhshih ku.
44026012	Housoeh phudyei uhjyung jens jyank masyah vmingh maussauh yoeus wons las ngos Damasku wus pheh loh lyis,
44026013	Hwankti phoq eh, nyeih gungs lyis buis thoq lyis bvng zis hauh cho mas ngos yahge ngah dyenschangh jens dah vyvm vwi mas, maukhung masyah bvng thuq los zis nyvng.
44026014	Hauh uhlyis ngamoq dvnganhmoq yah nyeisjvng mas lains loh lyis, ngos lyis Hebre nyingh pheh yah Saulo, Saulo, nvng ngos lyis chamus shoeuhshih nyeis lah? Tyanghchon lyis thvvq lyis nvng nos ge taiq thwe ngos xauhgyo.
44026015	Ngos gas, Yhensain eh, nvng hank nghuot lah, oen toeuh lyis, Yhensain taiq zis gas, Ngos gas nvng shoeuhshih nyeis soeu Yesu nghuot.
44026016	Nghuot laus eq toq aq, nah khyei yah zungh zungh yap aq: nvng lyis ngah jyeidwis duot das xiklyis ngos nah jyank mas thuq xoeuq zis nghuot. Nvng khvnyhik ngos mas nyvng cho lhyi thang pheh ngos nvng lyis Chixoeuq das cho gohyuk lyis taiq kyoh das zis nghuot.
44026017	Ngos nvng lyis Israel dius jens masyah eq, ngos nvng lyis nhang kat dah gohnyau bang masyah eq khyuot yoeus das.
44026018	Housoeh nvng nyamoq dah nyoqjeih lyis phank dyei las, nyamoq gas chuot masyah bvng yvpheh lhain los das zis yahge, Satan dah yomsoq masyah Mangso jyank pheh lhain los das. Housoeh nyamoq ngos lyis lomsjingh gvng mas nyamoq dah yobos khyuot dyei zis xauh las Mangso khyen yoeus zis xauh bang yah dvgeh vso vlho xauh yoeus das, ge.
44026019	Housoeh las hwankti Agripa eh, ngos gas hau maukhung mas dah ngos nyvng nyoqnyvng lyis domsyos gyo nyeis.
44026020	Hauh cho lhyi cangxeih lyis Damasku mas, hauh thang lhyi Yerusalem mas, tsai Yuda mau gonh yahge gohnyau bang mas, nyamoq yaunos masyah nhaiqlom thaiq las, Mangso jyank pheh lhain los zis yah nhaiqlom thaiq cho yah mon yih dah muhzoh lyis kuot chah oen taiq kyoh.
44026021	Hauh cho gvng mas Yuda jens yhenmuh mas ngos lyis nyhik las sat das zis tsain sont.
44026022	Mangso jyank masyah bos pangh zis xauh yvmvyah, khvnyhik jweh shoq dvyoh nyeis zis yahge, heimha yap zis yah ngislo kuhlo lyis kanghjyoeng kat yvmas, lvpe jens yahge Moshe yah bweh los das ge taiq toh cho masyah lai las, ngos gohtoeu vtseq cha ma taiq.
44026023	Khristu shanghsenh zis xauh chah zis yahge shei masyah cangxeih yoh dwis toq los las, nyah vnyau yahge gohnyau bang lyis bvng zis yoh tuonh shet das cho nghuot.
44026024	Housoeh ge gungsgos dang taiq yvlyis Festu gas, Paulo eh, nvng koh goeus; nah joeui nyhang zis gas nvng lyis koh nhang goeus, ge.
44026025	Nghuot laus eq Paulo taiq zis gas, Nyoqnho ngelang bos dah Festu eh, ngos ma koh; gying dah ehnyet yah jyoeng dang taiq.
44026026	Hwankti Agripa eh, ngos womh zis yah shang shang yoh taiq. Haih cho lhyi nyang ma seq zis dvkoeuq eq bos das zis ma nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis bweh cho ka vthunk vyoq mas bweh zis ma nghuot.
44026027	Hwankti Agripa eh, lvpe jens dah dang lyis nvng jingh lhyeh? Jingh nyeis zis gas ngos seq, ge.
44026028	Agripa Paulo lyis taiq zis gas, hai dvsoq kyingh gyo lyis nvng ngos lyis Khristan yoh bweh nhang das oen nghamh lhyeh, ge.
44026029	Paulo taiq zis gas, Shishenh lyung laus xing laus, hai ngos lyis twih toh shamjvng mas lai las, nvng yahge khvnyhik ngah dang gyo nyeis bang dvnganh eq, vluk bweh zis za ma nghuot, ngos teh nghuot das xiklyis ngos Mangso lhyi dung mes, ge.
44026030	Nyang housoeh dye taiq lyis hwankti toq yap las nyang yah dvgeh mungh zau, Bernike yahge gohtoeu dvnganhmoq dvgeh thuq loh.
44026031	Tsain thuq loh lyis, Haih soeu ka shei vvng, nghuot ya twih twih vvng dah yobos dvja eq kuot zis ma nghuot, ge tsain taiq goh.
44026032	Agripa Festu lyis taiq zis gas, Haih soeu nyang Kesar yah soetuon dyei das cho ma sang ya, phui kat gis goeus, ge.
44027001	Gvshih ngamoq lyis Itali mau pheh sangpho yah goeu chah ge dye thyet dyei thang lhyi, Paulo yahge gohtoeu thung dius dvyhamh lyis Agustu jesdvp mas dah Yuliu ge dah jes dvxo guon zau loq mas kyauh kat.
44027002	Hauh uhlyis Asia wuxom mas dah sangpho goeukhanh mas loh das xiklyis cicont nghuot dah Adramuti masyah wvng los dah sangpho mas ngamoq wvng tsung lha toq loh. Thesaloni wus masyah los dah Makedoni dius Aristaku eq ngamoq yah dvgeh nghuot.
44027003	Nungs nyeih ngamoq Sidon wus mas thoeng. Yuliu gas Paulo lyis nhaiqnyen las, nyah buisnoms jens jyank mas nyang chah zis pangh bas jungh ge e xauhgoh nhang.
44027004	Hou mhayah thuq goeus ya, lyeis muot tauh los yvmvyah, Kupru goeujo lyeis tam jyankyvm cho tsain loh.
44027005	Ngamoq Kiliki yahge Pamphilia mau mas dah panglai cho goeu thang lhyi Likia mau Mira wus mas jweh loh.
44027006	Hauh nyensyo jes dvxo guon zau gas Itali pheh goeu e dah Alesandria wus mas dah sangpho nyvng las, houmha ngamoq lyis wvng nhang.
44027007	Hou mhayah buisnyeis nyangh shoq, zoh yah Khinidu nvm mas jweh lyis, lyeis than lha houmha ma dap loh nhang yvmvyah, Kreti goeujo lyeis tam yvcho Salmone vyvm chank yah lai loh.
44027008	Hauh vyvm cho vyau vkeh tsain loh lyis Lasea wus yah ni dah Goeukhanh Gis ge dah sangpho goeukhanh mas tsain jweh loh.
44027009	Shishenh geh ko lo nyangh los lyis, womkyi shishenh yangh lai tyamp yvmvyah sangpho yah suh e das zis gyuk chah yoq jweh las, Paulo nyamoq lyis taiq zis gas,
44027010	Loeuzomh jens eh, haih gyung cho ka svsoh gyukphoh nghuot goeus, yah kyahsoe eq, sangpho eq somh thoq lyis magoh yah kang eq somh das teh mus, ge.
44027011	Jes dvxo guon zau gas Paulo dah dang thoq lyis sangpho komp soeu yahge sangpho sain dah dang lyis zes las jingh.
44027012	Goeukhanh hauh zis eq cungh lyis yoh thoeng das teh ma doeus yvmvyah, Phonik goeukhanh mas yoh jweh lyis jweh shoq loh las, houmha cungh yoh ku shoq jweh loh das cho lhyi nyothyang xam tsain xonh. Hauh joqyos gas Kreti goeujo mas dah buiswvng mautyi pheh nyoqnho xoeu toh dah goeukhanh nghuot.
44027013	Housoeh las mautyi lyeis, zoh yah muot los goeus ya, nyamoq nghamh zis yah top nghuot goeus ge tsain nghamh las, jywangh yoeus tyamp lho las Kreti goeujo jyank yvm cho yah lai loh.
44027014	Nghuot laus eq ma nyangh lyis buisthuq mautsung lyeismuh jyang ka hauh goeujo masyah muot los.
44027015	Houka sangpho lyis los bat las, xik pheh ma yoh loh lo yvmvyah nyamoq kat kat las lyeis muot loh yvpheh bos loh.
44027016	Kauda ge dah goeujo ngis, lyeis tam yvcho yah los nyeis lyis nyah lhyik jens lyis svkhyen yoh zwi toh.
44027017	Hauh yvlyis sangpho thoq mas tsain lang kih las sangpho kuh yah toenk shoq twih yah tsain lang twih tap toh. Tsai, Suti ge dah sihmuis jyank yvm mas kih das zis chiq yvmvyah, nyah misseh lyis khyoq tyamp las bos tsain nyoeu loh.
44027018	Lyeis jyang ka sangpho lyis tsoq las bat nyeis yvmvyah nungs nyeih gas sangpho hu dvkhamh lyis panglai mas tsain tyungh khyoq.
44027019	Tsai somh vnyeih lyis hauh sangpho yah sen dah kyahsoe lyis eq ngamoq nyang loq yah tyungh khyoq.
44027020	Buisnyeis nyoshoq nyeih buis ma nyvng, kyi eq ma thuq, lyeis than kyingh los nyeis yvmvyah, ngamoq yoh luiq das oen nghamh das cho dvtsiq eq ma bos lo.
44027021	Nyamoq wom ma zo zis svsoh nyangh los goeus las, Paulo nyamoq vgungs mas toq yap las taiq zis gas, Loeuzomh jens eh, namoq ngah dang gyo las Kreti goeujo masyah ma thuq ya heisoeh dyoqbis, dyuk loh zis ma xauh das.
44027022	Gvshih laus eq, yom huont geh. Sangpho mas lai las namoq hank kang eq som das zis ma nghuot.
44027023	Khasoeh ge lyis, ngos phuqsoe nyeis, ngah Mangso dah loeuswons soeu vmvn ngah vyvm mas yap las taiq zis gas,
44027024	Paulo eh vgyuk, nvng hwankti Kesar xikkhonh mas xauh yap das. Yoeuh aq, nvng yah dvgeh haih sangpho mas tsung bang dvnganhmoq, nah gvng mas Mangso nyamoq lyis kang luiq nhang das, ge.
44027025	Housoeh las loeuzomh jens eh, yom huont geh, Khasoeh ge lyis ngos lyis taiq zis yah dvyhangteh nghuot das oen ngos Mangso lhyi loms.
44027026	Nghuot laus eq yang goeujo dvkoeuq koeuq mas sangpho loh dyoq das, ge.
44027027	Dvci nyei vnyeih nyenhthang jweh las, ngamoq Mediteranean Thomh cho nyoeu loh nyeis lyis, gungsgvm lyis tung yos dvjoq joq mas ni los soh bos, ge sangpho muh zwi bang nghamh.
44027028	Housoeh jeis keq yoeuh lyis, aiqci lvm noq zis tsain seq. Dvsoq lyis doms keq lyis, dvci oeng lvm dvnoq lo zis tsain seq.
44027029	Housoeh las lukmhung mas thungh das zis gyuk yvmvyah, nyamoq sangpho vthang pheh dah jywangh nyei koeuq khyoq las nyoq nyvng los bas jungh ge, shvmanh tsain dung nyeis.
44027030	Sangpho muh zwi bang hou mhayah tsain phang das ge nghamh zis yah sangpho uhloms pheh dah jywangh tsain khyoq das teh kuot las lhyik lyis jeis mas tsain khyoq nyeis lyis,
44027031	Paulo jes dvxo guon zau yahge jeslo jens lyis taiq zis gas, Hai sangpho muh zwi bang sangpho mas ma nyeis lo lyis gas namoq yoh luiq das zis ma nghuot lo, ge.
44027032	Jeslo jens gas lhyik twih dah twih e thyet las, hauh lhyik lyis nyoeu loh nhang.
44027033	Nyoq nyvng los lyis Paulo gas nyamoq dvnganh lyis wom zo das xiklyis kywih las, Namoq dvci nyei nyeih nhangh langh nyeis las hauh gyo lyis cha eq ma tsain zo.
44027034	Housoeh las zonoms dvja ja zo geh; haih zis gas namoq dwis nyeis das cho nghuot. Namoq uhloms mas cam dvkhvt eq dyuk loh das zis ma nghuot, ge.
44027035	Housoeh dye taiq yah dvyih ohlhyoq yoeus las, nyamoq dvnganhmoq dah xikkhonh mas Mangso dah jyehjuh lyis chungh lho las, khyiq las zo.
44027036	Hauh uhlyis nyamoq dvnganhmoq yom yoeus las zonoms dvja ja tsain zo.
44027037	Hauh sangpho mha dah dius dvnganh lyis aiqxo nyhetci khyuk yuk nghuot.
44027038	Nyamoq jo shoq dye tsain zo lyis sangpho siq das xiklyis sunghso lyis jeis mas tsain doeuh khyoq.
44027039	Nyoq nyvng lyis, nyamoq hauh jyank yvm lyis ma seq laus eq sihsho yos vthunk dvkoeuq lyis nyvng kat las, gis bweh lyis houmha nyamoq dah sangpho loh no toh das ge thyet toh.
44027040	Housoeh nyamoq jywangh lyis thomh mas thyet khyoq khoq. Tsai sangpho komp dah lvshvp lyis twih dah twih lyis tsain phui tyamp. Hauh thang lhyi sangpho uhloms shot pheh misseh toq kat. Housoeh lyeis lyis yah hau jyank yvm pheh duon loh nhang.
44027041	Nghuot laus eq sihsho jyank yvm lyis sangpho loh thungh las sangpho uhloms zuk joq yvmas sangpho vthang pheh jeisphauq los tsain bat yvmvyah dyoq loh.
44027042	Hauh uhlyis jeslo jens gas thung dius jeis bat bat las cangh loh das yvlyis chiq yvmvyah, nyamoq lyis sat das zis xamgoh nyeis.
44027043	Jes dvxo guon zau gas Paulo lyis khyuot yoeus mes yvmvyah, nyamoq xam cho lhyi tomp las, Jeisbat seq bat bang hank laus eq jeis mas gyoh las tung yos mas cangxeih jweh bas jungh, ge.
44027044	Nyet bang dvyhamh gas thyvkhyamh yah, dvyhamh gas sangpho vdoeus vdyet mas lang lwi ji las goeu loh bas jungh, ge taiq. Housoeh nyamoq dvnganh tung yos mas yoh shwih kat las tsain luiq.
44028001	Ngamoq housoeh jesluiq shohluiq las vlhomuh yoh jweh thang lhyi, goeujo hauh yvlyis Malta ge zis yoh seq.
44028002	Houmha nyeis bang gas nhaiqnyen zis yah ngamoq lyis lhom zes yoeus. Mau eq wus, ngamh eq ngamh yvmvyah nyi khat dyei.
44028003	Hauh uhlyis Paulo thangh kui lha nyikhyomp mas kat lyis, Ywimuhtsanh dvdoeu nyi ngeh los yvmvyah thuq los las nyah loq mas tsuk lhangh toh.
44028004	Paulo loq mas ywimuhtsanh tsuk lhangh toh yvlyis hauh wukhau bang nyvng lyis, nyamoq nyang changh taiq goh zis gas, Haih dius yuk gas jyoengh nyang dius sat soeu nghuot soh bos: khasoeh ge lyis nyang thomh masyah yoh luiq los laus eq, jyoeng dah lyi gas nyang lyis ma dwis nyeis nhang lo, ge.
44028005	Paulo gas hauh lhangnyis lyis nyikhyomp mas ko khyoq las cha eq ma mus, nyeis.
44028006	Nyamoq gas, Nyah gungs yam los das, ma nghuot lyis eq dvsoq lyis lains shei loh das ge yoeuh nyeis. Nghuot laus eq nyangh shoq langh yoeuh lyis eq nyang mas cha eq ma chah los zis nyvng lyis nyamoq dah ehnyet doms thaiq las taiq zis gas, Haih soeu ka gywes dvkoeuq dvnghuot soh bos, ge.
44028007	Hauh vnvm mas dah goeujo vgyis Publiu dah maunyeis tsain joq. Hauh soeu ka ngamoq lyis lhom yoeus las somh nyeih top buisnoms ehnyet yah boengh daih.
