44028008	Hauh uhlyis Publiu dah uwus gas gungs eq ngeh, womnes eq nos nyeis. Paulo gas hauh soeu lyis shvmanh dung zis yah nyah loq kih dyei las nyang lyis gis los nhang.
44028009	Housoeh bweh yvmvyah hauh goeujo mas dah gohtoeu noslom yoh bang eq jweh los las gis los zis tsain xauh.
44028010	Nyamoq eq ngamoq lyis phauh nyang cho nyoshoq kuot las, hou mhayah sangpho tsung thuq loh lyis ngamoq mas chah nyeis goeu sangpho mas kat dyei kat.
44028011	Hauh goeujo mas lhamhmuh somh khyvp cungh lai shoq nyeis khoq thang lhyi, Gywes zoms ge Alesandria mas dah sangpho yah tsoq loh.
44028012	Siraku wus mas jweh lyis, ngamoq houmha somh nyeih thoeng nyeis khoq.
44028013	Hou mhayah ngamoq doms tsoq loh lyis, Regium wus mas jweh loh. Nungs nyeih gas mautyi lyeis muot los las, aiq nyeih lyis Puteoli wus mas dvjweh loh.
44028014	Ngamoq houmha lomsjingh bang yah xauhgoh las, nyhet nyeih thoeng khoq das xiklyis tsain sang lha, thoeng khoq. Hauh thang lhyi Roma wus pheh tsain loh.
44028015	Hauh wus mas dah lomsjingh bang gas, ngamoq jweh das cho xauhgyo yvmvyah, zes das ge, Apiu kaih yahge Boenghdoq yhen Somh joq jweh shoq tsain lyih langh. Paulo nyamoq lyis nyvng lyis Mangso lhyi chungh las yom yoh.
44028016	Ngamoq Roma wus mas jweh loh lyis, jes dvxo guon zau gas thung dius jens lyis, zungh dah zau loq mas kyauh toh. Nghuot laus eq Paulo lyis gas nyang lyis zungh soeu jeslo yah dvgeh gohtoeu nyeis das toeuh dyei.
44028017	Buisnyeis somh nyeih lai thang lhyi Paulo gas, houmha dah Yuda vgyis nhaiqbos bang lyis khi. Nyamoq jweh lyis nyang taiq zis gas, Boekyis eh, ngah vnyau lyis eq, phauh thyeih dah thungh lyis eq ma doeus khyvlyis ngos cha eq ma kuot ku. Nghuot laus eq ngos lyis Yerusalem mas nyhik las Roma loq mas thung dius khyvlyis kyauh zis xauh.
44028018	Roma zau jens gas ngos lyis nyei choq yoeuh thang lhyi ngos lyis phui kat mes: khasoeh ge lyis ngos shei mon yobos cha ma kuot ku zis nyamoq seq.
44028019	Nghuot laus eq Yuda jens ma gyo yvmvyah ngos gas ngah vnyau jens lyis yobos huon dais ma bos nghuot laus eq ngos gas Kesar xikkhonh mas soetuon kham das xiklyis sang chah loh.
44028020	Ngos gas Israel vnyau dah nghamhloms cho yah sen lha ngos heisoeh shamjvng yah twih zis xauh nyeis yvmvyah, ngos namoq yah xauhgoh las jisgoh das xiklyis namoq lyis dung kat zis nghuot, ge.
44028021	Housoeh nyamoq taiq zis gas, Ngamoq nah cho yah sen las Yuda mau masyah maussauh ma xauh yoeus; heimha los bang boekyis hank eq nah cho ma gis loeus cha ma taiq.
44028022	Nghuot laus eq haih nvng bos dah phung lyis joqyos khanghmuh yobos huon zis xauh cho ngamoq seq nyeis yvmvyah, hauh zis yah sen lha nvng khasoeh nghamh zis ngamoq gyo mes, ge.
44028023	Nyamoq Paulo yah xauhgoh das buisnyeis doengs toh las, nyang thoeng dah yhen mas dius nyoshoq lyih huom toh. Nvpsangh masyah nyenhthang jweh shoq, Nyang taiq kyoh dah Mangso munghdan cho dah dang lyis phant kyoh las, Moshe dah Lyi yahge lvpe maussauh jens lyis tuonh shet zis yah, Yesu dah cho jyoeng yvlyis nyamoq lomsjingh los shoq vlhomuh phui kyoh.
44028024	Housoeh taiq dah dang lyis dvyhamh gas jingh los, dvyhamh gas he tyamp.
44028025	Housoeh nyamoq nyang changh xam ma xonh. Housoeh nyamoq gang loh nyeis lyis Paulo dvkhonh doms taiq zis gas, lvpe Esaia dah nhuot lyis yah namoq dah phauh thyeih moq lyis Gyingshang Dyos taiq nyeis zis gas jus.
44028026	Hauh zis gas, Haih dius jens jyank mas heisoeh loh taiq aq, Namoq gas jyoengh gyo yoeus laus eq khanhamp eq seqgyo das zis ma nghuot; yoeuh laus eq nyvng das zis ma nghuot.
44028027	Khasoeh ge lyis Haih vnyau dah ehnyet gas than tyamp goeus; nyamoq no jet goeus. nyamoq nyoqjeih lyis tsain chenh toh goeus. Housoeh ma nghuot lyis gas nyamoq dah nyoq nyvng las nyamoq dah no xauhgyo zis yahge nyamoq gas ngah jyank mas lhain los das. Housoeh ngos nyamoq lyis gis los nhang das, ge Mangso taiq.
44028028	Paulo taiq zis gas, Mangso dah khyuot yoeus cho haih zis gas gohnyau bang lyis dyei goeus, nyamoq gyo yoeus das zis gas, namoq seq toh geh, ge.
44028029	Hauh dang dye taiq lyis, Yuda jens thuq loh las nyamoq nyang changh khoek khoek taiq phyen-goh nyeis.
44028030	Hou mhayah, Paulo gas nyang nghoh dah yhen mas aiq zvn top nyeis lyis, nyah jyank mas lyih bang dvnganh lyis lhom yoeus las,
44028031	Mangso munghdan cho taiq kyoh zis yahge Yhensain Yesu Khristu yah sen cho lhyi debangh womh womh jyauh nyeis.
45001001	Yesu Khristu dah jyeidwis ngos Paulo ka, lvgyo duot das xiklyis khi toh las Mangso dah gausyis dang nyhenshang toeuq toh zis xauh soeu nghuot.
45001002	Gausyis dang mas nyang gas gohlhain lvpe jens lyis yah gyingshang lhaihtoh dang mas dangthoengh toh las,
45001003	Nyah Lo, yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu lyis gas, gungsshoh khyvlyis Dawi dah vnyau vshih mas khoeu los nhang.
45001004	Gyingshang dah Dyos mas, yomsoq yah nyang lyis shei masyah dwis toqh kat las nyang gas Mangso dah Lo, yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu nghuot yvlyis taiq hoeuh.
45001005	Nyah nyings gvng mas dius nyau khanghmuh hau lomsjingh cho lhyi domsyos gyo bas jungh ge, nyah jyank masyah jyehjuh yahge lvgyo muh lyis ngamoq xauh kham yoeus.
45001006	Yesu Khristu yah sen bang duot das xiklyis khi tsainh toh bang mas namoq eq bos.
45001007	Mangso dah jyetdap bang yahge gyingshang dius bweh bas jungh ge, khi yoeus zis xauh dah Roma bang dvnganhmoq thoq mas, yah Uwus Mangso yahge Yhensain Yesu jyank masyah, jyehjuh yahge nyenstap zis joq bas jungh.
45001008	Namoq dah lomsjingh zis gas mungkvn gonh seq loh goeus las, Yesu Khristu nyings yah ngos ngah Mangso lhyi shih nhaiqshoqlang sang.
45001009	Ngah shvmanh dung dang mas ngos namoq lyis soh nyeis cho lhyi, nyah Lo dah gausyis dang taiq kyoh zis yah ngos phuqsoe nyeis, Mangso ka ngah kanghjyoeng nghuot.
45001010	Mangso dah ehnyet o khyvlyis gvshih thang thank lyis ngos namoq yah los yoh xauhgoh das cho phank dyei das xiklyis ngos shvmanh dung nyeis.
45001011	Khasoeh ge lyis namoq lyis yom yoh bos nhang shoq, Dyos jyungshuk dvkhamh yoh gvm dyei bas jungh, ngos namoq yah yoh xauhgoh das nyhenshang hwangh nyeis.
45001012	Ngos taiq mes zis gas, yah lomsjingh cho gvng mas yang nyang changh nyang yom yoh dyei goh das oen zis nghuot.
45001013	Hauh thoq lyis boekyis eh, gohnyau bang masyah khyuot yoeus xauh bang lyis yoh taiq kyoh shwih los teh, namoq masyah eq yoh taiq kyoh shwih los das xiklyis namoq jyank mas los das zis nyoshoq lhain sont laus eq, gvshih jweh shoq kyamp toh zis xauh nyeis yvlyis, namoq lyis seq nhang mes.
45001014	Heleni yahge dius soengh, joeui bos bang, joeui ma bos bang yahge dius dvnganh lyis gausyis dang taiq kyoh das nyhenshang jyen shauh soeu ka ngos nghuot.
45001015	Housoeh las namoq Roma bang lyis eq hau gausyis dang svsoh taiq kyoh mes nyeis.
45001016	Hau Khristu dah gausyis dang mas ngos ma xoq: khasoeh ge lyis hauh zis gas cangxeih lyis Yuda, hauh thang lhyi gohnyau lomsjingh bang dvnganh lyis yoh khyuot yoeus das xiklyis Mangso dah yomsoq nghuot.
45001017	Lomsjingh gvng mas dan cho yoh ge, Mangso dah dan cho ka, hau gausyis dang mas Chixoeuq toh: khasoeh ge lyis dan soeu ka lomsjingh zis yah dwis nyeis das, ge lhaih toh.
45001018	Maukhung mhayah Mangso dah nhaiqlom dyis zis gas, gywes ma tsungh bang yahge nyamoq dah ma gis muhzoh yah jyoeng cho lhyi kyamp gos tyamp bang thoq mas Chixoeuq.
45001019	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso lhyi seq gis cho ka, Mangso nyang nyamoq lyis Chixoeuq goeus las, hauh zis gas nyamoq xikkhonh mas dede nghuot.
45001020	Khasoeh ge lyis, nyoq yah ma nyvng, Mangso nyah vcaiq vto yomsoq yahge Mangso nghuot cho ka, hau gvnkhanh zis dvnganh masyah yoh nyvng las, nyamoq hauh zis lyis mauthuq nyeiszvn lyis yah nyvng las seq goeus. Housoeh yvmvyah nyamoq jyamp gus ma bos lo.
45001021	Nyamoq Mangso lhyi seq toh las, nyang lyis Mangso lhyi teh ma phauh nyang, Nhaiqshoqlang eq ma tsain ge, nyamoq nghamh cho ka vkom duot las nyamoq dah koh ehnyet gas chuot tyamp.
45001022	Nyamoq gas nyang gungs nyang joeui bos tsain ge laus eq nyamoq gas koh bang nghuot.
45001023	Ma seq shei dah Mangso phunk nyoqnho lyis, seq shei dah dius, nghoq, nyei khyei dap yewus, shweh loh ja dah silho jens yah tsain thaiq tyamp.
45001024	Housoeh las Mangso ka nyamoq lyis nyamoq dah obos dah vchoqh vjyot muh kuot bas jungh ge kyauh tyamp. Housoeh nyamoq gas nyamoq nyang changh vxoq vcaiq muh tsain kuot.
45001025	Khasoeh ge lyis, Mangso dah jyoeng cho lhyi hwah cho yah tsain thaiq tyamp. Gvnkhanh soeu lhyi paiq phuqsoe das gungsthaiq gvnkhanh toh zis lyis tsain paiq phuqsoe nyeis. Gvnkhanh toh soeu nyang gas vcaiq vto phunk bos. Amen.
45001026	Housoeh las Mangso ka nyamoq lyis vxoq vcaiq dah gungsshoh nyetnau muh mas kyauh tyamp. Nyamoq dah vmesbih jens yangh soengh choenk lyi khyvlyis zomh cho yah tyi lha nyamoq nyang changh tsain zomhgoh.
45001027	Vbusbih jens eq vmesbih jens yah zomhgoh dah soengh choenk lyi toh tyamp las vbusbih nyang changh vxoq vcaiq muh tsain kuot yvmvyah nyamoq dah gungs mas nyamoq dah nyetnau yobos yah mon yih dah yobos dyei zis tsain kham yoeus.
45001028	Tsai, Mangso cho, jyoeng dah seq cho lhyi ngoek tyamp yvmvyah, Mangso ka nyamoq lyis ma gis dah ehnyet yah suh e das xiklyis kyauh tyamp las nyamoq gas nyamoq ma kuot vvng dah muh lyis tsain kuot.
45001029	Nyamoq gas lhung cho vja ja, ma gis cho, nyoqnoq obos, gohyuk lyis nos nhang mes cho yah dyingh joq; noh, dius sat, dyoqgoh, mhuih, hoeng, wotwu ma gis zis yah dyingh joq.
45001030	Loeusmus goh, khyangh sang goh, Mangso lhyi hoeng bang, moengs bang, khwank bang, gomloeus pan bang, nyhiphoq dang ma gyo bang,
45001031	Seq cho ma bos bang, dang thanghchvp lais bang, jyetdap ehnyet ma bos bang, yobos ma yoh thoq khyuot dyei bang yahge nhaiq ma seq nyen bang nyamoq tsain nghuot.
45001032	Housoeh kuot bang gas shei mon, ge Mangso dah soetuon cho lhyi seq laus eq nyamoq gungs nyang hauh zis lyis tsain kuot thoq lyis magoh, housoeh chank kuot bang lyis eq xihhonh, bos gaus nyeis.
45002001	Housoeh yvmvyah gohyuk lyis soetuon soeu eh, nvng gas jyamp das cho ma bos lo: khasoeh ge lyis nvng soetuon dah muh lyis nvnyang kuot nyeis yvmvyah, gohyuk lyis soetuon yah dvyih nah gungs lyis nvnyang dang thang thyet goeus.
45002002	Housoeh kuot bang dah thoq mas Mangso dah soetuon cho ka jus yvlyis yang seq.
45002003	Housoeh kuot bang lyis soetuon nyeis las vsainnyang gas chank kuot soeu eh, nvng Mangso dah soetuon yvmvyah yoh luiq das oen nghamh lah?
45002004	Mangso dah jyehjuh gas nhaiqlom yoh thaiq shoq nvng lyis shwih uhshe los goeus yvlyis ma soh seq las, nyah magons magoh dah jyehjuh eq kuhxing ehnyet yah nvng lyis jhen nyeis yvlyis nvng chaxwe ma nhang lhyeh?
45002005	Nvng nothoeu zis yahge ma yoh thaiq dah ehnyet gvng mas hau Mangso dah nhaiqlom dyis ge, dan dah soetuon das buisnyeis lyis nvng kham das zis yobos yom nyhuk toh.
45002006	Mangso ka dvyuk yah dvyuk lyis vsainnyang dah muhzoh yah dvyhangteh phauh shangh das.
45002007	Gis dah muh kuot las jhen zis yah phunk, nyoqnho ngelang ma dyoq ma dyuk zis xo soeu lhyi ka vcaiq vto kang dyei das.
45002008	Nghuot laus eq vsainnyang vkyuh kyingh xo bang yahge dyoqgoh nyensgoh las, jyoeng cho lhyi domsyos ma gyo, lhung zis kuot bang xiklyis nhaiqlom tsoeu zis yahge nhaiqlom dyis zis xauh das.
45002009	Ma gis muh khanh bang dvnganhmoq thoq mas yaukyenh zis yahge shanghsenh zis xauh das. Houka cangxeih lyis Yuda jens, hauh thang lhyi gohnyau bang xauh das.
45002010	Gis dah muh kuot soeu khanghmuh mas phunk, nyoqnho ngelang yahge nyenstap zis joq das. Cangxeih lyis Yuda dius mas shih, hauh thang lhyi gohnyau bang mas eq joq das.
45002011	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka dius dah nyoqnho khyen zis ma nghuot.
45002012	Lyi ma yoh las yaunos kuot bang hank laus eq, Lyi ma bos khyvlyis dyoqbis das. Lyi khau mha yaunos kuot bang gas Lyi khyvlyis soetuon zis xauh das.
45002013	Lyi xauhgyo ku zis yah kyingh Mangso xikkhonh mas dan zis ma nghuot; Lyi lyis chank kuot bang lyis gas dan bang ge das.
45002014	Gohnyau bang gas Lyi ma yoh, nghuot laus eq Lyi yah taiq toh cho lhyi nyang pheh nyang chank kuot nyeis lyis, nyamoq Lyi ma yoh laus eq hau taiq toh cho ka nyamoq xiklyis Lyi bweh los goeus.
45002015	Nyamoq dah wotwu gas nyamoq dah ehnyet mas Lyi dah taiq toh cho lhaih toh goeus yvlyis chixoeuq nyeis zis yahge nyamoq dah seq nghamh ehnyet eq hauh yvlyis kanghjyoeng kat dyei nyeis las, nyamoq dah seq ehnyet gas nyamoq lyis yobos huon das, nghuot ya yobos khyuot dyei das.
45002016	Housoeh ngos taiq kyoh dah Gausyis Dang yah dvyhangteh, Mangso ka Yesu Khristu loq yah dius dah nghop toh cho lhyi soetuon das buisnyeis lyis houyah dvyhangteh nghuot das.
45002017	Yoeuh aq, nvng gas Yuda dius nyings dap soeu nghuot las, hauh Lyi mas nges zis yah Mangso yah sen lha moengs nyeis.
45002018	Nyah ehnyet o zis seq las Lyi yah jyauh yvmvyah gis thank yvlyis dang thang seq thyet las,
45002019	Nvng gas nyoqjet bang dah choshe soeu yahge, chuot yvmas bang xiklyis bvng zis,
45002020	koh bang dah shet dyei soeu, lonoeuh jens dah svra, lyi mas jyoeng dah seq cho bos soeu nghuot, ge ehnyet tap nyeis.
45002021	Gohyuk lyis jyauh soeu nvng gas nah gungs lyis ma jyauh das lhyeh? Ma gis khauh ge taiq kyoh lho lha nvnyang gas khauh lhyeh?
45002022	Nyi vshuot ge las nvng gas nyi shuot nyeis lhyeh? Silho lhyi choqh ge las nvng silho yhen lhyi thyoq yoeus nyeis lhyeh?
45002023	Nvng lyi mas khwank nyeis las lyi lhyweq zis yah Mangso lhyi ma phauh ma nyang kuot lhyeh?
45002024	Khasoeh ge lyis namoq gvng mas Mangso dah nyings gas gohnyau bang mas loeusmus soqzo zis xauh nyeis, ge lhaih toh.
45002025	Lyi lyis chank lyis gas, vthyoh tyomh zis vkyuh bos. Nghuot laus eq Lyi lhyweq soeu nvng nghuot joq lyis, nah vthyoh tyomh cho ka ma tyomh zis doms bweh joq goeus.
45002026	Housoeh yvmvyah vthyoh tyomh soeu ma nghuot laus eq Lyi taiq toh cho lhyi chank nghuot lyis gas, Mangso yah nyang lyis vthyoh tyomh soeu ge suon dyei das ma nghuot lah?
45002027	Gungs vthyoh ma tyomh laus eq Lyi chank lyis gas, lhaih toh Lyi khyvlyis chank las vthyoh tyomh toh dah nvng, Lyi lhyweq soeu lhyi soetuon das ma nghuot lhyeh?
45002028	Khasoeh ge lyis thoqlos baus lyis Yuda nghuot soeu ka Yuda gyingh ma nghuot. Gungsshoh dah vthyoh tyomh zis eq vthyoh tyomh gyingh ma nghuot.
45002029	Nghuot laus eq nhaiqlom mas Yuda nghuot soeu ka Yuda dius gyingh nghuot. Vthyoh tyomh cho jyoeng ka ehnyet yah sen cho nghuot. Houka gungs shoh yah ma nghuot, dyos yah sen zis dvnghuot. Housoeh teh bang gas gohyuk yah chungh zis ma nghuot mulas, Mangso yah chungh yvlyis xauh kham yoeus.
45003001	Housoeh lyis gas, Yuda jens gas gohnyau bang thoq lyis cha zes lah? Vthyoh tyomh zis eq chah vkyuh bos lah?
45003002	Cho khat khanghmuh mas vkyuh svsoh bos. Cangxeih lyis Mangso ka hauh Lyi Yuda jens dah loq mas kyauh toh yvmvyah nghuot.
45003003	Nyamoq mas dvyhamh ma lomsjingh lyis gas khasoeh gah? Nyamoq dah ma lomsjingh zis gas Mangso dah wontang cho lhyi vnyet vxuh bweh nhang lhyeh?
45003004	Housoeh ma nghuot: dius dvnganh gas hwah bang bweh los laus eq Mangso jyoeng zis gas dede nghuot cho kyink toh. Khasoeh ge lyis, Jyomp maussauh mas lhaih toh zis yah dvyhangteh, Nvng taiq dang gas dede jus joq zis yahge Nvng soetuon zis xauh lyis ung los bas jungh, ge.
45003005	Gvshih, yah ma dan cho ka, Mangso dah dan yvlyis bvng bvng zes nyvng nhang nghuot lyis gas, yang khasoeh taiq das lah? Mangso yang lyis nhaiqlom dyis dah joeng cho dyei lyis gas Nyang lyi ma chi khyvlyis kuot zis nghuot lhyeh? (Ngos heisoeh taiq zis gas dius dah nghamh cho khyvlyis chank las dvtaiq.)
45003006	Housoeh ma nghuot, Mangso lyi ma chi nghuot lyis gas mungkvn gonh lyis soe khasoeh yoh tuon das lah?
45003007	Tsai, ngos cu zis gas Mangso dah jyoeng cho lhyi bvng bvng zes bweh nhang khyvlyis yah nyah nyoqnho ngelang lyis zes chixoeuq dyei lyis gas, ngos yaunos yoh soeu dvyuk teh chamus dang thang thyet zis xauh nyeis shih lah?
45003008	Housoeh dvnghuot lyis gas, Gis cho bweh thuq los bas jungh, ma gis muh tsain kuot goh oen chamus ma taiq das lah? Jyoengh dius dvyhamh gas housoeh, ngamoq lyis loeusmus soqzo zis yah yobos huon nyeis. Nyamoq mon yih dah dang thang thyet zis xauh das.
45003009	Housoeh lyis khasoeh gah? Ngamoq dah chojeis gas gohyhamh thoq lyis zes gis lhyeh? Ma nghuot, khasoeh ge lyis ngos Chixoeuq goeus zis yah dvyhangteh Yuda jens yahge gohnyau bang dvnganhmoq gas yaunos dah yomsoq o mha nghuot joq.
45003010	Lhaih toh zis yah dvyhangteh: Dan soeu ma bos, dvyuk eq ma bos;
45003011	Seqgyo soeu hank ma bos, Mangso lhyi xo soeu eq ma bos;
45003012	Dvnganhmoq chowhang whang loh goeus, Nyamoq yhung pvjus bang bweh tyamp, nhaiqbos cho chixoeuq zis hank ma bos, dvyuk yangh ma bos.
45003013	Nyamoq dah khyunghkang ka bangh joq dah lop tsain nghuot; Nyamoq lhyo eq mhuih dang taiq. Nyamoq nhuotkuk khau mha ywimuhtsanh dah duk bos.
45003014	Nyamoq nhuot mas xungh xent dah nhoengh dang yah dyingh joq.
45003015	Nyamoq dah khyei ka suih huot das zis nyap.
45003016	Nyamoq dah cho mha dyoqbis zis yahge shanghsenh cho yah dyingh joq.
45003017	Nyamoq nyenstap cho lhyi ma seq:
45003018	Nyamoq mas Mangso lhyi gyukwoms cho ma bos, ge.
45003019	Lyi mas lhaih toh zis dvnganh zis gas, Lyi khau mha kang dwis bang chank das xiklyis lhaih toh yvlyis yang seq. Hau lhaih toh dah Lyi gas hank lyis eq ma seq oen jyamp taiq das cho ma dyei toh zis yahge mungkvn dius dvnganh gas Mangso dah soetuon zis xauh das cho chixoeuq toh.
45003020	Housoeh las Lyi taiq toh cho lhyi tyink khyvlyis yah hank eq Mangso xikkhonh mas yoh dan zis ma nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis Lyi gas yang yaunos yoh bang nghuot ge zis lyis kyingh dvyoh chixoeuq.
45003021	Nghuot laus eq gvshih gas Lyi yahge lvpe jens kanghjyoeng kat toh laus eq Lyi yah ma sen khyvlyis yah Mangso dah dan cho lhyi chixoeuq goeus.
45003022	Hauh zis gas Yesu Khristu lyis lomsjingh gvng mas, lomsjingh bang dvnganh lyis dyei, Mangso dah dan cho nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis houmha khwih khyamh cho ma bos.
45003023	Khasoeh ge lyis dius dvnganh gas yaunos kuot las, Mangso dah phunk lyis kat khyoq tyamp.
45003024	Nghuot laus eq gvshih gas Yesu Khristu khyuot yoeus gvng mas phauh ma dyei noh, Mangso dah jyehjuh yah dan cho xauh yoeus.
45003025	Mangso ka, Yesu Khristu lyis yah jyank mas nhang lha yah xiklyis lomhxangh kuot goeus. Housoeh nyah suih gvng mas nyang lyis lomsjingh bang gas nyamoq dah yaunos khyuot dyei zis tsain xauh. Mangso heisoeh kuot zis gas nyang nyang dan soeu nghuot ge yvlyis chixoeuq das nyhenshang nghuot.
45003026	Lai loh goeus shishenh lyis nyang dius dah yaunos lyis yoeuh lhaiq tyamp goeus. Nghuot laus eq gvshih nyang gas nyamoq dah yaunos lyis soetuon khyvlyis nyah dan cho lhyi chixoeuq nyeis. Heisoeh Mangso ka nyah gungs dan cho lhyi chixoeuq zis yah Yesu lyis lomsjingh bang dvnganh lyis dan cho xauh yoeus nhang.
45003027	Housoeh lyis khwank das cho cha bos? Cha ma bos, Chamus? Yang Lyi chank las lah? Ma nghuot, lomsjingh gvng mas dvnghuot.
45003028	Khasoeh ge lyis yang seqgyo zis gas, dius dvyuk Lyi yah taiq toh muh lyis chank kuot khyvlyis ma nghuot, lomsjingh gvng mas dan cho xauh yoeus ge zis nghuot.
45003029	Mangso ka Yuda jens dah Mangso kyingh nghuot lhyeh? Gohnyau bang dah Mangso eq nyang nghuot, ma nghuot lhyeh? Nghuot, gohnyau bang dah Mangso eq nghuot.
45003030	Mangso ka dvso kyingh dvnghuot yvmvyah, vthyoh tyomh kham bang lyis lomsjingh gvng mas dan nhang, Tsai vthyoh tyomh ma kham bang lyis eq hau lomsjingh cho yah kyingh dan nhang das.
45003031	Housoeh lyis gas, lomsjingh gvng mas hauh Lyi lyis tyamp goeus lhyeh? Housoeh ma nghuot, tyamp das gungsthaiq yang hauh Lyi lyis tsain chank tyink.
45004001	Housoeh lyis gas yah phauh thyeih Abraham dah thungh phuh cho cha nghuot?
45004002	Abraham gas muhzoh yah dan zis xauh yoeus lyis gas, khwank chank bos; nghuot laus eq Mangso xikkhonh mas khwank chank ma bos.
45004003	Hau lhaihtoh dang mas khasoeh ge lah? Abraham gas Mangso lhyi lomsjingh gvng mas nyang lyis dan soeu, ge dyei goeus, ge.
45004004	Gvshih muh zwi soeu xauh yoeus dah uhkung phauh gas jyungshuk khyvlyis suon yoeus zis ma nghuot, nyang muh zwi phauh dvnghuot.
45004005	Vsainnyang muh mas nges khyvlyis ma nghuot, yaunos yoh bang lyis yoh dan nhang soeu lhyi lomsjingh soeu lyis ka nyah lomsjingh zis lyis dan, ge suon dyei das.
45004006	Houka muhzoh yah ma nghuot, Mangso yah dan soeu, ge suon dyei zis xauh soeu ka ngelhoq cho, Dawi eq taiq toh.
45004007	Nyang taiq zis gas: Chah shuot zis lyis khyuot dyei las, nyah yaunos lyis nghop tyamp dyei zis xauh soeu ka ngelhoq.
45004008	Yhensain yah yobos comh zis ma xauh soeu ka ngelhoq, ge.
45004009	Housoeh haih ngelhoq cho ka vthyoh tyomh bang xiklyis kyingh nghuot lah, nghuot ya, vthyoh ma tyomh bang xiklyis eq nghuot lah? Abraham gas lomsjingh gvng mas dan soeu, ge dyei goeus oen yang taiq.
45004010	Housoeh lyis gas khanhamp suon dyei zis xauh lah? Vthyoh ma tyomh shih lyis lah? Vthyoh tyomh thang lhyi lah? Vthyoh tyomh thang lhyi ma nghuot, vthyoh ma tyomh shih lyis nghuot goeus.
45004011	Nyang vthyoh tyomh vlho lhyi xauh yoeus zis gas, nyang vthyoh ma tyomh shih lyis yah bos joq dah lomsjingh ehnyet gvng mas nyang lyis dan zis kuot dyei dah kyihau nghuot. Houka vthyoh ma tyomh, lomsjingh las hauh gvng mas dan ge suon dyei zis xauh bang dah phauh thyeih duot dyei das xiklyis nghuot.
45004012	Nyang gas vthyoh tyomh kham bang dah phauh thyeih eq nghuot. Hauh bang gas vthyoh tyomh kham bang thoq lyis zes las yah phauh thyeih Abraham vthyoh tyomh ma kham shih lyis yoh dah lomsjingh zis yah kang dwis yhangteh kang dwis bang nghuot.
45004013	Abraham, nghuot ya nyah vnyau vshih lyis mungkvn yhenzis khyvlyis dyei das ge dangthoengh toh uhlyis Abraham hau Lyi chank tyink gvng mas ma nghuot. Abraham gas lomsjingh gvng mas Mangso ka nyang lyis dan ge suon dyei zis xauh gvng mas dvnghuot.
45004014	Khasoeh ge lyis, Lyi chank bang vso vlho kham yoeus bang tsain nghuot lyis gas, dius dah lomsjingh zis gas vkom nghuot loh zis yahge Mangso dangthoengh eq pyaih tyamp goeus.
45004015	Lyi gas Mangso dah nhaiqlom dyis cho she los, nghuot laus eq lyi ma joq lyis gas, lyi lhyweq cho eq ma bos das.
45004016	Housoeh hauh dangthoengh lyis Mangso dah jyehjuh yah Abraham dah vnyau vshih dvnganh xauh kham yoeus das nyhenshang yoh kham toh das xiklyis hauh dangthoengh lyis lomsjingh yvmas vpom xi toh. Abraham dah vshih ge zis gas, Lyi chank tyink bang kyingh ma nghuot, Abraham teh lomsjingh bang lyis eq ge zis nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis Abraham gas yang dvnganh dah lomsjingh phauh thyeih nghuot.
45004017	(Ngos nvng lyis dius nyau nyoshoq dah uwus duot nhang goeus ge lhaih toh) Abraham gas lomsjingh nyeis. Shei bang lyis dwis toq nhang zis yahge ma bweh shih dah vyhang lhyi yoh bweh los nhang dah Mangso xikkhonh mas hauh dangthoengh gas goeng joq.
45004018	Nghamhloms joqyos ma bos laus eq Abraham gas lomsjingh zis yah nghamhloms nyeis las dius nyau nyoshoq dah uwus bweh loh. Jyomp maussauh mas taiq zis gas, Nah vnyau vshih jens gas maukhung mha kyi teh jebais los das, ge.
45004019	Nyah lomsjingh ehnyet yah nyang dvxo zvn ko bos los goeus dah nyah gungsdom lyis eq, loshang ma yoh khoeu lo dah Sara ung lhyi eq yom ma shuon.
45004020	Lomsjingh cho ma dyuk, Mangso dah dangthoengh lyis ma khamkhvv, nyah lomsjingh cho mha yombos los las Mangso lhyi chungh nyeis.
45004021	Mangso ka nyang toh dah dangthoengh lyis yoh tyink dyei ge yom nghamh zuk nyeis.
45004022	Housoeh las nyah lomsjingh cho lhyi dan cho nghuot ge suon dyei goeus.
45004023	Nyang lyis housoeh suon dyei ge dah dang gas nyah xiklyis kyingh lhaih toh zis ma nghuot.
45004024	Houka yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu lyis dwis toq nhang soeu lhyi lomsjingh bang, dan bang ge suon yoeus zis xauh dah, yah xiklyis eq lhaih toh.
45004025	Yang cu dah yaunos gvng mas nyang gas shei das xiklyis kyauh tyamp zis xauh las, yang dan cho yoh das xiklyis dwis toqh kat zis xauh goeus.
45005001	Lomsjingh gvng mas tsain dan los yvmvyah, yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu gvng mas yang Mangso yah yoh nyenstap goeus.
45005002	Yesu gas yang lyis lomsjingh khyvpheh yah gvshih kham zo nyeis Mangso dah jyehjuh shot pheh shwih wvng loh goeus. Housoeh yang gas Mangso dah phunk mas xauh wvng das zis nghamhloms zainsmuh bos las khwank gaus nyeis.
45005003	Hauh thoq lyis yang gas yaukyenh shanghsenh xauh dah cho mha laus eq yang khwank gaus nyeis. Khasoeh ge lyis yaukyenh zis gas jhen zis lyis bweh los nhang yvlyis yang seq.
45005004	Jhen zis gas kyink zis, kyink zis gas nghamhloms zis lyis bweh nhang.
45005005	Hau nghamhloms zis gas yang lyis ehnyet yom ma gyau nhang. Khasoeh ge lyis yang lyis dyei toh dah Gyingshang Dyos khyvlyis yah Mangso dah jyetdap ehnyet gas, yah nhaiqlom khau mha huot kat dyei goeus.
45005006	Yang gas yomnhuk joq shih lyis toeuq toh shishenh lyis, Khristu gas yaunos yoh bang xiklyis shei kham goeus.
45005007	Jyoengh, dan soeu xiklyis shei kham das dius hank ma bos mvbeh; dius gis dvyuk yuk xiklyis gas womh shei kham das zis dvyuk yuk bos mvbeh.
45005008	Nghuot laus eq yang yaunos dap bang nghuot joq shih lyis, Khristu gas yah nyhenshang shei kham yvmvyah, Mangso ka nyah jyetdap cho lhyi, yah jyank mas dede Chixoeuq goeus.
45005009	Housoeh nyah suih gvng mas gvshih yang dan cho yoh goeus las, nyah gvng mas Mangso dah nhaiqlom dyis masyah yang khyuot yoeus zis zes xauh.
45005010	Khasoeh ge lyis yang gas nyang lyis jes kuot bang dvtsain nghuot joq shih lyis, nyah Lo shei kham zis yah, yang lyis Mangso yah mehoq tamp zis xauh goeus bang yang gas nyah dah dwis nyeis kang yah zes las khyuot yoeus zis xauh das.
45005011	Tsai, hauh thoq lyis yang lyis Mangso yah mehoq tamp das xiklyis nyang gas yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu lyis nhang kat yvmvyah yang gauslaus nyeis.
45005012	Housoeh las dius dvyuk gvng mas yaunos gas mungkvn mas wvng los las yaunos gvng mas shei cho jweh los zis yah dvyhangteh, dius dvnganh yaunos kuot yvmvyah dvnganh gas shei chah.
45005013	Khasoeh ge lyis, hauh lyi ma dyei shih lyis yaunos gas mungkvn mas joq goeus; nghuot laus eq lyi ma joq shih gyo lyis yaunos comh toh ge zis ma bos.
45005014	Nghuot laus eq Adam masyah Moshe jweh shoq shei zis guon nyeis las, Adam dah shuot cho teh ma shuot bang thoq mas eq guon nyeis. Adam gas jweh los das soeu dah vzwvng nghuot.
45005015	Nghuot laus eq hau aiq yuk gas dvyhangteh ma nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso dah jyehjuh jyungshuk gas Adam dah yaunos teh ma nghuot. Dius dvyuk dah yaunos gvng mas dius nyoshoq shei zis xauh ge zis gas jus. Nghuot laus eq Mangso dah jyehjuh gas hauh thoq lyis zes kuh joq. Houyah dvyhangteh Yesu Khristu ge dah dius dvyuk dah jyehjuh gvng mas dius nyoshoq lyis dyei dah nyah jyehjuh jyungshuk gas zes kuh joq.
45005016	Mangso dah jyehjuh jyungshuk yah dius dvyuk dah yaunos cho ka shaih goh. Adam gas yaunos dvkoeuq kuot uhlyis yobos yoh ge dah dang thang thyet cho chank los. Nyah thang lhyi yaunos nyoshoq kuot uhlyis ma mon ma yih laus eq yobos ma bos ge dah jyehjuh jyungshuk chank los.
45005017	Khasoeh ge lyis dius dvyuk dah shuot cho gvng mas shei zis yah guon cho bweh thuq los zis gas jyoeng. Nghuot laus eq Yesu Khristu ge dius dvyuk kuot dah muh gvng mas bweh thuq los dah vkyuh gas kha iq zes kuh joq! Mangso dyei dah magons magoh jyehjuh jyungshuk lyis xauh yoeus las nyah jyehjuh yah dan ge suon dyei zis xauh bang dvnganh gas Yesu Khristu ge dius dvyuk dah gvng mas kang dwis zis yah xauh guon nyeis das.
45005018	Housoeh las dius dvyuk shuot dah yaunos gvng mas dius dvnganh dang thang thyet zis xauh zis yah dvyhangteh, dius dvyuk dan dah muhzoh gvng mas dius dvnganh gas dan cho xauh las kang tsain dwis nyeis das.
45005019	Khasoeh ge lyis dius dvyuk domsyos ma gyo gvng mas nyoshoq lyis yaunos wons bang bweh nhang zis yah dvyhangteh, gohtoeu dius dvyuk domsyos gyo gvng mas nyoshoq gas dan bang bweh los das.
45005020	Lyi jweh los yvmvyah shuot cho nyo los. Nghuot laus eq yaunos zes nyo los zes Mangso dah jyehjuh gas magons magoh zes dyingh shon los.
45005021	Housoeh yaunos gas shei cho khyvpheh yah guon nyeis zis yah dvyhangteh Mangso dah jyehjuh gas dan khyvlyis yah guon nyeis las, yah Yhensain Yesu dah jyehjuh yah yang lyis vcaiq vto kang dwis yvpheh shwih loh nyeis.
45006001	Housoeh lyis gas yang khasoeh taiq das lah? Jyehjuh je los bas jungh oen yang yaunos mas kang tsoq dwis nyeis das lah?
45006002	Ma nghuot, yang yaunos masyah shei gang goeus lyis gas houmha khasoeh kang tsoq dwis nyeis das lah?
45006003	Yesu Khristu mas jeisnyhop kham bang yang dvnganh gas nyang shei kham yvmas jeisnyhop tsain kham nyeis yvlyis namoq ma seq goh lhyeh?
45006004	Housoeh yvmvyah Khristu gas Uwus dah phunk yah, shei masyah dwis toq los nhang zis xauh zis yah dvyhangteh, yang eq kang saiq mas yoh suh shoq, hau jeisnyhop kham yvmas shei yvlyis yang kham yoeus las, nyang yah dvgeh nyhop zis tsain xauh goeus.
45006005	Yang gas nyang shei kham yvmas dvgeh bos shei kham lhyi ka, nyang dwis toq los yvmas eq dvgeh dwis toq los das.
45006006	Yang gas yaunos dah jyeidwis ma tsoq bweh bas jungh, yaunos gungsshoh lyis mhont das xiklyis, yah dius cauh lyis nyang yah dvgeh taplhangh kham yvlyis yang seq.
45006007	Khasoeh ge lyis shei goeus soeu ka yaunos masyah lhuiq zis xauh goeus.
45006008	Yang Khristu yah dvgeh shei lhyi ka, yang nyang yah dvgeh dwis nyeis das oen lomsjingh nyeis.
45006009	Khasoeh ge lyis Khristu gas dwis toq nhang zis xauh goeus yvmvyah ma doms shei lo zis lyis yang seq. Shei zis eq nyang lyis ma yoh guon lo.
45006010	Khristu shei zis gas yaunos xiklyis dvlhain kyingh shei lha, nyang kang dwis zis gas Mangso xiklyis dwis nyeis.
45006011	Houyah dvyhangteh namoq eq yaunos yah shei gang loh bang nghuot las, yah Khristu Yesu gvng mas Mangso mha dwis nyeis bang nghuot oen nghamh yoeus chah.
45006012	Namoq obos ehnyet dah jyeidwis jens ma duot loh bas jungh, yaunos lyis namoq dah seq shei gungs mas vguon nhang goh.
45006013	Namoq dah gungsdoeus lyis ma gis ma shop muh kuot das xiklyis yaunos dah muh mas vkyauh tyamp goh. Hauh gungsthaiq shei mhayah dwis toq nhang zis xauh bang teh namoq gungs Mangso lhyi kyauh las, namoq gungsdoeus lyis dan dah muh kuot das nyhenshang Mangso lhyi kyauh toh geh.
45006014	Khasoeh ge lyis namoq gas lyi khau mha ma nghuot, jyehjuh khau mha kang dwis nyeis yvmvyah yaunos dah yomsoq gas namoq thoq mas ma yoh zau lo.
45006015	Housoeh lyis gas khasoeh gah? Yang gas lyi khau mha ma nghuot, jyehjuh khau mha dvtsain nghuot yvmvyah, yaunos kuot das lah? Housoeh ma nghuot.
45006016	Namoq dvyuk dah domsyos gyo lyis namoq gas hauh soeu dah jyeidwis nghuot yvlyis namoq ma seq lhyeh? Yaunos dah jons duot lyis gas shei das. Mangso lhyi domsyos gyo dah jons duot lyis gas dan yvlyis xauh kham yoeus das.
45006017	Namoq xikpheh yaunos dah jons duot ku laus eq, namoq xauh yoeus dah jyauh cho, jyoeng yvvlyis ehnyet nhaiqlom dvnganh yah domsyos gyo goeus las Mangso lhyi nhaiqshoqlang.
45006018	Namoq gas yaunos masyah lhuiq kat zis xauh las dan cho dah jons jens duot los goeus.
45006019	(Namoq gungsshoh nhuk joq yvmvyah dius dah nghamh cho lhyi chank las ngos dvtaiq). Dvlhain ka ma gis dah muh kuot das xiklyis ma lhoq ma shang zis yahge ma shop dah jons jens bweh nhang. Houyah dvyhangteh gvshih gas namoq dah gungs dvnganh yah gyingshang dah muh kuot das xiklyis dan cho dah jons jens bweh los nhang chah goeus.
45006020	Namoq yaunos jons tsain duot nyeis shih uhlyis, namoq gas Mangso o cho, dan cho yah cha ma tsain sen.
45006021	Gvshih doms yoeuh lyis xoqphoh cho xikpheh namoq kuot ku goeus muh masyah chah vkyuh xauh yoeus lah? Hauh muh dah uhkung phauh gas shei zis nghuot.
45006022	Gvshih gas yaunos masyah lhuiq zis xauh las, Mangso dah jyeidwis jens duot goeus. Hauh vkyuh gas namoq gyingshang bang bweh los las thang thank lyis vcaiq vto kang yoh.
45006023	Khasoeh ge lyis yaunos dah uhkung phauh gas shei zis nghuot; Mangso dah jyehjuh jyungshuk gas yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu mas vcaiq vto kang nghuot.
45007001	Boekyis eh, ngos lyi seq bang lyis taiq bah, dius dwis nyeis gyo lyis lyi gas nyang lyis sain toh zis lyis namoq ma seq nyeis goh lhyeh?
45007002	Housoeh yhensain phoq yoh dah vmesbih gas yhensain phoq dwis nyeis dvchank, lyi gvng mas nyang yah dvgeh twih toh: nghuot laus eq yhensain phoq shei goeus ya, yhensain phoq yah sen dah lyi masyah luiq goeus.
45007003	Housoeh las yhensain phoq dwis nyeis shih lyis, yhensain phoq gohyuk xo loh lyis gas, nyang lyis lvng shuot soeu ge das: nghuot laus eq yhensain phoq shei goeus ya, nyang lyi masyah luiq goeus las, yhensain phoq gohyuk jyank mas loh laus eq nyang lvng shuot soeu bweh das zis ma nghuot.
45007004	Houyah dvyhangteh boekyis eh, shei masyah dwis toq los soeu yah phoengh wvng las yah Mangso xiklyis vshih yoh shih bas jungh, namoq eq Khristu gungs mas Lyi yah shei gang loh.
45007005	Khasoeh ge lyis yang gungsshoh nghuot shih lyis, Lyi yah nhauh toq kat, yah dah yaunos dap gungsshoh dah obos ehnyet gas shei muhzoh dah vshih shih bas jungh, yah gungsdoeus jens lyis muh khanh dyei nyeis.
45007006	Nghuot laus eq gvshih gas yang lyis twih toh dah Lyi masyah shei luiq goeus las, yang gas lhaih toh Lyi cauh dah phuqsoe bang ma nghuot lo, gyingshang Dyos dah kang vsaiq mas dvphuqsoe nyeis.
45007007	Housoeh lyis gas yang khasoeh oen taiq das lah? Lyi gas yaunos nghuot joq lhyeh? Housoeh ma nghuot: Lyi yah ma nghuot lyis gas, yaunos lyis ngos ma seq: Khasoeh ge lyis nyoq vnoq, ge Lyi ma taiq ya, ngos nyoqnoq obos cho lhyi jyoengh ma seq.
45007008	Nghuot laus eq yaunos gas tyingtoh dang lyis jyamp las obos cho vja ja lyis ngos masyah kuot thuq kat. Khasoeh ge lyis lyi ma joq lyis gas yaunos gas shei joq.
45007009	Khasoeh ge lyis xikpheh ngos gas lyi dah nghe pheh nyeis khoq: nghuot laus eq hauh lyi dah twih toh cho ngah jyank mas jweh yah dvyih, yaunos gas ngos mas kuh los las ngos gas shei loh.
45007010	Housoeh kang dyei das ge dah dangthoengh yah jweh los dah lyi nyang ngos mas shei cho bweh nhang.
45007011	Khasoeh ge lyis yaunos gas hau tyingtoh dang lyis yhung lha ngos lyis mhuih zis yah sat.
45007012	Housoeh las Lyi gas gyingshang, hau tyingtoh dang eq gyingshang, dan las gis joq.
45007013	Housoeh lyis gas, gis ja gas ngah xiklyis shei cho bweh los lhyeh? Housoeh ma nghuot: yaunos gas gis zis lyis yhung lha ngos lyis shei nhang. Houka yaunos dah wotwu lyis chixoeuq das xiklyis nghuot. Housoeh las tyingtoh dang gas yaunos gas cha yah ma yoh byi shoq kuh cho lhyi chixoeuq nyeis.
45007014	Khasoeh ge lyis Lyi gas Dyos yah sen yvlyis yang seq; nghuot laus eq ngos gas gungsshoh ehnyet bos las yaunos dah jons duot das xiklyis ungh zis xauh.
45007015	Ngos khanh yoszoh lyis ngos ma seqgyo; nghuot laus eq ngos kuot mes cho lhyi ma kuot kuot, ngos hoeng dah muh lyis kyingh ngos dvkuot nyeis.
45007016	Ngos ma mes kuot zis lyis ngos kuot lyis gas, Lyi gas gis joq yvlyis, ngos xamxonh.
45007017	Housoeh las, gvshih ngos nyang hauh zis lyis kuot nyeis zis ma nghuot, ngos mas bos dah yaunos dvkuot nyeis.
45007018	Khasoeh ge lyis ngah ungkhau mha, nghuot goeus, ngah gungsshoh mas gis zis cha ma bos yvlyis ngos seq. Ngos mas kuot mes ehnyet bos joq laus eq gis khyvlyis kuot das zis ngos ma nyvng.
45007019	Kuot mes dah gis cho lhyi ngos ma kuot, ma mes kuot, ma shop yvlyis ngos kuot nyeis.
45007020	Housoeh ngos ma mes kuot yvlyis ngos kuot nyeis lyis gas, ngos nyang hauh yvlyis ma kuot, ngos mas bos dah yaunos dvkuot nyeis.
45007021	Housoeh ngos nyvng dah lyi dvkoeuq gas, ngos gis dah muh lyis kuot mes khanghmuh ma gis zis lyis kyingh ngos dvyoh kuot.
45007022	Khasoeh ge lyis ngah ungkhau mha ka, Mangso dah lyi lyis nhaiqdoeus nyeis.
45007023	Nghuot laus eq ngah gungsdoeus mas gohtoeu lyi dvkoeuq gas ngah ehnyet mas bos dah lyi yah zan goh nyeis zis ngos nyvng. Hauh lyi gas ngos lyis ngah gungsdoeus mas bos, yaunos lyi dah thung dius kuot.
45007024	Mvshohjyen soeu ngos eh, hai shei nhang dah gungs masyah ngos lyis hank khyuot yoeus das lah?
45007025	Yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu gvng mas ngos lyis khyuot kat Mangso dah jyehjuh lyis chungh. Housoeh las ngos gungs doeu nyang, Mangso lyi lyis phuqsoe nyeis; nghuot laus eq gungsshoh yah gas yaunos lyi lyis ngos phuqsoe nyeis.
45008001	Housoeh yvmvyah gvshih gas, Khristu Yesu mas nyeis bang dah xiklyis gas dang thang thyet dais ma bos lo.
45008002	Khasoeh ge lyis Khristu Yesu masyah kang saiq dyei, dwis nyeis Dyos dah lyi gas ngos lyis yaunos dah lyi yahge shei cho lyi mhayah lhuiq kat.
45008003	Khasoeh ge lyis gungsshoh yomnhuk las Lyi ma yoh kuot yvlyis, Mangso ka nyah Lo lyis yobos bos dah gungsshoh teh doeus khyvlyis, yaunos lyis shang tyamp das xiklyis nhang kat yvmvyah, nyah gungsshoh mas yaunos lyis dang thang thyet tyamp goeus.
45008004	Housoeh gungsshoh khyvlyis ma chank Dyos khyvlyis chank las kang dwis nyeis bang yang gas hau Lyi taiq toh dah dan cho yoh nyuk los nhang das xiklyis nghuot.
45008005	Khasoeh ge lyis gungsshoh ehnyet chank bang gas, gungs yah sen dah vyhang lhyi nghamh twih toh. Nghuot laus eq Dyos dah ehnyet chank bang gas Dyos dah nhaiqdoeus khyvlyis loh nyeis.
45008006	Gungsshoh yah sen yvmas nghamh twih toh cho ka shei cho nghuot. Dyos mas nghamh twih cho ka kang yahge nyenstap yvpheh shwih loh nyeis.
45008007	Haih cho gvng mas gungsshoh lyis nghamh twih dah ehnyet gas Mangso lhyi jesmus nyeis las Mangso dah lyi lyis ma chank las, jyoengh ma yoh chank.
45008008	Gungsshoh ehnyet chank bang gas Mangso lhyi yoh pyo nhang zis ma nghuot.
45008009	Nghuot laus eq Mangso dah Dyos namoq mas nyeis goeus yvmvyah, namoq gas gungsshoh o khyvlyis ma nghuot, Dyos dah ehnyet o khyvlyis tsain suh nyeis. Ehnyet mas Khristu dah Dyos ma lungh soeu hank laus eq Khristu yah ma sen.
45008010	Khristu namoq mas nyeis lyis gas yaunos gvng mas gungs shei laus eq dan soeu dah gvng mas namoq dah dyos gas dwis nyeis das.
45008011	Yesu lyis shei masyah toq los nhang soeu dah dyos namoq mas nyeis lyis gas, Khristu lyis dwis toq los nhang soeu ka namoq mas bos dah dyos khyvpheh yah namoq dah seq shei gungs lyis eq dwis dah kang dyei das.
45008012	Housoeh las boekyis eh, yang gas gungsshoh ehnyet chank das xiklyis gungsshoh dah jyen dap bang ma nghuot.
45008013	Khasoeh ge lyis, gungsshoh yah sen khyvlyis kang dwis nyeis lyis gas, namoq shei das; nghuot laus eq namoq dyos masyah gungsshoh dah wotwu lyis tsain thyuk tyamp lyis gas namoq dwis nyeis das.
45008014	Mangso dah Dyos yah shwih zis xauh ya xauh bang gas Mangso dah lo jens nghuot.
45008015	Khasoeh ge lyis, Mangso namoq lyis dyei dah dyos gas namoq lyis jons kuot las nyang lyis doms gyuk nhang das xiklyis ma nghuot. Hauh gungsthaiq hauh dyos gas namoq lyis Mangso dah lo jens duot nhang lha hauh dyos yomsoq yah yang gas Mangso lhyi, Aba Uwus eh, oen sang.
45008016	Hauh Dyos nyang, yah dyos yah dvgeh kanghjyoeng kat zis gas, Yang gas Mangso dah lo jens nghuot, ge.
45008017	Yang gas lo jens tsain nghuot goeus ya, vso vlho kham yoeus bang nghuot. Khristu yah dvgeh shanghsenh kham lhyi ka nyang yah dvgeh nyoqnho ngelang dyei zis eq xauh kham das.
45008018	Khasoeh ge lyis gvshih shishenh dah shanghsenh zis gas, yang lyis Chixoeuq das phunk yah byi das zis ma mon oen ngos nghamh.
45008019	Gvnkhanh toh zis dvnganh gas Mangso dah lo jens hank nghuot yvlyis Chixoeuq das nyhenshang sainh hwangh zis yah langh nyeis.
45008020	Khasoeh ge lyis gvn ya gvnkhanh toh zis gas vsainnyang o zis yahge hauh dah toeuqkhom vkom bweh loh das zis gas vsainnyang dah ehnyet o khyvlyis ma nghuot mulas, Mangso bweh nhang yvmvyah dvnghuot.
45008021	Nghuot laus eq dvnyeih gas gvnkhanh toh zis dvnganh gas dyoqbis masyah yoh luiq las Mangso lo jens xauh yoeus, phunk nyoqnho bos dah luiq cho mha xauh bos das yvlyis nghamhloms zis yah Mangso heisoeh bweh nhang goeus.
45008022	Khasoeh ge lyis gvnkhanh toh zis dvnganh gas gvshih jweh shoq dvgeh lokhoeu nos nos dah vmesbih teh nos kyingh nyeis yvlyis yang seq.
45008023	Hauh thoq lyis Dyos dah cangxeih vshih lyis kham yoeus bang yang eq, yah gungs lyis khyuot ge, Mangso dah lo jens duot das shishenh lyis tsain langh nyeis.
45008024	Khasoeh ge lyis yang nghamhloms cho haih yvmas khyuot yoeus zis tsain xauh goeus. Nghuot laus eq nyvng yvlyis nghamhloms zis gas nghamhloms cho gyingh ma nghuot. Yang mas hank gas yoh nyvng yvlyis nghamhloms nyeis lah?
45008025	Ma nyvng dah vyhang lyis dvnghamhloms nyeis lyis gas, yang hauh yvlyis ehnyet xing xing tsain langh nyeis.
45008026	Houyah dvyhangteh Dyos eq yah dah yomnhuk yvlyis thukxank dyei nyeis. Yang shvmanh khasoeh dung das zis ma seq. Nghuot laus eq hauh Dyos nyang dang ma yoh thuq, soqmuh nyhank zis yah, yah xiklyis mehoq yoh tamp shoq bos shangphu dyei nyeis.
45008027	Yah ehnyet nhaiqlom lyis lhau yoeuh soeu Mangso ka Dyos cha nghamh nyeis yvlyis seq. Khasoeh ge lyis Dyos gas nyah dius jens xiklyis Mangso dah ehnyet o zis yah dvyhangteh Mangso jyank mas shangphu dyei nyeis.
45008028	Mangso ka nyang lyis jyetdap las nyah toeuqkhom yah dvyhangteh khi yoeus toh bang xiklyis gas, cho dvnganh yvmas gis zis chomp bweh los nhang nyeis yvlyis yang seq.
45008029	Khasoeh ge lyis, nyah Lo gas vmang vnoeuh nyoshoq mas lobes duot bas jungh ge, xik lyis yah seq toh bang lyis, nyah Lo dah gungskhyank yah doeusgoh das xiklyis nyang gas nyamoq lyis xik lyis yah toeuq toh.
45008030	Xik lyis yah toeuq toh bang lyis eq nyang khi yoeus. Khi yoeus bang lyis eq nyang dan nhang, dan nhang goeus bang lyis eq phunk tsain yoh nhang.
45008031	Housoeh lyis heinyhoq mas yang cha taiq das lah? Mangso, yah shot pheh nyeis lyis gas yang lyis tyi hank yoh xo das lah?
45008032	Nyah Lo lyis ma yu, yang dvnganhmoq xiklyis nyang lyis kyauh tyamp soeu ka, nyah Lo eq cheq vyhang dvnganh lyis eq yang lyis jyungshuk dyei das ma nghuot lhyeh?
45008033	Mangso khyen yoeus bang lyis yobos hank yoh huon das lah? Dan nhang soeu ka Mangso nghuot.
45008034	Dang thang thyet das soeu hank nghuot lah? Shei kham lha, nghuot goeus, shei kham thoq lyis magoh, shei masyah dwis toqh kat zis xauh thang lhyi Mangso dah loqyos shot pheh nghuot joq las, yah xiklyis khyoeuq dyei soeu Khristu Yesu nyang nghuot.
45008035	Khristu dah jyetdap masyah yang lyis hank yoh kangh tyamp das lah? Yaukyenh, shanghsenh, shoeuhshih, panghkhauq, shohchen, shohjyen, gudwvng cho, moengsa yah lah?
45008036	Nah gvng mas ngamoq dvnyeih gonh sat zis xauh, Ngamoq gas sat das nyhenshang she loh dah yvng jens lyis teh kuot zis xauh, ge lhaih toh zis yah dvyhangteh nghuot.
45008037	Housoeh ma nghuot! Yang lyis jyetdap nyeis soeu gvng mas hai dvnganh mas yang gas ung bang thoq lyis zes bang nghuot.
45008038	Khasoeh ge lyis shei cho, dwis cho, loeuswons bang, zauguon, yomsoq, gvshih joq dah vyhang yahge thang pheh jweh los das vyhang,
45008039	nyhang mha dah yomsoq eq, nyhen mha dah yomsoq eq gvn ya gvnkhanh toh vyhang masyah cha nghuot laus eq yah Yhensain Khristu Yesu mas Mangso dah jyetdap ehnyet masyah yang lyis yoh kangh tyamp das zis ma nghuot oen zis ngos soh soh nghuot.
45009001	Ngos Khristu yah sen soeu nghuot las jyoeng dang taiq, ngos ma hwah. Gyingshang Dyos yah guon yvlyis lhom yoeus dah ngah sohseq ehnyet yah ngos ma hwah cho kanghjyoeng kat.
45009002	Ngah suih ngah shoh, ngah vnyau jens dah nyhenshang ngah ehnyet mas nhaiqkuk zainsmuh yahge yaukyenh cho malyen lo xauh nyeis cho taiq lyis kha iq kuh joq lah!
45009003	Khasoeh ge lyis, nyamoq xiklyis ngos Mangso dah nhoengh zis lyis eq, Khristu yah gang loh das zis lyis eq kham mes shoq nghuot.
45009004	Israel jens gas Mangso lo jens nghuot. Nyamoq lyis nyah lo jens duot nhang lha, nyah phunk thuq xoeuq. Nyamoq yah thanghchvp toh, Lyi eq dyei. Nyamoq gas jyoeng dah paiq cho yahge Mangso dah dangthoengh lyis eq xauh yoeus.
45009005	Nyamoq gas nyings hoeuh dah Hebre phauh thyeih moq masyah yaus lyih bang nghuot. Dius khyvlyis gas Khristu eq nyamoq vnyau yah sen. Dvnganh lyis guon dah Mangso lhyi vcaiq vto chungh goh. Amen.
45009006	Mangso dah dangthoengh gas vnyet vkom bweh goeus oen zis ma nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis Israel vnyau dvnganh yah Mangso dah dius gyingh ma tsain nghuot.
45009007	Abraham dah vnyau vshih nghuot bang eq dvnganh gas Mangso dah lo jens nghuot lhyeh? Mangso Abraham lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos nvng lyis dangthoengh toh vgus Isak masyah nah vnyau vshih gyoh das, ge.
45009008	Hauh vjyuk gas, gungsshoh pheh yah khoeu los dah lo jens gas Mangso dah lo jens ma tsain nghuot; Mangso dangthoengh toh zis yah dvyhangteh khoeu los dah lo jens gas Abraham dah vnyau vshih gyingh nghuot ge suon yoeus dyei.
45009009	Khasoeh ge lyis dangthoengh mas, Heinyos ngos doms jweh lyis Sara gas yukgis lo yoh das, ge taiq toh.
45009010	Haih zis kyingh ma nghuot, Rebeka dah lotang eq yah phauh thyeih Isak masyah los.
45009011	Nghuot laus eq lotang ma khoeu shih las, gis gang cha ma daq kuot shih lyis yah Mangso Rebeka lyis taiq zis gas, Nah lo kuh vyuk gas ngis vyuk jyank mas jons mus das, ge.
45009012	Mangso housoeh taiq zis gas, nyang toeuq toh zis yah dvyhangteh lobes yuk lyis ma lui yoeus, khyen cho mha nyang gas dius ya kuot dah muh lyis vgungs toh las khyen zis ma nghuot, nyang o khyvlyis dvkhyen.
45009013	Housoeh Jyomp maussauh mas, Ngos Yakop lyis jyetdap las, Esau lyis hoeng, ge lhaih toh.
45009014	Housoeh lyis yang, Mangso ma dan oen taiq das lah? Housoeh ma nghuot.
45009015	Khasoeh ge lyis, Ngos jyehjuh kuot mes soeu lhyi jyehjuh kuot das. Ngos nhaiqnyen mes soeu lhyi nhaiqnyen das, ge Moshe lhyi taiq toh.
45009016	Housoeh las Mangso dah khyen cho ka dius dah omes cho, dius dah zwi khank cho mha ma nges. Mangso dah nhaiqnyen cho mha dvnges toh.
45009017	Khasoeh ge lyis lhaihtoh dang mas Egutu hwankti Pharao lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng mas ngah yomsoq yoh chixoeuq las ngah nyings nyeisjvng gonh hoeuh loh bas jungh, oen ngos nvng lyis dvtoeu toh, ge.
45009018	Housoeh las Mangso ka nyang nhaiqnyen mes soeu lyis nhaiqnyen las, nhaiqlom than nhang mes soeu lyis lhoq than dyei nyeis.
45009019	Nghuot laus eq namoq dvyuk yuk ngos lyis, Housoeh lyis Mangso ka dius lyis yobos khasoeh yoh xo das lah? Nyang bauh dah cho lhyi hank yoh kyamp toh lah, ge ngos lyis taiq mes mvbeh.
45009020	Buisnoms phoq eh, nvng gas hank nghuot las Mangso lhyi housoeh yoh toeuh lah? Tsoh auh dvlom gas hauh yvlyis kuot toh goeus soeu lhyi, Nvng ngos lyis chamus heisoeh kuot lah, oen yoh taiq lhyeh?
45009021	Auh shonh soeu ka tsohnyhon lhyi nyang o khyvlyis kuot das toeuh yoh las, tsoh dvjop zis lyis dvkhamh yah nyoqnho ngelang bos yvmas yhung das phauhdap auh, gohtoeu dvkhamh yah ma phauh dah auh yoh kuot ma nghuot lhyeh?
45009022	Housoeh Mangso eq housoeh kuot nyeis. Nyang gas nyah nhaiqlom dyis cho Chixoeuq zis yah nyah yomsoq lyis seq nhang nyeis. Nghuot laus eq nyah dah nhaiqlom dyis gvng mas monh las somh loh mon bang lyis ehnyet xing xing jhen nyeis.
45009023	Yhensain ka nyah nhaiqnyen cho kham yoeus das bang ge dah yang lyis nyah mathank magons Phunk lyis xauh nyvng nhang das nyhenshang o nyeis. Hauh bang gas Mangso dah phunk xauh yoeus das zis sont toh goeus bang nghuot.
45009024	Khasoeh ge lyis yang gas Mangso yah khi toh goeus bang nghuot las, Yuda jens mas kyingh ma nghuot, gohnyau bang mas zis eq nghuot.
45009025	Houyah dvyhangteh, Hosea maussauh mas eq Mangso heisoeh ge taiq: Ngah dius ma nghuot bang lyis ngos ngah dius oen das; Ngos ma jyet ku dah dius nyau lyis eq, Ngos jyet dah dius nyau nghuot, oen das.
45009026	Tsai, namoq ngah dius jens ma nghuot, ge nyamoq lyis taiq zis xauh joqyos mas nyang, dwis nyeis Mangso dah lo jens ge das, ge.
45009027	Esaia eq Israel vnyau dah cho kaiq las, Israel jens gas thomh mas sihsho nyhoq nyo laus eq, nyamoq mas dvtsiq kyingh khyuot yoeus zis dvxauh das.
45009028	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka nyeisjvng thoq mas dius lyis soetuon cho lvnyap kuot tyink das.
45009029	Houyah dvyhangteh xik lyis yah Esaia taiq toh zis gas, Maukhung Jesphung Yhensain yang lyis vnyau vshih dvyhamh ma nyhet toh lyis gas, Yang Sodom teh bweh las Gomora yah doeusgoh das, ge.
45009030	Housoeh yvmvyah yang cha taiq chank bos lo lah? Dan yvlyis ma chank dah gohnyau bang gas lomsjingh gvng mas dan cho yoh.
45009031	Israel vnyau gas, lyi chank las dan cho yoh das xiklyis yomkat, nghuot laus eq hauh lyi lyis ma yoh tsain chank tyink.
45009032	Chamus ma yoh ge lyis, nyamoq gas lomsjingh zis lyis ma nges, muhzoh mas vgungs toh khyvlyis kyingh dvtsain yomkat yvmvyah ma yoh tyink. Housoeh las thungh dwes das luklom mas tsain thungh lains.
45009033	Hauh zis gas lhaihtoh dang mas, Yoeuh aq, ngos Zion mha thungh lains das luklom yahge lainszo das lukmuh lom toh. Nghuot laus eq nyang lyis lomsjingh soeu hank laus eq yom ma gyau das, ge toh.
45010001	Boekyis eh, ngah vnyau Israel jens khyuot yoeus zis xauh das nyhenshang ngos ngah ehnyet nhaiqlom dvnganh yah ngos kha iq o mes zis yah nyamoq xiklyis Mangso jyank mas shvmanh dung nyeis lah!
45010002	Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas Mangso dah cho mha nhaiqkank wvng yvlyis ngos kanghjyoeng yoh kat. Nghuot laus eq hau nhaiq wvng yvmas seq cho ma bos.
45010003	Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas Mangso jyank masyah los dah dan cho lhyi ma tsain seq las, vsainnyang dah dan cho lhyi doengs nhang das ge yomkat yvmvyah nyamoq gas Mangso dah dan cho lhyi ma lhom yoeus.
45010004	Khasoeh ge lyis lomsjingh bang dvnganh gas dan cho yoh bas jungh, Khristu gas hau Lyi lyis thank loh nhang goeus.
45010005	Lyi chank zis yah Mangso xikkhonh mas dan soeu yoh bweh cho yah sen lha Moshe ka, Lyi chank soeu ka dwis nyeis das ge, lhaih toh.
45010006	Nghuot laus eq lomsjingh zis yah Mangso xikkhonh mas yoh dan los cho yah sen lha lhaihtoh dang mas, nah ehnyet mas, Khristu lyis gyoh los nhang das xiklyis maukhung mha hank yoh doq das lah, oen vsang.
45010007	Khristu lyis shei masyah dwis toq nhang das xiklyis, Noq thank joqyos mas hank yoh gyoh loh das lah, oen eq vsang.
45010008	Housoeh ge zis gas, Mangso dang gas nvng yah ni joq, nah nhuotkuk mas, nah nhaiqlom khau mha bos. Hauh zis gas ngamoq taiq kyoh dah lomsjingh cho yah sen dah dang nghuot.
45010009	Housoeh Yesu gas Yhensain nghuot, ge nah nhuot yah rhen lha, Mangso ka nyang lyis dwis toq nhang yvlyis nah ehnyet mas lomsjingh nghuot lyis gas nvng khyuot yoeus zis xauh das.
45010010	Khasoeh ge lyis dius gas dan zis xauh yoeus shoq, ehnyet nhaiqlom yah lomsjingh las, khyuot yoeus zis xauh shoq nhuot yah rhen toh.
45010011	Khasoeh ge lyis lhaihtoh dang eq, Nyang lyis lomsjingh soeu hank laus eq yom ma gyau das, ge.
45010012	Khasoeh ge lyis Yuda dius, gohnyau bang lyis khwih khyamh zis ma bos yvmvyah houmha yuk khanghmuh bos. Mangso ka dvnganh dah Yhensain nghuot las, nyang lyis lui bang dvnganh lyis shvmanh jyehjuh magons magoh dyei.
45010013	Lhaihtoh dang mas taiq zis yah dvyhangteh, Yhensain dah nyings lyis lui soeu khanghmuh khyuot yoeus zis xauh das.
45010014	Nghuot laus eq Yhensain lhyi ma lomsjingh shih bang gas nyang lyis khasoeh yoh lui das lah? Nyamoq dang lyis ma xauhgyo ku lhyi khasoeh yoh lomsjingh das lah? Dang cho taiq kyoh soeu ma bos lyis nyamoq khasoeh yoh xauhgyo das lah?
45010015	Gausyis dang taiq kyoh das bang lyis ma nhang kat lyis gas khasoeh yoh taiq kyoh das lah? Lhaihtoh dang mas taiq zis yah dvyhangteh, hau gausyis dang wons los dah loeuskyoh bang dah khyei ka kha iq yungh!
45010016	Nghuot laus eq hau gausyis dang lyis dvnganhmoq lhom yoeus zis ma nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis Esaia nyang taiq zis gas, Yhensain eh, ngamoq loeus lyis hank lomsjingh lah, ge.
45010017	Housoeh las hau lomsjingh ehnyet gas loeus xauhgyo masyah bweh los, hauh loeus gas Khristu dah cho taiq kyoh masyah los.
45010018	Nghuot laus eq ngos nyei zis gas, Nyamoq hauh loeus ma xauhgyo ku zis jyoeng lhyeh? Nyamoq xauhgyo goeus. Khasoeh ge lyis lhaihtoh dang mas taiq zis yah dvyhangteh, Nyamoq dah thwe ka nyeisjvng gonh mas, Nyamoq dang gas mungkvn goms shoq duons loh goeus, ge.
45010019	Tsai, ngos nyei zis gas, Israel dius jens ma seqgyo lhyeh? Moshe nyang shih toeuh zis gas, Ngos gas cha ma nghuot dah dius nyau lyis yhung zis yah ngah dius nyau lyis noh nhang das. Koh dah dius nyau lyis yhung lha namoq lyis nhaiqyo nhang das, ge.
45010020	Hauh thoq lyis Esaia womh womh taiq zis gas, Ngos lyis ma xo bang ngos lyis nyvng goeus. Ngah cho ma nyei bang jyank mas ngos thuq xoeuq, ge.
45010021	Nyang Israel yah sen cho taiq zis gas, Domsyos ma gyo, gomloeus toq dah dius jens lyis lhom yoeus das xiklyis ngos ngah loq dvnyeih gonh yhuonh toh, ge.
45011001	Housoeh las ngos nyei zis gas, Mangso ka nyah vnyau lyis peq tyamp goeus lah? Housoeh ma nghuot, Ngvnyang eq Israel vnyau, Abraham dah vshih yahge Benyamin vkoq nghuot.
45011002	Mangso ka xik lyis yah nyang khyen toh dah nyah dius nyau lyis ma peq tyamp. Lhaihtoh dang mas Eliya gas Israel jens lyis yobos huon zis yah Mangso lhyi khasoeh dung yvlyis namoq seq.
45011003	Yhensain eh, nyamoq nah lvpe jens lyis sat goeus. Nah phon lhyi eq tsain thyoq tyamp; ngos kyingh dvnyet joq lo las, nyamoq ngah kang lhyi eq tsain xo, ge.
45011004	Mangso ka nyang lyis khasoeh ge toeuh lah? Bala mangso xikkhonh mas phvluk zomh gyuis ma paiq dah yukgis nyhet khyoengh gas, ngos ngah xiklyis nyhet toh, ge.
45011005	Houyah dvyhangteh haq caiq mas eq Mangso jyehjuh gvng mas nyang khyen yoeus zis xauh bang dvyhamh nyet shih.
45011006	Nyang khyen yoeus cho ka muhzoh gvng mas ma nghuot, nyah jyehjuh gvng mas nghuot. Muhzoh yah nghuot lyis gas, nyah jyehjuh cho ka jyehjuh gyingh ma nghuot lo.
45011007	Housoeh lyis khasoeh taiq das lah? Israel jens gas nyamoq xo zis ma nyvng. Mangso khyen yoeus zis xauh bang nainlo dvtsain nyvng; nyet bang gas Mangso lui zis lyis ma xauhgyo.
45011008	Lhaihtoh dang mas taiq zis yah dvyhangteh, Mangso ka nyamoq dah uhnuk yahge ehnyet nhaiqlom lyis yoeu nhang lha khvnyhik jweh shoq nyamoq ma nyvng, xauh eq ma xauhgyo.
45011009	Dawi eq, Nyamoq dah zo pwe ka nyamoq xiklyis lhyik yahge twih mas nyih zis yah lains bas jungh, nyamoq joeng zis xauh bas jungh.
45011010	Nyamoq ma yoh nyvng das xiklyis nyoqjet nhang zis xauh bas jungh; Nyamoq dah nungs gas lyei dah yvwons o mha vjangh goeuh joq bas jungh, ge.
45011011	Housoeh las ngos nyei zis gas, Israel jens gas nyamoq dyoqbis shoq thungh lains goeus lah? Ma nghuot, Nyamoq yaunos kuot yvmvyah khyuot yoeus cho ka gohnyau bang jyank mas jweh loh. Houka Yuda dius jens noh cho bweh das nyhenshang nghuot.
45011012	Yuda jens dah yaunos kuot zis gas mungkvn dius jens xiklyis shvmanh jyehjuh nyoshoq bweh los nhang. Yuda jens dah dyos mas shohjyen cho ka gohnyau bang xiklyis shvmanh jyehjuh nyoshoq bweh los nhang. Housoeh lyis gas Yuda jens dvnganh hau khyuot yoeus yvmas bos nhang zis xauh lyis gas, kha iq kuh dah jyehjuh jyungshuk bweh los das lah!
45011013	Housoeh las ngos namoq gohnyau bang lyis taiq zis gas, Ngos gohnyau bang dah lvgyo nghuot joq dvchank, ngos ngah muhzoh mas nyoqnho ngelang yoeus las khwank nyeis.
45011014	Ngos ngah vnyau lyis noh dah ehnyet bos nhang zis yah nyamoq dvyhamh lyis yoh khyuot yoeus das.
45011015	Khasoeh ge lyis, nyamoq lyis peq tyamp zis gas cangsoeu dius jens yah Mangso jo mas buisnoms bweh los shoq mehoq tamp cho bweh los lyis gas, Yuda jens lyis Mangso doms lhom yoeus cho ka shei bang lyis kang dwis nhang zis nghuot.
45011016	Khasoeh ge lyis cangxeih yhomh dah guknyau shih nyau khyvlyis phudyei dah ohlhyoq dvkhyiq gas gyingshang nghuot lyis gas hau ohlhyoq dvkoeuq gonh gyingshang. Vnyet gyingshang lhyi ka vko jens eq gyingshang.
45011017	Tsungh toh dah tsanlun zains dah vko dvkhamh pheq tyamp las hauh vngot mas tsanlun lamh dah vko lhyi gyangh tsoq tsungh toh. Gohnyau bang nghuot dah nvng gas hauh tsanlun lamh dah vko yah doeusgoh las, nvng gas Yuda jens dah yombos dyos kang bos xauh gvm yoeus.
45011018	Housoeh lyis nvng hauh vko pheq tyamp zis xauh teh dah bang lyis dius ngis ma gis yoeuh khyoq, ma gis khwank, nvng gas vko dvnghuot. Nvng vnyet lyis wons toh zis ma nghuot, hauh vnyet yah nvng lyis dvwons toh.
45011019	Nghuot laus eq, Ngos lyis coq das zis hauh vko ka pheq tyamp zis xauh goeus, ge nvng taiq mvbeh.
45011020	Nghuot goeus, nyamoq gas ma lomsjingh yvmvyah pheq tyamp zis xauh: nvng gas lomsjingh zis yah goeng joq. Nghuot laus eq nvng vkhwank, gyukwoms nyeis aq.
45011021	Khasoeh ge lyis, Mangso ka vko gyingh ge dah Yuda lyis yangh ma yu lyis gas nvng lyis eq yu das teh mus lah?
45011022	Haih yvmas Mangso ka kha iq nhaiq seq nyen zis yahge kha iq than shoq yau dyei yvlyis yang nyvng goeus. Nyang gas yaunos kuot bang lyis than than joeng laus eq namoq gas nyah nhaiqnyen shohgyo cho lhyi kham yoeus cho mha tsoq las mon yih shoq suh e nyeis lyis gas, Yhensain ka namoq lyis nhaiqnyen nyeis das. Nghuot laus eq namoq eq nyah nhaiqnyen zis kham yoeus mon bang ma duot lyis gas pheq tyamp zis xauh das.
45011023	Yuda jens nyamoq dah ma lomsjingh cho tyamp lyis gas, nyah joqyos mas doms coq zis tsain xauh das: Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka nyang lyis yoh doms coq.
45011024	Namoq gohnyau bang gas hau tsanlun lamh vko lhyi zan yoeus las soengh choenk nghuot dah tsanlun gyingh mas coq tsungh teh nghuot. Yuda jens gas tsungh toh dah vko gyingh teh nghuot las, hau tsanlun vko jens lyis vkhang dah vzains gyingh mas coq tsungh das zis gas Mangso xiklyis zes lwis ma nghuot lhyeh?
45011025	Boekyis eh, namoq gas namoq nyang svsoh seq ge ma nghamh das xiklyis nghop toh, Mangso dah jyoeng cho dvkoeuq ngos namoq lyis seqgyo nhang mes. Houka Israel jens gas vjangh ehnyet than joq das zis ma nghuot, laus eq houka khyuot yoeus xauh las Mangso jyank mas jweh loh das, Gohnyau bang dah sonzoh dyingh los shoq dvnghuot das.
45011026	Heika Israel dius dvnganh khyuot yoeus zis khasoeh xauh das cho nghuot. Lhaihtoh dang mas: Zion masyah khyuot yoeus soeu thuq los las, Yakop vnyau masyah lhung cho dvnganh yoeus tyamp das.
45011027	Ngos nyamoq dah yaunos yoeus tyamp dyei uhlyis, Ngos nyamoq yah haih thanghchvp toh das, ge.
45011028	Namoq gohnyau bang gvng mas Yuda jens gas Gausyis Loeus lyis peq tyamp yvmvyah nyamoq gas Mangso dah jeswus bweh los. Nghuot laus eq Mangso ka nyamoq lyis khyen yoeus dah vnyau kuot goeus yvmvyah nyamoq dah phauh thyeih moq lyis toh dah dangthoengh gvng mas nyamoq gas nyang jyetdap zis xauh bang nghuot.
45011029	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka hank lyis laus eq khi yoeus las shvmanh dyei das xiklyis nghamh thyet thang lhyi ma phanh lo soeu nghuot.
45011030	Namoq gohnyau bang xiklyis gas, namoq xikpheh Mangso dah domsyos ma gyo, nghuot laus eq gvshih gas Yuda jens domsyos ma gyo yvmvyah namoq gas Mangso dah nhaiqnyen cho xauh yoeus.
45011031	Namoq Mangso dah nhaiqnyen zis xauh kham yoeus teh nyamoq eq xauh kham yoeus bas jungh ge nyamoq gvshih domsyos ma gyo mus nyeis.
45011032	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka dius dvnganh lyis nhaiqnyen zis yoh chixoeuq shoq dvnganh lyis domsyos ma gyo yvmas lhunk toh zis xauh nhang.
45011033	Mangso dah jyehjuh kha iq kuh joq! Nyah joeui yahge seq cho ka kha iq noq! Nyang nghamh thyet cho lhyi hank yoh phant kyoh! Nyah cho lhyi hank yoh seqgyo!
45011034	Lhaihtoh dang mas taiq zis yah dvyhangteh, Yhensain dah ehnyet lyis hank seq lah? Nyang lyis joeui hank yoh dyei lah!
45011035	Mangso jyehjuh tauh dyei bas jungh ge nyang lyis hank cha jyungshuk dyei toh ku lah?
45011036	Vyhang dvnganh yvlyis nyang gvnkhanh toh. Joq ya joq zis dvnganh gas nyang masyah, nyah xiklyis goeng joq. Mangso ka vcaiq vto phunk bos bas jungh. Amen.
45012001	Housoeh yvmvyah boekyis eh, Mangso ka yang lyis nhaiqnyen nyeis yvmvyah, namoq gungs lyis gyingshang lha lhom yoeus mon dah dwis nyeis, lomhxangh khyvlyis Mangso lhyi ngheq phudyei geh oen ngos namoq lyis taiq kyingh yomdyei kat. Houka namoq phudyei vvng, jyoeng dah paiq cho nghuot.
45012002	Namoq gas haih mungkvn dah vwot lyis ma wuot: Mangso lhyi namoq vkhau mha dah ehnyet nhaiqlom dvnganh lyis vsaiq thaiq nhang geh. Hauh uhlyis namoq gas Mangso o dah cho, gis cho, lhom yoeus mon cho yahge dyinghjet cho cha tsain nghuot yvlyis seq gvn das.
45012003	Housoeh Mangso ngos lyis dyei toh dah jyehjuh jyungshuk yah ngos namoq yuk khanghmuh lyis taiq bah. Namoq nyang gungs lyis nghamh vvng thoq lyis lai las vnghamh goh. Hauh gungsthaiq Mangso dius yuk khanghmuh lyis lvdoeus toeuq las dyei toh dah lomsjingh cho yah dvyhangteh vsainnyang gungs lyis nghamh yoeuh las thyet geh.
45012004	Khasoeh ge lyis dvgungs mas gungsbon nyoshoq bos, hauh gungsbon jens eq nyang muh nyang bos.
45012005	Houyah dvyhangteh yang nyoshoq tsain nghuot laus eq, Khristu mas dvgungs kyingh nghuot las, nyang changh nyang sain goh joq.
45012006	Housoeh yang gas yang lyis dyei toh dah jyehjuh jyungshuk nyang ja nyang nghuot zis yah dvyhangteh hauh yvlyis yhung chah. Yang yoh dah jyehjuh jyungshuk gas Mangso dah dang taiq kyoh das muh nghuot lyis gas yang yoh dah lomsjingh cho yah dvyhangteh kuot chah.
45012007	Phuqsoe muh nghuot lyis gas phuqsoe muh wons wuq bas jungh; jyauh muh nghuot lyis gas jyauh bas jungh.
45012008	Taiq kyingh yomdyei muh nghuot lyis taiq kyingh yomdyei muh khanh nyeis bas jungh. Vlu dyei soeu eq magons magoh dyei bas jungh; guon soeu eq yomkat las guon bas jungh; nhaiq seq nyen soeu ka gausyis ehnyet yah kuot bas jungh.
45012009	Jyetdap cho mha vguons kuot zis ma bos bas jungh; ma gis yvlyis hoeng geh, gis yvlyis zwi zains toh geh.
45012010	Jyetdap yvmas Khristan vmang vnoeuh teh jyet goh geh. Dvyuk yah dvyuk phauh nyang cho tungh chixoeuq goh nyeis geh.
45012011	Muh mas ma lan lo yomkat nyeis geh; Yhensain lhyi nhaiq wvng zis yah phuqsoe nyeis geh.
45012012	Nvng nghamhloms zis gas nvng lyis gauslaus nhang bas jungh; shanghsenh yvmas jhen geh; Vjangh shvmanh dung nyeis geh.
45012013	Nyungs dah Khristan dyenschangh jens lyis nvng yoh vyhang gvm dyei aq. Boengh daih nyeis geh.
45012014	Namoq lyis shoeuhshih bang lyis Mangso jyank mas shvmanh dung dyei geh; vnhoengh goh, shvmanh dyei geh.
45012015	Gauslaus bang yah dvgeh gauslaus las ngaus bang yah dvgeh ngaus geh.
45012016	Dvyuk yah dvyuk xamxonh zis yah pangh thuk goh nyeis geh. Vkhwank goh, nyoqnho ma yoh dah muh lyis lhom yoeus las wons wuq nyeis geh. Vsainnyang seq thoq lyis joeui bos oen vmoengs.
45012017	Dvyuk yuk nvng lyis ma gis khyvlyis kuot lyis, nvng nyang lyis ma gis khyvlyis vtauh dyei. Yuk khanghmuh gis ge nghamh yvlyis tungh kuot aq.
45012018	Namoq gas dvnganh yvmas nah shot pheh yah gis bweh lyis dius yuk khanghmuh yah nyenstap khyvlyis nyeis geh.
45012019	Jyetdap bang eh, khanhamp eq lvto vphuk; Mangso dah nhaiqlom dyis yvlyis xwiq toh geh: Khasoeh ge lyis lhaihtoh dang mas taiq zis gas, Lvto phuk das zis gas ngah muh nghuot, ngos tauh dyei das, ge Yhensain taiq.
45012020	Lvto phuk das gungsthaiq lhaihtoh dang mas taiq zis yah dvyhangteh, nah jeswus yuot lyis tsoh aq: shet lyis jeis gvmshuk aq; heisoeh kuot gvng mas nvng nyang lyis xoqphuh nyoqnho ngeh nhang das.
45012021	Ma gis zis yah nvng lyis ma ung bas jungh, gis zis yah ma gis yvlyis dv ung bas jungh.
45013001	Yuk khanghmuh gas guon dah toeuh yoh bang dah o mha gyoh nyeis bas jungh. Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso jyank masyah ma nghuot lyis gas, chah toeuh eq ma bos: bos dah toeuh dvnganh zis gas Mangso yah dyei toh.
45013002	Hank laus eq hau toeuh yoh soeu lhyi ngoek zis gas Mangso toeuq toh soeu lhyi ngoek yvmvyah nyang gungs nyang soetuon zis xauh das.
45013003	Khasoeh ge lyis guon bang gas gis dah muh kuot bang xiklyis gyuk phoh duot zis ma nghuot. Ma gis dah muh kuot bang xiklyis gyuk phoh dvtsain nghuot. Nvng vmingh yoh bang lhyi ma gyuk gyuk nyeis mes lah? Gis dah muh kuot aq: housoeh lyis nvng chungh zis xauh das.
45013004	Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas nah vkyuh xiklyis Mangso dah muh wons soeu nghuot. Nvng ma gis mus kuot nghuot lyis gas gyuk aq: khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas yoh joeng dah yomsoq jyoeng yoh. Nyang gas Mangso dah jyeidwis nghuot las ma gis zis kuot soeu lhyi Mangso gungsthaiq soetuon lha yobos dyei soeu nghuot.
45013005	Housoeh las nvng gas Mangso yobos dyei das yvlyis gyuk las kyingh ma nghuot, sohseq ehnyet yah vmingh yoh bang dah domsyos gyo nyeis chah.
45013006	Hauh gvng mas eq namoq khoengh tsain kat nyeis: khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas vsainnyang kuot chah muh lyis wons wuq uhlyis Mangso xiklyis muh wons bang tsain duot nyeis.
45013007	Housoeh las nyamoq lyis dyei chah zis dvnganh dyei geh; khoengh khywi soeu mha khoengh kat las, vkhoq kui soeu mha vkhoq kat geh. Gyuk chah soeu lhyi gyuk las phauh chah soeu lhyi phauh geh.
45013008	Dvyuk yah dvyuk jyetdap goh thoq lyis lai las hank yah eq chah jyen vdap goh: khasoeh ge lyis gohyuk lyis jyetdap soeu ka lyi lyis domsyos gyo goeus.
45013009	Khasoeh ge lyis nyi shuot lvng vshuot, dius vsat, vkhauh, gohyuk yah sen vyhang lhyi nyoq vnoq ge dah Lyi yahge gohtoeu bos shih dah Lyi dvnganh zis gas, Nah yhenkyoh lyis nvnyang gungs lyis teh yoh jyetdap das ge dah dang mas xom toh.
45013010	Jyetdap zis gas yhenkyoh lyis ma gis zis kuot ku zis ma nghuot: housoeh jyetdap zis gas Lyi dvnganh chank kuot goeus.
45013011	Gvshih gas yhet soh los shishenh nghuot chah goeus yvlyis namoq seq yvmvyah namoq haih jyetdap lyi lyis chank kuot chah. Khasoeh ge lyis yang khyuot yoeus xauh das cho ka yang lomsjingh zoh loh yoq thoq lyis gvshih zes ni goeus.
45013012	nyensyo lai loh nyeis las nyeihyo jweh los nyeis: housoeh mauchuot cho yah sen dah muh lyis toh tyamp las, bvng zis yah sen dah jesgungs lyis tsain wuot toh goh.
45013013	Nyeih lyis yhangteh topkoq suh e goh: vpyo lais, vshuk yet, nghe nyhiq vnan, vdyoqgoh, vnoh goh.
45013014	Yhensain Yesu Khristu lyis jesgungs teh wuot toh geh, gungsshoh nyetnau khyvlyis tyink das zis toeuh dvtsiq eq vdyei.
45014001	Lomsjingh cho mha yomnhuk soeu lhyi lhom yoeus geh: nghuot laus eq nyang nghamh khamkhvv cho lhyi taiq phyen-goh das xiklyis lhom yoeus zis ma nghuot bas jungh.
45014002	Khasoeh ge lyis dvyuk dah lomsjingh cho ka dvnganh yah gis zo ge loms: gohtoeu lomsjingh cho mha yomnhuk soeu dvyuk gas anghnyaus zo nyeis.
45014003	Vja ja zo soeu ka ma zo soeu lhyi dius ngis ma yoeuh khyoq bas jungh; ma zo soeu eq zo soeu lhyi soe vtuon: khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka nyang lyis lhom yoeus.
45014004	Nvng gas hank nghuot las gohyuk dah jyeidwis lyis soetuon lah? Hauh soeu dah muh ung cho, ma ung cho lhyi ka nyah yhensain nyang thyet das. Nyang jyoengh yoh ung das: khasoeh ge lyis hauh Yhensain ka nyang lyis ung shoq yoh kuot dyei.
45014005	Dius dvyuk gas buisnyeis dvnyeih gas gohnyeih thoq lyis zes yhaugyen ge nghamh: gohtoeu dvyuk gas nyeih khanghmuh dvyhangteh nghuot ge nghamh. Hank eq hank nyang ehnyet mas goeng goeng yap bas jungh.
45014006	Buisnyeis kyi soeu ka Yhensain dah phunk lyis chungh das xiklyis kyi nyeis. Ja khanghmuh zo soeu ka Yhensain dah phunk lyis chungh das xiklyis zo. Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas hau Yhensain dah jyehjuh lyis chungh las zo nyeis. Zonoms dvkhamh lyis kyi soeu eq Mangso dah phunk lyis chungh das xiklyis kyi nyeis. Housoeh nyang eq Yhensain dah jyehjuh lyis chungh nyeis.
45014007	Khasoeh ge lyis, yang hank eq vsainnyang gungs xiklyis kyingh dwis nyeis zis ma nghuot; hank laus eq vsainnyang xiklyis kyingh shei zis ma nghuot.
45014008	Dwis nyeis lyis gas Yhensain nyhenshang yang dwis nyeis; shei lhyi eq Yhensain dah nyhenshang tsain shei loh. Housoeh yvmvyah dwis laus eq, shei laus eq yang gas Yhensain yah sen joq.
45014009	Khasoeh ge lyis shei bang yahge dwis nyeis bang dah Yhensain bweh shoq, Khristu gas shei kham lha dwis toq loh goeus.
45014010	Housoeh las nvng anghphoq kyingh zo soeu nah boek lyis chamus soetuon nyeis lah? Nvng vja ja zo soeu eq nah boek lyis chamus dius ngis yoeuh khyoq lah? Yang dvnganhmoq gas Mangso dah soetuon zis xauh das xiklyis nyah soetuon tank xikkhonh mas xauh jweh yap das.
45014011	Khasoeh ge lyis lhaihtoh dang mas, Yhensain taiq zis gas, Ngos dwis nyeis zis yah dvyhangteh, yuk khanghmuh ngah xikkhonh mas los dupaiq las, lhyo khanghmuh gas, Ngos gas Mangso nghuot ge rhen das, ge.
45014012	Yang yuk khanghmuh gas Mangso jyank mas vsainnyang dah cho lhyi suon xoeuq chah das.
45014013	Housoeh yvmvyah yang dvyuk yah dvyuk chah soe ma tuon goh. Hank laus eq vsainnyang boek xik mas thungh lains gus, lainszo gus ma toh das cho dvnghamh thyet goh.
45014014	Yhensain Yesu yah dvgeh kang dwis yvmvyah ngos jyoengh yoh seq zis gas, zonoms cha nghuot laus eq hauh zis nyang pheh yah loms noq cho khyvpheh yah ma sen oen. Nghuot laus eq dius dvyuk yuk gas zonoms dvja ja lyis ma lhoq ge nghamh lyis gas, hauh zis gas nyah xiklyis ma lhoq.
45014015	Nvng zo dah zonoms shukphoh gvng mas nah boek lyis ehnyet ma tap joqyos bweh nhang lhyi ka, nvng jyetdap cho mha suh e nyeis zis ma nghuot. Khristu gas nyah xiklyis shei kham dyei goeus yvmvyah, nah zonoms yah nyang lyis vlhoq thyoq.
45014016	Namoq gis ge lhom yoeus toh yvlyis gohyuk lyis, ma gis oen ma sang nhang goh.
45014017	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso munghdan gas lvzo lvshuk cho ma nghuot, Gyingshang Dyos yah dyei dah dan cho, nyenstap gauslaus cho dvnghuot.
45014018	Housoeh chank las Khristu dah muh wons wuq soeu ka, Mangso nhaiqdoeus soeu bweh las, dius dah chungh zis eq xauh das.
45014019	Housoeh yvmvyah, yang gas nyang changh nyang nyenstap cho yoh bweh nhang cho yahge nyang changh nyang kuhxing los nhang cho lhyi vjangh nghamh toeuq zis yah suh e nyeis goh.
45014020	Zonoms gvng mas Mangso dah muhzoh lyis vlhoeu thyoq tyamp. Zonoms dvnganh gas zo gis. Nghuot laus eq zo las dius lyis lainszo nhang zis gas shuot cho nghuot.
45014021	Nah boek lyis lainszo nhang cho nghuot lyis gas, shoh zo, zvbiq shuk, chah zonoms laus eq jhank das zis gas gis cho nghuot.
45014022	Hai cho yah sen lha nvng khasoeh chank kuot ge zis gas nvng yahge Mangso yah sen. Vsainnyang jus ge lomsjingh las thyet zis yah dvyhangteh kuot las ehnyet mas shang shang yobos ma bos ge nghamh soeu ka ngelhoq.
45014023	Khamkhvv zis yah zo soeu ka Mangso dang thang thyet zis xauh goeus. Houka lomsjingh zis yah ma zo yvmvyah nghuot: khasoeh ge lyis lomsjingh zis yah ma kuot zis cha eq yaunos nghuot.
45015001	Yang lomsjingh cho mha yombos bang gas vsainnyang pyo cho ma gis chank, lomsjingh cho yomnhuk bang wons chah dah yvwons lyis bos gis pangh.
45015002	Yang dvnganh gas yah vmang vnoeuh jens dah nyeisgis yaplhoq das cho nghamh las lomsjingh cho mha jebais los das xiklyis nyamoq lyis lhoq pyo dyei goh.
45015003	Housoeh lhaihtoh dang mas, Nvng lyis jwangh nyhap dang gas ngos lyis zangh los, ge zis yah dvyhangteh, Khristu eq nyah gungs lyis nyang gaus nhang zis ma nghuot.
45015004	Lhaihtoh dang dvnganh gas yang lyis jyauh das xiklyis nghuot. Housoeh yang gas lhaihtoh dang masyah yoh dah jhen cho yahge yombos nhang cho gvng mas nghamhloms cho bos das xiklyis nghuot.
45015005	Yang dvnganh gas Khristu Yesu dah yikhyoh lyis chank las namoq nyang changh ehnyet dvdain dvlom yoh nghuot bas jungh, jhen cho yahge yomdyei cho dyei nyeis dah Mangso ka namoq lyis shwih bas jungh.
45015006	Housoeh lyis namoq dvnganhmoq dvgeh dvthwe kyingh yah, yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah Uwus nghuot dah Mangso lhyi yoh chungh das.
45015007	Housoeh las Mangso dah nyoqnho ngelang xiklyis Khristu gas namoq lyis lhom yoeus goeus zis yah dvyhangteh, namoq nyang changh nyang lhom yoeus goh geh.
45015008	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos taiq zis gas, Mangso ka dang jings soeu nghuot cho Chixoeuq das xiklyis phauh thyeih moq lyis dyei toh dah dangthoengh tyink das zis Khristu gas vthyoh tyomh bang Yuda jens dah gis cho nyhenshang jweh los, oen.
45015009	Gohnyau bang yangh Mangso dah nhaiqnyen cho lhyi yoh chungh bas jungh ge eq jweh los. Lhaihtoh dang mas taiq zis yah dvyhangteh nghuot. Houka, Gohnyau bang mas ngos nvng lyis chungh das, Ngos nvng lyis chunghthwe kat das, ge.
45015010	Tsai, lhaihtoh dang mas, Gohnyau bang eh, Mangso dah dius jens yah dvgeh gauslaus geh.
45015011	Tsai, Gohnyau bang dvnganh eh, Yhensain lhyi chungh geh; Dius jens dvnganh eh, nyang lyis chungh geh.
45015012	Tsai Esaia gas, Yese dah vnyet dvkoq thuq los das, Nyang gas Gohnyau bang lyis guon das; Nyamoq gas nyang lyis nghamhloms das, ge.
45015013	Gvshih Gyingshang Dyos dah yomsoq yah namoq dah nghamhloms cho tsoq je los bas jungh, Nghamhloms vpom nghuot dah Mangso ka, namoq dah lomsjingh cho mha gauslaus zis yahge nyenstap zis tyink dyei bas jungh.
45015014	Ngah boekyis eh, namoq gas gis cho yah dyingh las seq cho dvnganh dyingh zis yah, namoq nyang changh yoh jyauh goh nyeis yvlyis ngos wontang loms toh.
45015015	Nghuot laus eq haih maussauh mas ngos namoq lyis taiq kyingh kat dah cho dvkhamh womh womh lhaih kat. Ngos housoeh womh womh lhaih zis gas,
45015016	Mangso ngos lyis Khristu Yesu dah jyeidwis duot zis yah gohnyau bang xiklyis muh wons soeu duot das toeuh dyei yvmvyah nghuot. Gohnyau bang gas Mangso lhom yoeus mon dah phudyei duot las Gyingshang Dyos yah Mangso lhyi kyauh zis xauh bang bweh bas jungh, ngos gas phudyei soeu khyvlyis Mangso dah Gausyis dang lyis taiq kyoh.
45015017	Housoeh las Khristu Yesu mas dvdain dvlom bweh zis yah ngos wons wuq dah Mangso muh mas yoh khwank gaus nyeis.
45015018	Ngos womh womh taiq das zis gas Gohnyau bang Mangso dah domsyos gyo bas jungh Khristu gas ngos lyis yhung lha shwih uhshe nhang cho dvnghuot. Nyang haih yvlyis dang yah eq, muhzoh yah eq kuot.
45015019	Yomsoq muh yahge mauh loqmuh, Mangso dah Dyos yomsoq yah eq kuot. Housoeh ngos gas Yerusalem masyah Ilirikum wuxom ngap shoq chwang lha Khristu dah cho gausyis dang lyis taiq kyoh.
45015020	Nghuot laus eq dvyuk yuk tsuk toh dah vpom thoq mas ma tsank bas jungh, ngos vjangh nghamh tsuk zains toh zis gas, Khristu nyings ma xauhgyo ku shih joqyos mas, ngos hau gausyis dang taiq hoeuh das cho nghuot.
45015021	Lhaihtoh dang mas lhaih toh zis yah dvyhangteh nghuot: Houka: Nyah cho khanhamp eq ma xauhgyo ku bang nyvng das, Hauh zis ma xauhgyo ku bang seqgyo los das, ge.
45015022	Housoeh las ngos namoq jyank mas jweh das cho tomp toh zis nyoshoq lhain xauh.
45015023	Gvshih gas haih wuxom jens mas ngos kuot chah dah muh dye wons wuq goeus. Ngos namoq jyank mas los xauhgoh das xiklyis nyoshoq zvn lyis yah nghamh toh goeus.
45015024	Gvshih namoq jyank mas yoh los das oen nghamhloms. Ngos Spain mau pheh loh uhlyis namoq yah los xauhgoh mes. Namoq yah dvyoq zomh nyeis thang lhyi, hauh mau mas namoq ngos lyis pangh kat bas jungh oen nghamhloms nyeis.
45015025	Gvshih gas, Mangso dah dius jens lyis pangh thuk muh wons wuq das xiklyis Yerusalem pheh loh nyeis.
45015026	Khasoeh ge lyis Makedoni yahge Akhaia mau mas dah phung jens gas, Yerusalem mas nyeis, shohjyen dah Mangso dius jens lyis pangh das xiklyis gausyis zis yah vlu tsainh das zis nghamh thyet toh.
45015027	nyamoq thyet cho ka dius yah kywih las ma nghuot, nghuot laus eq jyoengh ge lyis hauh bang lyis pangh thuk das nyhenshang nyamoq mas yvwons s bos. Khasoeh ge lyis, Yuda jens dah dyos vso vlho gohnyau bang lyis gvm lyis gas, gohnyau bang gas nyeisjvng zisyos yah nyamoq lyis pangh das zis gis.
45015028	Housoeh yvmvyah haih muh dye kuot las, hauh bang xiklyis yung dah ngwis dye kyauh goeus ya, ngos Spain pheh loh uhjyangh namoq jyank mas wvng xauhgoh khoq das.
45015029	Namoq jyank mas jweh lyis Khristu dah shvmanh jyehjuh dyingh zis yah jweh das yvlyis ngos seq.
45015030	Housoeh yvmvyah boekyis eh, Yhensain Yesu Khristu gvng mas eq, Dyos yah dyei dah jyetdap gvng mas eq namoq ngah xiklyis ngos yah dvgeh malyen lo lomsjingh ehnyet zainsmuh yah shvmanh dung yvmas yomkat das xiklyis yomdyei kat.
45015031	Houka Yuda mau mas dah ma lomsjingh bang masyah jeslhuiq das zis yahge Yerusalem mas ngos phuqsoe dah muhzoh lyis houmha nyeis dah Mangso dius jens yoh lhom yoeus dyei das xiklyis shvmanh bos dung geh.
45015032	Housoeh Mangso dah ehnyet nghuot lyis gas ngos namoq lyis gausyis zis yah yoh xauhgoh las, namoq yah dvgeh pyo pyo yom doms yoh huiq das.
45015033	Nyenstap vpom Mangso ka, namoq dvnganhmoq yah dvgeh nghuot bas jungh. Amen.
45016001	Kenkhrea phung mha muh wons soeu, ngamoq dah nhamhmuh Phoebe lyis ngos namoq jyank mas taiq toenk dyei kat.
45016002	Mangso dius jens dah lhom yoeus goh khyvlyis Yhensain nyings mas nyang lyis lhom yoeus las chah cho mha laus eq, nyang chah yvmas yoeuh dyei geh. Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas dius nyoshoq lyis eq, ngos lyis eq bos thuk ku dah dyenschangh gis nghuot.
45016003	Khristu Yesu dah muh mas ngah muh wons changh jens Priska yahge Akula lyis bos jeshuh dyei geh.
45016004	Nyah zomh gas ngah kang xiklyis vsainnyang dah lainzain kham das zis nghamh thyet ku yvmvyah, ngos nyah zomh lyis jyehjuh soh. Ngos kyingh ma nghuot, gohnyau bang dah phung dvnganh eq nyah zomh lyis jyehjuh soh.
45016005	Nyah zomh yhen mha dah phung lhyi eq bos jeshuh dyei geh. Akhaia mau mas Khristu xiklyis cangxeih shih dah shihxeih nghuot, ngos jyetdap dah Epaenetu lyis bos jeshuh dyei geh.
45016006	Namoq xiklyis svsoh yomkat ku dah Mari lyis bos jeshuh dyei geh.
45016007	Ngah vnyau Yuda tsain nghuot las, ngos yah dvgeh thung lungh ku dah Androniku yahge Yunia lyis bos jeshuh dyei geh: hauh vzomh gas lvgyo jens mas nyings hoeuh las, ngah xikpheh Khristan bweh goeus.
45016008	Yhensain yah zomh cho mha ngos jyetdap dah Ampliatu lyis bos jeshuh dyei geh.
45016009	Ngamoq yah dvgeh Khristu dah muh mas pangh soeu Urbanu yahge ngos jyetdap dah Staki lyis bos jeshuh dyei geh.
45016010	Khristu mas dang jings dah Apele yahge Aristobulu dah yhenbang lyis bos jeshuh dyei geh.
45016011	Ngah Yuda vnyau Herodion lyis bos jeshuh dyei geh. Narkisu yhenbang Khristan vmang vnoeuh moq lyis bos jeshuh dyei geh.
45016012	Yhensain muh wons wuq dah Triphena yahge Triphosa lyis bos jeshuh dyei geh. Yhensain mha gvgis yomkat dah jyetdap Persi lyis jeshuh dyei geh.
45016013	Yhensain dah muh mas lyes soeu Rufu yahge nyah ungwes, ngos lyis vjangh nyah lo lyis teh dyangh soeu lhyi bos jeshuh dyei geh.
45016014	Asinkritu, Phlegon, Herme, Patroba, Herma yahge nyamoq yah dvgeh nyeis dah Khristan boekyis lyis bos jeshuh dyei geh.
45016015	Philologu yahge Yulia, Nereu yahge nyah nhamhmuh lyis eq, Olimpa yahge nyang yah dvgeh nyeis dah Mangso dius jens dvnganhmoq lyis jeshuh dyei geh.
45016016	Namoq nyang changh nyang gyingshang dah bvlot tanh zis yah jeshuh goh nyeis geh. Khristu dah phung jens dvnganh gas, namoq lyis tsain jeshuh kat.
45016017	Boekyis eh, namoq kham yoeus dah jyauh cho lhyi tyixo lha, lvn nhang zis yahge dius jens dah lomsjingh cho lhyi lainszo nhang bang lyis zungh yoeuh las, nyamoq lyis jhank nyeis bas jungh, ngos namoq lyis taiq kyingh kat.
45016018	Khasoeh ge lyis housoeh teh bang gas, yah Yhensain Khristu lyis ma phuqsoe, vsainnyang womdau xiklyis kyingh chiq las, cha ma seq bang lyis danggis dang chau yah tsain mhuih.
45016019	Nyamoq hau Gausyis Dang mas nhaiq wvng lomsjingh nyeis cho ka, dius dvnganh mas hoeuh loh goeus. Housoeh yvmvyah ngos namoq xiklyis gaus nyeis. Namoq gas gis cho cha nghuot yvlyis seq dah joeui bos bang bweh las, ma gis cho mha ka yobos ma bos bang bweh nhang mes.
45016020	Nyenstap vpom Mangso ka, ma nyangh lyis Satan lhyi namoq dah khyei o mha nang gyik tyamp das. Yah Yhensain Yesu dah jyehjuh gas namoq yah dvgeh nghuot bas jungh.
45016021	Muh wons changh Timothi yahge ngah Yuda vnyau Luki, Yason, Sosipata moq gas namoq lyis jeshuh kat.
45016022	Haih maussauh lhaih soeu ngos Tertiu eq Yhensain mha namoq lyis jeshuh kat.
45016023	Ngos lyis eq, phung gonh lyis eq, boengh daih dah yhensain Gai-u ka namoq lyis jeshuh kat. Hauh wus mas dah ngwis kwi zom soeu Erastu yahge vmang vnoeuh Kuartu vzomh gas namoq lyis jeshuh kat.
45016024	Yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah jyehjuh gas namoq yah dvgeh nghuot bas jungh. Amen.
45016025	Yang Mangso phunk lyis chungh goh. Ngos namoq lyis taiq kyoh goeus Yesu Khristu cho gausyis loeus yahge gohlhain caiq masyah nghop shung toh dah jyoeng cho chixoeuq kat zis yah dvyhangteh, nyang gas namoq lyis namoq dah lomsjingh cho mha goeng goeng yoh yap nhang toh.
45016026	Nghuot laus eq gvshih hau nghop toh dah jyoeng cho ka lvpe jens lhaih toh khyvlyis chixoeuq kat. Dius nyau khanghmuh Mangso lhyi lomsjingh las nyah domsyos gyo bas jungh ge, vcaiq vto Mangso tying toh zis yah dvyhangteh hau jyoeng cho lhyi taiq kyoh nyeis goeus.
45016027	Dvyuk kyingh nghuot las nyang kyingh joeui bos dah Mangso ka, Yesu Khristu gvng mas vcaiq vto phunk bos bas jungh. Amen.
46001001	Yesu Khristu dah lvgyo kuot das xiklyis Mangso dah ehnyet yah khi toh dah ngos Paulo yahge boek Sotene gas,
46001002	Korinthu wus mas joq, Mangso dah phung mha bos bang yahge khyiq khanghmuh mas ngamoq yahge nyamoq dah Yhensain Yesu Khristu lyis chomp paiq bang Khristu Yesu gvng mas Mangso dah gyingshang bang bweh das xiklyis lui yoeus zis xauh bang dvnganh jyank mas dang tying kat.
46001003	Yah Uwus Mangso yahge Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah jyehjuh yahge nyenstap zis gas namoq lyis dyei bas jungh.
46001004	Yesu Khristu gvng mas namoq lyis jyehjuh dyei toh yvmvyah, ngos namoq nyhenshang ngah Mangso lhyi vjangh nhaiqshoqlang sang.
46001005	Namoq gas Khristu Yesu mas dvdain dvlom bweh nyeis yvmvyah taiq dang yahge seq cho dvnganh, ja khanghmuh gas nyah gvng mas dyinghjet joq goeus.
