46001006	Khristu dah Loeus gas namoq mas vnyet goeng goeng yoh chent joq goeus.
46001007	Housoeh, yah Yhensain Yesu thuq los das yvlyis langh nyeis uhlyis namoq ma xauh lhom yoeus dah jyehjuh jyungshuk dvja eq ma bos lo.
46001008	Yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah buisnyeis lyis yobos huon chank ma bos bas jungh, Nyang gas thang thank jweh shoq goeng joq nhang das.
46001009	Nyah Lo, yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu yah yoh zomh shoq namoq lyis lui yoeus dah Mangso ka wontang.
46001010	Ngah boekyis eh, namoq dvnganh gas taiq dang xamxonh goh nyeis das xiklyis ngos namoq lyis Yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu nyings yah yomdyei kat; housoeh lyis namoq mas gang lvn loh cho ma bos das. Namoq nghamh cho, toeuqkhom dvkoeuq mas xamxonh goh nyeis geh.
46001011	Khasoeh ge lyis, ngah boekyis eh, namoq mas dyoqgoh cho bos yvlyis Khloe yhenbang dvyhamh ngos lyis los taiq kyoh.
46001012	Ngos heisoeh taiq bah, namoq dvyuk yah dvyuk shaih khyvlyis, Ngos gas Paulo thang chank, ngos gas Apolo thang chank, ngos gas Petru thang chank, ngos gas Khristu thang chank, ge tsain taiq goh nyeis.
46001013	Khristu gas vphung phung khyoq zis xauh goeus nyvng lhyeh? Paulo ka namoq xiklyis taplhangh zis kham goeus lhyeh? Namoq Paulo nyings masyah jeisnyhop tsain kham goh lhyeh?
46001014	Krispu yahge Gai-u mas lai las, ngos namoq hank lyis eq jeisnyhop ma dyei yvmvyah ngos Mangso lhyi nhaiqshoqlang sang.
46001015	Housoeh yvmvyah namoq gas ngah nyings yah jeisnyhop kham goeus ge hank eq ma yoh tsain taiq.
46001016	Jyoengh oen lhyi Stephana yahge nyah yhenbang lyis eq ngos jeisnyhop dyei goeus; hauh thoq lyis gohyuk hank lyis dyei shih lah zis ngos ma soh lo.
46001017	Khasoeh ge lyis Khristu ngos lyis nhang kat zis gas jeisnyhop dyei das xiklyis ma nghuot, gausyis dang taiq kyoh das xiklyis dvnghuot. Khristu dah tapzains dah yomsoq gas vkom ma bweh bas jungh, ngos nhuot joeui yah taiq kyoh zis ma nghuot.
46001018	Khasoeh ge lyis Khristu tapzains mas shei dah loeus gas, dyoqbis loh bang xiklyis vjyuk ma bos; nghuot laus eq khyuot yoeus xauh bang, yah xiklyis gas hauh zis Mangso dah yomsoq nghuot.
46001019	Khasoeh ge lyis lhaihtoh dang mas taiq zis gas, Joeui bos bang dah joeui lhyi ngos lhoq thyoq das, Dolhain bang dah seqgyo cho lhyi ngos peq tyamp das, ge.
46001020	Housoeh las joeui bos bang khalhye nyeis lah? Maussauh lhaih soeu khalhye nyeis lah? Haih mungkvn mas dah dangdat khalhye nyeis lah? Mangso ka haih mungkvn mas dah joeui lhyi vkoh vpaq kuot tyamp dyei ma nghuot lhyeh?
46001021	Khasoeh ge lyis dius gas vsainnyang joeui yah Mangso lhyi ma yoh seq bas jungh ge, Mangso ka nyah joeui da zis yah dvyhangteh kuot toh goeus. Hauh gungsthaiq ngamoq taiq kyoh dah dang koh paq, lyis lomsjingh bang lyis khyuot yoeus das xiklyis Mangso nghamh thyet goeus.
46001022	Hauh yvlyis kyink das nyhenshang Yuda jens gas vlho tsain sang lha, Heleni jens gas joeui tsain xo.
46001023	Nghuot laus eq ngamoq gas, taplhangh toh zis xauh soeu Khristu dah cho tsain taiq kyoh. Hauh zis gas Yuda jens dah xiklyis lainszo gus nghuot, Gohnyau bang xiklyis koh paq bweh nyeis.
46001024	Nghuot laus eq Mangso khi yoeus zis xauh dah Yuda jens yahge gohnyau bang xiklyis Khristu gas Mangso dah yomsoq yahge Mangso dah joeui nghuot.
46001025	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso dah vkoh vpaq cho ka dius dah joeui bos thoq lyis joeui zes bos. Mangso dah yomnhuk zis gas dius dah yombos thoq lyis yom zes bos.
46001026	Gvshih boekyis eh, namoq lyis khi yoeus cho nghamh wu yoeuh geh. Gungsshoh khyvlyis joeui bos bang nyoshoq bos zis ma nghuot. Toeuh bos bang yahge zau nyau mas bang eq nyoshoq bos zis ma nghuot.
46001027	Mangso ka joeui bos bang lyis xoq lhoeu phuh das xiklyis mungkvn mas koh bang ge nghamh toh bang lyis khyen yoeus. Yombos bang lyis xoq lhoeu phuh das xiklyis mungkvn mas yomnhuk bang ge suon toh bang lyis khyen yoeus.
46001028	Mungkvn mas yhaugyen ge nghamh yoeus bang lyis mhont das xiklyis Mangso ka dius ngis gyoh bang, gohyuk yah choqh bang, cha ma nghuot ge nghamh yoeus zis xauh bang lyis khyen yoeus.
46001029	Hauh vjyuk gas, Mangso xikkhonh mas hank eq ma yoh khwank das xiklyis nghuot.
46001030	Mangso ka namoq lyis Khristu yah dvdain dvlom bweh nhang goeus las, Mangso ka Khristu lyis, yah dah joeui duot los nhang goeus. Yang nyah gvng mas Mangso xikkhonh mas yoh dan los goeus. Mangso dah gyingshang bang yoh bweh los goeus zis yahge yaunos masyah khyuot kat zis xauh goeus.
46001031	Housoeh las lhaihtoh dang mas taiq zis yah dvyhangteh, Khwank dais bos soeu hank laus eq Yhensain mha khwank nyeis bas jungh, ge.
46002001	Boekyis eh, Mangso dah nghop toh jyoeng cho loeus ngos namoq lyis los taiq kyoh uhlyis, dang soenk yah, joeui bos zis yah jweh los zis ma nghuot.
46002002	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos namoq yah nyeis gyo lyis Yesu Khristu cho, zes las nyang taplhangh zis xauh cho, shei cho mha lai las gohtoeu cho dvnganh tohnyhik toh das oen nghamh thyet toh.
46002003	Housoeh las ngos namoq jyank mas jweh nyeis uhlyis ngos gas yomnhuk zis yah gyuk nvn zis yah nyeis.
46002004	Ngos jyauh cho yahge loeus dang lyis dius dah joeui cho lyes dah dang ma yhung, Yoh loms, Mangso Dyos dah muhzoh yahge yomsoq lyis yhung lha dvtaiq kyoh.
46002005	Housoeh las namoq dah lomsjingh cho ka, dius dah joeui mha ma nges, Mangso dah yomsoq mas nges las goeng joq.
46002006	Nghuot laus eq ngos gas Dyos lomsjingh cho mha nhaiqbos doengs goeus bang lyis joeui yah taiq kyoh. Nghuot laus eq houka haih mungkvn yah sen dah joeui ma nghuot; mungkvn mas dah dyoqbis tyamp das zau jens dah joeui eq ma nghuot.
46002007	Nghuot laus eq ngos taiq kyoh dah joeui ka cangsoeu dius ma seq shoq nghop shung toh, Mangso dah noq thank joeui nghuot. Houka mungkvn ma joq shih lyis yah, yang nyoqnho ngelang xauh yoeus das nyhenshang Mangso toh dah nghamh toeuq cho nghuot.
46002008	Haih mungkvn lyis guon bang hank eq haih joeui lhyi ma seq; Seq ya, phunk bos dah Yhensain lhyi nyamoq ma tsain taplhangh das.
46002009	Nghuot laus eq lhaihtoh dang mas taiq zis gas, Hank ma nyvng, ma xauhgyo ku cho bweh das ge, hank ma nghamh soh cho lhyi Mangso ka nyang lyis jyetdap bang dah xiklyis sont toh, ge.
46002010	Mangso ka nyah Dyos cho yah yang lyis nyah dah nghop toh cho lhyi chixoeuq goeus. Hauh Dyos gas vyhang dvnganh lyis kyingh ma nghuot, Mangso dah noq thank nghamh toeuq cho lhyi yangh lap yoeuh nyeis.
46002011	Dius dvyuk mas bos dah dyos ma nghuot lyis gas, dius yah sen yvlyis hank yoh seq lah? Houyah dvyhangteh Mangso dah Dyos yah ma nghuot lyis gas Mangso nyang yah sen dah cho lhyi hank eq ma yoh seq.
46002012	Yang gas mungkvn yah sen dah dyos lyis kham yoeus zis ma nghuot. Mangso yang lyis dyei toh dah jyehjuh dvnganh lyis seq bas jungh, Mangso nhang kat dah Dyos lyis tsain kham yoeus.
46002013	Housoeh yvmvyah Dyos lyis kham yoeus goeus bang lyis Dyos yah sen dah jyoeng cho lhyi taiq kyoh uhlyis ngamoq gas dius dah joeui khyvlyis ma taiq; Dyos yah jyauh dah dang yah dvtaiq.
46002014	Soenghchoenk dius gas Mangso dah Dyos yah dyei dah jyehjuh jyungshuk lyis ma yoh lhom yoeus. Hauh zis gas nyah xiklyis vkoh vpaq cho nghuot joq; dyos ehnyet yah kyingh hauh cho dah phauhdap zis lyis dvyoh thyet dyei yvmvyah, nyang gas hounyhoq lyis seqgyo zis ma nghuot.
46002015	Dyos bos soeu ka vyhang dvnganh dah phauhdap cho lhyi soe yoh tuon. Nghuot laus eq nyang lyis gas hank eq soe ma yoh tuon.
46002016	Lhaihtoh dang mas, Yhensain dah ehnyet lyis hank seq las nyang lyis joeui hank yoh dyei lah, ge taiq toh zis yah dvyhangteh nghuot. Nghuot laus eq yang mas gas Khristu dah ehnyet yoh toh.
46003001	Boekyis eh, ngos namoq lyis dyos ehnyet bos bang lyis teh ma yoh taiq kyoh. Gungsshoh dius gyingh dvnghuot shih bang yahge Khristu mas lonoeuh jens lyis teh taiq kyoh.
46003002	Gvshih jweh shoq namoq cicont ma nghuot shih yvmvyah, zos ma tsoh, nauh dvgvmshuk, gvshih yangh namoq cicont ma nghuot shih.
46003003	Housoeh las namoq gungsshoh gyingh dvtsain nghuot shih khyvlyis tsain nyeis; namoq mas noh cho, dyoqgoh cho bos yvmvyah, houka namoq haih mungkvn yah sen khyvlyis kang dwis nyeis zis nghuot cho kanghjyoeng chixoeuq nyeis ma nghuot lhyeh?
46003004	Namoq mas dvyuk yuk gas, Ngos gas Paulo thang chank, tsai gohyhamh gas, Ngos gas Apolo thang chank, ge tsain taiq goh lyis, namoq mungkvn dius jens teh kyingh kang dwis nyeis ma nghuot lhyeh?
46003005	Apolo gas hank nghuot lah? Paulo eq hank nghuot lah? Ngah aiq yuk gas Mangso dah jyeidwis jens tsain nghuot las, ngamoq gvng mas namoq Mangso lhyi yoh lomsjingh los bas jungh oen shwih uhshe dyei bang dvtsain nghuot. Housoeh las yang yuk khanghmuh gas Mangso gvn chixoeuq toh dah muh yoh zwi nyeis.
46003006	Ngos gas nyau khyoq, Apolo gas jeis sanh las, yuk kuh los nhang soeu ka Mangso nghuot.
46003007	Housoeh tsungh soeu ka cha ma nghuot, jeis sanh soeu eq cha ma nghuot; yuk kuh los nhang dah Mangso kyingh vgungs dvnghuot.
46003008	Tsungh soeu yahge jeis sanh soeu dah nghamh toeuq cho dvkoeuq dvnghuot; Mangso ka vsainnyang kuot dah muhzoh lyis tank las phauh shangh das.
46003009	Khasoeh ge lyis ngamoq gas Mangso dah muh chomp zwi bang nghuot. Namoq gas Mangso dah yos yahge yhenzains yoszains tsain nghuot.
46003010	Mangso ngos lyis dyei toh dah jyehjuh jyungshuk lyis yhung lha, joeui bos dah soehfuh teh, ngos vpom xi toh goeus. Gohyhamh gas houmha tsoq tsuk nyeis: nghuot laus eq yuk khanghmuh vsainnyang khasoeh tsoq kuot yvlyis zaih nyeis bas jungh.
46003011	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso dvlhain xi toh goeus, Yesu Khristu ge dvkoeuq kyingh dah yhen-yos mas gohtoeu vpom yoh xi zis ma nghuot.
46003012	Hauh yhen-yos mas dvyhamh ngwis, xing, phauhdap luk yhung lha tsoq ci loh. Dvyhamh gas saiq, huhyau, lhyeih yah tsoq kuot.
46003013	Dvyuk dvyuk dah kank bos muhzoh gas Yhensain Yesu jweh los nyeih lyis thuq los das. Khasoeh ge lyis hauh buisnyeis lyis nyi gas dvyuk yah dvyuk kuot dah muh lyis shi yoeuh las gis cho, ma gis cho lhyi chixoeuq das:
46003014	Hauh tsoq tsuk yvmas yhung dah vyhang hauh nyi mas yoh luiq nghuot lyis gas hau tsuk soeu ka phauh shangh zis xauh das.
46003015	Dvyuk yuk dah muhzoh ngeh tyamp nghuot lyis gas, nyang somh tyamp das. Nghuot laus eq nyang gas nyi masyah luiq teh nyah gungs kyingh khyuot yoeus zis xauh das.
46003016	Namoq gas Mangso dah yhenmuh nghuot las Mangso dah Dyos namoq mas bos yvlyis namoq ma seq goh lhyeh?
46003017	Dius dvyuk yuk Mangso dah yhenmuh lyis lhoeu thyoq lyis gas, Mangso ka hauh soeu lhyi mhont tyamp das: khasoeh ge lyis Mangso dah yhenmuh gas gyingshang joq: nvng gas hauh yhenmuh nghuot.
46003018	Hank eq vsainnyang gungs lyis ma mhuih jyomh bas jungh. Namoq dvyuk yuk haih mungkvn vsoenk mas joeui bos ge nghamh soeu ka jyoengh joeui bos soeu bweh das nyhenshang koh soeu bweh bas jungh.
46003019	Khasoeh ge lyis, haih mungkvn mas dah joeui ka Mangso xikkhonh mas koh zis nghuot. Hau lhaihtoh dang mas taiq zis yah dvyhangteh, Mangso ka hau joeui bos bang lyis nyamoq nyang dah yik cho lhyik mas nyih nhang.
46003020	Gohtoeu lhaihtoh dang dvkoeuq mas eq, Joeui bos bang dah nghamh yoeuh cho ka vkyuh ma bos yvlyis Yhensain seq, ge bos.
46003021	Housoeh yvmvyah hank eq dius dah uhshe bang gvng mas khwank ehnyet ma bos bas jungh. Khasoeh ge lyis dvnganh zis gas namoq zis nghuot.
46003022	Paulo eq Apolo eq, Petru eq, haih mungkvn eq, dwis zis yah shei zis eq, gvshih nyeis zis yahge thang pheh nyeis dyos das zis eq, dvnganh namoq zis nghuot.
46003023	Namoq gas Khristu dah zis nghuot las Khristu gas Mangso zis nghuot.
46004001	Ngamoq gas Mangso nghop shung toh dah jyoeng cho lhyi zom bang ge Khristu dah jyeidwis jens nghuot oen namoq suon yoeus gis.
46004002	Housoeh hauh jyeidwis mas bos chah dah kank bos cho dvja gas, nyang nyah Yhensain lhyi lomluk chah.
46004003	Gvshih namoq, nghuot ya soetuon jang mas ngos lyis soetuon lhyi, ngos hauh yvlyis chaxwe ma nhang; ngos ngvnyang gungs lyis yangh soe ma tuon.
46004004	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos sohseq dah ngah ehnyet gas lhoqshang, nghuot laus eq ngos yobos ma bos oen taiq zis ma nghuot: ngos lyis soetuon soeu ka Mangso dvnghuot.
46004005	Shishenh top ma jweh shih lyis hank lyis eq soe vtuon goh. Thang thank soetuon cho lhyi Yhensain jweh los shoq langh nyeis chah. Nyang gas chuot yvmas nghop shung toh dah vyhang dvnganh lyis eq, dius dah ungkhau mha gauh nghamh toeuq toh cho lhyi chi thuq xoeuq das. Hauh uhlyis hank eq hank mon yih zis yah dvyhangteh Mangso jyank masyah chungh cho xauh das.
46004006	Boekyis eh, namoq vkyuh xiklyis haih cho mha ngos yahge Apolo dah cho lhyi yikhyoh toh las taiq toh. Heisoeh taiq toh cho ka, Chank chah lyi vpom masyah lai las vkuot, ge dah sangkhyangh dah noq thank vjyuk lyis seqgyo das nyhenshang nghuot. Namoq gas dius dvyuk lyis nghamh kuh las khwank, gohtoeu dvyuk lyis gas ma phauh gis vkuot.
46004007	Nvng lyis gohyuk thoq mas hank zau nhang lah? Nvng yoh goeu dvnganh nvng lyis Mangso dyei toh ma nghuot lhyeh? Housoeh lyis namoq xauh kham yoeus dah vyhang ka Mangso jyank masyah yoh dah jyehjuh jyungshuk ma nghuot teh namoq khasoeh yoh moengs lah?
46004008	Gvshih namoq chah ya chah zis dvnganh yoh joq goeus ma nghuot lhyeh? Namoq dis goeus lhyeh? Ngamoq yangh hwankti ma bweh shih lyis namoq hwankti jens bweh joq goeus lhyeh? Gis, namoq hwankti jens bweh lyis ngamoq eq namoq yah dvgeh xauh guon das yvmvyah, ngos namoq hwankti bweh das zis o.
46004009	Khasoeh ge lyis moeng zan ung lha suh jens xoeuq uhlyis sat zis xauh das bang lyis thang thank mas suh nhang teh, Mangso ka cangsoeu yahge loeuswons bang dah xikkhonh mas chomp yoeuh bas jungh ge, ngamoq lvgyo jens lyis thang thank mas toh, oen ngos nghamh.
46004010	Khasoeh ge lyis ngamoq gas Khristu gvng mas koh nyeis, namoq gas Khristu mas dvdain dvlom joeui bos bang nghuot. Ngamoq gas yomnhuk, namoq gas yom bos; ngamoq gas dius ngis gyoh las namoq gas nyoqnho ngelang bos bang nghuot.
46004011	Ngamoq gas gvshih jweh shoq yuot, shet, shohchen, shohthungh shohnyhoq shoeuhshih zis xauh las nyeis gus ma bos dvjoqyos masyah dvjoqyos suh nyeis.
46004012	Ngamoq nyang dah loq yah tsoeng lha muh tsain zwi zo; ngamoq nhoengh zis xauh lyis shvmanh dyei; shoeuhshih zis xauh lyis ngamoq tsain jhen.
46004013	Ngamoq ma phauh gis kuot zis xauh lyis dang chau jis; ngamoq gvshih jweh shoq mungkvn gonh dah mhotkhyot yahge dvkhauyah dah mhotkhyot ngamoq bweh nyeis.
46004014	Ngos namoq lyis xoqphuh nhang das oen haih cho lhaih zis ma nghuot; ngos jyetdap lo jens lyis teh ngos namoq lyis taiq kyingh.
46004015	Khasoeh ge lyis, namoq dah Khristan kang dwis cho mha namoq lyis jyauh bang dvmons ko bos laus eq, namoq lyis yaus kat uwus dvyuk dvyoh. Ngos gas hau gausyis dang taiq kyoh khyvlyis namoq Khristu yah dvdain dvlom kang dwis cho mha jweh loh nhang, namoq dah uwus bweh los.
46004016	Housoeh las, ngah yikhyoh chank nyeis geh oen ngos namoq lyis dung kat.
46004017	Hauh cho gvng mas, Khristan kang dwis cho mha, ngos jyetdap lomluk dah ngah lo Timothi lyis ngos namoq jyank mas nhang kat. Nyang gas joqyos khanghmuh mas dah phung lhyi ngos jyauh teh, Khristu yah dvdain dvlom kang dwis cho vsaiq dah cho lhyi namoq doms soh shoq taiq kyingh das.
46004018	Ngos namoq jyank mas ma yoh jweh los das teh mus las, namoq dvyhamh khwank nyeis.
46004019	Yhensain gyo lyis gas ngos namoq jyank mas lvnyap jweh los das. Housoeh khwank bang dah dang lyis kyingh ma nghuot, nyamoq dah yomsoq lyis eq ngos yoh seq das.
46004020	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso munghdan gas dang mas bos zis ma nghuot, yomsoq mas dvbos.
46004021	Ngos namoq jyank mas lvxuk yah los das lah? Nghuot ya jyetdap las noeuh nhamp dyos yah los das lah? Namoq khah zis zes o goh lah?
46005001	Gvshih Khristan ma nghuot bang yangh ma kuot, gyukphoh dah yauxi zis namoq mas bos cho ngos lyis taiq kyoh bang bos. Dius dvyuk gas nyah uwus dah nyinhungh lyis yoeus, ge dah yauxi cho ngos xauhgyo.
46005002	Housoeh teh wotwu dyoq nyeis laus eq namoq khwank nyeis shih goh lhyeh? Namoq gas kuk zis yah housoeh yauxi bang lyis namoq phung masyah phe tyamp vvng.
46005003	Ngos gas gungs namoq yah we joq laus eq, dyos gas namoq jyank mas jweh las namoq yah dvgeh nghuot. Ngos namoq jyank mas jweh nyeis teh, hau gyukphoh ma shop muh kuot soeu lhyi, yah Yhensain Yesu dah nyings yah dang thang thyet goeus.
46005004	Namoq, yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah nyings mas huom nyeis geh. Hauh uhlyis ngah dyos eq namoq yah dvgeh nghuot. Yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah yomsoq eq namoq yah dvgeh nghuot.
46005005	Yhensain dah buisnyeis lyis hauh soeu dah dyos khyuot yoeus zis xauh das xiklyis, hauh soeu dah gungs lyis mhont chah las, namoq hauh soeu lhyi Satan loq mas kyauh tyamp geh.
46005006	Namoq khwank nyeis das zis gas ma gis. Bicheih dvmhauh gas ohlhyoq jop gonh lyis bi los nhang, ge dah sangkhyangh lyis namoq ma seq goh lhyeh?
46005007	Namoq shang nyang lhoqshang los das xiklyis bicheih cauh ge dah yaunos lyis yoeus tyamp geh. Hauh uhlyis namoq gas bicheih ma kat dah ohlhyoq saiq teh bweh los das. Namoq housoeh jyoengh yoh kuot yvlyis ngos top seq. Khasoeh ge lyis Khristu ge, yah nyhenshang lhuiq kat dah lomhxangh gas sat zis xauh goeus las, yah dah Lhuiq Kat Pwe kuot das zis cicont nghuot goeus.
46005008	Housoeh yvmvyah yaunos yahge lhung cho ge dah bicheih cauh bos dah ohlhyoq yah ma nghuot, lhoqshang dah ehnyet yahge jyoeng ge dah bicheih ma bos ohlhyoq yah Lhuiq Kat Pwe kuot goh.
46005009	Ngos lhaih dah maussauh mas namoq gas wotwu dyoq bang yah ma zomhgoh das xiklyis taiq toh.
46005010	Housoeh taiq toh yvmas, haih mungkvn mas dah yauxi bang, nyoqnoq obos bang, khauh bang, silho paiq bang yah ma zomhgoh das nyhenshang taiq mes zis ma nghuot. Nyamoq lyis yoh jhank das zis gas namoq haih mungkvn masyah thuq loh lo chah das.
46005011	Ngos taiq mes zis gas, nyah gungs lyis nyang Khristan vmang vnoeuh nghuot ge toh las wotwu dyoq, nyoqnoq obos, silho paiq, loeusmus khyangh sang, yhei pauhzoe kuot, khauh, houteh soeu yah ma zomh thoq lyis magoh, dvgeh tsung lha ma zomh zo shuk noh oen zis nghuot.
46005012	Khasoeh ge lyis Khristan ma nghuot dah nghe pheh bang lyis soetuon cho ka ngos yah cha ma sen. nyamoq lyis Mangso soetuon das.
46005013	Nghuot laus eq namoq gas phung khau mha bang lyis soetuon gis ma nghuot lhyeh? Lhaihtoh dang mas, Namoq vkhau mha ma shop soeu lhyi namoq masyah khat tyamp geh, ge toh.
46006001	Namoq mas dvyuk yuk soe bos yvlyis Mangso dah dius jens thyet dyei zis kham yoeus das gungsthaiq chamus gohnyau bang soetuon soeu jyank mas womh e lah?
46006002	Mangso dah dius jens gas mungkvn lyis soetuon das yvlyis namoq ma seq goh lhyeh? Mungkvn lyis soetuon das bang namoq gas soelo dvtsiq dvthang lhyi khvlangh ma yoh tuon goh lhyeh?
46006003	Ngamoq gas loeuswons bang lyis soetuon das zis namoq ma seq nyeis goh lhyeh? Housoeh las hai nyeisjvng thoq dah cho lhyi soe zes yoh gis tuon ma nghuot lhyeh?
46006004	Housoeh soe thuq los lyis phung yah cha ma sen, phung mha toeuh ma bos bang lyis soetuon nhang das lhyeh?
46006005	Namoq xoq bas jungh oen ngos haih cho dvtaiq. Khristan vmang vnoeuh nyang changh soe bos lyis namoq mas soe seq tuon dah joeui bos soeu dvyuk eq ma bos lo lhyeh?
46006006	Ma lomsjingh bang dah xikkhonh mas yangh Khristan boekyis nyang changh zau kauq goh nyeis nyvng!
46006007	Gvshih namoq mas dvyuk yah dvyuk kauq goh cho ka Khristan dah somh cho nghuot goeus. Cu cho lhyi jhen tyamp zis gas zes ma gis lhyeh?
46006008	Hauh gungsthaiq namoq Khristan vmang vnoeuh nyang changh tsain mop zo goh.
46006009	Lhung bang gas Mangso munghdan dah vso vlho ma xauh kham yoeus das yvlyis namoq ma seq goh lhyeh? Chowhang vwhang goh: yauxi bang eq, silho paiq bang eq, nyi shuot lvng shuot bang eq, yukgis nyang changh zomh bang eq,
46006010	Khauh bang eq, nyoqnoq obos bang eq, yhei pauhzoe eq, loeusmus bang eq, kyuk tant lhuot zo bang eq, Mangso munghdan vso vlho ma xauh kham yoeus das.
46006011	Namoq dvyhamh gas hou yhangteh bang nghuot khoq; nghuot laus eq namoq gas yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah nyings yah eq, yah Mangso dah Dyos yah eq namoq lyis cheihshang lha Mangso mha kyauh toh bang, Mangso xikkhonh mas dan bang ge zis kham yoeus goeus bang bweh goeus.
46006012	Namoq mas dvyuk yuk, Ngos gas cha lhyi laus eq kuot das toeuh yoh, ge das. Nghuot laus eq dvnganh gas nah xiklyis gis zis ma nghuot. Ngos dvnganh zis kuot das toeuh yoh oen yoh taiq laus eq, chah cho gvng mas eq ngos lyis hauh jons duot das zis ngos toeuh dyei das zis ma nghuot.
46006013	Zonoms gas womdau xiklyis, womdau gas zonoms xiklyis nghuot ge namoq taiq das. Houka jus, laus eq Mangso ka hau aiq ja lyis yah dvyih lhoq thyoq das. Gungs gas yauxi das xiklyis ma nghuot, Yhensain lhyi phuqsoe das xiklyis dvnghuot. Yhensain eq gungs xiklyis chah zis dyei nyeis.
46006014	Mangso ka nyah yomsoq yah Yhensain lhyi dwis toq nhang goeus las, yang lyis eq nyah yomsoq yah dwis toq nhang das.
46006015	Namoq dah gungs gas Khristu dah gungsdoeus nghuot yvlyis namoq ma seq goh lhyeh? Housoeh nghuot lyis gas Khristu dah gungsdoeus lyis ngos kangh tyamp las nghe nyhiq dah gungsdoeus kuot das lhyeh? Housoeh ma gis bweh.
46006016	Nghe nyhiq yah tsoq toh soeu ka nyang yah gungs dvgungs kyingh dvnghuot nyeis yvlyis namoq ma seq goh lhyeh? Lhaihtoh dang mas, Nyah aiq yuk gas gungs shoh dvkoeuq kyingh bweh das ge taiq toh.
46006017	Nghuot laus eq Yhensain mha tsoq soeu ka Dyos khyvlyis gungs dvkoeuq kyingh dvnghuot.
46006018	Yauxi cho lhyi jhank geh. Dius yah kuot dah yaunos dvnganh gas vsainnyang gungs dah gis cho lhyi ma los yoh zangh. Nghuot laus eq yauxi cho mha yaunos yoh soeu ka nyah gungs lyis nyang shuot nyeis.
46006019	Namoq dah gungs gas Mangso namoq lyis dyei toh las namoq mas bos Gyingshang Dyos dah yhenmuh nghuot yvlyis namoq ma seq goh lhyeh? Namoq gas namoq nyang gungs lyis yoh sain zis ma nghuot, Yhensain yah dvsain toh.
46006020	Mangso ka namoq lyis phauh lang yah wis toh goeus yvmvyah namoq dah gungs lyis Mangso dah phunk nyhenshang yhung geh.
46007001	Gvshih namoq lyis lhaih kat cho yah sen lha taiq das. Vbusbih gas nyi ma yoeus yoh nyeis lyis zes gis.
46007002	Nghuot laus eq yauxi cho nyo los yvlyis jhank das xiklyis vbusbih khanghmuh nyang yuk nyang toeu yhensain nyhiq yoh gis, vmesbih eq nyang yuk nyang toeu yhensain phoq yoh gis.
46007003	Yhensain phoq gas lyi yah dvyhangteh yhensain nyhiq yah zomhgoh bas jungh. Yhensain nyhiq eq houyah dvyhangteh yhensain phoq yah zomhgoh las dvyuk yah dvyuk dah chah cho lhyi tyink goh bas jungh.
46007004	Yhensain nyhiq gas vsainnyang gungs lyis ma yoh sain, yhensain phoq dvsain toh. Yhensain phoq eq vsainnyang gungs lyis ma yoh sain, yhensain nyhiq dvsain toh.
46007005	Namoq ma yoh zain las Satan yah shiwu zis ma xauh bas jungh, namoq xamxonh zis yah shvmanh dung shishenh masyah lai las namoq zomhgoh cho mha ma jhank noh: hauh shishenh lai goeus ya dvgeh doms nyeis geh.
46007006	Ngos heisoeh taiq zis gas vmingh dyei khyvlyis ma nghuot, namoq khyamhsa das khyvlyis cho shet zis dvnghuot.
46007007	Jyoengh oen lyis dius dvnganhmoq ngos teh kuot nhang mes: nghuot laus eq yuk khanghmuh gas Mangso jyank masyah vsainnyang dah jyehjuh jyungshuk tsain xauh yoeus: dius dvyuk gas dvja, gohtoeu dvyuk eq gohtoeu dvja tsain xauh yoeus.
46007008	Nyiyoeus yhen ma loh shih bang yahge chauhmuh jens lyis ngos taiq zis gas, ngos teh nyeis loh lyis namoq xiklyis gis das.
46007009	Nghuot laus eq namoq ehnyet lyis ma yoh zain lyis gas nyiyoeus yhenloh bas jungh: khasoeh ge lyis ngeh gywes nyeis das thoq lyis gas nyiyoeus yhenloh zis zes gis.
46007010	Nyiyoeus yhenloh goeus bang lyis ngos taiq toh bah, houka ngos taiq zis ma nghuot, yhensain taiq zis gas, yhensain nyhiq gas yhensain phoq yah ma gang bas jungh.
46007011	Gang goh lyis gas, nyang yhen ma doms loh goeus jungh, nghuot ya vkhang dah yhensain phoq yah mehoq tamp las doms dap goh bas jungh. Yhensain phoq eq yhensain nyhiq lyis ma tyamp bas jungh.
46007012	Yhensain taiq toh dang ma nghuot laus eq, gohyhamh bang lyis ngos taiq zis gas, Khristan yukgis dvyuk gas ma lomsjingh dah yhensain nyhiq yoh laus eq, hauh vmesbih nyang yah nyeis mes lyis gas nyang lyis ma kangh tyamp bas jungh.
46007013	Houyah dvyhangteh Khristan vmesbih dvyuk ma lomsjingh dah yhensain phoq yoh laus eq hauh vbusbih nyang yah dvgeh nyeis mes lyis gas, hauh vbusbih lyis ma kangh tyamp bas jungh.
46007014	Khasoeh ge lyis, ma lomsjingh dah yhensain phoq gas lomsjingh dah yhensain nyhiq gvng mas, ma lomsjingh dah yhensain nyhiq eq lomsjingh dah yhensain phoq gvng mas cheihshang dyei zis xauh las Mangso lhom yoeus mon bang yoh bweh los. Housoeh ma nghuot lyis gas namoq dah lo jens ma shang das. Gvshih gas nyamoq Mangso lhom yoeus mon bang bweh los.
46007015	Nghuot laus eq hau ma lomsjingh dah yhensain phoq, nghuot ya yhensain nyhiq gas gang loh mes lyis gang loh goeus jungh. Housoeh teh cho mha Khristan nghuot dah yhensain phoq, nghuot ya yhensain nyhiq gas khyot khyang yoh kuot las, Mangso ka namoq lyis nyenstap zis yah nyeis das xiklyis khi toh.
46007016	Khristan vmesbih eh, nvng nah yhensain phoq lyis yoh khyuot yoeus das ma nghuot oen khasoeh yoh taiq lah? Houyah dvyhangteh Khristan vbusbih eh, nvng nah yhensain nyhiq lyis yoh khyuot yoeus das zis ma nghuot oen khasoeh yoh taiq lah?
46007017	Yuk khanghmuh gas Yhensain nyang lyis gvm dyei toh dah jyehjuh jyungshuk yah dvyhangteh, nyang lyis lui yoeus uhlyis nghuot joq zis yah dvyhangteh kang dwis nyeis bas jungh. Haih zis gas ngos phung khanghmuh lyis jyauh cho nghuot.
46007018	Vthyoh tyomh soeu ka Mangso khi zis xauh lyis, nyang vthyoh tyomh cho ma tyamp goeus jungh. Vthyoh ma tyomh soeu khi zis xauh lyis nyang vthyoh ma tyomh goeus jungh.
46007019	Dius dvyuk vthyoh tyomh ma tyomh zis gas cha ma nghuot, Mangso tyingtoh dang lyis chank das zis kyingh vgungs nghuot.
46007020	Yuk khanghmuh gas Mangso khi zis xauh uhlyis nghuot joq zis yah dvyhangteh housoeh vgus nghuot joq bas jungh.
46007021	Khi zis xauh uhlyis jons nghuot soeu ka vchiq, nghuot laus eq jons duot mhayah yoh luiq das toeuh yoh das nghuot lyis gas hauh toeuh lyis yoeus aq.
46007022	Khasoeh ge lyis jons nghuot nyeis uhlyis, Yhensain yah khi zis xauh soeu ka Yhensain lhuiq zis xauh soeu nghuot. Houyah dvyhangteh, luiq soeu nghuot las Khristu yah khi zis xauh soeu ka nyah jons nghuot.
46007023	Namoq lyis Mangso ka phauh lang gyoh las wis toh goeus yvmvyah dius dah jons vduot goh.
46007024	Boekyis eh, dvyuk dvyuk gas khi zis xauh yoq lyis yah dvyhangteh, Mangso yah zomh las kang tsoq dwis nyeis goh.
46007025	Gvshih namoq maussauh yah nyei los, phoengh ma wvng bang cho yah sen lha, Yhensain tyingtoh dang ngos ma yoh, nghuot laus eq Yhensain dah nhaiqnyen jyehjuh gvng mas lomluk soeu dvyuk khyvlyis ngos yoh nghamh suon yoeuh cho lhyi taiq kat.
46007026	Gvshih yang xauh nyeis dah yaukyenh cho yah dyingh dah zaih gvng mas vbusbih dvyuk gas nyang housoeh nghuot joq zis yah dvyhangteh nyeis lyis zes gis oen ngos nghamh.
46007027	Nvng yhensain nyhiq yoh goeus lah? Gang goh das cho vxo lo; nyi ma yoeus shih soeu nghuot lyis gas yhensain nyhiq vxo lo.
46007028	Nghuot laus eq nvng nyihwank lyis, hauh zis yaunos kuot zis ma nghuot; lonyi eq phoengh wvng lyis, nyang yaunos kuot zis ma nghuot; nghuot laus eq nyi yoeus yhen loh bang nyeih yau nyeih thungh phuh xauh kham nyeis dah shanghsenh cho lhyi jhank nhang mes yvmvyah ngos heisoeh taiq zis nghuot.
46007029	Boekyis eh, ngos taiq mes zis gas heisoeh nghuot. Shishenh nyoshoq ma bos lo: gvshih masyah nyiyoeus goeus bang nyi ma yoeus bang teh nyeis das.
46007030	Ngaus bang gas ma kuk bang teh, yis bang gas ma pyo bang teh, hu wis bang gas nyamoq dah hu lhyi ma sain bang teh;
46007031	Mungkvn zisyos yhung nyeis bang gas zisyos sain toh las ma yhung bang teh nghuot los bas jungh: khasoeh ge lyis hai gvshih nyvng nyeis dah mungkvn gas nyangh nyangh joq lo das zis ma nghuot.
46007032	Ngos gas namoq mas chiqjyen cho ma bos das xiklyis omes nyeis. Yhensain nyhiq ma yoeus soeu ka, hau Yhensain dah muh mas nhaiq wvng zis yah chiq nyeis las Yhensain o khyvlyis kuot mes nyeis.
46007033	Nghuot laus eq nyiyoeus soeu ka, nyah yhensain nyhiq lyis lhoq pyo dyei mes las mungkvn vyhang lhyi chiq nyeis.
46007034	Housoeh las nyang gas ehnyet aiq shot lang goh nyeis. Yhen ma loh soeu, nghuot ya lonyi gyingh gas nyah gungs yahge dyos gyingshang bas jungh Yhensain lhyi kyauh mes yvmvyah, Yhensain dah muh mas nhaiq wvng chiq nyeis. Nghuot laus eq yhenloh goeus dah vmesbih gas nyah yhensain phoq lyis lhoq pyo mes las mungkvn vyhang lhyi chiq nyeis.
46007035	Ngos heisoeh taiq zis gas namoq lyis pangh mes yvmvyah nghuot. Namoq lyis lyi yah zwi zains toh das xiklyis ma nghuot. Namoq lyis jyoeng cho, phi cho jus khyvlyis chank kuot nhang mes thoq lyis magoh Yhensain dah muh mas nyhet toh cho ma bos vlhomuh yoh phuqsoe nhang mes las taiq zis nghuot.
46007036	Kwank toh thang lhyi nyihwank cho ma kuot das ge nghamh thyet dah vzomh yah sen lha: vbusbih gas Vmesbih thoq mas nyang kuot cho ma doeus ge nghamh nghuot nghuot, nyah ehnyet ma nyens, ma yoh zain las nyihwank chah ge nghamh lyis, nyang nghamh o zis yah dvyhangteh nyah aiq yuk nyihwank cho kuot bas jungh. Nyang yaunos kuot zis ma nghuot.
46007037	Nghuot laus eq vbusbih gas nyi ma yoeus das ge nghamh thyet zis yah, nyah ehnyet lyis eq vlhomuh yoh joeu las, hauh vmesbih lyis nyi ma hwank nyeis lyis nyang gis khyvlyis kuot goeus.
46007038	Housoeh vmesbih lyis nyihwank soeu ka gis khyvlyis kuot nyeis. Nghuot laus eq hauh vmesbih lyis ma yoeus yoeus nyeis soeu ka zes gis zis kuot goeus.
46007039	Yhenloh goeus dah vmesbih gas nyah yhensain phoq dwis nyeis dvchank nyang yah twih goh toh. Nghuot laus eq yhensain phoq shei goeus ya luiq goeus las nyang hank jyank mas loh mes lyis eq yoh loh goeus. Nghuot laus eq Khristan yukgis yah phoengh wvng chah.
46007040	Nghuot laus eq hauh vmesbih gas yhen ma doms loh lo yoh nyeis lyis gas nyang zes pyo zis yah ngelhoq cho nghuot das. Heika ngos nghamh cho nghuot. Ngos mas eq Mangso dah Dyos bos zis nghuot oen nghamh.
46008001	Gvshih silho lhyi kyangh dah shoh zos cho yah sen lha namoq lhaih kat cho lhyi taiq das. Yang dvnganhmoq mas seq cho bos, ge nyamoq taiq zis gas jus. Nghuot laus eq housoeh teh seq cho ka dius lyis khwank nhang; nghuot laus eq jyetdap cho ka jebais los nhang.
46008002	Dius dvyuk yuk gas, Ngos dvja ja seq, ge nghamh lyis gas, nyang seq chah zis yangh jyoengh ma seq shih.
46008003	Nghuot laus eq Mangso lhyi jyetdap soeu nghuot lyis gas Mangso eq nyang lyis seq.
46008004	Housoeh las silho lhyi kyangh dah phudyei zonoms yah sen lha taiq lyis, silho ge zis gas dwis nyeis cho ma bos cha ma nghuot yvlyis eq, Dvso kyingh dah Mangso mha lai las gohtoeu ma bos lo yvlyis eq yang seq.
46008005	Maukhung yahge nyeisjvng mas mangso jens, ge nyhink zis nyoshoq joq las mangso nyoshoq yahge yhensain nyoshoq bos.
46008006	Nghuot laus eq yah xiklyis gas, Uwus ge dah Mangso dvso kyingh dvnghuot. Nyang gas vyhang dvnganh yvlyis gvnkhanh toh soeu nghuot las yang gas nyah xiklyis kang dwis nyeis. Yesu Khristu ge Yhensain eq dvyuk kyingh dvnghuot las nyah gvng mas dvnganh bweh los, yang eq nyah gvng mas kang dwis nyeis.
46008007	Nghuot laus eq yuk khanghmuh mas seq gvn dah seq cho bos zis ma nghuot: dius dvyhamh silho lhyi tsain paiq ku los bang nghuot las gvshih jweh shoq hau silho lhyi kyangh dah phudyei zo uhlyis houka silho lhyi kyangh dah zonoms nghuot ge nghamh. Nyamoq dah sohseq ehnyet yomnhuk yvmvyah nyamoq zo dah zonoms gas nyamoq lyis vwot v-oeu bweh nhang ge nghamh.
46008008	Zonoms gas Mangso yahge yang tsoq goh cho mha zes goeng los nhang zis ma nghuot. Yang ma zo lyis cha ma somh loh, zo lyis eq chah vkyuh ma lung los.
46008009	Nghuot laus eq namoq heisoeh kyoq toh cho ma bos yoh zo zis gas Mangso lhyi lomsjingh cho mha yomnhuk bang dah lainszo gus ma bweh das xiklyis zaih nyeis geh.
46008010	Heisoeh teh cho mha, sohseq ehnyet yomnhuk soeu dvyuk, seq cho bos bang namoq silho yhen mha zo tsung toh yvlyis nyvng lyis, silho lhyi kyangh dah phudyei lyis womh zo los bas jungh ge yomdyei cho vbweh das lah?
46008011	Housoeh las sohseq cho yomnhuk dah nah boekyis xiklyis Khristu shei kham dyei goeus nghuot laus eq nah dah seq cho gvng mas hauh soeu dyoqbis loh das ma nghuot lhyeh?
46008012	Heisoeh namoq gas namoq dah boekyis lyis shuot las yomnhuk dah sohseq ehnyet lyis dvmtap lyis gas namoq Khristu lyis shuot goeus.
46008013	Housoeh las zonoms yah ngah boekyis lyis yaunos kuot nhang zis dvbweh das lyis gas, ngah boekyis lyis ma lains nhang das xiklyis ngos khanhamp eq shoh ma zo lo das.
46009001	Ngos gas luiq soeu ma nghuot lhyeh? Ngos lvgyo dvyuk ma nghuot lhyeh? Ngos yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu lyis nyvng yoeuh goeus ma nghuot lhyeh? Namoq eq ngos Yhensain xiklyis wons wuq dah muh mas dah vshih ma nghuot lhyeh?
46009002	Gohyhamh bang ngos lyis lvgyo dvyuk lyis teh ma lhom yoeus ma nghuot lhyeh! nghuot laus eq namoq gas lhom yoeus. Khasoeh ge lyis Khristu yah dvdain dvlom bweh las kang tsain dwis nyeis dah namoq nyang ngos lvgyo dvyuk jyoeng cho dah kanghjyoeng kyihau tsain nghuot.
46009003	Ngos lyis mau dius nghuot cho nyei choq bang lyis ngos phuk taiq dang gas haih zis nghuot.
46009004	Ngos zwi dah muh nyhenshang ngos mas zo shuk das toeuh ma yoh lhyeh?
46009005	Gohtoeu lvgyo jens, Yhensain dah vnoeuh moq yahge Petru teh bang dah yikhyoh chank khyvlyis ngos suh yenh uhlyis lomsjingh dah yhensain nyhiq shwih yenh das vmingh ma gis yoh lah?
46009006	Nghuot ya, ngah aiq yuk Barnaba kyingh ngamoq zo shuk das zis ngamoq nyang muh zwi chah lhyeh?
46009007	Vsainnyang zokho wons las jes muh hank wons? Zvbiq khyam zwi las hou mhayah ma thyoq zo zis hank bos lah? Yvng nyhoeu lha nauh ma nyhet yhung zis hank bos lah?
46009008	Haih nyeih yau nyeih bweh dah dangtoeuq lyis taiq kyoh zis yah kyingh ngos taiq mes cho lhyi dye nhang mes zis ma nghuot. Lyi mas eq haih cho taiq nyeis ma nghuot lhyeh?
46009009	Khasoeh ge lyis Guk nang nyeis noeulu lyis nhuottsungh vtsungh toh dyei, ge Moshe dah lyi mas lhaih toh. Heisoeh taiq yvmas Mangso ka noeujungs lu jens lyis kyingh chiq las taiq nyeis lhyeh?
46009010	Yah xiklyis jyoengh taiq nyeis ma nghuot lhyeh? Jyoengh yah xiklyis lhaih toh. Danh phuk soeu yahge jyo yhomh soeu ka vsainnyang xauh yoeus vvng dah jyo gvmboms lyis nghamhloms zis yah kuot nyeis.
46009011	Ngamoq gas namoq mas Dyos jyo khyoq toh las, namoq mas dah nyeisjvng thoq yah sen dah vyhang vkyuh lhyi kham yoeus lyis ngamoq xiklyis dvmsunk cho nghuot lah?
46009012	Gohyuk namoq masyah xauh yoeus das zis nghamhloms dah toeuh tsain yoh lyis gas, ngamoq zes yoh vvng ma nghuot lhyeh? Nghuot laus eq ngamoq hauh toeuh lyis ma yhung, Khristu dah gausyis dang lyis kyamp gos dah pahkai cho ma bos bas jungh, yau cho dvnganh ngamoq xauh lyis jhen.
46009013	Yhenmuh mas gyingshang muh zwi bang gas yhenmuh mas zis xauh zo zis eq, Phudyei bang eq phon mha zis gvmboms xauh zo yvlyis namoq seq.
46009014	Houyah dvyhangteh hau gausyis dang taiq kyoh bang gas hau gausyis dang mas womdau yoh khoeu das ge Yhensain taiq toh.
46009015	Nghuot laus eq ngos gas haih toeuh dvkoeuq eq ma yhung, ngos haih toeuh dung das oen ngos haih cho lhaih toh zis ma nghuot. Ngos housoeh dung das gungsthaiq ngos shei loh das zis gas zes gis. Ngah khwank cho vnyet vkom bweh das khyvlyis hank lyis eq toeuh dyei das zis ma nghuot.
46009016	Haih gausyis dang taiq kyoh yvmvyah ngah xiklyis khwank chank ma bos: khasoeh ge lyis ngos gas Mangso taiq toh zis yah dvyhangteh ma taiq ma yoh nyeis. Ngos hau gausyis dang lyis ma taiq kyoh lyis gas, ngos gyukphoh mvtanhzoe nghuot.
46009017	Housoeh hauh muh lyis ngah ehnyet yah ngos khyen lha kuot nyeis nghuot lyis gas, ngos uhkung phauh yoh das yvlyis yoh nghamhloms nyeis. Nghuot laus eq ngos haih muh lyis Mangso loms las kyauh toh goeus muh nghuot yvmvyah kuot chah dah yvwons s khyvlyis ngos kuot nyeis.
46009018	Housoeh lyis ngos chah uhkung phauh xauh yoeus das lah? Hau gausyis dang lyis phauh ma yoeus yoh taiq kyoh zis yahge gausyis dang yah sen dah muh xiklyis ngah toeuh lyis ma yhung yhung yoh taiq kyoh zis gas vmyat nghuot.
46009019	Ngos gas hank jons eq ma nghuot, luiq soeu nghuot. Laus eq dius gis yoh nyhoq yoh das xiklyis dvnganhmoq dah jons duot nyeis.
46009020	Yuda jens lyis yoh shoq Yuda jens mas Yuda teh, ngos kuot. Ngah gungs Lyi khau mha ma nyeis laus eq, Lyi khau mha bang lyis yoh shoq, Lyi khau mha nyeis soeu teh ngos bweh nyeis.
46009021	Houyah dvyhangteh, gohnyau bang jyank mas muh wons uhlyis nyamoq lyis yoh shoq ngos Yuda Lyi ma chank, gohnyau bang teh kuot. Heisoeh oen lhyi ngos gas Mangso dah Lyi ma chank soeu nghuot oen taiq mes zis ma nghuot. Jyoengh ngos gas Khristu dah Lyi khau mha nyeis soeu nghuot.
46009022	Mangso lhyi lomsjingh cho mha yomnhuk bang lyis yoh lhom yoeus shoq yomnhuk bang jyank mas yomnhuk soeu teh ngos bweh nyeis. Housoeh las dvyhamh lyis gis bweh cho dvkoeuq koeuq yah yoh khyuot yoeus shoq, ngos gas dius nyau vja ja mas ngos nyamoq teh bweh nyeis.
46009023	Ngos haih cho dvnganh chank kuot zis gas Gausyis dang gvng mas shvmanh jyehjuh lyis namoq yah dvgeh xauh kham yoeus das xiklyis nghuot.
46009024	Wuih khyank goh yvmas, dvnganhmoq wuih laus eq, ung jyungshuk gas dvyuk kyingh dvxauh yvlyis namoq vlhomuh seq. Housoeh namoq ung jyungshuk xauh yoeus shoq wuih khyank nyeis geh.
46009025	Lhoeu pwe wvng das nyhenshang toeuq yoeuh nyeis bang gas, than dah chank chah Lyi lyis chank kuot. Housoeh kuot zis gas seq dyoqbis dah bankhwank buismuk xauh yoeus das xiklyis nghuot. Yang gas vcaiq vto ma seq dyoqbis dah buismuk xauh yoeus das xiklyis yomkat.
46009026	Housoeh las ngos gas wuih jweh das toeuqkhom pheh dan dan wuih. Housoeh las ngos gas chwiq goh lyis eq lyeis mas ma chwiq tangh tyamp dah chwiq soeu yah doeusgoh.
46009027	Gohyhamh bang lyis gausyis dang dye taiq kyoh thang lhyi, ngos gas ngah gungs lyis ma mon ma yih doeuh tyamp zis ma xauh bas jungh oen, ngos ngah gungs lyis yomkat joeu nyeis.
46010001	Boekyis eh, Moshe shwih dah yah phauh thyeih moq mas cha bweh loh cho namoq lyis doms soh nhang mes. Nyamoq dvnganh gas, jyommauh o mha suh los; Thomh Nes pyo pyo yoh goeu luiq los.
46010002	Nyamoq dvnganh gas hau jyommauh yahge thomh mas jeisnyhop kham zis yah Moshe dah thang chank bang bweh los.
46010003	Dvyhangteh dah Dyos wom lyis dvnganhmoq zo las,
46010004	Dvyhangteh dah Dyos jeis lyis dvnganhmoq shuk; nyamoq mas chank los nyeis dah Dyos lukmuh lom masyah nyamoq shuk; hauh lukmuh lom gas Khristu nghuot.
46010005	Nghuot laus eq nyamoq mas nyothyang lyis Mangso ma o yvmvyah, nyamoq gas mhanhdyvp mas dvyos dvsanh shei dyuk loh.
46010006	Gvshih haih cho dvnganh gas nyamoq ma gis zis kuot teh ma gis ma shop dah vyhang lhyi nyoq ma gis noq cho yahge yang lyis nyamoq dvyhamh teh silho ma paiq das cho zaih nhang dah yikhyoh nghuot.
46010007	Hauh thoq lyis lhaihtoh dang mas, Dius jens gas zo shuk pwe dvkoeuq mas tsung lha tsain zo nyeis lyis houka zo lais shuk lais zis yah toq las gohshot pheh thaiq loh, ge lhaih toh zis yah dvyhangteh namoq gas nyamoq teh silho paiq bang vbweh goh.
46010008	Nyamoq dvyhamh bang yauxi lha, dvnyeih dvm lyis dius aiq mons somh khyoengh gywis tyamp teh, ma bweh shoq yang gas yauxi lha yobos dap bang ma bweh goh.
46010009	Nyamoq dvyhamh bang hau Yhensain lhyi shi yoeuh las lhangnyis yah chweh sat zis xauh teh, yang gas Yhensain lhyi ma gis shi yoeuh.
46010010	Nyamoq dvyhamh bang lop las shei cho dah loeus wons soeu yah mhont zis xauh teh, yang yoh lop das zis ma nghuot.
46010011	Haih cho dvnganh nyamoq mas bweh los zis gas gohyuk xiklyis yikhyoh bweh das nyhenshang nghuot las yang lyis taiq kyingh zaih nhang das xiklyis lhaih toh. Khasoeh ge lyis yang gas mungkvn caiq thank das shishenh lyis dius lyih tsain duot vvng bang nghuot.
46010012	Housoeh las dvyuk yuk, Ngos gas goeng goeng yap joq ge nghamh lyis gas, ma lains das xiklyis zaih nyeis bas jungh.
46010013	Namoq xauh ku dah shiwu cho ka dius jens dvnganhmoq mas xauh ku ja dvnghuot. Nghuot laus eq Mangso ka nyah dangthoengh jyoeng lha namoq lyis namoq ma yoh kham dah shiwu cho xauh nhang zis ma nghuot. Shiwu zis xauh uhlyis yoh kham das yomdyei las shiwu cho masyah yoh loeutyonh thuq los das cho phank dyei das.
46010014	Housoeh las ngos jyetdap bang eh, silho paiq cho jhank geh.
46010015	Ngos namoq lyis joeui bos bang lyis teh taiq nyeis: ngos taiq dang lyis nghamh yoeuh geh.
46010016	Yang gas Mangso dah jyehjuh lyis chungh las ngelhoq kom mha dah zvbiq shuk uhlyis, Khristu dah suih yah zomhgoh nyeis zis ma nghuot lhyeh? Yang ohlhyoq khyiq las hauh yvlyis zo uhlyis Khristu dah gungs yah zomhgoh nyeis zis ma nghuot lhyeh?
46010017	Khasoeh ge lyis ohlhyoq gas dvkoeuq dvnghuot. Yang hau ohlhyoq lyis chomp khyiq zo yvmvyah yang nyoshoq nghuot laus eq, gungs dvkoeuq dvnghuot.
46010018	Israel dius jens lyis nghamh yoeuh geh; lomhxangh lainh shoh lyis zo bang gas Mangso dah phon mha nyang yah dvgeh xonh zo bang nghuot, ma nghuot lhyeh!
46010019	Ngos heisoeh taiq zis gas, Silho nghuot ya silho lhyi lainh dah lomhxangh zonoms gas jyoengh yhaugyen oen taiq mes lhyeh?
46010020	Ngos housoeh taiq mes zis ma nghuot, gohnyau bang dah phon mha lainh dah lomhxangh gas Mangso lhyi lomhxangh lainh zis ma nghuot, yius jens lyis kyangh nyeis oen taiq mes. Ngos namoq lyis yius jens yah zomhgoh nyeis bang ma mes bweh nhang.
46010021	Namoq gas Yhensain dah kom mha zis shuk lho lha yius jens dah kom mha yoh doms shuk das zis ma nghuot. Yhensain dah womjus mas zo lho lha yius jens dah womjus mas yoh doms zo das zis ma nghuot.
46010022	Yang Yhensain lhyi noh nhang mes nyeis lhyeh? Yang gas hau Yhensain thoq lyis yom zes bos oen nghamh lhyeh?
46010023	Nyamoq gas, Ngamoq cha eq kuot das toeuh yoh, tsain ge. Houka jus, nghuot laus eq dvnganh gas gis zis ma nghuot. Yang dvnganh kuot das toeuh yoh laus eq dvnganh zis yoh thuk yoh pangh zis ma nghuot.
46010024	Hank eq vsainnyang dah vkyuh lyis ma xo, gohyuk dah vkyuh lyis xo nyeis bas jungh.
46010025	Sohseq ehnyet gvng mas cha eq ma nyei nyei, kaih mas ungh zis cha eq wis zo geh.
46010026	Khasoeh ge lyis lhaihtoh dang mas, Nyeisjvng yahge houmha dyingh joq zis dvnganh gas Yhensain yah sen ge taiq.
46010027	Ma lomsjingh soeu dvyuk yuk namoq lyis khi lha namoq loh mes nghuot lyis, sohseq ehnyet gvng mas cha eq ma nyei choq choq, namoq xikkhonh mas sont dyei zis zo geh.
46010028	Nghuot laus eq dvyuk yuk yah, Heika silho lhyi kyangh dah zonoms nghuot ge taiq kyoh lyis gas, hau taiq kyoh soeu xiklyis yahge sohseq ehnyet gvng mas vzo goh.
46010029	Sohseq ehnyet oen yvmas namoq dah ehnyet lyis ma nghuot, gohyuk dah sohseq ehnyet lyis taiq mes zis nghuot. Namoq dvyuk yuk, Ngos yoh kuot dah toeuh lyis gohyuk dah sohseq ehnyet yah dang thang thyet das lah?
46010030	Dvyuk yuk gas ngos jyehjuh chungh goeus dah zonoms xiklyis ngos chamus loeusmus las yobos xo zis xauh das lah?
46010031	Housoeh yvmvyah namoq zo laus eq, shuk laus eq, cha kuot laus eq, dvnganh yvmas Mangso dah phunk xiklyis kuot geh.
46010032	Namoq gas Yuda vnyau jens xiklyis eq, gohnyau bang xiklyis eq, Mangso dah tsainhtoh phung xiklyis eq ehnyet dyet gus vbweh nhang goh.
46010033	Dius dvnganhmoq khyuot yoeus zis xauh das xiklyis ngos ngah xiklyis gis das cho ma nghamh, dvnganhmoq dah vkyuh lyis xo lha dius jens o shoq kuot. Namoq eq ngos kuot teh chank kuot geh.
46011001	Ngos gas Khristu dah yikhyoh yoeus teh namoq eq ngah yikhyoh yoeus geh.
46011002	Namoq gas cho khat khanghmuh mas ngos lyis soh las, ngos namoq lyis hau tyingtoh dang jyauh toh zis yah dvyhangteh tsain chank kuot nyeis yvmvyah ngos namoq lyis chungh.
46011003	Nghuot laus eq ngos namoq lyis seq nhang mes zis gas, Khristu gas vbusbih khanghmuh dah uhloms nghuot; yhensain phoq gas nyah yhensain nyhiq dah uhloms nghuot; Mangso ka Khristu dah uhloms nghuot cho lhyi ngos namoq lyis seqgyo nhang mes.
46011004	Vbusbih hank laus eq shvmanh dung, nghuot ya moq phung mha gausyis dang taiq lyis uhloms nghop toh lyis gas, vsainnyang uhloms dah nyoqnho ngelang gyoh nhang nyeis.
46011005	Vmesbih hank laus eq shvmanh dung, nghuot ya moq phung mha Mangso dah dang taiq uhlyis uhloms ma nghop lyis gas, nyah yhensain phoq dah nyoqnho ngelang gyoh nhang nyeis. Nyang gas uhyuk tyamp dah vmesbih yah cha ma shaih.
46011006	Vmesbih gas uhloms ma nghop das nghuot lyis gas, cam eq yuk tyamp bas jungh. Nghuot laus eq cam gom tyamp, nghuot ya uhyuk tyamp das zis gas, vmesbih xiklyis xoqphuh cho nghuot lyis gas, nyang uhloms nghop bas jungh.
46011007	Vbusbih gas Mangso dah gungsdoeus lho yahge phunk nyoqnho dyei soeu nghuot yvmvyah uhloms nghop toh das zis ma doeus. Vmesbih gas vbusbih dah phunk nyoqnho nghuot.
46011008	Khasoeh ge lyis vbusbih gas vmesbih masyah gvnkhanh toh zis ma nghuot, vmesbih yuk vbusbih masyah dvnghuot.
46011009	Hauh vbusbih eq vmesbih xiklyis gvnkhanh toh zis ma nghuot, vmesbih lyis gas hauh vbusbih xiklyis gvnkhanh toh.
46011010	Housoeh yvmvyah loeuswons bang lyis phauh nyang khyvlyis vmesbih gas nyah yhensain phoq dah vmingh o mha nghuot dah vlho chixoeuq das xiklyis uhloms nghop chah.
46011011	Nghuot laus eq yang Yhensain yah zomh las kang dwis cho mha, vbusbih gas vmesbih ma bos lyis ma gis teh vmesbih eq vbusbih ma bos ma gis.
46011012	Khasoeh ge lyis, vmesbih gas vbusbih masyah gvnkhanh toh zis yah dvyhangteh, vbusbih gas vmesbih masyah khoeu los. Hauh thoq lyis dvnganh yvlyis bweh los nhang dah Yhensain ka Mangso nyang nghuot.
46011013	Vmesbih gas uhloms ma nghop Mangso dah moqphung mha shvmanh dung lyis doeus lah, zis vsainnyang nghamh suon yoeuh nyeis geh.
46011014	Vbusbih gas cam mui lyis nyah xiklyis ngelang gyoh cho nghuot zis gas soenghchoenk lyi mas namoq lyis chixoeuq nyeis ma nghuot lhyeh?
46011015	Nghuot laus eq vmesbih cam mui zis gas nyah xiklyis yungh cho nghuot: Nyah cam xing ka nyah uhloms lyis nghop zis bweh das nyhenshang dyei toh.
46011016	Nghuot laus eq dvyuk yuk hauh cho yah sen lha taiq phyen-goh nghuot lyis gas, ngamoq mas eq, Mangso dah phung mha eq, paiq dah huom mha housoeh uhloms nghop dah thungh mas lai las gohtoeu ma bos, oen ngos hauh soeu lhyi taiq das.
46011017	Namoq paiq das xiklyis zain los dah huom ka vkyuh bos los das xiklyis tsain huom zis ma nghuot. Vkyuh yomh das khyvlyis dvhuom lha o mha taiq toh cho mha ngos namoq lyis ma chungh.
46011018	Cangxeih vcho ka, namoq dah phung huom mha namoq mas xam ma xonh tyixo goh bang bos cho ngos xauhgyo; hauh zis dvkhamh jus oen ngos jingh.
46011019	Namoq mas gang lvn loh cho bweh lo das; Hauh uhlyis hank gas jus yvpheh bos ge dah jyoeng cho dede thuq los das.
46011020	Housoeh las namoq dvgeh huom uhlyis, Yhensain dah nyenhcon zo das xiklyis huom zis ma nghuot.
46011021	Khasoeh ge lyis namoq zo dah uhlyis, nyang yuk nyang toeu wom nyang yuk nyang toeu zo nyeis. Dvyhamh gas yuot nyeis, dvyhamh gas zvbiq shuk yet nyeis.
46011022	Zo shuk das xiklyis vsainnyang yhen ma tsain bos goh lhyeh? Nghuot ya Mangso dah tsainhtoh phung lhyi ma phauh ma nyang jwangh las, ma yoh bang lyis xoq lhoq phuh zis nghuot lhyeh? Ngos namoq lyis haih cho yah sen lha khasoeh taiq los das oen nghamhloms nyeis goh lah? Ngos namoq lyis chungh das lah? Jyoengh ma chungh.
46011023	Khasoeh ge lyis gvshih ngos namoq lyis cheh kyauh toh dah jyauh cho ka Yhensain Mangso mhayah lhom yoeus. Houka Yhensain Yesu gas jeswus loq mas kyauh tyamp zis xauh nyens lyis Yhensain Yesu gas ohlhyoq yoeus las,
46011024	jyehjuh chungh thang lhyi khyiq las, Haih zis gas namoq xiklyis dyei tyamp dah ngah gungs nghuot, ngos lyis soh nyeis das xiklyis haih zis yoeus zo geh, ge.
46011025	Houyah dvyhangteh nyenhcon dye zo thang lhyi, nyang kom lhyi eq yoeus las, Haih kom ka ngah suih yah kyihau tap las kuot toh dah thanghchvp vsaiq nghuot. Hauh yvlyis shuk khanghmuh ngos lyis soh das xiklyis haih zis kuot geh, ge.
46011026	Namoq gas khanhamp laus eq haih ohlhyoq zo las haih kom mha zis shuk khanghmuh hauh Yhensain dah shei kham cho lhyi, nyang doms jweh lyih shoq, kanghjyoeng kat taiq kyoh dyei dah vjyuk nghuot.
46011027	Housoeh las hank laus eq ma mon ma yih zis yah Yhensain dah ohlhyoq zo las, kom mha zis shuk lyis gas, Yhensain dah gungs yahge suih lyis shuot nyeis.
46011028	Housoeh yvmvyah hank laus eq vsainnyang gungs lyis nyei wu yoeuh las, hauh ohlhyoq lyis zo las hauh kom mha zis eq shuk bas jungh.
46011029	Khasoeh ge lyis hau ohlhyoq zo las hau kom mha zis shuk uhlyis hauh Yhensain gungs dah vjyuk lyis ma seqgyo soeu ka vsainnyang dang thang thyet zo khyvlyis zo shuk nyeis.
46011030	Housoeh yvmvyah namoq mas yomnhuk las ma yanghzan bang nyoshoq nyeis, shei loh bang eq nyoshoq nghuot goeus.
46011031	Yang yvnyang gungs lyis shih kyink yoeuh lyis gas Mangso dah soetuon zis ma xauh das.
46011032	Nghuot laus eq yang lyis heisoeh Mangso soetuon lha joeng cho ka yang lyis mungkvn dius jens yah dvgeh dang thang thyet zis ma xauh nhang das xiklyis jyauh cho nghuot.
46011033	Housoeh las ngah boekyis eh, Yhensain dah nyenhcon zo pwe zo das xiklyis namoq zop huom nyeis lyis gas nyang changh nyang langh goh geh.
46011034	Housoeh namoq Yhensain dah nyenhcon zo pwe zo das xiklyis zop huom zis gas, Mangso dah soetuon zis xauh das xiklyis ma nghuot goeus jungh, dius dvyuk yuk yuot nyeis lyis gas, yhen mha zo bas jungh. Gohtoeu chah shih cho yah sen lha ngos jweh los lyis tyeh taiq kyoh das.
46012001	Boekyis eh, namoq maussauh yah nyei los dah Dyos jyungshuk dah cho yah sen lha, hauh dah jyoeng cho ngos namoq lyis seq nhang mes.
46012002	Namoq gohnyau tsain nghuot shih uhlyis cho vja ja pheh chowhang whang zis yah kang ma bos dah silho jens lyis paiq los zis gas namoq nyang seq.
46012003	Hank laus eq Mangso Dyos yah shwih zis kham yoeus soeu nghuot lyis gas, Yhensain Yesu lyis ma nhoengh Gyingshang Dyos yah shwih zis ma xauh kham yoeus lyis gas, Yhensain Yesu gas Yhensain nghuot ge hank eq ma yoh rhen cho, ngos namoq lyis seq nhang mes.
46012004	Gvshih Dyos jyungshuk vja ja bos laus eq, hau jyehjuh jyungshuk lyis Dyos dvkoeuq masyah dyei nyeis.
46012005	Wons wuq das phuqsoe muhzoh vja ja bos, nghuot laus eq phuqsoe das Yhensain ka dvyuk kyingh dvnghuot.
46012006	Wons wuq muhzoh xiklyis kank bos cho vja ja nghuot. Nghuot laus eq dvnganhmoq lyis vsainnyang wons wuq phuqsoe dah lhyenwhei muhzoh xiklyis kank bos cho dyei soeu ka Mangso dvso kyingh dvnghuot.
46012007	Dvnganhmoq xiklyis vkyuh bos bas jungh, dvyuk yah dvyuk mas hau Dyos bos joq cho vja ja khyvlyis chixoeuq nyeis.
46012008	Khasoeh ge lyis dvyuk yuk lyis hau Dyos gas joeui dang seq taiq das kank bos nhang; gohtoeu dvyuk lyis hau Dyos gas seq cho dah dang yoh taiq das kank bos nhang.
46012009	Gohtoeu dvyuk lyis hau Dyos gas Mangso lhyi lomsjingh cho kank bos nhang; gohtoeu dvyuk lyis hau Dyos gas nos lhoq gis das jyungshuk yoh nhang.
46012010	Hau Dyos nyang gohtoeu dvyuk lyis yomsoq muh yoh kuot das kank bos cho dyei; gohtoeu dvyuk lyis lvpe pe nhang, gohtoeu dvyuk lyis Dyos yah dyei dah kank bos cho nghuot ma nghuot seq nghamh gvn yoeuh das jyungshuk, gohtoeu dvyuk lyis nyingh vja ja seq kat nhang, gohtoeu dvyuk lyis taiq dang dah vjyuk seq phant thuq das kank bos cho tsain dyei toh.
46012011	Nghuot laus eq hauh kank bos cho jyehjuh jyungshuk dvnganh gas, Dyos dvkoeuq kyingh yah bweh nhang lha, nyah ehnyet tap khyvlyis nyang yuk nyang toeu lhyi lhyenwhei kank bos cho gvm dyei toh.
46012012	Khristu gas gungsdoeus nyoshoq bos dah gungs yah doeusgoh. Hauh gungs dah gungsdoeus nyoshoq nghuot laus eq gungs dvkoeuq kyingh dvnghuot.
46012013	Houyah dvyhangteh yang dvnganh gas Yuda jens laus eq, gohnyau bang laus eq, jons jens laus eq, luiq bang laus eq Dyos dvkoeuq kyingh mas jeisnyhop tsain kham lha gungsdom dvkoeuq kyingh bweh los. Dvnganhmoq dah ehnyet mas hau Dyos dvkoeuq kyingh lyis kham yoeus.
46012014	Khasoeh ge lyis gungs mas gungsdoeus dvkoeuq kyingh bos zis ma nghuot, nyoshoq bos.
46012015	Khyei ka, Ngos loq ma nghuot yvmvyah gungs yah ma sen, ge sang lhyi ka, housoeh taiq gvng mas nyang gungs yah jyoengh ma sen zis ma nghuot.
46012016	Tsai, no gas, Ngos nyoqjeih ma nghuot yvmvyah gungs yah ma sen, ge sang lhyi ka, housoeh ge gvng mas nyang gungs yah jyoengh ma sen zis ma nghuot.
46012017	Dvgungs gonh nyoqjeih dvkoeuq dvnghuot lyis gas, xauhgyo das cho khalhye bos lah? Xauhgyo das cho kyingh nghuot lyis eq, xauh nam das cho khalhye bos lah?
46012018	Gvshih gas Mangso nyang o zis yah dvyhangteh gungsdoeus nyang doeus nyang lyis nyah joqyos yah nyang gungs mas tap toh.
46012019	Tsai, dvnganh gas gungsdoeus kyingh dvnghuot lyis gas, gungsdom bweh los das zis ma nghuot.
46012020	Gvshih gas gungsdoeus nyoshoq bos nghuot laus eq, gungs dvkoeuq kyingh dvnghuot.
46012021	Housoeh las nyoqjeih gas loq lyis, Ngos nvng lyis ma chah, ge ma yoh sang. Uhloms eq khyei aiq khyungh lyis, Ngos namoq lyis ma chah, ge ma yoh sang.
46012022	Hauh thoq lyis gungs mas yom zes nhuk dah gungsdoeus jens eq ma bos ma gis nghuot.
46012023	Gungs mas hou iq phauh ma dap teh dah gungsdoeus jens lyis yang zes yhaugyen teh gomh nyeis. Yah dah ma yungh gungsdoeus jens lyis zes las nyoqnho ngelang bos shoq shunk toh.
46012024	Yungh joq goeus dah gungsdoeus jens lyis gas ma shunk dyei chah lo. Nyoqnho ma yoh dah gungsdoeus jens lyis nyoqnho ngelang zes yoh nhang das xiklyis Mangso nyang hauh gungsdoeus jens lyis dvgeh xonh tap toh.
46012025	Housoeh las gungs mas gungsdoeus jens nyang changh shaih loh dyos loh zis ma bos, nyang changh nyang chiq goh nyeis.
46012026	Housoeh gungsdoeus dvkoeuq shohjyen zis xauh lyis, gohtoeu gungsdoeus dvnganh eq houyah dvgeh kham zo nyeis. Gungsdoeus dvkoeuq chungh zis xauh lyis, gohtoeu gungsdoeus dvnganh eq dvgeh gauslaus nyeis.
46012027	Gvshih namoq dvnganh gas Khristu dah gungs nghuot las, dvyuk yah dvyuk gas hauh gungsdoeus jens nghuot.
46012028	Mangso ka hauh phung mha, cangxeih joqyos mas lvgyo jens, aiq vjoq mas lvpe jens, somh vjoq mas svra moq, hauh thang lhyi yomsoq muh kuot bang, nos lhoq gis das kank bos jyungshuk yoh bang, gohyuk lyis pangh thuk bang, cho tuonh shet das kank bos bang yahge gohtseq nyingh vja ja seq kat bang lyis nyah joqyos yah nyang toeuq kat toh.
46012029	Nyamoq dvnganh gas lvgyo nghuot lhyeh? Dvnganhmoq lvpe tsain nghuot lhyeh? Dvnganhmoq svra tsain nghuot lhyeh? Dvnganhmoq yomsoq muh yoh kuot lhyeh?
46012030	Dvnganhmoq nos lhoq gis dah jyehjuh yoh lhyeh? Dvnganhmoq gohtseq nyingh vja ja kat lhyeh? Dvnganhmoq kat dah nyingh vjyuk phui lhyeh?
46012031	Housoeh las namoq gas zes thank dah jyehjuh jyungshuk lyis tungh o mes nyeis geh. Tsai, ngos namoq lyis zes thank dah cho dvkoeuq chixoeuq shih das.
46013001	Ngos gas dius nyingh yahge loeuswons bang nyingh vja ja seq taiq laus eq jyetdap ehnyet ma bos lyis gas, thwe bos dah mangh yahge nyings huomh toh dah janghau teh ngos bweh nyeis.
46013002	Ngos lvpe seq pe zis yahge, nghop shung toh cho dvnganh, seq cho vja ja yoh joq zis yahge, boms lyis yoh xwih dah lomsjingh ehnyet bos laus eq, jyetdap ehnyet ma bos lyis gas ngos cha eq ma nghuot.
46013003	Ngos yoh zis dvnganh dyei gvm tyamp las, ngah gungs lyis yangh ngheq phudyei das zis kyauh tyamp laus eq, jyetdap ehnyet ma bos lyis gas ngah xiklyis chah vkyuh ma bos.
46013004	Jyetdap ehnyet gas ehnyet xing, nhaiqnyen, noh cho ma bos, ma moengs ma khwank.
46013005	Jyetdap ehnyet gas ma doeus khyvlyis ma kuot, vsainnyang vkyuh ma xo, lvnyap ma nyho, yobos ma xo.
46013006	Jyetdap ehnyet gas ma dan cho mha ma gauslaus, jyoeng cho mha gauslaus nyeis.
46013007	Jyetdap ehnyet gas khanhamp eq vsomh ma kham, vjangh lomsjingh nyeis, vjangh nghamhloms nyeis, vjangh jhen nyeis.
46013008	Jyetdap ehnyet gas khanhamp eq nungsdoms loh zis ma nghuot; lvpe seq pe cho nghuot lyis gas wui loh das; nyingh vja ja seq taiq cho nghuot lyis eq doms tyamp das; seq cho nghuot lyis gas bi tyamp das.
46013009	Khasoeh ge lyis yah dah seq cho jyehjuh jyungshuk eq, Dyos yah jyuonh dah lvpe dang taiq dah kank bos cho eq dyinghjet zis ma nghuot, vdoeus kyingh dvnghuot.
46013010	Nghuot laus eq hau dyinghjet zis jweh los goeus ya, vdoeus gas dyuk loh das.
46013011	Ngos loshang yoq lyis ngos taiq cho, ehnyet mas kham zo cho, nghamh cho dvnganh gas loshang teh nghuot. Nghuot laus eq ngos svyenh nghuot goeus ya, loshang dah wotwu lyis ngos tyamp goeus.
46013012	Gvshih yang nyvng zis gas bvngtoenk masyah thuq los dah silho lhyi nyvng teh yet yet dvnyvng; hauh thang lyis yang nyoqnho changh nyvng goh das: gvshih ngos seq zis gas dvdoeus dvnghuot; hauh uhlyis Yhensain ngos lyis seq teh ngos eq vlhomuh seq das.
46013013	Gvshih gas lomsjingh zis, nghamhloms zis yahge jyetdap zis ge somh ja bos: nghuot laus eq hauh goeu mas zes kuh thank zis gas jyetdap ehnyet nghuot.
46014001	Housoeh yvmvyah namoq gas jyetdap ehnyet lyis yhung das xiklyis yomkat chah. Dyos jyungshuk lyis nghamh omes nyeis geh. Zes las hau Dang lyis seq taiq kyoh dah jyehjuh jyungshuk lyis omes nyeis geh.
46014002	Khasoeh ge lyis gohtseq nyingh kat soeu ka gohyuk lyis taiq nyeis zis ma nghuot, Mangso lhyi dvtaiq nyeis; Khasoeh ge lyis nyah nyingh hank ma seqgyo dyei, nyang gas Dyos yom lyis yhung lha nghop toh cho lhyi taiq nyeis.
46014003	Nghuot laus eq Mangso Dang taiq soeu ka dius jens lyis jebais los nhang dang, yomdyei taiq kyingh dang, nhaiqtaink dang taiq kyoh nyeis.
46014004	Gohtseq nyingh kat soeu ka, vsainnyang lyis jebais nhang; nghuot laus eq Mangso dah dang seq taiq soeu ka hau phung gonh lyis jebais los nhang.
46014005	Ngos namoq dvnganhmoq lyis gohtseq nyingh seq taiq nhang mes, nghuot laus eq Mangso dah dang yoh taiq kyoh das kank bos cho yah sen dah jyehjuh jyungshuk zes yoh nhang mes: khasoeh ge lyis gohtseq nyingh kat soeu ka nyang taiq dah dang vjyuk lyis taiq phui soeu bos lyis kyingh phung lhyi jebais los nhang. Housoeh ma nghuot lyis gas, Mangso dang taiq kyoh soeu ka gohtseq nyingh kat thoq lyis zes phauhdap.
46014006	Boekyis eh, gvshih ngos namoq jyank mas jweh las, nyingh vja ja kat laus eq, Mangso jyank mas dah nyoqnyvng dang, seq cho dah dang, Dyos yah jyuonh las taiq dah Mangso dang yahge jyauh dang ma taiq kyoh nghuot lyis gas, namoq xiklyis chah vkyuh bos lah?
46014007	Toenk nghuot ya khvlhank teh dah kang ma bos dah toenk khvlhank lyis tsain yoeuh goh. Hauh yvmas nyings dah thwe lhyi kyoq kyoq ma yoh lhoq thuq lyis gas, hauh thwe lhyi hank khasoeh yoh gvn yoeus das lah?
46014008	Lvbuh eq gvn bos khyvlyis ma muot lyis gas, jes toq das khyvlyis hank sont das lah?
46014009	Houyah dvyhangteh namoq gohtseq nyingh kat yvmas dang vjyuk kyoq kyoq ma nghuot lyis gas hank khasoeh seqgyo das lah? Namoq dah dang gas lyeisdons mas dyuk tyamp das.
46014010	Mungkvn mas nyingh thwe vja ja bos laus eq, hauh nyingh thwe mha vjyuk ma bos zis dvkoeuq eq ma bos.
46014011	Nghuot laus eq ngos ma seqgyo dah vnyau nyingh jis soeu ka ngah xiklyis lvbaus nghuot joq las ngos eq nyah xiklyis lvbaus nghuot joq.
46014012	Namoq gas Dyos jyungshuk lyis nghamh o mes nyeis yvmvyah, hauh phung kuhxing los das xiklyis yoh jebais los nhang dah Dyos jyehjuh jyungshuk lyis zes las yhung nyeis geh.
46014013	Housoeh las gohtseq nyingh kat soeu ka, nyang taiq dang dah vjyuk eq yoh phant dah kank bos jyehjuh xauh yoeus das nyhenshang nyang shvmanh dung chah.
46014014	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos nyingh vja ja yah shvmanh dung uhlyis, jyoengh ngah dyos gas shvmanh dung nyeis laus eq ngah ehnyet gas houmha ma bos.
46014015	Housoeh lyis ngos khasoeh kuot das lah? Ngos dyos yah shvmanh dung las ngah ehnyet yah eq shvmanh dung das: ngos ngah dyos yah chunghthwe kat las, ngah ehnyet yah eq chunghthwe kat das.
46014016	Namoq gas dyos yah kyingh Mangso dah jyehjuh lyis chungh las shvmanh dung lyis gas paiq huom mha bos dah dius laiq dvyuk gas namoq taiq dang ma seqgyo yvmvyah namoq shvmanh dung dang lyis khasoeh kuot las Amen, ge yoh chank sang das lah?
46014017	Namoq dah jyehjuh Chungh Dang kha iq gis laus eq gohyuk xiklyis jebais los das cho mha vkyuh bos das zis ma nghuot.
46014018	Ngos namoq thoq lyis gohtseq nyingh vja ja zes seq kat yvmvyah Mangso lhyi nhaiqshoqlang.
46014019	Nghuot laus eq ngos paiq huom mha dang taiq nyeis uhlyis gohtseq nyingh yah dang khonh dvmons yoh taiq thoq lyis, gohyuk lyis yoh jyauh shoq seqgyo dah dang oeng khonh lyis dvzes taiq mes.
46014020	Boekyis eh, namoq nghamh yoeuh cho mha loshang vduot goh; ma shop cho mha lonoeuh dvduot nyeis geh. Nghamh yoeuh cho mha logis kuot geh.
46014021	Lhaihtoh dang mas, Ngah dius nyau jens lyis gohtseq nyingh kat bang dah nhuot yah lhyo yah ngos taiq das. Gohnyau lvbaus dah nhuot yah ngos taiq das. Housoeh lyis yangh ngah vnyau jens ngah dang gyo das zis ma nghuot, ge Yhensain taiq.
46014022	Housoeh yvmvyah gohtseq nyingh seq kat dah jyehjuh gas, ma lomsjingh bang xiklyis kanghjyoeng vlho dvnghuot. Mangso dah dang yoh taiq kyoh dah jyehjuh jyungshuk kank bos cho ka lomsjingh bang xiklyis kanghjyoeng vlho nghuot.
46014023	Housoeh las phung gonh zain los las, dvnganhmoq gohtseq nyingh kat taiq uhlyis, ma seqgyo dah dius laiq, nghuot ya ma lomsjingh bang bos lyis gas, Namoq koh nyeis, ge nyamoq taiq das ma nghuot lhyeh?
46014024	Nghuot laus eq yuk khanghmuh Mangso dah dang taiq kyoh nyeis lyis, ma lomsjingh soeu nghuot ya dius laiq dvyuk yuk wvng los lyis, nyang xauhgyo dah dang gvng mas, nyang gas yobos wons soeu nghuot yvlyis vlhomuh yoh soh das.
46014025	Nyang xauhgyo dah dang dvnganh gvng mas nyah ehnyet nhaiqlom soetuon zis xauh zis yah nyah dah nghop shung toh dah nghamh cho thuq los das las nyang gas gop zis yah Mangso lhyi paiq las, Mangso ka namoq yah jyoengh nyeis nyvng, ge rhen das.
46014026	Housoeh las boekyis eh, ngos taiq mes zis haih zis nghuot. Namoq paiq das xiklyis huom uhlyis, dvyuk gas Chunghthwe kat cho, dvyuk gas jyauh cho, gohtoeu dvyuk gas nyoqnyvng dang phui kyoh cho, gohtoeu dvyuk gas nyingh vja ja yah taiq las, gohtoeu dvyuk gas taiq dang dah vjyuk phui cho wons wuq nyeis geh. Namoq kuot cho dvnganh gas phung lhyi jebais los nhang cho bweh nhang bas jungh.
46014027	Dvyuk yuk gohtseq nyingh yah taiq das bang bos lyis gas, nyo thank aiq yuk, nghuot ya somh yuk, dvyuk thang lhyi dvyuk taiq las, dvyuk gas hau taiq dang dah vjyuk phant bas jungh.
46014028	Vjyuk phant soeu ma bos lyis gas, Nyingh vja ja kat mes soeu ka hau tsainhtoh phung mha nyang gas samlo nyeis las nyah gungs nyang yah eq, Mangso yah eq jis goh nyeis bas jungh.
46014029	Mangso dang taiq kyoh das nyhenshang nyoqnyvng xauh lhom yoeus bang aiq yuk somh yuk taiq las gohyuk gas nyamoq taiq dang lyis suon yoeuh nyeis bas jungh.
46014030	Nghuot laus eq hauh huom mha tsung toh soeu dvyuk yuk mas Mangso jyank masyah nyoqnyvng dang jweh lyis gas dang taiq nyeis soeu ka no bas jungh.
46014031	Zophuom yvmas bos bang dvnganh gas xuq cho bos las yom yoh das nyhenshang dvnganhmoq gas dvyuk thang lhyi dvyuk Mangso dang lyis yoh taiq kyoh das.
46014032	Lvpe nyoqnyvng dang lyis yoh taiq kyoh dah jyehjuh jyungshuk lyis yhung yvmas, taiq kyoh soeu ka vsainnyang gungs lyis joeu chah das.
46014033	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka vnhunk nhunk dah Mangso ma nghuot. Nyang gas nyenstap ngwis ngon cho dah Mangso dvnghuot.
46014034	Mangso dius jens dah phung dvnganh mas chank nyeis zis yah dvyhangteh, vmesbih jens gas zophuom yvmas samlo nyeis bas jungh; nyamoq mas dang taiq das toeuh ma bos; Yuda jens dah lyi mas taiq toh zis yah dvyhangteh nyamoq gas uhjyung jens ma yoh bweh.
46014035	Nyamoq dvja ja dah cho seq mes nyvng mes lyis gas, yhen mha vsainnyang dah yhensain phoq lyis nyei yoeus bas jungh. Huom mha vmesbih xiklyis dang taiq zis gas vxoq vcaiq muh nghuot.
46014036	Mangso dah dang gas namoq jyank masyah thuq los zis nghuot lhyeh? Nghuot ya hauh dang namoq jyank mas kyingh dvjweh los lhyeh?
46014037	Dius dvyuk yuk vsainnyang gungs lyis Mangso dah lvgyo nghuot, nghuot ya Dyos yomsoq xauh yoeus soeu nghuot ge nghamh soeu ka, hai ngos lhaih kat cho ka Mangso tying toh zis nghuot yvlyis seq bas jungh.
46014038	Dvyuk yuk nyang haih cho ma gyo lyis gas, nyah dang lyis eq hank ma gyo bas jungh.
46014039	Housoeh las boekyis eh, namoq gas Mangso dah dang taiq kyoh das cho mha nghamh o mes nyeis geh: nyingh vja ja taiq das cho lhyi eq vtomp toh goh.
46014040	Cho khvt khanghmuh mas phi lha jus khyvlyis kuot loh geh.
46015001	Boekyis eh, ngos namoq lyis taiq kyoh las namoq eq lhom yoeus zis yah hauh yvmas namoq dah lomsjingh cho goeng toenk joq goeus dah hau Gausyis dang cho ngos namoq lyis doms taiq kyingh mes.
46015002	Hauh gausyis dang gas ngos namoq lyis taiq kyoh ku goeus dang nghuot. Namoq gas hau gausyis dang lyis goeng goeng lomsjingh zwi zains toh lyis namoq khyuot yoeus zis xauh das. Housoeh ma nghuot lyis namoq dah lomsjingh cho ka vkom lomsjingh zis dvnghuot das.
46015003	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos lhom yoeus goeus dah yhaugyen thank cho lyis ngos namoq lyis kyauh toh goeus. Houka lhaihtoh dang mas lhaih toh zis yah dvyhangteh Khristu gas yah yaunos xiklyis shei kham goeus cho.
46015004	Nyang nyhop zis xauh las lhaihtoh dang mas taiq zis yah dvyhangteh, somh vnyeih lyis dwis toq loh goeus cho,
46015005	Petru lyis nyvng xoeuq, hauh thang lhyi nyah changlo jens dvci aiq yuk lyis nyvng xoeuq.
46015006	Hauh thang lhyi nyah thang mha chank bang boekyis oengxo nyet lyis dvlhain dvm lyis nyvng xoeuq. Nyamoq mas nyothyang ka gvshih jweh shoq kang dwis nyeis shih, dvyhamh gas yhet pyo tyamp goeus.
46015007	Hauh thang lhyi Yaku lyis, hauh thang lhyi lvgyo jens dvnganhmoq lyis nyvng xoeuq.
46015008	Thang thank lyis ngos buisnyeis ma dyingh khoeu los dah loshang teh dah soeu jyank mas eq thuq xoeuq.
46015009	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos gas lvgyo jens mas ngis thank soeu ngos nghuot. Ngos Mangso dah tsainhtoh phung lhyi shoeuhshih yvmvyah lvgyo oen das zis yangh ma mon.
46015010	Nghuot laus eq Mangso dah jyehjuh gvng mas ngos gas gvshih dah ngos nghuot joq. Mangso ngos lyis dyei dah jyehjuh eq vkom ma nghuot, gohtoeu lvgyo jens dvnganhmoq thoq lyis ngos muh zes wons wuq nyeis. Housoeh yoh kuot zis gas ngos kank bos gvng mas ma nghuot, ngos yah dvgeh nghuot dah Mangso jyehjuh dvnghuot.
46015011	Housoeh las ngos laus eq, gohtoeu lvgyo jens laus eq hai gausyis dang lyis taiq kyoh las namoq eq lomsjingh goeus.
46015012	Khristu gas shei masyah dwis toq loh goeus cho ngamoq taiq kyoh nyeis lyis, namoq mas dvyhamh gas, shei yvmas dwis toq cho ma bos oen khasoeh yoh sang lah?
46015013	Shei masyah dwis toq los zis ma bos lyis gas Khristu eq dwis toq loh das zis ma nghuot.
46015014	Khristu ma dwis toq loh lyis gas, ngamoq dah taiq kyoh dang gas vkom nghuot las, namoq dah lomsjingh zis eq vkom dvnghuot.
46015015	Hauh thoq lyis ngamoq gas Mangso cho mha ma ying kanghjyoeng nghuot loh das. Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka Khristu lyis dwis toq loh nhang goeus oen lha ngamoq nyah cho kanghjyoeng kat goeus. Nghuot laus eq shei goeus bang jyoengh ma dwis toq lyis gas, Mangso nyang lyis dwis toq kat das zis ma nghuot.
46015016	Shei goeus bang ma dwis toq lyis gas, Khristu eq dwis toq kat zis ma xauh lo.
46015017	Khristu ma dwis toq loh lyis gas, namoq dah lomsjingh zis gas loms shuot cho dvkoeuq nghuot zis yah namoq gas namoq dah yaunos mas dvnyop joq shih.
46015018	Hauh thoq lyis, Khristu lyis lomsjingh las shei loh bang eq somh loh goeus ge dah vjyuk nghuot.
46015019	Yang haq caiq lyis kyingh Khristu mas nghamhloms chank dvbos lyis gas, yang gas cangsoeu dius dvnganhmoq thoq lyis zes shohjyen xauh bang nghuot.
46015020	Nghuot laus eq, jyoengh bweh cho ka, Khristu gas shei masyah dwis toq loh goeus las, yhet pyo goeus bang dwis toq das zis pauh toh cho tsain xauh yoeus.
46015021	Khasoeh ge lyis, dius dvyuk gvng mas shei cho bweh los zis yah dvyhangteh dius dvyuk gvng mas eq shei bang xiklyis dwis toq das cho bweh los goeus.
46015022	Dius dvnganh gas Adam yah dvdain dvlom nghuot las shei loh. Houyah dvyhangteh, Khristu yah dvdain dvlom tsain nghuot yvmvyah dvnganh gas shei masyah Khristu mas dwis toq los das.
46015023	Nghuot laus eq yuk khanghmuh nyang yuk nyang toeu vvng khyvlyis dwis toq los das. Khristu gas cangxeih dwis toq loh. Hauh thang lhyi Khristu doms jweh lyih uhlyis, nyang yah sen bang dwis toq los das.
46015024	Hauh thang lhyi thang thank shishenh jweh los das, hauh uhlyis Khristu gas zau nyeis dah dyos sidyos, toeuh yoh bang, yomsoq dvnganh lyis ung tyamp las hau munghdan lyis Uwus Mangso dah loq mas kyauh das.
46015025	Khasoeh ge lyis Khristu gas Mangso yah gomloeus jens dvnganh lyis ung tyamp las Khristu dah khyei o mha toh das shishenh jweh shoq guon nyeis das.
46015026	Thang thank dah jeswus ge dah shei cho ka mhont zis xauh das.
46015027	Lhaihtoh dang mas, Mangso ka vyhang dvnganh yvlyis nyah khyei o mha toh, ge. Vyhang dvnganh ge yvmas Mangso nyang houmha ma bos zis gas bvng bvng nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis vyhang dvnganh Khristu dah khyei o mha toh dah Yhensain ka Mangso nyang nghuot.
46015028	Nghuot laus eq dvnganh yvlyis Khristu guon dah o mha dye toh lyis, hauh Lo nyang vyhang dvnganh yvlyis Uwus Mangso dah o mha toh das las, Mangso ka joq zis dvnganh thoq mas nyang guon nyeis das.
46015029	Shei goeus bang dah nyhenshang nyamoq dah gungsthaiq khyvlyis jeisnyhop kham bang dah cho ka khasoeh gah? Chah vkyuh bweh nhang mes dah nghamhloms zis yah kuot lah? Dvyhamh bang nghamh zis yah dvyhangteh, shei goeus bang dwis toq das cho ma bos cho jyoeng nghuot lyis gas, shei goeus bang xiklyis ge chamus dius jens jeisnyhop tsain kham lah?
46015030	Ngamoq eq chamus shishenh khanghmuh gyuk chiqh cho mha shei ma soh chank kuot nyeis lah?
46015031	Boekyis eh, ngos gas nyeih yau nyeih shei cho yah thungh phuh nyeis. Ngos heisoeh yoh taiq zis gas Yhensain mha namoq gvng mas ngos khwank chank bos yvmvyah nghuot.
46015032	Ngos dius dah ehnyet khyvlyis mungkvn vkyuh lyis nghamhloms zis yah, Ephesu wus mas dah yewus yah sat goh lyis gas ngah xiklyis chah vkyuh bos lah? Shei goeus bang ma dwis toq los das lyis gas dius jens gyangh taiq dang: Yang zo goh, shuk goh, pyo pyo nyeis goh: khasoeh ge lyis yang phvnaq nyeihyo shei das, ge teh dvnghuot das.
46015033	Namoq chowhang vwhang goh: ma gis dah dyenschangh jens gas gis dah wotwu lyis lhoeu thyoq.
46015034	Dan cho chank das zis soh geh, yaunos vtsoq kuot goh: namoq dvyhamh Mangso lhyi ma seq: namoq xoq bas jungh oen ngos heisoeh taiq.
46015035	Shei goeus bang khasoeh yoh dwis toq das lah? Khasoeh teh gungs nghuot das lah, ge dvyuk yuk nyei das.
46015036	Houka koh soeu dah nyeidang nghuot, nvng nyeisjvng mas jyo nyau dvchvp xoh lyis, hauh jyo nyau shih ma shei tyamp lyis gas yoh yuk los zis ma nghuot.
46015037	Nvng tsoh mas xoh dah jyo nyau gas gukchvp, nghuot ya gohtoeu vnyau dvja ja dvnghuot. Yuk los dah gungs gas nvng xoh dah vjeih ma nghuot lo.
46015038	Mangso ka nyang o zis yah dvyhangteh, hauh jyo nyau lyis gungs vsaiq dyei toh. Yhensain ka jyo nyau khanghmuh lyis vsainnyang yah phi dah gungs tsain dyei toh.
46015039	Kang dwis nyeis dah gungs shoh bos ya bos zis gas dvja kyingh ma nghuot: dius dah gungs shoh dvja, gaunyhauq dah gungs shoh dvja, nghoq dah gungs shoh dvja, oengdoq dah gungs shoh dvja dvnghuot.
46015040	Maukhung yah sen dah gungs, nyeisjvng mas zis yah sen dah gungs ge gohtoeu toeu bos. maukhung gungs yah sen dah phunk gas, nyeisjvng yah sen dah gungs dah phunk yah shaih joq.
46015041	Buis eq nyah phunk yoh, lhamhmuh eq nyah phunk, kyi eq nyang gohphunk yoh, kyi mha yangh dvlom yah dvlom bvng zis gohtoeu toeu dvnghuot.
46015042	Shei goeus bang dwis toq das cho eq housoeh nghuot. Hauh gungs gas tsoh mas nyhop lyis seq dyoqbis loh. Dwis toq los lyis ma seq dyoqbis zis nghuot das.
46015043	Nyhop zis xauh uhlyis ma yungh, yom ma bos. Dwis toq los uhlyis houka yungh las yomsoq bos das.
46015044	Nyhop uhlyis nyeisjvng gungs dvnghuot, dwis toq los uhlyis gas dyos gungs nghuot das. Nyeisjvng gungs bos lyis gas dyos gungs eq bos das.
46015045	Lhaihtoh dang mas taiq zis yah dvyhangteh, cangxeih dius Adam gas kang dwis dah cangsoeu dius khyvlyis gvnkhanh toh zis xauh goeus. Nghuot laus eq thang thank Adam gas kang bos dah dyos nghuot.
46015046	Dyos gungs shih bos zis ma nghuot, nyeisjvng gungs bos thang lhyi dyos yah sen dah gungs doms bos.
46015047	Cangxeih Adam gas tsoh yah gvnkhanh toh las nyeisjvng mas zis nghuot. Thang lhyi dah Adam gas maukhung mhayah jweh los soeu nghuot.
46015048	Nyeisjvng thoq yah sen dah dius jens gas tsohmop yah gvnkhanh zis xauh soeu yah tsain doeusgoh. Maukhung yah sen bang gas maukhung mhayah jweh los dah dius yuk yah tsain doeusgoh.
46015049	Tsohmop yah kuot toh dah dius yuk yah doeusgoh dah gungsdoeus lho lhyi yang chi toh zis yah dvyhangteh, maukhung mhayah jweh los dah dius yah doeusgoh dah gungs doeus lho lhyi eq yang tsain chi toh das.
46015050	Boekyis eh, ngos namoq lyis taiq mes zis gas, suih yah shoh yah nghuot dah dius gas Mangso munghdan dah vso vlho ma yoh zom das zis yahge seq dyoqbis zis gas ma seq dyoqbis dah vso vlho lhyi xauh zom das zis ma nghuot.
46015051	Gyo geh, nghop toh dah jyoeng cho dvkoeuq ngos namoq lyis taiq kyoh bah: yang dvnganh gas shei loh das zis ma nghuot. Nghuot laus eq thang thank dah lvbuh nyings lyis, yang dvnganh gas nyet los nyet tant nyoq dvnyik gyo lyis thaiq loh das. Khasoeh ge lyis hauh lvbuh muot kat uhlyis shei goeus bang gas ma dyoq ma bis dwis toq los das zis yahge khanhamp eq doms shei das zis ma nghuot lo. Yang dvnganh thaiq loh das.
46015053	Khasoeh ge lyis hau seq dyoqbis zis gas ma seq dyoqbis yvpheh thaiq loh das; hai seq shei zis eq ma seq shei yvpheh thaiq loh das.
46015054	Housoeh las hai seq dyoqbis zis gas ma seq dyoqbis zis lyis eq seq shei zis gas ma seq shei yvlyis eq thaiq wuot goeus ya, Shei zis gas Ung zis yah nyhau tyamp zis xauh goeus, Shei zis lyis Ung zis yah nhiq zaiq cho dye goeus, ge lhaihtoh dang nyuk los.
46015055	Shei zis eh, nah nyen khalhye gah? Shei zis eh, nah ung zis khalhye gah?
46015056	Shei cho ka nyah nyen yaunos masyah xauh yoeus. Yaunos gas nyah yomsoq lyis Lyi masyah xauh yoeus.
46015057	Nghuot laus eq Yhensain Yesu gvng mas yang lyis ung cho dyei dah Mangso jyehjuh gas kuh joq.
46015058	Housoeh yvmvyah, ngos jyetdap boekyis eh, namoq goeng goeng yap geh. Yhensain Mangso dah muh wons wuq nyeis cho ka khanhamp eq vkom ma nghuot yvlyis soh zis yah hau Yhensain dah muhzoh mas vjangh tungh yomkat wons wuq nyeis geh.
46016001	Yuda mau mas Mangso dah dius jens lyis pangh das nyhenshang vlu ngwis yung das xiklyis namoq lhaih nyei los zis yah sen lha, ngos Galati mau mas dah phung jens lyis tying kat yhangteh namoq kuot geh.
46016002	Ngos jweh los lyis khywi cho ma kuot chah lo bas jungh, daus khanghmuh dah cangxeih vnyeih lyis, nyang yuk nyang toeu lhyi Mangso nyeisgis yaplhoq nhang zis yah dvyhangteh vsainnyang dah vlu lyis yung toh langh geh.
46016003	Ngos jweh los lyis, namoq tying kat, huon maussauh lhaih las namoq khyen toeuq toh bang lyis hau vlu ngwis Yerusalem mas ngos loh dih kat nhang das.
46016004	Ngah nyhenshang vkyuh bos das teh bweh las ngos eq loh doeus geh lyis gas, nyamoq ngos yah dvgeh loh bas jungh.
46016005	Ngos Makedoni mau cho suh lai las namoq jyank mas jweh los das: khasoeh oen lhyi, ngos Makedoni mau cho suh lai loh chah.
46016006	Ngos namoq yah dvyoq nyangh shoq xauh nyeis mvbeh oen nghamh. Hauh thang lhyi khapheh nghuot laus eq ngos gyung tsoq suh loh das nyhenshang namoq ngos lyis yoh pangh kat das oen nghamhloms.
46016007	Ngos namoq jyank cho yah suh lai uhjyangh dvsoq dvno khyvlyis ma mes kuot. Mangso dah ehnyet nghuot lyis gas ngos namoq yah dvgeh dvyoq xauh nyeis das oen nghamhloms nyeis.
46016008	Pentekoti pwe jweh shoq ngos Ephesu wus mas nyeis shih das.
46016009	Vkyuh bos dah muhzains wons wuq das toeuh gis ngah xiklyis joq. Nghuot laus eq ngos lyis tyixo dah jeswus nyoshoq eq nyeis.
46016010	Namoq jyank mas Timothi jweh los nghuot lyis, nyang mas chiqh cho gyuk cho ma bos, namoq yah dvgeh yoh nyeis bas jungh, nyang lyis gaus gaus yis yis lhom yoeus langh geh. Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas ngos yah dvyhangteh Yhensain dah muhzoh lyis wons wuq nyeis soeu nghuot.
46016011	Hank eq nyang lyis dius ma phauh ma nyang ma kuot bas jungh. Nyah gyung cho lhyi pyo pyo yoh tsoq loh bas jungh, nyang lyis namoq pangh kat chah. Housoeh Khristan boekyis yah dvgeh ngah jyank mas doms los das oen ngos nghamhloms las langh nyeis.
46016012	Gvshih boek Apolo cho yah sen lha taiq lyis, gohtoeu boekyis yah dvgeh nyang namoq jyank mas los kwang das nyhenshang ngos nyang lyis dvsoq soq lyis yom e dyei goeus. Nghuot laus eq nyang gvshih shishenh lyis loh das zis nyang dvtsiq eq ma nghamh thyet. Gis bweh shishenh jweh lyis nyang loh das.
46016013	Namoq zungh nyeis geh, lomsjingh cho mha goeng goeng yap las womh womh kuot geh, yangh yangh kuot geh.
46016014	Namoq kuot muh dvnganh zis gas jyetdap ehnyet yah kuot nyeis geh.
46016015	Namoq Stephana yahge nyah yhenbang dah cho seq. Nyamoq gas Akhaia mau mas cangxeih Khristan bweh bang nghuot las, Mangso dah dius jens lyis phuqsoe das xiklyis nyamoq gungs lyis kyauh toh bang nghuot.
46016016	Boekyis eh, namoq gas housoeh teh bang shwih cho lhyi eq, nyamoq yah dvgeh pangh thuk zis yah muh wons wuq phuqsoe nyeis bang shwih cho lhyi eq lhom yoeus las chank das xiklyis ngos namoq lyis dung.
46016017	Stephana, Fortunatu yahge Akhaiku moq jweh los yvmvyah ngos gaus. Nyamoq gas namoq dah gungsthaiq ngos lyis phuqsoe.
46016018	Nyamoq gas namoq dah ehnyet lyis pyo nhang teh ngah ehnyet lyis eq pyo nhang goeus. Housoeh teh bang gas chungh zis kham mon bang nghuot.
46016019	Asia mau mas dah tsainhtoh phung ka namoq lyis jeshuh kat. Akula yahge Priska vzomh yah dvgeh nyamoq yhen mha zop paiq dah phung mha bang eq, namoq lyis Khristan jyetdap ehnyet yah svsoh tsain jeshuh kat.
46016020	Heimha nyeis dah Khristan boekyis dvnganh namoq lyis jeshuh kat. Namoq nyang changh nyang gyingshang dah bvlot tanh zis yah jeshuh goh geh.
46016021	Ngos Paulo dah jeshuh dang lyis ngvnyang loq yah lhaih kat.
46016022	Dvyuk yuk hauh Yhensain lhyi ma jyetdap nghuot lyis gas, nyang nhoengh zis xauh bas jungh. Hauh Yhensain jweh los bas jungh.
46016023	Yhensain Yesu dah jyehjuh gas namoq yah dvgeh nghuot bas jungh.
46016024	Ngah jyetdap ehnyet gas, Khristu Yesu mas namoq dvnganhmoq yah dvgeh nghuot bas jungh.
47001001	Mangso dah ehnyet yah dvyhangteh, Khristu Yesu dah lvgyo ngos Paulo yahge vmang vnoeuh Timothi gas — Korinthu wus mas Mangso dah tsainhtoh phung yahge Akhaia mau gonh mas dah gyingshang bang dvnganhmoq lyis jeshuh kat.
47001002	Yah Uwus Mangso yahge Yhensain Yesu Khristu gas jyehjuh yahge nyenstap cho namoq lyis dyei bas jungh.
47001003	Nhaiq seq nyen dah Uwus yahge pangh cho vja ja dah Mangso, yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah Uwus Mangso lhyi nhaiqshoqlang chungh goh.
47001004	Yang yaukyenh shanghsenh vja ja xauh uhlyis Mangso yang lyis pangh goeus. Housoeh las yang gas Mangso jyank masyah kham yoeus dah nhaiqtaink jyehjuh yah gohtoeu yaukyenh shanghsenh vja ja xauh nyeis bang lyis doms yoh pangh.
47001005	Yang gas Khristu khamzo dah shanghsenh nyoshoq lyis bos gvm kham zis yah dvyhangteh, Khristu mas Mangso dyei dah pangh cho jyehjuh zainsmuh lyis eq bos gvm kham yoeus nyeis.
47001006	Housoeh las ngamoq shanghsenh zis xauh lyis, houka namoq xiklyis nhaiqtaink jyehjuh yahge khyuot yoeus cho xauh yoeus das nyhenshang nghuot. Ngamoq nhaiqtaink jyehjuh xauh kham yoeus lyis gas, namoq eq ngamoq yah dvyhangteh hauh jyehjuh lyis xauh kham yoeus las ngamoq jhen dah shanghsenh yvlyis namoq ehnyet xing xing yah yoh jhen das yom xauh yoeus.
47001007	Ngamoq shanghsenh yvmas namoq bos zis yah dvyhangteh, ngamoq kham yoeus dah nhaiqtaink jyehjuh lyis eq namoq xauh kham yoeus nyeis yvmvyah, namoq mas ngamoq dah nghamhloms cho ma lop ma loeh goeng joq yvlyis ngamoq seq.
47001008	Boekyis eh, Asia mau mas ngamoq xauh goeus dah shanghsenh cho namoq lyis doms taiq kyingh mes. Ngamoq lyis nhiq dah shanghsenh ge dah yvwons s gas kuh las svsoh lyei yvmvyah ngamoq gas kang dwis das zis yangh ma nghamhloms lo shoq nghuot.
47001009	Ngamoq gas shei das yobos dang thang thyet zis xauh bang nghuot oen vsainnyang gungs lyis nghamh goeus. Nghuot laus eq heisoeh bweh cho ka ngamoq gas vsainnyang gungs lyis ma nges, shei goeus bang lyis dwis toq nhang dah Mangso lhyi nges das xiklyis nghuot.
47001010	Nyang gas housoeh teh gyukphoh shei cho mhayah ngamoq lyis lhuiq kat goeus las lhuiq kat shih das. Namoq eq namoq dah vkyuh dung zis yah ngamoq lyis pangh nyeis yvmvyah nyang gas ngamoq lyis khyuot lhuiq kat shih das oen nghamhloms zis yah langh nyeis. Housoeh yvmvyah Mangso dah dius jens nyoshoq ngamoq xiklyis shvmanh dung dang lyis gyo dyei las ngamoq lyis shvmanh dyei das. Housoeh dius nyoshoq gas nyamoq dah thwe kat las ngamoq xiklyis Mangso lhyi nhaiqshoqlang ge tsain chungh das.
47001012	Ngamoq ehnyet mha khwank das cho dvkoeuq bos.
