Houka haih mungkvn mas ngamoq kang dwis cho, zes las namoq yah zomh tsoq goh cho mha dius dah seq cho mha ma nges, Mangso dah jyehjuh yomsoq yah ngamoq gas Mangso dyei dah jyoeng lha lhoqshang dah ehnyet yah guon khyvlyis chank las muh wons wuq cho nghuot.
47001013	Gvshih ngamoq lhaih huon dah maussauh mas namoq nghap las seqgyo das cho kyingh dvlhaih kat. Nghuot laus eq gvshih namoq ngamoq taiq yvlyis dvkhamh dvseqgyo laus eq thang pheh namoq ngamoq taiq yvlyis dyinghjet shoq seqgyo das nyhenshang ngos nghamhloms. Housoeh Yhensain Yesu dah buisnyeis lyis ngamoq gas namoq gvng mas yoh khwank teh namoq eq ngamoq gvng mas yoh khwank das.
47001015	Haih cho jens lyis nghamhnywe zis yah namoq gas aiq vlhain jyehjuh xauh yoeus bas jungh, namoq jyank mas shih los jweh das oen nghamhtoeuq toh.
47001016	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos Makedoni mau pheh loh uhjyangh eq, hou mhayah tauh los uhlyis eq namoq jyank mas wvng las Yuda mau pheh loh das gyung cho xiklyis namoq jyank masyah pangh cho yoh bas jungh oen nghamh.
47001017	Gvshih ngos housoeh nghamh toeuq yvmas ngos gas phanh ehnyet bos soeu nghuot cho chixoeuq nyeis lhyeh? Ngos nghamh toeuq cho lhyi ngos nghamh thyet loh uhlyis vsainnyang vkyuh dvxo dah cvvq ehnyet yah kuot loh lhyeh? Dvshishenh lyis, Nghuot goeus ge las eq ma nghuot lo ge las eq aiq ja taiq nyeis lhyeh?
47001018	Jyoengh Mangso ka jyoeng yvlyis taiq nyeis zis yah dvyhangteh ngos ngamoq lyis dyei dah dangthoengh eq nghuot zis yahge ma nghuot lhoeuq dah dang aiq ja ma nghuot.
47001019	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos, Sila yahge Timothi taiq kyoh goeus Mangso dah Lo Yesu Khristu gas, Nghuot yahge ma nghuot mvlhuk lvjus soeu ma nghuot. Jyoengh oen lhyi nyang gas Mangso nhaiqdoeus cho lhyi, Nghuot ge taiq dah Yhensain nghuot.
47001020	Nyang mas Mangso dah dangthoengh dvnganh, Nghuot, ge dah phuk dang nghuot. Housoeh las ngamoq gas Mangso dah phunk hoeuh das xiklyis Yesu Khristu mas Amen oen sang.
47001021	Namoq yahge ngamoq dvgeh Khristu mas dvdain dvlom kang dwis nhang soeu ka, Mangso nyang nghuot.
47001022	Mangso nyang yang lyis lhyenwhei khyen yoeus zis yah nyah dius nyau nghuot cho kyihau tap las, jweh los das shishenh lyis yang kham yoeus das jyehjuh dvnganh xiklyis pauh toh khyvlyis yah nhaiqlom khau mha hau Gyingshang Dyos huot kat dyei toh goeus.
47001023	Ngos Korinthu pheh ma doms loh lo das oen nghamh thyet zis gas namoq lyis sunghhuq nhang mes las nghuot cho ngah ehnyet lyis seq dyei dah Mangso ka ngah kanghjyoeng nghuot goeus.
47001024	Ngamoq namoq lyis, cha lhyi lomsjingh chah oen ma taiq, namoq gas hau lomsjingh cho mha goeng goeng yap joq yvlyis ngamoq seq. Ngamoq gas namoq dah gausyis pyo ngon cho xiklyis namoq yah dvgeh muh dvwons wuq nyeis.
47002001	Housoeh namoq nhaiqkuk cho dvlhain ma doms bweh bas jungh, ngos namoq jyank pheh ma doms los das oen nghamh thyet goeus.
47002002	Khasoeh ge lyis, ngos namoq lyis nhaiq lhoq ngis lyis gas, ngos lyis gaus nhang soeu ka hank nghuot lo das lah? Ngos nhaiq lhoq ngis goeus bang namoq kyingh dvnghuot das.
47002003	Ngos lyis gaus nhang das bang nyang ngos lyis ehnyet ma pyo cho ma bweh nhang bas jungh, ngos namoq jyank mas ma mes los lo. Housoeh las ngos haih maussauh lyis lhaih kat. Khasoeh ge lyis ngos gaus lyis namoq dvnganh eq gaus das yvlyis loms.
47002004	Ngos gas yaukyenh shanghsenh, ehnyet nyo las nyoqdyeis nyoshoq yah hauh maussauh lyis lhaih kat goeus. Ngos nghamh toeuq cho ka namoq lyis nhaiq lhoq ngis das xiklyis ma nghuot. Ngos namoq lyis kha iq jyetdap nyeis cho seq nhang mes las lhaih kat.
47002005	Gvshih dvyuk yuk yah dius dvyuk yuk lyis nhaiqkuk nhang lhyi ka, ngos lyis ma nghuot, dvcho khyvlyis taiq lyis gas namoq dvnganh lyis nhaiqkuk nhang zis nghuot. Ngos heisoeh taiq zis gas hauh soeu thoq mas dvmsunk khyvlyis ma mes kuot yvmvyah taiq zis nghuot.
47002006	Namoq nyothyang yah yobos huon jyauh mhoq dvm dyei zis gas hauh soeu xiklyis geh joq.
47002007	Hauh soeu ka ma yoh zain shoq dah nhaiqkuk yvmas ma nyop loh bas jungh, nyang lyis namoq yobos khyuot dyei las nhaiq doms taink nyeis geh.
47002008	Housoeh las namoq gas nyang lyis jyoengh jyetdap nyeis cho nyang seqgyo shoq kuot das xiklyis ngos namoq lyis dung.
47002009	Xikpheh ngos namoq jyank mas maussauh lhaih kat cho ka, shi yoeuh yvlyis namoq kha iq yoh kham cho yahge ngos taiq shet toh cho lhyi domsyos gyo las chank kuot das xiklyis cicont nghuot nyeis lah, ge yvlyis seq das nyhenshang nghuot.
47002010	Namoq gas, dvyuk yuk nyang cu yvlyis khyuot dyei lyis gas, ngos eq bos khyuot dyei. Khasoeh ge lyis ngos dvyuk yuk lyis yobos khyuot dyei chah los lyis, ngos gas namoq dah nyoqnho lhyi yoeuh las Khristu xikkhonh mas nyah yobos khyuot dyei.
47002011	Ngos heisoeh kuot zis gas Satan shih yang lyis ma ung tyamp bas jungh joeui yah kuot zis nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis, Satan dah joeui da cho lhyi yang seq.
47002012	Khristu dah gausyis dang taiq kyoh das xiklyis ngos Troa wus mas jweh lyis hauh joqyos mas ngos muh yoh wons wuq bas jungh Yhensain ngah xiklyis khomh phank toh dyei.
47002013	Nghuot laus eq ngamoq dah vmang vnoeuh Titu yah ma xauhgoh las, ngos svsoh chiq nyeis. Housoeh las ngos houmha bang lyis jeshuh khoq las Makedoni mau pheh loh.
47002014	Nghuot laus eq Mangso lhyi nhaiqshoqlang: Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas ngamoq lyis Khristu yah dvdain dvlom kuot dyei las Khristu dah ung cho pwe mha jens loh dah thung dius jens lyis teh Mangso ka ngamoq lyis shwih. Khristu lyis seq dah seq cho lhyi xangh shom teh joqyos khanghmuh mas tyo das xiklyis Mangso ka ngamoq lyis yhung nyeis.
47002015	Khasoeh ge lyis ngamoq gas Mangso lhyi Khristu ngheq dyei dah xangh shom yah doeusgoh. Hauh xangh shom ka khyuot yoeus xauh bang mas eq somh loh bang mas eq hoeuh loh goeus.
47002016	Hauh shom ka dyoqbis bang mas shei nhang dah shei shom duot las, khyuot yoeus zis xauh goeus bang dah xiklyis gas kang dwis nhang dah xangh shom nghuot. Housoeh las housoeh teh muh wons wuq das zis hank mon yih nyeis lah?
47002017	Ngamoq gas gohyhamh nyoshoq teh Mangso dah dang lyis phauh ma dap dah kaih hu teh ungh cho wis cho ma kuot. Ngamoq gas Mangso nhang kat bang nghuot las, Khristu dah jyeidwis jens khyvlyis Mangso xikkhonh mas hauh dang lyis jyoeng lha lhoqshang ehnyet yah dvtsain taiq kyoh.
47003001	Heisoeh taiq zis gas ngamoq dah cho ngamoq moengs teh ge lhyeh? Dius dvyhamh teh ngamoq cho taiq toenk maussauh namoq lyis dyei chah lah? Nghuot ya, namoq jyank masyah taiq toenk maussauh sang wons chah lhyeh?
47003002	Namoq gungs nyang dius yuk khanghmuh nghap las yoh seq, ngamoq dah ungkhau ehnyet mas lhaih toh dah maussauh nyang tsain nghuot.
47003003	Hauh maussauh lyis Khristu nyang lhaih las ngamoq lyis yah huon kat zis gas bvng bvng nghuot. Hauh maussauh lyis mvcheih yah ma lhaih, dwis nyeis Mangso dah Dyos yah, tsai luklhywaq mas ma nghuot dius dah nhaiqlom mas tsain lhaih toh.
47003004	Ngamoq heisoeh womh taiq zis gas, Khristu gvng mas Mangso mha ngamoq nghamhnywe las nghuot.
47003005	Ngamoq gas haih muh lyis yoh kuot oen yoh taiq das zis ngamoq chah yomsoq eq ma bos. Ngamoq yoh dah yomsoq gas Mangso mhayah nghuot.
47003006	Yang gas Thanghchvp saiq xiklyis muh yoh wons bas jungh, ngamoq lyis yomdyei zis gas hauh Yhensain nyang nghuot. Hau Thanghchvp saiq gas lhaih toh dah Lyi mas bos zis ma nghuot. Dyos mas dvbos. Khasoeh ge lyis sauhchvp yah lhaihtoh Lyi gas kang thyet las Dyos gas kang dwis nhang.
47003007	Luk lhywaq mas lhaih toh dah Lyi dyei uhlyis Mangso dah phunk bvng joq. Hau phunk bvng zis gas Moshe nyoqnho mhayah zoh zoh bi loh nyeis. Nghuot laus eq svsoh bvng nyeis shih las Israel dius jens nyah nyoqnho lhyi ma yoh yoeuh tsuk toh. Shei cho bweh nhang dah Lyi lyis housoeh teh phunk yah dyei lyis gas,
47003008	Dyos dah muhzoh yah sen dah phunk gas kha iq zes bvng das ma nghuot lhyeh?
47003009	Dang thang thyet cho yah sen dah muhzoh gas phunk bos nghuot lyis gas, khyuot yoeus cho dyei zis yah sen dah muhzoh gas phunk kha iq zes bos das lah!
47003010	Gvshih svsoh bvng dah phunk gvng mas, xik lyis dvlhain bvng goeus dah phunk gas yop loh goeus oen yang yoh taiq.
47003011	Dvsoq kyingh dvdoengs joq dah muh yangh phunk bos nghuot lyis gas, goeng joq dah muh mas phunk kha iq zes bos joq das lah?
47003012	Ngamoq haih nghamhloms cho tsain bos yvmvyah, ngamoq svsoh womh nyeis.
47003013	Ngamoq gas Moshe teh ma nghuot. Nyang gas nyah nyoqnho mhayah bvng dah phunk bi loh goeus zis Israel jens ma nyvng das xiklyis nyah nyoqnho lhyi nyoqnghop khuk toh.
47003014	Israel jens dah ehnyet gas jyoengh nghop gos toh. Khvnyhik jweh shoq laus eq Thanghchvp cauh lyis nghap khanghmuh nyamoq dah ehnyet lyis nyoqnghop hauh zis yah tsain nghop toh shih. Dius dvyuk gas Khristu mas kang dwis los lyis hau nyoqnghop lyis dvyoh yop tyamp.
47003015	Khvnyhik jweh shoq yangh nyamoq Moshe dah lyi nghap uhlyis hau nyoqnghop gas nyamoq dah nghamh cho lhyi tsain khuk toh shih.
47003016	Nghuot laus eq nyang Yhensain jyank pheh lhain los lyis hau nyoqnghop lyis xik tyamp dyei zis xauh nyeis.
47003017	Yhensain ge zis gas Dyos lyis ge, Yhensain dah Dyos lungh joqyos mas luiq dah toeuh yoh.
47003018	Housoeh las yang dvnganh gas nyoqnghop xik tyamp goeus dah nyoqnho yah Yhensain dah phunk dah siyet lyis doms tauh chixoeuq nyeis. Hau phunk nyang Dyos ge dah Yhensain mhayah jweh los las Yhensain yah zes zes doeus dah phunk shot pheh yang lyis thaiq loh nhang.
47004001	Mangso ka nyah nhaiqnyen zis yah ngamoq lyis haih muh kyauh toh goeus. Housoeh las ngamoq yom ma gyau.
47004002	Ngamoq gas zauh toh dah xoq phoh dah muh dvnganh lyis tyamp goeus. Ngamoq gas mhuih khyvlyis ma kuot; Mangso dang lyis ma hwah, ma phanh taiq. Ngamoq gas Mangso dah xikkhonh mas jyoeng cho dah bvng yvmas kang dwis las yuk khanghmuh dah sohseq ehnyet yah doeus khyvlyis tsain nyeis.
47004003	Ngamoq taiq kyoh dah gausyis dang lyis ma seqgyo bang bos lyis gas, hauh bang gas somh loh zis xauh bang dvnghuot.
47004004	Hai mungkvn dah ma gis mangso ge Satan gas nyamoq dah ehnyet lyis mauchuotdwang yah nghop tyamp dyei yvmvyah nyamoq ma lomsjingh. Satan ka Mangso dah gungsdoeus nyang nghuot dah Khristu dah phunk cho hau Gausyis Dang masyah thuq dah bvng yvlyis gos tyamp dyei.
47004005	Khasoeh ge lyis ngamoq gas ngamoq nyang cho lhyi taiq kyoh zis ma nghuot, Yesu Khristu gas Yhensain nghuot cho, ngamoq gas Yesu gvng mas namoq dah jyeidwis tsain nghuot yvlyis eq taiq kyoh.
47004006	Yesu Khristu dah nyoqnho mha bvng dah phunk cho namoq seq bas jungh, ngamoq dah ehnyet lyis pank dyei dah Mangso ka, Mauchuotdwang masyah bvng zis thuq los das, ge taiq dah Mangso nyang nghuot.
47004007	Nghuot laus eq mathank magons yomsoq gas yah jyank masyah ma nghuot, Mangso jyank masyah nghuot cho yoh chixoeuq bas jungh, hai Dyos zisyos yoh toh bang yang gas tsoh yam yah dv doeusgoh.
47004008	Ngamoq gas dvsoq soq lyis yaukyenh laus eq thungh thyi zis ma xauh; dvlhain lhain khamkhvv laus eq ehnyet ma dyet.
47004009	Jeswus nyoshoq bos laus eq dyenschangh ma yoh lo zis khanhamp eq ma bos. Dvlhain lhain svsoh nos loh laus eq ma dyoq ma bis.
47004010	Yesu gas ngamoq gungs mas kang dwis nyeis zis dede nghuot das nyhenshang, ngamoq dah seq shei gungs gas Yesu kham khoq, shanghsenh dah shei cho lhyi vjangh kham nyeis.
47004011	Yesu dah kang dwis cho ka ngamoq dah seq shei gungsshoh mas yoh nyvng bas jungh, ngamoq gas ngamoq dah kang dwis cho gonh mas shishenh khanghmuh Yesu nyhenshang shei kham das cho mha suh e nyeis.
47004012	Haih vjyuk gas, Shei cho ka ngamoq mas muh khanh nyeis laus eq, kang dwis cho ka namoq mas muh khanh nyeis.
47004013	Lhaihtoh dang mas, Lomsjingh yvmvyah ngos taiq, ge zis yah dvyhangteh ngamoq eq lomsjingh yvmvyah tsain taiq.
47004014	Yhensain Yesu lyis shei masyah dwis toq nhang dah Mangso ka ngamoq lyis eq Yesu yah dvgeh dwis toq nhang das las, namoq yah dvgeh nyah xikkhonh mas shwih loh das zis ngamoq seq.
47004015	Haih cho dvnganh gas namoq mas vkyuh bweh los das nyhenshang nghuot. Mangso dah jyehjuh lyis kham yoeus bang eq zes nyo los zis yah dvyhangteh, Yhensain dah phunk lyis nhaiqshoqlang shvmanh dung cho eq zes nyo los das.
47004016	Haih cho gvng mas ngamoq khanhamp eq ehnyet ma dyet yom ma gyau. Ngamoq dah gungs nghe pheh nyoq yah nyvng dah gungs vzwvng gas zoh zoh yah dyoqbis loh nyeis. Nghuot laus eq gungs vkhau pheh dyos vzwvng gas dvnyeih dvnyeih vsaiq soq thaiq yvlyis xauh kham yoeus.
47004017	Ngamoq dvdvm dvsoq xauh nyeis dah shanghsenh dvtsiq dvthang ka ngamoq lyis yaukyenh thoq lyis zes kuh zis yahge vcaiq vto nghuot dah phunk lyis xauh kham yoeus nhang nyeis.
47004018	Ngamoq gas nyoq yah nyvng dah vyhang lhyi yoeuh tsuk toh zis ma nghuot. Nyoq yah ma nyvng dah vyhang lhyi dvyoeuh tsuk toh. Khasoeh ge lyis nyoq yah nyvng dah vyhang ka dvsoq dvjoq, nyoq yah ma nyvng dah vyhang ka vcaiq vto goeng joq.
47005001	Nyeisjvng thoq mas yang nyeis dah zvng ge dah gungsdom dyoqbis loh lyis Mangso ka maukhung mha yang nyeis das xiklyis nyang kuot dah vcaiq vto goeng joq dah yhen yang yoh toh yvlyis yang seq.
47005002	Gvshih yang hau zvng mas lungh joq lyis maukhung mha dah yhen lyis yoh wuot toh das zis svsoh bweh nhang mes yvmvyah yang nos tsain kyingh nyeis.
47005003	Housoeh xauh wuot toh goeus ya yang gas gungs ma yoh bang duot das zis ma nghuot.
47005004	Haih nyeisjvng zvng mas nyeis shih uhlyis wons wuq dah yvwons yah nhiq yvlyis xauh kham dah ehnyet yah nos tsain kyingh nyeis. Housoeh noskyingh zis gas yah nyeisjvng gungsdom lyis yoeus tyamp mes las ma nghuot, seq shei yvlyis vcaiq vto kang dwis cho pheh thaiq loh das nyhenshang maukhung mha dah gungs lyis wuot toh mes las nghuot.
47005005	Hau thaiq loh das cho, yah nyhenshang sont dyei soeu ka Mangso nghuot. Nyang gas yang kham yoeus dah jyehjuh dvnganh xiklyis pauh toh dyei khyvlyis Dyos dyei toh.
47005006	Housoeh yvmvyah ngamoq gas womh ehnyet vjangh dyingh joq. Haih nyeisjvng gungsdom mas nyeis shih dvchank gas yang Yhensain dah yhen yah we joq zis yang seq.
47005007	Khasoeh ge lyis yah kang dwis cho ka nyoq yah nyvng yvmas ma nghuot, lomsjingh yvmas kang dvdwis nyeis.
47005008	Ngamoq gas womh ehnyet yah dyingh joq las, gungs dah zvng lyis tyamp zis yah Yhensain yah dvgeh nyeis das yvlyis zes o nyeis.
47005009	Housoeh las yang gas heimha gungsdom yhen mha nyeis laus eq, thyimha nyeis laus eq gohtoeu dvnganh mas nyang lyis nhaiqdoeus nhang mes.
47005010	Khasoeh ge lyis yang dvnganh gas soetuon zis xauh das nyhenshang Khristu xikkhonh mas thuq xoeuq chah. Hauh uhlyis yang yuk khanghmuh gas hau gungsdom mas nyeis nyeis shih lyis kuot dah muh gis laus gang laus vvng khyvlyis kham yoeus chah das.
47005011	Ngamoq gas Yhensain dah gyukwoms cho cha ge yvlyis seq yvmvyah, gohyuk lyis yoh jyoeuq yoeus das xiklyis yomkat. Mangso ka yah cho jyuk jyuk seq. Namoq eq namoq dah ehnyet mas ngah cho vlhomuh seq oen nghamhloms.
47005012	Heisoeh taiq yvmas ngamoq gas vsainnyang dah gis cho lhyi namoq xikkhonh mas chungh yoeus zis ma nghuot, ngamoq gvng mas namoq yoh khwank das xiklyis dvnghuot. Hauh uhlyis dius dah wotwu lyis ma yoeuh, nghe pheh vwot lyis kyingh yoeuh las seq khwank bang lyis yoh phuk taiq das.
47005013	Ngamoq jyoengh ma gying zis nghuot lhyeh? Ma gying nghuot lyis gas Mangso dah xiklyis ma gying zis nghuot. Nghuot ya ngamoq gying lhyeh? Gying nghuot lyis gas namoq xiklyis nghuot.
47005014	Ngamoq lyis Khristu dah jyetdap ehnyet yah guon nyeis. Khasoeh ge lyis dius dvyuk nyoshoqmoq xiklyis shei kham goeus yvlyis ngamoq soh, nhaiq tap. Housoeh las houka nyah dah shei kham yvmas dvnganhmoq shei kham goeus ge dah vjyuk nghuot.
47005015	Kang dwis nyeis bang eq nyamoq vkyuh xiklyis kang ma dwis, nyamoq xiklyis shei kham dyei thang lhyi dwis toq loh soeu xiklyis kyingh kang dwis nyeis bas jungh, dvnganhmoq dah xiklyis nyang shei kham goeus.
47005016	Housoeh las ngamoq gas gvshih masyah hank lyis eq, dius dah vkant lyis yoeuh las soetuon cho ma kuot. Xikpheh Khristu lyis dius dah vkant khyvlyis chank las dang thang thyet cho kuot lai loh goeus. Nghuot laus eq gvshih housoeh ma kuot lo.
47005017	Hank laus eq Khristu yah dvdain dvlom nghuot loh lyis nyang gas dius saiq bweh los goeus. Vcauh gas lai loh goeus, yoeuh aq dvnganh gas vsaiq bweh los.
47005018	Hauh cho dvnganh lyis Mangso yah kuot toh. Mangso ka yang nyah jeswus duot nyeis masyah nyah buisnoms bweh los das nyhenshang Khristu Yesu gvng mas thaiq loh nhang. Gohtoeu dius jens lyis eq nyah buisnoms duot nhang das nyhenshang ngamoq lyis muh kyauh toh.
47005019	Ngamoq taiq kyoh dah gausyis dang gas, Mangso ka Khristu mas dius dvnganh lyis nyah buisnoms duot nhang cho yah sen dah Dang nghuot. Mangso ka nyamoq dah yobos lyis ma comh dyei lo thoq lyis magoh nyamoq lyis nyah buisnoms bweh los shoq khasoeh kuot cho taiq kyoh dah dang ngamoq lyis dyei toh.
47005020	Housoeh las ngamoq gas Khristu dah cho dih dyei dah lvgyo jens nghuot las Mangso ka nyang ngamoq dah nhuot mas dang khyvlyis namoq lyis shangphu nyeis; namoq gas Mangso dah jeswus nghuot nyeis masyah nyah buisnoms jens duot los geh oen Khristu gungsthaiq khyoeuq nyeis.
47005021	Khristu gas yaunos ma dap soeu nghuot. Nghuot laus eq yang gas Khristu yah dvdain dvlom duot los las Mangso dah dan cho lhyi xauh kham yoeus das nyhenshang Mangso ka Khristu lyis, yah nyhenshang yang teh yaunos yoh soeu bweh nhang.
47006001	Namoq gas Mangso dah jyehjuh xauh kham yoeus bang nghuot zis yah dvyhangteh hauh jyehjuh lyis vyu vgeh ma kuot tyamp bas jungh, ngamoq Mangso yah dvgeh muh zwi bang khyvlyis yah namoq lyis shangphu kat.
47006002	Mangso taiq zis gyo geh, Ngos namoq lyis jyehjuh dyei das shishenh jweh lyis ngos namoq dung dang gyo yoeus dyei, Ngos namoq lyis Khyuot yoeus buisnyeis jweh lyis ngos namoq lyis pangh, ge. Mangso dah jyehjuh kham yoeus das zis gvshih yangh gis dah shishenh nghuot; yoeuh aq, gvshih yangh khyuot yoeus buisnyeis nghuot.
47006003	Ngamoq wons wuq muh yah sen lha hank eq yobos ma xo bas jungh ngamoq hank cho eq thungh lains gus ma bos shoq yomkat.
47006004	Ngamoq gas yaukyenh, shanghsenh, yau cho lhyi ehnyet xing xing jhen zis yah kuot. Cho khvt khanghmuh mas ngamoq gas Mangso dah jyeidwis jens nghuot yvlyis dvchixoeuq.
47006005	Ngamoq gas bat khyop, thung lhunk, dius hoeu toq cho xauh, muh zwi shangh, ma xauh yhet, zosyuot jeisshet cho tsain xauh.
47006006	Ehnyet lhoqshang cho, seq cho, jhen cho, nhaiqnyen cho yah eq, Gyingshang Dyos dah jyehjuh cho yahge, gyingh dah jyetdap ehnyet yah eq;
47006007	ngamoq taiq kyoh dah jyoeng dang yahge Mangso dah yomsoq yah, ngamoq gas Mangso dah jyeidwis jens nghuot cho Chixoeuq goeus. Ngamoq gas dan cho lhyi dyvm zan das xiklyis eq, vsainnyang lyis gos das xiklyis eq yhung das kyonhkhyi tsain kuot.
47006008	Ngamoq gas nyoqnho ngelang dyei zis, goes sang zis, chungh zis tsain xauh. Ngamoq lyis mhuih jyomh bang nghuot ge tsain tsuk. Nghuot laus eq ngamoq gas jyoeng dang tsain taiq.
47006009	Ngamoq gas hank ma soh ma seq bang teh nghuot laus eq nyings hoeuh bang nghuot. Shei loh teh nghuot laus eq yoeuh aq, ngamoq dwis nyeis. Joeng zis xauh laus eq sat zis ma xauh.
47006010	Nhaiqkuk zis xauh laus eq, ngamoq vjangh gauslaus nyeis; shohjyen teh nghuot laus eq nyoshoq moq lyis dis nhang; cha eq ma yoh teh nghuot laus eq jyoengh ngamoq dvnganh yvlyis sain toh bang nghuot.
47006011	Jyetdap dah Korinthu bang eh, ngamoq gas namoq lyis khyangh khyangh taiq goeus. Ngamoq dah ehnyet khomh lyis namoq xiklyis khonhchauh phank toh.
47006012	Namoq yuk ngamoq dah jyetdap ehnyet lyis namoq jyank mas ma jweh shoq nyheih toh.
47006013	Namoq dah ehnyet khomh phank toh geh. Gvshih ngos namoq lyis ngah lo jens lyis teh taiq nyeis. Namoq eq ngamoq lyis housoeh teh nghamh cho tauh Chixoeuq geh.
47006014	Ma lomsjingh bang yah xonh las muh vwons wuq nyeis goh. Khasoeh ge lyis dvgeh xonh las wons wuq das zis ma gis bweh. Jus zis yahge shuot zis gas dvgeh khasoeh yoh xonh nyeis das lah? Bvng zis gas chuot zis yah dvgeh khasoeh yoh zomh das lah?
47006015	Khristu yahge Satan gas khasoeh xam yoh xonh? Lomsjingh soeu ka ma lomsjingh soeu yah khasoeh toeuq las nyeis das lah?
47006016	Mangso dah yhenmuh gas phvra yah khasoeh xam yoh xonh das lah? Khasoeh ge lyis, Yang gas dwis nyeis Mangso dah yhenmuh tsain nghuot. Mangso nyang, Ngos gas ngah dius nyau jens mas ngah yhen duot nhang lha nyamoq mas nyeis das. Ngos nyamoq dah Mangso duot las, nyamoq gas ngah vnyau duot das, ge.
47006017	Housoeh las Yhensain taiq zis gas, Namoq gas nyamoq lyis toh khoq chah, nyamoq jyank masyah gohtoeu kangh yoeus geh. Vwot v-oeu lhyi vzangh thungh goh, housoeh lyis ngos namoq lyis lhom yoeus das.
47006018	Ngos gas namoq uwus duot las, namoq gas ngah loloeu lonyi jens duot das, ge Maukhung Jesphung Yhensain taiq.
47007001	Jyetdap bang eh, haih dangthoengh dvnganh gas yang lyis dyei toh. Housoeh yvmvyah yang gas gungsshoh yahge dyos lyis lhoq lhoeuh dah vwot v-oeu dvnganh mhayah vsainnyang gungs lyis cheihshang tyamp las, Mangso lhyi gyukwoms zis yah gyingshang thank khyvlyis kang dwis goh.
47007002	Namoq nhaiqlom mas ngamoq xiklyis joqyos dyei las lhom yoeus geh. Ngamoq hank lyis eq ma cu, hank lyis eq ma lhoq thyoq, hank thoq mas eq toeuh ma yoeus.
47007003	Ngos heisoeh taiq zis gas namoq lyis yobos huon dang thang thyet das xiklyis ma nghuot; khasoeh ge lyis xikpheh ngos namoq lyis taiq goeus zis yah dvyhangteh, namoq lyis ngamoq svsoh jyetdap yvmvyah shei lhyi yangh lyis vjangh namoq yah dvgeh nyeis.
47007004	Ngos namoq lyis svsoh nghamh kuh toh. Ngos namoq xiklyis svsoh khwank nyeis. Yaukyenh shanghsenh vja ja xauh laus eq ngos mas womh ehnyet dyingh joq thoq lyis magoh ngos mas gaus cho eq dyingh muis joq.
47007005	Makedoni mau mas jweh loh lyis yangh ngamoq mas nyenstap cho ma yoh. Joqyos khanghmuh mas yaukyenh shanghsenh cho, gohtoeu dius jens yah dyoqgoh cho eq bos. Ngamoq dah ungkhau mha gyuk cho chiq cho vja ja xauh.
47007006	Nghuot laus eq nhaiqngis nyoqyaus bang lyis nhaiqtaink dah Mangso ka, ngamoq jyank mas Titu jweh los zis yah ngamoq lyis yom yoh nhang goeus.
47007007	Titu jweh los gvng mas kyingh ma nghuot, nyang lyis namoq khasoeh yomdyei cho taiq kyoh las eq, ngamoq ehnyet pyo cho yoh. Hauh thoq lyis namoq gas ngos yah xauhgoh mes las kha iq hwangh nhaiqngis nyeis cho, ngos lyis khomp dyei das nyhenshang kha iq sont toh goeus cho taiq kyoh las, ngos gvshih zes gaus zis yah pyo nyeis.
47007008	Ngos huon maussauh yah namoq lyis nhaiqkuk nhang laus eq hau maussauh zangh lhaih yvlyis ma auhuiq; nghuot laus eq hauh maussauh gas namoq lyis dvyoq nhaiq ngis nhang cho soh las nhaiqkuk cho ka dvtsiq bos lai loh goeus.
47007009	Nghuot laus eq gvshih gas ngos gaus nyeis. Houka ngos namoq lyis nhaiqkuk nhang lha ma nghuot, namoq dah nhaiqkuk zis gas xikpheh namoq dah kang dwis cho mha nhaiqlom thaiq los nhang goeus yvmvyah nghuot. Mangso ka hau nhaiqkuk cho lhyi yhung nyeis las ngamoq gas namoq lyis nos nhang cho cha ma bweh nhang.
47007010	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso yhung dah nhaiqkuk zis gas, khyuot yoeus zis xauh nhang nyeis. Hauh gvng mas ehnyet ma tap joqyos ma bos. Nghuot laus eq ehnyet ma thaiq dius ehnyet khyvlyis nhaiq dvkuk lyis gas shei cho lhyi dvkuot thuq nyeis.
47007011	Namoq dah nhaiqkuk cho lhyi Mangso khasoeh yhung yvlyis yoeuh geh. Houka namoq lyis kha iq nhaiqdoeus nhang, namoq mas yobos ma dap cho chixoeuq das ehnyet kha iq nhauh dyei, gis cho lvnyap bweh nhang mes las nhaiqyo zis yah dvn loh, ehnyet mas kham zo nyeis cho, namoq lomsjingh yvmas goeng toenk cho, yobos bos soeu lhyi yobos dyei das zis cicont nghuot cho jens gas, cho khvt khanghmuh mas namoq yobos ma bos ge cho lhyi chixoeuq nyeis.
47007012	Housoeh las ngos namoq lyis hauh maussauh lhaih kat laus eq shuot soeu gvng mas ma nghuot, shuot zis xauh kham soeu gvng mas eq ma nghuot. Mangso xikkhonh mas namoq ngamoq lyis jyoengh kha iq jyetdap hwangh nyeis yvlyis Chixoeuq, seq nhang mes las lhaih kat.
47007013	Housoeh dede nghuot goeus las ngamoq yom yoh. Housoeh yom yoh thoq lyis magoh svsoh gauslaus nyeis. Khasoeh ge lyis namoq gas Titu lyis tsain gaus nhang lha, nyang gaus cho lhyi ngamoq nyvng las nghuot.
47007014	Ngos namoq cho Titu lyis khwank kyoh goeus. Housoeh khwank kyoh zis yah dvyhangteh jyoeng cho namoq Chixoeuq goeus las ngos lyis yomgyau nhang zis ma nghuot. Ngamoq namoq lyis khanhamp eq jyoeng cho lhyi kyingh dvtaiq zis yah dvyhangteh, Titu lyis namoq cho khwank kyoh zis eq jyoeng zis yoh seq goeus.
47007015	Namoq gas nyang jyauh cho lhyi domsyos gyo das zis cicont nghuot yvlyis eq, nyang lyis gyuk nvn zis yah lhom yoeus yvlyis eq soh joq yvmvyah, nyang namoq lyis jyetdap ehnyet gas zes kuhxing lha yombos los.
47007016	Ngos namoq lyis jyuk jyuk yoh loms toh goeus yvmvyah gauslaus nyeis.
47008001	Jyetdap boekyis eh, Makedoni mau mas dah phung jens lhyi Mangso chah jyehjuh dyei goeus cho, ngamoq namoq lyis seq nhang mes.
47008002	Nyamoq xauh kham goeus dah shanghsenh cho mha vthank lang mas shiwu zis xauh goeus. Nghuot laus eq nyamoq dah gaus cho svsoh kuh yvmvyah nyamoq gas svsoh nyungs bang nghuot laus eq nyamoq dah dyei gvm cho mha magons magoh dyei mes jyetdap ehnyet bos.
47008003	Hauh phung jens gas nyamoq duot nyhoq dyei cho ngos namoq lyis top nyang kanghjyoeng kat.
47008004	Nyamoq gas Yuda mau mas dah Mangso dah dius jens lyis pangh thuk das cho mha bos mes las, yoh bos das toeuh dyei das nyhenshang nyamoq ehnyet yah tungh khyoeuq nyeis.
47008005	Nyamoq gas ngamoq nghamhloms thoq lyis jes shoq dyei. Nyamoq gas cangxeih lyis vsainnyang gungs shih Yhensain lhyi kyauh toh. Hauh thang lhyi Yhensain o zis yah dvyhangteh pangh thuk cho mha kyauh.
47008006	Housoeh las xik lyis yah yvwons s yoeus kuot nyeis goeus dah Titu lyis hai vlu yah sen lha namoq dah lhyenwhei jyetdap ehnyet yah phuqsoe muh dye shoq namoq lyis pangh bas jungh ngamoq nyang lyis yomdyei.
47008007	Namoq gas lomsjingh cho, taiq cho, seq cho mha, namoq pangh thuk mes dah ehnyet mas, ngamoq lyis jyetdap cho mha namoq dyinghjet joq goeus. Housoeh las jyetdap ehnyet yah phuqsoe muh mas eq namoq magons magoh vlu dyei das yvlyis ngamoq omes.
47008008	Ngos heisoeh taiq zis gas, tyingtoh dang khyoq toh nyeis zis ma nghuot. Gohyhamh bang dah pangh thuk cho mha jyetdap ehnyet kha iq kuhxing nyeis yvlyis taiq kyoh zis yah namoq dah jyetdap ehnyet gyingh ge yvlyis yoh seq das nyhenshang taiq zis nghuot.
47008009	Namoq gas yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah jyehjuh lyis tsain seq. Yhensain Yesu gas nyang dis nyeis laus eq namoq xiklyis nyah gungs lyis shohjyen soeu kuot goeus. Nyang shohjyen xauh gvng mas namoq dis los goeus.
47008010	Hai vlu dyei cho yah sen lha ngos nghamh khyvlyis oen lhyi ka, vnhaiqyos namoq kuot xi toh dah muh lyis gvshih tyeh kuot lyis namoq xiklyis gis das. Namoq gas jyetdap ehnyet yah dyei mes ehnyet cangxeih bos bang kyingh ma nghuot, vlu cangxeih dyei bang tsain nghuot.
47008011	Housoeh yvmvyah hauh muh lyis tsoq las tyeh kuot geh. Namoq hauh muh lyis kuot loh yvmas bauh ehnyet bos joq zis yah dvyhangteh duot nyhoq tyeh kuot geh.
47008012	Namoq mas dyei mes dah jyetdap ehnyet bos lyis Mangso ka namoq duot nyhoq dyei dah jyungshuk lyis lhom yoeus das. Namoq ma duot yvlyis Mangso sang das zis ma nghuot.
47008013	Khasoeh ge lhyi gohyhamh lyis sunghhuq nhang das xiklyis ngos namoq lyis yvwons s huon zis ma nghuot.
47008014	Nghuot laus eq gvshih namoq mas magons magoh yoh joq yvmvyah chah nyeis bang lyis pangh thuk das nyhenshang phi; dvnyeih buis lyis nyamoq nyoshoq yoh joq las namoq chah nyeis lyis nyamoq eq namoq lyis doms thuk das. Heisoeh kuot las nyang changh nyang yih yih yoh pangh goh.
47008015	Lhaihtoh dang mas: Nyoshoq yung toh soeu eq guszes loh zis ma bos, dvmhauh dvxauh yung toh soeu eq chah shih zis ma bos, ge lhaih toh zis yah dvyhangteh nghuot.
47008016	Namoq lyis pangh thuk das xiklyis ngamoq mas mes dah ehnyet bos teh, Titu dah ehnyet mas eq heisoeh bos nhang dah Mangso jyehjuh lyis kha iq chungh gis lah!
47008017	Titu gas ngamoq dung dang lyis lhom yoeus thoq lyis magoh, svsoh kuot dyei mes ehnyet bos las, nyang namoq jyank pheh los das nyhenshang nyah ehnyet nyang nghamh thyet toh.
47008018	Hauh gausyis dang taiq muh wons wuq cho mha, phung dvnganh yah nghamh kuh toh soeu vmang vnoeuh dvyuk lyis eq ngamoq nyang yah dvgeh nhang kat.
47008019	Hauh thoq lyis hai jyetdap ehnyet yah phuqsoe dah vlu tsainh muh mas ngamoq yah dvgeh suh e das xiklyis phung jens yah khyen toeuq toh zis xauh soeu eq nyang nghuot. Hauh cho ka Yhensain dah phunk nyoqnho ngelang Chixoeuq das zis yahge ngamoq dah pangh mes ehnyet lyis Chixoeuq das xiklyis nghuot.
47008020	Hai dyei mes ehnyet yah dyei dah jyungshuk lyis yhung cho mha ngamoq lyis hank eq yobos huon chank ma bos bas jungh zaih nyeis.
47008021	Yhensain dah xikkhonh mas kyingh ma nghuot, dius dah xikkhonh mas eq jyoeng lha phi dah muh khanh das zis gas ngamoq dah nghamh toeuq cho nyang nghuot.
47008022	Housoeh yvmvyah ngamoq gas hau vmang vnoeuh tang yah dvgeh gohtoeu Khristan vmang vnoeuh dvyuk lyis eq nhang kat. Hauh soeu lhyi ngamoq nyoshoq lhain shi yoeuh lyis nyang gas khanhamp eq mes zis yahge seq pangh soeu nghuot yvlyis yoh seq. Gvshih nyang gas namoq thoq mas nghamhnywe ehnyet bos las svsoh pangh mes nyeis.
47008023	Titu cho yah sen lha taiq lyis, nyang gas ngah loeuzomh yahge namoq lyis pangh thuk das xiklyis ngos yah muh zomh zwi soeu nghuot. Nyang yah dvgeh chank los dah vmang vnoeuh aiq yuk gas phung jens dah lvgyo nghuot las Khristu dah phunk nyoqnho Chixoeuq das vzomh nghuot.
47008024	Housoeh yvmvyah, namoq yah sen lha ngamoq nyoqnho ngelang yoeus las khwank zis gas jus cho phung jens dvnganh top yoh seq bas jungh, nyamoq lyis namoq dah jyetdap ehnyet Chixoeuq geh.
47009001	Yuda mau Mangso dah dius jens jyank mas huon kat dah pangh thuk cho yah sen lha ngos namoq jyank mas lhaih kat chank ma bos.
47009002	Namoq pangh mes jyetdap ehnyet bos yvlyis ngos seq. Housoeh las namoq dah cho Makedoni mung dius jens lyis khwank xoeuq goeus. Akhaia mau mas vmang vnoeuh moq gas vnhaiqyos yah yangh pangh das zis cicont kuot toh goeus, oen Makedonia bang lyis ngos taiq goeus. Namoq kuot mes cho gvng mas nyamoq nyothyang dah ehnyet lyis nhauh toq dyei goeus.
47009003	Haih cho yah sen lha namoq mas ngamoq khwank dang gas vkom ma bweh bas jungh, haih vmang vnoeuh moq lyis namoq jyank mas nhang kat. Ngos taiq goeus zis yah dvyhangteh namoq gas namoq vlu yah cicont kuot toh das.
47009004	Housoeh ma nghuot lyis gas, Makedoni dius dvyhamh ngos yah dvgeh chank los las, namoq cicont ma nghuot yvlyis nyvng lyis namoq kyingh xoqphuh das zis ma nghuot, ngamoq eq namoq lyis nghamhnywe toh goeus zis yah dvyhangteh kha iq xoqphuh das lah!
47009005	Housoeh yvmvyah, namoq jyehjuh jyungshuk dangthoengh toh zis yah dvyhangteh, hauh yvlyis sont toh das nyhenshang ngos haih boekyis lyis ngah xikpheh namoq jyank mas nhang kat chah, oen nghamh. Ngos jweh los lyis vlu sont toh goeus zis nghuot las namoq dyei zis gas dyei chah las dyei khyvlyis ma nghuot, dyei mes dah jyetdap ehnyet yah dyei cho yoh chixoeuq das.
47009006	Jyo dvtsiq khyoq soeu ka dvtsiq xauh yhomh das; jyo nyoshoq khyoq soeu ka nyoshoq xauh yhomh das yvlyis soh las zaih nyeis geh.
47009007	Yu dah ehnyet yah eq ma nghuot, dyei chah dah yvwons s gvng mas kyingh eq ma nghuot, yuk khanghmuh nyah ehnyet mas nghamh toeuq toh zis yah dvyhangteh dyei bas jungh: khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka gausyis ehnyet yah dyei soeu lhyi jyetdap.
47009008	Mangso ka namoq chah thoq lyis zes shoq yoh dyei. Housoeh namoq vsainnyang xiklyis chah nyeis cho dvnganh yoh das thoq lyis gis dah muhzoh khanghmuh xiklyis chah thoq lyis zes shoq xauh yoeus das.
47009009	Lhaihtoh dang mas, Nyang gas chah nyeis dah nyungs bang lyis magons magoh gvm dyei las, Nyah nhaiqnyen cho ka vcaiq vto goeng joq, ge.
47009010	Nyau khyoq soeu lhyi nyau dyei las zo das zonoms kuot dyei soeu Mangso ka, namoq mas chah dah jyo nyau luk shoq dyei thoq lyis magoh, hauh nyau lyis yuk kuh los nhang zis yah jyo nyoshoq xauh yhomh nhang. Houka namoq magons magoh dyei dah jyetdap ehnyet mas dah vshih lyis taiq zis nghuot.
47009011	Namoq masyah nyamoq xauh lhom yoeus dah vlu jyungshuk gvng mas dius nyoshoq Mangso dah jyehjuh lyis chungh das. Namoq shishenh khanghmuh vlu magons magoh yoh dyei shoq Yhensain ka namoq lyis vjangh dis nhang das.
47009012	Khasoeh ge lyis haih namoq phuqsoe dah muh gas Mangso dah dius jens chah nyeis yvlyis yoh tyink dyei thoq lyis magoh, Mangso dah jyehjuh lyis chungh dah thwe yah dyingh los nyeis.
47009013	Hai namoq phuqsoe muh yikhyoh gis gvng mas, dius nyoshoq gas, Khristu dah gausyis dang lyis namoq wontang lhom yoeus lomsjingh gvng mas eq, namoq dah jyetdap ehnyet yah nyamoq lyis eq gohyhamh bang lyis eq magons magoh vlu dyei gvng mas eq, Mangso lhyi nhaiqshoqlang chungh dah ehnyet dyingh muis los nhang nyeis.
47009014	Namoq gas svsoh zes dah Mangso jyehjuh lyis xauh kham goeus yvmvyah, nyamoq gas namoq lyis svsoh jyet ehnyet yah namoq xiklyis shvmanh dung dyei das.
47009015	Phauh ma yoh thoq suon dah Mangso jyehjuh jyungshuk gvng mas Mangso lhyi nhaiqshoqlang sang nyeis goh.
47010001	Namoq xikkhonh mas ehnyet noeuh nhamp zis yah ehnyet nyhen mha khyoq cho chixoeuq las namoq yah we loh lyis womh ehnyet chixoeuq nyeis soeu nghuot, ge loeusmus zis xauh soeu ngos Paulo nyang Khristu dah nhaiqnyen ehnyet yahge noeuh nhamp ehnyet yah namoq lyis dung kat.
47010002	Khristu dah noeuh nhamp, ehnyet nyhen mha gyoh yvlyis byi las ngos namoq jyank jweh los uhlyis dang than jis shoq ma bweh das xiklyis khyoeuq kat. Khasoeh ge lyis ngamoq lyis mungkvn dah obos khyvlyis kuot las kang dwis bang nghuot, ge taiq bang lyis ngos than than yoh taiq.
47010003	Ngamoq gas mungkvn mas nyeis zis jyoeng laus eq mungkvn ehnyet khyvlyis jes tsain zan nyeis zis ma nghuot.
47010004	Ngamoq jeszan yvmas yhung dah kyonhkhyi ka mungkvn dius jens chi dah kyonhkhyi ma nghuot. Mangso dah yomsoq yah dyingh dah kyonhkhyi chi lha goeng dah thoenkgus jesdvp jens lyis thyoqpi tyamp. Ngamoq gas ma jus dah phyen-goh dang lyis thyoq tyamp.
47010005	Ngamoq gas Mangso lhyi seq cho joeui lhyi khwank zis yah pahkai dah muh dvnganh yvlyis thyoqpi tyamp. Ngamoq gas dius dah nghamh cho dvnganh lyis nyhik lhunk tyamp las Khristu dah domsyos gyo nhang.
47010006	Namoq gas ngamoq dah domsyos top gyo las dang jings cho yoh seq goeus ya, ngamoq gas dang ma jings dah muh cha lhyi laus eq yobos dyei das zis cicont nghuot.
47010007	Namoq gas chah cho mha eq thoqlosbaus lyis dvtsain yoeuh nyeis. Ngos gas Khristu yah sen, ge vsainnyang gungs lyis nghamh soeu dvyuk yuk bos lah? Bos lyis gas nyah gungs lyis dvlhain doms nghamh suon yoeuh bas jungh. Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas Khristu shot pheh dah dius nghuot zis yah dvyhangteh, ngamoq eq Khristu shot pheh dah dius nghuot.
47010008	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos gas Mangso dyei dah toeuh yah sen lha dvmsunk zangh khwank laus eq ma xoq, haih toeuh gas namoq lyis thyoqpi das xiklyis ma nghuot, toeutoq das xiklyis dvnghuot.
47010009	Housoeh las ngos huon maussauh yah namoq lyis kyuk mes khyvlyis vjyuk ma mes phui nhang.
47010010	Khasoeh ge lyis dius dvyhamh gas, Paulo dah huon maussauh gas dvmsunk zis yahge kank bos nghuot laus eq nyah gungs ngamoq yah nyeis lyis nyang gas yomnhuk, nyah dang eq cha vkyuh ma bos, tsain ge.
47010011	Housoeh ge soeu seq toh das cho ka, ngamoq gas we yvmas nyeis uhlyis maussauh lhaih kat zis yah dvyhangteh dius gungs nyang namoq jyank mas jweh los uhlyis eq houyah dvyhangteh ngamoq kuot das.
47010012	Jyoengh oen lhyi vsainnyang gungs lyis chunghzo bang mas bos suon tap las, ngamoq gungs lyis nyamoq yah ma womh byi. Nyamoq gas nyamoq kha iq nyhang zis seq das xiklyis nyamoq nyang vkeq thyet toh zo. Housoeh teh bang gas kha iq koh lah!
47010013	Ngamoq gas khwank vvng thoq lyis lai las khwank das zis ma nghuot. Namoq mas ngamoq zwi khank dah muh yah dvgeh, ngamoq zwi khank das xiklyis Mangso nyang toeuq toh dyei dah muhzoh vkhau mha ngamoq dvyoh khwank.
47010014	Namoq gas Mangso ngamoq xiklyis toeuq toh dyei muhzoh khau mha bos joq yvmvyah ngamoq gas Khristu dah gausyis loeus namoq jyank mas chi los uhlyis muhzoh wons wuq das gvm toh dah vkyo lhyweq khyvlyis ma kuot.
47010015	Housoeh yvmvyah ngamoq gas Mangso ngamoq lyis toeuq toh dyei dah muhzoh mas lai las, gohyuk dah muhzoh yah sen yvmas ngamoq moengs zis ma nghuot. Housoeh kuot das gungsthaiq khanhamp eq toeuq toh dyei dah muhzoh khau mha namoq dah lomsjingh cho je los das zis yahge namoq mas muhzoh zes yoh kuot das yvlyis ngamoq nghamhloms.
47010016	Hauh thang lhyi ngamoq gas namoq dah mau nghe pheh lai las gohtoeu munghdan mas Yhensain Yesu dah cho gausyis dang loh yoh taiq kyoh das. Tsai gohyuk dah joqyos, cicont kuot toh dah muhzoh cho mha moengs khwank chah das zis ma nghuot.
47010017	Nghuot laus eq lhaihtoh dang mas, Khwank mes soeu ka, Yhensain kuot dah muhzoh mas khwank nyeis bas jungh, ge taiq toh.
47010018	Khasoeh ge lyis, Jyoeng dah nyoqnho ngelang dyei zis xauh soeu ka vsainnyang gungs lyis vsainnyang chunghzo soeu ma nghuot. Mangso chungh zis xauh soeu dvnghuot.
47011001	Namoq ngos dvtsiq koh dah yobos lhyi jhen dyei shih das yvlyis ngos o. Jyoengh jenh jhen dyei shih geh.
47011002	Mangso ka namoq lyis noh ehnyet bos zis yah dvyhangteh ngos eq namoq lyis noh ehnyet bos. Namoq gas Khristu nyang yah kyingh phoengh wvng das xiklyis ngos dangthoengh dyei toh goeus lonyi gyingh yah doeusgoh.
47011003	Ewa gas lhangnyis dah joeui bos dah yik cho yah mhuih khwangh zis xauh teh namoq eq namoq dah nghamh cho thyoq tyamp zis xauh las namoq dah dyinghjet dah lhoqshang ehnyet yah Khristu lyis loms las chank suh dah ehnyet dyoq das yvlyis ngos chiqh.
47011004	Khasoeh ge lyis namoq jyank mas dius dvyuk yuk jweh los las, ngamoq ma taiq kyoh ku dah gohtoeu Yesu dvyuk dah cho taiq kyoh lyis namoq gaus gaus yis yis tsain lhom yoeus. Tsai ngamoq jyank masyah xauh lhom yoeus toh dah Dyos yahge gausyis dang yah kyoq kyoq shaih dah dyos yahge Gausyis Dang lyis tsain lhom yoeus nyeis nyvng!
47011005	Ngos gas hau namoq kuh thank lvgyo jens ge lui bang mas dvtsiq eq ngis soeu ma nghuot oen ngos nghamh.
47011006	Ngos gas taiq kyoh yvmas ma duot soeu nghuot laus eq, jyoengh seq cho mha ka housoeh ma nghuot. Ngamoq gas shishenh khanghmuh lyis bweh dah cho jeis dvnganh mas haih cho namoq lyis dede seq nhang goeus.
47011007	Namoq chunghtoq zis xauh bas jungh oen, ngos ngah gungs o mha gyoh las, Mangso dah gausyis dang namoq lyis phauh ma sang taiq kyoh goeus. Housoeh kuot zis gas ngos mas shuot cho nghuot lhyeh?
47011008	Ngos namoq mas muh wons nyeis dah shishenh gyo lyis, gohtoeu phung jens ngos lyis thuk goeus. Houka namoq lyis pangh thuk das xiklyis gohphung mhayah ngos khyanktau kuot zis nghuot oen lo goh.
47011009	Hauh thoq lyis ngos namoq yah dvgeh nyeis shishenh lyis ngwis xing chah los lyis pangh das zis ngos namoq lyis ma thauqkhyi. Makedoni mau masyah jweh los dah boekyis gas ngos chah ya chah zis chi los dyei. Lai loh goeus shishenh lyis ngos namoq lyis yvwons ma lyei nhang teh jweh los das shishenh lyis eq yvwons ma lyei nhang das.
47011010	Khristu dah jyoeng dang ngos mas bos zis yah dvyhangteh, hai ngos khwank cho lhyi Akhaia mauxom mha hank eq yoh tomp das zis ma nghuot, oen dangthoengh dyei.
47011011	Ngos heisoeh taiq zis gas ngos namoq lyis ma jyetdap las nghuot lhyeh? Ngos namoq lyis jyetdap zis gas Mangso seq.
47011012	Ngamoq kuot zis yah dvyhangteh nyamoq eq kuot, ge gohtoeu lvgyo jens taiq khwank das toeuh ma yoh bas jungh, gvshih ngos kuot vgus tsoq kuot nyeis shih das.
47011013	Hauh bang gas jyoeng dah lvgyo jens ma nghuot. Nyamoq gas Khristu dah lvgyo gyingh jens teh doeus shoq, yeis khuk las mhuih dah muh zwi bang nghuot.
47011014	Heisoeh kuot zis gas mauh chank ma bos: Satan yangh bvng dah loeuswons soeu teh dah yeis yoh khuk nyeis.
47011015	Housoeh las nyah jyeidwis jens nyang eq dan cho lhyi taiq kyoh kanghjyoeng kat dah jyeidwis jens yah doeus shoq yeis khuk nyeis zis gas mau phoh zis ma nghuot. Thang thank lyis nyamoq chank kuot zis yah dvyhangteh xauh kham das.
47011016	Ngos puk taiq mes zis gas, ngos lyis koh soeu nghuot oen lha hank eq ma gis nghamh. Namoq housoeh nghamh lyis eq ngos lyis koh soeu lhyi teh khvlangh lhom yoeus geh, housoeh ngos eq khwank dang dvtsiq taiq das.
47011017	Jyoengh oen lhyi, gvshih ngos taiq hwank cho ka Mangso taiq nhang mes cho ma nghuot. Hai taiq khwank cho mha ngos gas jyoengh nyang koh soeu teh taiq nyeis.
47011018	Nghuot laus eq dius nyoshoq dius dah kank bos cho mha khwank nyeis yvmvyah, ngos eq khwank das.
47011019	Namoq nyang joeui nyo bos las koh bang lyis gausyis zis yah tsain jhen nyeis nyvng!
47011020	Namoq gas namoq lyis vmingh dyei bang, namoq thoq mas toeuh yoeus bang, twih khyoq las nyhik yoeus bang, dius ngis yoeuh khyoq bang, bvlot tyuk dyei bang hank lyis laus eq jhen nyeis.
47011021	Ngamoq gas housoeh teh cho kuot das xiklyis yomnhuk cho rhen das xiklyis yangh xoq. Nghuot laus eq dius dvyuk yuk dvcho cho mha khwank lyis gas, ngos eq koh soeu teh womh taiq.
47011022	Israel jens Hebre dius nghuot lhyeh? Ngos eq nghuot. Nyamoq Abraham dah vnyau vshih nghuot lhyeh? Ngos eq nghuot.
47011023	Nyamoq Khristu dah jyeidwis jens nghuot lhyeh? Koh soeu dah dang teh gas nghuot laus eq ngos gas nyamoq thoq lyis zes gis dah jyeidwis nghuot. Ngos nyamoq thoq lyis muh zes zwi khank. Nyamoq thoq lyis zes las nyoshoq lhain thung gyoh. Nyamoq thoq lyis zes las wuseh xuk zis xauh. Ngos shei nos cho nyoshoq lhain zes xauh.
47011024	Yuda jens ngos lyis dvlhain lhyi somhci gau dvm dvm mulas oeng lhain lyuk zis xauh.
47011025	Roma jens bat zis somh lhain xauh. Lukzains yah doeuh zis dvlhain, jeis sangpho dyoq yvmas somh lhain bos. Dvlhain ka nvmukdra mas 24 nayi dang yenh.
47011026	Gyung nyoshoq lhain suh yvmas jeis je los las xauh dah gudwvng zis, khyanktau xauh dah gudwvng zis, ngah Yuda dius jens gvng mas gudwvng zis, gohnyau bang gvng mas gudwvng zis, wukhau mha xauh dah gudwvng zis, mhanhdyvp mas xauh dah gudwvng zis, thomh mas xauh dah gudwvng zis, hwah dah boekyis gvng mas gudwvng zis xauh lai loh goeus.
47011027	Muhzwi khank chah cho, ma xauh yhet zis nyoshoq lhain, zos yuot jeis shet, zonoms thank zis nyoshoq lhain, khau gus ma yoh zis yahge shohchen bweh zis vjangh xauh nyeis.
47011028	Hau thoq lyis phung dvnganh dah cho chiq zis gas nyeih yau nyeih ngos lyis nhiq zaiq toh.
47011029	Yomnhuk soeu dvyuk yuk bos lyis ngos yomnhuk yvlyis khamzo nyeis. Dvyuk yuk yaunos mas lains loh lyis ngos ehnyet nyo nyeis.
47011030	Ngos khwank chank bos lyis gas, ngos kha iq yomnhuk oen cho mha dvkhwank das.
47011031	Ngos ma hwah zis gas Yhensain Yesu dah Uwus, Mangso seq. Hau Yhensain Mangso dah nyings gas vcaiq vto ngelhoq bas jungh.
47011032	Damasku wus mas ngos nyeis uhlyis hwankti Areta o mha dah mungh zau gas ngos lyis nyhik das nyhenshang wus khomh jens mas zungh bang tsain toh.
47011033	Nghuot laus eq phung dius jens ngos lyis mhanghkhoq mas kat las wusciank masyah xuot khyoq dyei yvmvyah nyah loq masyah yoh luiq loh.
47012001	Khwank cho vkyuh ma bos laus eq hau Yhensain jyank masyah nyoqnyvng yah chixoeuq cho yah sen lha ngos khwank dang taiq shih das.
47012002	Khristan phoq dvyuk gas lai loh goeus dvci nyei zvn yoq lyis nyhang thank maukhung somh tsank pheh shwih dang doq loh zis xauh cho ngos seq. Housoeh shwih dang loh zis gas gungs bos lah, ma bos lah, zis gas ngos ma seq, Mangso dvseq.
47012003	Ngos doms taiq shih bah, hauh dius yuk lyis Paradisu pheh shwih dang loh zis ngos seq. Housoeh hauh zis gas jyoengh bweh lah? Yhetmoq nyoqnyvng nghuot lah, zis Mangso dvseq.
47012004	Nyang gas houmha dius dah dangkhonh yah ma gis taiq, dius dah nhuot yah taiq das toeuh ma bos dah dang yah xauhgyo yoeus.
47012005	Housoeh las ngos hauh soeu dah cho khwank das. Nghuot laus eq ngvnyang kha iq yomnhuk nyeis cho jens mas lai las ngah cho ngos ma khwank das.
47012006	Ngos khwank mes laus eq ngos koh das zis ma nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis ngos gas jyoeng zis dvtaiq das. Nghuot laus eq ngos ma khwank das: khasoeh ge lyis namoq hank eq ngos kuot cho xauh nyvng, ngos taiq dang lyis xauhgyo yvmvyah ngos lyis seq masyah jes las ngos lyis nghamh kuh cho ma mes bweh nhang.
47012007	Ngos nyvng dah mauhphoh nyoqnyvng gvng mas ngos mas nghamh kuh las khwank cho ma bos bas jungh ge, ngah gungsdom mas zoeu zoeu cho dvkoeuq ngos kham zo nyeis. Hau nos cho ka Satan yah nhang kat dah lvgyo teh ngos lyis bat las ngos khwank dah zwis lyis khyauh tyamp dyei nyeis.
47012008	Hau nos yvlyis yoeus tyamp das xiklyis ngos gas hauh Yhensain lhyi shvmanh somh lhain dung.
47012009	Nghuot laus eq Mangso ka, Ngah jyehjuh gas nah xiklyis geh joq: khasoeh ge lyis nvng yomnhuk uhlyis ngah yomsoq gas kuh thank nghuot joq, ge nyang ngos lyis taiq. Housoeh yvmvyah Khristu dah yomsoq gas ngos lyis khomp gos las khau nges nhang nyeis cho ehnyet mas xauh kham zo bas jungh, ngah yomnhuk cho gvng mas ngos svsoh pyo nyeis.
47012010	Housoeh las ngos gas Khristu gvng mas kham dah yomnhuk cho, jwangh cho, shanghsenh cho, shoeuhshih zis xauh cho yahge yaukyenh cho jens gvng mas gausyis nhaiqtap nyeis. Khasoeh ge lyis ngos yomnhuk uhlyis yombos nyeis.
47012011	Ngos gas koh soeu teh kuot nyeis. Namoq ngos lyis housoeh kuot nhang goeus. Namoq gas ngos lyis taiq toenk cho shet vvng bang nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis ngos gas cha eq ma nghuot soeu bweh nyeis lyis yangh, namoq lhyenwhei toh dah lvgyo jens o mha dvtsiq eq ma gyoh.
47012012	Ngos gas lvgyo dvyuk bweh nyeis cho kanghjyoeng chixoeuq das xiklyis yomsoq muh yahge mauh loqmuh nyoshoq lyis namoq mas kuhxing ehnyet yah kuot xoeuq goeus.
47012013	Namoq masyah pangh thuk ngwis ma yoeus cho mhayah lai las ngos namoq lyis goh phung jens yah vkant nyhen khyvlyis kuot ku lah? Housoeh Lyi ma chi cho zangh kuot yobos lyis jenh khyuot dyei geh.
47012014	Gvshih ngos namoq jyank mas somh vlhain kwang los das zis cicont nghuot goeus las, ngos namoq lyis cha ma sang das: khasoeh ge lyis, ngos namoq dah ngwis lyis o zis ma nghuot, namoq lyis dv o. Jyoengh oen lhyi lo jens gas ungwes uwus xiklyis zisyos yung toh dyei ma vvng, ungwes uwus moq nyang nyamoq dah lo jens xiklyis dvyung toh vvng.
47012015	Ngos namoq lyis pangh das nyhenshang oen lhyi ngos yoh ya yoh zis dvnganh yahge ngah gungs lyis yangh gausyis zis yah yhung das zis ngwis. Ngos namoq lyis svsoh jyetdap yvmvyah namoq ngos lyis dvtsiq dvjyetdap das lhyeh?
47012016	Housoeh las ngos namoq lyis yvwons lyei nhang zis ma nghuot cho namoq xamxonh das. Nghuot laus eq ngos gas namoq lyis joeui yah mhuih khyvlyis twih khyoq yoeus ge dvyuk yuk taiq das.
47012017	Ngos khasoeh mhuih zo lai loh goeus lah? Ngos namoq jyank mas nhang dah lvgyo jens mas dvyuk yuk masyah toeuh yoeus las namoq dah vyhang lhyi thyet zo nyeis lah?
47012018	Ngos gas Titu lyis namoq jyank mas los das xiklyis dung las nhang kat. Gohtoeu Khristan vmang vnoeuh dvyuk eq nyang yah dvgeh chank los. Titu gas namoq mas toeuh yoeus las vyhang thyet zo nyeis oen das lah? Nyang yahge ngos gas nghamh zis yahge kuot zis dvcho dvnghuot.
47012019	Ngamoq gas namoq xikkhonh mas vjangh yah vsainnyang yobos ma bos oen gungs gos dang tungh taiq bang nghuot ge nghamh mvbeh? Housoeh ma nghuot! Khristu taiq nhang mes zis yah dvyhangteh Mangso xikkhonh mas ngamoq taiq. Hauh thoq lyis jyetdap bang eh, ngamoq kuot ya kuot zis gas namoq lyis pangh das xiklyis dvkuot.
47012020	Ngos namoq jyank mas jweh lyis, namoq gas ngos o khyvlyis, ngos nyvng mes khyvlyis ma nghuot langh, ngos mas eq namoq o khyvlyis namoq nyvng mes khyvlyis ma nghuot mus das yvlyis chiqh. Tsai ngos gas namoq mas dyoqgoh cho, noh cho, nhaiqlom dyis cho, tyam cho, jwangh goh cho, goes sang goh, khwank, hoeu cho bweh nyeis yvlyis nyvng das zis chiqh.
47012021	Ngos namoq jyank mas doms jweh lyis, Mangso ka ngos lyis namoq xikkhonh mas khyoq tyamp zis xauh nhang das yvlyis chiqh. Gvshih jweh shoq nhaiqlom ma thaiq wotwu yoq, nyetnau las yauxi cho chank nyeis bang nyoshoq gvng mas ngos ngausdyeis gyoh das yvlyis chiqh.
47013001	Ngos namoq jyank mas somh vlhain jweh los das. Lhaihtoh dang mas taiq vgus, zau kauq cho dvja ja bos lyis kanghjyoeng aiq yuk somh yuk dah dang yah doengs nhang chah.
47013002	Xikpheh yaunos kuot lai loh goeus bang yahge gohtoeu dvnganhmoq lyis ngos taiq mes. Hauh yvlyis xikpheh ngos namoq jyank mas aiq vlhain jweh los uhlyis taiq toh zis yah dvyhangteh, gvshih namoq yah we nyeis shishenh lyis eq dvlhain doms taiq das. Houka thang lhain ngos doms jweh los uhlyis namoq hank eq soetuon yobos dyei masyah ma yoh luiq das.
47013003	Khristu gas ngos mas dang taiq nyeis cho kanghjyoeng lhyi namoq o nyhoq nyvng das. Khristu gas namoq yah tsoq goh las muh zwi uhlyis nyang yomnhuk zis ma nghuot. Hauh gungsthaiq nyah yomsoq lyis namoq mas chixoeuq das.
47013004	Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas yomnhuk dah vkant mas tapzains mas taplhangh sat zis xauh laus eq Mangso dah yomsoq yah dwis nyeis. Yang eq Khristu yah dvdain dvlom duot gvng mas yomnhuk nyeis. Nghuot laus eq namoq yah tsoq goh cho mha yang gas Khristu yah dvgeh dwis nyeis yvmvyah Mangso dah yomsoq lyis xauh gvm yoeus das.
47013005	Namoq gas lomsjingh yvmas kang dwis bang nghuot zis yoh seq das nyhenshang namoq nyang gungs nyang suon yoeuh soetuon zo geh. Namoq shank shoq somh loh bang ma nghuot lyis gas, Khristu Yesu namoq mas nyeis cho lhyi jyoengh yoh seq das.
47013006	Ngamoq gas somh loh bang ma nghuot yvlyis namoq seq das oen loms.
47013007	Namoq shuot cho lhyi ma kuot bas jungh oen ngamoq Mangso jyank mas shvmanh dung. Houka ngamoq shiwu yvlyis ung cho chixoeuq das nyhenshang ma nghuot; ngamoq gas somh loh bang teh nghuot laus eq namoq jyoeng yvlyis yoh kuot das xiklyis dvdung dyei nyeis.
47013008	Khasoeh ge lyis ngamoq gas jyoeng cho lhyi tyixo zis cha eq ma yoh kuot, jyoeng cho mha dvtsain yoh yap.
47013009	Housoeh las ngamoq yomnhuk las namoq yombos nyeis lyis ngamoq gauslaus. Housoeh namoq dyinghjet bang bweh los bas jungh eq shvmanh dung nyeis.
47013010	Namoq yah we joq lyis ngos haih maussauh lhaih zis gas, ngos namoq jyank mas jweh lyis Yhensain ngos lyis dyei toh dah toeuh lyis mvgon ma yhung tyamp das xiklyis nghuot. Hauh toeuh gas namoq lyis thyoqpi das xiklyis ma nghuot, jebais los nhang das xiklyis dvnghuot.
47013011	Ngah boekyis eh, gvshih ngamoq jeshuh kat. Namoq dvnganhmoq yoh dyinghjet shoq tsoq las yomkat nyeis geh. Ngos dung dang lyis gyo yoeus las nyang changh nyang xamxonh zis yah nyenstap khyvlyis nyeis geh. Jyetdap zis yahge nyenstap vsain Mangso ka namoq yah dvgeh nyeis das.
47013012	Namoq nyang changh vmang vnoeuh dah bvlot tanh zis yah jeshuh goh geh. Mangso dah dius jens dvnganh namoq lyis jeshuh kat.
47013013	Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah jyehjuh, Mangso dah jyetdap zis yahge Gyingshang Dyos dah zomh cho ka namoq dvnganhmoq yah dvgeh nghuot bas jungh.
48001001	Dius dah vmingh yah lvgyo toeuq toh zis xauh soeu ma nghuot, dius yah toeuq toh dah lvgyo eq ma nghuot, Yesu Khristu yahge nyang lyis dwis toq nhang dah Uwus Mangso vmingh yah lvgyo nghuot soeu, ngos Paulo gas,
48001002	heimha ngos yah dvgeh nyeis dah boekyis dvnganh gas, Galati mau mas dah phung jens lyis maussauh lhaih las jeshuh kat.
48001003	Yah Uwus Mangso yahge Yhensain Yesu Khristu jyank masyah jyehjuh yahge nyenstap zis gas namoq mas joq bas jungh.
48001004	Haih gvshih dah ma gis ma shop caiq masyah khyuot kat bas jungh, yah Uwus Mangso o zis yah dvyhangteh Khristu gas domsyos gyo zis yah, yah yaunos xiklyis nyah gungs lyis dyei tyamp goeus.
48001005	Hauh Uwus Mangso mha vcaiq vto phunk bos joq bas jung. Amen.
48001006	Khristu dah jyehjuh yah namoq lyis lui yoeus soeu jyank masyah lvnyap gang las gohtoeu gausyis dang shot pheh chank loh las ngos namoq lyis mauh.
48001007	Jyoengh oen lhyi Yhensain Yesu dah cho mha lai las Gausyis Dang gohtoeu ma bos lo. Nghuot laus eq gvshih ngos taiq nyeis zis gas, Khristu dah Gausyis Dang lyis lhoeu thyoq das nyhenshang yomkat nyeis bang dvyhamh namoq khamkhvv shoq lhoq yau nyeis gvng mas taiq zis nghuot.
48001008	Nghuot laus eq ngamoq namoq lyis taiq kyoh goeus dah Gausyis Dang yah shaih dah gohtoeu dah gausyis dang, ngamoq laus eq, maukhung loeuswons soeu laus eq namoq lyis taiq kyoh lyis gas, nyang munyi thomh yah mon dah nhoengh zis xauh bas jungh.
48001009	Namoq lhom yoeus goeus dah Gausyis Dang yah shaih dah gohtoeu gausyis dang dvkoeuq lyis, dvyuk yuk namoq lyis taiq kyoh lyis gas, nyang nhoengh zis xauh bas jungh oen, xikpheh ngamoq taiq ku goeus zis yah dvyhangteh gvshih ngos doms taiq nyeis.
48001010	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos heisoeh taiq zis gas dius o khyvlyis kuot nyeis lah? Housoeh ma nghuot. Ngos o mes cho ka Mangso xihhonh nhaiqdoeus cho dvnghuot. Ngos gas dius xikkhonh mas hoeuh shoq yomkat nyeis lah? Ngos dius o khyvlyis dvyomkat nyeis shih lyis gas, ngos Khristu dah jyeidwis ma nghuot lo.
48001011	Boekyis eh, ngos taiq kyoh goeus dah Gausyis Dang gas, dius yah kuot thuq kat cho ma nghuot yvlyis ngos namoq lyis taiq kyingh.
48001012	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos hauh zis lyis dius hank jyank masyah eq xauh lhom yoeus zis ma nghuot, Yhensain Yesu Khristu nyang nyoqnyvng khyvlyis chixoeuq zis dvnghuot.
48001013	Ngos Yuda thungh yah nyeis uhlyis ngos khasoeh chank kuot yvlyis namoq xauhgyo ku. Ngos gas Mangso dah phung lhyi nhaiqnyen ehnyet ma bos thyoq tyamp das zis lohthank shoq yomkat ku goeus.
48001014	Yuda loms noq thungh lyis chank kuot yvmas ngos gas ngah vnyau mas ngos yah dvgyamh bang nyoshoq thoq lyis nhaiq zes wvng zis yah phauh thyeih moq dah lyi lyis chank kuot tyink lai loh goeus.
48001015	Nghuot laus eq ngos ngah ungwes ung masyah ma khoeu shih lyis Mangso ka nyah jyehjuh yah ngos lyis khyen lha nyang lyis phuqsoe das nyhenshang khi yoeus.
48001016	Hauh thang lhyi gohnyau bang lyis nyah Lo dah Gausyis Dang yoh taiq kyoh das xiklyis nyah Lo ngos lyis chixoeuq. Hauh uhlyis ngos gas hank dah joeui dyei zis lyis eq ma sang, ma kham yoeus.
48001017	Hauh thoq lyis, ngah xik lyis yah lvgyo duot bang yah loh xauhgoh das xiklyis Yerusalem mas eq ma doq loh; Arabia mau mas dvlhain dvm lyis e lho lha Damasku mas tauh loh.
48001018	Somh zvn thang lhyi, ngos Kepha ge dah Petru yah xauhgoh las nyah jyank masyah loeus xauh yoeus das xiklyis Yerusalem mas doq loh las, nyang yah dvci oeng nyeih nyeis khoq.
48001019	Yhensain dah vnoeuh Yaku mas lai las gohtoeu lvgyo jens lyis ngos ma nyvng.
48001020	Gvshih ngos namoq lyis lhaih kat zis gas jyoeng cho nghuot. Ngos hwah dang ma taiq zis gas Mangso seq.
48001021	Hauh thang lhyi ngos Siria mau yahge Kiliki wuxom mha jweh loh.
48001022	Hauh yoq lyis Yuda mau mas dah Khristan phung dius jens gas ngos yah nyoqnho changh ma seq goh shih.
48001023	Nghuot laus eq nyamoq gas, xikpheh ngamoq lyis shoeuhshih ku soeu ka, gohlhain nyang mhont tyamp das xiklyis khank ku dah lomsjingh cho lhyi gvshih taiq kyoh nyeis ge, gohyuk taiq yvlyis dvxauhgyo ku.
48001024	Housoeh las nyamoq gas ngah gvng mas Mangso phunk lhyi tsain chungh.
48002001	Hauh thang lhyi dvci nyei zvn lai lhyi, Titu lyis eq shwih las ngos Barnaba yah dvgeh Yerusalem pheh doms loh.
48002002	Heisoeh ngos loh zis gas Mangso dyei dah nyoqnyvng dang yah dvyhangteh nghuot. Uhjyung jens kyoq kyoq huom yvmas ngos Gohnyau bang lyis taiq kyoh Gausyis Dang cho taiq phui kyoh. Ngos housoeh taiq phui kyoh chah zis gas, xik pheh laus eq gvshih laus eq ngos yomkat nyeis dah muhzoh lyis vkom somh loh cho ma bweh nhang mes yvmvyah nghuot.
48002003	Ngah dyenschangh Titu gas Heleni dius nghuot laus eq hank eq nyang lyis vthyoh ma tsoengh tyomh nhang.
48002004	Dvyhamh gas nyang lyis vthyoh tyomh nhang mes. Khristu Yesu yah dvdain dvlom bweh las kang dwis gvng mas ngamoq xauh yoeus, luiq toeuh lyis joh yoeuh das xiklyis dius dvyhamh gas Khristan vmang vnoeuh guons kuot zis yah ngamoq dah huom mha gauh wvng los.
48002005	Nghuot laus eq hau Gausyis dang dah jyoeng cho namoq dah xiklyis yoh goeng joq bas jungh, ngamoq nyamoq lyis dvminit yangh shoeuh cho kham zis ma nghuot.
48002006	Nyoqnho ngelang bos dah uhjyung jens teh bang gas nyamoq jyoengh uhjyung jens nghuot ma nghuot gas ngah xiklyis lhyenwhei yhaugyen zis ma nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka nghe pheh yah nyvng khyvlyis soe ma tuon. Hau nyoqnho ngelang bos teh dah uhjyung jens gas ngos lyis joeui dyei cho vsaiq cha ma bos.
48002007	Nyamoq ngos lyis joeui vsaiq dyei das gungsthaiq Mangso ka Petru lyis vthyoh tyomh dah Yuda jens lyis gausyis dang taiq kyoh das yvwons s dyei goeus zis yah dvyhangteh ngos lyis eq vthyoh ma tyomh dah gohnyau bang lyis taiq kyoh das yvwons kyauh toh goeus cho nyamoq nyvng, seq.
48002008	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso dah yomsoq yah Petru lyis Yuda dius dah nyhenshang lvgyo toeuq toh goeus zis yah dvyhangteh ngos lyis eq gohnyau bang nyhenshang lvgyo toeuq toh.
48002009	Housoeh ngos lyis dyei toh dah jyehjuh tsain nyvng lyis, phung dah khungzains uhshe bang oen gis dah Yaku, Petru yahge Yohan moq gas, Mangso ngos lyis lhyenwhei dyei toh dah yvwons s lyis bos toeuq dyei. Housoeh ngamoq dvnganh gas muh wons changh nghuot cho vlho Chixoeuq khyvlyis nyamoq gas Barnaba yahge ngos lyis loq zwi zis yah lhom yoeus. Ngamoq gas gohnyau jyank mas muh wons las nyamoq gas Yuda jens mas muh wons das xiklyis xamxonh toh goeus.
48002010	Nyamoq gas ngamoq lyis shohjyen bang chah nyeis cho mha pangh das zis ma tohnyhik das xiklyis tying kat. Haih zis ngos svsoh wons wuq mes dah muh nyang nghuot.
48002011	Nghuot laus eq Petru gas Antiok wus mas jweh lyis, nyah wotwu shuot cho gyoq gyoq nghuot joq las ngos nyang lyis dius phung xikkhonh mas nyho goeus.
48002012	Khasoeh ge lyis Yaku nhang kat bang dvyhamh houmha ma jweh los shih lyis Petru gas gohnyau bang yah dvgeh zo nyeis. Nghuot laus eq hauh nhang kat zis xauh bang jweh los goeus ya, vthyoh tyomh bang lyis gyuk yvmvyah, gohnyau bang yah dvgeh wom zo masyah thuq jhank loh.
48002013	Gohtoeu Yuda vmang vnoeuh moq eq Petru yah dvgeh ma womh bang teh chank loh nyeis yvmvyah Barnaba yangh nyamoq mas bos loh nyeis.
48002014	Gvshih nyamoq hau Gausyis Dang dah jyoeng cho mha dan dan ma suh zis ngos nyvng lyis nyamoq dvnganh dah xikkhonh mas Petru lyis, Nvng gas Yuda dius nghuot las, Yuda dius teh ma kuot, gohnyau teh nghuot joq las gohnyau bang lyis Yuda jens teh kang yoh dwis shoq khasoeh yoh nyhenh kuot das lah, oen taiq goeus.
48002015	Ngamoq gas Yuda gyingh nghuot las, yaunos dap dah gohnyau bang oen nyhink bang ma nghuot, tsain ge.
48002016	Nghuot laus eq dius gas Lyi chank bang dah muhzoh yah Mangso dah xikkhonh mas ma yoh dan, Yesu Khristu lyis lomsjingh zis yah kyingh dvyoh dan zis lyis ngamoq seq yvmvyah ngamoq eq Lyi chank dah muhzoh yah ma nghuot, Khristu lyis lomsjingh gvng mas Mangso xikkhonh mas dan bang bweh los bas jungh, ngamoq yangh Khristu Yesu lyis lomsjingh goeus. Khasoeh ge lyis Lyi dah muhzoh yah hank eq Mangso xikkhonh mas dan yvmas ma yoh jweh.
48002017	Housoeh las yang gas Khristu yah dvdain dvlom duot gvng mas Mangso xikkhonh mas yoh dan bas jungh yomkat cho mha ngamoq nyang eq gohnyau bang teh yaunos dap bang nghuot yvlyis nyvng goeus ya, Khristu nyang yaunos kuot cho lhyi yomdyei nyeis oen yoh taiq das lah? Khasoeh eq ma gis bweh.
48002018	Khasoeh ge lyis, xikpheh ngos thyoq sanh tyamp dah Lyi cho lhyi ngos doms toenk nhang nyeis lyis gas, ngos gas Lyi lhyweq soeu nghuot yvlyis Chixoeuq nyeis.
48002019	Lyi yah sen lha taiq lyis, Lyi gas ngos lyis sat goeus las ngos gas shei soeu nghuot. Ngos Mangso xiklyis kang dwis bas jungh, ngos gas Khristu yah dvgeh nyah tapzains mas taplhangh sat zis xauh goeus.
48002020	Housoeh las ngah gungs dwis nyeis shih zis ma nghuot, ngos mas Khristu dvdwis nyeis. Gvshih ngos dwis nyeis dah kang ka ngos lyis jyetdap las ngah xiklyis nyah kang dyei tyamp, Mangso dah Lo lyis lomsjingh gvng mas dwis nyeis dah kang dvnghuot.
48002021	Ngos Mangso dah jyehjuh lyis peq das zis ma gyo: khasoeh ge lyis dius gas Lyi yah Mangso dah xikkhonh mas yoh dan los nghuot lyis gas, Khristu gas vnyet dvshei kham lo.
48003001	Koh dah Galati bang eh, tapzains mas Yesu Khristu shei kham cho, ngos namoq xikkhonh mas gyoq gyoq nyvng shoq taiq phui kyoh goeus lyis eq, namoq lyis hank yah hweq kat yoeus lah?
48003002	Namoq hauh Dyos xauh yoeus zis gas Lyi chank tyink dah muhzoh yah nghuot lah? Gausyis dang xauhgyo las hauh yvlyis lomsjingh gvng mas nghuot lah? Ngos namoq nhuot masyah hauh dvcho kyingh seq mes.
48003003	Namoq khasoeh hei iq koh goh lah? Namoq gas hau Dyos mas nges zis yah kuot xi lho lha, gvshih gas namoq gungsshoh yom lyis nges las vthang sau mes lhyeh?
48003004	Namoq nyang thungh phuh kham zo dah shanghsenh lyis namoq vkom kham zo tyamp goeus lhyeh? Jyoengh hau thungh phuh zis gas namoq xiklyis vkom ma gis bweh loh.
48003005	Mangso ka namoq lyis Dyos dyei las, yomsoq muh kuot zis gas Lyi chank tyink gvng mas nghuot lah? Gausyis Dang lyis xauhgyo las lomsjingh gvng mas yoh bweh nhang lah?
48003006	Abraham thungh phuh cho lhyi nghamh yoeuh goh: lhaihtoh dang mas, Abraham gas Mangso lhyi lomsjingh las, Mangso eq nyang lyis dan soeu ge lhom yoeus, ge toh.
48003007	Housoeh yvmvyah Mangso lhyi lomsjingh bang gas, Abraham dah lo jens gyingh nghuot zis namoq seq geh.
48003008	Lhaihtoh dang eq, Mangso ka lomsjingh zis yah kyingh gohnyau bang lyis dan nhang das ge taiq toh. Housoeh las lhaihtoh dang gas, Dius nyau dvnganh gas nah gvng mas shvmanh yoh das ge Abraham lyis Gausyis Dang taiq kyoh goeus.
48003009	Housoeh las Abraham gas Mangso lhyi lomsjingh yvmvyah shvmanh jyehjuh xauh kham zis yah dvyhangteh lomsjingh bang dvnganh eq shvmanh jyehjuh xauh kham yoeus.
48003010	Lyi chank tyink dah cho lhyi nges soeu hank laus eq nhoengh yvmas bos: khasoeh ge lyis lhaihtoh dang gas, Lyi mas lhaih ya lhaih toh zis yah dvyhangteh ma kuot tyink soeu hank laus eq Mangso dah nhoengh zis xauh das, ge lhaih toh.
48003011	Lhaihtoh dang mas Mangso lhyi lomsjingh soeu lhyi nyah xikkhonh mas dan soeu nghuot ge suon dyei zis xauh soeu ka dwis nyeis, ge lhaih toh yvmvyah Lyi chank tyink zis yah Mangso xikkhonh mas hank eq ma yoh dan das zis gas bvng bvng nghuot.
48003012	Nghuot laus eq lhaihtoh dang mas, Lyi mas taiq ya taiq toh dang lyis chank tyink soeu ka kang dwis nyeis das ge lhaih toh yvmvyah Lyi gas lomsjingh cho yah cha ma sen.
48003013	Saiq mas lhangh zis xauh soeu khanghmuh Mangso dah nhoengh zis xauh soeu nghuot ge lhaih toh zis yah dvyhangteh, Khristu gas yah xiklyis nhoengh zis xauh soeu bweh loh gvng mas, Lyi dah nhoengh zis xauh masyah Khristu gas yang lyis khyuot yoeus goeus.
48003014	Heisoeh Yesu kuot cho ka Abraham kham yoeus, Mangso jyank mas dah dangthoengh yah sen dah shvmanh jyehjuh lyis gohnyau bang eq Yesu Khristu gvng mas xauh kham yoeus das zis yahge yang eq hau lomsjingh gvng mas Mangso dangthoengh toh dah Dyos xauh kham yoeus das.
48003015	Boekyis eh, namoq nyeih khanghmuh thungh phuh nyeis cho mha ngos dangtoeuq dvkoeuq yah taiq das. Dius aiq yuk gas cho dvja mas xamxonh zis yah dangthoengh vlho maussauh dye lhaih toh lyis hauh yvlyis hank eq ma yoh thyoq, ma yoh jyeq kat.
48003016	Gvshih Mangso ka nyah dangthoengh, Abraham yahge nyah vnyau vshih lyis dyei toh, ge. Lhaihtoh dang mas vnyau vshih nyoshoq, nghuot ya dius nyoshoq ge dah dang ma chi. Nah vshih ge dvyuk lyis kyingh taiq nyeis las hauh zis gas Khristu nghuot.
48003017	Housoeh las ngos taiq mes zis gas heisoeh nghuot. Mangso ka Abraham yah thanghchvp dye toh thang lhyi hauh yvlyis yoeuh gomh das dangthoengh toh. 430 zvn nyangh thang lhyi dvthuq los dah Lyi gas hauh thanghchvp lyis ma yoh thyuk zis yahge hauh dangthoengh lyis eq ma yoh yoeus tyamp.
48003018	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso dah jyehjuh vso vlho ka Lyi mas nges toh nghuot lyis gas hauh zis dangthoengh yah ma sen lo; nghuot laus eq Mangso ka dangthoengh gvng mas Abraham lyis hauh jyehjuh vso vlho dyei toh.
48003019	Housoeh lyis gas hauh Lyi dah toeuqkhom ka cha nghuot? Lyi lyis Mangso jyeq kat toh dyei cho ka shuot dah yaunos cho lhyi chixoeuq das xiklyis nghuot las houka dangthoengh toh dah Abraham vnyau vshih ma jweh los shih gyo lyis kyingh goeng joq das nyhenshang nghuot. Mangso ka Lyi lyis loeuswons bang khyvlyis yah jo mas suh soeu loq lyis yah dyei toh.
48003020	Nghuot laus eq Mangso ka dangthoengh dyei uhlyis jo mas suh dyei das dius ma chah, nyang dan dan kuot goeus. Mangso ka dvyuk kyingh dvnghuot.
48003021	Housoeh las Lyi gas Mangso dah dangthoengh lyis tyixo oen mes lah? Housoeh ma nghuot, khasoeh ge lyis cangsoeu dius jens gas kang yoh dwis nhang dah Lyi lyis dius jens toq xauh lhom yoeus toh lyis gas, dius yuk khanghmuh hauh Lyi chank tyink gvng mas Mangso xikkhonh mas yoh dan los das zis nghuot.
48003022	Nghuot laus eq Mungkvn gonh gas yaunos dah yomsoq yah nghop tyamp, ge lhaihtoh dang mas taiq. Housoeh las Yesu Khristu lyis lomsjingh yvmas vpom xi toh dah dangthoengh yah sen dah jyehjuh vso vlho ka lomsjingh bang kham yoeus goeus.
48003023	Nghuot laus eq hauh lomsjingh cho xiklyis shishenh ma jweh shih lyis lomsjingh cho dede thuq los shishenh jweh shoq Lyi gas yang dvnganh lyis thung dius jens lyis teh lhunk toh.
48003024	Housoeh las yang gas lomsjingh gvng mas dan los bas jungh ge, Lyi gas jyauh soeu khyvlyis Khristu jweh los shishenh jweh shoq yah xiklyis jyauh soeu duot dyei.
48003025	Nghuot laus eq lomsjingh cho jweh goeus las, yang gas jyauh soeu o mha ma nghuot lo.
48003026	Khasoeh ge lyis, Khristu Yesu lyis lomsjingh yvmvyah namoq dvnganh gas Mangso dah lo jens nghuot.
48003027	Namoq gas Khristu yah dvdain dvlom duot das xiklyis jeisnyhop tsain kham goeus las, Khristu lyis tsain wuot toh.
48003028	Housoeh las nyang changh shaih goh gang lvn cho ma bos bos, Yuda vnyau yahge gohnyau bang oen zis ma bos, jons yahge luiq soeu ma bos, nyelo yukgis lo oen das zis eq ma bos. Namoq dvnganh gas Khristu mas dvkoeuq dvnghuot.
48003029	Gvshih namoq Khristu yah sen bang nghuot lyis gas, namoq gas Abraham dah vnyau vshih tsain nghuot zis yahge hau dangthoengh joq zis yah dvyhangteh Mangso jyank masyah vso vlho xauh kham yoeus das.
48004001	Tsoq taiq das zis bos shih. Uwus jyank masyah yhenzis vso vlho dvnganh kham yoeus das yvmvyah jyoengh kham yoeus das zis jus joq laus eq loshang nghuot shih uhlyis gas jons dvyuk teh toh zis xauh.
48004002	Uwus toeuq toh shishenh jweh shoq nyang ngis shih gyo lyis gomh bang jyauh bang yahge nyang chah ya chah yvlyis kuot dyei dah yhen zom bang dah o mha nyang nyeis shih.
48004003	Houyah dvyhangteh yang eq Dyos dah cho mha seq dah nhaiqbos jens ma duot shih gyo lyis mungkvn lyis guon nyeis dah yius sidyos jens dah jons duot ku.
48004004	Nghuot laus eq shishenh jweh goeus ya, Mangso ka nyah Lo lyis nhang kat. Yang gas Mangso dah lo jens ge rhen dah jyehjuh xauh kham yoeus.
48004005	Hauh Lo gas Lyi khau mha nyeis bang lyis khyuot yoeus das nyhenshang cangsoeu ungwes masyah khoeu los las, Yuda jens dah Lyi khau mha nyeis lyih.
48004006	Gvshih namoq gas Mangso dah lo jens tsain nghuot yvlyis kanghjyoeng chixoeuq das xiklyis, Uwus eh, ngah uwus eh ge seq taiq, nyah Lo dah Dyos lyis yah ehnyet khau mha nhang kat dyei goeus.
48004007	Housoeh las nvng gas jons ma nghuot lo, lo dvyuk nghuot goeus: nyah lo nghuot goeus ya, Mangso jyank masyah nyah lo jens dah nyhenshang sont toh dah vso vlho dvnganh eq nvng lyis dyei das.
48004008	Lai loh goeus yoq lyis namoq Mangso lhyi ma seq shih yvmvyah ma jyoeng dah phvra jens dah jons tsain duot khoq.
48004009	Gvshih gas namoq Mangso lhyi seq goeus thoq lyis, Mangso eq namoq lyis seq goeus lyis, yomnhuk shohjyen dah yius sidyos jens jyank pheh namoq chamus doms tauh loh mes goh lah?
48004010	Namoq gas buisnyeis, lhamhmuh, shishenh yahge zvn dvkhamh lyis svsoh yhaugyen khyvlyis toh.
48004011	Ngos namoq jyank mas vkom mha dvyomkat tyamp mvbeh oen ngos namoq cho chiqh.
48004012	Boekyis eh, ngos namoq teh nghuot yvmvyah namoq eq ngos teh tsain kuot geh: oen ngos namoq lyis shangphu. Ngos namoq lyis cha ma cu.
48004013	Ngos namoq lyis Gausyis Dang cangxeih vlhain yoh taiq kyoh cho ka, gungsdom nos xauh las no nyeis gvng mas yoh taiq kyoh yvlyis namoq seq nyeis.
48004014	Ngah gungs yanghzan cho gvng mas namoq xiklyis thauqkhyi cho bweh nhang das laus eq namoq ngos lyis dius ngis ma khyoq, ma choqh thoq lyis magoh, maukhung mas dah loeuswons soeu dvyuk lyis teh, jyoengh Khristu lyis teh tsain lhom yoeus.
48004015	Hauh uhlyis namoq svsoh yoh pyo goeus. Gvshih namoq chamus lah? Hauh shishenh lyis namoq gas gis bweh lyis vsainnyang nyoqlom lap las ngos lyis dyei das zis yangh tsain womh yvlyis ngos namoq dah cho kanghjyoeng kat.
48004016	Gvshih gas ngos namoq lyis hau jyoeng cho taiq kyoh yvmvyah namoq dah jes bweh los goeus lah?
48004017	Ngos lyis tomp bang gas namoq mas nhaiq wvng. Nghuot laus eq jyoeng dah nghamh toeuq zis ma nghuot. Nyamoq dah o cho ka nyamoq thoq mas namoq dah nhaiq wvng cho xauh kham yoeus shoq namoq lyis ngos yah kangh tyamp nhang mes las dvnghuot.
48004018	Jyoeng dah nghamh toeuq cho yahge nhaiq wvng chiqh cho nghuot lyis gas gis. Ngos namoq yah nyeis lyis kyingh gis cho lhyi chiqh gis zis ma nghuot. Khanhamp laus eq gis cho lhyi chiqh nyeis das zis gas gis.
48004019	Jyetdap loshang jens eh, Khristu dah gungs khyank namoq mas dyinghjet los shishenh jweh shoq ngos gas namoq dah xiklyis lokhoeu dah ungwes teh lokhoeu nos doms nos nyeis.
48004020	Ngos namoq lyis thwe shaih khyvlyis yoh taiq das xiklyis ngos namoq yah kha iq nyeis mes lah! Ngos gas namoq dah cho svsoh chiqh nyeis.
48004021	Lyi khau mha nyeis mes bang lyis ngos nyei bah. Namoq gas hauh Lyi taiq toh cho lhyi ma xauhgyo ku goh lhyeh?
48004022	Khasoeh ge lyis lhaihtoh dang mas taiq zis yah dvyhangteh, Abraham gas loloeu aiq yuk yoh. Dvyuk gas jyeidwis nyih dah lo nghuot. Gohtoeu dvyuk gas nyicuk dah lo nghuot.
48004023	Jons nyhiq yah yoh dah lo gas diuslaiq khyvlyis khoeu los dah lo nghuot. Nghuot laus eq jons ma nghuot soeu yah yoh dah lo gas Mangso dangthoengh yah dvyhangteh khoeu los.
48004024	Hauh cho jens lyis dangtoeuq dvkoeuq khyvlyis seqgyo gis. Vmesbih aiq yuk gas hau thanghchvp aiq koeuq yah doeusgoh. Vmesbih dvyuk gas Hagar nghuot las nyang khoeu kat lo jens gas jons duot. Hagar gas Sina boms mas dyei dah thanghchvp vlho nghuot.
48004025	Hagar gas Arabia mau mas joq, Sina boms yah byi toh. Nyang gas gvshih jons duot nyeis Yerusalem yahge wus mas dius jens xiklyis vlho duot dyei nyeis.
48004026	Nghuot laus eq gohtoeu vmesbih gas maukhung Yerusalem yah byi toh. Nyang gas luiq dah vmesbih nghuot las, yah ungwes eq nghuot.
48004027	Khasoeh ge lyis lhaih toh zis gas, Lo ma khoeu dah dyeithonh eh, gauslaus nyeis aq; Lo khoeu nos ma xauh dah vmesbih eh, gaus zis yah kaiq nyeis aq; Khasoeh ge lyis doeuh tyamp toh dah vmesbih gas, yhensain phoq bos dah vmesbih thoq lyis loshang jens zes yoh, ge.
48004028	Boekyis eh, gvshih namoq gas Isak yhangteh nyah dangthoengh yah dvyhangteh yoh los dah Mangso dah lo jens nghuot.
48004029	Hauh shishenh lyis diuslaiq khyvlyis khoeu los lo gas Mangso dah Dyos gvng mas khoeu los dah lo lyis shoeuhshih. Gvshih uhlyis eq housoeh bweh nyeis.
48004030	Nghuot laus eq lhaihtoh dang gas cha taiq? Haih jyeidwis nyih yahge nyah lo lyis khat thuq aq: khasoeh ge lyis jyeidwis nyih dah lo gas nyicuk dah lo yah dvgeh uwus dah yhenzis vso vlho xauh sain das zis ma nghuot, ge.
48004031	Housoeh las boekyis eh, yang gas jyeidwis nyih dah lo jens ma nghuot, nyicuk dah lo jens dvnghuot.
48005001	Khristu gas yang lyis jons masyah lhuiq kat goeus las yang jons ma tsain nghuot lo. Housoeh las luiq goeus bang teh goeng goeng yap geh. Namoq dah gungs lyis jons tanzoe o mha vdoms bat lyet nyeis goh.
48005002	Gyo geh! namoq vthyoh tyomh lyis gas, Khristu gas namoq xiklyis chah vkyuh ma bos oen ngos Paulo nyang namoq lyis taiq kyoh.
48005003	Hauh thoq lyis vthyoh tyomh soeu ka Lyi dvnganh chank tyink chah oen vthyoh tyomh bang dvnganh lyis ngos dvlhain doms zaih nhang.
48005004	Lyi chank tyink khyvlyis yah Mangso xikkhonh mas dan cho yoh das ge yomkat bang namoq gas, Khristu yah gang las Mangso dah jyehjuh lyis kat khyoq tyamp.
48005005	Yang gas Mangso dah Dyos yomsoq mas nges las lomsjingh gvng mas Mangso xikkhonh mas dan ge suon dyei dah toeuh yoh das oen nghamhloms las langh nyeis.
48005006	Khasoeh ge lyis yang Yhensain Yesu mas nghuot joq lyis gas vthyoh tyomh, vthyoh ma tyomh ge zis gas cha yhaugyen zis ma nghuot: yhaugyen cho ka jyetdap ehnyet nyvng shoq muh khanh dah hau lomsjingh cho dvnghuot.
48005007	Xikpheh namoq svsoh yhaugyen khyvlyis kuot loh goeus; hauh jyoeng cho lhyi domsyos ma gyo bas jungh ge, namoq lyis hank kyamp toh lah? Hauh soeu ka namoq lyis khasoeh mhuih loh?
48005008	Housoeh mhuih zis gas, namoq lyis khi yoeus dah Mangso bweh nhang zis ma nghuot.
48005009	Ohlhyoq dvjop gonh lyis bi nhang das xiklyis bicheih dvtsiq dvchah ge dah dang lyis soh geh.
48005010	Nghuot laus eq ngos gas gvshih jweh shoq namoq lyis tsoq loms nyeis. Ngos yahge namoq gas Yhensain mha dvdain dvlom nghuot joq yvmvyah namoq gas shaih dah cho lhyi ma lhom yoeus das oen loms. Namoq lyis khamkhvv shoq thauqkhyi soeu hank lyis laus eq Yhensain ka soetuon yobos dyei das.
48005011	Nghuot laus eq boekyis eh, vthyoh tyomh cho yhaugyen oen ngos tsoq taiq kyoh nyeis ge cho jyoeng nghuot lyis gas, ngos chamus shoeuhshih zis xauh nyeis shih lah? Housoeh taiq kyoh ge zis jyoeng nghuot lyis gas, Khristu yah sen dah cho lhyi ngos taiq kyoh gvng mas yaukyenh cho bweh nhang das zis ma nghuot.
48005012	Namoq lyis lhoq yau bang gas, vthyoh tyomh zis kyingh ma nghuot, nyamoq nyang thyet tyamp lyis zes gis.
48005013	Boekyis eh, namoq gas luiq cho yoh bas jungh, namoq lyis khi yoeus goeus, nghuot laus eq hau luiq toeuh lyis jyamp las gungsshoh o mes khyvlyis vkuot goh. Housoeh kuot das gungsthaiq namoq gas jyetdap ehnyet yah nyang changh nyang phuqsoe goh geh.
48005014	Khasoeh ge lyis, Nah yhenkyoh lyis nvnyang gungs lyis teh jyetdap aq, ge dah tyingtoh dang dvkoeuq lyis chank kuot zis yah hauh Lyi dvnganh yoh nyuk los cho taiq toh.
48005015	Nghuot laus eq yewus jens teh namoq nyang changh nyang ngatzo goh nyeis lyis gas namoq nyang changh thyuk tyamp goh cho duot das las zaih nyeis geh.
48005016	Ngos taiq zis gas, Dyos taiq shet zis yah dvyhangteh chank kuot nyeis geh. Housoeh lyis namoq gungsshoh dah nyetnau cho ma kuot das.
48005017	Khasoeh ge lyis gungsshoh dah obos cho ka Dyos dah o cho yah tyixo goh. Gungsshoh dah o cho yahge Dyos dah o cho hai aiq koeuq gas jes dvtsain nghuot. Housoeh las namoq gas kuot mes khyvlyis ma tsain yoh kuot.
48005018	Hauh Dyos yah namoq lyis shwih nghuot lyis gas, namoq hau Lyi khau mha ma nghuot lo.
48005019	Gungsshoh dah muhzoh gas dede nghuot joq las, hauh zis gas nyi shuot lvng shuot, ma lhoq ma shang, yauxi nosxi,
48005020	silho paiq, hweq kuot, hoeng goh, dyoqgoh, noh, nhaiqlom dyis, lvn loh, gang loh, vphung phung bweh loh cho,
48005021	yhei yet, yhei shuk shoh zo teh dah cho yahge houyah doeus goh dah cho tsain nghuot. Housoeh kuot bang gas Mangso munghdan vso vlho xauh kham yoeus das zis ma nghuot oen ngos namoq lyis xikpheh taiq goeus zis yah dvyhangteh gvshih eq zaih nhang.
48005022	Nghuot laus eq hau Dyos dah vshih gas: jyetdap, gauslaus, nyenstap, jhen, nhaiqnyen, gis cho, lomluk cho,
48005023	nhaiqlom nyhen mha gyoh zis yahge nyang gungs nyang yoh joeu cho tsain nghuot. Haih cho jens lyis yoh tomp dah lyi ma bos.
48005024	Khristu Yesu yah sen bang gas, vsainnyang gungsshoh ehnyet lyis eq, nyetnau cho yahge obos cho tapzains mas lhangh sat goeus.
48005025	Yang hauh Dyos mas kang dwis nyeis lyis gas, Dyos yah shwih khyvlyis suh e nyeis goh.
48005026	Yang gas vkom mha moengs las, nyang changh nyang jausxo goh, noh goh cho ma kuot goh.
48006001	Boekyis eh, dius dvyuk yuk masoh mathamh yaunos zangh kuot lyis, Dyos yah shwih yvmas kang dwis bang namoq gas housoeh teh soeu lhyi noeuh nhamp ehnyet yah soq dyei geh. Namoq eq shiwu zis ma xauh bas jungh vsainnyang zaih nyeis geh.
48006002	Namoq nyang changh dah yvwons lyis bos wons wuq zis yah Khristu dah lyi lyis tyink nyeis geh.
48006003	Dius dvyuk yuk gas yhaugyen dah dius gis ma bweh shih lyis yhaugyen soeu nghuot goeus ge khwank soeu ka nyang nyah gungs lyis mhuih jyomh goeus.
48006004	Dius yuk khanghmuh nyah muhzoh lyis kyink bas jungh. Nyah muh gis joq nghuot lyis hauh yvlyis gohtoeu dvyuk yuk dah muh yah byi chank ma bos, nyang kuot muh mas nhaiqtap khwank chank bos das.
48006005	Khasoeh ge lyis, yuk khanghmuh vsainnyang yvwons s wons wuq chah das zis nghuot.
48006006	Hauh Khristu dah dang lyis xuq soeu ka, jyauh soeu lhyi vsainnyang yoh dah gis vyhang dvnganh gvm dyei nyeis bas jungh.
48006007	Namoq gas vsainnyang gungs lyis mhuih las chowhang vwhang goh, Mangso lhyi ma phauh yoh kuot das zis ma nghuot. Dius gas nyang xoh zis yah dvyhangteh nyang xauh yhomh das.
48006008	Dius dah gungsshoh ge dah tsoh mas xoh soeu ka shei ge dah dyoqbis jyo xauh yhomh das; Dyos ge dah tsoh mas xoh soeu ka vcaiq vto kang ge dah jyo xauh yhomh das.
48006009	Housoeh las yang gis dah muh zwi das zis ma nyung ma daus nyeis goh: khasoeh ge lyis yang ma toh tyamp lyis gas shishenh jweh lyis yang xauh yhomh yoeus das.
48006010	Housoeh yvmvyah yang shishenh yahge toeuh yoh zis yah dvyhangteh dius dvnganh lyis gis dah muh kuot nyeis goh, nghuot laus eq lomsjingh dah yhenbang lyis zes las kuot dyei goh.
48006011	Ngos namoq lyis ngah loq yah kha iq kuh dah sauhchvp lhaih toh zis lyis yoeuh geh.
48006012	Namoq lyis vthyoh tsoengh tyomh nhang bang gas, nghe pheh dah vlho lhyi khwank xoeuq bang nghuot. Nghuot laus eq nyamoq housoeh kuot cho ka Khristu dah tapzains gvng mas shoeuhshih zis ma xauh das nyhenshang dvnghuot.
48006013	Khasoeh ge lyis vthyoh tyomh bang nyang, hauh Lyi lyis chank tyink zis ma nghuot; nghuot laus eq nyamoq gas namoq vthyoh tyomh gvng mas khwank mes las namoq lyis vthyoh tyomh nhang zis nghuot.
48006014	Ngos gas yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah tapzains mas lai las gohtoeu cha cho mha eq ma khwank: khasoeh ge lyis nyang tapzains mas taplhangh sat zis xauh yvmvyah mungkvn gas ngah xiklyis vshei nghuot las ngos eq mungkvn xiklyis vshei bweh goeus.
48006015	Dvyuk yuk vthyoh tyomh laus, ma tyomh laus yhaugyen vpom ma nghuot. Gvnkhanh toh dah dius vsaiq bweh das zis dvyhaugyen.
48006016	Haih wotwu vzwvng lyi yah kang dwis cho mha chank nyeis bang dvnganh thoq mas nyenstap zis yahge nhaiqnyen zis joq bas jungh. Houyah dvyhangteh Mangso dah dius nyau Israel jens thoq mas eq nghuot joq bas jungh.
48006017	Gvshih masyah ngos lyis hank eq ma lhoeu yau lo bas jungh: khasoeh ge lyis Khristu gvng mas ngos kham dah dvm-yos kanghjyoeng ka ngah gungs mas dap joq.
48006018	Boekyis eh, yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah jyehjuh gas namoq dyos yah dvgeh nyeis nyeis bas jungh. Amen.
49001001	Mangso dah ehnyet yah Khristu Yesu dah lvgyo toeuq toh zis xauh soeu ngos Paulo gas, Ephesu wus mas nyeis, Khristu yah dvdain dvlom nghuot dah kang dwis cho mha lomluk bang, Mangso dah dius jens lyis dang tying kat.
49001002	Yah Uwus Mangso yahge Yhensain Yesu Khristu gas namoq lyis jyehjuh yahge nyenstap cho dyei bas jungh.
49001003	Yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah Uwus, Mangso lhyi nhaiqshoqlang chungh goh. Khasoeh ge lyis yang Khristu mas dvdain dvlom yoh bweh gvng mas nyang gas maukhung nyhang mha Dyos yah sen dah shvmanh jyehjuh cho khvt khanghmuh yang lyis dyei nyeis.
49001004	Yang gas jyetdap ehnyet yah nyah xikkhonh mas gyingshang lha yobos huon dais ma bos bang bweh los bas jungh yang Khristu gvng mas nyeisjvng ma xi shih lyis yah yangh Mangso ka yang lyis khyen yoeus goeus.
49001005	Nyang gas nyah jyetdap ehnyet yah, Yesu Khristu gvng mas yang lyis nyah lo jens ge rhen das xiklyis nghamh thyet toh goeus. Houka nyang o zis yah dvyhangteh nghamh toeuq cho nghuot.
49001006	Housoeh yvmvyah phauh ma sang, yang lyis dyei dah jyehjuh yahge phunk bos jyehjuh gvng mas Mangso lhyi chungh goh.
49001007	Khasoeh ge lyis Khristu shei kham gvng mas yang lhuiq kat zis xauh goeus. Houka yah yaunos khyuot tyamp dyei cho nghuot. Yang lyis heinyhoq magons magoh dyei dah Mangso jyehjuh gas kha iq kuhxing joq lah!
49001009	Nyah dah joeui yah eq, yik cho yah eq Mangso ka nyang nghamh toeuq toh cho lhyi kuot goeus las Khristu gvng mas tyink das xiklyis nghamh thyet toh goeus. Nghamh toeuq las nghop shung toh dah kuot das cho lhyi chixoeuq kat goeus.
49001010	Shishenh jweh lyis Mangso kuot tyink das dah nghamh toeuq cho ka maukhung nyhang tsank yahge nyeisjvng mas gvnkhanh toh vyhang dvnganh gas Khristu lyis uhjyung kuot zis yah dvdain dvlom kuot toh das cho nghuot.
49001011	Dvnganh gas Mangso dah nghamh toeuq cho yahge nghamh thyet toh zis yah dvyhangteh bweh los goeus. Tsai, xik lyis yah nghamh thyet toh goeus yvmas vpom kuot las Khristu mas dvdain dvlom nghuot gvng mas nyang nghamh toeuq toh khyvlyis yah yang lyis nyah dius nyau duot das xiklyis khyen toeuq toh goeus.
