49001012	Housoeh lyis Khristu mas cangxeih nghamhloms cho yoh toh goeus bang yang gas, Mangso phunk lyis chungh goh.
49001013	Namoq lyis khyuot yoeus cho dyei, jyoeng dang ge dah gausyis loeus lyis namoq xauhgyo lyis namoq eq Mangso dah dius nyau jens bweh los goeus. Namoq Khristu lyis lomsjingh goeus las, nyang thoengh toh dah Gyingshang Dyos dyei gvng mas nyang gas namoq dah Yhensain nghuot cho kyihau tap dyei goeus.
49001014	Hau Dyos dyei cho ka Mangso nyah dius nyau jens lyis kham yoeus nhang das thoengh toh goeus vso vlho xauh kham das yvlyis pauh toh cho nghuot. Houka Mangso ka nyah dius nyau jens lyis dyinghjet dah luiq toeuh dyei das cho, yang lyis nhaiq tap nhang nyeis. Yang nyah phunk lyis chungh nyeis goh.
49001015	Housoeh yvmvyah namoq Yhensain Yesu lyis lomsjingh cho yahge Mangso dah dius jens lyis jyetdap cho ngos xauhgyo masyah,
49001016	ngos gas namoq nyhenshang Mangso lhyi malyen lo nhaiqshoqlang sang zis yah ngos shvmanh dung yvmas namoq lyis soh nyeis.
49001017	Namoq Mangso lhyi zes seq los bas jungh. Yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah Mangso, phunk bos Uwus gas joeui yahge nyoqnyvng yoh nyvng yomsoq bos dah Dyos namoq lyis dyei bas jungh, ngos Uwus Mangso lhyi dung.
49001018	Yhensain ka namoq lyis chah nghamhloms cho mha khi yoeus goeus zis eq, Yhensain dah dius nyau jens lyis thoengh toh, mauhphoh jyehjuh vso vlho ka kha iq magons magoh nghuot yvlyis eq,
49001019	Yhensain lhyi lomsjingh bang mas muh khanh nyeis dah nyah yomsoq gas kha iq kuhxing joq yvlyis eq, namoq yoh nyvng seq das xiklyis namoq dah ungkhau dolhain los bas jungh oen dung. Yang mas muh khanh nyeis dah yomsoq gas,
49001020	Khristu lyis dwis toq los nhang lha, maukhung mha Mangso dah loqyos shot pheh tsung toh nhang uhlyis yhung dah mathank magons yomsoq nyang nghuot.
49001021	Houmha Khristu gas, maukhung mungkvn lyis guon bang, vmingh yoh bang, yomsoq bos bang, yhensain jens dvnganh thoq mas joeu las guon nyeis. Nyah nyings gas haih mungkvn, jweh los das mungkvn mas taiq das toeuh yoh dah nyings dvnganh thoq lyis zes dah nyings nghuot.
49001022	Mangso ka vyhang dvnganh zis lyis Khristu khyei o mha toh las, nyang lyis hau phung nyhenshang dvnganh thoq mas dah uhloms duot das xiklyis toeuq toh.
49001023	Hauh phung ka dvnganh yvlyis yoh dyinghjet nhang soeu, dyinghjet ge dah Khristu gungs nghuot.
49002001	Lai loh goeus yoq lyis namoq gas domsyos ma gyo cho yahge yaunos gvng mas dyos gas shei joq.
49002002	Hauh shishenh lyis namoq gas hai mungkvn dah ma gis ma shop cho mha tsain suh e lha, maulat mas dah vmingh yoh soeu, sidyos dah domsyos tsain gyo. Hauh sidyos gas gvshih eq Mangso domsyos ma gyo dah lo jens mas muh kuot nyeis.
49002003	Jyoengh yang dvnganh eq xikpheh nyamoq teh nghuot las, yah dah gungsshoh nyetnau cho chank zis yah, gungsshoh yahge ungkhau mha nghamh khyvlyis kuot tyink goeus. Yang eq gungsshoh khyvlyis yah gohyuk yah dvyhangteh Mangso dah nhaiqlom dyis zis xauh kham vvng bang nghuot.
49002004	Nghuot laus eq Mangso ka nhaiqnyen ehnyet nyo las nyang yang lyis jyetdap ehnyet kuh joq las,
49002005	yang domsyos ma gyo dah lyi lhyweq cho yaunos gvng mas dyos mas shei joq bang lyis Khristu mas kang doms dwis nhang goeus. Houka Mangso dah jyehjuh yah namoq khyuot yoeus zis xauh goeus.
49002006	Yang gas Khristu yah dvdain dvlom bweh gvng mas Mangso ka yang lyis maukhung nyhang mha Yhensain yah dvgeh guon nyeis das xiklyis nyang yah dvgeh dwis toq nhang.
49002007	Nyang heisoeh kuot cho ka Khristu Yesu mas yang lyis jyetdap ehnyet Chixoeuq yvmas Yhensain dah jyehjuh gas gohtseq kuhxing joq cho thang pheh vcaiq caiq dius jens yoh nyvng das xiklyis nghuot.
49002008	Khasoeh ge lyis namoq gas lomsjingh gvng mas Mangso dah jyehjuh yah kyingh namoq khyuot yoeus zis xauh. Houka namoq yomkat las ma nghuot, Mangso dah jyehjuh jyungshuk dvnghuot.
49002009	Namoq zwi khank dah muhzoh gvng mas ma nghuot, Mangso dah jyungshuk dvnghuot. Housoeh las hank eq khwank chank ma bos.
49002010	Khasoeh ge lyis yang gas Mangso khasoeh gvnkhanh toh lyis housoeh nghuot joq. Khristu Yesu mas dvdain dvlom nghuot joq gvng mas, Mangso ka uhlhomh las cicont sont toh goeus, gis dah muh lyis kuot uhjyangh kang dwis das xiklyis yang lyis gvnkhanh toh goeus.
49002011	Khoeu los lyis yah gohnyau bang tsain nghuot las dius dah loq yah vsainnyang gungs mas kuot yoeus dah muh, vthyoh tyomh bang ge nyhink yoeus dah Yuda dius jens yah, Vthyoh ma tyomh bang, ge lui dah gohnyau bang eh, xikpheh namoq hank tsain nghuot yvlyis soh geh.
49002012	Hauh shishenh lyis namoq gas Khristu yah gang joq bang, Mangso khyen yoeus dius nyau Israel jens mas ma bos dah lvbaus, nyah dius nyau lyis dyei toh thanghchvp yah sen dangthoengh mas ma bos bang nghuot las, mungkvn mas nghamhloms chank ma bos, Mangso eq ma yoh, nyeis dyos los dah dius jens nghuot lai los goeus.
49002013	Nghuot laus eq gvshih gas Khristu Yesu mas dvdain dvlom nghuot goeus las xikpheh Mangso yah we joq laus eq Khristu shei kham gvng mas Mangso yah yoh ni los goeus.
49002014	Khasoeh ge lyis Khristu gas Yuda vnyau yahge gohnyau bang lyis dvkoeuq kyingh bweh nhang zis yah namoq lyis nyenstap cho dyei goeus. Nyang gas nyah gungs lyis kyauh tyamp yvmas yang lyis vnyau khyvlyis khwih khyamh las jes khyvlyis nyeis nhang dah vkyo lhyi thyoq tyamp goeus.
49002015	Nyang gas aiq nyau lyis nyang yah dvdain dvlom kuot las dius nyau saiq dvkoeuq bweh nhang das xiklyis Yuda lyi yah dvgeh tyingtoh lyi yahge chank chah lyi lyis thyuk tyamp goeus. Heisoeh khyvlyis nyenstap cho dyei goeus.
49002016	Khristu gas tapzains mas shei kham zis yah nyamoq dah hoeng cho lhyi thyoq tyamp las hau aiq nyau lyis dvnyau kyingh kuot las Mangso jyank mas doms shwih loh dyei.
49002017	Housoeh Mangso yah we joq dah namoq gohnyau bang lyis eq, Mangso yah ni nyeis dah Yuda dius jens lyis eq Khristu jweh los las hau nyenstap gausyis loeus taiq kyoh goeus.
49002018	Gohnyau bang yahge Yuda dius jens nghuot dah yang dvnganh gas Khristu gvng mas hau Dyos dvkoeuq kyingh yah Uwus xikkhonh mas yoh wvng loh goeus.
49002019	Housoeh yvmvyah gvshih gas namoq gohnyau bang, nghuot ya lvbaus yahge boenghwus ma nghuot lo. Namoq gas Mangso dah dius jens mas bos, mung dius jens nghuot las Mangso dah yhenbang nghuot.
49002020	Namoq eq lvgyo jens yahge lvpe jens xi toh yhen-yos mas yhen tsoq tsuk zis xauh goeus. Khristu gas hauh yhen thunk lukzains nyang nghuot.
49002021	Nyang gas yhen dvkoeuq gonh lyis goeng goeng zwi toh las gyingshang zis yah Yhensain mha kyauh toh yhenmuh bweh los nhang goeus.
49002022	Namoq eq Khristu yah dvdain dvlom duot las gohyhamh bang dvnganh yah chomp tsuk zis kham yoeus las nyah Dyos gvng mas Mangso nyeis dah joqyos bweh los goeus.
49003001	Haih cho gvng mas Khristu Yesu dah thung lungh soeu ngos Paulo gas, namoq gohnyau bang xiklyis, Mangso jyank mas shvmanh dung dyei.
49003002	Mangso ka nyah jyehjuh yah namoq xiklyis gis das cho nyhenshang haih muh kuot das zis ngos lyis dyei toh goeus yvlyis namoq jyoengh xauhgyo ku goeus.
49003003	Mangso ka nyah dah noq thank nghamh toeuq cho ngos lyis chixoeuq goeus. Haih cho yah sen lha lyung khyvlyis lhaih kat ku goeus.
49003004	Hauh zis namoq nghap ku lhyi Khristu yah sen lha ngos seqgyo hau noq thank cho lhyi namoq yoh xuq das.
49003005	Lai loh goeus yoq lyis hai noq thank cho cangsoeu dius lyis ma taiq kyoh ku. Nghuot laus eq Mangso ka gvshih nyah gyingshang lvgyo jens yahge lvpe jens lyis Dyos masyah Chixoeuq.
49003006	Hau noq thank cho ka gausyis dang gvng mas gohnyau bang gas Yuda dius jens yah dvgeh Mangso dah shvmanh jyehjuh xauh kham cho nghuot. Nyamoq gas dvgungs mas dah gungsdoeus tsain nghuot las Khristu gvng mas Mangso dyei dah dangthoengh dah vso vlho kham yoeus das toeuh tsain yoh.
49003007	Mangso dyei dah lhyenwhei jyehjuh jyungshuk gvng mas hauh Gausyis dang dah jyeidwis ngos lyis duot nhang goeus. Hauh jyehjuh jyungshuk lyis Mangso dah yomsoq yah khanh dah muhzoh khyvlyis ngos lyis dyei toh goeus.
49003008	Ngos gas Mangso dah dius jens mas ngis thank soeu thoq lyis yangh nyhen soeu nghuot laus eq Mangso ka Khristu dah mathank magons nyeisgis yaplhoq cho yah sen dah hau gausyis loeus lyis gohnyau bang jyank mas yoeus loh dyei das xiklyis eq,
49003009	Mangso dah nghop toh dah nghamh toeuq cho khasoeh kuot thuq kat das cho dius dvnganh lyis nyvng, seq nhang das xiklyis eq Mangso ngos lyis hauh toeuh dyei toh. Dwis ya dwis yvlyis gvnkhanh toh dah Mangso ka nyah dah noq thank cho lhyi gohlhain caiq masyah nghop shung toh.
49003010	Housoeh kuot zis gas guon dah loeuswons bang yahge maukhung mha yomsoq bos bang gas Mangso dah joeui vja ja lyis gvshih uhlyis phung dah kang dwis cho khyvlyis yah xuq las seq los nhang das xiklyis nghuot.
49003011	Mangso ka nyah dah vcaiq vto nghamh toeuq toh cho yah dvyhangteh haih yvlyis kuot goeus. Hau nghamh toeuq cho lhyi yah Yhensain Khristu Yesu gvng mas nyang yoh dye kuot goeus.
49003012	Khristu yah dvdain dvlom yoh bweh gvng mas eq, nyang lyis lomsjingh gvng mas eq yang gas womh ehnyet yah Mangso xikkhonh mas nghamhnywe zis yah yoh wvng.
49003013	Housoeh las ngos namoq xiklyis kham dah shanghsenh gvng mas namoq ehnyet ma dyet bas jungh oen shangphu. Houka namoq vkyuh xiklyis ngos kham cho nghuot.
49003014	Haih cho gvng mas maukhung yahge nyeisjvng mas nyeis dah yhenbang khanghmuh lyis jyoeng dah nyings dyei dah,
49003015	Uwus Mangso xikkhonh mas ngos dupaiq las shvmanh dung.
49003016	Namoq dah ungkhau ehnyet yombos los bas jungh Mangso ka nyah phunk yah magons magoh zisyos masyah nyah Dyos khyvlyis yah namoq lyis yomsoq dyei bas jungh oen eq,
49003017	lomsjingh gvng mas Khristu gas namoq dah nhaiqlom khau mha nyang nyeis joqyos kuot bas jungh oen zis yahge jyetdap ehnyet mas vnyet chent zis yah,
49003018	namoq gas Khristu dah jyet cho kha iq dvm lha xing, kha iq nyhang lha noq joq yvlyis Mangso dah dius jens dvgeh yoh seqgyo das xiklyis dung.
49003019	Nyah jyetdap cho lhyi ka khanhamp eq dvnganh yoh seq das zis ma nghuot. Namoq gas nyah jyetdap ehnyet seq los las Mangso nyang namoq mas nyeis bas jungh oen dung.
49003020	Yah ehnyet mas nyah yomsoq yah muh kuot nyeis. Yang seq dung, nghuot ya nghamh toeuq thoq lyis yangh zes shoq kuot dyei nyeis.
49003021	Mangso ka hau phung gvng mas eq, Khristu Yesu gvng mas eq vcaiq vto vjangh phunk bos nyeis bas jungh. Amen.
49004001	Housoeh yvmvyah Yhensain lhyi phuqsoe gvng mas thung lungh soeu ngos Paulo gas namoq lyis khi yoeus masyah Mangso toeuq goeus kang dwis cho vpom yah dvyhangteh kang dwis das xiklyis ngos namoq lyis taiq kyingh kat.
49004002	Vjangh ehnyet nyhen mha khyoq las noeuh nhamp zis yah jhen nyeis geh. Namoq nyang changh jhen zis yah jyetdap ehnyet Chixoeuq goh nyeis geh.
49004003	Namoq lyis dvgeh twih xom dah nyenstap shvnanh khying gvng mas Dyos yah dyei toh dvdain dvlom xamxonh cho lhyi yomkat las tsomh toh geh.
49004004	Namoq lyis Mangso khi yoeus cho mha nghamhloms zis dvkoeuq mas khi yoeus goeus zis yah dvyhangteh, dvgungs dvdyos,
49004005	Yhensain dvyuk, lomsjingh cho dvkhvt, jeisnyhop kham cho dvkoeuq kyingh dvnghuot.
49004006	Dius nyau dvnganh dah Uwus ge dah Mangso eq dvso kyingh dvnghuot. Nyang gas dvnganh dah Yhensain nghuot las dvnganh dah ungkhau mha muh khanh nyeis.
49004007	Yang yuk khanghmuh gas Khristu dyei dah lhyenwhei jyehjuh jyungshuk lyis xauh kham yoeus.
49004008	Lhaihtoh dang mas taiq zis yah dvyhangteh, Nyang gas svsoh nyhang yvmas doq loh lyis lhunk toh bang nyoshoq lyis nyang yah dvgeh shwih loh. Nyang gas dius nyau jens lyis jyungshuk dyei, ge.
49004009	Doq loh ge zis cha lhyi ge, yhensain ka nyhen thank nyeisjvng dah nyhen tsank mas cangxeih gyoh loh goeus ge mes zis nghuot.
49004010	Gyoh los soeu ka, dvnganh yvlyis nyah phunk nyoqnho yah tyink das nyhenshang nyhang thank maukhung mha doq loh soeu nyang nghuot.
49004011	Cangsoeu dius jens lyis jyehjuh jyungshuk dyei dah Yhensain eq nyang nghuot. Nyang gas dvyhamh lyis lvgyo jens, dvyhamh lyis lvpe jens, dvyhamh lyis gausyis dang taiq kyoh yenh bang, dvyhamh lyis phung yoeuh bang yahge jyauh bang tsain kuot nhang toh.
49004012	Nyang housoeh kuot zis gas Khristu dah gungs lyis jebais los nhang das nyhenshang Mangso dius jens dvnganh lyis Khristan phuqsoe sasvna muh dyinghjet shoq sont dyei cho nghuot.
49004013	Housoeh las yah lomsjingh cho gvng mas eq, Mangso dah Lo lyis seq cho gvng mas eq thang thank lyis yang nyeis ya nyeis bang gas dvkoeuq kyingh duot las Khristu dah nyhang thank dyinghjet dah gungs khyank vkant yah dvyhangteh nhaiqbos ung gying bang bweh los das.
49004014	Hauh uhlyis yang gas seq mhuih khwangh dah dius jens yah vphanh vphuk taiq tangh dah jyauh cho khanghmuh mas vtauh vxoeu bos dang loh dah loshang jens teh ma nghuot lo das.
49004015	Housoeh bweh das gungsthaiq jyetdap ehnyet yah jyoeng dang taiq las, yang gas cho khvt khanghmuh mas uhloms nghuot dah Khristu mas kuh bes los chah nyeis.
49004016	Uhloms ge dah Yhensain shwih uhshe dah vkhau mha gungsdom dah gungsdoeus bos ya bos zis gas dvkoeuq yah dvkoeuq coq tsuk nyeis zis yahge yaunyoq changnyoq khanghmuh tsoq tsuk yomdyei nyeis gvng mas gungs gonh lyis dvdain dvlom yoh zwi toh. Housoeh las gungsdoeus khanghmuh vsainnyang yah sen dah muh khanh lyis gungs gonh lyis jyetdap zis yah kuhxing jebais los nhang.
49004017	Nghamh cho vkyuh ma bos dah gohnyau bang teh tsoq las kang ma dwis das xiklyis Yhensain nyings mas ngos namoq lyis zaih nhang.
49004018	Nyamoq dah seq cho soeng soeng noq zis yah koh las ehnyet than yvmvyah Mangso dyei dah kang vso mha ma bos bang nghuot.
49004019	Nyamoq gas xoq gyuk ehnyet dvnganh chithyuk tyamp goeus yvmvyah nyetnau cho chank las, ma lhoq ma shang vchoqh vjyot muh vja ja lyis tomp toh cho ma bos shoq kuot das nyhenshang vsainnyang gungs lyis duon jens tyamp.
49004020	Namoq gas Khristu dah cho mha housoeh teh yvlyis xuq goeus zis ma nghuot.
49004021	Namoq nyah cho lhyi jyoengh xauhgyo ku goeus zis yahge nyah thang chank bang nghuot las Yesu mas bos hau jyoeng cho lhyi namoq xuq goeus.
49004022	Housoeh las namoq gas xikpheh namoq chank ku dah kang dwis cho mha dah gungskhyank cauh lyis eq, pyo cho lhyi nyetnau las mhuih jyomh mes ehnyet gvng mas dyoqbis goeus dah gungskhyank cauh lyis eq tyamp geh.
49004023	Namoq dah ehnyet gungsdyos lyis vsaiq bweh nhang geh.
49004024	Vsaiq lyis wuot toh las hauh yvlyis dan zis yahge gyingshang ge, jyoeng dah kang dwis cho mha yoh chixoeuq das.
49004025	Housoeh las hwah dang vtaiq goh; yuk khanghmuh lomsjingh dah vsainnyang vmang vnoeuh lyis dang jyoeng taiq goh geh: khasoeh ge lyis, yang dvnganh gas Khristu ge dah gungs mas dah gungsdoeus tsain nghuot.
49004026	Namoq nhaiqyo lyis hau nhaiqyo dah ehnyet lyis yaunos vkuot nhang goh, buis wvng shoq eq nhaiq vyo goh.
49004027	Yius lyis joqyos vxwiq goh.
49004028	Khauh ku soeu ma doms khauh lo bas jungh: chah nyeis bang lyis yoh pangh shoq, gvm dyei shoq, vsainnyang xiklyis jyoeng dah womdau khoeu kang dwis cho yoh shoq muh zwi nyeis bas jungh.
49004029	Namoq dah nhuot masyah ma shop dah dang cha eq ma taiq bas jungh. Xauhgyo bang xiklyis vkyuh bweh shoq, chah nyeis zis yah dvyhangteh jebais los nhang dang kyingh taiq nyeis geh.
49004030	Hauh thoq lyis Gyingshang Dyos lyis nhaiq vkuk nhang goh: khasoeh ge lyis hau Gyingshang Dyos gas namoq lyis Mangso sain toh cho lhyi kanghjyoeng kyihau nghuot las thang thank buisnyeis lyis Mangso namoq lyis lhuiq kat zis xauh das cho lhyi kham toh cho dvkoeuq eq nghuot.
49004031	Nhaiq gyeih, nhaiqlom dyis, nhaiq yo, dyoqgoh kaiq goh, ma phauh ma danh kuot, hoeng ehnyet vja ja yahge gohtoeu houyah doeusgoh cho dvnganh lyis shang tyamp geh.
49004032	Namoq nyang changh nhaiqnyen goh, gis dah ehnyet chixoeuq goh las, Mangso ka Khristu mas namoq dah yobos khyuot dyei goeus zis yah dvyhangteh, namoq eq dvyuk yah dvyuk yobos khyuot dyei goh nyeis geh.
49005001	Namoq gas Mangso dah jyetdap lo jens nghuot goeus yvmvyah nyang yah doeus los shoq yomkat chah das.
49005002	Khristu gas yang lyis jyetdap las yah xiklyis nyah gungs lyis Mangso nhaiqdoeus dah xangh shom phudyei vyhang kuot las lomhxangh lainh zis yah dvyhangteh, namoq eq jyetdap ehnyet yah shwih dah vkhau mha suh e nyeis geh.
49005003	Namoq Mangso dah dius nyau jens nghuot joq yvmvyah yauxi cho, ma lhoq ma shang zis dvnganh, nyoqnoq obos zis yah sen dah cho lhyi namoq mas dang yah yangh ma nyhink bas jungh.
49005004	Ma lhoq khonhchoqh, vwot v-oeu dang, ma yungh dang, zeh dang eq ma taiq taiq, nhaiqshoqlang Chungh Dang sang nyeis bas jungh.
49005005	Yau kuot soeu, ma daq xoq gungs ma shung soeu, nyoqnoq obos soeu hank eq Khristu yahge Mangso munghdan dah vso vlho lhyi ma xauh zom zis gas namoq nyang top seq toh. Khasoeh ge lyis nyoqnoq obos cho ka silho paiq cho dvja nghuot.
49005006	Hank laus eq yhung pvjus dang yah namoq lyis vmhuih jyomh nhang goh: khasoeh ge lyis hauh cho gvng mas Mangso dah nhaiqlom dyis zis gas domsyos ma gyo bang thoq mas jweh los das.
49005007	Housoeh yvmvyah namoq housoeh teh bang yah dvtsiq eq vbos zomh goh.
49005008	Xikpheh namoq eq soeng soeng noq yvmas nyeis lai loh goeus. Nghuot laus eq, gvshih gas Yhensain dius jens duot los goeus las bvng yvmas jweh joq goeus. Housoeh yvmvyah namoq gas bvng dah lo jens teh suh e nyeis geh.
49005009	Khasoeh ge lyis hau bvng zis gas gis cho vja ja, dan cho yahge jyoeng cho lhyi bweh los nhang.
49005010	Yhensain nhaiqdoeus zis cha nghuot yvlyis tungh xuq geh.
49005011	Chuot yvmas suh e bang kuot, vkyuh ma bos chuot cho yah sen dah muhzoh cha eq ma chank kuot, hauh muh jens lyis bvng yvmas chixoeuq nyeis geh.
49005012	Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gauh kuot muh gas taiq das zis yangh vxoq vcaiq nghuot.
49005013	Hauh cho bos ya bos zis lyis bvng yvmas chixoeuq kat lyis nyamoq dah soengh choenk wotwu gas dede thuq los.
49005014	Khasoeh ge lyis joq ya joq yvlyis dede thuq los nhang nyeis. Housoeh las nyang taiq zis gas, Yhet pyo soeu eh, toq aq, shei masyah dwis toq los aq. Khristu nvng lyis bvng zis pank dyei das, ge.
49005015	Housoeh las namoq khasoeh kang dwis nyeis zis gas vlhomuh zaih nyeis geh. Koh bang teh ma nghuot, joeui bos bang teh kang dwis geh.
49005016	Gvshih dah buisnyeis shishenh gas ma shop joq yvmvyah namoq yoh dah toeuh dvnganh yvlyis vkyuh bos das khyvlyis yhung geh.
49005017	Housoeh las koh bang vbweh goh; Yhensain o dah cho cha nghuot zis gas seqgyo geh.
49005018	Yhei vyet goh, houka nvng lyis dyoqbis nhang das. Dyos yah dyingh joq geh.
49005019	Namoq nyang changh chungh dah lvkhyank dang, Dyos dah lomsjingh cho yah sen dah Chungh Dang yah jis goh las namoq dah ungkhau ehnyet mas Mangso lhyi chunghthwe kat las chungh nyeis geh.
49005020	Yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah nyings yoeus las cho khvt khanghmuh xiklyis, Uwus Mangso dah jyehjuh lyis vjangh nhaiqshoqlang sang geh.
49005021	Khristu lyis gyukwoms dah ehnyet yah namoq nyang changh nyang o mha gyoh nyeis geh.
49005022	Yhensain nyhiq jens eh, namoq gas Yhensain dah guon cho lhyi kham yoeus zis yah dvyhangteh yhensain phoq jens dah guon cho lhyi kham yoeus geh.
49005023	Khristu gas phung dah uhloms duot das toeuh yoh teh, yhensain phoq eq yhensain nyhiq dah thoq mas uhloms duot das toeuh yoh. Khristu nyang nyah gungs nghuot dah hauh phung lhyi khyuot yoeus soeu eq nghuot.
49005024	Phung ka Khristu dah guon cho lhyi kham zis yah dvyhangteh yhensain nyhiq jens eq cho khat khanghmuh mas yhensain phoq dah guon yvlyis kham yoeus das.
49005025	Yhensain phoq jens eh, Khristu gas hau phung lhyi jyetdap las, hauh xiklyis nyah gungs kyauh tyamp zis yah dvyhangteh, namoq dah yhensain nyhiq jens lyis jyetdap nyeis geh.
49005026	Yhensain nyah kang lhyi kyauh tyamp cho ka, hauh phung lhyi jeis yah cheihshang lha nyah Dang yah Mangso lhyi phudyei zis yah,
49005027	Hauh phung lhyi nyah gungs xiklyis kyauh uhlyis nyang mas mesyos, vnyhung teh zis cha eq ma bos bos, gyingshang zis yahge tswi ma bos, phunk bos, yungh thank das xiklyis nghuot.
49005028	Housoeh las yhensain phoq jens gas vsainnyang gungs lyis jyetdap nyeis teh, vsainnyang dah yhensain nyhiq jens lyis jyetdap chah. Vsainnyang yhensain nyhiq lyis jyetdap soeu ka nyah gungs lyis nyang jyetdap.
49005029	Khasoeh ge lyis yang hank laus eq vsainnyang gungs lyis hoeng zis ma bos. Hauh gungsthaiq Khristu gas hauh phung lhyi khoeu tsoh yoeuh gomh teh yang gas hau gungs lyis khoeu tsoh yoeuh gomh nyeis goh.
49005030	Khasoeh ge lyis yang gas nyah gungsdom dah gungsdoeus jens tsain nghuot.
49005031	Lhaihtoh dang mas, Haih gvng mas vbusbih gas, nyah ungwes uwus lyis toh khoq las, nyah yhensain nyhiq yah xonh zis yah nyah zomh gas dvsuih dvshoh bweh das, ge bos.
49005032	Haih cho ka lhaihtoh dang mas Chixoeuq, noq thank jyoeng cho dvkoeuq nghuot las. Khristu yahge phung lhyi toeuq las taiq zis nghuot oen ngos seqgyo.
49005033	Nghuot laus eq houka namoq yah eq sen joq. Yhensain phoq khanghmuh gas nyah yhensain nyhiq lyis yoh jyetdap das las yhensain nyhiq khanghmuh eq nyah yhensain phoq lyis yoh phauh nyang das.
49006001	Loshang jens eh, namoq nyhiphoq dah domsyos gyo nyeis geh. Housoeh kuot zis gas Khristan jens kuot chah dah jus cho nghuot.
49006002	Lhaihtoh dang mas, Nah ungwes uwus lyis phauh nyang geh, housoeh lyis nvng nyeisgis yaplhoq las nyeisjvng thoq mas kang xing zis yah xauh nyeis das, ge. Housoeh taiq toh dang gas dangthoengh mas bos cangxeih dah tyingtoh dang nghuot.
49006004	Namoq nyhiphoq jens eh, namoq dah lo jens lyis nhaiqyo das khyvlyis vkuot goh. Housoeh kuot das gungsthaiq nyamoq lyis Yhensain dah nyho jyauh cho yahge cho shet yvmas nyhoeu tsoh nyeis geh.
49006005	Jons jens eh, namoq Khristu lyis phuqsoe nyeis teh namoq dah cangsoeu yhensain jens lyis gyukwoms zis yah ehnyet dan khyvlyis domsyos gyo nyeis geh.
49006006	Yhensain jens yoeuh nyeis lyis nyoqnho yoh mes las kuot zis kyingh ma nghuot, Khristu dah jons jens teh Mangso ehnyet o cho lhyi nhaiqlom dvnganh yah kuot nyeis geh.
49006007	Dius lyis phuqsoe teh kyingh ma nghuot, hauh Yhensain lhyi phuqsoe teh mes dah ehnyet yah namoq dah jons muh lyis zwi nyeis geh.
49006008	Jons lyis laus eq, luiq soeu lhyi laus eq, Mangso ka nyang yuk nyang toeu lhyi nyang kuot dah gis muhzoh xiklyis tauh dyei das zis seq nyeis geh.
49006009	Yhensain jens eh, namoq eq houyah dvyhangteh namoq dah jons jens thoq mas chank kuot nyeis geh. Nyamoq lyis kyuk tant cho no toh geh. Namoq yahge namoq dah jons jens gas maukhung mha Yhensain dvyuk yah kyingh sen bang nghuot las hauh Yhensain ka dvyuk yah dvyuk lyis nyoqnho ma khyen soetuon soeu nghuot yvlyis soh nyeis geh.
49006010	Thang thank lyis, Yhensain yah dvkoeuq kyingh nghuot khyvlyis eq, nyah yomzains yomsoq yah eq, namoq yomhuont nyeis geh.
49006011	Yius dah khaujeini zis lyis namoq yoh toeu nghank tyamp bas jungh, Mangso namoq lyis dyei toh dah jesgungs dvnganh zis lyis wuot toh geh.
49006012	Khasoeh ge lyis yang gas dius yah zan goh zis ma nghuot, maukhung nyhang mha nyeis ma shop dah yius jens yah eq, haih mauchuotdwang dah mungkvn lyis guon dah zau jens, vmingh bos bang yah dvtsain zan goh nyeis.
49006013	Housoeh yvmvyah, Mangso dah jesgungs dvnganh yvlyis gvshih nyang wuot toh geh. Housoeh lyis ma shop zis yahge yaukyenh buisnyeis jweh lyis namoq gas jeswus dah zan cho lhyi yoh thoenk zan shuq tyamp das. Thang thank jweh shoq dye zan lyis eq, namoq goeng goeng yoh yap das.
49006014	Housoeh las namoq thyikdom lyis jyoeng cho ge dah dyichih chih las dan zis lyis sainhkhonh nghop teh gos lho lha,
49006015	nyenstap gausyis dang taiq kyoh das zis cicont nghuot joq bas jungh, khyei mha thyvkoq koq las thoenk yap joq geh.
49006016	Hauh thoq lyis lomsjingh ge dah gos lyis vjangh chi toh geh. Khasoeh ge lyis namoq gas hauh gos yah ma shop soeu baiq kat dah nyi shamshih dvnganh lyis yoh sat das.
49006017	Tsai, Khyuot yoeus cho ge dah uhkyop lyis kyop las, hau Dyos yah dyei dah Mangso dang ge moengsa lhyi wons toh geh.
49006018	Mangso jyank masyah pangh cho yoh bas jungh khyoeuq zis yah shvmanh dung yvmas haih cho dvnganh kuot nyeis geh. Haih cho gvng mas phuksohlhaiq mus nyeis geh. Khanhamp eq yom vshwe, Mangso dah dius jens xiklyis vjangh vkyuh dung nyeis geh.
49006019	Ngos dang taiq das xiklyis cicont nghuot shishenh lyis Mangso ngos lyis dang dyei bas jungh, hau gausyis dang dah noq thank vjyuk lyis ma gyuk ma woms, womh womh yoh taiq shoq, ngah xiklyis eq vkyuh bos dung nyeis geh.
49006020	Gvshih ngos thung lungh soeu nghuot joq laus eq hau gausyis dang gvng mas lvgyo dvyuk nghuot joq. Hau gausyis dang taiq kyoh das xiklyis ngos yvwons yoh zis yah dvyhangteh womh womh yoh taiq bas jungh shvmanh bos dung geh.
49006021	Namoq ngos khasoeh nghuot nyeis dah loeus jyuk yang yoh seq shoq, Yhensain dah muh mas lomluk kank kat nyeis, yah jyetdap boekyis Tichiku taiq kyoh das.
49006022	Housoeh las yang dvnganh khasoeh bweh nyeis cho loeus dvnganh namoq lyis taiq kyoh bas jungh zis yahge, namoq lyis pangh, yomdyei das nyhenshang ngos nyang lyis namoq jyank mas nhang kat.
49006023	Uwus Mangso yahge Yhensain Yesu Khristu gas Khristan boekyis dvnganhmoq lyis nyenstap, jyetdap zis yahge, lomsjingh cho dyei bas jungh.
49006024	Mathank magons jyetdap ehnyet yah, yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu lyis jyetdap nyeis bang dvnganhmoq mas jyehjuh joq bas jungh.
50001001	Khristu Yesu dah jyeidwis Paulo yahge Timothi gas Philipi wus mas nyeis dah phung uhshe bang phung thuk jens yah dvgeh Khristu Yesu mas dvkoeuq nghuot dah Mangso gyingshang bang dvnganhmoq jyank mas maussauh lhaih kat.
50001002	Yah Uwus Mangso yahge Yhensain Yesu Khristu jyank masyah jyehjuh yahge nyenstap zis gas namoq mas joq bas jungh.
50001003	Ngos namoq dah cho nghamh yoeuh soh khanghmuh ngah Mangso lhyi nhaiqshoqlang sang.
50001004	Ngos namoq nyhenshang shvmanh dung khanghmuh gausyis zis yah dung.
50001005	Khasoeh ge lyis Yhensain dah muh wons wuq xi buisnyeis masyah gvshih jweh shoq gausyis dang taiq kyoh cho mha ngos lyis pangh thuk lai loh goeus.
50001006	Housoeh las namoq mas hai gis dah muh kuot xi toh dyei soeu Mangso ka, Khristu Yesu dah buisnyeis lyis hauh muh lyis yoh dye shoq tsoq wons wuq loh das zis nghuot yvlyis ngos soh soh nghuot.
50001007	Ngos namoq lyis nghamh twih toh ehnyet bos das zis gas doeus: khasoeh ge lyis namoq gas vjangh ngah nhaiq mas bos bang nghuot. Gvshih ngos thung lungh nyeis shishenh lyis eq hau gausyis dang lyis kyoq toh cho ma bos khomp khyoq, taiq kyoh zis yah jyauh las yoh goeng toenk nhang shishenh lyis eq, namoq dvnganhmoq gas ngos yah dvgeh Mangso dyei dah jyehjuh toeuh lyis chomp kham yoeus goeus bang nghuot.
50001008	Ngos gas Khristu Yesu nyang dah ehnyet mas bos dah jyetdap sainhnos ehnyet yah namoq lyis soh nyeis, oen ngos taiq dang jyoeng zis gas Mangso ngah kanghjyoeng nghuot.
50001009	Hauh thoq lyis namoq gas gis yvlyis seq khyen yoeus, jyoeng dah seq cho yahge dyinghjet dah joeui yah dvgeh namoq dah jyetdap ehnyet mas zes kuhxing los bas jungh ngos shvmanh dung dyei.
50001010	Hauh uhlyis namoq gas gis thank yvlyis seq khyen yoeus las Khristu doms jweh dah buisnyeis lyis ma lhoq ma shang vwot v-oeu cho dvnganh masyah luiq zis yah yobos ma bos bang bweh das.
50001011	Hauh thoq lyis Mangso dah phunk bvng los das zis yahge nyah nyoqnho ngelang lyis dius jens chungh bas jungh, Yesu Khristu kyingh vshih yoh shih nhang, gis thank dan dah vshih gas namoq kang dwis cho mha dyinghjet los das.
50001012	Boekyis eh, ngos mas bweh cho ka, gausyis dang jebais los das cho mha jyoengh pangh thuk das nyhenshang bweh los cho ngos namoq lyis seq nhang mes.
50001013	Hau hwankti yhen lhyi zungh bang dvnganh yahge gohtoeu heimha nyeis bang dvnganh gas ngos thung lungh cho ka Khristu dah jyeidwis duot yvmvyah nghuot cho tsain seq goeus.
50001014	Hauh thoq lyis ngos thung lungh gvng mas boekyis nyothyang ka Yhensain mha lomsjingh ehnyet zes yombos los las Mangso dah Dang lyis ma gyuk ma woms taiq kyoh das zis zes womh los.
50001015	Jyoengh nyamoq mas dvyhamh gas noh las zan goh mes ehnyet yah Khristu cho taiq kyoh. Nghuot laus eq dvyhamh gas omes ehnyet gis bos zis yah taiq kyoh.
50001016	Ngos gas Gausyis dang lyis khomp dah muh mas toeuq toh soeu nghuot yvlyis nyamoq seq nyeis yvmvyah jyetdap ehnyet yah taiq kyoh.
50001017	Gohtoeu dvyhamh gas lhoqshang ehnyet yah ma nghuot, vsainnyang vkyuh dvxo ehnyet yah taiq kyoh. Nyamoq gas ngos thung lungh nyeis yoq lyis ngah thoq mas yaukyenh cho je los shoq kuot das ge tsain nghamh.
50001018	Taiq kyoh dah vkhyoh gas ma yhaugyen. Vguons kuot laus eq, jyoeng ehnyet yah laus eq, gis bweh cho khanghmuh mas Khristu cho yoh taiq kyoh goeus yvmvyah hauh cho mha ngos gauslaus nyeis, jyoengh tsoq gauslaus nyeis shih das.
50001019	Khasoeh ge lyis namoq dah shvmanh dung dang gvng mas eq, Yesu Khristu dah Dyos ngos lyis pangh gvng mas eq ngos hai thung lungh masyah luiq los das.
50001020	Ngos gas khanhamp eq ngah yvwons lyis ma katkhyoq, shishenh khanghmuh mas laus eq, zes las gvshih laus eq lyes dah kank bos cho dyingh zis yah ngos shei lhyi yangh lyis ngah kang dwis cho gonh mas Khristu dah phunk bvng nhang das zis gas ngos nhaiqdoeus thank cho yahge nghamhloms cho nghuot.
50001021	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos kang dwis zis gas Khristu nyang nghuot, shei loh lyis eq vmyat nghuot.
50001022	Nghuot laus eq ngah gungsshoh mas kang dwis nyeis lyis vkyuh bos dah muh zes yoh zwi lyis gas, kang dwis cho yahge shei cho khah zis khyen yoeus chah zis ngos ma seq.
50001023	Ngos gas aiq shot yah lang zis xauh nyeis. Ngos gas gvshih dwis nyeis dah kang dwis cho lhyi toh las Khristu yah dvgeh kang dwis mes nyeis. Houka ngah xiklyis zes gis joq.
50001024	Nghuot laus eq namoq xiklyis ngos kang dwis nyeis das zis gas namoq xiklyis zes yhaugyen.
50001025	Ngos haih cho lhyi vlhomuh seqgyo yvmvyah ngos namoq yah dvgeh nyeis das. Namoq lyis zes jebais los nhang das zis yahge lomsjingh cho mha yoh gausyis das nyhenshang ngos namoq dvgeh tsoq las nyeis das yvlyis ngos seq.
50001026	Housoeh las ngos namoq jyank mas doms jweh uhlyis ngah gvng mas namoq gas Khristu Yesu mas zes yoh khwank das.
50001027	Gvshih namoq xiklyis yhaugyen thank zis gas, Khristu Yesu dah gausyis dang yah chank kuot nhang zis yah dvyhangteh kang dwis nyeis das cho nghuot. Housoeh lyis ngos namoq jyank mas jweh los laus eq, ma jweh laus eq, namoq gas Dyos dah nghamh toeuq cho dvkoeuq kyingh yah thoenk yap joq las, ehnyet o zis dvja kyingh yah gausyis loeus dah lomsjingh cho dah xiklyis dvgeh chomp zan nyeis yvlyis ngos xauhgyo.
50001028	Hauh thoq lyis namoq gas jes jens lyis vgyuk nyeis goh, vjangh womh ehnyet bos geh. Hauh zis gas nyamoq shoeuh las namoq ung das kanghjyoeng vlho duot das. Khasoeh ge lyis namoq lyis ung cho dyei zis gas Mangso nyang nghuot.
50001029	Khasoeh ge lyis namoq gas Khristu lyis lomsjingh khyvlyis yah kyingh ma nghuot, nyah xiklyis shanghsenh kham khyvlyis eq Yhensain dah muh lyis wons wuq das toeuh jyehjuh xauh yoeus goeus.
50001030	Gvshih namoq gas ngos yah dvgeh jeszan yvmas xauh wvng goeus. Houka xikpheh ngos zan cho lhyi namoq nyvng goeus. Gvshih eq ngos zan nyeis shih yvlyis namoq xauhgyo dah zan cho nyang nghuot.
50002001	Namoq gas Khristu yah dvgeh kang dwis gvng mas yombos los goeus zis yahge nyah jyetdap ehnyet gas namoq lyis nhaiqtaink dyei goeus. Hauh thoq lyis Dyos dah zomh cho yoh las nyang changh nyang jyetdap sainhnos cho xauh kham yoeus nyeis.
50002002	Housoeh las namoq gas xamxonh cho dvkoeuq, jyetdap ehnyet dvlom, ehnyet dvkoeuq kyingh nghuot khyvlyis ngos lyis nhaiq dainh shoq gausyis nhang geh oen ngos namoq lyis yomdyei.
50002003	Khwank mes ehnyet, vsainnyang vkyuh dvxo ehnyet yah cha eq vkuot goh. Dius gohyuk gas vsainnyang thoq lyis zes gis oen vjangh nghamh yoeus las, nyang changh nyang nhaiqlom nyhen mha gyoh nyeis geh.
50002004	Dius yuk khanghmuh vsainnyang yah sen yvlyis kyingh ma nghuot, nyang changh nyang sen yvlyis eq nghamh yoeuh bas jungh.
50002005	Khristu Yesu mas bos dah ehnyet nyang, namoq mas eq bos joq bas jungh.
50002006	Nyang gas, khanhamp eq soengh choenk Mangso nyang nghuot joq laus eq, Mangso yah dvyih nghuot joq das xiklyis lhuot yoeus das ge ma nghamh.
50002007	Hauh gungsthaiq nyah ehnyet bauh zis yah dvyhangteh nyang yoh zis dvnganh lyis toh las, jons gungs tsungh zis yah cangsoeu dius dah vwot yah thuq los goeus.
50002008	Heisoeh nyah gungs o mha gyoh las shei shoq domsyos gyo. Nyang jyoengh nyang tapzains mas shei shoq domsyos gyo goeus.
50002009	Housoeh yvmvyah Mangso ka Nyang lyis nyhang thank khyvlyis chunghtoq las nyings dvnganh thoq mas dah nyings dyei.
50002010	Housoeh las nyhang thank maukhung, nyeisjvng thoq yahge nyeisjvng khau mha bang dvnganhmoq Yesu nyings lyis phauh nyang chungh paiq das.
50002011	Yesu Khristu gas Yhensain nghuot ge dvnganh gas Uwus Mangso dah phunk xiklyis taiq hoeuh das.
50002012	Housoeh las ngos jyet kang bang eh, namoq ngos yah dvgeh nyeis yoq lyis namoq vjangh ngah domsyos gyo teh, gvshih namoq yah we nyeis yoq lyis ngah domsyos gyo das zis gas, zes yhaugyen joq. Housoeh las namoq dah khyuot yoeus cho lhyi dyinghjet shoq xauh yoeus bas jungh Mangso ka namoq mas khanh dyei nyeis.
50002013	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka nyah ehnyet o dah cho lhyi kuot mes ehnyet yah yoh kuot das nyhenshang Mangso ka namoq mas muh kuot nyeis.
50002014	Namoq kuot chah dah cho khvt khanghmuh mas lop las phyen-goh cho ma bos bos kuot geh.
50002015	Housoeh lyis namoq gas wotwu dyoq las yobos yoh bang nyeis dah haih mungkvn mas tswi ma bos ehnyet lhoqshang dah Mangso lo jens teh bweh los das. Housoeh namoq gas kang dwis nhang dah dang lyis taiq kyoh nyeis zis yah maukhung gonh lyis pank dyei dah bvng zis teh nyamoq mas yoh bvng joq das.
50002016	Namoq housoeh kuot lyis gas ngos yomkat las wons wuq cho khanghmuh gas vkom ma nghuot yvmvyah Yhensain Yesu jweh buisnyeis lyis ngos khwank chank bos das.
50002017	Ngos sat xauh lyis, houka namoq dah Mangso lhyi phudyei namoq dah lomsjingh lomhxangh phon thoq mas ngah kang lhyi shukphoh jyungshuk khyvlyis huot khyoq laus eq ngos gauslaus nyeis. Ngos yah dvgeh namoq lyis eq gaus nhang mes.
50002018	Houyah dvyhangteh namoq eq gaus nyeis geh, ngos lyis eq namoq yah dvgeh bos gauslaus nhang geh.
50002019	Ngos namoq jyank masyah loeus xauhgyo las yom yoh bas jungh, Mangso o cho nghuot lyis gas Timothi lyis namoq jyank mas ma nyangh lyis yoh nhang kat das oen ngos nghamhloms nyeis.
50002020	Timothi kyingh ngos yah ehnyet doeusgoh las namoq dah cho nyang teh bos nghamh chiqh dyei soeu gohtoeu hank ma nyeis lo.
50002021	Gohyhamh bang dvnganh gas nyamoq yah sen zis kyingh dvtsain chiqh: Khristu Yesu yah sen cho mha nhaiq ma tsain wvng.
50002022	Nyang gas, lo gas uwus lyis thuk teh, gausyis dang tyo cho mha ngos yah dvgeh muh yomkat wons wuq nyeis yvmvyah, nyang kha iq phauhdap dius nghuot yvlyis namoq nyang seq.
50002023	Housoeh las ngah cho khasoeh bweh los das zis ngos seq yah dvyih, ngos nyang lyis namoq jyank mas nang kat das oen nghamhloms nyeis.
50002024	Hauh thoq lyis kha nyhank madot lyis ngos nyang namoq jyank mas los jweh das oen Yhensain mha loms toh.
50002025	Tsai, namoq dah vmang vnoeuh, zainsthuk thuk soeu, jeszan loeuzomh, ngos lyis pangh das xiklyis namoq nhang kat las, chah oen zis ma bos lo shoq ngos lyis phuqsoe soeu Epaphrodi lyis namoq jyank mas doms nhang kat chah oen nghamh.
50002026	Nyang gas namoq dvnganhmoq yah xauhgoh mes zis hwangh nyeis. Khasoeh ge lyis nyang nos yvlyis namoq xauhgyo goeus las nyang ehnyet svsoh ma nyens mus nyeis.
50002027	Nyang jyoengh vluk shei shoq nos goeus. Nghuot laus eq Mangso nyang lyis nhaiqnyen nyeis; nyang lyis kyingh ma nghuot, ngos gas kuk cho dvtsank thang lhyi dvtsank ma xauh bas jungh ge ngos lyis eq nhaiqnyen.
50002028	Housoeh las namoq nyang yah doms xauhgoh las namoq yoh gauslaus bas jungh zis yahge ngah dah kuk cho eq dyuk loh bas jungh oen, ngos nyang lyis namoq jyank mas nhang kat das zis zes omes nyeis.
50002029	Housoeh las namoq nyang lyis Khristan vmang vnoeuh dvyuk lyis teh lhom yoeus las, housoeh teh bang lyis phauh nyang geh.
50002030	Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas namoq nyang ma yoh dyei dah pangh cho ngos lyis yoh dyei das xiklyis kang dyei las Khristu dah muh lyis vluk shei shoq wons wuq goeus.
50003001	Boekyis eh, dang thang sau lhyi ka Yhensain mha dvdain dvlom yoh bweh cho lhyi gaus nyeis geh. Xikpheh ngos namoq lyis lhaih kat ku cho lhyi doms lhaih kat kat kuot das zis ngos yvwons ma lyei thoq lyis magoh, namoq lyis sam cho yoh nhang.
50003002	Ma gis ma shop dah muh kuot bang lyis zungh yoeuh nyeis geh, lvkhuih jens lyis zaih geh. Vsainnyang gungs lyis lhyamh thyet bang lyis zungh yoeuh nyeis geh.
50003003	Vthyoh tyomh cho gyingh lyis kham yoeus bang gas nyamoq ma nghuot, yang dvnghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis yang gas Mangso lhyi nyah Dyos yah paiq las Khristu Yesu mas dvdain dvlom yoh bweh dah kang dwis cho mha khwank bang nghuot. Yang gas nghe pheh vlho kuot xoeuq dah pwe mas ma nges.
50003004	Jyoengh oen lhyi nghe pheh vlho lhyi nges das cho ngos yoh ku. Nghe pheh vlho lhyi nges das cho yoh ge dvyuk yuk nghamh lyis gas ngos zes yoh.
50003005	Ngos gas xet nyeih lyis vthyoh tyomh kham goeus. Israel vnyau mas dah Benyamin vkoq yahge, Hebre jens mas Hebre suih gyingh nghuot. Yuda jens dah lyi chank khyv pheh yoeuh lyis eq ngos Pharishe nghuot.
50003006	Nhaiq wvng yomkat cho yah sen lha taiq lyis ngos gas phung lhyi shoeuhshih soeu nghuot. Dan cho yoh das nyhenshang lyi chank tyink yvmas ngos chah yobos ma bos.
50003007	Nghuot laus eq ngah xiklyis vmyat nghuot ge las yoh taiq dah vyhang dvnganh gas gvshih Khristu gvng mas somh tyamp vyhang tsain nghuot oen ngos nghamh.
50003008	Hauh thoq lyis ngah Yhensain Khristu Yesu lyis yoh seq yoeus dah seq cho ka cho khvt khanghmuh mas zes las, vcaiq vto phauhdap joq yvmvyah hauh nyhenshang vyhang dvnganh yvlyis somh loh goeus khyvlyis ngos suon yoeus. Ngos gas nyah xiklyis vyhang dvnganh tyamp goeus. Khristu ge dah vmyat lyis xauh yoeus das nyhenshang yahge Khristu yah dvdain dvlom yoh bweh das xiklyis joq ya joq yvlyis jenh boms teh nghamh goeus.
50003009	Ngos gas lyi chank tyink zis yah ngah dan cho lhyi ma yoh. Gvshih gas Khristu lyis lomsjingh gvng mas dyei dah dan cho lhyi ngos yoh. Houka lomsjingh gvng mas Mangso nhaiqnyen las dyei dah jyehjuh jyungshuk nghuot.
50003010	Ngos gas Khristu lyis seq das cho, nyah dah dwis toq dah yomsoq lyis xauh nyvng xauh kham das cho, nyang yah dvgeh shanghsenh zis kham lha nyang shei kham teh shei kham das yvlyis kyingh ngos o nyeis.
50003011	Housoeh ngos gas shei bang dwis toq das cho mha xauh bos das oen nghamhloms nyeis.
50003012	Ngos gas gvshih yangh hauh jyungshuk xauh yoeus goeus oen eq, gvshih dyinghjet joq goeus oen eq taiq mes zis ma nghuot. Nghuot laus eq Khristu Yesu gas ung zis yah ngos lyis nyah dius bweh nhang goeus zis yah dvyhangteh ngos gas hauh jyungshuk lyis xauh yoeus shoq tsoq las yomkat nyeis.
50003013	Boekyis eh, ngos gas hauh jyungshuk lyis xauh yoeus goeus oen jyoengh ma nghamh. Nghuot laus eq ngos kuot cho dvkoeuq gas ngah nungsthank pheh vyhang dvnganh lyis tohnyhik las xikkhonh mas joq vyhang lhyi yoh nyhi bas jungh yomsoq dvnganh yah yomkat nyeis.
50003014	Housoeh yvmvyah ngos gas hauh jyungshuk lyis xauh yoeus das xiklyis toeuqkhom jweh shoq wuih. Hauh jyungshuk gas nyhang mha kang yoh dwis bas jungh Khristu gvng mas Mangso dah lhung kat cho nghuot.
50003015	Dyos cho mha nhaiqbos ung gying los goeus bang yang dvnganh gas, heisoeh teh ehnyet yah nghamh chah. Nghuot laus eq namoq dvyhamh mas shaih dah nghamh cho bos nghuot lyis, Mangso ka hauh zis namoq lyis chixoeuq das.
50003016	Khasoeh nghuot laus eq yang gas khvnyhik jweh shoq chank nyeis dah nghamh cho yah dvyhangteh xik pheh tsoq las suh loh goh.
50003017	Boekyis eh, namoq dvnganh gas ngah jyank masyah yikhyoh yoeuh yoeus nyeis geh. Ngamoq Chixoeuq goeus dah yikhyoh gis chank nyeis bang lyis yoeuh comh toh geh.
50003018	Haih cho xikpheh ngos namoq lyis nyoshoq lhain taiq kyoh ku goeus. Gvshih eq ngos namoq lyis nyoqdyeis yah puk taiq kyoh nyeis. Khristu tapzains mas shei kham cho lhyi jes kuot las kang dwis bang nyoshoq nyeis.
50003019	Hauh bang gas munyi thomh mas nyamoq dah cho thank das zis nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis hauh bang dah Mangso ka gungsshoh dah nyoqnoq obos cho nghuot. Nyamoq gas vxoq vcaiq cho lhyi khwank cho kuot las hai nyeisjvng thoq mas dah vyhang lhyi kyingh nghamh twih toh.
50003020	Yang gas maukhung dius jens tsain nghuot las maukhung mhayah, yah khyuot yoeus Soeu Yhensain Yesu Khristu jweh los das yvlyis yang tsain langh nyeis.
50003021	Nyang gas vyhang dvnganh zis lyis nyah o mha yoh toh dah phunk nyoqnho, zau guon yomsoq lyis yhung zis yah yang seq shei dah gungs lyis nyah phunk bos gungs yah doeus shoq thaiq tsuk dyei das zis nghuot.
50004001	Housoeh las boekyis eh, ngos namoq lyis jyetdap las soh nyeis. Namoq gas ngah gaus joqyos yahge ngah buismuk nghuot. Jyetdap bang eh, Yhensain yah dvdain dvlom duot las kang dwis cho mha goeng goeng thoenk yap geh.
50004002	Eodia yahge Sintike eh, Yhensain mha vbi vnoeuh nghuot zis yah dvyhangteh xamxonh das xiklyis jyehjuh yah ngos nah aiq yuk lyis khyoeuq kat.
50004003	Ngah muh wons changh eh, hau vmesbih aiq yuk lyis pangh das xiklyis ngos o. Khasoeh ge lyis hau gausyis dang taiq kyoh cho mha nyah aiq yuk gas ngos yah dvgeh ma nyung ma daus yom bos kat goeus. Nyah aiq yuk yah dvgeh kuot lai loh bang mas Klemen yahge kang maussauh buk mas nyings bos, ngos lyis pangh thuk bang gohtoeu eq tsain bos.
50004004	Yhensain mha namoq vjangh gausyis nyeis bas jungh! Gausyis nyeis geh oen ngos doms taiq.
50004005	Namoq dah noeuh nhamp ehnyet lyis dius dvnganhmoq xikkhonh mas Chixoeuq geh. Yhensain jweh los nyeis.
50004006	Chah cho mha laus eq vchiq nyeis goh: namoq shvmanh dung khanghmuh khanhamp eq nhaiqshoqlang ehnyet yah namoq chah ya chah yvlyis Mangso lhyi taiq kyoh nyeis geh.
50004007	Housoeh lyis dius dah seq cho yah ma duons, Mangso dah nyenstap zis gas Khristu Yesu mas namoq dah ung khau yahge ehnyet nhaiqlom lyis gomh dyei das.
50004008	Boekyis eh dang thang sau lhyi, namoq gas jyoeng cho, phauh nyang gis cho, dan cho, lhoqshang cho, nhaiqdoeus cho, chungh cho, nyoqnho ngelang dvja ja, chungh cho dvja ja nghuot lyis gas hauh cho lhyi tsain nghamh yoeuh nyeis geh.
50004009	Ngah dang yahge kuot loh cho jens lyis nyvng yoeuh, xauhgyo yoeuh las xuq zis yah lhom yoeus chank kuot geh. Housoeh lyis nyenstap vpom Mangso ka, namoq yah dvgeh nyeis das.
50004010	Shishenh nyangh thang lhyi namoq dah jyetdap ehnyet ngos lyis dvlhain doms Chixoeuq yvmvyah ngos Yhensain Yesu mha svsoh gauslaus nyeis. Housoeh oen lhyi xikpheh namoq ngos lyis phuqsoe cho toh tyamp oen taiq mes zis ma nghuot. Jyetdap ehnyet lyis Chixoeuq das toeuh ma yoh oen zis dvnghuot.
50004011	Ngos heisoeh taiq zis gas, namoq ngos lyis ma yoeuh ma dyangh lo oen taiq zis ma nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis ngos gas vsainnyang yoh nyhoq yah nhaiqtap zis yah daq nyeis das xiklyis xuq toh goeus.
50004012	Ngos gas jo buk laus eq, yuot shet zis xauh laus eq, magons magoh yoh uhlyis eq, ma nyo ma tham dvyoh dah shishenh lyis laus eq, khamha laus eq, khanhamp laus eq ehnyet tap khyvlyis seq nyeis das nyhenshang nghop shung toh dah joeui xuq toh goeus.
50004013	Ngos lyis yombos nhang dah Khristu gvng mas cho khvt khanghmuh lyis yoh kuot.
50004014	Nghuot laus eq ngos shanghsenh xauh uhlyis, ngos lyis pangh zis gas svsoh gis goeus.
50004015	Philipi phung dius jens eh, ngos Makedoni mau masyah thuq las gausyis dang taiq kyoh xi shishenh lyis namoq Philipi phung dvkoeuq kyingh ngos lyis pangh kat goeus cho lhyi eq, muh wons wuq cho mha namoq kyingh ngos yah zomh las somh cho yahge myat cho lhyi dvgeh xauh kham zo cho lhyi namoq nyang vlhomuh seq.
50004016	Ngos Thesaloni wus mas nyeis shih lyis yangh namoq ngos mas chah los uhlyis hau nyhenshang dvlhain magah pangh dah vlu huon kat dyei.
50004017	Ngos heisoeh taiq zis gas, jyungshuk ngwis lyis o lha ma nghuot, namoq phuqsoe muh dah vshih, vmyat je los nyo los das yvlyis kyingh ngos dv o mes.
50004018	Namoq Epaphrodi loq masyah huon kat dah vyhang vlu jyungshuk dvnganh xauh yoeus las suon xoeuq. Houka chah thoq lyis guszes shoq nghuot. Ngos mas magons magoh dyingh joq. Hauh vyhang ka Mangso xiklyis ngheq dyei dah xangh shom teh eq, Mangso nhaiq doeus las lhom yoeus mon dah lomhxangh teh eq nghuot.
50004019	Housoeh las ngah Mangso ka nyah dah magons magoh zisyos masyah Khristu Yesu gvng mas namoq chah ya chah zis dvnganh yvlyis shvmanh dyei das.
50004020	Gvshih yah Uwus Mangso mha vcaiq vto phunk bos joq bas jungh. Amen.
50004021	Khristu Yesu yah sen bang Mangso dah lo jens dvnganh lyis jeshuh kat. Heimha ngos yah dvgeh nyeis dah boekyis gas namoq lyis jeshuh kat.
50004022	Heimha nyeis, Mangso dah dius jens dvnganh, zes las Kesar hwankti yhen mha nyeis bang namoq lyis jeshuh kat.
50004023	Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah jyehjuh gas namoq yah dvgeh nghuot bas jungh. Amen.
51001001	Mangso dah ehnyet yah Khristu Yesu dah lvgyo ngos Paulo yahge vmang vnoeuh Timothi gas,
51001002	Kolose wus mas dah Mangso dah dius jens yahge Khristu mas lomluk dah boekyis jyank mas dang tying kat. Yah Uwus Mangso ka jyehjuh yahge nyenstap zis dyei bas jungh.
51001003	Ngamoq namoq xiklyis shvmanh dung khanghmuh, yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah Uwus, Mangso lhyi vjangh nhaiqshoqlang oen sang.
51001004	Khasoeh ge lyis, namoq Khristu Yesu lyis kha iq lomsjingh nyeis cho, Mangso dah dius jens lyis kha iq jyetdap nyeis cho ngamoq xauhgyo goeus.
51001005	Hau jyoeng dah dang ge Gausyis Dang namoq jyank mas cangxeih jweh los uhlyis, namoq gas hauh dang yah dyei dah nghamhloms cho lhyi xauhgyo goeus. Housoeh las namoq dah lomsjingh cho yahge jyetdap cho ka namoq xiklyis maukhung mha shung toh dyei dah nghamhloms cho mha vpom tsuk toh.
51001006	Namoq gas Mangso dah jyehjuh cho cangxeih xauhgyo las hauh jyehjuh lyis jyoengh seqgyo dah buisnyeis masyah hauh Gausyis Dang gas namoq jyank mas jweh los las shvmanh jyehjuh vja ja lyis dyei nyeis zis yah dvyhangteh, hau Gausyis Dang gas mungkvn gonh dyos jweh loh las shih nyoshoq shih los.
51001007	Namoq gas Mangso dah jyehjuh cho lhyi ngamoq dah jyetdap dah pangh soeu Epaphra jyank masyah xuq goeus. Nyang gas ngamoq dah gungsthaiq Khristu dah lomluk muh wons soeu nghuot.
51001008	Dyos yah dyei toh, namoq dah jyetdap ehnyet dah cho nyang ngamoq lyis taiq kyoh goeus.
51001009	Namoq gas Mangso dah ehnyet o cho lhyi yoh seq dah joeui, Dyos yah dyei dah seq gyo cho dvnganh yahge seq cho yah tyink dyei zis xauh bas jungh, ngamoq Mangso jyank mas shvmanh dung dyei.
51001010	Housoeh namoq gas Mangso o khyvlyis kang yoh dwis las, nyang nhaiqdoeus cho lhyi vjangh yoh chank kuot das. Housoeh namoq dah kang dwis cho mha gis dah muhzoh vja ja kuot thuqh zis yah Mangso lhyi seq cho mha zes kuhxing los das.
51001011	Housoeh las namoq thungh phuh los dah cho khanghmuh lyis kuh xing ehnyet yah yoh jhen das xiklyis nyah phunk bos yom zainsmuh yah namoq lyis yombos nhang bas jungh.
51001012	Hauh thoq lyis bvng dah munghdan mas nyeis, nyah gyingshang bang xiklyis Mangso toeuq toh dah vso vlho lhyi kham yoeus mon bang namoq yoh bweh los shoq sont dyei dah Mangso jyehjuh lyis gausyis chungh nyeis geh.
51001013	Nyang gas yang lyis ma shop dah mauchuotdwang yomsoq khau mhayah khyuot yoeus las, nyah jyetdap Lo dah munghdan mas shwih kat.
51001014	Hau Lo gas yang lyis lhuiq kat goeus. Houka yah yaunos lyis khyuot tyamp dyei cho nghuot.
51001015	Khristu gas nyoq yah ma yoh nyvng dah Mangso lhyi Chixoeuq. Nyang gas loxeih nghuot las gvnkhanh toh vyhang dvnganh mas zes thank dah soeu nghuot.
51001016	Khasoeh ge lyis, maukhung yahge nyeisjvng mas yomsoq bos dyos, sidyos jens, yhensain jens, guon bang, toeuh yoh bang yah dvgeh, nyoq yah yoh nyvng zis yahge nyoq yah ma yoh nyvng zis dvnganh lyis eq hauh Lo masyah gvnkhanh toh. Mangso ka vyhang dvnganh yvlyis nyang masyah nyah xiklyis eq gvnkhanh toh.
51001017	Nyang gas dvnganh dah xik mas nyeis las joq ya joq zis dvnganh gas nyah gvng mas nyah joqyos yah nyang goeng joq.
51001018	Nyang gas nyah gungs ge dah phung uhloms nghuot. Nyang nyang gungsdom dah kang vpom nghuot. Nyang kyingh cho khvt khanghmuh mas cangxeih joqyos yoh soeu bweh bas jungh, shei bang mas cangxeih dwis toq nhang zis xauh dah loxeih nghuot.
51001019	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso nyang nghamh thyet zis yah dvyhangteh, nyang gas Mangso dah gungs khyank dyingh shoq kham yoeus goeus.
51001020	Housoeh las Mangso ka maukhung nyeisjvng mas nyeis ya nyeis, bos ya bos yvlyis nyang yah mehoq tamp das zis nghamh thyet toh goeus. Mangso ka tapzains mas nyah gungs dyei las shei kham soeu Lo dah phudyei suih yah nyenstap cho kuot las maukhung nyeisjvng mas nyeis ya nyeis yvlyis nyah jyank mas doms lang yoeus.
51001021	Namoq eq xikpheh gas namoq kuot dah ma gis dah nghamh cho yahge muh gvng mas Mangso yah we loh las nyah jeswus tsain duot loh.
51001022	Nghuot laus eq gvshih Mangso ka cangsoeu gungs tsungh toh dah nyah Lo lyis shei kham nhang khyvlyis yah namoq lyis nyah buisnoms kuot goeus. Housoeh kuot cho ka namoq gas gyingshang lha vchoqh vlhauq ma dap, yobos ma bos nyah xikkhonh mas namoq lyis yoh hwank kat das nyhenshang nghuot.
51001023	Jyoengh namoq gas namoq dah goeng dah lomsjingh vpom mha tsoq las yoh thoenk yap joq das. Lho lha hau gausyis dang lyis xauhgyo dah shishenh lyis namoq xauh yoeus toh dah nghamhloms cho lhyi vchi lhaiq kat goh. Ngos Paulo gas gausyis dang dah jyeidwis bweh goeus.
51001024	Gvshih gas namoq xiklyis ngos xauh dah shanghsenh yvmas ngos gaus nyeis. Khristu gas nyah gungs ge dah hau phung xiklyis shanghsenh xauh zis yah dvyhangteh ngos gas ngah gungs mas shanghsenh kham khyvlyis Khristu gas nyah gungs ge hau phung xiklyis kham das zis bos shih dah shanghsenh lyis ngos bos tyeh kham nyeis.
51001025	Namoq xiklyis gis cho kuot bas jungh ge Mangso ka phung muh wons soeu dvyuk khyvlyis ngos lyis toeuq toh zis xauh. Ngos lyis dyei toh yvwons s gas hau gausyis dang lyis dyinghjet shoq taiq kyoh das cho nghuot.
51001026	Nyang gas hau noq thank nghop toh dang lyis mungkvn mas nyeis dius jens ma seq shoq gohnhamp dvcaiq thang lhyi dvcaiq jweh shoq nghop shung toh laus eq gvshih gas nyah dius nyau lyis Chixoeuq kat goeus.
51001027	Mangso dah nghamh toeuq cho ka dius nyau khanghmuh xiklyis nyang shung toh dyei, phunk bos las mauhphoh cho yahge noq thank Dang lyis nyah dius nyau lyis Chixoeuq das cho nghuot. Hau Dang gas Khristu nyang namoq vkhau mha nyeis cho nghuot. Hauh vjyuk gas, namoq gas Mangso yah dvgeh nyah phunk lyis gvm yoeus das cho nghuot.
51001028	Housoeh yvmvyah ngamoq gas dius nyau khanghmuh lyis Khristu cho taiq kyoh. Dius yuk khanghmuh lyis Khristu mas nhaiqbos ung gying dah Khristan dvyuk dvyuk Mangso dah xikkhonh mas yoh shwih kat bas jungh, ngamoq gas joeui bos ya bos zis yah nyamoq lyis zaih nhang, jyauh nyeis.
51001029	Housoeh hauh cho yoh bweh shoq ngos gas Khristu dyei dah kuhxing yomsoq yah nyung daus zis yah yomkat zwi nyeis. Hauh yomsoq gas ngos mas muh kuot nyeis.
51002001	Ngos gas namoq xiklyis eq, Ladoki dius jens xiklyis eq, ngah nyoqnho ma nyvng ku bang dvnganh xiklyis eq ngos kha iq yomkat nyeis cho namoq lyis taiq kyoh.
51002002	Housoeh ngos wons wuq yomkat cho ka, nyamoq dvnganh mas womh ehnyet dyingh zis yah dvyuk yah dvyuk dah jyetdap ehnyet mas twih goh los las nyamoq gas hau jyoeng cho lhyi seq las yoh loms toh goeus ge dah zisyos lyis dyingh dyingh xauh kham yoeus das. Heicho yah Mangso dah nghop toh dah noq thank cho ge Khristu lyis seq los das.
51002003	Nyang gas Mangso dah nghop toh joeui dvnganh yahge seq cho dvnganh phank xoeuq dah suhshih nghuot.
51002004	Housoeh las hank laus eq shuot cho lhyi jus das teh, gis das teh ge shoq taiq phyen-goh cho yahge mhuih cho ma bweh bas jungh, ngos heisoeh taiq kyingh.
51002005	Khasoeh ge lyis ngah gungsdom namoq yah ma nyeis laus eq, dyos mas ngos namoq yah dvgeh nyeis las, namoq yomkat goengtoenk ehnyet yah Khristu lyis lomsjingh cho mha dvgeh yap joq yvlyis ngos nyvng las gauslaus.
51002006	Namoq gas Khristu Yesu lyis Yhensain oen lhom yoeus goeus zis yah dvyhangteh, nyang yah dvgeh kang dwis las suh e nyeis geh.
51002007	Nyang mas nyet chent las kuot nyuk toh goeus zis yah lomsjingh cho mha doengs joq nhang cho lhyi, Jyauh cho lhyi kham yoeus goeus zis yah dvyhangteh, nyang mas nauh nauh nyet chent las nyang mas vsainnyang dah kang dwis cho lhyi cuk zis yah namoq dah lomsjingh cho lhyi zes goeng nhang geh. Lho lha namoq gas jyehjuh soh zis yah kang dwis nyeis geh.
51002008	Khristu dah tyingtoh dang masyah ma nghuot, dius dah tying dang chank las vkyuh ma bos suon yoeuh joeui khyvlyis mhuih jyomh cho eq, maulvt mas dah yius masyah thuq dah jyauh cho eq, hank eq namoq lyis jons ma kuot bas jungh zaih geh.
51002009	Khasoeh ge lyis dius gungs tsungh las haih mungkvn mas kang dwis nyeis yoq lyis Mangso dah gungs khyank gas nyang mas dyingh joq.
51002010	Namoq gas nyang mas kang dwis gvng mas dyinghjet dah kang dwis cho yoh goeus. Hauh Yhensain ka maukhung nyeisjvng mas yomsoq bos bang, toeuh yoh dah dyos jens dvnganh lyis guon dah zes thank soeu nghuot.
51002011	Namoq gas Yhensain yah dvdain dvlom duot las kang dwis uhlyis vthyoh tyomh goeus. Houka dius loq yah vthyoh ma tyomh, hai yaunos dap gungs shoh dah yomsoq masyah lhuiq kat ge, Khristu kuot dyei dah vthyoh tyomh cho nghuot.
51002012	Namoq gas jeis nyhop kham uhlyis nyang yah dvgeh nyhop zis xauh las Khristu lyis shei masyah dwis toq los nhang dah Mangso mha dwis toq los nhang das yomsoq bos yvlyis lomsjingh gvng mas nyang yah dvgeh dwis toq los nhang zis eq tsain xauh goeus.
51002013	Namoq gas xikpheh yaunos kuot bang nghuot las eq, Yuda dius jens ma nghuot las lyi ma chi vthyoh ma tyomh dah gohnyau bang nghuot khoq las eq, dyos cho mha shei joq. Nghuot laus eq gvshih gas Mangso namoq lyis Khristu yah dvgeh kang doms dwis nhang goeus. Mangso ka yah yaunos dvnganh lyis khyuot tyamp dyei goeus.
51002014	Nyang gas yah dah ma doeus magoq yaunos jyen lhyi eq, houyah sen dah lyi lyis eq tapzains mas bat tap zis yah shang tyamp dyei goeus.
51002015	Hau tapzains thoq mas Khristu gas maukhung nyeisjvng mas dah yomsoq bos bang yahge toeuh yoh bang dvnganh lyis khyoq tyamp las nyamoq lyis thung dius kuot zis yah ung hoeu thang mha chank nhang lha, dius phung yah chomp yoeuh soeu bweh nhang tyamp.
51002016	Housoeh yvmvyah, zonoms shukphoh yah pwe vja ja dah thungh lyi lyis chank dah lhamhmuh canh nyeih yahge no nyeih dah cho yah sen lha, hank eq namoq lyis dang thang ma thyet bas jungh.
51002017	Houteh zis dvnganh gas jweh los das shishenh lyis bweh los das vyhang dah siyet kyingh dvtsain nghuot. Gungs gas Khristu nyang nghuot.
51002018	Lhyenwhei nyoqnyvng lyis nyvng yvmvyah dius dvnganh thoq lyis zes ge nghamh zis yahge gungs lyis ma jus khyvlyis nyhen mha gyoh nhang lha, loeuswons bang lyis tsoengh paiq nhang soeu hank lyis laus eq namoq lyis dang thang vthyet nhang goh. Housoeh teh bang gas nyamoq dah soengh choenk ehnyet khyvlyis vkom mha moengs bang nghuot.
51002019	nyamoq gas gungs dah uhloms ge, Khristu lyis zwi zains toh cho ma bos lo. Yaunyoq changnyoq gyi coq twih toh dah gungs gonh gas Khristu ge dah uhloms masyah zonoms kham yoeus las Mangso dah ehnyet o khyvlyis kuh los.
51002020	Namoq gas Khristu yah dvgeh shei goeus las haih mungkvn lyis guon yomsoq bos, dyos dah loq masyah lhuiq kat zis xauh goeus. Housoeh lyis namoq gas chamus haih mungkvn yah sen bang teh tsain suh e nyeis goh lah?
51002021	Chamus namoq gas, Haih zis vzwi goh, vchaq yoeuh, vtanh goh, ge tung toh dah lyi lyis domsyos gyo chank kuot nyeis lah?
51002022	Hau lyi dvnganh gas dvlhain yhung thang lhyi vkyuh ma bos lo vyhang yah tsain sen. Hauh cho dvnganh gas dius yah kuot thuq dah lyi yahge jyauh cho dvnghuot.
51002023	Heisoeh teh lyi gas loeuswons bang lyis tsoengh paiq nhang, ma jus khyvlyis ehnyet nyhen mha khyoq nhang, vsainnyang gungs lyis svsoh nyom cho lhyi toeu toq dah joeui dvja teh nghuot.Nghuot laus eq gungs shoh dah nyetnau ehnyet lyis joeu yvmas chah vkyuh ma bos.
51003001	Namoq gas Khristu yah dvgeh dwis toq kat zis xauh goeus las Mangso dah loqyos shot pheh tsung toh, Khristu ge dah maukhung vyhang lhyi omes nyeis geh.
51003002	Nyeisjvng mas vyhang lhyi vnghamh twih toh goh; nyhang mha dah vyhang lhyi nghamh twih toh geh.
51003003	Khasoeh ge lyis namoq gas shei goeus bang nghuot las namoq dah kang ka Khristu yah dvgeh Mangso mha shung toh goeus.
51003004	Namoq dah kang gyingh gas Khristu nghuot las nyang doms thuq los uhlyis yang eq nyang yah dvgeh phunk mas tsain thuq los das.
51003005	Housoeh yvmvyah yah vkhau mha muh khanh nyeis mungkvn dah obos ehnyet, yauxi, ma lhoq ma shang vwot v-oeu muh, nyetnau, ma gis ma shop, nyoqnoq cho yahge silho paiq cho dvja nghuot. Housoeh teh ehnyet lyis thyuk tyamp chah.
51003006	Housoeh teh gvng mas Nyang lyis domsyos ma gyo bang dah thoq mas Mangso dah nhaiqlom dyis zis jweh los das.
51003007	Gohnhamp namoq dah kang dwis cho gonh mas hauh cho yah nghop toh uhlyis namoq nyang eq housoeh teh yaunos kuot zis yah kang dwis khoq.
51003008	Gvshih gas nhaiqyo, nhaiqlom dyis, hoeng ehnyet, yobos comh, loeusmus soqzo, khonhchoqh dvnganh shung tyamp geh.
51003009	Namoq nyang changh vhwah goh: khasoeh ge lyis hau gungs khyank cauh yah dvgeh wotwu lyis khyuot tyamp las gungs khyank saiq lyis wuot toh goeus.
51003010	Gvnkhanh soeu Mangso ka nyah dah dius saiq lyis Mangso nyah gungs doeus lho yah zes zes doeus los shoq tsoq kuot nyeis. Housoeh kuot zis gas namoq hau Yhensain lhyi dyinghjet shoq seq los das nyhenshang nghuot.
51003011	Housoeh las Heleni, Yuda dius, vthyoh tyomh soeu, ma tyomh soeu, dius soengh, Sithia dius, jons yahge luiq soeu ge, nyamoq jo mas gvn nyeis das cho ma bos. Khristu gas namoq dvnganh dah vkhau mha nyeis las nyang gas dvnganh mas yhaugyen thank soeu eq nghuot.
51003012	Namoq gas Mangso dah dius jens nghuot las nyang gas namoq lyis jyetdap las nyah xiklyis khyen yoeus zis xauh bang nghuot. Housoeh las namoq gas jyetdap, nhaiqnyen shohgyo, ehnyet nyhen mha gyoh las noeuh nhamp, kuhxing ehnyet lyis wuot toh geh.
51003013	Namoq dvyuk yuk thoq mas yobos huon chank bos lyis dvyuk yah dvyuk jhen zis yah nyang changh nyang yobos khyuot goh geh. Yhensain ka namoq lyis yobos khyuot dyei goeus zis yah dvyhangteh, namoq nyang changh yobos yoh khyuot dyei goh chah.
51003014	Kank bos cho dvnganh thoq mas dyinghjet dvdain dvlom yoh bweh shoq dvnganh yvlyis twih dah jyetdap ehnyet lyis tsank wuot chi geh.
51003015	Khristu dyei dah nyenstap cho ka namoq dah nhaiqlom mas guon nyeis las houka namoq nghamh thyet cho mha cho tuonh shet bas jungh: khasoeh ge lyis hau nyenstap cho lhyi xauh kham zo das nyhenshang Mangso ka namoq lyis dvgungs khyvlyis khi yoeus goeus: housoeh las nhaiqshoqlang oen geh.
51003016	Khristu dah dang gas namoq mas dyingh dyinghjet jet bos joq bas jungh: joeui bos zis dvnganh yah namoq nyang changh jyauh, cho tuonh shet goh nyeis geh. Chungh Dang, chunghthwe dang, dyos yah sen dah Chungh Dang yah namoq nhaiqlom khau mha Mangso lhyi jyehjuh chungh nyeis geh.
51003017	Housoeh las namoq cha taiq taiq, cha kuot kuot, Yhensain Yesu dah nyings yoeus las nyeis geh. Dvnganh yvlyis kuot nyeis geh. Nyah gvng mas Uwus Mangso lhyi chungh nyeis geh.
51003018	Yhensain nyhiq jens eh, vsainnyang dah yhensain phoq dah o mha gyoh nyeis geh. Houka Khristan dvyuk khyvlyis Yhensain mha doeus cho nghuot.
51003019	Yhensain phoq jens eh, namoq dah yhensain nyhiq jens lyis jyetdap nyeis geh. Nyamoq lyis vnyho goh.
51003020	Loshang jens eh, nyhiphoq jens dah domsyos vjangh gyo nyeis geh. Houka Mangso nhaiqdoeus dah Khristan jens kuot vvng muh nghuot.
51003021	Nyhiphoq jens eh, namoq dah lo jens lyis nhaiq vyo nhang goh. Housoeh kuot lyis nyamoq nhaiqngis yomgyau das.
51003022	Jons jens eh, namoq dah cangsoeu yhensain jens lyis cho khvt khanghmuh mas domsyos gyo nyeis geh. Nyoqnho yoh mes las nyamoq xikkhonh mas kyingh domsyos gyo khyvlyis ma nghuot. Mangso lhyi gyukwoms zis yah lhoqshang ehnyet yah domsyos gyo nyeis geh.
51003023	Namoq cha kuot kuot dius lyis kuot dyei teh ma nghuot, Yhensain lhyi kuot dyei teh ehnyet nhaiqlom dvnganh yah yomkat kuot nyeis geh.
51003024	Mangso ka nyah dius nyau lyis thoengh toh dah jyehjuh vso vlho lhyi namoq kham yoeus das yvlyis vjangh soh nyeis geh: Khasoeh ge lyis Khristu gas namoq phuqsoe nyeis dah Yhensain gyingh nghuot.
51003025	Ma jyoeng khyvlyis kuot soeu khanghmuh lyis nyang kuot dah ma jyoeng muh xiklyis phauh shangh zis xauh das. Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka soetuon cho mha nyoqnho ma khyen.
51004001	Yhensain jens eh, namoq eq maukhung mha Yhensain dvyuk bos yvlyis soh las namoq dah jons jens lyis jyei nhang zo cho mha lyi dan khyvlyis kuot geh.
51004002	Shvmanh dung cho mha malyen lo yomkat nyeis geh. Namoq shvmanh dung cho mha ehnyet mas jen jen mus las Mangso lhyi nhaiqshoqlang sang nyeis geh.
51004003	Khristu dah noq thank dang cho yoh taiq kyoh das toeuh gis Mangso ngamoq lyis dyei bas jungh ngamoq xiklyis shvmanh bos dung geh. Khasoeh ge lyis Khristu dah noq thank dang lyis taiq kyoh gvng mas gvshih ngos thung gyoh nyeis.
51004004	Hau noq thank dang lyis ngos taiq kyoh das yvwons s yoh zis yah dvyhangteh bvng bvng yoh taiq kyoh bas jungh shvmanh dung dyei geh.
51004005	Namoq yoh dah toeuh khanghmuh lyis ma kat khyoq vlhomuh yhung zis yah ma lomsjingh shih bang dah xikkhonh mas joeui yah suh e nyeis geh.
51004006	Namoq taiq dang gas khanhamp eq coh soeh ngvm las jyehjuh cho khyvlyis nhaiq wvng nhang dah dang nghuot las nyei soeu khanghmuh dah dang lyis jus dah phuk dang khasoeh yoh dyei das cho cvvq toh geh.
51004007	Ngamoq dah jyetdap boek, lomluk muh wons soeu, Yhensain muh mas pangh dah jyeidwis Tichiku gas ngos yah sen dah cho dvnganh namoq lyis taiq kyoh das.
51004008	Ngamoq dvnganh khasoeh bweh nyeis dah cho jeis namoq lyis taiq kyoh zis yah namoq ehnyet tap zis xauh bas jungh ngos nyang lyis namoq jyank mas nhang kat.
51004009	Nyang yah dvgeh namoq jyank mas dah soeu nghuot las, lomluk soeu, jyetdap dah boek Onesimu lyis eq nhang kat goeus. Nyah aiq yuk gas heimha bweh cho dvnganh namoq lyis taiq kyoh das.
51004010	Ngah thung lungh changh Aristaku ka namoq lyis jeshuh kat. Barnaba dah boek Makho eq namoq lyis jeshuh kat. Namoq jyank mas Makho jweh los lyis nyang lyis lhom yoeus geh oen shet kat cho lhyi namoq xauh yoeus toh goeus.
51004011	Yustu ge dah Yesu eq namoq lyis jeshuh kat. Hai somh yuk kyingh lomsjingh dah Yuda dius nghuot las Mangso munghdan xiklyis ngos yah dvgeh muh zwi bang, ngos lyis svsoh pangh dah ngah zainsthuk tsain nghuot.
51004012	Namoq jyank masyah nghuot las Khristu Yesu dah jons Epaphra eq namoq lyis jeshuh kat. Nyang gas nhaiq wvng zis yah namoq xiklyis shvmanh dung nyeis. Namoq gas Mangso o dah cho mha domsyos gyo chank suh las nhaiqbos ung gying zis yah lomsjingh cho mha vlhomuh seqgyo dah Khristan duot las vjangh yoh thoenk yap joq bas jungh ge, nyang Mangso jyank mas khyoeuq nyeis.
51004013	Nyang gas namoq xiklyis eq, Ladoki yahge Herapoli wus bang xiklyis eq muh yomkat zwi khank nyeis zis gas ngos nyah cho kanghjyoeng kat.
51004014	Ngamoq dah jyetdap mvcheih svra Luka yahge Dema gas namoq lyis jeshuh kat.
51004015	Ladoki mas nyeis boekyis, Nimpha yahge nyah yhen mha huom dah phung lhyi eq jeshuh dyei geh.
51004016	Hai huon kat maussauh namoq dye nghap goeus ya, Ladoki phung lhyi nghap nhang lha, nyamoq lyis yah huon das maussauh eq namoq nghap yoeuh geh.
51004017	Yhensain dah muh mas wons wuq das xiklyis kyauh toh yvlyis dye shoq zwi tyink aq oen Arkhipu lyis taiq kyoh geh.
51004018	Ngos Paulo nyang, hai ngah jeshuh dang lyis ngah loq yah lhaih kat. Ngos thung mha lungh joq yvlyis vtohnyhik goh. Mangso dah jyehjuh gas namoq yah dvgeh nghuot bas jungh.
52001001	Paulo, Sila yahge Timothi moq gas, Uwus Mangso yahge Yhensain Yesu Khristu mas nghuot dah Thesaloni wus mas dah phung lhyi maussauh lhaih kat. Jyehjuh yahge nyenstap zis gas namoq mas joq bas jungh.
52001002	Ngamoq gas namoq dvnganhmoq xiklyis vjangh jyehjuh chungh nyeis zis yahge ngamoq dah shvmanh dung dang mas namoq lyis nyings yoeus nyeis.
52001003	Khasoeh ge lyis namoq dah lomsjingh cho mha muhzoh khasoeh khanh nyeis zis eq, namoq dah jyetdap ehnyet gvng mas muh kha iq khank nyeis zis eq, Yhensain Yesu mas namoq dah nghamhloms cho kha iq goeng yvlyis eq yah Uwus Mangso dah xikkhonh mas ngamoq soh nyeis.
52001004	Boekyis eh, Mangso ka namoq lyis jyetdap las nyah dius duot das xiklyis khyen yoeus cho ngamoq seq.
52001005	Khasoeh ge lyis, ngamoq dah gausyis dang gas, dang yah kyingh jweh zis ma nghuot, yomsoq yah eq Gyingshang Dyos yah eq, gausyis dang dah jyoeng cho lhyi dyingh dyingh lomsjingh ehnyet yah eq namoq jyank mas los taiq kyoh. Namoq yah dvgeh nyeis lyis namoq dah gis cho xiklyis ngamoq kang khasoeh dwis cho namoq nyang seq.
52001006	Namoq gas ngamoq yahge Yhensain dah yikhyoh yoeus las cho tsain chank kuot nyeis. Shanghsenh zis nyoshoq xauh laus eq, hauh gausyis dang lyis Gyingshang Dyos masyah los dah gauslaus ehnyet yah tsain lhom yoeus.
52001007	Housoeh las namoq gas Makedoni mau yahge Akhaia mau mas dah lomsjingh bang dvnganhmoq dah yikhyoh bweh los.
52001008	Khasoeh ge lyis namoq mas dah hau Yhensain dah loeus gas Makedoni mau yahge Akhaia mau gonh hoeuh loh thoq lyis magoh namoq Mangso lhyi lomsjingh cho loeus eq dvkhauyah hoeuh loh goeus. Housoeh las namoq lyis cha taiq dais ma bos lo.
52001009	Namoq jyank mas ngamoq jweh los uhlyis namoq ngamoq lyis khasoeh lhom yoeus zis eq, namoq gas dwis nyeis las jyoeng dah Mangso lhyi yoh phuqsoe das xiklyis phvra lyis tsain tyamp las Mangso jyank pheh khasoeh lhain los zis eq,
52001010	maukhung mhayah jweh los das Mangso dah Lo lyis langh nyeis zis lyis eq, dius jens dvnganh taiq hoeuh nyeis. Hau Lo Yesu gas shei goeus bang masyah Mangso dwis toq los nhang lha jweh los das Mangso dah nhaiqlom dyis masyah yang lyis lhuiq kat soeu nghuot.
52002001	Boekyis eh, ngamoq namoq jyank mas jweh los cho ka vkom ma nghuot zis gas namoq nyang seq.
52002002	Ngamoq namoq nyeis dah Thesaloni wus mas ma los shih, Philipi wus mas nyeis dah uhlyis ngamoq lyis khasoeh shoeuhshih zis yahge jwangh nyhap zis xauh cho lhyi namoq seq. Housoeh tyixo cho nyoshoq bos laus eq namoq lyis Mangso dah gausyis dang yoh taiq kyoh das xiklyis yah Mangso ka ngamoq lyis womh ehnyet dyei toh goeus.
52002003	Ngamoq shuot cho yahge ma lhoq ma shang ehnyet yah dvyuk yuk lyis mhuih jyomh mes dah ehnyet yah namoq lyis taiq kyingh ku zis ma nghuot.
52002004	Hauh gungsthaiq ngamoq gas khanhamp eq Mangso taiq nhang zis yah dvyhangteh taiq nyeis. Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka ngamoq lyis mon yih bang nghuot cho soetuon thuq kat las seq goeus yvmvyah hau gausyis loeus taiq kyoh das nyhenshang loms toh goeus. Ngamoq gas dius lyis nhaiqdoeus nhang das xiklyis yom ma kat, yang kuot loh dah wotwu lyis yoh seq soeu Mangso lhyi nhaiqdoeus nhang das xiklyis yom dvkat.
52002005	Khasoeh ge lyis namoq vlhomuh seq zis yah dvyhangteh, ngamoq gas namoq jyank mas ma jus khyvlyis mhuih dang taiq zis yah, nghuot ya nyoqnoq cho lhyi nghop shung toh dang chi lha los zis ma nghuot. Hauh cho mha Mangso nyang kanghjyoeng nghuot.
52002006	Ngamoq gas namoq jyank masyah eq, gohyuk jyank masyah eq hank jyank masyah eq chungh cho xauh yoeus shoq yomkat zis ma nghuot.
52002007	Ngamoq gas Khristu dah lvgyo jens nghuot zis yah dvyhangteh namoq lyis vmingh yah yoh taiq. Nghuot laus eq ngamoq namoq yah nyeis uhlyis ungwes gas nyah lo jens lyis dyangh teh, noeuh noeuh nhamp nhamp kuot goeus.
52002008	Namoq gas ngamoq dah jyetdap kang twih bang bweh los goeus. Mangso dah gausyis dang kyingh ma nghuot, ngamoq dah kang lhyi yangh namoq lyis gvm dyei das zis cicont nghuot.
52002009	Boek yis eh, ngamoq muh kha iq zwi khank lai loh goeus yvlyis namoq vlhomuh soh nyeis. Namoq lyis yvwons ma lyei nhang bas jungh oen ngamoq gas ngamoq dah kang khoeu muh lyis nyeih nyenh zwi khank zis yah Mangso dah gausyis dang lyis taiq kyoh.
52002010	Namoq lomsjingh nyeis bang xikkhonh mas ngamoq dah wotwu lhoq shang, jyoeng zis yah yobos huon dais ma bos nyeis zis gas namoq nyang eq, Mangso eq kanghjyoeng tsain nghuot.
52002011	Uwus gas nyah lo jens lyis kuot dyei teh namoq dvyuk dvyuk lyis ngamoq kuot dyei goeus zis namoq seq.
52002012	Ngamoq namoq lyis yomdyei cho yahge nhaiqtaink cho kuot goeus. Nyah munghdan mas xauh wvng das zis yahge phunk xauh yoeus bas jungh ge namoq lyis khi yoeus dah Mangso lhyi nhaiqdoeus nhang dah kang dwis cho mha suh e nyeis das nyhenshang ngamoq tsoq las taiq kyingh yomdyei kat.
52002013	Tsai Mangso dah jyehjuh lyis malyen lo chungh das cho gohtoeu dvkoeuq bos shih. Ngamoq namoq jyank mas hau Mangso dang los taiq kyoh uhlyis dius dah dang lyis teh ma nghuot, Mangso dang namoq xauhgyo las lomsjingh zis yah lhom yoeus goeus. Hauh dang gas namoq lomsjingh bang dah vkhau mha muh khanh dyei nyeis dah Mangso dang gyingh nyang nghuot.
52002014	Boekyis eh, namoq mas xauh kham dah cho jens gas Yuda mau mas Mangso dah phung nghuot dah Khristu Yesu yah sen bang mas eq dvyhangteh xauh nyeis. Namoq gas vsainnyang dius jens loq mas shoeuhshih cho xauh zis yah dvyhangteh, nyamoq eq Yuda dius jens loq mas shoeuhshih zis tsain xauh.
52002015	Hauh bang gas Yhensain Yesu lyis eq lvpe jens lyis eq sat goeus. Ngamoq lyis eq tsain shoeuhshih. Nyamoq gas Mangso nhaiqdoeus das khyvlyis ma tsain kuot, yuk khanghmuh dah jes duot nyeis.
52002016	Ngamoq gas gohnyau bang lyis nyamoq khyuot yoeus cho khasoeh xauh das cho taiq kyoh yvlyis yangh Yuda dius jens tomp tyamp das xiklyis yom tsain kat. Heisoeh khyvlyis nyamoq shuot nyeis dah yaunos dyingh dyingh kuot goeus. Housoeh las thang thank lyis Mangso dah nhaiqlom dyis zis gas nyamoq thoq mas jweh los.
52002017	Boekyis eh, ngamoq eq namoq yah nhaiqlom yah ma nghuot, gungsdom yah dvyoq gang joq las soh nyeis. Namoq yah nyoq nyvng sangh tsuk doms xauhgoh das nyhenshang yomkat nyeis.
52002018	Ngamoq namoq jyank mas doms los mes. Ngos Paulo nyang namoq jyank mas doms jweh los das xiklyis dvlhain aiq lhain yomkat yoeuh goeus. Nghuot laus eq Satan ka ngamoq lyis kyoq toh.
52002019	Yah Yhensain Yesu doms jweh los lyis, nyah xikkhonh mas gohtoeu hank ma nghuot, namoq lyis vgungs toh las ngamoq dah nghamhloms cho, gausyis cho yahge ung cho nyhenshang khwank das buismuk nghuot.
52002020	Jyoengh nyang namoq gas ngamoq dah nyoqnho ngelang yahge gauslaus cho tsain nghuot.
52003001	Housoeh las ngamoq ma yoh zain lo yvmvyah, Athen wus mas ngamoq nyang kyingh gyoh nyeis das zis nghamh thyet las,
52003002	Khristu dah gausyis dang taiq kyoh yvmas ngamoq yah dvgeh muh wons nyeis, ngamoq dah boek Timothi lyis nhang kat.
52003003	Namoq mas hank eq hai gvshih xauh nyeis dah shoeuhshih cho gvng mas lomsjingh cho ma lop ma loeh bas jungh, namoq lyis thukxank yomdyei das xiklyis nyang lyis namoq jyank mas nhang kat. Hai yang xauh nyeis dah shoeuhshih cho ka yah xiklyis Mangso dah nghamh toeuq cho dvkhamh nghuot oen yvlyis namoq nyang seq nyeis.
52003004	Khasoeh ge lyis, ngamoq namoq yah dvgeh nyeis shih uhlyis, yang gas shoeuhshih zis xauh das cho, taiq kyoh zaih nhang toh goeus. Houyah dvyhangteh top bweh los goeus yvlyis namoq vlhomuh seq.
52003005	Ngos tsoq las ma yoh zain lo yvmvyah, namoq dah lomsjingh cho khasoeh nghuot joq zis yoh seq das xiklyis ngos Timothi lyis nhang kat. Jyoengh nyang namoq gas yius yah shiwu yvpheh chank loh las ngamoq yomkat ohhont toh dah muhzoh vnyet vkom ma mes bweh nhang.
52003006	Gvshih Timothi gas namoq jyank masyah ngamoq jyank mas doms jweh los las, namoq mas lomsjingh cho yahge jyetdap zis je los cho gausyis lhom yoeus phoh dah loeus wons los. Namoq ngamoq lyis vjangh vlhomuh soh nyeis thoq lyis ma goh, ngamoq namoq yah xauhgoh mes teh, namoq eq ngamoq yah xauhgoh mes cho ngamoq lyis los taiq kyoh.
52003007	Housoeh las boekyis eh, ngamoq dah yaukyenh cho yahge shohjyen xauh nyeis uhlyis namoq cho xauhgyo las yom gyo bos. Houka namoq dah lomsjingh cho gvng mas yom yoh cho nghuot.
52003008	Khasoeh ge lyis, namoq gvshih Yhensain Yesu mas dvdain dvlom kang dwis cho mha ma lop ma loeh yap joq las yang nhaiqtap khyvlyis yoh tsain dwis nyeis.
52003009	Gvshih gas namoq gvng mas ngamoq Mangso lhyi nhaiqshoqlang yoh sang goeus. Namoq gvng mas Yhensain xikkhonh mas ngamoq xauh yoeus dah gausyis ehnyet dah gvng mas ngamoq nyang lyis nhaiqshoqlang tsain chungh.
52003010	Ngamoq gas namoq dah nyoqnho xauh nyvng das zis yahge namoq dah lomsjingh cho mha chah nyeis shih yvlyis yoh tyink das xiklyis ngamoq ehnyet dvnganh yah nyeih nyenh dung nyeis.
52003011	Namoq nyeis yvmas ngamoq los das cho lhyi, yah Uwus Mangso nyang yahge Yhensain Yesu cho sont dyei bas jungh.
52003012	Namoq nyang changh nyang thoq mas eq, dius dvnganh dah thoq mas eq namoq toh dah jyetdap ehnyet gas ngamoq namoq thoq mas toh dah jyetdap ehnyet teh zes las jelvm los nhang das xiklyis Mangso namoq lyis pangh bas jungh.
52003013	Haih cho yah nyang namoq lyis thukxank das. Yah Yhensain Yesu gas nyah gyingshang bang dvnganh yah dvgeh doms jweh uhlyis, namoq gas yah Uwus Mangso xikkhonh mas, dyinghjet las gyingshang bang bweh los das.
52004001	Thang thank lyis boekyis eh, Mangso nhaiqdoeus das nyhenshang namoq kang khasoeh dwis chah cho namoq ngamoq masyah xuq goeus, Namoq hauh cho chank yah kang dwis nyeis goeus. Hauh thoq lyis zes yoh kuot das nyhenshang Yhensain Yesu dah nyings mas ngamoq namoq lyis shangphu zis yah yomdyei kat.
52004002	Khasoeh ge lyis namoq kang khasoeh dwis gis ge tyingtoh cho lhyi Yhensain Yesu dah vmingh yah ngamoq namoq lyis dyei toh goeus zis gas namoq seq.
52004003	Mangso ka namoq lyis gyingshang nhang mes zis yahge nyetnau muh kuot mhayah kyoq kyoq luiq das nyhenshang o.
52004004	Namoq yukgis jens vsainnyang dah yhensain nyhiq yah gyingshang zis yah nyoqnho ngelang bos khyvlyis khasoeh yoh chomp nyeis das cho seq chah.
52004005	Mangso lhyi ma seq dah gohnyau bang teh nyetnau ehnyet yah ma gis zomh.
52004006	Heisoeh teh muh mas namoq hank eq vsainnyang dah Khristan vmang vnoeuh lyis shuot cho nghuot ya, vmang vnoeuh thoq mas toeuh yoeus cho ma gis kuot. Haih cho xikpheh ngamoq namoq lyis taiq kyoh ku goeus las Mangso ka shuot loh soeu lyis joeng das cho khoek khoek zaih nhang goeus.
52004007	Mangso ka yang lyis ma lhoq ma shang kang dwis cho mha dwis nyeis das xiklyis khi yoeus toh zis ma nghuot. Gyingshang dah kang dwis cho mha nyeis das nyhenshang dvkhi yoeus toh.
52004008	Housoeh las haih jyauh cho lhyi peq soeu hank laus eq dius lyis ma nghuot gyingshang Dyos dyei dah Mangso lhyi peq tyamp soeu dvnghuot.
52004009	Namoq dah lomsjingh vmang vnoeuh lyis jyetdap das cho yah sen lha ngos namoq jyank mas lhaih kat das chank ma bos lo. Nyang changh nyang jyetdap goh nyeis das cho Mangso jyauh yvlyis namoq kham goeus.
52004010	Jyoengh oen lhyi namoq gas Makedoni mau gonh mas dah Khristan vmang vnoeuh dvnganh lyis housoeh jyetdap cho chank kuot nyeis goeus. Housoeh las boekyis eh, namoq dah jyetdap ehnyet zes je los das xiklyis ngamoq namoq lyis khyoeuq. Housoeh zes las tsoq kuot loh goh.
52004011	Ngamoq namoq lyis taiq ku zis yah dvyhangteh, namoq gas nyenstap khyvlyis kang dwis nyeis das nyhenshang eq, gohyuk dah cho mha ma bos lhoeuh, vsainnyang dah womdau khoeu muh lyis nghamh toeuq nyeis bas jungh.
52004012	Haih cho khyvlyis yah namoq gas lomsjingh dah phung dius ma nghuot bang dah phauh nyang cho lhyi xauh kham yoeus das. Hauh thoq lyis namoq dah chah shih cho yah sen lha hank lyis eq ma nges lo noh das.
52004013	Boekyis eh, namoq gas nghamhloms cho ma bos bang teh nhaiqkuk zis ma xauh bas jungh, ngamoq gas shei goeus bang yah sen lha hau jyoeng cho namoq lyis seq nhang mes.
52004014	Yhensain Yesu gas shei lha dwis toq los yvlyis yang lomsjingh nyeis lyis gas, Yesu lyis lomsjingh zis yah shei loh bang lyis eq Mangso ka Yesu yah dvgeh nyah jyank mas shwih loh das oen ngamoq lomsjingh.
52004015	Gvshih ngamoq namoq lyis jyauh nyeis zis gas Yhensain dah jyauh cho nghuot. Yhensain jweh los lyis yang dwis nyeis shih bang gas shei goeus bang dah xik pheh loh das zis ma nghuot.
52004016	Yhensain dah kaiq hoeu thwe, vmingh dang, loeuswons vgyis dah thwe yahge Mangso dah lvbuh thwe yah dvgeh Yhensain nyang maukhung mhayah gyoh los das. Hauh uhlyis Khristu lyis lomsjingh las shei loh bang cangxeih dwis toq los das.
52004017	Hauh shishenh lyis dwis nyeis shih dah yang gas nyamoq yah dvgeh jyommauh yah nyhang mha toqh yoeus loh zis xauh das. Housoeh las yang Yhensain yah vjangh dvgeh nyeis das.
52004018	Housoeh las haih dang yah namoq nyang changh yomdyei goh nyeis geh.
52005001	Boekyis eh, haih cho bweh los das shishenh yahge yoq khanhamp nghuot das cho namoq lyis ma lhaih kat noh.
52005002	Khasoeh ge lyis Yhensain doms jweh lyih das buisnyeis gas nyenh lyis khauh soeu wvng teh, jweh los das yvlyis namoq nyang jyuk jyuk seq toh.
52005003	Dius jens gas, Sam joq, gau joq goeus, ge taiq das. Housoeh taiq uhlyis nyang loshang gungs lyis chi dah vmesbih gas lokhoeu nos nos yhangteh hau dyoqbis zis gas nyamoq thoq mas nyetlos nyettant jweh los das las dius jens hank eq yoh luiq das zis ma nghuot.
52005004	Nghuot laus eq boekyis eh, namoq gas chuot yvmas nyeis bang ma nghuot yvmvyah hauh Yhensain doms jweh los das buisnyeis gas khauh soeu teh, nyetlos nyettant namoq thoq mas jweh das zis ma nghuot.
52005005	Khasoeh ge lyis namoq dvnganh gas bvng dah lo jens yahge nyeih dah lo jens nghuot. Yang gas nyenh yahge chuot zis yah eq ma sen.
52005006	Housoeh yvmvyah yang gas gohyhamh teh ma yhet joq joq, phuk soh lhaiq zungh yoeuh nyeis chah.
52005007	Dius jens gas nyenh lyis yhet joq: nyenh lyis yhei yet nyeis.
52005008	Nghuot laus eq yang gas nyeih yah sen yvmvyah phuk soh lhaiq mus chah. Yang gas lomsjingh cho yahge jyetdap ge dah sainhkhonh nghop nghop las, yang nghamhloms dah khyuot yoeus cho ge dah uhkyop tsain kyop toh goh.
52005009	Mangso yang lyis nyah dah nhaiqlom dyis yvlyis kham nhang das xiklyis yang lyis khyen yoeus toh zis ma nghuot, Yhensain Yesu Khristu gvng mas khyuot yoeus cho xauh sain das xiklyis dvkhyen yoeus toh.
52005010	Nyang doms jweh los uhlyis yang gas dwis nyeis laus eq, shei goeus laus eq nyang yah dvgeh kang yoh dwis nyeis das nyhenshang nyang gas yah xiklyis shei kham dyei goeus.
52005011	Haih cho gvng mas namoq gvshih kuot nyeis zis yah dvyhangteh, nyang changh nyang yomdyei goh cho, pangh thuk goh cho kuot nyeis geh.
52005012	Boekyis eh, namoq mas khyoeuq kat zis gas, muh wons las namoq lyis Khristan kang dwis cho mha cho shet, jyauh nyeis bang lyis jus jyoeng khyvlyis phauh nyang nyeis das nyhenshang khyoeuq kat.
52005013	Nyamoq dah muh gvng mas svsoh jyetdap zis yah nyamoq lyis phauh nyang nyeis geh. Namoq nyang changh eq nyenstap goh nyeis geh.
52005014	Boekyis eh, namoq lyis taiq kyingh zis gas, Lan bang lyis zaih nhang lha, nhaiqngis bang lyis thukxank nyeis geh. Yomnhuk bang lyis pangh geh, yuk khanghmuh dah thoq mas jhen ehnyet bos geh.
52005015	Hank lyis eq ma gis gvng mas ma gis khyvlyis ma tauh tauh, namoq nyang changh yahge dius dvnganhmoq xiklyis gis dah muh kuot das zis namoq nghamh toeuq toh geh.
52005016	Vjangh gausyis nyeis geh.
52005017	Malyen lo shvmanh dung nyeis geh.
52005018	Cho khvt khanghmuh mas jyehjuh chungh nyeis geh. Houka Khristu mas namoq dah kang dwis cho yah sen lha Mangso o khyvlyis nghuot.
52005019	Namoq ehnyet lyis yomdyei nyeis dah Gyingshang Dyos lyis vkyamp toh goh. Gyingshang dyos lyis nhaiq vkuk nhang goh.
52005020	Mangso dah dyos kat dyei zis xauh las taiq kyoh dang lyis pvlhyahlyoeus vkuot.
52005021	Cho dvnganh lyis kyink las gis yvlyis lhom yoeus las zwi zains toh geh.
52005022	Ma gis dah cho dvnganh lyis jhank geh.
52005023	Yang lyis nyenstap cho dyei dah Mangso nyang nyamoq lyis cho khvt khanghmuh mas gyingshang nhang lha yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu jweh los uhlyis, namoq dah gungs, ehnyet, dyos dvnganh gas yobos huon chank ma bos shoq gomh nyeis bas jungh.
52005024	Namoq lyis khi yoeus soeu ka wontang soeu nghuot las haih cho lhyi kuot das.
52005025	Boekyis eh, ngamoq xiklyis eq shvmanh dung dyei geh.
52005026	Lomsjingh bang dvnganh lyis gyingshang dah wotwu yah jeshuh dyei geh.
52005027	Hai huon maussauh lyis lomsjingh bang dvnganh lyis nghap kyoh das nyhenshang hau Yhensain kyauh toh dah toeuh yah ngos namoq lyis vmingh dyei.
52005028	Yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah jyehjuh gas namoq yah dvgeh joq bas jungh.
53001001	Paulo, Sila yahge Timothi ngamoq gas, yah Uwus Mangso yahge Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah dius jens Thesaloni phung dius jens lyis maussauh lhaih kat.
53001002	Yah Uwus Mangso yahge Yhensain Yesu Khristu gas namoq lyis jyehjuh yahge nyenstap cho dyei bas jungh.
53001003	Ngamoq dah boekyis eh, namoq dah cho yah sen lha Mangso dah jyehjuh lyis yang vjangh chungh chank bos. Housoeh yang chungh cho kuot das zis gas yah xiklyis jus dah muh nghuot.
