Khasoeh ge lyis namoq dah lomsjingh cho ka svsoh kuhxing los las namoq dah, dius lyis jyetdap ehnyet eq zes je los goeus.
53001004	Housoeh las ngamoq nyang namoq dah cho Mangso dah phung mha gausyis zis yah taiq moengs yenh. Ngamoq gas namoq xauh kham dah shoeuhshih cho lhyi tsoq las, shanghsenh kham zis yah lomsjingh nyeis cho lhyi taiq khwank gaus yenh.
53001005	Haih cho dvnganh gas Mangso soetuon zis jyoeng yvlyis kanghjyoeng tsain kat nyeis. Hauh vkyuh gvng mas namoq gas nyah munghdan yah mon yih bang bweh los goeus zis yahge hauh xiklyis eq namoq shanghsenh zis xauh nyeis.
53001006	Mangso ka lyi jus khyvlyis kuot das las namoq lyis shanghsenh zis xauh nhang bang lyis shanghsenh cho tauh dyei das.
53001007	Yhensain Yesu gas Mangso lhyi ngoek tyamp bang yahge yah Yhensain Yesu dah gausyis dang lyis domsyos ma gyo bang lyis joeng das nyhenshang nyah yomsoq bos loeuswons bang yah dvgeh maukhung mhayah thuq los das. Hauh uhlyis Mangso ka shanghsenh zis xauh nyeis dah namoq yahge ngamoq lyis svkhyen sunghhuq cho yoh nhang das.
53001009	Hau joeng zis xauh das bang gas Yhensain xikkhonh masyah kangh tyamp zis yah, nyah yomsoq dah phunk yah gang loh ge, vcaiq vto thyoqpi tyamp zis xauh das.
53001010	Yhensain doms jweh los dah buisnyeis lyis nyah dius jens dvnganh dah xikkhonh mas phunk lyis eq, lomsjingh bang dvnganh dah phauh nyang chungh cho lhyi eq kham yoeus das. Ngamoq taiq kyoh dah Dang lyis namoq lomsjingh nyeis yvmvyah nyah dius jens yahge nyang lyis lomsjingh bang mas namoq eq bos das.
53001011	Haih cho gvng mas ngamoq eq namoq xiklyis vjangh shvmanh dung dyei nyeis. Namoq gas Mangso khi yoeus zis xauh bang dah kang dwis cho yah mon yih khyvlyis kang yoh dwis bas jungh oen ngamoq Mangso jyank mas shvmanh dung dyei. Nyang gas nyah phunk yomsoq yah namoq dah gis zis bweh nhang mes dah ehnyet bos ya bos yvlyis tyink dyei las namoq dah lomsjingh muhzoh lyis tyeh kuot dyei bas jungh.
53001012	Heisoeh yah Yhensain Yesu dah nyings gas namoq gvng mas phunk nyoqnho bos das. Yah Mangso yahge Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah jyehjuh yah haih cho bweh los bas jungh.
53002001	Ngah boekyis eh, yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu doms jweh los das cho yahge Yhensain yah dvgeh nyeis das nyhenshang xwih tsainh zis xauh das cho yah sen lha ngos namoq lyis shangphu.
53002002	Yhensain doms jweh los das ge dius jens taiq gvng mas namoq dah ehnyet mas lvnyap khamkhvv cho, nhunk cho ma bweh bas jungh, namoq lyis taiq kyingh kat. Housoeh ge dah dang gas, ngamoq lvpe dang taiq uhlyis, nghuot ya Gausyis dang taiq kyoh uhlyis, nghuot ya maussauh lhaih uhlyis bos dah dang nghuot ge nghamh lyis nghamh hah das.
53002003	Khasoeh nghuot laus eq namoq lyis hank khasoeh eq ma mhuih jyomh bas jungh. Khasoeh ge lyis thang thank dah Mangso lhyi gomloeus toq cho ma bweh shih lyis, munyi thomh mas khyoq zis xauh das. Lhung soeu ma thuq los dvchank hauh buisnyeis jweh das zis ma nghuot.
53002004	Nyang gas dius jens paiq nyeis dah mangso bos ya bos yvlyis tyixo lha, nyang gungs nyang gas dvnganh dah thoq lyis phunk zes bos soeu nghuot ge chungh zo das. Nyang gas Mangso dah yhenmuh mas yangh wvng tsung lha nyang gungs nyang Mangso nghuot ge taiq hoeuh das.
53002005	Ngos namoq yah dvgeh nyeis shih uhlyis, haih cho dvnganh ngos namoq lyis taiq kyoh ku goeus yvlyis ma tsain soh lo goh lhyeh?
53002006	Nghuot laus eq hauh cho gvshih ma bweh los shoq kyoq toh zis dvja ja bos. Hauh zis cha nghuot yvlyis namoq seq. Shishenh jweh lyis hau Lhung Soeu thuq los das.
53002007	Seqgyo yau, hau nghop toh dah lhung cho ka gvshih yangh muh kuot nyeis goeus; nghuot laus eq kyoq toh soeu lhyi nyah joqyos masyah shang tyamp shishenh ma jweh dvchank hauh cho bweh los das zis ma nghuot.
53002008	Hauh thang lhyi hau Lhung soeu thuq los das, nghuot laus eq Yhensain Yesu jweh los lyis Lhung soeu lhyi nyah nhuot mas soq yah sat las nyah dah duk bvng phunk yah mhont tyamp das.
53002009	Hau Lhung soeu ka Satan dah yomsoq yah jweh los das las hwah dah yomsoq muh yahge mauh loqmuh vja ja kuot xoeuq das.
53002010	Hauh thoq lyis dyoqbis xauh das bang dah thoq mas ma gis ma shop khyvlyis mhuih cho vja ja kuot das. Nyamoq gas khyuot yoeus xauh das nyhenshang hau jyoeng cho lhyi ma lhom yoeus, ma jyet yvmvyah nyamoq dyoqbis tyamp das.
53002011	Housoeh yvmvyah nyamoq gas shuot cho lhyi lomsjingh shoq Mangso ka shuot cho dah yomsoq lyis nyamoq mas muh khanh das nyhenshang nhang kat.
53002012	Housoeh hau jyoeng cho lhyi ma lomsjingh, yaunos dah pyo cho mha chank suh bang dvnganh gas dang thang thyet zis xauh das.
53002013	Yhensain dah jyetdap boekyis eh, namoq gvng mas ngamoq gas Mangso dah jyehjuh lyis vjangh yoh chungh das. Khasoeh ge lyis, Mangso ka namoq lyis gyingshang bang kuot dyei dah Dyos dah yomsoq yah eq, jyoeng yvlyis lomsjingh dah namoq dah lomsjingh cho yah eq, cangxeih dah khyuot yoeus xauh bang khyvlyis namoq lyis khyen yoeus goeus.
53002014	Mangso ka namoq lyis ngamoq taiq kyoh dah gausyis dang cho yah namoq lyis khi yoeus goeus. Nyang gas yah Yhensain Yesu dah phunk masyah namoq kham yoeus vvng dah gvmboms lyis yoh sain bas jungh ge khi yoeus.
53002015	Housoeh yvmvyah boekyis eh, ngamoq taiq kyoh dah gausyis dang khyvlyis eq, huon maussauh khyvlyis eq ngamoq namoq lyis jyauh, hau jyoeng dah cho mha goeng goeng thoenk yap las zwi zains toh geh.
53002016	Yah Yhensain Yesu nyang yahge yang lyis jyetdap las nyah jyehjuh yah yang lyis vcaiq vto goeng joq dah womh zis yahge goeng dah nghamhloms cho dyei soeu Uwus Mangso ka,
53002017	namoq lyis vjangh gis dah cho taiq zis yah yoh zwi khank nyeis bas jungh yomdyei zis yah goeng toenk nhang nyeis bas jungh.
53003001	Ngamoq dah boekyis eh, thang thank namoq lyis tying toh mes zis gas, Yhensain dah dang gas namoq mas jweh ngap los teh, tsoq las lvnyap jweh ngap loh las nyoqnho ngelang dyei zis yah yoh lhom yoeus das nyhenshang ngamoq xiklyis shvmanh bos dung nyeis geh.
53003002	Mangso ka ngamoq lyis ma gis ma shop, lhung bang dah loq masyah khyuot kat bas jungh, shvmanh bos dung dyei geh: khasoeh ge lyis, hau gausyis loeus lyis dius yuk khanghmuh lomsjingh zis ma nghuot.
53003003	Nghuot laus eq Yhensain ka wontang lha, nyang namoq lyis ehnyet yombos nhang lha ma shop soeu dah jes kuot masyah gomh dyei das.
53003004	Namoq gas, ngamoq tying ya tying toh yvlyis tsain chank kuot nyeis zis yah dvyhangteh tsoq las kuot nyeis das oen nghamhnywe dah ehnyet Yhensain ngamoq lyis dyei.
53003005	Namoq Mangso dah jyetdap cho lhyi zes seqgyo los das zis yahge Khristu dyei dah jhen cho lhyi seqgyo das nyhenshang eq, Yhensain ka namoq lyis choshe bas jungh.
53003006	Boekyis eh, lan zis yah kang dwis nyeis bang dvnganh yah eq, ngamoq jyauh cho lhyi ma chank bang yah eq, ma zomh zomh gohtoeu toeu nyeis das xiklyis yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu nyings masyah ngamoq namoq lyis vmingh dyei.
53003007	Namoq gas ngamoq kuot xoeuq dah yikhyoh yah dvyhangteh chank kuot vvng cho namoq nyang vlhomuh seq. Ngamoq namoq yah dvgeh nyeis shishenh lyis ngamoq lan dah yikhyoh ma chixoeuq.
53003008	Ngamoq gas phauh ma dyei hank dah pangh cho eq ma lhom yoeus. Hauh gungsthaiq namoq hank lyis eq yvwons ma huon bas jungh, ngamoq nyeih nyenh muh tsain zwi shangh lai loh goeus.
53003009	Ngamoq housoeh kuot zis gas ngamoq mas namoq jyank masyah pangh thuk das cho sang das toeuh ma bos las ma nghuot, namoq chank kuot das xiklyis yikhyoh bweh bas jungh oen dvtsain kuot.
53003010	Namoq yah dvgeh nyeis shih uhlyis, Muh ma mes zwi soeu ka wom eq ma zo goeus jungh, oen ngamoq namoq lyis tying toh ku.
53003011	Ngamoq haih cho chamus taiq lah oen lhyi, namoq mas dvyhamh lan zis yah kang dwis las, chah muh ma zwi zwi, gohyuk dah muh mas bos nhunk bang bos cho ngamoq xauhgyo.
53003012	Housoeh kuot nyeis bang gas, nyamoq gis khyvlyis vlhomuh nyeis las nyamoq nyang womdau khoeu muh zwi zo nyeis bas jungh oen, Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah nyings mas ngamoq taiq kyingh zaih nhang.
53003013	Nghuot laus eq boekyis eh, namoq gis dah muh zwi das zis vnyung vdaus nyeis goh.
53003014	Haih maussauh mas ngamoq namoq lyis lhaih huon dah dang lyis domsyos ma gyo soeu dvyuk yuk bos lyis, nyang lyis comh toh las: nyang xoq bas jungh, nyang yah vzomh goh.
53003015	Nghuot laus eq nyang lyis jeswus lyis teh vkuot goh, vmang vnoeuh lyis teh taiq kyingh zaih nhang geh.
53003016	Yah nyenstap vpom nghuot dah Yhensain ka namoq lyis cho khvt khanghmuh mas vjangh yah nyenstap cho dyei bas jungh. Yhensain ka namoq dvnganhmoq yah dvgeh nghuot bas jungh.
53003017	Haih zis ngos ngvnyang loq yah lhaih: Paulo Jeshuh kat. Ngos lhaih huon maussauh khanghmuh mas ngah loqyos gas haih zis nghuot. Ngos heisoeh gyangh lhaih.
53003018	Yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah jyehjuh gas namoq dvnganhmoq yah dvgeh joq bas jungh.
54001001	Yah khyuot yoeus Mangso yahge yang nghamhloms joqyos nghuot dah Khristu Yesu gvng mas, Khristu Yesu dah lvgyo ngos Paulo gas,
54001002	lomsjingh cho mha ngah lo gyingh nghuot dah Timothi jyank mas maussauh lhaih kat. Uwus Mangso yahge yah Yhensain Khristu Yesu jyank masyah nvng lyis jyehjuh, nhaiqnyen zis yahge nyenstap zis dyei bas jungh.
54001003	Ngos Makedoni mau pheh lai loh uhlyis nvng lyis taiq toh goeus zis yah dvyhangteh, Ephesu wus mas tsoq nyeis nhang mes. Houmha dius dvyhamh shuot dah lomsjingh cho lhyi tsain jyauh nyeis, hauh yvlyis nvng yoh tomp tyamp chah das.
54001004	Jyoengh ma gis bweh dah tying dang mvnyei, ma thank lo dah dius caiq shap cho toh tyamp das xiklyis nyamoq lyis taiq aq. Hauh cho jens gas dyoqgoh nyens goh, phyen-goh cho lhoq thuq nyeis las hau lomsjingh cho yah kyingh dvyoh seq dah Mangso dah nghamh toeuq toh cho lhyi ma yoh bweh los nhang.
54001005	Hai taiq toh dah toeuqkhom ka lhoqshang ehnyet masyah thuq los dah jyetdap cho, gying dah soh seq ehnyet yahge gyingh dah lomsjingh cho lhyi nhauh toq kat cho tsain nghuot.
54001006	Dvyhamh gas hauh cho jens masyah whang lha vkoh vpaq vkyuh ma bos dah taiq phyen-goh cho yah dye tyamp.
54001007	Nyamoq gas Mangso dah lyi jyauh bang tsain bweh mes, laus eq nyamoq gas vsainnyang taiq dang lyis eq, vsainnyang nghamhnywe zis yah taiq nyeis dah cho cha nghuot yvlyis ma tsain seqgyo.
54001008	Lyi gas yhung chah khyvlyis yhung lhyi ka hauh Lyi gis yvlyis ngamoq seq.
54001009	Housoeh las yang seq toh chah cho ka, hauh lyi gas dius gis jens xiklyis ma nghuot; lyi lhyweq bang, shei mon yaunos bos bang, gywes ma tsungh bang, yaunos bos bang, lomsnoq cho ma chank bang, lomsjingh cho nghuot ya dyos yah sen cho mha nhaiq ma wvng bang, ungwes uwus lyis sat bang yahge dius sat bang,
54001010	wotwu dyoq bang, nye changh yukgis changh nyeis goh bang, jons ungh dah soenghi kuot bang, hwah bang, ma ying kanghjyoeng kat bang yahge gohtoeu cho vja ja khyvlyis yah lomsjingh dah jyauh cho lhyi tyixo lha kang dwis bang xiklyis lyi dvtoh.
54001011	Hauh jyauh cho ka phunk bos las ngelhoq Mangso mhayah gausyis Dang yah dvyhangteh nghuot. Hau gausyis dang lyis taiq hoeuh das nyhenshang Mangso ka ngos lyis kyauh toh.
54001012	Ngos wons wuq muhzoh xiklyis ngos lyis yomdyei soeu, yah Yhensain Khristu Yesu lyis nhaiqshoqlang chungh. Nyang gas ngos lyis mon yih soeu nghuot ge suon lha nyang lyis phuqsoe das xiklyis toeuq toh zis xauh yvmvyah nyang lyis nhaiqshoqlang chungh.
54001013	Ngos gas lai loh goeus shishenh lyis Yhensain lhyi ma gis khyvlyis yobos huon, khyangh pu, shoeuhshih soeu jwangh soeu, nghuot ku laus eq, Mangso ka ngos lyis nhaiqnyen nyeis: khasoeh ge lyis ngos mas lomsjingh cho ma bos shih las ngos cha kuot nyeis zis ngos ma seq.
54001014	Yah Yhensain ka nyah magons magoh jyehjuh ngah thoq mas huot khyoq dyei las Khristu yah dvdain dvlom kang dwis nyeis yvmvyah yang xauh yoeus vvng dah lomsjingh cho yahge jyetdap ehnyet ngos lyis dyei goeus.
54001015	Yaunos dap bang lyis khyuot yoeus das xiklyis Khristu Yesu gas mungkvn mas jweh lyih, ge dah dang gas top nyang lhom yoeus las lomsjingh mon, jyoeng lha wontang dah dang nghuot. Hau yaunos wons bang mas ngos yaunos nyo thank soeu nghuot.
54001016	Nghuot laus eq, Mangso ngos lyis nhaiqnyen cho ka thang pheh Yhensain lhyi lomsjingh las vcaiq vto kang xauh yoeus das bang dvnganh dah nyhenshang yikhyoh bweh bas jungh ge Khristu Yesu gas ngos yaunos zes nyo soeu lhyi nyah dah nhaiqlom xing xing jhen cho lhyi Chixoeuq zis nghuot.
54001017	Gvshih, vcaiq vto Hwankti nghuot las ma seq dyoq dyuk loh, nyoqjeih yah ma yoh nyvng, dvso kyingh dah Mangso mha phunk yahge nyoqnho ngelang gas vcaiq vto bos joq bas jungh. Amen.
54001018	Ngah lo Timothi eh, lai loh goeus shishenh lyis nvng lyis toeuq las taiq toh dah lvpe dang yah dvyhangteh, wons wuq loh das nyhenshang ngos nvng lyis vmingh dyei; jes vlhomuh yoh zan das xiklyis hau lvpe jens taiqtoh dang lyis kyonhkhyi teh yhung aq.
54001019	Hauh thoq lyis nvng mas lomsjingh cho yahge gying dah sohseq ehnyet bos aq. Dvyhamh gas sohseq ehnyet yah taiq kyingh yvlyis ma gyo yvmvyah nyamoq dah lomsjingh cho lhyi lhoeu thyoq tyamp.
54001020	Nyamoq mas Satan loq mas kyauh khyvlyis ngos joeng dah Himenu yahge Alesandria tsain bos. Housoeh kuot zis gas nyamoq dah loeusmus soqzo cho lhyi doms tyamp bas jungh, jyauh das xiklyis kuot zis nghuot.
54002001	Housoeh yvmvyah cangxeih lyis dius dvnganhmoq dah nyhenshang Mangso jyank mas shangphu cho, shvmanh dung cho, bos khyoeuq cho yahge jyehjuh chungh cho kuot nyeis aq oen ngos nvng lyis taiq kyingh kat.
54002002	Yang gas Mangso lhyi gyukwoms cho dvnganh mas vlhomuh chank suh las doeus las gis dah wotwu bos zis yah samlo nyenstap khyvlyis kang dwis nyeis bas jungh. Hwankti jens yahge vmingh yoh bang dvnganhmoq xiklyis shvmanh dung dyei aq.
54002003	Haih muh gas gis dah muh nghuot las yah khyuot yoeus Yhensain Mangso lhyi nhaiqdoeus nhang nyeis.
54002004	Nyang gas dius dvnganh khyuot yoeus zis xauh las hau jyoeng cho lhyi seq los das nyhenshang o.
54002005	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka dvso kyingh nghuot las Mangso yahge dius jo mas shangphu dyei soeu eq dius lyih duot dah Khristu Yesu ge soeu dvyuk kyingh nghuot.
54002006	Yhensain ka dius nyau dvnganh lyis khyuot yoeus das nyhenshang nyah gungs lyis nyang kyauh tyamp goeus. Housoeh khyvlyis yah yang shishenh jweh lyis Mangso ka dius lyis khyuot yoeus mes cho kanghjyoeng lhyi hau toeuq toh shishenh lyis chixoeuq zis nghuot.
54002007	Housoeh las Yhensain ka ngos lyis lvgyo dvyuk khyvlyis eq, gohnyau bang dah jyauh soeu dvyuk khyvlyis eq hau lomsjingh cho yahge jyoeng cho dah dang lyis taiq kyoh das nyhenshang nhang kat zis xauh. Ngos hwah nyeis zis ma nghuot; jyoeng dang dvtaiq.
54002008	Phung dah paiq cho huom khanghmuh mas vbusbih jens lyis shvmanh dung nhang mes. Mangso mha kyauh toh zis xauh dah vbusbih jens gas, nhaiq yo cho, phyen-goh cho ma bos bos, gyingshang dah loq toeu lha shvmanh yoh dung.
54002009	Vmesbih jens lyis eq nyamoq dah dyimis wuot cho mha shop khyvlyis vlhomuh wuot nhang mes. Cam zaiq, xing, pvleh yahge phauhdap dyimis yah ma shunk,
54002010	paiq thungh chank kuot dah vmesbih jens dah nyhenshang kuot vvng zis yah dvyhangteh gis dah wotwu yah vsainnyang dah gungs lyis shunk nyeis bas jungh.
54002011	Vmesbih jens gas ehnyet nyhen mha gyoh zis yah samlo xuq bas jungh.
54002012	Vmesbih jens gas jyauh das zis yahge vbusbih jens thoq mas toeuh yoeus las guon das zis ngos ma gyo. nyamoq gas samlo nyeis bas jungh.
54002013	Khasoeh ge lyis Adam lyis shih gvnkhanh las Ewa lyis gas thang lhyi dvgvnkhanh toh.
54002014	Satan dah mhuih zis xauh soeu ka Adam ma nghuot, vmesbih yuk mhuih zis xauh las Mangso dah lyi lyis lhyweq goeus.
54002015	Nghuot laus eq vmesbih dvyuk gas shop zis yah lomsjingh cho, jyetdap cho, gyingshang cho mha tsoq chank nyeis lyis gas, hau lo khoeu dah gvng mas nyang khyuot yoeus zis xauh das.
54003001	Phung dah uhshe soeu dvyuk bweh mes soeu ka gis thank dah muh lyis o mes soeu nghuot ge dah dang gas jyoeng dang nghuot.
54003002	Phung lhyi uhshe dah soeu ka yobos ma bos soeu, yhensain nyhiq dvyuk kyingh bos soeu, zaih soeu, vsainnyang gungs lyis joeu soeu, cho jeis lyis yoeuh las kang dwis soeu, boengh mes daih soeu, seq jyauh das vlho chi soeu nghuot chah.
54003003	Yhei ma shuk, ma bat, ehnyet noeuh nhamp las nyens nyens tap tap nghuot chah. Nyang gas ngwis nyoq ma noq soeu nghuot chah.
54003004	Vsainnyang yhen lhyi vlhomuh yoh guon las, vsainnyang lo jens lyis domsyos gyo zis yah phauh nyang zis xauh kham shoq yoh kuot soeu nghuot chah.
54003005	Dius dvyuk gas vsainnyang yhen lhyi ma seq shwih nghuot lyis gas, Mangso dah phung lhyi loqzamh khasoeh yoh zwi das lah?
54003006	Nyang gas phung dius vsaiq bweh los soeu eq ma nghuot goeus jungh, nyang gas khwank ehnyet bos los las yius Satan lyis teh dang thang thyet zis ma xauh bas jungh, hau lomsjingh cho mha nhaiqbos chah.
54003007	Nyang gas jwangh las yobos huon zis ma xauh, yius dah lhyik mas ma nyih bas jungh, phung nghe pheh bang phauh nyang kham soeu eq nghuot chah.
54003008	Phung thuk jens eq dan las wotwu gis bang nghuot chah. Lhyo kuq soeu, zvbiq shuk lais soeu, ngwis nyonsdot soeu ma gis nghuot.
54003009	Mangso yah Chixoeuq toh goeus dah lomsjingh cho jyoeng cho lhyi shangkyei dah sohseq ehnyet yah lhom yoeus las zwi zains toh bang nghuot chah.
54003010	Nyamoq gas cangxeih lyis kyink zis xauh las, yobos huon dais ma bos lyis gas phung thuk muh wons bas jungh.
54003011	Nyamoq dah yhensain nyhiq jens eq wotwu gis bang nghuot las, loeus ma mus, zaih lha cho khvt khanghmuh mas lomluk bang nghuot chah.
54003012	Phung thuk gas yhensain nyhiq dvyuk kyingh yoh soeu nghuot las, vsainnyang yhen yahge lo jens lyis gis gis yoh guon soeu nghuot chah.
54003013	Vsainnyang dah muh lyis vlhomuh wons wuq dah phung thuk gas nyah xiklyis gis dah nyoqnho ngelang yoh las Khristu Yesu mas nyamoq dah lomsjingh cho mha womh dah ehnyet yah yoh taiq kyoh.
54003014	Ngos nvng lyis haih maussauh lhaih nyeis uhlyis nah jyank mas ma nyangh lyis yoh jweh das oen nghamhloms nyeis.
54003015	Nghuot laus eq ngos lvnyap ma yoh jweh los lyis dwis nyeis Mangso dah phung ge, hau jyoeng cho lhyi thuk dah zains tsain nghuot dah Mangso dah yhenbang mas yang khasoeh teh dah wotwu chank chah cho yoh seq bas jungh oen haih maussauh lyis lhaih kat.
54003016	Yah lomsnoq cho dah nghop toh zis gas kha iq kuhxing yvlyis hank eq ngoek chank ma bos zis gas o mha taiq toh zis yah dvyhangteh nghuot. Nyang gas cangsoeu gungs shoh yah thuq los zis yah dan soeu nghuot yvlyis Dyos yah Chixoeuq goeus, loeuswons bang eq nyang lyis nyvng goeus. Nyah cho dius nyau dvnganh lyis taiq kyoh goeus. Mungkvn gonh gas nyang lyis lomsjingh goeus. Housoeh nyang gas maukhung mha toqh kat zis xauh goeus.
54004001	Dyos yah bvng bvng taiq zis gas, Thang pheh dius dvyhamh gas lomsjingh cho lhyi tyamp das; nyamoq gas hwah las mhuih dah dyos dang gyo las yius Satan dah jyauh cho mha tsain chank loh das.
54004002	Vsainnyang dah sohseq ehnyet gas ngeh dah thyeq yah tanh ngheq zis xauh bang teh shei tyamp goeus dah mhuih bang gas housoeh teh jyauh cho lhyi tsain taiq hoeuh.
54004003	Housoeh teh bang gas nyihwank cho yahge zonoms dvkhamh lyis kyi das nyhenshang tsain jyauh. Nghuot laus eq lomsjingh bang yahge jyoeng cho lhyi seq bang gas nhaiqshoqlang oen shvmanh dung zis yah yoh zo das xiklyis Mangso ka hauh zonoms lyis gvnkhanh toh.
54004004	Mangso gvnkhanh toh zis dvnganh gas gis las zonoms cha lhyi eq ma peq noh: nghuot laus eq zonoms dvnganh lyis nhaiqshoqlang oen shvmanh dung zis yah lhom yoeus chah.
54004005	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso dang yahge shvmanh dung dang gas hauh yvlyis gyingshang nhang nyeis las Mangso lhom yoeus mon dah zonoms bweh los nhang nyeis.
54004006	Hai taiq shet toh dang yah dvyhangteh nvng Khristan vmang vnoeuh moq lyis taiq kyingh nyeis lyis gas, nvng xauh lhom yoeus las chank nyeis, Dyos dah lomsjingh cho mha eq, jyoeng dah jyauh dang mas eq vsainnyang gungs lyis nyhoeu kuh, Khristu dah jyeidwis gis nghuot nyeis.
54004007	Nghuot laus eq Mangso yah ma sen taiq das xiklyis vkyuh ma bos dah mvnyei dang lyis jhank las gywes so lhyi phauh nyang dah kang dwis cho lhyi pot toh aq.
54004008	Gungs yah sen lha pot zis gas vkyuh dvtsiq dvbos. Nghuot laus eq hau dyos dah lomsjingh cho mha pot cho ka cho khvt khanghmuh mas vkyuh bos; khasoeh ge lyis houka haq caiq yahge thang caiq xiklyis kang yoh dyei.
54004009	Hauh dang gas jyoeng lha dvnganh lhom yoeus las lomsjingh gis dah dang nghuot.
54004010	Dius dvnganh yahge zes las lomsjingh bang dah khyuot yoeus Yhensain nghuot las kang dwis Mangso ka yah dah nghamhloms joqyos nghuot yvmvyah yang zwi khank cho mha yomkat nyeis.
54004011	Nyamoq lyis hai taiq shet dang yahge jyauh cho lhyi dyei toh aq.
54004012	Nvng wotyamh nghuot yvmvyah hank eq nvng lyis dius ngis ma khyoq bas jungh, taiq dang, wotwu, jyetdap cho mha, lomsjingh cho mha, ehnyet lhoqshang cho mha eq lomsjingh bang xiklyis yikhyoh bweh nyeis aq.
54004013	Ngos jweh los shoq dius phung xikkhonh mas Jyomp maussauh nghap kyoh cho, gausyis dang taiq kyoh cho yahge jyauh cho lhyi shishenh dyei las yomkat nyeis aq.
54004014	Lvpe jens taiq toh dang bos yvmas phung whop jens nah thoq mas loq tsain kih las toeuq toh dyei uhlyis nvng lyis kyauh toh, nvng mas bos, dyos yah sen dah jyehjuh jyungshuk lyis ma phauh ma danh kuot las vchi thyuk tyamp.
54004015	Nvng seq los kunk los cho dius jens dvnganh yoh nyvng bas jungh, haih taiq toh goeus yvwons lyis nhaiq wvng zis yah chank kuot las houmha lang toh aq.
54004016	Nah gungs lyis eq, nvng jyauh dang lyis eq zaih lha zungh yoeuh nyeis aq. Nvng haih cho jens lyis tsoq kuot nyeis aq, khasoeh ge lyis nvng housoeh kuot lyis nah gungs lyis eq, nah dang xauhgyo bang lyis eq nvng yoh khyuot yoeus das.
54005001	Nyenhkyi bos dah logis lyis vnyho, nah uwus lyis teh sang aq; ngis bang lyis vmang vnoeuh lyis teh,
54005002	nyhiqzains jens lyis ungwes moq lyis teh, lonyi jens lyis nhamhmuh jens lyis teh, lhoqshang ehnyet yah taiq kyingh nyeis aq.
54005003	Jyoengh dvyuk kyingh nghuot dah chauhmuh jens lyis phauh nyang nyeis aq.
54005004	Nghuot laus eq chauhmuh dvyuk yuk mas lo jens nyei jens bos lyis gas, nyamoq gas nyamoq yhen khau nyhenshang lomsnoq cho yah sen lha kuot cho yvwons lyis shih xuq bas jungh; housoeh kuot khyvlyis vsainnyang ungwes uwus, vphauh vyos lyis jyehjuh phuk bas jungh. Khasoeh ge lyis houka Mangso lhyi nhaiqdoeus nhang cho nghuot.
54005005	Nyang bauh nghuot las nyang lyis yoeuh das zis hank ma bos dah chauhmuh dvyuk gas Mangso lhyi nghamhloms zis yah nyeis las nyeih nyenh shvmanh dung zis yah Mangso jyank mas pangh cho dung nyeis.
54005006	Nghuot laus eq wotwu dyoq las pyo cho dvxo dah chauhmuh gas dwis nyeis shih laus eq vshei dvnghuot.
54005007	Nyamoq lyis hank eq yobos huon chank ma bos bas jungh, haih tying toh dang yah nyamoq lyis taiq kyingh nyeis aq.
54005008	Dvyuk yuk nyang yah sen soeu yahge zes las yhen khau dius lyis ma khoeu soeu ka, lomsjingh cho lhyi ngoek soeu nghuot las ma lomsjingh soeu thoq lyis zes las ma shop soeu nghuot.
54005009	Nyenhkyi khyukci zvn ma lai lyis gas khah chauhmuh lyis eq chauhmuh nyings mas ma bos shih goeus jungh; Nyang gas dvlhain kyingh phoengh dvwvng soeu nghuot chah.
54005010	Hauh thoq lyis nyang gas wotwu gis cho mha hoeuh soeu, lo jens lyis vlhomuh khoeu bes kat soeu, boenghwus lyis nyah yhen mha daih ku soeu, ehnyet nyhen mha gyoh las Khristan changh jens lyis kuot dyei soeu, shohjyen bang lyis bos pangh soeu, gis dah muhzoh khanghmuh lyis yomkat las bos wons wuq soeu nghuot chah.
54005011	Nghuot laus eq nyenhkyi ngis shih dah chauhmuh jens lyis chauhmuh nyings mas ma kat goeus jungh. Khasoeh ge lyis, nyamoq ehnyet omes cho yah duon gvng mas yhen loh lyis Khristu masyah nungs seq doms loh.
54005012	Housoeh las nyamoq gas Yhensain lhyi cangxeih toh goeus dah dangthoengh lyis toh tyamp dah yaunos yoh bang bweh los.
54005013	Hauh thoq lyis nyamoq gas dvyhen dvyhen kwang lha shishenh lyis vkom thank nhang cho seq kuot los. Hauh thoq lyis zes ma gis cho ka nyamoq ma taiq vvng cho lhyi tsain taiq loeusmus yenh las nyamoq yah ma sen dah cho mha bos seq nhunk bang bweh los.
54005014	Housoeh las jeswus jens gas yah cho ma gis khyvlyis taiq das cho lhyi toeuh ma dyei das khyvlyis nyenhkyi ma kuh shih dah chauhmuh jens gas phoengh wvng las lo bos zis yah yhenkhau zom nyeis das xiklyis ngos zes o nyeis.
54005015	Khasoeh ge lyis, gvshih yangh chauhmuh dvyhamh Satan dah thang chank das nyhenshang nungs doms loh goeus.
54005016	Lomsjingh dah vmesbih dvyuk yuk gas nyah yhen mha chauhmuh muh bang bos nghuot lyis gas, nyang nyamoq lyis yoeuh chah. Nyamoq nyhenshang phung lhyi yvwons s ma gis lyei nhang. Housoeh kuot lyis phung ka jyoengh khau nges gus ma bos lo dah chauhmuh jens lyis yoh yoeuh dyei das.
54005017	Uhshe dah muh lyis vlhomuh kuot nyeis dah phung shwih bang gas uhkung phauh aiq huon yoh mon soeu nghuot oen nghamh yoeuh gis. Zes las Dang taiq kyoh las jyauh cho mha yomkat wons wuq nyeis bang gas housoeh kham yoeus mon bang nghuot.
54005018	Khasoeh ge lyis lhaihtoh dang mas, Guk nang nyeis noeulu lyis nhuottsungh vtsungh toh dyei; tsai muh zwi soeu ka nyah uhkung phauh xauh kham zo vvng, ge taiq.
54005019	Kanghjyoeng aiq yuk somh yuk ma bos bos, phung uhshe soeu lhyi yobos huon zis ma gis gyo dyei.
54005020	Gohyuk gyukwoms bas jungh, yaunos kuot bang dvnganh lyis moqphung xikkhonh mas nyho lha jyauh aq.
54005021	Haih taiq shet toh cho lhyi hank dah nyoqnho lyis eq ma yoeuh, nvng kuot loh cho khanghmuh mas dvshot shot mas ma dap dap, domsyos gyo las chank kuot das nyhenshang Mangso yahge Khristu Yesu dah xikkhonh mas eq, gyingshang loeuswons bang xikkhonh mas eq ngos nvng lyis taiq toh.
54005022	Yhensain dah muh wons wuq das nyhenshang hank lyis eq loq kih las muh kyauh das zis vgyen. Gohyhamh bang yaunos kuot cho mha vbos lhoeuh. Nvnyang yobos ma dap shoq shangkyei nyeis aq.
54005023	Nvng dvsoq soq lyis nos yvmvyah, nah womdau zos tyik yvmas pangh jus das nyhenshang jeis kyingh ma shuk shuk, zvbiq dvtsiq tsiq bos shuk dyei nyeis aq.
54005024	Dvyhamh bang dah yaunos gas nyvng das xiklyis dede nghuot las nyamoq dah yaunos gas nyamoq dah xik pheh soetuon yvpheh loh nyeis. Nghuot laus eq dvyhamh bang dah yaunos gas thang lhyi dede dvyoh nyvng.
54005025	Houyah dvyhangteh gis dah muhzoh lyis dede yoh nyvng, dede ma nghuot yvlyis yangh ma yoh nghop shung toh.
54006001	Jons jens gas, vsainnyang dah yhensain lhyi phauh nyang gis soeu nghuot oen nghamh chah. Housoeh lyis hank eq Mangso dah nyings yahge ngamoq dah jyauh cho lhyi ma gis khyvlyis loeusmus soqzo das zis ma nghuot.
54006002	Khristan yhensain jens dah o mha nyeis dah jons jens gas vsainnyang dah yhensain lhyi dvyhangteh vmang vnoeuh dvnghuot oen ma phauh ma nyang ma gis kuot: khasoeh ge lyis vsainnyang phuqsoe lha vkyuh xauh kham bang gas vsainnyang jyetdap nyeis dah lomsjingh bang nghuot yvmvyah nyamoq lyis zes nyangh phuqsoe chah. Nvng gas haih cho lhyi jyauh zis yah taiq kyoh nyeis chah.
54006003	Hank laus eq shaih dah jyauh cho jyauh soeu ka, yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah jyoeng lha dyinghjet dah dang yahge yah lomsjingh cho dah jyauh cho lhyi ma chank soeu nghuot.
54006004	Nyang gas khwank las cha eq ma seq soeu nghuot. Nyang gas dang taiq goh yvmas taiq phyen-goh das xiklyis dyoqgoh das xiklyis ma jus dah ehnyet bos soeu nghuot. Housoeh kuot yvmvyah noh cho, gang lvn loh cho, phyen-goh cho, laihwangh cho, ma gis khyvlyis kuot jyo cho tsain thuq los nhang nyeis.
54006005	Hauh thoq lyis uhnuk ma dyingh cho yahge jyoeng cho lhyi ma nyvng ma seq bang masyah phyen-goh cho dvsoq soq thuq los nyeis. Lomsnoq cho ge zis gas dis los das nyhenshang nghuot ge nyamoq nghamh.
54006006	Jyoengh oen lhyi ka vsainnyang yoh yvmas nhaiq seq tap lyis gas, lomsnoq cho ka dius dvyuk lyis svsoh dis nhang nyeis.
54006007	Khasoeh ge lyis, yang haih mungkvn mas cha chi los? Cha ma chi los. Mungkvn masyah cha yoh chi loh? Cha ma yoh chi loh.
54006008	Housoeh las yang wuot das zo das zis yoh goeus ya, hauh zis yah nhaiq tap nyeis goh.
54006009	Nghuot laus eq dis mes bang gas, shiwu zis xauh las vkoh vpaq yah shanghsenh yoh bweh nhang dah nyoqnoq obos cho nyoshoq dah lhyik mas nyop loh. Houka nyamoq lyis dyoqbis las somh loh yvmas she wvng loh.
54006010	Khasoeh ge lyis ngwis nyoqnoq ehnyet gas, ma gis cho vja ja dah vpom nghuot. Dius dvyhamh gas hauh zis yoh das nyhenshang svsoh omes nyeis yvmvyah, lomsjingh cho mhayah whang loh las kuk cho vja ja yah vsainnyang dah ehnyet lyis dyoqbis loh nhang.
54006011	Mangso dah dius nvng gas haih cho dvnganh lyis jhank aq. Dan cho, gywes so lhyi phauh nyang cho, lomsjingh cho, jyetdap cho, nhaiqlom xing cho yahge noeuh nhamp ehnyet lyis yoh shoq yomkat nyeis aq.
54006012	Lomsjingh zis yah sen dah wuih khyank goh pwe mha duot thank shoq wuih las vcaiq vto kang ge dah jyungshuk xauh yoeus shoq kuot aq. Khasoeh ge lyis hau kang dwis cho mha nvng lyis Mangso lui yoeus uhlyis nvng gas kanghjyoeng nyoshoq dah xikkhonh mas lomsjingh goeus cho toenk toenk rhen goeus.
54006013	Vyhang dvnganh lyis kang dyei soeu Mangso xikkhonh mas eq, Pontu Pilat xikkhonh mas nyang lomsjingh cho lhyi toenk toenk rhen dah Khristu Yesu dah xikkhonh mas eq hai muh wons das xiklyis ngos nvng lyis taiq toh.
54006014	Nvng gas nvng lyis taiq toh goeus cho lhyi domsyos gyo las Khristu doms thuq xoeuq das buisnyeis jweh shoq lomluk luk chank kuot tyink nyeis aq.
54006015	Dvyuk kyingh nghuot las zau guon nyoqnho ngelang bos dah guon soeu, hwankti jens dah Hwankti, yhensain jens dah Yhensain, Mangso ka shishenh jweh lyis Yhensain Yesu lyis dvlhain doms thuq xoeuq nhang das.
54006016	Nyang kyingh ma shei ma dyuk soeu nghuot las nyang gas hank ma yoh ni loh dah bvng yvmas nyeis. Nyang lyis hank eq ma nyvng ku, hank eq nyang lyis ma yoh nyvng. Nyah jyank mas nyoqnho ngelang yahge vcaiq vto phunk bos joq bas jungh. Amen.
54006017	Haih nyeisjvng thoq kang dwis nyeis caiq dah zisyos nyeisgis yaplhoq cho mha dis bang lyis hauh zisyos mas ma khwank das zis yahge ma goeng dah nyeisgis yaplhoq cho lhyi nyamoq dah nghamhloms khau nges joqyos ma kuot, yang gausyis zis yah lhom yoeus das xiklyis vyhang dvnganh lyis magons magoh dyei dah Mangso lhyi nghamhloms las langh nyeis das nyhenshang taiq toh aq.
54006018	Gis zis kuot das cho yahge gis dah muh mas dis das nyhenshang eq, gohyuk lyis dyei gvm cho mha eq, magons magoh dyei das zis cicont nghuot bas jungh nyamoq lyis jyauh nyeis aq.
54006019	Heisoeh khyvlyis nyamoq gas thang caiq xiklyis goeng dah vpom duot nyeis bas jungh. Phauhdap dah zisyos nyamoq yoh yung toh las jyoeng dah kang dwis cho gyingh lyis yoh das.
54006020	Timothi eh, nvng lyis kyauh toh dah muh lyis vlhomuh yoeuh gomh zwi zains toh aq. Ma lhoq ma shang dang taiq yvlyis eq, dius dvyhamh seq cho nghuot ge ma jus khyvlyis nyhink dah vkoh vpaq phyen-goh dang lyis eq jhank aq.
54006021	Khasoeh ge lyis dius dvyhamh gas seq cho bos bang nghuot ge toh las lomsjingh cho mhayah whang loh. Mangso dah jyehjuh gas namoq dvnganhmoq yah dvgeh joq bas jungh.
55001001	Mangso o zis yah dvyhangteh Khristu dah lvgyo duot las Khristu Yesu dvdain dvlom duot nyeis gvng mas yang xauh yoeus das dangthoengh yah sen dah kang cho taiq hoeuh das nyhenshang nhang zis xauh soeu ngos Paulo gas, Ngos jyetdap, ngah lo Timothi lyis dang tying kat.
55001002	Uwus Mangso yahge yah Yhensain Khristu Yesu gas nvng lyis jyehjuh, nhaiqnyen zis yahge nyenstap cho dyei bas jungh.
55001003	Ngah phauh thyeih moq kuot teh, lhoqshang ehnyet yah ngos phuqsoe nyeis dah Mangso lhyi chungh. Ngos nyeih nyenh shvmanh dung yvmas namoq lyis malyen soh nyeis zis yah Mangso lhyi jyehjuh chungh nyeis.
55001004	Ngos nah nyoqdyeis lyis soh dyei las, ngos mas hau gauslaus cho dyingh los bas jungh ngos nvng yah svsoh xauhgoh mes nyeis.
55001005	Nvng gas nah vyos Loi metang nah ungwes Euni mas cangxeih bos joq, jyoeng dah lomsjingh ehnyet gas nvng mas zuk joq yvlyis ngos soh nyeis. Nvng mas eq hauh zis bos joq yvlyis ngos soh soh nghuot.
55001006	Housoeh yvmvyah ngos nvng lyis loq kih las muh dyei uhlyis Mangso jyank masyah nvng kham yoeus goeus dah jyehjuh lyis dwis nyeis nhang das xiklyis ngos nang lyis doms nhauh kat.
55001007	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka yang lyis seq gyuk dah dyos ma dyei. Hau Yhensain dah Dyos gvng mas yang lyis yomsoq bos, jyetdap, vsainnyang gungs lyis seq joeu dah ehnyet dvdyei toh.
55001008	Housoeh las yah Yhensain Yesu dah xiklyis kanghjyoeng kat cho mha eq, Khristu gvng mas thung lungh soeu ngah gvng mas eq vxoq nyeis. Mangso ka nvng lyis hauh nyhenshang yomdyei toh goeus zis yah dvyhangteh, hau gausyis dang gvng mas shanghsenh kham cho mha ngos yah dvgeh yaukyenh cho chomp kham nyeis goh.
55001009	Mangso ka, yang kuot goeus dah muhzoh dvja ja gvng mas ma nghuot, nyang nghamh toh cho yahge jyehjuh gvng mas yang lyis khyuot yoeus las nyah dius jens duot das xiklyis khi toh. Nyang gas mauthuq nyeis ma zvn shih lyis yah Khristu Yesu gvng mas hauh jyehjuh yang lyis dyei toh.
55001010	Nghuot laus eq gvshih gas yah khyuot yoeus Yhensain Khristu jweh los shishenh lyis hauh cho yang lyis chixoeuq kat. Nyang gas shei cho dah yomsoq lyis yoeus tyamp las hau gausyis dang khyvlyis yah ma seq shei dah kang dwis cho lhyi Chixoeuq kat.
55001011	Gausyis dang taiq kyoh das nyhenshang Mangso ka ngos lyis lvgyo dvyuk khyvlyis eq, jyauh soeu khyvlyis eq toeuq toh.
55001012	Hauh cho gvng mas ngos haih shanghsenh zis kham nyeis. Nghuot laus eq ngos mas nghamhnywe cho dyingh dyingh bos joq: khasoeh ge lyis, ngos hank lyis khau nges nyeis yvlyis ngos seq zis yahge ngos lyis loms las ngah loq mas kyauh toh goeus dah vyhang lhyi hauh soetuon buisnyeis jweh shoq yoh tsomh toh dah yomsoq nyang mas bos oen zis ngos soh soh nghuot.
55001013	Ngos nvng lyis jyauh dah jyoeng dang lyis nvng chank kuot das yikhyoh toh las goeng goeng zwi zains toh zis yah yang Khristu Yesu yah dvdain dvlom duot las kang dwis cho yah sen dah lomsjingh cho yahge jyetdap ehnyet mas goeng joq nhang aq.
55001014	Nvng lyis loms las kyauh toh, gis dah vyhang lhyi, yah jyank mas bos joq Gyingshang Dyos dah yomsoq yah tsomh toh aq.
55001015	Asia mauxom mas bang dvnganhmoq ngos lyis tsain doeuh tyamp goeus zis nvng seq. nyamoq mas Phigelu yahge Hermogene tsain bos.
55001016	Yhensain ka Onesiphoru yhenbang lyis nhaiqnyen bas jungh: khasoeh ge lyis nyang ngos lyis nyoshoq lhain nhaiqtaink thoq lyis magoh, nyang ngos thung lungh cho yah sen lha ma xoq soeu nghuot.
55001017	Nyang gas Roma wus mas jweh yah dvyih ngos lyis nyvng shoq lyih xo xauhgoh.
55001018	Yhensain ka nyang lyis hauh soetuon buisnyeis lyis nhaiqnyen cho dyei bas jungh. Ephesu wus mas eq nyang ngos lyis kha iq daih goeus zis gas nvng vlhomuh seq.
55002001	Ngah lo eh, yah Khristu Yesu yah dvdain dvlom duot las kang dwis gvng mas xauh yoeus dah jyehjuh mas yombos nyeis aq.
55002002	Kanghjyoeng nyoshoq dah xikkhonh mas nvng ngah jyank masyah xuq, xauhgyo yoeus dah dang lyis yoeus las gohyuk lyis yoh doms jyauh das oen nvng yoh loms bang lyis cheh kyauh toh aq.
55002003	Khristu Yesu dah lomluk jeslo gis teh nvng kham yoeus vvng dah shanghsenh lyis kham yoeus aq.
55002004	Jesmuh wons nyeis dah jeslo dvyuk gas nyah thoq mas dah zau lyis nhaiqdoeus nhang shoq kuot mes yvmvyah jesphung yah ma sen dah dius jens cho mha ma bos nhunk.
55002005	Wuih khyank goh pwe mha wvng khyank goh soeu ka chank chah lyi vgus ma khyank goh lyis gas jyungshuk yoh das zis ma nghuot.
55002006	Danh muh, yos muh khank soeu ka, xauh yhomh yoeus dah guk nyau shih nyau cangxeih dah gvm boms xauh yoeus vvng.
55002007	Ngos taiq nyeis cho lhyi nghamh yoeuh aq: khasoeh ge lyis Yhensain ka hauh cho dvnganh nvng lyis seqgyo nhang das.
55002008	Ngos taiq kyoh dah gausyis dang mas bos zis yah dvyhangteh, shei masyah dwis toq los Dawi vnyau vshih nghuot dah Yhensain Yesu Khristu lyis soh nyeis aq.
55002009	Khasoeh ge lyis ngos gas Gausyis dang taiq kyoh gvng mas shanghsenh zis xauh. Ma shop dah thung dius dvyuk lyis teh shamjvng yah yangh twih zis xauh goeus. Nghuot laus eq Mangso dang gas ma twih toh.
55002010	Housoeh yvmvyah, ngos gas Mangso khyen yoeus zis xauh bang nyhenshang shanghsenh zis kham nyeis. Housoeh kham cho ka nyamoq eq Khristu Yesu gvng mas khyuot yoeus dah jyehjuh yah dvgeh, vcaiq vto phunk xauh yoeus das nyhenshang nghuot.
55002011	Haih zis gas jyoeng dang nghuot. Yang nyang yah dvgeh shei lhyi ka, nyang yah dvgeh eq yoh tsain dwis das.
55002012	Yang tsoq las kham nyeis lyis gas, nyang yah dvgeh eq xauh guon nyeis das. Yang nyang lyis ngoek tyamp lyis gas nyang eq yang lyis ngoek tyamp das.
55002013	Yang lom ma luk laus eq, nyang gas wontang: khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas nyang gungs lyis nyang yoh hwah ngoek tyamp zis ma nghuot.
55002014	Nah dius jens lyis haih cho taiq kyingh nyeis aq. Dang khonh jens dah vjyuk yah sen lha taiq phyen-goh las zan goh cho ma bos das xiklyis nyamoq lyis Mangso xikkhonh mas than than zaih nhang aq. Housoeh phyen-goh cho ka cha vkyuh ma bweh nhang thoq lyis, xauhgyo bang lyis lhoq thyoq cho dvbweh nhang.
55002015	Nvng gas nyah muh mas xoq chank cha ma bos dah muh wons soeu teh Mangso dah jyoeng dang lyis jus khyvlyis taiq kyoh, jyauh soeu khyvlyis eq Mangso xikkhonh mas nyoqnho yoh shoq nah Kank bos nyhoq yomkat nyeis aq.
55002016	Mangso yah we loh nhang dah vwot v-oeu yahge vkoh vpaq xamgoh dang lyis jhank aq.
55002017	Housoeh ge jyauh cho ka gungs lyis zo tomh loh dah mvnggvng dvm yah doeusgoh. Housoeh teh jyauh bang mas Himenu nhaiq tang Philetu bos.
55002018	Nyamoq gas hau jyoeng cho mhayah whang loh las, Yah dah dwis toq cho ka dye bweh goeus, ge taiq zis yah, dvyhamh bang dah lomsjingh cho lhyi lhoeu nhunk tyamp dyei.
55002019	Nghuot laus eq Mangso kuot toh, goeng dah vpom lhyi ka ma yoh nhont. Hauh vpom thoq mas, Yhensain ka nyah dius jens nghuot bang lyis seq, ge eq, Yhensain yah sen soeu nghuot ge taiq bang dvnganh gas lhung cho lhyi tsain jhank nyeis bas jungh, ge kyihau tap toh.
55002020	Yhenzains yoszains mas bvn khuq vja ja zis tsain joq; dvkhamh gas ngwis yah xing yah kuot toh; Dvyhamh gas saiq yahge tsoh yah kuot toh. Dvyhamh gas nyoqnho ngelang xiklyis yhaugyen uhlyis yhung lha, dvkhamh gas dius laiq nyeis dah joqyos mha tsain yhung.
55002021	Dius dvyuk yuk gas taiq loh goeus ma gis ma shop cho dvnganh masyah vsainnyang gungs lyis cheihshang lhyi ka, nyang gas Yhensain dah lhyenwhei nghamh toeuq toh cho mha yhung zis xauh kham yoeus das. Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas gis dah muh lyis kuot das zis cicont nghuot joq bas jungh Yhensain dah xiklyis vkyuh bos yvmas kyauh toh goeus soeu nghuot.
55002022	Loyvm dah o mes cho lhyi jhank las, Mangso lhyi Lhoq shang ehnyet yah pangh das cho sang bang yah dvgeh Dan cho, lomsjingh cho, jyetdap cho yahge nyenstap cho lhyi yomkat xo nyeis aq.
55002023	Nghuot laus eq koh las cha ma seq nyei gyo phyen-goh bang lyis jhank aq. Housoeh teh bang dah vthang ka dyoqgoh cho dvnghuot yvlyis nvng seq.
55002024	Yhensain dah jyeidwis gas dyoqgoh zis ma gis bos, dvnganhmoq lyis nhaiq seq nyen, gis cho yahge nhaiqlom xing xing seq jyauh dah jyauh soeu nghuot chah.
55002025	Vsainnyang lyis tyixo bang lyis soq dyei uhlyis noeuh nhamp zis yah kuot soeu nghuot chah: khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas ehnyet thaiq las hau jyoeng cho lhyi seqgyo los das toeuh Mangso nyamoq lyis dyei lyis dyei das.
55002026	Hauh uhlyis nyamoq gas jus khyvlyis doms nyvng soh los las Satan dah lhyik masyah yoh luiq los das. Hauh Satan gas nyamoq lyis nyhik las nyang o khyvlyis chank nhang ku goeus soeu nghuot.
55003001	Thang thank buisnyeis lyis loh yau thank shishenh jweh das zis lyis seq nyeis aq.
55003002	Dius jens gas vsainnyang vkyuh dvxo, nyoqnoq, moengs, khwank bang nghuot los das. Nyamoq gas laihwangh dang taiq bang, nyhiphoq domsyos ma gyo bang, jyehjuh ma seq soh bang, lomsnoq cho ma bos bang nghuot das.
55003003	Nyamoq gas nhaiq ma bos, nhaiq ma seq nyen, nyhap, thyoq zo bang yahge gyukphoh bweh bang nghuot das. Nyamoq gas gis cho lhyi hoeng bang,
55003004	gauh chuq thyoq, dang ma jings, ehnyet nyhang lha khwank bang nghuot las: Mangso lhyi jyetdap das thoq lyis vsainnyang dah pyo cho lhyi zes ngwis bang nghuot das.
55003005	Nyamoq gas ngamoq dah lomsnoq cho dah thoqlosbaus lyis chank kuot laus eq hauh yomsoq gyingh lyis gas ngoek tyamp bang nghuot. Housoeh teh bang lyis eq jhank aq.
55003006	Nyamoq mas dvyhamh gas, dius jens dah yhen mha gauh wvng zis yah, seq cho nain las yomnhuk dah vmesbih jens lyis nyamoq loq mas wvng shoq tsain kuot. Hauh vmesbih jens gas vsainnyang shuot dah yaunos gvng mas ehnyet nyung daus las nhaiqlom ma tap zis yah nyetnau cho vja ja mas nhaiq wvng tyamp las,
55003007	jyauh yvlyis kham yoeus das zis vjangh o mes zis yah yomkat laus eq nyamoq hau jyoeng cho lhyi seq das yvmas khanhamp eq ma yoh jweh.
55003008	Yanne yahge Yambre gas Moshe lhyi tomp gos toh teh, hauh bang eq jyoeng cho lhyi tsain tomp gos toh. Hauh dius jens gas nyamoq dah ehnyet nghamh suon yoeuh ge zis ma bos lo las lomsjingh cho mha dyoqbis somh loh.
55003009	Nghuot laus eq nyamoq dah ung cho ka hounyhoq masyah jes las nyangh shoq yoh kham das zis ma nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis hau aiq yuk mas cha bweh los cho dede thuq los teh, haih dius jens kha iq koh cho eq, dius jens xikkhonh mas dede thuq los das.
55003010	Nghuot laus eq nvng gas ngah jyauh cho, ngah wotwu yahge, ngah kang dwis cho mha ngos nghamh toh cho lhyi chank nyeis, ngah lomsjingh cho, ngos ehnyet xing cho, ngah jyetdap cho, jhen cho,
55003011	Ngos shoeuhshih zis xauh cho, khamzo cho; Antiok, Ikoni yahge Listra wus mas gyuk Phoh shoeuhshih cho xauh las ngos zain khoq yvlyis nvng seq. Housoeh xauh laus eq Yhensain ka ngos lyis hau dvnganh masyah khyuot yoeus.
55003012	Jyoengh, Khristu Yesu mas kang dwis las gywes so lhyi phauh nyang khyvlyis kang dwis mes soeu hank eq shoeuhshih zis xauh das.
55003013	Ma shop bang yahge vguons kuot bang, mhuih zo bang gas mhuih zo zis doms xauh las ma shop cho mha ma gis mhayah ma gis thank yvmas zes xunghxent loh das.
55003014	Nghuot laus eq nvng gas nvng xauh xuq las goeng goeng lomsjingh nyeis goeus, hau jyoeng cho mha tsoq las chank nyeis aq. Nvng gas nvng lyis jyauh bang hank nghuot yvlyis tsain soh nyeis.
55003015	Nvng lyis loshang yoq lyis yah joeui dyei las Khristu Yesu lyis lomsjingh gvng mas khyuot yoeus cho xauh yoeus das nyhenshang cho shwih she los dah gyingshang lhaihtoh dang vlhomuh seq soeu nghuot yvlyis eq soh nyeis aq.
55003016	Jyomp maussauh dvnganh lyis Mangso soq kat toh dyei yvmvyah jyoeng cho jyauh das, shuot cho lhyi yobos tuonh shet las kyink, shuot cho lhyi soq dan das zis yahge, jus dah kang dwis cho nyhenshang taiq shet dyei das xiklyis vkyuh bos.
55003017	Housoeh, Mangso dah muh wons wuq soeu ka gis dah muhzoh khanghmuh kuot das xiklyis kank bos cho yah tyink dyei las chi chah dah kyonhkhyi yah dyingh nhang nyeis.
55004001	Mangso xikkhonh mas eq, dwis nyeis bang yahge shei bang lyis soetuon das soeu Khristu Yesu xikkhonh mas eq, Yhensain ka guon das nyhenshang Hwankti khyvlyis jweh los das las ngos nvng lyis tungh kuot nhang zis gas,
55004002	Dang lyis taiq kyoh das xiklyis, seqgyo nhang das xiklyis, yobos tuonh shet las nyho das xiklyis, yomdyei das xiklyis, ehnyet xing xing toh las jyauh das xiklyis yoq doeus laus eq ma doeus laus eq yomkat nyeis aq oen, ngos nvng lyis kywih kat.
55004003	Dius jens gas, jyoeng lha chah zis ma bos dah jyauh cho lhyi ma gyo, nyamoq o yvpheh chank loh zis yah nyamoq ehnyet mas gvjywih yo shoq gyo yoeus mes dah cho lhyi jyauh das bang nyamoq xiklyis zes zes nyoshoq xo tsainh shishenh jweh los das.
55004004	Nyamoq gas hau jyoeng cho gyo mhayah phanh las dius dah mvnyei dang gyo das zis nhaiq wvng loh das.
55004005	Nvng gas chah cho bweh los laus eq nah gungs lyis joeu zis yah shanghsenh cho lhyi zain aq. Hau gausyis dang lyis taiq kyoh muh lyis wons wuq las, Mangso dah jyeidwis dvyuk khyvlyis nah yvwons s bos ya bos yvlyis wons wuq nyeis aq.
55004006	Ngah xiklyis gas ngah kang lhyi phudyei das shishenh jweh los nyeis. Gvshih nyang ngah xiklyis nyeisjvng thoq kang lhyi toh tyamp das shishenh jweh los nyeis.
55004007	Ngos gas wuih khyank goh cho mha kank bos nyhoq wuih goeus; khyank goh cho thank shoq wuih jweh goeus. Lomsjingh yvmas goeng goeng yap goeus.
55004008	Gvshih masyah dan dah soetuon soeu ge, Yhensain ka Soetuon buisnyeis lyis ngos lyis dyei das, dan dah kang dwis cho yah sen dah ung cho buismuk lyis ngah xiklyis toh toh. Ngos lyis kyingh ma nghuot, nyang doms jweh das buisnyeis lyis nhaiqdoeus zis yah langh nyeis bang dvnganhmoq lyis eq kyauh das.
55004009	Nvng ngah jyank mas lvnyap jweh das xiklyis mangh aq.
55004010	Dema gas haih mungkvn lyis ngwis yvmvyah ngos lyis toh tyamp khoq las Thesaloni wus pheh loh goeus. Kareka gas Galati mau pheh, Titu gas Dalamati mau pheh tsain loh goeus.
55004011	Luka kyingh ngos yah dvgeh nyeis. Makho lyis khi yoeus las nvng yah dvgeh shwih los aq. Khasoeh ge lyis haih muh mas nyang ngos lyis yoh pangh das.
55004012	Tichiku lyis gas ngos Ephesu wus pheh nhang kat.
55004013	Nvng los lyis Troa wus Karpu jyank mas ngos toh khoq dah ngah shanhzoe eq, maussauh eq, zes las shohyeis maussauh tsain yoeus los aq.
55004014	Hauh thunk bat soeu Alesanda gas ngos lyis ma gis zis nyoshoq kuot goeus. Nyang kuot zis yah dvyhangteh Yhensain ka nyang lyis phauh shangh das.
55004015	Nvng nyang lyis zaih las jhank aq: khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas yang taiq kyoh dah dang lyis than than kyoq tomp toh soeu nghuot.
55004016	Ngos lyis cangxeih vlhain zau kauq las ngos ngah gungs lyis ngos taiq gos uhlyis ngah shot pheh hank eq ma bos taiq toenk dyei. Dius dvnganh gas ngos lyis tyamp khoq: Mangso ka nyamoq housoeh kuot gvng mas yobos ma dyei bas jungh.
55004017	Nghuot laus eq Yhensain ka ngos yah nyeis las ngos lyis yomdyei yvmvyah ngos gas gohnyau bang dvnganh xauhgyo shoq hau gausyis dang lyis vlhomuh yoh taiq kyoh bas jungh: sat das dang thang thyet masyah lhuiq kat zis xauh goeus.
55004018	Yhensain ka ngos lyis ma gis cho dvnganh masyah khyuot kat las, nyah maukhung munghdan jweh shoq sam cho dyei zis yah shwih loh das. Nyang mas vcaiq vto phunk bos joq bas jungh. Amen.
55004019	Priska vzomh Akula yahge Onesiphoru dah yhenbang lyis jeshuh kat.
55004020	Erastu gas Korinthu wus mas gyoh nyeis khoq. Trophimu gas nos las, ngos nyang lyis Miletu wus mas nyhei toh khoq.
55004021	Cungh ma thuq shih lyis yoh jweh shoq mangh aq. Eubulu, Puden, Linu, Klaudia yahge gohtoeu Khristan boekyis dvnganhmoq nvng lyis tsain jeshuh kat.
55004022	Yhensain ka nah dyos yah dvgeh nghuot bas jungh. Mangso dah jyehjuh gas namoq mas joq bas jungh.
56001001	Mangso dah jyeidwis yahge Yesu Khristu dah lvgyo ngos Paulo maussauh lhaih kat. Mangso ka nyang khyen yoeus toh bang dah lomsjingh cho lhyi pangh toqh kat das zis yahge yah loms noq cho jyauh dah jyoeng cho lhyi yoh nyvng yoh seq shoq cho shwih she das nyhenshang ngos lyis khyen lha nhang kat.
56001002	Hauh lomsnoq cho ka vcaiq vto kang lhyi nghamhloms cho mha vpom kuot toh. Hwah cho ma bos dah Mangso ka gohlhain yah yang lyis vcaiq vto kang dyei das xiklyis dangthoengh dyei toh goeus.
56001003	Housoeh hauh shishenh jweh lyis hau vcaiq vto kang lhyi nyah dang mas chixoeuq kat. Hauh dang ngos lyis kyauh goeus las, yah khyuot yoeus Yhensain taiq toh zis yah dvyhangteh hauh yvlyis ngos taiq kyoh.
56001004	Yhensain Yesu lyis yang yah dvyhangteh lomsjingh cho mha dvgeh nghuot dah ngah lo gyingh Titu jyank mas ngos haih maussauh lhaih kat. Uwus Mangso yahge yah khyuot yoeus Yhensain Yesu Khristu gas nvng lyis jyehjuh yahge nyenstap cho dyei bas jungh.
56001005	Kreti goeujo mas kuot chah shih cho dvnganh lyis top jus shoq chank yoeuh chank chomp das zis yahge wus khanghmuh mas phung lhyi yoeuh dah yvwons s yoeus das logis jens toeuq kat toh das xiklyis ngos nvng lyis nyhei khoq. Ngos nvng lyis taiq shet goeus dang lyis comh aq.
56001006	Hauh phung logis gas yobos huon chank ma bos soeu, yhensain nyhiq dvyuk dvyoh soeu nghuot chah. Nyah lo jens gas lomsjingh bang nghuot chah. Ye dah wotwu yahge domsyos ma gyo cho nyings hoeuh dah lo jens yoh soeu ma gis nghuot.
56001007	Khasoeh ge lyis phung uhshe soeu ka Mangso dah muh lyis yvwons yoeus las wons wuq soeu nghuot las, yobos huon chank ma bos soeu nghuot gis. Nyang gas lhoq lhoq teh kuot soeu, phyiqkhyi chung soeu, yhei pauhzoe, dius bat, ngwis nyoqnoq soeu ma gis nghuot.
56001008	Nyang gas boengh mes daih, gis cho lhyi ngwis, vsainnyang gungs lyis seq joeu soeu, wot wons, dan, gyingshang, lyi chank soeu nghuot chah.
56001009	Nyang gas phung dah jyauh cho yahge xamxonh las loms gis dah Dang lyis wontang zwi zains toh soeu nghuot chah. Housoeh lyis nyang gas hau jyoeng dah jyauh cho yah dius jens lyis yomdyei ehnyet lyis yoh lang yoeus das zis yahge Dang lyis tyixo tomp gos bang dah shuot cho lhyi yoh tuonh shet das.
56001010	Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq dah vjyuk ma bos dang yah phanh lo se kuot zis yah gohtoeu dah dius jens lyis mhuih jyomh bang nyoshoq bos, zes las Yuda lomsnoq cho mhayah thaiq wvng los bang mas bos.
56001011	Nyamoq dang taiq dah nhuot cauq toh dyei chah goeus: khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas ma gis jyauh cho lhyi jyauh las yhen gonh gonh tsain lhoq pi tyamp. Hau dvnganh gas nyamoq dah ngwis yoh das cho yah sen, vxoq vcaiq nghamh toeuq cho xiklyis nghuot.
56001012	Nyamoq mas nyamoq dah vnyau lvpe nghuot dah Kreti dius dvyuk taiq zis gas, Kreti dius jens vjangh hwah, Lhung dah yewus, lan dah womlvm bang nghuot, ge.
56001013	Hauh kanghjyoeng dang gas jus yvmvyah nyamoq gas Mangso lhyi jyoengh lomsjingh las lhom yoeus das nyhenshang eq,
56001014	Yuda jens dah mvnyei yahge jyoeng cho lhyi ngoek dah dius jens masyah thuq los dah tyingtoh dang lyis zwi zains toh bang ma nghuot lo das xiklyis eq nvng nyamoq lyis than than yoh nyho jyauh das.
56001015	Vsainnyang shangkyei nyeis goeus bang xiklyis dvnganh zis shangkyei; nghuot laus eq vsainnyang ma shangkyei lha Yhensain Yesu lyis ma lomsjingh bang xiklyis gas cha eq ma shangkyei. Khasoeh ge lyis Nyamoq dah nghamh cho yahge sohseq ehnyet gas vwot v-oeu nghuot.
56001016	Nyamoq Mangso lhyi seq, ge taiq laus eq nyamoq wotwu yah nyang lyis tsain ngoek tyamp. Nyamoq gas hoeng phoh bang, gis dah muh dvja ja kuot das zis yah ma huq bang yahge domsyos ma gyo bang nghuot.
56002001	Nghuot laus eq nvng gas jyoeng dah jyauh dang yah phi cho lhyi taiq kyoh las yoh jyauh nyeis das.
56002002	Lokhoq phauh jens lyis yhei ma yet, jyoeng zaih zis yah vsainnyang gungs lyis joeu das xiklyis jyauh aq. Nyamoq gas jyoeng dah lomsjingh cho, jyetdap ehnyet yah jhen ehnyet bos bas jungh.
56002003	Houyah dvyhangteh lokhoq nyih jens eq lomsjingh las gywes so lhyi phauh nyang bang kang dwis teh wotwu gis Chixoeuq las, khyangh ma pu, yhei dah jons ma duot, gis cho seq jyauh bang bweh bas jungh taiq shet aq.
56002004	Housoeh Mangso dah Dang gas loeusmus soq zo zis ma xauh bas jungh, lokhoq nyih jens eq nyamoq thoq lyis ngis dah nyhiq yvm jens lyis, vsainnyang dah yhensain phoq yahge lo jens lyis jyetdap,
56002005	vsainnyang gungs lyis joeu zis yah shangkyei lha gis dah yhen wons vmesbih duot las, vsainnyang yhensain phoq shwih khyvlyis chank bang yoh bweh das nyhenshang xuq nhang aq.
56002006	Houyah dvyhangteh, loyvm jens eq nyang gungs nyang joeu nyeis bas jungh, taiq kyingh yomdyei nyeis aq.
56002007	Dvnganh lyis nvnyang gis dah muhzoh yikhyoh Chixoeuq nyeis aq. Jyauh cho mha ehnyet dan zis yah yhaugyen zainsmuh khyvlyis kuot nyeis aq.
56002008	Nah jeswus jens gas yang lyis chah cho mha laus eq yobos ma yoh xo nyvng las xoqphuh bas jungh, nvng gas gohyuk dah yobos huon zis ma xauh shoq jyoeng dah dang yah taiq kyingh las jyauh nyeis aq.
56002009	Jons jens gas nyamoq dah yhensain jens dah o mha gyoh nyeis las cho khvt khanghmuh mas nyamoq lyis nhaiqdoeus nhang lha ma phuk toeuh bas jungh;
56002010	khauh cho ma kuot bas jungh, housoeh kuot das gungsthaiq, nyamoq gas khanhamp eq wontang dang jings bang nghuot cho yoh Chixoeuq das. Haih neh yah nyamoq gas vsainnyang kuot cho dvnganh mas, yah khyuot yoeus Soeu Mangso dah jyauh cho vsoenk lyis yoh tsain Chixoeuq das.
56002011	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka dius nyau dvnganh lyis khyuot yoeus das xiklyis nyah jyehjuh lyis chi thuq xoeuq goeus.
56002012	Yang gas yah dah kuhxing Mangso ge, khyuot yoeus dah Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah phunk thuq los das ngelhoq buisnyeis lyis langh uhjyangh gywes ma tsungh ehnyet yahge mungkvn lyis nyetnau ehnyet doeuh tyamp das xiklyis eq,
56002013	wotwons zis yah vshih shih das cho, dan las gywes tsungh dah kang dwis cho yah haih mungkvn mas nyeis dyos das xiklyis eq, hau jyehjuh lyi gas yang lyis jyauh nyeis.
56002014	Yang lyis lyi lhyweq las ma gis ma shop dah yaunos masyah khyuot yoeus das xiklyis eq, yang gas ehnyet gyingshang lha nyang yah kyingh sen dah vnyau duot zis yah gis dah muh kuot das zis, nhaiq kank wvng dah vnyau duot das xiklyis eq, Khristu gas yah xiklyis nyah gungs dyei tyamp.
56002015	Nvng haih cho lhyi taiq kyoh las jyauh nyeis aq. Nvng yomdyei taiq kyingh las jyauh uhlyis nvng yoh dah toeuh bos ya bos zis yah taiq aq. Nvng lyis hank eq ma phauh ma danh dius ngis vyoeuh khyoq nhang.
56003001	Munghdan lyis guon bang yahge toeuh bos bang dah o mha gyoh las domsyos gyo nyeis das nyhenshang eq, gis dah muhzoh khanghmuh lyis kuot das xiklyis cicont nghuot joq das nyhenshang eq, nah phung dius jens lyis taiq kyingh nyeis aq.
56003002	Hank lyis eq ma gis zis ma taiq, nyenstap khyvlyis dapgoh nyeis das zis yahge dvnganhmoq lyis vjangh noeuh nhamp ehnyet Chixoeuq nyeis bas jungh, nyamoq lyis taiq kyingh nyeis aq.
56003003	Khasoeh ge lyis yang eq gohlhain ka koh, domsyos ma gyo zis yah chowhang whang bang nghuot. Yang gas gungsshoh dah obos zis yahge pyo cho vja ja chank kuot las hauh jons duot ku. Yang mas vjangh yah hoeng lha noh cho bos, nyang changh nyang hoeng goh bang tsain nghuot.
56003004	Nghuot laus eq yah khyuot yoeus soeu Mangso dah nhaiqbos cho yahge jyetdap cho thuq los uhlyis,
56003005	Yang gas khyuot yoeus zis xauh goeus. Hauh zis gas yvnyang kuot dah gis muhzoh gvng mas ma nghuot, nyah nhaiqnyen jyehjuh gvng mas dvnghuot. Hauh jyehjuh gas Gyingshang Dyos masyah jeis yah doms khoeu lha kang saiq xauh yoeus cho nghuot.
56003006	Yah khyuot yoeus soeu Yesu Khristu gvng mas Mangso ka yah thoq mas Gyingshang Dyos magons magoh huot khyoq dyei.
56003007	Heisoeh kuot cho ka, yang gas nyah jyehjuh yah Mangso nhaiqdoeus cho kham yoeus las yang nghamhloms nyeis, vcaiq vto kang xauh sain yoeus das xiklyis nghuot.
56003008	Haih dang gas wontang. Mangso lhyi lomsjingh bang gas dius yuk khanghmuh xiklyis gis las vkyuh bos muhzoh thoq mas taiq goeus dah cho jens lyis nhaiq wvng zis yah shishenh dyei las kuot nyeis bas jungh.
56003009	Nghuot laus eq vkyuh ma bos vkoh vpaq nyei, taiq phyen-goh dah nyeidang, xing dah sungson phant cho, lyi yah sen lha dyoqgoh cho lhyi jhank aq: khasoeh ge lyis hauh goeu gas vkyuh ma bos, vkom dvnghuot.
56003010	I loh gang lvn loh cho bweh nhang soeu lhyi dvlhain aiq lhain taiq kyingh zaih nhang thang lhyi ka nyang tsoq goh cho gohtoeu cha vkuot lo.
56003011	Housoeh teh soeu ka, dyoqbis loh las nyah yaunos gas nyang yobos yoh soeu nghuot yvlyis kanghjyoeng chixoeuq las nyang dang thang thyetzo nyeis yvlyis nvng seq.
56003012	Ngos nah jyank mas Artema yahge Tichiku dvyuk yuk nhang kat lyis, Nikopoli wus mas ngos lyis los zes langh das zis yoh yomkat nyhoq yomkat aq: khasoeh ge lyis hauh wus mas cungh nyeis ku das oen nghamh thyet toh.
56003013	Lyi dat Zena yahge Apolo lyis nyah aiq yuk dah gyung yoh suh das xiklyis chokhoq ma luk ma duons ma mus bas jungh, nyah aiq yuk lyis luk luk pangh kat aq.
56003014	Zo das, wuot das, nyeis yap das cho xiklyis jyoengh chah nyeis bang lyis yoh dyei shoq yah dius jens gis dah kang khoeu muh kuot yvmas nyamoq dah shishenh lyis seq yhung bas jungh oen zis yahge nyamoq gas vkyuh ma bos dah kang dwis cho ma kuot bas jungh jyauh aq.
56003015	Ngos yah dvgeh nyeis bang dvnganhmoq gas nvng lyis jeshuh kat. Lomsjingh cho mha ngamoq lyis jyetdap bang lyis bos jeshuh dyei aq. Jyehjuh gas namoq dvnganhmoq yah dvgeh joq bas jungh. Amen.
57001001	Khristu Yesu dah muh wons gvng mas thung lungh nyeis soeu ngos Paulo yahge yah vmang vnoeuh Timothi gas, Ngah aiq yuk dah jyetdap buisnoms yahge muh bos thuk nyeis Philemon jyank mas eq,
57001002	ngah aiq yuk dah nhamhmuh Aphia jyank mas eq, ngah aiq yuk dah jes loeuzomh Arkhipu jyank mas eq, nah yhen mha zop huom dah Khristan vmang vnoeuh moq jyank mas eq maussauh lhaih kat.
57001003	Yah Uwus Mangso yahge Yhensain Yesu Khristu jyank masyah jyehjuh yahge nyenstap zis gas namoq yah dvgeh nghuot bas jungh.
57001004	Ngos shvmanh dung khanghmuh nah cho taiq las ngah Mangso lhyi jyehjuh chungh.
57001005	Khasoeh ge lyis nvng gas Mangso dah dius jens dvnganhmoq lyis jyetdap nyeis zis yahge Khristu Yesu lyis lomsjingh nyeis cho ngos xauhgyo.
57001006	Lomsjingh dah Khristan tsain nghuot dah nvng yahge ngamoq gas Khristu mas dvdain dvlom bweh las kang dwis gvng mas yang xauh kham dah shvmanh jyehjuh dvnganh lyis zes noq khyvlyis seqgyo das xiklyis ngos shvmanh dung.
57001007	Vmang vnoeuh eh, nah jyetdap ehnyet gvng mas ngos svsoh gausyis zis yah yom yoh. Nvng gas Mangso dah gyingshang bang dvnganhmoq dah ehnyet lyis yoh lhoq pyo dyei.
57001008	Haih cho gvng mas ngos gas Khristan vmang vnoeuh nyang changh khyvlyis nvng kuot vvng dah muh lyis kuot das nyhenshang taiq das toeuh ngos yoh.
57001009	Nghuot laus eq Khristu dah lvgyo, lokhoq ngos Paulo nghuot joq zis yahge, gvshih Khristu xiklyis thung lungh soeu nghuot joq yvmvyah, jyetdap khyvlyis nvng lyis shangphu kat das zis ngos zes o.
57001010	Khristu mas ngah lo gyingh bweh los, ngah lo Onesimu xiklyis ngos nvng lyis shangphu kat. Khasoeh ge lyis ngos thung lungh nyeis lyis ngos gas nyah dyos cho mha ngos uwus duot los goeus.
57001011	Nyang gas xikpheh nah xiklyis vkyuh ma bos laus eq, gvshih gas nah xiklyis eq, ngah xiklyis eq vkyuh bos joq.
57001012	Gvshih ngos nyang lyis nah jyank mas doms nhang kat. Nyang yah dvgeh ngah ehnyet jweh bos joq.
57001013	Gausyis dang gvng mas thung lungh yvmas, nyang gas nah gungsthaiq ngos lyis phuqsoe das zis ngah jyank mas shwih nyeis mes.
57001014	Nghuot laus eq nah xamxonh cho ma yoh zis tsoengh kuot khyvlyis ngos cha eq ma mes kuot. Nvng bauh khyvlyis dvnghuot bas jungh. Housoeh las nvng ma xihhonh zis cha lhyi eq ngos ma kuot das.
57001015	Onesimu gas nvng yah vjangh dvgeh doms xauh nyeis das xiklyis nyang nvng yah dvsoq gang zis nghuot mvbeh.
57001016	Gvshih nyang gas jons kyingh ma nghuot lo, jons vsoenk masyah zes dah jyetdap Khristan vmang vnoeuh dvyuk bweh los goeus. Nyang gas ngah xiklyis kha iq phauhdap soeu bweh las nah jons dvyuk khyvlyis eq, Khristu mas vmang vnoeuh dvyuk khyvlyis eq kha iq zes phauhdap soeu bweh los das lah!
57001017	Housoeh yvmvyah nvng ngos lyis loeuzomh teh mus lyis gas, ngos lyis teh nyang lyis lhom yoeus aq.
57001018	Nyang nvng lyis dvja ja cu lhyi eq, jyen bos laus eq, hauh zis gas ngah jyen khyvlyis toh aq.
57001019	Ngos Paulo ka hauh jyen cap das oen, ngvnyang loq yah nyang lhaih kat. Nghuot laus eq nvnyang yangh Khristu mas nah kang dwis cho vsaiq nyhenshang ngos lyis jyen cap chah oen ma taiq kyingh noh das oen loms.
57001020	Housoeh las ngah vmang vnoeuh eh, hauh Yhensain dah nyoqnho lhyi yoeuh las hai ngos shangphu cho lhyi jenh kuot dyei aq. Khristu mas vmang vnoeuh nyang changh khyvlyis ngah ehnyet lyis lhoq pyo dyei aq.
57001021	Nvng gas ngos dung zis yah dvyhangteh kuot dyei das oen nghamhnywe zis yah haih maussauh lhaih kat. Jyoengh nyang ngos taiq thoq lyis zes las kuot dyei das yvlyis ngos seq.
57001022	Hauh thoq lyis, ngah xiklyis yhet yvp sont toh aq; khasoeh ge lyis, Mangso ka namoq dah shvmanh dung dang lyis gyo dyei das las namoq jyank mas doms jweh los nhang das oen ngos nghamhloms nyeis.
57001023	Khristu Yesu cho taiq kyoh yvmvyah ngah thung lungh changh Epaphra ka nvng lyis jeshuh kat.
57001024	Houyah dvyhangteh ngah muhzwi changh Makho, Aristaku, Dema yahge Luka moq eq nvng lyis jeshuh kat.
57001025	Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah jyehjuh gas namoq dvnganhmoq yah dvgeh nghuot bas jungh.
58001001	Gohlhain caiq lyis Mangso ka yah phauh thyeih moq lyis dang taiq cho nyoshoq lhain, neh vja ja khyvlyis yah lvpe jens dah nhuot yah taiq kyoh lai los goeus.
58001002	Nghuot laus eq hai thang thank dah buisnyeis lyis gas nyah Lo dah nhuot masyah yang lyis nyah dang dyei goeus. Hau Lo yah dwis ya dwis yvlyis gvnkhanh toh goeus zis yahge thang thank lyis mungkvn gonh lyis guon das soeu duot das nyhenshang Nyang lyis khyen toeuq toh goeus.
58001003	Nyang gas Mangso dah phunk duk bvng yvlyis Chixoeuq las Mangso nyang dah gungs khyank tsungh zis yah mungkvn buislom lhamhmuh joq ya joq zis dvnganh lyis nyah yomsoq bos dah Dang yah gomh toh. Nyang gas cangsoeu dius dah yaunos lyis yobos khyuot cheihshang cho dye kuot thang lhyi maukhung mha zauguon yomsoq bos Mangso dah loqyos shot pheh tsung toh.
58001004	Mangso nyang lyis dyei dah nyings gas loeuswons bang dah nyings thoq lyis zes kuh las lo lyis loeuswons bang thoq lyis zes phauhdap soeu kuot goeus.
58001005	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka, Nvng ngah Lo nghuot, Khvnyhik ngos nvng lyis ngah gungs masyah yaus kat, ge eq, Ngos gas nyah Uwus duot las, Nyang eq ngah Lo duot das, ge eq khah loeuswons soeu lhyi eq Mangso khanhamp eq ma taiq ku.
58001006	Nghuot laus eq Mangso ka nyah Lo xeih lyis mungkvn mas nhang kat das sont uhlyis, Nyang gas, Mangso dah loeuswons bang dvnganh nyang lyis paiq bas jungh, ge taiq kat.
58001007	Mangso ka loeuswons bang dah cho taiq uhlyis, Mangso ka nyah loeuswons bang lyis lyeis kuot las, Nyah jyeidwis jens lyis nyilhyam kuot, ge.
58001008	Tsai hau Lo dah cho taiq uhlyis, Mangso ka, Mangso eh, nah munghdan vcaiq vto joq das! Nvng gas nah dius nyau jens lyis lyi jus khyvlyis guon.
58001009	Nvng gas dan cho lhyi jyet las shuot cho lhyi hoeng. Housoeh yvmvyah Mangso ge dah nah Mangso ka, nvng lyis khyen yoeus las nah dyenschangh lyis dyei thoq lyis zes kuh dah gausyis nyoqnho ngelang dyei las chunghtoq, ge.
58001010	Tsai, nyang gas, Yhensain eh, cangxeih uhlyis nvng nyeisjvng vpom xi toh las, Maukhung lhyi nah loq yah kuot toh.
58001011	Hauh zis gas tsain dyuk loh das laus eq nvng gas goeng joq das. Hau dvnganh gas dyimis teh tsain tyang tyamp das.
58001012	Nvng gas hauh vyhang lhyi thoq dyi lyis teh nap tyamp das las hauh zis gas dyimis teh thaiq tyamp zis tsain xauh das. Nghuot laus eq nvng gas vjangh vgus dvnghuot las, nah kang khanhamp eq ma thank das.
58001013	Mangso ka nvng lyis gomloeus toq bang lyis ngos nah nangte kuot shoq Ngah loqyos shot pheh tsung toh aq, oen khah loeuswons soeu lhyi eq khanhamp ma taiq ku.
58001014	Housoeh lyis loeuswons bang gas hank tsain nghuot lah? Nyamoq gas, khyuot yoeus dah vso vlho kham yoeus bang lyis pangh das nyhenshang Mangso yah nhang kat zis xauh bang, Mangso lhyi phuqsoe nyeis dah dyos tsain nghuot.
58002001	Housoeh yvmvyah yang chowhang ma whang loh bas jungh, yang xauhgyo goeus hau jyoeng cho lhyi goeng goeng zwi zains toh chah.
58002002	Loeuswons bang dah nhuot yah, yah phauh thyeih moq lyis taiq toh dang gas jyoeng dah lyi nghuot las, hauh lyi lyis ma chank bang gas vsainnyang yah mon yih dah joeng cho kham yoeus das cho jyoeng nghuot lyis gas,
58002003	hei iq kuhxing dah khyuot yoeus cho lhyi yang maphauh madanh kuot lyis gas yang joeng cho mhayah khasoeh yoh luiq das lah! Hauh khyuot yoeus cho lhyi cangxeih lyis Yhensain nyang taiq hoeuh las xauhgyo bang gas hauh lyi jyoeng cho kanghjyoeng chixoeuq goeus.
58002004	Hauh thoq lyis Mangso ka nyah yomsoq muh, mauh loqmuh vja ja kuot xoeuq khyvlyis yah eq, Gyingshang Dyos yah sen dah jyehjuh jyungshuk lyis nyang bauh zis yah dvyhangteh gvm dyei khyvlyis eq, nyamoq dah kanghjyoeng mha lung las chixoeuq nyeis.
58002005	Mangso ka gvshih yang taiq nyeis, jweh los das mungkvn vsaiq lyis loeuswons bang guon das khyvlyis toh zis ma nghuot.
58002006	Lhaihtoh dang dvdeh mas taiq zis gas, Mangso eh, cangsoeu dius gas khasoeh teh soeu nghuot las, Nvng nyang lyis soh nyeis lah? Dius laiq gas khasoeh teh soeu nghuot las Nvng nyang lyis gomh yoeuh nyeis lah?
58002007	Nvng nyang lyis dvsoq loeuswons bang o lhyi dvtsiq nyhen khyvlyis gvnkhanh toh las, nyang lyis phunk yahge nyoqnho ngelang tsungh dyei. Nyang lyis nvng kuot toh zis dvnganh thoq mas guon das toeuh dyei goeus. ge.
58002008	Jyomp maussauh mas, Mangso ka cangsoeu dius lyis gvnkhanh toh las dvnganh thoq mas guon das toeuh dyei ge zis gas, dwis ya dwis zis dvnganh lyis guon nhang ge mes zis nghuot. Nghuot laus eq cangsoeu dius jens vyhang dvnganh yvlyis guon nyeis zis gas yang ma nyvng shih.
58002009	Nghuot laus eq yang nyvng soeu ka Mangso dah jyehjuh gvng mas dvnganhmoq xiklyis yoh shei kham shoq shishenh dvtsiq gyo lyis loeuswons bang o mha nyhen nhang zis xauh dah Yesu Khristu nyang nghuot. Hauh Yhensain ka shei nos dah shanghsenh zis kham yoeus yvmvyah, gvshih phunk yahge nyoqnho ngelang buismuk tsungh dyei zis xauh nyeis yvlyis yang nyvng.
58002010	Dvnganh yvlyis gvnkhanh toh las yoeuh gomh nyeis dah Mangso ka lo jens nyoshoq lyis phunk yoh bos nhang das xiklyis shanghsenh kham khyvlyis yah Yesu lyis dyinghjet nhang. Heisoeh Mangso kuot cho ka gis cho nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq khyuot yoeus zis xauh das nyhenshang shwih los soeu ka Yesu nyang nghuot.
58002011	Nyang gas dius jens lyis nyamoq dah yaunos masyah cheihshang kat. Housoeh nyang yahge cheihshang kat zis xauh bang dvnganh gas Uwus dvyuk kyingh yoh las nyamoq lyis vmang vnoeuh oen lui das zis ma xoq.
58002012	Nyang Mangso lhyi taiq zis gas, Nvng kuot dah muh cho ngos ngah boekyis lyis taiq kyoh das, ngos nyamoq huom xikkhonh mas ngos nvng lyis chungh das, ge.
58002013	Tsai Yesu gas, Ngos Mangso lhyi loms das, ge las eq, ngos heimha Mangso ngos lyis dyei toh dah loshang jens yah nyeis, ge taiq.
58002014	Lo jens ge las nyang nyamoq lyis lui zis yah dvyhangteh, gungsshoh shomp mas wvng bang nghuot. Yesu nyah gungs eq nyamoq teh gungsshoh shomp mas wvng dah cangsoeu dius dvgeh xonh kham yoeus. Housoeh kham yoeus cho ka, nyah dah shei kham cho gvng mas shei cho lhyi guon dah Satan yomsoq lyis mhont tyamp das xiklyis nghuot.
58002015	Heisoeh khyvlyis yah shei cho lhyi gyuk yvmvyah dvcaiq gonh hauh jons duot nyeis bang lyis lhuiq kat.
58002016	Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas loeuswons bang lyis pangh das xiklyis lyih zis ma nghuot. Abraham dah vnyau vshih lyis pangh das xiklyis dvlyih.
58002017	Housoeh yvmvyah nyang gas dius jens dah yaunos lyis yoh khyuot tyamp dyei das nyhenshang nhaiq seq nyen las wontang dah phudyei zainsmuh duot khyvlyis yah Mangso dah muh yoh wons bas jungh, cho khvt khanghmuh mas nyah vmang vnoeuh jens xauh kham zo cho lhyi nyamoq yah dvgeh xonh kham zo goeus.
58002018	Gvshih nyang gas shiwu xauh zis yah nyah gungs nyang shanghsenh zis xauh ku yvmvyah shiwu zis xauh bang lyis yoh pangh.
58003001	Mangso khyen lui toh dah ngah Khristan boekyis eh, yang rhen, lomsjingh cho dah Phudyei Zainsmuh duot das xiklyis Mangso nhang kat dah Yesu lyis nghamh yoeuh geh.
58003002	Moshe ka Mangso yhen mha dah nyah muh mas lomluk teh, nyang gas haih muh kuot das nyhenshang nyang lyis khyen kat soeu Mangso lhyi lomluk.
58003003	Yhen tsuk soeu ka hauh yhen thoq lyis nyoqnho ngelang zes bos. Houyah dvyhangteh, Yesu eq Moshe thoq lyis zes dah phunk nyoqnho ngelang lyis chungh cho kham yoeus mon.
58003004	Yhen ge yvlyis dius dvyuk yuk yah tsuk toh. Dvnganh yvlyis kuot toh soeu ka Mangso dvnghuot.
58003005	Moshe ka Mangso dah yhen mha jyeidwis teh lomluk soeu nghuot las thang pheh Mangso taiq kyoh das cho lhyi taiq soeu nghuot.
58003006	Nghuot laus eq Khristu gas Mangso yhen lhyi guon dah Lo nghuot khyvlyis lomluk. Yang eq yang nghamhloms cho lhyi womh ehnyet yahge nghamhnywe zis yah thank shoq zwi zains toh lyis gas, yang nyah yhenbang tsain nghuot.
58003007	Housoeh yvmvyah Gyingshang Dyos taiq zis gas: Khvnyhik namoq Mangso dah thwe xauhgyo lyis gas,
58003008	Mangso lhyi gomloeus toq las mhanhdyvp mas nghuot shishenh lyis nyang lyis shiwu dah namoq phauh thyeih jens teh ehnyet vthan goh.
58003009	Mangso ka namoq dah phauh thyeih moq nyeici zvn top mhanhdyvp mas ngos kuot xoeuq dah muh lyis nyvng laus eq ngos lyis tyi lha shi yoeuh.
58003010	Housoeh yvmvyah ngos hauh dius jens lyis nhaiqyo las, Nyamoq khanhamp eq lom ma luk, Ngos taiq toh dang lyis chank kuot das zis tsain ngoek, oen taiq goeus.
58003011	Ngos nhaiqyo las nyamoq lyis maukhi zis gas, Ngos nyamoq lyis dyei das noyos mas khanhamp eq ma xauh wvng das, oen.
58003012	Boekyis eh, dwis nyeis Mangso mhayah, nungsdoms loh shoq ma shop, seq loms shuot ehnyet bos bang, namoq mas dvyuk eq ma bos bas jungh, zaih nyeis geh.
58003013	Nyamoq mas dvyuk eq yaunos yah mhuih jyomh zis xauh las ehnyet than bang ma bweh bweh, lhaihtoh dang mas taiq, Khvnyhik oen, yah xiklyis yoh taiq shih dah shishenh lyis nyeih khanghmuh nyang changh nyang pangh goh nyeis geh.
58003014	Khasoeh ge lyis Khristan vsaiq bweh los shishenh lyis teh nghamhnywe dah lomsjingh cho mha thang thank jweh shoq goeng goeng zwi zains toh lyis gas, yang dvnganh gas Khristu yah dvgeh muh chomp wons nyeis bang nghuot.
58003015	Lhaihtoh dang mas taiq zis gas, Khvnyhik namoq Mangso thwe xauhgyo lyis gas, Mangso lhyi namoq dah phauh thyeih moq gomloeus toq uhlyis teh ehnyet vthan nyeis goh, ge.
58003016	Mangso dah thwe lhyi xauhgyo nyeis goeus lyis eq nyang lyis gomloeus toq bang gas hank tsain nghuot lah? Nyamoq gas Egutu mau masyah Moshe khyuot shwih los bang dvnganh nghuot.
58003017	Nyeici zvn top Mangso dah nhaiqyo zis xauh bang gas hank tsain nghuot lah? Hauh bang gas yaunos kuot las mhanhdyvp mas lains shei bang nghuot.
58003018	Nyamoq gas ngos dyei das noyos mas khanhamp eq ma xauh wvng das, ge hank lyis toeuq las Mangso maukhi lah? Nyah dang lyis domsyos ma gyo las gomloeus toq bang lyis toeuq las taiq ma nghuot lhyeh?
58003019	Housoeh nyamoq ma lomsjingh yvmvyah hauh mau mas ma tsain xauh wvng yvlyis yang yoh nyvng.
58004001	Gvshih Mangso ka yang lyis no yoeus das cho kham yoeus nhang das ge dangthoengh dyei toh goeus. Hau dangthoengh dyei toh goeus dah noyos lyis namoq mas ma xauh yoeus zis dvyuk eq ma bos bas jungh, zaih nyeis geh.
58004002	Khasoeh ge lyis ngamoq gas gohlhain dah dius jens yhangteh hau gausyis dang lyis xauhgyo goeus. Nghuot laus eq nyamoq xauhgyo dah gausyis dang gas nyamoq xiklyis vkyuh ma bos. Chamus ge lyis nyamoq xauhgyo uhlyis nyamoq hauh yvlyis lomsjingh zis yah ma lhom yoeus.
58004003	Yang lomsjingh bang gas Mangso dangthoengh toh dah noyos lyis xauh lhom yoeus goeus. Houka: Ngos nyamoq lyis nhaiqyo zis yah, Ngos nyamoq lyis no nhang das oen dyei dah mau mas khanhamp eq ma xauh wvng das oen dangthoengh yah maukhi toh, ge nyang taiq dah dang yah dvyhangteh nghuot. Nyang nyeisjvng lyis cangxeih gvnkhanh toh masyah nyang muh lyis dye kuot toh goeus. Nghuot laus eq nyang haih yvlyis taiq shih.
58004004	Khasoeh ge lyis lhaihtoh dang dvdeh mas, nyhet vnyeih yah sen lha, Mangso ka nyhet vnyeih lyis nyah muh dvnganh masyah no, ge.
58004005	Haih cho yah sen lha doms puk taiq toh zis gas, Ngos nyamoq lyis noyos dyei das oen dah mau mas nyamoq khanhamp eq ma xauh wvng das, ge.
58004006	Hau Gausyis Dang cangxeih xauhgyo bang gas hauh dang lyis ma lomsjingh yvmvyah hauh noyos mas ma xauh wvng. Housoeh las hauh noyos lyis gohtoeu dius jens kham yoeus das toeuh dyei tyamp.
58004007	Housoeh lhom yoeus cho lhyi Khvnyhik ge dah buisnyeis gohtoeu dvnyeih Mangso doms toeuq toh dyei ge dah cho dvkoeuq yah kanghjyoeng chixoeuq nyeis. Yhensain ka lhaihtoh dang mas taiq toh zis yah dvyhangteh zvn nyoshoq nyangh thang lhyi Dawi nhuot masyah Khvnyhik namoq nyah thwe xauhgyo nghuot lyis namoq ehnyet vthan goh, ge.
58004008	Mangso dangthoengh dyei toh dah no cho lhyi Yoshua gas hauh dius jens lyis dyei goeus nghuot lyis gas, thang lhyi buisnyeis gohtoeu dvkoeuq dah cho doms taiq lo das zis ma nghuot.
58004009	Housoeh las no nyeih lyis Mangso ka no nyeis teh Mangso dah dius jens xiklyis no das shishenh dvnyeih bos shih.
58004010	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso dangthoengh dyei toh dah no cho lhyi kham yoeus goeus bang hank eq Mangso no nyeis teh nyah muh masyah no das.
58004011	Housoeh yvmvyah nyamoq ma lomsjingh gvng mas noyos mas ma xauh wvng teh yang hank mas eq ma bweh bas jungh, hau noyos mas yoh wvng das xiklyis yomkat ohhont nyeis goh.
58004012	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso dang gas dwis nyeis zis yahge tsangh siq nghuot las, aiq shot zuk tyingh sham thoq lyis zes zuk. Houka ehnyet yahge dyos xauhgoh yvmas eq, yaunyoq yahge shohkhyang xauhgoh yvmas jweh shoq yoh jyweq gvn las, dius dah ungkhau mha nghamh cho yahge nghamh toh cho lhyi soetuon dyei nyeis.
58004013	Mangso mhayah cha eq ma yoh gos shung toh; dvnganh gas nyah xikkhonh mas dede nghuot las yang kuot cho dvnganh nyang lyis suon xoeuq chah das.
58004014	Housoeh las yang rhen lha lomsjingh cho lhyi goeng goeng zwi zains toh goh: khasoeh ge lyis Mangso jyank mas bangh wvng loh goeus Mangso dah Lo Yesu ge dah Phudyei Zainsmuh gas yang yoh toh.
58004015	Khasoeh ge lyis yah Phudyei Zainsmuh gas, yah yomnhuk cho lhyi nhaiq ma seq nyen soeu ma nghuot. Yang teh cho khat khanghmuh mas shiwu zis xauh ku laus eq yaunos ma kuot dah Phudyei Zainsmuh yang dvyoh toh.
58004016	Housoeh las yang womh dah ehnyet yah Mangso dah jyehjuh hwankti tank xikkhonh mas tsain wvng loh goh. Housoeh lyis yang gas nhaiqnyen zis xauh kham yoeus das zis yahge chah nyeis uhlyis yang lyis pangh dah jyehjuh xauh yoeus das.
58005001	Phudyei Zainsmuh khanghmuh gas yaunos xiklyis lomhxangh yahge jyungshuk phudyei bas jungh, dius masyah khyen lha dius dah gungsthaiq Mangso lhyi phuqsoe das xiklyis toeuq kat toh zis xauh soeu nghuot.
58005002	Nyah gungs nyang eq cho vja ja mas yomnhuk nyeis las seq cho ma bos bang, chah shuot loh bang lyis noeuh nhamp ehnyet yoh Chixoeuq soeu nghuot.
58005003	Nyang nyang yomnhuk nyeis yvmvyah gohyuk dah yaunos xiklyis kyingh ma nghuot, nyah yaunos xiklyis eq phudyei chah.
58005004	Hank eq vsainnyang gungs lyis Phudyei Zainsmuh duot dah nyoqnho ngelang mas yoh khyen toeuq toh zo zis ma nghuot. Aron lyis teh Mangso khi yoeus zis xauh soeu kyingh Phudyei Zainsmuh dvyoh kuot.
58005005	Houyah dvyhangteh Khristu eq Phudyei Zainsmuh nyoqnho ngelang mas nyang gungs nyang chungh zo zis ma nghuot, Housoeh kuot das gungsthaiq, Nvng ngah Lo nghuot, Khvnyhik ngos nvng lyis ngah gungs masyah yaus kat, ge taiq dah Mangso yah dvchungh toh.
58005006	Nyang gohyos dvdeh mas taiq zis gas, Nvng gas Melkhizedek dah gyamh huon zis xauh soeu, vcaiq vto phudyei soeu nghuot, ge.
58005007	Yesu gas gungsshoh mas kang dwis nyeis shishenh lyis, nyang lyis shei masyah yoh khyuot yoeus soeu Mangso lhyi ngausdyeis ngausnhvp nyoqdyeis gyoh zis yah shvmanh dung sang cho kuot goeus. Yhensain Yesu gas ehnyet nyhen mha gyoh las kyauh soeu nghuot yvmvyah Mangso eq nyang sang cho lhyi gyo yoeus dyei.
58005008	Nyang gas Mangso dah lo nyang nghuot nyeis laus eq, shanghsenh zis kham lha domsyos gyo cho lhyi xuq yoeus.
58005009	Nyang lyis dyinghjet soeu dye kuot dyei goeus ya, nyang gas domsyos gyo bang dvnganh xiklyis vcaiq vto khyuot yoeus cho dah vpom bweh los.
58005010	Mangso eq nyang lyis Melkhizedek dah gyamh huon dah Phudyei Zainsmuh nghuot ge taiq hoeuh dyei.
58005011	Haih cho yah sen lha ngamoq taiq das cho nyoshoq bos. Nghuot laus eq namoq gas lvnyap ma seqgyo yvmvyah namoq lyis phui kyoh das zis yau.
58005012	Shishenh suon yoeuh lyis namoq gas jyauh bang duot gis goeus, nghuot laus eq Mangso dah cangxeih vpom dang lyis yangh namoq lyis dvyuk yuk jyauh chah joq shih. Namoq gas wom than zo das gungsthaiq nauh dvshuk chah nyeis shih.
58005013	Nauh dvshuk shih soeu hank laus eq shuot cho yahge jus cho yah sen lha seq gvn dah thungh phuh cho ma bos dah lonoeuh dvnghuot nyeis shih.
58005014	Than dah wom gas kuh goeus bang xiklyis nghuot las, nyamoq gas kuot man gvng mas gis gang seq gvn bang nghuot.
58006001	Housoeh yvmvyah namoq gas Khristan lomsjingh cho dah dang vpom lhyi toh khoq las lomsjingh cho mha nhaiqbos ung gying goeus bang yah phi dah jyauh cho pheh cheh loh goh.
58006002	Jeisnyhop kham cho, loq kih muh huon cho, shei masyah dwis toq cho yahge vcaiq vto soetuon xauh cho jens lyis doms puk jyauh las vpom xi das zis ma chah lo.
58006003	Gvshih yang xik pheh toq loh goh! Mangso bauh lyis gas yang haih yvlyis nyang kuot das.
58006004	Khasoeh ge lyis hau lomsjingh cho mhayah nungs doms loh goeus bang lyis ehnyet dvlhain doms thaiq nhang das cho khasoeh gis bweh das lah? Nyamoq gas Mangso dah bvng yvmas dvlhain nyeis ku goeus las maukhung mha dah jyehjuh jyungshuk lyis wu yoeuh zis yahge Gyingshang Dyos lyis chomp kham yoeus ku goeus bang nghuot.
58006005	Tsai, nyamoq gas Mangso dang gas gis yvlyis eq, thang caiq yah sen dah yomsoq lyis eq vsainnyang xauh kham zo las seq goeus bang nghuot.
58006006	Housoeh bweh thang lhyi gvshih nyamoq gas nyamoq dah lomsjingh cho lhyi tyamp goeus. Nyamoq gas Mangso dah Lo lyis dvlhain doms taplhangh las moqphung xikkhonh mas maphauh madanh xoqphuh nhang yvmvyah nyamoq lyis nhaiqlom doms thaiq das cho khasoeh eq ma gis bweh lo.
58006007	Nyoshoq lhain wus gyon dah mau jeis lyis lhom yoeus las phuk tsungh bang dah xiklyis vkyuh bos dah jyo yuk kuh nhang dah nyeisjvng lyis Mangso shvmanh jyehjuh tsoq dyei nyeis.
58006008	Nghuot laus eq hauh nyeisjvng gas zoeu zains yahge nyoq kyingh dvyuk los nhang lhyi ka chah vkyuh ma bos thoq lyis magoh Mangso dah gyukphoh nhoengh zis yahge nyi mas ngheq tyamp zis xauh das.
58006009	Jyetdap bang eh, ngamoq heisoeh taiq laus eq, namoq yah sen lha ngamoq nghamh kuk nyeis. Namoq gas hau khyuot yoeus cho yah sen lha zes gis dah shvmanh jyehjuh xauh yoeus goeus cho lhyi ngamoq seq.
58006010	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka lyi ma chi soeu ma nghuot. Nyang gas namoq wons wuq los goeus dah muhzoh lyis eq, namoq Yhensain lhyi jyetdap cho Chixoeuq das xiklyis lai loh goeus shishenh lyis yah gvshih jweh shoq Khristan nyang changh pangh goh cho lhyi eq, Mangso ma tohnyhik dyei.
58006011	Yang omes dah cho zainsmuh gas namoq dah nghamhloms cho dyingh los shoq yuk khanghmuh gas vsainnyang omes ehnyet lyis thang thank jweh shoq goeng joq nhang das cho nghuot.
58006012	Ngamoq gas namoq lyis lan bang ma bweh nhang mes. Nghuot laus eq lomsjingh zis yah ehnyet xing bang bweh las Mangso dyei dah vso vlho kham yoeus bang teh namoq lyis bweh los nhang mes.
58006013	Mangso Abraham lyis dangthoengh toh uhlyis, nyah dangthoengh vgus kuot das cho maukhi toh. Nyah thoq lyis zes soeu ma bos lo las, nyah nyings yoeus zis yah maukhi toh.
58006014	Mangso ka, Ngos nvng lyis jyoengh shvmanh dyei das; vnyau vshih lyis jebais los nhang das, ge.
58006015	Abraham gas jhen las langh nyeis yvmvyah, Mangso dah dangthoengh yah sen lha vso lhyi xauh kham yoeus.
58006016	Dius gas maukhi uhlyis vsainnyang thoq lyis zes kuh soeu dah nyings yoeus las mau gyangh khi zis yahge nyamoq dah phyen-goh cho dvnganh lyis hau maukhi dang yah doengs nhang, dye nhang.
58006017	Mangso ka nyang nghamh toeuq toh cho ma thaiq loh nhang cho lhyi dangthoengh vso vlho kham yoeus bang lyis bvng bvng Chixoeuq mes. Housoeh las nyah dangthoengh mas maukhi dang lhungh kat.
58006018	Housoeh hau dangthoengh yahge maukhi dang aiq ja yah ma gis thaiq loh cho nghuot zis yahge houyah sen lha Mangso ka hwah dang yoh taiq zis ma nghuot. Housoeh las nyang lyis nges las sam cho xauh yoeus bang ge yang gas, yang lyis dyei dah nghamhloms cho lhyi goeng goeng zwi zains toh das nyhenshang yomdyei cho nyoshoq xauh yoeus goeus.
58006019	Yang gas hau nghamhloms cho lhyi yah kang dwis cho nyhenshang jywangh dvkoeuq teh xauh kham yoeus goeus. Hau nghamhloms cho ka sam joq goeng joq las maukhung yhenmuh khau mha, gos toh dah misseh vkhau mha jweh wvng loh goeus.
58006020	Yhensain Yesu gas yah gungsthaiq hauh joqyos mas, yah xik pheh jweh wvng nyeis goeus las Melkhizedek dah gyamh huon cho yah, vcaiq vto phudyei zainsmuh bweh loh goeus.
58007001	Hai Salem hwankti Melkhizedek gas nyhang thank Mangso dah phudyei soeu nghuot. Abraham gas hwankti nyei yuk lyis zan ung lha tauh los uhlyis, Melkhizedek gas nyang lyis e zes las shvmanh dyei.
58007002	Abraham eq nyang chi los dah lvnyhvp dvnganh masyah ciboms dvboms Melkhizedek lyis gvm dyei. Melkhizedek ge dah nyings cangxeih vjyuk gas, Dan dah Hwankti nghuot las nyang gas Salem hwankti nghuot yvmvyah, Nyenstap Hwankti ge zis eq nghuot.
58007003	Melkhizedek dah ungwes uwus, phauh thyeih dius caiq ge zis ma bos, buisnyeis vpom yahge vcaiq thank ge zis ma bos yvmvyah, Mangso dah Lo yah doeus shoq bweh los las, vcaiq vto nyeis dah phudyei soeu nghuot.
58007004	Yah dah nyings hoeuh phauh thyeih Abraham gas nyang zan ung los lvnyhvp masyah ciboms dvboms Melkhizedek lyis dyei lyis, housoeh dyei zis kham yoeus soeu ka kha iq kuhxing soeu nghuot das zis gas namoq nghamh suon yoeuh geh.
