58007005	Phudyei bang nghuot dah Lewi vnyau vshih jens gas nyamoq nyang dah vnyau jens ge dah Israel vnyau jens jyank masyah ciboms dvboms khywi yoeus das xiklyis hau Lyi mas nyamoq lyis taiq toh goeus. Hau Israel vnyau jens eq Abraham dah vnyau vshih dvtsain nghuot.
58007006	Melkhizedek gas Lewi vnyau mas zis ma nghuot laus eq Abraham jyank masyah ciboms dvboms kham yoeus las, Mangso jyank masyah dangthoengh yoh toh soeu Abraham lyis shvmanh dyei.
58007007	Shvmanh dyei soeu ka shvmanh zis kham yoeus soeu thoq lyis kuh zis gas cha khamkhvv chank ma bos.
58007008	Phudyei bang khyvlyis yah ciboms dvboms khywi yoeus zis gas seq shei dah dius jens khywi yoeus zis nghuot. Nghuot laus eq Melkhizedek kui yoeus dah ciboms dvboms gas lhaihtoh dang mas taiq zis yah dvyhangteh kang dwis nyeis soeu kui yoeus zis nghuot.
58007009	Ciboms dvboms zo dah Lewi gas Abraham dah loq cho yah ciboms dvboms Melkhizedek lyis dyei goeus oen yoh taiq.
58007010	Khasoeh ge lyis Melkhizedek gas Abraham lyis zes langh uhlyis Lewi ma khoeu shih, nyah phauh thyeih Abraham dah thyikdom mas dvnghuot shih oen yoh taiq.
58007011	Israel jens lyis lyi dyei uhlyis Lewi vnyau phudyei gyamh huon yvmas vpom toh las dyei goeus. Gvshih Lewi vnyau dah phudyei bang wons dah muh dyinghjet goeus nghuot lyis gas, Aron vkoq masyah ma nghuot, Melkhizedek dah gyamh huon zis kham yoeus dah gohtoeu phudyei dvyuk doms thuq los chah zis ma nghuot.
58007012	Khasoeh ge lyis hau phudyei gyamh huon yvlyis thaiq tyamp lyis gas, lyi eq thaiq tyamp chah das.
58007013	Hai gvshih taiq nyeis cho yah sen soeu, yah Yhensain ka gohkoq masyah los zis nghuot las hauh vkoq mas hank eq phudyei khyvlyis khanhamp eq phuqsoe yoeuh zis ma nghuot.
58007014	Nyang gas Yuda vkoq masyah khoeu los goeus yvlyis dvnganhmoq seq, Moshe ka phudyei bang yah sen lha taiq uhlyis Yuda vkoq dah cho cha eq ma taiq toh.
58007015	Melkhizedek teh dah gohtoeu phudyei soeu thuq los yvmvyah haih cho zes las dede nghuot.
58007016	Hauh soeu ka phudyei muh mas dius yah kuot toh lyi cho khyvlyis toeuq kat toh zis xauh soeu ma nghuot; mathank magons kang dah yomsoq yah toeuq kat toh zis xauh soeu dvnghuot.
58007017	Khasoeh ge lyis lhaihtoh Dang mas taiq zis gas, Nvng gas Melkhizedek yhangteh vcaiq vto phudyei soeu nghuot, ge.
58007018	Xiklyis dah lyi gas yomnhuk las vkyuh ma bos lo yvmvyah yoeus tyamp zis xauh goeus.
58007019	Khasoeh ge lyis Moshe dah lyi gas chah cho lhyi eq dyinghjet shoq ma yoh kuot. Gvshih gas hau zes gis dah nghamhloms cho dyei goeus las hauh gvng mas yang Mangso jyank mas yoh ni wvng loh.
58007020	Hauh thoq lyis Mangso maukhi toh dang eq bos shih. Gohyhamh bang lyis phudyei bang kuot nhang uhlyis housoeh teh maukhi dang ma bos.
58007021	Nghuot laus eq Yesu gas maukhi dang yah phudyei soeu bweh los goeus. Mangso nyang lyis taiq zis gas, Nvng gas vcaiq vto phudyei soeu nghuot das, ge Yhensain maukhi dangthoengh toh zis ma doms thaiq lo, ge.
58007022	Heisoeh muh huon cho mha ma doeusgoh yvmvyah Yhensain Yesu gas zes gis dah thanghchvp lyis pauh toh dyei zis bweh goeus.
58007023	Tsai, ma doeusgoh cho gohtoeu bos shih. Gohtoeu phudyei bang gas nyoshoq nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas shei loh yvmvyah nyamoq dah muh lyis ma yoh tsoq kuot.
58007024	Nghuot laus eq Yhensain Yesu gas vcaiq vto kang dwis nyeis yvmvyah nyah phudyei muh eq dius dvyuk yuk dah loq mas thot thaiq loh zis ma nghuot.
58007025	Housoeh yvmvyah nyang gas nyang lyis nges las Mangso jyank mas wvng los bang lyis khanhamp eq khyuot yoeus das yomsoq bos: khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas nyamoq nyhenshang Mangso jyank mas khyoeuq dyei das zis vjangh dwis nyeis.
58007026	Housoeh las Yhensain Yesu gas yang mas bweh nyeis, chah nyeis cho lhyi tyink dyei nyeis, yah xiklyis gis thank phudyei zainsmuh nghuot. Nyang gas yunghshop gyingshang lha, nyang mas shuot cho ma bos, yaunos ma dap. Nyang gas yaunos dap bang masyah kangh yoeus zis xauh las maukhung nyhang mha jweh shoq chunghtoqh zis xauh soeu nghuot.
58007027	Nyang gas gohtoeu phudyei zainsmuh jens teh cangxeih lyis nyah yaunos xiklyis, hauh thang lhyi dius nyau jens dah yaunos xiklyis nyeih khanghmuh lomhxangh lainh chah zis ma nghuot. Nyah gungs lyis lomhxangh kuot las phudyei uhlyis vcaiq vto xiklyis dvlhain lhyi yah dye shoq phudyei tyamp goeus.
58007028	Moshe dah lyi gas yomnhuk las ma dyingh ma jet dah dius lyis phudyei zainsmuh muh huon toh. Nghuot laus eq lyi toh thang lhyi jweh los, Mangso maukhi lha dyei toh dangthoengh gas vcaiq vto dyinghjet dah Lo lyis Phudyei Zainsmuh dah muh mas toh.
58008001	Gvshih ngamoq taiq kyoh nyeis cho dah dang vgungs gas, yang gas maukhung mha Gywes So Shoenkkhyi yah dyingh dah hwankti tank loqyos shot pheh tsung toh dah Phudyei Zainsmuh yoh toh.
58008002	Nyang gas gyingshang thank joqyos mas Phudyei Zainsmuh muh wons wuq nyeis. Hauh joqyos gas maukhung ge, dius yah ma kuot, Mangso nyang kuot toh dah zvng gyingh nghuot.
58008003	Phudyei Zainsmuh khanghmuh gas jyungshuk yahge gaunyhauq phudyei lyis Mangso jyank mas phudyei das xiklyis toeuq kat toh bang nghuot. Houyah dvyhangteh yah Phudyei Zainsmuh eq nyang mas lomhxangh lainh das xiklyis phudyei dvja chah joq.
58008004	Nyang nyeisjvng thoq mas kyingh dvnyeis lyis gas, phudyei soeu khasoeh eq yoh duot das zis ma nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis Yuda lyi yah dvyhangteh jyungshuk yah phudyei dah phudyei bang nyeis goeus.
58008005	Phudyei bang khyvlyis nyamoq kuot dah muh gas maukhung mha paiq cho dah yikhyoh dah siyet dvnghuot. Moshe kuot los dah muh eq houyah dvyhangteh nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis Moshe ka hau gyingshang dah Zvng kuot bah ge lyis, Mangso nyang lyis boms thoq mas, ngos nvng lyis chixoeuq goeus yikhyoh vgus hau dvnganh yoh kuot shoq zaih nyeis aq, ge taiq yvmvyah nghuot.
58008006	Nghuot laus eq gvshih gas gohtoeu phudyei bang yoh dah muh thoq lyis zes dah phudyei muh Yesu lyis dyei goeus. Mangso yah dius dah jo mas Yhensain Yesu kuot dyei dah thanghchvp lyi gas zes gis dah thanghchvp nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis hau thanghchvp gas xik lyis thoq lyis zes gis dah dangthoengh mas vpom toh.
58008007	Cangxeih thanghchvp mas tswi ma bos zis jyoeng lhyi ka thang lhyi aiq vkoeuq lyis kuot toh dais ma bos lo.
58008008	Nghuot laus eq Mangso ka nyah dius nyau lyis yobos huon zoh lyis taiq zis gas, Israel vnyau jens yah eq, Yuda dius nyau jens yah eq thanghchvp saiq toh das buisnyeis jweh los das.
58008009	Hau thanghchvp gas, Ngos nyamoq lyis loq masyah she lha, Egutu mau masyah shwih los uhlyis ngos nyamoq dah phauh thyeih moq yah toh dah thanghchvp yah doeusgoh das zis ma nghuot. Nyamoq ngos yah toh dah thanghchvp mas dang ma jings yvmvyah, Ngos eq nyamoq lyis ma yoeuh ma gomh, ge Yhensain taiq.
58008010	Gvshih hai thanghchvp gas jweh los das buisnyeis dah thang lhyi Israel vnyau jens yah Ngos toh das thanghchvp nghuot. Ngos nyamoq dah ehnyet khau mha ngah lyi kat toh dyei das, Nyamoq nhaiqlom mas lhaih toh das. Ngos nyamoq dah Mangso duot das las, nyamoq eq ngah dius duot das.
58008011	Nyamoq mas hank eq vsainnyang yhenkyoh changh lyis eq, vsainnyang boekyis changh lyis eq, Mangso lhyi seq geh oen jyauh chah das zis ma nghuot: khasoeh ge lyis ngis thank masyah kuh thank jweh shoq dvnganhmoq ngos lyis tsain seq das.
58008012	Ngos nyamoq dah yobos lyis khyuot dyei las, nyamoq shuot cho lhyi ma soh dyei lo das, ge Yhensain taiq.
58008013	Hau thanghchvp saiq dah cho taiq dah vjyuk gas, Mangso ka cangxeih thanghchvp lyis vcauh kuot tyamp cho nghuot; cauh las yom tyamp zis cha laus eq ma nyangh lyis wui das.
58009001	Cangxeih thanghchvp mas paiq cho yah sen dah thungh lyi bos zis yah dvyhangteh dius yah kuot dah paiq joqyos eq bos chah.
58009002	Khasoeh ge lyis houmha zvng dvkoeuq kuot toh; hauh dah cangxeih vyvp mas nyi tuonh gus yahge Mangso lhyi kyangh dah phudyei ohlhyoq kih dah kih gus joq. Hauh yvlyis gyingshang joqyos ge.
58009003	Tsai, aiq vyvp oen das gosseh dah vkhau pheh yvp lyis gyingshang thank joqyos ge.
58009004	Hauh yvmas xangh ngheq dah xing phon yahge dvkoeuq gonh xing shauq toh dah Thanghchvp Kwi bos. Hauh kwi khau mha mana ohlhyoq bos dah xing auh eq, vhuq tsain thot los Aron dah lhamloq eq, lyi tsain lhaih toh dah luklhyoq dvzomh eq tsain bos.
58009005	Hauh kwi thoq mas dungs dap dah Kherubim silho aiq koeuq joq las Mangso nyeis dah vlho Chixoeuq. Nyamoq dah dungs lyis yaunos khyuot dyei joqyos ge, kwi nghop thoq mas lhywa nghop toh. Haih cho dah vjyuk lyis jyuk jyuk taiq kyoh chank ma bos.
58009006	Hai paiq cho thungh yah dvyhangteh dye sont goeus ya, phudyei bang gas Mangso dah phuqsoe muh lyis kuot das xiklyis, zvng khau cangxeih jweh dah vyvp mas nyeih yau nyeih tsain wvng.
58009007	Nghuot laus eq zvng dah vkhau yvp mas gas, phudyei zainsmuh nyang kyingh, nyah xiklyis eq, dius dah shuot cu cho xiklyis eq, phudyei das suih chi lha dvzvn dvlhain dvyoh wvng loh.
58009008	Haih thungh yah dvyhangteh cangxeih vyvp goeng joq dvchank gas, gyingshang thank joqyos mas wvng das cho eq ma bangh shih das cho Gyingshang Dyos gas bvng bvng jyauh nyeis.
58009009	Haih cho ka haq caiq dah cho Chixoeuq dah dangtoeuq dvkoeuq nghuot. Hauh vjyuk gas Mangso lhyi phudyei dah jyungshuk yahge gaunyhauq phudyei gas paiq soeu dah ehnyet lyis yoh dyinghjet nhang zis ma nghuot.
58009010	Hauh cho ka zonoms, shuk phoh yahge cheihshang cho vja ja yah sen lha kuot zis kyingh dvnghuot. Hauh zis gas Mangso dah vsaiq doms soq das caiq ma jweh shih gyo lyis toh langh, gungsshoh yah sen lha chank das lyi dvtsain nghuot.
58009011	Nghuot laus eq Khristu gas, gvshih yang xauh kham zo nyeis goeus dah nyeisgis yaplhoq cho dah phudyei zainsmuh khyvlyis jweh los goeus. Nyang phudyei muh kuot dah zvng gas loq yah ma kuot toh yvmvyah hai gvnkhanh toh dah nyeisjvng yah eq ma sen, zes kuh las dyinghjet dah paiq zvng nghuot.
58009012	Khristu gas Gyingshang Thank Joqyos khau mha vcaiq vto xiklyis dvlhain lhyi yah dye shoq wvng uhlyis, phudyei das xiklyis shvbeq, noeulu dah suih ma chi wvng, nyah suih yah wvng las yah nyhenshang vcaiq vto khyuot yoeus cho xauh yoeus goeus.
58009013	Shvbeq yahge noeuchoq lu dah suih, ngheq tyamp goeus ge noeu pon dah nyiyvp yah vwot v-oeu xauh bang dah thoq mas sanh gyuon lyis nyamoq dah vwot v-oeu bweh yvlyis yoh gyingshang nhang zis jyoeng nghuot lyis gas,
58009014	Khristu dah suih gas hauh thoq lyis yoh cheihshang dyei ma nghuot lhyeh? Khristu gas hau vcaiq vto Dyos yah nyah gungs lyis mesyos ma bos phudyei khyvlyis Mangso jyank mas phudyei goeus. Dwis nyeis Mangso lhyi yang yoh phuqsoe shoq Khristu dah suih gas yah ehnyet nhaiqlom lyis vkyuh ma bos paiq dah lyi thungh vshei lhyi chank nyeis masyah cheihshang yoeus das.
58009015	Haih cho gvng mas Mangso yah lui yoeus zis xauh bang gas, Mangso dangthoengh dyei toh goeus vcaiq vto shvmanh jyehjuh vso vlho xauh kham yoeus bas jungh ge, Khristu gas thanghchvp vsaiq lyis kuot dyei goeus. Housoeh kham yoeus das toeuh xauh yoeus zis gas, xik lyis dah thanghchvp khau mha nyeis uhlyis shuot cu dah yaunos masyah lhuiq kat das nyhenshang shei kham cho dvkoeuq bweh los goeus yvmvyah nghuot.
58009016	Vso vlho yah sen dah thanghchvp lyis bweh nhang das xiklyis gas thanghchvp chvp toh soeu jyoengh shei goeus cho kanghjyoeng yoh chixoeuq chah.
58009017	Khasoeh ge lyis thanghchvp toh soeu dwis nyeis shih lyis gas thanghchvp ma gis bweh shih. Thanghchvp toh soeu shei lhyi dvyoh doengs.
58009018	Housoeh las cangxeih thanghchvp lyis yangh suih chi lha dvgoeng joq nhang.
58009019	Cangxeih lyis Moshe ka nyah lyi mas bos tying ya tying toh zis dvnganh dius jens lyis dye taiq kyoh lyis, zoek zoek nes dah yvng mauh yahge shomnhamh kyang tsain yoeus las noeulu yahge shvbeq suih lyis jeis yah lhoeuq las lyi maussauh lyis eq, dius dvnganh lyis eq sanh gyuon.
58009020	Hauh thang lhyi nyang taiq zis gas, Heika Mangso namoq lyis domsyos gyo las chank kuot das nyhenshang toh dah thanghchvp lyis kyihau tap toh dah suih nghuot, ge.
58009021	Houyah dvyhangteh Moshe ka paiq dah zvng lyis eq, paiq cho mha yhung dah vyhang dvnganh lyis eq hauh suih yah sanh gyuon.
58009022	Lyi khyvlyis yah gas vyhang vluk dvnganh lyis suih yah yoh cheihshang lha, suih huot lyis kyingh yaunos dvkhyuot dyei.
58009023	Maukhung mha vkhang yah joq goeus dah vyhang dah tap yoeus yvlyis housoeh teh cho yah yoh cheihshang; nghuot laus eq maukhung vyhang gyingh lyis gas hauh thoq lyis zes gis dah lomhxangh lainh zis yah cheihshang chah.
58009024	Khasoeh ge lyis Khristu gas, maukhung mha dah yikhyoh yet dvnghuot las dius loq yah kuot toh dah Gyingshang Joqyos mas ma wvng, maukhung mha nyang wvng las gvshih yah gungsthaiq Mangso dah xikkhonh mas dede thuq los goeus.
58009025	Yuda phudyei zainsmuh gas gaunyhauq suih chi lha zvn yau zvn hau gyingshang thank yvp mas gyangh wvng. Nghuot laus eq Khristu gas nyah gungs lyis nyoshoq lhain wvng phudyei zis ma nghuot.
58009026	Housoeh phudyei nghuot lyis gas mungkvn cangxeih gvnkhanh yoq lyis yah nyoshoq lhain shei kham kham kuot das; nghuot laus eq gvshih gas nyeisjvng caiq thank das zis ni los shishenh lyis vcaiq vto nyhenshang dvlhain lhyi yah dye shoq jweh los las nyah gungs lyis lomhxangh lainh zis yah yaunos lyis wes tyamp goeus.
58009027	Cangsoeu dius yuk khanghmuh gas dvlhain shei chah das las hauh thang lhyi Mangso yah soetuon zis xauh das.
58009028	Houyah dvyhangteh Khristu eq dius nyoshoq dah yaunos lyis dvlhain lhyi yah dye shoq wons tyamp das xiklyis nyah gungs lyis lomhxangh kuot las phudyei dyei goeus. Yaunos wons tyamp dyei cho yah ma sen, nyang lyis langh nyeis bang lyis khyuot yoeus das nyhenshang aiq vlhain thuq xoeuq das.
58010001	Yuda jens dah lyi gas vgyingh dah yikhyoh gyingh ma nghuot, jweh los das hau nyeisgis yaplhoq cho dah siyet dvnghuot. nyamoq gas vjangh phudyei nyeis dah lomhxangh yah kyingh zvn yau zvn tsain phudyei. Housoeh las haih lomhxangh yah Mangso jyank mas wvng loh bang lyis hauh lyi gas nyamoq lyis dyinghjet bang khasoeh yoh bweh los nhang das lah?
58010002	Mangso lhyi paiq nyeis bang lyis yaunos masyah yoh cheihshang goeus nghuot lyis gas, nyamoq yaunos yoh shih bang nghuot oen khanhamp eq ma nghamh lo das las phudyei cho dvnganh eq no tyamp lo das zis nghuot.
58010003	Nghuot laus eq gvshih gas zvn yau zvn phudyei dah lomhxangh gas dius jens lyis nyamoq dah yaunos dah cho soh nhang nyeis.
58010004	Khasoeh ge lyis noeuchoq yahge shvbeq suih gas yaunos lyis khanhamp eq yoh yoeus tyamp dyei zis ma nghuot.
58010005	Housoeh yvmvyah Khristu gas hai mungkvn mas jweh lyih das zis cvvq uhlyis Mangso lhyi taiq zis gas, Nvng gas lomhxangh yahge jyungshuk lyis ma o, Nvng ngah xiklyis gungs sont toh dyei.
58010006	Phon thoq mas dah doeu gonh ngheq dyei dah gaunyhauq lomhxangh yahge yobos khyuot lomhxangh lyis nvng nhaiq ma doeus.
58010007	Hauh uhlyis ngos taiq zis gas, Sauhdain mas ngah cho lhaih toh zis yah dvyhangteh, Mangso eh, Nvng nhaiqtap khyvlyis kuot das zis gvshih ngos heimha jweh los oen goeus, ge.
58010008	Tsai, nyang cangxeih taiq zis gas, Phudyei dah lomhxangh yahge jyungshuk lyis eq, phon mha gaunyhauq ngheq dyei zis yahge yaunos khyuot lomhxangh lainh zis lyis eq lyi yah dvyhangteh phudyei nghuot laus eq hauh lomhxangh lyis Yhensain nvng ma o, nhaiq doeus zis ma nghuot, ge.
58010009	Hauh thang lhyi nyang taiq zis gas, Mangso eh, nvng nhaiqtap khyvlyis kuot das zis gvshih ngos heimha nyeis, ge. Housoeh las Mangso ka xik lyis phudyei dah lomhxangh vcauh dvnganh lyis yoeus tyamp las, Khristu dah phudyei yvlyis hauh joqyos mas gungsthaiq kat las goeng joq nhang.
58010010	Yesu Khristu gas Mangso kuot nhang mes dah nhaiqtap khyvlyis yah dvyhangteh, nyah gungs lyis vcaiq vto xiklyis dvlhain lhyi yah dvnganh dye shoq phudyei gvng mas, yang dvnganh gas yaunos masyah cheihshang kat zis xauh goeus.
58010011	Yuda phudyei soeu khanghmuh gas nyah dah phudyei muh lyis nyeih yau nyeih wons wuq zis yah phudyei cho dvja kyingh lyis nyoshoq lhain kuot nyeis. Nghuot laus eq haih phudyei dah lomhxangh gas yaunos lyis khanhamp eq ma yoh yoeus tyamp dyei.
58010012	Khristu gas yah yaunos khyuot dyei das nyhenshang vcaiq vto xiklyis vkyuh bos dah lomhxangh dvkoeuq kyingh lyis yah dye lainh lyis Mangso dah loqyos shot pheh loh tsung toh goeus.
58010013	Gvshih nyang gas houmha nyah jeswus jens lyis nyah khyei o mha nangte khyvlyis Mangso yah toh dyei shoq langh uhjyangh nyeis.
58010014	Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas phudyei dah lomhxangh dvkoeuq yah yaunos masyah cheihshang kat zis xauh goeus bang lyis vcaiq vto xiklyis dyinghjet bang bweh los nhang.
58010015	Hau gyingshang Dyos eq yang lyis kanghjyoeng kat dyei: Nyang cangxeih taiq zis gas,
58010016	Haih zis gas hau jweh los das buisnyeis lyis nyamoq yah ngos toh das dah thanghchvp nghuot. Ngos ngah lyi nyamoq dah nhaiqlom mas kat dyei das las, nyamoq dah ehnyet mas lhaih toh das, ge hauh Yhensain taiq.
58010017	Hauh thang lhyi nyang taiq zis gas, Nyamoq dah yaunos yahge ma shop muh lyis ngos ma comh dyei lo das.
58010018	Housoeh las yaunos khyuot zis xauh goeus ya, yaunos khyuot dyei das xiklyis phudyei das chank ma bos lo.
58010019	Housoeh yvmvyah ngah boekyis eh, Yesu shei kham gvng mas yang gas hau gyingshang thank joqyos mas wvng das xiklyis dyinghjet dah toeuh yoh goeus.
58010020	Nyang gas nyah gungs ge dah yhenmuh gosseh lyis jyweq bangh loh las Mangso dah xikkhonh mas bangh loh, dwis nyeis cho vsaiq dvkoeuq yah xiklyis phank toh dyei goeus.
58010021	Yang gas Mangso dah yhen lhyi guon das dah Phudyei Zainsmuh dvyuk yoh.
58010022	Housoeh yvmvyah yang gas yaunos bos ge sohseq dah ehnyet lyis cheihshang lha, yah gungsdom lyis eq lhoqshang dah jeis yah dye cheihshang lhyi, yobos ma bos dah ehnyet, goeng dah lomsjingh cho bos zis yah Mangso jyank mas tsain ni loh goh.
58010023	Yang rhen dah lomsjingh cho dah nghamhloms cho mha goeng goeng zwi zains toh goh. Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka nyang toh dah dangthoengh mas wontang soeu nghuot yvlyis yang yoh loms.
58010024	Yang gas nyang changh nyang pangh thuk goh das nyhenshang, jyetdap ehnyet Chixoeuq goh zis yah gis dah muh chank kuot das xiklyis nyang changh nyang nghamh suon yoeuh goh nyeis goh.
58010025	Dvgeh zop huom dah thungh lyi lyis dvyhamh bang toh tyamp loh. Yang gas housoeh ma kuot kuot Yhensain doms jweh lyih dah buisnyeis ni los nyeis yvlyis namoq seq yvmvyah namoq nyang changh zes las yomdyei goh nyeis goh.
58010026	Khasoeh ge lyis yang gas hau jyoeng cho lhyi seq las dye lhom yoeus thang lhyi, pa-i yaunos doms kuot loh nyeis lyis gas, yah yaunos xiklyis lainh das lomhxangh bos lo das zis ma nghuot.
58010027	Yang gas jweh los das soetuon cho yahge Mangso lhyi tyixo bang lyis ngheq jyomh tyamp das gyukphoh nyi lyis gyuk zis yah langh nyeis das cho kyingh dvbos lo.
58010028	Moshe dah lyi lyis domsyos ma gyo soeu hank laus eq kanghjyoeng aiq yuk somh yuk dah dang yah yobos bos ge soetuon zis xauh lyis nhaiq ma nyen lo sat zis xauh.
58010029	Housoeh lyis gas Mangso dah Lo lyis chaxwe ma nhang kuot soeu, vsainnyang lyis yaunos masyah cheihshang dah Mangso thanghchvp suih lyis pvlhyahlyoeus kuot soeu, jyehjuh dyei dah Dyos lyis ma phauh gis kuot soeu ka khasoeh nghuot das lah? Nyang xauh mon dah joeng cho ka kha iq zes xungh das lah! Dvnghamh yoeuh geh.
58010030	Khasoeh ge lyis, Ngos lvto phuk das ge las eq, Yaunos dah uhkung phauh ngos laiq dyei das. Yhensain ka nyah dius jens lyis soetuon das, ge taiq soeu hank nghuot yvlyis yang seq.
58010031	Dwis nyeis Mangso dah loq khau mha gyoh cho ka svsoh gyuk chank bos cho nghuot.
58010032	Lai loh goeus shishenh lyis namoq khasoeh teh bang nghuot yvlyis doms soh nyeis geh. Hauh shishenh lyis Mangso dah bvng zis xauh kham yoeus thang lhyi shanghsenh cho nyoshoq xauh kham lai los goeus. Nghuot laus eq namoq yomkat thoenk yap joq gvng mas hauh zis namoq lyis ma yoh ung.
58010033	Namoq nyang moqphung xikkhonh mas jwangh zis yahge shoeuhshih cho dvlhain lhain xauh lai loh goeus. Tsai gohtoeu shishenh lyis gas namoq teh shoeuhshih zis xauh nyeis dah dyenschangh jens shot pheh nyeis las yaukyenh cho chomp kham khyvlyis yah yomdyei zis yah pangh goeus.
58010034	Namoq gas thung lungh zis xauh bang dah shanghsenh yvlyis nhaiq bos taink dyei goeus. Namoq dah vyhang lhuot loh zis xauh uhlyis eq gausyis zis yah somh kham goeus. Khasoeh ge lyis hauh thoq lyis zes gis las vjangh goeng joq dah vyhang dvja yoh yvlyis namoq seq.
58010035	Housoeh yvmvyah namoq dah womh ehnyet lyis vchi lhaiq kat goh. Housoeh lyis namoq phauh shangh zainsmuh xauh yoeus das.
58010036	Mangso o khyvlyis chank kuot das zis yahge nyah dangthoengh yah dvyhangteh vkyuh xauh kham shoq namoq kuhxing ehnyet yah jhen chah nyeis.
58010037	Khasoeh ge lyis lhaihtoh dang mas taiq zis gas, Dvsoq lyis jweh los das soeu ka, ma nyangh lyis jweh los das. Nyang ma sheq nyeis lo das.
58010038	Ngah dah dan bang gas lomsjingh zis yah dwis nyeis das. Nghuot laus eq nyamoq mas dvyuk nungsdoms lyis gas Ngos nyang mas nhaiqdoeus das zis ma nghuot, ge.
58010039	Yang gas nungsdoms las dyuk loh bang ma nghuot; Lomsjingh las khyuot yoeus zis xauh bang dvnghuot.
58011001	Lomsjingh ge zis gas yang nghamhloms dah vyhang ka jyoengh bweh das ge cho lhyi nghamhnywe nyeis las ma nyvng dah vyhang ka jyoengh joq oen seqgyo las lhom yoeus yvlyis ge.
58011002	Gohlhain dah dius jens gas nyamoq dah lomsjingh cho gvng mas Mangso yah gausyis lhom yoeus cho lhyi xauh yoeus.
58011003	Ma yoh nyvng dah vyhang mhayah yoh nyvng dah vyhang bweh los das xiklyis Mangso dah dang yah hai dwis ya dwis yvlyis gvnkhanh toh goeus cho yang yoh seq zis gas hau lomsjingh gvng mas nghuot.
58011004	Lomsjingh zis yah Abel gas Ka-in dah lomhxangh thoq lyis zes gis dah lomhxangh lainh goeus. Mangso ka nyah lomsjingh cho lhyi yoeuh las nyang lyis dan soeu ge lhom yoeus zis xauh goeus. Khasoeh ge lyis nyang lomhxangh lainh dah jyungshuk lyis Mangso nyang nhaiqdoeus dyei goeus yvmvyah nghuot. Abel shei goeus laus eq nyang lomsjingh gvng mas gvshih jweh shoq nyang dang taiq nyeis shih.
58011005	Lomsjingh gvng mas Enok gas ma shei shei Mangso yah thot yoeus loh zis xauh. Nyang lyis Mangso yah thot yoeus loh goeus las nyang lyis hank eq xo ma nyvng lo. Mangso yah thot yoeus zis ma xauh shih lyis, Enok gas Mangso dah nhaiqdoeus soeu nghuot, ge Jyomp maussauh mas taiq toh.
58011006	Lomsjingh zis ma bos lyis gas hank eq Mangso lhyi nhaiq ma yoh doeus nhang. Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso jyank mas los soeu hank laus eq Mangso nyeis zis yahge nyang lyis chank xo bang lyis jyehjuh dyei nyeis oen yvlyis lomsjingh soeu nghuot chah das.
58011007	Jweh los das shishenh lyis bweh das cho ma nyvng shih dah vyhang yah sen lha Mangso zaih nhang yvlyis Noa xauhgyo zis gas nyang lomsjingh gvng mas nghuot. Nyang gas Mangso dah dang lyis domsyos gyo zis yah sangpho dvlom tsuk las nyang yahge nyah yhenbang gas khyuot yoeus zis tsain xauh goeus. Housoeh las mungkvn lyis nyang dang thang thyet las, Noa gas lomsjingh zis yah sen, dan cho dah vso vlho kham yoeus zis nghuot.
58011008	Abraham gas Mangso nyang lyis dyei das ge dangthoengh toh mau pheh thuq loh das xiklyis lomsjingh cho ka nyang lyis domsyos gyo nhang. Housoeh las nyang khapheh loh nyeis zis nyang ma seq laus eq nyah mau masyah thuq gyoh loh.
58011009	Mangso dangthoengh toh dah mau mas nyang gas boenghwus teh lomsjingh zis yah nyeis yenh. Nyang gas Mangso jyank masyah nyang teh dangthoengh vso vlho chomp kham yoeus dah Isak yahge Yakop teh muga zvng mas nyeis.
58011010	Khasoeh ge lyis Abraham gas Mangso yah vzwvng kuot las goeng toenk dah vpom yah tsuk toh goeus dah wus lyis nghamhloms las langh nyeis.
58011011	Abraham gas mang goeus, Sara nyang eq nyenhkyi lai goeus las lo ma gis yoh lo. Nghuot laus eq Abraham gas lomsjingh zis yah uwus bweh loh goeus. Mangso ka nyang dangthoengh toh zis yah dvyhangteh wontang dah Yhensain nghuot yvlyis Abraham loms.
58011012	Abraham gas jyoengh shei goeus yukgis teh nghuot joq laus eq, nyang dvyuk masyah jebais los dah lo jens gas maukhung mha dah kyi jens yahge nvmukdra yvm mas ma thoq suon lo dah sihsho teh nyo dah lo jens nyeis dyos los.
58011013	Haih bang dvnganh gas lomsjingh yvmas shei loh goeus. nyamoq gas Mangso dyei toh dah dangthoengh yah sen dah vso vlho ma xauh lhom yoeus. Nghuot laus eq hauh yvlyis we masyah nyvng kat zis yah lhom yoeus. nyamoq gas hai nyeisjvng thoq mas lvbaus yahge boengh dvtsain duot yvlyis rhen yoeus.
58011014	Housoeh teh cho lhyi tsain taiq bang gas nyamoq nyang nyeis das nyhenshang munghdan dvkoeuq xo nyeis zis gas dede nghuot.
58011015	nyamoq thuq khoq mau cho lhyi nghamh suon yoeuh las soh nyeis zis ma nghuot. Hauh mau mas tauh loh mes lyis yoh loh das toeuh yoh toh.
58011016	Gvshih gas hauh thoq lyis zes dah maukhung mha dah munghdan lyis soh nyeis. Housoeh yvmvyah Mangso ka nyamoq dah Mangso oen das yvlyis xoq zis ma nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka nyamoq xiklyis nyeis das joqyos dvkoeuq sont toh dyei.
58011017	Abraham gas Mangso shi yoeuh zis xauh uhlyis, Lomsjingh zis yah lo Isak lyis phudyei jyungshuk kuot las phudyei. Abraham gas Mangso jyank masyah dangthoengh kham yoeus soeu nghuot laus eq nyang gas nyah loteh lyis lomhxangh kuot las phudyei das zis gaunyhauq nghuot.
58011018	Mangso ka Abraham lyis, Ngos nvng lyis dangthoengh toh dah vnyau vshih gas Isak masyah gyoh das, ge.
58011019	Isak lyis shei masyah Mangso yoh dwis toq kat ge Abraham nghamh suon zis yah dvyhangteh jyoengh Abraham gas Isak lyis, shei masyah doms xauh yoeus.
58011020	Lomsjingh zis yah Isak gas jweh los das shishenh lyis xauh kham yoeus das shvmanh jyehjuh yah sen lha Yakop yahge Esau lyis dangthoengh dyei.
58011021	Lomsjingh zis yah Yakop gas nyang shei yeis lyis Yosep dah lotang lhyi shvmanh dyei las, nyah lhamloq thyoh mas nges las Mangso lhyi paiq.
58011022	Lomsjingh zis yah Yosep gas nyang shei das shishenh ni los lyis Israel jens Egutu mau masyah luiq thuq los das cho taiq kyingh toh las, nyah shohyau lyis khasoeh kuot das cho shet toh dang dyei toh.
58011023	Lomsjingh zis yah Moshe dah nyhiphoq gas Moshe khoeu los thang lhyi lhamhmuh somh khyvp top nyang lyis shung toh: Moshe ka svsoh yungh dah loshang nghuot yvlyis nyah zomh nyvng las hwankti dah zau dang lyis lhyweq das zis ma gyuk.
58011024	Moshe ka kuh los lyis, lomsjingh zis yah Pharao lonyi dah lo ge das yvlyis he tyamp.
58011025	Nyang gas dvyoq kyingh yaunos dah pyo cho mha pyo das thoq lyis, Mangso dah dius nyau yah dvgeh shohjyen xauh das yvlyis zes o.
58011026	Nyang Meshia xiklyis jwangh nyhap xauh zis gas Egutu munghdan dah zisyos dvnganh thoq lyis zes gis ge nghamh. Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas jweh los das shishenh lyis doms xauh yoeus das phauh shangh jyungshuk lyis yoeuh tsuk toh.
58011027	Lomsjingh zis yah Moshe ka hwankti dah nhaiqlom dyis yvlyis ma gyuk, Egutu mau masyah thuq khoq. Nyang gas nyoq yah ma yoh nyvng dah Mangso lhyi yoh nyvng teh Egutu mau pheh tauh loh das zis he tyamp.
58011028	Nyang gas lomsjingh zis yah lomons jens lyis sat dah loeuswons soeu ka Israel Vnyau dah lomons jens lyis ma sat bas jungh, Lhuiq Kat Pwe xi kuot las yvng suih lyis khomh mas sanh gyuon das cho taiq toh.
58011029	Lomsjingh zis yah Israel jens gas tung yos mas teh Thomh Nes lyis yoh tsain goeu lai los. Egutu dius jens eq housoeh goeu yoeuh lyis tsain nyop shei zis dvxauh.
58011030	Lomsjingh zis yah Israel jens gas nyhet nyeih top Yerikho wus lyis dye suh lhaink lyis, hauh wusciank lyis yoh gyop gyoh nhang.
58011031	Lomsjingh zis yah nghe nyhiq Rahab gas Israel jens dah joh yoeuh bang lyis dyenschangh khyvlyis lhom yoeus yvmvyah Mangso lhyi domsyos ma gyo bang yah dvgeh sat zis ma xauh.
58011032	Ngos tsoq taiq chah shih lah? Gideon, Barak, Samson, Yeptha, Dawi, Samuel yahge lvpe jens dah cho taiq das ge lyis ngah shishenh mathoq luk.
58011033	Hauh bang gas lomsjingh gvng mas svbih munghdan lyis yoh zan ung. Nyamoq gas dan cho lhyi chank kuot las Mangso dangthoengh dyei toh cho lhyi xauh kham yoeus. Khangkhyi jens dah nhuot lyis yoh cheiq toh.
58011034	Nyilhyam lhyi yoh sat, moengsa thyoh masyah yoh phang luiq, nyamoq yomnhuk laus eq yombos nhang zis xauh yvmvyah moengzan yvmas lyes las lvbaus dah jesphung lhyi yoh zan shuq tyamp.
58011035	Vmesbih jens eq lomsjingh zis yah shei goeus dah nyamoq buisnoms jens lyis kang doms dwis nhang zis tsain xauh. Dvyhamh gas nyamoq lyis lhuiq kat das ge dah toeuh lyis ma lhom yoeus, zes phauh thank dah kang dwis cho pheh dwis toq das xiklyis shoeuhshih zis tsain kham.
58011036	Tsai dvyhamh gas, jwangh las lyuk thoq lyis magoh, twih las thung lhunk zis tsain xauh.
58011037	nyamoq gas luk yah doeuh sat, kywizoe yah vchink chink kywi sat, moengsa yah jap sat zis tsain xauh. Vshoh vjyen shoeuhshih, yhenh zis tsain xauh las yvng yeis shvbeq yeis khuk las tsain yenh.
58011038	Nyamoq gas yaukyenh shanghsenh las khaugus xo bang teh mhanhdyvp mas, boms mas, lukkhyung mha, tsoh khyung mha tsain nyeis yenh. Mungkvn gas nyamoq yah ma mon.
58011039	Hauh dvnganh zis gas, nyamoq dah lomsjingh gvng mas chunghtoq zis xauh laus eq Mangso dangthoengh dyei toh jyehjuh lyis nyamoq ma xauh kham yoeus shih.
58011040	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka yah xiklyis zes gis dah nghamh thyet cho toh dyei. Hau thyet toh cho ka yang yah dvgeh nghuot lyis nyamoq lomsjingh dah dyinghjet vkyuh lyis xauh yoeus das.
58012001	Gvshih yah xiklyis hei iq nyo dah kanghjyoeng jens gas yang lyis lhaink toh. Housoeh las yang gas cho mha pahkai cho khanghmuh lyis eq, yang mas dap joq dah yaunos lyis eq phe tyamp las yang wuih das xiklyis nghamhloms thyet toh dah toeuqkhom jweh shoq jhen zis yah wuih jweh goh.
58012002	Yah lomsjingh cho xi mas zis vthang jweh shoq dyinghjet nhang soeu Yhensain Yesu lyis yoeuh tsuk toh goh. Yhensain ka nyang kham yoeus das, nyang lyis langh nyeis dah hau gausyis cho gvng mas hau tapzains mas shei kham dah xoqphuh cho lhyi chaxwe ma nhang, hau tapzains cho lhyi khyen yoeus las gvshih nyang gas Mangso dah hwankti tank loqyos shot pheh loh tsung toh goeus.
58012003	Yaunos wons bang yah svsoh hoeng cho lhyi hauh Yhensain kha iq kham lai los goeus yvlyis namoq nghamh yoeuh geh. Housoeh yvmvyah namoq mas yom gyau las shoeuh loh cho vbos nhang goh.
58012004	Namoq gas yaunos yah zan goh cho mha sat zis xauh das vkant jweh shoq ma loeutyonh ku shih.
58012005	Mangso ka, Ngah lo eh, hauh Yhensain nvng lyis soq dyei lyis gyo aq. Nyang nvng lyis nyho lha jyauh lyis yom vgyau.
58012006	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka Nyang jyetdap soeu khanghmuh lyis jyauh las nyah lo jens khyvlyis lhom yoeus bang dvnganh lyis seq joeng, ge namoq lyis nyah lo jens nghuot khyvlyis yomdyei dang lyis namoq tohnyhik goeus lhyeh?
58012007	Namoq xauh nyeis dah shanghsenh yvlyis uwus dah jyauh cho teh jhen nyeis geh: Namoq xauh kham dah shanghsenh gas namoq lyis Mangso ka nyah lo jens lyis teh jyauh cho nghuot. Nyah uwus nyho lha ma jyauh dah lo khalhye bos ku lah?
58012008	Nyah lo jens dvnganhmoq kham ku teh, jyauh yvlyis ma kham yoeus lyis gas namoq lo gyingh ma nghuot, deslo dvtsain nghuot.
58012009	Yang lyis nyho lha jyauh dah cangsoeu uwus moq lyis yang phauh nyang. Housoeh lyis yah Dyos yah sen dah Uwus o mha gyoh nyeis las kang dwis nyeis chah ma nghuot lhyeh?
58012010	Cangsoeu uwus moq gas yang lyis dvyoq kyingh nyamoq jus ge nghamh suon zis yah dvyhangteh nyho lha seq jyauh; nghuot laus eq Mangso ka yah xiklyis gis das nyhenshang, nyang teh gyingshang los bas jungh ge yang lyis nyho lha jyauh.
58012011	Yang nyho lha jyauh zis xauh kham uhlyis houka yah xiklyis gaus cho ma nghuot, nhaiqkuk cho teh dvnghuot laus eq thang pheh doms yoeuh lyis housoeh teh nyho lha jyauh zis kham yoeus bang gas dan dah kang dwis cho lhyi nyenstap jyungshuk khyvlyis xauh yhomh yoeus.
58012012	Housoeh yvmvyah nhuk gyoh dah loq lyis toeu geh; nvn dah phvlukchvp lyis yombos nhang geh.
58012013	Cho dan chank tsoq suh loh geh, hauh uhlyis dyoq dah khyei ma yoh yhung lo shoq ma bweh, gis los das.
58012014	Dius dvnganhmoq yah nyenstap khyvlyis yoh nyeis shoq eq, gyingshang dah kang dwis cho lhyi xauh yoeus shoq eq yomkat nyeis geh. Khasoeh ge lyis housoeh teh kang dwis cho yah ma nghuot lyis hank eq Yhensain lhyi ma yoh nyvng.
58012015	Mangso dah jyehjuh masyah nungsdoms bang ma bweh bas jungh, zungh nyeis geh. Khoh dah saiq nyet gas yuk kuh los las nyah nyonoq yah yau nyoshoq yoh dyei teh, namoq hank mas eq housoeh ma bweh bas jungh zaih nyeis geh.
58012016	Wotwu ma gis, dyos lomsjingh cho ma bos zis yah wom dvnyo xiklyis kyingh yah mang muh toeuh ungh tyamp dah Esau teh, namoq hank mas eq ma bweh bas jungh, zaih nyeis geh.
58012017	Namoq seq zis yah dvyhangteh nyang gas thang lhyi ka uwus jyank masyah shvmanh jyehjuh yoh mes. Nghuot laus eq nyang ma yoh. Khasoeh ge lyis nyang kuot lai los goeus yvlyis doms soq das cho ngausdyeis yah xo laus eq ma nyvng lo.
58012018	Namoq gas Israel vnyau jens teh loq yah yoh tanh las nyi duk nyeis, chuot, soeng soeng noq, lyeis muh jyang muot,
58012019	lvbuh thwe gyo zis yahge nyoqnyvng dang thwe thuq dah Sina boms mas namoq jweh ku zis ma nghuot. Nyamoq hauh thwe xauhgyo lyis gohtoeu thwe dvkoeuq eq ma xauhgyo lo bas jungh ge tsain dung.
58012020	Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas, Gaunyhauq dvdoeu yangh hauh boms lyis zangh tanh lyis, luk yah doeuh sat geh, ge tying toh zis lyis ma tsain yoh kham.
58012021	Nyvng zis dvkoeuq gonh gas gyukphoh nghuot yvmvyah Moshe yangh, Ngos svsoh gyuk goeus, ge.
58012022	Namoq gas Sina boms gungsthaiq Zion boms yahge loeuswons bang mons sens nyeis dwis nyeis Mangso dah wus ge, maukhung Yerusalem mas tsain jweh nyeis goeus.
58012023	Namoq gas maukhung mha nyings lhaih toh yvmas bos, lomons jens gausyis huom nyeis dah huom mha tsain jweh joq. Dius nyau dvnganh lyis soetuon soeu ge Mangso jyank mas eq, dyinghjet nhang zis xauh goeus dah dan bang dah dyos jyank mas eq, jweh nyeis goeus.
58012024	Namoq gas Thanghchvp saiq lyis kuot dyei soeu Yesu jyank mas eq, Abel suih thoq lyis zes, sanh gyuon suih jyank mas eq tsain jweh goeus.
58012025	Namoq gas hauh Dang taiq soeu lhyi ma gyo dyei ngoek tyamp cho ma bweh bas jungh zaih nyeis geh. Haih nyeisjvng thoq mas taiq kyingh soeu dah dang lyis gyo yoeus das zis ngoek bang yobos dyei masyah ma yoh luiq. Housoeh las yang gas maukhung mhayah taiq soeu lhyi nungs phuk tyamp lyis gas, yobos dyei masyah luiq das cho zes ma bos lo.
58012026	Hauh shishenh lyis Mangso dah thwe ka nyeisjvng lyis nhont kat; nghuot laus eq gvshih gas nyeisjvng lyis kyingh ma nghuot, maukhung lhyi eq dvlhain doms nhont das, ge dangthoengh toh.
58012027	Tsai dvlhain, ge dah dang vjyuk gas, gvnkhanh toh zis xauh dah vyhang dvnganh lhyi nhont las yoeus tyamp das las ma yoh nonh dah vyhang kyingh dvnyet joq das, ge zis nghuot.
58012028	Housoeh las yang xauh yoeus dah munghdan gas ma yoh nonh las yang Mangso lhyi chungh nyeis goh. Yang gas nhaiqshoqlang ehnyet bos las, gyukwoms zis yah Yhensain nhaiqdoeus khyvlyis Mangso lhyi phuqsoe nyeis goh.
58012029	Khasoeh ge lyis yah Mangso ka yoh ngeh jom nhang dah nyi nyang nghuot.
58013001	Namoq gas vmang vnoeuh nyang changh jyetdap vmang vnoeuh ehnyet tsoq las chixoeuq goh nyeis geh.
58013002	Namoq yhen mha lvbaus boenghwus lyis lhom yoeus las phuqsoe das zis vtohnyhik goh. Housoeh phuqsoe zis dvyhamh gas loeuswons bang lyis masoh mathamh zangh phuqsoe goeus.
58013003	Namoq gas thung lungh bang lyis eq dvgeh thung lungh joq bang teh nyamoq lyis soh nyeis geh. Shanghsenh zis xauh bang lyis namoq nyang shanghsenh nyeis teh soh nyeis geh.
58013004	Nyi hwank cho lhyi dius dvnganhmoq phauh nyang chungh bas jungh. Yhensain phoq yhensain nyhiq nyang changh dang yoh jings goh nyeis bas jungh. Mangso ka wotwu dyoq bang yahge nyi shuot lvng shuot bang lyis soetuon das.
58013005	Namoq gas ngwis nyoqnoq dah muh dvnganh lyis jhank nyeis geh. Yoh nyhoq yah nhaiqtap nyeis geh: khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka, Ngos nvng lyis khanhamp eq ma toh khoq das; Ngos nvng lyis khanhamp eq ma doeuh tyamp toh das ge toh.
58013006	Housoeh yvmvyah, Yhensain ka ngos lyis pangh soeu nghuot las, Ngos cha lhyi eq ma gyuk noh. Ngos lyis hank cha yoh kuot das! oen yang womh ehnyet yah taiq nyeis goh.
58013007	Namoq lyis Mangso dah dang taiq kyoh goeus, xik lyis dah cho shwih she los bang lyis soh nyeis geh. Nyamoq kang khasoeh dwis las khasoeh shei loh goeus yvlyis doms nghamh yoeuh zis yah nyamoq dah lomsjingh yikhyoh lyis toeuq yoeus geh.
58013008	Yesu Khristu gas nyinaq, khvnyhik, vcaiq vto dvyhangteh nghuot.
58013009	Xikpheh ma nyvng ku, ma xauhgyo ku dah jyauh cho vja ja yah namoq lyis cho vshwih whang nhang goh. Zonoms yah sen, chank chah lyi lyis chank tyink khyvlyis ma nghuot, Mangso dah jyehjuh masyah dyos yom lyis kham yoeus zis gas zes gis. Zonoms yah sen dah lyi gas chank kuot bang lyis cha ma yoh pangh.
58013010	Yuda jens dah paiq joqyos vkhau mha phuqsoe dah phudyei bang gas yah phon mha dah phudyei cha eq yoh zo das toeuh ma yoh.
58013011	Yuda Phudyei Zainsmuh gas gaunyhauq dah suih lyis yaunos khyuot das phudyei khyvlyis gyingshang thank joqyos mas yoeus wvng loh nghuot laus eq hauh phudyei mvng lyis gas dvp nghe mha dvngheq tyamp.
58013012	Haih cho gvng mas Yesu eq nyah suih yah dius jens lyis yaunos masyah cheihshang yoeus das xiklyis wus nghe mha shei kham goeus.
58013013	Housoeh yvmvyah yang gas dvp nghe pheh nyah jyank mas thuq e lha nyang kham dah xoqphuh cho lhyi dvgeh chomp kham goh.
58013014	Khasoeh ge lyis haih nyeisjvng thoq mas yah xiklyis goeng joq dah wus ma bos las, yang gas thang pheh jweh los das wus lyis dvxo nyeis.
58013015	Housoeh las yang gas nyang lyis yah Yhensain nghuot oen rhen dah nhuot yahge phudyei dah yah Chungh Dang lyis Yhensain Yesu gvng mas, Mangso lhyi vjangh phudyei nyeis goh.
58013016	Gis dah muh kuot das zis namoq nyang changh pangh goh das cho vtohnyhik goh. Khasoeh ge lyis housoeh teh dah lomhxangh gas Mangso lhyi nhaiqdoeus nhang.
58013017	Namoq dah uhshe bang dah domsyos gyo las nyamoq taiq toh dang lyis chank kuot nyeis geh. Nyamoq gas nyamoq phuqsoe dah muh cho Mangso lhyi suon xoeuq chah las, namoq ehnyet lyis ma no lo zungh yoeuh dyei nyeis. Namoq nyamoq dah domsyos gyo lyis gas nyamoq kuot dah muh lyis gausyis zis yah kuot das. Housoeh ma nghuot lyis gas nyamoq nhaiqkuk zis yah kuot das las namoq xiklyis chah vkyuh ma bos das.
58013018	Ngamoq xiklyis malyen lo shvmanh dung nyeis geh. Ngamoq gas ngamoq dah sohseq ehnyet shang shang bos zis soh soh nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis ngamoq gas shishenh khanghmuh jus cho kuot mes ehnyet tsain bos.
58013019	Mangso ka ngos lyis namoq jyank mas lvnyap doms jweh los nhang bas jungh, oen yomkat shvmanh dung das xiklyis sang kat.
58013020	Nyah kang lhyi phudyei las shei kham zis yah vcaiq vto thanghchvp lyis kyihau tap goeus las yvng jens dah yvng yoeuh uhjyung Zainsmuh ge, yah Yhensain Yesu lyis Mangso ka shei masyah dwis toq nhang goeus.
58013021	Namoq gas nyah nhaiqdoeus cho yoh chank kuot das xiklyis namoq mas chah nyeis, gis dah cho khanghmuh lyis nyenstap Mangso ka dyei bas jungh, Yhensain ka nyang o khyvlyis yah dvyhangteh Khristu gvng mas nyang nhaiqdoeus cho lhyi yang mas kuot bas jungh, Khristu mas vcaiq vto phunk bos bas jungh. Amen.
58013022	Boekyis eh, hai yomdyei dang lyis jhen zis yah gyo yoeus das xiklyis ngos namoq lyis sang kat. Khasoeh ge lyis ngos namoq lyis lhaih kat haih maussauh gas nyoshoq xing zis ma nghuot.
58013023	Ngamoq dah vmang vnoeuh Timothi gas thung mhayah luiq los goeus cho namoq lyis seq nhang mes. Nyang lvnyap jweh los lyis gas namoq yah xauhgoh das nyhenshang ngos nyang yah dvgeh los das.
58013024	Namoq dah uhshe bang dvnganh yahge Mangso dah dius nyau dvnganh lyis jeshuh dyei geh. Itali mau mas vmang vnoeuh moq gas namoq lyis jeshuh kat.
58013025	Mangso dah jyehjuh gas namoq dvnganhmoq yah dvgeh joq bas jungh.
59001001	Mangso yahge Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah jyeidwis nghuot dah Yaku gas, mungkvn gonh nyeis dyos joq dah Mangso dius jens lyis jeshuh kat.
59001002	Ngah boekyis eh, shiwu zis vja ja xauh uhlyis namoq xiklyis gaus cho nghuot oen lhom yoeus geh.
59001003	Khasoeh ge lyis namoq dah lomsjingh ehnyet yah housoeh teh shiwu cho lhyi yoh ung tyamp uhlyis vsainnyang mas yoh kham dah yom lung los yvlyis namoq seq.
59001004	Namoq gas chah cho mha laus eq chah zis ma bos, dyinghjet nyeis bas jungh, namoq dah jhen ehnyet lyis thang thank jweh shoq goeng joq nhang geh.
59001005	Nghuot laus eq namoq mas dvyuk yuk joeui chah nyeis lyis gas Mangso jyank mas shvmanh dung bas jungh, Mangso ka nyang lyis hauh cho dyei das: khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas dvnganh lyis magons magoh jyehjuh khyvlyis dyei nyeis soeu nghuot.
59001006	Nghuot laus eq, namoq shvmanh dung uhlyis loms shuot ehnyet ma bos bos, lomsjingh ehnyet yah dung chah. Loms shuot soeu hank laus eq lyeis muot las toq dah thomh mas jeisphauq yah doeusgoh.
59001007	Housoeh teh soeu ka nyang kuot cho dvnganh mas nyah ehnyet ma yoh nghamh thyet las ehnyet ma thyeh thyet soeu nghuot.
59001008	Nyang gas ehnyet aiq ja bos soeu nghuot las, Yhensain jyank masyah cha eq xauh yoeus das oen ma nghamh noh.
59001009	Nyungs dah Khristan vmang vnoeuh gas, nyang lyis Mangso toeu toq uhlyis gaus bas jungh.
59001010	Dis dah Khristan vmang vnoeuh ka, Mangso nyang lyis nyhen mha khyoq zis xauh lyis gaus nyeis chah: khasoeh ge lyis dis bang gas mhanhdyvp mas ban teh wui loh das.
59001011	Buis gas gywes ngeh los lyis ban zains ngeh kyuk tyamp. Ban buh eq gywis gyoh zis yah ban yungh dah vwot gas dyoq tyamp. Houyah dvyhangteh dis soeu ka nyah muhzoh kuot nyeis lyis dyoqbis las dyuk tyamp das.
59001012	Shiwu zis xauh lyis lomluk nyeis soeu ka ngelhoq: khasoeh ge lyis hauh soeu ka housoeh teh shiyoeuh cho lhyi yoh lai ung lhyi Mangso ka nyang lyis jyetdap bang lyis dyei das ge thoengh toh dah kang lhyi jyungshuk khyvlyis xauh kham yoeus das.
59001013	Dius dvyuk housoeh teh dah shiwu zis xauh lyis, Mangso ka ngos lyis shiwu, ge yoh taiq das zis ma nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis ma gis zis gas Mangso lhyi yoh shiwu zis ma nghuot. Tsai, nyang hank lyis eq shiwu nyeis zis ma nghuot.
59001014	Nghuot laus eq dius dvyuk shiwu zis xauh ge zis gas, vsainnyang ehnyet obos cho yah she loh yvmas chank loh las hauh jons duot loh yvlyis taiq zis nghuot.
59001015	Hau obos ehnyet yenh goeus ya yaunos lyis khoeu kat. Yaunos yenh goeus ya shei cho lhyi khoeu kat.
59001016	Ngah jyetdap boekyis eh, chowhang vwhang goh.
59001017	Gis las dyinghjet dah jyehjuh jyungshuk dvnganh gas maukhung mhayah, maukhung bvng zis lyis tsain gvnkhanh toh dah Mangso mhayah los zis nghuot. Nyang mas phanh phuk nyeis gvng mas thaiq loh shaih loh cho yahge siyet ma bos.
59001018	Nyang gvnkhanh toh yvmas yang gas cangxeih joqyos yoh dah vxeih vnyau duot bas jungh, nyang o khyvlyis hau jyoeng dang yah nyang yang lyis yaus kat.
59001019	Ngah jyetdap boekyis eh, haih cho comh geh. Yuk khanghmuh gas gyo yoeus das zis nyap bas jungh, nghuot laus eq dang taiq das zis yahge nhaiq yo das zis vgyen.
59001020	Dius dah nhaiqyo zis gas Mangso o dah dan cho lhyi yoh bweh nhang zis ma nghuot.
59001021	Housoeh yvmvyah ma lhoq ma shang dah wotwu khanghmuh yahge ma gis wotwu dvnganh lyis shang tyamp geh. Ehnyet nyhen mha gyoh zis yah Mangso dah domsyos gyo las, nyang namoq ehnyet mas kat toh dyei goeus, namoq lyis yoh khyuot yoeus dah hauh dang lyis lhom yoeus geh.
59001022	Nyah dang lyis xauhgyo khyvlyis yah kyingh vsainnyang gungs lyis ma mhuih jyomh bas jungh, hauh dang lyis chank kuot nyeis geh.
59001023	Hauh dang xauhgyo las ma chank kuot soeu hank laus eq vsainnyang nyoqnho lhyi bvngtoenk mas yoeuh zo soeu yah doeusgoh.
59001024	Nyang gas nyah gungs lyis yoeuh zo lho lha thuq loh yah dvyih nyah gungs khasoeh teh zis tohnyhik tyamp.
59001025	Nghuot laus eq dius lyis lhuiq kat dah dyinghjet lyi lyis yoeuh tsuk toh soeu ka hauh lyi lyis xauhgyo las doms tohnyhik tyamp soeu ma nghuot, tsoq las chank kuot soeu nghuot yvmvyah nyang kuot yvlyis Mangso shvmanh zis xauh das.
59001026	Ngos gas lomsnoq cho chank soeu nghuot ge namoq mas dvyuk yuk nghamh laus eq, vsainnyang lhyo lhyi ma yoh joeu lyis gas nyah lomsnoq cho ka vkom dvnghuot las nyah gungs lyis mhuih jyomh soeu dvnghuot.
59001027	Uwus Mangso xikkhonh mas lhoqshang lha gyingh dah lom noq cho ge zis gas, yaukyenh xauh nyeis dah chauhmuh chauhlo jens lyis bos yoeuh bos gomh las, vsainnyang gungs lyis mungkvn dah vwot v-oeu yah ma zangh shoq zaih las nyeis cho nghuot.
59002001	Ngah boekyis eh, namoq gas yah phunk bos Yhensain Yesu Khristu lyis lomsjingh bang nghuot zis yah dvyhangteh dius jens lyis yoh nyvng dah gungs lyis yoeuh las nyoqnho khyen khyvlyis dvyuk yah dvyuk khanhamp eq vzomh goh.
59002002	Dangtoeuq, dis las xing loqkyop kyop, phauhdap dyimis wuot soeu dvyuk yahge vjuiq vnyho dyimis wuot dah nyungs soeu dvyuk namoq huom yvmas jweh los oen goh.
59002003	Namoq gas hau phauhdap dyimis wuot soeu lhyi zes phauh nyang zis yah, Haih gis thank joqyos mas tsung aq ge lho lha; nyungs soeu lhyi ka, Nvng thyimha yap aq, nghuot ya ngah khyeiyang mas tsung aq, ge sang lhyi ka,
59002004	namoq mas khwih khyamh cho lhyi bweh nhang lha, ma gis dah nghamh ehnyet yah dang thang thyet bang bweh goeus yvmvyah yaunos tsain bos.
59002005	Ngah jyetdap boekyis eh, gyo yoeus geh: Mangso ka haih mungkvn mas nyungs bang lyis lomsjingh cho mha dis bang bweh das zis yahge nyang lyis jyetdap bang lyis thoengh toh dah munghdan lyis xauh sain yoeus das nyhenshang nyang nyamoq lyis khyen yoeus.
59002006	Namoq yuk nyungs bang lyis ma phauh ma danh kuot goeus nyvng! Namoq lyis zaiq las soetuon bang xikkhonh mas lang she loh bang gas hank tsain nghuot lah? Hauh zis gas dis bang nghuot.
59002007	Nyamoq gas namoq lyis dyei toh goeus dah nyings gis lyis jwangh bang tsain nghuot.
59002008	Namoq gas, Nah yhenkyoh lyis nvnyang gungs lyis teh yoh jyetdap das, ge lhaihtoh dang mas bos. Maukhung munghdan lyi lyis domsyos gyo lyis gas namoq gis las jus yvlyis kuot nyeis.
59002009	Nghuot laus eq namoq gas dius lyis yoh nyvng dah gungs lyis yoeuh las nyoqnho khyen khyvlyis lhom yoeus las zomh nghuot lyis gas namoq yaunos tsain yoh zis yahge hauh Lyi gas namoq lyis lyi lhyweq soeu khyvlyis dang thang thyet das.
59002010	Hank laus eq lyi dvkoeuq lhyweq goeus ya lyi dvnganh yvlyis lhyweq goeus.
59002011	Khasoeh ge lyis, nyi shuot lvng vshuot, ge tung toh soeu nyang, Dius vsat, ge taiq nyeis shih. Nvng gas nyi ma shuot laus eq dius sat lyis gas nvng lyi lhyweq soeu nghuot goeus.
59002012	Housoeh yvmvyah namoq gas yang lyis lhuiq kat dah lyi yah soetuon zis xauh das bang teh taiq las, chank kuot loh geh.
59002013	Khasoeh ge lyis nhaiqnyen das ehnyet ma bos soeu lhyi soetuon uhlyis Mangso ka nyang lyis nhaiqnyen cho Chixoeuq das zis ma nghuot. Nghuot laus eq Nhaiqnyen ehnyet gas soetuon cho lhyi ung tyamp goeus.
59002014	Ngah boekyis eh, namoq dvyuk yuk gas, Ngos gas lomsjingh cho bos, ge taiq laus eq, nyang muh khanh yvmas kanghjyoeng ma chixoeuq lyis gas cha vkyuh bos lah? Hau lomsjingh zis gas nvng lyis yoh khyuot yoeus lhyeh?
59002015	Dangtoeuq: dyimis chah nyeis zis yahge zoshuk das zonoms dyet dah vmang vnoeuh, nghuot ya nhamhmuh jens nyeis oen goh.
59002016	Namoq gas nyamoq lyis, Namoq lyis Mangso shvmanh dyei bas jungh! Jo jo zo geh, nywe nywe nyeis geh, ge las kang xiklyis yhaugyen zis ma dyei lyis gas chah vkyuh bos das lah?
59002017	Lomsjingh cho mha eq houyah dvyhangteh nghuot. Muhzoh ma bos dah lomsjingh cho ka vshei dvnghuot.
59002018	Nghuot laus eq dvyuk mas lomsjingh cho bos las, gohtoeu dvyuk mas muhzoh bos, ge dvyuk yuk ngos lyis taiq los lyis gas, muhzoh ma bos dah lomsjingh cho ngos lyis Chixoeuq aq; ngos gas ngah lomsjingh cho lhyi ngah muhzoh yah nvng lyis Chixoeuq das.
59002019	Mangso ka dvso kyingh dvnghuot yvlyis nvng jingh lhyeh? Nghuot goeus, gis joq! Yius jens eq lomsjingh nyeis las tsain gyuk nvn nyeis.
59002020	Koh soeu eh, muhzoh ma bos dah lomsjingh cho ka vkom dvnghuot yvlyis nvng seq mes lhyeh?
59002021	Yah phauh thyeih Abraham gas Mangso xikkhonh mas dan cho lhyi khasoeh yoh yoeus lah? Nyang gas nyah lo Isak lyis phon mha phudyei ge dah muhzoh yah xauh yoeus.
59002022	Nyah lomsjingh cho yahge muhzoh dvgeh khanh nyeis zis yahge nyah lomsjingh cho ka nyah muhzoh gvng mas yoh dyinghjet los goeus yvlyis nvng ma nyvng ma seq lhyeh?
59002023	Abraham gas Mangso lhyi lomsjingh las nyah lomsjingh cho gvng mas nyang lyis dan, ge lhom yoeus dyei, ge dah lhaihtoh dang gas dyingh nyuk los. Housoeh las Abraham gas Mangso dah buisnoms phoq ge dah nyings lyis kham yoeus goeus.
59002024	Housoeh las dius gas nyah lomsjingh gvng mas kyingh ma nghuot, nyah muhzoh yah Mangso dah xikkhonh mas dan soeu yoh bweh los yvlyis namoq nyvng.
59002025	Nghe nyhiq Rahab dah cho eq houyah dvyhangteh nghuot. Nyang gas joh yoeuh bang lyis lhom yoeus lho lha, gohcho yah luiq thuq loh das xiklyis pangh kat dah muhzoh gvng mas Mangso xikkhonh mas dan cho lhyi xauh lhom yoeus.
59002026	Housoeh las gungs mas dyos ma bos lyis gas vshei dvnghuot teh, muhzoh ma bos dah lomsjingh cho eq vshei dvnghuot.
59003001	Ngah boekyis eh, yang svra moq gas gohyuk thoq lyis zes than dah lyi yah soetuon zis xauh das yvlyis soh zis yah, namoq svra nyoshoq yuk vkuot mes goh.
59003002	Yang dvnganhmoq gas dvsoq soq lyis seq shuot bang nghuot. Nghuot laus eq dius dvyuk gas nyang taiq yvmas khanhamp eq ma shuot nghuot lyis gas hauh soeu ka dyinghjet soeu nghuot las nyah gungs gonh lyis yoh joeu soeu nghuot.
59003003	Yang gas nyang lyis yah dang gyo nhang das xiklyis nyang nhuot mas thyeq lungthungh kat lyis yang o yvpheh yoh loh nhang.
59003004	Nghuot ya sangpho dvkoeuq lyis nghamh yoeuh goh, Svsoh kuh dah sangpho lhyi than dah lyeismuh jyang yah bat zis xauh laus eq, svsoh ngis dah shvp yah yoh joeu las sangpho komp soeu loh nhang mes yvpheh loh nyeis.
59003005	Lhyo ka houyah dvyhangteh nghuot. Houka gungsdoeus mas vmhauhlo dvnghuot laus eq svsoh kuh cho jeis lyis seq moengs. Vtsihlo dah nyi jyenh gas kha iq teh dah dainhjeis yos lyis yoh ngeh tyamp yvlyis nghamh yoeuh geh.
59003006	Lhyo eq nyi yah doeusgoh. Lhyo yah gungs shoh dah gungsdoeus mas ma gis ma shop dah mungkvn nghuot las gungs gonh mas hau ma shop yvlyis dyingh los nhang. Lhyo ka munyi yah nyang, yah kang dwis cho gonh lyis ngheq kat.
59003007	Yang cangsoeu dius gas gohtoeu yewus ja khanghmuh, nghoq ja khanghmuh, shweh loh ja yahge jeis khau mha dah oengdoq vja ja lyis yoh mhiq las hounyhoq zis tsain mih.
59003008	Nghuot laus eq lhyo lhyi ka hank eq ma yoh mhiq: hauh zis gas ma gis ma shop joq zis yahge ma yoh guon toh las shei nhang dah nyonoq yah dyingh joq.
59003009	Yang gas lhyo lhyi, yah Yhensain Uwus Mangso lhyi chungh yvmas eq, Mangso dah gungsdoeus lho yah dvyhangteh gvnkhanh toh goeus dah dius nyang changh yah nhoengh khan goh yvmas eq, yhung nyeis.
59003010	Nhuot dvkoeuq kyingh masyah Chungh Dang yahge nhoengh dang thuq los. Ngah boekyis eh, houka namoq mas ma bweh oeng.
59003011	Jeisthuq dwang dvkoeuq kyingh masyah jeis nghamh yahge jeis khoh yoh thuq kat zis ma nghuot.
59003012	Ngah boekyis eh, maiphang zains mas tsanlun shih, zvbiq nwis mas maiphang shih ma yoh shih. Houyah dvyhangteh coh ngvm jeis thuq dwang gas nghamh dah jeis ma yoh thuq nhang.
59003013	Namoq mas joeui bos las seq cho bos soeu dvyuk yuk bos lah? Hauh soeu ka nyang joeui bos cho lhyi nyah dah gis dah kang dwis cho yah eq, noeuh nhamp las joeui bos khyvlyis gis dah muhzoh kuot zis yah eq kanghjyoeng Chixoeuq bas jungh.
59003014	Nghuot laus eq namoq ehnyet mas noh goh cho, nhaiq khoh, namoq nyang vkyuh dvxo ehnyet bos lyis gas, namoq joeui bos ge nghamh las khwank zis yah hau jyoeng cho lhyi shuot dah yobos vkuot goh.
59003015	Housoeh teh joeui ka maukhung mhayah los dah joeui ma nghuot: houka mungkvn yahge dyos cho ma nghuot dah suih shoh yahge yius gomloeus yah dvsen.
59003016	Hauh yvmas noh cho, vsainnyang vkyuh dvxo cho, nhunk cho yahge ma gis ma shop cho vja ja bos yvlyis nyvng.
59003017	Nghuot laus eq nyhang mhayah jweh los dah joeui ka, cangxeih gas tsingh-kan, hauh thang lhyi nyenstap, noeuh nhamp, dap goh cho lhyi bweh nhang thoq lyis nhaiqnyen shoh gyo cho yah dyingh las gis dah muhzoh ge dah vshih lyis xauh yhomh yoeus. Houmha nyoqnho khyen cho yahge vguons kuot cho ma bos.
59003018	Hau gis dah cho ka nyenstap muh wons bang nyenstap cho mha nyau khyoq las xauh yhomh yoeus dah jyo nyau shih nyau nghuot.
59004001	Namoq mas zan goh cho yahge dyoqgoh nyens goh cho ka kha mhayah los lah? Houka namoq dah gungs shoh pyo cho omes mhayah thuq los las vjangh zan goh nyeis.
59004002	Namoq gas vyhang dvja ja lyis o lha hauh yvlyis ma yoh los lyis dius sat das zis cicont nghuot. Namoq svsoh o mes laus eq ma tsain yoh yvmvyah dyoqgoh zan goh nyeis. Namoq o zis namoq ma yoh: khasoeh ge lyis namoq hauh nyhenshang Mangso lhyi ma dung yvmvyah nghuot.
59004003	Namoq dung lyis ma tsain xauh yoeus: khasoeh ge lyis namoq kuot dah cho ka ma gis namoq nyang dah pyo cho mha yhung das xiklyis dvdung yvmvyah ma tsain xauh yoeus.
59004004	Namoq gas lom ma luk bang nghuot nyvng! Mungkvn yah buisnoms kuot zis gas, Mangso dah jeswus bweh nyeis ge zis lyis namoq ma seq goh lhyeh? Mungkvn dah buisnoms bweh mes soeu hank laus eq vsainnyang gungs lyis Mangso dah jeswus bweh nhang nyeis.
59004005	Yah jyank mas Mangso kat toh dyei dah dyos gas noh dah ehnyet dyingh joq ge dah lhaihtoh dang mas jyoeng cho ma bos oen namoq nghamh goh lhyeh?
59004006	Nghuot laus eq Mangso yang lyis dyei dah jyehjuh gas yom zes bos. Mangso ka khwank bang lyis kyamp toh laus eq, ehnyet nyhen mha gyoh bang lyis jyehjuh dyei, ge lhaihtoh dang mas taiq zis yah dvyhangteh nghuot.
59004007	Housoeh las Mangso dah o mha gyoh nyeis las nyang o cho chank geh. Satan lhyi thoenk tyamp geh; housoeh lyis nyang namoq jyank masyah phang loh das.
59004008	Mangso jyank pheh los geh; hauh uhlyis nyang namoq jyank pheh los das. Yaunos dap bang eh, namoq dah loq lyis cheihshang toh geh; vguons kuot bang eh, namoq dah ehnyet lyis tsingh-kan nhang geh.
59004009	Nhaiqkuk nhaiqngis zis yah kaiq ngaus geh; namoq dah yis zis gas ngaus yvpheh, gausyis zis gas chiqjyen yvpheh thaiq tyamp geh.
59004010	Yhensain xikkhonh mas namoq nhaiqlom nyhen mha gyoh nyeis geh: hauh uhlyis nyang namoq lyis toeu toq das.
59004011	Boekyis eh, namoq nyang changh tyixo dang vtaiq goh. Vsainnyang Khristan boekyis dvyuk lyis tyixo dang taiq, nghuot ya soetuon soeu hank laus eq hauh lyi lyis tyixo thoq lyis magoh hauh yvlyis soetuon soeu eq nghuot. Namoq hauh lyi lyis soetuon lhyi ka, lyi chank bang ma nghuot, hauh yvlyis soetuon bang dvnghuot joq.
59004012	Mangso kyingh lyi dyei soeu yahge soe yoh tuon soeu nghuot. Nyang kyingh yoh khyuot yoeus zis yahge yoh mhont tyamp soeu nghuot. Nah yhenkyoh lyis soetuon soeu nvng gas hank nghuot oen nghamh nyeis lah?
59004013	Khvnyhik, nghuot ya phvnaq nyeihyo yang dvwus wus mas loh las, houmha dvzvn thoeng lha soenghi kuot las ngwis nyo nyo yoh shoq kuot das ge bang eh, ngos taiq yvlyis gyo yoeuh geh.
59004014	Namoq gas phvnaq nyeihyo namoq dah kang chamus das zis yangh ma tsain seq. Namoq gas dvsoq kyingh dvthuq los las bi loh dah nyikhauh yah doeusgoh.
59004015	Mangso gyo lyis gas yang dwis nyeis las haih muh eq thyih muh eq yoh kuot das, ge dah dang gas namoq taiq gis.
59004016	Nghuot laus eq gvshih gas namoq khwank las tsain moengs nyeis: housoeh moengs cho dvnganh gas shuot cho nghuot.
59004017	Housoeh yvmvyah gis dah muh kuot das zis seq las ma kuot soeu ka yaunos bos.
59005001	Dis bang eh, gvshih ngos taiq dang lyis gyo yoeus geh! Namoq mas jweh los nyeis dah shanghsenh cho gvng mas kaiq ngaus nyeis geh.
59005002	Namoq dah dis cho dah zisyos gas bop yuq tyamp las, namoq dah dyimis lyis naus yah zo tyamp goeus.
59005003	Namoq dah ngwis xing mha yangh yus zo las hauh yus eq namoq yah tyi dah shot pheh kanghjyoeng duot das las namoq dah gungsshoh lyis nyi teh ngeh jom tyamp das. Namoq gas hai thang thank buisnyeis xiklyis zisyos tsain yung toh.
59005004	Namoq gas namoq dah danh mas muh zwi bang lyis uhkung phauh ma tsain dyei. Nyamoq lop dah thwe lhyi gyo yoeuh geh. Namoq dah jyo yhomh dyei bang dah kaiq thwe ka Maukhung Jesphung Yhensain Mangso dah no mas bangh wvng loh goeus.
59005005	Haih nyeisjvng thoq mas namoq dah kang dwis cho ka gungsdom ehnyet lyis lhoq ngon dah kyahsoe gis yahge pyo cho yah kyingh dyingh joq. Namoq gas sat xauh das buisnyeis xiklyis, namoq nyang gungs lyis coeu shoq tsain nyhuk nyeis.
59005006	Namoq gas yobos ma bos bang lyis dang thang thyet las sat goeus; nyamoq gas namoq lyis tyi ma xo.
59005007	Housoeh yvmvyah boekyis eh, Yhensain doms jweh lyih shoq jhen nyeis geh. Danh zwi zo soeu ka nyah danh masyah phauhdap dah guk nyau shi nyau khasoeh thuq los nhang das yvlyis khasoeh langh nyeis yvlyis yoeuh geh. Nyang gas ehnyet xing xing yah mau xeih yahge mau nhungh wus das yvlyis langh nyeis.
59005008	Namoq eq nhaiqlom xing xing jhen nyeis geh: Namoq yom hont zis yah nghamhloms nyeis geh. Khasoeh ge lyis Yhensain doms jweh lyih das buisnyeis gas ni los goeus.
59005009	Ngah boekyis eh, namoq Mangso dah dang thang thyet zis ma xauh bas jungh, namoq nyang changh vlop goh nyeis goh; soetuon soeu ka jweh los nyeis goeus las thuq xoeuq das zis cicont nghuot goeus.
59005010	Ngah boekyis eh, Yhensain dah nyings yah taiq kyoh, Lvpe jens dah cho lhyi nghamh suon yoeuh geh. Shanghsenh zis xauh uhlyis ehnyet xing xing jhen yvlyis yikhyoh yoeus geh.
59005011	Nyamoq gas yoh jhen bang nghuot las ngamoq gas nyamoq lyis, Ngelhoq bang oen sang. Yoba dah ehnyet xing cho namoq xauhgyo ku. Thang thank lyis Yhensain ka nyang lyis khasoeh pangh goeus cho namoq seq. Khasoeh ge lyis Yhensain ka nhaiqnyen shohgyo ehnyet yah dyingh joq soeu nghuot.
59005012	Zes las ngah boekyis eh, namoq dangthoengh toh dah uhlyis maukhi dang vyhung goh: maukhung, nyeisjvng, cha lhyi eq nyings yoeus las mau vkhi goh: namoq Mangso dah soetuon zis ma xauh bas jungh, namoq taiq dah dang gas nghuot zis lyis nghuot, ma nghuot zis lyis gas ma nghuot oen dvtaiq geh.
59005013	Namoq mas dvyuk yuk yaukyenh zis xauh nyeis lah? Nyang shvmanh dung bas jungh; dvyuk yuk ehnyet pyo nyeis lyis gas, nyang Chungh Dang yhang bas jungh.
59005014	Namoq mas dvyuk yuk nos xauh nyeis lah? Nyang gas phung logis jens lyis khi lha, nyamoq gas Yhensain dah nyings masyah nyang lyis tsanlun coeu juot las, nyah xiklyis shvmanh dung dyei bas jungh.
59005015	Lomsjingh zis yah shvmanh dung dang gas hau nos soeu lhyi yoh gis los nhang lha Yhensain ka nyang lyis doms yanghzan los nhang das zis yahge; nyang zangh kuot dah yaunos lyis eq khyuot dyei das.
59005016	Namoq lhoq gis zis xauh bas jungh, namoq dah yaunos lyis dvyuk yah dvyuk rhen goh las dvyuk yah dvyuk nyhenshang shvmanh dung dyei goh geh. Dan soeu dah shvmanh dung dang gas yoh bweh los nhang dah yomsoq bos.
59005017	Eliya gas yang teh cangsoeu dius dvnghuot laus eq, mau ma wus bas jungh ge shvmanh dung lyis, somh zvn lhamhmuh khyuk khyvp nyeisjvng mas mau ma wus mus tyamp.
59005018	Tsai nyang shvmanh doms dung lyis, maukhung ka mau wus khyoq dyei las, hau nyeisjvng gas, nyah jyo nyau shih nyau thuq los nhang.
59005019	Ngah boekyis eh, namoq mas dvyuk yuk hau jyoeng cho mhayah whang loh soeu lhyi tauh los nhang lhyi ka,
59005020	hank laus eq hau shwih tauh los soeu ka yaunos yoh soeu lhyi, nyah dah shuot cho mhayah doms tauh nhang kat zis yah nyah dyos lyis shei masyah khyuot yoeus las yaunos vbomsdom masyah khyuot kat zis xauh das nyhenshang kuot dyei soeu nghuot yvlyis soh nyeis bas jungh.
60001001	Yesu Khristu dah lvgyo ngos Petru gas Pontu, Galati, Kapadokia, Asia yahge Bithuni mau mas boenghwus teh khau nges yenh bang, Mangso khyen yoeus dah dius nyau jens lyis maussauh lhaih kat.
60001002	Nyah Dyos mas gyingshang dius nyau kuot las Yesu Khristu dah domsyos gyo das zis yahge nyah suih yah cheihshang yoeus das nyhenshang Uwus Mangso dah gohlhain yah nghamh toeuq toh zis yah dvyhangteh namoq lyis khyen yoeus goeus. Jyehjuh yahge nyenstap zis gas namoq mas dyingh los bas jungh.
60001003	Yang gas Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah Uwus Mangso lhyi chungh nyeis goh. Khasoeh ge lyis nyah nhaiqnyen ehnyet zainsmuh yah Yesu Khristu lyis shei masyah dwis toq los nhang gvng mas, nyang yang lyis kang vsaiq doms dyei toh goeus las yang mas dwis nyeis dah nghamhloms cho tyink dyei goeus.
60001004	Housoeh las yang gas nyah dius nyau xiklyis Mangso tsomh toh, magons magoh dah shvmanh jyehjuh lyis xauh sain das nyhenshang nghamhloms nyeis. Nyang gas ma bop ma yuq, vwot v-oeu ma bos, ma nyhauh loh dah vso namoq nyhenshang maukhung mha tsomh toh dyei.
60001005	Houka namoq xiklyis nghuot. Namoq gas lomsjingh gvng mas thang thank shishenh lyis thuq xoeuq das zis sont toh dah khyuot yoeus jyehjuh xiklyis Mangso dah yomsoq yah gomh toh zis xauh bang nghuot.
60001006	Namoq xauh nyeis dah shiyoeuh cho vja ja gvng mas nhaiqkuk zis dvyoq xauh laus eq hau khyuot yoeus cho gvng mas namoq svsoh gaus nyeis geh.
60001007	Hau shiyoeuh zis xauh dah cho ka namoq Mangso lhyi lomsjingh ehnyet gas gyingh lah, zis khyink yoeuh das xiklyis nghuot. Yoh thyoq dah xing lhyi yangh nyi mas ngheq shauq las khyink tyamp chah las xing thoq lyis zes phauhdap namoq dah lomsjingh cho lhyi eq goeng toenk das nyhenshang khyink tyamp chah. Housoeh lyis Yesu Khristu doms thuq xoeuq buisnyeis lyis chungh dah phunk yahge nyoqnho ngelang lyis namoq xauh kham yoeus das.
60001008	Namoq Yesu lyis ma nyvng ku laus eq nyang lyis jyetdap nyeis. Gvshih nyang lyis ma nyvng laus eq nyang lyis lomsjingh nyeis. Housoeh las namoq gas ma thoq taiq lo shoq dah gausyis zis yah gausyis nyeis.
60001009	Khasoeh ge lyis Yesu Khristu lyis lomsjingh kang dwis cho dah toeuqkhom nghuot dah namoq dyos kang dah khyuot yoeus cho lhyi xauh lhom yoeus nyeis.
60001010	Hai khyuot yoeus cho yah sen lha lvpe jens gas yomkat las nyei gyo pheh xo lha Mangso namoq lyis dyei das hau jyehjuh jyungshuk cho nyamoq lvpe pe lha taiq kyoh.
60001011	Hau khyuot yoeus zis yah sen dah jyehjuh gas khah shishenh khah caiq lyis khasoeh khyvlyis jweh das cho lhyi yomkat tsain xo. Nyamoq mas bos, Khristu dah dyos gas hauh shishenh lyis Khristu kham das dah shanghsenh cho lhyi eq, housoeh dye kham thang lhyi eq xauh kham yoeus das phunk lyis eq uhlhomh las Chixoeuq toh goeus.
60001012	Nyamoq wons wuq nyeis, taiq kyoh muh gas nyamoq nyang vkyuh xiklyis ma nghuot, namoq xiklyis dvnghuot cho Mangso ka haih lvpe jens lyis Chixoeuq goeus. Namoq jyank mas gausyis loeus chi los bang gas hau lvpe jens uhlhomh las taiq kyoh bang lyis maukhung mhayah nhang kat, Gyingshang Dyos dah yomsoq yah namoq lyis taiq shet yvmvyah namoq xauhgyo goeus. Haih cho lhyi loeuswons bang yangh seqgyo mes.
60001013	Housoeh yvmvyah namoq muh kuot loh das nyhenshang namoq ehnyet lyis cicont kuot geh. Yesu Khristu thuq jyweq xoeuq uhlyis namoq lyis dyei das jyehjuh lyis khamkhvv ehnyet ma bos bos, jyoeng zaih zis yah dyingh dyingh nghamhloms nyeis geh.
60001014	Mangso dah dang lyis domsyos gyo las, namoq xikpheh ma seq shih shishenh lyis namoq dah omes cho khyvlyis suh e lai loh goeus teh tsoq las vdoms kuot goh.
60001015	Namoq lyis khi yoeus dah Mangso ka gyingshang nyeis zis yah dvyhangteh, namoq eq namoq dah kuot loh cho khanghmuh mas gyingshang nyeis geh.
60001016	Hau lhaihtoh dang mas eq, Ngos gyingshang nyeis yvmvyah namoq eq gyingshang nyeis geh, ge toh.
60001017	Hauh thoq lyis dius dvnganh lyis nyoqnho ma khyen, hank eq hank nyang kuot zis yah dvyhangteh soetuon nyeis dah Mangso jyank mas namoq shvmanh dung lyis Nyang lyis Uwus eh, ge tsain dung. Housoeh las haih mungkvn mas namoq kang dwis nyeis gyo lyis nyang lyis gyukwoms nyeis geh.
60001018	Namoq dah phauh thyeih moq masyah bos lyih las phauh ma dap dah kang dwis cho wotwu masyah namoq lyis cha yah khyuot thaiq toh zis gas namoq seq. Houka seq dyoqbis loh dah ngwis xing teh zis dvja ja yah ma nghuot.
60001019	Mesyos ma bos, chah zis ma bos dah yvnglo teh dah phauhdap Khristu suih yah dvnghuot.
60001020	Mungkvn ma bos shih lyis yah Mangso ka nyang lyis khyen toeuq toh las hai thang thank shishenh lyis namoq xiklyis Chixoeuq kat.
60001021	Nyang lyis dwis toq los nhang lha phunk dyei dah Mangso lhyi nyah gvng mas namoq lomsjingh nyeis. Housoeh namoq dah lomsjingh cho yahge nghamhloms cho ka Mangso mha zuk joq.
60001022	Gvshih namoq gas hau jyoeng cho lhyi domsyos gyo zis yah namoq gungs lyis tsain cheihshang lha, namoq dah lomsjingh boekyis lyis jyoengh jyetdap nyeis. Housoeh las namoq nyang changh ehnyet dvnganh yah jyetdap goh nyeis geh.
60001023	Khasoeh ge lyis namoq gas dwis nyeis las vcaiq vto nyeis Mangso Dang gvng mas ma seq shei dah ungwes uwus moq lo jens teh doms khoeu kat zis xauh goeus.
60001024	Houka lhaihtoh dang mas, Cangsoeu dvnganh gas mhanh teh nghuot; nyamoq dah phunk dvnganh mhanh buh yah doeusgoh. Hauh mhanh nyhauh tyamp las vbuh eq gywis gyoh tyamp.
60001025	Nghuot laus eq Yhensain dang gas vcaiq vto joq, ge taiq toh. Hauh Dang gas namoq lyis taiq kyoh dah gausyis dang nghuot.
60002001	Housoeh yvmvyah namoq gas ma gis cho vja ja yahge, mhuih khwangh cho, tyam cho, noh cho yahge ma phauh gis taiq cho dvnganh yvlyis shang tyamp geh.
60002002	Lonoeuh teh dyos yah sen, gyingh dah nauh lyis vjangh yuot nyeis geh. Housoeh namoq shuk las kuhxing los zis yah khyuot yoeus zis xauh das.
60002003	Lhaihtoh dang mas, Yhensain ka kha iq nhaiqnyen shohgyo dah Yhensain nghuot yvlyis namoq nyang kham yoeus ku khyvlyis tsain seq goeus, ge.
60002004	Yhensain jyank mas los geh, nyang gas dius jens yah vkyuh ma bos ge khyen tyamp, dwis nyeis dah luk nghuot. Nghuot laus eq Mangso yah khyen yoeus, phauhdap dah luk bweh los goeus.
60002005	Namoq eq dwis nyeis luk teh Mangso jyank mas los las, dyos yah sen dah yhenmuh tsuk yvmas namoq nyang bos wvng las yhung zis kham geh. Hauh joqyos mas Yhensain Yesu gvng mas, Dyos yah sen lha nhaiqdoeus lhom yoeus gis dah lomhxangh lyis Mangso lhyi phudyei das nyhenshang gyingshang phudyei bang teh namoq phuqsoe das.
60002006	Khasoeh ge lyis lhaihtoh dang mas eq, Yoeuh aq, ngos Zion mha phauhdap luk dvlom khyen lha yhenthunk luklom khyvlyis khyoq toh las, Hauh yvlyis lomsjingh soeu hank laus eq yom ma gyau das. ge bos.
60002007	Namoq lomsjingh bang xiklyis haih luk gas phauhdap. Nghuot laus eq ma lomsjingh bang xiklyis gas, Yhen tsuk bang vkyuh ma bos ge peq tyamp dah luklom gas Yhaugyen dah yhenthunk lukzains bweh goeus, ge.
60002008	Tsai gohtoeu lhaihtoh dang dvkoeuq mas Haih luk gas dius jens lyis thungh lains nhang das; nyamoq lyis dyetgyoh nhang dah lukmuh lom eq duot das, ge taiq toh. Nyamoq gas hau Dang lyis ma lomsjingh yvmvyah thungh lains: housoeh tsain bweh zis gas nyamoq xiklyis Mangso dah ehnyet o cho nghuot.
60002009	Nghuot laus eq namoq gas, khyen yoeus dah vnyau, hwankti phudyei bang, gyingshang dius nyau yahge Mangso nyang sain nyeis bang nghuot. Housoeh khyen yoeus cho ka namoq lyis soeng soeng noq masyah nyah mauhphoh bvng yvmas khi hwank soeu dah phunk bos muhzoh lyis hoeuh kat dyei das xiklyis nghuot.
60002010	Namoq eq lai loh goeus shishenh lyis Mangso dius nyau ma tsain nghuot, gvshih gas nyah dius nyau tsain nghuot los goeus. Xik pheh Mangso nhaiqnyen zis ma xauh kham yoeus, gvshih gas nhaiqnyen zis tsain xauh kham yoeus goeus.
60002011	Ngos jyet kang bang eh, namoq gas mungkvn mas gyung suh boenghwus yahge khau nyeis bang teh nghuot las, gungs dyos yah zan goh nyeis, gungsshoh obos cho lhyi khanhamp eq vsomh ma dyei das xiklyis ngos namoq lyis dung kat.
60002012	Gohnyau bang gas namoq lyis ma gis zis kuot bang nghuot ge tsuk lyis namoq dah gis muhzoh nyvng las Yhensain doms jweh lyih buisnyeis lyis Mangso lhyi yoh chungh bas jungh, nyamoq xikkhonh mas namoq wotwu gis gis kuot geh.
60002013	Yhensain dah nyoqnho lhyi yoeuh las dius jens mas toeuh yoh bang dah o mha gyoh nyeis geh; nyhang thank toeuh yoh dah hwankti o mha laus eq,
60002014	ma shop muh kuot bang lyis shoenk zis yahge gis dah muh kuot bang lyis chungh das xiklyis, toeuq kat toh zis xauh dah mungh zau jens dah o mha laus eq gyoh nyeis geh.
60002015	Khasoeh ge lyis namoq gis dah muh khanh gvng mas seq cho ma bos vkoh vpaq ge taiq los dah dang lyis yoh sam nhang das zis gas Mangso o nyeis.
60002016	Namoq gas luiq bang teh nyeis geh; nghuot laus eq ma gis cho lhyi nghop gos tyamp das xiklyis namoq dah luiq toeuh lyis vyhung goh. Namoq gas Mangso yah sain toh dah jyeidwis jens teh kuot nyeis geh.
60002017	Yuk khanghmuh lyis phauh geh: namoq dah lomsjingh vmang vnoeuh lyis jyetdap geh; Mangso lhyi gyukwoms nyeis geh; hwankti lhyi phauh nyang geh.
60002018	Jyeidwis jens eh, namoq dah yhensain o mha yoh gyoh nyeis das. Nhaiqbos las seq nghamh yoeuh bang lyis kyingh ma nghuot, thung thot bang lyis eq phauh nyang cho vlhomuh Chixoeuq geh.
60002019	Namoq gas Mangso o cho lhyi tsain seq nyeis las namoq ma kham vvng dah shanghsenh xauh kham nyeis lyis gas Mangso ka hauh nyhenshang namoq lyis shvmanh dyei das.
60002020	Namoq gas namoq nyang kuot shuot dah yobos gvng mas kham vvng dah yobos lyis kham nyeis lyis gas cha chungh chank bos lah! Nghuot laus eq jyoeng cho lhyi kuot nyeis goeus lyis eq shanghsenh zis kham lha nos zain nyeis lyis gas Mangso ka namoq lyis hauh nyhenshang shvmanh jyehjuh dyei das.
60002021	Housoeh chank kuot das nyhenshang Mangso ka namoq lyis khi yoeus goeus. Khasoeh ge lyis Khristu nyang eq namoq xiklyis shanghsenh xauh zis yahge namoq nyah beszoh mas yoh chank nang bas jungh ge namoq xiklyis yikhyoh toh dyei.
60002022	Nyang gas yaunos kuot ku zis ma nghuot; nyah nhuot mas mhuih dang hank khanhamp eq ma xauhgyo ku.
60002023	Nyang lyis ma phauh gis kuot lyis nyang ma doms tauh kuot; nyang shanghsenh kham uhlyis nyang kyuk tant cho cha ma kuot, jyoeng dah soetuon soeu Mangso loq mas nyah dah nghamhloms cho kyauh toh.
60002024	Yang gas yaunos toh tyamp las dan yvmas kang yoh dwis nyeis bas jungh, Khristu nyang hau saiqzains thoq mas, yah yaunos nyah gungs mas wons tyamp dyei goeus: nyah dvm gvng mas namoq gas lhoq gis zis xauh goeus.
60002025	Namoq gas chowhang loh yvng jens teh nghuot. Gvshih gas hau Yvng yoeuh soeu yahge namoq dah gungs dyos lyis tsomh soeu dah thang chank das nyhenshang nyah jyank mas shwih tauh jweh los goeus.
60003001	Houyah dvyhangteh yhensain nyhiq jens eh, namoq yhensain phoq jens dah o mha gyoh nyeis geh. Haih cho khyvlyis namoq mas Mangso dang lyis ma lomsjingh shih dah yhensain phoq jens bos lyis namoq dah wotwu lyis nyvng las dang dvkhonh yangh ma taiq noh lomsjingh bang yoh bweh nhang das.
60003002	Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas namoq dah wotwu kha iq gyingh zis yahge phauh nyang yvlyis nyvng das.
60003003	Namoq dah gungs shunk das zis nghe shot pheh nghuot dah cam soq, ngwis xing yah shunk, dyimis yungh yah ma nghuot.
60003004	Housoeh kuot das gungsthaiq namoq dah yungh cho ge yvmas jyoeng lha nyoq yah ma yoh nyvng, nhaiqlom khau mha kang dwis cho noeuh nhamp las vjangh nyens nyens nghuot dah ehnyet ge, nyenhkyi kuh ngis yah ma sen, yungh cho bos chah. Hau yungh cho ka Mangso xikkhonh mas phauhdap thank cho nghuot.
60003005	Khasoeh ge lyis gohnhamp Mangso lhyi nghamhloms nyeis, Lomsjingh cho kuh dah vmesbih jens eq, nyamoq dah yhensain phoq jens dah o mha gyoh nyeis khyvlyis yah nyamoq gungs lyis tsain shunk.
60003006	Sara eq houyah dvyhangteh teh kuot. Nyang gas Abraham lyis domsyos gyo las nyang lyis yhensain ge lui. Namoq eq cha lhyi eq ma gyuk ma woms, gis dah muh kuot nyeis lyis gas gvshih namoq gas Sara dah lonyi jens nghuot joq.
60003007	Houyah dvyhangteh yhensain phoq jens eh, vmesbih jens gas yom nhuk bang nghuot ge yvlyis vlhomuh seqgyo las namoq dah yhensain nyhiq jens yah zomh nyeis geh. Nyamoq lyis phauh nyang geh: khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq eq namoq yah dvyhangteh Mangso jyank masyah kang vso vlho jyungshuk kham yoeus das zis nghuot. Haih cho kuot geh, housoeh lyis namoq dah shvmanh dung dang lyis cha yah eq lhoeu nhunk cho ma bweh nhang das.
60003008	Vthang khyvlyis yah taiq mes zis gas, namoq dvnganhmoq mas dvyhangteh dah nghamh cho yahge kham zo zis yoh bos das las, boekyis nyang changh teh jyetdap goh, nhaiqbos goh zis yah dvyuk yah dvyuk dah nyhen mha gyoh nyeis geh.
60003009	Ma gis yvlyis ma gis zis yah, nhoengh zis lyis nhoengh zis yah vphuk goh. Housoeh kuot das gungsthaiq shvmanh dang yah phuk geh: khasoeh ge lyis hau shvmanh dah dang gas nyang namoq lyis khi yoeus uhlyis namoq lyis dyei das nyhenshang dangthoengh dyei toh goeus.
60003010	Lhaihtoh dang mas, Hank laus eq kang dwis cho mha gausyis zis yah nyeisgis yaplhoq cho o mes, nyvng mes soeu ka, ma gis cho taiq dang jhank las hwah dang taiq cho no tyamp chah.
60003011	Nyang gas ma gis cho mhayah tauh los las gis dah muh kuot bas jungh. Nyang nyenstap cho lhyi xo lha chank kuot bas jungh.
60003012	Khasoeh ge lyis Yhensain dah nyoqjeih gas dan bang lyis yoeuh nyeis las, nyah no gas nyamoq dung zis lyis gyo dyei. Nghuot laus eq ma gis zis kuot bang lyis gas ma gyo dyei, ge.
60003013	Namoq gas gis zis nhaiq wvng wvng kuot mes nyeis lyis gas, namoq lyis hank yoh lhoeu yau das lah?
60003014	Nghuot laus eq jyoeng cho lhyi chank kuot nyeis goeus lyis eq namoq shanghsenh xauh kham nyeis lyis gas, namoq ngelhoq; Hank lyis eq vgyuk goh, chiq eq vchiq goh.
60003015	Namoq dah nhaiqlom mas Khristu lyis phauh nyang zis yah Yhensain o khyvlyis chungh nyeis geh. Namoq mas kham yoeus toh goeus dah nghamhloms cho lhyi dvyuk yuk nyei nghuot lyis gas vjyuk yoh phuk taiq das xiklyis cicont kuot geh.
60003016	Nghuot laus eq hauh yvlyis noeuh nhamp las phauh nyang zis yah kuot nyeis geh. Namoq lyis ma phauh gis kuot bang gas, namoq Khristu thang chank bang khyvlyis chank kuot nyeis dah wotwu gis lyis nyvng las nyamoq taiq goeus dah dang yah sen lha xoqphuh bas jungh, namoq dah sohseq ehnyet shang shang yah kang dwis nyeis geh.
60003017	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso o khyvlyis dvnghuot lyis gas gis dah muh kuot gvng mas shanghsenh xauh zis gas ma gis zis kuot las shanghsenh zis xauh thoq lyis zes gis.
60003018	Khasoeh ge lyis Khristu gas yah yaunos gvng mas dvlhain lhyi yah dvnganh dah xiklyis dye shoq shei kham goeus. Nyang gas dius gis dvyuk nghuot joq las yaunos wons bang dah gungsthaiq shei kham goeus. Housoeh kuot cho ka namoq lyis Mangso jyank mas shwih loh das xiklyis nghuot. Nyang gas gungs shoh khyvlyis yah sat zis xauh laus eq dyos mas Mangso dwis toq yoeus goeus.
60003019	Nyang gas hau dyos gungs mas nghuot uhlyis thung lungh nyeis dah dyos jyank mas loh tsain taiq kyoh.
60003020	Hauh dyos jens gas gohlhain Noa sangpho tsuk uhlyis Mangso ka ehnyet xing xing yah langh nyeis lyis domsyos ma gyo bang dah dyos tsain nghuot. Hau sangpho mha dius xet yuk kyingh jeis yah khyuot yoeus zis tsain xauh.
60003021	Hau jeis gas khvnyhik namoq lyis khyuot yoeus dah jeisnyhop kham cho lhyi Chixoeuq dah vlho nghuot. Hauh jeis nyhop gas gungs shoh mas dap dah vchoqh vlhauq lyis shang tyamp zis ma nghuot; sohseq ehnyet vwot yah Mangso xikkhonh mas dangthoengh toh cho nghuot. Namoq hau jeisnyhop lyis kham lhyi Yesu Khristu shei mhayah dwis toq los gvng mas khyuot yoeus zis tsain xauh.
60003022	Yesu Khristu gas maukhung mha Mangso dah loqyos shot pheh loh nyeis las, Loeuswons bang, maukhung mha toeuh yoh bang yahge yomsoq bos bang dvnganh thoq mas guon nyeis.
60004001	Khristu gas gungsshoh mas shanghsenh zis xauh goeus las nyang mas bos dah nghamh cho yah dvyhangteh, namoq eq vsainnyang gungs lyis yom hont geh. Khasoeh ge lyis gungs shoh shanghsenh kham goeus soeu ka yaunos yah cha ma sen lo.
60004002	Housoeh las gvshih masyah haih mungkvn mas namoq kang dwis das xiklyis nyet shih dah shishenh gyo lyis dius dah gungsshoh o mes khyvlyis ma chank, Mangso dah ehnyet khyvlyis joeu yvmas kang dwis chah.
60004003	Namoq gas lai loh goeus caiq lyis gvgis lo nyangh shoq gohnyau bang kuot mes cho lhyi tsain kuot khoq goeus. Namoq gas lyi ma chank dah muh, ma yungh ma shop dah muh, nyetnau, yhei shuk pwe kuot zis yah vchoqh vlhauq muh, silho paiq cho kuot zis yah kang dwis lai loh goeus.
60004004	Gvshih gas nyamoq yah dvgeh ye las zau ma guon dah kang dwis cho mha namoq ma bos lo gvng mas nyamoq mauh las namoq lyis ma phauh gis dang taiq.
60004005	Nghuot laus eq nyamoq gas dwis nyeis bang yahge shei goeus bang lyis soetuon das zis cicont toh soeu Mangso dah xikkhonh mas nyamoq nyang dah cho comh toh zis Chixoeuq chah das.
60004006	Haih cho gvng mas shei goeus bang lyis eq gausyis dang taiq kyoh goeus. Nyamoq gas gungsshoh khyvlyis kang dwis nyeis uhlyis dius yuk khanghmuh lyis soetuon teh nyamoq soetuon zis xauh goeus bang nghuot. Nyamoq lyis taiq kyoh cho ka Mangso dwis nyeis teh nyamoq dah dyos mas dwis nyeis das xiklyis nghuot.
60004007	Vyhang dvnganh dah thang thank shishenh jweh los nyeis. Housoeh las namoq gas shvmanh yoh dung das nyhenshang vsainnyang gungs lyis joeu las phuk soh lhaiq mus geh.
60004008	Dvnganh thoq lyis, namoq nyang changh jyetdap goh yvmas shvnanh khying twih toh geh: khasoeh ge lyis jyetdap cho ka yaunos nyoshoq lyis nghop tyamp.
60004009	Ma lop lop namoq nyang changh boengh daih goh nyeis geh.
60004010	Namoq dvyuk dvyuk Mangso jyank masyah lhyenwhei jyehjuh jyungshuk lyis xauh yoeus zis yah dvyhangteh Mangso dah jyehjuh vja ja lyis yvwons yoeus dah lvgungh teh nyang changh nyang gis dah vkyuh xiklyis yhung geh.
60004011	Dvyuk yuk loeus taiq kyoh lyis gas, Mangso dah dang taiq kyoh bas jungh. Dvyuk yuk phuqsoe lhyi ka Mangso dyei toh dah yom yah dvyhangteh phuqsoe nyeis bas jungh. Housoeh lyis nyang kuot muhzoh dvnganh gas Yesu Khristu gvng mas Mangso dah phunk lyis chungh cho bweh das. Yesu Khristu mas phunk yahge yomsoq vcaiq caiq bos joq. Amen.
60004012	Jyetdap bang eh, namoq xauh kham zo nyeis, svsoh nos dah shiwu cho ka xikpheh ma bweh ku, gohtseq dah cho jeis nghuot teh vmauh nyeis goh.
60004013	Mauh nyeis das gungsthaiq, namoq gas Khristu dah shanghsenh yvlyis Khristu yah dvgeh wvng kham yoeus nyeis yvmvyah gaus nyeis geh. Housoeh lyis nyang nyah phunk thuq jyweq xoeuq uhlyis, namoq svsoh gausyis zis yah dyingh los das.
60004014	Namoq Khristu thang chank bang nghuot yvmvyah ma phauh gis kuot zis xauh kham lhyi namoq ngelhoq. Houka phunk bos dyos ge Mangso dah Dyos gas namoq mas bos dah vjyuk nghuot.
60004015	Namoq mas dvyuk yuk shanghsenh xauh lyis houka dius sat soeu, khauh soeu, ma gis ma shop las soetuon zis xauh soeu, svbih dah soe mha bos khank yenh soeu nghuot yvmvyah xauh dah shanghsenh cho ma xauh bas jungh.
60004016	Nghuot laus eq Khristan nghuot yvmvyah shanghsenh xauh lyis gas, hauh yvlyis vxoq; hauh gungsthaiq Khristu dah nyings xauh kham yoeus las Mangso dah jyehjuh lyis chungh nyeis aq.
60004017	Soetuon xi das shishenh jweh los nyeis las Mangso dah yhenbang shih soetuon zis xauh das. Yang hau soetuon zis cangxeih xauh lyis gas Mangso dah gausyis dang lyis ma lomsjingh bang dah nyhenshang ka khasoeh nghuot das lah?
60004018	Lhaihtoh dang mas, Dius gis jens dah xiklyis khyuot yoeus zis xauh das nyhenshang yau lyis gas gywes ma tsungh dah yaunos wons bang gas cha bweh los das lah, ge toh.
60004019	Housoeh las nyamoq xiklyis Mangso dah ehnyet yah dvyhangteh shanghsenh zis xauh bang gas gis dah muhzoh kuot zis yah, vjangh wontang, nyamoq dah Gvnkhanh Soeu lhyi loms toh bas jungh.
60005001	Phung lhyi shwih uhshe soeu dvyuk khyvlyis phung lhyi yoeuh nyeis soeu ngos gas phung uhshe bang mas bos dah namoq lyis khyoeuq kat. Ngos gas Khristu kham dah shanghsenh lyis nyvng dah kanghjyoeng dvyuk khyvlyis yah eq, thuq los das phunk lyis namoq yah dvgeh xauh kham das oen nghamhloms nyeis soeu khyvlyis eq ngos namoq lyis khyoeuq kat.
60005002	Mangso namoq lyis kyauh toh dah yvng phung dah yvng yoeuh bang teh Mangso namoq lyis kuot nhang mes khyvlyis yah dvyhangteh, tsoengh kuot nhang zis xauh dah ehnyet teh ma nghuot, gausyis zis yah vlhomuh yoeuh gomh nyeis geh: uhkung phauh ngwis yoh das nyhenshang kyingh ma nghuot, kuot dyei mes dah ehnyet yah phuqsoe geh.
60005003	Namoq yoeuh gomh das nyhenshang kyauh toh dah phung lhyi guon mes ehnyet yah ma nghuot, hau yvng phung xiklyis gis dah yikhyoh duot nyeis geh.
60005004	Hau yvng yoeuh uhjyung thuq los uhlyis namoq gas khanhamp eq ma shen loh dah phunk bos buismuk xauh yoeus das.
60005005	Houyah dvyhangteh wotyamh jens eh, nyenhkyi kuh bang dah o mha gyoh nyeis geh. Namoq nyang changh phuqsoe goh das xiklyis namoq dvnganhmoq ehnyet nyhen mha gyoh ge dah huhyhauh lyis wuot chi geh: khasoeh ge lyis Lhaihtoh dang mas, Mangso ka khwank bang lyis kyamp toh laus eq, ehnyet nyhen mha gyoh bang lyis jyehjuh dyei las nyoqnho yoh nhang, ge bos.
60005006	Housoeh las Mangso ka nyah dah gis shishenh jweh lyis namoq lyis toeu toq bas jungh nyah dah yomzains loq o mha namoq ehnyet nyhen mha gyoh nyeis geh.
60005007	Namoq dah chiqh cho dvnganh nyang lyis kyauh toh geh: khasoeh ge lyis Nyang namoq lyis loqzamh zwi nyeis.
60005008	Namoq jyoeng zaih zis yah zungh nyeis geh: namoq dah jeswus ge dah Satan ka, khayuk lyis yoh nyhau tyamp das lah, ge nyings yenh dah khangkhyi teh lhaink yenh.
