60005009	Namoq gas namoq lhom yoeus goeus dah lomsjingh cho lhyi goeng toenk nhang lha hau jeswus lyis thoenk zan geh. Khasoeh ge lyis mungkvn mas nyeis namoq dah lomsjingh boekyis eq housoeh teh shanghsenh xauh nyeis cho lhyi namoq seq.
60005010	Nghuot laus eq namoq dvdvm shanghsenh thang lhyi, jyehjuh dvnganh dah Mangso ka namoq lyis Khristu mas dvdain dvlom bweh nhang lha vcaiq vto phunk mas xauh wvng bas jungh, namoq lyis khi yoeus dah Yhensain nyang namoq lyis dyinghjet cho, goeng toenk cho, yom yahge goeng dah vpom dyei das.
60005011	Nyang mas yomsoq vcaiq vto bos joq bas jungh. Amen.
60005012	Ngos haih maussauh lyung lyis Sila bos pangh zis yah lhaih kat; ngos nyang lyis wontang dah Khristan vmang vnoeuh oen suon yoeus. Heika jyoeng dah Mangso jyehjuh nghuot cho ngos namoq lyis yomdyei zis yahge kanghjyoeng kat das xiklyis, haih maussauh lhaih kat. Houmha goeng goeng yap joq geh.
60005013	Babilon wus mas nyeis, namoq lyis teh khyen yoeus zis xauh dah phung ka namoq lyis jeshuh kat. Ngah lo Makho eq namoq lyis jeshuh kat.
60005014	Namoq nyang changh jyetdap vlho ge, bvlot tanh zis yah jeshuh goh geh. Khristu dah dius jens dvnganhmoq mas nyenstap zis joq bas jungh.
61001001	Yesu Khristu dah jyeidwis yahge lvgyo duot soeu, ngos Simon Petru gas, yah Mangso yahge khyuot yoeus Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah dan cho mha, ngamoq teh phauhdap dah lomsjingh cho xauh yoeus bang lyis dang tying kat.
61001002	Mangso yahge yah khyuot yoeus soeu Yesu Khristu lyis namoq seq gvng mas namoq gas jyehjuh yahge nyenstap cho dyinghjet shoq xauh kham yoeus bas jungh.
61001003	Nyah phunk yahge gis cho lhyi chomp kham yoeus das nyhenshang namoq lyis lui yoeus dah Khristu lyis seq gvng mas Mangso dah gywes so yomsoq gas jyoeng dah lomsnoq cho mha kang yoh dwis nyeis das xiklyis yang mas chah nyeis cho dvnganh dyei goeus.
61001004	Haih cho khyvlyis svsoh kuhxing lha phauhdap dah jyehjuh jyungshuk yah sen dah dangthoengh yang lyis dyei toh goeus. Housoeh las haih jyehjuh gvng mas yang gas mungkvn mas dah dyoqbis loh nhang dah nyetnau cho mhayah yoh luiq las soengh choenk gywes tsungh so tsungh bang yoh bweh los.
61001005	Haih cho gvng mas namoq lomsjingh cho mha gis cho, gis cho mha seq cho lhungh kat geh.
61001006	Seq cho mha vsainnyang gungs lyis joeu cho, vsainnyang gungs lyis joeu cho mha jhen cho, jhen cho mha gywes so lhyi phauh nyang cho,
61001007	Gywes so lhyi phauh nyang cho mha vmang vnoeuh sain teh nhaiqbos goh cho, hou mhayah jyetdap sainhnos goh cho lhungh kat geh.
61001008	Heinyhoq gas namoq mas bos chah dah kank bos cho tsain nghuot. Haih cho namoq mas magons magoh bos nghuot lyis gas namoq dah Yhensain Yesu Khristu lyis namoq seq zis yah kang dwis cho mha thyvdvng siq siq yah vkyuh bweh nhang das.
61001009	Nghuot laus eq hauh kank bos cho lhyi ma yoh soeu ka, we we ma nyvng nyoqjet soeu nghuot las, gohnhamp nyah yaunos masyah cheihshang kat zis xauh cho lhyi tohnyhik tyamp.
61001010	Housoeh las ngah boekyis eh, namoq lyis Mangso khi lha khyen yoeus cho lhyi vjangh xauh kham das xiklyis yomkat nyeis geh. Housoeh kuot nyeis lyis gas, namoq dah lomsjingh cho lhyi khanhamp eq ma tyamp das.
61001011	Hauh cho chank nyeis lyis gas, yah Yhensain yahge khyuot yoeus soeu Yesu Khristu dah vcaiq vto munghdan mas yoh wvng das toeuh, namoq lyis dyingh dyingh dyei das.
61001012	Housoeh las namoq haih cho lhyi tsain seqgyo las lhom yoeus toh goeus dah jyoeng cho mha vpom goeng goeng kuot toh goeus laus eq ngos namoq lyis vjangh taiq kyingh nyeis das.
61001013	Ngos kang dwis nyeis shih yoq lyis haih cho yah sen lha namoq lyis taiq kyingh zaih nhang zis gas ngos kuot vvng dah muh nghuot oen nghamh.
61001014	Yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu ngos lyis bvng bvng taiq toh goeus zis yah dvyhangteh, hai seq shei dah gungs ma nyangh lyis ngos haih gungs lyis toh tyamp das zis seq.
61001015	Housoeh las ngos shei thang lhyi haih cho lhyi dvcho cho yah namoq vjangh soh nyeis das xiklyis ngos yomkat ohhont das.
61001016	Yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah yomzains yah jweh los cho ngamoq namoq lyis seq nhang das xiklyis ngamoq gas dius yah kuot taiq dah mvnyei mas ma nges, nyah kuhxing cho lhyi ngamoq nyoqjeih yah nyvng goeus.
61001017	Nyang lyis Uwus Mangso jyank masyah nyoqnho ngelang yahge phunk dyei uhlyis, zes thank dah phunk nyoqnho ngelang khau mhayah nyah jyank mas jweh los dah thwe ka, Haih soeu ka ngos jyetdap Lo nghuot, ngos nyang lyis nhaiqdoeus, ge taiq uhlyis eq ngamoq houmha nyang yah dvgeh nghuot.
61001018	Ngamoq Yhensain yah dvgeh hau gyingshang boms thoq mas nyeis uhlyis maukhung mhayah nyings thuq los dah thwe lhyi ngamoq nyang xauhgyo.
61001019	Housoeh yvmvyah ngamoq gas lvpe jens taiq toh dah nyoqnyvng dang lyis zes yoh nghamhnywe. Namoq hauh Dang lyis vlhomuh gyo nyeis geh. Khasoeh ge lyis houka namoq dah ehnyet mas bvng los las buhnyhiq thuq los shishenh jweh shoq soeng soeng noq yvmas bvng joq dah nyibung teh nghuot.
61001020	Nghuot laus eq hank laus eq vsainnyang o khyvlyis lhaihtoh dang mas bos dah lvpe dang lyis vjyuk ma yoh phant yvlyis cangxeih comh toh chah.
61001021	Khasoeh ge lyis lvpe dang kha khonh eq dius dah ehnyet o khyvlyis bweh los zis ma nghuot. Gyingshang Dyos yah bos jyonh zis xauh bang gas Mangso jyank masyah jweh los dah dang lyis tsain taiq.
61002001	Lai loh goeus shishenh lyis dius jens mas lvpe hwah tsain thuq los zis yah dvyhangteh, namoq mas eq ma jus dah jyauh bang thuq los das. Nyamoq gas thyoqpi cho, ma jus dah jyauh cho gauh chi hwank las vsainnyang lyis khyuot yoeus goeus dah Yhensain lhyi eq peq tyamp das. Housoeh nyamoq gas nyamoq thoq mas nyetlos nyettant dyoqbis cho jweh los nhang das.
61002002	Housoeh bweh laus eq dius nyoshoq gas nyamoq dah ma gis wotwu cho mha chank loh das. Nyamoq housoeh kuot yvmvyah jyoeng cho lhyi ma gis khyvlyis tsain taiq jwangh das.
61002003	Hai ma jus dah jyauh bang gas nyamoq dah nyoqnoq ehnyet yah kuot yoeus dah mvnyei taiq las vmyat xo das. Nyamoq lyis joeng das soetuon soeu ka, gohlhain yah yangh cicont kuot toh goeus, nyamoq lyis mhont das soeu ka yhet muih joq zis ma nghuot.
61002004	Mangso ka, yaunos kuot dah loeuswons bang lyis yangh khyamhsa ma dyei, nyamoq lyis munyi thomh mas khyoq las, hau soeng soeng noq yvmas shamjvng yah twih las soetuon das buisnyeis lyis langh nhang toh.
61002005	Mangso ka gohlhain caiq lyis dah mungkvn lyis eq khyamhsa ma dyei, gywes so lhyi ma phauh nyang dah mungkvn lyis dvjeis lhyi nhang. Dan cho lhyi taiq kyoh soeu Noa yahge gohtoeu dius nyhet yuk lyis gas khyuot yoeus.
61002006	Mangso ka Sodom yahge Gomora aiq wus lyis eq nyi yah mhont las gywes ma tsungh bang khasoeh bweh los das cho yikhyoh toh.
61002007	Nyang gas lyi ma chi, wotwu dyoq dah dius jens gvng mas nhaiqkuk yomgyau nyeis soeu ge dah Lot lyis gas lhuiq kat.
61002008	Hauh dan soeu ka nyamoq yah dvgeh nyeis dah uhlyis dvnyeih dvnyeih nyamoq kuot dah ma gis muh lyis nyvng, xauhgyo gvng mas nyah ehnyet mas shanghsenh nyung daus nyeis.
61002009	Housoeh yvmvyah Mangso ka gywes so lhyi phauh nyang bang lyis nyamoq xauh nyeis dah shiwu cho mhayah khasoeh lhuiq kat das zis yahge lhung bang lyis soetuon buisnyeis jweh shoq khasoeh joeng das zis seq.
61002010	Zes las vchoqh vlhauq gungsshoh dah nyetnau cho mha tsain suh e las, Mangso dah toeuh lyis maphauh madanh kuot bang gas housoeh teh cho xauh das. Hai ma jus dah jyauh bang gas svsoh womh las lhoq lhoq teh nyhang mha dah phunk bos bang lyis phauh nyang cho ma Chixoeuq, nyamoq lyis ma phauh gis kuot.
61002011	Hai ma jus dah jyauh bang thoq lyis yom yahge yomsoq zes tsain bos dah Loeuswons bang yangh Yhensain xikkhonh mas nyamoq lyis ma phauh gis zau ma kauq.
61002012	Nghuot laus eq haih dius jens gas, nyhik yoeus las sat das xiklyis nyeis dyos dah gaunyhauq lamh jens teh, nyamoq yangh ma seq dah soengh choenk ehnyet yah ma phauh gis kuot. Nyamoq gas yewus yhangteh mhont tyamp zis xauh das.
61002013	Nyamoq gas nyamoq yah gohyuk lyis xauh nhang dah shanghsenh cho tauh dyei zis xauh das. Nyeihgungs lyis yangh nyamoq dah gungs shoh pyo cho lhyi tyink das xiklyis gas nyamoq dah pyo cho nghuot. Nyamoq gas namoq yah dvgeh zo shuk huom mha bos wvng yvmvyah namoq xiklyis vxoq vcaiq, nyoqnho gyoh cho bweh nhang nyeis. Nyamoq gas mhuih cho lhyi tsain ngwis.
61002014	Nyamoq gas nyi shuot lvng shuot muh yoh kuot das toeuh xo thoq lyis gohtoeu cha lhyi eq ma mes yoeuh. Nyamoq yaunos kuot las xauh kham dah whitau lhyi nhaiq ma thoq shei. Nyamoq dah ehnyet lyis nyoq noq o seq bos das xiklyis xik toh goeus. Nyamoq gas Mangso dah nhoengh zis xauh nyeis.
61002015	Nyamoq gas cho dan lyis toh tyamp las cho whang loh: Beora dah lo Balam chank dah cho mha chank loh goeus. Balam gas ma jus dah muh kuot las yoh dah uhkung phauh lyis obos soeu nghuot.
61002016	Balam gas nyang kuot dah yaunos gvng mas nyho lha jyauh zis xauh. Nyah mauhlyihzoe gas dius nyingh yah dang taiq los las lvpe dah huonh muh lyis tomp tyamp.
61002017	Haih dius jens gas jeis kanh dah jeisthuq dwang yahge lyeis jyang yah muot tangh los dah jyommauh teh tsain nghuot. Mangso ka soeng soeng noq yvmas nyamoq xiklyis noq thank joqyos dvkoeuq sont toh dyei.
61002018	Nyamoq gas shuot dah kang dwis cho mhayah vsaiq yoh luiq los bang lyis vkom mha moengs dang taiq zis yah gungs shoh dah nyetnau cho mha chuq yoeus las cho shwih whang loh.
61002019	Nyamoq gas nyamoq nyang dyoqbis dah wotwu dah jons tsain duot toh las gohyuk lyis lhuiq cho das ing toh. Khasoeh ge lyis dius dvyuk gas nyang lyis yoh ung dah vyhang dvnganh dah jons nghuot.
61002020	Dius jens gas namoq dah khyuot yoeus soeu Yhensain Yesu Khristu lyis yoh seq gvng mas, mungkvn dah vchoqh vjyot yomsoq masyah luiq los thang lhyi, tsai dvlhain vchoqh vjyot cho yah ung tyamp zis xauh lyis gas, thang thank lyis hauh bang dah bweh cho ka cangxeih thoq lyis zes xungh.
61002021	Dan cho lhyi seq lho lha, nyamoq lyis kyauh toh, gyingshang dah tyingtoh dang lyis lhyweq tyamp thoq lyis, hauh cho lhyi ma seq seq nyeis das zis gas dvzes gis shih.
61002022	Lvkhuih gas nyang duk yvlyis doms zo, wuq eq cheih dyei thang lhyi thomh boengh mas doms lhoeuh, ge dah sangkhyangh gas nyamoq xiklyis jus joq.
61003001	Ngos jyetdap dah dyenschangh jens eh, heika ngos namoq lyis aiq vlhain huon maussauh nghuot. Hai aiq koeuq mas namoq dah shangkyei ehnyet vpom yah seq nghamh yoeuh das xiklyis haih cho jens lyis taiq kyingh kat.
61003002	Gyingshang dah lvpe jens gohnhamp taiq khoq dang lyis eq, namoq dah lvgyo jens dah loq cho yah, namoq xauh yoeus dah khyuot yoeus soeu Yhensain tyingtoh dang lyis eq ngos namoq lyis doms soh nhang mes.
61003003	Hau thang thank buisnyeis lyis vsainnyang dah gungs shoh nyetnau khyvlyis chank zis yah kang dwis bang thuq los das yvlyis cangxeih seq toh chah. Nyamoq gas namoq lyis jwangh zis yah, Yhensain doms jweh los das ge dangthoengh dyei toh ma nghuot lhyeh? Gvshih nyang khalhye gah?
61003004	Ngamoq uwus moq shei loh goeus: nghuot laus eq vyhang dvnganh gas mungkvn lyis gvnkhanh dah shishenh yah dvyhangteh dvnghuot joq nyvng, ge los das.
61003005	Mangso ka cangxeih lyis maukhung yahge nyeisjvng lyis nyah dang yah gvnkhanh toh goeus yvlyis eq, nyeisjvng lyis jeis khau mhayah jeis yah she thuq toh goeus yvlyis eq,
61003006	tsai nyeisjvng vcauh lyis jeis yah dvjeis lhyi lha thyoq tyamp goeus yvlyis eq nyamoq pa i tohnyhik tyamp.
61003007	Nghuot laus eq Mangso ka gvshih joq dah maukhung yahge nyeisjvng lyis nyi yah mhont tyamp das xiklyis gohlhain dah hau dang yah nyang shung toh. nyamoq lyis gywes ma tsungh bang yah dvgeh soetuon lha mhont das buisnyeis jweh shoq toh shih das.
61003008	Nghuot laus eq jyetdap dyenschangh jens eh, hai dvcho lhyi vtohnyhik goh, Yhensain xikkhonh mas buisnyeis dvnyeih yahge khyoengh zvn gas cha ma shaih, nyah xiklyis hau aiq ja gas dvyhangteh dvnghuot.
61003009	Dius dvyhamh nghamh teh Mangso ka nyang dangthoengh toh goeus dah cho lhyi kuot tyink das xiklyis sheq nyeis zis ma nghuot; dvnganhmoq yaunos masyah lhain los las hank eq dyoqbis zis ma xauh bas jungh, nyang o nyeis yvmvyah nyang namoq lyis jhen nyeis zis dvnghuot.
61003010	Yhensain dah buisnyeis gas khauh soeu teh jweh los das. Hauh buisnyeis lyis maukhung nyings huomh toh thwe yah dyuk loh das. Maukhung vyhang dvnganh eq nyi ngeh las dyoqbis tyamp das; nyeisjvng yahge houmha nyeis ya nyeis zis gas bi tyamp das.
61003011	Vyhang dvnganh heisoeh mhont tyamp zis xauh das lyis gas, namoq khasoeh teh dius jens nghuot chah das lah? Namoq dah kang dwis cho ka gyingshang lha Mangso mha kyauh toh dah kang dwis cho nghuot chah das.
61003012	Namoq gas Mangso dah buisnyeis lyis langh nyeis cho mha lvnyap jweh los bas jungh gis thank khyvlyis yomkat zis yah langh nyeis geh. Hauh buisnyeis lyis maukhung ka ngeh las dyoqbis tyamp das; maukhung vyhang jens eq ngeh yvmvyah yings tyamp das.
61003013	Nghuot laus eq yang gas Mangso dangthoengh dyei toh goeus, dan bang nyeis das yhen ge maukhung vsaiq yahge nyeisjvng vsaiq lyis nghamhloms las dvlangh nyeis.
61003014	Housoeh las ngah dyenschangh jens eh, namoq hauh buisnyeis lyis langh nyeis shishenh lyis Mangso xikkhonh mas namoq dah ehnyet shangkyei lha yaunos ma dap bas jungh oen zis yahge nyang mas nyenstap zis yah yoh nyeis das xiklyis yomkat ohhont nyeis geh.
61003015	Yang jyetdap dah vmang vnoeuh Paulo eq, Mangso dyei dah joeui yhung lha namoq jyank mas lhaih kat goeus zis yah dvyhangteh, yang Mangso lhyi ehnyet xing xing yah langh nyeis zis gas khyuot yoeus xauh das xiklyis toeuh nghuot yvlyis seq geh, nyvng geh.
61003016	Paulo ka haih cho yah sen lha nyang huon maussauh mas hei yah dvyhangteh lhaih xoeuq toh. Nyah maussauh mas bos dah cho dvkhamh gas seqgyo nanh las joeui ma seq bang yahge ehnyet ma gying bang gas shuot khyvlyis vjyuk tsain phant yoeus. Dius jens gas gohtoeu lhaihtoh dang jens lyis shuot khyvlyis vjyuk phant yoeus. Housoeh nyamoq dah dyoqbis cho lhyi nyamoq nyang kuot yoeus goeus.
61003017	Nghuot laus eq dyenschangh jens eh, namoq gas heinyhoq lyis tsain seq toh goeus. Housoeh yvmvyah namoq gas lyi ma chi bang dah shuot cho pheh shwih loh yvpheh ma bos das zis yahge gau dah kang dwis cho mhayah ma gyoh tyamp das xiklyis zaih nyeis geh.
61003018	Namoq gas yah khyuot yoeus Yhensain Yesu Khristu dah jyehjuh yahge seq cho mha tsoq las kuhxing jebais los geh. Gvshih eq, vcaiq vto eq Yesu Khristu mas phunk bos bas jungh. Amen.
62001001	Cangxeih lyis yah nyeis, hauh kang dwis dang dah cho namoq jyank mas ngamoq lhaih kat. Ngamoq hauh zis lyis xauhgyo ku goeus. Nyoqjeih yah eq, nghuot goeus ngamoq nyvng eq nyvng ku goeus, ngamoq loq yah eq tanh ku goeus.
62001002	Hauh kang thuq los uhlyis ngamoq hauh zis lyis nyvng ku goeus. Housoeh las ngamoq hauh cho lhyi kanghjyoeng tsain kat. Uwus yah dvgeh nyeis ku goeus hauh vcaiq vto kang ka ngamoq jyank thuq los las ngamoq hauh kang cho namoq lyis taiq kyoh.
62001003	Ngamoq gas Uwus Mangso yah eq, Lo Yesu Khristu yah eq, zomh ku goeus las namoq eq ngamoq yah dvgeh yoh zomh bas jungh, ngamoq gyo ku, nyvng ku dah cho ngamoq namoq lyis taiq hoeuh.
62001004	Ngamoq gas hau gausyis cho namoq mas top jweh los bas jungh oen haih maussauh lhaih kat.
62001005	Mangso ka bvng zis nghuot las Nyang mas chuot zis ma bos. Haih Mangso dang lyis nyah lo masyah ngamoq xauhgyo ku goeus gvng mas namoq lyis taiq kyoh.
62001006	Yang gas nyang yah yoh zomh nyeis goeus ge las mauchuotdwang mas suh e nyeis shih lyis gas yah dang mas eq, yang kuot dah muhzoh mas eq, yang hwah bang tsain nghuot.
62001007	Nghuot laus eq, nyang gas bvng yvmas nyeis teh, yang eq bvng yvmas suh e nyeis lyis gas yang dvyuk yah dvyuk nyang changh zomh goh nyeis bang nghuot las nyah lo Yesu dah suih gas yang mas bos dah yaunos lyis cheihshang tyamp dyei goeus.
62001008	Yang yobos ma bos ge taiq lyis gas, yah gungs lyis yvnyang hwah bang tsain nghuot las yang gas dan cho ma bos bang tsain nghuot.
62001009	Nghuot laus eq, yah yaunos lyis Mangso xikkhonh mas Chixoeuq las rhen zis yah shangphu lhyi ka, nyang gas nyah dangthoengh mas doengs joq las hauh dan dah muhzoh lyis kuot soeu nghuot gvng mas, yah yaunos lyis khyuot tyamp dyei das zis yahge kuot cu cho dvnganh masyah cheihshang tyamp dyei das.
62001010	Yang yaunos ma kuot ge taiq lyis gas, yang Mangso lhyi hwah soeu kuot nhang lha Mangso dah dang eq yah jyank mas ma bos.
62002001	Ngah loshang jens eh, namoq yaunos ma kuot bas jungh, haih maussauh ngos namoq jyank lhaih kat. Nghuot laus eq dvyuk yuk yaunos zangh kuot lyis gas, hauh Uwus dah xikkhonh mas, yah xiklyis shangphu dyei soeu Yesu Khristu ge, dan Soeu yang yoh.
62002002	Yesu Khristu nyang nyang, yah yaunos xiklyis gungsthaiq lomhxangh nghuot las, nyah gvng mas, yah yaunos khyuot tyamp dyei zis tsain xauh thoq lyis ma goh dius yuk khanghmuh dah yaunos lyis eq khyuot tyamp dyei goeus.
62002003	Nyah tyingtoh dang lyis yang domsyos gyo zis yah chank nyeis lyis gas yang nyang lyis seq bang nghuot cho vlhomuh yoh seq.
62002004	Ngos nyang lyis seq ge dvyuk yuk taiq laus eq, Nyah tyingtoh dang lyis domsyos ma gyo lyis gas hauh soeu ka hwah soeu nghuot las hauh jyoeng zis gas nyah jyank mas ma bos.
62002005	Hank laus eq nyah dang lyis domsyos gyo soeu ka Mangso lhyi jyet ehnyet nyang mas yoh dyinghjet los goeus soeu nghuot. Heika yang Mangso yah dvdain dvlom khasoeh yoh bweh goeus cho lhyi top seq nhang.
62002006	Yang gas Mangso yah dvdain dvlom bweh las kang dwis bang nghuot oen taiq lyis gas, Yesu Khristu kang dwis dah wotwu yah dvyhangteh yang eq kang dwis chah.
62002007	Ngah jyetdap bang eh, gvshih ngos lhaih kat, haih tyingtoh dang gas vsaiq ma nghuot, cangxeih lyis yah namoq yoh toh dah tyingtoh dang vcauh dvnghuot. Hau tyingtoh dang cauh gas namoq xauhgyo ku goeus dah Mangso dang nghuot.
62002008	Nghuot laus eq gvshih ngos namoq jyank lhaih kat dah tyingtoh dang gas dvcho pheh yah vsaiq nghuot. Housoeh vsaiq nghuot zis jyoeng cho lhyi Khristu dah kang dwis yvmas eq, namoq dah thungh phuh cho mha eq yoh nyvng. Khasoeh ge lyis chuot cho ka bi tyamp las hauh jyoeng dah bvng zis gas gvshih yangh bvng joq.
62002009	Hank laus eq bvng yvmas nyeis ge lho lha nyah boekyis lyis hoeng soeu ka gvshih yangh mauchuotdwang mas lungh joq shih soeu nghuot.
62002010	Hank laus eq nyah boekyis lyis jyetdap soeu ka, hauh bvng yvmas nyeis soeu nghuot. Nyang mas dius dvyuk yuk lyis yaunos kuot nhang ja cha eq ma bos.
62002011	Nghuot laus eq nyah vmang vnoeuh lyis hoeng soeu ka, hauh mauchuotdwang mas nyeis las hauh chuot yvmas suh e gvng mas nyang khapheh loh nyeis zis yangh ma seq. Khasoeh ge lyis hauh chuot zis gas nyah nyoqjeih lyis jet nhang.
62002012	Ngah lo jens eh, Khristu gvng mas namoq dah yaunos khyuot tyamp zis xauh goeus yvmvyah ngos namoq lyis lhaih kat.
62002013	Uwus moq eh, cangxeih lyis yah nyeis nyeis soeu lhyi namoq seq nyeis yvmvyah, ngos namoq lyis lhaih kat. Loloeu jens eh, hauh ma shop dah yius Satan lyis namoq ung tyamp gvng mas, ngos namoq lyis lhaih kat.
62002014	Ngah lo jens eh, hauh Uwus lyis namoq seq nyeis yvmvyah ngos namoq lyis lhaih kat. Uwus moq eh cangxeih lyis yah nyeis nyeis soeu lhyi namoq seq yvmvyah ngos namoq lyis lhaih kat. Wotyamh jens eh, namoq yombos las Mangso dah dang namoq mas bos joq zis yah hauh ma shop dah yius Satan lyis ung tyamp gvng mas ngos namoq lyis lhaih kat.
62002015	Nyeisjvng lyis eq, nyeisjvng mas joq dah vyhang jens lyis eq vjyetdap nyeis goh. Namoq nyeisjvng lyis jyetdap nghuot lyis gas Uwus lyis ma jyetdap.
62002016	Nyeisjvng yah sen dah vyhang joq yah joq zis, gungs shoh dah nyetnau cho, dius jens nyoqjeih yah nyvng las obos cho yahge, haih mungkvn mas dius jens khwank zis yahge moengs nhang dah vyhang dvnganh gas Uwus jyank masyah los zis ma nghuot. Hau dvnganh gas nyeisjvng masyah thuq los zis dvnghuot.
62002017	Nyeisjvng yahge houmha dah cangsoeu dius jens nyoqnoq obos cho ka lai loh nyeis laus eq, Mangso nhaiqdoeus khyvlyis chank kuot nyeis soeu ka vcaiq vto nyeis.
62002018	Ngah lo jens eh, thang thank dah buisnyeis jweh ni los goeus! Namoq lyis taiq toh goeus zis yah dvyhangteh Khristu dah jeswus ge soeu ka jweh los das. Gvshih yangh Khristu dah jeswus jens nyoshoq thuq los goeus las thang thank buisnyeis jweh ni los goeus zis yang tsain seq.
62002019	Haih dius jens gas yah dah zomhgoh phung yah jyoengh ma sen, housoeh las yang masyah nyamoq tsain thuq loh. Sen zis jyoeng lhyi ka nyamoq yang yah nyeis das. Nghuot laus eq nyamoq housoeh thuq loh zis gas nyamoq mas hank eq yang yah jyoengh ma sen yvlyis vlhomuh Chixoeuq nyeis.
62002020	Nghuot laus eq, Yesu Khristu gas namoq dah thoq mas hau Gyingshang Dyos huot khyoq zis xauh goeus las namoq dvnganh gas hauh jyoeng cho lhyi tsain seq.
62002021	Namoq lyis ngos lhaih kat cho ka, hau jyoeng yvlyis namoq ma seq yvmvyah ma nghuot. Namoq seq yvmvyah dvnghuot. Hwah cho ka jyoeng cho yah khanhamp eq cha ma sen yvlyis eq namoq seq las lhaih kat.
62002022	Housoeh lyis hwah soeu ka hank nghuot lah? Yesu gas Meshia ma nghuot ge ngoek tyamp soeu nyang nghuot. Hau Uwus yahge Lo lyis ngoek tyamp soeu ka Khristu dah jeswus nghuot.
62002023	Hank laus eq, hau Lo lyis ngoek tyamp soeu ka Uwus lyis ngoek tyamp soeu eq nghuot. Hauh Lo lyis lhom yoeus soeu ka Uwus lyis lhom yoeus soeu eq nghuot.
62002024	Cangxeih lyis yah namoq xauhgyo ku dah Mangso dang lyis namoq dah ehnyet nhaiqlom khau mha bos joq nhang geh. Hauh Mangso dang namoq mas bos joq nghuot lyis gas, namoq vjangh yah Uwus yahge Lo yah dvdain dvlom nyeis das.
62002025	Haih zis gas Khristu nyang yang lyis dangthoengh dyei toh dah vcaiq vto kang nghuot.
62002026	Namoq lyis mhuih las chowhang shwih whang bah ge yomkat nyeis bang dah cho namoq jyank mas lhaih kat.
62002027	Nghuot laus eq namoq gas, Khristu nyah dyos namoq thoq mas huot khyoq dyei zis xauh goeus las, namoq mas hauh dyos bos nyeis dvchank hank eq namoq lyis ma jyauh lo noh. Khasoeh ge lyis nyah dyos gas namoq lyis cho khvt khanghmuh mas jyauh. Nyang jyauh cho ka jyoeng, hwah cho cha eq ma bos. Housoeh las namoq gas dyos jyauh zis yah dvyhangteh domsyos gyo las Khristu yah dvdain dvlom bweh nyeis geh.
62002028	Nghuot goeus lo jens eh, nyang thuq xoeuq buisnyeis lyis namoq gas xoq gyuk zis yah ma tamh noh, nyah xikkhonh mas womh womh yoh yap das xiklyis nyang yah dvdain dvlom bweh nyeis geh.
62002029	Khristu gas dan yvlyis namoq seq lyis hauh dan khyvlyis chank kuot bang yuk khanghmuh gas Mangso dah lo jens nghuot yvlyis namoq seq chah.
62003001	Yoeuh aq, Mangso ka yang lyis kha iq jyetdap? Nyah jyetdap ehnyet svsoh kuh joq las yang lyis Mangso dah lo jens ge nyhink goeus zis yah dvyhangteh yang eq jyoengh Mangso dah lo jens tsain nghuot. Nghuot laus eq mungkvn gas Mangso lhyi ma seq yvmvyah yang lyis eq ma tsain seq.
62003002	Jyetdap bang eh, gvshih yang Mangso dah lo jens tsain nghuot. Nghuot laus eq thang pheh yang cha bweh das zis dede ma yoh seq shih: Nghuot laus eq Khristu thuq los uhlyis yang gas nyang yah doeus das, khasoeh ge lyis nyang nyang nghuot zis yah dvyhangteh nghuot yvlyis yang tsain nyvng das.
62003003	Khristu mas hau nghamhloms cho yoh dah dius yuk khanghmuh gas Khristu nyang gyingshang joq zis yah dvyhangteh vsainnyang dah gungs lyis eq gyingshang nhang.
62003004	Yaunos kuot soeu hank laus eq Mangso dah lyi lyis lhyweq goeus. Khasoeh ge lyis yaunos gas lyi lhyweq muh nghuot.
62003005	Khristu gas cangsoeu dius jens dah yaunos lyis yoeus tyamp dyei das xiklyis thuq los zis namoq seq: nyang mas yaunos ma bos.
62003006	Housoeh las Khristu mas nyeis soeu hank laus eq tsoq las yaunos ma kuot. Yaunos tsoq kuot nyeis soeu hank laus eq nyang lyis ma nyvng, ma seq.
62003007	Ngah lo jens eh, hank eq namoq lyis chowhang ma shwih whang bas jungh; Khristu gas dan zis yah dvyhangteh dan dah muh kuot soeu hank laus eq dan.
62003008	Yaunos tsoq kuot nyeis soeu hank laus eq, Satan yah sen soeu nghuot, khasoeh ge lyis Satan ka cangxeih lyis yah yaunos kuot goeus. Housoeh las yius dah muhzoh lyis thyoq tyamp das xiklyis Mangso dah Lo gas thuq los goeus.
62003009	Mangso dah lo duot goeus soeu ka tsoq las yaunos ma kuot. Khasoeh ge lyis hauh soeu jyank mas Mangso dah seq cho yomsoq bos. Nyang gas Mangso dah lo nghuot yvmvyah yaunos ma yoh tsoq kuot.
62003010	Houka Mangso lo jens yahge yius dah lo jens ma doeusgoh cho dede nghuot. Hank laus eq dan dah muhzoh ma kuot, nghuot ya vsainnyang dah vmang vnoeuh lyis ma jyetdap soeu ka Mangso dah lo ma nghuot.
62003011	Cangxeih lyis yah namoq xauhgyo ku dah loeus gas, yang nyang changh jyetdap goh chah ge zis nghuot.
62003012	Yang gas Ka-in teh ma gis nghuot. Nyang gas ma shop soeu shot pheh dah dius duot las nyah vnoeuh Abel lyis sat. Ka-in ka Abel lyis chamus sat? Nyang kuot dah muhzoh shuot joq. Nyah vnoeuh kuot dah cho jens gas jus joq las nghuot.
62003013	Housoeh las boekyis eh, mungkvn dius jens namoq lyis hoeng laus eq vmauh goh.
62003014	Yang boekyis lyis jyetdap yvmvyah yang shei masyah dwis yvpheh yoh lhyweq goeus zis yang tsain seq. Boekyis lyis ma jyetdap soeu ka hauh shei cho dah yomsoq vkhau mha dvnyeis shih.
62003015	Nyah boekyis lyis hoeng soeu hank laus eq, dius sat soeu nghuot. Dius sat soeu ka nyang mas vcaiq vto kang ma bos yvlyis namoq seq.
62003016	Khristu gas yah xiklyis nyah kang dyei tyamp yvmvyah jyoeng dah jyetdap ehnyet gas cha nghuot yvlyis yang tsai seq. Yang eq yah kang lhyi yah boekyis xiklyis dyei gis.
62003017	Zisyos yoh soeu nghuot toh las nyah boekyis vshoh vjyen chah nyeis zis nyvng las nyah dah nhaiqnyen ehnyet khomh nyheih toh lyis gas nyang gas Mangso lhyi jyetdap soeu oen khasoeh yoh taiq das lah?
62003018	Ngah lo jens eh, yah dah jyetdap cho ka taiq dang yah kyingh ma nghuot, Muhzoh yah Chixoeuq dah jyetdap cho jyoeng nghuot chah.
62003019	Haih gungs gas jyoeng cho yah sen bang nghuot zis yoh seq. Mangso dah xikkhonh mas yang nghamhnywe zis yah nghuot das.
62003020	Yah dah sohseq ehnyet gas yang lyis dang thang thyet lyis Mangso ka yah sohseq ehnyet thoq lyis zes cho yahge nyang dvnganh yvlyis seq cho lhyi yang seq.
62003021	Housoeh las jyetdap bang eh, yah dah sohseq ehnyet yah yang lyis dang thang ma thyet lyis gas yang Mangso dah xikkhonh mas womh womh xauh wvng das.
62003022	Yang gas Mangso tyingtoh dang lyis domsyos gyo las nyang nhaiqdoeus dah muhzoh lyis chank kuot gvng masyah yang dung dah cho khvt khanghmuh lyis yang tsain xauh lhom yoeus.
62003023	Nyang yang lyis tyingtoh dang gas yang nyah lo Yesu Khristu lyis lomsjingh las Khristu yang lyis tyingtoh zis yah dvyhangteh nyang changh nyang jyetdap goh nyeis das cho nghuot.
62003024	Mangso tyingtoh dang lyis chank kuot soeu hank laus eq, Mangso yah dvdain dvlom nghuot las Mangso eq hauh soeu yah dvdain dvlom nghuot. Housoeh bweh cho lhyi Mangso dyei toh dah dyos gvng masyah yoh seq.
62004001	Jyetdap bang eh, dyos xauh yoeus goeus ge bang dvnganh lyis vjingh nyeis goh. Nyamoq xauh yoeus dah dyos gas Mangso jyank masyah gyoh los dah dyos nghuot lah? Kyink yoeuh geh, khasoeh ge lyis Lvpe hwah jens joqyos khyiq khanghmuh mas jweh nyeis goeus.
62004002	Mangso dah dyos nghuot ma nghuot yoh seq das cho ka haih zis nghuot. Yesu Khristu gas cangsoeu dius gungs tsungh las jweh los, ge rhen bang hank laus eq Mangso jyank masyah dyos xauh kham yoeus bang nghuot.
62004003	Nghuot laus eq, Hauh Yesu dah cho lhyi ma rhen bang hank laus eq, Mangso jyank masyah gyoh lyih dah dyos lyis xauh lhom yoeus bang ma nghuot. Nyamoq jyank mas bos dah dyos gas namoq xauhgyo ku goeus zis yah dvyhangteh, jweh los nyeis. Nghuot goeus gvshih yangh nyeisjvng mas lyih nyeis goeus Khristu dah Jeswus dah dyos nghuot.
62004004	Lo jens eh, namoq gas Mangso shot pheh bang nghuot las hauh Lvpe hwah jens lyis ung tyamp goeus. Khasoeh ge lyis namoq mas bos dah dyos gas nyeisjvng yah sen bang mas bos dah dyos thoq lyis yomsoq zes bos.
62004005	Hauh lvpe hwah jens gas, mungkvn yah sen bang nghuot yvmvyah nyamoq gas mungkvn dah cho tsain taiq. Mungkvn mas nyeis bang eq nyamoq dah dang domsyos tsain gyo.
62004006	Nghuot laus eq yang gas Mangso shot pheh zis nghuot. Mangso lhyi seq bang hank laus eq yah dang tsain gyo. Mangso shot pheh ma nghuot bang gas yah dang ma tsain gyo. Heisoeh khyvlyis yah yang gas jyoeng dah dyos lhom yoeus zis yahge ma jyoeng dah dyos lhom yoeus bang dah ma doeusgoh cho lhyi yoh taiq.
62004007	Jyetdap bang eh, yang nyang changh nyang jyetdap goh nyeis goh. Khasoeh ge lyis jyetdap ehnyet gas Mangso jyank masyah nghuot. Seq jyetdap soeu hank laus eq, Mangso lo nghuot las Mangso lhyi seq.
62004008	Jyetdap ehnyet ma bos soeu ka, Mangso lhyi seq zis ma nghuot: khasoeh ge lyis Mangso ka jyetdap ehnyet nghuot.
62004009	Yang gas Lo gvng mas vcaiq vto kang yoh bas jungh ge Mangso ka nyah Loteh lyis mungkvn mas nhang kat zis yah Mangso yang lyis jyetdap ehnyet Chixoeuq.
62004010	Jyetdap ehnyet ge taiq lyis, yang Mangso lhyi jyet ge yvlyis taiq zis ma nghuot, yah yaunos khyuot dyei das xiklyis gungsthaiq shoh-uh bweh bas jungh ge nyah lo lyis nhang kat zis yah nyang yang lyis jyetdap goeus yvlyis taiq zis dvnghuot.
62004011	Jyetdap bang eh, Mangso ka yang lyis hei iq jyetdap nyeis lyis, yang eq nyang changh nyang jyetdap goh gis.
62004012	Mangso lhyi hank khanhamp eq ma nyvng ku: yang nyang changh nyang jyetdap goh nyeis lyis gas, Mangso ka yah jyank mas bos joq yvmvyah, nyah jyetdap ehnyet gas yang mas dyinghjet joq.
62004013	Nyah dah dyos yang lyis dyei toh yvmvyah, yang eq nyang mas nyeis las, nyang eq yang mas nyeis yvlyis yang tsain seq.
62004014	Mungkvn dah khyuot yoeus Yhensain bweh bas jungh ge las Uwus gas hau Lo lyis nhang kat zis gas ngamoq nyvng las kanghjyoeng tsain kat.
62004015	Yesu gas Mangso dah Lo nghuot ge rhen soeu hank mas laus eq Mangso ka nyang mas nyeis. Nyang eq Mangso mha nyeis.
62004016	Housoeh las yah thoq mas Mangso jyetdap ehnyet toh toh cho lhyi yang seq las tsain lomsjingh nyeis. Mangso ka jyetdap ehnyet nghuot; housoeh las jyetdap ehnyet mas kang dwis soeu hank laus eq Mangso yah dvdain dvlom nghuot. Mangso eq nyang yah dvdain dvlom nghuot.
62004017	Ngamoq mas nyah jyetdap ehnyet dyinghjet los las hau soetuon buisnyeis lyis ngamoq womh ehnyet yoh das. Khasoeh ge lyis jyetdap cho lhyi ngamoq mas dyinghjet shoq yoh yhung goeus zis yahge haih mungkvn mas ngamoq gas Khristu yah dvyhangteh kang dwis goeus las ngamoq hau womh cho yoh.
62004018	Jyetdap ehnyet mas gyuk zis ma bos. Dyinghjet dah jyetdap cho ka gyuk yvlyis khat tyamp. Housoeh lyis gas gyuk ehnyet bos soeu hank mas laus eq jyetdap ehnyet ma yoh dyinghjet. Khasoeh ge lyis gyuk ehnyet gas joeng zis xauh das cho yah sen joq.
62004019	Mangso ka cangxeih lyis yah yang lyis jyetdap yvmvyah, yang eq nyang lyis jyetdap nyeis.
62004020	Dvyuk yuk, Ngos gas Mangso lhyi jyetdap nyeis ge las nyah vmang vnoeuh lyis hoeng nyeis lyis gas, hauh soeu ka hwah soeu nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis vsainnyang yoh nyvng dah vmang vnoeuh lyis ma jyetdap lyis gas, vsainnyang ma yoh nyvng dah Mangso lhyi ma yoh jyetdap.
62004021	Yang lyis Khristu dyei toh dah tyingtoh dang gas, Mangso lhyi jyetdap soeu ka nyah vmang vnoeuh lyis eq yoh jyetdap das, ge zis nghuot.
62005001	Yesu gas Meshia nghuot ge lomsjingh soeu hank laus eq, Mangso dah lo jens nghuot las hauh Uwus lyis jyetdap soeu hank laus eq, lo lyis eq jyetdap.
62005002	Yang gas Mangso lhyi jyetdap las nyah tyingtoh dang lyis chank kuot nyeis nghuot lyis gas, Mangso dah lo jens lyis eq jyetdap nyeis cho yang tsain seq.
62005003	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso tyingtoh dang lyis chank kuot zis gas nyang lyis jyetdap cho nghuot. Nyah tyingtoh dang gas yah xiklyis nyoshoq ma yau.
62005004	Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso dah lo khanghmuh gas hauh mungkvn lyis yoh ung. Mungkvn lyis yang yoh ung cho ka yah lomsjingh cho gvng masyah nghuot.
62005005	Yesu gas Mangso dah lo nghuot ge lomsjingh soeu kyingh ma nghuot lyis gas mungkvn lyis hank yoh ung tyamp das lah?
62005006	Yesu Khristu gas jeisnyhop kham cho dah jeis yahge shei cho dah suih yah jweh los soeu nghuot. Nyang gas jeis yah kyingh ma nghuot. Jeis yahge suih yah jweh los, dyos gas jyoeng yvmvyah hauh cho jyoeng yvlyis dyos nyang kanghjyoeng kat dyei.
62005007	Kanghjyoeng somh koeuq bos.
62005008	Hauh zis gas Dyos, jeis yahge suih nghuot las, hau somh koeuq gonh gas dvyhangteh doeusgoh dah kanghjyoeng tsain kat.
62005009	Yang gas dius dah kanghjyoeng kat cho lhyi daq jingh, nghuot laus eq Mangso dah kanghjyoeng kat cho ka zes goengtoenk las nyang gas nyah Lo dah cho kanghjyoeng kat dyei goeus.
62005010	Housoeh las Mangso dah lo lyis lomsjingh soeu hank laus eq, haih kanghjyoeng dang lyis nyah ehnyet nhaiqlom mas comh toh. Nghuot laus eq Mangso lhyi ma lomsjingh soeu hank laus eq, lo dah cho Mangso kanghjyoeng kat dyei dang lyis ma lomsjingh yvmvyah Mangso lhyi hwah soeu nghuot ge tsain nghamh.
62005011	Hauh kanghjyoeng dang gas haih zis nghuot. Mangso ka yang lyis mathank magons kang dyei goeus las hauh kang dah jeisthuq dwang gas Lo nyang nghuot.
62005012	Lo lyis yoh soeu hank laus eq, kang eq yoh. Lo lyis ma yoh soeu hank laus eq, hauh kang eq ma yoh.
62005013	Namoq gas vcaiq vto kang yoh goeus cho vlhomuh seq nyeis bas jungh, Mangso dah lo lyis lomsjingh nyeis bang namoq jyank mas ngos haih maussauh lhaih kat.
62005014	Mangso lhyi nyah ehnyet o khyvlyis yang cha lhyi laus eq dung lyis gas gyo dyei nyeis cho yoh loms gvng mas yang nyah xikkhonh mas womh womh yoh wvng.
62005015	Yang nyang lyis dung khanghmuh nyang gyo dyei. Haih cho jyoeng zis yang seq. Yang nyah jyank dung cho eq yoh goeus zis yang seq.
62005016	Nah boek dvyuk yuk shei das iq ma nghuot dah yaunos dvkoeuq koeuq kuot nyeis zis nvng nyvng lyis, nyah xiklyis Mangso lhyi vkyuh bos dung dyei gis. Mangso ka nyang lyis kang dyei das. Hauh zis gas shei vvng dah yaunos ma kuot bang xiklyis kyingh dung dyei das cho nghuot. Nghuot laus eq shei vvng dah yaunos ge zis bos las hauh xiklyis Mangso lhyi nvng bos dung dyei gis cho ngos ma taiq.
62005017	Ma jus dah muhzoh dvnganh gas yaunos nghuot. Nghuot laus eq ma shei vvng dah yaunos eq bos.
62005018	Mangso lo nghuot soeu ka yaunos tsoq las ma kuot zis yang tsain seq. Khasoeh ge lyis nyang lyis Mangso dah lo gomh toh las ma gis soeu ka nyang lyis yoh nos nhang das zis ma nghuot.
62005019	Mungkvn gonh gas ma gis soeu guon dah vkhau mha nghuot. Nghuot laus eq yang gas Mangso shot pheh bang nghuot yvlyis, yang seq.
62005020	Mangso dah lo gas jweh los goeus zis nghuot las, jyoeng dah Mangso lhyi yoh seq dah ehnyet, yang lyis dyei toh goeus zis yang seq. Yang gas lo Yesu Khristu yah dvdain dvlom kang dwis nyeis yvmvyah jyoeng dah Mangso yah eq dvdain dvlom kang tsain dwis nyeis. Hauh soeu ka jyoeng dah Mangso yahge vcaiq vto dah kang eq nghuot.
62005021	Ngah lo jens eh, ma jyoeng dah mangso jens lyis jhank nyeis geh.
63001001	Ngos jyetdap jyoeng dah vmesbih yahge nyah lo jens jyank mas --- Ngos logis maussauh lhaih kat. Nvng lyis ngos kyingh ma nghuot, jyoeng cho lhyi seq bang dvnganhmoq eq nvng lyis tsain jyetdap.
63001002	Khasoeh ge lyis, hauh jyoeng cho yah jyank mas bos las yang yah dvgeh vcaiq vto nyeis das xiklyis nghuot.
63001003	Uwus Mangso yahge Uwus dah Lo Yesu Khristu jyank masyah jyehjuh, nhaiqnyen zis yahge nyenstap zis gas jyoeng yvmas eq, jyetdap yvmas eq, yang yah dvgeh nghuot bas jungh.
63001004	Nah lo jens dvyhamh gas Uwus Mangso yang lyis tyingtoh goeus zis yah dvyhangteh, hauh jyoeng cho mha kang dwis nyeis zis nyvng las ngos svsoh gaus.
63001005	Housoeh las jyetdap dah vmesbih eh, yang dvyuk yah dvyuk jyetdap goh nyeis das xiklyis ngos nvng lyis khyoeuq kat. Gvshih ngos lhaih kat dah cho ka tyingtoh dang vsaiq ma nghuot, cangxeih lyis yah yang xauh yoeus toh goeus dah tyingtoh dang dvnghuot.
63001006	Gvshih ngos taiq nyeis dah jyetdap ge zis gas Mangso dah tyingtoh dang lyis domsyos gyo las chank kuot zis yah kang dwis nyeis cho nghuot. Cangxeih lyis yah namoq dvnganh xauhgyo ku goeus dah tyingtoh dang gas namoq dvnganh jyetdap yvmas kang dwis das cho nghuot.
63001007	Yesu Khristu gas cangsoeu gungs tsungh zis yah jweh lyih yvlyis ngoek dah mhuih jyomh bang nyoshoq gas, mungkvn gonh mas tsain thuq gyoh loh goeus. Hou teh bang gas mhuih jyomh bang, Khristu dah jeswus nghuot.
63001008	Ngamoq kuot toh dah muhzoh lyis namoq ma chithyuk thyuk namoq phauh shangh zis dyingh dyingh yoh bas jungh, vsainnyang zaih nyeis geh.
63001009	Khristu dah jyauh cho mha ma nyeis, hauh yvlyis lai toh khoq soeu hank laus eq Mangso lhyi ma yoh. Hauh jyauh cho lhyi chank nyeis soeu hank laus eq, Uwus lyis eq, Lo lyis eq yoh.
63001010	Haih jyauh cho ma chi los soeu dvyuk yuk namoq jyank jyweh los lyis, namoq yhen mha vlhom yoeus goh, nyenstap bas jungh oen yangh vsang goh.
63001011	Khasoeh ge lyis hauh soeu lhyi lhom jeshuh soeu hank laus eq, nyah dah ma gis muhzoh mas bos goeus.
63001012	Ngos namoq lyis lhaih kat das cho nyoshoq yoh. Nghuot laus eq maussauh mas lhaih ja cheih yah lhaih toh mes zis ma nghuot. Yang dvnganhmoq mas gauslaus cho dyingh shoq xauh yoeus das xiklyis namoq jyank mas jweh las, nhuot tsuk xauh taiq goh das zis lyis ngos nghamhloms nyeis.
63001013	Mangso khyen yoeus zis xauh soeu, nvng jyetdap vbi dah lo jens gas nvng lyis jeshuh kat.
64001001	Ngos jyetdap jyoeng dah Gai-u jyank mas— Ngos logis maussauh lhaih kat.
64001002	Ngah dyenschangh phoq eh, nah dyos nyeisgis yaplhoq zis ngos seq, nvng cho khvt khanghmuh mas nyeisgis yaplhoq las nvng yanghzan nyeis bas jungh, ngos vkyuh dung.
64001003	Nvng vjangh yah jyoeng cho mha suh e nyeis zis yah dvyhangteh, hauh jyoeng cho mha nvng kha iq wontang nyeis cho lhyi Khristan vmang vnoeuh moq dvyhamh jweh los las tsain taiq kyoh uhlyis ngos svsoh gaus.
64001004	Ngah lo jens, hauh jyoeng cho mha tsain suh e nyeis zis lyis xauhgyo dah gausyis joqyos thoq lyis zes dah gausyis joqyos ngos mas gohtoeu ma bos lo.
64001005	Ngah jyetdap buisnoms phoq eh, Khristan vmang vnoeuh moq, nyamoq lvbaus dvnghuot shih lyis nvng kuot dyei dah muhzoh dvnganh gas lomluk dah muh nghuot.
64001006	Nyamoq nah jyetdap cho lhyi haih phung mha los tsain taiq kyoh. Nyamoq gyung cho yoh tsoq loh das nyhenshang jyehjuh yah bos jenh pangh kat shih aq. Houka Mangso lyis nhaiqdoeus nhang cho nghuot das.
64001007	Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas ma loms ma jingh bang masyah pangh thuk cho ma lhom yoeus yoeus, Khristu dah sasvna muhzoh mas tsain suh e bang nghuot.
64001008	Housoeh las hauh jyoeng dah muhzoh mas nyamoq yah muhwons changh yoh bweh bas jungh, yang Khristan jens gas haih dius jens lyis pangh thuk chah.
64001009	Hauh phung mha ngos maussauh lhaih kat goeus. Nghuot laus eq nyamoq dah uhjyung duot mes soeu Diotrephe gas ngos taiq kat dah cho jens lyis domsyos gyo das zis ma nghuot.
64001010	Ngos jweh los lyis nyang kuot tyamp goeus dah cho khvt khanghmuh lyis taiq kyoh das. Nyang gas yang lyis svsoh ma gis dang yahge hwah dang taiq. Nghuot laus eq hauh zis nyah xiklyis ma tham shih las, Khristan vmang vnoeuh moq jweh los lyis nyang ma lhom yoeus thoq lyis ma goh lhom yoeus mes bang lyis eq tomp tyamp las phung masyah eq khat thuq tyamp.
64001011	Ngos jyetdap dah buisnoms phoq eh, ma gis cho lhyi vtoeuq yoeus goh, gis cho lhyi dvtoeuq yoeus geh. Gis dah muh kuot soeu ka Mangso dah zis nghuot. Ma gis dah muh kuot soeu ka Mangso lhyi ma seq.
64001012	Dius yuk khanghmuh gas Demetrio dah gis cho lhyi kanghjyoeng tsain kat. Nyang kuot dah muhzoh gas jyoeng dah Mangso dang yah yih joq. Ngamoq eq kanghjyoeng tsoq kat las ngamoq kat dah kanghjyoeng dang gas jus yvlyis nvng seq.
64001013	Ngos nvng lyis taiq das cho nyoshoq yoh; nghuot laus eq pen yahge lhaih cheih yah ma mes lhaih lo.
64001014	Ma nyangh lyis nvng yah yoh xauhgoh das zis ngos nghamhloms nyeis. Hauh uhlyis yah aiq yuk nhuot tsuk xauh taiq goh das.
64001015	Nvng nyenstap nyeis bas jungh, Nah buisnoms jens dvnganh nvng lyis jeshuh kat. Nvng eq ngamoq dah buisnoms jens dvnganh lyis bos jeshuh dyei aq.
65001001	Yesu Khristu dah jons yahge Yaku dah vnoeuh ngos Yuda gas, Mangso khi yoeus las Uwus Mangso dah jyetdap zis yah Yhensain Yesu dah gomh cho mha kang dwis nyeis bang lyis dang kyoh kat.
65001002	Nhaiqnyen cho, nyenstap cho yahge jyetdap zis gas namoq thoq mas dyinghjet los bas jungh.
65001003	Ngah jyetdap bang eh, yang dvnganhmoq chomp lomsjingh las lhom yoeus toh goeus dah khyuot yoeus cho lhyi namoq jyank mas lhaih kat das zis ngos svsoh yomkat nyeis. Hauh uhlyis, Mangso ka nyah dius jens lyis vcaiq vto xiklyis dvlhain kyingh kyauh toh dah lomsjingh cho xiklyis tsoq las thoenk zan loh das cho namoq jyank dvlhain dvm maussauh lhaih las yomdyei chah cho ngos nyvng.
65001004	Khasoeh ge lyis, yang masoh mathamh nyeis uhlyis gywes ma tsungh bang gas yah jyank mas gauh wvng los. Nyamoq gas nyamoq pyo cho chank dah ma gis wotwu yah yoh tsain nghop tyamp das xiklyis yah Mangso dah jyehjuh yah sen dah dang lyis mes khyvlyis vguih vkoeu kuot tyamp thoq lyis magoh, dvyuk kyingh dah yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu lyis eq tsain he tyamp.
65001005	Mangso ka Israel dius nyau jens lyis Egutu masyah dvlhain khasoeh khyuot yoeus thang lhyi nyang lyis ma lomsjingh bang lyis mhont tyamp cho namoq seq laus eq, namoq lyis ngos doms taiq kyingh mes.
65001006	Vsainnyang yoh toh dah toeuh lyis ehnyet ma tap, vsainnyang dah nyeis joqyos toh tyamp khoq las thuq loh dah loeuswons bang lyis eq soh nyeis geh. Mangso ka nyah dah dang thang thyet buisnyeis zainsmuh mas nyamoq lyis dang thang thyet las joeng das xiklyis mauchot dwang mas vcaiq vto ge dah shamjvng yah twih toh.
65001007	Sodom yahge Gomora wus lyis eq, hau vyvm vwi wus jens lyis eq soh nyeis geh. Hauh wus mas dah dius jens gas hauh loeuswons bang teh, nye yukgis zomh cho mha lhyap lhyi lha soengh choenk lyi yah tyi lha zomh goh gvng mas dvnganhmoq xiklyis de bangh zaih nhang khyvlyis yah vcaiq vto nyi mas joeng zis tsain xauh.
65001008	Houyah dvyhangteh haih dius jens gas, nyamoq gungs lyis yaunos bweh nhang dah nyoqnyvng nyvng. Nyamoq gas Mangso dah toeuh lyis chaxwe ma nhang, nyhang mas dah phunk bos bang lyis ma phauh gis tsain kuot.
65001009	Loeuswons vgyis nghuot dah Mikhael yangh haih cho ma kuot. Moshe dah mvng lyis hank yoeus vvng zis yah sen lha hauh Satan yah phyen goh dyoqgoh uhlyis Mikhael gas Satan lhyi ma phauh ma danh yobos huon cho ma womh taiq. Nvng lyis Mangso yah nyho lha jyauh bas jungh; ge dvtaiq.
65001010	Nghuot laus eq, haih dius jens gas nyamoq ma seq cho cha lhyi eq ma phauh gis kuot zis yah tsain zan. Ye dah gaunyhauq teh vkhang yah bos joq dah seq cho eq nyamoq lyis tsain mhont tyamp.
65001011	Nyamoq gas Ka-in chank dah cho jeis lyis tsain chank gvng mas nyamoq xiklyis kha iq gyuk chank bos das lah! ngwis xing gvng mas Balam kuot shuot ja yobos mas nyamoq dah gungs lyis tsain kyauh tyamp. Kora gomloeus toq teh nyamoq eq gomloeus toq gvng mas nyamoq lyis mhont tyamp.
65001012	Nyamoq gas xoq zis ma seq lo shoq hoeu lha tsain zo shuk gvng mas, namoq dah zomhgoh zoshuk huom mha vchoqh vjyot lhoeuh nhang. Nyamoq gas Nyamoq vkyuh xiklyis kyingh tsain kuot, nyamoq gas mau ma bos lyeis yah muot tangh dah jyommauh, cungh thuq los laus eq vshih ma shih vnyet eq cheq khuot tyamp las shei goeus dah saiqzains yah doeusgoh.
65001013	Than dah Panglai jeisphauq yah eq tsain doeusgoh, nyamoq dah vchoqh vjyot muhzoh lyis panglai jeisnyop teh de bangh thuq los nhang. Nyamoq gas kyilamh teh tsain nghuot. Mangso ka nyamoq xiklyis noq thank dah mauchotdwang mas joqyos sont toh dyei goeus.
65001014	Adam caiq masyah nyhet vcaiq lyis dah Enok gas gohlhain yah haih dius jens dah cho pe toh. Hauh zis gas Yhensain ka nyah loeuswons mons mons sens sens yah jweh lyih las,
65001015	dius dvnganh lyis nyamoq kuot dah ma gis muhzoh gvng mas eq, gywes ma tsungh dah dius jens Mangso lhyi ngoek khyvlyis yah taiq dah gyukphoh dang jens dvnganh xiklyis eq soetuon lha dang thang thyet das, ge.
65001016	Haih dius jens gas vjangh yah lop las gohyuk lyis yobos tsain huon; nyamoq gas nyamoq nyang omes dah ma gis cho lhyi tsain chank. Nyamoq gas vsainnyang dah cho lhyi moengs zo las nyamoq dah vkyuh bos cho yoh das nyhenshang gohyuk lyis tsain chungh.
65001017	Nghuot laus eq jyetdap bang eh, lai loh goeus dah shishenh lyis yah Yesu Khristu dah lvgyo jens namoq lyis taiq kyoh goeus dah dang lyis tsain soh nyeis geh.
65001018	Nyamoq gas thang thank dah buisnyeis jweh uhlyis, namoq lyis loeusmus soqzo bang, gywes ma tsungh bang, vsainnyang dah gungsshoh obos ehnyet chank bang tsain thuq los das, ge namoq lyis taiq kyoh goeus.
65001019	Hauh bang gas phung khau mha gang lvn cho lhoeu thuq bang, vsainnyang gungsshoh obos cho chank bang, Dyos lyis ma xauh yoeus bang tsain nghuot.
65001020	Nghuot laus eq jyetdap bang eh, namoq dah gyingshang lomsjingh cho mha vpom tsuk las vsainnyang hauh yvlyis tsoq las kuhxing los nhang geh. Gyingshang Dyos dah yomsoq mas nges las vkyuh tsain dung nyeis geh.
65001021	Yhensain Yesu Khristu gas nyah nhaiqnyen shohgyo ehnyet yah namoq lyis dyei das mathank magons kang yoh shoq Mangso dah jyetdap ehnyet mas nyeis nyeis geh.
65001022	Loms shot khamkhvv mus nyeis bang lyis nhaiqnyen geh.
65001023	Tsai, dvyhamh lyis nyi masyah lhuot she yoeus teh khyuot yoeus geh. Tsai, gohtoeu dvyhamh lyis gyuk zis yah nhaiqnyen ehnyet Chixoeuq nyeis geh. Nghuot laus eq, nyamoq dah gungsshoh nyetnau masyah vchoqh vjyot dap dah dyimis lyis yangh hoeng nyeis geh.
65001024	Gvshih gas namoq lyis ma lains shoq yoh gomh las nyah phunk xikkhonh mas yaunos yobos ma bos yvmvyah gauslaus cho yoh dyei.
65001025	Yah Yhensain Yesu Khristu masyah, yah khyuot yoeus soeu dvso kyingh dah Mangso mha phunk, zauguon, yomsoq yahge toeuh gas lai loh goeus vcaiq caiq masyah haq caiq, vcaiq caiq vto to joq bas jungh. Amen.
66001001	Haih maussauh gas Yesu Khristu lyis Mangso dyei dah nyoqnyvng cho lhyi lhaih toh. Yesu lyis haih nyoqnyvng dyei zis gas ma nyangh lyis bweh los das cho Mangso dah jyeidwis jens yoh nyvng shoq Chixoeuq nhang das xiklyis nghuot. Khristu gas nyah jyeidwis Yohan jyank loeuswons soeu nhang las haih nyoqnyvng dang lyis seq nhang.
66001002	Heika Yohan taiq kyoh, Mangso jyank masyah jweh los dang yahge Yesu Khristu Chixoeuq dah jyoeng dah cho nghuot.
66001003	Haih maussauh nghap soeu yahge haih lvpe dang jens lyis gyo yoeus las, haih maussauh mas lhaih ya lhaih toh zis lyis chank kuot bang gas ngelhoq. Khasoeh ge lyis taiq kyoh dah muhzoh bweh das shishenh ni los goeus.
66001004	Ngos Yohan gas Asia mau mas joq dah phung nyhet phung lhyi maussauh lhaih kat. Haih caiq, gohlhain caiq, thang caiq mas nyeis dah Mangso jyank masyah eq, nyah hwankti tank xik mas nyeis dah dyos nyhet koeuq masyah eq,
66001005	wontang dah kanghjyoeng phoq, shei bang masyah cangxeih dwis toq los soeu, nyeisjvng dah hwankti jens lyis guon dah Yhensain Yesu Khristu jyank masyah eq jyehjuh yahge nyenstap zis gas namoq mas joq bas jungh. Yang lyis jyetdap las, nyah gungs nyang phudyei shei kham zis yah, yang lyis yah yaunos masyah khyuot kat las,
66001006	Nyah Uwus dah muhzoh lyis yoh wons wuq das xiklyis yang lyis munghdan vnyau yahge phudyei toeuh dyei soeu Yesu Khristu mas phunk nyoqnho yahge yomsoq vcaiq vto joq bas jungh! Amen.
66001007	Yoeuh aq, nyang gas jyommauh yah jweh lyih goeus.Yhensain lhyi lham yah thauh phank bang yah dvgeh dius jens dvnganh gas nyang lyis tsain nyvng das. Nyeisjvng mas dah dius nyau khanghmuh nyah gvng mas kuk nyingh shohthang thauh das. Houyah dvyhangteh bweh los bas jungh. Amen.
66001008	Ngos gas cangxeih soeu eq, thang thank soeu eq nghuot ge, haih caiq lyis eq, gohlhain caiq lyis eq, jweh los das caiq lyis eq nyeis dah Maukhung Jesphung Yhensain Mangso taiq.
66001009	Ngos gas namoq dah vmang vnoeuh Yohan nghuot. Yesu dah thang chank soeu dvyuk khyvlyis yah nyah munghdan yah sen dah dius jens xauh dah shanghsenh cho mha nhaiqlom xing zis yah namoq yah dvgeh jhen nyeis soeu nghuot. Ngos gas Mangso dah dang yahge Yesu dan cho lhyi taiq kyoh gvng mas Patmo goeujo pheh nhang kat zis xauh.
66001010	Hau Yhensain dah buisnyeis lyis ngos dyos mas nghuot loh las, ngah nungsthank mas lvbuh yhangteh dah thwe zainsmuh dvkoeuq lui zis ngos xauhgyo.
66001011	Hauh thwe ka, Nvng nyvng zis yah dvyhangteh maussauh mas lhaih las, hauh maussauh lyis phung nyhet koeuq nghuot dah Ephesu, Samirna, Pergamu, Thiatira, Sardi, Philadephia yahge Ladoki phung jens lyis huon kat aq, ge.
66001012	Housoeh ngos lyis jis nyeis soeu ka hank nghuot au, oen nyvng das xiklyis lhain yoeuh kat lyis ngos gas xing nyituonh gus nyhet koeuq yahge,
66001013	hauh vgungs mas dius teh soeu dvyuk nyah dyixing lhyi khyeiwu mas jweh shoq wuot chi. Nyah sainhkhonh mas xing dyichih chih toh zis ngos nyvng.
66001014	Nyah cam ka thyoeu dah yvng mauh teh, nghuot ya gyu teh thyoeu. Nyah nyoqjeih jens gas nyilhyam teh duk nyeis.
66001015	Nyah khyei ka nyi mas shuonh goeus dah thunk gyingh teh tsain bvng, nyah thwe ka nyings huomh toh dah jyvthyangh teh nyings nyeis.
66001016	Nyah loq mas kyi nyhet lom chi toh: nyah nhuot masyah aiq shot zuk dah tyingh sham thuq nyeis, nyah nyoqnho ka nyeih gungs lyis tso dah buis teh bvng joq.
66001017	Hauh soeu lhyi nyvng lyis ngos nyah khyeiyang mas shei soeu teh lains loh. Nyang gas nyah loqyos loq ngah thoq mas kih las, Vgyuk, ngos gas cangxeih soeu eq, thang thank soeu eq nghuot.
66001018	Ngos gas dwis nyeis soeu eq nghuot. Ngos shei goeus laus eq gvshih ngos vcaiq vto dwis nyeis. Ngos gas shei nos dah thoq mas eq, shei mau dah thoq mas eq guon das toeuh yoh.
66001019	Housoeh las nvng nyvng goeus zis lyis eq, gvshih joq zis lyis eq, thang pheh bweh los das cho lhyi eq lhaih toh aq.
66001020	Ngah loqyos loq mas nvng yoh nyvng dah kyi nyhet koeuq yahge xing nyituonh gus nyhet koeuq dah nghop toh cho ka haih zis nghuot. Kyi nyhet lom gas phung nyhet koeuq lyis zungh dah loeuswons nyhet yuk nghuot las nyi tuonh gus nyhet koeuq gas hauh phung nyhet phung nghuot, ge.
66002001	Ephesu wus phung mha dah loeuswons soeu lhyi heisoeh lhaih kat aq. Haih zis gas loqyos loq mas kyi nyhet lom chi toh las, xing nyituonh gus nyhet koeuq dah vgungs mas suh loh soeu dah dang nghuot.
66002002	Nvng kuot goeus dah muhzoh lyis ngos seq. Nvng kha iq yau las zwi khank zis yahge jhen cho lhyi eq ngos seq. Nvng gas ma shop bang lyis ma yoh yoeuh toh zis eq, lvgyo ma nghuot, lvgyo yeis khuk bang lyis yen las nyamoq gas hwah bang nghuot yvlyis yoh chixoeuq goeus zis ngos seq.
66002003	Nvng ehnyet xing, ngah nyings gvng mas shanghsenh kham lha nvng vsomh eq ma dyei.
66002004	Nghuot laus eq gvshih nvng ngos lyis xikpheh teh ma jyetdap lo las nvng mas yobos huon das zis ngos nyvng.
66002005	Housoeh yvmvyah nvng kha iq nyhang shoq dyet gyoh loh goeus cho nghamh yoeuh aq. Nah yaunos masyah lhain los las xikpheh teh doms chank kuot aq. Nvng nah yaunos masyah ma lhain los lyis gas ngos nah jyank mas jweh las nah nyituonh gus lyis hauh joqyos masyah xwih tyamp dyei das.
66002006	Nghuot laus eq Nikola dah changlo jens kuot dah wotwu lyis ngos hoeng teh nvng eq hoeng nyeis gvng mas nvng lyis chungh dais dvkoeuq bos.
66002007	Dyos gas phung jens lyis khasoeh taiq zis gas no dap soeu ka xauhgyo bas jungh. Ung cho yoh soeu lhyi Mangso dah Eden khyam gungs mas yuk dah kang saiqzains mas dah vshih zo das toeuh ngos dyei das.
66002008	Samirna phung mha dah loeuswons soeu lhyi heisoeh lhaih kat aq. Haih zis gas cangxeih soeu yahge thang thank soeu, shei goeus laus eq doms dwis nyeis soeu dah dang nghuot.
66002009	Nvng xauh dah yaukyenh cho yahge shohjyen cho lhyi ngos seq, nghuot laus eq nvng jyoengh dis nyeis. Yuda dius nghuot ge laus eq Yuda dius ma nghuot bang nvng lyis nyoqnho ngelang gyoh nhang, ma gis dah loeusmus soqzo dang taiq nyeis zis ngos seq. Jyoengh taiq lyis, nyamoq gas Satan dah phung dius jens nghuot.
66002010	Nvng jweh los nyeis dah shanghsenh cho lhyi vgyuk; yoeuh aq namoq lyis shiwu das satan ka namoq mas dvyhamh lyis thung mha lhunk toh las namoq buisnyeis dvci nyeih shoeuhshih zis xauh das. Shei shoq ngos lyis lomluk nyeis geh, housoeh lyis ngos nvng lyis kang buismuk dyei das. Houka nah ung cho dah phauh nghuot.
66002011	Dyos gas phung jens lyis khasoeh taiq zis gas, no dap soeu ka xauhgyo bas jungh. Aiq vlhain shei cho ka ung soeu lhyi yoh zangh das zis ma nghuot.
66002012	Pergamu phung mha dah loeuswons soeu lhyi heisoeh lhaih kat aq. Heika aiq shot zuk tyingh sham chi soeu dah dang nghuot.
66002013	Nvng khah joqyos mas nyeis zis ngos seq, Satan dah tank joq yvmas nvng khau nyeis. Ngos mas jyoeng zis yah kanghjyoeng kat dah Antipa ka Satan nyeis dah joqyos nghuot dah nah vgungs mas sat tyamp zis xauh dah shishenh lyis yangh, nvng gas ngos mas wontang lha ngos lyis lomsjingh dah nah lomsjingh cho lhyi ma ngoek tyamp.
66002014	Nghuot laus eq silho lhyi kyangh dah zonoms zo das zis yahge yauxi dah cho ge dah lainszo gus muh mas Israel jens chank las yaunos kuot shoq Balak lyis joeui dyei Balam dah jyauh cho mha chank loh bang dvyhamh namoq mas bos yvmvyah nvng lyis yobos huon dais dvtsiq ngos nyvng.
66002015	Houyah dvyhangteh namoq mas Nikola thang chank bang dah jyauh cho mha chank loh bang bos.
66002016	Housoeh yvmvyah gvshih nyang nah yaunos masyah lhain los aq. Housoeh ma nghuot lyis ngos nah jyank mas lvnyap jweh los las ngah nhuot masyah thuq dah tyingh sham yah hauh bang lyis zan das.
66002017	Dyos gas phung jens lyis khasoeh taiq zis gas no dap soeu xauhgyo bas jungh. Ung cho yoh bang lyis shung toh dah mana dvkhamh lyis eq, nyamoq yuk khanghmuh lyis thyoeu dah luk eq ngos dyei das. Hauh luk thoq mas lhaih toh dah nyings saiq lyis gas luk yoh soeu mha lai las gohyuk hank eq ma yoh bos seq.
66002018	Thiatira phung mha dah loeuswons soeu lhyi heisoeh lhaih kat aq. Haih zis gas nyilhyam teh duk bvng dah nyoqjeih yahge buot cheih toh dah thunk gyingh teh dah khyei dap soeu, Mangso dah Lo dang nghuot.
66002019	Nvng cha kuot yvlyis ngos seq. Nah jyetdap cho yahge lomsjingh cho mha wontang zis eq, muh wons wuq zis yah ehnyet kuhxing dah jhen cho lhyi eq ngos seq. Hauh thoq magoh, nvng thang thank kuot dah muhzoh gas cangxeih kuot dah muhzoh thoq lyis zes gis cho ngos seq.
66002020	Nghuot laus eq ngos nvng lyis yobos huon chank dvkoeuq bos. Khasoeh ge lyis nvng gas nyang gungs nyang Mangso jyank masyah lyih dah lvgyo nghuot ge dah vmesbih Yezebel lyis yobos yoeuh lhaiq toh zis yah shwih toh. Nyang gas ngah jyeidwis jens lyis yauxi muh kuot das zis yahge silho lhyi kyangh dah zonoms zo das cho jyauh las nyamoq lyis chowhang whang nhang.
66002021	Ngos nyang lyis yaunos masyah nhaiqlom thaiq das shishenh dyei toh laus eq nyah yauxi muh masyah nhaiqlom ma yoh thaiq los.
66002022	Housoeh las ngos nyang lyis nyah yhetyos mas doeuh tyamp toh das. Houmha nyang yah nyi shuot lvng shuot muh kuot bang yah dvgeh shanghsenh zainsmuh xauh das. Nyamoq gas hauh vmesbih yah kuot dah yauxi muh masyah nhaiqlom ma yoh thaiq los lyis gas ngos nyamoq lyis gvshih nyang hauh shanghsenh zis xauh nhang das.
66002023	Nyah thang chank bang lyis eq ngos sat das. Hauh uhlyis ngos gas dius yuk khanghmuh dah nghamh cho yahge bweh nhang mes cho dvnganh yvlyis seq dyei dah Yhensain nghuot yvlyis phung jens seq los das. Ngos namoq dvyuk yah dvyuk lyis vsainnyang kuot goeus dah muhzoh yah dvyhangteh tauh dyei das.
66002024	Nghuot laus eq Thiatira wus mas nyet joq shih dah phung dius jens dvyhamh gas hau yauxi dah jyauh cho lhyi ma chank thoq lyis magoh, dius jens taiq, Satan dah noq thank nghop shung toh cho lhyi eq ma xuq. Ngos namoq lyis taiq bah, namoq lyis gohtoeu yvwons s ma kyah dyei lo das.
66002025	Nghuot laus eq namoq yoh goeu lyis ngos jweh lyih shoq goeng goeng tsop zains toh geh.
66002026	Ung cho yoh las thang thank jweh shoq ngos nhaiqdoeus dah wotwu chi bang lyis ngos ngah Uwus jyank masyah yoh dah toeuh lyis dyei das.
66002027	Hauh toeuh gas svbih mau thoq mas thyeq lhamloq yah guon las yam shonh soeu dah yam lyis teh vdyis vmons bat khyop tyamp das toeuh nghuot.
66002028	Hau buhnyhiq ngos nyamoq lyis dyei das.
66002029	Dyos gas phung jens lyis khasoeh ge taiq zis gas, no dap soeu xauhgyo bas jungh, ge.
66003001	Sardi phung mha dah loeuswons soeu lhyi heisoeh lhaih kat aq. Haih zis gas Mangso dah Dyos nyhet koeuq yahge kyi nyhet lom chi toh soeu dah dang nghuot. Nvng kuot dah muhzoh ngos seq. Nvng gas kang dwis nyeis ge hoeuh laus eq vshei dvnghuot.
66003002	Housoeh las phuk soh lhaiq mus aq. Nvng mas nyet joq shih las shei loh nyeis bang lyis thukxank aq. Khasoeh ge lyis nvng kuot dah muhzoh ngah Mangso xikkhonh mas ma dyinghjet shih zis ngos nyvng dyei.
66003003	Housoeh yvmvyah nvng cha xauh xuq zis yahge xauhgyo zis doms soh aq. Hauh yvlyis domsyos gyo las nah yaunos masyah nhaiqlom thaiq las lhain los aq. Nvng phuk soh lhaiq ma mus lyis gas, ngos khauh soeu teh jweh lyih das. Ngos nah jyank mas khanhamp jweh lyih das zis eq nvng ma seq das.
66003004	Nghuot laus eq vsainnyang dyimis lyis vwot v-oeu ma mus nhang bang Sardi phung mha dvyhamh nyet joq shih. Nyamoq gas mon yih yvmvyah dyi thyoeu wuot las ngos yah dvgeh suh e das.
66003005	Ung cho yoh bang gas heisoeh teh dyimis thyoeu xauh wuot das. Ngos nyamoq dah nyings lyis kang maussauh buk masyah thyuk tyamp das zis ma nghuot. Ngah Uwus xikkhonh mas eq, nyah loeuswons bang xikkhonh mas eq nyamoq gas ngos yah sen bang nghuot oen kyoq kyoq taiq hoeuh das.
66003006	Dyos gas phung jens lyis khasoeh taiq zis gas no dap soeu ka xauhgyo bas jungh, ge.
66003007	Tsai, Philadephia wus phung mha dah loeuswons soeu lhyi heisoeh lhaih kat aq. Haih zis gas gyingshang soeu, jyoeng soeu, Dawi dah suhshih chi soeu, hank ma yoh nyheih shoq phank toh las hank ma yoh phank shoq nyheih toh soeu dah dang nghuot.
66003008	Nvng kuot nyeis dah muhzoh lyis ngos seq. Nvng yom dvtsiq dvbos laus eq, Ngah jyauh dang lyis nvng chank las ngah thoq mas wontang zis ngos seq. Nah xikkhonh mas hank eq ma yoh nyheih dah khomh dvkoeuq ngos phank hanh toh dyei goeus.
66003009	Yoeuh aq, vsainnyang Yuda dius nghuot ge laus eq ma jings, Satan phung mha bos dah hauh hwah bang lyis ngos, nyamoq lyis nah khyeiyang mas los tsain paiq nhang das las, ngos nvng lyis jyetdap nyeis zis gas nyamoq seq das.
66003010	Nvng gas ngos tying toh zis yah dvyhangteh ehnyet xing zis yah jhen das cho chank nyeis yvmvyah, nyeisjvng dius dvnganh yvlyis shiwu das xiklyis, nyeisjvng goms shoq shanghsenh zis jweh lyis ngos nvng lyis gomh das.
66003011	Ngos lvnyap jweh lyih das, nah dah ung buismuk lyis hank eq ma yoh lhuot yoeus bas jungh! Nvng yoh nyhoq lyis zungh nyeis aq.
66003012	Yoh ung soeu lhyi ngah Mangso dah zoppaiq yhenmuh mas khungzains dvzains ngos bweh nhang das. Nyang hou mhayah khanhamp eq nghe pheh thuq das zis ma nghuot. Ngah Mangso dah nyings lyis eq, ngah Mangso jyank masyah thuq las, maukhung masyah gyoh los dah Yerusalem wus saiq ge, ngah Mangso dah wus nyings lyis eq, ngvnyang dah nyings saiq lyis eq, hauh soeu thoq mas ngos lhaih tap dyei das.
66003013	Dyos gas phung jens lyis khasoeh taiq zis gas no dap soeu ka xauhgyo bas jungh.
66003014	Ladoki wus phung mas dah loeuswons soeu lyis heisoeh lhaih kat aq. Haih zis gas wontang zis yahge jyoeng dah kanghjyoeng phoq, Mangso gvn ya gvnkhanh toh dah vpom, Amen! ge soeu dah dang nghuot.
66003015	Nvng cha kuot goeus zis ngos seq. Nvng gas jyamh eq ma nghuot gywes eq ma nghuot. Nvng jyamh ya jyamh, gywes ya gywes dvkoeuq koeuq bweh das zis ngos o.
66003016	Nghuot laus eq gvshih nvng gas gywes eq ma nghuot jyamh eq ma nghuot, loms loms mus joq yvmvyah ngah nhuot masyah dyeh tyamp das.
66003017	Nvng gas, Ngos gas dis, ngos mas zisyos nyoshoq joq, ngos mas chah cho dvnganh yoh goeus ge taiq. Nghuot laus eq nvng gas kha iq shanghsenh las nhaiqnyen phoh zis nghuot joq yvlyis nvng ma seq nyvng! Nvng gas shohjyen, nyoqjet las shohchen mus nyeis.
66003018	Housoeh las nvng dis bas jungh, nyi mas kyink tyamp goeus dah xing lhyi eq, svbih xikkhonh mas nah shohchen vxoq vcaiq ma mus bas jungh. Nghop dyei das xiklyis nvng wuot dah dyimis thyoeu jens eq, nah nyoq nyvng das xiklyis juot ja mvcheih eq, ngah jyank mas wis yoeus das zis ngos nvng lyis joeu i da dyei.
66003019	Ngos gas ngos jyetdap bang dvnganh lyis nyho, jyauh zis yah joeng. Housoeh las nvng jyoengh gying soh zis yah nhaiqlom thaiq aq.
66003020	Yoeuh aq, ngos gas khomh koq yap joq, ngah thwe gyo las khomh phank dyei soeu hank jyank mas laus eq, ngos wvng las nyang yah dvgeh zoshuk das. Nyang eq ngos yah dvgeh xauh zo shuk das.
66003021	Ngos gas ung cho yoh las ngah uwus dah tank mas nyang yah dvgeh yoh tsung teh, ung cho yoh soeu lyis ngah uwus dah tank mas ngos yah dvgeh xauh tsung das toeuh ngos dyei das.
66003022	Dyos gas phung jens lyis khasoeh taiq zis gas no dap soeu ka xauhgyo bas jungh, ge.
66004001	Hauh thang lhyi gohtoeu nyoqnyvng dvkoeuq gas maukhung mha phank hanh toh dah khomh dvkoeuq lyis ngos nyvng. Xikpheh ngos lyis lui las ngos xauhgyo ku dah thwe ka lvbuh teh nyings nyeis zis yah, Heimha doq los aq, thang pheh bweh das cho ngos nvng lyis chixoeuq bah, ge.
66004002	Hauh uhlyis ngos dyos mas muis loh, maukhung mha hwankti tank dvkoeuq joq, hauh yvmas dius dvyuk tsung toh.
66004003	Nyah nyoqnho vwuot gas phauhdap luk nvgvthweq yahge patvmyah teh buh yungh joq las, hauh tank dah yvmlhaink mas myaq lung seng teh dah sainyvng yoqgan chent toh.
66004004	Hauh tank dah yvmlhaink mas tank aiqci nyei lom joq. Hauh tank mas dyithyoeu wuot las xing buismuk tsungh dah logis aiqci nyei yuk zui nyang tsain tsung lhaink toh.
66004005	Hau tank masyah maunyoq nyik, nyings huomh toh dah thwe yahge maujau jau dah thwe teh zis tsain thuq los. Hauh tank xikkhonh mas eq, Mangso dah dyo nyhet koeuq ge dah tuonh toh nyiduk nyhet koeuq eq bvng joq.
66004006	Tsai, hauh tank xikkhonh mas bvng toenk teh gying dah thomh dvkoeuq bos. Hauh thoq lyis magoh hwankti tank dah thyih shot haq shot mas, xik pheh, nungs pheh nyoqjeih yah dyingh dah yewus nyei doeu tsain nyeis.
66004007	Cangxeih dah yewus gas khangkhyi yah doeusgoh. Aiq vdoeu gas noeu yah doeusgoh. Somh vdoeu gas dius dah nyoqnho yah doeusgoh. Nyei vdoeu gas dang nyeis dah zonsmuh teh nghuot.
66004008	Hauh yewus nyei doeu gas dungs khyuk koeuq koeuq dap las gungs dah vkhau vthoq yvmlhaink yah nyoqjeih kyingh dyingh joq. Nyamoq gas nyeih nyenh malyen lo taiq zis gas, Gohlhain caiq, gvshih caiq, thang caiq lyis eq nyeis shih dah Maukhung Jesphung Yhensain Mangso ka Gyingshang, gyingshang, gyingshang! ge.
66004009	Hau yewus nyei doeu gas hwankti tank mas tsung toh las vcaiq vtoh kang dwis nyeis Yhensain dah phunk nyoqnho ngelang yahge jyehjuh lyis chunghthwe kat nyeis.
66004010	Hauh uhlyis nhaiqbos aiqci nyeis yuk eq, tank mas tsung toh las vcaiq vto dwis nyeis soeu lhyi tsain dupaiq. Nyamoq gas hauh tank xikkhonh mas xing buismuk lyis tsain khyuot toh las,
66004011	Ngamoq dah Yhensain Mangso eh, joq ya joq zis nvng gvnkhanh toh las, hauh goeu gas nvng nhaiqdoeus khyvlyis goeng joq zis yah kang tsain dwis nyeis. nvng gas phunk nyoqnho ngelang yahge yomsoq xauh yoeus das zis mon yih nyeis, tsain ge.
66005001	Tsai, tank mas tsung toh soeu dah loqyos loq mas sauhbuk vkhau vthoq lhaih toh las, kyihau nyhet koeuq tap toh dah sauhdain dvkoeuq ngos nyvng.
66005002	Hauh thang lhyi yombos dah loeuswons soeu dvyuk gas, hauh kyihau yoeus tyamp las maussauh dain phank das zis hank mon yih lah, ge thwe zainsmuh yah kaiq yvlyis ngos xauhgyo.
66005003	Nghuot laus eq maukhung mha eq, nyeisjvng mas eq, nyeisjvng dah o tsank mas eq, hauh maussauh lyis phank las hau vkhau mha dah maussauh chvp lyis yoeuh das soeu dvyuk eq ma bos.
66005004	Hauh sauhdain phank las hau vkhau mas lhaih toh cho jens lyis nghap mon soeu dvyuk eq ma xo nyvng yvmvyah ngos gvgis ngaus.
66005005	Housoeh las logis jens masyah dvyuk gas, Vngaus, yoeuh aq, Yuda vkoq mas Dawi dah vnyau vshih kuh nghuot dah khangkhyi ge soeu ka ung cho yoh goeus, nyang gas hauh kyihau nyhet koeuq lyis yoeus tyamp las sauhdain lyis yoh phank, ge.
66005006	Hauh uhlyis Yvnglo gas dwis nyeis dah yewus nyei ja yahge logis jens yvmlhaink toh dah hwankti tank dah vgungs mas yap joq zis ngos nyvng. Hauh Yvnglo gas sat zis xauh goeus teh nyvng. Nyang mas khyau nyhet koeuq yahge nyoqjeih nyhet lom dap. Hauh bang gas nyeisjvng goms shoq nhang kat zis xauh, Mangso dah dyos nyhet koeuq tsain nghuot.
66005007	Hauh Yvnglo los las, hwankti tank mas tsung toh soeu dah loqyos loq mas dah sauhdain lyis yoeus.
66005008	Hau sauhdain lyis xauh yoeus yah dvyih, hauh yewus nyei doeu yahge logis jens aiqci nyei yuk gas, hauh Yvnglo dah xikkhonh mas tsain dupaiq. Nyamoq dvyuk yah dvyuk toenk yahge Mangso dah dius jens shvmanh dung dang ge dah xangh shom yah dyingh joq dah xing kom jens eq tsain chi toh.
66005009	Nyamoq gas chunghthwe vsaiq yah, Nvng hauh sauhdain lyis yoeus das zis yahge kyihau lyis yoeus tyamp das zis mon. Khasoeh ge lyis nvng gas sat zis xauh goeus las, nvng shei kham phudyei zis yah dius nyau ja khanghmuh masyah eq, munghdan khanghmuh masyah eq, vnyau khanghmuh masyah eq, nyingh vja ja masyah eq, Mangso xiklyis nvng dius jens wis goeus.
66005010	Nvng gas nyamoq lyis, ngamoq dah Mangso lhyi phuqsoe muh yoh kuot das xiklyis hwankti mau yahge phudyei dius nyau dvnyau bweh nhang zis yah nyamoq gas nyeisjvng thoq mas guon nyeis das, ge tsain chungh.
66005011	Hauh thang lhyi ngos doms yoeuh kat lyis, hauh Hwankti tank dah yvmlhaink mas eq, Yewus nyei ja yahge logis jens dah yvmlhaink yap joq dah loeuswons bang dah thwe ngos xauhgyo. Hau loeuswons bang gas sens sens wvn wvn huon tsain nyo.
66005012	Nyamoq gas, Sat tyamp xauh dah Yvnglo gas, yomsoq, zisyos, joeui, yom, nyoqnho ngelang, phunk yahge chungh zis lyis kham yoeus das zis mon yih nyeis, ge thwe zainsmuh yah tsain chungh.
66005013	Hauh thoq magoh, maukhung thoq keq masyah eq, nyeisjvng masyah eq, nyeisjvng o tsank masyah eq, nvmukdra khau mhayah eq, maukhung nyeisjvng mas dah dwis ya dwis zis dvnganh gas, Hwankti tank mas tsung toh soeu yahge Yvnglo mas chungh cho, nyoqnho ngelang, phunk yahge yomsoq vcaiq vto bos joq bas jungh, ge.
66005014	Hauh uhlyis yewus nyei ja gas Amen! ge tsain toeuh. Logis jens eq phvluk zomhgyuis las tsain paiq.
66006001	Hauh thang lhyi Yvnglo gas kyihau nyhet koeuq masyah dvkoeuq phank kat yvlyis ngos nyvng las yewus nyei ja masyah dvdoeu gas maujau jau thwe teh zis yah, Los aq, ge taiq thwe ngos xauhgyo.
66006002	Ngos yoeuh kat lyis nyang thyoeu dvdoeu lyis nyvng. Houmha ji soeu ka lyei dvkoeuq chi toh, buismuk eq dvkoeuq tsungh dyei las nyang gas ung cho yoh goeus soeu nghuot zis yah dvyhangteh, ung shih das xiklyis thuq los.
66006003	Hauh thang lhyi Yvnglo gas kyihau aiq vkoeuq phank kat lyis, yewus aiq vdoeu gas, Los aq, ge taiq zis ngos xauhgyo.
66006004	Hauh uhlyis gohtoeu nyang nes teh zis dvdoeu thuq los. Hauh nyang ji soeu lhyi haih nyeisjvng thoq mas jeszan cho bweh nhang lha dius nyang changh sat goh nhang das toeuh dyei toh. Nyang lyis moengsa zainsmuh eq huon dyei.
66006005	Tsai Yvnglo gas kyihau somh vkoeuq lyis phank kat lyis, yewus somh vdoeu gas, Los aq, ge zis ngos xauhgyo. Hauh uhlyis ngos yoeuh kat lyis nyang noq dvdoeu nyeis. Houmha ji soeu ka nyah loq mas jvng dvkoeuq chi toh.
66006006	Hauh yewus nyei ja dah vjo masyah nyings thuq los teh dah thwe dvkoeuq ngos xauhgyo. Hauh thwe ka, Sunghso dvpan lyis dvnyeih dah uhkung phauh khyvlyis shangh chah. Laiq somh pan lyis dvnyeih dah uhkung phauh khyvlyis shangh chah. Nghuot laus eq hauh tsanlun zains jens yahge zvbiq khyam jens lyis vlhoeu thyoq tyamp goh, ge taiq.
66006007	Hauh thang lyis Yvnglo gas kyihau nyei vkoeuq lyis phank kat lyis yewus nyei vdoeu gas, Los aq, ge taiq zis ngos xauhgyo.
66006008	Tsai, ngos yoeuh kat lyis nyang nhamh dvdoeu lyis nyvng. Houmha ji soeu dah nyings gas Shei zau nghuot. Nyah thang mha munyi thomh eq tanh tanh chank yenh, nyamoq gas nyeisjvng dah nyei boms dvboms mas nyeis dah dius jens lyis moeng zan, phanghkhauq zainsmuh, yomh yahge yewus shoeuhshih zis yah sat das toeuh tsain yoh.
66006009	Tsai Yvnglo gas kyihau oeng vkoeuq phank lyis, Mangso dah dang taiq kyoh gvng mas eq, wontang zis yah kanghjyoeng kat gvng mas eq, sat zis xauh bang dah dyos lyis eq, hauh phon o mha ngos nyvng.
66006010	Hauh dyos jens gas, yomsoq zainsmuh yahge gyingshang lha dan dah Yhensain eh, ngamoq lyis sat dah yobos gvng mas nyeisjvng mas nyeis dah dius jens lyis ma shoeuhshih, soe ma tuon tuon nvng khanhamp jweh shoq nyeis dah lah, ge thwe zainsmuh yah tsain kaiq.
66006011	Nyamoq yuk khanghmuh lyis dyi thyoeu gvm huot las, nyamoq teh sat zis xauh das jyeidwis changh jens yahge vmang vnoeuh moq dah nyings yoh changjet shoq, dvsoq langh nyeis shih das xiklyis nyamoq lyis tying toh.
66006012	Tsai, Yvnglo gas kyihau khyuk vkoeuq phank kat zis ngos nyvng. Hauh uhlyis maunyeis svsoh dwis las buis eq thoeubaplap dah yanghthung misseh noq teh noq tyamp las lhamhmuh lom gonh eq suih teh nes tyamp.
66006013	Lvhomp zains lyis uklyeis yah thungh lyis shih-kyei gywis tyamp teh maukhung mas dah kyi ka nyeisjvng mas tsain gywis gyoh tyamp.
66006014	Maukhung ka lom tyamp dah sauhdain teh dyuk tyamp las boms yahge goeujo dvnganh eq vsainnyang joqyos masyah xwih tyamp zis tsain xauh.
66006015	Hauh uhlyis nyeisjvng mas dah hwankti jens, zau guon bang, jeszau jens, dis bang, yombos bang, dius yuk khanghmuh, jons jens yahge luiq bang, dvnganh gas lukkhyung jens yahge boms mas dah luk-uk jens mas tsain phang tamh.
66006016	Nyamoq gas boms yahge lukkhyung jens lyis lui las, Ngamoq thoq mas gyoh nhiq dyei aq. Hwankti tank mas tsung toh soeu dah nyoqnho yahge Yvnglo dah nhaiqlom dyis masyah ngamoq lyis gos dyei aq.
66006017	Nyah aiq yuk dah gyukphoh nhaiqlom dyis buisnyeis zainsmuh heimha jweh goeus las hauh zis lyis hank yoh thoenk yap das lah, ge.
66007001	Hauh thang lhyi loeuswons bang nyei yuk gas nyeisjvng nyei thunk mas yap joq las, nyeisjvng thoq mas eq, nvmukdra thoq mas eq, saiqzains thoq mas eq, lyeis ma yoh muot gyon bas jungh ge, nyeisjvng nyei thunk mas dah lyeis lyis tsain tsop zains toh yvlyis ngos nyvng.
66007002	Tsai, dwis nyeis Mangso dah kyihau chi toh dah loeuswons soeu dvyuk buisthuq shot pheh yah thuq los zis ngos nyvng. Nyang gas nyeisjvng yahge nvmukdra lyis lhoeu thyoq das toeuh yoh dah loeuswons soeu nyei yuk lyis thwe zainsmuh yah kaiq taiq.
66007003	Hauh loeuswons soeu ka, Ngamoq Mangso jyeidwis jens dah ngelang mas kyihau ma tap dvchank gas, nyeisjvng lyis eq, nvmukdra lyis eq, saiqzains lyis eq, vshoeuhshih shih goh, ge.
66007004	Ngelang mas Mangso dah kyihau tap toh goeus bang 144,000 nghuot cho ngos lyis taiq kyoh goeus. Hauh bang gas Israel dah lo jens dvci aiq koq masyah,
66007005	Yuda vkoq mas dvmons aiq khyoengh, Ruben vkoq mas dvmons aiq khyoengh, Gad vkoq mas dvmons aiq khyoengh,
66007006	Asher vkoq mas dvmons aiq khyoengh, Napthali vkoq mas dvmons aiq khyoengh, Manase vkoq mas dvmons aiq khyoengh,
66007007	Simon vkoq mas dvmons aiq khyoengh, Lewi vkoq mas dvmons aiq khyoengh, Isakha vkoq mas dvmons aiq khyoengh,
66007008	Zebulun vkoq mas dvmons aiq khyoengh, Yosep vkoq mas dvmons aiq khyoengh, Benyamin vkoq mas dvmons aiq khyoengh kyihau tap zis tsain kham yoeus goeus.
66007009	Hauh thang lhyi ngos yoeuh kat lyis houmha hank eq ma yoh thoq suon lo shoq nyo dah moqmuh dvkoeuq lyis ngos nyvng. Nyamoq gas vnyau khanghmuh, vhuh khanghmuh, mau khanghmuh mas bang yahge nyingh vja ja kat bang masyah eq, lyih tsain jweh bang nghuot. Hauh bang gas dyi thyoeu tsain wuot las, nyamoq loq mas tsanlun saiq ko tsain chi lha, hauh hwankti tank xikkhonh mas eq, Yvnglo dah xikkhonh mas eq tsain yap joq.
66007010	Nyamoq gas thwe zainsmuh yah khyuot yoeus cho ka hwankti tank mas tsung toh soeu yahge Yvnglo jyank masyah nghuot ge tsain kaiq.
66007011	Tsai, loeuswons bang dvnganh gas, hwankti tank, logis jens yahge yewus nyei doeu lyis tsain yap lhaink toh. Hauh uhlyis nyamoq gas hwankti tank khyeiyang mas gop las, Mangso lhyi dupaiq zis yah,
66007012	Amen! chungh, phunk, joeui jyehjuh chungh, nyoqnho ngelang, yomsoq yahge yom gas vcaiq vto yah Mangso jyank mas joq bas jungh! Amen ge tsain taiq.
66007013	Hauh uhlyis logis jens masyah dvyuk gas haih dyi thyoeu wuot bang gas hank tsain nghuot lah? Khapheh yah tsain thuq los bang nghuot lah, ge, ngos lyis nyei.
66007014	Ngos gas, Yhensain eh, ngos ma seq, nvng gas seq oen, toeuh. Hauh uhlyis, nyang gas, nyamoq gyukphoh shanghsenh zainsmuh masyah tsain luiq thuq los bang nghuot. Nyamoq dah dyimis lyis, hauh Yvnglo dah suih mas tsain cheihshang goeus.
66007015	Housoeh las nyamoq gas Mangso dah tank xikkhonh mas xauh nyeis zis yah nyah Yhenmuh mas nyang lyis nyeih nyenh tsain paiq nyeis. Hwankti tank mas tsung toh soeu eq, nyamoq yah dvgeh nyeis las nyamoq lyis gomh das.
66007016	Nyamoq gas thang pheh khanhamp eq yuot shet zis ma xauh lo das. Buis eq, khateh dah ngeh cho eq, nyamoq lyis yoh ngeh nhang das zis ma nghuot.
66007017	Khasoeh ge lyis hwankti tank vgungs mas nyeis dah Yvnglo gas nyamoq dah yvng yoeuh soeu bweh das. Kang jeisthuq dwang jweh shoq nyamoq lyis cho she das. Mangso eq nyamoq nyoq mas dah nyoqdyeis dvnganh buot tyamp dyei das, ge ngos lyis taiq.
66008001	Tsai, kyihau nyhet vkoeuq lyis Yvnglo phank kat lyis maukhung mha dvshishenh dah vgungs dvgohyih ko sam joq.
66008002	Hauh uhlyis Mangso xikkhonh mas yap joq dah loeuswons bang nyhet yuk lyis ngos nyvng. nyamoq lyis lvbuh nyhet lom dyei.
66008003	Tsai, xangh ngheq dah xing kyop chi dah gohtoeu loeuswons soeu dvyuk hau phon nvm mas e yap joq. Hwankti tank xikkhonh mas joq dah xing phon thoq mas Mangso lo jens dvnganhmoq dah vkyuh dung dang mas lhungh kat las phudyei bas jungh ge, xangh nyoshoq hauh soeu lhyi dyei.
66008004	Xangh shom nyikhauh gas Mangso xikkhonh mas yap joq loeuswons soeu dah loq masyah, Mangso dius jens shvmanh dung dang jens yah dvgeh nhoenk doq loh.
66008005	Hauh thang lhyi loeuswons soeu ka hauh xing kyop lyis yoeus las phon thoq mas nyi dyingh shoq dye kat thang lhyi hauh yvlyis nyeisjvng mas doeuh khyoq kat. Hauh uhlyis maujau jau, nyings huomh toh dah thwe, maunyoq nyik zis yah maunyeis dwis zis tsain bweh los.
66008006	Hauh uhlyis lvbuh nyhet koeuq chi toh loeuswons nyhet yuk gas, lvbuh muot das zis tsain sont nyeis.
66008007	Gvshih cangxeih dah loeuswons soeu nyah lvbuh muot kat. Hauh uhlyis suih yah lhoeuq dah gyu yahge nyi gas nyeisjvng thoq mas buiq gyoh los. Nyeisjvng eq somh boms dvboms ngeh loh. Saiq khyam eq, mhanh nyaus dvnganh eq, somh boms dvboms tsain ngeh tyamp.
66008008	Tsai, loeuswons aiq vyuk ka nyah lvbuh muot kat. Hauh uhlyis nyi ngeh nyeis teh dah boms zainsmuh dvkoeuq nvmukdra mas khyoq kat. Housoeh las nvmukdra somh boms dvboms suih bweh tyamp.
66008009	Nvmukdra mas dah kang dwis ja somh boms dvboms shei tyamp. Sangpho jens eq somh boms dvboms tsain gyop tyamp.
66008010	Tsai, loeuswons somh vyuk nyah lvbuh muot kat. Hauh uhlyis nyibung teh bvng joq dah kyi zainsmuh dvkoeuq gas maukhung masyah dyet gyoh las, jeismuh lvng somh boms dvboms yahge jeisthuq dwang jens dah thoq mas tsain gyoh kih joq.
66008011	Hauh kyi dah nyings gas, Khoh, ge zis nghuot. Jeis somh boms dvboms gas khoh tyamp las hau jeis khoh shuk bang nyoshoq tsain shei tyamp.
66008012	Tsai, loeuswons nyei vyuk nyah lvbuh muot kat. Hauh uhlyis buis dah somh boms dvboms, lhamhmuh dah somh boms dvboms, kyi dah somh boms dvboms eq tsain gyop tyamp las nyamoq dah bvng zis somh boms dvboms mau chuot tyamp zis yah nyeih lyis dah somh boms dvboms yahge nyenh lyis dah somh boms dvboms gas bvng zis ma tsain yoh lo.
66008013	Hauh thang lhyi ngos yoeuh kat lyis maulvt mas dang yenh dah zons dvdoeu gas, gohtoeu loeuswons somh yuk muot kat das lvbuh thwe nyings thuq los lyis nyeisjvng mas nyeis bang dvnganh xiklyis gyukphoh mvtanhzoe! Gyuk phoh mvtanhzoe! Kha iq gyukphoh dah mvtanhzoe nghuot das lah, ge kaiq nyeis dah thwe zainsmuh lyis ngos xauhgyo.
66009001	Tsai, loeuswons oeng vyuk nyah lvbuh muot kat. Hauh uhlyis maukhung masyah nyeisjvng mas kyi dvlom dyet gyoh joq zis ngos nyvng, Hau kyi lhyi noq thank dwang chukbuiq dah suhshih dyei.
66009002	Hauh kyi ka noq thank dah dwang chukbuiq lyis phank kat las nyikhauh gas nyikhyomp zainsmuh mas dah nyikhauh teh hauh dwang masyah nhoenk doq los zis yahge hauh dwang dah nyikhauh gvng mas buis yahge maulvt gas soeng soeng noq tyamp.
66009003	Hauh nyikhauh masyah janghgyik jens thuq los las, nyeisjvng mas tsain gyoh. Nyamoq lyis gungsgauh jens yoh ja yomsoq dyei toh.
66009004	Nyamoq gas nyeisjvng mas dah mhanh lyis eq, nyaus ya nyaus ja lyis eq, saiq jens lyis eq yoh zangh das zis ma nghuot ge vmingh dyei toh. Vsainnyang dah ngelang mas Mangso dah kyihau ma dap bang lyis kyingh yoh shoeuhshih das ge tying toh.
66009005	Janghgyik jens gas hauh dius jens lyis lhamhmuh oeng khyvp shoeuhshih masyah lai las sat das toeuh ma yoh. Hauh shoeuhshih zis gas gungsgauh pat yhangteh nos.
66009006	Hauh lhamhmuh oeng khyvp gyo lyis nyamoq shei cho tsain xo das, nghuot laus eq nyamoq hauh zis lyis nyvng das zis ma nghuot. Nyamoq tsain shei mes das, nghuot laus eq shei cho ka nyamoq jyank masyah phang loh das.
66009007	Hauh janghgyik jens gas jeszan das xiklyis shauq toh dah nyang jens yah doeusgoh. Nyamoq dah uhloms mas xing buismuk teh zis tsain tsungh. Nyamoq dah nyoqnho ka dius dah nyoqnho teh zis tsain nghuot.
66009008	Nyamoq dah cam gas nyelo jens dah cam teh nghuot. Nyamoq dah zwis gas khangkhyi jens dah zwis teh nghuot.
66009009	Nyamoq dah sainhkhonh lyis thyeq sainhkhonh nghop teh zis yah tsain nghop toh. Nyamoq dah dungs phap thwe ka, jes dyvm zan dah nyang lhyingh nyoshoq nyings huomh toh dah thwe yah doeus joq.
66009010	Nyamoq mas gungsgauh dah lhyank yahge nyen teh zis yuk las nyamoq lhyank yah dius jens lyis lhamhmuh oeng khyvp shoeuhshih das toeuh tsain yoh.
66009011	nyamoq gas nyamoq thoq mas guon dah hwankti dvyuk yoh. Hauh hwankti ka dwangchukbuiq lyis guon dah loeuswons soeu nghuot. Nyah nyings lyis Hebre pheh yah Abadon, Greek pheh yah gas Apolion (lhoeu thyoq soeu) ge zis nghuot.
66009012	Xiklyis dah mvtanhzoe gas lai loh goeus. Hauh thang lyis mvtanhzoe aiq ja jweh los shih das.
66009013	Hauh thang lhyi loeuswons khyuk vyuk nyah lvbuh muot kat. Hauh uhlyis Mangso xikkhonh mas joq xing phon vthunk nyei thunk masyah thwe dvkoeuq thuq los zis ngos xauhgyo.
66009014	Hauh thwe ka loeuswons soeu khyuk vyuk lyis, Uphrat lvng yvm mas lhunk toh dah loeuswons bang nyei yuk lyis phui kat aq, ge.
66009015	Housoeh las hauh loeuswons nyei yuk gas lhunk toh masyah phui kat zis tsain xauh. Nyamoq gas cangsoeu dius somh boms dvboms lyis sat das ge hauh shishenh, hauh buisnyeis, hauh lhamhmuh, hauh zvn xiklyis sont toh zis xauh bang tsain nghuot.
66009016	Nyang ji dah jesphung jens aiq xo wvn nghuot cho ngos lyis taiq kyoh goeus.
66009017	Tsai, ngah nyoqnyvng mas nyang jens yahge houmha ji bang lyis ngos nyvng. Nyamoq gas nyi teh nes, Nila vlanh teh lanh, hwank teh buh dah sainhkhonh nghop lyis tsain nghop toh. Nyang jens dah uhloms gas khangkhyi jens dah uhloms yah doeus las nyamoq dah lhyo masyah nyi jyenh, nyi khauh yahge hwank thuq nyeis.
66009018	Hauh nyang jens dah nhuot masyah thuq nyijyenh, nyikhauh, yahge hwank ge dah shanghsenh cho somh koeuq gvng mas, cangsoeu dius somh boms dvboms sat zis tsain xauh.
66009019	Khasoeh ge lyis hauh nyang jens dah yom gas nyamoq dah nhuot yahge lhyank mas tsain bos. Nyamoq dah lhyank jens gas uhloms dap lhangnyis teh doeus las, hauh zis yah dius jens lyis tsain chweh.
66009020	Hai shanghsenh cho mhayah yoh luiq las nyet joq shih dah cangsoeu dius jens gas, nyamoq kuot dah muhzoh masyah ehnyet ma yoh tsain thaiq, nyamoq gas yius jens lyis eq, nyoq ma nyvng no ma gyo, ma seq suh dah, ngwis, xing, thunk, luk yahge saiq silho jens lyis paiq cho eq ma tsain tomp tyamp.
66009021	Dius sat muh, hweq muh, yauxi muh, khauh muh masyah nyamoq nhaiqlom ma yoh tsain thaiq.
66010001	Hauh thang lhyi, Yombos dah gohtoeu loeuswons dvyuk maukhung masyah gyoh los zis ngos nyvng. Nyang gas jyommauh lyis wuot chi lha nyah uhloms yvmlhaink yah sainyvng yoqgan chent toh. Nyah nyoqnho ka buis yah doeus. Nyah khyei ka nyi zains teh nghuot.
66010002	Nyah loq khau mha phank toh dah sauhdain lo dvkoeuq lyis chi toh. Nyah loqyos khyei ka nvmukdra thoq mas, loqwi khyei ka tungyos mas nang toh las,
66010003	khangkhyi nyings teh, thwe zainsmuh yah yomkat kaiq kat. Nyang kaiq kat lho lhyi maujau jau dah thwe zainsmuh nyhet koeuq yah tsain toeuh thuq los.
66010004	Hauh maujau thwe taiq thuq kat yah dvyih ngos lhaih comh das sont nyeis. Nghuot laus eq maukhung mha dah hai maujau thwe nyhet koeuq taiq thuq cho lhyi nghop shung toh aq. Vlhaih toh ge dah thwe ngos xauhgyo.
66010005	Hauh thang lhyi nvmukdra yahge tungyos mas yap joq, ngos nyvng dah loeuswons soeu ka nyah loqyos loq lyis maukhung pheh tuonh las,
66010006	vcaiq vto dwis nyeis las maukhung, nyeisjvng, nvmukdra mas bos ya bos zis gvnkhanh toh dah Mangso nyings lyis yoeus las maukhi zis gas, vyoq shishenh sheq toh das cho ma bos lo.
