66010007	Nghuot laus eq loeuswons nyhet vyuk lvbuh muot kat lyis Mangso ka nyah jyeidwis jens ge, lvpe jens lyis taiq toh goeus zis yah dvyhangteh nyah dah noq thank nghamh toeuq cho lhyi tyink das, ge.
66010008	Hauh thang lhyi maukhung mhayah ngos xauhgyo ku dah thwe, ngos lyis doms taiq zis gas, nvmukdra yahge tungyos mas yap joq dah loeuswons loq mas phank toh dah maussauh lyis e yoeus aq, ge.
66010009	Hauh uhlyis loeuswons jyank mas ngos e lha, Hauh sauhdain lo ngos lyis dyei aq, oen dung. Nyang gas, Yoeus las zo aq. Hauh zis gas nah womdau mas khoh das, nghuot laus eq nhuot mas gas dyoyhei teh chau das, ge ngos lyis taiq.
66010010	Hauh uhlyis hau sauhdain lo lyis ngos yoeus las zo. Houka ngah nhuot mas dyoyhei teh chau, nghuot laus hauh yvlyis dye nyhau lhyi ngah womdau mas khoh.
66010011	Hauh thang lyis loeuswons soeu ka dius nyau nyoshoq, munghdan nyoshoq mas dah nyingh nyoshoq yahge hwankti nyoshoq yah sen Mangso dah dang lyis nvng doms xauh taiq das, ge ngos lyis taiq.
66011001	Hauh thang lhyi loeuswons soeu ka keq ja wuseh teh zis dvseh ngos lyis dyei las, Toq aq. Mangso dah yhenmuh lyis eq, phon lhyi eq, keq aq. Yhenmuh mas paiq nyeis bang lyis eq suon yoeuh aq.
66011002	Nghuot laus eq hau yhenmuh dah nghe pheh gas vkeq. Khasoeh ge lyis hau zis gas gohnyau bang lyis dye kyauh tyamp goeus las, lhamhmuh nyeici aiq khyvp top tsain nang nheh tyamp das.
66011003	Tsai ngah kanghjyoeng aiq yuk lyis ngos nhang kat das nghuot las nyah aiq yuk gas yanghthung dyi wuot zis yah buisnyeis 1,260 nyeih top Mangso dah dang lyis tsain taiq das.
66011004	Hauh kanghjyoeng aiq yuk gas nyeisjvng dah Yhensain xikkhonh mas cuk toh dah tsanlun saiq aiq zains yahge nyi tuonh gus aiq koeuq tsain nghuot.
66011005	Dius dvyuk yuk nyah aiq yuk lyis jes sont bah ge uhlyis, nyah zomh nhuot masyah nyi thuq los las jes jens lyis ngheq tyamp nhang. Nyamoq lyis jes sont das xiklyis yomkat ya kat bang dvnganh lyis heisoeh sat zis tsain xauh das.
66011006	Nyah aiq yuk gas Mangso dah dang taiq kyoh das buisnyeis gyo lyis, mau ma wus das xiklyis, maukhung lhyi nyheih tyamp das toeuh tsain yoh. Jeis lyis suih yoh duot nhang dah toeuh eq, nyamoq mas chah dah shishenh khanghmuh mungkvn lyis yomh vja ja yah shanghsenh nhang das toeuh eq, tsain yoh.
66011007	Nyah aiq yuk vsainnyang dah taiq kyoh muhzoh dye thang lyis dwangchukbuiq masyah thuq los dah yewus gas nyah aiq yuk lyis zan ung lha sat zis xauh das.
66011008	Nyah aiq yuk dah mvng gas nyah aiq yuk dah Yhensain taplhangh sat zis xauh dah wusmuh talhoeu cho mha joq joq das. Hauh wus lyis vlho khyvlyis nyhink dah nyings gas Sodom wus, nghuot ya Egutu wus nghuot.
66011009	Hauh uhlyis vnyau vhuh, nyingh vja ja kat bang yahge munghdan khanghmuh mas dah dius nyau jens gas nyah aiq yuk dah mvng lyis nyhop das toeuh ma tsain dyei das.
66011010	Nyeisjvng mas nyeis dah dius jens gas, hauh loeuswons aiq yuk shei gvng mas, svsoh tsain gaus zis yah nyang changh nyang jyungshuk tsain thaiq goh, ung cho yoh dah pwe eq tsain kuot. Khasoeh ge lyis hauh loeuswons aiq yuk gas nyeisjvng mha dah dius nyoshoq lyis svsoh tsain shoeuhshih goeus.
66011011	Gvshih hauh buisnyeis somh nyeih dvkhyauq lai thang lyis Mangso jyank masyah dwis nhang dah kang soq nyah aiq yuk jyank mas wvng los las nyah aiq yuk gas zungh zungh tsain yap joq. Nyah aiq yuk lyis nyvng bang gas svsoh tsain gyuk nvn.
66011012	Hauh thang lhyi loeuswons aiq yuk gas, Heimha doq los aq, ge maukhung mas dah lui thwe zainsmuh dvkoeuq tsain xauhgyo. Nyah aiq yuk dah jes jens zungh yoeuh nyeis lyis jyommauh ji las maukhung pheh tsain doq loh goeus.
66011013	Hauh shishenh lyis maunyeis dwis zainsmuh dwis los las hauh wus ciboms dvboms gyop tyamp, dius eq nyhet khyoengh bos shei tyamp. Nyet joq bang gas tsain gyuk dvn zis yah, maukhung Mangso dah kuhxing nyoqnho ngelang lyis tsain chungh.
66011014	Mvtanhzoe aiq vkoeuq lai loh goeus. Nghuot laus eq mvtanhzoe somh vkoeuq lvnyap jweh los das.
66011015	Hauh thang lhyi loeuswons nyhet vyuk nyah lvbuh muot kat. Hauh uhlyis maukhung mha thwe zainsmuh thuq los zis gas, Mungkvn mas dah munghdan jens lyis guon dah toeuh gas yah Yhensain yahge nyah Meshia dah loq mas nghuot goeus yvmvyah nyang gas vcaiq vto guon nyeis lo das, ge.
66011016	Hauh uhlyis Mangso xikkhonh, nyamoq nyang hwankti tank mas tsung toh dah logis aiqci nyei yuk gas, nyeisjvng mas gop zis yah Mangso lhyi paiq las taiq zis gas,
66011017	Gohlhain caiq, gvshih caiq, thang caiq lyis eq nyeis dah Maukhung Jesphung Yhensain Mangso eh, nvng gas nah zau guon yomsoq chi lha mungkvn lyis guon nyeis goeus yvmvyah ngamoq nvng lyis chungh.
66011018	Nvng nhaiqyo das vyoq shishenh eq, shei bang lyis soetuon das vyoq shishenh eq, gvshih shishenh jweh goeus las dius nyau jens nhaiqlom tsain dyis nyeis goeus. Nah jyeidwis lvpe jens lyis eq, nah dius nyau jens lyis eq, nvng lyis tsain gyukwoms las phauh nyang nyeis dah ngislo kuhlo lyis eq phauh shangh das zis yahge, nyeisjvng lyis mhont bang lyis mhont tyamp das buisnyeis jweh los, ge.
66011019	Hauh uhlyis maukhung mha Mangso dah yhenmuh phank hanh los las, yhenmuh mas Thanghchvp Kwi lhyi ngos nyvng. Hauh thang lhyi maunyoq nyik, nyings huomh toh thwe, maujau jau, maunyeis dwis zis yah gyu mau lhungthungh bweh los.
66012001	Hauh thang lhyi maukhung mha mauhphoh dah vlho zainsmuh dvkoeuq thuq los zis gas, vmesbih dvyuk buis lyet chi lha lhamhmuh lyis nang zis yah kyi dvci aiq lom dap dah buismuk lyis tsungh toh.
66012002	Nyang gas loshang gungs lyis chi lha lokhoeu das xiklyis lokhoeu nos nos yvmvyah kaiq ngaus nyeis.
66012003	Tsai, maukhung mha mauhphoh dah gohtoeu vlho zainsmuh dvkoeuq thuq los. Uhloms nyhet lom dap las khyau dvci lom yuk nes dah mvnjung zainsmuh dvdoeu gas, nyah uhloms jens mas buismuk nyang koeuq nyang tsain tsungh toh.
66012004	Nyang gas maukhung mha dah kyi somh boms dvboms lyis nyah lhyank yah khyom yoeus las nyeisjvng mas khyoq kat. Hauh mvnjung gas lo khoeu bah ge dah vmesbih xikkhonh mas yap joq las, vmesbih lo khoeu yah dvyih hauh lo lyis kui nyhau tyamp das ge langh nyeis.
66012005	Hauh vmesbih gas dius nyau khanghmuh lyis thyeq lhamloq yah guon das yukgis lo khoeu. Nghuot laus eq nyah lo lyis Mangso yahge nyah hwankti tank xikkhonh mas chot she toqh yoeus zis xauh.
66012006	Hauh vmesbih gas nyah xiklyis Mangso sont toh dyei dah mhanhdyvp pheh phang loh, hau joqyos mas nyang lyis buisnyeis 1,260 nyeih jweh shoq khoeu tsoh das.
66012007	Hauh thang lhyi maukhung mha jeszan goh nyeis. Mikhael yahge nyah loeuswons bang gas hauh mvnjung yah zan goh nyeis. Hauh mvnjung eq nyah jyeidwis jens yah doms zan goh.
66012008	Nghuot laus eq mvnjung somh gvng mas, nyang yah nyah jyeidwis jens maukhung mha nyeis das toeuh ma tsain yoh lo.
66012009	Hauh uhlyis mungkvn gonh lyis mhuih jyomh tyamp yius yahge Satan ge gohlhain dah lhangnyis nghuot dah mvnjung zainsmuh gas nyah jyeidwis jens yah dvgeh nyeisjvng mas khat khyoq tyamp zis tsain xauh.
66012010	Hauh thang lhyi maukhung mas dah thwe zainsmuh dvkoeuq gas, Gvshih yah Mangso dah khyuot yoeus cho ka jweh los goeus. Gvshih Mangso ka hwankti nghuot cho nyah yomsoq chixoeuq. Gvshih nyah Meshia gas nyah dah zau guon yomsoq lyis chixoeuq goeus. Khasoeh ge lyis yah boekyis lyis yah Mangso xikkhonh mas nyeih nyenh yobos xo, tyi xo soeu lhyi maukhung masyah khat khyoq tyamp goeus.
66012011	Nyamoq gas Yvnglo dah suih yahge nyamoq kanghjyoeng kat nyeis, dan dah Mangso dang gvng mas nyang lyis yoh ung tyamp. Nyamoq gas shei shoq vsainnyang kang lhyi tsain kyauh tyamp.
66012012	Housoeh yvmvyah maukhung jens yahge houmha bos joq bang eh, tsain gauslaus nyeis geh. Nghuot laus eq nyeisjvng yahge nvmukdra gas mvtanhzoe tsain xauh. Khasoeh ge lyis Satan ka nyah buisnyeis dvtsiq dvnyet lo zis seq yvmvyah nhaiqlom dyis zis yah namoq jyank pheh gyoh lyih goeus, ge tsain taiq zis lyis ngos xauhgyo.
66012013	Hauh mvnjung gas nyang lyis nyeisjvng mas khyoq kat cho seq goeus ya yukgis lo khoeu kat dah vmesbih lyis nyhik das ge chank xo.
66012014	Hauh uhlyis vmesbih gas mvnjung dah jeswus masyah luiq las, mhanhdyvp masyah nyang nyeis dah joqyos mas yoh dang loh das xiklyis zonsmuh dah dungs aiq koeuq xauh yoeus. Nyang gas hauh joqyos mas somh zvn lhamhmuh khyuk khyvp mvnjung dah jes sont cho lhyi ma gyuk noh, gomh kat zis xauh das.
66012015	Mvnjung gas hau vmesbih lyis jeisbaus yah nyhoeuh kat das ge nyah nhuot mas dah jeis lyis jeislvng teh hauh vmesbih jyank mas muot kat.
66012016	Nghuot laus eq nyeisjvng gas hauh vmesbih lyis wons kat. Nyeisjvng gas nyah nhuot haq las hau mvnjung nhuot masyah muot kat dah jeislvng lyis nyhau tyamp dyei.
66012017	Hauh uhlyis mvnjung gas hau vmesbih lyis nhaiqlom dyis las, vmesbih dah nyet joq vnyau vshih ge Mangso dah tyingtoh dang chank zis yahge Yhensain Yesu chixoeuq dah jyoeng dang mas wontang chank nyeis bang lyis zan tyamp das xiklyis thuq loh.
66012018	Hau mvnjung gas nvmukdra dah jyankyvm dah sihmuis yos mas yap joq.
66013001	Hauh uhlyis nvmukdra masyah Yewus dvdoeu thuq los yvlyis ngos nyvng. Nyang mas khyau dvci lom yahge uhloms nyhet lom dap. Hauh khyau koeuq khanghmuh mas buismuk tsain tsungh las uhloms koeuq khanghmuh mas Mangso dah nyoqnho ngelang lyis khoengh lhoq shomh dah nyings tsain dap.
66013002	Hau ngos nyvng dah Yewus gas lutyoeuh yah doeus las nyah khyei ka woms khyei teh, nyah nhuot gas khangkhyi nhuot teh nghuot. Mvnjung gas nyah phunk, nyah tank yahge nyah dah kuh thank vmingh lyis eq, hau Yewus lyis dyei.
66013003	Yewus dah uhloms jens masyah uhloms dvlom gas shei das iq dvmdap teh mus nyeis. Nghuot laus eq hauh dvm gas gis tyamp goeus. Nyeisjvng gonh gas hauh yewus dah cho tsain mauh hangh las nyah thang tsain chank nyeis.
66013004	Mvnjung gas yewus lyis nyah dah vmingh kyauh goeus las, dius yuk khanghmuh hauh mvnjung lyis tsain paiq. nyamoq hauh yewus lyis eq tsain paiq zis yah hai yewus yah hank yoh doeus? Nyang lyis hank yoh khyank zan das lah, tsain ge.
66013005	Hauh yewus gas, khwank zis yahge Mangso lhyi loeusmus soqzo dang taiq das zis eq, lhamhmuh nyeici aiq khyvp top toeuh lyis yoh yhung nhang.
66013006	Nyang gas, Mangso yahge Yhensain dah nyings lyis eq, Mangso nyeis dah maukhung lyis eq, maukhung mha nyeis bang dvnganh lyis eq, loeusmus soqzo dang taiq nyeis.
66013007	Nyang gas Mangso dah dius jens lyis zan las ung das toeuh eq, mau khanghmuh mas nyeis, nyingh vja ja kat dah dius nyau khanghmuh lyis guon das toeuh eq dyei toh zis xauh soeu nghuot.
66013008	Sat tyamp zis xauh goeus Yvnglo dah kang maussauh buk mas nyeisjvng ma xi shih lyis yah nyings lhaih toh zis xauh goeus mungkvn dius jens masyah lai las nyeisjvng mas nyeis dah dius jens dvnganh hauh yewus lyis tsain paiq das.
66013009	No dap soeu ka xauhgyo bas jungh.
66013010	Nyhik zis xauh das soeu ka nyhik zis jyoengh xauh das. Moengsa yah shei das soeu eq moengsa yah shei das. Heika Mangso dah lo jens mas jhen zis yah lomsjingh cho bos chah zis taiq kyoh.
66013011	Hauh thang lhyi nyeisjvng khau masyah thuq los dah yewus gohtoeu dvdoeu lyis ngos nyvng. Nyang mas Yvnglo dah khyau teh dah khyau aiq lom dap las mvnjung teh dang taiq nyeis.
66013012	Nyang gas cangxeih yewus dah vmingh dvnganh lyis hauh yewus dah xikkhonh mas yhung lha shei bah ge shoq dah dvm gis goeus, cangxeih yewus lyis nyeisjvng yahge houmha nyeis bang dvnganh lyis tsain paiq nhang.
66013013	Hauh yewus aiq vdoeu gas mauhphoh vlho zainsmuh tsain chixoeuq nyeis. Dius nyoshoq dah xikkhonh mas maukhung masyah nyeisjvng mas nyi gyoh los nhang.
66013014	Nyang gas xik lyis dah yewus xikkhonh mas chixoeuq nhang dah vlho jens lyis chixoeuq las, nyeisjvng mas nyeis dius jens dvnganh lyis mhuih khwangh tyamp. Hauh yewus gas moengsa yos dvmdap laus eq ma shei doms gis los dah yewus lyis chungh zis yah nyah gungs lho kuot das xiklyis nyamoq lyis jyeinhang toh.
66013015	Hauh yewus dah gungslho dang yoh taiq das xiklyis eq, hauh yewus dah gungslho lhyi ma paiq paiq nyeis yah nyeis bang lyis sat das zis eq, yewus aiq vdoeu gas hauh gungslho mha soq muot kat dyei das toeuh eq yoh.
66013016	Hauh yewus gas cangsoeu dius dvnganh ngislo kuhlo, dis bang nyungs bang, luiq bang yahge jons jens dvnganh lyis vsainnyang dah loqyos loq mas nghuot ya ngelang mas nyah dah loqsoh tsoengh tap nhang.
66013017	Hauh yewus dah nyings nghuot ya hauh gungsthaiq sonzoh ge dah loqsoh dvkoeuq koeuq ma dap soeu hank laus eq vyhang ungh das, wis das toeuh ma tsain yoh.
66013018	Haih cho yah sen lha joeui bos chah. Joeui bos soeu ka hauh yewus dah sonzoh vjyuk lyis daq phui yoeus. Khasoeh ge lyis hauh sonzoh gas dius dvyuk dah nyings nghuot. Nyah sonzoh gas 666 nghuot.
66014001	Hauh thang lhyi ngos yoeuh kat lyis hauh yvnglo gas Zion boms thoq mas yap joq zis ngos nyvng. Nyah nyings yahge nyah uwus dah nyings lyis nyamoq dah ngelang mas tap toh dah dius 144,000 gas Yvnglo yah dvgeh tsain nyeis.
66014002	Tsai, maukhung mha dah jyvthyangh jeis gyoh sam gyo zis yahge maujau lhapzainstain teh dah thwe lyis ngos xauhgyo. Hauh thwe ka toenk khvlhank lyes bang toenk bat kat lyis nyings thuq los dah thwe teh nghuot.
66014003	Hauh dius 144,000 gas hwankti tank xikkhonh mas eq, yewus nyei doeu yahge logis jens xikkhonh mas eq, yap uhjyangh Chungh Dang vsaiq tsain chungh nyeis. Nyeisjvng mas dah cangsoeu dius nyau dvnganh masyah wis las khyuot zis xauh goeus dah dius 144,000 masyah lai las hauh Chungh Dang lyis hank eq ma yoh tsain xuq.
66014004	Hauh bang gas vmesbih jens yah vwot v-oeu ma kuot yoeuh ku dah yukgis lo jens nghuot. Nyamoq gas Yvnglo khapheh loh khapheh tsain chank loh. Nyamoq gas nyet joq dah cangsoeu dius nyau jens masyah wis las khyuot zis xauh las, Mangso yahge Yvnglo jyank mas cangxeih kyauh toh bang nghuot.
66014005	Nyamoq khanhamp eq hwah dang ma taiq ku. Yobos huon chank ma bos bang nghuot.
66014006	Hauh thang lhyi maulvt mas dang jyon yenh dah loeuswons soeu dvyuk ngos nyvng. Nyang gas dius nyau, dius koq khanghmuh, nyingh vja ja yahge munghdan khanghmuh lyis taiq kyoh das vcaiq vto dah gausyis dang lyis chi lyih.
66014007	Hauh loeuswons soeu ka cangsoeu dius nyau khanghmuh lyis soetuon das shishenh jweh goeus. Housoeh las Mangso lhyi gyukwoms nyeis geh, nyah vcaiq vto kuhxing dah phunk lyis chungh nyeis geh, maukhung nyeisjvng, nvmukdra yahge jeisthuq dwang jens lyis gvnkhanh toh soeu lhyi paiq nyeis geh, ge thwe zainsmuh yah taiq nyeis.
66014008	Tsai, loeuswons soeu aiq vyuk gas, xiklyis dah loeuswons soeu thang mha thuq los las Babilon wus zainsmuh gyop gyoh goeus, gyop gyoh goeus. Hauh wus gas yauxi muh mas nyetnau ge yet dah zvbiq dius nyau dvnganh lyis shuk nhang goeus, ge.
66014009	Tsai, loeuswons soeu somh vyuk gas cangxeih dah loeuswons aiq yuk thang mha thuq los las, hauh yewus yahge nyah gungslho lhyi paiq las vsainnyang ngelang, nghuot ya loq mas loqsoh tap yoeus bang hank eq,
66014010	Mangso dah nhaiqlom dyis ge dah kom mha dyingh shoq huot kat toh, svsoh yet nhaiqlom dyis ge dah zvbiq xauh shuk das. Hauh thoq ma goh, nyamoq gas gyingshang dah loeuswons bang xikkhonh mas eq, hau Yvnglo dah xikkhonh mas eq, nyi yah kant duk nyeis yvmas vshoh vjyen shoeuhshih zis xauh das.
66014011	Nyamoq lyis vshoh vjyen shoeuhshih yvmas yah nyikhauh gas vcaiq vto nhoenk doq loh nyeis. Hauh yewus yahge nyah gungslho lhyi paiq bang yahge, nyah nyings dah loqsoh tap zis kham yoeus bang dvnganh gas, nyeih nyenh dvtsiq eq sunghhuq das zis ma nghuot, ge thwe zainsmuh yah kaiq nyeis.
66014012	Mangso dah tyingtoh dang lyis chank tyink las, Khristu mas wontang ge, Mangso dah duis jens gas haih cho mha jhen cho bos chah.
66014013	Hauh thang lhyi maukhung mhayah, Lhaih toh aq; gvshih masyah Yhensain dah muh wons wuq zis yah shei loh bang gas ngelhoq, ge dah thwe dvkoeuq lyis ngos xauhgyo. Dyos eq, nghuot goeus! Nyamoq xauh no das. Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq kuot dah muhzoh vkyuh gas nyamoq mas chank yenh, ge.
66014014	Tsai, ngos yoeuh kat lyis, jyommauh thyoeu dvkoeuq nyvng. Hauh jyommauh thoq mas dius teh doeus soeu dvyuk tsung toh. Nyah uhloms mas xing buismuk tsungh toh las, nyah loq mas zuk dah banlyenh dvchamh chi toh.
66014015	Hauh thang lhyi gohtoeu loeuswons soeu dvyuk hauh yhenmuh masyah thuq los las, jyommauh thoq mas tsung toh soeu lhyi, nyeisjvng mas guk nyhink gyop loh goeus. Guk yet shishenh jweh goeus las, guk yet das xiklyis nah banlyenh chi lha yet yoeus aq, ge thwe zains yah kaiq kat.
66014016	Housoeh jyommauh thoq mas tsung toh soeu ka nyah banlyenh lyis nyeisjvng mas lhwih kat las nyeisjvng mas dah jyo ka dye yhomh goeus.
66014017	Hauh thang lhyi gohtoeu loeuswons soeu dvyuk gas maukhung yhenmuh khau masyah thuq los zis ngos nyvng. Nyang eq zuk dah banlyenh dvchamh chi toh.
66014018	Hauh thang lhyi nyi lyis guon dah gohtoeu loeuswons soeu dvyuk gas phon masyah thuq los las, zuk dah banlyenh chi toh soeu lhyi, nyeisjvng mas zvbiq shih nyhink joq goeus yvmvyah nah banlyenh yoeus las zvbiq shih tsain yet yoeus aq, ge thwe zainsmuh yah kaiq las taiq.
66014019	Housoeh las hau loeuswons soeu ka nyeisjvng mas nyah banlyenh lhwih kat las zvbiq nwis dah vshih lyis tsainh yoeus las Mangso dah nhaiqlom dyis ge dah zvbiq nyhet zwvng mas huot kat.
66014020	Zvbiq shih lyis wus nghe mha nyhet zwvng yah nyhet las, hou mhayah yaus thuq dah suih lvng gas xing choeu main aiqxo, noq pheh nyang lungthungh nyhank bos.
66015001	Hauh thang lhyi maukhung mha ma daq taiq kyoh lo shoq kuhxing dah mauhphoh vlho zainsmuh dvkoeuq lyis ngos nyvng. Houka loeuswons nyhet yuk yomh nyhet koeuq tsain chi toh. Hauh yomh gas thang thank dah yomh tsain nghuot. Khasoeh ge lyis houka Mangso dah nhaiqlom dyis yvlyis thang thank vlhain chixoeuq dah vlho tsain nghuot.
66015002	Hauh thang lhyi nyi yah lhoeuq dah bvngtoenk thomh teh zis dvkoeuq ngos nyvng. Hauh yewus yahge nyah gungslho lyis eq, sonzoh yah nyings nyhink toh soeu lyis eq, ung tyamp bang lyis eq, ngos nyvng, nyamoq gas Mangso dyei toh toenk tsain chi las hauh bvngtoenk thomh yvm mas tsain yap joq.
66015003	Nyamoq gas Mangso dah jyeidwis Moshe dah Chungh Dang yahge Yvnglo dah Chungh Dang lyis chungh zis yah, Maukhung Jesphung Yhensain Mangso eh, nah muhzoh kuhxing zis yahge kha iq mauhphoh zis nghuot lah! Dius nyau khanghmuh dah Hwankti eh, nah cho jens gas kha iq dan las jyoeng joq lah!
66015004	Yhensain eh, nvng lyis ma gyuk, ma phauh nyang zis hank bos das lah? Nvng kuhxing zis lyis ma rhen soeu hank bos das lah? Nvng kyingh gyingshang, nvng kuot dah muhzoh dan cho dvnganhmoq nyvng yvmvyah, dius nyau dvnganh nah xikkhonh mas los tsain paiq das, tsain ge.
66015005	Hauh thang lhyi maukhung mha kanghjyoeng zvng joq dah yhenmuh phank toh yvlyis ngos nyvng.
66015006	Hauh Yhenmuh masyah yomh nyhet koeuq chi dah loeuswons bang nyhet yuk tsain thuq los. Nyamoq gas bvng las shang dah jeimuh dyi tsain shunk las nyamoq dah sainhkhonh mas xing dyichih tsain chih toh.
66015007	Tsai, hauh yewus nyei doeu masyah dvdoeu gas vcaiq vto kang dwis nyeis dah Mangso nhaiqlom dyis zis yah dyingh dah xing kom nyhet koeuq, hauh loeuswons bang nyhet yuk gonh lyis dyei.
66015008	Hauh yhenmuh gas Mangso dah phunk yahge yomsoq gvng mas nyikhauh dyingh nhoenk joq, Hauh loeuswons bang nyhet yuk chi lyih dah yomh ma thank dvchank hauh yhenmuh khau mha hank eq yoh wvng das zis ma nghuot.
66016001	Tsai, hauh loeuswons nyhet yuk lyis, Thuq e lha Mangso dah nhaiqlom dyis zis yah dyingh dah kom nyhet koeuq lyis nyeisjvng thoq mas huot khyoq kat geh, ge hauh yhenmuh masyah nyings thuq los dah thwe zainsmuh lyis ngos xauhgyo.
66016002	Hauh uhlyis cangxeih dah loeuswons soeu thuq e lha nyah kom lhyi nyeisjvng mas huot khyoq kat. Hauh uhlyis yewus dah loqsoh tap zis xauh bang yahge nyah gungslho lhyi paiq bang mas gyukphoh yahge xunghxent dah nos dvm bweh thuq los.
66016003	Hauh thang lhyi loeuswons aiq vyuk gas nyah kom lhyi nvmukdra mas huot khyoq kat. Hauh uhlyis nvmukdra jeis gas dius shei dah suih teh bweh tyamp las, nvmukdra khau mas kang dwis ya dwis zis dvnganh tsain shei tyamp.
66016004	Tsai, loeuswons somh vyuk gas nyah kom lhyi jeislvng yahge jeisthuq dwang jens mas huot khyoq kat: hauh uhlyis suih bweh tyamp.
66016005	Hauh uhlyis jeis zungh das loeuswons soeu ka, Gvshih caiq, gohlhain caiq, goeng toenk joq dah gyingshang Uwus eh, nvng soetuon zis gas dan, ge.
66016006	Nyamoq gas Mangso dah dius yahge lvpe jens dah suih lyis huot tyamp yvmvyah nvng nyamoq lyis suih doms shuk nhang. Hauh zis gas nyamoq mas xauh vvng lha xauh zis nghuot, ge taiq zis ngos xauhgyo.
66016007	Hauh thang lhyi phon mas dah thwe dvkoeuq eq, Maukhung Jesphung Yhensain Mangso eh; nah soetuon cho ka jyoengh jus las dan, ge taiq zis ngos xauhgyo
66016008	Tsai, loeuswons nyei vyuk gas, nyah kom lyis buis mas huot kat. Hauh uhlyis buis gas dius jens lyis svsoh ngeh zis yah ngheq jyomh tyamp das toeuh lyis yoh.
66016009	Housoeh las dius jens gas svsoh ngeh zis yah ngheq jyomh tyamp zis xauh las, yomh lyis guon dah Mangso nyings lyis eq loeusmus soq tsain zo. Nghuot laus eq nyamoq gas nhaiqlom ma thaiq, zes thank dah Mangso phunk lyis eq ma tsain chungh.
66016010	Hauh thang lhyi loeuswons oeng vyuk nyah kom lhyi yewus hwankti tank mas huot khyoq kat. Hauh uhlyis yewus dah munghdan gonh mas soeng soeng noq tyamp. Hauh dius jens nos khih las nyamoq dah lhyo ngat chink loh.
66016011	Housoeh nyamoq nos zis yahge dyingsjyen nos dvm bos gvng mas nyamoq gas maukhung Mangso lhyi tsain nhoengh. Nghuot laus eq, nyamoq nyang dah ma gis wotwu masyah nhaiqlom ma tsain thaiq.
66016012	Hauh thang lhyi loeuswons khyuk vyuk nyah kom lhyi Uphrat lvng mas huot khyoq. Hauh uhlyis buisthuq mau mas dah hwankti jens yoh los das cho bangh das xiklyis hauh jeismuh lvng kanh tyamp.
66016013	Hauh uhlyis puh teh ma lhoq ma shang dah sidyos somh koeuq lyis ngos nyvng. Nyamoq gas, mvnjung dah nhuot, yewus dah nhuot, lvpe hwah dah nhuot masyah tsain thuq los.
66016014	Nyamoq gas vlho yoh chixoeuq dah yius jens dah dyos tsain nghuot. Hauh dyos somh koeuq gas Maukhung Jesphung Mangso dah buisnyeis zainsmuh soetuon nyeih lyis jeszan das xikyis, nyeisjvng gonh dah hwankti jens lyis tsainh yoeus das ge tsain thuq loh.
66016015	Yoeuh aq, khauh soeu teh ngos jweh los das, housoeh svbih xikkhonh mas shohchen yenh las xoq ma phuh bas jungh, phuksohlhaiq mus las, vsainnyang dah dyimis lyis tsomh nyeis soeu ka ngelhoq.
66016016	Hauh yius jens gas hwankti jens lyis Hebre nyingh pheh yah Armagedon ge dah joqyos mas khi tsainh toh.
66016017	Hauh thang lhyi loeuswons nyhet vyuk nyah kom lyeis mas huot lhank kat. Hauh uhlyis, Muhzoh dye tyamp goeus, ge yhenmuh khau, hwankti tank masyah thwe zainsmuh thuq los.
66016018	Hauh shishenh lyis maunyoq nyik, thwe nyings huomh toh, maujau jau, gyukphoh dah maunyeis dwis los, nyeisjvng mas dius vsaiq gvnkhanh nyeih masyah houteh kuh las svsoh than dah maunyeis dwis zis khanhamp eq ma bweh ku.
66016019	Housoeh las hauh kuhxing dah wusmuh gas somh khyamh gyoh tyamp. Mau khanghmuh mas dah wus jens eq tsain lains gyop tyamp. Mangso ka Babilon wusmuh lyis soh las nyah dah nhaiqlom dyis ge kom mha dah zvbiq jeis lyis shuk nhang.
66016020	Goeujo jens dvnganh dyuk loh las boms jens eq ma tsain joq los.
66016021	Hauh uhlyis maukhung masyah dvlom lyis nyeici joi ko bos dah gyutomp maulhung thungh dius jens thoq mas tsain wus gyuon. Hau gyu mau yah joeng gvng mas dius jens gas Mangso lhyi tsain nhoengh. Khasoeh ge lyis hau joeng cho ka gyukphoh nghuot.
66017001	Hauh uhlyis kom nyhet koeuq chi dah loeuswons nyhet yuk mas dvyuk ngah jyank los las, Los aq, jeis lvng nyoshoq dah vyvm mas tsuk toh wusmuh ge dah moeng nyhiq zainsmuh lyis soe khasoeh tuon das cho ngos nvng lyis chixoeuq bah.
66017002	Nyeisjvng hwankti jens gas nyang yah yauxi muh kuot las, nyeisjvng dius jens gas nyah yauxi muh ge dah zvbiq jeis tsain shuk yet goeus, ge ngos lyis taiq.
66017003	Hauh uhlyis dyos gas ngos lyis shwih las, hau loeuswons soeu ka ngos lyis mhanhdyvp pheh shwih loh. Houmha uhloms nyhet lom yah khyau dvci lom yuk las Mangso lhyi loeusmus soqzo dah nyings dyingh shoq lhaih toh, zoek zoek nes dah yewus thoq mas tsung toh vmesbih dvyuk lyis ngos nyvng.
66017004	Hauh vmesbih gas nesnoq zis yah khvlhamh vwot bos dah dyimis wuot toh las xing, phauhdap luk, pvleh yah shunk toh. Nyang gas nyah nyetnau muh dah vshih, ma lhoq ma shang vchoqh vjyot zis yah dyingh muis joq dah xing kom lhyi nyah loq mas chi toh.
66017005	Nyah ngelang mas nyeisjvng mas dah nghe nyhiq jens dvnganh yahge ma gis ma shop chowhang tsain whang loh bang dvnganh dah ungwes, kuhxing dah Babilon wus ge nghop shung toh, noq thank vjyuk bos dah nyings dvkoeuq lhaih tap toh.
66017006	Tsai, hauh vmesbih gas Mangso dius jens dah suih lyis eq, Yhensain Yesu mas dang jings las sat xauh bang dah suih lyis eq shuk yet nyeis yvlyis ngos nyvng. Nyang lyis nyvng lyis maudvn dyoslhyoq tyamp.
66017007	Housoeh hauh loeuswons soeu ka, Nvng chamus mauh hangh toh lah? Hauh vmesbih nghop shung toh noq thank dah vjyuk lyis eq, uhloms nyhet lom, khyau dvci lom yuk yewus nghop shung toh noq thank dah vjyuk lyis eq, ngos nvng lyis taiq kyoh bah.
66017008	Nvng nyvng dah yewus gas xikpheh nyeis ku goeus, nghuot laus eq gvshih gas kang ma dwis nyeis lo. Nyang gas dwangchuk buiq masyah doq los nyeis las dyoqbis yvpheh loh das. Nyeisjvng cangxeih xi masyah vsainnyang dah nyings lyis kang maussauh mas ma bos lhaih toh. Nyeisjvng mas dah dius jens gas hauh yewus lyis nyvng yah dvyih dvnganhmoq tsain mauh hangh toh das. Nyang gas xikpheh kang dvlhain dwis ku goeus, gvshih kang ma dwis los. Nghuot laus eq thang pheh kang doms dwis los das.
66017009	Haih cho yah sen lha joeui yahge seq cho bos chah. Uhloms nyhet lom gas hauh vmesbih tsung toh dah boms nyhet koeuq nghuot. Nyamoq gas hwankti nyhet yuk eq nghuot.
66017010	Hwankti oeng yuk gas gyoh tyamp goeus dvyuk gas guon nyeis shih, gohtoeu dvyuk gas ma jweh los shih, hauh soeu jweh los lyis dvxa kyingh dvxauh guon das.
66017011	Xikpheh kang dvlhain dwis ku lha gvshih kang ma dwis lo dah yewus gas hwankti xet vyuk nghuot. Nghuot laus eq hauh hwankti nyhet yuk mas bos las nyang eq dyoqbis loh das.
66017012	Nvng nyvng dah khyau dvci loms gas hwankti toeuh ma lhom yoeus shih dah hwankti dvci yuk tsain nghuot. Nghuot laus eq hauh yewus yah dvgeh dvyuk dvshishenh shenh hwankti yhangteh guon das toeuh dyei zis tsain xauh das.
66017013	Tsai, hwankti dvci yuk mas nghamh toeuq cho dvkoeuq kyingh dvbos las, hau yewus lyis nyamoq dah yomsoq yah toeuh tsain kyauh.
66017014	Nyamoq gas Yvnglo lyis moeng zan das. Nghuot laus eq hauh yvnglo gas nyang khi yoeus las khyen yoeus zis xauh bang, lomluk las nyah thang chank bang yah dvgeh ung cho yoh das. Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas yhensain jens dah Yhensain, hwankti jens dah Hwankti nghuot, ge ngos lyis taiq.
66017015	Tsai, loeuswons soeu ka, Nvng nyvng, nghe nyhiq tsung toh dah jeis lvng jens gas, munghdan jens, dius nyau jens, moqphung jens yahge nyingh vja ja kat dah dius jens tsain nghuot.
66017016	Tsai, Nvng nyvng dah khyau dvci lom yahge hauh yewus gas hauh nghe nyhiq lyis hoeng das. Nyamoq gas nghe nyhiq yoh yah yoh zis khyuot yoeus las shoh chen kuot tyamp das, nyah shoh lyis zo las nyang lyis nyi yah ngheq tyamp das.
66017017	Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq gas Mangso dah dang nyuk los buisnyeis jweh shoq, nyamoq guon das toeuh, hauh yewus lyis xamxonh zis yah kyauh bas jungh, ge. Mangso ka nyamoq dah ehnyet nhaiqlom mas nyah nghamh toeuq cho chank kuot das ehnyet kat toh dyei.
66017018	Nvng nyvng dah vmesbih gas nyeisjvng hwankti jens lyis guon dah wus zainsmuh nghuot ge, ngos lyis taiq.
66018001	Hauh thang lhyi loeuswons soeu dvyuk maukhung masyah gyoh los zis ngos nyvng. Nyang mas toeuh zainsmuh bos las, nyah phunk gas nyeisjvng gonh bvng joq.
66018002	Hauh soeu ka thwe zainsmuh yah kuhxing dah Babilon wusmuh gyop gyoh goeus, gyop gyoh goeus. Hauh joqyos gas yius boengh jens dah nyeisgus, ma lhoq ma shang dah dyos jens khaugus yahge ma lhoq ma shang vchoqh vjyot dah nghoq vja ja khaugus bweh tyamp goeus.
66018003	Khasoeh ge lyis dius nyau ja khanghmuh gas hau wus dah yauxi muh mas nyetnau ge dah zvbiq jeis lyis tsain shuk goeus. Nyeisjvng hwankti jens eq, nyang yah dvgeh yauxi muh tsain kuot goeus. Mungkvn mas dah soenghi jens eq nyo dvmsunk dah nyetnau cho gvng mas dis los goeus, ge thwe than yah tsain kaiq.
66018004	Hauh thang lhyi maukhung mha thwe dvkoeuq gas, Ngah dius nyau jens eh, thuq los geh, nyah jyank masyah tsain thuq los geh! Nyang yah dvgeh yaunos ma kuot bas jungh, nyang yah hauh joeng zis ma xauh bas jungh.
66018005	Khasoeh ge lyis nyah yaunos maukhung jweh shoq zungs toh las, Mangso ka nyah dah lhung cho nyoshoq lyis soh nyeis.
66018006	Nyang namoq lyis kuot zis yah dvyhangteh nyang lyis eq doms kuot dyei geh, nyang kuot ya kuot zis yah dvyhangteh aiq huon doms tauh geh, namoq xiklyis kom mha nyang lhaiq dyei dah shuk ja thoq lyis soq aiq huon than shoq nyah kom mha tyink dyei geh.
66018007	Vsainnyang gungs lyis nyoqnho ngelang bos goeus, nyeisgis yaplhoq goeus ge nyhoq, nyang lyis shanghsenh cho yahge kuk cho tauh dyei geh. Khasoeh ge lyis nyang gas, Ngos hwankti nyih heimha guon nyeis, ngos chauhmuh ma nghuot. Ngos khanhamp eq kuk zis ma xauh das ge, nyang moengs zo nyeis.
66018008	Hauh cho gvng mas yomh, noslom, kukxi cho yahge phanghkhauq gas dvnyeih dvm lyis nyah jyank jweh las nyi yah ngheq tyamp zis xauh das. Khasoeh ge lyis nyang lyis soetuon dah Mangso ka yomsoq bos, ge taiq.
66018009	Nyang yah yauxi muh kuot las lhyap lhyi nyetnau dah nyeisjvng hwankti jens gas hauh wus ngeh dah nyikhauh thuq los zis nyvng lyis ngausdyeis ngausnhvp yah kuk nyingh shoh thang tsain thauh das.
66018010	Nyamoq gas hauh wus joeng cho xauh yvmas nyamoq eq bos xauh joeng das zis gyuk las, we we mas yap uhjyangh, kuhxing zis yah yombos dah Babilon wus eh, mvtanhzoe, mvtanhzoe nghuot goeus nyvng! Nvng gas dvnayi kyingh lyis soetuon zis xauh goeus nyvng, tsain ge das.
66018011	Nyeisjvng thoq mas dah soenghi jens eq, ngausdyeis ngausnhvp yah kuk nyingh shoh thang tsain thauh nyeis. Khasoeh ge lyis nyamoq dah hu hank eq wis lo das zis ma nghuot.
66018012	Nyamoq dah hu jens gas ngwis, xing, phauhdap luk, pvleh, jeimuh misyhwiq, khvlhamh buh vwot bos dah misseh, baulo khying yah yoq dah misseh, kyi kyi bvng dah misnes seh, xangh saiq vja ja, cang zwis yah kuot dah vyhang vja ja, phauhdap dah saiq, thunk, thyeq, luk thyoeu kyahsoe vja ja,
66018013	maza saiq, conh xangh, xangh ja mura, loban, coeu, zvbiq, ohlhyoq, monh, sunghso chen, noeu, yvng, nyang, nyanglhyingh, jons jens yahge dius jweh shoq tsain nghuot.
66018014	Soenghi kuot bang gas hau wus lyis, Nvng sain yoeus mes, gis dah vyhang dvnganh gas bi tyamp goeus. Nah zisyos kyahsoe yahge obos phoh dah yungh ja kyahsoe dvnganh eq bi tyamp goeus. Hauh kyahsoe lhyi thang pheh nvng khanhamp eq xauh nyvng lo das zis ma nghuot.
66018015	Babilon wus lyis nges las hu ungh zis yah dis los dah soenghi jens gas, hauh wus lyis joeng yvmas bos xauh joeng das zis chiqh las we we mas tsain yap joq das. Nyamoq gas ngausdyeis ngausnhvp yah kuk nyingh shoh thang tsain thauh uhjyangh,
66018016	jeimuh misseh, khvlhamh buh vwot bos dah baulo khying misseh, nes dah dyimis wuot las, xing, phauhdap luk, pvleh jens yah shunk toh wus zainsmuh gas mvtanhzoe, mvtanhzoe nghuot goeus!
66018017	Dvnayi lyis, yoh dah kyahsoe zisyos dvnganh lyis nyang thyuk tyamp goeus nyvng, ge ngausdyeis ngausnhvp yah kuk nyingh shoh thang tsain thauh das. Sangpho vgyis jens dvnganh yahge houmha bos ji dah gyung suh bang dvnganh, sangpho mas muh zwi bang yah nvmukdra masyah womdau khoeu dah soenghi kuot bang dvnganh gas we we mas tsain yap joq las,
66018018	hauh wus lyis ngeh nhang, nyilhyam mas dah nyikhauh lyis nyvng lyis, nyamoq gas haih wus iq kuhxing dah gohtoeu wus khanhamp eq ma bos ku lo, ge tsain kaiq.
66018019	Nyamoq gas vsainnyang dah uhloms mas tsohmop yah lhyauq las, hau kuhxing dah wus gas mvtanhzoe, mvtanhzoe xauh nyvng! Nvmukdra mas sangpho komp bang dvnganh lyis hau zisyos zainsmuh yah tsain dis los nhang dah wus gas dvnayi gyo lyis yoh yah yoh zis somh tyamp goeus nyvng, ge ngausdyeis ngausnhvp kuk nyingh shohthang thauh zis yah tsain kaiq.
66018020	Maukhung eh, hauh wus dyoqbis goeus las gauslaus geh. Mangso dah dius jens eh, lvgyo jens yahge lvpe jens eh, gaus nyeis geh. Khasoeh ge lyis nvng lyis kuot cho dvnganh xiklyis Mangso ka hauh wus lyis soetuon goeus, ge taiq cho ngos xauhgyo.
66018021	Hauh thang lhyi yombos dah loeuswons soeu dvyuk gas mhoq iq bos luklom dvkoeuq toeu yoeus las, nvmukdra mas doeuh khyoq kat lyis hauh zis gyoh wvng loh teh kuhxing dah Babilon wus eq doeuh khyoq kat zis xauh das. Thang pheh nyang lyis khanhamp eq xauh nyvng lo das zis ma nghuot.
66018022	Nvng mas toenk thwe, chungh thwe, khvlhank muot bang yahge lvbuh muot bang dah thwe thang pheh khanhamp eq xauhgyo lo das zis ma nghuot. Joeui vlho yahge soenghi kuot bang thang pheh nvng mas khanhamp eq thuq los lo das zis ma nghuot. Wom mhoq thwe eq thang pheh nvng mas khanhamp eq xauhgyo lo das zis ma nghuot.
66018023	Nvng mas nyibung dah bvng zis khanhamp eq yoh bvng los das zis ma nghuot lo, loloeu saiq yahge lonyi saiq dah thwe lyis eq nvng mas thang pheh khanhamp eq xauhgyo lo das zis ma nghuot. Nah soenghi jens gas nyeisjvng dah zauguon yomsoq bos thank bang bweh goeus. Nvng gas nyeisjvng mas dah dius jens dvnganh lyis ma jus dah hweq yah mhuih jyomh tyamp goeus nyvng!
66018024	Babilon wus joeng cho xauh zis gas lvpe jens dah suih, Mangso dius nyau jens dah suih yah nghuot goeus. Nyeisjvng thoq mas sat ya sat zis xauh bang dah suih hauh wus mas nyvng goeus las nghuot, ge taiq.
66019001	Hounyhoq thang lhyi, maukhung mha moqphung zainsmuh dvkoeuq dah nyings thwe yhangteh doeus dah thwe ngos xauhgyo. Nyamoq gas Mangso lhyi chungh geh! Khyuot yoeus cho phunk yahge yomsoq gas yah Yhensain Mangso sain toh.
66019002	Nyah soetuon cho jyoeng las dan joq. Vsainnyang dah yauxi muh yah nyeisjvng gonh lyis lhoeu thyoq nhang dah nghe nyhiq lyis, nyang dang thang thyet goeus. Yhensain dah jyeidwis jens lyis sat gvng mas Mangso ka nyang lyis joeng goeus ge taiq zis ngos xauhgyo.
66019003	Nyamoq doms kaiq zis gas, Mangso lhyi chungh geh, hauh wusmuh lyis ngeh tyamp nhang dah nyilhyam jens dah nyikhauh gas vcaiq vto nhoenk doq loh, ge.
66019004	Hauh uhlyis logis aiqci nyei yuk yahge kang dwis yewus nyei doeu gonh gas, phvluk zomhgyuis gop las hwankti tank mas tsung toh Mangso lhyi paiq zoh lyis yah, Amen! Mangso lhyi chungh, tsain ge.
66019005	Tsai, hwankti tank masyah nyings thuq los dah thwe dvkoeuq gas, Mangso dah jyeidwis jens dvnganh yahge nyang lyis gyukwoms bang ngislo kuhlo dvnganh, yah Mangso lhyi chungh paiq geh, ge.
66019006	Hauh thang lhyi somhlohmoq jens dah thwe teh thwe, jyvthyangh gyoh teh thwe yahge maujau jau thwe teh zis thuq los yvlyis ngos xauhgyo. Hauh thwe ka, Mangso lhyi chungh geh! Khasoeh ge lyis hauh Yhensain ka yah Yomzains Mangso ge dah Hwankti nghuot.
66019007	Hauh Yvnglo dah nyihwank pwe shishenh jweh goeus las yang gauslaus zis yah gausyis nyeis goh. Nyah kuhxing cho lhyi tsain chungh nyeis goh. Nyah lonyi saiq gas nyah gungs lyis dye shunk goeus.
66019008	Thyoeu lha shang dah jeimuh dyi yah vsainnyang gungs lyis shunk das toeuh nyang yoh. Hauh jeimuh dyi gas Mangso dius jens dah gis wotwu yahge muhzoh lyis taiq zis nghuot.
66019009	Hauh thang lhyi loeuswons soeu ka, Hauh Yvnglo dah nyihwank pwe mha khi yoeus zis xauh bang gas ngelhoq, oen lhaih toh aq. Haih dang gas Mangso dah jyoeng dang nghuot, ge ngos lyis taiq.
66019010	Hauh uhlyis ngos nyang lyis paiq das oen, nyah khyeiyang mas phvluk zomhgyuis. Nghuot laus eq hauh loeuswons soeu ka, Housoeh vkuot! Ngos gas nvng yah eq, nah boekyis yah eq dvgeh Yhensain Yesu chixoeuq dah jyoeng dang lyis chank las zwi zains toh bang dah jyeidwis loeuzomh dvnghuot. Mangso lhyi paiq aq, khasoeh ge lyis Yhensain Yesu kanghjyoeng chixoeuq dah hauh jyoeng dang nyang lvpe jens lyis gywes tsungh so tsungh dyei.
66019011	Hauh thang lhyi maukhung khomh phank hanh toh zis ngos nyvng, houmha nyang thyoeu dvdoeu nyeis las houmha ji soeu ka, Wontang yahge Jyoeng ge soeu nghuot. Nyang gas dan khyvlyis soetuon zis yah jeszan.
66019012	Nyah nyoqjeih gas nyilhyam teh tsain bvng joq, nyah uhloms mas buismuk nyoshoq tsungh toh. Nyang masyah lai las gohyuk hank eq ma bos seq dyei dah nyings nyah thoq mas lhaih tap toh.
66019013	Nyang suih mas jen dah dyimis wuot toh. Nyah nyings gas Mangso Dang ge zis nghuot.
66019014	Maukhung mha jesphung jens eq, nyang thyoeu ji las tsingh-kan dah jeimuh dyi thyoeu wuot zis yah nyah thang mha tsain chank loh.
66019015	Dius nyau jens lyis ung tyamp das xiklyis nyah nhuot masyah zuk dah moengsa thuq nyeis. Nyang gas nyamoq lyis thyeq lhamloq yah guon das, Maukhung Jesphung Mangso dah nhaiqlom dyis ge dah zvbiq nyhet zwvng mas nyang nang las nyhet das.
66019016	Nyah dyi yahge tanghbauh mas hwankti jens dah Hwankti, yhensain jens dah Yhensain ge lhaih tap toh.
66019017	Hauh thang lhyi loeuswons dvyuk buis thoq mas yap joq zis ngos nyvng. Nyang gas maudang nghoq jens lyis, Mangso dah zo shuk pwe zainsmuh mas los zop geh.
66019018	Los geh, hwankti jens dah shoh, jeszau, jeslo jens dah shoh, nyang jens dah shoh, nyang ji bang dah shoh, luiq bang yahge jons jens ngislo kuhlo dah shoh lyis namoq xauh zo das, ge thwe zainsmuh yah kaiq.
66019019	Hauh thang lhyi hauh yewus eq, nyeisjvng mas dah hwankti jens yah nyamoq dah jesphung jens eq, hauh nyang ji soeu yahge nyah jesphung lhyi zan das xiklyis tsain huom toh zis ngos nyvng.
66019020	Hauh yewus yah dvgeh nyah xikkhonh mas vlho kuot xoeuq dah lvpe hwah gas nyhik yoeus zis xauh goeus. Nyang gas hau vlho chixoeuq zis yah yewus dah loqsoh dap bang yahge yewus dah gungslho lhyi paiq bang lyis mhuih jyomh soeu nghuot. Hauh yewus yahge lvpe hwah gas hwank ngeh nyeis dah nyithomh mas vdwis khyoq kat zis tsain xauh.
66019021	Nyamoq dah jesphung jens gas nyang ji soeu dah nhuot masyah thuq dah moengsa yah sat zis xauh las nyamoq dah shoh lyis, nghoq dvnganh gas nyamoq yoh zo nyhoq jo shoq tsain zo.
66020001	Hauh thang lhyi loeuswons soeu dvyuk gas dwangchuk buiq dah suhshih yahge svsoh lyei shamjvng twih dvkvt lyis nyah loq mas chi lha, maukhung mhayah gyoh los zis ngos nyvng.
66020002	Nyang gas hauh yius Satan nghuot, gohlhain dah lhangnyis ge mvnjung lyis nyhik yoeus las dvkhyoengh zvn jweh shoq lhunk toh das xiklyis twih toh.
66020003	Hau loeuswons soeu ka mvnjung lyis dwangchuk buiq mas khyoq kat toh las, hauh joqyos lyis nyheih lho lha zvnlom dvkhyoengh dyingh shoq dius nyau jens lyis ma yoh mhuih jyomh bas jungh, kyihau thungh tap toh. Zvnlom dvkhyoengh dyingh lyis nyang lyis dvsoq phui kat das.
66020004	Hauh thang lhyi hwankti tank jens lyis ngos nyvng. Hauh hwankti tank jens mas tsung toh bang gas, soetuon das toeuh dyei toh zis tsain xauh bang nghuot. Hauh thoq lyis Yhensain Yesu chixoeuq dah dan cho lhyi eq, Mangso dah dang lyis kanghjyoeng kat las sat zis xauh bang yah, hauh yewus lyis eq, nyah gungslho lyis eq, ma paiq, vsainnyang dah ngelang yahge loq jens mas hau Yewus dah loqsoh ma kham yoeus bang dah dyos lyis ngos nyvng. Nyamoq gas kang doms dwis los las hwankti jens teh Yhensain Yesu yah dvgeh zvnlom dvkhyoengh dyingh shoq tsain guon nyeis das.
66020005	(Nyet joq shih dah shei bang gas, hauh dvkhyoengh zvn ma thank shih gyo lyis ma yoh dwis toq los,) heika cangxeih vlhain dwis toq cho nghuot.
66020006	Housoeh shei masyah cangxeih dwis toq los bang dah caiq mas xauh wvng bang gas ngelhoq las nyoshoq dah shvmanh jyehjuh tsain xauh kham yoeus. Aiq vlhain shei cho ka nyamoq thoq mas yomsoq ma bos. Nyamoq gas Mangso yahge Khristu dah phudyei bang nghuot das las zvnlom dvkhyoengh dyingh shoq Khristu yah dvgeh xauh guon nyeis das.
66020007	Hauh zvnlom dvkhyoengh lai lyis Satan ka thung mhayah phank kat zis xauh das las,
66020008	nyeisjvng gonh dyos nyeis dah Gog yahge Magog ge dah dius nyau jens lyis mhuih jyomh das xiklyis thuq los das. Satan ka moeng zan das xiklyis nvmukdra mas dah sihsho nyhoq nyo dah nyah dius jens lyis khi huom toh das.
66020009	Nyamoq gas nyeisjvng goms shoq nyenh loh las Mangso dah dius jens thoenggus yahge yhensain jyetdap dah wus lyis tsain lhaink toh. Nghuot laus eq maukhung masyah nyi gyoh los las nyamoq lyis ngeh jom tyamp.
66020010	Hauh thang lhyi, nyamoq lyis mhuih jyomh dah Yius eq nyi yahge hwank dap nyeis dah thomh mas khyoq kat zis xauh: houmha hauh yewus yahge lvpe hwah eq xiklyis yah tsain bos las nyamoq gas nyeih nyenh vcaiq vto shoeuhshih zis xauh das.
66020011	Hauh thang lhyi kuhxing dah hwankti tank thyoeu eq, houmha tsung toh soeu lhyi eq ngos nyvng. Hauh Yhensain xikkhonh mas dah maukhung yahge nyeisjvng gas dyuk loh las hauh aiq ja gonh lyis ma nyvng lo.
66020012	Hwankti tank xikkhonh mas shei bang ngislo kuhlo tsain yap joq zis ngos nyvng. Sauhbuk jens tsain phank toh, kangbuk ge gohtoeu sauhbuk eq dvkoeuq phank toh. Shei loh goeus bang gas nyamoq kuot khoq cho sauhbuk mas comh toh zis yah dvyhangteh nyamoq soetuon zis tsain xauh.
66020013	Hauh thang lhyi nvmukdra gas nyang mas tsain bos dah shei goeus bang lyis doms kyauh. Shei cho yahge shei mau eq, nyamoq mas bos dah shei bang lyis doms kyauh las dvnganh gas vsainnyang kuot lai los goeus dah wotwu yah dvyhangteh soetuon zis tsain xauh.
66020014	Hauh uhlyis shei zis yahge shei mau gas munyi thomh mas khyoq kat zis tsain xauh. Hauh munyi thomh gas aiq vlhain shei cho nghuot.
66020015	Kang maussauh mas nyings ma bos soeu hank laus eq hauh munyi thomh mas khyoq kat zis tsain xauh.
66021001	Hauh thang lhyi maukhung vsaiq, nyeisjvng vsaiq lyis ngos nyvng. Cangxeih maukhung yahge nyeisjvng gas dyuk goeus, thomh eq ma joq lo.
66021002	Hauh uhlyis gyingshang wus ge dah Yerusalem wus vsaiq gas loloeu saiq xiklyis shunk dah lonyi saiq teh dye sont las, Mangso nyeis dah maukhung mhayah gyoh los yvlyis ngos nyvng.
66021003	Tsai, ngos gas hwankti tank masyah taiq thuq los dah thwe zainsmuh dvkoeuq xauhgyo. Houka, gvshih Mangso yhen ka dius yah dvgeh nghuot. Nyang nyamoq yah dvgeh huom nyeis das las nyamoq gas nyah vnyau duot das. Mangso ka nyah gungs nyang nyamoq yah dvgeh nyeis las, nyang gas nyamoq dah Mangso duot das.
66021004	Nyang gas nyamoq nyoqjeih mas dah nyoqdyeis dvnganh lyis buot tyamp dyei das. Thang pheh shei ge zis ma bos lo das; kuk zis, ngaus zis, nos zis, xikpheh dah joq zis dvnganh dyuk goeus, ge.
66021005	Hauh thang lhyi hwankti tank mas tsung toh soeu taiq zis gas, Yoeuh aq, gvshih shishenh lyis vyhang dvnganh lyis ngos vsaiq doms kuot toh, ge. Tsai, Yhensain taiq zis gas, Lhaih toh aq: khasoeh ge lyis haih dang gas jyoeng lha wontang, ge.
66021006	Hauh thang lhyi nyang taiq zis gas, Muh dye goeus. Ngos gas Alfa yahge Omega, cangxeih yahge thang thank nghuot: jeis shet soeu hank eq hau jeisthuq dwang mas dah jeis lyis phauh ma gyoh xauh shuk das toeuh ngos dyei das.
66021007	Yoh ung soeu ka dang thoengh yah dvyhangteh xauh kham yoeus das las, ngos gas nyamoq dah Mangso duot las nyamoq eq ngah lo jens duot das.
66021008	Nghuot laus eq gyuk ehnyet bos bang, ma lomsjingh las dang ma jings bang, vchoqh vjyot bang, dius sat bang, yauxi bang, hweq kat bang, silho paiq bang yahge hwah bang dvnganh gas nyi yahge hwank ngeh nyeis dah thomh mas xauh tsain joeng das. Houka aiq vlhain shei cho nghuot, ge.
66021009	Hauh uhlyis thang thank dah yomh yah dyingh joq dah kom nyhet lom chi dah loeuswons bang nyhet yuk mas dvyuk ngah jyank los las, Los aq hauh Yvnglo dah yhensain nyhiq ge dah lonyi saiq ngos nvng lyis chixoeuq bah, ge ngos lyis taiq.
66021010	Tsai, hauh dyos gas ngos lyis shwih las hauh loeuswons soeu ka ngos lyis svsoh nyhang dah boms thyoh mas shwih doq loh las, Mangso nyeis dah maukhung masyah gyoh los gyingshang dah Yerusalem wus ngos lyis chixoeuq.
66021011	Hauh wus gas Mangso dah phunk yah bvng joq. Hauh wus gas shang dah bvngtoenk, nvgvthweq luk yahge phauh dah luk teh bvng joq.
66021012	Hauh wusciank zainsmuh gas kuhxing zis yah nyhang lha khomh dvci aiq khomh bos. Hauh khomh jens mas loeuswons bang dvci aiq yuk tsain zungh nyeis. Hauh khomh jens thoq mas Israel jens dvci aiq koq dah nyings tsain lhaih tap toh.
66021013	Buisthuq shot wus khomh somh koeuq, mautsung shot wus khomh somh koeuq, mautyi shot wus khomh somh koeuq, buiswvng shot pheh wus khomh somh koeuq nghuot.
66021014	Hauh wusciank lyis luk vpom dvci aiq koeuq dah thoq mas ci toh las, hauh khomh jens mas Yvnglo dah lvgyo jens dvci aiq yuk dah nyings lhaih toh.
66021015	Ngos yah jisgoh dah loeuswons soeu loq mas wus lyis eq, wus khomh jens lyis eq, wusciank lyis eq, keq das xiklyis xing keqseh dvkoeuq chi toh.
66021016	Hauh wus gas nyei thunk nghuot las, mau tsung yahge mautyi shot pheh dvyhangteh nghuot. Loeuswons soeu ka keqseh yah hauh wus lyis keq lyis lywas choeu, xing choeu, nyhang choeu main dvkhyoengh oengxo nghuot.
66021017	Tsai, hauh wusciank lyis eq keq yoeuh lyis dius keq zis yah dvyhangteh nghuot. Loeuswons soeu keq lyis pe 216 nyhang.
66021018	Hauh wusciank lyis nvgvthweq luk yah ci toh, hauh wus lyis gas lhoqshang dah bvngtoenk teh doeus dah xing gyingh yah kuot toh.
66021019	Hauh wusciank vpom luk jens lyis phauhdap luk vja ja yah shunk toh. Cangxeih dah vpom luk gas nvgvthweq, aiq gas nila, somh gas mvhoya, nyei gas myaq,
66021020	oeng gas jyaung, khyuk gas patvmyah, nyhet gas sengmut, xet gas myet-yweh, gau gas uqtapvyah, dvci ka mvhoya nyaus, dvci das gas wakintu, dvci aiq gas thitun nila tsain nghuot.
66021021	Hauh wus khomh dvci aiq koeuq eq pvleh dvci aiq koeuq nghuot. Khomh khanghmuh pvleh dvkoeuq koeuq nghuot. Hauh wus dah talhoeu cho ka bvngtoenk teh bvng dah xing gyingh nghuot.
66021022	Hauh wus vkhau mha Yhenmuh lyis ngos ma nyvng. Khasoeh ge lyis Maukhung Jesphung Yhensain Mangso yahge Yvnglo gas hauh wus dah yhenmuh nghuot.
66021023	Hauh wus lyis pank dyei das zis buis yahge lhamhmuh ma chah. Khasoeh ge lyis Mangso dah phunk gas hauh wus lyis pank dyei las Yvnglo gas hauh nyibung nghuot.
66021024	Nyeisjvng dius jens gas hauh wus dah bvng zis yah tsain suh e das. Nyeisjvng dah hwankti jens eq vsainnyang yoh dah yhenzis yoskhuih lyis hauh wus mas chi wvng los das.
66021025	Hauh wus khomh jens lyis dvnyeih gonh phank hanh toh das. Nyamoq lyis khanhamp eq nyheih toh das zis ma nghuot, khasoeh ge lyis hauh wus mas nyenh ge zis ma bos.
66021026	Dius nyau jens dah phunk nyoqnho ngelang yahge nyeisgis yaplhoq cho jens lyis hauh wus mas tsain chi wvng los das.
66021027	Nghuot laus eq vwot v-oeu cha eq hauh wus mas yoh wvng das zis ma nghuot. Vchoqh vjyot, vwot v-oeu kuot soeu, hwah cho chank soeu eq, hauh wus mas khanhamp eq xauh wvng das zis ma nghuot. Yvnglo dah kang maussauh mas nyings bos bang kyingh hauh wus mas xauh wvng das.
66022001	Tsai loeuswons soeu ka Mangso yahge Yvnglo dah hwankti tank masyah yaus thuq los las hauh wus chomuh gungs chank yaus loh, pvt teh cingh dah kang jeismuh lvng ngos lyis Chixoeuq.
66022002	Hauh jeismuh lvng thyitvp haqtvp jeis yvm chank yah shih dvci aiq ja shih dah, kang dwis nhang dah saiqzains tsain bos. Hauh yvmas lhamhmuh dvkhyvp dvlhain, dvzvn lyis dvci aiq lhain vshih shih joq. Hauh saiqzains dah vhuq eq dius nyau jens dah nos lhoq gis das xiklyis nghuot.
66022003	Thang pheh hauh wus mas Mangso dah nhoengh xauh ge zis cha eq ma bos lo das. Mangso yahge Yvnglo dah hwankti tank gas hauh wus dah vkhau mha joq das las, nyah jyeidwis jens nyang lyis phuqsoe das.
66022004	Nyamoq gas nyah nyoqnho lhyi xauh nyvng nyeis das. Nyamoq dah ngelang mas nyah nyings lhaih tap toh das.
66022005	Houmha nyenhyo ma bos lo das. Nyamoq nyibung bvng zis eq, buis bvng zis eq ma chah lo. Khasoeh ge lyis Yhensain Mangso ka nyamoq dah bvng zis duot das. Hauh thoq lyis nyamoq gas hwankti duot las vcaiq vto guon nyeis das.
66022006	Hauh thang lhyi loeuswons soeu ka, Haih dang jens gas dan las yoh loms. Lvpe jens lyis dyos dyei dah Yhensain Mangso ka shishenh ma nyangh lyis bweh los das cho, nyah jyeidwis jens jyank mas chixoeuq das xiklyis nyah loeuswons soeu lhyi nhang kat.
66022007	Yesu gas, Gyo yoeus aq, ngos lvnyap jweh los das! Haih maussauh mas bos lvpe jens dah dang lyis domsyos gyo las chank nyeis soeu ka ngelhoq, ge ngos lyis taiq.
66022008	Ngos Yohan gas haih cho jens lyis xauh eq xauhgyo, nyvng eq nyvng soeu nghuot. Heinyhoq dye xauhgyo zis yahge dye nyvng thang lhyi, ngos lyis haih cho chixoeuq dah loeuswons soeu khyeiyang mas, nyang lyis paiq das zis ngos phvluk zomhgyuis bah oen.
66022009	Nghuot laus eq nyang gas, Housoeh vkuot, ngos gas nvng, nah boekyis lvpe jens yahge haih maussauh mas dah dang lyis domsyos gyo zis yah chank nyeis bang dah loeuzomh changh jyeidwis dvnghuot. Mangso lhyi paiq aq, ge ngos lyis taiq.
66022010	Tsai, nyang gas haih cho dvnganh yah bweh das shishenh ni los goeus las, haih maussauh mas bos dah lvpe dang jens lyis vnghop shung toh.
66022011	Ma dan soeu ka ma dan khyvlyis chank nyeis shih bas jungh, ma lhoq ma shang soeu ka ma lhoq ma shang khyvlyis nghuot nyeis shih bas jungh, dan soeu ka dan khyvlyis nghuot nyeis shih bas jungh, gyingshang soeu ka gyingshang khyvlyis nghuot joq shih bas jungh.
66022012	Gyo aq, ngos lvnyap jweh lyih das, dvyuk yah dvyuk vsainnyang kuot goeus dah muhzoh yah dvyhangteh shangh das phauh lyis ngos yah dvgeh chi lyih das.
66022013	Ngos gas Alpha yahge Omega, cangxeih yahge thang thank zis nghuot.
66022014	Kangdwis nhang dah saiqzains mas dah vshih xauh zo das zis yahge, wus khomh cho chank yah wus mas wvng das toeuh yoh shoq, vsainnyang dah dyimis lyis cheihshang tyamp bang gas ngelhoq.
66022015	Nghuot laus eq dius teh yangh ma doeus lo shoq mulyanghsenh bang, hweq kat bang, nyetnau muh kuot bang, dius sat bang, silho paiq bang yahge hwah cho lhyi ngwis las chank kuot bang dvnganh gas wus nghe mha xauh nyeis das, ge ngos lyis taiq.
66022016	Ngos Yesu gas phung khau mha nyeis dah namoq lyis haih cho jeis taiq kyoh das nyhenshang ngah loeuswons lyis nhang kat. Ngos gas Dawi yhenbang masyah dyos lyih soeu nghuot. Ngos gas bvng dah buhnyhiq nghuot.
66022017	Hauh dyos yahge lonyi saiq gas, Los aq, tsain ge. Hauh zis xauhgyo yoeus soeu hank laus eq, Lo aq, ge bas jungh. Jeis shet soeu ka los bas jungh, kang jeis lyis omes soeu hank laus eq, phauh ma gyoh gyoh jyungshuk khyvlyis lhom yoeus bas jungh.
66022018	Ngos Yohan gas haih maussauh mas bos dah lvpe dang xauhgyo bang dvnganh lyis, gvgis zaih nhang. Haih dang mas dvja ja lhungh soeu hank lyis laus eq, Mangso ka haih maussauh mas bos joeng dah yomh lung dyei das.
66022019	Haih maussauh mas bos lvpe dang masyah dvja ja yoeus tyamp soeu hank lyis laus eq, hai mha lhaih toh kang dwis nhang saiqzains mas dah vshih xauh zo das toeuh yahge gyingshang wus mas wvng das toeuh lyis Mangso yoeus tyamp dyei das.
66022020	Haih cho lhyi kanghjyoeng kat dyei soeu ka, Jyoengh nghuot goeus. Ngos lvnyap jweh lyih das, ge. Amen. Yhensain Yesu eh, jweh los aq!
66022021	Yhensain Yesu dah jyehjuh gas Mangso dah dius jens yah dvgeh nghuot bas jungh! Amen.
